column2: METHOD FOR SORTING DATA IN MULTI-CORE OR SINGLE-CORE PROCESSOR
column4: Provided in the present disclosure are a method and system for sorting data in single-core and multi-core processors. The system and method may be involved in a combined processing apparatus, and the combined processing apparatus may further comprise a universal interconnection interface and another processing apparatus. A computing apparatus interacts with the other processing apparatus to jointly complete a computing operation designated by a user. The combined processing apparatus may further comprise a storage apparatus, which is respectively connected to a device and the other processing apparatus, and is used for storing data of the device and the other processing apparatus. By means of the solution of the present disclosure, the running efficiency of operations can be improved in various fields of data processing including, for example, the field of artificial intelligence, thereby reducing the overall overheads and costs for operations.

column2: METHODS AND DEVICES FOR EARTH REMOTE SENSING USING STEREOSCOPIC HYPERSPECTRAL IMAGING IN THE VISIBLE (VIS) AND INFRARED (IR) BANDS
column4: A hyperspectral stereoscopic CubeSat with computer vision and artificial intelligence capabilities consists of a device and a data processing methodology. The device comprises a number of VIS-NIR-TIR hyperspectral sensors, a central processor with memory, a supervisor system running independently of the imager system, radios, a solar panel and battery system, and an active attitude control system. The device is launched into low earth orbit to capture, process, and transmit stereoscopic hyperspectral imagery in the visible and infrared portions of the electromagnetic spectrum. The processing methodology therein comprises computer vision and convolutional neural network algorithms to perform spectral feature identification and data transformations.

column2: PHOTOGRAPHIC DEVICE AND AI-BASED OBJECT RECOGNITION METHOD THEREOF
column4: An AI-based object recognition method is provided to recognize an object in a first image captured by a photographic device at a first shooting angle. The method includes: Step A, determining a difference value between the first shooting angle and a preset second shooting angle; Step B, converting the first image into a second image with a view angle of the second shooting angle when the difference value is greater than a preset value; and Step C, sending the second image to an artificial intelligence model for recognition.

column2: INTELLIGENT SYSTEM THAT AUTOMATICALLY ADJUSTING OPTIMAL REHABILITATION INTENSITY OR EXERCISE VOLUME WITH PERSONALIZED EXERCISE PRESCRIPTION
column4: An intelligent system that automatically adjusting optimal rehabilitation intensity or exercise volume with personalized exercise prescription, comprising: upload the physiological information data measured by registered members to a cloud data integration server through the Internet; an expert diagnostic unit, which can download and use the member's physiological information data from the cloud data integration server. After the diagnosis, a personalized exercise prescription is issued and uploaded to the cloud data integration server; a rehabilitation fitness equipment unit can download the exercise prescription from the cloud data integration server to control and automatically adjust the optimal rehabilitation intensity or exercise volume; after being diagnosed by experts such as doctors, rehabilitators or fitness coaches, the optimal parameter values of a continuously updated artificial intelligence exercise prescription can be used to improve the efficacy of personal rehabilitation or exercise fitness.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR USING METABOLIC DATA TO OPTIMIZE ATHLETIC PERFORMANCE
column4: A method for optimizing at least one exercise is provided. The method includes receiving user data. The user data includes biometric attribute data associated with a user of an exercise device. The method includes generating at least one interval, the at least one interval including at least duration data and target power data each associated with the exercise. The method includes during the at least one interval, receiving measurement data associated with at least one of the user and the exercise device. The method includes calculating, based on the measurement data and the user data, energy data associated with an expended energy of the user during the at least one interval, the energy data including quantity data and source information each associated with at least one energy source. The method includes generating, via an artificial intelligence engine, a machine learning model trained to identify the at least one energy source.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ANALYZING GOLF SWING VIDEOS AND GENERATING EFFECTIVE GOLF ADVICE USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: An automated system and method for analyzing a golf swing video and generating golf professional advice using artificial intelligence (AI). The system receives user video data from a user device; generates user swing signature data from the user video data using an initial AI; generates golf professional advice outputs from the user swing signature data using a final AI; and sends the golf professional advice outputs to the user device to be output on the user device. The final AI may take as input the user swing signature data or user profile class data, as well as golf professional advice data and user feedback data. The user profile class data may be generated based on user profile data and an intermediate AI, where the user profile data is based on the user swing signature data and other user data.

column2: AN ARTIFICIALLY INTELLIGENT IMAGE BASED DIGITAL SCORING SYSTEM FOR TARGET PAPER EVALUATION IN TARGET UNIT
column4: The role of artificial intelligence is inevitable in the sports simulation and its result evaluation, the system performs image-based target sheet evaluation for shooting and archery by capturing the image of the target sheet and overlaps it with a predefined reference target sheet with unique colour for each ring using image processing technique. Once overlapped the artificial intelligent technique is used to segregate the target sheet into two main categories namely one with distinct marking for each shoot that tallies the total number of markings on the target sheet and total number of shoots. The other is where there is a difference in count clearly implying multiple shoots on same spot for which the system performs image processing for the target sheet before and after each shoot as recorded earlier and finally subjects to colour based scoring using the fuzzy inference engine.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LEARNING USING MESSAGING SERVICE AND METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR RELAYING ANSWER USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: Provided are an artificial intelligence (AI) learning method and system and an answer relay method and system using an AI. According to an AI learning method, an AI may transmit a question to users through a messaging service and may acquire learning data for the AI through reactions of the user to the transmitted question.

column2: UPPER-BODY EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: An upper-body exercising device, comprising of L-shaped platform 1 for performing an upper-body exercise, plurality of mace weights 2 arranged in an ascending order, a touch interactive display panel 3 for enabling user to input details regarding expertise level, an inbuilt microcontroller actuates a robotic gripper 4 for extending towards one of mace weights 2 in order to grip mace weight, an artificial intelligence based image capturing module 5 for capturing and processing images of user to detect height of user to align mace weight in proximity to user, a force sensor 6 for detecting grip of user over weights 2, an audio unit 7 to generate audio notification for alerting user, a thermal based imaging unit 8 for monitoring movement of user while performing exercise to detect posture of user, and a laser projector 9 for illuminating beam of lights to project an appropriate posture.

column2: SURFING ASSISTIVE DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a surfing assistive device, comprising a v-shaped board 1 having a first and second portion, the first portion 2 is used for accommodating a user and the second portion 3 to float on the water and acting as a base for portion 2, a pair of hollow pipes 4 with centrifugal pump 7 for discharging pressurized water, a pair of rectangular plates 8 for propelling the board 1, a telescopically operated handle 10 for providing a grip to the user, an artificial intelligence-based imaging module 14 for detecting posture and height of the user, a microphone 15 for providing access to the user to give input commands for performing different types of flips, a harness 11 for assisting the user in posture maintenance, multiple L-shaped bars 16 for propelling the surfing board 1, an elastic fiber 18 for controlling the wind flow.

column2: YOGA PRACTICING ASSISTIVE DEVICE
column4: A yoga practicing assistive device, comprising of a platform 1 made-up of plurality of blocks positioned on a ground utilized for accommodating a user for focused towards practicing various yoga, a touch enabled screen 2 mapped on the platform 1 for select type of yoga and for displaying an animation video of posture, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 3 mounted on the platform 1 for capturing image, a pair of C-shaped members 4 configured on the platform 1 via a pair of motorized sliders to detect positioning of the user chest portion, a pair of motorized clamps 5 configured on the platform 1 via the motorized sliders for gripping the user legs, a motorized hinge configured between each of the block to detect incorrect posture of the user.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR GENERATING TREATMENT PLANS TO ENHANCE PATIENT RECOVERY BASED ON SPECIFIC OCCUPATIONS
column4: A method is disclosed for generating a treatment plan to modify an attribute of a user, wherein the attribute of the user is associated with an attribute of an occupational task. The method includes receiving data associated with the user, wherein the data comprises the modified attribute of the user and the attribute of the occupational task; accessing a database comprising data associated with exercises associated with the modified attribute of the user and the attribute of the occupational task; and generating, via an artificial intelligence engine, the treatment plan comprising an exercise of the exercises associated with the modified attribute of the first user and the attribute of the occupational task, wherein the artificial intelligence engine generates the treatment plan comprising the exercise based on the data associated with the user and the data associated with the exercises.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-ENABLED GOLF COURSE
column4: A system for monitoring and recording and processing an activity includes one or more cameras for automatically recording video of the activity. A processor and memory associated and in communication with the camera is disposed near the location of the activity. The system may include AI logic configured to identify a user recorded within a video frame captured by the camera. The system may also detect and identify a user when the user is located within a predetermined area. The system may include a video processing engine configured to process images within the video frame to identify the user and may modify and format the video upon identifying the user and the activity. The system may include a communication module to communicate formatted video to a remote video processing system, which may further process the video and enable access to a mobile app of the user.

column2: TABLE TENNIS GAME TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A table tennis game training device, comprising a platform 1 assembled with multiple telescopically operated rods 2 to perform training regarding the game, an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 3 for determining height of user(s), a touch interactive display panel 4 for enabling the user to input details regarding level and mode of training, a cylindrical body 5 for launching the ball towards the user(s), a chamber 6 for storing balls, an iris lid 7 assembled for dispensing a ball, an electromagnetic spring 8 for expanding the spring 8 to launch the ball towards the user(s),multiple racket 9 for stroking the ball and a pneumatically operated clamp 10 with multiple links 11 for gripping a wrist portion of the user(s) for stroking of ball.

column2: POLE CLIMBING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a pole climbing device, comprises of a U-shaped telescopic frame 1 developed to be positioned in close proximity to a pole which the user wants to climb, a pair of suction cups 2 are attached underneath frame 1 for providing stability to frame 1 on surface, a pair of plates 3 electromagnetically attached with frame 1 for attaining a standing posture on plates 3 while climbing pole, an artificial intelligence enabled capturing module positioned on frame 1 for detecting height of user, a user interface installed within a computing unit associated with device for allowing user to provide input commands regarding halting of climbing operation, an inflatable component 12 equipped by user over a torso region during climbing for inflating component 12 in a manner to prevent any injury to user.

column2: JAVELIN THROW TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A javelin throw training device comprises of a pair of elongated frames 1 equipped with plurality of rings 2 to enable a user for passing a javelin from one of the rings 2 for performing aim training, a touch enabled screen 4 for selecting an expertise level of training, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 5 to decode height of the user and according positioning the rings 2, a motorized slider 6 for translating each of the rings 2 in a to-and-fro motion, an LED (Light Emitting Diode) for indicating the user to pass the javelin from one of the rings 2 glowed with the LED, A motorized iris lid 7 to open/close in accordance to the user-selected expertise level, a speaker 9 for notifying regarding incorrect throw and a motorized wheel 8 is for positioning the rings 2 at an appropriate distance from the user.

column2: ASSISTIVE ARM REHABILITATION DEVICE
column4: An assistive arm rehabilitation device comprises of a C-shaped frame 1 having a first and second portion 2,3 attached with a flexible metallic wire 5 configured with a ring 6 to perform the exercise via moving ring 6 from one end to other of the wire 5, a touch interactive display panel 7 to select exercising level, multiple electromagnetic blocks 8 for changing orientation of wire 5, an artificial intelligence-based imaging module 9 for determining arm length of user, a pair of extendable U-shaped clamps 10 along with a slider 11 for placing user?™s arm and translating clamps 10, an iris lid 12 for altering diameter of hole of ring.

column2: SKATING ASSISTIVE DEVICE
column4: A skating assistive device comprises of a pair of circular body 1 configured with blocks 2 utilized by user to position foot, a pair of motorized wheels 3 attached to bodies 1 maneuver device as per requirement of user, a strap 4 configured with blocks 2 for securing user?™s feet over blocks 2, a pair of motorized clamps 5 installed over each block 2 for gripping user calf?™s portion, a computing unit linked with microcontroller accessed by user for selecting destination to travel and speed of skating, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 6 detects presence of obstacle in a path for actuating a speaker 7 for alerting user, a pair of electromagnets fabricated on outer periphery of bodies 1 get energized to attached bodies 1 for providing passage to narrow path and a pressure sensor detects pressure exerted by user over blocks 2 for stopping device.

column2: FOOTBALL TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A football training device, comprising a platform 1 installed with a circular frame 4 for providing a target structure that is to be aimed by a user, a motorized rack 5 stored with multiple footballs for allowing user to continue a football training, an artificial intelligence-based imaging unit 6 for capturing and processing images of user and actuates a holographic projection unit 7 for projecting a holographic image of a target object on frame 4, a telescopic rod 8 for extending in a manner to alter height of frame 4 in order to adjust intensity of training, a wearable component 9 developed to be equipped by user and actuates a motorized roller 10 attached via a string 11 in order roll and unroll string 11 to provide resistance to user, and plurality of impact sensors 12 for detecting area of impact of football on frame 4.

column2: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED HELMET FOR ACCIDENT DETECTION AND NOTIFICATION
column4: ABSTRACT OF THE INVENTION Accidents caused by road hazards are more likely to happen when riding a bike. Potholes, sewer grates, railroad and trolley lines, and other road hazards are the ones most likely to result in bicycle accidents. Due to the obvious reasons that they have less surrounding safety than four-wheelers like vehicles, bikers are the most accident-prone individuals when it comes to suffering significant death injuries. Once he has his hands on his ride, every rider should be cautious, observant, and think that a traffic collision should be the very last thing that might happen to him and his ride. The frequency of accidents is increasing as there are more 2-wheeled motor vehicles on the road. Most fatalities happen either because the person wasn't wearing a helmet or because they were. To get around this, this invention suggests a smart helmet for preventing accidents and warning the wearer before an accident occurs. Alcohol/Gas sensor (MQ5) built into the helmet can determine whether the rider is intoxicated. In order to locate the rider and contact the closest emergency service in the event of an accident, the GSM and GPS have been incorporated to our project. Alcohol sensors can detect the presence of alcohol on a rider's breath. If the motor speed surpasses 100 km/h, an LED will flash. uses a cardiac pulse sensor to check the state of the human body (Heart Beat). The helmet has sensors that sense the environment and send signals to a microcontroller, such as an Arduino Board, to check the conditions. The RF module has a reception unit at the bike and a transmitter unit at the helmet where data is wirelessly transmitted. The two-wheeler battery or an external battery can supply the necessary energy for operation. The bike's buzzer alerts the other riders to the rider's aberrant condition if their heart rate increases or decreases while they are operating it. The rider's head and the cruiser's speed are determined separately by a Force Sensing Resistor (FSR) and a BLDC Fan. When an accident due to high speed is imminent, it will send the wearer an alert. This concept will help India develop in a safer and more secure manner. Just one step forward for the culture that requires smart helmet use while operating a motorcycle.

column2: PORTABLE TENNIS TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A portable tennis training device, comprising of a platform 1 developed to be positioned over a ground surface and arranged with multiple omnidirectional wheels 2 for maneuvering platform 1 on surface, an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 3 for capturing images of surroundings and determines location of a user and further actuates wheels 2 to move platform 1 towards user for performing tennis training, a touch interactive display panel 4 for enabling a user to input details regarding speed of ball and actuates a launching unit 5 for launching a ball positioned within launching unit 5, that is further hit by user via a tennis racket held by user, and a rope 6 connected to an electromagnetic spring 7 for providing resistance to rope 6 after launching, to increase difficulty experienced by user while hitting ball.

column2: FINGER EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: A finger exercising device comprises of a cylindrical telescopically operated hollow body 1 for accommodating the fingers of the user, a first end 2 of the body 1 for enabling the entry of the finger, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 4 to capture multiple images, a set of rings 5 to allow the positioning of the fingers , multiple pneumatic pins 6 for enabling the extraction/retraction of rings 5, a microphone 7 for giving the input command regarding the type of exercise, a couple of motorized hinges 8 for allowing the rings 5 to bend, a motorized iris lid 9 attached on a second end 3 of the body 1 for suitable positioning of the finger inside the lid 9 , a telescopic operated rod 14 in order to allow the extension/retraction of the lid 9 and a cushion pad 10 to provide comfort.

column2: CYCLING TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A cycling training device, comprises of a frame 1 established on a surface having first and second portion 2, 3, the first portion 2 is installed with touch interactive display panel 4 for entering details regarding distance to travel and surface upon which user desires to ride, an artificial intelligence based image capturing module 5 mounted on second portion 3 to determine bicycle?™s length, multiple horizontal telescopic links 6 assembled at first portion 2 that extends/retracts as per bicycle?™s length, at least two pairs of vertical telescopic links 7 are assembled on horizontal telescopic links 6 and coupled with roller 8 for positioning bicycle, a pair of robotic arm 9 is assembled on first portion 2 for gripping bicycle and a body harness 10 is attached on second portion 3 via a pneumatic rod 11 that is equipped by user.

column2: SWIMMING TRAINING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a swimming training device, comprising of a rectangular platform 1 with first and second portion installed on a ground surface. a telescopically operated rod for providing extension and retraction to the platform 1, a multiple suction cups 3 for adhering the platform 1 to the ground, a elongated member 4 to accommodate a user, a touch-enabled screen 5 permitting the user to give commands, an artificial intelligence enable image 7 for capturing m various images of the user, a pair of wearable unit 8 attached via strings 9 for assisting the user to perform swimming strokes, a motorized slider 10 for providing a user back and forth motion, a holographic projector 12 for projecting visual representation to guide the user for training.

column2: BASEBALL BATTING TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A baseball batting training device comprises of elongated body 1 having an upper 2 and a lower 3 portion, upper portion 2 attached with horizontal telescopic rod 5 having ball 8 of flexible material, artificial intelligence based image capturing module 4 to capture images of the body 1, a freely rotatable bearing 12 to evaluate strength applied by the user, a touch-enabled display panel 6 to allow user to enter details regarding the angle of positioning, motorized ball and socket joint 7 for providing a multidirectional motion to the ball 8, multiple pressure sensors 9 to measure pressure applied by the user on ball 8 , a motorized slider 11 to provide a linear motion to the roller 10, the roller 10 is wrapped with a string 13 to apply pressure on the rod 5 which helps the user in providing training.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED PERSONAL HEALTH MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column4: An artificial intelligence-based personal health management system. The system consists of a personal health information acquisition terminal (11), the Internet (12), an artificial intelligence identification subsystem (13), a personal health information storage system (14), and a personal health management system (15). By means of capturing photos by using a mobile phone, a user acquires personal medical health data, such as medical records, medical images and physical examination reports, and uploads same to a personal cloud account for storage; and personal health information is regularly recorded by voice. The cloud-based artificial intelligence identification system (13) identifies, organizes, archives and classifies said personal medical health information. According to the personal health information, the personal health management system (15) manages personal health, e.g., carries out medical advice management, exercise management, and diet management. A mobile phone app is provided on a user terminal. The user can complete various functions, such as registration, login, acquisition, and management, through the mobile phone app.

column2: J-SLEEVE SYSTEM
column4: The J-Sleeve System provides a system for collecting and analyzing data from the athletic performance of an athlete to provide feedback and advice on preferred movements to produce increased accuracy and efficient in the performance of the athlete and to improve understanding of the competitive landscape. Users would wear the J-sleeve on their arm during workouts, games, back yard skill sessions for which data is desired for analysis with JSS to improve efficiency and performance of user. JSS uses data and artificial intelligence to improve the efficiency of the athletes and their athletic performance. JSS capabilities include athletic movement form replay and accuracy, movement location tracking, fatigue level tracking, social sharing and competition, and a virtual clipboard for developing plays and positioning, and video game integration. The virtual clipboard allows users to draft optimal plays using data to determine the user with the best chance of success.

column2: CLIMBING TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A climbing training device comprises of a lemniscate shaped platform 1 fabricated with stretchable fabric 2 placed over ground, multiple telescopic rods 3 mapped on the ground surface to lift the platform 1, a pneumatically powered ladder 4 attached side to the platform 1 that extend and retract and allow user to reach to platform 1, a touch enabled display panel 5 mounted over the platform 1 to allow user to enter details regarding shape of surface over which user want to climb, a multiple of motorized rollers wrapped with multiple ropes 6 and each ropes 6 is paired with fabric 2, a harness 7 attached with the telescopic bar mapped over platform 1 through, an artificial intelligence module 9 mounted over platform 1 to capture multiple images of user for monitoring training session of user.

column2: HIGH JUMP TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A high jump training device, comprises of a platform 1 positioned over a ground surface, a display screen 2 accessed by a user for providing input, an artificial intelligence (AI) based imaging unit 3 for capturing and processing surrounding images in order to determine height of user while providing input over screen 2, a panel 4 installed with multiple laser lights 5 that projects a beam of laser light in surrounding of platform 1 to form a trajectory for user to trace while running, a pair of rods 6 positioned with a bar 7 via a motorized slider 8 that translate bar 7 along rod 6 to orient bar 7 at an optimum height for user to jump across bar 7 in order to perform high jump after completing trajectory, a speaker 9 for producing voice commands for instructing user to perform high jump in an appropriate manner.

column2: PERFORMANCE MODELING AND ANALYSIS OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) ACCELERATOR ARCHITECTURES
column4: ABSTRACTA method includes receiving one or more input Artificial Intelligence (AI) networks, transforming the AI networks into respective graphs including interconnected logical operators, and mapping the graphs onto a design of a hardware accelerator including a plurality of interconnected hardware engines. A performance of running the AI networks on the design of the hardware accelerator is simulated using a petri-net simulation.

column2: RECOGNIZANCE OF ELECTRICAL, MECHANICAL AND THERMAL PARAMETERS IN ELECTRIC TRAINS USING AI & ML
column4: An electric locomotive is the one which is powered by the use of electricity from the overhead lines, or a on-board energy storage likely Electro-chemical cell or the super capacitor. These types of the electric locomotives get their benefits from the high efficiency of the electric motors often above the better efficiency of 90%. Adding up to it give the additional efficiency which can be gained from the regenerative braking which allows the kinetic energy to be recovered from the braking system. When the brakes are applied the energy spent in braking is recovered and feed into the motors for the better additional efficiency. The Electrical, Mechanical and Thermal parameters of a train are of a very great importance in bringing into judgment whether the said train is running smoothly and with stability. As the electric locomotives are is quiet when compared to the diesel engines as there is no engine there is no exhaust of noise and mechanical noise. By observing the parameters, we can monitor, control, the parameters by the use of Artificial intelligence and Machine Learning. Here, we present our model which id developed with a wireless monitoring system using Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning along with the help of sensors and microcontrollers and cutting-edge cloud technology. The wireless monitoring system records all parameters on a train to collect all the needed information and with the help of a microprocessor/microcontroller and Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning a decision is made on the possible outcomes and which outcome gives us the best usability in the system or to put it simply, higher efficiency. A test phase was initiated in a lab under a controlled environment with a mockup model and the error from the results of test phases was less than 2%. This model can be expected to play a vital role in the real-time monitoring of railway trains in the future to come.

column2: SNOWBOARD RIDING TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A snowboard riding training device consisting a frame 1 having first and second portions 2, 3, a snowboard 4 attached over first portion 2 of frame 1, an artificial intelligence based image capturing module 6 mounted over second portion 3 of frame 1 for capturing pictures, pneumatically operated rod 5 attached with snowboard 4 with first ball and socket joint 7 for providing motion to snowboard 4, spring 8 installed between joint 7 and rod 5 for compression/ decompression of board 4, virtual reality headwear 9 worn by user for path determining, couple of telescopic bars 10 via second ball and socket joint 11 attached to the frame 1 which user clasps to move 4 in desired direction, plurality of clamps 12 attached to the frame 1 grips users foot in order to prevent user from falling, FBG sensor 13 installed over frame 1 to determine vital parameters of user.

column2: AN INTELLIGENT INTERACTIVE DISPLAY SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR FITNESS TRAINING
column4: The Present invention is an Intelligent Interactive Display system and method for Fitness training. It consists of a Reflective device with touch screen, camera, microphone and speaker. The device can be connected to the smart phone or any other sensors or digital devices. This Display can measure the weight of the user from the image and can suggest a fitness programme for the user with Artificial Intelligence Algorithms. It also monitors the vital parameters of the user with wireless biometric sensors, posture of the user and connects with community and fitness trainer for real time experience.

column2: AUTOMATED AUDIO-FEEDBACK COMPUTERIZED SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) --CONTROLLED EYE EXERCISE
column4: The present invention provides a computerized AI-controlled optical system and method for tracking eye exercises of a patient, the system including an AI-controlled optical tracking device adapted to track eye exercises of a patient, a user-activated apparatus for performing eye exercises of both eyes together, and a processor adapted to receive data from the AI-controlled eye tracking device and from the user-activated apparatus thereby providing the user with eye exercises for improving user eye function over time.

column2: PERFORMANCE MODELING AND ANALYSIS OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) ACCELERATOR ARCHITECTURES
column4: A method includes receiving one or more input Artificial Intelligence (AI) networks, transforming the AI networks into respective graphs including interconnected logical operators, and mapping the graphs onto a design of a hardware accelerator including a plurality interconnected hardware engines. A performance of running the AI networks on the design of the hardware accelerator is simulated using a petri-net simulation.

column2: HEALTH MONITORING AND COACHING SYSTEM
column4: A system is disclosed that monitors participants in health-related programs, such as weight loss or exercise programs, and that provides automated, personalized health coaching to the program participants. The system includes breath analysis devices that are used by the program participants to generate ketone measurements, and includes a mobile application that runs on mobile devices of the participants and communicates with corresponding breath analysis devices. The system operates generally by monitoring ketone levels (such as acetone levels) and other attributes of the participants and by making personalized, machine-generated changes or updates to such programs to maintain program effectiveness and engagement. In some embodiments the system uses artificial intelligence to classify and coach the participants.

column2: AUTOMATED AUDIO-FEEDBACK COMPUTERIZED SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI)--CONTROLLED EYE EXERCISE
column4: The present invention provides a computerized operator-controlled optical system and method for tracking eye exercises of a patient, the system including an optical tracking device adapted to allow an operator to track eye exercises of a patient, a patient-activated apparatus for performing eye exercises of binocular vision and a processor adapted to receive data from the optical tracking device and from the patient-activated apparatus thereby providing the operator with at least one indication of the eye exercises of the patient over time.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND CLOUD BASED SMART HR MANAGEMENT SYSTEM IN FINANCIAL SECTOR USING MACHINE LEARNING ALGORITHMS
column4: Artificial Intelligence and Cloud based Smart HR Management System in Financial Sector using Machine Learning AlgorithmsABSTRACTCloud computing, machine learning, and artificial intelligence innovations are reshaping many facets of business, such as finance, healthcare, human resources, marketing, etc. People have suggested that technologies like AI, ML, and cloud have the potential to revolutionise the sport. Banking, healthcare, human resources, and marketing will be among the first industries impacted by artificial intelligence. AI and its enabling technologies, such as machine learning and deep learning, have ushered in a new era of intelligent automation and human-level recognition. AI is already disrupting industries such as finance, healthcare, human resources (HR), and marketing that have existed for decades. Artificial intelligence is the most overused keyword in contemporary solutions. It is typically advertised as a revolutionary approach to fulfilling labour demands. Businesses throughout the globe now have access to better, cheaper labour as a result of technological improvements. Additionally, they can use analytics to identify untapped sources of value for their own organisations. Today, artificial intelligence has an undeniable impact on business. AI has multiple uses in the business world, including predictive analytics for corporate intelligence, deep learning applications for picture identification, and recommendation algorithms for the creation of personalised suggestions. AI will impact non-technical parts of the economy as well. We will study the potential ethical ramifications of implementing AI, ML, and cloud technologies in the marketing, finance, healthcare, and human resources industries. In addition, we will cover why AI is crucial in business today and how these solutions operate.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR DETERMINING SKELETON DRIVE COEFFICIENT, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: Provided are a method and an apparatus for determining a skeletal driving coefficient, an electronic device, and a readable storage medium, and relates to the field of image processing technologies, and in particular, to the field of artificial intelligence or augmented reality technologies. A method includes driving a deformation, based on an initial skeletal driving coefficient, on an initial skin-skeleton model to obtain a first skinned skeleton model; and in response to a difference between the first skinned skeleton model and a target skinned skeleton model does not meet a threshold, performing at least one deformation on the first skinned skeleton model until a second skinned skeleton model, the difference between which model and the target skinned skeleton model meets the condition on the difference, is obtained, and obtaining at least one target skeletal driving coefficient used for driving the at least one deformation.

column2: METHOD FOR TRAINING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LEARNING MODEL FOR ESTIMATING HEMOGLOBIN A1C LEVEL, AND SYSTEM THEREFOR
column4: A method for training an artificial intelligence learning model for estimating a hemoglobin A1C level, comprises the steps of: collecting patient information including exercise information and biometric information of a patient; collecting an actual hemoglobin A1C level of the patient; converting the collected patient information and actual hemoglobin A1C level into a format of a single standardized data structure; and generating an artificial intelligence learning model for estimating a hemoglobin A1C level, by training the artificial intelligence learning model by using the converted patient information and actual hemoglobin A1C level, wherein the biometric information includes one or more of blood sugar, blood pressure, a heart rate, and a menstrual cycle, and the exercise information is generated on the basis of patient life log data obtained by a patient terminal.

column2: APPLICATION OF MACHINE LEARNING TO MUOS NETWORK MANAGEMENT
column4: A system for satellite communication is disclosed. The system includes a base terminal and a mobile terminal configured to communicate via a communication satellite relay. The base terminal and the mobile terminal include a receiver and a transmitter. At least one of the base terminal or the mobile terminal further includes an artificial intelligence engine configured to receive status or instruction data based on a received signal, determine an instruction or command based on the received data, prepare instruction data or updated status data, and send an instruction signal or status signal based on the instruction data or updated status data. The artificial intelligence engine utilizes a machine learning model and may generate the machine learning model.

column2: OPERATIONAL METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR NEURAL NETWORK MODEL AND TRAINING METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR NEURAL NETWORK MODEL
column4: The present application discloses an operational method and apparatus for a neural network model and a training method and apparatus for a neural network model in the field of artificial intelligence. In the operational method, a winograd-transformed weight matrix is used for performing feature extraction on a winograd-transformed input data matrix to obtain an intermediate matrix, each element in the intermediate matrix is determined according to a distance L1 between the transformed input data matrix and an element at a corresponding position in the transformed weight matrix, and output data transform is performed on the intermediate matrix by means of a winograd algorithm to obtain an output data matrix. According to the solution of the present application, a point multiplication operation in winograd is replaced with an addition operation such as an operation of calculating the distance L1, thereby reducing the calculation amount of the feature extraction process, improving the running speed of the model, and reducing the operational overhead.

column2: A SYSTEM BASED ON BIG DATA ANALYTICS TO PROVIDE EFFICIENT MARKETING STRATEGY FOR E-COMMERCE
column4: The present invention discloses a system based on big data analytics to provide efficient marketing strategy for e-commerce. The system includes, but not limited to, an artificial intelligence based interface for utilising an information gathering agent on the marketing system computing device, dynamically collect data on customer interactions related to a specific customer from a client-side agent running on a client computing device connected to the unique consumer. Further, the intelligence analytic system, information acquisition system, intelligent marketing system, and customer service system known as Panorama are distinguished by including Information Exchange System, which is linked to data from the panorama customer service system, the intelligent marketing system, and the intelligent analysis system.Accompanied Drawing [FIGS. 1-2]

column2: AN INTELLIGENT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM FOR FOUL DETECTION AND PERFORMANCE ANALYSIS IN FOOTBALL MATCHES USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE WITH MACHINE LEARNING TECHNIQUES
column4: Disclosed herein is a system and method system for evaluating performance of football players in football matches. The system comprises a plurality of 3D depth cameras (100); one or more wearable sensors (200); a control device (300); and an internet communication channel. The 3D depth cameras (100) are mounted in plurality of stations inside a football stadium where the football players participate in the football matches, whereas the 3D depth cameras are adapted to capture video/image of the football matches. The wearable sensors (200) are to be worn by the football players while playing the football matches, whereas the wearable sensors (200) are adapted to read physiological parameters of the football players. The control device (300) is in internet communication with the 3D depth cameras (100) and the wearable sensors (200) to receive, record, and analyse the data associated with the video/image and the physiological parameters. The control device (300) comprises an internet of things (IoT) enabled microprocessor embedded with a neural network trained engine configured for: detecting foul events based on unfair practices as noticed in the image/video frames; counting number of the foul events with respect to identity credentials of the football players; predicting intentions of the football players causing the foul event using the physiological parameters of the football players; and computing a performance rating for each of the football players based on the number of the foul events and the intention of the football player causing such foul event.

column2: METHOD, DEVICE, AND SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED CONTENT USING CHIN-UP DEVICE
column4: Provided is a system for providing a content by using an exercise device, the system comprising: an exercise device including at least a base frame, a device part configured to have a bar shape so that a user can do a chin-up exercise, and a communication part; a user terminal; and a server, wherein: the device part includes a sensor capable of counting the number of chin-ups of a user and recognizing motion of the user, at the center part of the device part, and transmits first data regarding the number of chin-ups of the user and the motion of the user obtained from the sensor to the user terminal; and the server generates exercise performance data of the user on the basis of the received data, builds time series data regarding movement of the user with respect to the exercise performance data by using a voting model based on linear regression, a decision tree, and a support vector machine, and predicts a degree of fatigue of a human body and a mental state of the user from past movement data and present movement date of the time series data by using a first artificial neural network.

column2: SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLED FARMING
column4: The present invention mainly discloses a system that involves controlled farming in a fully enclosed chamber that has no contact to the outside environmental factors for the growth of various plant species. All the factors that are required for the growth of the plants are provided inside the chamber by virtue of a system through which the growth and quality of the plant species is enhanced. The same is achieved by providing the factors for growth such as light means, air and temperature means, nutrient means, the said parameters which will be checked, moderated and controlled through a chamber running on AI module (artificial intelligence).

column2: SISTEMA Y PROCEDIMIENTO DE ALARMA, VERIFICACIÃ“N Y ACTUACIÃ“N EN REMOTO BASADO EN INTELIGENCIA ARTIFICIAL
column4: The remote alarm, verification and action system and procedure based on artificial intelligence comprises at least one camera, an image processing unit with artificial intelligence analysis capacity, a control unit, a radiofrequency information emission system and a WEB + Mobile management interface hosted on a server. Said device has the capacity to recognize within the images taken by its camera the different objectives of previously configured reconnaissance and emit an alarm signal, as well as send a signal or activate a system by means of a relay or similar in case of recognition. column2: AUTOMATIC SMART HEALTH CARE SYSTEM TO PREVENT AND DETECT ALL TYPES OF LIVER DISEASE AND ALL TYPES OF CANCER AND DIAGNOSE AT EARLY STAGE USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, CLOUD COMPUTING, IMAGE PROCESSING AND DEEP LEARNING ALGORITHMS
column4: [05] The elderly is disproportionately affected by Alzheimer's disease (AD), a form of dementia. Cognitive abilities and memory in Alzheimer's sufferers deteriorate with time. Recent studies have shown that people with Alzheimer's disease have elevated inflammatory markers, suggesting that inflammation plays a significant role in the onset and progression of the disease. Microglial receptors CD14, CD36, and CD47, and TLRs, may all be able to detect AÃŸ oligomers and fibrils. The neurodegenerative process begins when AÃŸ binds to either CD36 or TLR4, setting off an inflammatory cascade of chemokines and cytokines. TLR4 has been implicated in type 2 diabetes and Alzheimer's disease as of late. Several diabetes-related clinical problems, as well as changes in the body's internal environment and the brain's microenvironment, have been connected to TLR4 activation. Clinical trials have demonstrated that TLR4 inhibitors not only decrease the likelihood of getting sick but also increase life expectancy. Molecular docking and molecular dynamics modelling were used to examine the effectiveness of antidiabetic drugs against the TLR4 receptor. Parlodel's primary interactions were anticipated with the help of molecular docking investigations. With a binding affinity of -9.6 kcal/mol, it was the most promising of the candidates. The interaction pattern between Parlodel and the TLR4 receptor was verified by running a molecular dynamic simulation at a time scale of 50 nanoseconds. By making substantial contact with the active site, Parlodel ensured the complex's structural integrity was maintained throughout its rapid expansion. In light of these findings, further research into Parlodel's potential as a lead drug for TLR4 receptors is warranted.Accompanied Drawing [FIG. 1] [FIG. 2] [FIG. 3]

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) BASED ANIMAL RECOGNITION AND REPELLING SYSTEM FOR SMART FARMING DCNN ALGORITHM
column4: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) BASED ANIMAL RECOGNITION AND REPELLING SYSTEM FOR SMART FARMING DCNN ALGORITHMABSTRACTDeep Neural Networks and the Internet of Objects have made it possible to design and use programmes that can precisely manage, monitor, and track objects, which is one of the primary reasons why automated farming is gaining popularity. In a continuously changing environment, it is essential to explore the optimal way to manage interactions between humans and wildlife. The consumption of crops by wild animals is one of the most important problems farmers face today. In the past, people have attempted both lethal (such as shooting or trapping) and non-lethal (such as poisoning or eliminating the issue) solutions to this problem. However, certain traditional practises degrade the environment, which can be detrimental to humans and ungulates alike. Other methods are excessively costly, need substantial maintenance, and are neither dependable nor efficient. This project comprises the creation of a system that employs AI Computer Vision and Deep Convolutional Neural Networks (DCNN) to find and identify diverse animal species prior to frightening them away with species-specific ultrasonic emissions. When the camera is activated, the edge device will recognise the target using Deep Convolutional Neural Network (DCNN) software. If the target is an animal, the Animal Repelling Module will be instructed on what type of ultrasound to emit.

All the factors that are required for the growth of the plants are provided inside the chamber by virtue of a system through which the growth and quality of the plant species is enhanced. column2: COGNITIVE MIND BASED MOBILE APP AND KIOSK SUPPORT FOR WOMEN MENTAL HEALTH ISSUES
column4: ABSTRACT OF THE INVENTIONAcross the world, studies in India have shown that CMD (Common Mental Disorders) such as depression and anxiety are strongly associated to female gender besides poverty.Mood and behavioral changes have been observed to be associated with menstrual cycle since ancient times. Also, menopause is a time of change for women not only in their endocrine and reproductive systems, but also their social and psychological circumstances. It has long been known that menopause is accompanied by depression and other mental disturbances. Interventions at various levels aiming at both individual women and women as a large section of the society are essential. The primary care providers must be aware of the major mental health problems affecting women, routinely enquire about common mental health problems, provide the most appropriate intervention and support and provide education to the community on issues related to the mental health of women. The root cause for the mental health issues, symptoms for the issue, behavior and other physical activity variations, solutions to come out of the issues, supporting system (like natural (engaging mind with different techniques) / treatment options (naturopathy/ homeopathy/ayurvedic/Siddha/ Allopathic/other), has to be observed with different groups of people.We plan to develop and use the chatbot in English and Tamil Language for rural and urban women user friendly support system with Artificial Intelligence and Extreme Machine Learning techniques (LeNET Convolution Neural Networks), we train the chatbot on the various interactions, and streamline the responses it delivers to the women requesting for mental health issues. Cognitive patterns in the theory of mind concept was considered as a source to support for different mental health issues. Training consists of providing examples of content it will encounter along with psychiatrics expert knowledge. Providing more examples to the chatbot gives it a wider basis with which it can interpret and answer questions and commands in an intelligent way like the human. This is time consuming, but produces results like a expert person giving solutions for the issues raised by women (Rural & Urban). Machine Learning build algorithms that can receive input data and use statistical analysis to predict an output, while updating outputs as new data becomes available. The above data inference is used for developing the model. The questionnaire includes questions about the age group of the people, their awareness about mental health issue, symptoms, treatment options they undergone, positive and negative experiences during the issues etc.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR USING AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ENGINE TO ANONYMIZE COMPETITIVE PERFORMANCE RANKINGS IN A REHABILITATION SETTING
column4: The present disclosure provides a method comprising the steps: receiving first patient data, wherein the first patient data includes at least a first patient identifier associated with the first patient and a first treatment plan including an exercise; receiving first measurement data, where the first measurement data is associated with a first performance data; receiving second measurement data, where the second measurement data is associated with at least one of a second performance data and a second patient identifier; one of anonymiztion of and pseudonymization of the second patient identifier; determining, via an artificial intelligence engine and based on one or more differences between the first and the second measurement data, differential data; and presenting, with a patient interface, at least one of the differential data, first measurement data, second measurement data, and the first patient data.

column2: SYSTEM, METHOD, SOFTWARE AND DEVICE OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FOR HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS, PATIENTS, PHARMACIES AND MEDICAL TEST VENDORS
column4: A system, method, software for patients, medical vendors and medical service providers to increase patient compliance using Artificial Intelligence, includes either (i) a device configured to scan a summary text or (ii) a speech recognition engine configured to convert into text an audio recording of a conversation between a physician and a patient and to extract a summary text; a positioning system, sensor or mechanism to detect a current location of the patient; a data mining engine configured to search for and capture vendor data that matches patient's vendor criteria (i) using a web crawler or web scraper or (ii) from a list, and compare the matching vendor data to physician treatment instructions from the summary text regarding at least one of pharmacies, medical testing vendors, exercise vendors; artificial intelligence software configured to access the matching vendor data and to: monitor and encourage compliance of the patient with the treatment.

column2: RELAY DEVICE FOR ACQUIRING SYNCHRONIZATION ON BASIS OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, AND OPERATION METHOD OF SAME
column4: Provided are a relay device and an operation method of same. The method comprises the steps of: performing deep learning for deriving a downlink synchronization control signal, in which the downlink error vector magnitude (EVM) of a TDD relay has a minimum value, on the basis of downlink signal sets for training obtained by applying a plurality of wireless propagation environments to downlink signals for training, respectively; outputting a downlink ON synchronization control signal and a downlink OFF synchronization control signal, which correspond to downlink signals received from a base station, at a first point in time and a second point in time by using an artificial intelligence program trained through the deep learning; and relaying the downlink signals received from the base station to a terminal for a time interval from the first point in time to the second point in time on the basis of TDD antenna switching according to the downlink ON synchronization control signal and the downlink OFF synchronization control signal.

column2: HUMANOID, PRO-ACTIVE, EXPRESSIVE, MOBILE, TELESCOPIC, MULTIFUNCTION ROBOT WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM
column4: Humanoid, pro-active, expressive, mobile, telescopic and multi-function robot with artificial intelligence system, adapted for providing assistance and information in hotel structures; said robot being characterized in that it comprises: - an upper component, with video cameras inserted in two eye sockets, provided with a sonar which allows omni-directional navigation, a plurality of directional microphones and at least two speakers; - a central body comprising two limbs, a screen and a touch-screen interface; - a tank provided with stair-climbing wheels, lower brushes and a staircase detector sensor; - a smart cleaning function, adapted to perform a deep cleaning through said lower brushes and a suction system; - a lower block comprising said artificial intelligence system adapted to implement dialogues, languages and to adapt according to the context.

column2: FAULT EARLY-WARNING METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MOTOR DRIVER
column4: A fault early-warning method and apparatus for a motor driver, being used for achieving fault early-warning of the motor driver. Embodiments of the present application provide a fault early-warning method for a motor driver, comprising: obtaining running state data when the motor driver runs; inputting the running state data into a preset artificial intelligence (AI) diagnosis model, and outputting a first anomaly degree parameter of the motor driver by means of the AI diagnosis model, wherein the AI diagnosis model is configured to extract a data feature according to the running state data and perform decision reasoning by means of the data feature; and performing fault early-warning on the motor driver according to the first anomaly degree parameter.

column2: AN ARTIFICIALLY INTELLIGENT SYSTEM FOR WASTE SEGREGATION
column4: The present invention relates to the field of waste management and more particularly it refers to a smart system integrated with artificial intelligence and machine learning modules to segregate wastes as per the classification. The waste segregation system using machine learning and IoT are implemented using three modules. The waste collection and segregation module , waste data module and the web interface module. The circuit is made up of a raspberry pi connected to two relay that distributes power to the two servo motors in the system. The servo motors are used to drive the conveyor belt as well as the arm to flick the waste material to there respective bins. The amount of waste material collected displayed on the web interface with help of a graph. The data collected form the system in the form of count of the waste material collected and segregated is displayed in the web interface.

column2: SKATING TRAINING SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to a skating training system comprises of a pair of blocks 1, each configured with an inner and outer ring 2, 3 a touch interactive display panel 4 accessed by user for selecting expertise level from a beginner, intermediate, or an advanced level decodes speed for maneuvering of blocks 1 on ground surface, distance to be covered by user, path to be followed by user, a laser projector 5 projecting path to be followed by user for performing skating, a DC (Direct Current) motor coupled with outer rings 3 for rotating outer rings 3 at decoded speed in order to assist user in skating over ground surface, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 6 in synchronization with an ultrasonic sensor for detecting presence of obstacle in decoded path for notifying user to change path in order to dodge obstacle via speaker 7.

column2: ASSISTIVE SYSTEM FOR CROSSING WATER-BODY
column4: The present invention relates to assistive system for crossing water-body, comprising plurality of supporting members 1 arranged on at least two shores of a waterbody developed to move in proximity to each other, multiple hinges to form a deck portion for crossing of users over the platform 2, an electromagnet for securing the attachment of the members 1, plurality of hollow floating units 3 to provide stability to the platform 2, plurality of telescopically operated horizontal and vertical rods 4 forming a boundary over the platform 2 in order to secure the users from falling from the height, an inflatable bag integrated underneath each of the floating units 3 for providing additional buoyancy to the floating units 3 and an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 5 installed on one of the rods 4 for capturing images of the waterbody to determine any ship sailing through the waterbody.

column2: ATHLETIC RUNNING TRAINING SYSTEM
column4: An athletic running training system comprising a uniform platform 1 arranged on a ground surface for running, an AI (Artificial Intelligence) based image-capturing module 2 is mounted over the platform 1 for detecting body posture of a user, a display unit 3 mapped over the platform 1 that display different training options to select an option corresponding to a beginner, intermediate or expert level based on pre-acquired running skill, a pair of running blocks 4 configured on the platform 1 via corresponding motorized sliders for assisting the user to maintain correct running posture in the beginner level, multiple numbers of telescopic hurdles 6 are incorporated along the edges of the platform 1 by means of slider for enabling the user cross hurdles 6 while running thereby adjusting difficulty level based on the selected level and a speaker 7 integrated on the platform 1 for improvising the user?™s running posture

column2: EXERCISE ASSISTIVE DEVICE
column4: A platform 1 installed with device placed over the ground surface, a pair of foot placing unit 4 arranged over the platform 1 via a sliding unit in order to place the user?™s foot, an artificial intelligence based image capturing module 3 placed over platform 1 to capture multiple images of said user, a hula hoop 9 connected with platform 1 via a pair of telescopically powered rods 6 for extending/retracting the rods 6 to align the hula hoop 9 around the user?™s waist portion for performing exercise, a pair of hand rest 8 fabricated with platform 1 via a pair of pneumatically powered bars 7 for accommodating user?™s elbow portion, a display panel 2 constructed over platform 1 to display various options regarding exercise, an audio unit 5 connected over platform 1 to provide voice commands to user for performing hula hoop 9 exercise in an effective manner.

column2: LOWER EXTREMITY EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a lower extremity exercising device comprising, two expandable body 1 fabricated with a shape shifting fibre 9 connect with electromagnetic lock 2 to provide inline structure of user legs, plurality of rollers 3 wrapped with elastic straps 4 on the body 1 to provide appropriate contact between sides and legs, a touch interactive display panel 6 mapped on body 1 to provide input of exercise by user, a microcontroller linked to panel determines angle between the leg and body 1, a folding fan arrangement comprising plurality of flaps 5 connected with motorized rivet assembled within each body 1 that expand the flaps 5, a digital angle ruler gauge to measure angle expansion/retraction of body 1, an artificial intelligence image capturing 7 and a voice module for detecting physical condition and postures of the user and generating voice message to notify the user.

column2: VOLLEYBALL TRAINING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a volleyball training device that consists of a platform 1 configured with an artificial intelligence image capturing module 2 and linked with microcontroller to determine the levels of the user and generates commands, wearable bands 3, 4 positioned on the wrist and ankle of a user is connected via elastic rope 5, multiple guiding rails 6 configured with a ball throwing unit fitted on the platform 1 through vertical stand 7, gripper 8 translates on the rail 6 up to a pre-defined distance for limiting elasticity and enable user to stretch hands for beginner level and simultaneously deactivates for intermediate level, holographic projection unit 9 is installed on the platform 1 assist user to hit the ball in an appropriate manner for the beginner, a touch interactive display panel 10 is plugged over the platform 1 monitor the user and upgrade the user?™s level.

column2: LEG EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a leg exercising device comprising a first and second rod 1, 2 attached via a motorized hinge 3 that provide movement to the second rod 2 in pre-defined direction to inclined at various, a touch interactive display panel 4 to provide an access to a user to input command regarding type of exercise to be performed, an artificial intelligence image capturing module 5 determine a height, shape of the thighs, a motorized slider 6 configured with a seat position 7 to provide seating arrangement to the user to adjust the seat according to its requirement, a telescopic rod 8 attached with a pair of adjacently attached rectangular bar 9 that is utilize for positioning the foot over it, a ball and socket enables the bar 9 to rotate at different angle, a first angle sensor measure angle between the bars 9 and rods 8.

column2: STICK-BASED BODY EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a stick-based body exercising device, that includes a platform 1 attached with a stick 2, positioned over a ground surface, wherein the stick 2 is used by a user for performing body exercises, a display panel 3 mapped on platform 1 for enabling the user to provide touch input related to difficulty level of exercise, a pair of C-shaped clamps 4 positioned on stick 2 by means of a motorized slider for gripping each of user?™s foot, an artificial intelligence (AI) based imaging unit 5 configured on platform 1 for capturing images of stick 2, multiple pneumatically operated rods 6 is constructed in between platform 1 and stick 2 in a vertical orientation for adjusting tilting of stick 2 and a holographic projector 7 is positioned on platform 1 for projecting virtual images of correct body posture required by user.

column2: DIVER SECURITY SYSTEM
column4: A diver security system, comprising a bodysuit 1 and diving fins 2 worn by a user while performing underwater diving, multiple sensors for detecting underwater pressure along with variations in heart rate, blood pressure experienced by user, an oximeter 5 installed in association with a gas cylinder 4 carried by the user for detecting amount of oxygen gas remaining in the cylinder 4 in real-time conditions to analyze sufficiency of gas, an AI (Artificial Intelligence) based image capturing unit 6 for analyzing risk of drowning based on user?™s expressions/gestures, an inflatable casing 7 configured with bodysuit 1 and connected to an inflation unit 8 for reducing underwater pressure, thereby helping user to float on water surface under emergency situation and a communication module linked to a computing unit for notifying the trainer to focus attention towards user in order to prevent any underwater accident.

column2: BACK EXERCISE DEVICE
column4: A back exercise device having a platform 1 placed on a ground surface for accommodating user in order to perform exercise, a pair of suction unit 2 for providing stability to a user, a cuboidal member 4 arranged on platform 1 via a motorized scissor 3 in order to provide a base to user for placing a knee and a diagonal arm to achieve a posture, an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 11 for capturing multiple images of user, a pair of C- shaped clamps 8 associated on platform 1 via a pair of a telescopic rods 9 in order to grip and lift a shin region of user?™s leg, a suction cup 6 attached on cuboidal member 4 via a sliding arrangement 10 on order to fix placed knee for providing stability to user while performing exercise in case detected level is determined to be a beginner level.

column2: MULTI-LEVEL VOLLEYBALL TRAINING SYSTEM
column4: A volleyball training system, comprising a volleyball net 1 attached between a pair of poles 2 comprising of an electromagnetically powered guiding rail 3 that is installed with multiple telescopic rods 4 which translates on rail 3 via ferromagnetic wheels 5 and extend up to a pre-defined height for blocking a volleyball, an artificial intelligence based imaging module 6 synchronized with an ultrasonic sensor 7 to capture multiple images of user to detect location of user and volleyball, a voice recognition module 8 to enable user to input voice command regarding selection of difficulty level, a shaft 9 connected to each of rods 4 via a motorized ball and socket joint 10 to provide movement to shafts 9 in multiple directions, and an infrared transmitter and receiver 11 for detecting number of times volleyball passes through rods 4 and actuates a speaker 12 to notify user.

column2: SURFING TRAINING SYSTEM
column4: A surfing training system, comprising a pool 1 configured with a wave generator 2 for generating artificial waves of water, comprises of a body 3 having a first 4, second 5 and third portion 6 to perform surfing, an artificial intelligence-based image capturing module 7 for detecting height, type of surfing performed by user, a wearable unit 15 configured with a motion sensor 16 and 3-axis accelerometer 17 and gyroscope sensor 18 installed wirelessly to detects postures of user while surfing, an eye wearable unit 20 fabricated with a display screen 21 for displaying detected postures, a shape shifting fiber incorporated with Shape Memory Alloy (SMA) wires 19 to expand and aid in maintaining correct posture, and multiple load cells 10 for detecting pressure exerted by user and waves on body 3 and activates an electromagnetic spring 11 to expand for levelling with another portion.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ENGINE THAT USES A MULTI-DISCIPLINARY DATA SOURCE TO DETERMINE COMORBIDITY INFORMATION PERTAINING TO USERS AND TO GENERATE EXERCISE PLANS FOR DESIRED USER GOALS
column4: A method is disclosed for generating an improved exercise plan for a user to perform using at least an exercise machine. The method includes receiving data pertaining to the user. The data includes a physical activity goal the user desires to achieve and the physical activity goal includes levels of attainment to achieve. The method includes generating, by an artificial intelligence engine, the improved exercise plan. The improved exercise plan includes a set of exercises to be performed by the user to achieve the levels of attainment associated with the physical activity goal. The artificial intelligence engine uses at least one data source configured to include information pertaining to one or more exercises and at least one of the levels of attainment associated with the physical activity goal. The method includes transmitting the improved exercise plan to a computing device.

column2: MOBILE OR AIRBORNE RELAY NETWORK AND PROTOCOL
column4: A network comprising artificial intelligence for optimising network topology between transceiver nodes via link quality which leverage blind transception, transmit and receive without demodulation of signals. (Figure 3). The network may be configured to self-heal or reform in reaction to interference or physical events, and in which nodes which disappear or become unresponsible are ignored and a new topology is created based on new calculations instead of the network not being able to route traffic through a broken part of the network.

column2: ADJUSTMENT OF EXERCISE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, EXERCISE PLAN, AND USER FEEDBACK
column4: A method for generating an exercise session for a user using an exercise machine is disclosed herein. The method includes receiving a plurality of inputs, wherein the plurality of inputs comprise an indication of a level of pain of the user and a range of motion of a body part of the user. The method also includes determining, based on the plurality of inputs, an exercise level of the user, generating, using a machine learning model, the exercise session for the user by selecting, based on the exercise level of the user, one or more exercises to be performed by the user using an exercise machine, and causing initiation of the exercise session on the exercise machine and a virtual coach executed by a computing device associated with the exercise machine to provide instructions pertaining to the exercise session.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TO GENERATE EXERCISE PLANS BASED ON USER ENERGY CONSUMPTION METRICS
column4: Systems, methods, and computer-readable mediums for generating, by an artificial intelligence engine, an exercise plan for a user to perform. The method comprises receiving data pertaining to the user and generating user energy consumption metrics for a plurality of exercises. Each of the user energy consumption metrics is generated for a respective one of the plurality of exercises based at least on a metabolic equivalent of task (MET) value for the respective one of the plurality of exercises and user fitness test results. The method also includes generating the exercise plan based at least on the user energy consumption metrics and a user energy score. The exercise plan includes at least a subset of the plurality of exercises to be performed by the user to attempt to achieve the user energy score. The method further includes transmitting the exercise plan to a computing device.

column2: MACHINE LEARNING MODEL GENERATOR
column4: A method includes receiving information associated with a requested operator. The method further includes, in response to receiving the information, generating, by a processing device executing a machine learning model, an artificial intelligence (AI)-based solution to the requested operator, wherein the AI-based solution comprises a plurality of machine-learning models. The method further includes displaying an option to access the AI-based solution in a marketplace platform. The method further includes receiving information associated with a requested operator, and generating, by a processing device executing a first machine learning model, a skeleton architecture of an AI-based solution to the operator based on the information.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ENGINE THAT USES A MULTI-DISCIPLINARY DATA SOURCE TO DETERMINE COMORBIDITY INFORMATION PERTAINING TO USERS AND TO GENERATE EXERCISE PLANS FOR DESIRED USER GOALS
column4: A method is disclosed for generating an improved exercise plan for a user to perform using at least an exercise machine. The method includes receiving data pertaining to the user. The data includes a physical activity goal the user desires to achieve and the physical activity goal includes levels of attainment to achieve. The method includes generating, by an artificial intelligence engine, the improved exercise plan. The improved exercise plan includes a set of exercises to be performed by the user to achieve the levels of attainment associated with the physical activity goal. The artificial intelligence engine uses at least one data source configured to include information pertaining to one or more exercises and at least one of the levels of attainment associated with the physical activity goal. The method includes transmitting the improved exercise plan to a computing device.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TO GENERATE EXERCISE PLANS BASED ON USER ENERGY CONSUMPTION METRICS
column4: Systems, methods, and computer-readable mediums for generating, by an artificial intelligence engine, an exercise plan for a user to perform. The method comprises receiving data pertaining to the user and generating user energy consumption metrics for a plurality of exercises. Each of the user energy consumption metrics is generated for a respective one of the plurality of exercises based at least on a metabolic equivalent of task (MET) value for the respective one of the plurality of exercises and user fitness test results. The method also includes generating the exercise plan based at least on the user energy consumption metrics and a user energy score. The exercise plan includes at least a subset of the plurality of exercises to be performed by the user to attempt to achieve the user energy score. The method further includes transmitting the exercise plan to a computing device.

column2: INTELLIGENT VEHICLE-MOUNTED CAMERA CONTROL SYSTEM BASED ON INTERNET OF THINGS
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides an intelligent vehicle-mounted camera control system based on the Internet of Things, which comprises a power supply module, a main control module, an optical detection assembly, a camera interface circuit and an optical filter control module, and is characterized in that the input end of the camera interface circuit is connected with the main control module, and the output end of the camera interface circuit is used for being connected with a camera; an optical filter switcher is arranged on the camera, the optical detection assembly is connected with the input end of the main control module, the output end of the main control module is connected with the input end of the optical filter control module, and the main control module is used for sending a delayed control instruction to the optical filter control module according to the illumination intensity information. The power supply end of the optical filter control module is connected with the power supply module, and the output end of the optical filter control module is used for being connected with the optical filter switcher; according to the invention, the optical filter of the vehicle-mounted camera can be intelligently adjusted, so that the vehicle-mounted camera has a clear shooting effect under different brightness.

column2: MULTI-FILM PROCESSING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a multi-sample processing method and system based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of video processing, and the method comprises the steps: enabling a template creator to edit a template through a template tool, carrying out the editing of a sample video, exporting a template file, uploading the exported template file to a server background for storage, and enabling a user to carry out the video shooting. The method comprises the steps that a shot video is uploaded to a server to be stored, a template creator imports the uploaded video into a template file, meanwhile, the subtitle format, the special sticker effect and the background requirement of the video are set, an editing tool generates a target video, and the template creator uploads the target video to the server to be watched by a user. The efficiency of a template production line is optimized, a user can obtain a required video only by shooting the video, and the threshold of video release is reduced.

column2: MACHINE LEARNING BASED CROP GROWTH MONITORING SYSTEM
column4: There is a connection between the crop health monitoring system and the crop health monitoring system that uses machine learning. This description pertains to the use of remotely sensed photo records for the automated detection of areas of change within the subject. More specifically, the present invention relates to the crop health monitoring system that uses artificial intelligence. It also relates to the detection of modifications in crop fitness condition within an agricultural area.
