And also notifying by producing a color-coded map of the geographic area consisting of a number of different map factors, where each map detail of the plurality corresponds to a geographic sub-area of the geographic area, and where each map detail is associated with a coloration indicative of a difference between the actual geographic region overall performance price exchange and a predicted geographic region overall performance fee alternative for the respective geographic sub-area.

column2: GESTURE RECOGNITION SYSTEM AND METHOD AND COMPUTING EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a gesture recognition system and method and a computing device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence (AI), computer vision and image processing. The system comprises a wearable device, a shooting device and a computing device. Wherein the wearable device is used for collecting a numerical signal generated by hand movement of a user; the shooting device collects a video image sequence used when the hand of the user moves; and the computing equipment is used for fusing the acquired numerical signals and the video image sequence features and identifying gestures of the user during movement. According to the system, the computing device integrates the numerical value signal and the video image sequence when the hand of the user moves to recognize the gesture of the hand of the user, and the problem that in the prior art, the accuracy is low when gesture recognition is conducted according to the numerical value signal or the video image singly is solved.

column2: CAMERA MODULE AND CAMERA DEVICE
column4: The invention provides a camera module and a camera device, and the camera module is characterized in that an image collector is used for collecting an image signal; the controller is used for processing the image signal to obtain display data; and the at least one AI chip expansion position is electrically connected with the image collector and the controller and is used for installing an AI chip corresponding to a camera shooting application scene, and the AI chip is a chip with an AI operation function corresponding to the camera shooting application scene. The expansion position of the AI chip is reserved in the camera module, so that the AI function can be replaced or customized when the camera device is produced according to an actual scene. The design flexibility of the camera device is greatly improved, and an integrated circuit of functional modules of various artificial intelligence algorithms does not need to be integrated, so that the research and development and production time can be greatly saved, the generation cost can be reduced, and functional redundancy and waste can be avoided.

column2: DISCONTINUOUS RECEPTION METHOD, RELATED APPARATUS AND SYSTEM
column4: This application relates to a discontinuous reception method. In the first time unit, for example, the first symbol, after a hybrid automatic repeat request HARQ feedback occasion of a sidelink HARQ process, a first terminal may start a drx-HARQ-RTT-TimerSL and start a drx-RetransmissionTimerSL when the drx-HARQ-RTT-TimerSL expires. During running of the drx-RetransmissionTimerSL, the first terminal monitors a physical downlink control channel. In this way, sidelink retransmission efficiency can be improved, an increase of a sidelink retransmission delay can be avoided, and sidelink-based applications, such as unmanned driving, automatic driving, assisted driving, intelligent driving, networked driving, intelligent networked driving, and car sharing in the field of artificial intelligence can be better supported.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ADAPTIVE MICRO SEGMENTATION AND ISOLATION OF CONTAINERS
column4: Disclosed herein is a system and a computer implemented method for adaptive micro segmentation and isolation of compromised containers inn networked environment. The system and methods disclosed herein provides a machine learning and artificial intelligence based micro-segmentation for isolation of containers during runtime responsive to a compromise. The system is adaptive to the runtime container security profile and isolates compromised containers based on real time data. A processing unit is configured to identify one or more compromised containers amongst a plurality of containers that are part of a microservices architecture working in a networked environment. The processor identifies the one or more compromised containers and isolates the said one or more compromised containers in order to contain the spread of security attack on to remaining containers, while diverting the traffic to similar containers running similar applications, thereby maintaining integrity of services in real time. The processor is further operable to identify one or more risky containers in addition to compromised containers and create an ethical wall surrounding the containers running core and essential services so that said services are not disrupted.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR MEASURING AND ANALYZING BODY MOVEMENT, POSITIONING AND POSTURE
column4: One aspect of the invention provides a computer-based method for providing corrective feedback about exercise form, the method comprising; recording a user performing a specific exercise: evaluating, by the computer, with machine learning, computer vision, or deep learning models that have been previously trained in order to evaluate the form of a user by training on labelled and or unlabeled datasets that consist of: both correct and incorrect exercise form for the different types of exercises being evaluated; identifying the user throughout the video, the exercise type, each repetition of the exercise, the user's errors in form; and then generating, by the computer, corrective feedback for the user on how to improve exercise form for subsequent repetitions; and communicating, via an output device, the corrective feedback to the user.

column2: INTELLIGENT AI ARCHITECTURE SELECTION
column4: A computer implemented method of deploying an artificial intelligence (Al) algorithm to model a function comprising: defining a verification test for verifying that the Al algorithm models the function, the fitness test being defined based on a set of input/output pairs each indicating the required output of the function for an input; defining a machine learning component having a machine learning algorithm and a configuration, the machine learning algorithm being trained based on training data to model the function; iteratively adapting the machine learning component over a plurality of generations, wherein each generation of the component is adapted by modifying the configuration of the component, and wherein the adaptation for a generation is selected from a set of candidate adaptations based on a determination of a fitness of the component so adapted, the fitness being determined by the verification test, wherein the iteration ceases in response to a stopping condition such that, on cessation, a latest generation of the machine learning component is selected to constitute the Al algorithm modelling the function...

column2: AUTHENTICATION METHOD AND MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC APPARATUS THEREOF
column4: This application relates to the communications field and the artificial intelligence field, and discloses an authentication method and an electronic device. The method includes: When determining that a distance between a first device and a second device reaches a first preset distance, the first device sends a first authentication request to the second device, to request the second device to determine whether wireless communication between the first device and the second device is relayed. When determining that the distance between the first device and the second device reaches a second preset distance, the first device determines whether a first authentication success ciphertext sent by the second device is received. When the first device determines that the first authentication success ciphertext sent by the second device is received and verification performed by the first device on the first authentication success ciphertext succeeds, the first device performs a service agreed on with the second device. According to the authentication method in this application, when services such as imperceptible unlocking and imperceptible payment are performed, it can be determined whether a device that performs these services encounters a relay attack, to ensure security of the imperceptible services and make the imperceptible services more intelligent.

column2: DEFECT DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a defect detection method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The embodiment of the invention can be applied to various scenes such as industrial detection and artificial intelligence. According to the embodiment of the invention, a plurality of component images of a to-be-detected component can be acquired; performing feature extraction on each component image to obtain feature information corresponding to the component images under different shooting light sources; performing attention extraction on the feature information corresponding to each component image to obtain attention information corresponding to the to-be-detected component under different shooting light sources; performing cross fusion on the feature information corresponding to the first component image and the attention information of the second component image to obtain fused feature information corresponding to the first component image; and performing defect detection on the to-be-detected component based on the fused feature information corresponding to each component image to obtain a defect detection result of the industrial component, thereby improving the quality of defect detection on the industrial component.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE HOME CONTROL SYSTEM WITH VOICE CONTROL
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence home control system with voice control, which comprises voice input equipment, a cloud server, a login module, a voice recognition module, a wireless router, a data screening module, a classification database, a voice control terminal, a server cluster, an instruction control terminal, a relay and intelligent home equipment, the voice input device is used for logging in the server and inputting a voice command, the cloud server is used for being connected with a network, serving as a switching center in the network, being capable of obtaining voice uploaded by the voice input device and serving as an identity login platform, and the voice recognition module is used for obtaining the voice command uploaded by the voice input device and sending the voice command to the cloud server. The login module is used for providing a platform for a user to log in and providing network login connection; a voice character recognition module is added, operation commands can be recognized more accurately, and meanwhile the transmission efficiency of voice commands is improved.

column2: THREE-DIMENSIONAL RECONSTRUCTION MODEL TRAINING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a three-dimensional reconstruction model training method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a plurality of training images and three-dimensional reconstruction labels corresponding to the training images; wherein the plurality of training images comprise at least one real training image and at least one synthetic training image, the real training image refers to an image obtained by shooting a real target object, and the synthetic training image refers to an image generated according to a three-dimensional model of the synthetic target object; three-dimensional reconstruction information corresponding to the training image is obtained through the three-dimensional reconstruction model according to the training image, and the three-dimensional reconstruction information is used for determining a three-dimensional geometric configuration of a target object in the training image in a three-dimensional space; and training the three-dimensional reconstruction model according to the three-dimensional reconstruction information and the three-dimensional reconstruction label corresponding to the training image. And training is performed through the real image and the synthetic image, so that the generalization and fidelity of the three-dimensional reconstruction model can be improved.

column2: IDENTIFICATION PHOTO GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an identification photo generation method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an original image, wherein the original image comprises a face of a living body; image specification degree detection and color deviation degree detection are carried out on the original image, the image specification degree detection is used for determining whether the original image meets the shooting specification or not, and the color deviation degree detection is used for determining whether the face of the organism in the original image has color cast or not; performing color correction on the organism face in the original image in response to the fact that the original image passes the image specification degree detection and does not pass the color deviation degree detection; and generating the identification photo based on the original image after color correction. By adopting the method provided by the embodiment of the invention, the identification photo is generated based on the original image after image specification degree detection and color deviation degree detection and correction, the identification photo generation quality can be improved, and the identification photo auditing success rate can be improved.

column2: AUTOMOBILE SEALING STRIP QUALITY DETECTION METHOD BASED ON COMPUTER VISION
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of data identification, in particular to an automobile sealing strip quality detection method based on computer vision. The method is a method for identifying by using electronic equipment, and the quality detection of the automobile sealing strip is completed by using an artificial intelligence coefficient in the production field. Firstly, an industrial camera is used for obtaining a sealing strip cross section image; and performing data identification on the cross section image of the sealing strip to obtain a quality difference index, and further performing quality detection on the sealing strip according to the quality difference index. According to the invention, the quality of the sealing strip is detected according to the skeleton characteristics of the acquired cross section image of the sealing strip, the pixel overlap ratio of the cross section image of the sealing strip and the standard binary image, the curvature characteristics and the edge burrs, so that the purpose of detecting the quality of the automobile sealing strip in combination with the appearance deformation and the edge burrs of the sealing strip is achieved; and the quality detection precision of the automobile sealing strip is improved.

column2: CONTROL METHOD, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, COMPUTER-READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM, AND CHIP
column4: The present invention relates to the field of computer vision, and discloses a control method, an electronic device, a computer-readable storage media, a computer program product and a chip, so as to solve the technical problem of poor quality of images collected by a camera of the electronic device in the prior art. The method comprises: the first electronic device obtains a shooting instruction; according to the shooting instruction, determining location information or shooting mode of the content to be shot corresponding to the shooting instruction, and according to the location information or shooting mode of the content to be shot, determining a camera at the most suitable location for shooting the content to be shot from at least two controllable camer as as the target camera; the at least two cameras comprise: a camera on the first electronic device and a camera of a second electronic device, and the first electronic device is different from the second electronic device; the first electronic device controls the target camera to execute the shooting instruction to obtain the image data collected by the target camera. The method is applicable to artificial intelligence (AI) equipment.

column2: HEALTH PREDICTION MANAGEMENT METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a health prediction management method and system based on artificial intelligence, and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: collecting blood attribute data, user attribute data and environment temperature information of a user at a current moment and geographic data of a position where the user is located; corresponding outdoor temperature information is obtained based on the geographic data, and a first temperature correction value and a second temperature correction value are generated according to the environment temperature information and the outdoor temperature information; based on the first temperature correction value and the second temperature correction value, a first blood pressure actual value in the blood attribute data is subjected to offset adjustment, and a first blood attribute offset value and a second blood attribute offset value are adjusted; performing prediction operation according to the blood attribute threshold value, the first blood attribute offset value and the second blood attribute offset value to obtain a first blood attribute motion value and a second blood attribute motion value; and selecting corresponding health management data according to the first blood attribute exercise value and the second blood attribute exercise value, wherein the health management data at least comprises recommended exercise items.

column2: MUSCLE STRENGTHENING EXERCISE DEVICE
column4: A muscle strengthening exercise device, comprises of a cylindrical member 1 having a first 2 and second portion 3, a telescopically operated supporting unit 4 is attached with each of the portion 2, 3 for enabling a user to place a body potion that is to be exercised, an artificial intelligence based imaging module 5 mounted on the member 1 and linked with a microcontroller for capturing and processing images of the user in order to detect type of body portion, a pair of electromagnetic strip 6 arranged with each of the supporting units 4 for generating a magnetic field between each of the supporting units 4 to generate a resistance between each of the units 4, a thermal imaging unit 7 mapped on the member 1 and linked with the microcontroller for capturing and processing thermal images of the user to detect muscle fatigue of the body portion.

column2: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED FIRE PREVENTION SYSTEM WITH IOT
column4: An efficient, low cost, low false outputs, and fast response fire prevention system is developed. It is portable and equipped with nonvisual and visual fire sensing techniques to prevent electrical wiring-based fires. It utilizes the measurement of the wiring temperature and current as the key parameters that provide the possibility of the fire. The Sugeno model based fuzzy logic technique is used to fuse the key parameters. The crossing of the threshold level of the fused output activates the relay and the alarm. The relay breaks the circuit so that the fire hazard condition is avoided. The real time information transfer to the occupant smartphone or a remote location takes place with the IoT technique. The ESP8266 is used both as a processing and IoT unit. The open source IoT platform is used for this purpose. An android application is developed to control the parameters of the algorithm for different sanctioned loads. To increase the reliability and utilize the multi-sensor approach, an artificial intelligence based visual fire detection subsystem is also developed. It consists of camera as a vision sensor that inspect the region of interest. A diverse dataset is developed taking fire flame, smoke, spark, and non-fire images. A transfer learning approach is used for training and testing. The classification of the image as fire or non-fire image takes place and if the image is of fire, the activation of the relay to break the circuit and alarm operation takes place.

column2: HUMAN BODY FITNESS TRAINING MANAGEMENT SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a human body fitness training management system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the field of human body fitness training management, and the main points of the technical scheme are that the human body fitness training management system comprises a host control module which is used for receiving and processing data transmission of the whole system; the data collection module registers and numbers the data of the used human body to establish a folder, and the body shape analysis module is used for recording the motion of the body shape of the human body in an initial natural state to draw a three-dimensional curve posture graph. The video key frame number extraction unit is used for carrying out video key frame number extraction on the standard exercise posture motion amplitude output by the parameter analysis unit, the wearable sensing module is used for monitoring fitness exercise data of a client in real time, and the judgment and comparison module is used for judging the overlapping area S between the standard exercise posture motion amplitude X0 and the training exercise posture motion amplitude recorded as data Xi. And the display module displays the standard actions input by the client and the movement actions of the trainees during continuous follow-up training, so that the training effect of the trainees can be improved.

column2: TABLE TENNIS TRAINING DEVICE FOR HANDICAPPED
column4: A table tennis training device for handicapped, comprising a platform 1 arranged with a wearable unit 2 equipped by a user and is attached with platform 1 via a telescopic rod 3 that extends or retracts for altering height of wearable unit 2, an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 4 for capturing and processing images of user to detect an expertise level of user, a ball throwing arrangement 5 for throwing a table tennis ball towards user which is required to hit ball via a racket held by user in a manner that ball reaches to a court segregated on table, and a sensing module for measuring speed and height of ball and activates a two-axis lead screw arrangement 8 coupled between platform 1 and table for providing movement to platform 1 to relocate wearable unit 2 towards ball.

column2: CONTROL METHOD, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT, COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM AND CHIP
column4: The invention relates to the field of computer vision, discloses a control method, electronic equipment, a computer readable storage medium, a computer program product and a chip, and aims to solve the technical problem of poor quality of an image acquired by a camera of the electronic equipment in the prior art. The method comprises the steps that first electronic equipment obtains a shooting instruction; according to the shooting instruction, determining the position information or the shooting mode of the to-be-shot content corresponding to the shooting instruction, and based on the position information or the shooting mode of the to-be-shot content, determining the camera with the most appropriate shooting position of the to-be-shot content from at least two cameras capable of being controlled as a target camera; the at least two cameras comprise a camera on the first electronic equipment and a camera on the second electronic equipment, and the first electronic equipment is different from the second electronic equipment; and the first electronic equipment controls the target camera to execute the shooting instruction to obtain image data acquired by the target camera. The method can be used for artificial intelligence equipment.

column2: A FITNESS MANAGEMENT SYSTEM AND A METHOD THEREOF
column4: A fitness management system (100) is disclosed. The fitness management system (100) comprises a base module (106) having a calories target module (110) configured to determine total target calories required by the user; calories intake module (112) configured to determine total calories intake of the user; calories burn module (114) configured to determine total calories burnt by the user; and an artificial intelligence and machine learning (AI/ML) module (120) communicatively coupled to the calories intake module, the calories burn module and the calories target module (110). The AI/ML module (118) is configured to determine a result based at least on the total calories intake and the total calories burnt by the user, during a predefined time and generate one or more recommendations based at least on the determined result during the predefined time.

column2: SOYBEAN PLANT PHENOTYPE DATA STATISTICAL METHOD BASED ON IMPROVED YOLO V5 MODEL
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of soybean artificial intelligence breeding, and discloses a soybean plant phenotype data statistical method based on an improved YOLO v5 model, comprising the following steps: obtaining a sampling picture of a target soybean plant; recognizing the sampling picture through a recognition model trained based on a specified training method; counting and storing phenotypic characteristics about soybean plants output by the recognition model; wherein the recognition model is a YOLO v5 model improved based on a specified improvement method; according to the method, the sampling picture obtained by shooting and sampling the target soybean plant can be input into the pre-trained recognition model for recognition, the recognition model can quickly and accurately give the phenotypic characteristic data of the target soybean plant, and then the phenotypic characteristic data can be counted, so that subsequent workers can conveniently look up and call the phenotypic characteristic data.

column2: ONLINE TEACHING MANAGEMENT METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an online teaching management method and system based on artificial intelligence, which are used for improving the recognition accuracy of the learning state of students and further improving the learning interest of courses. The method comprises the following steps: performing posture recognition, facial emotion recognition and intonation analysis of a target user on a learning state video, and performing feature comprehensive analysis on a posture recognition result, a facial emotion recognition result and an intonation analysis result according to a target learning environment factor to obtain a video analysis result; performing code running test and code quality analysis on the after-class code practice data to obtain a code quality analysis result; according to the video analysis result, the code quality analysis result and the current course evaluation data, course learning scheme adjustment is carried out on the target user, a target course learning scheme is obtained, and the target course learning scheme comprises a course arrangement progress and a course learning target.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ALGORITHM QUANTUM CLOUD BRAIN ENGINE AND GLOBAL INTELLIGENT TERMINAL MODULE INTEGRATED SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence algorithm quantum cloud brain engine and global intelligent terminal module integrated system, which comprises a quantum cloud brain data input module and millions of distributed super computing robots, time, space, regionalization distribution and national distribution of data of the data lake are subjected to tagging processing, a recognition area is achieved, the recognition area corresponds to the digital earth of the enterprise and court, virtual modeling of longitude dimension altitude block distribution is carried out on the digital earth, and memory logic thinking distribution of data situation awareness is achieved. According to the artificial intelligence algorithm quantum cloud brain engine and global intelligent terminal module integrated system, the thought that a common engine is formed by the quantum cloud brain, the global internet of things and millions of distributed super-computing robots is adopted, like a brain erected on a physical computer running globally; and the understanding of real-time data of market subjects created by global enterprises is recorded, learned and observed.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGE ACQUISITION DEVICE AND USE METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of image acquisition devices, in particular to an artificial intelligence image acquisition device and a use method thereof.The artificial intelligence image acquisition device comprises a shell assembly, the shell assembly comprises a surrounding plate, an emptying hole is formed in the outer side wall of one end of the surrounding plate, a top plate is fixedly connected to the top surface of the surrounding plate, and a bottom plate is fixedly connected to the bottom surface of the surrounding plate; sliding rails are fixedly connected to the top side and the bottom side of the inner side wall of the surrounding plate. According to the invention, through the arrangement of the driving assembly and the waterproof unit, the driving assembly is started to drive the waterproof unit to slide between the two slide rails, so that the driving assembly drives the waterproof unit to slide between the two slide rails, and a glass plate, away from one side of the fixed shell, of the emptying hole is moved to the front of the camera assembly; therefore, the glass plate in front of the camera shooting assembly is kept clean, and the situation that shot pictures are affected by splashed water drops is avoided.

column2: AN ARTIFICIALLY INTELLIGENT SYSTEM FOR MONITORING AND PREVENTING DRYNESS IN PLANTS
column4: The present invention relates to agricultural systems and more particularly it relates to a system for effectively monitoring the moisture content in plants and providing sufficient water to prevent dryness through the integration of artificial intelligence algorithms. The algorithm coded in the Raspberry Pi microprocessor decides whether the leaf is wet or dry and it will water the plant according to it. If the leaf is normal, Raspberry Pi actuates the relay and water pump starts which leads to water to flow. If the leaf is dry, Raspberry Pi turns the relay off as a result water pump is off and water flow stops.

column2: INTELLIGENT TUNNEL AIR COMPRESSOR UNIT CONTROL SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a tunnel air compressor unit intelligent control system based on artificial intelligence, and the system is characterized in that the system comprises a data collection module, a central control calculation module, a database module, and a PLC output module; the data output end of the data acquisition module is respectively connected with the data input end of the database module and the data input end of the central control calculation module, the data output end of the database module is connected with the data input end of the central control calculation module, and the data output end of the central control calculation module is connected with the PLC output module. Intelligent control over the air compressor can be achieved through artificial intelligence, big data and the automatic control technology, and therefore labor cost is reduced, idle running of the air compressor is avoided, and electric energy is saved.

column2: INTEGRATED MONITORING AND ANALYSIS SYSTEMS AND METHODS
column4: Systems and methods monitor a space for environmental pollutants. A sensing device senses and reports air quality anomalies to a cloud detection service. The cloud detection service uses artificial intelligence to analyze raw sensor data from the sensing device, determines whether the raw sensor data indicates an air quality event, and sends an air quality report indicative of the air quality event to a client device associated with the sensing device and/or the monitored space. A sensing device may be deployed in an air extraction vent to detect and report indications of vaping in prohibited spaces. A sensing device may be deployed in a vehicle to detect and report smoking in vehicles where smoking is prohibited. An application running on a mobile device reports detection of a short-range wireless beacon within a serviceable space to a cloud detection service, which tracks servicing of the serviceable space.

column2: INTELLIGENT VIDEO RECORDING METHOD AND APPARATUS
column4: This application relates to a computer vision technology in the field of artificial intelligence. A video shooting method includes: enabling a camera application on a terminal (for example, a mobile phone); and in a slow-motion video recording mode of the camera application, when a motion detection function of the camera application is enabled: starting to capture video frames after a video recording instruction input by a user is detected; recording a second video frame set at a first frame rate automatically when a motion of a human body in a captured first video frame set is a preset motion; and generating a target video, wherein the target video includes a slow-motion video clip, and the slow-motion video clip includes some video frames in the second video frame set. When the motion of the human body is a first preset motion, duration for playback of the slow-motion video clip at a first playback speed is first duration; when the motion of the human body is a second preset motion, the duration for playback of the slow-motion video clip at the first playback speed is second duration; the first preset motion is different from the second preset motion; and the first duration is different from the second duration.

column2: TRAFFIC INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: This application relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and provides a traffic information processing method and apparatus. This can provide a more appropriate and reliable traffic control policy, and improve traffic service quality. The method includes: determining a target traffic model from a plurality of candidate traffic models by using historical traffic data, where the candidate traffic model includes at least one of the following: a driver model, a road propagation model, or a road network evaluation model, and the candidate traffic model corresponds to the historical traffic data; adjusting a parameter of the target traffic model based on current traffic data, where the parameter of the target traffic model is used for describing a current traffic running status; and generating a traffic control policy based on an adjusted parameter of the target traffic model, where the traffic control policy includes at least one of the following: navigation information of a driver, traffic signal control information, or road network boundary control information.

column2: COMPUTER ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INFORMATION READING DEVICE
column4: The invention provides a computer artificial intelligence information reading device, which relates to the technical field of intelligent reading, and comprises an intelligent device, a camera mechanism is arranged in the middle of the top end of the front surface of the intelligent device and rotatably connected to the inner side of the intelligent device, and an induction motor is fixed to the inner side of the position, connected with the camera mechanism, of the intelligent device and is in transmission connection with the camera mechanism; a palm print reading mechanism is arranged on one side of the middle of the front face of the intelligent device and vertically slidably connected to the inner side of the intelligent device, and a driving device is fixed to the lower side of the palm print reading mechanism and located at the bottom of the inner side of the intelligent device and is in transmission connection with the palm print reading mechanism. A control center is arranged on the inner side of the intelligent equipment, the control center is electrically connected with the driving equipment and the induction motor, and the control center is in electric signal connection with the palmprint reading mechanism and the camera shooting mechanism; according to the method, the reading speed of the personal information is greatly increased, the convenience of reading the personal information is improved, and the reading mode is synchronous identification of the face and the palm print, so that the safety of reading the personal information is greatly enhanced.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ONLINE TEACHING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of computer data processing, in particular to an artificial intelligence online teaching method and system.The difficulty coefficient of a question relative to a user is evaluated by obtaining the knowledge point condition involved in the question in online teaching test paper content and the mastering condition of the user for each knowledge point; the score corresponding to the question is adjusted according to the difficulty coefficient of the question, the total score of the test paper is kept unchanged, the question answering time corresponding to the question is adjusted according to the difficulty coefficient of the question, the total question answering time of the test paper is kept unchanged, and when the difficulty of the question is higher, smaller motivation and more question answering time are provided for a user, so that the difficulty is reduced, and the user experience is improved. The motivation motivation is reduced, the difficulty of exercise doing is adapted to the motivation level, when the difficulty of the exercise doing is lower, the exercise doing time is properly shortened, the task difficulty is improved, the stronger motivation motivation is provided, a good motivation effect is achieved on learning of the user, the possibility of generating negative emotion of the user is reduced, and the learning effect is improved.

column2: EXERCISE TRAINING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of training assistance, and discloses an exercise training method, device and equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: predicting a corresponding target exercise score according to an exercise portrait of a user, obtaining an actual exercise score of the user, and generating an exercise training strategy based on the target exercise score and the actual exercise score, and performing exercise training on the user according to the exercise training strategy. Compared with the prior art that the exercise ability of the user is reflected by measuring the corresponding degree between one or more body exercise parameters of the user and the corresponding target parameters, the target exercise score of the user is predicted based on the exercise portrait of the user, and the actual exercise score of the user is compared with the target exercise score; therefore, the corresponding exercise training strategy is provided for the user, the user is trained through the exercise training strategy, the problem that targeted training cannot be carried out on the user through the exercise measurement parameters of the user is solved, and the user experience is improved.

column2: EXERCISE RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an exercise recommendation method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring exercises and exercise doing records; determining an association relationship between the exercises, and obtaining a question-answering relationship between the student and the exercises according to the question-answering record; generating a heterogeneous graph according to the association relationship and the exercise relationship, and determining student vectors of student nodes and exercise vectors of exercise nodes through the heterogeneous graph; according to the student vector and the exercise vector, obtaining a correct probability that the student completes the exercise; and if the correct probability is in a preset probability interval, recommending the exercises to the student. By the adoption of the method, exercise recommendation is not limited by exercise doing records, the correct probability that the students complete all exercises in the question bank can be predicted through the student vectors and the exercise vectors in the heterogeneous graph, then whether the exercises need to be recommended to the students or not can be judged, and personalized exercise recommendation for a large-scale question bank is facilitated.

column2: CHEST EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a chest exercising device, comprising of, a L-shaped platform 1 having a first and second portion 2, 3 and is installed on a ground surface, a bench 4 is installed with first portion 2 for user to attain exercise position, a touch interactive display panel 5 installed on the bench 4 to provide inputs, a telescopic rods 6 coupled between the bench 4 to position bench 4, an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 7 installed at second portion 3 to detect the user and expertise level, multiple dumbbells 8 placed on a rack 9 mounted on the second portion 3 for exercise, a pair of telescopic links between a sliding rack 11 and electromagnets 12 at the second portion 3 to pick dumbbells 8, a gripping units 13 installed on the platform 1 to provide support to user.

column2: METHOD FOR REALIZING EFFECTIVE SHOOTING ARRESTING OF MORTAR
column4: The invention discloses a method for realizing effective shooting arresting of a mortar, which is characterized in that on the basis of artificial intelligence target identification methods such as YOLOv5, SSD and the like which can identify a target in real time and have a high success rate, an enemy armored target is taken as an example, and a target data set of the category is trained by using a YOLOv5s target identification method. The method has the advantages that the target is recognized in real time, and the success rate is high.

column2: HANDS-FREE DRINK ASSISTIVE DEVICE
column4: A hands-free drink assistive device, comprises of a cylindrical member 1 pre-filled with water accommodated by user at back portion of user?™s body, while running on a ground surface, by means of a pair of straps 2 configured with member 1, a touch interactive display panel 3 mapped on member 1 accessed by user for giving input commands regarding total distance to be run by user commands for decoding time-interval within which user is to drink water, while running, in order to prevent any chances of dehydration, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 4 processes the captured images to detect position of user?™s face during running, an angle sensor mapped on member 1 in synchronization with module 4 for detecting angle of inclination of user for actuating a Peltier unit 8 mapped within body for maintaining an optimum temperature of water, in accordance to body temperature of user.

column2: FITNESS EFFECT MONITORING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT, STORAGE MEDIUM AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a body-building effect monitoring method and device, electronic equipment, a storage medium and a system, and is applied to the field of artificial intelligence, the body-building effect monitoring method comprises the following steps: obtaining user point cloud data through a three-dimensional monitoring device, and establishing user body model data according to the user point cloud data; comparing the user body model data with historical user data in a preset model library to obtain a user historical comparison result; comparing the user body model data with public typical data in the preset model library to obtain a public typical comparison result; and determining a fitness effect monitoring result according to the user historical comparison result and the public typical comparison result. The technical problem that the accuracy of monitoring the fitness effect of the user is poor in the prior art is solved.

column2: CLOUD COMPUTING RESOURCE SCHEDULING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a cloud computing resource scheduling method which can be applied to the technical field of cloud computing and artificial intelligence. The cloud computing resource scheduling method comprises the following steps: determining the type of a newly added application in response to a request that the newly added application accesses a target load balancing cluster; determining a target elastic resource pool cluster matched with the newly added application according to the type of the newly added application; in the running process of the target load balancing cluster, collecting a performance index value of the target load balancing cluster generated in a preset time period; and scheduling the resources of the target load balancing cluster and the resources of the target elastic resource pool cluster under the condition of determining that the resources of the target load balancing cluster and the resources of the target elastic resource pool cluster need to be scheduled according to the performance index value. The invention further provides a cloud computing resource scheduling device and equipment, a storage medium and a program product.

column2: GYMNASTIC TRAINING DEVICE
column4: The device, comprises of a frame 1 having a pair of rings 2 linked with each other by means of bars 3 and moved on a platform 5 through a guiding rail 4 that is to be operated by the user in performing ring training, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 6 attached on platform 5 for capturing multiple images of user in order to fetch an expertise level of the user, a motorized slider 7 installed in between rings 2 and bars 3 for adjusting space between rods with respect to fetched expertise level, multiple telescopic blocks 8 integrated with platform 5 along the length of guiding rail 4 to protrude at front and rear portion of the rings 2 for marking of a distance, a pair of motorized C-shaped clamps 12 fitted at each bar 3 for gripping user?™s hands and legs in a secured manner.

column2: SQUAT EXERCISE TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A squat exercise training device, comprising a platform 1 for providing sufficient space for user to exercise, a vertical pole 3 installed on the platform 1 for better control of exercise, footmarks 2 for accurate positioning of user?™s feet, a U-shaped telescopic member 4 for adjusting the rod 5 on the user?™s shoulder , a L shaped spring 6 for allowing raising and lowering of rod 5 , a touch interactive display panel 7 for enabling the user to choose the exercise level, an Artificial Intelligence image capturing module 8 to decode the size of user?™s torso region and accordingly actuate the member 4, telescopically operated gripper 16 for putting various magnetic circular plates 15 on the rod 5 as per decoded weight by the microcontroller, and a scissor lift arrangement 9 for regulating movement of seat 10 and a thermal imaging unit 12 for detecting strain in user?™s hand.

column2: DATA SET SECURITY TEST METHOD AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and provides a data set security test method and device and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: receiving a model test request sent by a relay server; acquiring a data sample set and a test model mirror image corresponding to the model test request; performing model testing on the test model mirror image based on the data sample set to obtain a sample test result set; if it is determined that the mistakenly rejected samples exist in the sample test result set, determining a mistakenly rejected sample set based on the mistakenly rejected samples Storing the mistakenly rejected sample set to a preset first storage area; and if a first data downloading request sent by the relay server is received, obtaining a mistaken rejection sample set in the first storage area based on the first data downloading request and sending the mistaken rejection sample set to the relay server. According to the scheme, data stored in other areas except the first storage area in the service server cannot be downloaded and can only be checked, so that the security of the data set stored in the service server and the test model data is improved.

column2: IDENTITY INFORMATION INPUT METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON OPTICAL CHARACTER RECOGNITION AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides an identity information input method and device based on optical character recognition and related equipment.The method comprises the steps that in response to a received identity information input request, an identity card photographing area is displayed on an information input interface, and photographing is started; when it is detected that an identity card image is shot in the identity card shooting area, the identity card image is sent to an optical character recognition model for recognition, and an initial recognition result is obtained; adopting a plurality of preset correction strategies to correct the initial recognition result to obtain a target recognition result; and inputting the first target identification result into an information input interface according to a preset input rule. According to the identity information input method and device, the information input interface and the identity card photographing area are aggregated to one page, and the error information and the missing information in the initial recognition result are corrected by adopting multiple preset correction strategies, so that the input efficiency and accuracy of the identity information are improved.

column2: LEG EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: A leg exercising device comprises a frame 2 assembled with an inverted U-shaped table 1 for enabling user(s) to place different items, a pair of seating members 3 mounted on each of the base 4 that is installed over frame 2 for performing a leg exercise, a sliding arrangement 5 attached between base 4 and frame 2 for providing a back and forth movement to the members 3 for performing an exercise, a voice recognition module 6 installed on frame 2 enable user(s) to select a type of exercise, an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 8 fitted on table 1 for capturing multiple images of user for detecting an expertise level of the user(s), when user choose a beginner level, the sliding arrangement 5 is deactivated which allows user(s) to push members 3 over by pushing paddles 7 for leg-press exercise.

column2: TEST CASE GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to a test case generation method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and is applied to the field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: executing a to-be-recognized case through a to-be-tested business program after compiling instrumentation, and obtaining instrumentation output information corresponding to the to-be-recognized case; based on the instrumentation output information, generating an execution flow graph corresponding to the to-be-identified case; the execution flow graph represents a running path formed by program basic blocks passed by the case to be identified in the execution process; obtaining a test case queue for the to-be-tested business program; the test case queue comprises a plurality of effective test cases; and if the execution flow graph corresponding to the to-be-identified case is different from the execution flow graphs corresponding to the test cases in the test case queue, determining that the to-be-identified case is valid, and adding the to-be-identified case into the test case queue. By adopting the method, omission of the branch paths in the to-be-tested business program can be avoided.

column2: WIND GENERATING SET OPERATION STATE MONITORING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses a wind generating set running state monitoring system based on an artificial intelligence algorithm, which comprises an extraction module connected with an acquisition and transmission module, the extraction module is connected with a comparative analysis module and an audio feature library, and the comparative analysis module is connected with the audio feature library and an alarm module. The system has the advantages that the operation state of the wind generating set can be discriminated according to the real-time audio signals and the audio feature library, and potential safety hazards of the wind generating set are eliminated.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING EQUIPMENT CONTROLLED BY COMPUTER
column4: A computer-controlled artificial intelligence monitoring device disclosed by the present invention comprises a base, the upper end of the base is fixedly connected with a stand column, the upper end of the stand column is fixedly connected with a top cover, the side wall of the stand column is fixedly connected with a mounting frame, the mounting frame is provided with a camera, the interior of the stand column is provided with a first cavity, and the first cavity is internally provided with a second cavity. A mounting mechanism used for mounting a camera is arranged in the first cavity, a collecting mechanism used for collecting rainwater is arranged at the upper end of the top cover, a fixing plate is fixedly connected to the side wall of the stand column, a translation plate is arranged on the side wall of the fixing plate, and a third cavity is formed in the inner side of the fixing plate; and the interior of the third cavity is fixedly connected with an electric telescopic rod. The surface of the camera can be wiped and cleaned through rotation of the brush plate, the monitoring definition of the camera is guaranteed, the camera can be put down to be overhauled, climbing to a high position is not needed, and potential safety hazards are reduced.

column2: IOT-DRIVEN SMART SYSTEM FOR MULTI-FOOD RECOMMENDATION USING MACHINE LEARNING
column4: A personal health record (PHR) is an electronic health record that stores, tracks, and maintains all forms of health-related data in a safe and private manner throughout a person's life. Thanks to wireless sensors and wearable gadgets that use IoT devices, it is now feasible to measure an individual's physical activity, blood pressure, and glucose levels in real-time. As a result of the effective use of such data, the quality of healthcare management services has improved. Diabetes, arthritis, Alzheimer's disease, and heart disease are among the chronic disorders for which PHR is becoming more important. The present design is for health-care privileges, with a focus on individualized management of a user's healthcare needs. A system for combining a user's personal risk analysis with resources utilized by health-care medical service providers, as well as food habits, patient condition, and other stakeholders in the user's health-care decision-making is presented in the invention. The PHR platform, which contains filters based on particular and well-known health risk indicators, as well as user preference models for each individual patient, underpins PHR's real-time health monitoring and management solution. Those who are worried about their own health can benefit from a mobile-based health management service and personal health records. Patient-centric health monitoring systems are rapidly replacing hospital-centric health monitoring systems in the medical field. To improve the recommendation system, we used Collaborative Filtering for meal suggestions. There are further benefits, such as standardization of personal health records, support for a smart digital food assistant-based health management system, patient health awareness, and hospital-to-hospital data exchange. AI is entering all parts of food systems, meaning that systemic changes are possible. Designers have a duty to understand and evaluate how artificial intelligence (AI) might help us move to more sustainable food systems as intermediates between humans, technology, and the environment.

column2: SWIMMING ASSISTIVE DEVICE
column4: A swimming assistive device comprises a V-shaped frame 1 whose stern portion 3 is linked with a waist belt 2 for holding a user during swimming, an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 5 installed on a frame 1 for capturing multiple images of the user, a pair of rollers 6 wrapped with strap 13 for providing secured positioning of the user, a pair of Z-shaped members 7 hinged at bow portion 4 for providing gripping to the user, a pair of platforms 9 attached at stern portion 3 through a L-shaped telescopic links 10 for positioning of legs and performing leg movements during swimming, a FBG (Fiber Bragg Grating) sensor integrated with member 7 for evaluating the vital health parameters of the user, when determined parameters of user?™s health mismatches with a standard level, the microcontroller actuates members 7 and platform 9 to assists user in normalizing the examined parameters.

column2: INTELLIGENT GATE SYSTEM FOR CONSTRUCTION SITE AND CONSTRUCTION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a construction site intelligent gate system and a construction method.The system comprises a server, a K2-Draco development board, a GC0308 camera, an LCD screen, an electric control lock controlled by a relay and a user terminal, a model and program codes used for intelligent recognition are written into the K2-Draco development board, the camera displays shot pictures on the LCD screen in real time and transmits the pictures to the server, and the server is connected with the GC0308 camera and the LCD screen. A WeChat applet is installed in the user terminal; and the passing result of the picture is displayed on the LCD screen. According to the system, by means of a light classification algorithm and a human-assisted learning environment, accurate identification of current picture features and cost compression are realized, a worker can be prevented from entering a construction site without wearing a reflective garment at high accuracy and low cost, the problem of high cost in artificial intelligence landing to the construction site reflective garment detection is solved, and the working efficiency is improved. And the risk of accidents caused by the fact that workers do not wear the reflective clothing can be reduced.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CONFERENCE SYSTEM BASED ON FACE RECOGNITION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of data recognition, in particular to an artificial intelligence conference system based on a face recognition technology. The camera shooting unit is activated through a button of the switch unit, the camera shooting unit shoots image information of a current designated area and transmits the image information to the face recognition and analysis unit, and the face recognition and analysis unit extracts facial features of a user in the image information and transmits the facial features of the user to the management end. The management end compares the facial features of the user with the pre-stored facial features of the storage end and the standby pre-stored facial features of the cloud platform in a preset mode to realize face recognition to enter the conference, and the conference system has the functions of positioning, sign-in, blacklist, automatic database updating and the like; the problem that in the prior art, when the user does not update the image information for a long time or the facial features of the user are changed to a certain degree, face recognition is prone to failure is solved, the conference safety is guaranteed, and the working efficiency is improved.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR GENERATING TREATMENT PLANS TO ENHANCE PATIENT RECOVERY BASED ON SPECIFIC OCCUPATIONS
column4: A method is disclosed for generating a treatment plan to modify an attribute of a user, wherein the attribute of the user is associated with an attribute of an occupational task. The method includes receiving data associated with the user, wherein the data comprises the modified attribute of the user and the attribute of the occupational task; accessing a database comprising data associated with exercises associated with the modified attribute of the user and the attribute of the occupational task; and generating, via an artificial intelligence engine, the treatment plan comprising an exercise of the exercises associated with the modified attribute of the first user and the attribute of the occupational task, wherein the artificial intelligence engine generates the treatment plan comprising the exercise based on the data associated with the user and the data associated with the exercises.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR INDUSTRIAL MACHINE ENVIRONMENT
column4: A system and method for automated optimization of industrial machines and controllers. The disclosed system and method include a monitoring module that collects and evaluates input and output data from a controller coupled to a machine; a system identification trigger module that analyses the input and output data to detect performance and stability deviations based on design specifications of the equipment; a system modeling identification module that identifies dynamics of the equipment based on the input and output data; an adaptation module that adapts the controller to the deviations by modifying parameters and/or structure of the controller; a fitness criteria module that evaluates the modified parameters and/or structure of the controller; and a system update module that integrates the modified parameters and/or structure into the controller/machine.

column2: DISPLAY CONTROL METHOD AND TERMINAL DEVICE
column4: Embodiments of this application provide a display control method and a terminal device, and relate to the field of artificial intelligence (artificial intelligence, AI) technologies. The display control method may be applied to a terminal device, and includes: determining, in response to a first operation of a user, an application that is running on the terminal device, where the first operation is used to trigger display of an interface of the application that is running on the terminal device; obtaining a display layout manner of the application; and displaying the interface of the application in a display region corresponding to the display layout manner. A display interface of the terminal device includes display regions respectively corresponding to N display layout manners, and N is an integer greater than or equal to 2. Display regions respectively corresponding to a plurality of display layout manners are displayed on the display interface of the terminal device, so that interfaces of at least two running applications may be displayed, and a display effect is improved.

column2: IMAGE ATTRIBUTE RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE AND ATTRIBUTE RECOGNITION MODEL TRAINING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an image attribute recognition method, an attribute recognition model training method and device, equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical fields of image processing, computer vision and the like, and can be applied to scenes such as intelligent traffic and smart cities. According to the specific implementation scheme, a first image is acquired, wherein the first image comprises an image of a target object; afterwards, a second image can be determined according to the first image, and the second image is a partial region image including the target object in the first image. And inputting the first image and the second image into a single attribute recognition model to obtain a target image attribute. Wherein the target image attribute comprises first attribute information of the first image and second attribute information corresponding to the target object. According to the invention, attribute recognition can be simultaneously carried out on different images through one model, so that the model recognition efficiency is improved, and the running speed reduction caused by common running of multiple models is avoided.

column2: POWER DISTRIBUTION RACK ACCEPTANCE METHOD BASED ON UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE
column4: The invention relates to a power distribution rack acceptance method based on an unmanned aerial vehicle, and relates to the technical field of detection. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an image of a power distribution rack by using shooting equipment loaded on an unmanned aerial vehicle, judging whether the definition of the image meets a requirement, if so, obtaining a target image, and if not, shooting again until the target image is obtained; recognizing the target image through a deep learning artificial intelligence image recognition technology, and judging whether the installation of each component on the power distribution rack accords with a specification or not; and when the installation of the component does not conform to the specification, marking the corresponding image as an unqualified image, and storing the data of the unqualified image. The method can avoid the danger caused by manual acceptance high-altitude operation, guarantees the personal safety of workers, guarantees the accuracy of the unmanned aerial vehicle for collecting the image data of the power distribution rack, and improves the acceptance efficiency of the whole power distribution rack.

column2: AIR BOAT ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DETECTION SYSTEM AND DETECTION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence detection system and detection method for an air boat, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the navigation image recording of a standard boat and a test boat, and carrying out the analysis through an artificial intelligence analysis method; and performing iterative judgment on a change curve of an included angle between the boat body and the water surface and a pixel point change curve of the highest point of the boat head and the high point of the water surface in the model, thereby realizing intelligent detection of the posture of the aerodynamic boat. According to the air boat artificial intelligence detection system, the artificial intelligence technology is adopted to add an intelligent analysis function for air boat production quality detection, the influence of human factors is avoided, the detection accuracy is improved, meanwhile, high-definition image data is adopted for intelligent analysis, fixing equipment does not need to be installed on a test boat, and the cost is reduced. And the high-definition camera is only needed to shoot the images of the test boat and the standard boat on the shore or on the shooting boat, so that the detection cost is reduced. And the system uploads high-definition image data and downloads an intelligent analysis result by adopting a 5G communication technology, so that the detection efficiency is greatly improved.

column2: PROMPTING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a prompting method and device, electronic equipment and a readable storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that a first image collected by a first camera of the electronic equipment and a second image collected by a second camera of the electronic equipment are obtained, and target scenes shot by the first camera and the second camera are the same, and shooting angles are different; obtaining three-dimensional feature information in the target scene according to the first feature information of the first image and the second feature information of the second image; according to the stereo feature information, obtaining a probability value of a target object in a learning state in the target scene; and outputting prompt information under the condition that the probability value is smaller than a target threshold value.

column2: BEHAVIOR DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, VEHICLE, STORAGE MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a behavior detection method and device, a vehicle, a storage medium and electronic equipment, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a target image frame comprising a target part of a target object and a first image frame sequence from video frames collected by a camera device; determining a first behavior of the target object and a first confidence coefficient of the first behavior based on the target image frame; performing skeleton detection on each image frame in the first image frame sequence to obtain skeleton information of each image frame in the first image frame sequence, and performing behavior recognition based on the skeleton information of each image frame in the first image frame sequence to obtain a second behavior of the target object and a second confidence coefficient of the second behavior; and determining a behavior detection result of the target object based on the first behavior, the first confidence of the first behavior, the second behavior and the second confidence of the second behavior. According to the embodiment of the invention, the misjudgment probability of behavior detection can be greatly reduced.

column2: TASK FLOW ACCURATE SCHEDULING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a task flow precise scheduling method and device based on artificial intelligence, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a task link diagram of each preset task flow which comprises a plurality of task nodes, the task link diagram comprises a preset ID of a preset task flow, a period type and an upstream and downstream relationship of task nodes; determining a dependency relationship between any task nodes in the different task link diagrams to draw a dependency graph, wherein the dependency relationship comprises dependency task nodes and a dependency period number; state information of each task node is obtained, the state information comprises a running queue and a running cycle number, and the running queue comprises output results of the task nodes in each running cycle; calculating a scheduling priority of each task link diagram based on the state information, the dependency diagram, the cycle type and a preset priority; and scheduling a preset task flow corresponding to the task link diagram according to the scheduling priority to obtain a scheduling result. The task flow scheduling method and device can realize accurate scheduling of the task flow.

column2: SWIMMING POOL DROWNING PREVENTION EARLY WARNING DEVICE BASED ON IMAGE RECOGNITION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a swimming pool drowning prevention early warning device based on an image recognition technology, and the device comprises a cruise guide rail, an electric sliding seat, a cleaning assembly, a monitoring camera, an artificial intelligence drowning prevention early warning system body, a water mist prevention assembly, an adjustment assembly, an early warning frame, a display screen, and a demisting assembly. Cleaning assemblies are fixedly mounted at the tops and the bottoms of the end faces of the two sides of the electric sliding seat correspondingly, the cleaning assemblies are connected with the cruise guide rail, an adjusting assembly is arranged in the center of one end of the electric sliding seat, and a monitoring camera is mounted above the top of the adjusting assembly. The swimming pool anti-drowning early warning device is simple in structure and small in size; when the device is used, a large cruising range can be achieved, and therefore monitoring and early warning of different positions of the swimming pool can be improved; and meanwhile, water mist and impurities on the surface of the early warning equipment can be cleaned, so that the water mist is prevented from influencing the monitoring and early warning effects.

column2: COKE QUALITY PREDICTION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention is based on the technical field of data processing, and particularly relates to an artificial intelligence-based coke quality prediction method, which comprises the following steps of: constructing a quality prediction function model according to the weight of feed coal, characteristic indexes of the feed coal, coking furnace temperature and coking time, and training and determining parameters of the prediction function model through a DNN network and historical processing data; the method comprises the following steps: calculating the similarity between existing inventory and historical processing data, selecting historical data with the maximum similarity with existing conditions in a clustering manner, calculating the outlier of each piece of historical processing data information according to the similarity between every two pieces of historical processing data information with the maximum similarity, screening out initial value data according to the outlier, and carrying out data processing according to the initial value data. The method comprises the following steps: calculating the average gradient, substituting the average gradient into a coke quality prediction function model to obtain fitness, calculating the variation rate of individual data of each gene according to the fitness and the average gradient, continuously iterating according to the variation rate to obtain an optimal solution of the prediction function model, and controlling the coal processing process according to the optimal solution, so that the method is intelligent and accurate.

column2: PULL-UP COMBINED TRAINER BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of fitness equipment, and particularly discloses a pull-up combined trainer based on artificial intelligence. Comprising a base plate, a control cabinet, adjustable telescopic vertical rods, a horizontal bar cross rod, a handheld induction sleeve and a training intensity adjusting device, the control cabinet is fixedly arranged at the front end of the upper surface of the base plate, the two adjustable telescopic vertical rods are fixedly installed at the left end and the right end of the upper surface of the base plate, and the upper end of each telescopic vertical rod is connected with a two-way fixing piece; the two ends of the horizontal bar cross rod are connected with the two-way fixing piece, the two handheld induction sleeves are arranged at the left end and the right end of the horizontal bar cross rod respectively, and the training intensity adjusting device is fixedly arranged under the horizontal bar cross rod. According to the pull-up combined trainer based on artificial intelligence, the training intensity can be adjusted according to the condition of a user, the intelligent degree is high, after training is completed, related information can be viewed from a display screen or transmitted to a mobile phone of the user through Bluetooth to be viewed, and the pull-up combined trainer is diversified in function and convenient to use.

column2: ABNORMAL REGISTRATION IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to artificial intelligence, and provides an abnormal registration identification method and device, equipment and a storage medium. According to the method, registration information of a to-be-registered user is obtained, the registration information comprises basic information of the to-be-registered user and equipment information corresponding to input equipment, a target time period is generated according to the input moment of the basic information on the input equipment and preset time, and the operation state of an audio input module in the target time period is recognized. Calculating the running speed of the screenshot module in the target time period, detecting a screen sharing result of the input equipment based on the running state and the running speed, when the screen sharing result is a preset result, performing characterization processing on the basic information to obtain a feature vector, and processing the feature vector based on a registration risk prediction model to obtain a registration risk prediction result; and the abnormal information is determined according to the registration risk value, so that the identification accuracy of the abnormal registration is improved. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the abnormal information can be stored in a block chain.

column2: STROBOSCOPIC SCENE CLASSIFICATION METHOD, MODEL TRAINING METHOD, RELATED DEVICE AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses a stroboscopic scene classification method, a model training method, a related device and electronic equipment, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first image pair in the same shooting scene, wherein the first image pair comprises a first image and a second image; performing feature processing on the first image and the second image to obtain a first image feature of the first image and a second image feature of the second image; splicing the first image feature and the second image feature to obtain a first target image feature; based on the first target image feature, stroboscopic scene classification is carried out on the shooting scene to obtain a first classification result, and the first classification result is used for representing the stroboscopic intensity level of the first image pair.

column2: TARGET USER LOCKING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: Embodiments of this application provide a target user locking method and an electronic device, and relate to the field of electronic devices. The method provided in this application may be applied to an artificial intelligence (artificial intelligence, AI) fitness scenario, and can ensure accuracy of locking a target user. The electronic device may recognize the target user and track the target user in a fitness process by using a method such as recognizing a user feature, recognizing the user with reference to data collected by a wearable device worn by the user, or recognizing a motion mode of the user.
