column2: METHOD FOR AUTOMATICALLY CAPTURING RED LIGHT RUNNING OF ELECTRIC TWO-WHEELED VEHICLE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence machine vision analysis and identification, and discloses an electric two-wheeled vehicle red light running automatic snapshot method, which comprises the following steps: collecting electric two-wheeled vehicle, human license plate and status lamp specimens, and training a Yolov4 target detection model library by adopting a Darknet deep learning framework; and carrying out rarefaction, pruning and simplification on the obtained model library, carrying out F16 precise secondary reasoning conversion, obtaining a final red light running target object detection model library, putting the model library into use, identifying a license plate after a snapshot event is generated, and recording a red light running behavior snapshot event record and a video evidence obtaining video. According to the method for automatically capturing red light running of the electric two-wheeled vehicle, an AI artificial intelligence machine vision'deep learning 'technology is adopted, a video detection red, yellow and green light state algorithm library is trained, and red, yellow and green light state signals can be obtained without connecting a traffic light state machine.

column2: IMAGE SHOOTING INTEGRITY JUDGMENT METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an image shooting integrity determination method and apparatus. The method comprises the steps of firstly obtaining a to-be-detected and identified image for training an artificial intelligence model; performing image segmentation on the to-be-detected and identified image according to the image segmentation model to obtain a commodity selling area; extracting the area contour of the commodity selling area; and finally carrying out shooting integrity determination according to the area contour and the to-be-detected and identified image to obtain a shooting integrity determination result, and the method can automatically and rapidly carry out identification determination on the shooting integrity of the image and give a determination result whether the shooting integrity is qualified, thereby being helpful for obtaining a higher-quality training sample, and improving the detection accuracy of the to-be-detected and identified image. And the training effect of the artificial intelligence model is improved.

column2: UNDERGROUND CULVERT SUSPENSION TYPE SAFETY REFUGE ROOM
column4: An underground culvert suspension type safety refuge chamber comprises a refuge support and a refuge cavity arranged below the refuge support, the refuge support is provided with a material cavity for storing materials, and an oxygen generation device and a storage battery are arranged in the refuge support. The oxygen generating device and the storage battery provide energy support for the oxygen supply mask and the illuminating lamp which go deep into the refuge cavity, a cavity bottom plate is arranged at the bottom of the refuge cavity, and a safety door which is opened upwards in an overturning mode is arranged at the bottom of the refuge cavity. A climbing rope ladder capable of being downwards perpendicular to the lower portion and a rope ladder storage box for storing the climbing rope ladder are arranged at the position, close to the safety door, of the refuge cavity, and a lifesaving air bag connected with the cavity bottom plate through a safety rope is arranged on the periphery of the bottom of the cavity bottom plate in a surrounding mode and can support the cavity bottom plate through buoyancy of water. In conclusion, the emergency escape device has the advantages that space is saved, the refugees can have a rest conveniently, enough rescue materials are provided, and the refugees can escape conveniently.

column2: PIEZOELECTRIC MATERIAL-BASED TIRE HEALTH STATE MONITORING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a tire health state monitoring system and method based on a piezoelectric material, and the system comprises a sensor module, an analog-to-digital conversion and storage module, a data processing unit, a state evaluation module, a data transmission module, and an upper computer. The analog-to-digital conversion and storage module collects electric signals output by the sensor module, converts the electric signals into digital signals and stores the digital signals, and the data processing unit performs time-frequency domain analysis on the digital signals stored by the analog-to-digital conversion and storage module, extracts, counts and stores characteristic parameters and forms a characteristic parameter training set; the piezoelectric fiber composite material is pasted on the surface of the automobile hub, vibration signals of the tire in the automobile running process are collected, analyzed and processed in combination with an artificial intelligence algorithm, the health state of the tire is evaluated and fed back, the health state of the tire is comprehensively reflected in time, and the driving safety and reliability are enhanced.

column2: ANTI-PINCH AUTOMATIC CONTROL METHOD FOR PUNCHING MACHINE BASED ON INFRARED RAYS
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an infrared ray-based automatic control method for preventing hands of a punching machine from being pinched. Dividing the machine tool into a dangerous area, a buffer area and a safe area, and collecting human hand joint point cloud data in the buffer area; initial matching is conducted on the joint numbers, and three groups of joints with the maximum similarity in an initial matching result are obtained to serve as first matching joint pairs; performing downward matching on the joints at two adjacent moments, obtaining all matched joint pairs obtained by each round of matching result in three rounds of matching, calculating the dominance degree of each round of matching result, and obtaining the corresponding joints at the two adjacent moments according to the matching result corresponding to the maximum dominance degree; and acquiring the change tracks of the human hand joints corresponding to the continuous moments to predict the motion positions of the human hand joints, and controlling the machine tool to stop running according to the positions of the human hand joints. Stop and start of the punching machine are controlled by predicting the moving track of the hand, and the hand clamping accident can be effectively prevented.

column2: INTELLIGENT DETECTION METHOD FOR TAIL END SHAKING OF INDUSTRIAL ROBOT
column4: The invention relates to an industrial robot tail end jitter intelligent detection method comprising the following steps: firstly installing an acceleration sensor at the tail end of an industrial robot, and determining an industrial robot test motion track; secondly, an acceleration sensor collects tail end vibration signals of the industrial robot and divides the tail end vibration signals into starting, running and stopping stages; then searching a jitter position through a root-mean-square threshold value, changing a search initial phase, repeatedly obtaining a jitter sample, and carrying out continuous wavelet transform calculation to obtain a tail end jitter sample time-frequency graph; and finally, adaptively determining an optimal convolutional neural network structure through a small number of training samples, and carrying out deep feature extraction and classification on the time-frequency graph by using an optimal network to realize industrial robot tail end jitter state recognition. According to the method, the sensor detection technology and the artificial intelligence algorithm are combined, the accurate intelligent detection of the tail end jitter of the industrial robot is realized through a small number of sensors and the adaptive convolutional neural network, and the method has the advantages of low cost, simple operation and high accuracy.

column2: CHILDREN PUZZLE GAME SYSTEM BASED ON SOMATOSENSORY INTERACTION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a children puzzle game system based on a somatosensory interaction technology. The children puzzle game system comprises a somatosensory sensor, a computer processing system, a memory, an artificial intelligence voice recognition system, a display and a loudspeaker box, the somatosensory sensor is used for sensing perception information of a human body and inputting the perception information into the computer processing system; the computer processing system is used for receiving the sensing information and sending the sensing information and a processing result to the display and the sound box, the display is used for receiving and displaying a video signal, and the sound box is used for receiving and playing an audio signal; the memory is used for storing a computer control program, a control model, a control algorithm and a database; and the artificial intelligence voice recognition system is used for performing voice recognition, and the computer processing system performs selection or executes an operation command according to the voice recognition content. The interactive technology is utilized, the potential intelligence of children is excavated, teaching is achieved through lively activities, the user experience is improved, the positive exercise effect is achieved for the user, and certain practicability is achieved.

column2: BIONIC EYE MEDICAL ROBOT FOR CERVICAL VERTEBRA REHABILITATION AND REHABILITATION EVALUATION METHOD
column4: The bionic eye medical robot comprises a robot body, and the robot body is provided with a seven-degree-of-freedom cervical vertebra operation teaching motion control module, a man-machine interaction voice module, a patient motion sensing module, a cloud database system and a robot visualization module. The robot body is used for carrying out human-simulated actions and carrying out interactive perception, analysis and evaluation on actions in the cervical vertebra exercise process of a patient through a video and audio multi-mode artificial intelligence algorithm, and the cervical spondylosis patient is assisted to obtain standardized exercise treatment and log records. Compared with the prior art, the cervical spondylosis rehabilitation training device has the advantages that the cervical spondylosis patient is helped to obtain good exercise treatment, the labor cost of rehabilitation exercise of the cervical spondylosis patient is reduced, and the safety and stability of cervical spondylosis rehabilitation exercise are guaranteed.

column2: KNOWLEDGE POINT PREDICTION METHOD AND DEVICE, STORAGE MEDIUM AND COMPUTER EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses a knowledge point prediction method and device, a storage medium and computer equipment, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a to-be-predicted exercise, extracting an exercise vector corresponding to the to-be-predicted exercise from a graph attention neural network, calculating the distance between the exercise vector and all knowledge point vectors in the graph attention neural network, and calculating the distance between the exercise vector and the knowledge point vectors in the graph attention neural network; and screening out a target distance smaller than a distance threshold from the distances, determining a target knowledge point vector indicated by the target distance, and taking a knowledge point corresponding to the target knowledge point vector as a knowledge point of the to-be-predicted exercise. By adopting the method and the device, the vector representation of the to-be-predicted exercises and the knowledge points is acquired based on the semi-supervised classification graph attention neural network, and the distance between the to-be-predicted exercises and the knowledge points is calculated and the appropriate and accurate knowledge point labels are marked on the exercises according to the distance.

column2: FITNESS EXERCISE EFFECT EVALUATION ANALYSIS MANAGEMENT SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a fitness exercise effect evaluation analysis management system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a body-building mirror, the body-building mirror is provided with a binocular acquisition camera, an infrared thermal imaging module and a communication module, the binocular acquisition camera is used for acquiring a user image in a body-building area in front of the body-building mirror, and the infrared thermal imaging module is used for acquiring a thermal image in the body-building area in front of the body-building mirror; the user wearable device is used for collecting physiological data of a user in real time and sending the physiological data to the communication module; the fitness mirror is further provided with a central processing unit which is used for preprocessing a user image collected by the binocular camera, a thermal image collected by the infrared thermal imaging module and physiological data collected by the user wearing device and inputting the preprocessed data into a first convolutional neural network model. And obtaining an exercise effect analysis score when the user performs fitness exercise. Therefore, the fitness exercise effect of the user can be evaluated and analyzed in real time, and the use feeling of the user can be improved.

column2: ROBOT AND ROBOT INSPECTION METHOD
column4: The invention provides a robot and a robot inspection method, which can be applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The robot sequentially comprises a workbench, a trunk and a chassis from top to bottom. The chassis is provided with a motion environment detection module used for detecting motion environment information in an inspection path and a motion control module used for determining inspection path information according to inspection position information and sending a motion instruction to the motor driving module. The workbench is provided with an image acquisition module which is used for acquiring an operation state image of the target cabinet and a heat distribution image of the target cabinet when the inspection position is determined to be reached. The trunk is provided with a central processing module which is used for receiving and analyzing an inspection task instruction from the man-machine interaction module to obtain inspection position information and sending the inspection position information to the motion control module; and the image processing module is used for processing the running state image and the heating power distribution image from the image acquisition module and sending image processing result information to the central processing module.

column2: REMOTE CONTROL TYPE DUMPING AND CLIMBING AUXILIARY DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of medical apparatus and instruments, in particular to an artificial intelligence-based remote control type toppling and climbing auxiliary device which comprises a sandbox seat, a supporting plate is welded to the middle of the upper end of the sandbox seat, an illuminating lamp is embedded in the outer wall of one side of the supporting plate, a support is fixed to the upper end of the supporting plate, and an equipment plate is connected to the upper end of the support; and a traction machine is mounted on the upper surface of the equipment plate through bolts. The remote control type toppling and climbing auxiliary device based on artificial intelligence is provided with the traction cable, the traction cable is driven by the traction machine output shaft and the traction wheel to stretch out or retract on the equipment plate, a user can conduct large-range movement exercise, steering adjustment is achieved without moving several steps, the use experience is better, and the practicability is high. And the traction cable is wound on the guide wheel at one end of the support arm and is limited through the rope stopper, so that the traction cable is prevented from being separated from a wheel groove of the guide wheel, the traction effect is more stable, and the situation that a user falls down and is injured for the second time due to shaking of the traction cable is prevented.

column2: ROBOT CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE, ROBOT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a robot control method and device, a robot and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and robot control. The method comprises the steps that after the foot-wheel robot is started and runs, the foot-wheel robot enters a power-on self-test state, and in the power-on self-test state, whether all functional components of the foot-wheel robot run normally or not is detected; entering a motor self-locking state under the condition that each functional assembly of the foot-wheel robot normally operates, and controlling each motor of the foot-wheel robot to be locked to a set operation state under the motor self-locking state; and under the condition that each motor is locked to the set operation state, responding to the received triggering instruction, entering a basic balance state, and starting a posture balance control function of the foot-wheel robot. A state switching control scheme is provided for the foot-wheel robot, and the foot-wheel robot is controlled to be reasonably switched among the running states, so that it is guaranteed that the foot-wheel robot can accurately and reliably execute corresponding functions.

column2: CASE IMPROVEMENT METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON SKELETON AI VIDEO AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a case improvement method and device based on a skeleton AI video and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the prediction of motion skeleton video data through a target posture shape prediction model, and obtaining the offset of a human motion form; when the offset of the human body action form is consistent with the offset of the target form, generating a target health knowledge graph according to the basic data, the physiological data and the target health management strategy; managing the health of the target user according to the target health knowledge graph, and improving the initial case according to the target health knowledge graph; according to the mode, the offset of the human body action form is predicted according to the target posture shape prediction model, and the health of the target user is managed according to the target health knowledge graph, so that the efficiency and convenience of managing the health of the user can be effectively improved, the range of applicable crowds is wide, and an improved case conforms to health management regulations.

column2: URBAN TERMINAL LUGGAGE AUTOMATIC BOXING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to an automatic luggage boxing device of an urban terminal based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of logistics automation, the automatic luggage boxing device comprises a luggage transfer frame, and a luggage transfer channel is formed on the luggage transfer frame through transfer rollers; the luggage transfer frame is provided with a plurality of piece selectors located above the luggage transfer channel, the piece selectors are sequentially arranged in the extension direction of the luggage transfer channel, and the automatic loading device is arranged on the outer side of the luggage transfer frame and matched with the piece selectors to load the selected luggage; the method has the effect that luggage freight is more convenient and quicker in actual arrangement.

column2: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND MACHINE LEARNING BASED AUTOMATIC PENALTY DEVICE AND ITS METHOD THEREOF
column4: The automatic penalty device comprises a camera to capture video of a player and goal area; an image sequencing unit to transmute captured video into a set of frames; a pre-processing unit to remove noise from the set of frames and augment the frame?™s precision upon converting RGB format frames into HSV format frames; a background removal unit to separate foreground object upon removing background thereby a DPHE is implemented to the extracted frame for CE and highlighting the frame quality; a motion estimation unit to detect moving objects; an object tracking unit to track the moving object on the video frames; a feature extraction unit to extract a set of features; a RBF-FDLNN classifier to detect a player from the moving objects; and a control unit to activate a football shooting machine for shooting a football in a goal post by dodging the player.

column2: PERCEPTUAL NETWORK AND DATA PROCESSING METHOD
column4: Disclosed in the present application is a perceptual network, which can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence. The perceptual network comprises: a feature extraction network, wherein a first block in the feature extraction network is used for performing convolution processing on input data to obtain M target feature maps; at least one second block in the feature extraction network is used for performing convolution processing on M1 target feature maps among the M target feature maps to obtain M1 first feature maps; a target operation in the feature extraction network is used for processing M2 target feature maps among the M target feature maps to obtain M2 second feature maps; and a splicing operation in the feature extraction network is used for splicing the M1 first feature maps and the M2 second feature maps in order to obtain a feature map after splicing. In the present application, a cross-layer target operation between identical stages is used for enabling a perceptual network to generate these features having a high similarity to a key feature, such that the parameters of a model are reduced, thereby increasing the running speed of the model on a GPU device, a TPU device and an NPU device.

column2: PROMPT METHOD AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE FOR FITNESS TRAINING
column4: This application provides a prompt method for fitness training and an electronic device, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method includes: obtaining required training space, where the required training space is used to complete one or more training actions; determining, based on a training scenario in which a user is located and the required training space, a training location recommended to the user; and recording collecting a training action of the user based on the training location recommended to the user. A suitable training location is recommended to the user based on the training scenario in which the user is located and the required training space. Therefore, the user can also normally perform training in a scenario in which exercise space is limited, for example, when there is an obstruction or a site is insufficient.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELING FOR CYBER-ATTACK SIMULATION PROTOCOLS
column4: The methods and systems disclosed herein generally relate to automated execution and evaluation of computer network training exercises, such as in a virtual environment. A server generates a training system having a virtual attack machine and a virtual target machine where the virtual target machine is operatively controlled by a trainee computer. The server then executes a simulated cyber-attack and monitors/collects actions and responses by the trainee. The server then executes an artificial intelligence model to evaluate the trainee's action and to identify a subsequent simulated cyber-attack (e.g., a next step to the simulated cyber-attack). The server may then train the artificial intelligence model using various machine-learning techniques using the collected data during the exercise.

column2: SUSPENSION BRIDGE MAIN CABLE MAINTENANCE ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a suspension bridge main cable maintenance robot which is used for improving the working stability of the robot on a main cable and comprises a maintenance working part, a climbing part and at least one set of supporting parts. The supporting part comprises a driving mechanism, a connecting block and a rolling mechanism. The climbing part is used for climbing along an assembly rope of the suspension bridge. First hinges are arranged on the two sides of the climbing part, and the climbing part is hinged to the middle of the connecting block through the first hinges. The first end of the connecting block is connected with one end of the driving mechanism, the end, away from the connecting block, of the driving mechanism is connected with the climbing part, and the driving mechanism is used for driving the connecting block to rotate around the first hinge. The second end of the connecting block is connected with the rolling mechanism which is used for rolling on the surface of a main cable of the suspension bridge. The maintenance working part is arranged on the climbing part or the supporting part and used for maintaining the main cable. The robot can simultaneously bear the counter-acting force of the assembly rope and the main cable of the suspension bridge, the force system is more stable, and shaking and vibration generated when the robot works are reduced.

column2: AUXILIARY DRIVING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an auxiliary driving system based on artificial intelligence. The auxiliary driving system comprises a central control module; the surrounding environment monitoring module is used for monitoring the environment condition around the vehicle and feeding back the environment condition to the central control module; the in-vehicle environment monitoring module is used for monitoring the environment condition in the vehicle and feeding back the environment condition to the central control module; the vehicle state monitoring module is used for monitoring the running condition of the vehicle body and feeding back the running condition to the central control module; the driver state monitoring module is used for monitoring the fatigue state of the current driver and feeding back the fatigue state to the central control module; the driving assistance module is used for realizing the functions of vehicle speed adjustment, lane adjustment, overtaking, braking and parking under the control of the central control module so as to assist a driver in driving the vehicle in the driving process; the method has the advantages that the safe driving coefficient can be improved, a driver is reminded of standard operation, safe road safety risks are avoided, personnel and vehicle safety is guaranteed, and traffic accidents are reduced.

column2: ELECTRICAL SAFETY MONITORING METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an electrical safety monitoring method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and comprises the steps that a three-dimensional space model corresponding to a building is acquired, the three-dimensional space model is generated according to the deployment positions of electrical equipment in the building and the line connection relation between the electrical equipment, and the electrical equipment comprises a line monitor and electric equipment; receiving target line data collected by a target line monitor; through a trained electrical safety monitoring model based on a neural network, according to the three-dimensional space model and the target line data, obtaining an operation state detection result of a target line where the target line monitor is located; and when the running state detection result indicates that the target line is in the abnormal running state, determining target electric equipment related to the target line, and generating a control instruction for closing the target electric equipment. By adopting the method, the operation condition of the electric equipment can be automatically adjusted, and the loss caused by power failure of the whole area due to abnormity is reduced.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to artificial intelligence monitoring equipment which comprises a monitoring equipment body and a U-shaped support arranged above the monitoring equipment body and further comprises an adjusting assembly arranged on the surface of the U-shaped support, and the adjusting assembly comprises a rectangular sleeve, a roller, a rotating shaft and a motor. The rectangular sleeve is connected to the surface of the U-shaped support in a sliding mode, and the motor is fixedly installed on the surface of the rectangular sleeve. The position of the monitoring equipment main body can be adjusted, the phenomenon that the monitoring equipment main body is fixed at a place and cannot move, so that a monitoring area is limited is avoided, the monitoring equipment main body can be overturned to a proper angle, and people can adjust the shooting angle of the monitoring equipment main body according to needs conveniently; adjustment of the monitoring angle or visual angle is achieved, mounting and dismounting of the monitoring equipment main body are facilitated, and therefore people can conveniently adapt to monitoring equipment main bodies of different specifications.

column2: RANGE HOOD EQUIPMENT FAULT DIAGNOSIS METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON KNOWLEDGE GRAPH
column4: The invention discloses a kitchen ventilator equipment fault diagnosis method and system based on a knowledge graph. The kitchen ventilator equipment fault diagnosis method comprises the steps that running state information of kitchen ventilator equipment is collected; if the fault phenomenon information is received, inputting the fault phenomenon information and the operation state information into a fault diagnosis model to obtain a fault reason and a fault processing measure; wherein the fault diagnosis model comprises a fault diagnosis knowledge graph. According to the application, the fault phenomenon is analyzed and diagnosed by means of the fault diagnosis knowledge graph, so that the fault reason and the corresponding fault processing measure are obtained, the intelligence of fault diagnosis is realized by means of the artificial intelligence technology, and the reliability and effectiveness of the operation of the range hood equipment are improved.

column2: TAKE-OUT AUTOMOBILE DATA RECORDER FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SAFETY ANALYSIS
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence safety analysis take-out automobile data recorder which comprises a mounting plate, a fixing mechanism is arranged on the surface of the mounting plate, an outer shell is arranged on the inner side of the fixing mechanism, a display screen is arranged on the surface of the outer shell, and a camera and a loudspeaker are arranged on the upper portion of the display screen. And a control panel is arranged at the lower part of the display screen. The driving recording system comprises the wireless communication module, the storage module, the display module, the positioning module and the camera shooting module, the storage module is connected with the storage chip, the communication module is connected with the Bluetooth module, the positioning module is connected with the positioning chip, and the Bluetooth module can connect camera shooting data, conversation data, positioning data and other data to a mobile phone in an enforcement mode. Platform sharing is achieved, the positioning chip can position the position of a takeout worker in real time and record speed information, and the wireless communication module comprises a wireless headset which can communicate with customers in real time and receive platform prompts and safety prompts.

column2: PARAMETER-BASED COMPUTER EVALUATION OF USER ACCOUNTS BASED ON USER ACCOUNT DATA STORED IN ONE OR MORE DATABASES
column4: A user account evaluation system is disclosed for evaluating risk associated with a user account. The system may obtain user account data associated with many user accounts, select a statistically significant subset of the user accounts, and then process (e.g., to determine types of the user accounts, etc.) and analyze the subset of user accounts to generate a plurality of evaluation models. When a new user account is accessed by the system, user account data may be obtained for the new user account, and the new user account may be evaluated based on the plurality of evaluation models. Accordingly, a plurality of evaluation parameter scores may be generated for the new user account, each of which may indicate an amount of risk associated with the user account. Some embodiments of the present disclosure may include machine learning and/or artificial intelligence methods to improve evaluation of the user accounts.

column2: GENERAL USER AUTHENTICATION METHOD OF GATE ACCESS CONTROL SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a general user authentication method of a gate access control system based on artificial intelligence, relates to the technical field of general user authentication, solves the technical problem that in the prior art, the equipment state and the passing state of a gate cannot be accurately analyzed in the user passing authentication process, analyzes the running state of the gate, and improves the user experience. The corresponding operation state of the gate machine put into use is judged, whether the current gate machine state meets the use requirement or not is analyzed, and the situation that due to the gate machine state, the user authentication accuracy is reduced, the user authentication failure is caused, and meanwhile the safety efficiency of the gate machine is reduced is prevented; and analyzing the user passing authentication of the corresponding analysis object, and judging whether the current user authentication process is normal or not, so that the passing quality of the corresponding analysis object is analyzed and diagnosed, the use efficiency of the user authentication of the analysis object is ensured, and the use quality of the user is enhanced.

column2: THREE-DIMENSIONAL KEY POINT ACQUISITION SYSTEM, METHOD AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a three-dimensional key point acquisition system, method and device and a storage medium, the system comprises an arithmetic device and at least one shooting device, and the shooting device comprises a binocular camera composed of two infrared cameras and a gray scale camera; the shooting device is used for shooting a target object to obtain a gray level image and a light spot image, the surface of a key point of the target object is provided with a reflective material, the gray level image is obtained through shooting of a gray level camera, each infrared camera in the binocular camera corresponds to one light spot image, and each light spot in the light spot image corresponds to one key point; the operation device is used for determining a first three-dimensional coordinate of each key point according to the light spot image, and the first three-dimensional coordinates are located in a first coordinate system; and determining a second three-dimensional coordinate corresponding to each key point in the grayscale image according to the first three-dimensional coordinate, wherein the second three-dimensional coordinate is located in a second coordinate system. The system can solve the technical problems of low three-dimensional key point acquisition efficiency and consumption of a large amount of labor cost in related technologies.

column2: POWER PLANT FAULT MAINTENANCE AND ALLOCATION SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGE RECOGNITION
column4: The invention discloses a power plant fault maintenance deployment system and method based on artificial intelligence image recognition, and belongs to the technical field of fault maintenance. A power plant fault maintenance deployment system based on artificial intelligence image recognition comprises an intelligent safety helmet, a deployment system is arranged in the intelligent safety helmet, a fixing block is fixedly arranged on the intelligent safety helmet, an adjusting rod is arranged in the fixing block, and the adjusting rod comprises a first swing rod, a third swing rod and a plurality of second swing rods connected between the first swing rod and the third swing rod. The second swing rod and the third swing rod are fixedly connected with fixing shafts. According to the invention, the position of the camera can be more flexible, an engineer can conveniently find a better shooting angle and carry out shooting in a more targeted manner, the quality of shot images is ensured, dust and impurities on the camera can be cleaned when the position of the camera is adjusted, the image acquisition quality of the camera is further improved, and the user experience is improved. Therefore, the maintenance progress and effect are ensured.

column2: HIGH PITCH EXERCISE TASK AUXILIARY SYSTEM BASED ON NEURAL NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses a high pitch exercise task auxiliary system based on a neural network, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method mainly comprises the following steps: collecting audio of a singer in a high pitch exercise process, extracting an oscillogram corresponding to a single frame of audio from the audio, obtaining a spectrogram corresponding to the oscillogram through short-time Fourier transform, and respectively obtaining the characteristics of the oscillogram and the characteristics of the spectrogram of each single frame of audio; the features of the oscillogram and the spectrogram of each audio with the duration being the preset duration are used as an input set, the high pitch evaluation scores of the audios with the preset duration are used as a test set, and a neural network is trained; and outputting a high-pitch evaluation score corresponding to the audio frequency to be tested by using the neural network so as to give suggestions to the singer by using the high-pitch evaluation score. According to the embodiment of the invention, the corresponding suggestions for assisting the high-pitch practice can be given according to the characteristics of the sound of the singer, so that the high-pitch practice of the singer is assisted.

column2: INTELLIGENT MONITORING TERMINAL BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND BIG DATA ANALYSIS
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent monitoring, in particular to an intelligent monitoring terminal based on artificial intelligence and big data analysis, which comprises a safety monitoring platform and a processor, and is characterized in that an equipment operation monitoring unit, an equipment maintenance management unit and a safety early warning management unit are further arranged in the safety monitoring platform; the processor generates an operation analysis signaling and transmits the operation analysis signaling to the equipment operation monitoring unit, and performs operation management on the operation condition of the equipment monitored in the platform; according to the invention, data monitoring and analysis are carried out on the running state of the equipment and the maintenance of the equipment through the terminal, so that data conversion and combined calculation are carried out on the running state and the maintenance state of the equipment, the stability of the equipment is analyzed and processed according to a calculation result, and early warning is carried out according to whether the analysis and processing result is healthy or not. And monitoring of the equipment in all aspects is further enhanced, so that health of the equipment is guaranteed, protection in advance is achieved, and potential safety hazards of the equipment are reduced.

column2: SELF-CRUISING ROBOT APPLIED TO GYMNASIUM
column4: The self-cruising robot applied to the gymnasium comprises a lower main body, walking wheels provided with driving structures are arranged below the lower main body, a main body lifting electric pull rod in the vertical direction is embedded in the lower main body, and an upper main body is connected to the main body lifting electric pull rod; a beverage storage device capable of automatically discharging is arranged in the upper main body, a clamping mechanism capable of clamping a cup to a position matched with the beverage storage device and sending out the cup filled with a beverage is arranged in the lower main body, a lower inspection camera is arranged on the upper portion of the side face of the lower main body, and the lower inspection camera is provided with a walking camera inclining outwards and downwards. An upper inspection camera is arranged on the side surface of the upper main body; a power distribution control system is arranged in the lower main body; according to the self-cruising robot, routing inspection and beverage distribution are integrated on the self-cruising robot, it is avoided that body building personnel drink beverages for a short time to inspect oolong, the workload of workers is reduced, and meanwhile the overall feeling of the body building personnel can be improved.

column2: VISUAL INTELLIGENT GUIDING METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CHILDREN TO CLIMB ROCK
column4: The invention discloses a visual intelligent guiding method and system for child rock climbing, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the rock climbing difficulty analysis based on basic condition information, and determining a rock climbing adaptation difficulty coefficient; the rock climbing adaptation difficulty coefficient and the child rock climbing map model are input into a first rock climbing route planning model, and a rock climbing route planning result is obtained; according to the child rock climbing map model, a climbing point set is obtained, and the climbing point set is associated with a climbing point sensor; performing visual marking on the rock climbing route planning result based on a climbing point sensor to obtain visual climbing route information; and the child user performs climbing feedback guidance based on the visual climbing route information. The climbing difficulty is selected according to the personal condition of the child, the climbing route is visually and intelligently planned in combination with the climbing point sensor, the rationality of the child grabbing the climbing points is guaranteed, interactive feedback is conducted according to the real-time climbing condition, and then the climbing training effect of the child is guaranteed.

column2: AUTOMATIC SCORING SYSTEM FOR BADMINTON GAME AND SCORING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention relates to a badminton game automatic scoring system and a scoring method thereof, and the system is characterized in that the system comprises a real-time video collection unit which is used for carrying out the real-time video collection of a court; the storage unit comprises a video storage part and a score storage part; the computing unit comprises a video analyzing and processing unit and a serving analysis algorithm module, the video analyzing and processing unit extracts video information from the video for analysis and processing, and the video analyzing and processing unit transmits an analysis result to the serving analysis algorithm module; the control unit comprises a scoring module which is in signal transmission connection with the serving analysis algorithm module; the display unit comprises a score display, the display unit displays the match information according to the match information, and the controller is electrically connected with the score display; the automatic scoring device based on artificial intelligence can replace a scoring referee to accurately score and display the score of each round of a competition.

column2: SULFUR-SMOKED MEDICINAL MATERIAL RAPID IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE YOLOX ALGORITHM
column4: The invention relates to a stoving medicinal material rapid identification method based on an artificial intelligence YOLOX algorithm, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out stoving treatment on a non-stoving medicinal material sample in a stoving device, and obtaining a stoving medicinal material sample; respectively shooting images of the non-stoving medicinal material sample and the stoving medicinal material sample; the method comprises the following steps: constructing a sample data set by taking images of a stoving medicinal material sample and a non-stoving medicinal material sample, and training a YOLOX model; and finally, inputting the to-be-identified medicinal material into the stoving medicinal material detection model to realize rapid identification of the medicinal material. According to the method, the stoving medicinal materials are quickly identified by adopting the artificial intelligence YOLOX algorithm, the defects of relatively large subjective influence and relatively poor consistency of artificial sensory evaluation are overcome, and an accurate and objective method is provided for quickly identifying the stoving medicinal material decoction pieces.

column2: CARRIER ROLLER RUNNING STATE DETECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON IMAGE PROCESSING
column4: The invention discloses a carrier roller running state detection method and system based on image processing, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method mainly comprises the following steps: acquiring a multi-frame grayscale image of a to-be-detected carrier roller at each moment in the running process of a conveyor belt; superposing the edge vibration areas in the adjacent multi-frame grayscale images at each moment to obtain an edge vibration image corresponding to each moment; performing non-blind deconvolution on the edge vibration image at each moment to obtain a clear vibration image at each moment; and respectively obtaining the similarity between the edge vibration image and the clear vibration image corresponding to each moment so as to determine whether the carrier roller to be detected is an abnormal carrier roller. According to the embodiment of the invention, the front images of the carrier rollers are processed, so that the state detection result of each carrier roller can be respectively obtained in the running process of the conveying device provided with the carrier rollers, and the state detection precision of the carrier rollers is improved.

column2: HUMAN BODY CONFLICT DETECTION METHOD BASED ON DEEP LEARNING
column4: The invention discloses a human body conflict detection method based on deep learning, and particularly relates to the field of artificial intelligence technology application, and the method specifically comprises the following steps: S1, selecting figures in a video through a Tiny YOLO frame; s2, cutting the video into blocks, performing limb detection by using Alpha Pose, and outputting limb actions; s3, identifying a segment of the suspicious action by using ST-GCN; according to the method, ST-GCN is the first step of applying a graph convolution network to a skeleton-based action recognition task, and compared with an existing method, the method has the advantages that part information is implicitly learned through the locality and time dynamics of graph convolution, the requirement for manual tasks is reduced, and part recognition efficiency is improved. The model is easier to design and effectively learn better action representations.

column2: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED BICYCLE FOR BABY SECURITY
column4: ABSTRACT OF THE INVENTION"Go digital" is the catchphrase these days due to the rapid improvements in technology. It's possible that youngsters are driven to electronics, video games, cartoons, and other forms of entertainment despite the positives that digitalization brings. Cycling is seen as a low-impact, beneficial, and entertaining activity. Kids like cycling because it gives them a sense of independence. Creating a secure environment for your newborn is a crucial aspect of newborn care. Babies must be kept secure both at home and while travelling. This invention suggests a smart baby cycle with sensors for baby security and safety both indoors and outdoors. It includes an eye tracking module with AI that can be used to investigate how newborns can categorize visual, linguistic, and auditory inputs as well as a GPS sensor for providing position, velocity, and time information. Security and motion detection with PIR sensors, Baby temperature can be determined with a temperature sensor. Risks of exploitation and abuse are reduced by this device. Implementing this invention's secure child check-in system can reduce those threats while also offering some practical advantages. Benefits include enhancing kid protection and safety, enhancing parent satisfaction, and effectively regulating our kids' space.

column2: IMAGE ACQUISITION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an image acquisition method, a graphical user interface and a device in the field of artificial intelligence, which are used for completing focusing of a moving target object by capturing a motion track of the target object during motion in a motion scene and improving the definition of an obtained image. The method comprises the steps that motion information of a target object is detected, the motion information comprises information of a motion track when the target object moves in a preset range, and the preset range is a camera shooting range; determining focusing information according to the motion information, wherein the focusing information comprises parameters for focusing the target object in the preset range; and focusing the target object in the preset range according to the focusing information, and shooting an image in the preset range.

column2: METHOD AND EQUIPMENT FOR ACCELERATING RUNNING OF APPLICATION PROGRAM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a method and equipment for accelerating running of an application program, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and solves the problem that the starting response speed of the application program is relatively slow when a user starts the application program. According to the specific scheme, the method is applied to the electronic equipment with a first memory and a second memory, the first memory is a memory adopting a volatile storage medium, and the second memory is a memory adopting a non-volatile storage medium. The electronic equipment loads the first application program in a second memory according to the user portrait and/or a preset prediction rule when it is predicted that the user is about to use the first application program; receiving a first operation of starting a first application program by a user; in response to the first operation, transferring data of the first application program in the second memory into the first memory; and displaying an interface of the first application program according to the data of the first application program in the first memory.

column2: SMART CORE EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: A smart core exercising device includes a base platform 1 having first portion 2 second portion 3, a first portion 2 for placing hand over circular member 4, a second portion 3 having foot rests 5 connected with base platform 1 through ball-socket joint 7 and sliding rails 8 for placing user feet, an artificial intelligence imaging unit 6 fitted on platform 1 for facial recognition of user, a rotary actuator 9 with sliding rails 8 for maintaining the stability of user, a display panel 10 fabricated with circular member 4 to display the information related to exercise, an ultrasonic sensor 11 assembled with circular member 4 for evaluating the tilt angle, a C-shaped telescopic rod 12 fitted between first 2 and second portion 3 for providing abdominal support, a speaker 13 for producing alert notifications, an FBG (Fiber Bragg) sensor 14 for determining vital health parameter of user.

column2: MULTIFUNCTIONAL EXERCISE DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a multifunctional exercise device, comprising a body 3 having a first and second portion 1, 2, a platform 4 installed via a pair of sliding unit 5 to enable sitting of a user while performing an exercise, a retractable magnetic gripping unit 7 to unlock a pair of paddles 6, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 8 to capture images of the user, a touch interactive display panel 9 to enable the user to enter details regarding type and mode of exercise and to display a time duration to perform the exercise, a flywheel 10 to rotate, a rod 11 to activate rowing exercise, an electromagnetic bar 12 to provide resistive force to a metallic block 13 via a cable 14 during the rowing exercise, a vital sensor 15 to monitor vital health parameters of the user while performing the exercise.

column2: AUTOMATED UPPER LIMB EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: An automated upper limb exercising device comprising, a platform 1 mounted over a ground surface and configured with a display panel 2 for taking user input regarding level of exercise is to be perform, an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 3 mounted on platform 1 for determining user height, a pair of telescopically operated rods 4 configured with a motorized roller 6 fabricated on platform 1 that extend/retract in accordance to determined user?™s height, a strap 5 is wrapped around roller 6 in a manner that one end of strap 5 is held by user?™s hand for pulling strap 5, a wearable unit 7 worn by user while performing exercise fabricated with platform 1 by means of a link connector to aids in correcting body posture, and a pair of telescopically operated bar 9 attached on platform 1 for supporting back and hip portion of user.

column2: DIVING ASSISTIVE DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a diving assistive device , comprising a platform 1 configured with a motorized fulcrum 2 to adjust its flexibility, a wearable wrist band 15 integrated with a touch-interactive-display-panel 16 to input instructions, PPG sensor 17 to monitor vital parameters and a communication module where all are linked to the microcontroller integrated in the platform 1, an artificial-intelligence-image-capturing-module 3 installed on the platform 1 and linked to the microcontroller to identify the diving position and flip, a karat meter 9 and a weight sensor 4 integrated on the platform 1 for identifying its build material and weight of the user, a cantilever sensor 10 in sync with a pressure sensor 5 and connected to the microcontroller to detect bend angle of the platform 1 and pressure exerted by the user while diving and a vibrating unit 13 to notify the user regarding the exerted pressure.

column2: ASSISTIVE LEG STRETCHING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to an assistive leg stretching device, comprising a frame 1 having a seat 2 that provides a base to a user for seating during a stretching exercise, a pair of robotic platform 10 attached to the seat 2 for placing user?™s leg, an artificial intelligence enabled thermal image capturing module 5 installed on the frame 1 for locating the position of the knee, a touch interactive screen 13 mapped on the frame 1 for allowing user to choose level of stretching, an angle sensor 7 mapped on the frame 1 for monitoring angular displacement of user?™s leg while stretching, a sensing module 8 constructed on the frame 1 for monitoring strain experienced by the user and a set of motion sensor 9 fabricated within each of the knee pad 6 for detecting movement of the user?™s knee position.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE REHABILITATION EXERCISE PROMPTING INSTRUMENT
column4: The artificial intelligence rehabilitation exercise prompting instrument comprises a base, a supporting seat and a supporting leg seat, a supporting pedal is arranged at the position, located on the left side of the supporting seat, of the upper end of the base, a vertical groove is formed in the upper end of the base, a miniature electric rod is arranged in the vertical groove, and the miniature electric rod is connected with the supporting leg seat. A movable block is arranged at the upper end of the micro electric rod, rotating holes are formed in the left side wall and the right side wall of the interior of the vertical groove, and a rotating seat is arranged at the lower end of the supporting pedal. Whether the lower limb function training actions of a patient are standard or not can be reminded, so that the patient is prevented from being trained by mistake all the time, the patient is prevented from being injured secondarily in the rehabilitation process, the safety of rehabilitation exercise is guaranteed, function training can be conducted on the lower limbs of the patient, blood circulation of the lower limbs of the patient is promoted, and the rehabilitation effect is improved. And secondly, the action of the patient can be captured, when the action of the patient is not in place, it is prompted that the action is not in place, and when the action is in place, it is prompted that the action is not completed mistakenly.

column2: CLIMB ASSISTIVE DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a climb assistive device comprising of a pair of primary rods 1 having a first and second portion 3, 4, wherein the primary rods 1 are segregated into multiple adjustable sections 5 with first portion 3 hinged to a secondary pair of rods 2 designed to provide stability to a user while climbing, a touch interactive display 6 integrated at the second portion 4 that enables the user to input details regarding elongation of the rods 1, 2, multiple sliding unit 7 fabricated at lateral sides of sections 5 to allow a movable rung 5 attached in the sections 5 to slide at different positions based on the user?™s step length, an ultrasonic sensor fabricated at each rung 8 to monitor the user?™s climbing pattern and an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 9 to determine the user?™s height.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED CALORIE LEVEL DETECTING AND FOOD SUGGESTING EQUIPMENT
column4: ABSTRACTARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED CALORIE LEVEL DETECTING AND FOOD SUGGESTING EQUIPMENTAn artificial intelligence-based calorie level detecting and food suggesting equipment. The equipment includes a kit. The kit includes (i) a plurality of sensors to measure the amount of 5 energy consumed during physical activity, wherein the plurality of sensor includes (a) a measuring, using a accelerometer, the physical activity and the energy consumed in different situations, including walking and going up the stairs, (b) storing all the received information in a database utilizing sensors and are retrievable for subsequent reference, (c) transmitting the data to the doctor/nurse and stored in the central system for subsequent actions. (ii) 10 Implementing the accelerometer and the heart rate sensors to determine the energy consumption during the physical activity, (iii) measuring, using the PPG sensor, to measure the heart rate by taking advantage of an infrared (IR) transmitter and receiver, (iv) mounting the PPG sensor on the body and the person is carrying out an activity, the device may be affected by the environmental factors and produce inappropriate data, (v) suggesting the food 15 based on the calorie data based on the automatic analysis, (vi) mounting the PPG sensor on the body and the person is carrying out an activity, wherein the device may be affected by the environmental factors and produce inappropriate data and non-worn imaging devices and image analysis systems are limited by whether a person consistently uses them for every meal or snack. 20FIG.1

column2: SMART BOARD SURFING TRAINING SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to a smart board surfing training system includes a pair of telescopic rods 1 fixed on a ground surface attached to a fabric-based-sheet 2 attached amid telescopic-rods 1 via a pair of springs 3, an AI (artificial intelligence) based imaging unit 4 mounted on one of the rods 1 to identify the height of user, a pair of electromagnetic bars 5 configured amid each pair of springs 3 to modulate the stiffness of fabric-sheet 2, a motorized ball and socket 6 integrated in between the spring 3 and telescopic rod 1 to generate swinging effect over the fabric-sheet 2, a touch-enabled-display-panel 7 plotted on telescopic-rod 1 to select surfing level, a pair of wearable members 8 having metallic strip plotted at bottom portion of the members 8 gets attached to electromagnets of the two multi-directional sliding rails 9 that are configured in the fabric sheet 2.

column2: SKATING TRAINING SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to a skating training system comprising of a skate board 1 accustomed to be worn for skating and is configured with an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 3 for determining a user?™s stance/posture while skating/leaping, a weight and pressure sensor in association with a microcontroller to detect the user?™s body weight and pressure applied by the user?™s feet while skating/leaping, a wearable band 6 associated with the system and displays notifications/alert to the user, an angle sensor fabricated on the board 1 to determine the user?™s feet angle, a profilometer 4 positioned on the board 1 to determine roughness of the user?™s shoe sole, a set of Infrared transmitters and receivers 8 to determine positioning of the user?™s feet on the board 1 and a pair of motorized plates 9 attached on the board 1 to prevent the user?™s feet to hung in air.

column2: 5G-WIFI INSIDE SECURE IRIS BIOMETRICS' LOGIN
column4: The invention 5G-WiFi INSIDE SECURE IRIS BIOMETRICS' LOGIN is embodiment of system and methods using a proprietary Automated Iris-biometrics-login Identification System (AIIS), as a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) supporting Machine-to-Machine (M2M) system-architecture-evolution solution (SAES), providing Global Single-Sign-On (G-SSO) protocols for virtual identifications, replacing multiple passwords, automating identifications, with machine learning algorithm operable with a particular learning algorithm, and/or technique, control by Artificial Intelligence (AI), and Fifth Generation Software Hardware Security Module (5G-SoftHSM) embedded into Hardware Security Module (HSM), as cybersecurity software application suite, automating identifications with plurality access of global computer network, accessing web-browser, search-engine, middleware, and Operating-System (OS) functionalities across multi-language platforms, using secure communication over freespace, communicating and transmitting space-to-space, space-to-ground, and/or ground-to-space, with universal connectivity for communication from Geostationary (GEO) satellites, and Low earth-orbiting (LEO) satellites transmitting relay signals to Satellite Ground Station (SGS) (earth-station/ground terminal) parabolic omnidirectional antenna as space-to-ground transceiver, and/or ground-to-space transceiver, also as a point-to-point bidirectional transceiver, with connection arrangements to subscribers, clients, and/or users, to-and-from telecommunication providers, or interne providers, via Evolved Universal Terrestrial Radio Access Network (E-UTRAN), or Universal Terrestrial Radio Access Network (UTRAN) operable as a Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS), Global System for Mobile-communications (GSM) with Global Positioning System GPS), and Global Positioning System Aided Geo Augmented Navigation (GAGAN), as a Fifth Generation Core Network (5G-CN), and Fifth Generation System (5G-S).

column2: METHOD FOR RUNNING NEURAL NETWORK MODEL, AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The present application relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. Provided are a method for running a neural network model, and an electronic device and a storage medium. The method for running a neural network model comprises: firstly, acquiring a first neural network model, wherein at least one model operator of the first neural network model is an operator to be determined; acquiring operator mapping data of the first neural network model, wherein the operator mapping data comprises a mapping relationship between the operator to be determined and an original model operator; then, according to the mapping relationship, acquiring the original model operator of each operator to be determined of the first neural network model; and finally, replacing each operator to be determined of the first neural network model with the corresponding original model operator, and then running the first neural network model. Therefore, a neural network model can be protected, thereby preventing the neural network model from being illegally acquired and attacked.

column2: FITNESS-ASSISTED METHOD AND ELECTRONIC APPARATUS
column4: A fitness-assisted method in the field of artificial intelligence, characterized in that the method comprises: an electronic device acquiring a user's actions (S601); the electronic device determining, from the user's actions, an alternative action, where a motion trajectory of a first limb satisfies a first preset condition, in the user's actions (S602); the electronic device determining an action variation magnitude of a second limb in the alternative action (S603); and the electronic device determining to output guidance information according to the action variation magnitude (S604). By means of determining an alternative action where a limb motion trajectory satisfies a first preset condition, and according to the action variation magnitude of a limb in the alternative action, it can be accurately determined that a user performs a fitness action; and guidance information is output when it is determined that the user performs a fitness action, such that the accuracy of outputting the guidance information can be improved, and the user experience is improved.

column2: PHOTOGRAPHING DEVICE AND OBJECT RECOGNITION METHOD USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses an object recognition method using artificial intelligence, which is used for recognizing an object in a first image shot by a shooting device at a first shooting angle, and comprises the following steps of: A, determining a difference value between the first shooting angle and a preset second shooting angle; b, when the difference value is greater than a preset value, converting the first image into a second image of which the visual angle is the second shooting angle; and C, providing the second image to an artificial intelligence model for identification.

column2: POSTURE RECOGNITION DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence-based posture recognition device, which comprises a bottom plate, a lifting adjusting device, telescopic rods, a fixed bottom bin, a handle, a cleaning device, a posture recognition device body and cushion blocks, the cushion blocks are symmetrically arranged below the bottom plate, the telescopic rods are symmetrically arranged at the top of the bottom plate, the lifting adjusting device is arranged at the center of the top of the bottom plate, and the lifting adjusting device is arranged at the center of the bottom plate. The fixed bottom bin is arranged at the tops of the telescopic rod and the lifting adjusting device, the posture recognition device body is arranged at the top of the fixed bottom bin, the handle is arranged at the top of the posture recognition device body, and the cleaning device is arranged at the top of the posture recognition device body. The utility model belongs to the technical field of posture recognition, and particularly relates to a posture recognition device based on artificial intelligence, which removes dust through a cleaning device when the dust exists at the position of a camera, prevents the dust from influencing shooting of a lens, and further ensures normal posture recognition.

column2: BANK EMPLOYEE DRESSING DISCRIMINATION METHOD AND DEVICE, STORAGE MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a bank employee dressing discrimination method and device, a storage medium and an electronic device, and can be used in the artificial intelligence field or the financial field, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a dressing image obtained by photographing the dressing of a bank employee through a camera device; inputting the dressing image into a dressing discrimination model to obtain a dressing discrimination result of the bank employee; wherein the dressing discrimination model is pre-established based on a convolutional neural network model, and the dressing discrimination result is used for indicating whether the dressing of the bank employee is compliant or not; and outputting prompt information corresponding to the dressing judgment result. According to the scheme, the dressing image obtained by shooting the dressing of the bank employee through the camera device is input into the dressing judgment model, so that the dressing judgment result about whether the dressing is compliant or not is obtained, and whether the dressing of the bank employee is compliant or not is judged automatically; therefore, the problem that in the prior art, detail omission inevitably exists in manual supervision, and the bank enterprise image is greatly influenced is solved.

column2: INTEGRATED EXERCISE PROTECTION DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model belongs to the field of sports protection devices, and particularly relates to an integrated sports protection device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a ferrule, the bottom of the ferrule is fixedly connected with a sleeve body, the outer wall of the sleeve body is fixedly connected with a buffer mechanism, the outer wall of the sleeve body is fixedly connected with a tightening ring, and the tightening ring is fixedly connected with the sleeve body. The outer wall of the tightening ring is fixedly connected with a supporting rod, one end of the sleeve body is fixedly connected with a cuff, the buffering mechanism comprises an air cushion and a fixing plate, and the air cushion and the fixing plate are connected through hot melting; during use, an athlete wears the sleeve body on an arm, the buffer mechanism is aligned to the elbow, the elbow can be better protected through the buffer mechanism, collision at the elbow joint can be better prevented during exercise, an air cushion is used for buffering, a fixing plate is made of silica gel materials, and skin-friendly fitting work is conducted; when the forearm is injured and fractured, the forearm part is fixed through the supporting rod, and temporary fixing work is conducted through the tightening ring.

column2: INTEGRATED DEPRESSION INTERVENTION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND BIG DATA
column4: The invention discloses a depression overall intervention method based on artificial intelligence and big data, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, determining the depression severity of a testee through obtaining an electroencephalogram signal of the testee; s2, making an overall solution according to the depression severity, discussing an execution plan every day, supervising an execution process, evaluating an execution effect, and adjusting the scheme and execution at any time according to the effect; and S3, according to the overall solution, implementing a social core course, taking emotion as a link, taking a game as a medium, and training eye expression to follow and jointly pay attention. The depression severity of the testee is determined, and then an overall solution is formulated, so that spontaneous social willingness is conveniently cultivated, social ability is improved, memory, observation ability, spatial imagination ability, creativity, calculation ability and reasoning ability of children are conveniently trained, physical fitness of the children is improved, different nerve areas of the brain are stimulated, and the depression severity of the testee is improved. The brain vitality is comprehensively stimulated, so that the overall intervention on the depression is facilitated.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR ACCELERATING RUNNING OF APPLICATION
column4: A method and device for accelerating the running of an application, relating to the field of artificial intelligence, and solving the problem that the application starting response speed is relatively slow when a user starts an application. The specific solution is: being applied to an electronic device having a first memory and a second memory, the first memory being a memory using a volatile storage medium, and the second memory being a memory using a non-volatile storage medium; when the electronic device predicts, according to a user portrait and/or a preset prediction rule, that the user is about to use a first application, loading the first application in the second memory; receiving a first operation of the user starting the first application; in response to the first operation, transferring data of the first application in the second memory to the first memory; and displaying an interface of the first application according to the data of the first application in the first memory.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TO IMPLEMENT A CARDIO PROTOCOL VIA A RELAY-BASED SYSTEM
column4: A computer-implemented method including receiving, at a computing device, a first treatment plan designed to treat a cardiovascular health issue of a user. The first treatment plan comprises at least two exercise sessions that, based on the cardiovascular health issue, enable the user to perform an exercise at different exertion levels. While the user uses a treatment apparatus to perform the first treatment plan for the user, the computing device receives cardiovascular data from one or more sensors configured to measure the cardiovascular data associated with the user, and transmits the cardiovascular data. Wherein a machine learning model is used to generate a second treatment plan. The second treatment plan modifies at least one exertion level, and the modification is based on a standardized measure comprising perceived exertion, the cardiovascular data, and the cardiovascular health issue of the user. The method includes receiving the second treatment plan.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROTECTING A LOGIN PROCESS
column4: Embodiments of the disclosure provide systems and methods for protecting a login process to an application running on a device. The method may include interactively training a mock hacker artificial intelligence (AI) engine and a challenge generation AI engine to compete with each other. The challenge generation AI engine is configured to generate challenges that defeat hacking attacks by the mock hacker AI engine, and the mock hacker AI engine is configured to attack the challenges generated by the challenge generation AI engine. The method may further include generating a login challenge using the trained challenge generation AI engine. The method may additionally include providing the login challenge to a user attempting to access the application during the login process.

column2: MULTI-STATION ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGE RECOGNITION CAMERA ROTARY ADJUSTING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses a multi-station artificial intelligence image recognition camera rotary adjusting device which comprises a bottom wheel, an electric telescopic rod is fixed above the bottom wheel, a longitudinal rail and a transverse rail are installed on the front side of a fixing module through a connecting plate, and oil barrels are welded to the rear sides of the tail ends of the longitudinal rail and the transverse rail. A servo motor is installed at the tail end of the oil drum, a rotary adjusting mechanism capable of enabling the camera to slide in an arc shape in cooperation with the longitudinal track and the transverse track is arranged on the inner side of the oil drum, the rotary adjusting mechanism comprises a threaded rod connected to the inner side of the oil drum through a bearing, and a sliding block is in threaded connection to the outer side of the threaded rod. According to the multi-station artificial intelligence image recognition camera rotary adjusting device, through the rotary adjusting mechanism, the situation that an object or a face needs to be rotated manually to be matched with a camera for image shooting recognition is avoided, so that the overall convenience and practicability are improved, and meanwhile the full-automatic intelligent function of the multi-station artificial intelligence image recognition camera rotary adjusting device is further stated.

column2: VOICE CONTROL SYSTEM, METHOD AND APPARATUS, DEVICE, MEDIUM, AND PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: A voice control system and control method. The system is applied to the field of artificial intelligence, and comprises: a first client (100) running on a mobile terminal, a server side (200) running on a server, and a second client (300) running on a controlled terminal. The first client (100) obtains identity information of a user, sends the identity information of the user to the server side (200) (S204), and the server side (200) verifies the identity information of the user (S206). The first client (100) further collects voice data of the user (S208), and generates a voice control request according to the voice data and sends the voice control request to the server side (200) (S210). When the identity information is verified successfully, the server side (200) generates a control instruction according to the voice control request (S212), and sends the control instruction to the second client (300) (S214). The second client (300) instructs the controlled terminal to execute the control instruction (S216). In this way, the controlled terminal can support voice control, does not need to be modified, reduces the cost, and improves the usability. Moreover, verification is performed on the basis of the identity information, thereby ensuring the security of voice control.

column2: METHOD OF RECOGNIZING ILLEGAL PARKING OF VEHICLE, DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: A method of recognizing illegal parking of a vehicle, a device, and a storage medium, which relate to the field of artificial intelligence, and in particular to the fields of deep learning, cloud computing, computer vision, etc. The method includes: obtaining a video image collected by an electronic device; recognizing a parking area of the vehicle in the video image; determining a shooting angle used by the electronic device for collecting the video image; determining an illegal parking area in the video image based on the shooting angle; and recognizing whether the vehicle is illegally parked or not based on the parking area of the vehicle and the illegal parking area.

column2: CERAMIC TILE FLAW DETECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to a ceramic tile flaw detection method and system based on artificial intelligence and a storage medium.
