According to the method, the target object is shot through the multiple shooting devices to obtain the multiple images, and at least one image in the multiple images is obtained under the condition that the direction of the light is not perpendicular to the surface of the target object. The multiple shooting devices can shoot multiple types of flaws of the target object at the same time, and especially under the condition that the direction of light is not perpendicular to the surface of the target object, the imaging effect of the flaws such as shallow scratches or missed polishing with unobvious visual features can be remarkably improved. In addition, the target area, including the target object, in the at least one image is aligned with the template drawing of the flawless target object, and it can be avoided that part of patterns on the target object are mistakenly recognized as flaws. Therefore, the accuracy of defect detection can be improved.

column2: VOICE CONTROL SYSTEM, METHOD, DEVICE, EQUIPMENT, MEDIUM AND PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The invention provides a voice control system, which is applied to the field of artificial intelligence and comprises a first client running on a mobile terminal, a server running on a server and a second client running on a controlled terminal. And the first client obtains the identity information of the user and sends the identity information of the user to the server, and the server verifies the identity information of the user. The first client also collects voice data of a user, generates a voice control request according to the voice data, and sends the voice control request to the server. And when the identity information passes verification, the server generates a control instruction according to the voice control request and sends the control instruction to the second client. And the second client instructs the controlled terminal to execute the control instruction. In this way, the controlled terminal can support voice control, transformation is not needed, cost is reduced, and usability is improved. Moreover, verification is carried out based on the identity information, so that the security of voice control is ensured.

column2: DETECTION MODEL POST-PROCESSING METHOD, MEDIUM, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a detection model post-processing method, a medium, electronic equipment and a program product. The method comprises the following steps: determining a candidate bounding box on a processing object, and performing adjustment operation on the candidate bounding box; obtaining bounding box data and region adjustment data corresponding to the adjustment operation, wherein the region adjustment data comprises first adjustment data and second adjustment data; determining a table lookup parameter associated with the second adjustment data, and obtaining a table lookup result corresponding to the table lookup parameter from a lookup table; inputting the bounding box data and the first adjustment data into the first operation part to obtain a first operation result; determining a second operation result of the second operation part based on linear operation of the bounding box data and the table look-up result; and determining adjusted bounding box data based on linear operation of the first operation result and the second operation result. Therefore, the running speed of the electronic equipment can be improved.

column2: MONITORING EQUIPMENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of monitoring equipment, in particular to artificial intelligence-based monitoring equipment, which comprises a supporting column, linear guide rails, an electric sliding block, a fixing frame, a control box, an ultrasonic bird repeller, a panoramic camera, a face recognition tracking camera shooting assembly and a solar power taking assembly, and is characterized in that the linear guide rails are mounted on the left and right sides of the supporting column; the electric sliding blocks are arranged on the linear guide rails in a sliding mode and provided with electric locks, the supporting columns are provided with lock holes corresponding to the electric locks, the electric sliding blocks are installed on the left side and the right side of the fixing frame, the control box is installed on the top of the fixing frame, and the ultrasonic bird repelling device is installed on the top of the control box. The panoramic camera and the face recognition tracking camera shooting assembly are both installed at the bottom of the fixing frame, the solar power taking assembly is installed at the top of the supporting column, and a control host, a storage battery and a 5G communication module are arranged in the control box. The monitoring equipment based on artificial intelligence is convenient to overhaul and good in monitoring effect.

column2: VEHICLE FAULT DETECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ALGORITHM
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of vehicle fault detection, and particularly provides a vehicle fault detection method and system based on an artificial intelligence algorithm, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the VCU data of a vehicle, and analyzing the fault information of each accessory of the vehicle; collecting vehicle running sound data in the vehicle running process, inputting the vehicle running sound data into the trained neural network model for training analysis, and outputting a classification report by the model to obtain fault prediction information of each accessory of the vehicle; comparing the fault information of each accessory of the vehicle with the corresponding accessory fault prediction information, and extracting the fault prediction information of each accessory; the optimized and qualified neural network model is used for analyzing vehicle operation sound data, the model outputs a result to obtain the vehicle health degree, and whether maintenance is needed or not is determined. Through sound monitoring of vehicle operation, the probability of vehicle accident occurrence is accurately predicted, the prediction accuracy of vehicle accident occurrence is greatly improved, the vehicle safety is improved, and the commercial operation income is improved.

column2: LOG MONITORING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON DECONVOLUTION NEURAL NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses a log monitoring method and device based on a deconvolution neural network, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a to-be-monitored log image; segmenting the to-be-monitored log image to obtain a plurality of segments of to-be-monitored log sub-images; inputting each segment of the to-be-monitored log sub-image into a deconvolution neural network model for adaptive key feature extraction to obtain a key feature image corresponding to each segment of the to-be-monitored log sub-image; the deconvolution neural network model is generated by pre-training a plurality of log image samples; performing keyword log monitoring on the key feature image corresponding to each segment of log sub-image to be monitored to obtain a log monitoring result; the log monitoring result is used for monitoring a program running state. According to the invention, the abnormal log can be monitored timely and effectively.

column2: INTELLIGENT AUTOMATIC PRODUCTION LINE FOR VACUUM BLOOD COLLECTION TUBES
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent automatic production line for vacuum blood collection tubes, which comprises a peripheral frame main body 1, the peripheral frame body 1 is composed of a blood collection tube feeding machine 9, a feeding transferring and labeling device 10, an overturning dust removal device 11, a medicine spraying and visual inspection device 12, a medicine drying device 13, a cap feeding machine 14, a cap conveying and assembling device 15, a vacuum treatment cap pressing device 16, a foam box automatic boxing device 17 and a packaging machine 18. The whole process of feeding and transferring, labeling, spraying, liquid dropping, visual inspection, medicine drying, cap covering, vacuum treatment, cap pressing, boxing and packaging is carried out on the formed blood collection tubes through an automatic control system and a robot control technology, and the production quality and efficiency of the blood collection tubes are greatly improved.

column2: FITNESS ACTION REAL-TIME MONITORING METHOD AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE RECOGNITION SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of image recognition, in particular to a fitness action real-time monitoring method and an artificial intelligence recognition system. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an image and a human body key point category annotation image; performing human body part segmentation on the image; obtaining an average area of human body part segmentation corresponding to each human body key point category, and obtaining a Gaussian distribution size and a Gaussian distribution standard deviation of each key point according to the average area; human body key point category labels are converted into coordinate one-dimensional distribution vectors, and label value distribution vectors are obtained at the same time; training a neural network according to the image, the coordinate one-dimensional distribution vector and the label value distribution vector; and according to the human body posture information of each person, performing person body-building action state recognition. According to the method, human body posture labels with different distribution sizes and standard deviations are obtained based on the human body part areas in the image, the ambiguity of manual labeling is reduced, meanwhile, human body posture image recognition is achieved through the one-dimensional vector, calculation resources are saved, and the detection precision is high.

column2: FINGER STRETCHING DEVICE
column4: The device, comprises a rectangular platform 1 positioned over a surface to accommodate a user?™s arm, a chair 2 is installed to the platform 1 via a vertical guiding rail 3 to perform the stretching exercise to adjust height of the chair 2, a button 4 for adjusting chair 2 height, multiple telescopic rods 5 attached underneath the platform 1 to regulate height of the platform 1, a touch interactive display 6 for input desired inclination of the platform 1, a robotic arm 7 to restrict movement of the user?™s arm via cylindrical rollers 8, an artificial intelligence enabled imaging module 9 to detect posture of the arm, a speaker 10 to generate a voice command, slider 11 with plurality of telescopic bars 12 to position user?™s hand, a multiple magnetic block 14 affixed to attach with a magnetic wearable unit 15.

column2: QUICK STAIR CLIMBING METHOD FOR INSTANT CHAT COMMUNICATION TOOL
column4: The invention provides a quick stair climbing method for an instant chat communication tool, which is characterized by comprising the following steps that: a user gives an instruction of reading all unread messages in a current group chat; the artificial intelligence topic analysis module obtains all the unread messages, analyzes the characters of all the unread messages, and calculates a theme surrounded by each unread message in a fuzzy matching mode, so that a plurality of different themes and messages surrounding each theme are obtained; and the user selects the topic in which the user is interested to check. Compared with the prior art, the method has the following advantages: topics surrounded by the unread message are intelligently analyzed, so that a user can quickly know about the general content of the unread message; the user can select to check the unread message corresponding to the topic in which the user is interested, so that the stair climbing time is saved, and the stair climbing efficiency is improved.

column2: ANTI-CLIMBING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SIGNAL TOWER BASED ON 5G COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of 5G communication technologies, in particular to an anti-climbing artificial intelligence signal tower based on the 5G communication technology, which comprises a signal room, a signal cement base is arranged at the top end of the signal room, the output end of a transmission shaft is connected with a winding disc, and a cable winding structure is wound on the winding disc. The tail end of the cable winding structure is connected with an automatic conveying structure. And the four-wheel drive trolley is placed on the end face of the automatic conveying structure, a six-axis mechanical arm is installed in the middle of the four-wheel drive trolley, a camera is installed at the top end of the six-axis mechanical arm, and a manipulator and a welding head are arranged on one side of the camera. Through the driving motor, the winding disc, the transmission shaft and the cable winding structure, the automatic conveying structure can be subjected to winding, winding and lifting treatment, so that an object can be conveyed to the signal tower table, the problem that a worker climbs the signal tower can be avoided, and the safety of the signal tower during use, maintenance and overhaul can be improved.

column2: FITNESS PLACE LAYOUT OPTIMIZATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a fitness place layout optimization method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of obtaining an activity track of a user; obtaining the fitness intention of the user according to the activity track; obtaining a reference use time length of the fitness facility; obtaining a first heat degree of each fitness facility through a difference value between the use duration and the corresponding reference use duration; obtaining a region of interest of each track point in the activity track of each user, selecting fitness facilities of the same type as the fitness facilities finally selected by the user in each region of interest, and generating corresponding description vectors; obtaining a popularity optimization parameter of each fitness facility through the description vector; the product of the popularity optimization parameter and the corresponding first popularity is used as the actual popularity of the fitness facility; and when the actual heat of the fitness facilities in the fitness site is unbalanced, moving the fitness facilities until the actual heat is balanced. The embodiment of the invention can improve the utilization rate of fitness facilities in a fitness place.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE POSITIONING DEVICE BASED ON LASER RADAR
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence positioning device based on a laser radar, and relates to the technical field of laser radars. According to the invention, the radar locking mechanism is in running fit with the positioning mechanism; the bottom of the positioning mechanism is provided with a magnetic driving assembly. The top of the radar locking mechanism is in clamping connection with a laser radar. Two limiting stoppers are symmetrically arranged on the surface of a positioning seat of the magnetic positioning assembly, and push plates are hinged between the limiting stoppers and the corresponding moving plates below the limiting stoppers. A telescopic rotator is fixed to the lower end of the supporting rod, and the two rotation driving racks are arranged on the two sides of the telescopic rotator in parallel and engaged with the telescopic rotator. According to the invention, by rotating the rotary pushing and pressing assembly and utilizing the relative sliding of the pushing and pressing groove and the pushing and pressing arc plate, the pushing and pressing arc plate gradually pushes the locking rod to move towards the inner side of the locking ring seat until the locking rod is clamped in the matching groove at the bottom of the laser radar, so that the separable connection of the laser radar and the radar locking assembly is realized; and subsequent disassembly of the laser radar for maintenance is facilitated.

column2: FACIAL SKELETON BINDING AUTOMATIC MIGRATION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON FBX FILE
column4: The invention discloses an fbx file-based facial skeleton binding automatic migration method and system, relates to the technical field of animation production based on artificial intelligence, and aims to solve the problems of high cost and low efficiency of new model facial skeleton binding in the prior art. According to the technical scheme, the method is characterized in that a first model bound with an existing skin is fitted to a second model to be bound with the skin, a third model is obtained, skeleton data and skin information of the second model are determined according to the mapping relation between the second model and the third model, skeleton data of the third model and skin information of the third model, and the skin information of the second model is obtained. Finally, an fbx file of the second model is generated, and skin binding of the second model is completed. According to the method and the device, the existing facial skeleton binding is automatically migrated to other models, the binding efficiency of the new model is improved, and the labor cost is reduced.

column2: GARBAGE THROWING DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a garbage throwing detection method, device and equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: determining the position information of staying pedestrians and garbage cans in a garbage throwing area; acquiring skeleton key point information of the staying pedestrian, and determining arm swing information according to the skeleton key point information; and garbage throwing detection is conducted according to the garbage can position information and the arm swing amplitude information. Compared with the prior art that an administrator needs to manually capture a garbage throwing image, and consequently the garbage throwing detection efficiency is low, garbage throwing detection is carried out according to the garbage can position information and the arm swing amplitude information, then the garbage throwing detection efficiency is improved, and the false alarm rate of garbage throwing is reduced.

column2: PORTABLE PLANT DENSITY AND PLANT SPACING MEASURING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a portable plant density and plant spacing measuring system which comprises a handheld terminal device used for collecting and analyzing plant images and displaying measuring results and a telescopic calibration assembly used for calibrating the area of a region and correcting a shooting visual angle, and is low in cost, compact in structure and convenient to carry. By extracting the center of the marker ball in the telescopic calibration assembly, the shooting angle of view can be automatically corrected through perspective transformation, the plant image shooting flexibility is high, and the automation degree is high; a deep learning network is utilized to train a plant model, a single plant is identified and positioned, then the plant density and plant spacing are calculated, and the automation degree is high.

column2: NOVEL INTELLIGENT MONOCHAMUS ALTERNATUS TRAP
column4: The utility model discloses a novel intelligent monochamus alternatus trapper which comprises a clamping device and a flying device body, the lower end of the clamping device is fixedly connected with the flying device body, a plurality of motors are fixedly connected to the outer side of the upper end of the flying device body, and propellers are fixedly connected to the upper ends of output shafts of the motors. Solar panels are installed on the left side and the right side of the upper end of the flight device body correspondingly, and a pesticide applying controller and a spray head are machined at the left end and the lower portion of a pesticide box correspondingly. The novel intelligent monochamus alternatus trapper is scientific and reasonable in structure and safe and convenient to use, the 360-degree camera shooting recognition device, the flight device body and the signal reflecting and receiving module are matched, a multispectral five-channel camera is carried, the trapper placement area with the maximum monochamus alternatus population density is automatically optimized and calculated, and the trapper placement area is optimized and calculated. And the optimal spraying area of the monochamus alternatus prevention and control medicine is provided, so that the problem that the specific operation of a user cannot be assisted by intelligent calculation through an artificial intelligence technology is avoided.

column2: LEARNING MACHINE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a learning machine based on artificial intelligence. The learning machine comprises a main chip; the interface expander is electrically connected with the main chip; the image shooting module is electrically connected with the main chip through an interface expander; the touch screen is electrically connected with the main chip through an interface expander; wherein the image shooting module transmits a shot video image to the main chip through the interface extender for artificial intelligence identification, and the main chip transmits an identification result of the video image to the touch screen through the interface extender. According to the learning machine based on artificial intelligence provided by the embodiment of the invention, a corresponding image processing chip does not need to be additionally and independently added in the image shooting module of the learning machine, and meanwhile, data information transmission is carried out between the main chip and the image shooting module and between the main chip and the touch screen by adopting an interface expander; and the manufacturing cost of the learning machine is greatly reduced.

column2: WAKE-UP AUTOMATIC TESTING DEVICE OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EQUIPMENT BASED ON CIRCUIT CONTROL
column4: The invention provides an automatic wake-up testing device for artificial intelligence equipment based on circuit control. The automatic wake-up testing device comprises an earphone plug, a remote controller and a relay, the earphone plug is provided with a first audio line; the remote controller is provided with a voice button used for controlling the artificial intelligence equipment; the input end of the relay is connected with the first audio line, and the output end of the relay is connected with a pin of the voice button. The remote controller has the advantages that the earphone plug sends audio output voltage to the relay, the effect of pressing down and lifting up the voice button of the remote controller is achieved through closing and opening of the contact of the relay, the voice button can be automatically triggered to wake up recording testing, the action of manually operating the button is simulated, and the working efficiency is improved. The automatic recording test of the artificial intelligence equipment can be completed under the unattended condition.

column2: FILLER COMPACTION DETECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a filler compaction degree detection method and system, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the imaging analysis of a compaction road section, and obtaining a plurality of shooting blocks corresponding to the compaction road section and the numbers of the shooting blocks; acquiring images at the plurality of shooting blocks to obtain a pavement image set; recognizing the road surface image set by using a pre-constructed road surface image recognition model, and extracting abnormal images in the road surface image set according to a recognition result; and presenting the exception category corresponding to the exception image and the serial number of the shooting block corresponding to the exception category. According to the method, the compaction road section is partitioned by performing imaging analysis on the compaction road section, and the abnormal pavement area with the compaction degree not meeting the requirement is directly recognized through a nondestructive detection mode of image recognition based on the pavement image recognition model pre-established by an artificial intelligence technology; therefore, the defect category and the serial number corresponding to the abnormal pavement area can be presented to the user, the user is assisted in targeted repair, and the pavement compaction quality is ensured.

column2: FLEXIBLE CONSTANT FORCE CONTROL METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR GRINDING ROBOT
column4: The invention provides a flexible constant force control method and system for a grinding robot, the method is applied to the field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps that first grinding information of a first grinding robot is acquired; obtaining constant force compensation information according to the first polishing information; grinding constant force compensation adjustment is conducted on the first grinding robot, posture detection is conducted, and first posture information is obtained; constructing an attitude balance compensation state space; acquiring various attitude compensation behavior information; constructing attitude compensation optimization fitness, and performing optimization in various attitude compensation behavior information; carrying out attitude balance compensation by adopting the optimal attitude compensation behavior information for polishing, and taking the compensated attitude information as initial attitude information for carrying out attitude balance compensation next time. The technical effects that the control precision of the polishing robot and the quality of produced workpieces are improved, the occurrence probability of safety problems in the polishing procedure is reduced, and precise control is achieved are achieved.

column2: GAME GLOVE SYSTEM FOR META-UNIVERSE INTERACTION
column4: The invention provides a game glove system for universe interaction. The game glove system comprises a stretchable sensor, a flexible array pressure sensor, an air bag, a controller, a user terminal and a glove. The stretchable sensor is attached to the elbow joint of the wearer and monitors the stretching motion characteristics of the arm; the flexible array pressure sensor is positioned in the glove and is used for monitoring the stress condition of a hand; the air bag is arranged on the outer side of the glove and extrudes inwards to generate acting force during inflation; the user terminal collects and analyzes information through a sensor, calculates a hand movement speed, establishes a virtual model of a game target object through sample training, and establishes a mutual trust mechanism with the meta universe based on an artificial intelligence algorithm; according to the magnitude of the stress of the virtual model and in combination with feedback information of the stretchable sensor and the flexible array pressure sensor, the air bag is controlled to output a preset proportion of force to act on the hand, so that a wearer senses the force of the virtual model. According to the method, the virtual scene of the meta universe is combined, so that the user can generate very strong experience feeling when playing boxing and other games.

column2: JAK1 INHIBITOR AND PREPARATION METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention provides a JAK1 inhibitor and a preparation method thereof. The structure of the JAK1 inhibitor is as shown in formula I in the specification. According to the invention, an artificial intelligence molecular design method capable of carrying out skeleton transition on a reference molecule of a target spot is utilized, and a compound with a new skeleton is obtained based on the structure and data of upatinib. Experimental results show that the compound provided by the invention has good JAK1 inhibitory activity, can be used for preparing a JAK1 inhibitor and drugs for preventing and/or treating JAK1 expression abnormality related diseases, and has a wide application prospect.

column2: MACHINE LEARNING MODEL INTERPRETATION METHOD AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a machine learning model interpretation method and device and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: training a first machine learning model based on network performance data, obtaining a feature weight corresponding to each feature contained in the network performance data, and selecting a model feature based on the feature weight; training a second machine learning model based on the model features to obtain a decision tree structure corresponding to the second machine learning model; determining a judgment selection path in the decision tree structure as an explanatory working path; according to the method, the device and the storage medium disclosed by the invention, the complexity of the algorithm is reduced by performing complexity arrangement on the solved problem and cutting the features; the interpretability work is carried out through the decision tree model, the process is simple, the operation is convenient and efficient, the decision basis of the machine learning model can be accurately obtained, and simplicity and accuracy are both considered.

column2: TARGET USER LOCKING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: The embodiments of the present application provide a target user locking method and an electronic device, relating to the field of electronic devices. Said method provided in the present application can be applied to an artificial intelligence (AI) fitness scene, and can ensure the accuracy of target user locking. The electronic device can complete the identification of a target user and the tracking of the target user during fitting by means of methods such as identifying user features, or identifying the user in combination with data acquired by a wearable device worn by the user, or identifying the user's motion mode.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR MANAGING CONTAINER RESOURCES IN CLUSTER
column4: The invention relates to a method for managing container resources in a cluster. The method comprises the following steps: (1) presetting a seat for each node in the cluster; (2) after each round of scheduling, if the task running on the node needs to be interrupted and suspended, executing forced deletion on the task; (3) performing forced deletion on the task execution of the scheduling program, and enabling all nodes which terminate task operation to serve as idle available nodes to enter a new round of scheduling; (4) acquiring the existence state of a container in a single node every other seat monitoring trigger time, and updating the seat state in real time; (5) applying for resources of a seat when a container is started for a node needing to execute a new training task in a new round of scheduling, and waiting for the seat resources if no seat resources exist; and (6) creating a new container, starting a new training task, and changing the seat state. The efficiency of the scheduling system can be improved, risks caused by coexistence of training containers are eliminated, and meanwhile the independence of the scheduling module is improved.

column2: TRANSFORMATION OF TEXT INTO PICTURES USING MACHINE LEARNING AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: Abstract of the Invention:The task of converting a text to image is a very complicated task and has posed multiple challenges for computer vision and natural language processing. The designed framework makes use of very large datasets for the purpose of training.The designed framework will help in converting text to high quality images, upon understanding the semantics in the input. The increase demand for the designed framework is all because of the kind of applications where this concept can be implemented and which can be related to scientific and business domains. The important aspect of this will be in fashion or engineering design/architecture.The designed framework works on multiple components like the generative network which should be pre trained (Generative Pre-trained Transformer(GPT) which is a language model based on deep learning and is used to generate human-like text) along with the evolutionary algorithm loop (Evolutionary algorithms are based on concepts of biological evolution. A 'population' of possible solutions to the problem is first created with each solution being scored using a 'fitness function' that indicates how good they are. The population evolves over time and (hopefully) identifies better solutions) and the Contrastive Language-Image Pre-training-CLIP model.CLIP is a neural network model. Which is trained on 400,000,000 (image, text) pairs. An (image, text) pair might be a picture and its caption. So this means that there are 400,000,000 pictures and their captions that are matched up, and this is the data that is used in training the CLIP model.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TRANSFER ROBOT
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence carrying robot which comprises a chassis, a telescopic arm device arranged on the chassis, a telescopic arm swing driving mechanism, a climbing device, a jacking device and a clamping jaw arranged at the outer end of the telescopic arm device. The chassis is a wheel type chassis capable of autonomously advancing; the telescopic arm device can carry the clamping jaw to stretch out and draw back, and the clamping jaw is used for grabbing objects; the telescopic arm swing driving mechanism is used for driving the telescopic arm device to swing in a pitching manner; the climbing device is used for enabling the front part of the chassis to climb to steps, and the jacking device is used for integrally jacking the rear part of the robot; the robot can stably pass when encountering the steps, has high passing capacity and is suitable for the logistics environment with obstacle terrains such as the steps.

column2: EPIDEMIC PREVENTION SELF-INSPECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON AI AND PUBLIC INFORMATION PLATFORM
column4: The invention provides an anti-epidemic self-inspection method and system based on AI and a public information platform. The method comprises the following steps: setting a name and/or a two-dimensional code of a kit special application program in an anti-epidemic detection kit in advance; guiding the subject to download a kit special application APP or a corresponding applet on a terminal of the subject; prompting the subject to perform self-inspection sampling according to the use process of the epidemic prevention detection kit; calling a camera device on the terminal, and prompting the subject to shoot a complete picture containing the sampling result and the unique mark information of the test card according to the shooting specification; the shot pictures are uploaded to a public information platform, and historical pictures on the terminal are forbidden to be uploaded in the uploading process; and carrying out image recognition on the shot picture on the public information platform through an artificial intelligence technology, determining a self-inspection result, and pushing the self-inspection result to the subject. According to the method, the troubleshooting work efficiency of infection conditions in the epidemic situation period is improved, and the infection risk is reduced.

column2: AGRICULTURAL MACHINERY REMOTE AUXILIARY DRIVING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON PANORAMIC VISION
column4: The invention discloses an agricultural machinery remote auxiliary driving system and method based on panoramic vision, and belongs to the technical field of unmanned agricultural machinery. The remote auxiliary driving agricultural machinery system provided by the invention can better drive the agricultural machinery, and the specific method for realizing remote auxiliary driving of the agricultural machinery comprises the following steps: when the agricultural machinery encounters a complex environment during automatic driving and cannot make a judgment, the agricultural machinery stops running immediately; a driving state switching instruction is sent to a remote control room; the driver switches the agricultural machinery from an automatic driving state to a remote manual driving state; executing the corresponding instruction, and performing remote driving operation on the agricultural machinery; and when the agricultural machinery can judge the surrounding environment, the driver switches the driving state of the agricultural machinery into automatic driving. According to the invention, the agricultural machinery can be effectively switched to manual driving under the condition that the agricultural machinery encounters a complex environment and cannot make a judgment, so that the safe operation of the agricultural machinery is ensured.

column2: WATER SUPPLY PIPELINE LEAKAGE SOUND DATA ACQUISITION TRANSCEIVER
column4: The utility model discloses a water supply pipeline leakage sound data acquisition transceiver, which comprises an electronic leakage listening rod, the electronic leakage listening rod comprises a metal long rod, a shell part and a detection device main body, one end of the metal long rod extends out of the shell part, and the other end of the metal long rod is connected with the detection device main body in the shell part; a main control board, a WiFi communication module and a display screen are arranged in the detection device body, and the main control board is connected with the WiFi communication module and the display screen. And an electronic recording device is arranged in the detection device main body. The electronic recording device can stably collect and convert the sound emitted by the vibrating plate into an electronic signal without distortion, and transmits an audio file to the tablet personal computer in a wireless mode. According to the utility model, a coherent, compact and free mode is utilized, and an efficient, convenient and cost-controllable data acquisition instrument is provided for water leakage sound discrimination of an artificial intelligence model running in a cloud end.

column2: MULTI-MODE VOLLEYBALL GAMING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to multi-mode volleyball gaming device comprises multiple telescopic linkages 1 forms frame resembling a volleyball court, a extendable poles 2 is installed with a net 3 dividing courts in two halves, a touch enabled display panel 4 allows a user to select a playing mode from sand, ground or water mode along with total number of players for dividing players into two teams and assigns one of half court to each teams, chambers 5 installed over frame individually filled with water and sand for dispensing water and sand within frame, a touch sensor 7 installed over the net 3 for determining touch of a player and accordingly microcontroller actuates a speaker 8 to indicate foul condition, and an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 9 processing surrounding images in order to evaluate points scored by each team along with cross line foul.

column2: AQUEDUCT SHIP, PEOPLE AND TRAFFIC FLOW STATISTICAL METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an aqueduct ship, people and traffic flow statistical method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: detecting whether a new ship is berthed at a wharf aqueduct in real time; when it is detected that a new ship is parked at the wharf aqueduct, ship information of the ship is recognized; generating voyage number data corresponding to the ship; starting a camera closest to the ship according to the information of the berthing position of the ship, and adjusting the shooting angle of the camera to enable a lens of the camera to face the ship; selecting a tracking target, and recording a moving track of the tracking target in the preset tracking area; counting people, pets, goods and vehicles on the ship according to the movement track; and obtaining the total number of targets boarding the ship, and uploading the total number of targets and voyage number data. Through the above mode, multiple targets such as people, pets, goods and vehicles can be automatically identified, statistics of different targets can be realized, the precision is high, the labor cost is low, and the working efficiency is high.

column2: TRANSVERSE CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE OF VEHICLE, STORAGE MEDIUM AND AUTOMATIC DRIVING VEHICLE
column4: The invention provides a transverse control method and device of a vehicle, a storage medium and an automatic driving vehicle, and relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as the intelligent traffic field and the automatic driving technical field. According to the specific implementation scheme, when transverse control of automatic driving is carried out on a vehicle, predicted transverse vehicle state parameters of the vehicle at all predicted time points are determined by combining running state information of the vehicle at the current moment and expected longitudinal speeds of the vehicle at all predicted time points in a predicted time domain after the current moment; and determining the transverse control quantity at each prediction time point in the prediction time domain by combining the predicted transverse vehicle state parameter and the expected transverse vehicle state parameter of the vehicle at each prediction time point, and performing transverse control on the vehicle based on the transverse control quantity at the first prediction time point in the prediction time domain. Therefore, the accuracy and stability of transverse control of the vehicle are improved, and then the safety of automatic driving of the vehicle can be improved.

column2: SUPPORT VECTOR MACHINE FOR REAL TIME ANALYSIS OF ROCKS AND STRUCTURES
column4: Artificial Intelligence provide effective solution to many real time problems and challenges in the world. Real Time Analysis of rocks and structures is one of such challenges. Many situations require gaining the knowledge of rocks or building or iceberg structures. Examples where such analysis required are mining, rescue operations, sailing of ships, etc?? Structure of rocks / debris / icebergs are got through advanced imaging system and sensors. My research introduces application of Artificial Intelligence algorithm, particularly support vector machine for analyzing and predicting the structure of earth or rock.

column2: AUTOMATIC ROAD INSPECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT, MEDIUM AND PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The invention provides an automatic road inspection method and device, electronic equipment, a medium and a computer program product. The method and device can be applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The automatic road inspection method comprises the steps of determining a starting point and an ending point of an inspection road section; according to the starting point, the ending point and the cutting distance, the patrol road section is cut, m monitored road sections are obtained, and m is an integer larger than or equal to 1; ai monitoring devices of each monitoring road section are determined, the shooting range of each monitoring device comprises the monitoring road section, Ai is an integer larger than or equal to 1, and i is an integer larger than or equal to 1 and smaller than or equal to m; acquiring road information of the monitored road section; acquiring equipment information of each piece of monitoring equipment in the Ai pieces of monitoring equipment; determining a target monitoring device in the Ai monitoring devices according to the road information and the device information; shooting road section information of the patrol road section by using target equipment; and inputting the road section information and the patrol rule into the automatic patrol model to obtain a patrol result.

column2: AI FACE CHANGING CLOUD PLATFORM SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an AI face changing cloud platform system which comprises a login home page, the login home page comprises a single-person mode and a multi-person mode, the output end of the login home page is electrically connected with a scene interface, and the scene interface comprises a single-person scene, a double-person scene, a three-person scene and a four-person scene. The output end of the scene interface is electrically connected with a shooting interface, the shooting interface comprises a camera shooting module, the output end of the shooting interface is electrically connected with a synthesis module, the synthesis module comprises a face lifting module and a mask module, and the output end of the synthesis module is electrically connected with a preview interface. The preview interface comprises a fusion module and a display module. The login home page, the scene interface, the shooting interface, the synthesis module, the preview interface, the screen projection interface and the code scanning interface are arranged, and the problems that an existing artificial intelligence face changing system is not simple enough, poor in use effect and not high in picture scene selectivity are solved.

column2: INDUSTRIAL IMAGE POSITIONING RECOGNITION DEVICE AND RECOGNITION METHOD FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an industrial image positioning recognition device and recognition method for artificial intelligence, and the device comprises a base, the four corners of the bottom of the base are fixedly connected with supporting blocks, the front surface of the base is fixedly connected with a display screen, and the center of the top of the base is fixedly connected with an image positioning recognition mechanism. Side plates are fixedly connected to the two sides of the top of the base. Through mutual cooperation of the first box body, the sliding groove, the first motor, the threaded rod, the threaded block, the sliding rod, the moving table, the second box body, a second motor, a first bevel gear, a second bevel gear, a rotating column, a rotating disc, a rotating rod, a rotating plate and a camera, the advantage that the shooting angle of the camera device can be freely adjusted is achieved; when the industrial image positioning and recognition device is used, the angle of the camera device can be freely adjusted according to actual use requirements, the precision of industrial image positioning and recognition is improved, and the actual use requirements can be met.

column2: SOFTWARE DYNAMIC LINK IMPLEMENTATION METHOD
column4: Artificial intelligence (hereinafter referred to as AI) is a main technical representation form of ICT in the future, and the most critical factor "learning" is almost all representation of "intelligence" in the AI. "Learning" of the AI is not "memory"-based learning, but "method"-based learning. Therefore, chips having powerful functions are impossible to be AI, and only software running on the chips is possible to be AI. When we are accustomed to define software from a main function, we consider that a dynamic link library must have the main function and then the dynamic link library is "active", and we restrict most of space where software is the only one which may become the AI. According to the present invention, an infinite exertion space is provided for the software to move to the AI, such that a thinking space which can be expanded by the software is consistent with a thinking expansion space required by the AI known to us.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR REMOTE INTELLIGENT TROUBLESHOOTING
column4: System and method for autonomous trouble shooting of a unit under test (UUT) having a plurality of replaceable components include: a test station that stores an artificial intelligence (Al) program and a knowledge database (KDB) including acceptable test results for each test point represented by an acceptable test vector, a test probe to test the circuit card assembly; and an operator station to send commands to the test station via the communication network to teach the Al program to capture and store the acceptable test result for each test point of the UUT by the test probe, in the KDB, wherein the Al program commands the test probe to test the UUT, stores the test results in a test result vector, compares the test result vector with the stored acceptable test vector, and displays recommendation as which replaceable component in the UUT to be repaired or replaced.

column2: PAVEMENT DISEASE DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON PAN-TILT CAMERA, AND RELATED MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a pavement disease detection method and device based on a pan-tilt camera and a related medium, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the shooting of a to-be-detected road through a pan-tilt camera, and obtaining a pavement overview map; delimiting a to-be-detected road surface area in the road surface overview map, and calculating a rotation range of the pan-tilt camera according to the to-be-detected road surface area; based on the to-be-detected road surface area, automatically planning an inspection path for the pan-tilt camera, and controlling the pan-tilt camera to perform inspection shooting according to the inspection path to obtain a target image; detecting and identifying disease positions and types in the target image through an image processing technology; and summarizing detection and identification results into the road overview map. According to the invention, the cloud platform camera is controlled to automatically inspect so as to detect the road surface diseases, and the road surface diseases are detected under the condition that a large amount of repeated manual operation is not needed and field detection is not needed, so that the detection efficiency and precision of the road surface diseases are improved.

column2: EQUIPMENT OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an equipment operation and maintenance system which can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence, the field of cloud computing, the field of big data, the field of Internet of Things or the field of finance. The edge gateway performs de-framing processing and feature extraction on the running picture acquired by the data acquisition equipment to obtain picture features, the picture features and the acquired running data are sent to the data processing equipment through the data transmission equipment, the data processing equipment performs feature extraction on the picture features and the running data respectively, and the data are sent to the data acquisition equipment; the method comprises the following steps: monitoring equipment to obtain operation characteristic information of the monitored equipment, determining operation and maintenance management demand information, performing operation and maintenance analysis and operation and maintenance management operation on the operation characteristic information by the operation and maintenance management equipment according to the operation and maintenance management demand information to obtain operation and maintenance management control information, and issuing the operation and maintenance management control information to the corresponding monitored equipment through data transmission equipment. By means of the equipment operation and maintenance system, unified operation and maintenance management of at least one piece of monitored equipment is achieved, the utilization rate of the equipment operation and maintenance system is increased, and resource waste is avoided.

column2: LOAD BALANCING METHOD, DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a load balancing method and device, equipment and a medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical fields of image processing, computer vision, deep learning and the like. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring current running state information of each computing node in a plurality of computing nodes; for each computing node in the plurality of computing nodes, load state information of the computing node is determined based on the current operation state information of the computing node and the target operation state information of the computing node, and the load state information indicates that the computing node is in one of light load, full load and overload; and adjusting the resource configuration of at least one computing node in response to determining that the at least one computing node in the plurality of computing nodes is in a light load or overload state.

column2: YOGA TEACHING EQUIPMENT CAPABLE OF IMPROVING COMFORT DEGREE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of yoga teaching equipment, in particular to yoga teaching equipment capable of improving comfort based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a fixed bottom plate, the upper surface of the fixed bottom plate is fixedly connected with a supporting plate, the supporting plate is rotatably connected with a lying plate, and the lying plate is matched with the fixed bottom plate. Shoulder supporting blocks are symmetrically and fixedly connected to the upper surface of the lying plate, the lying plate is sleeved with a breathable rubber pad, the breathable rubber pad is matched with the shoulder supporting blocks, and protective handles are symmetrically and fixedly connected to the two sides of the lying plate; through mutual cooperation of structures of the air blowing assembly and the massage mechanism, the effect of increasing the sweat evaporation rate of people can be achieved, the massage effect can also be achieved, meanwhile, the effect of improving the comfort level of people is facilitated, a limiting rod drives a limiting sliding block on a positioning frame to do reciprocating motion in a supporting frame, and the comfort level of people is improved. Therefore, the working range of the fan impeller is enlarged, and evaporation of sweat on the back of a person is accelerated.

column2: TRAIN BRAKE CHAIN STATE RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to a train brake chain state recognition method and device, equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps that image data of a train brake chain are collected; performing feature extraction on the image data to obtain a plurality of feature maps with different sizes; inputting the feature map of each size into a corresponding prediction model to obtain corresponding prediction data; determining corresponding candidate prediction coordinates of a plurality of preset key points on the brake chain in the image data under each prediction model; performing de-duplication processing on the candidate prediction coordinates under each prediction model to obtain corresponding optimal prediction coordinates of a plurality of preset key points on the brake chain in the image data; a brake chain status in the image data is determined. The brake chain state is automatically identified based on the prediction model, manual inspection is not needed, heavy and low-efficiency work is omitted, the running efficiency of a train can be effectively improved, and the running safety of the train is ensured.

column2: MULTI-TARGET AUTOMATIC TEMPERATURE MEASUREMENT AND EARLY WARNING METHOD FOR STEEL COLD ROLLING ANNEALING FURNACE COMPONENT
column4: The invention discloses a multi-target automatic temperature measuring and early warning method for steel cold rolling annealing furnace components, and relates to the technical field of metal smelting. Comprising the following steps of collecting image data of key components of the annealing furnace, developing a target detection algorithm for the components of the annealing furnace, developing a semantic segmentation algorithm for images of the components of the annealing furnace, analyzing historical temperature of each component, and designing a temperature anomaly detection algorithm. On the basis of an automatic temperature monitoring system combining an infrared thermal imaging camera and an artificial intelligence technology, a target detection and image semantic segmentation algorithm based on a machine vision technology is adopted, and real-time equipment component images are obtained. On the basis of acquiring field actual measurement data, real-time temperature data of key components are acquired based on an infrared thermal imaging camera, and a temperature anomaly detection algorithm is developed, so that the running state of equipment is judged, and early warning is performed on equipment anomaly in time.

column2: LANGUAGE MODEL TRAINING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a language model training method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the data enhancement processing of obtained training text data, determining the near-synonym text data and the anti-synonym text data corresponding to the corresponding training text data, and storing the near-synonym text data and the anti-synonym text data; the accuracy and the stability of the trained language model are improved; according to the method, feature extraction is carried out on exercise text data, synonym text data and antisense text data, original text features, synonym text features and antisense text features are determined, and language model training is carried out according to the original text features, the synonym text features and the antisense text features, so that a target language model with higher accuracy is obtained; therefore, the accuracy and stability of subsequent downstream language processing are ensured.

column2: CODE DEPLOYMENT METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a code deployment method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: determining a target version number of to-be-deployed software and a historical version number of the to-be-deployed software, and obtaining a historical compiling file package corresponding to the historical version number; determining a target code file of which the target version number is changed compared with the historical version number; compiling the target code file to obtain a target compiled file; and updating the historical compiled file package according to the target compiled file to obtain a target compiled file package, and deploying the target compiled file package to a running environment of the to-be-deployed software. According to the method, the changed code data between the latest version and the historically deployed version can be quickly determined, only the changed code data is compiled, the same code does not need to be repeatedly compiled in each deployment, the compiling time can be shortened, the code compiling efficiency is improved, and therefore the code deployment efficiency is improved.

column2: MOTION TRACK GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to artificial intelligence, and provides a motion trail generation method and device, equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: identifying target application software, monitoring a running state of the target application software, counting state duration when the running state is a closed state, if the state duration is greater than or equal to preset duration, executing self-starting processing on the target application software, and obtaining longitude and latitude coordinates of a user in real time; and calculating a moving distance of the user according to the plurality of longitude and latitude coordinates, if the moving distance is greater than or equal to a preset distance, executing restarting processing on the target application software, and accurately generating a motion track according to the plurality of longitude and latitude coordinates. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the motion trail can be stored in a block chain.

column2: SHOOTING BEHAVIOR DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a shooting behavior detection method and device, equipment and a storage medium, which are used for improving the accuracy of human behavior recognition. The shooting behavior detection method comprises the following steps: acquiring a single-frame video image of a target person through preset monitoring equipment; performing marker identification on the single-frame video image through a target detection network; if the image acquisition equipment exists in the single-frame video image, performing position correlation detection on the image acquisition equipment and the hands, the side faces and the ears of the target person according to an intersection-to-parallel ratio function; if the image acquisition equipment is in the candidate state, performing perspective transformation on a camera of the image acquisition equipment to generate a corresponding camera perspective transformation plane; and if the included angle between the perspective transformation plane of the camera and the plane of the single-frame video image is smaller than or equal to a preset included angle, determining that the image acquisition equipment is in a shooting state, generating early warning information, and sending the early warning information to an early warning terminal.

column2: NOVEL SKIING MACHINE OPTICAL MULTIMEDIA INTELLIGENT INTERACTION SYSTEM
column4: A novel skiing machine optical multimedia intelligent interaction system comprises a skiing machine, a position sensor, one or more light source generators and a pressure sensor, the position sensor is fixed above a skiing blanket, protective wallboards are arranged on the two sides of the skiing machine, and information transmission is accurately and efficiently achieved through an optical multimedia communication medium; multi-physical-quantity information is acquired, so that the acquisition requirements of various signs of the skier are comprehensively met; an intelligent data processing system and artificial intelligence data acquisition and analysis are realized, and functions of teaching, entertainment and the like are realized.

column2: METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT FOR OPERATOR SCHEDULING OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODEL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an operator scheduling method and device of an artificial intelligence model, equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a reference running time length of each target operator corresponding to a model, calculating an expected queuing time of each operator queue based on the number of operators in a plurality of operator queues and an expected waiting time length of the operators, and calculating the expected queuing time of each operator queue based on the reference running time length and the expected queuing time of each operator queue. And adding each target operator to the operator queue with the shortest expected queuing time. According to the method, the operators in the operator queues can be balanced to the maximum extent, so that the reasoning load on the reasoning engines is balanced to the maximum extent, the model reasoning delay corresponding to the APPs tends to be balanced, the problem of reasoning delay diffusion caused by scheduling according to the number of the operators in the operator queues is effectively avoided, and the reasoning efficiency is improved. The waiting time of each target operator is reduced, and the AI reasoning efficiency of the whole system is improved.

column2: GARBAGE CLASSIFICATION AND RECOGNITION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based garbage classification and recognition system, which comprises an intelligent control system, a camera, an image acquisition system, a database, a touch screen interaction system, a voice interaction system, an alarm system, a harmful garbage can, a dry garbage can, a wet garbage can and a recyclable garbage can, the intelligent control system serves as a transfer station of other systems and accessories and regulates and controls the systems and the parts, the camera is used for shooting pictures of an area in front of the classification dustbin, and the image collection system is used for collecting images, including garbage throwers and garbage, in the pictures shot by the camera. The database is used for storing resources such as images and garbage classification related knowledge; according to the garbage classification and identification system based on artificial intelligence, management is convenient, meanwhile, garbage classification knowledge and previous violation records are convenient to learn, inconsistent violation records can be appealed, and an alarm is given to the surrounding when someone throws high-risk garbage.

column2: HEALTH MANAGEMENT METHOD AND DEVICE FOR GESTATIONAL DIABETES MELLITUS AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a health management method and device for gestational diabetes mellitus and electronic equipment, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the personal basic information and exercise taboo information of a target user; and pushing a diet catering scheme and a pregnancy exercise strategy to the target user based on the personal basic information and the exercise taboo information. According to the method, the diet catering scheme and the pregnancy exercise strategy can be pushed to the target user in a manner of interacting with the target user, so that the purpose of active health management of the target user is achieved, timely professional diet guidance and professional exercise guidance are provided for the target user, the probability of occurrence of complications of gestational diabetes patients is greatly reduced, and the experience of the gestational diabetes patients is improved. The pregnancy outcome of a gestational diabetes patient is improved, and the prevention effect on gestational diabetes is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY-BASED PITUITARY TUMOR OPERATION PLANNING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a pituitary tumor operation planning system based on an artificial intelligence technology. The system comprises the following steps: 1, acquiring a vascular medical image sequence, a skeleton medical image sequence and a pituitary tumor medical image sequence; 2, if the medical image sequences are the image sequences shot at different moments or the image sequences shot at the same moment are not in the same coordinate system, performing registration, and placing the image sequences in the same coordinate system; 3, using a deep neural network model to take each medical image sequence in the same coordinate system as input, and outputting a blood vessel image segmentation result, a skeleton image segmentation result and a pituitary tumor image segmentation result; and 4, performing three-dimensional reconstruction on the blood vessel image segmentation result, the skeleton image segmentation result and the pituitary tumor image segmentation result to obtain a three-dimensional model for pituitary tumor preoperative planning. The method is high in processing speed and high in reliability, so that preoperative evaluation and surgical planning of clinicians become simple, accurate and rapid.

column2: BINOCULAR ROTARY TABLE CAMERA
column4: The utility model belongs to the technical field of three-dimensional reconstruction, and particularly relates to a binocular rotary table camera, after the binocular rotary table camera is started, a background system of a main control circuit of the binocular rotary table camera starts to be loaded, the main control circuit starts a lens module by sending a starting signal to the lens module, and a user sends a shooting instruction to the main control circuit through a user terminal. The main control circuit controls the lens module to execute a shooting action according to the shooting instruction, receives an image signal sent by the lens module and receives an illumination signal output by the photosensitive sensor, and then a background of the main control circuit generates a panoramic image signal through an algorithm and outputs the panoramic image signal to the screen board so as to indicate the screen board to display the panoramic image signal to a user. Visibly, the background system of the visual camera can be quickly started, binocular ranging is carried out in combination with the collected plane image signal, the panoramic image signal is output, the three-dimensional model is directly generated according to the panoramic image signal subsequently, and the measurement precision of the visual camera is improved.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR DETERMINING ACTION CATEGORY, EQUIPMENT, STORAGE MEDIUM AND PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The invention provides a method and device for determining an action category, equipment, a storage medium and a program product, and relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence, deep learning and image detection. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps of determining a skeleton node attention map of video frame data in target video data, and obtaining a plurality of skeleton node attention maps; performing decoupling classification of at least one level on the skeleton node attention graph to obtain a plurality of skeleton node attention graph tree structures; determining a target feature tensor of the target skeleton node data according to the plurality of skeleton node attention graph tree structures and the target skeleton node data of the target video data; and determining a target action category of the target video data according to the target feature tensor.

column2: CHEST EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a chest exercising device, comprising of a platform 1 having a first and second portion 2, 3, a clamping units to hold motorized roller 9, a cushioned plate 6 for back support through a sliding unit 7, a suction cup 8 is configured at the bottom of the telescopic pole 5, a pair of motorized roller 9 wrapped with a rope 10 and a pair of holding unit 11 for user to pull rope 10 for exercise, an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 12 to detect the user height, a touch interactive display panel 13 for user access, a pair of U-shaped clamping unit 14 for calve support via a link rod 15, a motorized lead screw 16 arrangement on the link rod 15 and a pair of inverted L-shaped telescopic rods 18 with a pair of robotic arms 17.

column2: IDANCE TUTOR: A 3D DIGITAL INDIAN CLASSICAL DANCE MOTION CAPTURE TOOL
column4: The invention focused on bringing Indian cultural dances close to the urban digital Indian by improving its Brand Value. An iDance Tutor is digital software that can connect actual dance performance to the digital avatar. When online, the software connects to dancers and viewers through the internet. The dance performances are analysed, and performance ratings can be provided based on the user happiness quotient about the version. New dance structures can be made, and sound can be added using state-of-the-art augmented reality (AR) features. A dancer can design their performances in 3D and promote the dance form online for enhancing the user experience and use this analysis to book live performances, thereby generating financial benefits. iDance tutor uses a powerful artificial intelligence platform for training and reproducing the study, and hence new dance forms are constantly updated in the database. Overall, the proposed tool can transform Indian cultural dance forms with a research strategy of BDI. The Big data research strategy bridges people from Indian cultural dance and technology, focusing on the fundamentals of mathematics, computer programming, and human body dynamics.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED COMPREHENSIVE PHYSICAL TRAINING APPARATUS WITH RUNNING TRAINING FUNCTION
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based comprehensive physical training apparatus with a running training function, and particularly relates to the technical field of physical training, the artificial intelligence-based comprehensive physical training apparatus comprises two groups of vertical plates and transverse plates which are vertically arranged, a first angle adjusting mechanism is arranged at the joint of each group of vertical plates and transverse plates, a lifting adjusting mechanism is arranged between the two vertical plates, and a second angle adjusting mechanism is arranged between the two vertical plates; a running mechanism is arranged between the two transverse plates, a mounting assembly is arranged between the ends, away from the vertical plates at the corresponding positions, of the two transverse plates, a second angle adjusting mechanism is arranged at the end, away from the mounting assembly, of the running mechanism, and a grabbing mechanism is arranged on the side, facing the running mechanism, of the lifting adjusting mechanism. The running mechanism for running training, the lifting adjusting mechanism for arm strength training and leg pressing training and the grabbing mechanism for grabbing strength training are ingeniously combined, multiple purposes are achieved through one machine, and the physical ability of trainees who like physical training at home can be comprehensively improved.

column2: VEHICLE PERCEPTION CAPABILITY DETERMINATION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a vehicle perception capability determination method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. According to the specific implementation scheme, the current running speed of a vehicle and the type of a current test scene are determined; according to the driving speed of the vehicle and the type of the current test scene, determining the current reference precision corresponding to the vehicle; determining the test precision of the vehicle in the current test scene; and according to a comparison result of the test precision and the reference precision, determining a current perception capability grade of the vehicle. Therefore, the accuracy and the reliability of determining the vehicle perception capability level are improved, so that the vehicle test is more sufficient and credible, and reliable guarantee is provided for driving traffic safety in the aspect of testing the vehicle perception capability.

column2: EQUIPMENT SEARCHING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to an equipment searching method and electronic equipment in the field of artificial intelligence, and is used for marking the position of to-be-searched equipment in an image in combination with the positioning of the to-be-searched equipment and the shot image, so that a user can quickly search the equipment in an actual application scene, and the user experience is improved. The method comprises the following steps: a first device obtains position information of a second device; the first device obtains the relative position of the second device and the first device according to the position information of the first device and the position information of the second device; if it is determined that the second device is within the shooting range of the first device according to the relative position, the first device shoots a first image; the first device determines an area where the second device is located in the first image; the first device highlights the area where the second device is located in the first image.

column2: GESTURE RECOGNITION BRACELET FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND GESTURE RECOGNITION METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses a gesture recognition bracelet for artificial intelligence, and belongs to the field of bracelets, the gesture recognition bracelet for artificial intelligence comprises a bracelet body and at least one composite mechanical sensor, and the at least one composite mechanical sensor is fixed on the bracelet body. The composite mechanical sensor comprises a flexible sensing layer used for moving relative to a sensed object, an electrode sensing layer, a piezoelectric material layer and a signal processor used for calculating user gestures, the electrode sensing layer is located on one side of the flexible sensing layer, and a gap is reserved between the flexible sensing layer and the electrode sensing layer. The piezoelectric material layer is located in a gap between the flexible induction layer and the electrode induction layer, and the flexible induction layer faces the inner side of the bracelet body. According to the gesture recognition bracelet for artificial intelligence, mechanical information of arm surface muscles of a deaf-mute is detected through the gesture recognition bracelet to obtain a gesture posture signal, gesture shooting is not needed, and the gesture recognition bracelet is easy to wear and good in portability.

column2: ANTI-SLIP GRAPPLING SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to an anti-slip grappling system comprising a bodyhaving proximal and distal end as first and second end 2, 3, a primary claws 4 are attached to the first end 2, a rope 9 is adhered with the body 1 to climb up, a rotatable artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 7 to analyze strength of user, multiple number of secondary claws 5 attached to primary claws10 4 grabbing surface firmly, a wearable glove 10 associated with body 1 inconnection with ultrasonic sensor 11 measuring distance between user and surface, a vital sensor 12 installed on glove 10 observing real time physiological parameters, an inflatable unit interconnected with the glove 10 aiding user in climbing up, a freefall sensor installed on glove 10 in association with gripping15 unit to enhance gripping while climbing.

column2: PROCESSING METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MODEL
column4: Provided are a processing method and apparatus for a model in the field of artificial intelligence. The model comprises a plurality of operators, the plurality of operators run on a plurality of calculation circuits, and the plurality of calculation circuits correspond to different data formats.
