The method comprises: adding a first conversion operator to a model, so as to convert data, which is input into the first conversion operator, into a general format, wherein the general format is a data format supported by a plurality of calculation circuits; modifying other operators after the first conversion operator in the model, such that formats of input data and output data of the other operators are both the general format. By means of the provided method and apparatus, data conversion operations during the process of running a model by using a plurality of calculation circuits are reduced, thereby improving model running efficiency.

column2: ROSE ACNE CLASSIFICATION SOFTWARE BASED ON COMPUTER VISION
column4: The invention discloses acnes rosacea identification and classification software based on computer vision. The acnes rosacea identification and classification software comprises a mobile terminal image acquisition system, an acnes rosacea category data system, an acnes rosacea category judgment system and a personalized user upgrading system, the mobile end image acquisition system is used for acquiring facial rosacea disease images through a photographing function of a mobile end; the rosacea category data system can utilize a deep learning mode to carry out high-intensity learning and training on rosacea category data; the acne rosacea category judgment system obtains a category result from the facial acne rosacea picture of the patient according to a learning model matching result; according to the personalized user upgrading system, the category of the rosacea disease can be newly increased according to the characteristics of the patient, so that the accuracy of rosacea classification is ensured. According to the invention, simultaneous classification and identification of different types of rosacea can be completed through simple shooting operation, and convenience is provided for clinical diagnosis of doctors.

column2: ROBOT AUTOMATIC DANCING SYSTEM BASED ON MACHINE LEARNING AND INTELLIGENT PLANNING
column4: The invention discloses a robot automatic dance editing system based on machine learning and intelligent planning. The robot automatic dance editing system comprises a classifier module, an audio processing module and a planning module. The invention belongs to the technical field of robots and artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to a robot automatic dancing system based on machine learning and intelligent planning, which combines machine learning and PDDL technologies, integrates expert knowledge while having a small amount of data sets, and enables robot dancing to be closer to music and more ornamental. The problems that a large number of data sets are needed and real expert knowledge is lacked in an existing robot dance editing system are successfully solved, and the ornamental value and the graceful degree of robot dance editing are effectively improved.

column2: CROSS-CAMERA MULTI-TARGET TRACKING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a cross-camera multi-target tracking method and device, equipment and a medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining video frames shot by a plurality of cameras; determining a first type of targets which are located in an overlapped visual space region between different cameras and have the same shooting time in the video frame, and performing de-duplication processing on the first type of targets to obtain residual targets after de-duplication; and based on the time sequence, classifying the duplicate-removed residual targets shot at different shooting times and the second type of targets in the non-overlapping visual space region, so as to obtain path tracks corresponding to each duplicate-removed residual target and each second type of target in the non-overlapping visual space region. Therefore, matching of the target tracks in different cameras is not needed, the target deduplication and classification are carried out to obtain the cross-camera target tracks, and cross-camera multi-target tracking can be realized more accurately.

column2: ROBOT REAL-TIME DANCE EDITING SYSTEM BASED ON DANCE LIBRARY
column4: The invention discloses a robot real-time dance editing system based on a dance library, which comprises a dance basic action library construction module, a surrounding environment music real-time analysis module, a basic action selection module and a rhythm and basic action synchronization module, the surrounding environment music real-time analysis module, the basic action selection module and the beat and basic action synchronization module are respectively connected with the dance basic action library construction module. The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence and robots, and particularly relates to a robot real-time dance editing system based on a dance library, which is characterized in that music feature information obtained by real-time analysis is matched with basic actions from a dance basic action coherence relation table through the pre-constructed dance basic action coherence relation table, and the basic actions are analyzed and obtained; according to the system, the intellectualization of the dance editing process is better embodied and the method is ensured to be correctly and smoothly realized through the preset transaction process logic.

column2: DIGITAL CURLING STRATEGY VALUE EXTRACTION METHOD BASED ON POLAR COORDINATE REPRESENTATION
column4: The invention discloses a digital curling stone strategy value extraction method based on polar coordinate representation, belongs to artificial intelligence and computer vision directions in the field of deep learning, establishes a curling stone position feature extraction model based on polar coordinate representation, and mainly solves the problem of deterministic discretization caused in a digital curling stone position feature extraction process. And thus, strategy value network extraction is optimized. The algorithm mainly comprises three parts: a data processing part, a feature extraction part and a strategy value head part, the data processing part converts a traditional digital curling stone data set into a curling stone data set represented by polar coordinates, and the feature extraction part sets a new network structure to fully extract curling stone position information according to polar coordinate characteristics; and the strategy value head part is used for extracting the probability of selecting a certain action and the possibly obtained value at the current position, so that the reinforcement learning of the digital curling match decision can be correctly carried out subsequently. The digital curling strategy value extraction method based on polar coordinate representation is small in error and high in efficiency during supervision feature extraction of digital curling match data, has high expandability, and can effectively improve the speed and precision of digital curling decision.

column2: ENERGY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM WITH ENERGY EFFICIENCY MANAGEMENT FUNCTION
column4: The invention discloses an energy management system with an energy efficiency management function, and the system comprises a main control unit with a human-computer interface and a big data expert analysis system, and a plurality of unit control units which are connected with units with unit fuzzy controllers and AC/DC modules. The main control unit is further connected with a steering oar system load and a propulsion system load through a rudder angle adjusting bus and a rudder speed adjusting bus, the big data expert analysis system is connected with a sensor signal collecting system, and the sea condition duration is predicted by combining big data of the sensor signal collecting system in the navigation process. And calculating the lowest energy consumption of the sailing speed reaching the existing sea condition. The generator set adopts the fuzzy mode recognition controller, compared with an existing energy management system, the energy efficiency management function is added, the artificial intelligence degree is higher, and higher energy efficiency is achieved.

column2: METHOD FOR CONVERTING CURLING SIMULATION IMAGE INTO REAL IMAGE BY REINFORCING LEARNING PERCEPTION
column4: The invention discloses a method for converting a curling stone simulation match image into a real image based on reinforcement learning perception, belongs to artificial intelligence and computer vision directions in the field of deep learning, and establishes a curling stone simulation image conversion model based on reinforcement learning perception tasks. The problem that a curling strategy trained in a simulation environment may not match reality is mainly solved. The algorithm mainly comprises an image style conversion module and a reinforcement learning constraint module, and the reinforcement learning constraint module is used for providing pixel-level field self-adaption for an analog image and enabling the image to keep important attributes required by reinforcement learning in a conversion process through reinforcement learning constraint so as to realize task knowing of the conversion process. According to the method for converting the curling simulation match image into the real image based on reinforced learning perception, the effect of an existing curling auxiliary decision-making model is effectively improved, the implementation cost is low, and the application range is wide.

column2: UPPER LIMB MUSCLE STRENGTH IMPROVING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to an upper limb muscle strength improving device that is capable of providing an assistance to user in performing an exercise of arm, biceps and shoulders without any strain caused to user that comprises of an elongated body 1 having a lateral and central portion 3, a pair of primary adjustable straps 4 attached with body 1 for fixing the user?™s hands, an artificial intelligence (AI) based imaging unit 5 mounted over body 1 for capturing the images of user?™s physique, a pair of arm supporting units 6 for gripping the user?™s arm via a pair of secondary adjustable strap 8, an electromagnetically empowered spring 9 that is adjusted for increasing/ decreasing difficulty level, a holographic projector for producing virtual images of correct posture to guide the user during exercise appropriately.

column2: SMART CITY INFORMATION GRID OPERATION SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a smart city information grid operating system which comprises a 4S cloud service module which is composed of a facility layer, a data layer, a platform layer and an application layer. The facility layer is used for information interconnection and intercommunication and data sharing and exchange of the smart city government, the society and the enterprise through integrated network fusion; the data layer is used for carrying out storage, processing and artificial intelligence deep learning on the data integrated by the facility layer, forming a business data set, a management element data set and a decision target data set, and carrying out component packaging on the corresponding data sets, and the platform layer is used for carrying out component packaging on the corresponding data sets based on a reflection mechanism of information grid logic service. A physical entity system of each distributed data and information node is reconstructed as a virtualization application system, and a cross-industry, cross-platform and cross-service virtualization application integration platform and a virtualization industry-level second-level platform are formed; and the application layer performs visual integrated display and running operation according to the requirements of the use functions.

column2: FULL BODY EXERCISE ASSISTANCE DEVICE
column4: A full body exercise assistance device comprises of a pair of U-shaped rods 1, 2 attached with each other via pair of spiral springs 3, rods 1, 2 are utilized by a user for performing different exercises, an artificial intelligence image capturing module 4 for determining an intensity of exercises and number of repetitions to be performed by user, an ultrasonic sensor 6 detects distance between rods 1, 2, an electromagnet 7, for creating an attractive force between rods 1, 2, in same microcontroller energized the electromagnets 7 for creating a repulsive force between rods 1, 2, thereby providing a resistance to user in performing exercise, and a thermal imaging unit 8 installed detects strain experienced by user while performing exercise, in case detected strain exceeds a threshold level, then microcontroller regulates intensity of energization of electromagnets 7 for reducing resistance provided to user.

column2: ABDOMINAL EXERCISE DEVICE
column4: An abdominal exercise device comprises of a telescopic frame 1, a telescopic link 2 is attached with a primary pair of telescopic bars 3 for enabling a user to place feet to attain an supine posture, a pair of holding units 4 engaged with a pair of secondary telescopic bars 5 for providing a grip to user while attaining posture, a pneumatically operated pin 10 is integrated within each of holding unit 4 for locking units within multiple holes crafted over secondary bars 5 for enabling user to climb, an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 6 captures and processes images of user detect physical dimensions for extending/retracting for allowing an appropriate accommodation of user, and a FBG sensor 7 for detecting vital health parameters of user for actuating a telescopically operated supporting unit 8 attached with frame 1 via a sliding rack 9 for providing support to user.

column2: ASSISTIVE CORE STRENGTH IMPROVING DEVICE
column4: An assistive core strength improving device comprises a platform 1 for accommodating a user to perform the exercise, a display panel 2 for feeding details by user regarding difficulty level, an artificial intelligence (AI) based imaging unit 3 for capturing the images of platform 1, a microcontroller for regulating the components to perform configured tasks, a pair of pneumatically operated blocks 4 for holding user?™s hand and foot in a position by extending and retracting, a slider 5 for sliding the blocks 4 in order to maintain a position as per user?™s height, a pair of telescopically operated hand supporters 6 for supporting elbow portion of user during exercise in order to uplift the user?™s body, a pair of C-clamp 7 with a pair of pneumatically actuated rods for supporting knee portion, and a set of rollers 8 with a strap 9 for providing resistance to user during exercising.

column2: ADJUSTABLE BACK PAIN RELIEVING DEVICE
column4: An adjustable back pain relieving device, comprises of a platform 1 assembled withmultiple telescopically operated rods 2 for accommodating a user suffering from back and spinal pain disorder, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 3 for capturing the multiple images of the user to decode height and weight of the user, a pair of L-shaped pneumatically operated bars 4 configured with10 motorized grippers 5 for holding the shoulders, a strap 6 for securing the chestportion of the user, a touch interactive display panel 12 that for entering mode related to performing of a stretching exercise, a thermal enabled imaging unit 7 arranged on the platform 1 for detecting the fatigue, strain and redness developed on the user?™s back and spinal position.

column2: ADAPTABLE RESTING DEVICE
column4: An adaptable resting device, comprising a frame 1 integrated with a pair of vertical sliders 4 running parallel to each other, an artificial intelligence (AI) based imaging unit 5 for capturing and processing images of surrounding respectively to determine height of a user, a flap 6 mounted on sliders 4 and developed in a manner to accommodate user in accordance to determined height of user, a C-shaped neck supporting unit 7 for supporting user?™s neck region, multiple rollers 8 wrapped with an inflatable fabric 9 for tightening or loosening fabric 6 over supporting unit 7 followed by actuation of an air compression to inflate fabric 9 in order to provide comfort to user?™s neck, and a set of foot resting unit 10 to translate foot resting unit 10 along slider 4 as per user?™s height to facilitate user to accommodate each of user?™s foot on resting unit 10.

column2: TRICEPS TRAINING SYSTEM
column4: A triceps training system comprises of a platform 1 fitted with a telescopic rectangular block 2 over which user?™s back positioned to perform tricep exercise, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 3 fitted over platform 1 capture user images and accordingly microcontroller actuates the block 2 based on expertise level of exercise, a pair of telescopic rods 5 positioned over platform 1 connected to a pair of C-shaped clamp 6 over which user place elbow, a touch interactive display panel 7 positioned on platform 1 allows user to choose mode of exercise, weights 4 are electromagnetically locked with each other in beginner mode and deactivate in intermediate mode, a pair of supporting units 8 installed over platform 1 through a pair of telescopic bar extract/retract with respect to user?™s hand movement thereby assisting in performing exercise, a back support member 10 fitted over platform 1 to correct back posture.

column2: AI MODEL OPERATION METHOD AND DEVICE, AI MODEL LOADING METHOD AND DEVICE AND IC CHIP
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides an AI model operation method and device, an AI model loading method and device and an IC chip, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: receiving a model calling request from an application processor (AP), wherein the model calling request is used for requesting to call a target AI model; obtaining a storage address of the target AI model on a system main memory; transferring recognizable model data of the target AI model from a system main memory to an AI chip based on a storage address through direct memory access DMA; wherein the recognizable model data comprises a model operator instruction and model weight data; and running the target AI model through the AI chip based on the recognizable model data. According to the embodiment of the invention, the problem that the AI model corresponding to the third-party application cannot obtain the acceleration capability of the AI chip in the related technology is solved.

column2: HUMAN BODY INTERACTION BEHAVIOR RECOGNITION METHOD BASED ON SPACE-TIME DIAGRAM CONVOLUTION
column4: The invention discloses a human body interaction behavior recognition method based on space-time diagram convolution, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and the method specifically comprises the steps: firstly, recording a video of a double-person interaction behavior in time T through a depth camera, directly extracting three-dimensional coordinate data of key points of a human skeleton, and normalizing the data into a tensor of 1 * M * C * T * V; the method comprises the following steps: initializing a space-time interaction graph convolutional network, inputting a data tensor, enabling the data tensor to pass through a normalization layer, enabling the data tensor to reach six sub-network layers with the same structure, and enabling each sub-network layer to be composed of two single-person feature extraction modules and an interaction feature association module; the single-person feature extraction module comprises a space graph convolution module GCN and a time convolution module TCN; two tensor features R1 and R2 are output after six-layer space graph convolution and time convolution are carried out, the two tensor features R1 and R2 are spliced at a channel dimension after normalization, a category number label is obtained through a full connection layer and a Softmax layer in sequence, and finally, a hash table composed of the category number and the behavior name is inquired to obtain the behavior name; according to the method, the aggregation efficiency and the recognition accuracy of the interaction features are effectively improved.

column2: SCIATICA TREATMENT SYSTEM
column4: A sciatica treatment system, comprises of an enclosure 1 carries a platform 2 to treat sciatic pain, a pair of footmarks 3 over the platform 2, a pair of hip supporting units 4 mounted over the platform 2, a display panel 5 linked with a microcontroller to show correct exercise posture, a pair of telescopically operated rods 6 mounted over ceiling of the enclosure 1 to provide aid in obtaining correct posture, a cuff 8 coupled with the rods 6 to hold ankle region for achieving the posture of leg crossing over each other, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 9 coupled with the platform 2 and linked with the microcontroller, an angle sensor mounted over the platform 2 for detecting angle between the knee?™s, a vertical bar 11 mounted over the platform 2 coupled with a belt 12 to hold thigh region of the leg, and a motorized sliding unit 13 fabricated between the vertical bar 11 and the platform 2 to provide stretching exercise to the user.

column2: ARM EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: An arm exercising device comprises of a frame 14 attach over ground surface viamultiple suction cups 3, an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 4 installed over frame 14 detect the user?™s height and accordingly tilt the upper portion 2, a user interface located within a computing unit permits user to enter input medical record and mode of operation, correspondingly microcontroller activates a holographic10 projection unit 6 installed over upper portion 2 to project a virtual image of user?™sposture, a C-shaped holding unit 7 mounted on upper portion 2 position user?™s arm, a spherical member 8 assembled on upper portion 2 provide grip to the user, a primary sliding arrangement 9 positioned on upper portion 2 provide movement to the member 8 pushed manually by the user, the microcontroller activates weighing15 plate 10 located on upper portion 2 through secondary sliding arrangement 11 forcarrying out exercise.

column2: TABLE TENNIS TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A table tennis training device comprising a telescopic rod 3 installed along an edge of a tennis table via a motorized slider 4 includes a primary 1 and secondary 2 chamber via a motorized ball and socket joint filled with plurality of table tennis balls 5, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 6 for decoding the user?™s height, a touch interactive display panel 7 for selecting a mode of training table tennis from a first and second mode, along with type of short to be practiced, and speed of launching of the ball 13, a hydraulic pusher 8 for launching the balls 5 towards the user via an opening carved on the primary chamber 1, a pair of rotating discs 9 for generating a centrifugal force by virtue of which the ball 13 is launched towards the user for enabling the user to practice the selected shot.

column2: FINGER EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a finger exercising device comprising of a body 1 fabricated with a multiple grooves 4 for a user to place fingers for exercise, an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 5 mapped to detect fingers of the user, a motorized sliding arrangement 6 installed to accommodate fingers, a sensing module 7 placed on the grooves 4 to sense pain experienced by the user, an inflatable spherical structure 8 positioned to support palm of the user, an inflating unit 9 attached to inflate the spherical structure 8, an elastic strap 10 attached to support the user at the wrist, a multiple telescopically operated supporting units 11 are installed via sliding rack 12 to provide support to fingers, the telescopically operated supporting units 11 are attached to rings 13 to place finger tips and a spraying unit 14 coupled with a container 15 to spray pain relief oil.

column2: POSTURE MAINTENANCE DEVICE
column4: A posture maintenance device, comprises of a platform 1 installed with multiplemotorized omnidirectional wheels 4 for providing movement to platform 1 over a ground surface, a cylindrical member 5 assembled via a pair of L-shaped telescopic rods 6 for enabling user to layover member 5 to perform back exercise, member 5 is constructed with multiple bearing arrangement 7 provides to and fro10 motion to member 5, an artificial intelligence imaging unit 8 captures andprocesses user to detect height of user, a telescopic rods 6 extends/ retract to position member 5 at an appropriate height and a touch interactive display panel 9 enables user to enter details regarding type of exercise user desires to perform and multiple pneumatically powered pins 9 configured over member 5 extends/retracts15 in such a manner that provides exercise to user in order to correct user?™s backposture.

column2: UNET NETWORK-BASED SUBFISSURE TOOTH CRACK IMAGE SEGMENTATION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a subfissure tooth crack image segmentation method based on a Unet network, and the method comprises the steps: S1, making a subfissure tooth, processing a healthy tooth through a temperature difference method, and generating a crack simulation subfissure tooth, S2, making a subfissure tooth semantic segmentation data set, and shooting a region with a crack on the surface of the tooth through an electron microscope, S3, marking the data set, and S4, carrying out the segmentation of the subfissure tooth crack image. A marked data set is put into a modified Unet for training, a Unet network is used, fusion of shallow features and deep features is carried out in a feature channel splicing mode, normal teeth are taken, hidden crack tooth cracks are simulated through a shock cooling and shock heating process, the normal teeth are cut into small pictures with the size of 256 * 256, and semantic-level pixel marking is carried out on the small pictures with cracks. According to the method, image processing is carried out through artificial intelligence, automatic identification and judgment of the crack are realized, segmentation of the crack of the subfissure tooth is realized, artificial participation is not needed, and the requirement for diagnosis experience of doctors is reduced.

column2: BASKETBALL SHOOTING TRAINING DEVICE WITH MUSCLE EXOSKELETON CONTROLLED BY ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a basketball shooting training device with muscle exoskeleton controlled by artificial intelligence, which comprises a human skeleton data acquisition device, an AI control device and a whole-body muscle exoskeleton device, and is characterized in that a shooting action database is arranged in the AI control device; the human body skeleton data acquisition device acquires the body skeleton size of a trainee and transmits the acquired data to the AI control device; the AI control device controls the whole-body muscle exoskeleton device in a wired or wireless mode and correspondingly deforms according to body skeleton size data of the trainee; the whole-body muscle exoskeleton device is attached to the whole body or the five fingers of a trainee to control the whole-body exercise training of the trainee, and assists or resists the trainee through the muscle exoskeleton telescopic unit to correct wrong actions. According to the device, the action specification stability is guaranteed through AI intelligent control, so that trainees can truly sense multiple exercise action specifications such as the amplitude, the speed and the strength of the actions, and the requirements of different trainees are met.

column2: SWIMMING TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A swimming training device, comprises of a platform 1 installed with a telescopically operated circular block 2 upon which user supposed to lie in an upside-down posture, an artificial intelligence image capturing module 3 capturing multiple images of user and compares captured images with pre-saved images stored data to fetch an expertise level for user, a holographic projector 4 projects an appropriate movement of hands and feet to be made by user for performing training, a pair of C shaped clamps 5 attached with platform 1 via pneumatically actuated bar 6 extend/retract followed by actuation of clamps to securely hold user over block 2, and four U-shaped clamp 7 installed with a telescopic rod 8 attached with platform 1 via a motorized slider 9 actuates rods 8 to extend/retract and synchronously actuates sliders 9 to continuously translate rod 8 in a back-and-forth direction, thereby assisting user in training.

column2: SOFTWARE TESTING PLATFORM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a software testing platform based on artificial intelligence, relates to the technical field of software testing, and solves the technical problem that in the prior art, when software is tested, a proper testing mode cannot be matched according to the real-time running state of the software. Therefore, a proper test method is matched for the performance test of the analysis object, the accuracy of the analysis object test is improved, and meanwhile, the working efficiency of software test can be improved by performing the test in a targeted manner; the performance test of the analysis object is matched with the test method, the accuracy of the software performance test is improved, meanwhile, the working efficiency of the software performance test can be improved by reasonably matching the performance test mode, the error of the performance test is reduced, and the reliability of the performance data is improved; the software is subjected to the reliability verification test, the reliability of the software is subjected to the verification test, and the software test accuracy is improved.

column2: MOBILITY ASSISTIVE EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: A mobility assistive exercising device, comprises of multiple number of slidablemember 1 installed within each other with limited mobility for allowing user to perform mobility exercise, a pair of holding units 2 installed on members 1 for providing firm grip to user, a pressure sensor 3 is integrated on holding units 2 for measuring pressure applied by user, , a scissor lift arrangement 5 assembled10 beneath platform 11 for lifting the user?™s body, an artificial intelligence basedimage capturing module 6 mounted on member 1 for monitoring user?™s movement, a touch interactive display panel 7 configured over member 1 for allowing user to enter their medical history and a vibration sensor 8 integrated over holding units 2 for detecting vibration in user?™s hands.

column2: TARGET USER LOCKING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: Embodiments of this application provide a target user locking method and an electronic device, and relate to the field of electronic devices. The method provided in this application may be applied to an artificial intelligence (artificial intelligence, AI) fitness scenario, and can ensure accuracy of locking a target user. The electronic device may recognize the target user and track the target user in a fitness process by using a method such as recognizing a user feature, recognizing the user with reference to data collected by a wearable device worn by the user, or recognizing a motion mode of the user.

column2: FITNESS-ASSISTED METHOD AND ELECTRONIC APPARATUS
column4: A method for assisting fitness in the field of artificial intelligence is provided, including: An electronic device obtains a user movement (S601); the electronic device determines from the user movement, a candidate movement in which a motion track of a first body part in the user movement meets a first preset condition (S602); the electronic device determines a movement change amplitude of a second body part in the candidate movement (S603); and the electronic device determines, based on the movement change amplitude, to output guidance information (S604). A candidate movement in which a motion track of a body part meets the first preset condition is determined, and it can be accurately determined, based on a movement change amplitude of a body part in the candidate movement, that the user performs a fitness movement. The guidance information is output when it is determined that the user performs the fitness movement, so that accuracy of the output guidance information can be improved, and user experience can be improved.

column2: CAMERA CONTROL METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND TERMINAL DEVICE
column4: This application provides a camera control method and apparatus and a terminal device, so as to enable a user to sense whether a camera is started, thereby effectively protecting privacy of the user. The camera control method includes: A terminal device obtains a first instruction input by a user, where the first instruction is used to play a movement tutorial in a first application in the terminal device. The terminal device controls, in response to the first instruction, a camera to start and pop up from the terminal device and to obtain an image including a user movement after the camera pops up from the terminal device, where the user movement is a movement made by the user by imitating the movement tutorial. The method, apparatus, and terminal device in the embodiments of this application may be applied to the artificial intelligence (artificial intelligence, AI) field, and more specifically, may be applied to the intelligent fitness field.

column2: DISTRIBUTION NETWORK GRAPH MODEL MANAGEMENT METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a distribution network graph and model management method and device, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the processing and analysis of a CAD graph and a CIM/G published graph through employing the artificial intelligence technologies, such as deep machine learning, image recognition, and the arrangement of elements, such as equipment, connection lines, and characters, automatically generating a structured picture description file of a distribution network wiring diagram, and carrying out the management of the distribution network wiring diagram. The method comprises the following steps: realizing conversion from a static picture to an on-line monitoring entity object, running through a graphic model importing and transaction updating process of a distribution network production management system on this basis, intelligently extracting a graphic layout of a CAD drawing used in daily work development, and carrying out grammar semantic verification and consistency verification on the basis of CIM/SVG graphs, so as to realize online monitoring of the distribution network production management system. Problems of attribute missing, association errors, connection line virtual connection and the like of graph and model data are automatically identified, the online maintenance efficiency and accuracy of the wiring diagram are improved, the service pain point of distribution network graph and model management is solved, and the intelligent level of distribution network graph and model operation and maintenance is improved.

column2: SYNTHETIC ENGINE FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: A method of orienting a human behavioral model to a problem context in an artificial intelligence algorithm includes instantiating pattern instances from a class hierarchy to generate executable objects, each binding autonomously with a data store and executing a completeness function for the binding. The bound executable objects are joined into a pattern instance graph autonomously operating as a deduction processor, and the behavioral model is oriented to the problem context by repeatedly evaluating a fit between the bound pattern instance graphs and the human behavioral model. Behavioral models are competitively executed against the bound pattern instances to compute levels of fitness for the models and assigning one of the models as a current controller based on the levels of fitness.

column2: JOB SCHEDULING METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT BASED ON REINFORCEMENT LEARNING
column4: The invention provides a job scheduling method, device and equipment based on reinforcement learning, and the method comprises the steps: inputting job information of different jobs into a deep neural network through a management node, and obtaining a job scheduling strategy and a calculation node queue related to each job; and scheduling and running each job according to a job scheduling strategy and the computing node queue, determining an evaluation parameter for evaluating the deep neural network according to the scheduling and running condition of each job, updating a model parameter in the deep neural network according to the evaluation parameter and an expected parameter set for each job, and calculating the operation of each job. Therefore, the job scheduling strategy is adjusted. It can be seen that by applying the technical scheme provided by the embodiment, the job scheduling strategy can be adaptively adjusted according to the expected parameters configured by the user, and the user does not need to consume tedious time to select the scheduling strategy, so that the job scheduling strategy can be adaptively adjusted, and the job scheduling efficiency can be improved.

column2: HUMAN BODY THREE-DIMENSIONAL MODEL GENERATION METHOD, EQUIPMENT AND DEVICE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a human body three-dimensional model generation method, equipment and device, and aims to improve the accuracy of a generated human body three-dimensional model. According to the embodiment of the invention, human body images of a target human body at multiple different visual angles are collected through a camera; according to the collected human body image and the shooting parameters of the camera, respectively obtaining human body point clouds in a camera coordinate space corresponding to the camera; global alignment is carried out on the human body point clouds corresponding to different visual angles to obtain point cloud data corresponding to the target human body; determining feature points of a preset human body position corresponding to the target human body according to the point cloud data corresponding to the target human body; measuring the target human body according to the feature points to obtain human body measurement parameters for representing the form of the target human body; and generating a human body three-dimensional model corresponding to the target human body according to the human body measurement parameters and the trained human body grid model.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE REPRESENTATION METHOD FOR DANCE EDITING KNOWLEDGE
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence representation method for dance editing knowledge, which relates to PDDL3.0, preferences supported by the PDDL3.0 allow people to describe preference characteristics of the people on target planning and design metrics for constraint, and finally, the preferences are met as much as possible in the solving process of a planner. The dance arrangement knowledge is embodied in that the process of studying how to design a dance better by a dance expert comprises the step of using a planner to obtain a planning solution according to preference and target solution, and the preference comprises rhythm preference, synchronous control, buffer synchronization, action coherence and action customization. The rhythm preference allows the user to select or directly define the speed, the middle and the slow of the dance rhythm according to the music information, so that the amplitude and the duration of the action can be conveniently adjusted according to the music characteristic information.

column2: IMAGE RECOGNITION METHOD OF DEEP PULSE NEURAL NETWORK BASED ON DYNAMIC THRESHOLD NEURONS
column4: The invention discloses an image recognition method of a deep pulse neural network based on dynamic threshold neurons, and belongs to the field of brain-like calculation and deep learning. The problems that when deep SNN is achieved through an existing DNN-to-SNN conversion technology, the pulse transmission rate is low, the issuing rate is low, and conversion precision is lost are solved. The implementation method comprises the following steps: firstly, training a DNN to obtain a weight and storing the weight; then, on the basis of a DNN-to-SNN conversion method, an activation function ReLU in the DNN is converted into an IF neuron with a dynamic threshold value in the SNN, and the weight of the DNN is normalized and mapped to the SNN; and finally, simulating and running the SNN, and calculating the threshold value of each neuron in each time step. The method is suitable for the artificial intelligence fields of image classification and recognition, target recognition and tracking and the like, the pulse transmission rate can be increased, the pulse distribution rate can be increased, information transmission can be accelerated, and meanwhile conversion loss can be reduced.

column2: AUDIO-VISUAL-HEAT INTEGRATED ANOMALY DETECTION DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence-based sound, vision and heat integrated anomaly detection device, which comprises a sliding frame, a lead screw is arranged on the inner side of the sliding frame, the outer wall of the sliding frame is connected with a connecting sliding block in a sliding manner, a sound detector is arranged at the top of the sliding frame, and a storage battery is arranged at the top of the connecting sliding block. According to the device, the sliding frame and the lead screw which can be installed in the workshop are arranged, the motor drives the lead screw to push the connecting sliding block to transversely move, and therefore the camera shooting mechanism on the connecting sliding block is driven to synchronously transversely move together, and the camera shooting mechanism can be charged through the charging base and the storage battery; according to the invention, the camera shooting mechanism in motion does not need to be electrically connected through a long line, the outer connecting frame can be controlled to swing up and down through a worm and a worm gear, the detection range is expanded, and when abnormity occurs in a workshop, a fault area can be illuminated through a headlamp, so that maintenance personnel can conveniently and quickly find an incident position.

column2: ELEVATOR FLOOR DISPLAY ABNORMITY IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an elevator floor display abnormity recognition method and device and a computer readable storage medium. When it is detected that the running speed and/or acceleration are/is abnormal, an image detection sample is obtained, a floor display detection model conducts target detection on the image detection sample, whether an elevator runs abnormally or not is judged, and when it is judged that the elevator runs abnormally, the elevator floor display abnormity is recognized. And intelligent interaction equipment of the elevator is controlled to play a pacifying video and/or display annular information in the elevator, and elevator abnormal information is continuously sent to maintenance personnel. According to the system, the Internet of Things technology, artificial intelligence and big data technology are adopted, 24-hour online monitoring of an elevator is achieved through the camera installed in the elevator car, when it is judged that an elevator floor is abnormal, elevator abnormal information is continuously sent to maintenance personnel, and when it is monitored that people exist in the elevator car, the maintenance personnel can be timely monitored. Furthermore, the voice set in advance is utilized to prompt pacifying or play pacifying videos, so that the unsafe psychology of passengers is reduced, and secondary accidents are reduced.

column2: NON-INVASIVE SPECIAL BRAIN-COMPUTER INTERFACE DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a non-invasive special brain-computer interface device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the device comprises a central processing unit which is used for connecting a brain-computer interface and processing brain neuron electric signals through a neural network algorithm; the signal processing unit is used for converting the cerebral cortex electric signal into a digital signal which can be identified by a computer; the digital circuit unit is used for assisting the signal processing unit to convert the electric signal into a digital signal; the data storage unit is used for providing a running memory and storing program data; the universal interface control unit is used for providing an interface for cerebral cortex neuron connection; the protocol control unit is used for assisting the chip to complete the function; the external equipment interface unit is used for providing function mapping of the GPIO interface; and the encryption and decryption unit is used for developing and debugging the chip and encrypting and decrypting a chip program. According to the non-invasive brain-computer interface based on the RISC-V architecture, decoding of brain information can be realized without surgical invasion.

column2: FISH IDENTIFICATION DATA AUGMENTATION METHOD AND FISH IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides a fish identification data augmentation method and a fish identification method and system, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence in order to solve the problems that in the prior art, fish identification is complex in implementation mode and poor in flexibility. The fish identification data augmentation method comprises the following steps: acquiring an underwater environment image; acquiring a first fish image of the clear water underwater scene and converting the first fish image into a second fish image; and performing image fusion to generate a third fish image. According to the fish identification method, the augmented third fish image is used for training to obtain a final fish identification model, and the final fish identification model is marked. The fish identification system comprises an image acquisition module, a training data augmentation module and the like. According to the data augmentation method, the public data set including different scenes can be quickly established, the precision of the fish identification model is improved, the implementation mode is simple, and the flexibility is extremely high. According to the fish identification method and system, rapid and automatic labeling can be realized, and the number of times of model iteration in engineering deployment is reduced.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND DEEP LEARNING (DL) APPROACH BASED FRUIT IDENTIFICATION AND CALORIE ESTIMATION BY USING CNN ALGORITHMS
column4: Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning (DL) approach based fruit identification and calorie estimation by using CNN algorithms Abstract: Fruits are high in vitamins, minerals, and fiber, all of which are essential for good health. Consuming a variety of fruits and vegetables can reduce your risk of developing cancer, diabetes, and heart disease. The CNN algorithm is used to recognise fruits in this paper. This is a positive type of acknowledgement. If you want to know how many calories are in a food, you'll need to consult a nutrition table and a model trained on images of various fruits. The raspberry pi's webcam allows it to capture images of what's going on in front of it. Image detection is one of the most promising claims of visual object recognition when it comes to determining how many calories you need to eat and changing your eating habits. The nutrition our bodies require is provided by the food we eat. We can end up with a wide range of health problems if we don't get enough precise information about our metabolic progress and fitness decline. Simply put, we believe that proper nutrition is critical to our health. According to some recent research, people who don't get enough food may struggle with a variety of issues. Scientists used to believe that diseases like diabetes and obesity were caused by a single change in a single gene. They now believe that a faulty system of living things is to blame. Because of this project, there will be better ways to keep people's fitness levels up or down. It is designed to meet the needs of patients and users.

column2: INTELLIGENT ANTI-PINCH METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT FOR AUTOMATIC DOOR AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses an intelligent anti-pinch method for an automatic door, which comprises the following steps: when the closing time is up, shooting images according to a preset time interval, and carrying out physical detection on the images; when it is detected that a preset number of the images of the real objects exist, taking the detected images of the real objects as target images, and performing real object similarity identification on the target images; when the similarity is greater than a similarity threshold value, generating a motion trail according to the position of a real object in the target image, when the preset closing time reaches a time threshold value, extracting an infrared thermal induction detection result under the time threshold value, and judging whether a door clamping risk exists according to the infrared thermal induction detection result and the motion trail; and when the door clamping danger exists, safety early warning is started. The invention further provides an intelligent anti-pinch device for the automatic door, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The safety when the automatic door is closed and the accuracy of starting door clamping early warning can be guaranteed.

column2: METHOD FOR ESTABLISHING SKULL ANATOMICAL STRUCTURE DATABASE
column4: The invention discloses a skull anatomical structure database establishment method, which is characterized by comprising the following steps of: 1, reconstructing and printing a normal person and case skull model; 2, reconstructing brain tissues, calculating corresponding brain volumes, and recording, classifying, matching and filing; 3, particularly performing three-dimensional multi-plane reconstruction and surface reconstruction based on a skeleton threshold range on a to-be-cut replacement or bone defect part of the case skull; and 4, forming a complete database containing two types of skull anatomical structures of normal persons and cases. According to the skull anatomical structure database establishment method, directories are established for storage classification and processing identification and matching of different samples, artificial intelligence learning is facilitated, three-dimensional multi-plane reconstruction and surface reconstruction are performed, and an artificial intelligence convolutional neural network algorithm can be matched; and the patient part with the maximum feature attribute is extracted, so that deep calculation such as subsequent design of a convolutional layer is facilitated, and the recognition efficiency and effect are better.

column2: DEVELOPMENT METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) MODEL
column4: A development method and apparatus for an artificial intelligence (AI) model. The method comprises: splitting an AI model to obtain a plurality of split results, each split result in the plurality of split results comprising a plurality of first sub-models, each first sub-model in the plurality of first sub-models corresponding to at least one processor in M processors, M being a positive integer greater than 1, and each first sub-model being capable of running on the corresponding at least one processor, such that each split result has a running overhead for running a plurality of first sub-models (210); determining a first split result in the plurality of split results, a first running overhead of the first split result being less than a second running overhead of one or more second split results in the plurality of split results (220); and outputting the first split result (230). When the AI model is deployed on a device comprising M processors according to the first split result, the efficiency of deploying the AI model on the device can be improved, and the running overhead of the AI model on the device can be reduced.

column2: METHOD FOR PREDICTING MAXIMAL OXYGEN UPTAKE IN WEARABLE DEVICES
column4: A method for predicting maximal oxygen uptake (VO2Max) in wearable devices with memory restriction using ensemble of machine learning algorithms is described. The method is related to the fields of well-being, healthcare and artificial intelligence, and includes a technique that predicts maximal oxygen uptake (VO2Max) in running sessions at different paces using wearable devices with memory restriction. The proposed method requires less than 5 KB of memory to run on a wearable device. Specifically, equipped of user's profile data (age, gender, height and weight), a set of heart rate (HR) and speed readings of a running session, the method is able to estimate VO2Max.

column2: METHOD, APPARATUS, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, STORAGE MEDIUM, AND COMPUTER PROGRAM FOR RECOGNIZING VEHICLE PARKING VIOLATION
column4:
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a method, apparatus, electronic device, storage medium, and computer program for recognizing vehicle parking violation, which relate to the field of artificial intelligence and, in particular, to the fields of deep learning, cloud computing, computer vision, etc.
SOLUTION: Specific solution means realized herein comprises: obtaining video images collected by an electronic device; recognizing a parking area of a vehicle in the video images; determining a shooting angle to be used by the electronic device for collecting the video images; determining an illegal parking area in the video images based on the shooting angle; and recognizing whether or not the vehicle is illegally parked based on the parking area of the vehicle and the illegal parking area.
SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

column2: DISCONTINUOUS RECEPTION METHOD, RELATED DEVICE, AND SYSTEM
column4: This application relates to a discontinuous reception method. In the first time unit, for example, the first symbol, after a hybrid automatic repeat request HARQ feedback occasion of a sidelink HARQ process, a first terminal may start a drx-HARQ-RTT-TimerSL and start a drx-RetransmissionTimerSL when the drx-HARQ-RTT-TimerSL expires. During running of the drx-RetransmissionTimerSL, the first terminal monitors a physical downlink control channel. In this way, sidelink retransmission efficiency can be improved, an increase of a sidelink retransmission delay can be avoided, and sidelink-based applications, such as unmanned driving, automatic driving, assisted driving, intelligent driving, networked driving, intelligent networked driving, and car sharing in the field of artificial intelligence can be better supported.

column2: INTELLIGENT VIDEO RECORDING METHOD AND APPARATUS
column4: This application relates to a computer vision technology in the field of artificial intelligence. A video shooting method includes: enabling a camera application on a terminal (for example, a mobile phone); and in a slow-motion video recording mode of the camera application, when a motion detection function of the camera application is enabled: starting to capture video frames after a video recording instruction input by a user is detected; recording a second video frame set at a first frame rate automatically when a motion of a human body in a captured first video frame set is a preset motion; and generating a target video, wherein the target video includes a slow-motion video clip, and the slow-motion video clip includes some video frames in the second video frame set. When the motion of the human body is a first preset motion, duration for playback of the slow-motion video clip at a first playback speed is first duration; when the motion of the human body is a second preset motion, the duration for playback of the slow-motion video clip at the first playback speed is second duration; the first preset motion is different from the second preset motion; and the first duration is different from the second duration.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS OF RECOGNIZING ILLEGAL PARKING OF VEHICLE, DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: Provided are a method and an apparatus of recognizing illegal parking of a vehicle, a device, a storage medium and a computer program product, which relate to the field of artificial intelligence, and in particular to the fields of deep learning, cloud computing, computer vision, etc. The method includes: obtaining a video image collected by an electronic device; recognizing a parking area of the vehicle in the video image; determining a shooting angle used by the electronic device for collecting the video image; determining an illegal parking area in the video image based on the shooting angle; and recognizing whether the vehicle is illegally parked or not based on the parking area of the vehicle and the illegal parking area. -

column2: AI TRAINER SYSTEM WITH ROWING MOTION POSTURE AUTOMATIC ERROR CORRECTION FUNCTION
column4: The invention discloses an AI trainer system with a rowing motion posture automatic error correction function, and belongs to the field of fitness equipment. The trainer system provided by the invention comprises the rowing machine, the posture detection device and the posture error correction reminding device, and can help a user to take exercises better through rowing speed control, rowing posture detection and error correction reminding of a sporter, avoid wrong postures and methods in the use process, and improve the training efficiency. The injury caused by improper training postures is avoided, the risk of the user in the use process is reduced, and a better fitness effect is achieved. The training machine system can realize automatic error correction through artificial intelligence, so that the training machine system can be used without a coach, the use threshold of the rowing machine is greatly reduced, and meanwhile, the training cost is also reduced.

column2: PRINTING DEFECT DETECTION MODEL AND PRINTING DEFECT DETECTION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a printing defect detection model and a printing defect detection method, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, two multi-scale skeleton networks with the same structure are utilized, semantic feature maps of a reference image Iref and a to-be-detected image Idet are extracted at the same time, and according to a plurality of semantic feature maps of the reference image Iref and a plurality of semantic feature maps of the to-be-detected image Idet, a printing defect detection result is obtained. And calculating the similarity between the reference image Iref and the to-be-detected image Idet, and judging whether the to-be-detected image Idet has the printing defect according to the similarity, so that the defect existing in the printed matter can be effectively detected, the detection performance is improved, manual marking is not needed when the printing defect detection model is trained, the training cost is greatly reduced, and the printing defect detection efficiency is improved. During use, debugging by professionals is not needed, and usability is improved.

column2: BOTANY INTELLIGENT TEACHING INSTRUMENT
column4: The utility model discloses a botany intelligent teaching instrument, and belongs to the field of botany artificial intelligence. Comprising a three-dimensional planter (1), an interaction screen (7) and a plant growth detection system, the three-dimensional planter (1) comprises a plant lamp (2), a plant table (3) and a supply disc (4); the plant growth detection system comprises an automatic control panel (5) and a shooting device (6); plants are planted in the three-dimensional planters, and the plant growth detection system controls the growth environment of the plants in the three-dimensional planters and monitors the growth state of the plants in the three-dimensional planters under the control of the interactive screen and feeds back a growth rotary table to the interactive screen; and the interactive screen can be used for man-machine interaction, setting a plant growth environment, displaying a plant growth state and presetting extended reading data. The automatic control panel controls the plant environment, and the shooting device collects the plant growth state. According to the utility model, the system is naturally moved into a classroom, and a user carries out planting independently or under guidance and directly participates in the whole natural growth process of plants, so that an online and offline fused situational teaching platform is created.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED MICROSCOPIC ROCK AND ORE IMAGE RECOGNITION METHOD
column4: The invention provides a microscopic rock and ore image recognition method based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the field of rock and ore identification in mineral exploration, and the method comprises the steps: firstly, carrying out the data collection of an ore specimen, and shooting an image under a microscope; secondly, according to the characteristics of different minerals under a microscope, carrying out preliminary category division and classification through manual observation; then, enhancing and processing the acquired image data, and creating a training set and a test set; and finally, training and testing by using a U-net convolutional neural network, and calculating the mineral content and the recognition accuracy. The method can effectively improve the efficiency of rock and ore identification under the microscope, can effectively avoid human subjective interference and reduce the labor cost based on the artificial intelligence identification method, is suitable for automatic identification of large-batch rock and ore samples, and has great significance in research of deep earth crust structures and realization of accurate delineation of ore bodies. And technical support is provided for rock and ore classification in mine production.

column2: MODE SWITCHING METHOD AND DEVICE OF AUTOMATIC DRIVING SYSTEM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a mode switching method and device of an automatic driving system and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an unmanned driving technology. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a mode switching instruction through a mode switching monitoring component; according to the mode switching instruction, a mode switching request is sent to a mode switching service component of a target process in the at least two processes through a mode switching monitoring component, and the mode switching request comprises a target mode; and controlling a component running in the target process to be switched from a first component corresponding to the current mode to a second component corresponding to the target mode through the mode switching service component. The method can be applied to mode switching of the distributed automatic driving system.

column2: ONLINE MONITORING METHOD FOR LOADABLE WEIGHT OF FORKLIFT TIRE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a forklift tire bearable weight online monitoring method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a plurality of groups of distance information in real time through an infrared distance sensor in a tire operation process; performing noise preprocessing on the distance data by using a wavelet denoising algorithm; five pieces of small distance data are obtained through a minimum value search algorithm and serve as height data; compensating the height data by using a multi-layer BP neural network algorithm to obtain the highest height accurate value from the infrared distance sensor to the ground in the running process of the tire; and matching the obtained maximum height accurate value with a wear expert database to obtain the current maximum loadable weight of the tire, storing the current maximum loadable weight in Flash, and uploading loadable weight data to a vehicle control master controller through Bluetooth to be stored as historical data. According to the data processing method integrating the wavelet denoising algorithm and the multilayer BP neural network, the distance measurement precision is effectively improved, an expert database is introduced, and real-time on-line detection of the bearable weight is achieved.

column2: TARGET USER LOCKING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: The embodiments of the present application provide a target user locking method and an electronic device, relating to the field of electronic devices. Said method provided in the present application can be applied to an artificial intelligence (AI) fitness scene, and can ensure the accuracy of target user locking. The electronic device can complete the identification of a target user and the tracking of the target user during fitting by means of methods such as identifying user features, or identifying the user in combination with data acquired by a wearable device worn by the user, or identifying the user's motion mode.

column2: RAIL TRANSIT FAULT DETECTION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of safety monitoring, and particularly relates to a rail transit fault detection system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a cloud big data center and a detection unit, the cloud big data center comprises an analysis unit, a comparison unit, a processing unit and a database, the analysis unit is used for analyzing and classifying the detection data, the comparison unit is used for processing and comparing the detection data and giving a detection result, and the processing unit makes a processing action according to the detection result; the detection unit comprises displacement sensors, and the displacement sensors are installed on a track along a fixed interval and used for monitoring the position offset of spikes on the track; data collected by the detection unit are processed and compared through artificial intelligence, the states of the track and the train are obtained in time, workers are informed of processing through the processing unit, and the running safety and stability of the train are improved.

column2: DATA QUERY METHOD BASED ON SEMANTIC ANALYSIS AND RELATED EQUIPMENT THEREOF
column4: The embodiment of the invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, is applied to the field of smart communities, and relates to a semantic analysis-based data query method and related equipment thereof.The semantic analysis-based data query method comprises the steps of receiving voice inquiry data, and converting the voice inquiry data into text data; inputting the text data into a pre-trained intention recognition model to obtain intention information, and performing information extraction operation on the text data based on a pre-trained word vector conversion model to obtain target information; and generating a query statement according to the intention information and the target information, and running the query statement in a database to obtain result data. Wherein the result data can be stored in the block chain. The data query efficiency and accuracy are improved.

column2: SOFTWARE OPERATION OPTIMIZATION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND BIG DATA, AND CLOUD PLATFORM
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a software operation optimization method and system based on artificial intelligence and big data, and a cloud platform, and can analyze a software operation state data unit between a software operation strategy mode and a software operation strategy project, and determine a target state data subunit corresponding to a software operation optimization skeleton point. And according to a preset number of software operation state data units associated with software operation in the target state data subunit with the software operation evaluation tag as the guidance optimization tag, judging whether the software operation state data unit of the software operation strategy project needs guidance optimization or not. Whether the software operation state data unit of the software operation strategy project needs to be guided and optimized or not can be judged without configuring the software operation strategy feature information of the software operation strategy project in advance.

column2: A SYSTEM FOR A WEARABLE ANKLE REHABILITATION ROBOT AND A METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to a wearable ankle rehabilitation robot (10) system and a method thereof, wherein said rehabilition robot system has a hardware structure that allows the physical therapy and rehabilitation processes of the ankles of partially or fully paralyzed patients, especially cerebral palsy, to be remotely controlled via interface devices (30) such as mobile devices or data processing devices, which is suitable for home care services. The present invention provides a wearable ankle rehabilitation robot (10) system and method thereof, wherein said robot is capable of performing ankle dorsiflexion and plantar flexion movements, is adjustable according to the limb size of a person, is able to determine the muscle degree by making artificial intelligence-based evaluation by the exercise modes where measurements are made with EMG and force sensors (13), capable of performing passive stretching, active assisted, active resistance, isometric (fixed ankle joint angle, variable resistance), isotonic (variable ankle joint angle, fixed resistance) and other exercises according to rehabilitation theory by means of the present invention.

column2: MINIATURE APPLICATION EDGE CONTROLLER
column4: The utility model discloses a miniature application edge controller, comprising a CPU resource distribution module which comprises a dual-core processor, a coprocessor, a control program based on a ladder diagram, a running gateway, a large platform application program and an artificial intelligence program; the system comprises an application store core module, the application store core module is in signal connection with a gateway core module, a ladder diagram analysis core module and a cloud service module, the gateway core module is in signal connection with a third-party controller through a protocol conversion signal, the ladder diagram analysis core module is in signal connection with an IO connection point, and the IO connection point is in signal connection with a controlled device. According to the utility model, the control of field equipment is realized, the cost for purchasing the software on site can be avoided, meanwhile, the application software can directly obtain data on the edge controller, the real-time performance is high, the gateway function is realized, and the device can be directly connected with hundreds of third-party control layer equipment to obtain data.

column2: VISUAL MAP UPDATING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a method and device for updating a visual map in an augmented reality scene, electronic equipment and a medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical fields of computer vision, image processing, augmented reality and the like. According to the implementation scheme, a plurality of reference images shot by the mobile terminal in a first scene are determined, and the first scene has a corresponding visual map; in response to determining that at least one reference image in the plurality of reference images is not matched with the visual map, determining pose information of the mobile terminal when shooting the at least one reference image; and updating the visual map at least based on the at least one reference image and the pose information corresponding to the at least one reference image.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR DETERMINING REAL-TIME RUNNING ROUTE OF VEHICLE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a method, device and equipment for determining a real-time running route of a vehicle and a storage medium, and relates to the artificial intelligence technology, in particular to the technical field of intelligent traffic. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a preorder track of each vehicle in real time; for each vehicle, determining a real-time running route of the vehicle according to the preorder track of the vehicle and a pre-obtained mapping set; wherein the mapping set comprises a first mapping relation or a second mapping relation obtained by aggregating the line number and the identification of the vehicle according to the historical track information of each vehicle, the first mapping relation is mapping between the line number and the line, and the second mapping relation is mapping between the identification of the vehicle and the line. According to the scheme, the real-time running route of the vehicle is determined, and the accuracy of the determined real-time running route is improved.

column2: COMPUTER VISION TASK PROCESSING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of computers, and particularly discloses a computer vision task processing method and system based on artificial intelligence. According to the embodiment of the invention, a visual task processing permission and a visual task starting gesture are obtained; when the visual task starting gesture is recognized, starting a computer visual task processing mode; performing user action extraction to obtain real-time user action shooting data; and performing action analysis to obtain action analysis data, matching a computer control signal, and performing task control on the computer according to the computer control signal. On the basis of artificial intelligence and computer vision technologies, a computer vision task processing mode is started by shooting a user in real time and identifying a vision task starting gesture, and a computer control signal is matched by performing action extraction and action analysis on the user, so that task control is performed on a computer; therefore, the computer tasks can be switched and controlled under the condition that a mouse and a keyboard are inconvenient to use.

column2: SPEECH RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON MACHINE LEARNING, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a speech recognition method based on machine learning, which comprises the following steps: pre-selecting a basic network suitable for speech recognition to form a super network space containing different candidate networks, forming a first network model for the different candidate networks in the super network space, training and evaluating the first network model input with the voice sample by adopting a neural network search framework to obtain the fitness of the candidate network, selecting the candidate network with the highest fitness from the first network model by using an evolutionary algorithm to form a second network model, and retraining the second network model for the voice sample to obtain a second network model; and constructing a speech recognition model, inputting the target speech segment into the speech recognition model for recognition, and obtaining a text representation mapped by the target speech segment. According to the invention, the candidate network can be evaluated by using the weight sharing mechanism in the training process, the appropriate network model can be found more accurately, and the voice recognition effect of the network model is improved.

column2: MOTION PLAN PLANNING METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT BASED ON BIG DATA ANALYSIS AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a motion plan planning method based on big data analysis, which comprises the following steps: segmenting a motion video sequence in a human motion video sequence into rectangular blocks, taking a search window as the center of the rectangular blocks, selecting a plurality of initial search points at the center of the rectangular blocks according to a search step length, performing three-step search processing in the rectangular block based on the plurality of initial search points to obtain a plurality of standard search points, selecting a compressed video sequence determined by the plurality of standard search points in the rectangular block, and extracting human skeleton data features in the compressed video sequence; a motion analysis model is obtained through big data construction and training, human skeleton data features are analyzed based on the motion analysis model, a motion analysis result is obtained, and a motion plan is planned. The invention further provides an exercise plan planning device based on big data analysis, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. According to the invention, the problem of low efficiency of exercise plan planning can be solved.

column2: MICRO-CONTROL EQUALIZING BEAM DIGITAL AUTOMATIC MAGNETIC PARTICLE FLAW DETECTOR
column4: The invention provides a digital automatic magnetic particle flaw detector for a micro-control equalizing beam, which is designed by adopting a horizontal structure, mechanical and electrical integration, an integrated circuit and closed-loop digital control. The device is mainly composed of a rack, a liquid collecting tank, an air cylinder, a rotating shaft, a left electrode box, a longitudinal magnetizing coil, a mechanical lifting device, a right electrode box, a mechanical arm, a balance beam workpiece, a workpiece bracket, an electric control cabinet and a camera. The machine not only can perform circumferential or longitudinal independent magnetization, but also can perform circumferential and longitudinal composite magnetization, has the characteristics of high sensitivity, fast response, digitalization, omnibearing magnetization of workpieces, uniform distribution of a magnetic field, high stability, no leak detection and the like, avoids the risk of missed and misjudged, can automatically give an alarm when a fault occurs, can automatically display the position of the fault on a display screen, and is convenient to operate. The maintenance is convenient. The machine is provided with a camera shooting automatic identification system, the automation degree is high, a new field of artificial intelligence is developed for the flaw detection machine industry in China, and the running safety of the railway train is effectively guaranteed.

column2: TOF CAMERA POINT CLOUD DENSIFICATION METHOD, TOF CAMERA POINT CLOUD DENSIFICATION DEVICE, TOF CAMERA POINT CLOUD DENSIFICATION EQUIPMENT AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
