column4: The embodiment of the invention belongs to the technical field of image processing and artificial intelligence, and relates to a TOF camera point cloud densification method, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the shooting data of a TOF camera at each angle, obtaining the angle value of the TOF camera at each angle, measured by an angle limiting stopper, calculating the original three-dimensional coordinates of each angle, and obtaining the point cloud of the TOF camera. According to built-in parameters of the camera and the resolution data, calculating the inherent space angle resolution of each pixel at the original position, and according to the angle resolution, calculating the angle of each pixel in each row relative to the position of the main point of the camera at the row position; and calculating a new three-dimensional coordinate of the rotating TOF camera in the original position coordinate system according to the angle of each pixel and the original three-dimensional coordinate. The invention further provides a TOF camera point cloud densification device and equipment and a readable storage medium. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the point cloud data can be stored in a block chain. According to the invention, sparse point cloud densification is completed.

column2: INTELLIGENT WAREHOUSING AND CARRYING ROBOT SYSTEM CAPABLE OF AUTOMATICALLY BALANCING AND STABILIZING LOAD
column4: The invention provides an intelligent warehousing transfer robot system capable of automatically balancing and stabilizing load, which comprises a robot body, the top of the robot body is connected with a cylinder, and the surface of the cylinder is equidistantly connected with a plurality of rotatable storage mechanisms. Goods are placed on the two sides of the rotatable storage mechanism, so that the goods are conveniently carried through the robot body, and the control device controls the rotatable storage mechanism to rotate, so that the mass of the goods on the two sides of the top of the robot body is close; then the control device controls the leveling mechanism to adjust the mass of goods on the two sides of the top of the robot body to be equal, and when the robot body is emergently braked in the running process, stability of the robot body and the goods can be guaranteed, and the robot body and the goods are effectively prevented from toppling over; and the stability of the robot body during emergency braking can be further improved through the stabilizing mechanism, and the robot body and the goods are further prevented from toppling over.

column2: LAWN TENNIS TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A lawn tennis training device comprising an elongated body 1 utilized for enabling a user to train lawn tennis, multiple motorized omnidirectional wheels 2 via telescopically operated rods 3 for moving over a surface in various directions, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 4 for capturing multiple images of user and decoding height of the user and accordingly actuates the rods 3, a touch interactive display panel 5 for selecting an expertise level, type of shot to be practiced, and time elapse between consecutive shots, wherein based on the selected type of shot, a ball storage chamber 6 filled with plurality of the tennis balls 7, a hydraulic pusher installed with the chamber 6 for dispensing one of the balls 7, a shaft 8 having a pair of rackets 9 for launching the ball towards the user to allowing the user to train lawn tennis in an appropriate manner.

column2: LEG EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: A leg exercising device comprises of a first and second portion 2, 3, an inlet 4 erected at first portion 2 for enabling user to enter within housing 1, a touch interactive display panel 5 positioned within second portion 3 of housing 1 for allowing user to enter their details, an artificial intelligence based imaging unit 6 mounted within housing 1 for capturing user?™s images, a telescopically powered T-shaped structure 7 configured with horizontal rod 8 to allow user to perform first-type of exercise, a pair of wearable body 9 configured on primary-platform mapped within housing 1 via pair of sliding arrangement 11 for accommodating user?™s foot, a C-shaped clamping unit 12 assembled with rope-pulley arrangement 13 installed on housing 1 for fastening user?™s heel portion and a motorized roller 14 having multiple pins 15 mapped on secondary-platform for allowing user to place their calf portion.

column2: MODEL QUANTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE, TERMINAL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a model quantification method and device, a terminal and a storage medium, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an original image acquired by a shooting assembly; in response to the change of the shooting scene identified based on the original image, determining a target quantization parameter of a first image processing model in the current shooting scene, the first image processing model being used for processing the original image to improve the image quality of the original image; and updating the original quantization parameter of the first image processing model to the target quantization parameter. Compared with image processing by using an image processing model with a fixed quantization parameter, the quantization parameter is dynamically adjusted based on different shooting scenes, so that the optimization quality of the image processing model in different scenes is improved, and the quality of the image processed by the model is improved.

column2: MACHINE LEARNING AND EMBEDDED TECHNOLOGY BASED FOOD SERVING ROBOT
column4: AbstractFood production, handling, packing, transportation, planning, security, and food administration are all examples of modern activity in the food sector. The food business is sometimes seen as low-tech, although as assessed by its R&D to transaction ratio, it has recently become more innovative.Artificial intelligence robots are being employed all over the world. These robots, which were developed utilizing cutting-edge technology and Artificial Intelligence advancements, are designed to be utilized for human-focused development, perceiving humans, also, answering human feelings.The future of social robots that can interact with humans seems promising. There are now available housekeeping robots, friendliness robots, drink producing robots, pharmaceutical robots, table tennis trainers, and other sorts of robots. Despite advances in mechanical technology and automation, a few measures must be performed to fulfil the need for computerizing diverse food sector assembly processes.As far as we can tell, these issues are: the development of automated end-effectors that can adapt to a wide variety of food items while remaining cost-effective, the recognition of food items and materials in 3D situations, and a better understanding of primary data of food items from the perspective of mechanical care.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-ENABLED GOLF COURSE
column4: A system for monitoring and recording and processing an activity includes one or more cameras for automatically recording video of the activity. A processor and memory associated and in communication with the camera is disposed near the location of the activity. The system may include AI logic configured to identify a user recorded within a video frame captured by the camera. The system may also detect and identify a user when the user is located within a predetermined area. The system may include a video processing engine configured to process images within the video frame to identify the user and may modify and format the video upon identifying the user and the activity. The system may include a communication module to communicate formatted video to a remote video processing system, which may further process the video and enable access to a mobile app of the user.

column2: BIRD CERTIFICATE IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention belongs to the technical field of image processing in artificial intelligence, and relates to a birth certificate identification method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the target birth certificate information of the user can be stored in a block chain. According to the method, the image correction is performed on the initial birth certificate image to obtain the standard intermediate birth certificate image, then the text recognition is performed on the corrected intermediate birth certificate image to obtain the initial birth certificate information, and finally the real semantic information of the initial birth certificate information is obtained through the semantic recognition model. Therefore, interference factors such as different illumination, shooting angles and different backgrounds are effectively prevented from affecting the birth certificate recognition accuracy, further, real semantic information is recognized through the semantic recognition model, the situation that text content connection is incorrect due to the serial situation and the like is effectively avoided, and the birth certificate recognition accuracy is further improved.

column2: ELEVATOR OPERATION CONTROL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an elevator operation control management system based on artificial intelligence. Comprising an elevator operation control terminal setting module, an elevator operation speed regulation and control module, an elevator taking overload monitoring prompt module, an elevator taking subject recognition module, a taking subject dangerous state analysis module, a taking subject dangerous state voice prompt module, a dangerous taking state storage library, a control database and an emergency braking processing end. A human body infrared sensor and a thermal infrared imager are used for sensing a human body and analyzing the personnel gathering density, and a human body area environment image and an object area environment image are further obtained through area environment images, collected by an intelligent camera, of all steps, so that the danger level is obtained according to the human body area environment image; and corresponding emergency braking operation is carried out according to the danger level. In this way, the safety and reliability of elevator running are improved, and time errors caused by manual emergency braking operation in emergency situations are effectively avoided.

column2: LASER ROTARY TABLE CAMERA
column4: The utility model belongs to the technical field of three-dimensional reconstruction, and particularly relates to a laser rotary table camera which is characterized in that after the laser rotary table camera is started, a background system of a laser camera main control circuit starts to be loaded, and the main control circuit starts a lens module and a laser range finder by sending starting signals to the lens module and the laser range finder; a user sends a shooting instruction to the main control circuit through the user terminal, and the main control circuit controls the lens module and the laser range finder to execute a shooting action according to the shooting instruction, receives an image signal sent by the lens module, receives a laser signal sent by the laser range finder, and receives an illumination signal output by the photosensitive sensor. And then the background of the main control circuit generates a panoramic image signal through an algorithm, and outputs the panoramic image signal to the screen board. Therefore, the background system of the laser camera can be quickly started, the panoramic image signal is output in combination with the collected laser signal and the plane image signal, so that the three-dimensional model is directly generated according to the panoramic image signal subsequently, and the measurement precision of the laser camera is improved.

column2: POSTURE ANALYSIS SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of posture analysis, in particular to an artificial intelligence-based posture analysis system, which comprises a storage module, a comparison module and an acquisition module, the storage module comprises a computer and a notebook computer; the computer is used for recording personal information of personnel, and the notebook computer is used for recording each exercise type and exercise amount and then registering the exercise types and exercise amount in the computer; the acquisition module comprises an electronic scale, a body scanning device and a height weighing ruler; the body weight and the body contour of each stage are input into the storage module through the acquisition module and recorded in personal information, and the electronic scale and the body scanning device are communicated with the computer through USB data lines; according to the shape contour comparison method, a camera is adopted to shoot a human body contour picture, a shape contour picture is cut out through picture processing software, a previous shape contour line picture is placed on a white bottom layer with a grid, then the shape contour picture and the previous shape contour line picture are overlapped and laid, and the contour protrusion/depression amount is checked.

column2: POLE-CLIMBING ROBOT WITH SELF-WALKING FUNCTION
column4: The utility model is suitable for the technical field of pole-climbing robots, and provides a pole-climbing robot with a self-walking function, which comprises a first box body, a second box body, a clamping mechanism and an inserting mechanism, the second box body is in threaded insertion connection with one side of the first box body, the clamping mechanism is fixedly connected with one side of the outer surface of the first box body, and the insertion connection mechanism is fixedly connected with the other side of the outer surface of the first box body; tools needing to be delivered can be placed in the second box body through a storage opening, a third motor is started until the two climbing wheels and the second box body can clamp the rod type building sufficiently, then a first motor is started until the two climbing wheels can adapt to the width of the rod type building, and finally a second motor is started; and at the moment, the inserting piece is inserted into the sleeve piece, the sleeve piece is driven to rotate, the two climbing wheels synchronously rotate, the first box body and the second box body climb or descend from the outer surface of the rod building, and a maintenance tool is conveniently provided for maintenance personnel.

column2: HISILICON INTELLIGENT AI CAMERA
column4: The Hisilicon intelligent AI camera comprises a main shell, the main shell comprises a front cover, a rear cover and a side plate which are connected with one another, and an image acquisition board, a main board, an interface conversion circuit board, an interface expansion board and an aviation connector conversion board are installed in the main shell; the side plate is provided with an HDMI interface and a network port which are connected with the interface conversion circuit board, a plurality of USB interfaces which are connected with the interface expansion board, and an aviation joint which is connected with the aviation joint conversion board. The front cover is provided with a lens hole corresponding to the image acquisition plate, the outer side of the lens hole is provided with a lens assembly, the lens hole is also internally provided with an optical filter, and the optical filter is fixed in the lens hole through a fixing sheet; the front cover is also provided with an open window corresponding to the interface expansion board, and a cover plate is arranged in the open window; the mainboard is attached to the inner side of the rear cover through a heat conduction pad. According to the technical scheme, artificial intelligence and an industrial camera structure are combined, and the shooting effect is improved.

column2: GENETIC INTELLIGENT OPTIMIZATION NEURAL NETWORK WIND POWER GENERATION EQUIPMENT TEMPERATURE PREDICTION METHOD
column4: The invention provides a genetic intelligent optimization neural network wind power generation equipment temperature prediction method, and relates to the field of electric power energy and artificial intelligence. The method is characterized by providing an artificial intelligence-assisted deep learning wind power generation equipment temperature prediction method. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, in order to construct a data set required by the wind power generation equipment temperature prediction method, preprocessing input sample data, carrying out data labeling and normalization on a wind power equipment parameter data sequence, generating a data original matrix convenient for deep learning model processing, determining the dimension of the original matrix, and filling the data sequence into the original matrix; secondly, constructing a neural network model, including constructing a convolutional layer, an activation function layer, a pooling layer and a full connection layer; and finally, enabling the neural network parameter weight of each layer to correspond to a chromosome gene, carrying out multi-layer gene coding, constructing a fitness function, and carrying out exchange, variation and updating, thereby realizing efficient intelligent prediction for the temperature of the wind power generation equipment.

column2: METHOD FOR REMOTELY SENSING RFID ELECTRONIC BOUNDARY BASED ON OLFACTION ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses a method for remotely sensing an RFID electronic boundary based on an olfaction algorithm. The invention aims to provide a method for remotely sensing an RFID electronic boundary based on an olfaction algorithm, which is provided with a technical system for solving the problems of traditional boundary points, positioning, manual CNSS/total station measurement boundary points, large-range village and town ownership information autonomous acquisition and processing, RID electronic boundary point equipment and a land ownership/current situation investigation robot through combination of artificial intelligence and surveying and mapping. The unmanned aerial vehicle investigation monitoring robot and electronic boundary point intelligent sensing are realized, and the popularization and application of the new technology and the new mode can improve the land use efficiency of rural land investigation and monitoring, and traditionally depends on a remote sensing technology or artificial photo shooting. The problems that in the prior art, the remote sensing technology is shot from the air, the artificial intelligence level is low, the ground ownership survey is lack of robot autonomous control, collection and processing theories and methods, the GNSS combined total station technology is mostly adopted, and the measurement process mostly depends on manpower and depends on an ownership survey online service platform are solved.

column2: WHOLE-COURSE PARKING LOT GUIDING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON INTELLIGENT INTERACTION
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent interactive parking, and discloses a whole-course parking lot guiding system and method based on intelligent interaction. The central system is in signal connection with a vehicle identification module, an artificial intelligence module, an intelligent parking guiding module, an intelligent user guiding module, an intelligent interaction module and an intelligent vehicle charging module, and the vehicle identification module comprises a camera shooting module which is used for shooting license plate information of a vehicle, a vehicle color, a vehicle appearance and a head portrait of a driver; the information input model is used for receiving the pictures captured by the camera shooting module and the shooting time of the pictures; the information display module is used for displaying parking lot information and parking space guidance; the intelligent user guiding module provides user vehicle parking whole-course guiding, the guiding modes include but are not limited to LED color lamps, spotlights, light reflecting modules, projection and holographic projection, optimal parking path planning is provided, and visual guiding is carried out.

column2: TOBACCO VIBRATION GROOVE FAULT DETECTION SYSTEM BASED ON MULTI-MODE SIGNALS
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a tobacco vibration groove fault detection system based on multi-modal signals, which comprises the steps of video shooting, video cutting and audio segmentation, model coding, MFCC feature extraction, vector feature code establishment, cosine distance calculation, numerical value analysis and the like. The vibration condition of the tobacco vibration groove is automatically judged by utilizing an artificial intelligence technology and integrating visual and sound signals, and compared with a manual judgment scheme, the system reliability is higher, the detection is more intelligent, and the labor cost is lower.

column2: CLOUD-BASED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MUSCULAR STRENGTH EXERCISE GUIDE SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to a cloud-based artificial intelligence muscular strength exercise guide system for determining a muscle which is to be strengthened by objectively evaluating the muscular strength of a user, enabling a goal desired by the user to be established on the basis thereof, and recommending a suitable exercise matching the goal by also objectively evaluating an exercise for achieving the goal and, more particularly, to a cloud-based artificial intelligence muscular strength exercise guide system for generating statistical information regarding muscle states for each user group obtained by classifying, according to individual characteristics, users who obtained muscle states by using an electromyogram measuring device (10) and a personal terminal (20), enabling a muscle state of a user group desired by a user to be established as a goal of a muscular strength exercise by comparing and evaluating the muscle state of the user and the statistical information of each user group, selecting a suitable exercise according to fitness by receiving, from an expert group, a recommendation for an exercise suitable to a muscular strength exercise goal, and recommending same.

column2: PROMPTING METHOD FOR FITNESS TRAINING, AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: This application provides a prompt method for fitness training and an electronic device, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method includes: obtaining required training space, where the required training space is used to complete one or more training actions (801); determining, based on a training scenario in which a user is located and the required training space, a training location recommended to the user (802); and collecting a training action of the user based on the training location recommended to the user (803). A suitable training location is recommended to the user based on the training scenario in which the user is located and the required training space. Therefore, the user can also normally perform training in a scenario in which exercise space is limited, for example, when there is an obstruction or a site is insufficient.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence monitoring device, relates to the intelligent monitoring technology field, and is characterized in that a transmission assembly is internally and rotatably connected with a main gear and an auxiliary gear located at the front end of an opening, the main gear and the auxiliary gear are correspondingly arranged front and back and are engaged with each other, and the main gear extends out of the opening and is engaged with a rack; a transmission shaft penetrating through the bottom wall of the movable part downwards is fixed to the bottom of the auxiliary gear, and a plurality of auxiliary blades are embedded in the outer wall of the transmission shaft; the two sides of the transmission assembly are each provided with two movable parts symmetrically arranged on the outer wall of the track front and back, the faces, facing the track, of the movable parts are provided with connecting grooves, a plurality of oil release holes are evenly formed in the inner walls of the connecting grooves, and a layer of wiping cotton covering the outer sides of the oil release holes is bonded to the inner walls of the connecting grooves. Four groups of moving parts are respectively stabilized on the two sides of the transmission assembly to move, so that the shooting stability of the intelligent monitoring assembly is indirectly improved, the wiping cotton can wipe the side wall of the track, and lubricating oil is smeared on the track.

column2: WORK VIOLATION IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND BIG DATA TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses an operation violation identification method based on artificial intelligence and a big data technology, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the real-time monitoring of a transformer substation, and judging whether there is an operator in an image or not through an image recognition algorithm; if there is an operator, shooting the operator through a camera, comparing the clothes of the operator with the clothes of the operator recorded on the big data platform, checking whether the clothes of the operator are standard or not, and if the clothes of the operator are not standard, giving an alarm; monitoring the operation process of the operator in real time, and extracting a head sample image and an elbow sample image of the operator from the image data; the operation process of the operator is compared with the dangerous situation recorded on the big data platform in the operation process, so that whether the human body posture of the operator breaks rules or not is judged; the invention belongs to the technical field of electric power operation management, and particularly relates to an operation violation identification method based on artificial intelligence and a big data technology.

column2: UNMANNED AUTOMOBILE TIRE MONITORING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a driverless car tire monitoring method based on artificial intelligence. The driverless car tire monitoring method comprises the steps that A001, an operation characteristic sequence corresponding to driverless car tires in an initial time period is obtained; a002, calculating a running state measurement standard corresponding to the driverless car tire; a003, the running state closeness degree between any two tires of the pilotless automobile is calculated; a004, calculating corresponding normal working parameters of the driverless car tire in each time stage in the initial time period; and A005, simulating the object pre-estimation model, wherein the simulated object pre-estimation model is used for speculating the normal working variables of the driverless car tire in the future time period and predicting the working condition of the driverless car tire. According to the technical scheme, the tire pressure and the temperature of the driverless car tire are monitored, and the situation that the tire is internally cracked and burst due to the too high temperature and the tire pressure, and dangerous factors are brought to driving is avoided.

column2: BONE AGE PREDICTION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a bone age prediction method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a target skeleton image; performing key point detection on the target skeleton image through a first key point detection model to obtain a first target skeleton key point; performing first posture correction processing on the target skeleton image according to the first target skeleton key point to obtain a standard skeleton image; performing segmentation processing on the standard skeleton image through the image segmentation model to obtain a preliminary skeleton foreground image; performing key point detection on the standard skeleton image through a second key point detection model to obtain a second target skeleton key point; performing second posture correction processing on the preliminary skeleton foreground image according to the second target skeleton key point to obtain a standard skeleton foreground image; and inputting the standard skeleton foreground image into a bone age prediction model for bone age prediction to obtain bone age prediction data. The accuracy of bone age prediction can be improved.

column2: MEDICAL ROBOT CLAMPING ADJUSTING STRUCTURE AND CONTROL SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a medical robot clamping adjusting structure and control system based on artificial intelligence, the medical robot clamping adjusting structure comprises a negative film, a control box seat, a mounting cover, a clamping mechanism and a power supply wiring, and the middle side of the top of the negative film is fixedly connected with the control box seat. Under the action of an electric push rod, an inner gear sleeve column drives a sleeve frame to move in the vertical position direction, then a second motor serves as a power source to enable the sleeve frame to rotate in the horizontal direction, meanwhile, an adjusting and positioning assembly is arranged on the inner side of a first arc-shaped frame and the inner side of a second arc-shaped frame, and arc-shaped blocks on the two sides rotate with stand columns as fulcrums through a fourth motor; therefore, the angles of the inner sides of the two arc-shaped blocks are changed to clamp an instrument with a small size, and the clamping stability is improved; and rotating speed sensors are arranged at the output ends of the first motor, the second motor, the third motor and the fourth motor and used for monitoring the running states of the motors, and the driving running states of the motors are monitored in real time, so that the use stability of the motors is guaranteed.

column2: AI BASED RECOGNITION SYSTEM TO DEPLOY FACE RECOGNITION SYSTEM IN AID OF SECURITY AND SUPERVISION AT SPECIAL AREAS
column4: The main objective of the invention is to develop an AI-based face recognition Model which is implemented following the Deep Learning algorithm for the security system for making decisions to lock or unlock the door system and to deploy the developed AI Model in a Docker Container on an IoT platform. The main aim of the invention would be to achieve the edge computing concept that brings the Artificial Intelligence to the low power Internet of Things devices with the help of containerization concept. Containerization would be similar to the virtualization. Docker containers are easy to port on various IoT devices. Along with the portability, Docker includes all the dependencies and modules required for running the application in a container. The research work comprises the methodology of developing the containerized AI model and deploying the containerized application on the Raspberry Pi IoT device, which consists of the ARM processor. We conclude that the containerized application run with high efficiency, is portable and transferable between multiple platforms, and the containerized application is compatible with multiple architectures.

column2: ELEVATOR CAR ABNORMAL EVENT MONITORING AND EARLY WARNING SYSTEM BASED ON TARGET DETECTION NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses an elevator car abnormal event monitoring and early warning system based on a target detection network. The system mainly solves the problems that in the prior art, network time delay exists, real-time monitoring cannot be achieved, and the computing power is low. The system comprises an elevator car, a switch and a server, a control panel, a camera and a loudspeaker are installed in the elevator car, the camera is sequentially connected with the switch and the server, and the camera is connected with the control panel and the loudspeaker. An artificial intelligence chip and different functional modules are arranged in the camera, target detection is carried out on shot videos through the camera, when the electric vehicle is detected, the loudspeaker sends out an alarm signal, and the control panel controls the elevator car to stop running. And meanwhile, the camera encodes and pushes a video code stream with a detection result, and the server side receives, decodes and displays the video code stream. Network time delay can be avoided, an alarm signal is sent out in real time, elevator operation is controlled, the calculation power and the calculation speed are improved, and the method can be used for accurately monitoring and recognizing the electric vehicle.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE REHABILITATION EXERCISE PROMPTING INSTRUMENT AND PROMPTING METHOD
column4: The artificial intelligence rehabilitation exercise prompting instrument comprises a base, a foot supporting seat and a supporting leg seat, a supporting seat is arranged at the position, close to the edge of the right side, of the upper end of the base, an instrument seat is arranged at the upper end of the supporting seat, an induction structure is installed at the front end of the supporting seat, and an induction arc-shaped plate is arranged at the upper end of the foot supporting seat; a mode adjusting plate is arranged at one end of the instrument base, and a loudspeaker is arranged at the upper end of the instrument base. The lower limb function training device has the beneficial effects that whether the lower limb function training actions of a patient are standard or not can be reminded to prevent the patient from being trained by mistake all the time, the patient is prevented from being injured secondarily in the rehabilitation process, the safety of rehabilitation exercise is guaranteed, function training can be conducted on the lower limbs of the patient, blood circulation of the lower limbs of the patient is promoted, and the rehabilitation effect is improved. And secondly, the action of the patient can be captured, when the action of the patient is not in place, it is prompted that the action is not in place, and when the action is in place, it is prompted that the action is not completed mistakenly.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ROBOT CAPABLE OF QUICKLY IDENTIFYING TARGET
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence robot capable of rapidly recognizing a target, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, the robot comprises a trunk, a head and a foot support mounted at the bottom of the trunk, a movable head support is arranged at the top of the trunk, the head is mounted on the head support, and a display screen is mounted on the front side of the head. A microphone, a voice recognition sensor and a main control computer are installed in the head, a camera shooting protection frame is fixed to the front face of the trunk, a video camera shooting sensor is installed on the camera shooting protection frame, an article containing plate is arranged under the video camera shooting sensor, and a main board and a loudspeaker are installed in the trunk. According to the robot, rapid target recognition and voice broadcasting are achieved, children can be assisted in recognizing daily use articles, the robot has the auxiliary functions of picture display, video explanation and the like, the children are efficiently assisted in cognizing things, interestingness is high, the learning fun of the children is stimulated, and the teaching effect is good.

column2: DANCE POSTURE RECOGNITION TEACHING EQUIPMENT BASED ON EMBEDDED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model provides a dance posture recognition teaching device based on embedded artificial intelligence, which comprises a dance teaching rotating frame, a dance teaching video transmission display screen, a hollow aluminum cabinet, an artificial intelligence development board and a computer device, and is characterized in that the dance teaching video transmission display screen is embedded in the dance teaching rotating frame; and the middle part of the lower part of the dance teaching rotating frame is in bolted connection with a hollow aluminum cabinet. Through the arrangement of the dance posture recognition and acquisition camera, the lamp holder, the light supplementing lamp tube, the protective lampshade and the photosensitive sensor, when human body movement dance posture information is captured, if the photosensitive sensor detects that the illumination intensity is low, the information can be transmitted into the artificial intelligence development board through the photosensitive sensor, and the human body movement dance posture information is captured. Through information processing of the computer equipment, the lamp holder can drive the light supplementing lamp tube to be lightened, and auxiliary light supplementing operation can be carried out.

column2: POSTURE ANALYSIS ASSISTANT SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND TRANSMISSION SYSTEM
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of computer internet and artificial intelligence, and discloses a posture analysis assistant system and transmission system based on artificial intelligence, after a user confirms the start of posture detection, a photographing and video recording module is carried out on the user, the user is prompted to confirm the identity information of a detected object in sequence, and the posture analysis assistant system and transmission system based on artificial intelligence are provided. The method comprises the following steps: taking photos on the front and side surfaces of a figure according to the prompt of a system, marking the existing figure photos and posture information by a posture analysis expert, putting the marked picture information into a model for training, obtaining a model with the best evaluation index through training, forming an electronic document, and displaying the electronic document. And determining whether a video needs to be recorded for deep posture analysis, and analyzing recovery suggestions given by various indexes of the document. The user can control the posture of the user without going out, the detected identity information is confirmed to ensure that the posture analysis report and the exercise rehabilitation suggestion detected in the later period correspond to the identity, the posture feature information of the user is analyzed and evaluated with high accuracy, real-time uploading is achieved, analysis feedback is obtained in real time, and the user experience is improved. And finally, providing guidance for related high-risk part recovery training according to an analysis result.

column2: DATA PRIVACY PROTECTION SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VIDEO BEHAVIOR ANALYSIS
column4: The invention discloses a data privacy protection system based on artificial intelligence video behavior analysis. The data privacy protection system comprises a video input module, an early warning detection module and a data transmission and storage module, the video input module is used for shooting video data; the early warning detection module comprises a connection module and a detection module; the connection module is used for acquiring the video data from the video input module; the detection module is used for performing early warning detection on the video data to obtain violation data; and the data transmission and storage module is used for transmitting and storing the violation data to a server of the system. According to the data privacy protection system and method based on artificial intelligence video behavior analysis provided by the invention, the shot video is intelligently detected, and images with mobile phones in the video are automatically screened out, so that the video detection efficiency is improved, and early warning processing is timely sent out.

column2: MODEL TRAINING METHOD, COMMODITY RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a model training method, a commodity recommendation method and device, equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of model training, and can be applied to a commodity recommendation scene. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: monitoring the running time of the shopping platform; when it is determined that the running time reaches one training node of the current training period, a first commodity recommendation model corresponding to a first historical training node before the current training period is called, and the first commodity recommendation model is obtained through training based on at least part of first sample data before the first historical training node; acquiring second sample data in a time period from the first historical training node to the training node; and training the first commodity recommendation model based on the second sample data to obtain a target commodity recommendation model. According to the method, it can be ensured that the fluctuation of the recommendation result output by the trained target commodity recommendation model is small, and the accuracy of the recommendation result is ensured.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence monitoring device, and relates to the technical field of intelligent monitoring, the artificial intelligence monitoring device comprises a monitoring device, a bearing device and a monitoring camera, the bearing device is placed on a horizontal plane, the monitoring device is arranged at the top of the bearing device, and the monitoring device comprises an adjusting assembly and a monitoring assembly; the adjusting assembly is fixedly arranged at the top of the bearing equipment, the monitoring camera is fixedly arranged on the adjusting assembly, the monitoring assembly is arranged on the monitoring camera, the monitoring equipment is further provided with cleaning equipment, and the cleaning equipment is in sliding fit with the monitoring equipment. The adjusting assembly can adjust the shooting angle of the monitoring camera, so that the shooting range of the monitoring camera can be enlarged, all positions around the monitoring camera can be shot clearly, and when the monitoring camera is shielded, the hidden micro camera can be exposed outside through the monitoring assembly, so that the monitoring effect is improved. And the surrounding environment is monitored and shot through the micro camera, so that the safety performance of monitoring and shooting is improved.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR IDENTIFYING RAW MATERIALS RUNNING IN KILN
column4: The invention relates to the field of machine learning of an artificial intelligence technology, in particular to a method and a system for identifying raw materials in a kiln, which are mainly used for improving the identification rate of raw materials in the kiln and identifying risks in advance. The method comprises the following steps that S1, a feature model M of the raw material running in the kiln is determined, a plurality of sets of data corresponding to the feature model in off-line data in the kiln are collected to serve as samples, and the feature model M comprises a plurality of feature parameters and data ranges corresponding to the feature parameters; s2, establishing a multilayer perceptron (MLP) model for the feature model M; s3, training and testing a multilayer perceptron (MLP) model according to the sample to obtain an optimal training model; and S4, detecting data corresponding to the characteristic parameters in the kiln condition in real time, inputting the data into the optimal training model, and determining the raw material running condition according to the output of the optimal training model. The method solves the influence of human subjective factors, reduces the consumption of manpower, and improves the judgment rate.

column2: MULTIFUNCTIONAL DEHUMIDIFICATION HEAT PUMP CONTROL SYSTEM SPECIAL FOR SWIMMING POOL
column4: The utility model discloses a special multifunctional dehumidification heat pump control system for a swimming pool, which comprises a touch screen man-machine interface module, the touch screen man-machine interface module is connected with an acquisition unit, the acquisition unit is arranged in the swimming pool, and the swimming pool is also provided with a circulating air channel and a circulating water channel; the circulating air channel and the circulating water channel are respectively provided with a heating device and a refrigerating device. The system has the advantages of simple structure, integration of dehumidification, heating and refrigeration, artificial intelligence control, labor saving and the like.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR SKI LIFT OPERATIONS
column4: Systems and methods for improved operations of ski lifts increase skier safety at on-boarding and off-boarding locations by providing an always-on, always-alert system that "watches" these locations, identifies developing problem situations, and initiates mitigation actions. One or more video cameras feed live video to a video processing module. The video processing module feeds resulting sequences of images to an artificial intelligence (AI) engine. The AI engine makes an inference regarding existence of a potential problem situation based on the sequence of images. This inference is fed to an inference processing module, which determines if the inference processing module should send an alert or interact with the lift motor controller to slow or stop the lift.

column2: TARGET USER LOCKING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: The embodiments of the present application provide a target user locking method and an electronic device, relating to the field of electronic devices. Said method provided in the present application can be applied to an artificial intelligence (AI) fitness scene, and can ensure the accuracy of target user locking. The electronic device can complete the identification of a target user and the tracking of the target user during fitting by means of methods such as identifying user features, or identifying the user in combination with data acquired by a wearable device worn by the user, or identifying the user's motion mode.

column2: NIGHT VISION IMAGE ENHANCEMENT METHOD AND RELATED DEVICE
column4: The invention provides a night vision image enhancement method and device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first image and a second image; wherein the first image and the second image are images obtained by shooting the same scene by using a common camera and an infrared camera respectively; obtaining a third image based on the first image and the second image by using a trained infrared image coloring model; and enhancing the third image by using the trained image enhancement model to obtain a high-definition color image. The invention further provides a night vision device which is provided with the lens module, the AI chip and the LED screen. According to the night vision image enhancement method and device, the electronic equipment, the storage medium and the night vision device, the non-ideal image acquired at night can be enhanced, and the colored high-definition night vision image is obtained.

column2: MODEL TRAINING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a model training method and device, equipment and a storage medium, which can be applied to various scenes such as cloud technology, artificial intelligence, intelligent traffic and auxiliary driving. Visual information and audio information in a dance video are obtained, starting point features of the audio information are extracted, the starting point features are used for representing music theory element points of audio in the dance video, music theory element points of the visual information are predicted through an initial model, and therefore the dance video is obtained according to the music theory element points of the visual information and the starting point features of the audio information. And optimizing the initial model, so that the music theory element points of the visual information are aligned with the music theory element points of the audio, and obtaining a pre-training model. According to the method and the device, the alignment of the music theory element points of the visual information and the audio is used as an agent task to realize model pre-training, and some unique features in the dance video are considered, so that the pre-training model is enabled to better adapt to downstream tasks of various dance types without data annotation, and the performance is ideal.

column2: EYE GROUND LEOPARD PRINT IMAGE SEGMENTATION METHOD, COMPUTER AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and provides a fundus leopard print image segmentation method, a computer and a storage medium, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining preprocessed fundus image data; inputting the fundus image data into a leopard print feature module for first-stage training to obtain a target leopard print feature module; inputting the fundus image data into a fusion network module for second-stage training to obtain a target skeleton feature module and a target edge feature module, wherein the fusion network module comprises a target leopard print feature module, a skeleton feature module and an edge feature module; generating a target neural network module by using the target leopard print feature module, the target skeleton feature module and the target edge feature module; inputting the fundus image data into a target neural network module for segmentation processing to obtain a target leopard print image output by the target neural network module; and the structural integrity and the edge accuracy of the segmentation result can be obviously improved.

column2: EXERCISING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to an exercising device, comprising, a pair of leg supporting units 1 arranged on an adjustable rod, wherein the rod extends or retracts to stretch the legs, a hand supporting unit 2 for providing a grip to hands of the user, wherein the sensor monitors grip strength of the hands on the hand supporting unit 2, plurality of springs 3 to expand or contract while pulling through the hand and leg supporting units 2, 1, an angle sensor 4 for measuring the user?™s elbow flex, an artificial intelligence camera 5 for capturing real time images/videos of the user to determine postures via the microcontroller in order to evaluate any inappropriate postures adopted by the user while executing the exercise, and a speaker 6 for generating a command to the user regarding techniques in order to assist the user to perform the exercise in an appropriate manner.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED EMPLOYEE ACHIEVEMENT PORTFOLIO SYSTEM
column4: ?œARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED EMPLOYEE ACHIEVEMENT PORTFOLIO SYSTEM?Accordingly, embodiments herein disclose artificial intelligence based employee achievement portfolio system (100), comprising of a processing unit (102) including a plurality of processors (104) operated by an employee; and a memory (106) coupled with and readable by the processing unit (102) and storing therein a set of instructions when executed by the processing unit (102). The plurality of processors (104) configured to perform accessing an employee records database (108) to identify a plurality of employees; and receiving physical activity data in electronic format from a plurality of wearable electronic devices (116) worn by corresponding employees performing multiple differing tasks in a workplace environment. Followed by, the processors (104) configured to perform scoring the received physical activity data to determine a respective score for each of the employees, and presenting the scores for the plurality of employees determined by the scoring, via a management interface.Figure to be published with Abstract: Figure 1

column2: DESIGN AND DEVELOPMENT OF AN INTELLIGENT WILD ANIMAL DRIVE BACK SYSTEM FOR CROP PROTECTION BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND DEEP NEURAL NETWORK
column4: The edge computing has become an essential technology for real-time application developmentby moving processing and storage capabilities close to end devices, thereby reducing latency,improving response time and ensuring secure data exchange. In this work, we focus on a SmartAgriculture application that aims to protect crops from ungulate attacks, and therefore tosignificantly reduce production losses, through the creation of virtual fences that take advantageof computer vision and ultrasound emission. Starting with an innovative device capable ofgenerating ultrasound to drive away ungulates and thus protect crops from their attack, this workprovides a comprehensive description of the design, development and assessment of anintelligent animal repulsion system that allows to detect and recognize the ungulates as well asgenerate ultrasonic signals tailored to each species of the ungulate. Taking into account theconstraints coming from the rural environment in terms of energy supply and networkconnectivity, the proposed system is based on loT platforms that provide a satisfactorycompromise between performance, cost and energy consumption. More specifically, in thiswork, we deployed and evaluated various edge computing devices (Raspberry Pi. with or withouta neural compute stick, and NVIDIA Jetson Nano) running real-time object detector (YOLO andTiny-YOLO) with custom-trained models to identify the most suitable animal recognitionHW/SW platform to be integrated with the ultrasound generator. Experimental results show thefeasibility of the intelligent animal repelling system through the deployment of the animaldetectors on power efficient edge computing devices without compromising the mean averageprecision and also satisfying real-time requirements. In addition, for each HW/SW platform, theexperimental study provides a cost/performance analysis, as well as measurements of the averageand peak CPU temperature. Best practices are also discussed and lastly, this product discusseshow the combined technology used can help farmers and agronomists in their decision makingand management process.

column2: ACTION GENERATION MODEL TRAINING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses an action generation model training method and device, equipment and a storage medium, belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and can be applied to an automatic driving scene. The method comprises the following steps: determining multiple pieces of precision demand information of an action subject; determining a plurality of target complexities based on the plurality of pieces of precision demand information; constructing a plurality of first network sub-models of which the model complexities are a plurality of target complexities respectively; for any first network sub-model, obtaining sample action data of a first action part corresponding to the first precision demand information from the sample action data of the action subject, and training the first network sub-model based on the sample action data of the first action part to obtain a second network sub-model; and determining an action generation model based on the plurality of second network sub-models obtained by training. According to the scheme, compression of the action generation model is realized, and the smoothness of running the action generation model can be improved.

column2: DEVICE AND METHOD FOR DETECTING EARLY STROKE SYMPTOMS IN OLD AGED PEOPLE
column4: The present disclosure discloses is a device and method for early stroke symptoms detection in old age people using artificial intelligence and machine learning. A handheld wearable device that can be wear by any user which acquires data from a plurality of sensors . The present disclosure uses artificial intelligence and deep neural network to calculate the risk factor of having stoke from the data acquired .The system automatically sends useful data/report to its user in regular intervals. If the system assesses the risk factor as high, it immediately alerts its user. The SOS module by which it alerts emergencies to relatives and nearby healthcare insitutions and can be connected to 5 family members for doing collaborative activities such as group exercise, comparative analytics reports, monthly/weekly goal set, SOS alert , can be integrated to the mobile/laptop device through Bluetooth or WiFi.

column2: BEHAVIOR RECOGNITION CAMERA DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the field of monitoring camera devices, in particular to a behavior recognition camera device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a device main body and a camera, an adjusting frame is movably mounted at the lower end of the device main body, a driving motor capable of driving the camera to rotate is arranged in the adjusting frame, and a mounting part is fixedly connected to the outer side of the device main body. A water storage tank is movably mounted on the outer side of the mounting part, a control chip is mounted in the device main body, a storage module is mounted at the upper end in the device main body, and the control chip is electrically connected with the storage module, so that images shot by the camera can be converted into electric signals to be transmitted into the control chip; the control chip can read various actions such as rapid running, limb conflict and object throwing pre-stored in the storage module, images collected by the camera are compared, when the similarity after comparison reaches a preset value, an alarm is given to the display screen displaying the monitoring images, and the effect of improving the behavior recognition speed and accuracy is achieved.

column2: ACCESS REQUEST PROCESSING METHOD AND APPARATUS, DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: This disclosure provides an access request processing method, a storage device, and a storage system. In embodiments of this disclosure, a first storage device receives an artificial intelligence (AI) model from a second storage device, wherein the AI model is obtained by the second storage device through training based on historical input output (IO) requests in historical running processes. The first storage device obtains a prediction result of the AI model based on an access request received by the first storage device.

column2: AUTOMATIC LANE CHANGE SYSTEM AND CONTROL METHOD FOR VEHICLES
column4: The invention relates to a driving system control method for a semi-autonomous vehicle comprising a vehicle control unit (20) in connection with the surrounding monitoring device (10) in a way that detects the surrounding conditions containing lane information by a surrounding monitoring device (10) the method comprising the steps of creating a surrounding model containing at least one object information located at the periphery of the vehicle by means a processor (22) provided in the vehicle control unit (20) with the images coming from the surrounding monitoring device (10); determining possibility of enter into a target lane from a current lane by the processor (22) while the vehicle is en route; presenting the decision result via a user interface; generating a response input via the user interface for the presented result; storing a data set pairing a user profile containing response input in combination with surrounding model in a buffer memory (32) running on a host computer (30); comparing the user profile in a memory unit (36) with previous data sets over a neural network operated by an artificial intelligence module (34) connected with the buffer memory (32) and saving a unique data set to the memory unit (36).

column2: SPEED PLANNING METHOD FOR AUTOMATIC DRIVING, APPARATUS, DEVICE, MEDIUM, AND VEHICLE
column4:
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a speed planning method for automatic driving, an apparatus, a device, and a medium, where the present application relates to artificial intelligence technologies such as automatic driving and deep learning.
SOLUTION: A specific implementation form includes: acquiring a current state of a vehicle comprising at least remaining running distance and current speed; and interpolating actions including at least acceleration based on the current state and a predetermined state table to obtain a target action of the current state, where the state table is determined based on a reinforcement learning method and comprises a plurality of states and a respective action performed in each state. The present application uses a method of table lookup instead of a neural network, and first can determine a state table in an offline manner and then can determine a target operation of the current state in an online query manner, thus ensuring that an optimal solution for the entire course of a speed plan is obtained without occupying a large amount of computational resources.

column2: BUSINESS PROCESSING METHOD, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a business processing method, an electronic device, electronic equipment and a medium. By applying the technical scheme provided by the invention, in the process of processing the current service by the computing node, the service data required for subsequent service processing can be retrieved from the storage cluster in advance and stored in the temporary storage space through the specific cache algorithm. Therefore, on the premise of not influencing the currently running task, the reading efficiency of the business data is higher when the subsequent task uses the computing node for computing, and the overall business processing efficiency is further improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DEVICE FOR HEALTH FITNESS DATA ACQUISITION
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of fitness equipment, in particular to an artificial intelligence device for health fitness data acquisition, which comprises a substrate, a casing, a detection casing and a support frame are fixed at the top end of the substrate, an infrared sensor is mounted at the top end of the surface of the casing, the detection casing is positioned on the front side of the casing, and the support frame is positioned on the surface of the casing. A block groove is formed in the top end of the detection shell, a weighing sensor and a supporting block are arranged in the block groove, a lying plate is fixed to the top of the supporting block, a face recognition device and a touch display screen are arranged on the back of the machine shell, and a partition plate is fixed in the machine shell; a data storage module, a central processing unit and a wireless transmitting module are sequentially arranged at the top of the partition plate, the exercise detection device is arranged on the fitness equipment, exercise data are recorded in the exercise process, a body builder can accurately know the exercise data of the body builder, and therefore the body builder can cooperate with reasonable planned training, and the exercise efficiency of the body builder is improved. And the scientific and efficient body-building effect is achieved.

column2: PICTURE BRIGHTNESS ENHANCEMENT METHOD AND DEVICE OF BANK BACKGROUND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a picture brightness enhancement method and device for a bank background system, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, the method comprises the following steps: different pictures are shot under different illumination conditions and then a training set is established, and each sample comprises a first picture and a second picture obtained by shooting the same picture; for each sample, respectively inputting a negative-label picture group established according to the first picture and the corresponding brightness enhancement picture and a positive-label picture group established according to the first picture and the second picture into a brightness judgment model; calculating a loss value of the brightness judgment model, and adjusting parameters of the brightness judgment model to obtain a trained brightness judgment model; setting a label of a brightness enhancement picture output by the brightness enhancement model to be positive, inputting the trained brightness judgment model, calculating a loss value of the trained brightness judgment model, and adjusting parameters of the brightness enhancement model to obtain the trained brightness enhancement model; and performing brightness enhancement on the picture by using the trained brightness enhancement model.

column2: ACTION DEMONSTRATION SYSTEM SUITABLE FOR PHYSICAL EDUCATION
column4: The invention provides an action demonstration system suitable for physical education. The action demonstration system comprises artificial intelligence glasses, wearable gloves, a leg binding device and a data processing module, the artificial intelligence glasses, the wearable gloves and the leg binding device are worn on the body of an operator; an operator holds the basketball with a hand; the artificial intelligence glasses, the wearable gloves and the leg binding devices are all connected with the data processing module; the wearable glove includes a controller and a resistance band. The basic characteristics of the trainee are obtained in real time by arranging the wearable gloves, the artificial intelligence glasses and the leg binding device, and a teaching demonstration dynamic track is given to guide the trainee to carry out standard shooting training, so that the formation of wrong exercise habits and the time and energy cost of correction are avoided, and the training efficiency is greatly improved; by arranging a resistance belt, a basketball can be simulated, and the training efficiency is further improved; meanwhile, the power of the trainee is corrected in time through the controller, and the standardized shooting training effect is further improved.

column2: SHOOTING POSITION SEARCHING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a shooting position searching method and device based on artificial intelligence and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps that a position meeting a preset condition is inquired in a virtual reality VR scene through a scene inquiry system EQS, and the distance between the position meeting the preset condition and the current position of artificial intelligence AI and the distance between the position meeting the preset condition and the target position meet a set position relation; filtering out unreachable positions in the positions meeting the preset conditions to obtain reachable positions; a shot position is determined from the reachable positions. By means of the method, the problem that the virtual character carries out shooting aiming on the target position can be solved.

column2: IMAGE INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE CAPABLE OF DISSIPATING HEAT
column4: According to the image information processing device capable of dissipating heat, good cooling and noise reduction effects can be achieved, and a fan is not needed for dissipating heat. According to the invention, the image processing equipment body, the top cover, the L-shaped block and the cooling device are matched for use, so that when the image processing equipment body runs at a high speed, cooling and noise reduction can be well realized at the same time, and the problem of poor cooling and noise reduction effects in the prior art is solved; the image shooting information processing device for target identification based on artificial intelligence has the advantages of good cooling and noise reduction effects.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides an image processing method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and further relates to the field of computer vision and the field of deep learning, so as to at least solve the technical problem that a complete road is difficult to extract in related technologies. According to the specific implementation scheme, a skeleton image of a target road is obtained, and the skeleton image at least comprises at least one road skeleton of the target road; performing vector processing on the skeleton image to generate a target point set corresponding to the at least one road skeleton; and repairing the skeleton image based on the target point set to generate a target image.

column2: VERIFICATION METHOD, VERIFICATION DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT OF FRONT-END PAGE AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a front-end page verification method, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The verification method is applied to a verification server and comprises the steps that an analog terminal user initiates N transaction requests to a web server, the N transaction requests are used for requesting N front-end pages of an application program running in the web server respectively, and N is an integer larger than or equal to 1; receiving a front-end page returned by the web server in response to each transaction request; performing screenshot processing on each received front-end page to generate a verification picture; each verification picture is recognized based on a neural network model deployed in the verification server, label information of each verification picture is obtained, and the label information of each verification picture is used for indicating whether the front-end page corresponding to the verification picture is normally displayed or not. The invention further provides a front-end page checking device and equipment, a storage medium and a program product.

column2: STRONG SCATTERING BRIGHT TARGET INTERFERENCE ELIMINATION METHOD IN MILLIMETER WAVE HUMAN BODY IMAGING
column4: The invention provides a strong scattering bright target interference elimination method in millimeter wave human body imaging, which comprises the steps of three-dimensional image reconstruction processing, three-dimensional image filtering, human body contour extraction and two-dimensional visual image generation, and utilizes the characteristic that the imaging result of a dihedral angle or a trihedral angle formed by natural structures such as human skeleton and skin is not on the surface of the human body contour. And removing strong bright spots and strong bright lines by extracting human body surface contour data. According to the method, strong bright spots and strong bright lines in the two-dimensional millimeter wave visual image of the human body can be greatly reduced, so that the image texture is uniform, the uniformity characteristic of the skin surface of the human body is reflected more truly, and the strong bright spots and the strong bright lines are prevented from influencing judgment of suspicious articles; therefore, the accuracy of judging the suspicious articles on the human skin surface through human eyes or artificial intelligence by a worker is higher, the time waste caused by uncertain or misjudgment of the suspicious articles by the worker is reduced, and the passing efficiency of security inspection equipment is improved.

column2: METHOD, SYSTEM AND TERMINAL FOR DETECTING ILLEGAL BEHAVIORS OF PERSON STANDING UNDER SUSPENSION ARM
column4: The invention provides a method, a system and a terminal for detecting illegal behaviors of a person standing under a suspension arm based on binocular vision and artificial intelligence technologies. Two cameras are arranged according to the position of a crane; shooting a construction site video, and decoding to obtain a to-be-detected image; inputting the two images into a trained crane key point detection model to obtain coordinate values of the crane key points on pixel coordinate systems of the two images; inputting the left image and the right image into a trained human body key point detection model, and detecting a plurality of key points of a human body in the images; inputting the coordinates of the key points of the crane into a binocular vision positioning module to obtain coordinate values of the key points of the crane, and establishing a crane coordinate system; inputting coordinate values of the human body key points in the pixel coordinate system into a binocular vision positioning module to obtain mean value coordinates; and according to the coordinate relationship, performing compliance judgment. According to the invention, normalization of crane operation on a construction site is supervised, and violation operation is reduced.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODEL FOR NATIONAL FITNESS
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence model for nationwide fitness. The intelligent model comprises the following logic sections: step 1, determining people flow conditions of parks equipped with fitness facilities and other fitness places through long-term observation; 2, determining local permanent resident population estimation data according to local population registration conditions and face recognition of a camera; 3, classifying the data in the current parameter sequence to obtain a category number and a discrete point number corresponding to the current parameter sequence; obtaining a data stability degree index of the current parameter sequence according to the number of categories and the number of discrete points, and calculating a fitness participation rate through a model and big data information; equipment can be assisted to improve the fitness participation rate, social medical expenditure can be effectively reduced, and the living standard and expected life of residents can be improved.

column2: TEACHING TRAINING PLATFORM WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a teaching training platform with artificial intelligence, which comprises a base, a movable display blackboard arranged on the outer wall of the top of the base, a processing host fixedly connected to the outer wall of the top of the base, a first movable camera arranged on the outer wall of the top of the base, and a second movable camera arranged on the outer wall of the top of the base. A second movable camera is fixedly connected to the outer wall of the top of the base, and a third movable camera is arranged on the outer wall of the top of the base. Panoramic VR shooting can be carried out through the first mobile camera, the second mobile camera and the third mobile camera, so that the problem that specific operation and operation details cannot be seen due to the fact that the number of people in practice courses cannot be close to teachers can be solved, and the processing host can convert shot data and output the data to VR instruments of students. The first movable camera, the second movable camera and the third movable camera are the same in structure and different in position, the movable display blackboard can be used as a projection screen for offline teaching, and modern teaching is met.

column2: DANGEROUS SITUATION MONITORING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a risk monitoring method and device based on artificial intelligence, electronic equipment and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: determining a risk pre-judgment region based on a coordinate position corresponding to a target user if it is detected that the heart rate fluctuation value of the target user is greater than a preset fluctuation threshold value; determining a first risk value corresponding to the target user according to the risk pre-judgment area; if the first risk value is greater than a first threshold value, controlling a shooting device corresponding to the coordinate position to collect a behavior image corresponding to the target user; inputting the behavior image into a trained behavior recognition model to obtain a behavior recognition result corresponding to the target user; and if the behavior recognition result does not belong to the behavior in the safety behavior library, performing early warning according to a preset early warning rule. According to the invention, the efficiency of dangerous situation monitoring is improved.

column2: TEXT ERROR CORRECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, STORAGE MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a text error correction method and device, a storage medium and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of text processing. The text error correction method comprises the following steps: judging whether a to-be-corrected text has an error or not by utilizing an error detection model; if the to-be-corrected text is wrong, a corrected text corresponding to the to-be-corrected text is determined through an error correction model, the error detection model is obtained through training of a discriminator in the generative adversarial network, and the error correction model is obtained through training of a generator in the generative adversarial network. According to the text error correction method, the error correction task is only carried out on the wrong text, the calculation amount of an error correction model is reduced, and the running speed of a text error correction system is increased.

column2: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED SAFETY DOOR FOR SECURING A BABY FROMKIDNAPPING AND MONITORING BABY ACTIVITIES
column4: ABSTRACT OF THE INVENTIONA baby gate, also known as a kid safety gate, is a barrier that keeps babies and toddlers out of parts ofthe house that are potentially dangerous, such as stairwells and kitchens. The best time to install safety gatesis before your child begins to crawl. Most newborns master this skill between the ages of 7 and 10, so startputting gates when your child is about 6 months old. A pressure-mounted safety gate was presented in thisinvention. Friction with the walls on either side usually keeps it in place. This uses an accordion-like devicethat wedges itself between two opposing walls. This style of gate is useful for keeping children out of certainareas. Assume you have hazardous materials or valuable items in your dining room. It acts as a solid barrierat the top and bottom of your stairs. Invention can help keep a crawling and climbing toddler from getting intomischief. A pressure-mounted safety gate is ideal for preventing a newborn or toddler from reaching thesegoods.
