Safety gate with LED light allows us to see the gate in the dark, magnetic auto lock locks the doorautomatically, door sensor prevents children from escaping, buzzer activates local alarms to alert parents inthe event of an emergency, emotion sensor predicts children's emotions and informs parents if they are stressedor alone, heart rate sensor monitors children's heart rate, and temperature sensor measures children's bodytemperature and PIR sensor will detect unknown object near to infant. Buzzer will raise an alarm to alertparent if any unknown found to be near to infant. It will help the infants from kidnapping. This device assistsin the monitoring of children's health as well as providing safety for children in an emergency.

column2: OPERATION METHOD OF NEURAL NETWORK MODEL, READABLE MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an operation method of a neural network model, a readable medium and electronic equipment. The method comprises the steps that first operation is detected in the process of operating a neural network model, the first operation comprises a first operation part, and the first operation part comprises at least one nonlinear operation factor; obtaining first input data of the first operation from the first data matrix; generating a first table look-up parameter of the first input data; a first index value corresponding to the first table look-up parameter in the index table is determined, a first table look-up result corresponding to the first index value in the index table is obtained, and the first table look-up parameter, the first index value and the first table look-up result are fixed-point numbers; and determining an operation result of the first operation part based on the first table lookup result. Therefore, when the electronic equipment runs the first operation, the fixed-point number operation result of the first operation can be obtained through linear operation and table look-up, and the speed of running the neural network model by the electronic equipment is improved.

column2: AN INTELLIGENT VR HEADSET FOR REDUCING STRESS OF BEDRIDDEN PATIENT
column4: Due to the loss of mobility caused by various diseases or injuries, the human must be bedridden for treatment and maintenance, and the lower limb paralysis patient must be bedridden for an extended period of time. Many people who are sick or injured, or who are "restricted" to the bed as a patient for reasons other than typical nocturnal sleep. Physical activity is limited in certain circumstances; thus these people are unable to engage in social life even after leaving the bed, or at all, i.e. they are unable to work, or they are unable to work and require daily support. Bedridden people may experience increased stress as a result of sleeping in the same position for long periods of time. This invention suggests a virtual reality-based headset using artificial intelligence technology to overcome the challenges. It's made up of a virtual reality headset, a smartphone, a chest strap with a heart rate monitor sensor, a pressure sensor, and a microprocessor. The patient's stress level is predicted by the pressure and heart rate monitor sensor. The VR headset automatically play the video with the help of AI technology when bedridden patient getting stress. It would lessen stress levels after they are relaxing with their past memories and forgetting that they are occasionally bedridden due to old memories using VR headset. It aids the patient's speedy recovery.

column2: TASK RESOURCE ADJUSTING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a task resource adjustment method and device, which can be used in the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: running a current task according to a matched initial task resource; if the task operation fails, failure reason prediction is carried out on the obtained task log, and a resource prediction result is generated; and if the resource prediction result is true, the initial task resource is adjusted according to the task log, so that the task operation efficiency and the task operation success rate can be improved, and the manual learning requirement is reduced.

column2: PRE-SCHOOL CHILD EXERCISE REHABILITATION DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a preschool child exercise rehabilitation device based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of exercise rehabilitation. Comprising a machine base, a supporting mechanism is arranged at the top of the machine base, a protection auxiliary mechanism is arranged on the inner side of the supporting mechanism, the front face of the machine base is movably connected with a double-face display screen through a connecting supporting column, the front face of the machine base is fixedly connected with a connecting mechanism through a connecting supporting column, and a connecting seat is arranged at the top of the front face of the connecting mechanism. By arranging the pedal mechanism, the pedal part is pedaled to drive the gear part to drive the rotating wheel to rotate, so that the lower limb strength and the waist and abdomen strength of a child patient can be exercised, on the other hand, when the child patient squats and rises on the connecting base plate of the machine base, the center of the child patient is dispersed through the hollow spring supporting part supported at the bottom of the child patient, and the child patient shakes; in this way, the child patient can train and adjust the body coordination ability in the using process, the functionality of the device is improved, and the using effect of the device is enhanced.

column2: DATA MONITORING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a data monitoring method, which comprises the following steps of: acquiring a data monitoring request, and extracting a monitoring content field in the request; analyzing monitoring time, a monitoring index and a target data source from the monitoring content field, and determining a monitoring rule according to the monitoring index; deploying the monitoring rule into the target data source; when it is monitored that the target data source is running, judging whether the system time of the target data source is within the monitoring time or not; if the system time of the target data source is not within the monitoring time, returning to the step of judging whether the system time is within the monitoring time; and if the system time of the target data source is within the monitoring time, monitoring the target data source by using the deployed monitoring rule. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the product portrait and the user portrait can be stored in nodes of a block chain. The invention further provides a data monitoring device, equipment and a medium. According to the invention, the flexibility and accuracy of data monitoring can be improved.

column2: BADMINTON VIDEO CLIP PROCESSING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention is suitable for the field of computers, and provides a badminton video clip processing method and system based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the preprocessing of a badminton game video, and obtaining a target video clip which at least comprises a score tracking video clip and a score anti-super video clip; capturing video sub-clips of two paragraph parties in the target video clip from pause ending to next pause starting, and distinguishing and marking the video sub-clips according to a time axis sequence; positioning a target body in the marked video sub-segment, obtaining a framing motion track image of the target body in the marked video sub-segment, and judging whether the framing motion track image has a smear phenomenon or not; the method has the beneficial effects that the visibility of the target body under the conditions of high-speed smear and deformation is improved, and analysis of competition related data is facilitated.

column2: POSTURE RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND COMPUTER READABLE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a posture recognition method and device, electronic equipment and a computer readable medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of machine vision and image recognition, and the method comprises the steps: receiving a posture recognition request, and obtaining a corresponding to-be-recognized image and a target feature; determining a bounding box from the to-be-recognized image according to the target feature; generating key points of the to-be-recognized image in the bounding box; generating a blank background image based on the bounding box, mapping the key points into the blank background image, and further generating a skeleton image; and obtaining a predicted attitude according to the key points and the skeleton diagram, and determining an attitude type according to the predicted attitude. The influence of inaccurate recognition caused by environmental factors is avoided, and the method is suitable for classification recognition tasks of complex postures under different background brightness.

column2: INTELLIGENT GRADING SYSTEM FOR FISH CULTURED IN CIRCULATING WATER
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent grading system for fish cultured in circulating water. The system can comprise a culture pond, an underwater camera, a biomass evaluation channel, a fish pump, a server, a light supplementing lamp and the like. The system mainly uses machine vision and an artificial intelligence algorithm to quantify and analyze recirculating aquaculture fish school community hierarchical structure information, then combines swimming strategy game characteristics among individuals of different community levels of a fish school, couples recirculating aquaculture environment information, solves optimal community hierarchical structure configuration of a current aquaculture object, and finally obtains the optimal community hierarchical structure configuration of the current aquaculture object. And intelligent grading of cultured fishes is realized based on the configuration. The system is simple in structure, the method is simple, convenient and effective, the stability of a fish school community grade structure can be promoted while the ingestion welfare of the cultured fishes is ensured, and the grade differentiation of individual communities in the fish school is avoided, so that the production efficiency is improved, and the culture benefits are maximized.

column2: SECURITY FOR PRIVATE DATA INPUTS TO ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELS
column4: Methods, systems, and devices for supporting security for private data inputs to artificial intelligence models are described. A device (e.g., an application server) may receive a request to run an artificial intelligence model. The device may run the artificial intelligence model on a public data set and an extended set of data that includes both the public data set and a private data set. The device may determine a first set of outcomes based on running the artificial intelligence model on the public data set and a second set of outcomes based on rerunning the model on the extended set of data. The device may then compare the two sets of outcomes to determine whether a private data value is identifiable based on the second set of outcomes. If a private data value is identifiable, the device may obfuscate the results prior to transmitting the results to the requestor.

column2: METHODS AND APPARATUS FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELS AND FEATURE ENGINEERING TO PREDICT EVENTS
column4: Provided herein are methods and systems for selecting featured within high dimensional datasets to predict an event. In one embodiment, a method comprises determining, by a processor, a probability of occurrence of one or more features within a high dimensional patient dataset; profiling, by the processor, the one or more features in accordance with their respective probability of occurrence; executing, by the processor, a feature generation model to select at least one feature from the profiled features and a corresponding time window for the at least one feature; executing, by the processor, a time search model to select at least one time interval from a set of time intervals that includes time intervals associated with the profiled features or the at least one feature; executing, by the processor, a meta-learning model to calculate a fitness score based on the at least one feature and the at least one time interval; and using, by the processor, responsive to the at least one feature having the fitness score that satisfies a threshold, the at least one feature to predict an event associated with a patient.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VISUAL PLATFORM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence visual platform comprising a box body which comprises a bottom box body and a top box body which is assembled on the bottom box body and can be opened and closed; the visual module is mounted in the bottom box body and is used for shooting an image of the article; the supporting platform is mounted in the bottom box body and is positioned below the visual module; and the personal computer can be accommodated in the bottom box body and can be supported on the supporting platform. When the artificial intelligence visual platform is in a use state, the personal computer is taken out from the box body so as to allow a shot article to be supported on the supporting platform; and when the artificial intelligence visual platform is in a non-use state, the personal computer is stored in the box body and is supported on the supporting platform. The artificial intelligence visual platform is small in size, simple in structure and convenient to carry.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING CAMERA CONVENIENT TO ADJUST
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence monitoring camera convenient to adjust, which comprises a mounting ring, a driving bin is fixedly connected to the middle of the upper end of the mounting ring, a small electric motor is fixedly connected to the inner bottom of the driving bin, and a driving rod is fixedly connected to the driving end of the upper end of the small electric motor. A rotating rod is fixedly connected to the upper end of the driving rod, limiting bolts are slidably connected to the interiors of openings in the middles of the left side and the right side of the mounting base correspondingly, the limiting bolts are sleeved with reset springs correspondingly, the ends, close to each other, of the limiting bolts are fixedly connected with limiting blocks correspondingly, and a camera body is arranged in an opening in the upper end of the mounting base; limiting grooves are formed in the middles of the left side and the right side of the camera body. According to the utility model, the limiting block is inserted into the limiting groove, so that the camera body can be quickly mounted, and the camera body can rotate during working, so that dead-corner-free shooting during monitoring can be realized.

column2: LONG-FOCUS AND SHORT-FOCUS MIXED ZOOM PAN-TILT CAMERA DEVICE AND INTELLIGENT INTERACTION PANEL
column4: The utility model discloses a long-focus and short-focus mixed zoom pan-tilt camera device and an intelligent interaction panel. The long-focus and short-focus mixed zoom pan-tilt camera device comprises a machine body; the short-focus lens is mounted on the machine body; the telephoto lens is movably mounted on the machine body through the holder assembly; the first driving mechanism is used for driving the telephoto lens to rotate leftwards or rightwards relative to the machine body; the second driving mechanism is used for driving the telephoto lens to rotate upwards or downwards relative to the machine body; the main control module is electrically connected with the first driving mechanism and the second driving mechanism; the intelligent interaction panel comprises the long-focus and short-focus mixed zoom pan-tilt camera device. According to the long-focus and short-focus mixed zoom pan-tilt camera device, the size can be reduced and a better imaging effect can be obtained while the multi-focus shooting requirement is met, and the view finding position of the long-focus lens can be adjusted and an image can be amplified at a fixed point; the camera device adopted by the intelligent interaction panel is small in occupied space, good in imaging effect and better in interaction experience.

column2: METHOD FOR RECORDING INDEPENDENT EVIDENCE AND COMPLETE FACTS OF ACCIDENTS IN INTELLIGENT DRIVING
column4: The invention relates to a method for recording independent evidences and complete facts of accidents in intelligent driving, and belongs to the field of automobile event data recording systems, vehicle-mounted video driving recording systems, road vehicle driving control systems, driver auxiliary systems, automatic driving, artificial intelligence and intelligent automobiles. During intelligent driving of a vehicle, various accidents such as errors, failures and abnormities occur in links such as sensing, positioning, planning, control and man-machine interaction, so that a user feels unsolved, uncomfortable, unsafe and dissatisfactory, and even encounters accidents. According to the utility model, equipment which is not carried by a vehicle is used for collecting various independent evidences related to an accident, and detailed continuous expressions, especially intelligent related expressions, of people and vehicles in the whole process before, during and after the accident are recorded mainly through time-synchronous multi-view and multi-position targeted video shooting; a reproducible comprehensive, complete, clear and accurate fact information record about the accident causes and consequences of intelligent driving is formed, a user is helped to record accident encounters, and legitimate rights and interests are maintained.

column2: WATER POLLUTION DIAGNOSIS METHOD BASED ON SATELLITE IMAGE ANALYSIS
column4: The invention discloses a water pollution diagnosis method based on satellite image analysis, and relates to the technical field of water pollution detection. Comprising the steps of S1 ground detector arrangement, S2 water area contour line confirmation, S3 water level height change confirmation, S4 pollution range and pollution degree confirmation, S5 pollution amount confirmation caused by rainfall, S6 water purification pollution amount time period confirmation, S7 water level height real-time forecasting and S8 artificial intelligence data analysis. The water area contour line, the diving flow direction, the water level height change period, the water body pollution amount and the pollution range are judged through the satellite image, the detection precision is improved with the assistance of the ground detector, the reading precision of the satellite on the water flow data of the detected water area can be effectively improved, and after the satellite obtains the meteorological data, the detection precision is improved. The difference between the water quantity and the pollution quantity in the river section before and after raining can be calculated, so that the pollution quantity, the pollution range and the influence time of raining on the river can be accurately and quantitatively calculated, and the technical vacancy in the field is made up.

column2: INTELLIGENT FINANCIAL WORK SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention provides an intelligent financial working method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining an electronic picture, wherein the electronic picture comprises an electronic certificate for scanning or shooting a financial related bill; identifying characters, numbers and symbols of the electronic picture through an OCR (optical character recognition) technology, and classifying and storing the identified data according to types of input, output, bank receipts and fees; calculating the data through an AI artificial intelligence algorithm and correspondingly generating financial special data; sending the generated special financial data to a display screen for display, so that financial staff can perform manual inspection; when a command of the financial special data confirmed by the financial staff is received, storing the financial special data to a financial system; generating a preset financial data report from the financial special data in the financial system; an AiiBill system is adopted to replace financial staff to input financial related bill data, and automatic accounting is carried out.

column2: ABNORMAL INFORMATION DETECTION MODEL CONSTRUCTION METHOD AND GRAY ENVIRONMENT ANOMALY DETECTION METHOD
column4: The invention provides a construction method of an abnormal information detection model and a gray environment anomaly detection method, which can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence. The construction method comprises the steps that a training sample is acquired, the training sample comprises training data and a sample label, the training data comprises a first historical detection deviation degree, and the first historical detection deviation degree is generated based on first historical detection data running in a gray environment and second historical detection data running in a formal environment of a to-be-detected system; the sample label comprises a second historical deviation degree; obtaining N initial models; training each initial model in the N initial models by using the training data to obtain N trained prediction models; determining respective prediction precision of the N prediction models according to the sample labels; and according to the respective prediction precision of the N prediction models, constructing an abnormal information detection model. The invention further provides a construction device of the abnormal information detection model, a gray environment anomaly detection device, equipment, a medium and a program product.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR PLAYING PANORAMIC VIDEO, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a method and device for playing a panoramic video, computer equipment and a storage medium, can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence and the like, and is used for solving the problem that the playing flexibility of the panoramic video is relatively low. The method comprises the following steps: in response to a watching operation of a target object for a panoramic video presented in a display interface, playing the panoramic video at an initial view angle, and shooting the target object to obtain a target video stream; extracting a target video frame from the target video stream by taking a preset duration as a period, and predicting a viewpoint prediction position of a viewpoint of the target object falling on the display interface by adopting a trained viewpoint prediction model based on the extracted target video frame; and adjusting the initial view angle based on the viewpoint prediction position, and continuing to play the panoramic video.

column2: SELF-ADAPTIVE DATA SYNCHRONIZATION SYSTEM, CONTROL METHOD AND APPLICATION
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of big data processing, and discloses a self-adaptive data synchronization system, a control method and application, and the self-adaptive data synchronization system comprises a data source layer, a read plug-in layer, a frame component, a data layer, a write plug-in layer, a database and a running environment. And the data source layer comprises Mysql, MongoDB, Clickhome and the like. The data source layer comprises Mysql, MongoDB, Clickhome and the like. The framework assembly comprises self-adaptive thread scheduling, task scheduling, system setting, storage scheduling and a UI interface. The operation environment comprises an Ali cloud host, an independent server and a third-party virtual host. According to the invention, a scheduler for automatic thread allocation is designed, and the number of threads for data synchronization is allocated according to the number of cores of a current CPU (Central Processing Unit). According to the method, CPU resources can be fully utilized, under the condition of a large number of synchronous tasks, it is guaranteed that the total speed of writing in databases such as Hbase is roughly equal to the total speed of all threads used by one task, and the problem of thread dynamic allocation is solved.

column2: INTELLIGENT VOICE PLAYING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides an intelligent voice playing method and equipment, relates to the technical field of electronics, can be applied to artificial intelligence (AI) fitness scenes, and can play different voices according to the current training state and training action of a user in real time, so that real-time voice feedback and real-time guidance of action improvement are provided for the user, and the user experience is improved. And the voice content is rich and changeable, and the user experience is good. According to the specific scheme, the electronic equipment displays an interface of a first application program, and the first application program is used for exercise training of a user; collecting an image of a user training action; the animation of the standard action is played, and the image of the training action of the user is displayed; determining a plurality of to-be-selected voices triggered by a first action unit in the training actions of the user, wherein the first action unit is a training action or a part of the training action; and selecting one voice from the to-be-selected voices for playing. The embodiment of the invention is used for playing voice.

column2: SECURITY SENSING SPECTRUM SHARING METHOD BASED ON DISCRETE TIME ENERGY COLLECTION
column4: The invention discloses a security sensing spectrum sharing method based on discrete time energy collection. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a relay-assisted cooperative cognitive radio network adopting an NOMA scheme; designing a security sensing spectrum sharing scheme; carrying out battery charging and discharging dynamic simulation based on a finite state Markov chain; and analyzing system performance and performing parameter optimization to complete security sensing spectrum sharing. According to the method, the two antennas are deployed at the receiving end to realize full-duplex communication, joint optimization is performed on system transmission parameters, and one antenna is used for transmitting artificial noise with optimized power during information receiving, so that the transmission rate of information can be ensured, an eavesdropping end can be effectively interfered to receive confidential information, and the security of the eavesdropping end is improved. And meanwhile, the cost and the deployment complexity are reduced.

column2: INTELLIGENT ELEVATOR AND DIGITAL MANAGEMENT AND CONTROL SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides an intelligent elevator and a digital management and control system, the intelligent elevator comprises an elevator, the bottom of the elevator is provided with a built-in transportation device, and the elevator is provided with a plurality of scanners; an aisle transportation device is arranged on each floor on one side of the elevator, and a bar code is arranged on the cargo transportation trolley; the aisle transportation device and the built-in transportation device are controlled to move, the scanner scans bar codes, and automatic transportation and intelligent cargo state recording are achieved. The digital management unit and the central processing unit are connected with each other, the digital management unit receives bar code information on a freight trolley, the central processing unit sends instructions to the multiple elevators, and the running states of the multiple elevators are displayed in real time; a plurality of elevators are controlled, monitored and managed without manual work, cargo transportation recording, supervision and inquiry of cargo transportation trolleys on different floors are achieved, and operation without artificial intelligence is achieved. By adopting digital management and a central processing unit, an optimal transportation path is realized under the condition of a large number of cargoes. And the method has a relatively high popularization value.

column2: QUANTIZATION METHOD AND SYSTEM OF BINARY INPUT MODEL, AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a quantization method of a binarization input model. The quantization method comprises the following steps: carrying out equalization processing on a preprocessed binarization input image; inputting the input image after equalization processing into a deep learning model for training to obtain model parameters; carrying out equivalent scaling on adjacent layers of the model parameters to obtain scaled model parameters; performing model quantization on the deep learning model with the scaled model parameters; the invention further discloses a binary input model system and a computer readable storage medium, the problem of precision loss in the quantization process of the binary input model in the prior art is solved, the precision loss of the model is reduced, and the running speed is increased.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides an image processing method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to computer vision, image processing and deep learning technologies. According to the implementation scheme, an image to be processed and a plurality of style images corresponding to a plurality of shooting times are obtained; obtaining a content feature code in the to-be-processed image; obtaining a plurality of style feature codes respectively corresponding to the plurality of style images; performing decoding processing on each style feature code in the plurality of style feature codes in combination with the content feature code to obtain a plurality of first images corresponding to a plurality of shooting times; and based on the time sequence of the plurality of shooting times, continuously playing the plurality of first images to obtain a first video.

column2: ROBOT TRACKING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a robot tracking system and method based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a plurality of cameras which are respectively arranged at preset positions of a crowded area and are used for shooting video pictures when people and animals appear in the crowded area at the same time; the movable robot is arranged in the crowded area; and the controller is in communication connection with each camera and the movable robot, and is used for generating an action track route of the movable robot according to the video picture and controlling the movable robot to walk according to the action track route.

column2: VIDEO PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a video processing method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a computer vision and deep learning technology, and can be used in a three-dimensional vision scene. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps of generating a first three-dimensional motion track of a virtual three-dimensional model in a world space based on attribute information of a target contact surface of the virtual three-dimensional model in the world space; the first three-dimensional motion trail is converted into a second three-dimensional motion trail in a camera space, and the camera space is a three-dimensional space for shooting the initial video; determining a motion sequence of the virtual three-dimensional model in the camera space by using the second three-dimensional motion track; and performing synthesis processing on the virtual three-dimensional model and the initial video through the texture information and the motion sequence of the virtual three-dimensional model to obtain a target video to be played.

column2: EXERCISE COACHING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention relates to an exercise coaching device based on artificial intelligence. The exercise pose extraction unit of an exercise coaching device, according to an embodiment of the present invention, can generate pose data by extracting the exercise pose of an exercising individual from an exercise image captured by means of an image capturing unit. In addition, an exercise pose analysis unit can receive pose data on the basis of artificial intelligence to infer whether the exercise pose is the correct pose. Moreover, the exercise coaching device according to an embodiment of the present invention may further include a coaching information output unit for outputting exercise coaching information on the basis of the inference result of the exercise pose analysis unit. Therefore, whether the exercise pose is correct is accurately inferred on the basis of artificial intelligence so that exercise coaching information appropriate therefor can be provided to a user.

column2: INTEGRATED MONITORING AND ANALYSIS SYSTEMS AND METHODS
column4: Systems and methods monitor a space for environmental pollutants. A sensing device senses and reports air quality anomalies to a cloud detection service. The cloud detection service uses artificial intelligence to analyze raw sensor data from the sensing device, determines whether the raw sensor data indicates an air quality event, and sends an air quality report indicative of the air quality event to a client device associated with the sensing device and/or the monitored space. A sensing device may be deployed in an air extraction vent to detect and report indications of vaping in prohibited spaces. A sensing device may be deployed in a vehicle to detect and report smoking in vehicles where smoking is prohibited. An application running on a mobile device reports detection of a short-range wireless beacon within a serviceable space to a cloud detection service, which tracks servicing of the serviceable space.

column2: PERFORMING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SIGN LANGUAGE TRANSLATION SERVICES IN A VIDEO RELAY SERVICE ENVIRONMENT
column4: Video relay services, communication systems, non-transitory machine-readable storage media, and methods are disclosed herein. A video relay service may include at least one server configured to receive a video stream including sign language content from a video communication device during a real-time communication session. The server may also be configured to automatically translate the sign language content into a verbal language translation during the real-time communication session without assistance of a human sign language interpreter. Further, the server may be configured to transmit the verbal language translation during the real-time communication session.

column2: METHODS AND APPARATUS FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELS AND FEATURE ENGINEERING TO PREDICT EVENTS
column4: Provided herein are methods and systems for selecting featured within high dimensional datasets to predict an event. In one embodiment, a method comprises determining, by a processor, a probability of occurrence of one or more features within a high dimensional patient dataset; profiling, by the processor, the one or more features in accordance with their respective probability of occurrence; executing, by the processor, a feature generation model to select at least one feature from the profiled features and a corresponding time window for the at least one feature; executing, by the processor, a time search model to select at least one time interval from a set of time intervals that includes time intervals associated with the profiled features or the at least one feature; executing, by the processor, a meta-learning model to calculate a fitness score based on the at least one feature and the at least one time interval; and using, by the processor, responsive to the at least one feature having the fitness score that satisfies a threshold, the at least one feature to predict an event associated with a patient.

column2: RRC CONNECTION RELEASE CONTROL METHOD AND APPARATUS
column4: An RRC connection release control method and apparatus, which are applied to the technical field of mobile communications, and relate to the field of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning algorithms. In the present application, during a first application program of a terminal running in a foreground, a timing duration of a first timer is set according to a timing duration corresponding to the first application program, wherein the first timer is a timer used when the terminal is in an RRC connected state; when the terminal is in the RRC connected state, the first timer starts timing; and when the terminal performs information exchange with a network device, the first timer is reset, thereby controlling the RRC connection release of the terminal on the basis of the first timer. By means of the present application, RRC connection release of a terminal can be controlled, such that the power consumption of the terminal can be reduced.

column2: INTELLIGENT SPEECH PLAYING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: An intelligent voice playing method and a device are provided, which relate to the field of electronic technologies, and may be applied to an artificial intelligence fitness scenario, so that different voices can be played in real time for a current training state and training action of a user, to provide the user with real-time voice feedback and real-time guidance for action improvement. In addition, voice content is abundant and diversified, and user experience is relatively good. The voice playing method includes: displaying, by an electronic device, an interface of a first application, where the first application is used by a user to perform exercise training (1301); capturing an image of a training action of the user (1302); playing an video of a standard action, and displaying the image of the training action of the user (1303); determining a plurality of to-be-selected voices triggered by a first action unit in the training action of the user, where the first action unit is one training action or a part of one training action (1304); and selecting a voice from the to-be-selected voices for playing (1305).

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an image processing method and device, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning and computer vision, and can be applied to scenes such as face recognition. According to the implementation scheme, a target image and an infrared image obtained by shooting a first object through a first image obtaining device and a second image obtaining device respectively are obtained; in response to determining that the target image contains the target object, based on the target image, obtaining a detection result indicating whether the infrared image corresponds to the target object; and in response to the detection result indicating that the infrared image does not correspond to the target object, determining that the first object corresponds to a first classification in the plurality of classifications.

column2: HANDHELD INSPECTION TERMINAL
column4: The utility model provides a handheld inspection terminal, which comprises a front cover and a rear cover, the camera module is embedded in the front cover and is used for shooting the to-be-inspected equipment so as to obtain image information of the to-be-inspected equipment; the sound acquisition module is embedded in the front cover and is used for acquiring audio information of the to-be-inspected equipment; the AI artificial intelligence board is arranged in a cavity formed by the front cover and the rear cover, and the AI artificial intelligence board is connected with the camera module and the sound acquisition module and is used for carrying out data processing on the image information and the audio information so as to obtain an inspection result of the to-be-inspected equipment; and the touch display screen is connected with the AI artificial intelligence board, and the touch display screen is used for displaying the inspection result. Therefore, the workload of a user is greatly reduced, the inspection accuracy is improved, the inspection environment requirement is low, the operation configuration is simple, the practicability is high, and meanwhile, the production cost is greatly reduced.

column2: EXCEL FILE DATA IMPORT METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a data import method and device of an excel file, computer equipment and a storage medium, the method comprises the following steps: when a file data import request triggered by a user is received and a current event is in a running idle time period, extracting the excel file from the file data import request; performing header extraction processing on the excel file to obtain first header information; performing adjustment processing on the data of the excel file to obtain a processed excel file; if the data processing amount of the processed excel file is greater than a preset processing amount threshold value, calling an analysis tool to perform data reading processing on the processed file to obtain target data in the processed file; and importing the target data into a preset system. According to the method and the device, the problem of memory overflow in the traditional process of importing the data in the excel file can be solved, and the processing efficiency of data importing of the excel file is improved. The method can also be applied to the field of block chains, and the target data can be stored on the block chain.

column2: PERFORMING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SIGN LANGUAGE TRANSLATION SERVICES IN A VIDEO RELAY SERVICE ENVIRONMENT
column4: Video relay services, communication systems, non-transitory machine-readable storage media, and methods are disclosed herein. A video relay service may include at least one server configured to receive a video stream including sign language content from a video communication device during a real-time communication session. The server may also be configured to automatically translate the sign language content into a verbal language translation during the real-time communication session without assistance of a human sign language interpreter. Further, the server may be configured to transmit the verbal language translation during the real-time communication session.

column2: METHODS AND APPARATUS FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELS AND FEATURE ENGINEERING TO PREDICT EVENTS
column4: Provided herein are methods and systems for selecting featured within high dimensional datasets to predict an event. In one embodiment, a method comprises determining, by a processor, a probability of occurrence of one or more features within a high dimensional patient dataset; profiling, by the processor, the one or more features in accordance with their respective probability of occurrence; executing, by the processor, a feature generation model to select at least one feature from the profiled features and a corresponding time window for the at least one feature; executing, by the processor, a time search model to select at least one time interval from a set of time intervals that includes time intervals associated with the profiled features or the at least one feature; executing, by the processor, a meta-learning model to calculate a fitness score based on the at least one feature and the at least one time interval; and using, by the processor, responsive to the at least one feature having the fitness score that satisfies a threshold, the at least one feature to predict an event associated with a patient.

column2: RRC CONNECTION RELEASE CONTROL METHOD AND APPARATUS
column4: An RRC connection release control method and apparatus, which are applied to the technical field of mobile communications, and relate to the field of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning algorithms. In the present application, during a first application program of a terminal running in a foreground, a timing duration of a first timer is set according to a timing duration corresponding to the first application program, wherein the first timer is a timer used when the terminal is in an RRC connected state; when the terminal is in the RRC connected state, the first timer starts timing; and when the terminal performs information exchange with a network device, the first timer is reset, thereby controlling the RRC connection release of the terminal on the basis of the first timer. By means of the present application, RRC connection release of a terminal can be controlled, such that the power consumption of the terminal can be reduced.

column2: INTELLIGENT SPEECH PLAYING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: An intelligent voice playing method and a device are provided, which relate to the field of electronic technologies, and may be applied to an artificial intelligence fitness scenario, so that different voices can be played in real time for a current training state and training action of a user, to provide the user with real-time voice feedback and real-time guidance for action improvement. In addition, voice content is abundant and diversified, and user experience is relatively good. The voice playing method includes: displaying, by an electronic device, an interface of a first application, where the first application is used by a user to perform exercise training (1301); capturing an image of a training action of the user (1302); playing an video of a standard action, and displaying the image of the training action of the user (1303); determining a plurality of to-be-selected voices triggered by a first action unit in the training action of the user, where the first action unit is one training action or a part of one training action (1304); and selecting a voice from the to-be-selected voices for playing (1305).

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an image processing method and device, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning and computer vision, and can be applied to scenes such as face recognition. According to the implementation scheme, a target image and an infrared image obtained by shooting a first object through a first image obtaining device and a second image obtaining device respectively are obtained; in response to determining that the target image contains the target object, based on the target image, obtaining a detection result indicating whether the infrared image corresponds to the target object; and in response to the detection result indicating that the infrared image does not correspond to the target object, determining that the first object corresponds to a first classification in the plurality of classifications.

column2: HANDHELD INSPECTION TERMINAL
column4: The utility model provides a handheld inspection terminal, which comprises a front cover and a rear cover, the camera module is embedded in the front cover and is used for shooting the to-be-inspected equipment so as to obtain image information of the to-be-inspected equipment; the sound acquisition module is embedded in the front cover and is used for acquiring audio information of the to-be-inspected equipment; the AI artificial intelligence board is arranged in a cavity formed by the front cover and the rear cover, and the AI artificial intelligence board is connected with the camera module and the sound acquisition module and is used for carrying out data processing on the image information and the audio information so as to obtain an inspection result of the to-be-inspected equipment; and the touch display screen is connected with the AI artificial intelligence board, and the touch display screen is used for displaying the inspection result. Therefore, the workload of a user is greatly reduced, the inspection accuracy is improved, the inspection environment requirement is low, the operation configuration is simple, the practicability is high, and meanwhile, the production cost is greatly reduced.

column2: EXCEL FILE DATA IMPORT METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a data import method and device of an excel file, computer equipment and a storage medium, the method comprises the following steps: when a file data import request triggered by a user is received and a current event is in a running idle time period, extracting the excel file from the file data import request; performing header extraction processing on the excel file to obtain first header information; performing adjustment processing on the data of the excel file to obtain a processed excel file; if the data processing amount of the processed excel file is greater than a preset processing amount threshold value, calling an analysis tool to perform data reading processing on the processed file to obtain target data in the processed file; and importing the target data into a preset system. According to the method and the device, the problem of memory overflow in the traditional process of importing the data in the excel file can be solved, and the processing efficiency of data importing of the excel file is improved. The method can also be applied to the field of block chains, and the target data can be stored on the block chain.

column2: NOVEL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE COMPUTER CASE
column4: The utility model discloses a novel artificial intelligence computer case in the field of computers, which comprises a case body, a casing is mounted on the inner bottom wall of the case body, a memory slot is mounted on the inner wall of the casing, two clips are movably connected to the inner wall of the memory slot, and a memory component is mounted on the inner wall of the memory slot. The bottom surface of the internal storage assembly is provided with two hydraulic telescopic rods, the upper surface of the internal storage assembly is provided with a lifting ring, the back surface of the box body is fixedly embedded with a shock pad, and the inner side wall of the box body is provided with sound-absorbing cotton. The purpose of increasing the capacity without replacing a new memory bank is achieved, the problem that the computer running speed is low due to the fact that the memory capacity in a computer case is small is solved, the effects of lifting and protecting the memory assembly can be achieved through cooperation of the hydraulic telescopic rod, the lifting ring and the shell, and the purpose of protecting and storing the memory assembly when the memory assembly is not used is achieved.

column2: WELDING SHIELD WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-CONTROLLED DISPLAY
column4: Welder's shield with AI includes a frame for mounting on a user's head; a camera mounted on the frame and directed forward toward welding zone, to obtain images of welding zone as video data; a display on an inner side of the frame; an optical device to enable the user to see the display; battery; processor receiving a video data from the camera; the processor running an AI application to process the video data; the processor displaying images on the display based on output of the AI application; the artificial intelligence application receiving the video data and detecting a welding arc in the welding zone using a pattern recognition algorithm; and the AI application modifying the video data to reduce an intensity of the welding arc in the images that are to be displayed on the display, without reducing an intensity of the rest of the images.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PROCESSING SLIDER FOR VIRTUAL CHARACTER
column4: The present disclosure discloses a method and apparatus for processing a slider for a virtual character, an electronic device, a storage medium, and a computer program product, relating to a field of virtual reality, in particular to fields of artificial intelligence, Internet of Things, voice technology, cloud computing, etc.. An implementation includes: acquiring a shape model associated with a target semantic tag; acquiring a skeleton and skinning information of a reference virtual character; fitting the shape model based on the skeleton and skinning information to obtain a skeleton linkage coefficient; and generating a slider associated with the target semantic tag based on the skeleton linkage coefficient, wherein the slider is used to drive the reference virtual character to obtain a target virtual character complying with a target semantic feature contained in the target semantic tag.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR MEASURING AND ANALYZING BODY MOVEMENT, POSITIONING AND POSTURE
column4: One aspect of the invention provides a computer-based method for providing corrective feedback about exercise form, the method comprising; recording a user performing a specific exercise: evaluating, by the computer, with machine learning, computer vision, or deep learning models that have been previously trained in order to evaluate the form of a user by training on labelled and or unlabeled datasets that consist of: both correct and incorrect exercise form for the different types of exercises being evaluated; identifying the user throughout the video, the exercise type, each repetition of the exercise, the user's errors in form; and then generating, by the computer, corrective feedback for the user on how to improve exercise form for subsequent repetitions; and communicating, via an output device, the corrective feedback to the user.

column2: WELDING SHIELD WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-CONTROLLED DISPLAY
column4: Welder's shield with AI includes a frame for mounting on a user's head; a camera mounted on the frame and directed forward toward welding zone, to obtain images of welding zone as video data; a display on an inner side of the frame; an optical device to enable the user to see the display; battery; processor receiving a video data from the camera; the processor running an AI application to process the video data; the processor displaying images on the display based on output of the AI application; the artificial intelligence application receiving the video data and detecting a welding arc in the welding zone using a pattern recognition algorithm; and the AI application modifying the video data to reduce an intensity of the welding arc in the images that are to be displayed on the display, without reducing an intensity of the rest of the images.

column2: MONITORING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence monitoring, in particular to a monitoring system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a monitoring camera, a protective cover shell, a temperature sensor, an electric control baffle plate, a radiator, a connecting seat, a rotating disc and a fixed seat, the temperature sensor is installed on the top of the protective cover shell, the electric control baffle and the radiator are installed on the left side and the right side of the monitoring camera, the electric control baffle can cover the front of the radiator when extending downwards to the limit, the bottom of the monitoring camera is fixedly connected with the top of the connecting base, and the bottom of the connecting base is fixedly connected with the top of the rotating disc. The bottom of the rotating disc is fixedly connected with the fixing base, a control host is arranged in the monitoring camera, and the temperature sensor, the electric control baffle and the rotating disc are all electrically connected with the control host. The monitoring system based on artificial intelligence can work normally in a hot environment and a severe cold environment, and can carry out camera shooting horizontal angle conversion.

column2: MONITORING SHOPLIFTING ACTIVITY IN MEGASTORES THROUGH AI BASED SURVEILLANCE SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The present invention an AI (Artificial Intelligence) based surveillance system and a method of monitoring shoplifting activity in megastores. The system includes a camera (101), a posture generation module, a skeleton pre-processing module, a feature evaluation module, a feature reduction module, an activity classification module, a monitoring module (102) and an alert generating module (103). Through the present system, the surveillance by using a camera-based system with a height mounted camera (101) placed at a particular distance to capture the real-time video stream. The same video stream is then processed in real-time by a video processing subsystem to identify whether any person is involved in shoplifting act or not. Further, it generates a warning message on the monitoring screen and an alert when shoplifting occurs as a consequent outcome of the system.

column2: METHOD FOR PROCESSING SLIDER FOR VIRTUAL CHARACTER, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The present disclosure discloses a method for processing a slider for a virtual character, an electronic device, and a storage medium, relating to a field of virtual reality, in particular to fields of artificial intelligence, Internet of Things, voice technology, cloud computing, etc. An implementation includes: acquiring a shape model associated with a target semantic tag; acquiring a skeleton and skinning information of a reference virtual character; fitting the shape model based on the skeleton and skinning information to obtain a skeleton linkage coefficient; and generating a slider associated with the target semantic tag based on the skeleton linkage coefficient, wherein the slider is used to drive the reference virtual character to obtain a target virtual character complying with a target semantic feature contained in the target semantic tag.

column2: TRAINING AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE / MACHINE LEARNING MODEL TO RECOGNIZE APPLICATIONS, SCREENS, AND USER INTERFACE ELEMENTS USING COMPUTER VISION
column4: Techniques for training an artificial intelligence (AI) / machine learning (ML) model to recognize applications, screens, and UI elements using computer vision (CV) and to recognize user interactions with the applications, screens, and UI elements. Optical character recognition (OCR) may also be used to assist in training the AI/ML model. Training of the AI/ML model may be performed without other system inputs such as system-level information (e.g., key presses, mouse clicks, locations, operating system operations, etc.) or application-level information (e.g., information from an application programming interface (API) from a software application executing on a computing system), or the training of the AI/ML model may be supplemented by other information, such as browser history, heat maps, file information, currently running applications and locations, system level and/or application-level information, etc.

column2: USER KNOWLEDGE TRACKING DEVICE, SYSTEM, AND OPERATION METHOD THEREOF BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LEARNING
column4: A user knowledge tracking device is provided. The user knowledge tracking device use a transformer structure-based artificial intelligence model as a knowledge tracking model which is trained by inputting exercise information to an encoder thereof and inputting response information to a decoder thereof so as to predict a user's correct answer probability based on the trained knowledge tracking model.

column2: BUS TEACHING AID BASED ON INTERNET OF THINGS
column4: The utility model discloses a bus teaching aid based on Internet of Things, which belongs to the technical field of teaching aids and comprises a bus teaching aid base body, an electric skylight is embedded in the middle of the top end of the bus teaching aid base body, a display is mounted in the middle of one end of the bus teaching aid base body, and a bottom plate is mounted at the bottom end of the inner wall of the bus teaching aid base body. A storage battery is installed on one side of the top end of the bottom plate, and a controller is installed at the position, located on one side of the storage battery, of the top end of the bottom plate. According to the bus teaching aid base body, various traffic accidents of a bus running on a road can be simulated conveniently, various alarming, escaping and positioning means are added, the bus teaching aid base body can be moved conveniently, objects in the bus teaching aid base body can escape conveniently, and therefore simulation teaching is conducted on an existing bus.

column2: CYLINDRICAL CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the utility model discloses a cylindrical climbing robot which is used for adapting to cylindrical bodies with different sizes and diameters. The device specifically comprises two trolley modules and an adjusting and tensioning module. The gantry type adjusting tensioning module comprises a transverse frame body, a first frame body and a second frame body, the first frame body and the second frame body are arranged on the two sides of the transverse frame body, the transverse frame body is connected with one trolley module in the two trolley modules, the first frame body is connected with one side of the other trolley module in the two trolley modules, and the second frame body is connected with the other side of the other trolley module. The relative distance between the two trolley modules is adjusted to adapt to the ruler diameter of the cylindrical body; and the trolley module can climb along the cylindrical body under the driving of the motor.

column2: A SYSTEM AND METHODS FOR PROVIDING SECURITY AND SAFETY OF KIDS USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: Artificial IntelligenceStairs can be found in almost every home. Everyone will want to make certain that tiny children do not have unsupervised access to these stairwells. because it is exceedingly hazardous. A fall from the top of the stairwell can result in serious injury, if not death. As a result, a baby safety gate is a necessary layer of security in every home. A safety gate, like a pool fence, provides a solid barrier at the bottom or top of your stairs. This prevents a crawling or climbing child from getting themselves into trouble. The Baby Safety Gate allows you to give your child the freedom to play, have fun, explore, and learn while being within easy monitoring range. This innovation suggests a baby gate based on artificial intelligence for giving security and protection to children. It is made up of a gate with an integrated LED light that allows you to see the gate in the dark, as well as Infrared Beam Motion sensor, PIR and IR motion sensors on the sides. When motion is detected within 8 feet, the light will automatically turn on for 05 seconds, ensuring your child's safety at night. It has a temperature sensor that continuously monitors the room temperature, as well as a humidity sensor that detects moisture in the baby's environment. All sensor data inputs are processed using an ANN algorithm with a threshold. If there is any violence against children, an alert will be sent to the parent's cell phone through text message. With this invention, parents will be able to take care of their children on time. It can effortlessly move across rooms, doorways, and stairwells.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED WIND SOLAR DIESEL HYBRID ELECTRIC VEHICLE
column4: A control technique for a hybrid electric vehicle that includes an electric motor, a lithium-ion battery, and an internal combustion engine is described in this invention. The control technique, which uses an adaptive control unit with an artificial neural network, increases fuel efficiency and decreases emissions while maintaining enough acceleration under various driving circumstances. On a pre-processed training set based on the highest fuel economy of several control techniques and varied driving profiles, the artificial neural network is taught to recognize patterns in the data. A training algorithm and a learning algorithm are used in the artificial neural network training. Additionally, the invention provides a method of running a hybrid electric vehicle that employs an adaptive control technique that is implemented via an artificial neural network.

column2: TRAINING AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE / MACHINE LEARNING MODEL TO RECOGNIZE APPLICATIONS, SCREENS, AND USER INTERFACE ELEMENTS USING COMPUTER VISION
column4: Techniques for training an artificial intelligence (AI)/machine learning (ML) model to recognize applications, screens, and UI elements using computer vision (CV) and to recognize user interactions with the applications, screens, and UI elements. Optical character recognition (OCR) may also be used to assist in training the AI/ML model. Training of the AI/ML model may be performed without other system inputs such as system-level information (e.g., key presses, mouse clicks, locations, operating system operations, etc.) or application-level information (e.g., information from an application programming interface (API) from a software application executing on a computing system), or the training of the AI/ML model may be supplemented by other information, such as browser history, heat maps, file information, currently running applications and locations, system level and/or application-level information, etc.

column2: STORAGE DEVICE FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ROBOT
column4: The storage device comprises a storage box, a notch is formed in the front end of the storage box, a cover plate is movably connected to the left portion of the front end of the storage box through a hinge, a containing plate is fixedly connected to the lower inner wall of the notch, and limiting rods are fixedly connected to the left groove wall and the right groove wall of the notch. The two limiting rods are located on the lower portion of the containing plate, an auxiliary climbing device is arranged between the containing plate and the two limiting rods, a plurality of buffering devices are fixedly connected to the left groove wall, the right groove wall and the rear groove wall of the groove opening, universal wheels are fixedly connected to the four corners of the lower end of the storage box, and a pull rod is fixedly connected to the rear end of the storage box. The buffering device comprises a buffering pad and a clamping plate, and clamping grooves are formed in the middle and the lower portion of the upper end of the clamping plate. The storage device for the artificial intelligence robot is good in protection effect, high in stability and suitable for being used for robot storage.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM OF COUNTING AND COLLECTING OBJECTS IN PACKAGING AUTOMATION PLATFORM
column4: Disclosed herein is a method/system of counting and collecting any kind of object irrespective of its shape, size, colour, texture, orientation, which is ready for packing in packaging automation platform. The invention employs a coarse feeder (29) and a fine feeder (30) to feed the objects (20) on two sets of motorized conveyors (100, 200) at a varying/fixed time interval; two cameras (1, 2) to acquire images of the objects carried on the conveyors (100, 200) running at variable speed towards a packing container (3); and an artificial intelligence/machine learning tool embedded processor (12) for counting accurately required number of objects in the images and finally dropping accurately the required number of objects into the packing container (3) in order to complete one packing cycle. Particularly, one packing container (3) is accurately filled with the required number of objects in one packing cycle by receiving all objects (20) from the coarse feeder side conveyer (100) except the last object/batch which is received from the fine feeder side conveyer (200). The user is also alerted immediately if any anomaly is found at the time of determining the number of objects present in the images.Fig. 2

column2: IOT BASED FISHING AND SECURITY SYSTEM FOR WATERCRAFT VESSELS
column4: The fishing sector is an integral part of our economy that provides livelihood to a vast majority of people. Fishing is a skill that requires substantial expertise and patience. Hence, automation of such a process can significantly reduce the labour cost and efforts. The security of fishermen during fishing activities is also a concern due to many hurdles such as climatic conditions, the crossing of boundaries, attacks from enemy naval vessels, etc, Artificial Intelligence can be used to effectively track the hazards and activities of the vessel. Thereby, it is deployed in order to ensure the protection of fishermen by integrating it with uninterrupted communication between the vessel and shore.The proposed fishing and security system primarily focuses on automating the fishing activity, in addition to ensuring the security of watercraft vessels. The fishing unit consists of a SONAR device to effectively locate the fish population with respect to density. Upon reaching an area with a threshold density, a motor is actuated to instantly release the fishing net towards the fish population. Imaging and image processing techniques are further done to practically calculate the count of fishes. Once the count reaches a threshold amount, the net is pulled up. Upon fetching, a classification using image acquisition devices is done to identify the variety of fish using Convolutional Neural Networks. Additionally, the activities happening inside the vessel as well as the presence of any intruders are also tracked by the system using artificial intelligence with the help of frames captured through the image acquisition devices. Regular updates are sent to the authority of all the fishing activities offshore using long-range communication methodologies and they are also notified in case of any emergencies in the vessel so that necessary actions can betaken.

column2: ADJUSTABLE MERRY GO ROUND
column4: An adjustable merry go round comprising, an elongated body 1 having a first and second portion(s) 2, 3, plurality of cycling units 4 for providing rides to multiple users, multiple concentric circular strips 6 for providing a path for cycling units 4 to move, at least two pedaling units 7 for moving the cycling units 4 on the strips 6, a display unit 8 for providing access to the user for selecting number of pedaling to be performed, an Artificial Intelligence (AI) camera 9 for real-time monitoring of the user, and a FBG (Fibre Bragg Grating) sensor 10 for determining vital parameters of the users, the microcontroller for generating a command to move the cycling unit 4 from one strip to other, and an anemometer 12 for detecting direction of wind flow, the microcontroller for generating a command to actuate a motorized ball and socket arranged on the handles 11.

column2: FITNESS-ASSISTED METHOD AND ELECTRONIC APPARATUS
column4: A fitness-assisted method in the field of artificial intelligence, characterized in that the method comprises: an electronic device acquiring a user's actions (S601); the electronic device determining, from the user's actions, an alternative action, where a motion trajectory of a first limb satisfies a first preset condition, in the user's actions (S602); the electronic device determining an action variation magnitude of a second limb in the alternative action (S603); and the electronic device determining to output guidance information according to the action variation magnitude (S604). By means of determining an alternative action where a limb motion trajectory satisfies a first preset condition, and according to the action variation magnitude of a limb in the alternative action, it can be accurately determined that a user performs a fitness action; and guidance information is output when it is determined that the user performs a fitness action, such that the accuracy of outputting the guidance information can be improved, and the user experience is improved.

column2: CONSTRUCTION METHOD OF UNIVERSAL HETEROGENEOUS ACCELERATION FRAMEWORK
column4: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence computing, and particularly relates to a construction method of a universal heterogeneous acceleration framework. The invention discloses a construction method of a universal heterogeneous acceleration framework. The construction method comprises the following steps: S1, determining a target operating system and heterogeneous intelligent hardware equipment; s2, the target operating system loads a driver and a calculation library of the heterogeneous intelligent hardware equipment and selects a calculation framework and a neural network model; s3, constructing an instantiated neural network model through the neural network model and the calculation framework; s4, compiling the instantiated neural network model into an intermediate presentation layer IR by using a deep learning compiler; the uniform interface API is written according to the calculation library; and S5, the target operating system imports a core component of the general heterogeneous acceleration framework, and compiles the core component into a software model running in heterogeneous intelligent hardware equipment.

column2: OPERATION METHOD OF NEURAL NETWORK MODEL, READABLE MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an operation method of a neural network model, a readable medium and electronic equipment. The method is applied to the electronic equipment of which a processor comprises a plurality of kernels, and comprises the following steps: in a process of running a neural network model, detecting that N idle kernels exist in the processor; for M computing nodes which are not operated currently in the neural network model, L computing nodes which are not operated are selected according to the sequence of the distribution priorities from high to low and are distributed to L idle kernels in the N idle kernels, N, M and L are positive integers, and L is smaller than or equal to N. The allocation priority of the computing node with the front running sequence is high, so that the idle rate of a processor core can be reduced, and the speed of running the neural network model by the electronic equipment is improved.

column2: TRANSPORTATION DEVICE AND COMBINED TRANSPORTATION DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses a transportation device and a combined transportation device, and belongs to the technical field of machinery, the transportation device comprises a regulator, an adapter, a supporting part and at least two movement devices, the regulator is respectively connected with the adapter and the supporting part, and the at least two movement devices are respectively connected with the adapter and the supporting part. The adjuster is in running fit with the adapter to adjust the relative position between the adapter and the supporting part, and the at least two movement devices are arranged at the two ends of the supporting part respectively. Synchronous position adjustment of at least two movement devices can be achieved through one-time adjustment operation, operation is easy and convenient, operation time in the transferring process is saved, the transportation device is small in size and wide in application range, different adapter plates can be matched through the adapters, and the transportation device is suitable for transferring equipment of different specifications and different weights.

column2: DATABASE MIGRATION METHOD AND SYSTEM AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a database migration method and system and a computer readable storage medium. The method comprises the steps that migration information of a main database is configured, and migration information of a standby database is configured; starting a Binlog increment reading process, a Binlog increment conversion process and a Binlog increment writing process of the standby database in parallel; reading the binary log file based on a Binlog increment reading process to generate a relay log file; reading the relay log file based on a Binlog increment conversion process, and performing format conversion on the relay log file to generate a converted log file; and analyzing the conversion log file based on the Binlog increment writing process, and writing the analyzed conversion log file into a standby database. According to the method, data of the main database is migrated to the standby database, and the problems that the main database is slow in response and large in occupied storage space along with the increase of the running time of the artificial intelligence platform are solved.

column2: VIDEO FACE RECOGNITION SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to a video face recognition system and method based on artificial intelligence. The video face recognition system comprises a supporting base, a supporting frame and a face recognition machine body. The supporting frame is vertically and fixedly connected to the supporting base. The face recognition machine body is connected to the supporting frame. The face recognition machine body is provided with a face recognition lens used for recognizing and shooting. The video face recognition system based on artificial intelligence further comprises a stepping type longitudinal and transverse movement mechanism and a butt clamp mechanism. The stepping type vertical and horizontal movement mechanism comprises a stepping type electric telescopic rod, a connecting guide rail, a driving motor, a first driving gear, a second driving gear, a connecting side plate, a first rack and a second rack. The method has the beneficial effects that the video does not need to be transmitted into a face recognition system for recognition, video recognition is directly carried out, the recognition efficiency is improved, and meanwhile, the recognition range is large.

column2: DESIGN INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM FOR SMART FOOD RECOMMENDATION USING ML FOR HEALTH MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column4: maintains all forms of health-related data in a safe and private manner throughout a person's life. Thanks to wireless sensors and wearable gadgets that use IoT devices, it is now feasible to measure an individual's physical activity, blood pressure, and glucose levels in real-time. As a result of the effective use of such data, the quality of healthcare management services has improved. Diabetes, arthritis, Alzheimer's disease, and heart disease are among the chronic disorders for which PHR is becoming more important.
