The present design is for health-care privileges, with a focus on individualized management of a user's health-care needs. A system for combining a user's personal risk analysis with resources utilized by health-care medical service providers, as well as food habits, patient condition, and other stakeholders in the user's health-care decision-making is presented in the invention. The PHR platform, which contains filters based on particular and well-known health risk indicators, as well as user preference models for each individual patient, underpins PHR's real-time health monitoring and management solution. Those who are worried about their own health can benefit from a mobile-based health management service and personal health record. Patient-centric health monitoring systems are rapidly replacing hospital-centric health monitoring systems in the medical field. To improve the recommendation system, we used Collaborative Filtering for meal suggestions. There are further benefits, such as standardization of personal health records, support for a smart digital food assistant-based health management system, patient health awareness, and hospital-to-hospital data exchange. AI is entering all parts of food systems, meaning that systemic changes are possible. Designers have a duty to understand and evaluate how artificial intelligence (AI) might help us move to more sustainable food systems as intermediates between humans, technology, and the environment.

column2: POULTRY HEALTH ASSESSMENT METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON GROUP EXERCISE AMOUNT STATISTICAL CHARACTERISTICS
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a poultry health assessment method and system based on group exercise amount statistical characteristics, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining poultry data from a foot ring which is worn by poultry and is provided with a three-axis sensor, and carrying out the preprocessing of the obtained data, and obtaining the poultry exercise amount data; performing abnormal data detection and correction on the poultry exercise amount data to obtain corrected poultry exercise amount data; performing statistics and data distribution on the poultry exercise amount data of the same individual and group in different time periods according to the corrected poultry exercise amount data, and performing individual scoring and group scoring on the poultry according to the statistics and data distribution results of the poultry exercise amount data; and evaluating the health state of the poultry in combination with the poultry exercise amount data, the individual scoring result and the group scoring result to obtain a poultry health evaluation result. The poultry health detection precision and accuracy can be effectively improved, and the poultry health condition can be visually reflected.

column2: AUTOMATIC DRIVING METHOD AND RELATED DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an automatic driving method in the field of artificial intelligence. The method can be applied to an intelligent automobile. The method comprises the steps that first information of a first target vehicle and second information of a second target vehicle are obtained, the vehicle has a collision risk with the first target vehicle and the second target vehicle, the first information comprises position information and speed information of the first target vehicle, and the second information comprises position information and speed information of the second target vehicle; a dynamic game model is established at least according to the first information and the second information, the first information is used for determining conflict loss in the dynamic game model, and the second information is used for determining safety distance loss in the dynamic game model; determining a driving strategy according to the dynamic game model; and controlling the vehicle to run according to the running strategy. Based on the scheme of the invention, the safety of automatic driving can be improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AUTOMATIC DETECTION METHOD FOR EMBEDDING QUALITY OF SEISMIC ACQUISITION RECEIVING DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence automatic detection method for the embedding quality of an earthquake acquisition receiving device, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, shooting a field image of the earthquake acquisition receiving device, and screening out a clear image; s2, performing feature labeling on the clear images by using a label labeling tool, classifying the images into qualified images and unqualified images, and storing the images as xml label files; s3, building a YOLOv3 neural network, setting network parameters, carrying out iterative training, outputting a model after each round of training, and selecting an optimal prediction model according to an evaluation index of prediction accuracy; and S4, performing classification prediction on an image of a to-be-predicted seismic acquisition receiving device by using the optimal prediction model. According to the method, construction quality inspection can be quickly and effectively carried out, the effectiveness and timeliness of quality control are improved, the quality control cost is reduced, the construction efficiency is improved, quality inspection personnel are helped to realize quick evaluation of instrument installation quality, and the acquisition quality of seismic data is ensured.

column2: METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT FOR MINING UNBALANCED DATA SET IN GAME AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to a method, device and equipment for mining an unbalanced data set in a game and a medium. The method comprises the steps that a plurality of data sets are constructed, wherein each data set is composed of game objects; acquiring a difficulty prediction value of each data group through a data group difficulty prediction model, wherein the difficulty prediction value indicates an acquisition probability of extracting game objects from a game object pool to form a corresponding data group; an intensity prediction value for each data set is obtained through a data set intensity prediction model, which indicates a winning rate of each data set to a set of reference data sets. The method further comprises the following steps: obtaining the fitness of each data group according to the difficulty prediction value and the intensity prediction value of each data group; and mining an unbalanced data group based on the fitness of each data group through a data group mining model, wherein the unbalanced data group refers to a data group of which the winning rate is not matched with the acquisition probability. By the adoption of the method, the balance of the game data set can be reasonably adjusted through the artificial intelligence model.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR IDENTIFYING SUSPECTED ARTICLE, MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a suspected article identification method and device, a computer readable storage medium and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of computers, the identification method comprises the following steps: when a new suspected article appears in a shooting area, generating a shooting instruction; after receiving a first suspected article image shot by the camera shooting equipment according to the camera shooting instruction, acquiring the first suspected article image; performing artificial intelligence image recognition on the first suspected article image to obtain an image recognition result; performing data matching in a dangerous goods database according to the image recognition result to obtain dangerous goods classification data; and generating suspected article registration data according to the image recognition result and the dangerous article classification data. According to the technical scheme of the embodiment of the invention, the method can improve the recognition efficiency of suspected article recognition, and enables the recognition result to contain more comprehensive information.

column2: BOTANY INTELLIGENT TEACHING INSTRUMENT AND BOTANY ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PLANTING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a botany intelligent teaching instrument, and belongs to the field of botany artificial intelligence. Comprising a three-dimensional planter (1), an interaction screen (7) and a plant growth detection system, the three-dimensional planter (1) comprises a plant lamp (2), a plant table (3) and a supply disc (4); the plant growth detection system comprises an automatic control panel (5) and a shooting device (6); plants are planted in the three-dimensional planters, and the plant growth detection system controls the growth environment of the plants in the three-dimensional planters and monitors the growth state of the plants in the three-dimensional planters under the control of the interactive screen and feeds back a growth rotary table to the interactive screen; and the interactive screen can be used for man-machine interaction, setting a plant growth environment, displaying a plant growth state and presetting extended reading data. The automatic control panel controls the plant environment, and the shooting device collects the plant growth state. According to the invention, the system is naturally moved into a classroom, a user carries out planting independently or under guidance, and directly participates in the whole growth process of plants in a natural state, so that an online and offline fused situational teaching platform is created.

column2: EXPOSURE CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE IN IMAGING, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides an exposure control method and device in imaging, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as machine learning and intelligent imaging. According to the specific implementation scheme, semantic segmentation is carried out on a pre-imaging image to obtain semantic segmentation images of at least two semantic regions; estimating the exposure duration of each semantic region based on the semantic segmentation image and the pre-imaging image; and based on the exposure duration of each semantic region, controlling the exposure of each semantic region during imaging. The technology disclosed by the invention can effectively improve the quality of the image generated by shooting.

column2: SAFE AND CREDIBLE SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON EMBEDDED PLC
column4: The invention discloses an embedded PLC (programmable logic controller)-based safe and trusted system, which relates to the technical field of safety technologies of programmable logic controllers and comprises a user verification module, an agreement setting module, a program pre-compiling module, an abnormal data analysis module, an abnormal data set module and a user feedback module. The invention also discloses an embedded PLC-based security and credibility method. The method comprises the following steps: S100, initializing; s200, establishing a credible verification channel; s300, setting an agreement; s400, comparing the running program code with the pre-compiled code; s500, carrying out real-time monitoring; and S600, carrying out information binding. According to the method, the identity of the user is verified through the two indexes of satisfaction and reputation, the behavior of the user is monitored in the operation process, meanwhile, key information generated in the PLC program code operation process is monitored, and the safety of PLC operation is improved.

column2: SHOOTING OBJECT BOUNDARY IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a shot object boundary identification method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a shot picture of a shooting device at a current moment; converting the shot picture into a pixel value distribution diagram of a two-dimensional coordinate array; determining positions of four vertexes of the shot picture and pixel values corresponding to the four vertexes through the pixel value distribution diagram; generating a dynamically set critical value according to the pixel values corresponding to the four vertexes respectively; and identifying a shot object boundary in the shot picture according to the critical value. By identifying the pixel values of the four vertexes of the shot picture in real time, dynamic adjustment and setting of the critical value are realized, so that the shot object boundary identification through the critical value and the pixel value difference data in the shot object is improved, and the shot object boundary identification in the shot picture is more accurate than the shot object boundary identification through a fixedly set background color value.

column2: AN AI ENABLED FRAMEWORK FOR DETECTION OF FAKE REVIEWS OVER SOCIAL MEDIA
column4: Reviews in social media have assumed significance as people of all walks of life are relying on reviews for making decisions. It is always good to use knowledge of other people along with our own knowledge for decision making. Towards this end, reviews in social media have impact on service organizations and customers. However, there is problem with fake reviews that are intentionally spread in an organized fashion. Unless such fake reviews are filtered out, the significance of genuine reviews get lessened and the overall social feedback systems need to relay on polluted information. In order to overcome this problem, the current invention is an AI enabled framework for automatic detection of fake reviews over social media. It exploits methods of Artificial Intelligence (AI) for efficiently detecting fake reviews. The invention has a AI enabled framework with underlying mechanisms to deal with fake reviews. It has certain factors and metrics to measure and understand the probability of a review being fake or not fake. In addition to this, the invention has its supervised learning approach also to gain knowledge from training data in order to identify fake reviews. The current invention benefits many stakeholders such as social media service providers, online review web site services, general public, researchers and academia.

column2: PASSENGER ABNORMAL BEHAVIOR IDENTIFICATION METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND PASSENGER MONITORING SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and computer vision processing, and discloses a passenger abnormal behavior recognition method, device and equipment and a passenger monitoring system. Through the creation of the invention, a new scheme for carrying out joint detection and identification on abnormal behaviors of passengers based on a human body joint point extraction technology and a fast-slow dual-channel network is provided, namely, human body joint point extraction processing is carried out on continuous multi-frame video images extracted from a monitoring video in a passenger compartment; and then the continuous multi-frame video images are sent to a fast channel in the fast and slow dual-channel network, information reading in a small fixed-length time period is completed at a time, a human body joint point extraction result is sent to a slow channel in the fast and slow dual-channel network, behaviors are defined by using skeleton information, and a human body joint point extraction result is obtained. Therefore, the two channels are more special, the time span for processing the motion information can be expanded to a certain extent, the accuracy of the recognition result after continuous application is maintained, and long-term monitoring of abnormal behaviors of passengers is facilitated.

column2: PICTURE DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE FOR VEHICLE LOSS CLAIM SETTLEMENT, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and relates to a picture detection method for vehicle damage claim settlement, which comprises the following steps: performing part detection on a to-be-shot vehicle through a preset part category deep learning detection model, shooting a picture if the detection succeeds, and otherwise, prompting to change a shooting angle or/and distance; classifying the shot pictures through a preset picture quality classification model; and executing a claim settlement operation rule according to the output classification result, wherein the claim settlement operation rule is that if the output classification result is copying, the claim settlement process is stopped, if the output classification result is fuzzy or inclined in angle, re-shooting is prompted, and if the output classification result is normal, the claim settlement process is continued. The invention further provides a vehicle loss claim settlement picture detection device, computer equipment and a storage medium. According to the method and the device, the waste picture rate of the input picture can be greatly reduced, and the robustness of the system is improved.

column2: BUILDING MEASUREMENT METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT BASED ON IMAGE RECOGNITION AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a building measurement method based on image recognition, which comprises the following steps: calculating the confidence coefficient of each pixel point in a building remote sensing image; collecting pixel points of which the confidence is greater than a preset threshold as building pixels, and constructing a pixel coordinate system by taking the central pixel point as an original point; determining edge pixel point coordinates of the building pixels according to the pixel coordinate system, and calculating the image size of the target building according to the edge pixel point coordinates; calculating the building size according to the shooting height of the remote sensing image; acquiring shooting time and climate conditions of the remote sensing image, and querying an ambient light angle and an air refractive index when the remote sensing image is shot according to the shooting time and the climate conditions; and correcting the building size according to the ambient light angle and the air refractive index to obtain a real building size. The invention further provides a building measurement device and equipment based on image recognition and a medium. According to the invention, the accuracy of building size measurement can be improved.

column2: CABLE CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The utility model discloses a cable climbing robot which comprises a walking mechanism and a gravity self-locking module, wherein the walking mechanism is used for moving in the axial direction of a cable, and the gravity self-locking module is connected to the walking mechanism. The gravity self-locking module is provided with a hanging ring used for hanging a heavy object and a sole used for holding the cable tightly under the gravity traction of the heavy object. Under the action of the gravity self-locking module, the walking mechanism can automatically adjust the friction force between the walking mechanism and the cable according to whether the gravity self-locking module drags the heavy object or not and the mass of the dragged heavy object, and the connection strength of the walking mechanism and the cable is guaranteed. Wherein the gravity self-locking module belongs to an under-actuated sole gravity self-locking mechanism, the walking mechanism can be assisted to meet traction and dragging of heavy-load heavy objects, the number of power equipment cannot be increased, light weight of the cable climbing robot is facilitated, and the requirement for heavy-load traction and dragging operation of the cable climbing robot is met.

column2: OFFLINE PACKAGE VERIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an off-line package verification method, device and equipment and a storage medium, which are used for improving the accuracy of off-line package verification. The offline package verification method comprises the following steps: calling a first algorithm to generate public and private keys according to an offline package acquisition request; obtaining offline packet information of the to-be-updated offline packet, calculating a first hash value through a second algorithm, and encrypting the first hash value through the first algorithm according to the public and private keys to obtain a hash ciphertext; analyzing the offline packet information to obtain a downloading address; downloading the offline package according to the downloading address to obtain a target offline package, and generating a second hash value according to a second algorithm; decrypting the Hash ciphertext to obtain a first Hash value, and matching the first Hash value with the second target Hash value to obtain a matching result; and if the matching is successful, decompressing the target offline package and running the target offline package. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the target offline package can be stored in a block chain node.

column2: SYSTEM DUPLICATE WINDOW DISPLAY METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON AI AND RPA
column4: The invention provides a system duplicate window display method and device based on artificial intelligence AI and robot process automation RPA, and relates to the technical field of RPA and AI. The method comprises the steps that a system branch obtains current operation information of an RPA robot in an operation state; and according to the current operation information, updating the display state of the window corresponding to the system copy. Therefore, by associating the display state of the window corresponding to the system duplicate with the current running information of the RPA robot, not only can the window corresponding to the system duplicate be displayed in a diversified manner, but also it can be ensured that an operator can accurately know the running state of the RPA robot in real time, so that user operation is facilitated, time is saved, and efficiency is improved.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ASSISTING CT SCREENING BASED ON HYPERSPECTRAL HIGH-DIMENSIONAL IMAGING
column4: The invention discloses a system for assisting CT screening based on hyperspectral high-dimensional imaging. The system comprises a ray machine projection assembly, an imaging camera, a front optical module, a spectrum rapid scanning module, a multi-view camera and an artificial intelligence information processing module. Wherein the ray machine projection assembly and the imaging camera complete a projection structure light high-dimensional morphology detection function, the front optical module and the spectrum rapid scanning module complete a rapid hyperspectral scanning function of an image, and the two functional units are combined to form a hyperspectral high-dimensional imaging system. The ray machine projection assembly is further used for guiding the examinee to correct the body position according to the collected high-dimensional human body morphology of the examinee; the multi-view camera is used for determining the current body position of the detected person and comparing the current body position with the optimal posture so as to further remind the detected person to correct the body position; and the artificial intelligence information processing module performs fine spectrum reconstruction and artificial intelligence analysis of multi-dimensional vital sign parameters. According to the invention, the depth, breadth and efficiency of CT detection can be improved, and automation and unmanned operation can be realized.

column2: ANKLE-KNEE LINKAGE WALKING ASSISTING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an ankle-knee linkage walking assisting device, belongs to the field of medical instruments, and aims to solve the problem that the existing walking training assisting method is poor in treatment effect or expensive in equipment and cannot be popularized and used. Comprising a knee joint wearing body, an ankle wearing body and a plurality of pull lines. The tension angle and the tension force of each stay wire are dynamically adjusted by adjusting the length of the stay wires and the position of the sliding screw, the posture of the ankle is limited by the tension force of the stay wires, the gentle flexion of the knee is controlled to be within 10 degrees, the dorsal flexion of the ankle is controlled to be larger than 0 degree, the consistency of each exercise training is guaranteed, and the exercise training efficiency is improved through repeated exercise and exercise dynamic shaping reconstruction. According to the principle of open chain and closed chain movement, the degree of freedom of far-end movement is limited through ankle-knee combination, near-end control is enhanced, far-end abnormal modes are reduced, and the purposes of saving force and assisting in treatment are achieved.

column2: INTELLIGENT CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE FOR SCREEN REFRESH FREQUENCY, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention is applied to the field of artificial intelligence, relates to the field of block chains, and discloses a screen refresh rate intelligent control method and device, computer equipment and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: monitoring a screen surrounding environment and a display page to obtain an environment image around the screen and display page information on the screen; determining whether to start an anti-photographing mode according to the environment image and the display page information; if the anti-shooting mode is started, dividing the display page into a target area and a non-target area; controlling the target area to be normally displayed, and adjusting the screen refresh frequency of the non-target area to enable the screen refresh frequency between the target area and the non-target area to be a preset frequency difference; according to the method, the shooting equipment cannot shoot clear screen page contents through the differentiated control of the screen refreshing frequencies of different areas, so that the interference on normal reading behaviors of a user can be effectively reduced under the condition of reducing the risk of information leakage, and the reading experience and the reading efficiency are improved.

column2: STATE DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, DETECTION EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a state detection method and device, detection equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that a plurality of training samples are acquired, each training sample comprises a first number of sample audio features, the first number of sample audio features correspond to a first number of audio frames in the same piece of sample audio data, and the sample audio data are acquired under the condition that the electronic equipment operates normally; inputting each training sample into a state detection model to obtain a prediction probability corresponding to each training sample; and training a state detection model based on the prediction probabilities corresponding to the plurality of training samples, the trained state detection model being used for detecting the running state of any electronic device. According to the method provided by the invention, the relatively accurate state detection model is trained in an unsupervised training mode, and the accuracy of state detection is ensured.

column2: REMOTE SENSING IMAGE AUTOMATIC IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of remote sensing image recognition, in particular to a remote sensing image automatic recognition system based on an artificial intelligence technology, which comprises an image acquisition unit, an image processing unit, a central control unit, a training unit and a storage unit. According to the invention, the image processing unit is arranged to process the image information acquired by the image acquisition unit so as to obtain the spectrum semantic information, the texture semantic information and the shape semantic information; three different types of semantic information are combined and compared to judge whether the single semantic information is distorted or not, and quick correction is performed when the single semantic information is judged to be distorted. The situation that the recognition precision of the features in the semantic information is reduced due to distortion of the generated semantic information caused by the influence of weather or a shooting angle during image acquisition is effectively avoided; the situation that the features of the ground objects to be recognized are misjudged is effectively avoided, and the recognition precision of the system for the types of the ground objects in the area to be recognized is effectively improved.

column2: FISH MULTI-TARGET TRACKING METHOD BASED ON BALANCED JOINT NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses a fish multi-target tracking method based on a balanced joint network, and belongs to the technical field of aquaculture. According to the method, on the basis of a Chinese agricultural artificial intelligence innovation and entrepreneurship contest data set, optimization, arrangement and supplementation are carried out on the basis of an original data set, and a new OptMFT data set is generated; the robustness of the model in a complex environment is further enhanced by performing merging training on a data set; meanwhile, some negative sample image frames with poor image quality are removed, the training weight of data with obvious fish targets and clear swimming tracks is enhanced, the fish recognition precision of the model is further improved, and full-frame training is performed on a data set to enhance robustness verification of the model under the condition of high-speed swimming of fish schools; the method is wide in application range, can achieve a good effect in multiple breeding environments, and is high in practicability.

column2: LOG ANALYSIS METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, TERMINAL EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention is suitable for the field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to a log analysis method and device based on artificial intelligence, terminal equipment and a medium. The method comprises the following steps: determining N running stages in a task log according to the task log generated when a target database is driven to run, obtaining the running log corresponding to each running stage from the task log, identifying each running log, determining a task corresponding to each running log and task execution process data, each task execution process data is compared with a first preset data condition, a task corresponding to a first comparison result and a task corresponding to a second comparison result are determined, the task corresponding to the first comparison result and the task corresponding to the second comparison result are marked differently, and a first analysis result of the task log is obtained; according to the method, the task log is identified based on artificial intelligence, the analysis result is obtained in combination with the preset condition, manual auditing and analysis result positioning are not needed, and the analysis efficiency of the database task log is effectively improved.

column2: MEMORY MANAGEMENT METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a memory management method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, an operator execution queue is obtained according to a preset to-be-executed model, the operator execution queue comprises at least two model operators, and the model operators are used for realizing a processing step in the to-be-executed model when being executed; according to the execution sequence of the model operators in the operator execution queue, pre-allocated memory information is generated, the pre-allocated memory information represents target memory areas of the model operators, the target memory areas are used for executing the model operators, and the target memory areas corresponding to at least two model operators are the same; according to the pre-allocated memory information, memory allocation information is generated, the to-be-executed model is operated based on the memory allocation information, and the memory allocation information is used for representing memory addresses needed by all model operators in the operator execution queue. The problem of efficiency loss caused by dynamic allocation and release of the memory is avoided, and the running speed of the model is increased.

column2: POWER GRID MONITORING AND SHOOTING METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT BASED ON EDGE CALCULATION AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a power grid monitoring and shooting method, device and equipment based on edge calculation and artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining massive training images, the training images are from front-end equipment and a sample pool, and the front-end equipment is located at the periphery of a power transmission channel; using the training image to obtain an identification model used for identifying a dangerous phenomenon; deploying the identification model in front-end equipment; the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a monitored image by using front-end equipment, performing dangerous phenomenon identification on the monitored image by using an identification model in the front-end equipment, and sending the monitored image to a server; when a dangerous phenomenon is identified in the monitored image, alarm information is sent to a server; and displaying the monitored image in the server in a display device in real time. According to the method, model training can be carried out on external damage hidden dangers such as wire foreign matters, construction machinery and tower cranes frequently occurring in the power transmission channel, the trained model is deployed in front-end equipment, and foreign matter hidden dangers in images are automatically detected and recognized.

column2: INTELLIGENT SCREEN BRIGHTNESS ADJUSTING METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention is applied to the field of artificial intelligence, relates to the field of block chains, and discloses an intelligent screen brightness adjusting method and device, computer equipment and a medium, and the method part comprises the steps: monitoring a screen surrounding environment and a display page to obtain an environment image around the screen and display page information on the screen; determining whether to start an anti-photographing mode according to the environment image and the display page information; if the anti-shooting mode is started, dividing the display page into a target area and a non-target area; controlling the target area to display normally, and adjusting the screen brightness of the non-target area to enable the brightness difference between the target area and the non-target area to be a preset brightness difference; according to the method and the device, the user can normally read related contents, the shooting equipment cannot shoot clear screen page contents through different display of the screen brightness of different areas, the interference to normal reading behaviors of the user is effectively reduced under the condition of reducing the risk of information leakage, and the reading experience and the reading efficiency are improved.

column2: DIGITAL COMPUTER-IMPLEMENTED PLATFORM FOR CREATING MEDICAL APPLICATIONS USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND OPERATING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The claimed digital computer-implemented platform for creating medical applications using artificial intelligence comprises: a data storage subsystem capable of receiving medical examination data from information systems of medical facilities; tools for viewing and labelling said examinations, which are capable of storing and managing initial and labelled examinations, organizing labelling, and integrating examinations into medical facility information systems; an application development environment capable of storing and managing initial application codes; an application running environment capable of running interim versions of applications for testing and debugging; an application execution subsystem capable of receiving developed applications and providing for the execution thereof in response to external queries, and also capable of generating predictive models; an application storefront in the form of an external interface for allowing a rapid insight into available applications, test running applications, logging the running of applications and allowing for viewing of the results of the working of applications; a user verification subsystem; a message exchange subsystem.

column2: IDENTIFICATION DEVICE FOR SMART CITY BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND IDENTIFICATION METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses a smart city recognition device based on artificial intelligence and a recognition method thereof.The smart city recognition device comprises a fuselage, a rotating motor is arranged at one end of the interior of the fuselage, one end of the rotating motor is in transmission connection with a rotating shaft, a propeller is fixedly connected to the surface of the rotating shaft, and wings are arranged on the surfaces of the two sides of the fuselage. According to the invention, through the arrangement of the aerial photography equipment, the aerial photography equipment is brought to the air through the unmanned aerial vehicle to carry out aerial photography on the smart city, and then aerial photography pictures, videos and the like are uploaded to the interior of the ground recognition system for recognition, so that the recognition process of the smart city is greatly facilitated; an equipment and algorithm integrated solution about a smart city specific scene is created, an equipment system integrating shooting, transmission, model training and AI algorithm recognition is built in, garbage, pollution discharge, mountain fire and other algorithms are built in, and the solution of the smart city scene is provided.

column2: IMAGE ACQUISITION METHOD AND DEVICE APPLIED TO SATELLITE
column4: The invention discloses an image acquisition method and device applied to a satellite, which are used for more efficiently acquiring observation images by fully combining environmental factors, and comprises the following steps: determining a corresponding detection area according to the current position of the satellite; determining environment data corresponding to the detection area; determining a target area in the detection area according to the environmental data; shooting the target area by using the satellite to obtain an observation image; according to the method, based on artificial intelligence calculation, a target area in a detection area is obtained through calculation according to environmental data, and the target area is shot to obtain an observation image; the observation image is clear and is not shielded, and the problem of poor observation image quality caused by environmental factors is avoided; and the earth observation efficiency is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXERCISE AUXILIARY EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model discloses artificial intelligence exercise auxiliary equipment which comprises a U-shaped supporting plate and is characterized in that the middle of one side of the U-shaped supporting plate is movably connected with one end of a lead screw, the end portion of one end of the lead screw is fixedly connected with the center of a rotary knob, and the lead screw is in threaded connection with the middle of a sliding rod. The two ends of the sliding rod are arranged in the corresponding rectangular grooves respectively, the two rectangular grooves are formed in the ends of the two sides of the U-shaped supporting plate respectively, and the middles of the two ends of the sliding rod are hinged to one ends of the corresponding first connecting rods respectively. According to the device, the two L-shaped rods can respectively drive the corresponding arc-shaped clamping plates to move towards each other, so that the two arc-shaped clamping plates clamp the chest of a patient, the patient is prevented from falling down or having an accident during rehabilitation exercise, and the safety is improved.

column2: SHOT PUT THROWING SCORE RECORDING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a shot throwing score recording system based on artificial intelligence, which is characterized in that a preparation area and a score area are arranged in a throwing field, a throwing start line is arranged in the preparation area, and a camera is arranged in the throwing field; n athletes in the throwing field wear different number plates in sequence according to a departure sequence, and an industrial personal computer, a display screen and a loudspeaker are arranged on one side of the throwing field; the industrial personal computer is provided with a data acquisition module, a preprocessing module, a number matching module, a timing module, a personnel position detection module, a violation detection module, a track detection module, a landing point detection module and a score output module. According to the invention, intelligent measurement of the throwing distance is realized by using artificial intelligence, so that the accuracy and fairness of measurement are improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ROBOT BASED ON INTERNET OF THINGS
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence robot based on Internet of Things, which comprises a head and a body, the bottom of the body is fixedly connected with a base, the bottom edge of the base is provided with universal wheels, the inner side of the body is provided with a lifting shell, the upper end of the lifting shell is fixedly connected with a platform, the upper end of the platform is fixedly connected with a connecting column, and the connecting column is fixedly connected with a connecting rod. The head is fixedly connected to the upper end of the connecting column, a display screen is fixedly embedded in the front end of the head, a camera shooting mechanism is arranged on the front side of the bottom of the head, a microphone located below the display screen is arranged at the front end of the head, loudspeakers are arranged on the two side walls of the head, and a mounting plate is fixedly connected to the lower portion of the inner side of the body. The robot has the function of internet-of-things man-machine interaction, the auxiliary effect on teaching is good, the structure can be flexibly adjusted, the applicability is high, movement is convenient and fast, meanwhile, the buffering and anti-collision effects are achieved, and the probability that the robot is collided and damaged is reduced.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGE PROCESSING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence image processing device, which belongs to the technical field of express delivery high-speed shooting instruments, and comprises a placing plate, the top of the placing plate is fixedly connected with a fixing block, the top of the fixing block is fixedly connected with a first rotating shaft, the surface of the first rotating shaft is fixedly connected with a first supporting rod, and the surface of the first supporting rod is fixedly connected with a second supporting rod. The problems that in the using process of an existing high-speed scanner, if a camera encounters strong sunlight, scanning of pictures by the high-speed scanner is affected, the camera in the high-speed scanner is affected due to long-time irradiation of the sunlight, the service life of the camera is shortened, meanwhile, a supporting rod of the high-speed scanner cannot be adjusted, and the service life of the high-speed scanner is shortened are solved. According to the high-speed photographic apparatus, the high-speed photographic apparatus occupies more use space when not in use, inconvenience is brought to a user, and the purposes of preventing dazzling sunlight from affecting the high-speed photographic apparatus during working, preventing damage to the camera and facilitating folding and storage of the high-speed photographic apparatus are achieved.

column2: ROPE SKIPPING COUNTING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a rope skipping counting system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises an industrial personal computer, a camera, a loudspeaker and a display screen, wherein the industrial personal computer, the camera, the loudspeaker and the display screen are used for counting rope skipping athletes in a designated area; a data acquisition module, an instruction module, an athlete detection module, a preprocessing module, a violation detection module, a counting module, an alarm module and a score output module are arranged on the industrial personal computer. Intelligent rope skipping counting can be achieved through artificial intelligence, so that manual counting errors are reduced, and the rope skipping counting accuracy and fairness are guaranteed.

column2: PAGE SCRIPT DEBUGGING METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM AND SERVER
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to a page script debugging method and device, a computer readable storage medium and a server. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-debugged target page script, and adding a preset stack tracking identifier in each execution function of the target page script to obtain a rewritten page script; running the rewriting page script in a preset browser, and capturing an exception thrown by the rewriting page script in a running process; according to the stack tracking identifier, determining a function call path of the rewriting page script when the exception is thrown out; determining a first position of an abnormal code in the rewriting page script according to the function call path; and performing code mapping according to the first position to obtain a second position of the abnormal code in the target page script. According to the invention, a large amount of time and manpower can be saved, and the working efficiency is greatly improved.

column2: FLEXIBLE WORKSHOP SCHEDULING METHOD AND MODEL BASED ON REINFORCEMENT LEARNING AND GENETIC ALGORITHM
column4: The invention provides a flexible workshop scheduling method and model based on reinforcement learning and a genetic algorithm, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. Establishing a flexible job shop scheduling model according to the characteristics of the flexible job shop; basic parameters in the genetic algorithm and the entropy-based confidence domain optimization reinforcement learning algorithm are initialized; updating parameters in the genetic algorithm by using an entropy-based confidence domain optimization algorithm, and respectively performing crossover and mutation operation on the chromosome population participating in crossover and mutation to generate a new chromosome population participating in crossover and mutation; the fitness of each individual in the new population is calculated, state parameters in a confidence domain optimization algorithm based on entropy are determined, and genetic algorithm operation is executed on the new chromosome population; and repeatedly executing the iteration until the end, and outputting a result. According to the method, the confidence domain optimization reinforcement learning algorithm based on entropy is combined with the genetic algorithm, so that the performance of flexible workshop scheduling is improved, the robustness of workshop production is enhanced, and the production efficiency is improved.

column2: CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON AI AND RPA SYSTEM DUPLICATE WINDOW
column4: The invention provides a control method and device based on an artificial intelligence AI and robot process automation RPA system branch window, and relates to the technical field of RPA and AI. The method comprises the steps that a first RPA robot starting instruction is received; determining a first service corresponding to the first RPA robot and a second service in a running state in a terminal device; under the condition that the second service does not conflict with the first service, starting a new system branch window; and running the first RPA robot in the new system copy window. Therefore, under the condition that the second service does not conflict with the first service, the new RPA robot can be operated in the new branch window to process the corresponding service, so that the problem of resource competition is effectively solved, resource waste is reduced, reliable operation of the multiple RPA robots is ensured, the service processing efficiency is further improved, and the service processing experience is improved. And the time is saved.

column2: CONTROL METHOD, DEVICE AND SYSTEM, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT, STORAGE MEDIUM AND VEHICLE
column4: The invention provides a control method, device and system, electronic equipment, a storage medium and a vehicle, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the fields of Internet of Vehicles, intelligent cabins and the like. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: receiving a target object acquisition task sent by a first terminal device, and determining departure time and a first driving route based on the target object acquisition task; sending confirmation information of the target object acquisition task to the first terminal equipment under the condition that the vehicle is determined to meet a travel condition based on the departure time and the arrival time; under the condition that the departure time arrives, the vehicle is controlled to run to the first destination according to the first running route in an automatic driving mode; and under the condition that the target object is acquired, determining that the target object acquisition task is completed. The method can improve the utilization rate of the vehicle and ensure the overall treatment efficiency.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED HEALTH MONITORING AND PREVENTION SYSTEM TO MONITOR AND DIAGNOSE HEART ATTACK USING IOT
column4: The proposed law makes use of sensors to determine whether a person's heartbeat can be checked at home based on the level of disclosure desired. To make use of the sensor, a microcontroller is required. It is capable of obtaining morale readings and transmitting them to the user via the internet. To obtain an accurate temperature reading of the patient, we developed a remote sensing parameter based on ethnic body composition that includes bough temperature and room temperature. This is the solution that we came up with. Certain parameters used to detect and monitor intent are no longer valid. Wireless sensors are used to transmit the data. When you use web-based total looking, you can see a patient's overall health and fitness status in real time. Patients benefit from online telemedicine systems because they make it easier to receive timely and efficient health care. Wireless and wearable sensor technologies are at the heart of many of these systems. Due to the rapid advancement of technology, the variety of remote health monitoring systems has increased significantly. The purpose of this paper is to propose the development of a real-world heart monitoring system, taking into account costs, ease of use, accuracy, and the security of the data stored in the system. The system is intended to facilitate communication between the doctor and the patients. Due to a lack of doctors, people with heart problems in remote areas are unable to receive the most up-to-date medical care. Then, 40 people (aged 18 to 66) are tested while wearing wearable sensors and carrying an Android device (i.e., smartphone under supervision of the experts). The proposed system, according to those who conducted a performance analysis, is both safe and beneficial due to its high speed. Numerous studies have established that the proposed system is extremely efficient and reliable, as well as extremely cost-effective. Additionally, it protects your data. Additionally, the new system can send alerts to both the doctor and the patient in the event of an emergency.

column2: S-DUSTBIN: SMART DUSTBIN

This incongruity has been taken out by the Smart Dustbin created at the Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) column2: INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, SERVER AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention is suitable for the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides an information processing method and device, a server and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: configuring each node included in a target process into task services according to a preset task configuration rule; according to a preset process configuration rule, configuring the target process into a process service; and when a process calling request for the process service is received, running the task service corresponding to each node according to the execution condition of each node in the target process so as to execute the target process. According to the method and the device, the implementation codes corresponding to the nodes are independently packaged, so that the nodes are independently managed, departments related to the nodes can be independently developed, developers do not need to be familiar with professional domain knowledge of multiple nodes, the development difficulty can be reduced, and the development efficiency can be improved.

column2: CURATIVE FIDGETING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a curative fidgeting device comprising of a grid panel 1 configured with multiple flexible spherical shells 2 filled with an incompressible fluid to maintain an optimum pressure, multiple conduits 3 interlinked with each other in associated with the shells 2 to maintain the flow of the fluid, an artificial intelligence based image capturing module 4 to determine age, mood and finger condition of a user, multiple electronically controlled valves integrated with each of the shells 2 to regulate inflow and outflow of the fluid, multiple pressure sensor fabricated within each of the shells 2 to monitor pressure applied by the user and a communication module in association with the microcontroller to send the track record details of the exercise performed by the user via a computing unit.

column2: OUTDOOR NEW ENERGY AUTOMOBILE CHARGING PILE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model relates to an outdoor new energy automobile charging pile based on artificial intelligence, and the charging pile body comprises a pile body, a charging seat, a charging line, a charging gun, a camera, a processor, and an automobile locking assembly. The camera is arranged on the front face of the pile body and used for shooting a license plate picture of a vehicle parked in a parking space. The processor is connected with the camera and used for recognizing whether the license plate belongs to a new energy automobile or not. The automobile locking assembly is arranged on the ground surface of the charging parking space in front of the charging pile and used for limiting illegal parking of non-new energy automobiles. According to the utility model, the camera is used for photographing, then the processor is used for analyzing the license plate to judge whether the fuel vehicle is parked in the parking space special for new energy, if the fuel vehicle is parked in the parking space special for new energy, a voice alarm is sent to the fuel vehicle, and if not, the vehicle locking assembly is used for punishing the fuel vehicle in a vehicle locking manner; and the parking standardization can be improved, so that the public charging pile of the new energy vehicle is efficiently utilized.

column2: CONTACTLESS PAYMENT RELAY ATTACK PROTECTION
column4: A method for contactless payment relay attack protection includes receiving an online authorization request including a cryptogram, a measured processing time, and a reference processing time from a terminal. The cryptogram is verified, and a determination is performed as to whether the measured processing time exceeds the reference processing time. An online authorization response authorizing or declining a monetary transaction is transmitted, based on the determination. An artificial intelligence transaction analysis can be performed based on past and current conditions (e.g., battery level, operating system, open applications) of a payment device such as a mobile phone, past and current conditions of a terminal, and/or a monetary amount. The online authorization response can be based on the artificial intelligence transaction analysis.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The present application relates to the field of artificial intelligence and blockchain technology, particularly relating to a data processing method and device, and a storage medium. The method and the device are applied to a server. The method comprises: the read and write of a database are split into a read set database and a write set database respectively, and a concept of a cache is introduced; thus, when each thread is running, different intervals may be correspondingly accessed, thereby realizing multi-thread database access, and helping to reduce database access pressure; meanwhile, when performing a MVCC verification, the cache can be directly accessed without frequently accessing the database, thereby helping to improve the verification efficiency of the MVCC; also, the operations described above relate only to CPU operation, thereby improving the performance of the blockchain.

column2: VIRTUAL REALITY AUTOMOBILE DRIVING INTERACTION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a virtual reality automobile driving interaction method based on artificial intelligence, which combines a deep learning technology and a virtual reality technology, can realize driving of a real automobile (without an engine) in a virtual environment under a holographic virtual projection technology, and adopts the deep learning technology to detect whether the automobile collides with a target in a virtual image or not. Situal training such as back-up parking and lateral parking is realized by adopting an automobile driving information and virtual image interaction technology, and illegal behaviors such as red light running and the like in a virtual environment are judged by combining traffic light time nodes on virtual images with automobile turn light signals and automobile speed signals. The system has the main effects that the machine vision technology is combined with the virtual reality technology, virtual reality driving interaction is realized without wearing equipment such as a VR helmet, the effect is vivid, the on-site driving cost is greatly saved, the technology can be used for training a green driver, and the driving experience is improved. And the system can also be used for automatic driving testing and driving entertainment experiencing by any person.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ROBOT ACCESS CONTROL DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence robot access control device, which belongs to the technical field of access control devices and comprises a protective box, a servo motor is fixedly mounted on the left side of the top of an inner cavity of the protective box, the output end of the servo motor is fixedly connected with a screw rod, and the bottom of the screw rod is rotatably connected with the joint of the protective box through a bearing. Firstly, the pressure sensor, the PLC, the relay and the servo motor are externally connected with a power source, when the L-shaped plate needs to be opened, fingers press the pressure sensor all the time to enable the pressure sensor to transmit data to the PLC, then the PLC processes the data to enable the relay to start the servo motor, and then the L-shaped plate is opened. The output end of the servo motor drives the screw rod to rotate on the inner surface of the sleeve in a threaded mode, meanwhile, the sleeve drives the driving plate to move, and the driving plate drives the L-shaped plate to move, so that protection on the access controller body is relieved, and the situation that the access controller body is damaged by lawbreakers, and normal use of the access controller body is affected can be avoided.

column2: AUTOMATIC RISK INDICATOR EARLY WARNING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON EXPRESSION ENGINE
column4: The invention discloses a risk indicator automatic early warning method and system based on an expression engine, belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence and big data, and provides the risk indicator automatic early warning method and system based on the expression engine in order to solve the problems that in the prior art, report monitoring indicators are too many, and manual reading duration is too long. Through abstracting and solidifying a report index template, risk indexes are generated based on automatic batch running of a system, an index abnormity early warning formula is constructed through an expression engine, and multi-form automatic early warning of the risk abnormity indexes is realized. Through system configuration, automatic early warning when tens of thousands of indexes are abnormal is realized, manual reading is replaced by system monitoring, the efficiency is greatly improved, and the timeliness and timeliness of abnormality discovery are ensured.

column2: GAME AI DECISION CONFIGURATION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON MACROSCOPIC AND MICROSCOPIC STRATEGIES
column4: The invention provides a game AI decision configuration method and device based on a macroscopic and microscopic strategy. The method comprises the steps that S1, a strategy model needing to be executed by a current AI role is obtained according to the game running time stage and state information of the current AI role; s2, extracting view map information and global environment information of the current AI role, and analyzing an advancing route of executing the strategy model by the current AI role according to the view map information and the global environment information; s3, controlling the current AI role to go to a target area according to the advancing route under the control of the strategy model; and S4, when the current AI role arrives at the target area, calling an operation model required for executing the strategy model to control the current AI role to act, and adjusting the control strategy of the AI role in time according to the dynamic change of the game progress.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) AUXILIARY SCORING SYSTEM FOR EXPERIMENT OPERATION OF CHINESE SCHOOL EXAM
column4: The invention discloses a Chinese school examination experiment operation artificial intelligence AI auxiliary scoring system, which comprises an examinee terminal, the output end of the examinee terminal is electrically connected with an examination room port, the output end of the examination room port is electrically connected with an education machine room, and the output end of the education machine room is electrically connected with an AI scoring module. According to the artificial intelligence AI auxiliary scoring system for the experimental operation of the middle school examination, a sample library of non-standardized experimental instruments and equipment is established, so that a large amount of later funds can be prevented from being used on experimental instruments which are purchased uniformly, the model optimization module can optimize the scale, response time and calculation overhead of a model by using a model optimization tool, and the evaluation efficiency is improved. The method has the advantages of reducing the usage amount of model parameters, quantifying the model precision and improving the topological structure of the model, and is suitable for deploying the model to terminal equipment, or running the model when hardware is limited, providing a visual tool to display a data flow diagram, drawing an analysis diagram, displaying additional data and the like.

column2: AUTOMATED SURFBOARD DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to an automated surfboard device comprising, a pair of body 1,2 electromagnetically configured with each other that ride cresting wave towards water shore, a primary Artificial Intelligence (AI) based imaging unit 3 capture image of user surfing on the first body 1, a weather detection module 4 monitor speed and direction of cresting wave(s), a fiber bragg grating sensor 5 determine vital parameters of user, a microcontroller compares combined signals received from imaging unit 3, module 4, sensor 5 with pre-fed data and sends signals for disengaging second body 2 to prevent the user from drowning within the water, a telescopic rod 6 provide support to user, multiple motorized propellers 7 create thrust for propelling first body 1, a display unit 8 display surfing speed, speed and direction of cresting wave(s), physical and vital parameters of user.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING DEVICE CAPABLE OF BEING AUTOMATICALLY ADJUSTED
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of safety monitoring, and discloses an artificial intelligence monitoring device capable of automatically adjusting, which comprises a strip-shaped plate, a control switch and a pressing plate, a camera is arranged at the lower end of the strip-shaped plate, a bracket is fixedly arranged on the right side of the strip-shaped plate, and a PLC (Programmable Logic Controller) is arranged in an inner cavity of the control switch. Through the arrangement of the pressing plate, the sliding block, the pull rope, the rubber water bag, the coiled pipe, the spray head, the small servo motor, the transmission rod and the sponge wiper, impurities such as oil stains attached to a lens can be effectively removed, the monitoring effect of the camera is improved, the trouble of manual climbing cleaning is omitted, cleaning liquid can be sprayed on the sponge wiper, and the cleaning effect is improved. The cleaning effect of the sponge wiper is further improved, the trouble of manually adding the cleaning liquid is omitted, the structure is novel, the effects of cleaning the lens and adding the cleaning liquid are achieved through one motor, and the cleaning device is practical and suitable for wide application and popularization.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR CLUSTER MANAGEMENT TASK SCHEDULING
column4: The invention relates to the field of node allocation, in particular to a cluster management task scheduling method, which can realize reasonable allocation of limited computing power resources between a user and a task as much as possible through reference and arrangement allocation of multiple dimensions such as task priority, user right number, running time length and user utilization rate. And the distribution balance of internal resources is realized. The method has the advantages that compared with traditional scheduling, the problem of butt joint coupling of a scheduling module and other modules in a traditional module is solved through independent scheduling module design, and a program is more flexible and easy to expand. A two-in-one mode of interruption and starting logic is adopted, task states, newly-built tasks, interrupted tasks or restarted tasks do not need to be concerned from the scheduling level, only results need to be calculated, the independence of a task scheduling module is improved from the bottom layer design, and the task scheduling efficiency is improved. Conditions are provided for more subsequent users, a larger cluster and a more complex platform service scene.

column2: SCOLIOSIS DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, TERMINAL EQUIPMENT AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a scoliosis detection method and device, terminal equipment and a readable storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a two-dimensional image around a foot through a shooting device, and obtaining plantar pressure data through a pressure sensing platform; a foot three-dimensional model is constructed according to the two-dimensional image, and foot three-dimensional feature parameters are obtained according to the foot three-dimensional model; determining scoliosis conditions according to the plantar pressure data and the foot three-dimensional characteristic parameters; and sending the two-dimensional image and the plantar pressure data to a terminal device, and/or sending the foot three-dimensional model, the plantar pressure data and the scoliosis condition to the terminal device. The scoliosis detection efficiency is improved, and the effect of monitoring the spine health condition for a long time is achieved.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR CALIBRATING EXTERNAL PARAMETERS OF CAMERA
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of automatic driving, and provides a camera external parameter calibration method and device.The method comprises the steps that a shot image of a camera is obtained, and the shot image is an image shot by the camera with a calibration reference object as a shooting object; according to the shot image and a high-precision map, external parameters of the camera are obtained, and the high-precision map comprises a calibration reference object. The external parameters of the camera are obtained through the shot image of the calibration reference object by the camera and the high-precision map, so that the calibration precision of the external parameters of the camera can be improved. The method can be applied to intelligent automobiles, connected automobiles, new energy automobiles or self-driving automobiles.

column2: SOFTWARE PRODUCT FUNCTION IMPLEMENTATION METHOD AND DEVICE AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of computer processing, particularly provides a software product function implementation method and device and a computer readable storage medium, and aims to solve the technical problems of how to simplify a software product implementation process and improve software product function implementation efficiency. In order to achieve the purpose, the method comprises the steps that scene arrangement information is set for a software product; a sandbox is set up for the software product, resources are obtained according to the scene arrangement information, and the resources are used for setting up a running environment of the software product in the sandbox; and installing the installation package of the software product in the operation environment, and operating the software product after installation to realize the function of the software product. According to the invention, the scene arrangement information is used to realize the connection and simplification of the design, development and test processes of the software product, and the function realization efficiency of the software product is improved.

column2: HOUSEHOLD CLEANING ROBOT CAPABLE OF IMPROVING STABILITY BASED ON LEVER PRINCIPLE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence robots, and discloses a domestic cleaning robot capable of improving stability based on the lever principle, the domestic cleaning robot comprises a chassis, the top of the chassis is rotatably connected with a stair climbing mechanism, the bottom end of the stair climbing mechanism is rotatably connected with a speed limiting mechanism, and the bottom of the chassis is hinged with a buffer mechanism; electromagnets are fixedly connected to the left and right sides of the middle of the chassis, and an arc-shaped groove is formed in the center of the bottom of the chassis. According to the domestic cleaning robot capable of improving stability based on the lever principle, when the chassis climbs stairs, contacts at the bottom end of the movable support sequentially abut against and communicate with each other, the balance frame is controlled to rotate left and right, under limiting of a first sliding groove, the movable support moves upwards to drive bottom rollers to climb stair steps, and the chassis is prevented from being suspended in the air in cooperation with abutting buffering of a buffering mechanism; under the action of centrifugal force, the centrifugal blocks move back to back to the upper and lower ends to abut against the inner wall of the movable support, friction is increased, the speed is reduced, and the intermittent speed reduction effect is achieved.

column2: ROAD SURFACE DETECTION METHOD, DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a road surface detection method, device and equipment and a storage medium, which are used for improving the detection speed of road surface detection so as to improve the safety of a vehicle. The road surface detection method comprises the steps that a road image is acquired through preset shooting equipment, and the road image comprises a road surface image and a road appendage image; the road image is identified through a preset road surface detection model, a target road image is obtained, and the road surface detection model comprises a backbone network (OfficientNet backbone), a feature network (BiFPN) and a prediction network (Boxpredictionnet); determining corresponding road surface alarm information and emergency measure information in a preset early warning model according to the target road image; and sending the road surface alarm information and the emergency measure information to a vehicle-mounted early warning terminal.

column2: INTEGRATIVE SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PERFORMING MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: INTEGRATIVE SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PERFORMING MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCEABSTRACTAn integrative system (100) for performing medical diagnosis using artificial intelligence is disclosed. The integrative system (100) combines traditional medicine with modern medical science. Specifically, a baseline of a patient is first established. Subsequently, changes in the baseline of the patient are captured. Machine learning techniques are incorporated into the integrative system (100) for accurate and quantifiable determination of the baseline of the patient as well as the changes in the baseline that leads to diseases. Further, health, wellness and risk scores are generated based on this integrative approach. The integrative system (100) is also configured to generate a recommendation message to the patient based on the generated health, wellness, and disease risk score. The knowledge from the baseline and baseline changes is used for subsequent interventions such as food, medicine, meditation, yoga, panchakarma, acupuncture, music, massage, and the like.FIG. 1

column2: CONTACTLESS PAYMENT RELAY ATTACK PROTECTION
column4: A method for contactless payment relay attack protection includes receiving an online authorization request including a cryptogram, a measured processing time, and a reference processing time from a terminal. The cryptogram is verified, and a determination is performed as to whether the measured processing time exceeds the reference processing time. An online authorization response authorizing or declining a monetary transaction is transmitted, based on the determination. An artificial intelligence transaction analysis can be performed based on past and current conditions (e.g., battery level, operating system, open applications) of a payment device such as a mobile phone, past and current conditions of a terminal, and/or a monetary amount. The online authorization response can be based on the artificial intelligence transaction analysis.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR PRIVATELY AND SECURELY TRACKING LOCATION DATA AND BIOMETRIC SAMPLING FOR TRACING DISEASE PROPAGATION
column4: Embodiments of the present invention provide an artificial intelligence-enabled apparatus, such as a mobile communication device equipped with input ports and bio sensors and having a controlling/coordinating/managing methods and software applications running on them for reducing the spread of a pandemic and managing social and economic impact to minimize disruptions that occur due to indiscriminate and global actions such as strict social distancing and business closures.

column2: MANAGEMENT MODULE FOR A SAILING BOAT
column4: The invention relates to a management module for a sailing boat, said sailing boat comprising a wind angle sensor configured to measure the wind angle value of the boat indicating the angle between the wind direction and the sailing direction of the sailing boat, said wind angle value being comprised between ??80Â° and +180Â°, and an autopilot module configured to receive control commands and to control the trajectory of said sailing boat using said control commands, said management module being configured to receive the wind angle value from said wind angle sensor, generate a control command to control the wind angle of the boat between a first angle threshold and a second angle threshold wherein said first angle threshold and said second angle threshold are greater than or equal to 0Â° and smaller than or equal to +180Â° when the wind angle value is between 0Â° and +180Â° and greater than or equal to ??80Â° and smaller than or equal to 0Â° when the wind angle value is between ??80Â° and 0Â°, and send said generated control command to the autopilot module in order for said autopilot module to control the trajectory of the sailing boat using said control command.

column2: A MANAGEMENT MODULE FOR A SAILING BOAT
