column4: The invention relates to a management module for a sailing boat, said sailing boat comprising a wind angle sensor configured to measure the wind angle value of the boat indicating the angle between the wind direction and the sailing direction of the sailing boat, said wind angle value being comprised between -180Â° and +180Â°, and an autopilot module configured to receive control commands and to control the trajectory of said sailing boat using said control commands, said management module being configured to receive the wind angle value from said wind angle sensor, generate a control command to control the wind angle of the boat between a first angle threshold and a second angle threshold wherein said first angle threshold and said second angle threshold are greater than or equal to 0Â° and smaller than or equal to +180Â° when the wind angle value is between 0Â° and +180Â° and greater than or equal to -180Â° and smaller than or equal to 0Â° when the wind angle value is between -180Â° and 0Â°, and send said generated control command to the autopilot module in order for said autopilot module to control the trajectory of the sailing boat using said control command.

column2: BUSINESS PROCESSING METHOD, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a business processing method, an electronic device, electronic equipment and a medium. By applying the technical scheme provided by the invention, in the process of processing the current service by the computing node, the service data required for subsequent service processing can be retrieved from the storage cluster in advance and stored in the temporary storage space through the specific cache algorithm. Therefore, on the premise of not influencing the currently running task, the reading efficiency of the business data is higher when the subsequent task uses the computing node for computing, and the overall business processing efficiency is further improved.

column2: SOFTWARE TESTING METHOD AND DEVICE, MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to a software testing method, a software testing device, a computer readable medium and electronic equipment. The software testing method comprises the following steps: respectively deploying to-be-tested software in different software development stages in a plurality of virtual containers of a container cloud platform, and configuring a plurality of flow pools associated with the virtual containers; collecting flow data related to the to-be-tested software according to a preset flow collection rule, and storing the collected flow data to a flow pool related to the flow collection rule; and extracting sample data from the plurality of flow pools according to a flow input proportion configured in the virtual container, and inputting the sample data into the to-be-tested software deployed in the virtual container so as to update a software code of the to-be-tested software according to a running result of the to-be-tested software. The embodiment of the invention can improve the software testing efficiency and reduce the software development cost.

column2: RUNNING POSTURE DETECTION METHOD AND EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a running posture detection method and equipment. The method is applied to the fields of artificial intelligence and human-computer interaction. The method can be executed by a first device, the first device can be a wearable device or a terminal device, and the method comprises the steps that the first device obtains current running activity data of a user and feature information of the user, the first device determines a reference value interval of N types of running posture parameters corresponding to the feature information of the user, the first equipment determines K running posture parameters of which the sampling values of the M types of running posture parameters do not fall into a reference value interval of the N types of running posture parameters from the M types of running posture parameters, the K running posture parameters comprise landing impact force, and the first equipment determines L correlation coefficients between L running posture parameters in the K running posture parameters and the landing impact force, and the first device outputs the running posture detection results of the user corresponding to the L correlation coefficients. The method can evaluate the running posture of the user so as to guide the user to run correctly and healthily.

column2: BEHAVIOR RECOGNITION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON PROTOTYPE COMPARATIVE LEARNING, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a behavior recognition method and system based on prototype comparative learning, and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. Comprising the steps of sampling in a skeleton key point data set to generate a sample set; converting the samples by adopting at least two random data conversion methods to obtain two groups of enhanced samples; respectively inputting the two groups of enhanced samples into a coding network to obtain two groups of characterization vectors; searching a prototype vector with the highest similarity with each representation vector in one group of representation vectors in the prototype vector set, and labeling to generate a corresponding similar vector set; constructing a prototype comparison loss function; and carrying out back propagation by adopting the prototype comparison loss function, and training an encoder network and all prototype vectors at the same time. According to the prototype contrast learning behavior recognition method, under the condition that behavior category labels are not needed and the method is not based on an auto-encoder, a model capable of effectively obtaining behavior representation vectors can be obtained through skeleton point sequence sample training.

column2: INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, SERVER AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention is suitable for the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides an information processing method and device, a server and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining configuration information; if the running mode indication information indicates that the target server is in a development mode, when a starting operation is detected, obtaining an application program code from the code path, and performing source code analysis on the application program code to obtain a file identifier of a bottom-layer code file quoted by the application program code and a file identifier of a service logic code file; carrying out file compiling on the bottom-layer code file; and according to the page basic path, the application program code, and the file identifier of the underlying code file and the file identifier of the business logic code file quoted by the application program code, generating page structure information and an access path of each page in the application. According to the method and the device, the browser can quickly display the effect of the page related to the application program code, and the development efficiency can be improved.

column2: INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a control method and device of intelligent equipment, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of intelligent hardware, in particular to the field of artificial intelligence such as the voice technology. According to the specific implementation scheme, in response to an opening instruction of a first mode, audio data with rope skipping rhythm information are played, dance step videos corresponding to the audio and the video are displayed, treading key position information of the intelligent dancing blanket and motion data of intelligent rope skipping are obtained, corresponding first feedback data are determined according to the motion data and the rope skipping rhythm information, and the first feedback data are sent to the first mode. And determining corresponding second feedback data according to the treading key position information and the dance step video, thereby determining corresponding total feedback data, thereby providing audio data and the corresponding dance step video for a user and providing feedback data corresponding to dancing and rope skipping for the user in the process of skipping the rope on the intelligent dancing blanket by the user of the intelligent rope skipping. Therefore, the dancing experience of the user during rope skipping is realized, and the happy experience of the user during sports is increased.

column2: LEADER NODE MANAGEMENT METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to artificial intelligence, and discloses a leader node management method and device based on artificial intelligence, equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a first connection between a zookeeper server and a server side, creating a leader node for managing a service component in the server side through the zookeeper server, according to the running state of the zookeeper server and/or the connection state of the first connection, carrying out recovery or unloading on a leader node in the zookeeper server; and after the unloading processing is carried out on the leader node, electing the leader node of the server side again. The situation that a plurality of leader nodes coexists due to the fact that a new leader node is directly selected again when the zookeeper server considers that the leader node is offline is avoided.

column2: IOT DRIVEN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FOR SMART FOOD RECOMMENDATION TO HEALTH MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column4: A personal health record (PHR) is an electronic health record that captures, tracks, and manages all types of health-related information in a secure and confidential manner throughout a person's life. It is now possible to track an individual's physical activity, blood pressure, and glucose levels in real time thanks to wireless sensors and wearable gadgets using IoT devices. As a result, the quality of health-care management services has improved because of the efficient utilization of such data. PHR is also becoming more significant in the treatment of chronic diseases like as diabetes, arthritis, Alzheimer's disease, and heart disease. The current design is for health-care privilege, specifically for personalized management of a user's health-care requirements. The invention presents a method for merging a user's personal risk analysis with resources used by health-care medical service providers, as well as food habits, patient condition, and other stakeholders in the user's health-care decision-making. PHR's real-time health monitoring and management solution is based on the PHR platform, which includes filters based on specific and well-known health risk indicators, as well as user preference models for each unique patient. A mobile-based health management service and personal health record can help those who are concerned about their own health. In addition, the medical environment is fast transitioning away from hospital-centric health monitoring systems toward patient-centric health monitoring systems. We employed Collaborative Filtering for food recommendations to improve the recommendation system. There are further advantages, such as personal health record standardization, support for a smart digital food assistant-based health management system, patient health awareness, and hospital-to-hospital sharing of treatment-related data. Artificial intelligence (AI) is infiltrating all aspects of food systems, implying that systemic changes are feasible. Designers, as intermediaries between people, technology, and the environment, have a responsibility to recognize and consider how artificial intelligence (AI) can help us transition to more sustainable food systems.

column2: SENSOR FUSION METHOD FOR PERSONNEL CONDITION DETECTION
column4: The invention provides a sensor fusion method for personnel condition detection. The method comprises the following steps: positioning the position of at least one moving personnel in a detection area by a millimeter wave radar; capturing an RGB image or an IR image of the at least one moving person with a depth sensing camera, and generating two-dimensional (2D) human skeleton point information corresponding to the at least one moving person; executing a sensor fusion program by using an artificial intelligence operation platform, and synthesizing a three-dimensional (3D) human skeleton time sequence by using data derived from the two-dimensional human skeleton point information; and when the number of the synthesized three-dimensional human skeleton time sequences is greater than a threshold value N, judging whether the at least one moving person falls down or not by using an action identification module in the artificial intelligence operation platform so as to decide whether to send out a notification or not.

column2: DISASTER RECOVERY METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT BASED ON ACTIVE-ACTIVE SYSTEM AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of digital medical treatment and artificial intelligence, and particularly discloses a disaster recovery method and device based on an active-active system, equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: when it is detected that a disaster occurs in a first machine room, acquiring configuration information of the first machine room, matching a preset fault scene according to the configuration information, and acquiring a corresponding directed acyclic execution stream according to the fault scene; obtaining an execution request sent by a client, and generating an execution instruction of each task node according to the directed acyclic execution flow based on the execution request; obtaining a mapping relation between a corresponding task node and an execution server and corresponding execution script information according to the execution instruction; and determining a target execution server according to the mapping relationship, and running the execution script information on the target execution server to switch the first machine room to the second machine room. By means of the mode, the fault response speed can be increased, and the problem of data loss and damage caused by man-made or natural disasters is solved.

column2: POSTURE RECOGNITION DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a posture recognition device based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of image recognition equipment. The device comprises a placing box internally provided with a corresponding control panel, a U-shaped support is arranged at the top of the placing box, a transmission shaft rotationally arranged in the placing box is fixedly installed at the bottom of the U-shaped support, and a containing plate frame used for containing mobile equipment is arranged in the U-shaped support. And a fixing strip is fixedly installed on one side of the containing plate frame, a camera is fixedly installed on the fixing strip, a first bevel gear is fixedly installed at the position, located in the containing box, of the transmission shaft, and a first motor is fixedly installed in the containing box. According to the utility model, the mobile end is arranged on the accommodating plate frame in the U-shaped bracket, so that the equipment adjusts the rotating angle and the elevation angle of the accommodating plate frame through the corresponding position tracking module and the camera to realize automatic tracking shooting of the mobile end, the use is convenient, the safety is high, and a good shooting effect is ensured.

column2: INFLATABLE LIFE-SAVING SWIMMING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to an inflatable life-saving swimming device, comprising an inflatable body 1 installed with a weight sensor 2 that determines weight of a user while wearing it, a microcontroller for generating a command that is received by an air pump 3 configured on the body 1 for pumping in air inside to inflate the body in accordance to the determined weight, an accelerometer 5 in syncing with an AI (artificial intelligence) enabled image capturing module 6 configured on the body 1, wherein the accelerometer 5 upon sensing sailing speed of the user to be above a threshold limit activates the module 6 to detect presence of solid objects in path of sailing and a spherical canopy 8 upon detection of the the solid objects directs the canopy 8 to deploy around head portion of the user for preventing the user?™s head to collide with the solid objects.

column2: DATA JOB PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a data job processing method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining data mapping information of open source software used during data job processing of different data systems; generating a running program according to the data mapping information and the running parameters of different data systems; taking the generated running program as a job running engine, and accessing different data systems; wherein the job operation engine is used for processing the to-be-processed data job in the original format according to data mapping information and operation parameters of the data system to obtain a data job processing result in a target format; for each data system, inputting a to-be-processed data job input by a user to a job operation engine; and receiving a data job processing result output by the job operation engine. Unified processing of data jobs of different data systems can be achieved, the redundancy of program codes is reduced, and the accuracy and processing efficiency of the data jobs are improved.

column2: IOT WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED ELECTRIC ADVENTURE BIKE
column4: IOT with Artificial Intelligence-Based Electric Adventure Bike Abstract: Urban transportation policymakers must address a variety of issues, including traffic congestion, inaccessibility, social equity, air pollution, and rising CO2 emissions. Many people overlook or dismiss the benefits of motorised two-wheelers for people who are unable to travel by foot or public transportation due to concerns about pollution, noise, road safety, and driver behaviour. As a result of these social and political issues, cycling is widely regarded as a viable mode of transportation, even though it is best for short distances. The "sustainable mobility" paradigm helps to frame discussions about the potential role of electric two-wheelers (pedelecs, electric mopeds, and electric scooters) in urban vehicle ecosystems. Traditional transportation planning does not place the same emphasis on accessibility, people, streets as physical spaces, city livability, or the environment as this new approach does. This new way of thinking has undergone dramatic changes. The researchers examined academic and policy literature, as well as alternative modes of transportation such as motorised and pedalled vehicles, public transportation, and private automobiles, to determine what they could accomplish for this study. It demonstrates the differences in transportation systems between the three countries through the use of an example from each. Additionally, electric two-wheelers are being discussed as potential policy tools to aid in their spread. Two-wheel electric vehicles are critical for transportation, sustainable development, and climate change mitigation. This chapter addresses knowledge gaps in these areas regarding electric two-wheelers.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE METHOD AND DEVICE FOR HEALTH FITNESS DATA ACQUISITION
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of fitness equipment, in particular to an artificial intelligence method and device for health fitness data acquisition. The device comprises a substrate. A machine shell, a detection shell and a support frame are fixed at the top end of the substrate. An infrared sensor is mounted at the top end of the surface of the machine shell. The detection shell is located on the front side of the machine shell. A block groove is formed in the top end of the detection shell, a weighing sensor and a supporting block are arranged in the block groove, and a lying plate is fixed to the top of the supporting block. A face recognition device and a touch display screen are arranged on the back of the machine shell, and a partition plate is fixed in the machine shell. A data storage module, a central processing unit and a wireless transmitting module are sequentially arranged at the top of the partition plate. An exercise detection device is arranged on the fitness equipment, exercise data are recorded in the exercise process, a body builder can accurately know the exercise data of the body builder, and therefore, a scientific and efficient body-building effect is achieved through reasonable planned training.

column2: EXERCISE DEVICE FOR STROKE PATIENT
column4: The invention discloses an exercise device for a stroke patient. The exercise device comprises a machine body group, a man-machine intelligent voice interaction module, an upper limb exercise module and a lower limb exercise module, the man-machine intelligent voice interaction module is used for electrically controlling the upper limb exercise module and the lower limb exercise module, the machine body group comprises a base and a mounting frame, and the man-machine intelligent voice interaction module is installed on the upper side of the mounting frame and comprises a display screen and a voice instruction transceiver. Through the artificial intelligence voice interaction module, the upper limb exercise module and the lower limb exercise module, a patient can be conveniently guided to take scientific training actions for training, recovery of the patient is facilitated, the structure is simple, the cost is low, good practicability is achieved, and the exercise device is suitable for daily exercise of hemiplegia or quadriplegia patients caused by cerebral apoplexy, and is beneficial to rehabilitation exercise of patients in a home environment.

column2: UNMANNED DRIVING ALGORITHM OF AGV BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of AGV driving, in particular to an unmanned driving algorithm of an AGV based on artificial intelligence. The unmanned driving algorithm comprises the following steps: firstly, carrying out offset real-time correction on an AGV trolley in a running process, and automatically guiding a trolley path tracking control system to keep the system in a balanced state; and controlling AGV navigation through PID control, adjustment of a proportionality coefficient, an integral time constant and differential time. According to the invention, the offset is corrected firstly, then driving control is conducted on the AGV, the unmanned driving algorithm has the advantages of being reliable in work, small in error, low in error rate, capable of improving the transportation efficiency and the like, the fault rate of the AGV is further reduced, and the transportation efficiency is improved.

column2: PHYSICAL BALANCE TRAINING SYSTEM USING FOOT SENSORS, REAL-TIME FEEDBACK, ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, AND OPTIONALLY OTHER BODY SENSORS
column4: A wearable, flexible, bio-sensing housing with physical feedback, with software running on a user's wirelessly connected smart device. The housing has embedded at least one of pressure, movement, temperature, velocity, and acceleration sensors, and at least one of a haptic, vibrational, audio, visual, kinesthetic, tactile, olfactory, thermal, vestibular, and somatosensory feedback mechanisms. The feedback being triggered by measurements from the sensors and predetermined parameters, as compared by the smart device's software and/or a connected server. With real-time measurements and real-time feedback directly to the user's body, the user can perform real-time adjustment of his activity to obtain optimal performance and/or health.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VISUAL FIRE EARLY WARNING SYSTEM BASED ON UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE
column4: The utility model relates to an artificial intelligence visual fire early warning system based on an unmanned aerial vehicle, which comprises an unmanned aerial vehicle monitoring module, a lifting module arranged on the outer side surface of a building, a fire monitor and an artificial intelligence host, and is characterized in that the unmanned aerial vehicle monitoring module comprises an unmanned aerial vehicle, an undercarriage and an unmanned aerial vehicle control unit for controlling the unmanned aerial vehicle; the lifting module and the unmanned aerial vehicle control unit are controlled by the artificial intelligence host to operate; a monitoring shooting unit is carried on the unmanned aerial vehicle, and the monitoring shooting unit is in communication connection with the artificial intelligence host; if the fire monitor monitors a fire condition, a signal is sent to the artificial intelligence host, the artificial intelligence host sends an instruction to control the lifting unit to operate to drive the unmanned aerial vehicle monitoring module to ascend to a corresponding floor, and the unmanned aerial vehicle is controlled by the unmanned aerial vehicle control unit to fly for monitoring and shooting, so that a field picture can be collected at the first time; the flight distance of the unmanned aerial vehicle to the scene can be shortened, and the reliability is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE GRAPHIC INFORMATION COLLECTION DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence graphic information collecting device which comprises a lifting frame, a base, a rotating seat and an angle adjusting frame. According to the artificial intelligence graphic information collecting device, the bottom motor drives the threaded rod to rotate, the threaded rod rotates to drive the threaded sleeve to move upwards on the threaded rod, the distance observed by the horizontal height infrared probe changes along with the distance, the bottom motor stops rotating after the distance reaches the expected height, and similarly, the built-in motor drives the rotating frame to rotate; an external motor drives a camera end to rotate, the camera end rotates on a positioning gear through an adjusting gear, and the requirement for a vertical angle expected to be observed by the horizontal angle observation infrared probe is met. The device can intelligently observe the accuracy of the height, the direction and the angle in the shooting process, and the optimal data collection effect is achieved.

column2: NETWORK MONITORING CAMERA BASED ON AI ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of video monitoring, and discloses a network monitoring camera based on AI artificial intelligence technology, a first motor and a second motor respectively drive a camera housing to rotate left and right and up and down to adjust a monitoring visual angle, and the first motor and the second motor realize accurate operation positioning by receiving a control signal of a main control board. The system can automatically scan a monitored area, can track a monitored object under the control of a worker in a monitoring center, is added with an infrared shooting function, achieves 24-hour all-weather video monitoring, can carry out structured processing on most video data in real time through a built-in AI chip and a camera, can analyze video content in real time, can detect a moving object in real time, and is high in practicability. According to the utility model, the system identifies the attribute information of people and objects, transmits the attribute information to the cloud server for storage through the network, can remotely check the monitoring image in real time, facilitates the subsequent rapid query and intelligent retrieval, can give an alarm for the abnormal behaviors of people, improves the efficiency of video processing, and is high in practicality.

column2: COMPUTER OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VISUAL IDENTIFICATION
column4: The invention discloses a computer operation and maintenance method based on artificial intelligence visual identification, and relates to the technical field of computer operation and maintenance, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining current network state operation information which comprises normal current network connection or abnormal current network connection; if the current network connection is abnormal, collecting image information of a current running client interface; identifying the obtained client interface image information to obtain an analysis report; and obtaining a solution based on the analysis report, and pushing the solution to the user, including pushing assistance fault processing to the user. The method is high in timeliness and timely in response, meets daily operation and maintenance requirements, meets operation and maintenance of different crowds and different environments, and can assist a user in rapidly solving problems.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VISUAL PEOPLE FLOW THERMODYNAMIC DIAGRAM ANALYSIS SYSTEM BASED ON UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE
column4: The utility model relates to an artificial intelligence visual people flow thermodynamic diagram analysis system based on unmanned aerial vehicles, which comprises an analysis system host, a plurality of unmanned aerial vehicles and a controller, and the controller comprises an undercarriage, an unmanned aerial vehicle control unit and a control host. A monitoring shooting unit for shooting a thermodynamic diagram picture is carried on the unmanned aerial vehicle, a moving unit for driving the landing gear to move is arranged on the landing gear, and the moving unit is controlled by the control host to move; during use, the analysis system host sends a control instruction to the control host according to an input instruction, the control host controls each mobile unit to operate to bring the plurality of undercarriages to a specified place and controls the unmanned aerial vehicle control unit to operate, and the unmanned aerial vehicle control unit controls an unmanned aerial vehicle to take off and shoot according to a set mode. Shooting pictures are transmitted back to the analysis system host through the unmanned aerial vehicle control unit, a large area can be covered for monitoring through the system mode, and meanwhile good signal stability and continuous shooting monitoring capacity are achieved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHANNEL GATE WITH SHOOTING ASSEMBLY CONVENIENT TO DISASSEMBLE AND ASSEMBLE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence passageway gate convenient to disassemble and assemble a shooting component, which comprises a first mounting rack, a stop lever, a passageway gate body, a second mounting rack, a telescopic outer rod and a fixed mount, the passageway gate body is composed of the first mounting rack and the second mounting rack, and a groove is formed in the first mounting rack; a rotating disc is rotatably connected to the inner wall of the groove, a fixing plate is fixed to the front surface of the rotating disc through fixing bolts, a limiting rod is welded to the outer end face of one side of the fixing plate, a limiting groove is formed in a blocking rod, the fixing frame is welded to the upper surface of the first mounting frame, and a through hole is formed in the fixing frame; the telescopic outer rod is inserted into the through hole, the front surface of the fixing frame is in threaded connection with a second locking valve, the outer end face of one side of the telescopic outer rod is in threaded connection with a first locking valve, a telescopic inner rod is movably inserted into the upper surface of the telescopic outer rod, and a shooting frame is fixed to the upper surface of the telescopic inner rod. The shooting frame can be adjusted and detached.

column2: PICTURE SEARCHING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a picture search method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of natural language processing and intelligent search. The method can be applied to scenes such as picture search. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises: obtaining a place name search word input by a user, and determining a target place name based on the place name search word; acquiring geographical location information of the target place name; and determining a target picture matched with the target place name from the at least one candidate picture based on the geographic position information of the target place name and the shooting place position information of each candidate picture in the at least one candidate picture. According to the method, the geographic position information of the target place name is compared with the position information of the shooting place of each candidate picture, so that the target picture of which the shooting place is matched with the target place name is accurately searched from the candidate pictures, and the requirement of a user for carrying out picture search at a place with relatively small fine granularity is met.

column2: EXERCISE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides an exercise processing method and device based on artificial intelligence, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. The method comprises the steps: acquiring exercise data comprising question stem data and question solving data; presenting the question stem data in a human-computer interaction interface, and determining a plurality of question solving knowledge points corresponding to the question solving data; in a knowledge graph of a subject corresponding to the exercise data, determining a relationship among the plurality of question solving knowledge points, and determining at least one question solving step included in the question solving data according to the relationship; performing title classification processing on each problem solving step to determine a title of each problem solving step; and presenting at least one problem solving step and a corresponding title in the human-computer interaction interface. According to the invention, the efficiency and accuracy of understanding the exercise solving process of the user can be improved.

column2: APPLICATION ACQUISITION METHOD AND DEVICE, SERVER, MEDIUM AND PRODUCT
column4: The invention discloses an application program acquisition method and device, a server, a medium and a product, and can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence or finance. If the user inserts a bank card into a bank card identification module in the process of playing a public welfare video in first electronic equipment, the first electronic equipment generates the payment instruction, and the bank card is bound with the target user, so that the target user can be obtained through the payment instruction. The first electronic equipment can play the public welfare video in the process of running the application program. Second electronic equipment held by the target user is searched from a pre-stored corresponding relation between the user and electronic equipment, and the second electronic equipment is different from the first electronic equipment; and the installation link of the application program is sent to the second electronic equipment. If the user needs to install the application program in the second electronic equipment, the application program is directly obtained and installed through the installation link, and the user does not need to search the application program.

column2: WAREHOUSE SMOKING IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a warehouse smoking identification system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises an image identification server and a front-end device, and the front-end device comprises a monitoring track, a main control module, an alarm device, a communication module and a plurality of cameras. The monitoring track is annular and rotates in the preset direction, and the cameras are evenly hung below the monitoring track and move along with the monitoring track to pass through all the goods shelves. The monitoring track is arranged, the camera moves along with the monitoring track, the monitoring track is arranged above the goods shelves, the warehouse can be monitored more comprehensively by passing through all the goods shelves, camera shooting dead angles caused by placing of the goods shelves are reduced, meanwhile, the main control module controls the communication module to send images collected by the camera to the image recognition server, and the image recognition server recognizes the images collected by the camera. The smoking behavior of the image is analyzed through the image recognition server, automatic recognition of the smoking behavior is achieved, and the method is more accurate and efficient.

column2: FITNESS ROOM COACH MANAGEMENT PERSONNEL DISTRIBUTION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a fitness room coach management personnel allocation method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining an action standard rate of using corresponding fitness equipment according to a three-dimensional action sequence of fitness personnel; obtaining the demand degree of each type of fitness equipment area for coach management personnel according to the action standard rate, obtaining the initial distribution number of people required by each type of fitness equipment area according to the demand degree, and carrying out area integration based on the position relation of each type of fitness equipment area to obtain a plurality of integration areas, obtaining a newly distributed number of people of each integration area by combining the integration area and the initial distributed number of people; and performing corresponding personnel scheduling on the coach management personnel in combination with the newly allocated number of people and the total number of the coach management personnel. Through targeted personnel allocation, the rationality of personnel allocation and the utilization rate of personnel are greatly improved, the effect of coach management personnel is fully played, and then the fitness efficiency and the fitness quality of fitness personnel are improved.

column2: DATA UPDATING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a data updating method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of automatic driving. According to the specific implementation scheme, target route description information of a target driving route of the autonomous vehicle is obtained; according to the corresponding relation between the route description information and an automatic driving suite, the automatic driving suite corresponding to the target route description information is determined to serve as a target automatic driving suite of the automatic driving vehicle, and the automatic driving suite comprises parameter values of vehicle parameter items; and the target automatic driving suite is sent to a client running on the automatic driving vehicle. When the scheme provided by the embodiment of the invention is applied to data updating, the data updating efficiency can be improved.

column2: SIGN LANGUAGE RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON NEURAL NETWORK MODEL, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a sign language recognition method and device based on a neural network model, equipment and a medium. The method comprises the following steps of: obtaining to-be-recognized sign language information input by a user and collected by a shooting device, the sign language information comprising conversion mode sign language information and the to-be-recognized sign language information; inputting the sign language information into a pre-trained sign language recognition model to obtain first sign language semantic text information corresponding to the conversion mode sign language information and second sign language semantic text information corresponding to the to-be-recognized sign language information; determining a target language mode corresponding to the conversion mode sign language information according to the first sign language semantic text information; and converting the second sign language semantic text information into one or more of voice, characters and sign languages corresponding to the target language mode. Efficient and intelligent sign language recognition is achieved, and the sign language recognition flexibility is improved. The invention relates to a block chain technology, for example, sign language information can be written into a block chain so as to be used for scenes such as data evidence obtaining.

column2: ABNORMAL PAGE RECOVERY METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to artificial intelligence, and provides an abnormal page recovery method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps of: when a target application crashes in a running process, capturing an exception to generate application exception information; judging whether the application exception information contains preset page exception information or not; if the application exception information contains the preset page exception information, obtaining and storing current page data corresponding to a current display page; and recovering the current display page according to the current page data. In the embodiment of the invention, when a crash caused by page exception is detected, the current display page can be automatically recovered according to the stored page data, the occurrence of the exception condition of the current display page is reduced, and the user experience is improved.

column2: MONITORING EQUIPMENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a monitoring device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a support column and an L-shaped plate, the upper surface of the L-shaped plate is fixedly connected with a mounting box, the inner bottom wall of the mounting box is fixedly connected with a servo motor through a fixing block, the output shaft of the servo motor is fixedly connected with a first helical gear, and the inner bottom wall of the mounting box is rotatably connected with a cylinder. A second bevel gear is fixedly connected to the surface of the cylinder, a camera is fixedly connected to the upper end of the cylinder, a water storage tank is fixedly connected to the upper surface of the camera, a water inlet pipe is fixedly connected to the upper surface of the water storage tank, and a sealing cover is slidably connected to the surface of the water inlet pipe. According to the monitoring equipment based on artificial intelligence, the servo motor, the first bevel gear, the second bevel gear, the cylinder and the camera are arranged, the servo motor drives the first bevel gear to rotate, the first bevel gear is meshed with the second bevel gear, and the second bevel gear drives the cylinder to rotate, so that the camera on the cylinder rotates left and right, and the shooting angle of the camera is increased.

column2: NASAL IMPLANT DESIGN METHOD FOR MAKING PATIENT-CUSTOMIZED NASAL IMPLANTS
column4: The invention provides a nasal implant design method for manufacturing a patient-customized nasal implant. The method comprises the following steps of (a) acquiring a medical image of a nose part of a patient; (b) based on the nasal cartilage data learned by artificial intelligence, automatically implementing a three-dimensional volume rendering image including skin, skeleton and cartilage of the nose part from the medical image of the nose part of the patient; (c) simulating nasal cartilage in the three-dimensional volume rendered image to adapt to the patient; (d) placing a nasal implant selected from a virtual nasal implant model database on the simulated nasal cartilage and the nasal bone; and (e) designing the customized nasal implant to fit the patient by simulating the placed nasal implant.

column2: AUTOMATIC FOOT CORRECTOR MACHINE
column4: The present invention relates to an automatic foot corrector machine includes a platform 1 hinged with a telescopic handle 2 to provide support to hands of a user while performing exercises, wherein the platform 1 incorporates: multiple racks 3 fitted on the platform 1 such that the racks 3 provides sliding pathway for magnetic strips 4 and roller bars 5 that associated with motorized sliders over the racks 3, wherein the strips 4 and bars 5 are fitted to encircle foot and provides support to arch/toe portion of the user according to arch correcting exercises, a foldable chair arrangement 9 to provide sitting option to the user to perform ball roll exercise, an Artificial Intelligence (AI) camera module 6 fitted works in synchronization with a speaker unit 7 to provide real time suggestions to user, an angle sensor 8 fitted on the handle 2 to detect angle of user?™s posture.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TO INDEPENDENTLY ADJUST RESISTANCE OF PEDALS BASED ON LEG STRENGTH
column4: A method is disclosed for using an artificial intelligence engine to modify resistance of pedals of an exercise device. The method includes generating, by the artificial intelligence engine, a machine learning model trained to receive measurements as input, and outputting, based on the measurements, a control instruction that causes the exercise device to modify, independently from each other, the resistance of the pedals. While a user performs an exercise using the exercise device, the method includes receiving the measurements from sensors associated with the pedals. The method includes determining, based on the measurements, a quantifiable or qualitative modification to the resistance provided by a pedal of the pedals. The resistance provided by another pedal of the pedals is not modified. The method includes transmitting the control instruction to the exercise device to cause the resistance provided by the pedal to be modified.

column2: TASK DEPLOYMENT METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT, STORAGE MEDIUM AND PRODUCT
column4: The invention discloses a task deployment method and device, equipment, a storage medium and a product, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: displaying a task flow configuration page under the condition that a task flow creation instruction is detected; in response to a task flow configuration operation received on the task flow configuration page, determining at least one model processing task and task configuration information in first task flow; in response to a running instruction for the first task flow, executing the at least one model processing task based on the task configuration information; and under the condition that the at least one model processing task is successfully executed, deploying a first task model in a target service to execute a target task. In the technical scheme provided by the embodiment of the invention, the task flow can be executed according to the task flow running instruction by receiving the task flow configuration operation and creating the model processing task and the task configuration information in the task flow, so that a process of automatic modeling deployment is realized, the task deployment time is shortened, and the task deployment efficiency is improved.

column2: 3D GRATING DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to a 3D grating detection method and device, computer equipment and a readable storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: embedding a grating scanner between binocular cameras, providing a light source for the binocular cameras, carrying out the calibration of the binocular cameras, enabling the binocular cameras to carry out the shooting of a workpiece, collecting the image of the workpiece,g. and obtaining point cloud information including three-dimensional coordinates; carrying out smooth filtering on the point cloud information by adopting bilateral filtering, and meanwhile reserving boundary information; performing 3D modeling based on the point cloud information after bilateral filtering to obtain a 3D model; and detecting the workpiece based on the 3D model, obtaining data of all dimensions of the workpiece from the four dimensions of the X axis, the Y axis, the Z axis and the pose, and judging whether the workpiece is installed in place or not. The problem that an existing workpiece detection mode is low in detection precision is solved. The method and the device have the effect of improving the workpiece detection precision.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TALENT EVALUATION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON MULTI-SCENE SIMULATION AND MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses an artificial intelligence talent evaluation method and device based on multi-scene simulation and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: determining the post information of a to-be-recruitment user, and determining a fitness calculation model corresponding to the post information through a pre-generated space description model according to the post information, wherein the post information comprises an industry type and a post level, and the space description model is used for describing a dimension corresponding to the industry type and a class cluster corresponding to the post level; selecting at least one simulation scene through a preset configuration rule according to the post information; collecting behavior information of a to-be-recruitment user in the simulation scene, and calculating user features of the to-be-recruitment user; and inputting the post information and the user features into a fitness calculation model, determining the fitness of the to-be-recruitment user and the corresponding post to complete evaluation of the to-be-recruitment user. The complex interaction relationship among the industry, the post type and the post level is fully considered in the evaluation process.

column2: TABLE TENNIS SERVING MACHINE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a table tennis serving machine based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of table tennis serving machine equipment, the table tennis serving machine comprises a serving machine main body, the bottom of the serving machine main body is fixedly connected with a supporting seat, a base is installed below a base of the supporting seat, and a lifting adjusting assembly is installed in the base. The multifunctional ball serving machine has the advantages that the lifting adjusting assembly is arranged, when the overall height needs to be adjusted, the individual requirements of trainees with different heights and body types for the height during use are met, the practical training effect is improved, the limiting assembly is arranged, and when normal ball serving is needed, the height of the trainees is adjusted, so that the height of the trainees is adjusted, and the practical training effect is improved. Table tennis balls are pushed to be shot out of the ball serving opening through output operation of the electric telescopic rod, limited and limited ball serving is achieved, and therefore the practical training efficiency is improved, an infrared sensor, universal wheels, a pull rod and a buzzer are arranged, and equipment damage and power resource waste caused by continuous operation of equipment are avoided.

column2: HEALTH MONITORING AND COACHING SYSTEM
column4: A system is disclosed that monitors participants in health-related programs, such as weight loss or exercise programs, and that provides automated, personalized health coaching to the program participants. The system includes breath analysis devices that are used by the program participants to generate ketone measurements, and includes a mobile application that runs on mobile devices of the participants and communicates with corresponding breath analysis devices. The system operates generally by monitoring ketone levels (such as acetone levels) and other attributes of the participants and by making personalized, machine-generated changes or updates to such programs to maintain program effectiveness and engagement. In some embodiments the system uses artificial intelligence to classify and coach the participants.

column2: CASH TRANSPORT MANAGEMENT METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND COMPUTER STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a cash transport management method and device, electronic equipment and a computer storage medium, and can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence or finance. According to the scheme, the method comprises the steps: acquiring the first position of the cash truck in the working state in real time from the blockchain; drawing an actual running route based on the first position and the urban path; inputting the actual running route and a planned route corresponding to the cash truck in the working state into a preset route detection model, processing the planned route and the actual running route based on the route detection model, outputting a detection result, wherein the detection result is used for indicating whether deviation sailing exists in the actual running route or not; if it is determined that the detection result indicates that the actual running route has the yaw behavior, outputting first prompt information to prompt a driver of the cash truck. In this way, the transportation safety of the cash truck can be guaranteed.

column2: USER CAPTURING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT, STORAGE MEDIUM AND COMPUTER PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The invention provides a user capturing method and device, electronic equipment, a computer readable storage medium and a computer program product, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as smart home and posture recognition. The method comprises the following steps: performing whole body skeleton key point scanning on a user entering a capture area to generate a skeleton posture model; using the skeleton posture model of the user closest to an intelligent mirror as a suspected model to be displayed in a preset display area of the intelligent mirror in a highlight mode; and in response to the situation that an error capture feedback of the displayed suspected model is not received within the preset duration, locking the suspected model as an effective model corresponding to the target user, and controlling a capture component to take the target user as a capture object and adjust a capture posture. According to the method, the time consumed for rendering the posture model can be shortened, and meanwhile, the display mechanism of the highlight suspected model is also beneficial to enabling the intelligent mirror to capture the target user.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR OUTPUTTING INFORMATION
column4: The invention provides a method and device for outputting information, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of intelligent mirrors. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps of outputting a picture of a target scene in response to a received instruction of entering the target scene; acquiring a user action image; identifying skeleton key points in the user action image, and determining the action of the user according to the skeleton key points; matching the action with an operation mapping table of the target scene, wherein the operation mapping table is used for representing the corresponding relation between the action of the user and the operation of the target object; and controlling the target object to execute the successfully matched operation. According to the embodiment, the fitness function is achieved through the intelligent mirror.

column2: SNAKELIKE RUNNING TRACK JUDGMENT METHOD BASED ON COMPUTER VISION
column4: The invention discloses a snakelike running track judgment method based on computer vision and particularly relates to the field of sports testing. A camera is adopted to capture a sports field and a sportsman motion track, a deep learning algorithm and a mathematical formula are used to capture and calculate a sportsman running track, and the snakelike running track judgment method has advantages of simple arrangement, low cost, high accuracy and the like. The method has advantages of being simple in structure, convenient to operate, capable of preventing cheating and the like, problems caused by original equipment can be effectively solved, the human-shaped object can be detected only when the human-shaped object moves in the field, and the detection frame rate can reach more than 100 frames per second. Compared with infrared rays, a group of infrared detection equipment is placed every 20cm to detect the running of the athlete, so the footstep moving path of the athlete can be more accurately restored. Whether an athlete moves according to a specified route or not can be known through basic geometric calculation.

column2: SITTING POSTURE DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a sitting posture detection method and device, equipment, and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining a sitting posture image of a to-be-detected user collected by a designated shooting device, and extracting three-dimensional data of a plurality of human body feature points from the sitting posture image; inputting the three-dimensional data of the human body feature points into a pre-trained posture recognition model, and performing recognition to obtain current human body posture information of the to-be-detected user; determining a current sitting posture state according to the current human body posture information; when it is determined that the current sitting posture state is abnormal, generating prompt information according to the sitting posture state, and sending the prompt information to terminal equipment corresponding to the to-be-detected user, wherein the prompt information is used for prompting that the sitting posture state is abnormal. Thus, a sitting posture state of a user is detected efficiently and rapidly in real time, and the user is helped to correct bad sitting postures in time. The invention relates to a blockchain technology, and data can be written into a blockchain for possible scenes such as data collection.

column2: METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT FOR GUIDING ROBOT TO POSITION AND GRAB BASED ON 3D GRATING
column4: The invention relates to a method, device and equipment for guiding a robot to position and grab based on a 3D grating. The method comprises the steps of embedding a grating scanner between binocular cameras, calibrating the binocular camera, performing hand-eye calibration on the binocular camera and the robot, causing the binocular camera to communicate with the robot, shooting an object to be grabbed by the binocular camera to obtain point cloud information including three-dimensional coordinates, conducting smooth filtering on the point cloud information by adopting bilateral filtering, and meanwhile reserving boundary information, performing three-dimensional object recognition based on the filtered point cloud information to obtain coordinates of the object to be grabbed in a robot coordinate system, according to the coordinates, calculating robot grabbing pose information, and returning the robot grabbing pose information to the robot, and enabling the robot to carry out positioning grabbing according to the robot grabbing pose information. The problem that in the prior art, when a robot is guided to conduct positioning grabbing, objects cannot be accurately positioned and grabbed is solved. The effect of accurately positioning and grabbing objects is achieved.

column2: INTERCONNECTION METHOD FOR STATE INFORMATION AND DISPATCHING MANAGEMENT OF MINING VEHICLES
column4: The invention discloses an interconnection method for mining vehicle state information and scheduling management. The interconnection method comprises the steps of multi-type data fusion, multi-path wireless transmission channel construction and multivariate target data interaction. The multi-type data fusion is mainly used for collecting and summarizing various information of vehicle end equipment, a system end and a control end; the multi-path wireless transmission channel construction is to construct a data transmission channel based on a wireless technology through a transmission device of the vehicle-end equipment; according to the multivariate target data interaction, the ground vehicle management and control system end integrates multivariate data of numerous target sources and then carries out training processing on information through an artificial intelligence algorithm in combination with service function requirements of vehicle operation so as to realize multi-information interaction and intelligent management and control processing. The interconnection method for the state information and the dispatching management of the mine vehicles has the advantage of guaranteeing the running safety of the mine vehicles.

column2: INTELLIGENT OPTICAL NETWORK UNIT EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the utility model provides intelligent optical network unit equipment, which comprises an artificial intelligence AI main control module, a logic control module, a 5G signal access module, an optical signal access module, a control detection module and a signal output module, and is characterized in that the 5G signal access module and the optical signal access module are both connected with the logic control module; the AI master control module is respectively connected with the logic control module, the control detection module and the signal output module. Through the arrangement of the 5G signal access module, the intelligent ONU equipment has the capability of accessing a wireless network signal, and a protection path is provided for an uplink of the intelligent ONU equipment. When an optical cable link is interrupted or an OLT breaks down, the AI main control module controls the logic control module to automatically access the 5G network signal, a user can normally use various internet surfing services, the use experience of the user is provided, the 5G network signal is large in broadband and low in time delay, the service requirements of high broadband and low time delay can be met, and the use experience of the user is better.

column2: HIGH-SPEED AUDITING SYSTEM BASED ON PATH ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses a high-speed auditing system based on a path algorithm, relates to the technical field of high-speed auditing, and aims to solve the technical problem that vehicles running for a long time and buying for a short time cannot be accurately and efficiently identified due to the fact that an existing scheme does not consider a cross-provincial passing scene and is high in implementation cost and operation complexity. The system comprises a processor and a data acquisition module in communication connection with the processor. According to the invention, a portal transaction flow and a portal plate identification flow are integrated to generate a portal flow model, and a provincial boundary portal flow model and a boundary portal flow model are screened according to the portal flow model, so that high-speed cross-provincial traffic data are effectively combined, and the identification efficiency and accuracy of long-term running and short-term buying are improved; and manual verification and an artificial intelligence model are combined, continuous verification data feedback in service use is combined, the model is continuously optimized, the recognition precision can be improved, and the auditing efficiency is improved.

column2: UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE AUTONOMOUS INSPECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON PRIOR INFORMATION, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of electric power line inspection, and discloses an unmanned aerial vehicle autonomous inspection method and system based on prior information, and a storage medium. The system comprises an unmanned aerial vehicle system, and a route correction module, a communication module, an identification module and an image collection module which are connected with the unmanned aerial vehicle system. According to the invention, a front-end autonomous image identification system based on an unmanned aerial vehicle is developed, a pole tower inspection target point is automatically captured according to waypoint information, the shot target point is automatically identified, if the shooting standard is not met, waypoint intelligent correction is automatically carried out, and it is ensured that reliable high-quality pole tower photos can be shot and the artificial intelligence identification rate of the photo meets the actual application requirement; and the method and system have the beneficial effects that the target point can be automatically identified, the waypoint can be automatically corrected and updated in real time, and high-quality tower target point image information can be acquired.

column2: CAMERA MONITORING EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model discloses a camera monitoring device, which comprises a shell, a circuit board fixedly arranged in the shell, a camera rotatably arranged at a first end of the shell, and a POE power supply device arranged outside the shell, a screw rod is fixedly arranged in the shell, a through hole for the screw rod to pass through is arranged on the shell, and the POE power supply device is arranged in the shell. The screw rod is provided with a butterfly nut which is in threaded connection with the screw rod and is used for fixing monitoring equipment. When the camera monitoring equipment is used, the POE power supply device is externally arranged, so that wiring of the POE power supply device is facilitated, heat dissipation of the POE power supply device is facilitated, and the power supply stability of the POE power supply device is improved. By arranging the screw rod and the butterfly nut, when the monitoring equipment is fixed, the screw rod can penetrate through the fixing plate block, and then the butterfly nut is sleeved on the screw rod to fix the screw rod, so that the monitoring equipment can be quickly mounted and fixed. Furthermore, the camera is rotatably arranged at the first end of the shell, so that the shooting angle of the camera can be conveniently adjusted as required, and a better shooting effect is achieved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INFRASTRUCTURE FOR MONITORING AND DANGER EARLY WARNING OF COMMUNITY NURSING HOME
column4: The utility model belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence infrastructures, and particularly discloses an artificial intelligence infrastructure for monitoring and danger early warning in a community nursing home, which comprises a relay end and a client, the relay end and the client are internally provided with mutually matched Bluetooth transmission modules, the relay end comprises a box body, and the box body is internally provided with a wireless communication module. A mounting block is arranged at the bottom end of the box body, the client side comprises a shell, a cover body is arranged at the top end of the shell through a fixing shaft, the cover body is rotationally connected with the shell through the fixing shaft, and an emergency button is arranged at the top end of the shell; according to the utility model, the client sides with two carrying modes are arranged, so that a user can conveniently fix or carry the system in different modes, the user can conveniently use and operate the system, information of the user can be displayed through the display screen, nursing personnel can conveniently acquire the information of the user, and the use experience of the nursing personnel is improved. And through the arrangement of the drawing type wrist strap, wrists of various different crowds can be conveniently adapted, and client equipment can be conveniently fixed.

column2: APP DETECTION METHOD, SYSTEM AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides an APP detection method, system and device, equipment, and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of big data and application detection. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: running a to-be-detected APP in a cloud mobile phone; based on a current detection item, performing simulation operation on the to-be-detected APP in the cloud mobile phone; meanwhile, acquiring data generated by the APP in the simulation operation, and acquiring detection data required by the current detection item from the data; according to a target detection algorithm preset based on the current detection item, detecting the current detection data to obtain a detection result of the current detection item. By applying the embodiment of the invention, a to-be-detected APP runs in a cloud mobile phone, and APP detection can be completed without using a plurality of devices, so that the APP detection convenience is improved; meanwhile, a dynamic running code of the to-be-detected APP can be obtained for the corresponding detection by performing simulation operation on the to-be-detected APP, so that the detection is more comprehensive, and the effect is better.

column2: EMOTICON, SYSTEM, AND INSTANT MESSAGE SERVICE SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR STUDY USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND BIG DATA
column4: The present invention is to enable learning of knowledge by using an emoticon for study and, specifically, relates to an emoticon, a system, and an instant message service system and method for study using artificial intelligence and big data, wherein an instant message service is provided between a first terminal device and a second terminal device by relay of a server system, and an emoticon provided by the instant message service includes at least one emoticon for study in which emoticon data and study data are combined, so that whenever the emoticon for study is executed, the study data combined with the emoticon for study is displayed to enable natural repeated learning and enable a user to perform self-learning by him or herself alone and transfer a study emoticon owned by the user to another user.

column2: WEARABLE SENSOR AND HEALTHCARE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM USING A WEARABLE SENSOR
column4: A healthcare management system for a healthcare team caring for a patient to serve a healthcare need of the patient includes a wearable sensor worn by the patient for obtaining healthcare data from the patient; a healthcare clinical system having an healthcare analysis subsystem for analyzing the healthcare data; and a relay device in communication selectively with the wearable sensor and the healthcare clinical system. The healthcare analysis subsystem includes an artificial intelligence (AI) engine, the AI engine having a plurality of clinical analysis modules, each clinical analysis module is directed to a respective predetermined medical area, the respective clinical analysis module analyzing the healthcare data with a respective learned algorithm directed to the respective predetermined medical area.

column2: DISTRIBUTED PRIVACY-PRESERVING COMPUTING ON PROTECTED DATA
column4: The present disclosure relates to techniques for developing artificial intelligence algorithms by distributing analytics to multiple sources of privacy protected, harmonized data. Particularly, aspects are directed to a computer implemented method that includes receiving an algorithm and input data requirements associated with the algorithm, identifying data assets as being available from a data host based on the input data requirements, curating the data assets within a data storage structure that is within infrastructure of the data host, and integrating the algorithm into a secure capsule computing framework. The secure capsule computing framework serves the algorithm to the data assets within the data storage structure in a secure manner that preserves privacy of the data assets and the algorithm. The computer implemented method further includes running the data assets through the algorithm to obtain an inference.

column2: ILLEGAL BUILDING DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a construction violation detection method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a computer vision and deep learning technology. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the following steps: shooting the same to-be-detected area at different time to obtain a first image group and a second image group; determining first point cloud data and second point cloud data according to the first image group and the second image group; and comparing the first point cloud data with the second point cloud data, and determining a construction violation detection result of the to-be-detected area. According to the embodiment of the invention, the illegal building detection accuracy can be improved.

column2: TENNIS NET BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a tennis net based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The device comprises a main box and an auxiliary box, the bottom of the inner wall of the main box is fixedly connected with a motor, a rotating shaft of the motor is fixedly connected with a first rotating shaft, the top of the first rotating shaft is rotatably connected with a bearing seat, the bearing seat is fixedly connected to the bottom of the inner wall of the main box, and the middle of the first rotating shaft is fixedly connected with a first winding drum. Infrared rays are emitted through the infrared emitter, the distance between the main box and the auxiliary box is measured in cooperation with the infrared receiver, then the distance is transmitted into the electric control box through an electric signal, rotation of the motor is controlled through conversion, the first winding drum, the auxiliary box, the idler wheels, the rails and the like are matched, and storage of a ball net is achieved; therefore, the ball net is prevented from being exposed to the wind and the sun, and the service life of the ball net is prolonged; the storage of personal supplies of a user is realized through the storage cabinet, and the T-shaped structure of the main box is used for the user to have a rest.

column2: VEHICLE AUTOMATIC DRIVING ASSISTANCE SYSTEM COMBINING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND COMPUTER VISION
column4: The invention relates to an vehicle automatic driving assistance system combining artificial intelligence and computer vision, which comprises a camera device, and is used for recording the shooting angle and the moving track information of a camera in real time and enabling the shooting angle and the moving track information to correspond to each frame of picture in video information; the invention discloses a computer vision basic network training recognition sample collection system, which comprises a camera device, a deep learning network, and input content shot by the camera device as sample information for training, and further comprises a computer vision basic network training recognition sample collection device, which comprises at least one camera and a device capable of recording the shooting angle and track of the camera. According to the method, manual data annotation is not needed any more, a large-scale data set can be generated quickly at low cost, the model can automatically predict the image in the subsequent time according to the track and angle change of the collected image and synthesize the three-dimensional space, and the method can be widely applied to application situations such as automatic driving and space generation which need to generate and perceive the three-dimensional space.

column2: METHOD FOR MULTI-DIMENSIONALLY AND INTELLIGENTLY STUDYING AND JUDGING EXERCISE EFFECT OF FITNESS ACTIONS
column4: The invention relates to a method for multi-dimensionally and intelligently studying and judging the exercise effect of fitness actions, which comprises an external device and an AI brain, the external device is provided with an AI camera and an edge computing host, and the AI brain comprises a real-time video acquisition module, a target detection module, a posture detection module, a joint angle analysis module, an action comparison module and an action input module. The AI brain obtains image information through an AI camera of an external device, and the AI brain target detection module, the posture detection module, the joint angle analysis module and the motion comparison module complete target recognition, motion recognition and motion amount calculation.

column2: DEEP LEARNING-BASED CORN SEEDLING STAGE FIELD DISTRIBUTION INFORMATION STATISTICAL METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a corn seedling stage field distribution information statistical method based on deep learning and belongs to the technical field of target detection and deep learning. The invention discloses a corn seedling stage field distribution information statistical method based on deep learning. The method comprises the following steps of controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle to fly according to a seeding path; shooting by an unmanned aerial vehicle to obtain a corn seedling stage image, marking a whole corn plant and a corn plant center in the image, and training to obtain a weight file; and loading the weight file into a deep learning algorithm to obtain a target detection network, detecting the whole corn plant and the corn plant center in combination with an unmanned aerial vehicle camera calibration result, and calculating data such as the plant number, the plant spacing and the line spacing.
