According to the method, the number of the crops and the distance between the crops can be counted, so information such as the density and the seeding quality of the crops can be obtained; a problem of low crop information statistical efficiency in the prior art is solved, the deep learning algorithm has relatively high detection speed and detection precision, and statistical efficiency is greatly improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ADAPTIVE INTERACTIVE TEACHING SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching system, which comprises a personal information registration module, an interactive course selection module, an interactive teaching module, an after-class exercise module, a weekly test module, a knowledge point consolidation module and a learning progress adjustment module. The personal information registration module is connected with the interactive course selection module, the interactive course selection module is connected with the interactive teaching module, the interactive teaching module is connected with the after-class exercise module, the after-class exercise module is connected with the weekly test module, the weekly test module is respectively connected with the knowledge point consolidation module and the learning progress adjustment module, and the learning progress adjustment module is connected with the interactive teaching module. According to the invention, students can select required learning subjects, knowledge points can be consolidated in time after interactive learning is finished, the learning progress of the students can be adjusted in time after weekly tests, teachers can conveniently, efficiently and quickly master the learning progress and knowledge mastering conditions of the students, and the learning efficiency of the students is improved.

column2: CROSS-MEDIA ANALYSIS REASONING TECHNOLOGY SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides a cross-media analysis reasoning technology system, and relates to the technical field of medical treatment. The cross-media analysis reasoning technology system comprises a server, an input module, an output module and a storage module, and the storage module is used for storing a cross-media medical database, a method and a model; the input module is connected with the output module through the server, and the storage module is connected with the output module through the server; the server comprises a computing unit, and a large-scale cross-media medical knowledge random forest model and a cross-media knowledge self-evolution model which are used for running by the computing unit are arranged in the storage module. A large-scale cross-media medical knowledge random forest model is constructed, a generalization mechanism from directional reasoning to general reasoning is established, content is output in a mode of combining images, texts, audios and videos, and the artificial intelligence cross-media reasoning system with the medical process traceable and the medical means explainable is established.

column2: UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE DETECTION SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON BLADES OF WIND GENERATING SET
column4: The invention discloses an unmanned aerial vehicle detection system and method based on blades of a wind generating set. The detection system comprises an unmanned aerial vehicle, a route planning module, a flight mission module, a three-dimensional modeling module and a defect identification module, wherein the unmanned aerial vehicle is used for shooting images of a fan and has a positioning function, the route planning module is used for planning a flight shooting route of the unmanned aerial vehicle, the flight task module is used for remotely controlling the unmanned aerial vehicle, so that the unmanned aerial vehicle performs flight shooting according to the route generated by the route planning module, the three-dimensional modeling module is used for generating a three-dimensional model of the blades according to the two-dimensional image shot by the unmanned aerial vehicle and the corresponding position information, and the defect identification module is used for performing artificial intelligence identification on the defect of the blades according to the two-dimensional and three-dimensional data of the blades. According to the unmanned aerial vehicle detection system and method provided by the invention, full-automatic inspection of the blades of the wind generating set is realized, and the workload of personnel is greatly reduced.

column2: SUBMARINE SINKING AND FLOATING CONTROL SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a submarine sinking and floating control system based on artificial intelligence. The submarine sinking and floating control system comprises a submarine model, a water tank used for loading the submarine model, a suspension mechanism arranged in the water tank, a drainage mechanism used for conducting drainage on an inner cavity of the submarine model and a water injection mechanism used for injecting water into the inner cavity of the submarine model. One end of the suspension mechanism is fixedly connected with the submarine model, the other end of the suspension mechanism is fixedly connected with the bottom of the water tank, and transparent windows are arranged on the submarine model and the water tank. Transparent windows are arranged on the submarine model and the water tank in the demonstration device, and the floating and diving processes and the sinking and floating principle of the submarine model are visually displayed by utilizing a visual model structure.

column2: RETRACTABLE AERIAL CAMERA BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a retractable aerial camera based on artificial intelligence, which is provided with an intelligent flying aerial camera and an aerial camera body with a shooting function. Comprising a moving groove formed in the inner surface of the aerial photography device, the inner surface of the moving groove is connected with a moving block, a threaded rod is installed on the inner surface of the moving block, and meanwhile the edge end of the outer surface of the moving block is connected with an angle rod. According to the retractable aerial camera based on artificial intelligence, the movable block with the adjustable position is arranged, in the moving process, when an angle rod connected through a cylindrical pin is used, a supporting rod connected with the side end of the angle rod is adjusted to rotate at a fixed point, and an aerial camera body connected with the inner surface of the supporting rod is adjusted to adjust the position and the angle; and through the arrangement of the cross rod, the use stability of the supporting rod is improved, and meanwhile, folding and unfolding of the aerial photographing camera body in the aerial photographing device are automatically controlled during adjustment.

column2: CLASSIFYING GAMING ACTIVITY TO IDENTIFY ABUSIVE BEHAVIOR
column4: A method of controlling online gaming behavior. The method including monitoring at a game server a plurality of game plays of a plurality of players playing a video game in a gaming session over a period of time. The method including extracting features from the plurality of game plays related to a plurality of activities associated with the plurality of game plays, the plurality of activities being controlled by the plurality of players. The method including running the features through an artificial intelligence (AI) learning model configured to classify the plurality of activities. The method including classifying an activity as abusive behavior.

column2: CLASSIFYING GAMING ACTIVITY TO IDENTIFY ABUSIVE BEHAVIOR
column4: A method of controlling online gaming behavior. The method including monitoring at a game server a plurality of game plays of a plurality of players playing a video game in a gaming session over a period of time. The method including extracting features from the plurality of game plays related to a plurality of activities associated with the plurality of game plays, the plurality of activities being controlled by the plurality of players. The method including running the features through an artificial intelligence (AI) learning model configured to classify the plurality of activities. The method including classifying an activity as abusive behavior.

column2: DATA SYNCHRONIZATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a data synchronization method and device, computer equipment and a medium. The method is applied to middleware and comprises the steps: receiving first data and second data from a first server, wherein the first data is received after the second data, and the first data and the second data are not sent to a second server; acquiring the data attribute of the first data, the data attribute of the second data and the running state of the second server; determining to-be-synchronized data in the first data and the second data and the synchronization time of the to-be-synchronized data based on the data attribute of the first data, the data attribute of the second data and the running state of the second server; determining that the to-be-synchronized data meets a transmission rule; and when the synchronization time arrives, sending the to-be-synchronized data to the second server. By adopting the method and the device, the validity and the flexibility of data synchronization are improved under the condition of ensuring the data security.

column2: SUPERCONDUCTING MAGNET QUENCHING DETECTION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a superconducting magnet quenching detection method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: collecting coil data when each coil performs quench exercise; calculating the similarity relationship between each coil and other coils by using the coil data; further obtaining the physique coefficient; selecting samples from the coil data, calculating the similarity between every two samples, and then obtaining the welding quality between the two samples; matching all the samples by utilizing the welding quality, selecting optimal matching through iteration to generate a plurality of amplified samples, and taking the welding quality between two samples corresponding to each amplified sample as the sample quality of the amplified sample; training a time sequence convolutional network by using all the amplified samples; and obtaining a prediction result of each coil in a preset time through the time sequence convolutional network, obtaining a risk coefficient of the coil, and carrying out quench detection by using the risk coefficient. According to the embodiment of the invention, the accuracy of quench detection can be improved, and privacy information is protected.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AUTONOMOUS PRINTING TEACHING ARCHIVE PRINTER
column4: The utility model belongs to the technical field of file printing machines, particularly relates to an artificial intelligence automatic printing teaching file printing machine, and provides the following scheme aiming at the problems that a keyboard and a pick-up part of an existing automatic printing teaching file printing machine are mostly directly exposed outside, and when an object falls, the automatic printing teaching file printing machine is easy to damage, the automatic printing teaching file printing machine comprises a printing machine main body, a box body is fixedly arranged on the shooting machine main body, a base is fixedly arranged and mounted at the bottom of the box body, a prompt screen is fixedly arranged on the shooting machine main body, a display screen is fixedly arranged on the shooting machine main body, two contraction grooves are formed in the box body, and a first protection plate and a second protection plate are slidably mounted in the two contraction grooves respectively; a gear is rotationally installed in the box body, two conveying wheels are rotationally installed in the box body, a keyboard and a part taking position can be protected, and damage to the shooting machine is reduced when the collision situation occurs or objects fall down.

column2: BIOLOGICAL CHARACTERISTIC ACQUISITION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a biological feature acquisition method, which comprises the following steps: when a biological feature acquisition area of a terminal detects a biological feature, acquiring an image of the biological feature through a shooting device of the terminal, identifying a rotation speed of the biological feature according to the image, and adjusting the acquisition frequency of the shooting device according to the rotation speed, acquiring a biological feature image of the biological feature according to the acquisition frequency, and ending acquisition of the image of the biological feature when the biological feature cannot be detected in a biological feature acquisition area. The invention further provides a feature acquisition device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. The problem that the efficiency of biological feature collection is low can be solved.

column2: RISK MANAGEMENT AND CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a risk management and control method and device based on artificial intelligence, a computer device and a storage medium, and is applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence and financial science and technology. The method comprises the steps of obtaining the first transaction data and the second transaction data of a target virtual account of a target platform; using a risk monitoring strategy set based on a decision tree to identify the target virtual account according to the first transaction data to perform risk identification, and obtaining a first risk identification result; performing risk identification on the target virtual account according to the second transaction data by using a risk monitoring strategy set based on an integrated learning method to obtain a second risk identification result; and performing risk management and control according to the first risk identification result and the second risk identification result. According to the invention, the risk management and control effect can be improved. The invention relates to a block chain technology. The method can be realized by running a target smart contract in a block chain.

column2: ANIMAL BODY LENGTH MEASURING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an animal body length measurement method and device based on artificial intelligence, equipment and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the corner position detection of a checkerboard image according to a target image, and obtaining a target corner position set; carrying out checkerboard pixel side length calculation according to the target angular point position set; respectively determining a body length starting point part detection frame and a body length terminal point part detection frame according to the animal image in the target image; carrying out animal pixel body length calculation according to the body length starting point part detection frame and the body length terminal point part detection frame; and according to the animal pixel body length, the checkerboard pixel side length and the preset checkerboard side length, calculating the animal body length, and obtaining the target animal body length. The animal body length is determined based on the checkerboard image in the image, the checkerboard image is easy to keep horizontal, and only one person is required to take charge of the whole shooting process, so that the accuracy of determining the animal body length is improved, and the measurement speed is improved.

column2: HUMAN BODY POSTURE RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a human body posture recognition method and device, equipment, a storage medium and a computer program product, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of computer vision and deep learning. The specific implementation scheme comprises: extracting skeleton key point information of a target person in a to-be-recognized image; according to the skeleton key point information, determining a position relationship among the plurality of skeleton key points; and determining the body posture of the target person based on the position relationship. The human body posture is recognized through the position relation between the key points of the skeleton, so that the recognition efficiency is improved while the recognition cost is reduced.

column2: FLYWHEEL ENERGY STORAGE GENERATOR CAR HEALTH CONDITION EARLY WARNING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a flywheel energy storage generator car health condition early warning system and method based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a deep learning model module, an image acquisition module, a data processing module, a data fitting module and a data reporting module. The running state of the flywheel energy storage generator car is comprehensively and automatically judged in an unattended mode through the artificial intelligence technology; a health state report is automatically generated, and comprehensive evaluation on the health state of the flywheel energy storage power generation vehicle is formed in combination with artificial active judgment factors; management personnel can make judgments in the shortest time, and problems can be found early and solved accurately; and the efficiency is improved, so that the condition of reverse power transmission is better ensured not to occur.

column2: INTELLIGENT ELECTRONIC SCALE SYSTEM BASED ON VISUAL ANALYSIS
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of electronic weighing, and particularly discloses an intelligent electronic scale system based on visual analysis. The system comprises an electronic scale body, wherein a visual acquisition and processing mechanism matched with the electronic scale body is arranged on the electronic scale body, and comprises a visual acquisition structure, the visual acquisition structure is provided with a visual processing structure connected with the electronic scale body, and the electronic scale body is internally provided with an electronic express sheet execution module connected with the visual processing structure. According to the invention, the visual acquisition and processing mechanism is used for shooting and scanning fruits, vegetables and the like on the weighing tray of the electronic scale, intelligent identification of the fruits, vegetables and the like is carried out, and intelligent weighing is carried out through the weighing tray of the electronic scale, so that intelligent express sheet attaching action of the fruits, vegetables and the like on the electronic scale body is realized, the process is simple and rapid, the fruit and vegetable weighing efficiency can be greatly improved, and the probability of misjudgment and misjudgment is effectively reduced.

column2: METHODS AND SYSTEMS FOR AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FITNESS PROFESSIONAL SUPPORT NETWORK FOR VIBRANT CONSTITIONAL GUIDANCE
column4: A system for an artificial intelligence fitness professional support network for vibrant constitutional guidance includes a computing device configured to obtain at least a biological extraction from a user, receive a user request, determine a fitness regimen, wherein determining the fitness regimen further comprises generating a diagnostic output as a function of the at least a biological extraction, and determining the fitness regimen as a function of the user request and the diagnostic output, and output the fitness regimen.

column2: METHODS AND SYSTEMS FOR MULTIPLAYER TAGGING USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: Methods and systems for image clustering are described, and include first receiving a plurality of images from a video of a game. Next, determining a first feature vector of a first player from the plurality of images by inputting the plurality of images to an artificial intelligence (AI)-based process. Next, dividing the plurality of images into a first subset of images and a second subset of images based on the first feature vector. Next, receiving a first identifier tagging the first player in a first image of the first subset. Finally, identifying a second player in a second image in the second subset by propagating the first identifier of the first subset, based on a distance measure associated with the first feature vector from the artificial intelligence (AI)-based process. Running on a mobile computing device, the method allows multiplayer tagging to be easily performed in almost any environment.

column2: THIRD PARTY VALIDATION SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR REMOTELY DETERMINING COMPLIANCE WITH PROTOCOLS
column4: A system may include a server, which may present on a user device operated by a user via a software application running on the user device, one or more tasks to be executed in a designated physical location. The server may receive from the user device via the software application, a set of images of the designated physical location upon execution of the one or more tasks. The server may execute an artificial intelligence model to process the set of images to determine whether the one or more tasks are successfully completed. In response to determining that the one or more tasks are successfully completed, the server may transmit a notification to a smart display device within the designated physical location. The smart display device is configured to present the notification.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR CONTROLLING SWITCHING OF VEHICLE DRIVING MODE
column4: A method and device for controlling switching of a vehicle driving mode, relating to the field of artificial intelligence, automatic driving, or intelligent driving, and capable of being applied to intelligent automobiles, networked automobiles, and automatic driving automobiles. The method comprises: obtaining environment information detected by a second vehicle, the second vehicle being a vehicle running on a target road section, and the target road section being a road section located in front of the running direction of a first vehicle; predicting, according to the environment information detected by the second vehicle, whether the target road section is suitable for automatic driving; and if the target road section is not suitable for automatic driving and the first vehicle is currently in an automatic driving mode, reminding a driver of the first vehicle to take over the driving control right of the first vehicle, such that the first vehicle is switched from the automatic driving mode to a manual driving mode. The real-time requirement for manual takeover in an automatic driving process can be effectively lowered, and the safety of automatic driving is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CAMERA DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence camera device, which comprises a base, a screw rod and a sliding seat, one side wall of the base is connected with a stepping motor I through a bolt, the transmission output end of the stepping motor I is connected with the screw rod through a key, and the screw rod is connected with the sliding seat through threads. The beneficial effects of the utility model are that through the arrangement of the pedestal, the stepping motor I, the screw rod and the sliding seat, the stepping motor I can drive the screw rod to rotate under the assistance of the bearing when working, so that the sliding seat can move transversely in the pedestal, and thus the face recognition camera can also move transversely; and the shooting range of the face recognition camera can be wider, so that the device can obtain more information and is very practical.

column2: AI CAMERA FOR YOGA TEACHING
column4: The utility model discloses an AI (artificial intelligence) camera for yoga teaching, relates to the field of AI cameras, and aims to solve the problems that learning cannot be effectively and accurately adjusted conveniently, the learning range is greatly limited and the teaching efficiency is high due to remote video teaching in the conventional yoga teaching. In order to solve the problems that some existing AI cameras capable of shooting in real time cannot conveniently and effectively adjust the position and the gravity center is easy to be unstable after adjustment, the utility model utility provides the following scheme that the AI camera comprises a sleeve, and the upper end and the lower end of the sleeve are rotationally sleeved with an upper cylinder and a lower cylinder respectively; the upper side and the lower side in the sleeve are fixedly connected with a first limiting screw and a second limiting screw respectively, the outer side of the first limiting screw is sleeved with a threaded cylinder in a threaded mode, and an AI camera is fixedly installed at the upper end of the threaded cylinder. According to the device, the body posture of a learner can be effectively judged through the AI camera when the learner learns, and meanwhile, the AI camera can be conveniently adjusted and is stable to use.

column2: SUBWAY OPERATION STATE PREDICTION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a subway operation state prediction method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of intelligent traffic, artificial intelligence and the like. According to the specific implementation scheme, air pressure information of a mobile terminal used by a user on a subway at all moments in a time window is obtained; and the running state of the subway in the time window is predicted based on the air pressure information at each moment in the time window. According to the technology disclosed by the invention, the identification efficiency of the subway operation state can be effectively improved.

column2: MACHINE VISION DETECTION TEACHING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a machine vision detection teaching device based on artificial intelligence. The machine vision detection teaching device comprises a material platform; the camera shooting telescopic rod structure is fixed at one end of the material platform and is perpendicular to the material platform; the depth vision camera is connected to the tail end of the camera shooting telescopic rod structure, and the position of the light supplementing source is matched with that of the depth vision camera. And the image processor is connected with the depth vision camera and is designed based on deep learning. According to the technical scheme of the utility model, the problem of large detection error of material images in the prior art can be solved.

column2: TRAIN COUPLING STATE DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a train coupling state detection method and device, and relates to the field of railway transportation. The train coupling state detection method comprises the steps that when a target tank car exists behind a target train, whether the target train and the target tank car are both in a running state or not is judged; if so, whether the distance between the target tank car and the target train is within a preset distance range or not is judged; if the distance is within the preset distance range, whether the unhooking and hooking state between the target tank car and the target train is a closed state or not is judged; if the target train is in the closed state, the coupling state between the target train and the target tank car is determined to be successful coupling; and finally, coupling normal prompt information including the coupling state is outputted, so that the coupling state of the train and the tank car can be completely and truly detected, manpower and material resources are saved, and the safe operation of the unmanned train is ensured.

column2: SWIM TRAINING DEVICE
column4: A swim training device, comprising a pair of wearable body 1 having a first and second portion adapted to be configured on hands of a user practicing swimming, a pair of telescopic rods 2 to accommodate the palm for providing grip while practicing the swimming, an artificial intelligence image capturing module 3 for detecting palm size and age of the user for determining level of training of the user, a touch interactive display panel 4 for displaying instruction regarding arc length to be maintained and strokes to be adopted in accordance to the determined level while practicing the swimming, an inclinometer 5 connected to the body 1 for measuring the arch maintained through the body 1, an ultrasonic sensor 7 for measuring water level of a pool, a vital sensor 9 for measuring vital parameters of the user while the swimming.

column2: SPRINT TRAINING AND MONITORING SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to a sprint training and monitoring system including eye glasses 1, bridge 3, temples 4, nose pad 5, and rim 2, a holographic image projector 6 installed on the rim 2 for projecting a holographic image of a virtual opponent, a Fiber Bragg Grating sensor 7 installed on the temples 4 for monitoring vital parameters of the user, wherein the microcontroller on basis of the monitored parameters generates a command to the image projector 6 for altering speed of the virtual opponent, a wearable band 8 configured with an accelerometer module for continuously monitoring running speed of the user, an artificial intelligence image capturing module 10 installed on bridge 3 for detecting cracks, dust on the glasses 1 and rim 2, and a pair of telescopic wiping units 12 connected to each glasses 1 to move in back and forth directions for removing the dust.

column2: FULL-FUNCTION AIR-SAVING TYPE AIR JET LOOM CONTROL SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses a full-function air-saving type air jet loom control system which comprises a main control unit and a brake unit, and a tension sensor, a displayer, a weft accumulator, a frequency converter, a let-off curling device, a jacquard machine and an electronic dobby device are arranged outside the main control unit. An analog quantity input module, a switching value input module, an electromagnetic valve control module, an RS232 communication module, an RS485 communication module, a CAN communication module, a pulse output module and a switching value output module are arranged in the main control unit, and the signal output end of the jacquard machine is connected with the switching value input module. The electronic dobby brake control system has the advantages that the latest STM32F207 of an ST semiconductor is adopted as a core, a large-capacity storage chip FM22L16 is adopted, internal resources of a CPU are fully utilized, and the electronic dobby brake control system is simple in structure, capable of achieving artificial intelligence display and automatic control, stable, capable of saving gas and efficient.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TEACHING DEVICE AND METHOD F
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence teaching device and method. The device comprises a teacher end, a communication module, and a student learning end. The teacher end comprises an image acquisition module, a sound acquisition module, a teaching video generation module, a data compression module, an after-class exercise packaging module, a data sending module I, a controller I, a data receiving module I and a data storage module I; and the student learning end comprises an identity information acquisition module, a controller II, a decompression module, a display module, a data receiving module II, a data sending module II, a data storage module II, an after-class exercise detection module and a learning question uploading module. According to the invention, the teacher end, the communication module and the student learning end are arranged, and the information of the teacher end and the student learning end is transmitted in real time through the communication module, so that the teacher can timely know the learning condition of the student, the student can timely upload the learning problem for inquiry, and the learning quality of the student is improved.

column2: SECURED TREE CLIMBING DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to a secured tree climbing device 1, comprising a portable body 1 mounted on a tree trunk and configured into a first 9 and second section 10, wherein the first section 9 includes an AI (Artificial Intelligence) based imaging unit 2 for visualizing dimensions of the, an adjustable seat 3 creating space to be occupied by the user according to physique output provided by the imaging unit 2, an telescopic footrest 4 for allowing the user to climb the trunk, plurality of for detecting axial orientation of the seat 3 along with vital parameters and bodyweight distribution associated with the user while climbing, wherein the supporters 4, 11 stop moving along the trunk when detected vital parameters are varying from normal value pre-fed in the microcontroller, and plurality of inflatable cushions 6 arranged around the seat preventing risk of injury for the user.

column2: ADVERTISEMENT PUTTING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an advertisement putting system and method based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises a putting device and a cloud server, the putting device comprises an identification module, a putting module and a feedback module, and the cloud server comprises an information comparison module, an advertisement selection module and an updating module. The delivery device is connected with the cloud server through the wireless transmission device, the identification module comprises an identification unit and a filtering unit, the identification unit is a camera and is used for shooting and recording passing information, and the filtering unit is used for filtering the content shot and recorded by the identification unit, thus to generate combined information element. The information comparison module comprises an information database and an information confirmation unit. According to the advertisement putting system and method based on artificial intelligence, the advertisement propaganda effect is improved, and operation is carried out in the direction of achieving the optimal effect after feedback.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TO INTERACT WITH A USER OF AN EXERCISE DEVICE DURING AN EXERCISE SESSION
column4: A method is disclosed for using an artificial intelligence engine to interact with a user of an exercise device during an exercise session. The method includes generating, by the artificial intelligence engine, a machine learning model trained to receive data as input, and based on the data, providing an output. While a user performs an exercise using the exercise device, the method includes receiving the data from an input peripheral of a computing device associated with the user. Based on the data being received from the input peripheral, the method includes determining, via the machine learning model, the output to control an aspect of the exercise device.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TO PRESENT A USER INTERFACE REPRESENTING A USER'S PROGRESS IN VARIOUS DOMAINS
column4: A method is disclosed for using an artificial intelligence engine to present a user interface capable of presenting the progress of a user in domains. The method includes generating, by the artificial intelligence engine, a machine learning model trained to receive measurements as input, and outputting, based on the measurements, a user interface that causes icons to dynamically change position on the user interface. While a user performs an exercise using the exercise device, the method includes receiving the measurements from sensors associated with the exercise device. The method includes presenting, on a computing device associated with the exercise device, sections of the user interface, wherein the sections are each related to a separate domain comprising the domains and wherein, based on the measurements, each section includes the icons placed.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TO ONBOARD A USER FOR AN EXERCISE PLAN
column4: A method is disclosed for using an artificial intelligence engine to onboard a user for an exercise plan. The method includes generating a machine learning model trained to receive as input onboarding data associated with a user and an onboarding protocol and, based on the onboarding data and the onboarding protocol, output an exercise plan. While a user performs an exercise using the exercise device, the method includes receiving the onboarding data associated with the user. The method includes determining, by the machine learning model using the onboarding data and the onboarding protocol, a fitness level of the user. The onboarding protocol includes exercises with tiered difficulty levels, the onboarding protocol increases a difficulty level for a subsequent exercise when an exercise is completed, and based on a completion state of a last exercise performed, the fitness level is determined. The method includes selecting a difficulty level for each exercise.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TO ADJUST PEDAL RESISTANCE
column4: A method is disclosed for using an artificial intelligence engine to modify resistance of one or more pedals of an exercise device. The method includes generating, by the artificial intelligence engine, a machine learning model trained to receive one or more measurements as input, and outputting, based on the one or more measurements, a control instruction that causes the exercise device to modify the resistance of the one or more pedals. The method includes receiving the one or more measurements from a sensor associated with the one or more pedals of the exercise device, determining whether the one or more measurements satisfy a trigger condition, and responsive to determining that the one or more measurements satisfy the trigger condition, transmitting the control instruction to the exercise device.

column2: AI SYSTEM FOR PROCESSING HISTORICAL DATA TO IDENTIFY AND RECONFIGURE PRESCHEDULED, SUBOPTIMAL EVENTS
column4: An entity may generate generic notifications for transmittal to a plurality of customers. One of the notifications may not be properly customized for a customer to whom the notification is scheduled for deployment. A system is provided that generates and refines generic notifications using artificial intelligence (?œAI??. The system may include an application server running an AI engine for periodically monitoring, at a given point in time, historical customer data relating to less than a predetermined number of customers to ensure reduced, relative to a predetermined baseline, processing usage. The AI engine may determine, during the monitoring, that notifications transmitted by the platform to one of the customers have failed to elicit a positive response from the customer. The determination may prompt the AI engine to put the generic notification on hold for the customer and to perform additional steps to alter the generic notification to a targeted notification.

column2: TAIJIQUAN ACTION CORRECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON GENERATIVE ADVERSARIAL NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses a Taijiquan action correction method and system based on a generative adversarial network, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and image recognition, and the method comprises the steps: determining a standard action sequence of a next-stage user based on an obtained human body action image of a current-stage user and a trained generative adversarial network model; calculating the similarity between the standard action sequence of the user in the next stage and the obtained human body action image of the user in the next stage; and according to the similarity, correcting the motion of the user for practicing the Taijiquan. According to the method, computer vision and deep learning technologies are used for detecting human body joint points and identifying and evaluating actions, and compared with a traditional method using a sensor and wearable equipment, the cost is reduced, the convenience of Taijiquan exercise is improved, and the accuracy of action evaluation is improved.

column2: HOUSEHOLD INTELLIGENT SAFETY PROMPTING SYSTEM
column4: The utility model provides a household intelligent safety prompt system, which belongs to the field of artificial intelligence control and comprises a fixed box, a sensor module fixedly mounted at the left upper corner of the inner bottom wall of the fixed box, and a voice broadcast module fixedly mounted at the right upper corner of the inner bottom wall of the fixed box. An acousto-optic display module is fixedly mounted on the upper surface of the voice broadcast module, a thermal imaging module is fixedly mounted at the lower left corner of the inner bottom wall of the fixed box, a camera module is fixedly mounted on the upper surface of the thermal imaging module, a CPU module is fixedly mounted at the lower right corner of the inner bottom wall of the fixed box, and a control module is fixedly mounted on the upper surface of the CPU module; the detection method adopted by the device comprises the steps of face shooting, thermal imaging detection and gas concentration detection. The multiple detection can quickly confirm whether a person is in a room, whether the person can move or not and whether a danger value tends to decrease or not, and the alarm device can be started immediately after the danger condition is confirmed.

column2: MOTION POSTURE MONITORING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGE RECOGNITION
column4: The utility model discloses a motion posture monitoring device based on artificial intelligence image recognition, and particularly relates to the field of fitness equipment, the motion posture monitoring device comprises a device body, the lower surface of the device body is fixedly connected with a supporting frame, the device further comprises a supporting assembly and a cleaning assembly, the supporting assembly is located in the supporting frame, and the cleaning assembly is located in the supporting frame. Comprising a first supporting plate located in the supporting frame and a second supporting plate partially located above the first supporting plate, and the cleaning assembly is located on the outer side of the device body and comprises a containing frame fixedly connected to the outer surface of the device body and a movable frame located above the containing frame; the front end of the inner surface of the movable frame is fixedly connected with a cleaning block. After the device is placed, the first supporting plate and the second supporting plate are pulled out from the interior of the supporting frame through the first finger groove and the second finger groove correspondingly, additional supporting is provided for the supporting frame through the first supporting plate making contact with the ground and the second supporting plate with one end making contact with the ground, and the device is placed stably.

column2: BADMINTON TRAINING SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to a badminton training system, comprising a body 1 configured with plurality of wheels 2 allowing the body 1 to move in all direction, an artificial intelligence image capturing module 3 installed on the body 1 for capturing images of the user, an audio unit 4 in synch with the module 3 and installed on the body 1 to train the user by generating voice commands, a throwing unit 5 installed on the body 1 for throwing the shuttle cock towards the user, a robotic racket 6 connected to the body 1 via a telescopic rod for responding the shuttle cock smashed by the user and a wearable unit 12 mapped with wrist sensor 11 to be worn by user for measuring the hand tilt of the user while smashing the shuttle cock.

column2: DIGITAL MICROSCOPE WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED IMAGING
column4: The invention relates to the domain of microscope based imaging. The invention provides methods and apparatuses for providing improved microscope based digital imaging solutions that are capable of providing high quality images with a high level of image detail. The invention additionally provides solutions for artificial intelligence based controlling of a digital microscope's imaging functions to enable bright field / dark field imaging functionality to be combined with spectroscopic functions to obtain higher detail and more meaningful information about a specimen sample.

column2: OPERATION MAPPING PROPORTION ADJUSTMENT METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides an operation mapping proportion adjustment method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a motor operation current corresponding to a target instrument in a preset time period; under the condition that the motor running current is larger than a preset current threshold value and the duration reaches a preset duration threshold value, adjusting the operation mapping proportion of the target instrument to be a first operation mapping proportion; and determining the preset current threshold according to the no-load running current of the motor. Thus, whether the instrument collides with the biological tissue or not can be judged through the running current of the motor, the mapping proportion can be adjusted in time, the operation mapping proportion of the operation handle and the tip end of the instrument is flexibly adjusted, instrument operation is more refined, tissue damage caused by too large operation amplitude can be prevented, the use safety of the endoscopic instrument is improved, and the requirements of various scenes can be met.

column2: RECTUS ABDOMINIS INTERNAL STIMULATION DEVICE
column4: According to the rectus abdominis internal stimulation device provided by the utility model, the electro-acupuncture part, the indication assembly and various sensors are arranged, firstly, acupuncture treatment is performed on the abdomen of a patient through the electro-acupuncture part, and then each movement posture of movement training of the patient is ensured to reach a standard posture through the indication assembly; meanwhile, a sensor is arranged to assist in monitoring whether the posture of the patient in exercise training is standard or not and further judging whether exercise training actions are standard or not according to the contraction degree of abdominal muscles and pelvic floor muscles, the patient can be guided to independently carry out various postpartum DRA rehabilitation training actions in an artificial intelligence mode, assistance of special guiding personnel is not needed, and the training efficiency is improved. Therefore, the problem of shortage of hospital personnel is relieved, and meanwhile, training actions specially aiming at the postpartum DRA are specifically designed to treat the postpartum DRA of the patient.

column2: CALCULATING TASK VISUAL SCHEDULING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a computing task visual scheduling method based on artificial intelligence. The computing task visual scheduling method comprises the steps that when a computing task is created, a system will automatically recommend an upstream task and executable time on which the task depends; the scheduling priority is determined according to the in-degree and out-degree of the tasks when the calculation tasks are scheduled, and the calculation tasks to be scheduled are sequenced and scheduled in parallel by using a breadth parallel priority scheduling algorithm; in the calculation task visualization, a critical path algorithm is used for displaying a critical path of a current calculation task node, so that visual interference of calculation task nodes on other paths is avoided; corpus word segmentation is carried out on error logs through calculation task running log analysis, word frequency analysis is carried out through a TF-IDF algorithm, and error types are filed, classified and processed in a unified mode. According to the method, the artificial intelligence algorithm is introduced, reasonable prompts are provided for arrangement of the calculation tasks according to the correlation analysis algorithm, the running logs of the calculation tasks are analyzed by using the TF-IDF algorithm, and the calculation task scheduling efficiency is improved.

column2: CARD FILLING QUESTION CLOUD REVIEWING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON NEURAL NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses a card filling question cloud reviewing system and method based on a neural network. The system comprises an intelligent client capable of configuring related parameters, a local intelligent camera used for shooting and storing answer sheet information, and a cloud platform used for transmitting, processing and analyzing the answer sheet information. The method comprises the following steps: configuring and setting related parameters at an intelligent client; calling a local intelligent camera to continuously shoot the answer sheet and storing the answer sheet; remotely connecting the cloud platform and uploading the answer sheet image; processing and analyzing the answer sheet image at the cloud server to obtain a result and generate a report; and returning the scoring report to the local client through the cloud platform. According to the method, a special card reader is not needed, a mobile phone or a computer intelligent camera is used, a user does not need to have related knowledge in the fields of artificial intelligence and target detection and recognition, operation is easy, and convenience and practicability are achieved; and a neural network technology and an artificial intelligence algorithm are used, so that the recognition speed and accuracy are improved, the workload is reduced, and the paper marking pressure of a paper marking person is effectively relieved.

column2: CROWN BLOCK ONLINE DETECTION AND DIAGNOSIS SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention provides a crown block online detection and diagnosis system and method based on an artificial intelligence technology. The system comprises a crown block operation state monitoring system, a crown block state data analysis module and a man-machine interaction module, wherein the crown block operation state monitoring system and the man-machine interaction module are both electrically connected with the crown block state data analysis module, the crown block operation state monitoring system is used for collecting operation state data of all parts of a crown block, the crown block state data analysis module is used for analyzing the operation state data collected by the crown block operation state monitoring system, and the man-machine interaction module is used for displaying operation state data acquired by the crown block operation state monitoring system and an analysis result of the crown block state data analysis module. According to the crown block online detection and diagnosis system and method based on the artificial intelligence technology, acquisition and processing of crown block operation data can be achieved, and then automatic fault detection and analysis of the crown block are achieved.

column2: INTELLIGENT MARKING AND WARNING METHOD FOR CABLE PIPELINE PATH
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent marking and warning method for a cable pipeline path. The intelligent marking and warning method comprises the following steps that an intelligent marking warning device is arranged at a position to be marked; the position of the cable at the position to be marked is judged according to an indicating arrow of the intelligent marking warning device; a vibration signal of the intelligent marking warning device is detected, and the detected vibration signal is sent to the camera module; a camera shooting signal of the camera shooting module is sent to a management background, and an artificial intelligence recognition module is started to judge the abnormal condition of the intelligent marking warning device. The intelligent marking warning device is arranged at the position to be marked, so that the position of the cable can be judged according to the indicating arrow. Meanwhile, constructors can remotely judge whether the intelligent marking warning device is abnormal or not through detected vibration signals, and external force damage is effectively prevented.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INTERACTIVE WATER DISPENSER
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence interactive water dispenser which comprises a water dispenser body, a camera is additionally arranged below a water outlet of the water dispenser body, and a mode selection switch, a manual water outlet switch, a display screen and an offline visual identification module are additionally arranged on a front panel of the water dispenser body. An Arduino Nano control panel, an off-line voice recognition module, a water temperature detector, a water level detector, a water drainage control motor, a relay module and a power module are additionally arranged in the water dispenser body, and the water pumping end of the water drainage control motor is connected with a water storage unit in the water dispenser body. The water discharging end of the water discharging control motor is connected with a water outlet of the water dispenser body, the water temperature detector and the water level detector are both installed on a water storage unit in the water dispenser body, the Arduino Nano control panel is used for coordinating and controlling operation of the whole water dispenser, and the power module is used for supplying power to the whole water dispenser. The intelligent brewing device is convenient and safe to operate and can intelligently brew drinks in daily life.

column2: LANGUAGE TEXT MANAGEMENT METHOD AND DEVICE, STORAGE MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a language text management method and device, a storage medium and electronic device. The method is applied to cross-platform mobile development framework and comprises the steps: acquiring a target project in the cross-platform mobile development framework, the target project being used for generating an application program running on a terminal; extracting first text information in the target item, and generating a first text mapping file and a text reference file; generating at least one second text mapping file based on the first text mapping file, second text information in each second text mapping file not belonging to the first language; and storing the first text mapping file, the at least one second text mapping file, and the text reference file in a first location. According to the invention, the management of the multi-language text information is realized in a cross-platform mobile development framework, so that the generated application program has a multi-language adaptive switching function. The language text management method and device can be applied to various scenes such as cloud technology, artificial intelligence, intelligent traffic, auxiliary driving and the like.

column2: SERVER HARDWARE RUNNING STATE DETERMINATION METHOD, RELATED DEVICE AND PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The invention provides a server hardware running state determination method and device, electronic equipment, a computer readable storage medium and a computer program product, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: reading a hardware running log of a server through a log reading interface of a baseboard management controller; using a preset hardware running state classification model to determine running state categories corresponding to all pieces of hardware running information recorded in the hardware running log, and obtaining a classification result, wherein the hardware running state classification model is used for representing the corresponding relation between different pieces of hardware running information and the running state categories; and determining the abnormally running hardware according to the classification result, and triggering a corresponding alarm prompt according to the abnormal degree of the abnormally running hardware. According to the method, the hardware running log can be obtained more conveniently by means of the substrate management controller which is an out-of-band controller, and the accuracy of the classification result is improved by means of the pre-trained hardware running state classification model.

column2: SOLAR RANGE-EXTENDING UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE
column4: The utility model provides a solar range-extending unmanned aerial vehicle, which relates to the technical field of unmanned aerial vehicles and comprises a control module, a receiving module, a wireless communication module, a driving module, a navigation module, a camera shooting module and a power supply module, and the driving module, the navigation module and the camera shooting module are connected with the control module through the wireless communication module. The navigation module, the camera module and the power supply module are connected with the receiving module through the wireless communication module; the power supply module comprises a charging module, a power storage module and a power supply module which are connected in sequence; the power supply module is connected with and supplies power to the wireless communication module, the driving module, the navigation module and the camera module; the charging module comprises a photovoltaic power generation module and a wind power generation module, the photovoltaic power generation module and the wind power generation module are respectively connected with the power storage module, and voltage stabilization modules are arranged between the photovoltaic power generation module and the power storage module and between the wind power generation module and the power storage module. The self-charging unmanned aerial vehicle can be self-charged in the flight process, the flight range is increased, return electric quantity is provided when the unmanned aerial vehicle is insufficient, and smooth return flight of the unmanned aerial vehicle is guaranteed.

column2: STEERING OAR STATE MONITORING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a steering oar state monitoring method and system based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a sample data set of each sub-working condition, and enabling the sample data set to comprise a vibration data sequence and sound data of a steering oar which belong to the same sampling time; processing a vibration data sequence to obtain the working condition similarity of each sub-working condition, screening, calculating the sound similarity of each sub-working condition according to a screening result, screening to obtain the target sound similarity, and combining the actual sound data and standard sound data of the steering oar at the current driving speed under the current working condition, calcualting the sound frequency domain characteristic indexes, then calculating the confidence coefficient in combination with the actual vibration data sequence and the standard vibration data sequence, and finally judging the running state of the steering oar according to the confidence coefficient so that a relatively accurate monitoring result of the running state of the steering oar is obtained, and the monitoring accuracy is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IDENTIFICATION SCALE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM WITH MULTIPLE WEIGHING PLATFORMS
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence identification scale management system with multiple weighing platforms. The system comprises an artificial intelligence identification label printing host, and the weighing platforms and a man-machine interaction system which are respectively in communication connection with the artificial intelligence identification label printing host. The multiple weighing platforms are used for measuring the weight of an object and outputting a weight measurement value to the artificial intelligence identification label printing host, and also shooting pictures of commodities to be weighed and measured and outputting the pictures of the commodities to the host; the artificial intelligence identification label printing host carries out coordinated management on data of a plurality of weighing platforms, the coordinated management process is visually displayed through the man-machine interaction system, and a portal for interactive operation is provided for a user. The AI label scale with one person, one machine and multiple weighing platforms can complete commodity metering and label printing in a multi-process parallel mode, the commodity metering and label printing efficiency can be obviously improved, nearly half of the labor cost and nearly half of the equipment cost of a supermarket are reduced, the queuing waiting time of customers is shortened by half, and the metering and weighing efficiency is doubled.

column2: INTERNET OF THINGS (IOT) ENABLED HEALTH CARE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column4: In medical diagnosis and therapy, the Internet of Things (IoT) and Machine Learning (ML) concepts are widely used to monitor a patient's condition. The IoT has been utilised to construct systems that tell the patient's peers in the event of an irregularity by exploiting the capabilities of a wearable sensor system with sensors attached to it. Models that have been taught to spot any anomalies in the patient's condition have been utilised to help in medical diagnosis. The framework is designed to maintain track of the patients' health using a pulse oximeter, temperature sensor, and other sensors. IoT devices acquire the required data, which is then saved on the cloud. Medical data is analysed, categorised, and communicated between consumers and healthcare experts via the Internet of Things. The data will be stored in the cloud IoT with a device collecting data from various sensors used in patient monitoring, then transferred to the hospital and stored in the hospital database using Artificial Intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) based algorithms to continuously evaluate the data, such as: A technique based on a classification approach is used to categorise people as infected or uninfected. To categorise the user into infected or uninfected groups, we utilise the fuzzy k-nearest neighbour approach, and the similarity coefficient to discriminate based on the patient's symptoms. Patients can get individualised care through wearable gadgets like fitness bands and other wirelessly connected equipment like blood pressure and heart rate monitoring cuffs, glucometers, and so on if something goes wrong straight immediately. Calorie counts, exercise, appointments, blood pressure variations, and a number of other things may all be programmed on these gadgets. People's lives have been revolutionised by the Internet of Things, notably the lives of elderly patients, who can now follow their health in real time. The impact on single parents and their families is significant. An alarm system delivers information to family members, physicians, paramedics, and other worried health providers if a person's typical behaviour is disturbed or altered.

column2: IMAGE STABLE SAMPLING METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT IN FACE RECOGNITION SCENE AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a stable image sampling method in a face recognition scene, which comprises the following steps: acquiring initial stability parameters of a camera in different shooting environments and color stability parameters of the camera under preset light; adjusting view finding parameters of the camera according to the initial stable parameters to obtain camera standard parameters; adjusting a camera standard parameter according to a target color stability parameter corresponding to the target change color and a preset adjustment rule; performing cross sampling on the camera standard parameters in the step-by-step adjustment, and calculating a parameter variance between adjacent parameters obtained by parameter cross sampling; and selecting the parameter variance smaller than a preset threshold value, and shooting an image by using the current camera standard parameter. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, for example, initial stability parameters can be stored in nodes of a block chain. The invention further provides a stable image sampling device and equipment in the face recognition scene and a medium and can improve the image acquisition stability.

column2: INTERNET OF THINGS APPLICATION PROCESSING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND VIRTUAL CHIP
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides an Internet of Things application processing method and system based on artificial intelligence and a virtual chip. The Internet of Things application processing method comprises the following steps: acquiring first input data of a user in an Internet of Things platform, the first input data comprising data of an Internet of Things application task proposed by the user; acquiring a virtual chip corresponding to the first input data according to the first input data, wherein the virtual chip is an abstract description of an Internet of Things device, the Internet of Things device is a device entity executing an Internet of Things application task, and the abstract description at least comprises a physical pin and a workflow; obtaining a mapping relationship between the virtual pin and a physical pin by a user, wherein the physical pin is a pin of an entity chip in the Internet of Things device; according to the mapping relation and the workflow, generating an operation code corresponding to the entity chip; and loading the running code into the entity chip to enable the entity chip to execute the Internet of Things application task. According to the method, the development and design difficulty of the Internet of Things device can be reduced, and the universality and applicability are improved.

column2: COACHING, ASSESSING OR ANALYSING UNSEEN PROCESSES IN INTERMITTENT HIGH-SPEED HUMAN MOTIONS, INCLUDING GOLF SWINGS
column4: The system automatically or partly automatically coaches and assesses a non-putting golf swing to increase the strength or distance of the swing. Increases are coached in the components of energy generated across specific individual joints of the player's body during the downswing. Increases are also coached in the efficiency at which the generated energy is transmitted to the clubhead. Fast or near-instantaneous feedback is provided to the player, based on measured changes in the components of energy generated in the specific individual joints and on the efficiency at which the generated energy is transmitted to the clubhead. Changes in 3D positions of the player's body segments or joints are tracked by inertial sensors or optical sensors and used in the calculation of the components of energy generated across the specific individual joints utilising an artificial intelligence system.

column2: CABLE-CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: A cable climbing robot, comprising a climbing front body (100) and a detection body (200). The climbing front body (100) comprises a front body rack (110), duct propellers (120), front body clasping units (130) and front body control modules (140), wherein the duct propellers (120) are mounted on the outer side of the front body rack (110) by surrounding the front body rack (110); each of the front body clasping units (130) comprises a front body clasping electric motor (131), a front body clasping transmission component (132) and a front body clasping member (133); the front body clasping electric motor (131) is fixedly mounted on the front body rack (110), and the front body clasping electric motor (131) drives the front body clasping member (133) by means of the front body clasping transmission component (132), such that the front body clasping member (133) clasps a cable (900); the front body control modules (140) are mounted on the front body rack (110), and the front body control modules (140) are respectively electrically connected to the duct propellers (120) and the clasping electric motors (131), and are used for controlling the operation of the duct propellers (120) and the front body clasping electric motors (131); and the detection body (200) is used for climbing together with the climbing front body (100) and for detecting the cable (900). The cable climbing robot is used for reducing the damage caused by the cable climbing robot to a surface of the cable, improving the detection efficiency, and widening the quality range of various carried apparatuses.

column2: SHOCKPROOF PLATFORM BASED ON MICROSCOPIC AUTOMATIC SHOOTING SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses an anti-vibration platform based on a microscopic automatic shooting system, relates to the technical field of algae analyzers, and aims to solve the problems that an existing artificial intelligence algae analyzer is not provided with an anti-vibration scanning platform, the anti-vibration performance is poor, and imaging is affected by slight vibration, so that in the working process, the anti-vibration effect is poor, and the like. The problems that when a worker or other personnel touch a workbench, the workbench vibrates slightly, and the worker cannot perceive the tiny vibration, so that data errors are caused when the alga is shot and analyzed are solved. A through groove is formed in the table top of the workbench, an adjusting mechanism is arranged in the through groove, a platform mechanism is arranged above the adjusting mechanism, a mounting plate is arranged on one side of the platform mechanism, and a vibration sensor is fixedly mounted at the rear end of the upper end face of the mounting plate. An alarm is fixedly mounted at the front end of the upper end face of the mounting plate and electrically connected with the vibration sensor through a wire.

column2: SAFETY MONITORING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of video monitoring, and discloses a safety monitoring device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a shell, a camera, a telescopic cylinder, a support and a controller, the telescopic cylinder and the support are arranged at the top of the shell, the other end of the support is connected with a wall body through a bolt, the controller is arranged outside the shell, and the camera is arranged on the shell. The camera is arranged at the bottom of the shell; a cavity is formed in the bottom of the shell, the pushing end of the telescopic cylinder extends downwards into the cavity and is provided with a base block, the bottom of the base block is rotationally connected with a hanging rod, the other end of the hanging rod is fixedly connected with the top of the camera, and a cleaning block located in an opening of the cavity is inserted into the bottom of the shell. According to the utility model, the whole structure is simple, the lens of the camera can be automatically wiped and cleaned, the camera shooting definition can be improved, the safety monitoring effect can be improved, the market prospect is wide, and the popularization and the use are facilitated.

column2: INTELLIGENT ANTI-THEFT DEVICE FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention is suitable for the technical field of intelligent anti-theft, and provides an intelligent anti-theft device for artificial intelligence. The intelligent anti-theft device comprises a wall body, a storage assembly, a locking assembly, an operation assembly and a driving assembly,the wall body is provided with a mounting plate, and the mounting plate is provided with a camera shooting assembly; the storage assembly is installed on the wall body, and the storage assembly and the camera shooting assembly are matched with each other; the locking assembly is mounted on the storage assembly; the operation assembly is mounted in the wall body; and the driving assembly is mounted in the wall body. According to the device, the storage assembly and the locking assembly are additionally arranged on the wall body, so that the camera shooting assembly can be automatically locked when being disassembled, the camera shooting assembly is prevented from being stolen, the safety is improved, and the property loss of an owner is reduced; and by additionally arranging the control assembly and the driving assembly, an owner can smoothly unlock the camera shooting assembly in the process of disassembling the camera shooting assembly, and the intelligent anti-theft device is convenient to use, high in safety and simpler to operate.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CARRYING DEVICE WITH HIGH STABILITY
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence carrying device with high stability. The high-stability artificial intelligence carrying device comprises a carrying vehicle, an auxiliary brake mechanism and an anti-toppling mechanism, wherein two rolling shafts are arranged at the bottom of the carrying vehicle, rolling wheels are fixed to the two ends of the two rolling shafts, any rolling shaft is fixed to the bottom of the carrying vehicle through a connecting block, a threaded sleeve is installed on the outer side of the other rolling shaft, the auxiliary brake mechanism used for conducting auxiliary braking when a trolley encounters an obstacle in a running process is installed on the outer side of the threaded sleeve, and the anti-toppling mechanism used for preventing goods from toppling is installed on the top of the carrying vehicle. By means of the designed auxiliary brake mechanism, when the carrying vehicle accidentally touches an obstacle in a cargo carrying process, emergency braking can be conducted, and anti-toppling treatment can be conducted on cargo, so the phenomena of toppling, deviation and the like of the cargo due to inertia are avoided, and the carrying process is more stable.

column2: AUTOMATIC EARLY WARNING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON IMAGE RECOGNITION, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to artificial intelligence and digital medical technology, and discloses an automatic early warning method based on image recognition, which comprises the following steps: carrying out frequency domain conversion and filtering processing on an original monitoring image to obtain an initial monitoring image, binarizing the initial monitoring image according to a global threshold obtained by calculation to obtain a standard monitoring image, extracting a standard skeleton image from a standard monitoring image, screening a plurality of skeleton straight lines in the standard skeleton image, carrying out intersection processing on the plurality of skeleton straight lines to obtain a plurality of skeleton key points, mapping the plurality of skeleton key points to a preset coordinate system to obtain a plurality of target key areas, and performing early warning according to the number and a preset early warning rule. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the global threshold can be stored in a node of a block chain. The invention further provides an automatic early warning device based on image recognition, electronic equipment and a storage medium. According to the invention, the problem of low accuracy of automatic early warning can be solved.

column2: VEHICLE ILLEGAL DRIVING DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a method and a device for detecting illegal driving of a vehicle, electronic equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a computer vision and deep learning technology, and particularly can be used in intelligent cities and intelligent traffic scenes. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: collecting a current frame of a road video; performing vehicle detection on the current frame to obtain a surrounding frame of the vehicle; performing road detection on the current frame to obtain lane recognition information; and determining whether the vehicle runs illegally based on the bounding box and the lane recognition information. According to the embodiment of the invention, whether the vehicle runs illegally or not can be automatically determined, the labor cost is effectively saved, and the timeliness of finding the illegal running of the vehicle is improved.

column2: DISTRIBUTED PRIVACY-PRESERVING COMPUTING ON PROTECTED DATA
column4: The present disclosure relates to techniques for developing artificial intelligence algorithms by distributing analytics to multiple sources of privacy protected, harmonized data. Particularly, aspects are directed to a computer implemented method that includes receiving an algorithm and input data requirements associated with the algorithm, identifying data assets as being available from a data host based on the input data requirements, curating the data assets within a data storage structure that is within infrastructure of the data host, and integrating the algorithm into a secure capsule computing framework. The secure capsule computing framework serves the algorithm to the data assets within the data storage structure in a secure manner that preserves privacy of the data assets and the algorithm. The computer implemented method further includes running the data assets through the algorithm to obtain an inference.

column2: BEVERAGE CUP CLAMPING AND DISCHARGING MECHANISM FOR AUTOMATIC BEVERAGE DISPENSER
column4: The utility model provides a beverage cup clamping and unloading mechanism for an automatic beverage dispenser, which comprises a mechanical arm and a base, a cup storage disc is rotatably matched on the base, the cup storage disc is provided with a first cup unloading opening, the base is provided with a second cup unloading opening, and the side wall of the second cup unloading opening is sequentially provided with a clamping and limiting mechanism and a multi-layer cup opening unscrewing mechanism from bottom to top.
