The mechanical arm comprises a clamping arm, a first sensor is arranged on the clamping arm, a second sensor is arranged on the bottom side of the base, and the first sensor is matched with the second sensor. The cup storage disc is arranged to be in running fit with the base, empty beverage cups in the cup storage disc can be supplemented in sequence, and the large cup storage amount is guaranteed; a plurality of cup opening unscrewing mechanisms are arranged, so that the cup openings of the beverage cups which are in contact in pairs can be unscrewed, and the overlapped beverage cups are prevented from being attached together; and the clamping limiting mechanism is arranged, can stretch out or retract the abutting block and is used for limiting the beverage cup and discharging the cup.

column2: VEHICLE CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a vehicle control method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical fields of automatic driving, deep learning and the like. The method comprises the steps of obtaining running information of a vehicle and information of a scene where the vehicle is located, judging whether the scene is a target scene according to the running information and the information of the scene, if the scene is the target scene, obtaining target control parameters corresponding to the target scene according to the information of the scene, and automatically controlling the vehicle according to the target control parameter. Therefore, when automatic driving control is carried out on the vehicle, the judgment and recognition capability of the scene where the vehicle is located can be effectively improved, an automatic driving algorithm related to vehicle control is assisted to generate more accurate control parameters, the accuracy of vehicle control can be effectively improved, and the automatic control performance of the vehicle is effectively improved.

column2: CABLE CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The cable climbing robot comprises a rack, a holding assembly and a plurality of driving pre-tightening assemblies, the holding assembly is arranged on the rack and used for holding a cable, and all the driving pre-tightening assemblies surround the rack and are arranged at the upper end and the lower end of the rack correspondingly; the driving pre-tightening assembly comprises a base arranged on the rack; one end of the support frame is rotatably arranged on the base, and the other end is provided with a roller; the two ends of the adjusting rod are connected with the base and the supporting frame respectively, and the angle of the supporting frame relative to the base is adjusted by adjusting the length of the adjusting rod; and the rolling wheel is provided with a driving motor, and the rolling wheel is attached to the cable rope and walks on the cable rope by adjusting the angle of the supporting frame relative to the base. The cable climbing robot not only can span a spiral line on the outer surface of the cable, but also can advance on the cable at a high speed.

column2: INTELLIGENT RECOGNITION SYSTEM AND CORRECTION METHOD FOR HUMAN JOINT WRONG MOVEMENT
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent recognition system for human joint wrong movement in the field of movement detection, which comprises an input module, the input module comprises a Y-level input unit and an X-level input unit, the Y-level input unit is a man, the X-level input unit is a woman, and the input module is used for recording athletes with different genders. By arranging the Y-level storage unit and the X-level storage unit, various standard indexes of athletes with different genders are respectively stored in the Y-level storage unit and the X-level storage unit, and by arranging the Y-level input unit and the X-level input unit, the athletes with different genders are independently detected and identified, so that the exercise intensity suitable for the athletes with different genders is calculated; therefore, when athletes with different genders take exercises, the physical fitness of the athletes with different genders can be improved to the maximum extent, meanwhile, the bodies of the athletes with different genders cannot be injured due to different exercise intensities borne by the athletes with different genders, and the applicability and protectiveness of the intelligent identification equipment for human body exercises are improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE GARBAGE CLASSIFICATION SYSTEM
column4: An artificial intelligence garbage classification system comprises two or more classified throwing garbage cans, driving modules, a camera module, a voice acquisition module, a voice recognition module and a control module. The classified throwing garbage cans comprise garbage classification marks, each classified throwing garbage can comprises a can body and a can cover, the can covers of the classified throwing garbage cans are connected with the driving modules corresponding to the can covers, the driving modules are connected with the control module, and the driving modules are used for opening or closing the can covers under the control of the control module. The artificial intelligence garbage classification system has the beneficial effects that when garbage needs to be thrown, people can be helped to classify the garbage in the modes of image shooting, voice recognition and voice broadcasting, the voice recognition module can understand mandarin and can also understand local dialects, the can covers of the garbage cans can be opened while garbage recognition and classification are completed, and the operation of people can be greatly facilitated.

column2: VISUAL IMAGE AND MEDICAL IMAGE FUSION RECOGNITION AND SELF-POSITIONING SCANNING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a visual image and medical image fusion recognition and self-positioning scanning method, which uses an artificial intelligence robot technology and is a method for autonomously positioning and recognizing human organ feature positions and collecting ultrasonic images; is a method for remotely and adaptively collecting images and videos of neck, left and right thyroid lobes, isthmus, parotid gland; is a method for remotely and adaptively acquiring lower limb blood vessels scanning mode and acquiring medical images and videos of organs and tissues; and is a method for remotely and adaptively acquiring scanning mode of skeleton joint, muscle and nerve. Image sharing is achieved through medical image remotely and adaptively control collection and sharing, and the problems that the medical work pressure is large, and night shift is large are solved. The efficiency of remote collecting and sharing of medical images, inquiry and ward round of experts and doctors is improved, clinical cases are solved through common opinions of the experts, and the method is applied to outpatient service, wards and overseas medical institutions.

column2: MODULARIZED INTELLIGENT STREET LAMP WITH AUDIO AND VIDEO ACQUISITION AND INTERACTION FUNCTIONS
column4: The utility model discloses a modularized intelligent street lamp with audio and video acquisition and interaction functions, which belongs to the technical field of street lamps and comprises a lamp post, a limiting slide way is arranged on the side wall of the lamp post, a fixing sleeve is slidably connected to the outer wall of the lamp post, and a pulley is mounted on the inner side of the fixing sleeve and positioned in the limiting slide way. A lifting box is fixedly connected to the top of the lamp pole, a lifting shaft is rotatably connected to the interior of the lifting box, connecting ropes are fixedly connected to the two sides of the lifting shaft, one end of each connecting rope penetrates through the lifting box to be fixedly connected with the corresponding fixing sleeve, and an inserting rod is slidably connected to the middle of the limiting sliding way and matched with the corresponding fixing sleeve; the utilization rate of the lamp pole is improved, maintenance is facilitated, the working pressure of maintenance personnel is relieved, difficulty is lowered, climbing is not needed, and some dangers are avoided.

column2: ARTIFICIAL-INTELLIGENCE-BASED EXERCISE RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND DEVICE, SERVER AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention is suitable for the field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to an artificial-intelligence-based exercise recommendation method and device, a server and a medium. According to the method, an exercise plan is determined according to personal health data of a patient, the exercise plan is added to an electronic calendar, and when a first exercise type and a first exercise index at a target date are modified into a second exercise type and a second exercise index, the difference between a first exercise amount calculated according to the first exercise type and the first exercise index and a second exercise amount calculated according to the second exercise type and the second exercise index is determined, and when the difference is greater than a difference threshold value, the second exercise index is adjusted until the difference is less than or equal to the difference threshold value, the reasonable exercise plan is automatically planned for the patient, the situation that the requirement for the exercise amount cannot be met when the patient modifies the exercise plan is avoided, the reasonability of the exercise plan is guaranteed, and the supervision effect can be achieved by adding the corresponding exercise plan in the electronic calendar.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MANAGEMENT AND CONTROL PLATFORM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence management and control platform, and the platform comprises a computing cluster deep learning subsystem which is used for building an artificial intelligence deep learning cluster foundation through a computing cluster; a deep learning multi-mode deployment subsystem used for constructing a plurality of deep learning frameworks and deploying a multi-mode deep learning training environment through a deep learning cluster basis; a monitoring and training multi-dimensional evaluation subsystem used for performing multi-dimensional evaluation on the running performance of the deep learning and training task through monitoring of a multi-mode deep learning and training system; and a resources scheduling intelligent management and control subsystem used for performing integrated scheduling and intelligent management and control on the computing cluster deep learning subsystem, the deep learning multimode deployment subsystem and the monitoring training multi-dimensional evaluation subsystem according to multi-dimensional evaluation analysis.

column2: CABLE CLIMBING DETECTION ROBOT
column4: The cable climbing detection robot comprises a climbing front body, a detection device and a cable carrying device which are sequentially arranged and connected through a cable, the climbing front body and the detection device are connected through a retractable first rope, and the detection device and the cable carrying device are connected through a retractable second rope; wherein the front climbing body, the detection device and the cable carrying device are each provided with a rotating wheel and a holding assembly, the rotating wheels are used for being attached to a cable and rolling and walking on the cable, and the holding assemblies are used for holding the cable; the detection device is further provided with a detection unit and a first winch, the detection unit is used for detecting the cable, and the first rope is wound around the first winch; the cable carrying device is used for carrying a cable and further provided with a second winch, and the second rope is wound around the second winch.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE OF THINGS (AIOT) DEVELOPMENT SYSTEM AND WEARABLE DEVICE HAVING THE SAME
column4: The present invention provides an AIoT development system. The present invention includes: an auxiliary device having an AI edge computing processing function, a core, and a plurality of function expansion kits. The core includes: a processing unit having programmable, computing and AI communication functions; and a plurality of expansion interfaces for performing signal transmission with an external device. Each of the function expansion kits includes: a relay interface connected to the expansion interfaces of the core, a transducer for sensing signals from a test object located at where a corresponding one of the function expansion kits is, and a function circuit for processing the signals sensed by the transducer. The transducer of each of the function expansion kits senses signals, or modulates the sensed signals via the function circuit, and sends the sensed signals or the modulated signals to the processing unit through the relay interface and the expansion interfaces.

column2: CLOUD RESOURCE MANAGEMENT USING EXTERNALLY-SOURCED DATA
column4: A processing device can make use of an Artificial Intelligence (AI) model to make projections about resource usage based on data from external sources. The processing device can then adjust cloud-based resources accordingly. The cluster resource allocation can be adjusted as examples, by increasing, decreasing, or maintaining a number of nodes allocated to a cluster, by increasing, decreasing, or maintaining the number of pods assigned to an application or a container running in a cluster, or by increasing, decreasing, or maintaining central processing unit (CPU) resource, memory, disk storage, or a replication factor assigned to a pod.

column2: INTELLIGENT CONSTANT-TEMPERATURE WAISTCOAT
column4: The intelligent constant-temperature waistcoat comprises a waistcoat body and a heating device, the waistcoat body is composed of a waistcoat outer layer and a waistcoat inner layer, the waistcoat outer layer is formed by sewing diving fabric, and the waistcoat inner layer is formed by sewing graphene fabric; the heating device is arranged between the waistcoat outer layer and the waistcoat inner layer and integrally located on the back portion of the waistcoat body, the heating device comprises a plurality of carbon fiber graphene heating pieces, and the carbon fiber graphene heating pieces are electrically connected with a constant-temperature controller arranged at the chest position of the waistcoat body through first wires; a second wire is led out of the constant temperature controller and extends into a pocket located on one side of the waist and abdomen portion of the waistcoat body, a mobile power source can be placed in the pocket in a matched mode, and an end connector of the second wire can be connected with the mobile power source in a matched mode. The constant-temperature vest not only can ensure that the inside of the vest is basically at constant temperature and improve the comfort level of a wearer, but also has the health-care effects of promoting metabolism of a human body, regulating meridians and collaterals and improving microcirculation of the human body.

column2: AUTOMATIC DEEP FIRE EXTINGUISHING ROBOT MECHANISM SUITABLE FOR MULTIPLE TERRAINS
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence robots, and discloses an automatic deep fire extinguishing robot mechanism suitable for multiple terrains. The automatic deep fire extinguishing robot mechanism comprises a machine frame, a steering gear is rotatably connected in the machine frame, a water gun seat is rotatably connected to the top of the machine frame, and a rotating frame is rotatably connected in the machine frame; and a feeding assembly is rotationally connected to the interior of the machine frame, transmission shafts are rotationally connected to the interior of the rotating frame, a connecting shaft is clamped between the transmission shafts, and a climbing main shaft is rotationally connected to the bottom of the machine frame. According to the automatic deep fire extinguishing robot mechanism suitable for the multiple terrains, the feeding assembly drives the connecting shaft to rotate, the connecting shaft drives the transmission shafts to rotate, the transmission shafts drive a driving belt wheel to rotate, the driving belt wheel drives a driven belt wheel to rotate through a transmission belt, the driven belt wheel drives a feeding tire to rotate, and the water gun seat, the steering gear and other mechanisms are matched for use, so that the effect of automatically advancing and rotating at multiple angles to extinguish fire is achieved.

column2: EMBEDDED SYSTEM AND EDGE SYSTEM APPLICATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an embedded system and edge system application method based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of embedded systems. The problem that artificial intelligence tasks such as environment object recognition, enhancement, natural language processing and automatic driving cannot be better completed is solved. The method specifically comprises the following steps of collecting photos and texts required by a model through modes of network downloading, automatic shooting, text collection and the like; processing the photos and texts, then selecting an optimal and best model for training in a host unit, and generating a model after training is completed. According to the invention, an image and a text are transmitted into the Jetson suite to be identified through an arranged model, the corresponding single-chip microcomputer is controlled according to an identification feedback result, and the single-chip microcomputer controls the intelligent device to complete an action planned in advance through programming according to an instruction sent by the Jetson suite. And an embedded system and an edge system can quickly and correctly identify and respond to surrounding conditions.

column2: EXERCISE-BASED ANSWERING ABILITY VALUE EVALUATION METHOD AND DEVICE AND COMPUTER EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the field of answering of artificial intelligence, and discloses an exercise-based answering ability value evaluation method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a first question and a first difficulty coefficient of the first question; obtaining a first question answering result of the user for the first question; according to the first difficulty coefficient and the first answer result, utilizing a maximum likelihood parameter estimation method to calculate an ability estimation value of the user; if the ability estimation value does not meet the evaluation requirement, determining a second difficulty coefficient of the first question based on the ability estimation value; matching a second question according to the second difficulty coefficient; obtaining a second question answering result of the user for the second question, and updating the ability estimation value according to the second question answering result until the ability estimation value meets the evaluation requirement; and generating an evaluation capability value of the user according to the capability estimation value. According to the invention, the number of answers during evaluation can be reduced, and the evaluation efficiency of the evaluation ability is improved.

column2: MONITORING SYSTEM AND MONITORING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent monitoring, and provides a monitoring system and method based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises a data collection unit; a data storage unit; a data processing unit which is used for analyzing and processing the data through an artificial intelligence technology, acquiring image data, monitoring equipment data and shooting time data which are identified from a video, inputting multi-source information data into a machine learning model, and obtaining image data classified according to image types and/or image data classified according to monitoring equipment and/or image data sorted according to a time sequence; a data matching unit which is used for comparing the target image data with the label data obtained by the data processing unit, matching succeeds if the target image data are consistent with the label data, and matching fails if the target image data are not consistent with the label data; and a data positioning unit which is used for positioning all successfully matched image data in the data matching unit to obtain video data. The time for a user to know the monitoring condition of the target area can be saved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED TRAINING MANAGEMENT SYSTEM USING MUSCULAR POWER STRENGTHENING SUIT
column4: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based training management system using a muscular power strengthening suit, which acquires a user's body information while providing electrical stimulation to the user, analyzes the acquired body information, and suggests appropriate exercise to the user. To this end, the present invention comprises: a smart band which is worn by a user, measures the user's heart rate, and generates heart rate data; a muscular power strengthening suit which includes a plurality of electrode plates and a power communication device that are detachably attached thereto, wherein the power communication device applies electricity to the electrode plates at regular intervals; a terminal which wirelessly communicates with the smart band and the muscular power strengthening suit and has an application that receives data from the smart band and the muscular power strengthening suit so as to generate a plurality of pieces of information data; and an AI server which stores a plurality of pieces of exercise program data therein and transmits, when the terminal receives the information data by learning exercise prescription data supplied from the outside, exercise program data corresponding to the received information data to the terminal. According to the present invention, the system can promote the user's muscle growth. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: PSYCHOLOGY EXAMINATION APPARATUS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to a psychology examination apparatus comprises: a camera unit shooting an examination video of a subject during a psychological examination; a facial expression analysis unit analyzing facial expression of the subject in units of frames of the shot examination video and extracting emotional numerical data corresponding to the facial expression of the subject; a database unit storing a facial expression analysis result for each subject and a psychological analysis result reflecting the facial expression analysis result; a learning unit learning content of the database unit, generating psychological type models on the basis of the emotional numerical data, and storing the generated psychological type models in the database unit; and a psychology type determination unit determining a psychological type of the subject by applying the emotional numerical data extracted from the facial expression analysis unit to the psychological type models. According to the present invention, a subject's expression is analyzed in frame units from the video of the subject during projection examination and provides a result in a numerical form, thereby providing an advantage of providing an objective projection test result on the basis of numerical information. An objective projection examination result is provided based on artificial intelligence, thereby providing an advantage of increasing reliability of the projection inspection results. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: MACHINE ROOM TEMPERATURE PREDICTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a machine room temperature prediction method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of obtaining temperature data of a target area through a temperature sensor, obtaining server information, preprocessing the temperature, establishing an LSTM network, obtaining a predicted temperature, giving out an early warning according to the predicted temperature and adjusting a cooling system. According to the invention, an artificial intelligence technology is utilized, the running state of the server and the working state of the cooling system are predicted according to historical information, the cooling system is automatically linked and adjusted, early warning is given out, and server service interruption caused by overtemperature is avoided.

column2: MOTION TRAIL ACQUISITION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and provides a motion trail acquisition method and device, equipment and a medium. The method comprises: obtaining 3D video data and first label information of the 3D video data, wherein the first label information comprises a first object identifier of a main moving object, a second object identifier of an auxiliary moving object and first scene information in the 3D video data; performing motion trail identification on a main motion object corresponding to the first object identifier to obtain a motion trail of the main motion object; and processing the first scene information, the second object identifier and the motion trail of the main motion object through the trained composition model to obtain the motion trail of the auxiliary motion object corresponding to the second object identifier. Shooting can be assisted based on the predicted motion trail of the auxiliary motion object, and 3D video data can be efficiently and conveniently produced; and moreover, the perception of a film viewer on the scene feature change is improved, and the film viewer is promoted to feel a more changeable and fierce dynamic 3D scene.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED GOLF IMAGE LEARNING DEVICE, METHOD THEREOF AND RECORDING MEDIUM THEREOF
column4: An artificial intelligence-based golf image learning device, a method thereof and a recording medium thereof, according to one embodiment, are disclosed. The artificial intelligence-based golf image learning method, which is performed by a golf image learning device, comprises the steps of: generating a first golf operation image of a virtual human, with respect to a user's first movement data; recognizing motion data corresponding to feedback obtained by analyzing the user's first movement data through a first golf operation image generated from a plurality of pieces of motion data stored in a database; generating a second golf operation image of the virtual human using second movement data obtained by changing the user's first movement data based on the recognized motion data; using the generated second motion data in a deep learning model learned using a plurality of golf images for learning so as to obtain output information; and providing the generated second golf operation image and the obtained output information. According to the present invention, the effect of golf learning can be improved. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: INTELLIGENT INTERNET OF THINGS DEVELOPMENT SYSTEM AND WEARABLE DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent Internet of Things development system and a wearable device. The system comprises an auxiliary device, a core body and a plurality of function expansion suites, the core body is provided with a processing unit with programmable and computing functions and artificial intelligence communication and a plurality of expansion components for performing signal transmission processing with the outside; each function expansion suite is provided with a relay interface used for being connected with the expansion assembly, a transducer used for sensing an object to be detected at the position where the function expansion suite is located, and a functional circuit used for processing a signal sensed by the transducer. The transducer of the function expansion suite can sense a signal or regulate and control the sensed signal through the functional circuit, and can transmit the sensed signal or the regulated and controlled signal to the processing unit through the relay interface and the expansion assembly. The processing unit transmits the control signal to the auxiliary device for analysis and feeds back the control signal to the processing unit; therefore, the processing unit performs artificial intelligence communication and control of the function expansion suite according to the control signal.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CALIBRATING WORKING POWER OF HUMAN BODY BASED ON TREADMILL
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence detection, and particularly relates to a method and a system for calibrating the working power of a human body based on a treadmill, wherein the method comprises the steps that: according to the law of conservation of energy, on the basis of electric energy data stored in an electric energy storage area and mechanical energy data in a mechanical energy storage area, through a calibration method of treadmill operation and counterweight motion, the energy conversion relation is determined to be the relation between the treadmill movement speed and the treadmill working current and the relation between running slope of treadmill and working current of the treadmill. The problem that an existing method and system for calibrating the working power of the treadmill on a human body are unscientific and inaccurate in the energy index calibration process is solved, and the method and the system have the beneficial technical effects that the treadmill can be used for exercising more scientifically and safely, and calibration of the electric treadmill on work in the running process of a runner is improved and increased.

column2: ANKLE-KNEE LINKAGE WALKING ASSISTING DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an ankle-knee linkage walking assisting device, belongs to the field of medical instruments, and aims to solve the problem that an existing walking training assisting method is poor in treatment effect or expensive in equipment and cannot be popularized and used. The ankle-knee linkage walking assisting device comprises a knee joint wearing body, an ankle wearing body and a plurality of stay wires. The tension angle and the tension force of each stay wire are dynamically adjusted by adjusting the length of the stay wires and the position of a sliding screw, the posture of the ankle is limited by the tension force of the stay wires, the gentle flexion of the knee is controlled to be within 10 degrees, the dorsal flexion of the ankle is controlled to be larger than 0 degree, the consistency of each exercise training is guaranteed, through repeated exercise, exercise dynamic shaping reconstruction is realized, and action reflection is formed, so that the gait is fixed. By means of the open-chain and closed-chain motion principle, the far-end motion freedom degree is limited through ankle-knee combination, near-end control is strengthened, far-end abnormal modes are reduced, and the purposes of labor saving and auxiliary therapy are achieved.

column2: INFORMATION ACQUISITION DEVICE AND ACQUISITION METHOD FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an information acquisition device for artificial intelligence. The device comprises a mounting plate, a supporting shaft is fixedly mounted on the right side of the mounting plate, a connector is fixedly mounted on the right side of the supporting shaft, an adjusting cylinder is fixedly mounted on the top of the connector, a camera is movably mounted on the top of a sleeving cylinder, and an adjusting mechanism is arranged in the adjusting cylinder. According to the information acquisition device and acquisition method for artificial intelligence, by arranging the adjusting mechanism, a pull rod drives a rotating wheel to rotate downwards around a bearing, so that a transmission wheel is driven, after the transmission wheel rotates, the camera is driven through a connecting seat to change the shooting angle, and artificial intelligence acquisition is effectively changed by adopting a mechanical mechanism. In the acquisition process, the shooting visual angle of the acquisition device can be adjusted according to the change of pictures, so that the artificial intelligence information can be better acquired, the operation is convenient and fast, and manual assistance is not needed.

column2: MAMMARY GLAND DISEASE AUXILIARY SCREENING METHOD BASED ON MOLYBDENUM TARGET IMAGE
column4: The invention relates to a mammary gland disease auxiliary screening method based on a molybdenum target image, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out data preparation: collecting mammary gland molybdenum target images, and enabling each piece of data to comprise the information of a subject as metadata; carrying out data preprocessing on the collected images; carrying out data training on the preprocessed data, the training content comprising image feature extraction, metadata feature extraction and feature classification, and enabling an image feature extraction network to output first high-dimensional features through a transform-based feature extraction network; combining metadata feature extraction with factors related to breast diseases, constructing shallow features of metadata through linear regression, constructing deep features through linear regression, and outputting second high-dimensional features; splicing the first high-dimensional feature and the second high-dimensional feature, and performing feature classification to obtain a breast disease classification model; and performing molybdenum target image shooting on the subject, and inputting the molybdenum target image into the breast disease classification model to obtain the health state of the mammary gland of the subject and the confidence coefficient of the corresponding result.

column2: SCENE ANALYSIS AND AUXILIARY DECISION-MAKING METHOD FOR CURLING SPORTS BASED ON REINFORCEMENT LEARNING
column4: The invention discloses a curling sports field analysis and auxiliary decision-making method based on reinforcement learning, belongs to artificial intelligence and computer vision directions in the field of deep learning, establishes a digital model of curling match scenes and situations, and establishes a curling sports field analysis and auxiliary decision-making system. The method mainly solves the problems of scene analysis and auxiliary decision making of curling sports in an actual sports scene. The algorithm mainly comprises curling match situation awareness design, a curling field digital extraction method and curling match decision analysis, specifically, the actual movement position and speed of curling are sensed in a curling match situation awareness module, the static state is obtained, and a curling field digital extraction module is used for extracting the actual movement position and speed of curling through position mapping between the actual field and shooting data. And the curling match decision analysis module is used for collecting the accurate position and category of the curling at the critical moment, performing simulation calculation through a reinforcement learning algorithm according to the category and position information of the curling match decision analysis module, giving a suggested striking position of the next step, and assisting in performing curling tactical decision. The curling sports field analysis and auxiliary decision-making method based on reinforcement learning is excellent in test effect during actual curling match training, high in use value and high in expandability.

column2: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) AND INTERNET OF THINGS (IOT) BASED INTEGRATED APPROACH FOR COVID-19 PREVENTION
column4: A low-cost AI-based screening system that can be installed at various locations. The objective is to automate the task of face mask detection, check for social distancing and body temperature scanning. The dataset consisted of 2314 images combining those without a mask and those with an artificial mask attached to them. These functionalities are carried out by combining AI and IoT technologies. IoT devices are employed with deep learning and computer vision algorithms to achieve a real-time covid screening solution. The objective is to provide a cost-effective solution for automating face mask detection, checking social distancing and temperature sensing by leveraging IoT. Components like Raspberry Pi, IR Temperature Module, Servo Motors, Pi camera, Solenoid Lock, Motion Detector, and Relay are used to achieve the task. The system and method for identification of pople with risk / threat of Covid 19, wherein these components are easily available at a low cost.

column2: ELECTRIC POWER INSPECTION UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE IMAGE CLASSIFICATION PREPROCESSING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an electric power inspection unmanned aerial vehicle image classification preprocessing method, which comprises the following steps of: acquiring original images shot by an electric power inspection unmanned aerial vehicle in a flight process, and extracting shooting time parameters of the original images; subjecting the obtained original images to primary grouping according to time interval parameters, dividing the original images with the time interval smaller than or equal to two times into one group, and forming N original image groups; and respectively extracting image longitude, latitude and height information in the N original image groups, and acquiring a bounding rectangle of the image points through utilizing the longitude and latitude information of the plurality of images. The electric power inspection unmanned aerial vehicle image classification preprocessing method has the advantages that the original images are automatically identified and classified, manual visual interpretation is replaced, image classification errors caused by manual classification are avoided, the workload of personnel is reduced, the labor cost is reduced, application of artificial intelligence in the field of electric power inspection is effectively promoted, and the inspection working efficiency of the unmanned aerial vehicle is improved.

column2: SCREEN SHOOTING RANGE USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY AND SCREEN SHOOTING GAME METHOD
column4: The present invention relates to a screen shooting range using artificial intelligence technology and a screen shooting game method. According to the present invention, the screen shooting range using artificial intelligence technology comprises: a set including a plurality of shooting spaces virtually divided to connect moving paths of a user, wherein the divided shooting spaces are decorated in accordance with different themes; a sensor unit to sense the position or movement of the user; a plurality of structures arranged in the shooting spaces; a plurality of video playing unit to play a video in the shooting spaces; a moving means provided such that the structures or the video playing unit can move; a main server to store a plurality of videos as a manual, and receive the position of a laser pointer; and a control unit to generally control the inside of the shooting spaces. Accordingly, the present invention allows a user to escape from a two-dimensional game for looking at only one screen and playing a shooting game and to enjoy three-dimensional and complex shooting games through movements similar to a real battle by using a plurality of screens and various structures.

column2: REAL TIME TRAIN CONDITION MONITORING SYSTEM
column4: A real time train condition monitoring system (RTTCMS) comprises a microprocessor (101), Transceiver (102), RTC(103), GPS/GSM (104), Accelerometer (105), Proximity Sensor (105), Gyroscope (106), Magneto meter (107), Sound Sensor (108), Thermal Scanners (109), memory card (110), relay (111) , battery (112) and camera (113). Real time train condition monitoring system is a sensor based automatic device which we install on the Bogie of train for the prediction of fractures in the different bogie parts and Railway Track. It works on the advanced technologies like- artificial intelligence, IoT, cloud computing, etc.Till the Railway workers are facing a big challenge and over burden for searching Defects & fractures in Train wheels, axle, bearing, Rail track fractures, etc. by manual monitoring only, through their eyes by walking over many kilometers on railway tracks only when the trains stand in the static condition in the loco shed. They are unable to monitor defects in the running condition of train, which is a big challenge in different environmental conditions.

column2: SKELETON SCREEN GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a skeleton screen generation method and device based on artificial intelligence, electronic equipment and a medium. The method comprises the following steps: when any key value in a page configuration file meets a preset skeleton screen generation requirement, obtaining a skeleton screen automatic generation code of a target page corresponding to a key of each key value; executing a skeleton screen automatic generation code of the target page to obtain a first JSON file and a first picture of an initial skeleton screen of the target page; and receiving a second JSON file and a second picture of the initial skeleton screen reported by the server, drawing a corresponding view according to the second JSON file and the second picture, and determining the view as a target skeleton screen of the target page. According to the invention, the target skeleton screen is drawn according to the received second JSON file and the second picture reported by the server, so that the phenomenon that the client and the server need to communicate and interact for many times to generate the target skeleton screen is avoided, and the generation efficiency of the target skeleton screen is improved.

column2: REAL TIME LOCAL FILTERING OF ON-SCREEN IMAGES
column4: The present invention in some embodiments thereof relates to a system and method for detecting inappropriate content on a device and filtering content on a variety of media. Inappropriate content is detected by taking a sample of media from at least one of a local memory, a data stream from a network and a data stream from local sensor, preprocessing the sample using a local processor and locally stored software to determine if the sample is a likely candidate to include objectionable content, in response to said sample being found to be a likely candidate perform at least one of quarantining the sample, marking the media, sending the sample to a remote processor for further analysis, analyzing the sample using an artificial intelligence routine running on a local processor and analyzing the sample using an artificial intelligence routine running on said local processor.

column2: TREADMILL CONTROL METHOD, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, AND SYSTEM
column4: The present application provides a treadmill control method, an electronic device, and a system. The method can be used in an artificial intelligence (AI) terminal. The method comprises: an electronic device receives a user's heart rate value sent from a wearable device; the electronic device determines the running purpose and running recovery time of the user according to user information stored on the electronic device; the electronic device determines a first target heart rate range according to the running purpose, recovery time, and a mapping relationship; and the electronic device adjusts the pace of a treadmill according to the heart rate value and the first target heart rate range. Embodiments of the present application facilitate improvement of the degree of intelligence of the electronic device (for example, a smart terminal device, such as a mobile phone), and can improve experience of the user when using the treadmill.

column2: INTELLIGENT EXERCISE RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND APPARATUS, COMPUTER DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: An intelligent exercise recommendation method and apparatus, a computer device and a storage medium, which relate to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: by means of a first preset formula, according to an exercise completion situation of each student, first calculating knowledge points which are fully mastered by each student and knowledge points which are possibly not fully mastered; and then by means of a second preset formula, further calculating exercises which are appropriate to be recommended to the students. The problems of wrong exercises being relatively singular in existing wrong exercise recommendation and the quality pertinence of wrong exercise recommendation not being high are solved. Personalized recommended practice exercises can be automatically generated with regard to the work situations and knowledge point mastering situations of students, so that the students spend time on exercises which need to be practiced the most, thereby helping the students to learn efficiently, and the exercise completion time can thus be reduced, thereby achieving the aims of performing personalized learning and improving the learning efficiency.

column2: SCREEN SHOOTING RANGE AND METHOD OF PLAYING SCREEN SHOOTING GAME USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The present invention provides a screen shooting range and a method of playing a screen shooting game using artificial intelligence technologies. The screen shooting range includes a set studio including a plurality of shooting spaces virtually divided so as to continue a movement line of a user, wherein each of the divided shooting spaces is decorated according to different themes; a plurality of structures disposed in the shooting spaces; a sensor unit configured to detect a motion or position of the user; a plurality of image display units disposed in the shooting space to display images; a moving means provided so that the structure or the image display unit can be moved; a main server for storing a plurality of images as a manual and receiving position information of the laser point; and a controller for controlling internal configurations of the shooting space as a whole.

column2: SCHOOL VEHICLE COMMERCE SYSTEM AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to a school vehicle commerce system, which comprises: a school vehicle device provided in a vehicle, and including a passenger information collector for collecting first identification information on a passenger positioned in a vehicle seat, and a seat terminal for providing recommended content for the passenger; and a commerce server device for recognizing an identify of the passenger on the basis of passenger information including second identification information and identification information on the passenger and the first identification information in a first mode, selecting, by an artificial intelligence content selecting unit, the recommended content customized to the identity of the passenger on the basis of externally provided content stored in a second mode, and generating link information generated based on whether the passenger is interested in the recommended content in a third mode to interactively relay the same between the school vehicle device and a terminal device of a guardian of the passenger. Therefore, a customized product can be provided for an identified passenger. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: DECISION MODEL TRAINING METHOD AND DEVICE, TERMINAL EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention is suitable for the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a decision model training method and device, terminal equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining first state information of a simulation system in any fault; the simulation system is a virtual system pre-built based on the running production line environment of a real system; inputting the first state information into the initial decision model to obtain a target recovery action predicted by the initial decision model; obtaining second state information after the simulation system executes the target recovery action and the system health degree of the simulation system; taking the first state information, the target recovery action, the second state information and the system health degree as a group of simulation experience data; and performing reinforcement learning training on the initial decision model according to the simulation experience data to obtain a target decision model. By adopting the method to train the decision model, the model training efficiency can be improved.

column2: VIDEO DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND COMPUTER EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to a video data processing method and computer equipment. The method relates to artificial intelligence, and comprises the steps of segmenting a video to be split according to a shooting view angle to obtain a plurality of initial video shots, and performing face image frame extraction and continuous action image frame extraction based on video frames corresponding to the plurality of initial video shots to obtain a face video region and a continuous same action video region; combining the initial video shots with similar contents along the time axis based on the video frames corresponding to the plurality of initial video shots to obtain similar shots, and combining the face video region, the continuous same action video region and the similar shots until a video segmentation stop condition is met to obtain a plurality of video clips. By adopting the method, the videos can be merged and automatically split from multiple angles, a plurality of video clips for broadcasting on different platforms are generated, manual video splitting is not needed, errors caused by manual splitting operation are avoided, and the splitting working efficiency for different videos is improved.

column2: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING TREADMILL, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides a method for controlling a treadmill, electronic equipment and a system. The method can be used for an artificial intelligence (AI) terminal. The method comprises the steps that: the electronic equipment receives a heart rate value, sent by the wearable equipment, of a user; the electronic equipment determines the running purpose and the running recovery time of the user according to the user information stored in the electronic equipment; the electronic device determines a first target heart rate range according to the running purpose, the recovery time and the mapping relation; and the electronic equipment adjusts the speed of the treadmill according to the heart rate value and the first target heart rate range. According to the embodiment of the invention, the intelligent degree of the electronic equipment (such as intelligent terminal equipment, such as a mobile phone) can be improved, and meanwhile, the user experience of a user when the user uses the treadmill can be improved.

column2: VIRTUAL RULER CALCULATION METHOD BASED ON SECOND-ORDER RADIAL DISTORTION CORRECTION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a virtual ruler calculation method based on a second-order radial distortion correction method. The virtual ruler calculation method comprises an image acquisition module, a virtual ruler module and a numerical value acquisition module; the virtual ruler module further comprises a distortion judgment unit, a distortion correction unit and a perspective transformation unit. The method the following steps: S1, the image acquisition module is used for shooting an image of a water area to be detected and transmitting the image to the virtual rule module; S2, the image is judged through the distortion judgment unit, and the judgment result is transmitted to the distortion correction unit; S3, the distortion correction unit performs image correction and conversion on the image with the large distortion angle through correction calculation; and S4, the converted image is transmitted to the perspective transformation unit, and a virtual rule is printed. The calculation method is simple and accurate, the accuracy of water area monitoring is improved, the difficulty of reading and establishing an actual scale is reduced, the labor intensity of labor force is reduced, the labor cost is reduced, the artificial intelligence level of water area monitoring is improved, and the method is suitable for popularization.

column2: AUXILIARY DETECTION SYSTEM FOR HEAD HAIR TRANSPLANTING AREA AND HAIR TRANSPLANTING MIRROR
column4: The utility model belongs to the technical field of detection methods and devices before and after hair transplantation, and particularly relates to an auxiliary detection system for a head hair transplantation area and a hair transplantation mirror. Images of different spectrums are obtained through standard white light and other auxiliary irradiation in the shooting process; and according to the shot image, various data of the part to be transplanted with hair are analyzed through artificial intelligence Ai software, and reference suggestions are provided for a hair transplanting scheme. The intelligent Ai unit is used for completing identification and drawing of the whole head top area and identifying and drawing of the hair transplanting area with hair or without hair or with little hair, the area, needing hair transplanting, of the head can be rapidly positioned through the electronic photographing technology, and the virtual hair transplanting effect picture is pasted to the bald area through artificial intelligence Ai software and the image processing technology. A testee can select a hair transplanting scheme suitable for the testee; and the change effect before and after hair transplantation is vividly reflected.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE WATER SURFACE DETECTION SYSTEM BASED ON VIRTUAL SCALE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence water surface detection system based on a virtual scale. Theartificial intelligence water surface detection system comprises a virtual scale module and a water surface height detection module, the output end of the water surface height detection module is connected with the virtual scale module, and the virtual scale module comprises a virtual scale construction method. The virtual scale construction method comprises the following steps: S1, selecting a water surface detection area, and performing calibration through a movable scale; S2, shooting a detection water area image, and uploading the shot image to the construction system; S3, determining a relation between image pixels and actual water surface scales through a construction system; and S4, forming a virtual scale module according to the relationship between the image pixel and the actual water surface scale in combination with the pixel characteristics. The detection implementation method is simple, use of actual scales is reduced, the problems of color fading, meteorite falling and unclear scales of existing scales are solved, the automation degree of water surface detection is improved, the working efficiency of detection is improved, and the system is suitable for market popularization.

column2: ASPHALT PAVEMENT COMPACTION QUALITY CONTROL DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a bituminous pavement compaction quality control device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a temperature image acquisition device, an environment temperature, humidity and wind speed detection device, a GPS (Global Positioning System) transmitting and receiving device, a compaction section distance measuring device, an AI (Artificial Intelligence) processor module, a road roller running track recording device and a compaction degree detection device, the device comprises a road roller running speed adjusting device, a road roller power control device, a display and an alarm device, according to the utility model, the dynamic control of the compaction quality of the asphalt pavement can be intelligently controlled by integrating various influence factors through the artificial intelligence technology, and the condition that the compaction quality of the pavement does not reach the standard due to severe conditions can be warned in time.

column2: INTERACTIVE E-LEARNING SHOOTING METHOD AND SYSTEM USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The disclosed technology relates to an interactive e-learning shooting method and system using artificial intelligence. The method includes the steps of: extracting the gesture and voice of an instructor included in a lecture video filmed by an e-learning filming system; inputting, by the e-learning imaging system, the extracted gesture and voice into a pre-learned artificial neural network; selecting, by the artificial neural network, one of a plurality of response data matching the extracted gesture and voice; and applying, by the e-learning shooting system, the selected reaction data to a virtual character output on the screen in real time. Therefore, it has the effect of improving the concentration of the shooting of the instructor. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EMPLOYED TO CREATE A REVOLUTIONARY ENERGY-EFFICIENT INTELLIGENT DEVICE FOR WEATHER OBSERVATION
column4: Windows are a vital feature of every structure because they allow for proper ventilation and enable sunlight to enter. The sun's beams contain natural ultraviolet radiation that are effective at destroying pathogenic microbes. Long-closed spaces suffer from moisture, fungi, and other issues; thus, windows must be opened frequently throughout the day to allow fresher air to enter. One issue remains: users must manually control the windows, curtains, and so forth. To overcome the above stated issue, the objective of this invention is to create a revolutionary energy-efficient intelligent device for weather observation using artificial intelligence. This device comprising: an internal sensor module for sensing interior weather patterns with a multitude of sensing devices; an exterior sensor module for sensing the outside weather patterns with a multitude of detectors, a central controller module, a load relay unit, a processor, and a smartphone with artificial intelligence. Using this device, the window automatically opens and shuts based on the weather scenarios utilising artificial intelligence.

column2: ELECTRONIC MONITORING EQUIPMENT AND ROAD ASSOCIATION METHOD AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides an electronic monitoring equipment and road association method and a device and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence such as computer vision, intelligent traffic and deep learning, and the method can comprise the steps: determining a road included in a to-be-processed image as an alternative road, wherein the image is an image acquired by an acquisition vehicle running on a road, and the image comprises a monitoring rod and an electronic monitoring device located on the monitoring rod; determining an angle range shot by the electronic monitoring device according to the image, and respectively determining an orientation angle of a passing direction of each alternative road; and selecting a road corresponding to the electronic monitoring device from the alternative roads in combination with the obtained angle range and the orientation angle. According to the scheme, manpower and time cost can be saved.

column2: SEALED CONTROL TYPE INTELLIGENT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM FOR OBSTETRICAL DEPARTMENT
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of intelligent management and application integration innovation, and particularly relates to a sealed control type intelligent management system for the obstetrical department, which comprises a family hall, a family zone, a baby swimming pool, a puerpera health care zone, a maternal and infant living room, a delivery room, an intelligent nurse station, a storeroom, a control room, a consulting room, a changing room and the like. Through function creation of a regional module, management mode design and development of matched service-oriented hardware equipment, an existing management mode and a physical environment are reformed based on the Internet of Things, big data, digital twinning, audio-visual fusion and artificial intelligence technologies, and comprehensive management of the obstetrical department is converted from a manpower support type to a science and technology support type. The sealed control type intelligent system management is realized from the aspects of space and working process, the working efficiency of medical personnel is improved, and the feeling of interaction between family members, women and infants is increased; medical care and family members are assisted to complete part of work content, and the number of close-fitting accompanying family members and the work intensity of medical care personnel are reduced.

column2: PARKING SPACE DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a parking space detection method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical fields of computer vision, intelligent traffic, deep learning and the like. The specific implementation scheme comprises steps of determining to-be-processed parking space information and a parking space image corresponding to the parking space information; detecting the parking space image, and determining a parking space shooting condition corresponding to the parking space information; and adjusting the processing state of the parking space video corresponding to the parking space information according to the parking space shooting condition. Therefore, when the parking space video is abnormal, the processing state of the parking space video corresponding to the parking space information can be adjusted in time, and the accuracy of judging the parking state of the vehicle is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EDUCATION INTERACTION DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence education interaction device which comprises an interaction table, a storage cabinet is arranged on the front face of the interaction table, a drawer is movably connected to the top, away from the storage cabinet, of the front face of the interaction table, an AI host is fixedly arranged in the drawer, a display screen is movably arranged on the top of the interaction table, and a camera shooting body is movably connected to the inner side of the display screen. An infrared sensor is fixedly connected to the front face of the camera body, a sliding rail is arranged on the inner side of the top of the interaction table, a loudspeaker is fixedly connected to one side of the interaction table, a base is fixedly connected to the bottom of the interaction table, universal wheels are movably connected to the bottom of the base, storage frames are fixedly connected to the two sides of the base, and a storage opening is formed in one end of each storage frame. The device is more humanized through an infrared sensor, a loudspeaker and an EMS micro electric appliance, corresponding response is made according to the condition of a user, the flexibility of the interaction device is improved through a sliding rail, a storage frame and a telescopic rod, and a worker can move the interaction device overall conveniently.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING EQUIPMENT FOR EXHIBITION
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of monitoring equipment, in particular to artificial intelligence monitoring equipment for an exhibition, which comprises a mounting seat, a support column, a display screen, a rotary holder, a camera and a control box, one end of the mounting seat is fixedly connected with the support column, and the top of the support column is fixedly connected with the display screen and the control box respectively. The display screen is located in front of the control box, the bottom of the supporting column is fixedly connected with the rotating holder, the camera is installed on the rotating holder, a control host, a storage battery and a wireless transmission device are arranged in the control box, and the storage battery, the wireless transmission device, the display screen, the rotating holder and the camera are all electrically connected with the control host. The artificial intelligence monitoring equipment for the exhibition not only can carry out monitoring and camera shooting, but also can provide display support and play a guiding role in danger.

column2: APPLICATION LAG PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT, STORAGE MEDIUM AND PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The invention relates to an application lag processing method and device, equipment, a storage medium and a program product. The method can be applied to various scenes such as cloud technology, artificial intelligence, intelligent traffic and auxiliary driving, and comprises the following steps: acquiring a callback interval time of two adjacent system drawing frame callback functions, and when the callback interval time is detected to reach a preset interval threshold value, determining that the lagging exists; obtaining application lag data corresponding to the preset lag influence factors, and performing lag analysis based on the application lag data to determine a corresponding lag point. By adopting the method, whether the lagging condition exists or not can be directly determined according to the system drawing frame callback function without an additional detection tool or setting a corresponding monitoring message queue, so that the performance consumption can be reduced, the influence on the time consumption of an actually running component is avoided, and the jamming point can be accurately determined by further analyzing the application jamming data, so that the jamming problem is solved in time, and the jamming processing efficiency is improved.

column2: DATA CENTER SERVER REGULATION AND CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a data center server regulation and control method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a data center server and an average utilization rate, building a relation between performance and the average utilization rate, obtaining a data center task set and a task deadline, carrying out the resource distribution according to the performance and the task set, adjusting the task set at a time interval T, and calculating the shortest running time of the task, adjusting a task running sequence, and calculating and outputting the task execution time. According to the method, a dynamic server scheduling algorithm is realized, so that the tasks are efficiently executed, and the tasks are better and efficiently allocated by establishing the relationship between the utilization rate and the performance.

column2: TEST SCHEDULING AND LOG MANAGEMENT METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a test scheduling and log management method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining an iteration software package corresponding to a currently running production software package, and deploying the iteration software package in a preset test service cluster, performing A/B testing on the test service cluster and the production service cluster running the production software package; obtaining a code merging request of the iteration software package, and extracting attribute information from the code merging request according to a preset attribute extraction rule; according to test information generated by the A/B test, extracting index information from the test information according to a preset index extraction rule, and integrating the attribute information and the index information into a test log. The invention further relates to a blockchain technology, and information can be stored in a blockchain node. The test efficiency of the software package is improved, key information and main viewpoints transmitted by the test information are obtained, and departments and developers which the test information belongs to are accurately and quickly obtained.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VISUAL TROUBLESHOOTING VEHICLE BODY STRUCTURE
column4: The utility model belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence vision, and particularly relates to an artificial intelligence vision troubleshooting vehicle body structure which comprises a base, a limiting rod and a baffle, a side plate is fixed above the base, the front end of the side plate is connected with a connecting shaft, a clamping block is arranged below the limiting rod, the limiting rod is located at the front end of the connecting shaft, and the baffle is connected with the clamping block. A rotating shaft is connected to the lower portion of the baffle, the baffle is located on the right side of the limiting rod, a monitoring mechanism is fixed to the upper portion of the side plate, and a conveying belt is installed in the base. Through the arrangement of the monitoring mechanism, the camera can shoot the surroundings, so that the vehicle body can achieve artificial intelligence vision, surrounding road obstacles are found through the artificial intelligence vision, use is convenient, the camera can be driven to rotate through work of the swing air cylinder, the shooting angle of the camera is increased, and the safety of the vehicle is improved. Meanwhile, through the arrangement of the left camera and the right camera, the vehicle body can conduct all-directional shooting.

column2: LIVESTOCK BODY RECOGNITION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND USE METHOD
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of livestock recognition, and particularly relates to a livestock body recognition system based on artificial intelligence and a using method, the livestock body recognition system comprises an image acquisition module and a model feature extraction, comparison and database building module, the image acquisition module is connected with the model feature extraction, comparison and database building module, the image acquisition module comprises a photographing program and related equipment, and pictures acquired by the image acquisition module are RGB diagrams. Livestock bodies are recognized through the artificial intelligence technology, contact is avoided, the system is simple and easy to use, the livestock recognition efficiency, recognition accuracy and recognition effectiveness are improved, the system is not in contact with livestock, the unique electronic identity ID of the livestock can be established by shooting one RGB image or several RGB images without contact, that is, objects such as electronic ear tags and the like are not needed, contact between people and the livestock is avoided, the possible cross infection problem is also avoided, and the livestock does not need to be moved for measurement.

column2: INTELLIGENT ROBOT BALL PICKING MACHINE
column4: The utility model discloses an intelligent robot ball picking machine, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. According to the intelligent robot ball picking machine, a photovoltaic panel is fixedly installed on the outer surface of a traction trolley, a storage battery is fixedly installed in the traction trolley, an integrated mainboard is fixedly installed at the top of the storage battery, a camera is fixedly installed at the top of the traction trolley, and a ball storage bag comprises walking wheels, a movable stop lever and a rotating shaft; the two sets of walking wheels are fixedly connected to the outer surfaces of the two ends of the rotating shaft in a sleeving mode correspondingly, arc-shaped grooves are formed in the outer surfaces of the walking wheels, the movable stop rods are movably clamped in the arc-shaped grooves, and springs are arranged in the arc-shaped grooves. According to the intelligent robot ball picking machine, automatic ball picking on a tennis court is achieved, and meanwhile tennis balls can conveniently enter the ball storage bags.

column2: OPTICAL DETECTION DEVICE FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DETECTION OF PCB
column4: The utility model belongs to the technical field of automatic optical detection, and discloses an optical detection device for artificial intelligence detection of PCBs, which comprises a conveying mechanism, the conveying mechanism comprises a transmission platform and a PCB bracket, the PCB bracket is mounted on the transmission platform, and the transmission platform is used for conveying PCBs on the PCB bracket to move; and the positioning mechanism comprises fixed frames which are symmetrically connected to the two ends of the PCB bracket, a screw rod, screw sleeves which are symmetrically arranged at the two ends of the screw rod in a sleeving manner, a movable rod, a movable block, a clamping plate and a driving motor, and through the cooperation of the screw rod, the screw sleeves, the movable rod, the movable block, the clamping plate and other structures, the clamping plate can move on the PCB bracket and lock a workpiece; therefore, the workpiece can be prevented from shaking and vibrating, the shooting definition is greatly improved, the locking state can be quickly released after detection, operation is simple, quick and efficient, the workpiece is not prone to being damaged, and the safety coefficient is high.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR DETERMINING OBJECT ATTRIBUTE PARAMETERS, TERMINAL EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a method and a device for determining object attribute parameters, terminal equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that if it is detected that the terminal equipment is in a target running state and receives an object selection instruction, a target comment text for a target object is obtained according to an analysis result of the object selection instruction, so that when the terminal equipment is in the target running state and receives the object selection instruction, the initial condition of the target object is quickly known through the target comment text, and then sentiment classification processing is performed on the target comment text to obtain the sentiment classification result of the target comment text, so that the sentiment tendency of a reviewer to the target object is known, and then the specified attribute parameters of the target object are determined according to the sentiment classification result. Therefore, the condition of the target object is known based on the specified attribute parameters, that is, the condition of the target object can be well obtained and displayed through the scheme provided by the invention.

column2: TRANSPORTATION DEVICE AND COMBINED TRANSPORTATION DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a transportation device and a combined transportation device, and belongs to the technical field of machine. The transportation device comprises an adjuster, an adapter, a supporting part and at least two movement devices, and the adjuster is connected with the adapter and the supporting part; the adjuster is in running fit with the adapter to adjust the relative position between the adapter and the supporting part, and the at least two movement devices are arranged at the two ends of the supporting part respectively. Synchronous position adjustment of the at least two movement devices can be achieved through one-time adjustment operation, operation is easy and convenient, the operation time in the transfer process is saved, and the transportation device is small in size, wide in application range, capable of being matched with different adapter plates through adapters and suitable for transfer of equipment of different specifications and different weights.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SECURITY AND PROTECTION MONITORING EQUIPMENT FOR BUILDING INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses intelligent artificial intelligence security and protection monitoring equipment for building intelligence, and the equipment comprises: a camera body which can automatically rotate to a required shooting position according to the change of sound and environment; a support which is connected to the camera body, wherein a fixed seat is arranged between the support and a wall surface, and the fixed seat is fixed at one end of the support; and an auxiliary mechanism which is installed on one side of the fixed seat, can be supported on the wall surface, and supports part of gravity of the camera on the wall surface, so that the fixed seat is kept relatively stable. The auxiliary mechanism can balance part of the gravity of the camera, an installer can install the camera with one hand, then installation of the installer is facilitated, the danger of the installer in the installation process is reduced; after installation is completed, the protection mechanism can protect the installation position, so that the corrosion possibility of the installation position is reduced, and follow-up maintenance or replacement of the camera is facilitated.

column2: NETWORK THREAT EARLY WARNING AND MONITORING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to a network threat early warning and monitoring system based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises: a network switching working machine which serves as a data network switching relay, is provided with a firewall and antivirus software, carries out the data exchange with an extranet device through an extranet switch, and is used for monitoring and blocking the input of an extranet threat and the reading or output of intranet data by the extranet threat; the monitoring machine that is used for monitoring the network switching working machine and monitoring downloading data and output data of the external network. When the data downloaded by the extranet comprises a set data segment, the data uploaded by the intranet comprises set data, and the data downloaded or uploaded is greater than a set amount or a set rule is triggered, the power supply of the network switching working machine is forcibly cut off by the monitoring machine; the invention is reasonable in design, compact in structure and convenient to use.

column2: PROGRAM MAINTENANCE METHOD, DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of Internet of Things and the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a program maintenance method, a device, equipment and a storage medium.
