The method comprises the following steps: receiving a service starting instruction of a parent terminal; starting a sub-process and a service program in the sub-process based on the service starting instruction; monitoring the running state of the service program in real time through the sub-process; and when the sub-process detects that the running state of the service program is abnormal, the sub-process restarts the service program according to configuration information by collecting the configuration information of the service program. The program maintenance processing efficiency is improved.

column2: TARGET TRACKING METHOD AND TARGET TRACKING DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to a computer image processing technology in the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a target tracking method which is applied to target tracking in a video and can reduce tracking errors caused by target shielding. The method comprises the steps that a video for shooting a target object is input into a pre-trained neural network model, motion pipelines of the target object are acquired, the motion pipelines are connected, a tracking trajectory of the target object is acquired, and the tracking trajectory comprises position information of the target in each video frame of the first video.

column2: ARTIFICAL INTELLIGENCE BASED CHATBOT FOR DIGITALLY ASSISTING A PATIENT
column4: A chatbot (100) for digitally assisting a patient (204) by simulating a conversation related to healthcare is disclosed in the present invention. The chatbot (100) includes an artificial intelligence engine (106) which incorporates an artificial intelligence mechanism to identify a relevant diagnose, yoga asana/posture, and a home remedy to the patient by learning the patient's past medical history, current illness symptoms. The artificial intelligence engine (106) includes an input data module (108), a data training module (110), a data mapping module (112), and a recommendation module (114). The recommended diagnose is based on the patient's proven medical data set, and/or based on current illness symptoms. Figure 4 is selected.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND RELATED PRODUCT
column4: Provided are a data processing method and a processing apparatus. The data processing method comprises: a general-purpose processor generates a binary instruction according to the device information of an end-side artificial intelligence processor, and generates an artificial intelligence learning task according to the binary instruction; the general-purpose processor transmits the artificial intelligence learning task to a cloud-side artificial intelligence processor to be run; the general-purpose processor receives a running result corresponding to the artificial intelligence learning task; the general-purpose processor determines an offline running file according to the running result, wherein the offline running file is generated according to the device information of the corresponding end-side artificial intelligence processor and the binary instruction when the running result meets a preset requirement. The present invention can realize debugging between an artificial intelligence algorithm model and the artificial intelligence processor in advance.

column2: STORAGE YARD ANTI-COLLISION SYSTEM BASED ON THREE-DIMENSIONAL VISION
column4: The utility model belongs to the field of artificial intelligence algorithms, particularly relates to a storage yard anti-collision system based on three-dimensional vision, and aims to solve the problems that the conventional storage yard anti-collision system independently uses laser radars, a single laser radar has a larger visual angle blind area, and a plurality of expensive laser radars are higher in cost, so that the cost and the efficiency cannot be considered at the same time. According to the technical scheme, the system comprises two camera arrays, industrial control equipment, a gantry crane and an artificial intelligence controller, the camera arrays are arranged at the top of the gantry crane, an electrical room is arranged in the gantry crane, the industrial control equipment is installed in the electrical room, and the artificial intelligence controller is connected with the two camera arrays. According to the utility model, the digital camera is used for shooting different-angle pictures of the storage yard below the yard crane or the quay crane, and then an electronic virtual map of the whole lower storage yard is generated by using a multi-view three-dimensional reconstruction algorithm and an artificial intelligence algorithm, so that better protection can be provided for the dislocation of the containers close to the storage positions, and the cost performance is better.

column2: TENSOR ATTENTION-BASED SMALL SAMPLE CLASSIFICATION METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR SMALL AND MEDIUM-SIZED ENTERPRISES
column4: The invention discloses a tensor attention-based small sample classification method and system for small and medium-sized enterprises, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that a sample set is divided into a support set and a query set, and images are represented by tensors; the support set and the query set are input to a classification model, the classification model comprises a neural network skeleton and a tensor attention module which are connected in series, and the tensor attention module is used for performing position and space fusion on the data features to obtain tensor self-attention features; and similarity calculation is performed on the support set prototype feature tensor and the query set self-attention feature tensor, the loss is calculated and updated, and the category-unknown small and medium-sized enterprise monitoring image are converted into tensor data which are input into the fine-tuned model for prediction. According to the method, a tensor attention mechanism is introduced, and a traditional attention module is expanded to a tensor space for maintaining a potential association relationship between data; besides, the extracted superficial layer features are input into a tensor attention module, so that fusion of data positions and spaces is realized, and the accuracy of small sample image classification is improved.

column2: ONLINE PROBLEM SOLVING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly discloses an online problem solving method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the online problem solving method comprises the steps of obtaining first data according to error reporting information of an online problem, wherein the first data is used for identifying data of operation of corresponding online personnel on the system after the system reports an error; performing feature extraction on the first data according to the data type of the first data to obtain key feature information of the first data; matching a solution according to the key feature information; displaying the solution to a user, and receiving feedback information of the user; according to the feedback information and the solution, matching at least one script combination in a preset script library to form a solution script; and running the solving script to solve the online problem.

column2: INTELLIGENCE-BASED IMAGE RECOGNITION DEVICE AND IMAGE RECOGNITION METHOD
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of image recognition, and discloses an artificial intelligence-based image recognition device which comprises a vehicle body and is characterized in that a GPS positioner and an image recognition mechanism are fixedly mounted at the top of the vehicle body, and two transmission shafts are movably mounted in the vehicle body; a power box, a CPU control board, a WIFI control board, an infrared test board, a driving box and an obstacle detector are fixedly installed in the vehicle body. According to the intelligence-based image recognition device and the image recognition method, through an image recognition mechanism, when a limiting wheel rotates, an insertion block is pushed to enter a limiting groove to fix the position of an adjusting plate, Meanwhile, a camera also has the steering and angle adjusting functions, so that the effects of positioning and keeping the shooting height are achieved; the shooting angle of the image shooting recognition device is achieved through a telescopic mechanism, shooting can be completed more completely, artificial intelligence automatic control is adopted, and shooting, generation and recognition work of images can be rapidly completed.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE POSTOPERATIVE PAIN PREDICTION MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence postoperative pain prediction management system, relates to the technical field of medical auxiliary instruments, solves the problems of large workload of medical staff and low synchronization rate in the current postoperative pain management work, and adopts the technical scheme that the artificial intelligence postoperative pain prediction management system comprises an inverted L-shaped plumbing arm bracket, a linear motor is fixedly installed on one side of the upper end of the plumbing arm support, a connecting sliding block is arranged on the other side of the upper end of the plumbing arm support, a camera shooting table is fixedly installed at the lower end of the connecting sliding block, a movable rod is fixedly installed between the connecting sliding block and the output end of the linear motor, and a sliding groove matched with the camera shooting table is formed in the upper end of the plumbing arm support. An operation panel is fixedly mounted on the inner wall of the lower end of the plumbing arm bracket; the working intensity of medical staff is relieved, the medical staff can be synchronized with the pain time of a postoperative patient, the real-time performance is high, and therefore the postoperative rehabilitation efficiency can be improved.

column2: "A CROP HEALTH MONITORING SYSTEM USING MACHINE LEARNING."
column4: The crop health monitoring system using machine learning relates to the crop health monitoring system. More particularly present invention relates to the crop health monitoring system using artificial intelligence also to the detection of modifications in crop fitness condition within an agricultural area , More in particular, this description pertains to using remotely-sensed photo records for automated detection of areas of change within the subject. And also notifying by producing a coloration-coded map of the a geographic area comprising a plurality of map factors, in which each map detail of the plurality corresponds to a geographic sub-area of the geographic area, in which each map detail is associated with a coloration indicative of a difference among the real geographic area overall performance price exchange and an predicted geographic region overall performance fee alternate for the respective geographic sub-region and showing the colour-coded map on a user device associated with the consumer.

column2: INTERNET-BASED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TRAFFIC CONTROL SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of traffic control, and particularly discloses an Internet-based artificial intelligence traffic control system. TheInternet-based artificial intelligence traffic control system comprises: a road condition end which is used for generating a road condition information table according to the number of heat sources of different heat source types and vehicle information; sub-control ends which are used for acquiring the road condition information table generated by the road condition end and determining the smoothness of the road section; a general control end which is used for receiving a passing request sent by a user and determining a passing scheme according to the passing request, obtaining the fluency of each road section is obtained according to the sub-control end, calculating the fluency of the passing schemes according to the fluency of each road section, and sorting the passing schemes according to the fluency. According to the invention, the sub-control ends are additionally arranged between the road condition end and the general control end, so that the working pressure of the general control end is greatly shared, the general control end and the road condition end are connected more closely, an architecture foundation is established for providing more perfect traffic control service, and the system is convenient to popularize and use.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DATA ACQUISITION EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses artificial intelligence data acquisition equipment which comprises a fixed base, universal wheels, a fixed base, a support column, a lifting structure, an image acquisition structure and a cable fixing structure. The universal wheels are fixedly mounted at four corners of the bottom surface of the fixed base, and the fixed base is fixedly connected to the upper surface of the fixed base. The upper surface of the fixed base is rotatably connected with a rotating seat, the upper surface of the rotating seat is fixedly connected with a supporting column, a lifting structure is installed in an inner cavity of the supporting column, a lifting sliding plate is slidably arranged on the side wall of the supporting column, the image acquisition structure is fixedly installed on the side wall of the lifting sliding plate, and the cable fixing structure is fixedly installed on the side wall of the supporting column. According to the artificial intelligence data acquisition equipment, through the image acquisition structure, outdoor images can be flexibly shot and acquired, the shooting and acquisition effect is flexible, the shooting and acquisition range is wide, and the artificial intelligence data acquisition equipment is suitable for popularization and application.

column2: AN AUTOMATIC CLIMBING MACHINE FOR TREES AND POLES OF MULTI-PROFILE AND VARIABLE DIMENSIONS
column4: The present invention is the automatic climbing machine for Trees and Poles of Multi-Profile and Variable Dimensions. It is equipped with a novel combination of mechanisms and technology to climb different trees and different poles. The main three mechanisms in the climbing machine are the Omni-climbing mechanism (Rubber grip wheels are mounted along with different actuators), spring connected wheel arm climbing mechanism (double frustum shaped wheels are mounted on wheel arm), and the external steering mechanism. All three mechanisms are mounted on the mainframe. The three mechanisms are controlled by the machine controller with inputs from sensors, actuators, and camera during automatic mode and inputs from sensors, actuators, camera, and user's remote-control commands during the semi-automatic mode. The main controller is also programmed with machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence. The three mechanisms and their synergistic, co-ordinated and combinational working enable the machine to climb any kind of 3-axis (X, Y, and Z) variable tree trunk profile or pole profile, variable tree trunk diameter or pole diameter, and tree trunk or pole ??having surface abnormalities like patch holes and ring scars. A robotic arm having the required degree of freedom with a suitable end effector and sensors is mounted on the machine to perform desired operations upon reaching the top of a tree or pole. The desired operations to be performed on reaching the top may be harvesting, pesticide spraying, tree pruning, washing, cleaning, fixing, surveillance, etc based on the use case. Multiple robotic arms can also be mounted if needed for a use case. The machine is powered by a battery mounted on it.

column2: NEURAL NETWORK DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND APPARATUS
column4: Disclosed are a neural network data processing method and apparatus, relating to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: according to a data volume of input data, a first feature of an internal memory inside a chip for running a neural network, and a second feature of a plurality of layers in the neural network, dynamically segmenting the input data, so as to set different batch sizes for the layers in the neural network. By means of setting a reasonable batch size for each layer in a neural network, an internal memory can be fully used to store interlayer data of the neural network during a neural network reasoning process, such that the utilization rate of the internal memory is improved, and the computing efficiency of hardware for running the neural network is ensured.

column2: AUTONOMOUS ACTIVITY MONITORING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: A system for automatically monitoring activity on an athletic activity area is provided. The network device includes artificial intelligence configured to automatically identify objects and gestures from video received from cameras disposed at the activity area. The artificial intelligence automatically edits the video based on objects and gestures identified from the video and generates a video file including predetermined objects and gestures. The artificial intelligence may generate a video including each trial completed by a particular athlete and may provide the video automatically to the player or a third party.

column2: FOOT REHABILITATION EXERCISE EQUIPMENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of medical equipment, and particularly relates to the field of foot rehabilitation exercise equipment based on artificial intelligence. The foot rehabilitation exercise equipment comprises a base, a bottom plate and a damping rotating shaft I, wherein a massage ball and a servo motor are mounted on the left side of the base, a gear I and a gear II are mounted at the left end of the servo motor, and a lead screw is mounted at the axis of the gear II; a foot sleeve I is connected to the upper part of the lead screw, a foot sleeve II is connected to the right side of the foot sleeve I, a limiting block and a spring I are mounted on the right side of the foot sleeve II, a hydraulic cylinder II is mounted in the base, and a transverse plate and a massage roller are mounted at the upper end of the hydraulic cylinder II; and the damping rotating shaft I is mounted on the front side and the rear side of the base, a telescopic rod is mounted at the end, away from the massage roller, of the damping rotating shaft I, a mounting plate and an operation panel are connected to the upper part of the telescopic rod, a massage block is mounted on the right side of the base, a micro motor drives an extrusion roller to adjust the height of a protruding block, and the purpose of conveniently and rapidly adjusting the height of the protruding block can be achieved.

column2: VEHICLE-MOUNTED FATIGUE DRIVING DETECTION SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a vehicle-mounted fatigue driving detection system which comprises a data acquisition hardware module, an eye fixation point analysis module, a blood oxygen/heart rate and other physiological parameter analysis module, an optional facial expression analysis module and a multi-information fusion artificial intelligence fatigue driving analysis module. Wherein the data acquisition hardware module comprises one or more cameras and is used for acquiring images or spectral information of the face of a driver; the blood oxygen/heart rate and other physiological parameter analysis module detects the blood oxygen concentration change and the heart rate of the human body through the change of the ratio of a 540nm absorption peak to a 510nm reflection peak or through spectral information; the eye fixation point analysis module extracts a fixation point time sequence of a driver by using an image acquired by a camera in combination with deep learning to obtain a fixation direction and a concerned area; the multi-information fusion artificial intelligence fatigue driving analysis module fuses multi-information training, and then judges whether fatigue driving abnormity exists. The method is high in efficiency and reliability and easy and convenient to operate.

column2: FAMILY HEALTH STRATEGY GENERATION METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a family health strategy generation method, device and equipment and a storage medium, which are used for improving the accuracy of fingerprint identification and improving the accuracy of family diet recommendation and family exercise recommendation. The family health strategy generation method comprises the following steps: acquiring initial fingerprint data of a target user; obtaining target feature data according to the initial fingerprint data, obtaining family data of a target user according to the target feature data, and collecting blood pressure data of the target user through a target sphygmomanometer according to the target feature data; performing grade matching on the blood pressure data of the target user in combination with preset blood pressure grade data to generate a blood pressure grade of the target user; and generating a family target health strategy according to the blood pressure level of the target user, the family data of the target user and a pre-trained family health model. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the initial fingerprint number can be stored in a block chain.

column2: MARINE POLLUTION DIAGNOSIS AND FORECASTING SYSTEM USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention relates to a marine pollution diagnosis and forecasting system using artificial intelligence. The system includes: an unmanned ship that runs on the sea and collects and transmits seawater pollution data; a relay part that relays the data of the unmanned aerial vehicle; a marine pollution forecasting server that processes and provides the seawater pollution data received through the relay part to a terminal and provides the terminal with a result of predicting the effect of seawater pollution over time; and a learning server that receives the seawater pollution data from the marine pollution forecasting server, learns based on the data stored in a learning database, predicts the impact of seawater pollution on facilities and coasts, and provides data about the impact to the marine pollution forecasting server. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: MONITORING BALL
column4: The utility model discloses a deploy and control ball which comprises a deploy and control ball body, an infrared camera, a network management unit, a wireless communication unit, an artificial intelligence processing unit, a voice control unit, a signal control unit and a COFDM modulation unit, the infrared camera is located on one side of the deploy and control ball body, and the infrared camera is fixedly connected with the side face of the deploy and control ball body; one side of the infrared camera is provided with an on-off key, a signal indicating lamp and an SIM card placing port, and the on-off key, the signal indicating lamp and the SIM card placing port are all embedded in the side face of the deploy and control ball body. The other side of the infrared camera is provided with a charging port, an HDMI output interface and an electric quantity display screen. The deploy and control ball body can be inserted into a flow card for use, has the functions of automatic network management and automatic relay, also has millimeter-level rapid network self-healing capability, and is high in destroy resistance; and equipment such as a high-definition conference camera, an unmanned aerial vehicle, a high-definition network camera, a remote control network camera holder and the like can be butted.

column2: MATERIAL PUMPING MECHANISM FOR BEVERAGE DISPENSER
column4: The utility model provides a material pumping mechanism for a beverage dispenser, and belongs to the technical field of beverage dispensers. Comprising a fixed base, the fixed base is fixedly provided with a material pumping cavity, the material pumping cavity is provided with a material pumping closed cavity, a rotating shaft is in running fit in the material pumping closed cavity, a plurality of impellers are fixedly arranged on the rotating shaft, the material pumping cavity is fixedly connected with a sealing cover with an annular sealing gasket, and the material pumping cavity is fixedly provided with a material pumping inlet and a material pumping outlet. The material pumping inlet and the material pumping outlet are fixedly connected with a first limiting connecting pipe and a second limiting connecting pipe correspondingly. The sealing cover with the annular sealing gasket is arranged, so that the sealing cover can be conveniently detached to clean the sanitation of the closed material pumping chamber while the closed environment in the closed material pumping chamber is conveniently guaranteed, and the sealing performance of the closed material pumping chamber is improved through the annular sealing gasket; the first limiting connecting pipe and the second limiting connecting pipe are arranged, so that the situation that ingredients are leaked in the material pumping process possibly due to the fact that the positions where other pipelines are directly connected with the material pumping inlet and the material pumping outlet are unstable is avoided.

column2: RESIDUAL AVAILABLE TIME LENGTH PREDICTION METHOD AND DEVICE OF IMAGE ACQUISITION DEVICE, AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a residual available time length prediction method and device of an image acquisition device, and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of equipment detection. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring running state information of a target image acquisition device in at least one dimension; inputting the operation state information of each dimension into an available time length prediction model trained through an artificial intelligence technology, and obtaining an influence factor of the target image acquisition device in the corresponding dimension, wherein the influence factor is output by the available time length prediction model; and according to the influence factor of the target image acquisition device in each dimension, obtaining the remaining available duration of the target image acquisition device. According to the embodiment of the invention, the high-accuracy residual available duration of the image acquisition device can be obtained, and the efficiency of training the available duration prediction model is higher than that of related technologies.

column2: FIRE ALARM DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention is applicable to the technical field of fire-fighting alarms, and provides a fire-fighting alarm device based on artificial intelligence, comprising: a drainage mechanism; a filtering mechanism which is arranged in the shell, and further comprises a cleaning assembly that is used for cleaning the bowl-shaped groove of the filtering mechanism; a reminding mechanism, wherein when the filtering mechanism is blocked, the drainage mechanism and the reminding mechanism are conducted, and when the airflow flows in the reminding mechanism, a whistle included in the reminding mechanism makes a sound, and the reminding mechanism generates a cleaning signal and sends the cleaning signal to the intelligent processor; and a smoke sensor, an intelligent processor and a camera. The fire alarm device provided by the embodiment of the invention not only can realize an intelligent monitoring fire alarm effect, but also can solve the problems that smoke entering is influenced and the sensitivity of the smoke alarm is reduced due to the fact that the device is attached to a smoke groove of the smoke alarm and the smoke groove is blocked in the long-term installation and monitoring of the smoke alarm.

column2: WHOLE BODY EXERCISE EVALUATION SYSTEM BASED ON AI ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a whole body exercise assessment system based on AI artificial intelligence. The system comprises an athlete capture module, AI artificial intelligence and a monitoring platform; the athlete capture module is attached to the body force application position and the rotating part of an athlete, and records the vibration of a muscle group, the muscle expansion generated by muscle force application and the muscle force application movement data; meanwhile, the capture system is used for recording movement tracks of continuous behaviors of the athletes, recording and uploading movement scores of the athletes to the monitoring platform, a database is established in the monitoring platform, body data of the athletes are recorded and analyzed through AI artificial intelligence, and whole-body movement is evaluated; and the AI artificial intelligence is used for reversely deducing the muscle state of the sportsman according to the sportsman whole-body movement database and the existing whole-body movement data of the sportsman for evaluation, specific display and exercise amount evaluation of exercise muscle groups of whole-body movement actions are facilitated, and meanwhile the muscle state of the sportsman can be effectively evaluated.

column2: DISINFECTION ROBOT
column4: The utility model discloses a disinfection robot, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The disinfection robot comprises a robot body, a walking mechanism and a disinfection mechanism, the walking mechanism and the disinfection mechanism are arranged on the robot body, the robot body comprises a shell and a liquid storage bin arranged in the shell, and the liquid storage bin is connected with the disinfection mechanism and used for storing disinfectant. A controller and a state monitoring assembly electrically connected with the controller are further arranged in the shell, and the controller is used for controlling operation of the disinfection robot according to feedback information of the state monitoring assembly. The state monitoring assembly is used for monitoring external obstacle information, the dosage of the disinfectant and the running state of the disinfection robot. The external environment and the self state can be obtained, so that the intelligent degree in the disinfection process is improved.

column2: MICRO-CONTROL EQUALIZING BEAM DIGITAL AUTOMATIC MAGNETIC PARTICLE FLAW DETECTOR
column4: The utility model provides a digital automatic magnetic particle flaw detector for a micro-control equalizing beam, which is designed by adopting a horizontal structure, mechanical and electrical integration, an integrated circuit and closed-loop digital control. The device is mainly composed of a rack, a liquid collecting tank, an air cylinder, a rotating shaft, a left electrode box, a longitudinal magnetizing coil, a mechanical lifting device, a right electrode box, a mechanical arm, a balance beam workpiece, a workpiece bracket, an electric control cabinet and a camera. The machine not only can perform circumferential or longitudinal independent magnetization, but also can perform circumferential and longitudinal composite magnetization, has the characteristics of high sensitivity, fast response, digitalization, omnibearing magnetization of workpieces, uniform distribution of a magnetic field, high stability, no leak detection and the like, avoids the risk of missed and misjudged, can automatically give an alarm when a fault occurs, can automatically display the position of the fault on a display screen, and is convenient to operate. The maintenance is convenient. The machine is provided with a camera shooting automatic identification system, the automation degree is high, a new field of artificial intelligence is developed for the flaw detection machine industry in China, and the running safety of the railway train is effectively guaranteed.

column2: METHOD, INTELLIGENT TERMINAL AND SYSTEM FOR SUPERVISING SWIMMING POOL
column4: The invention relates to a method, an intelligent terminal and a system for supervising a swimming pool, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence supervision. The method is suitable for a flexible business time or fixed period management mode of swimming pool management, and comprises the following steps: S1, obviously distinguishing is performed on a business state and a non-business state of a pool; s2, the intelligent terminal receives the configuration information, wherein the intelligent terminal supports different types of hardware interfaces and communication protocols; s3, the intelligent terminal collects monitoring data and uploads the monitoring data to a remote server; and S4, the intelligent terminal receives feedback information of the user, evaluates the swimming pool according to a predetermined criterion, outputs and displays the evaluation result, and uploads the evaluation result. The intelligent terminal supports various business time settings and various hardware interfaces of the venue, supports a self-defined acquisition protocol, realizes adaptation with various monitoring devices, completes acquisition of online monitoring data and evaluation of the swimming venue, uploads the data to a remote server in real time, is accurate and timely in data reporting and matching, can be quickly butted with a monitoring system, supervision efficiency is improved, and manpower and material resources are saved.

column2: AN AUTOMATIC CLIMBING MACHINE FOR TREES AND POLES OF MULTI-PROFILE AND VARIABLE DIMENSIONS
column4: The present invention is the automatic climbing machine for Trees and Poles of Multi-Profile and Variable Dimensions. It is equipped with a novel combination of mechanisms and technology to climb different trees and different poles. The main three mechanisms in the climbing machine are the Omni-climbing mechanism (Rubber grip wheels are mounted along with different actuators), spring connected wheel arm climbing mechanism (double frustum shaped wheels are mounted on wheel arm), and the external steering mechanism. All three mechanisms are mounted on the mainframe. The three mechanisms are controlled by the machine controller with inputs from sensors, actuators, and camera during automatic mode and inputs from sensors, actuators, camera, and user?™s remote-control commands during the semi-automatic mode. The main controller is also programmed with machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence. The three mechanisms and their synergistic, co-ordinated and combinational working enable the machine to climb any kind of 3-axis (X, Y, and Z) variable tree trunk profile or pole profile, variable tree trunk diameter or pole diameter, and tree trunk or pole ??having surface abnormalities like patch holes and ring scars. A robotic arm having the required degree of freedom with a suitable end effector and sensors is mounted on the machine to perform desired operations upon reaching the top of a tree or pole. The desired operations to be performed on reaching the top may be harvesting, pesticide spraying, tree pruning, washing, cleaning, fixing, surveillance, etc based on the use case. Multiple robotic arms can also be mounted if needed for a use case. The machine is powered by a battery mounted on it.Reference: Fig 23

column2: ANTI-SMUGGLING SUPERVISION METHOD FOR TAX-EXEMPTION COMMODITIES
column4: The invention provides an anti-smuggling supervision method for off-island tax-exemption commodities, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the microscopic shooting of a collection point, enabling the collected microscopic texture information or/and microscopic sawtooth information to be associated with a traceability code, and correspondingly storing and recording the information in a database of an identity information reverse checking system of a purchasing person; when the traceability code on the tax-exempt commodity is manually cleared on purpose, the supervisor photographing the position acquisition point with the prominent individual characteristics in a microscopic manner, and uploading the obtained microscopic texture information or/and microscopic sawtooth information to a buyer identity information reverse checking system; and finding out the traceability code corresponding to the fingerprint file with the highest matching degree, and then finding out the identity information of the purchaser corresponding to the fingerprint file with the highest matching degree. The anti-clearing code is further arranged, the anti-clearing code which is difficult to be cleared by people on purpose can be loaded on the off-island tax-exempt commodity on the premise that the commodity package is not disassembled, and the unexpected application technical problem in the traceability industry is solved.

column2: REVERSE CHARGING MOBILE TERMINAL SYSTEM AND OPERATION METHOD
column4: The invention relates to a reverse charging mobile terminal system and an operation method. According to the reverse charging mobile terminal system and the operation method, the time-task two-dimensional data association attributes of charging equipment and charged equipment are comprehensively considered through an artificial intelligence technology based on a deep neural network; it can be intelligently and highly precisely determined that a reverse charging function is to be turned on or turned off or reverse charging power is to be increased or reduced, so that the charging equipment can be ensured to have a good running state and running performance when the reverse charging is turned on.

column2: OFFICE EQUIPMENT STATE DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses an office equipment state detection method and device based on artificial intelligence and electronic equipment. In the method, first state operation data of to-be-detected office equipment is acquired according to a state operation data detection instruction, a running track curve graph is determined from acquired equipment running log records, and state detection is performed on the to-be-detected office equipment one by one according to a marked equipment running trend list. Therefore, a technician does not need to detect each office device regularly, and the working time of the technician can be reduced.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED EXERCISE INTENSITY DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides an artificial intelligence-based exercise intensity detection method and device, equipment and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining sole pressure data of a to-be-detected user sent by an intelligent shoe; acquiring output data of a gyroscope, and determining angular motion parameters of the two feet of the to-be-detected user according to the output data of the gyroscope; according to the pressure data and the angular motion parameter, determining a movement parameter of the to-be-detected user; determining motion data of the to-be-detected user according to the movement parameters; and determining a motion score of the to-be-detected user according to the motion data, and determining the motion intensity of the to-be-detected user based on the motion score. The exercise intensity of the to-be-detected user can be accurately detected, and the use experience of the to-be-detected user is greatly improved. The invention further relates to a block chain technology. The sole pressure data and the exercise intensity can be stored in a block chain.

column2: TO-BE-DIAGNOSED IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence and digital medical treatment, and provides a to-be-diagnosed image processing method, device and equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps: obtaining a shot original to-be-diagnosed image, calculating an illumination component image of the original to-be-diagnosed image, and then correcting the illumination component image to obtain a corrected to-be-diagnosed image. As the original to-be-diagnosed image is subjected to illumination correction, the illumination information of the original to-be-diagnosed image is corrected to be more uniform, and finally the image meeting the diagnosis requirement is obtained, the problem that the image quality is uneven due to different shooting conditions can be solved, meanwhile, the influence of light and shadow conditions, camera hardware and operation skills on diagnosis is reduced, and the illumination is corrected to be more uniform, so that the data processing accuracy and the processing efficiency can be improved.

column2: INSPECTION ROBOT BASED ON EDGE CALCULATION
column4: The invention discloses an inspection robot based on edge calculation. The inspection robot based on edge calculation comprises an equipment main body, a base is mounted in the middle of the top end of the equipment body, exhaust outlets are formed in the two sides of the base, a vertical plate is mounted at the top end of the base, a motor base is mounted at the top end of the vertical plate, rotating shafts are mounted at the two ends of the top side of the motor base, movable plates are mounted at the top ends of the rotating shafts, opening stopping plates are mounted at the top ends of the movable plates, micro motors are arranged on the two sides of the bottom ends of the movable plates, and air outlets are formed in the surfaces of the opening stopping plates. According to the inspection robot based on edge calculation, by mounting the base part on the equipment body, monitored data, environment temperature and other influences can be played on the basis of a display screen in the folded state; unfolding is mainly performed in two steps according to the movable plates and a compression inflatable cushion in the unfolded state; a shooting device and a wireless transmission module part can be shielded after unfolding; and therefore, the influence of an external severe environment on a monitoring result is reduced while the temperature of the inner side is kept.

column2: REAL TIME LOCAL FILTERING OF ON-SCREEN IMAGES
column4: The present invention relates to a system and method for detecting inappropriate content on a device and filtering content on a variety of media. Inappropriate content is detected by sampling a display of the device to produce a sample, preprocessing the sample using a local processor and locally stored software to determine if the sample is a likely candidate to include objectionable content, and if found to be a likely candidate, analyzing the sample using an artificial intelligence routine running on said local processor;

column2: ALPHA SCOUT STAR SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: A social media platform for recruiting student-athletes enables student-athletes of any age to create detailed profiles, upload videos and photos, and post information to generate recruiting interest. Coaches, scouts, recruiters, and the like can also create profiles on the platform so they can recruit student-athletes. Artificial intelligence enables coaches and scouts to build prototypical student-athlete profiles and receive notifications when a student-athlete's profile matches a prototypical profile. The coach can then provide a rating for the ?œmatch??and provide feedback based on how closely related the prototypical profile and student-athlete profiles are. The Artificial intelligence receives the rating input with feedback and can learn to identify better matches in the future.

column2: SMART GOLF CART MANAGEMENT SYSTEM THAT TRACKS LOCATION OF PLAYER'S GOLF BALL IN GOLF COURSE, MEASURES REMAINING DISTANCE TO LOCATION OF HOLE CUP, AND PROVIDES INFORMATION BY VOICE TO PLAYER THROUGH AI
column4: The present invention relates to a smart golf cart management system that tracks the location of a player's golf ball in a golf course, measures the remaining distance to the location of the hole cup, and provides the information by voice to the player through artificial intelligence. The smart golf cart management system calculates carry distance information from a current position of a golfer to the location of the golfer's golf ball, analyzes the golfer's swing motion information, and coaches the golfer through video information, thereby enabling the golfer to correct his/her poor golf swing posture. According to the present invention, carry distance information of a golf ball is calculated and informed, a golfer's swing motion information is analyzed, and the golfer can be coached through video information so as to correct his/her poor golf swing posture. Therefore, the present invention is effective in improving a user's golf skills and providing greater fun. The smart golf cart management system of the present invention comprises: a golf ball including a global positioning system (GPS) receiver; a golf cart consisting of a camera unit, a GPS signal processing unit, and a cart control unit; and a golf course server consisting of a golf swing analysis database unit and a server control unit. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: MODEL PROTECTION METHOD, DEVICE, EQUIPMENT, SYSTEM AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a model protection method, relates to the field of computers, in particular to the field of artificial intelligence, and can be used for application scenes such as AI model protection. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method includes forming a WASM file, wherein the WASM file is used for providing a running environment for a target model, the WASM file comprises a corresponding model reasoning algorithm and a security verification algorithm, and the security verification algorithm protects the target model by executing at least one of the following security verification operations: verifying a host environment; verifying the integrity of the WASM file; verifying the integrity of a model file, wherein the model file is generated corresponding to an original model file of the target model; in the model reasoning process, performing overtime verification on the specified reasoning process; in the model reasoning process, performing overtime verification on the whole reasoning process.

column2: AUTOMOBILE INTELLIGENT BRAKING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an automobile intelligent braking method and system based on artificial intelligence. Automobile running data are obtained, an initial running label set in the automobile running data is mined, the initial running label set is loaded to a preset mining analysis network, so that a first running condition in the initial running label set is used, and a running condition of a non-example running theme is used as a second running condition; the driving conditions of the driving topics are optimized, the driving topics with the optimized driving conditions conforming to the preset driving conditions are determined as the driving topics with prompt signals, mining analysis results of multiple groups of driving labels are optimized, and prompt results of the prompt signals are determined according to quantitative optimization processing results. Therefore, the accuracy and the credibility of the analysis result of the prompt signal can be improved; the initial prompt signal analysis condition can be more accurately generated based on the driving theme with all the prompt signals.

column2: MOTION DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON COMPUTER VISION, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and provides a motion data processing method and device based on computer vision, equipment and a medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first video, wherein the first video comprises behavior actions of a human body for exercise training; generating continuous multi-frame first images according to the first video, and performing feature extraction on the continuous multi-frame first images to obtain a first feature sequence; establishing a first motion model according to the first feature sequence; comparing the first motion model with a preset second motion model to identify motion actions contained in the first motion model, wherein the second motion model comprises at least one motion action; determining an action recognition rate of the first video according to the recognized motion action. According to the motion data processing method based on computer vision, feature extraction and description are directly performed on the video, so that behavior actions of a human body are recognized more visually, and the accuracy of action recognition is improved.

column2: ANIMATION VIDEO PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON SKELETON MIGRATION, AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and provides an animation video processing method and device based on skeleton migration, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: cutting an initial video, and obtaining an initial image video and an initial background video; extracting an image skeleton from the initial image video to obtain a skeleton video stream, and analyzing the skeleton video stream to obtain a conversion action instruction; loading the conversion action instruction into the target cartoon image to obtain an image action video corresponding to the target cartoon image; converting the initial audio information into an initial text, and modifying the initial text to obtain a target text; generating target audio information according to the preset voice packet and the target text; and fusing the target audio information, the image action video and the initial background video to obtain a target video. According to the method, the production cost of the animation video can be reduced, the video production efficiency is improved, and the rapid development of a smart city is promoted.

column2: DATA-DRIVEN APPROACHES FOR CYBER DEFENSE OF BATTERY ENERGY STORAGE SYSTEMS
column4: An essential component of a contemporary power system, the battery energy storage system (BESS), provides the smooth integration of renewable energy sources (RES) into the grid. A BESS is subject to various cyber-attacks that may interfere with its correct functioning, which can have a severe effect on both the BESS and the electric grid. The probable failure of a BESS might result in financial losses and physical harm to the system's components. A cyber-defense plan is required to assure cyber-secure and dependable BESS operation in either the grid-connected or islanded modes of the BESS's operation. This proposed invention includes state-of-the-art attack detection and mitigation methods for various BESS applications, with a particular emphasis on machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI)-based techniques. Aside from that, the methodologies for creating and running a cyber-secure BESS at the cutting edge of the technology are provided.

column2: WORKING STATE SWITCHING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT, STORAGE MEDIUM AND PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The invention provides a working state switching method and device, electronic equipment, a computer readable storage medium and a computer program product, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as intelligent equipment control, image recognition and linkage control. A specific embodiment of the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a face image of a user by using a shooting assembly arranged on the intelligent mirror; in response to the collected target face image facing the mirror surface and lasting for more than a first preset duration, performing reflection detection on the target face image by using a preset reflection feature detector; and switching from a screen-off standby state to an activated state in response to determining that the target face image does not have the reflective feature through the reflective feature detector. According to the embodiment, whether mirror reflection exists or not is confirmed by introducing the reflective feature detector, the judgment accuracy is improved as much as possible, and unnecessary energy consumption caused by switching to the activated state by mistake is reduced.

column2: DRIVING ASSISTANCE SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of auxiliary driving, and particularly relates to a driving assistance system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a processor, and the left end of the processor is connected with a vehicle self-monitoring module, a vehicle driving safety monitoring module, a vehicle interior personnel monitoring module and an artificial intelligence module. The right end of the processor is connected with a display module, a voice module and an alarm module, the vehicle self-monitoring module is mainly used for checking itself before a vehicle runs and when a power supply is switched on. In the running process of the vehicle, the vehicle running safety monitoring module is mainly used for detecting factors possibly influencing vehicle safety, and the vehicle interior personnel monitoring module is mainly used for monitoring the state of personnel in the vehicle in the driving process, so that the artificial intelligence driving assistance system is more comprehensive, the safety is greatly improved, and danger of a driver in the driving process is avoided.

column2: BELT DEVIATION AND ABNORMAL OPERATION STATE MONITORING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a belt deviation and abnormal operation state monitoring method based on an artificial intelligence technology, and the method comprises the steps: dividing a recognition target in an image according to a plurality of thresholds according to different gray information contained in different objects, and extracting more gray features reflecting the information of the objects through a multi-threshold image segmentation method. The possibility is provided for further mining the association rules between various target objects in the picture and the abnormal running state of the belt and further performing pattern recognition in the next step. According to the method, the pixel points of the monitoring image are recognized in real time, the recognition grid is established, in the belt deviation monitoring stage, the device does not need any training sample, and the real-time performance of belt deviation monitoring is achieved; in the mode recognition stage of the abnormal running state of the belt, a classification model is constructed by utilizing the incidence relation between gray information of a target object and the running state of the belt, so that classification and recognition of the abnormal running state of the belt based on multiple threshold values are realized.

column2: FITNESS FACILITY ANOMALY DETECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to a fitness facility anomaly detection method and system based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of fitness facility anomaly detection. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a current parameter sequence and a standard parameter sequence corresponding to a target fitness facility; classifying data in the current parameter sequence to obtain a category number and a discrete point number corresponding to the current parameter sequence; obtaining a data stability degree index of the current parameter sequence according to the category number and the discrete point number; analyzing the change of data in the current parameter sequence by using a sliding window to obtain a data change degree index of the current parameter sequence; calculating the similarity between the current parameter sequence and the standard parameter sequence to obtain a similarity index of the current parameter sequence; and obtaining an abnormal degree corresponding to the target fitness facility according to the data stability degree index, the data change degree index and the similarity index. According to the invention, the efficiency of anomaly detection can be improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EQUIPMENT WITH HIGH-DEFINITION IMAGE RECOGNITION ANALYSIS AND LANGUAGE PROCESSING FUNCTIONS
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses artificial intelligence equipment with high-definition image recognition analysis and language processing functions, which comprises a device main body frame, wherein a fixing plate is fixedly connected to the back of the device main body frame; a positioning plate is fixedly connected to the upper end of the fixing frame; an incomplete gear is rotatably connected to the front of the fixing plate; a tooth plate is engaged with the lower portion of the incomplete gear; and a shooting device is fixedly connected to the lower portion of a rotating disc and comprises a camera, voice processing equipment and a storage. According to the artificial intelligence equipment with the high-definition image recognition analysis and language processing functions, a sliding column is slidably connected to the interior of an adjusting cylinder, a first iron sheet is fixedly connected to the upper end of the sliding column, a sliding groove is formed in the front face of the sliding column, and a sliding block is slidably connected to the interior of the sliding groove formed in the sliding column; when a tooth piece moves left and right, the rotating disc is driven to rotate, and when the rotating disc rotates, the shooting device is driven to swing left and right, so that multi-angle shooting is conducted on a fire scene.

column2: FITNESS ROOM FACILITY LAYOUT OPTIMIZATION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON IMAGE PROCESSING
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a fitness room facility layout optimization method and system based on image processing. The method comprises the following steps of acquiring the device images of all fitness devices in a fitness room, and acquiring the local optimization images of the small devices according to a second target neural network, wherein the loss functions of the second target neural network comprise a first loss function, a second loss function and a third loss function; the first loss function is a similarity loss function; the second loss function is an area loss function; and the third loss function is an overlap ratio loss function; inputting the local optimization images into a trajectory prediction network for re-training; and after the second target neural network is stably converged, obtaining an overall optimization image to adjust the fitness room, so that the fitness devices are reasonably planned, the fitness paths of the fitness personnel during fitness exercises are potentially guided, and the problems of low manual guiding efficiency and idle fitness devices are effectively solved.

column2: DYNAMIC SERVICE PUBLISHING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of internet development and the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a dynamic service publishing method which comprises the following steps: receiving a service publishing request transmitted by a client, querying service data of the service publishing request, and identifying a service function of the service publishing request; calling a function component running a service function, identifying a flow relationship of the function component, creating a release node of the service release request according to the flow relationship and the function component, and constructing a release template of the service release request in the release node; loading the service data into the publishing template to generate a publishing file of the service publishing request; and uploading the release file to a server corresponding to the client so as to execute service release of the service release request through the server. In addition, the service publishing request can be a medical service publishing request. According to the invention, the dynamic release of the service can be realized, and the service release efficiency is improved.

column2: BODY HEALTH MONITORING MANAGEMENT SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a body health monitoring management system and method based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence health monitoring. The system comprises an information acquisition module, an information processing module, a pelvis simulation setting module and a muscle influence module, and the information acquisition module is used for acquiring crowd information and shooting and collecting walking postures of crowds; the information processing module is used for extracting spine feature points of part of people and obtaining the offset degree of the spine curve of part of people compared with the spine curve of normal people; the pelvis simulation setting module is used for simulating pelvic bone states of partial crowds according to the spine curves of the partial crowds, calculating pelvic inclination areas of the partial crowds and obtaining skeleton names corresponding to the pelvic inclination areas; the muscle influence module is used for analyzing whether muscles on one side of a trunk of a part of crowds are sunken towards the interior of the trunk or not according to a spine line formed by spine points of the part of crowds, and judging the influence degree of the sunken muscles on normal walking of the crowds.

column2: FOURIER PTYCHOGRAPHY BASED EARLY DETECTION OF LUNG CANCER
column4: This project proposes a low-cost Fourier Ptychography based early detection of lung cancer as a replacement for expensive microscopes. Fourier Ptychography (FP), a simple computational microscopy technique that provides high-resolution images at a cheaper rate, reveals the innermost hidden details of cellular data and provides valuable information for medical professionals. The large mortality rate in the case of lung cancer when compared to other cancer forms is due to the unavailability of a proper early detection framework. Sputum cytology is a non-invasive technique for lung cancer detection. One of the significant problems associated with sputum cytology is the low space bandwidth product (SBP) of conventional microscopes. The traditional microscope imaging techniques can provide either high-resolution or wide field-of-view (FoV) but not both. So this project incorporates the FP technique in the conventional microscope to improve its SBP value and improve the resolution of the sputum image sample; thus, more features can be extracted from it. Artificially increasing the SBP of an imaging system by mechanical scanning methods is suboptimal, as it requires precise control over actuation, optical alignment, and motion tracking. Furthermore, the design and maintenance of complex mechanical systems are tedious as the control strategy to be used complex, making its initial and running cost comparatively higher for application in common laboratories. After applying FP technique to different specimen samples, the resolution has been enhanced 16 times and the Numerical Aperture (NA) has increased from 0.25 to 0.6, which proves that the SBP has been increased. Artificial Intelligence (AI) based model for extracting features from the reconstructed images of the sputum samples enables identifying Malignancy Associated Changes (MAC) for early detection of lung cancer.

column2: FITNESS SCHEME GENERATION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND BIG DATA
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent fitness, in particular to a fitness scheme generation method and a system based on artificial intelligence and big data. The method comprises the following steps: training a first neural network according to first training data corresponding to a fitness person and annotation data corresponding to the first training data; inputting second training data corresponding to the fitness person into the first neural network to obtain a second category label corresponding to the second training data, and obtaining the fitness motion visual sensitivity of each motion, thereby training the fitness motion visual angle invariance measurement network by using the second training data and the fitness motion visual sensitivity; and finally, obtaining directed graph data corresponding to different fitness purposes by utilizing the trained fitness motion view angle invariance measurement network, so as to obtain a fitness scheme corresponding to each fitness purpose. The body-building scheme is generated for the user according to the body-building scheme of the body-building personnel with the same body-building purpose as the user in the big data, and the body-building effect of the user can be improved.

column2: POSITIONING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a positioning method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the fields of image processing, optical character recognition, intelligent traffic, augmented reality and deep learning in the technical field of artificial intelligence. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: performing optical character recognition detection on a parking space image to obtain a parking space number and a parking space number detection frame; performing feature point extraction on the image in the parking space number detection frame to obtain two-dimensional coordinates and feature descriptors of two-dimensional feature points; acquiring three-dimensional coordinates and feature descriptors of three-dimensional space points in the mapping image matched with the parking space number; performing feature matching on the feature descriptors of the two-dimensional feature points and the feature descriptors of the three-dimensional space points to obtain the matched two-dimensional feature points and the three-dimensional space points; and according to the two-dimensional coordinates and the three-dimensional coordinates of the feature points and the space points, the shooting position and the shooting pose of the parking space image are determined, and the accurate positioning effect is achieved.

column2: SPEED PLANNING METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR SELF-DRIVING, DEVICE, MEDIUM AND VEHICLE
column4: Provided are a speed planning method and apparatus for self-driving, a device and a medium, relating to artificial intelligence technologies such as self-driving and deep learning. The solution includes acquiring the current state of a vehicle and interpolating actions based on the current state and a predetermined state table to obtain the target action of the current state. The current state includes at least the remaining running distance and the current speed. The state table is determined based on a reinforcement learning method and includes multiple states and an action performed in each state. The action performed in each state includes at least acceleration.

column2: AUGMENTED COGNITION METHODS AND APPARATUS FOR CONTEMPORANEOUS FEEDBACK IN PSYCHOMOTOR LEARNING
column4: A method of creating a scalable dynamic jointed skeleton (DJS) model for enhancing psychomotor leaning using augmented cognition methods realized by an artificial intelligence (AI) engine or image processor. The method involves extracting a DJS model from either live motion images of video files of an athlete, teacher, or expert to create a scalable reference model for using in training, whereby the AI engine extracts physical attributes of the subject including arm length, length, torso length as well as capturing successive movements of a motor skill such as swinging a gold club including position, stance, club position, swing velocity and acceleration, twisting, and more.

column2: HEIGHT-ADAPTIVE FACE RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides a height-adaptive face recognition method which can be applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method is applied to the automatic teller machine, and comprises the following steps: controlling a rotating motor to rotate to an initial position in response to an instruction that a binocular camera adapts to the height of a user; acquiring initial images acquired by the first camera and the second camera; judging whether the relationship between the face of the user and the initial image meets a specified condition or not; when the relation between the face of the user and the initial image does not meet a specified condition, controlling a motor to rotate by a preset angle so as to adjust the shooting angle of the first camera and the shooting angle of the second camera, wherein the specified condition comprises the fact that the face of the user is detected in the collected image, wherein the height of the face of the user in the collected image is within a preset range. The invention further provides a height-adaptive face recognition device and equipment, a storage medium and a program product.

column2: INSTRUMENT IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATIC INSPECTION
column4: The invention relates to an instrument identification method for automatic inspection, which comprises the following steps of: acquiring a field image of an instrument to be inspected, detecting the field image step by step, finally identifying an instrument reading, matching the instrument reading, field image acquisition time and position information, and generating a reading report of each instrument at different moments, and tracking the production condition of corresponding equipment. An instrument recognition system for automatic inspection comprises a mobile device, an image acquisition device arranged on the mobile device and a central processing unit, the central processing unit controls the mobile device to move and controls the image acquisition device to shoot, and shooting postures, image scales and the like do not need to be considered; manual correction such as edge detection or straight line detection on the image is not needed; the instrument representation digital character does not need to be segmented, the precision is higher, and the robustness is higher; reading reports of all instruments are automatically generated, and automatic inspection of all equipment instruments in a factory is achieved.

column2: CYLINDRICAL CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a cylindrical climbing robot which is used for adapting to cylindrical bodies with different sizes and diameters. The robot specifically comprises two trolley modules and an adjusting and tensioning module. Each gantry type adjusting and tensioning module comprises a transverse frame body, a first frame body and a second frame body, the first frame body and the second frame body are arranged on the two sides of the transverse frame body, the transverse frame body is connected with one trolley module in the two trolley modules, the first frame body is connected with one side of the other trolley module in the two trolley modules, and the second frame body is connected with the other side of the other trolley module. The relative distance between the two trolley modules is adjusted to adapt to the ruler diameter of the cylindrical body; and the trolley module can climb along the cylindrical body under the driving of the motor.

column2: ACTION RECOGNITION METHOD BASED ON MULTI-ANGLE VIDEO AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses an action recognition method based on a multi-angle video and related equipment, which can be applied to various scenes such as cloud technology, cloud safety, artificial intelligence and intelligent transportation. The method comprises the following steps: collecting N multi-angle detection videos collected from a target object, and after image frame extraction processing and weighted fusion processing are carried out on each detection video, obtaining an action description graph for recording action information executed by the target object in the detection videos at a corresponding shooting angle; through information fusion processing of the action description graph, the action fusion description graph recording the action information of the target object at multiple different shooting angles can be obtained, and then based on recognition processing of the action fusion description graph, an recognition result for whether the target object executes the target action can be obtained. Based on the combined recognition process of the multi-angle action information, the accuracy of action recognition of the target action can be improved.

column2: PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE FOR ABNORMAL DATA OF SERVICE SYSTEM, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, provides a processing method and device for abnormal data of a service system, equipment and a storage medium, and is used for improving the fault attribution analysis accuracy of the abnormal data of the service system. The processing method for abnormal data of a service system comprises the steps of carrying out feature vector fusion and feature vector superposition sequentially on initial business system sample data, obtaining a target virtual feature vector, wherein the initial business system sample data are used for indicating calling abnormal data and running abnormal data of a business system; training a preset initial fault attribution model through the target virtual feature vector to obtain a target fault attribution model; calling the target fault attribution model to perform fault attribution analysis on the abnormal data of the business system to be processed to obtain an initial analysis result; and verifying the initial analysis result through the reference fault information to obtain a target analysis result. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the to-be-processed abnormal data of the business system can be stored in a block chain.

column2: ELECTRIC STAIR CLIMBING VEHICLE AUXILIARY CONTROL METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an electric stair climbing vehicle auxiliary control method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring identity information of a patient to obtain a diseased part of the patient, and acquiring posture information of the patient on a seat by a sensor on an electric stair climbing vehicle; obtaining a first range of a crawler inclination angle and a crawler speed according to the step height and the step width of the stair, and obtaining a second range of a seat inclination angle according to the crawler angle and the height of an operator; fitting a polynomial function of the comfort degree of the human body part, the crawler speed and the seat inclination angle according to historical data, and constructing a target function by combining the polynomial function and the attention degree of the human body part; and in the first range and the second range, acquiring the corresponding track speed and the corresponding seat inclination angle when the target function is minimum. The speed of the crawler belt and the inclination angle of the seat are controlled in a self-adaptive mode, so that automatic adjustment of the seat is achieved, and the comfort and safety of a patient are improved on the premise that the safety and comfort of an operator are guaranteed.

column2: FITNESS ROOM TEMPERATURE ADAPTIVE REGULATION AND CONTROL METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to a fitness room temperature adaptive regulation and control method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of installing a plurality of cameras in a fitness room, collecting image data of a body builder in the fitness room, and obtaining a panoramic image of a fitness room area through an image processing method; after acquiring required panoramic image data, carrying out region division on the fitness room to obtain sub-regions; analyzing each body building type of the body builder through a body building action database to obtain the body building type of the body builder in each sub-region, and further obtaining an exercise index of each sub-region; and analyzing the effect after temperature regulation and control, setting an optimization model, and enabling the environment of each sub-region to can meet the fitness environment requirement of the body builder. Energy is saved, adjustment is convenient, and the requirements of the body builder for cooling and heat dissipation in the body building process are met.

column2: SWIMMING ANTI-DROWNING IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON AI VISION
column4: The invention relates to a swimming anti-drowning identification method based on AI vision, and the method employs a peripheral assembly and an AI intelligent platform, the peripheral assembly is provided with an intelligent camera, a special filter, a warning lamp, a loudspeaker, a router, a deep learning host, and a monitoring screen, and the AI intelligent platform is provided with an AI intelligent cloud platform. The AI intelligent platform is provided with a video stream real-time acquisition module, an AI video analysis module, a behavior logic judgment module and a linkage early warning module, the system is provided with three safety signs of green, yellow and red, green represents safety, yellow represents potential safety hazards, and red represents danger.

column2: MULTILEVEL GYMNASTIC DEVICE
column4: A multilevel gymnastic device comprises a flat base platform 1, associated with frame having two metallic rings 2, arranged in parallel orientation to each other via multiple horizontal bars 3 to align user?™s footstep, an AI (Artificial Intelligence) based imaging unit 4 incorporated in the frame for detecting body posture of user and is coupled with first sensor 5 integrated on one of metallic ring used to detect vital parameters of the user, a second sensor 6 installed in each horizontal bars 3, used for sensing the gripping pressure, multiple electromagnetic modules 7 incorporated in both the rings 2 and platform 1 having connection with microcontroller, for controlling the speed of the frame over platform, a display unit 8 installed on the frame, and is operated by the microcontroller, for displaying an image of corrected body posture and instructions regarding gripping pressure.

column2: OPERATION METHOD OF NEURAL NETWORK MODEL, READABLE MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and provides an operation method of a neural network model, which is used for operating the neural network model comprising a calculation layer and a sorting layer.
