A first storage area and a second storage area are arranged in a second memory in a processor of the electronic equipment, and the processor performs calculation layer calculation on a second data part in to-be-processed data and stores a calculation result into the second storage area; and performs sorting layer sorting on calculation results of the calculation layer of the first data part in the to-be-processed data stored in the first storage area in parallel, and stores the results into a first memory arranged outside the processor. Therefore, the processor always executes calculation of the calculation layer and sorting of the sorting layer of different data parts in parallel, and the processor does not need to store the calculation result of the calculation layer to the first memory, so that the running speed of the neural network model is improved, hardware resources occupied by running the neural network model are reduced, and the performance of the electronic equipment is improved.

column2: ANTI-CHEATING TRAVEL VEHICLE-MOUNTED INTELLIGENT TERMINAL BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an anti-cheating travel vehicle-mounted intelligent terminal based on artificial intelligence. The anti-cheating travel vehicle-mounted intelligent terminal comprises a multi-source data acquisition module, an artificial intelligence data processing module and a data encryption module, the multi-source data acquisition module is used for receiving GPS mileage and GPS time from a vehicle GPS receiving device, acquiring instrument mileage and running time of a vehicle from a vehicle CAN, calculating the mileage from a vehicle taximeter device through a wheel speed pulse sensor, and acquiring time from an RTC timing device; the artificial intelligence data processing module is used for performing data inspection and data state analysis on the data received from the multi-source data acquisition module; and the data encryption module is used for carrying out encryption storage protection on the data acquisition and transmission process in the multi-source data acquisition module, and in order to better realize the function of the intelligent terminal, the intelligent terminal comprises the vehicle anti-cheating method based on artificial intelligence.

column2: FOOTBALL TRAINING SYSTEM
column4: A football training system, comprising a wearable band 1 installed with a touch interactive display panel 2, wherein the panel 2 is accessed to select a beginner level, intermediate level and expert level, a holographic projector 7 for imparting virtual holographic projections of a football 4, team mates and opponents in accordance to the selected level, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing module 6 for capturing multiple images of the user to determine appropriate posture and in case the determined posture is found to be incorrect, then the panel 2 displays corrective posture, multiple sensors 9,10 and 11 for detecting different type of parameters that are processed by the microcontroller through comparing the parameters with the detected distance and in case the parameters are found to be unideal, then the projector 7 re-imparts holographic projection of the football 4 and the microcontroller directs the panel 2 for displaying corrective parameters.

column2: METHODS, SYSTEMS, APPARATUSES, AND DEVICES FOR FACILITATING MONITORING OF AN ENVIRONMENT
column4: Disclosed herein is a system for facilitating monitoring an environment. Accordingly, the system comprises a camera, an artificial intelligence (AI) processing unit, a radio unit, and at least one alternative energy capturing device. Further, a camera device is configured for capturing video of an environment. Further, an AI processing unit is responsible to analyze captured videos, detect whether certain relevant events occurred, make a decision, then generate relevant alert. Further, the radio unit is capable to send the generated alert to different devices. Further, the alternative energy capture device can use solar or other energy source to keep the entire system running.

column2: ELECTRONIC COMMERCE SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: Disclosed is an electronic commerce system which includes a relay platform connected to a seller terminal and a buyer terminal to relay the sale and purchase of a designated product on the web. The electronic commerce system further includes: a seller terminal which sells a designated product on the web and determines the selling price of the designated product according to a discount rate; and a product storage unit which stores products, wherein the product storage unit includes a plurality of vertical frames, a shelf plate, a reader, and a cleaning module. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: FITNESS TRAINING MANAGEMENT METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON SMART BRACELET AND HUMAN BODY THREE-DIMENSIONAL RECONSTRUCTION
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a fitness training management method and system based on an intelligent bracelet and human body three-dimensional reconstruction. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an image of a fitness person and performing human body three-dimensional reconstruction to obtain a body shape parameter; analyzing the attitude angle curve of each component to obtain a synthesized attitude angle curve of each component; superposing the synthesized attitude angle curves of all the components to obtain a video frame key degree curve; selecting a key frame according to the video frame key degree curve, and performing fitness action recognition by using the key frame; and calculating real-time consumed calories of the fitness person according to the body shape parameter and heartbeat data measured by the smart bracelet, and performing fitness training management. By means of the method, the recognition precision of the composite fitness actions can be improved, and personalized fitness training management is achieved.

column2: IMPORTANT SHIP TARGET DYNAMIC MONITORING METHOD BASED ON INTERNET INFORMATION
column4: The invention discloses an important ship target dynamic monitoring method based on Internet information, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, setting ship monitoring equipment which is used for obtaining ship dynamic information; S2, setting an important ship running track, and setting a ship running track on ship monitoring equipment; S3, arranging a communication device used for being in contact with the ship monitoring equipment; S4, arranging a real-time positioning device used for obtaining real-time dynamic positioning of a ship; S5, comparing the obtained ship dynamic positioning data with the ship moving trajectory; S6, arranging a wind condition detection device on the important ship; S7, arranging a sea wave detection device on the important ship; and S8, predicting the running dynamic state of the ship, and predicting the running track of the ship through the wind condition data, the sea wave data and real-time dynamic positioning of the ship. The real-time monitoring, prediction and prejudgment of important ship tracks are realized, the marine environment is prejudged according to the detection data, and defense is carried out in time.

column2: CAMERA INTERNAL REFERENCE AND EXTERNAL REFERENCE ESTIMATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a camera internal parameter and external parameter estimation method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: respectively building a camera coordinate system, a world coordinate system and a pixel coordinate system, and building a transformation matrix between the camera coordinate system and the world coordinate system; shooting at least one image containing the same pedestrian crossing line, and extracting a plurality of feature points and a plurality of feature lines on the pedestrian crossing line from the image; determining a geometrical relationship between the plurality of feature points and the plurality of feature lines; determining world coordinates of the feature points and two end points of the feature lines, and establishing geometric equations of the feature points and the feature lines; and solving the geometric equation by using an iterative optimization method and/or a simultaneous equation method, and taking the solving result as an internal parameter and an external parameter of the camera. According to the embodiment of the invention, the internal reference and the external reference of the camera can be estimated under the condition that the internal reference of the camera does not need to be calibrated and the external reference of the camera does not need to be measured.

column2: RANDOM INSTRUCTION VERIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE OF PROCESSOR, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a random instruction verification method and device of a processor, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as natural language processing and deep learning. According to the specific implementation scheme, a random instruction verification file set is generated, wherein the random instruction verification file set comprises a random instruction stream file, a register file initialization file of a processor and a data memory initialization file of the processor; performing simulation operation according to the random instruction stream file, the register file initialization file and the data memory initialization file, and generating simulation operation data and a simulation operation result; if the simulation running result meets the preset condition, running the random instruction stream file through the processor according to the register file initialization file and the data memory initialization file to generate running data; and verifying the random instruction stream file according to the operation data and the simulation operation data. Therefore, the random instruction verification efficiency and precision of the processor can be improved.

column2: RIVER CHANNEL DESILTING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention relates to a river channel desilting method and system based on an artificial intelligence technology, and relates to the technical field of river channel desilting. The river channel desilting method comprises the steps that S1, a ship body is controlled to travel along a silt area in the reverse water flow direction; S2, silt is filtered through a protection device; S3, a motor controls a stirring rod to stir the filtered silt; S4, a silt suction device is controlled to suck the stirred silt into a waste material box; and S5, the waste material box full of the silt is transported to a shore to be cleaned. In the step S1, when the ship body runs, a controller controls the running speed of the ship body according to resistance borne by a shovel plate and detected by a pressure sensor, and meanwhile, the controller adjusts the set running speed according to the input water body flow speed A. According to the method and the system, the desilting efficiency is effectively improved.

column2: VEHICLE SPEED LIMIT CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE, STORAGE MEDIUM AND PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The invention provides a vehicle speed limit control method and device, a storage medium and a program product, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and in particular relates to the fields of automatic driving, autonomous parking, intelligent transportation and the like. According to the specific implementation scheme, in the running process of the vehicle, at least two layers of nested surrounding frames and multiple speed limiting areas of the vehicle are determined according to the vehicle body contour and the running direction of the vehicle, when it is detected that an obstacle appears in any speed limiting area, speed limiting control is conducted on the vehicle according to a speed limiting threshold value of the speed limiting area where the obstacle is located, the shape of at least one layer of surrounding frame matches the shape of the scanning area of the vehicle in the next time period, so that the obstacle can be found in advance; each speed limiting area corresponds to one or more speed limiting threshold values, the maximum speed limiting threshold value corresponding to the outer-layer speed limiting area is larger, in the process that the vehicle gets close to the obstacle, speed limiting control can be carried out on the obstacle for multiple times, speed reduction is gradually carried out till braking is carried out, and the safety and reliability of the vehicle are improved.

column2: METHOD FOR DETERMINING ROUTING CONVERGENCE TIME AND DEVICE THEREOF
column4: The invention provides a method for determining routing convergence time and a device thereof, and relates to the technical field of computer networks. The embodiment of the invention can be applied to various scenes such as cloud technology, artificial intelligence, intelligent traffic, auxiliary driving and the like; the method comprises the steps that a service cluster corresponding to a target application program is obtained, the service cluster comprises at least two services, and each service corresponds to at least one service instance; when the target application program has running service instances, recording initial time and collecting routing change information of the service instances; the route change information comprises change information of a route number corresponding to the service cluster caused by state switching of the service instance; deadline is recorded when determining that a routing convergence condition corresponding to the service cluster is satisfied based on the routing change information; and the routing convergence time corresponding to the service cluster is determined based on the initial time and the deadline. According to the invention, the accuracy of determining the routing convergence time corresponding to the service cluster can be improved.

column2: SOFT LOAD SCHEDULING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON GENETIC ALGORITHM MODEL, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of computers and artificial intelligence, and discloses a soft load scheduling method and device based on a genetic algorithm model, equipment and medium. A target node and consumed time RT when the target node is called form a gene segment, and a plurality of gene segments form a first chromosome; and a plurality of first chromosomes form a first chromosome array, the fitness value of each first chromosome is calculated, so that the first chromosomes lower than a preset value can be deleted from the first chromosome array, and then the remaining first chromosomes are crossed to form a second chromosome, therefore, the fitness values of the second chromosomes are higher than those of the first chromosomes, the multiple second chromosomes form a second chromosome array, and multiple tasks are scheduled based on the second chromosome array. In this way, it can be ensured that the later-generation chromosome array is more suitable for the environment than the previous-generation chromosome array, and therefore the utilization rate of the whole cluster nodes is higher and higher.

column2: A NOVEL ENERGY EFFICIENT SMART SYSTEM FOR WEATHER MONITORING USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention is Internal sensing Unit for sensing inner weather conditions, External sensing unit for sensing outer weather conditions, Window which has to be operated, Central unit for controlling all operations, Load Relay unit for operations, Mobile applications with artificial intelligence.

column2: QUALITY GRADE DETERMINATION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent decision in artificial intelligence, and provides a quality grade determination method and device based on artificial intelligence, equipment and a medium. The method comprises the steps: shooting a material in a container, accurately obtaining a first image containing the material, inputting the first image into a preset image segmentation model, carrying out image segmentation to obtain a second image, correcting the second image to obtain a third image with more accurate quality grade judgment of the material, and inputting the third image into a preset quality grade determination model for processing to obtain the quality grade of the material accurately. According to the scheme, the shot image is segmented and corrected, the quality grade determination accuracy can be improved, the third image is processed through the quality grade determination model, and the quality grade of the material can be accurately determined. The invention also relates to a block chain technology. The image segmentation model and the quality grade determination model can be stored in a block chain.

column2: FITNESS ROOM SAFETY RISK EARLY WARNING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a gymnasium safety risk early warning method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: further obtaining the fitness amplitude of a fitness person by obtaining position information and fitness actions of the fitness person, and obtaining the mastering degree of the fitness person according to the fitness amplitude and real fitness time used by one-time fitness; obtaining the safety accident probability according to the safety level and the mastering degree of the equipment used by the fitness action and the fatigue degree of the fitness personnel; taking each fitness person as a hazard source, obtaining a cross risk area and the quantity of hazard sources in the area, and further obtaining the cross risk degree of the cross risk area; and obtaining a safety risk assessment result according to the cross risk degree and the number of hazard sources in the cross risk area. According to the invention, the gymnasium management personnel can be prompted according to different levels of safety risk assessment, and the problem that the safety risk supervision of the gymnasium management personnel is not timely and inaccurate is effectively solved.

column2: PROGRAM RUNNING METHOD AND DEVICE, PROCESSOR CHIP, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a program running method and device, a processor chip, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence chips. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method includes obtaining a first program; analyzing the first program to obtain each first instruction, and sending each first instruction to the corresponding coprocessor; in the process of waiting for the coprocessor to execute the first instruction, sending a request message to the upper computer, wherein the request message is used for obtaining a second program which does not depend on the running result of the first program; and obtaining a second program sent by the upper computer, and running the second program. In the process that the first program finishes running and the coprocessor executes the first instruction, the second program which does not depend on the running result of the first program is run, so that two programs which do not have a dependency relationship can be simultaneously run in the heterogeneous processor, the utilization rate of the heterogeneous processor is improved, and the program running efficiency is improved.

column2: VEHICLE CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT, STORAGE MEDIUM AND AUTOMATIC DRIVING VEHICLE
column4: The invention provides a vehicle control method and device, equipment, a storage medium and an automatic driving vehicle, and relates to the automatic driving technology in the artificial intelligence technology, and the method comprises the steps: when a target vehicle is controlled to run according to a planned path and an obstacle is determined to exist to prevent the vehicle from running according to the planned path, acquiring surrounding vehicle information in the external environment of the target vehicle; determining a reference vehicle in the surrounding vehicles according to the surrounding vehicle information, and updating the planned path according to the position of the reference vehicle; and controlling the target vehicle to run according to the updated planned path. According to the scheme provided by the invention, when the target vehicle runs according to the planned path but is blocked by the obstacle and cannot pass, the planned path can be updated by referring to the running tracks of other surrounding vehicles, so that the target vehicle bypasses the obstacle to pass smoothly.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PERSONAL SPORTS CURATION BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention relates to a method and system for personal sports curation, which can recommend sports optimized for a person. The system for personal sports curation comprises: a first database which is a physical storage space for storing information on the personal characteristics of an individual user; a second database which is a physical storage space for storing information on the sports characteristics of an individual sport; a user terminal for generating user input information based on the user input of a user; and a server for, if the user input information is received from the user terminal, calculating a correlation between the user and an individual sport based on artificial intelligence using the user input information, the information on the personal characteristics and the information on sports characteristics, extracting customized sports based on the calculated correlation, and transmitting information on one or more among the extracted customized sports to the user terminal as information on recommended sports. The user terminal displays the information on recommended sports. The server clusters a plurality of groups using the information on the personal characteristics, selects any one among the groups as a holding group to which the user belongs based on the user input information, and reflects a weight set for the holding group in calculating correlation between the user and an individual sport, wherein the weight varies depending on the holding group. The user terminal counts the time of the recommended sports being displayed and transmits the time to the server, and the server modifies the individual weights of the recommended sports based on the time. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IN TELEMEDICINE-ENABLED HARDWARE TO OPTIMIZE REHABILITATIVE ROUTINES CAPABLE OF ENABLING REMOTE REHABILITATIVE COMPLIANCE
column4: A computer-implemented system comprising a treatment apparatus, a patient interface, and a processing device is disclosed. The processing device is configured to receive treatment data pertaining to the user during the telemedicine session, wherein the treatment data comprises one or more characteristics of the user; determine, via one or more trained machine learning models, at least one respective measure of benefit one or more exercise regimens provide the user, wherein the determining the respective measure of benefit is based on the treatment data; determine, via the one or more trained machine learning models, one or more probabilities of the user complying with the one or more exercise regimens; and transmit the treatment plan to a computing device, wherein the treatment plan is generated based on the one or more probabilities and the respective measure of benefit the one or more exercise regimens provide the user.

column2: COLLECTIVE PHOTO SHOOTING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a collective photo shooting system, which comprises a shooting end and a server side, wherein the shooting end is used for shooting collective photos and uploading the collective photos to the server end; and the server side receives the collective photo, selects the optimal facial expression data of each person from the collective photo and integrates the optimal facial expression data to a new collective photo. According to the invention, the efficiency of a user in a group photo shooting process can be improved, and the shooting time cost is reduced; and the photo quality required by the user can be quickly realized. The method does not need to manually select the shot photos in the collective photo shooting process, and the system intelligently obtains the data in accordance with the portrait feature values in the collective photo through a plurality of photos for migration and synthesis, thereby achieving the rapid collective photo shooting. Meanwhile, the portrait features, eye closing detection data and portrait technology identification data are extracted through an artificial intelligence technology and are sorted and analyzed; in addition, the fragmented information is converted into favorable information, intelligent group photos are achieved more efficiently and quickly, the use experience of users is improved, and the use cost of the users is reduced.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR ACCURATELY DETECTING ANIMAL INDIVIDUAL HEALTH AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a method and a system for accurately detecting animal individual health and a computer readable storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an initial image of an animal to be detected; detecting and distributing an animal ID for each animal; tracking and calculating the exercise amount of each animal; respectively calculating the total exercise amount of all animals in each field in the unit time length; when the total amount of exercise of all animals in one fence is lower than a preset total amount of exercise threshold value, finding out animals with abnormal amount of exercise in the fence; and identifying and analyzing animals died of illness. According to the invention, the deep learning algorithm in artificial intelligence is used for detecting the exercise amount of the animal, the detection efficiency and the detection accuracy are improved, the error judgment rate of the health condition of the animal is reduced, the health degree of the animal is accurately detected, and a basic data basis is provided for discovering animals died of diseases as soon as possible and preventing epidemic situations from spreading in animal populations. The production cost of livestock breeding is reduced, and automation of the livestock breeding process is achieved.

column2: TEST REQUIREMENT IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a test demand identification method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, which can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence or finance. For a target interface, the running trend of the target interface is obtained by analyzing first running information generated when the target interface is called, the running state of the target interface is predicted based on the running trend, and whether the target interface has a pressure test requirement or not is determined according to the running state. Based on the invention, the pressure test requirement of the system interface can be accurately identified, so that the performance pressure point is identified as early as possible, performance optimization is performed, and the pressure problem of the system is prevented.

column2: PUSH INFORMATION GENERATION METHOD, RELATED DEVICE AND COMPUTER PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The invention provides a push information generation method and device, electronic equipment, a computer readable storage medium and a computer program product, is applied to an intelligent mirror, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as data transmission, intelligent recommendation and user understanding. A specific implementation mode of the method comprises the steps that after first motion information of a target user is acquired from intelligent wearable equipment through a near field identification technology, comprehensive motion information is generated according to second motion information stored locally and the first motion information, a motion suggestion is generated based on the comprehensive motion information, and the exercise suggestion is pushed to the target user. According to the embodiment, a scheme for generating the exercise suggestion for the user by jointly using the first exercise information collected in the intelligent wearable device and the second exercise information stored in the intelligent mirror is provided, so that the accuracy and the reference value of the exercise suggestion are improved.

column2: SYSTEM, METHOD AND EQUIPMENT FOR MONITORING AND ANALYZING DISSOLUTION BEHAVIOR BY USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGE RECOGNITION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a system, method and equipment for monitoring and analyzing a dissolution behavior by using an artificial intelligence image recognition technology, the system comprises a computer for operating the system, a camera, a light source, a dissolution instrument, a data transmission module and an image recognition system, and the camera can be acquired by a single camera or a plurality of cameras in a combined manner. According to the method, the dissolution behavior is monitored at a single angle or multiple angles by adopting an artificial intelligence image recognition method; in the dissolution process, data such as the volume and the shape of the preparation are analyzed, a change curve is given, and the change time point and the corresponding dissolution behavior such as the dissolution phenomenon, the disintegration phenomenon and the disintegration start are given according to the change. After disintegration ending, the research and development personnel only need to analyze the experiment process according to information given by the system and can also play back videos according to time points given by the system, the camera has an infrared camera shooting function, and a light activated switch and an infrared light source are added.

column2: RUNNING METHOD AND DEVICE OF REASONING SERVICE PLATFORM, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a running method and device of a reasoning service platform, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of inference service of an artificial intelligence model. The method comprises the steps: determining a to-be-distributed reasoning task for a reasoning service platform; determining the flow weight of each reasoning service module, wherein the flow weight of the reasoning service module is used for indicating the proportion of the number of reasoning tasks needing to be distributed to the reasoning service module in the total amount of the reasoning tasks; based on the flow weight of each reasoning service module, distributing the reasoning tasks with the corresponding number in the to-be-distributed reasoning tasks to each reasoning service module; and using the reasoning service module for executing the reasoning task. According to the method, the corresponding number of reasoning tasks can be automatically allocated to each reasoning service module based on the traffic weight, so that the workload increased by the user due to task allocation for the reasoning service module is greatly reduced, and the working efficiency of the reasoning service is remarkably improved.

column2: SKELETON DRIVING COEFFICIENT DETERMINATION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a skeleton driving coefficient determination method and device, electronic equipment and a readable storage medium, and relates to the technical field of image processing, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence or augmented reality. According to the specific implementation scheme, a pre-configured initial skin skeleton model is driven to deform based on a pre-configured initial skeleton driving coefficient, and a first skin skeleton model is obtained; if the difference data of the first skin skeleton model and the target skin skeleton model does not meet a preset difference data condition, the first skin skeleton model is deformed at least once until a second skin skeleton model is obtained, wherein the difference data of the second skin skeleton model and the target skin skeleton model meet the difference data condition, and a target skeleton driving coefficient for driving at least one deformation is obtained. Based on the scheme, a basis can be provided for the electronic equipment to generate the face 3D model based on the target skeleton driving coefficient, and the data transmission cost between a server and the electronic equipment is saved.

column2: INDOOR ACQUISITION POINT POSITIONING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON IMAGE PROCESSING
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an indoor acquisition point positioning method and system based on image processing. The method comprises the steps of constructing a plane placement diagram of a house according to actual arrangement of the house; collecting an indoor real image of the house, and obtaining a shooting direction of the real image; obtaining a plane area corresponding to the real image in the plane placement diagram, and projecting the shooting direction to the plane area to obtain a mapped shooting direction; according to a distance proportion between any two rigid body points in the real image and the optical axis projection point, obtaining the optical axis projection point in the plane area to obtain an optical axis position; according to the real image and the distance proportion between the specific point and the imaging end point in the plane area, obtaining the optical center position in the plane area, wherein the optical center position is the image collection point position. The image collection point position of the real image is determined according to the optical center position of the optical axis in the plane placement diagram, the limitation of image collection is reduced, the working efficiency is improved, and the precision and accuracy of image collection point positioning are improved.

column2: FRACTURE DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a fracture detection method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of computer vision and deep learning, and can be applied to scenes such as fracture detection. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps: obtaining a to-be-detected skeleton image; inputting the bone image into a fracture detection model, and outputting a preliminary detection result indicating whether the bone image has a fracture part or not; when the preliminary detection result indicates that the fracture part exists, inputting the skeleton image into a contour recognition model, and marking the contour of the fracture part in the skeleton image; and determining the name information of the fracture part based on the contour of the fracture part in the skeleton image, and generating a detection report containing the name information of the fracture part. The specific information of the fracture part can be visually obtained based on the detection report, and the diagnosis efficiency and accuracy of doctors can be greatly improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE WIDE-RANGE MONITORING DEVICE AND METHOD
column4: The invention discloses artificial intelligence wide-range monitoring equipment and method, and particularly relates to the technical field of security monitoring. The equipment comprises a mounting block, wherein a limiting groove is formed in the middle of the front part of the mounting block, and a lifting assembly is mounted in the limiting groove. Through the arrangement of a moving assembly, the monitoring equipment is convenient to install and move, the portability and practicability of the monitoring equipment are high, through the arrangement of a reversing assembly, a bearing table can drive a monitoring machine body to rotate, incline forwards or backwards, adjust the camera shooting angle of a camera in the monitoring machine body and automatically control the lens to flexibly rotate at all angles, a tripod head mechanism is not easy to damage, the monitoring quality is good, the monitoring safety is high, through the arrangement of the lifting assembly, the bearing platform can drive the monitoring machine body to ascend or descend, the camera in the monitoring machine body can monitor a larger range, the control signal received by a decoder is strong, the camera and the tripod head can be remotely controlled through the decoder, and the security and protection monitoring range is widened.

column2: EFFICIENT DEEP CONVOLUTIONAL NEURAL NETWORK PRUNING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an efficient deep convolutional neural network pruning method, which mainly solves the problem that the existing deep convolutional neural network consumes a large amount of storage resources and computing resources, and the implementation scheme is as follows: a scaling factor is optimized through a sparse learning method based on an ADMM algorithm, the deep convolutional neural network is trained, and the network structure is sparse; a genetic algorithm is used to search the tailoring rate suitable for each layer of the trained deep convolutional neural network, and the optimal tailoring rate meeting the requirement is automatically searched under the guidance of a fitness function; and each layer of the network after sparse learning training is cut by using the optimal cutting rate to obtain the convolutional neural network with the optimal efficiency. According to the method, the precision loss of the pruned convolutional neural network can be greatly reduced, the consumption of storage resources and computing resources by the convolutional neural network is greatly reduced by reducing the parameter quantity of the network, and the method can be used for compression of the deep convolutional neural network.

column2: NEXT GENERATION ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MULTI-PLATFORM SYSTEM THROUGH IOT
column4: The present invention relates to a next generation artificial intelligence multi-platform system through IoT which comprises an exercise device that communicates with a smart mirror. Therefore, the next generation artificial intelligence multi-platform system can provide a correct exercise posture. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: VIDEO-BASED EXERCISE EVALUATION METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND COMPUTER DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The present application relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a video-based exercise evaluation method and apparatus, and a computer device and a storage medium. The method comprises: acquiring a first exercise video of a user and a second exercise video of a coach; identifying the type of exercise of the user according to the first exercise video; according to the type of exercise, extracting a first key frame image from the first exercise video and extracting a second key frame image from the second exercise video; detecting a first human body key point in the first key frame image and detecting a second human body key point in the second key frame image; calculating the degree of difference between the first human body key point and the second human body key point; and evaluating an exercise score of the user according to the degree of difference and the type of exercise. By means of the present application, a key frame image can be adaptively extracted according to the type of exercise, and the degree of difference can be calculated; and the exercise of a user is evaluated by combining the type of exercise and the degree of difference, so that the accuracy is higher. In addition, the present application further relates to blockchain technology, and the exercise score can be stored in a blockchain node.

column2: METHOD, APPARATUS, AND SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED CONTENT USING PULL-UP MECHANISM
column4: Provided is a system for providing content using exercise equipment. The system comprises: an exercise tool at least including a base frame including one pair of bars disposed perpendicular to the ground, a mechanism part detachably coupled to the one pair of bars and configured in a bar shape so that a user can do a pull-up exercise, and a communication unit capable of communicating with an external device; a user terminal capable of communicating with the exercise tool; and a server capable of communicating with the user terminal. The mechanism unit includes a sensor capable of counting the number of pull-ups of a user and recognizing a user's motion in the center portion of the mechanism unit, transmits first data about the number of pull-ups of the user and the user's motion acquired from the sensor of the mechanical unit to the user terminal, receives second data regarding the user's physical condition from the user terminal, and transmits the first data and the second data from the user terminal to the server. The server, on the basis of the first data and the second data, generates the user's exercise performance data, builds time series data on the user's locomotion for exercise performance data by using a voting model on the basis of linear regression, decision tree, and support vector machine, and predicts the user's physical fatigue and psychological state by using a first artificial neural network from past and current movement data among time series data. The system can continue strength training according to physical and psychological states. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: TARGET DEPTH AND HEIGHT MEASURING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON MONOCULAR CAMERA
column4: The invention discloses a target depth and height measurement method and device based on a monocular camera, and the method comprises the steps: adjusting the monocular camera, enabling a target to be imaged at two sides of a vertical midperpendicular of an imaging plane of the monocular camera, so that the target to be imaged below a transverse midperpendicular of the imaging plane, shooting the target, and obtaining a target image; marking a target bottom point C and a corresponding vertex D in a target image, obtaining pixel coordinates of the bottom point C and the vertex D, converting the pixel coordinates of the bottom point C and the vertex D into image coordinates, calculating parameters required by measurement through an image coordinate system, then keeping the state of a monocular camera unchanged, rotating a lens of the monocular camera to obtain different target images, and measuring to obtain a target distance and a target height. The technical scheme of the invention not only has low requirements on measurement equipment and measurement environment, but also is simple to operate, low in measurement cost, high in calculation rate and accurate in result, can be widely applied to artificial intelligence or engineering measurement, and has a good development prospect.

column2: ACTION SEQUENCE MIGRATION METHOD AND DEVICE AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses an action sequence migration method and device and electronic equipment, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to computer vision and deep learning technologies, and particularly can be used in virtual human and 3D vision scenes. The specific implementation scheme comprises the following steps: obtaining a first model according to a source skeleton, and obtaining a second model according to a target skeleton; inputting a source skeleton action sequence into a full-connection network, obtaining a target skeleton action sequence, wherein the source skeleton action sequence is an action sequence of the source skeleton; and training the full-connection network according to the source skeleton action sequence, the first model, the target skeleton action sequence and the second model to obtain an optimized full-connection network. According to the embodiment of the invention, the action sequence corresponding to the target skeleton can be obtained according to the source skeleton action sequence of the source skeleton. According to the embodiment of the invention, migration of the action sequences can be realized, the utilization rate of the skeletons is improved, and the utilization value of action sequence data is increased.

column2: ESCALATOR SAFETY DETECTION AND DISINFECTION DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE APPLICATION
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of elevator safety, and discloses an escalator safety detection and disinfection device based on artificial intelligence application. The escalator safety detection and disinfection device based on artificial intelligence application comprises a disinfection device and an intelligent start-stop device; the disinfection device comprises a rotating shaft; a disinfectant box is fixedly connected to the interior of the rotating shaft; teeth are arranged on the outer side of the rotating shaft; a guide pipe is fixedly connected to the lower end of the disinfectant box; a transmission disc is rotationally connected to the lower end of the guide pipe; the teeth are meshed with the transmission disc, so that the rotating shaft rotates to drive the transmission disc to rotate; a disinfection sheet is fixedly connected outside the transmission disc; and a cleaning piece is fixedly connected outside the rotating shaft. Through escalator handrail running, the disinfection device is driven to disinfect an escalator handrail; the disinfection device drives the intelligent start-stop device through a belt to intelligently control the running state of the elevator through centrifugal force; and when the elevator breaks down and the speed is increased, a fault reminding device is triggered, so that the effects of comprehensive disinfection, intelligent control, timely reminding, energy conservation and environmental protection are achieved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TABLE TENNIS BALL PICKING DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence table tennis ball picking device which comprises a base plate shell, a disc carrying plate and a top plate shell, the base plate shell is of an annular structure, an opening groove part of the base plate shell is communicated with an inner cavity of the base plate shell, and the disc carrying plate is arranged on the upper side wall of the base plate shell in an attached mode, an integrated structure frame part is arranged on the front half part of the upper side wall of the top disc shell, the top disc shell, the disc carrying plate and the bottom disc shell are combined and then fixedly connected together through bolts, a master console is arranged in the top disc shell, and the master console in the top disc shell comprises a control panel and a central processing unit. According to the artificial intelligence table tennis ball picking device, intelligent and autonomous table tennis ball searching and picking are achieved in a training field, time and labor are saved compared with manual searching and picking, in addition, the table tennis balls are easy to transfer and clean after being collected, normal work of the table tennis ball picking device is not affected when the table tennis balls are transferred, and the working efficiency is effectively improved.

column2: CABLE CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The invention discloses a cable climbing robot. The cable climbing robot comprises a walking mechanism and a gravity self-locking module, wherein the walking mechanism is used for moving in the axial direction of a cable, and the gravity self-locking module is connected to the walking mechanism; the gravity self-locking module is provided with a hanging ring used for hanging a heavy object and a sole used for holding the cable tightly under the gravity traction of the heavy object. Under the action of the gravity self-locking module, the walking mechanism can automatically adjust the friction force between the walking mechanism and the cable according to whether the gravity self-locking module drags the heavy object or not and the mass of the dragged heavy object, and the connection strength of the walking mechanism and the cable is guaranteed. The gravity self-locking module belongs to an under-actuated sole gravity self-locking mechanism, the walking mechanism can be assisted to meet traction and dragging of heavy-load heavy objects, the number of power equipment cannot be increased, light weight of the cable climbing robot is facilitated, and the requirement for heavy-load traction and dragging operation of the cable climbing robot is met.

column2: TEACHING EQUIPMENT FOR GUIDING CHILDREN TO LEARN CORRECTLY
column4: The invention provides teaching equipment for guiding children to learn correctly, and relates to the technical field of teaching equipment. The teaching equipment for guiding children to learn correctly comprises a rotating assembly, and a digital gear is arranged in the rotating assembly. According to the teaching equipment for guiding the correct learning of the children, a knob algorithm gear rotates by one fourth when a turn is rotated, a pull rod is pulled back and forth once, and a digital gear rotates by one tenth, so that the effects of high device precision and accurate digital display are achieved. Students need to use certain strength to pull the pull rod repeatedly, so that the effects of driving children to do interesting exercise and improving comprehensive physical and psychological development of the children are achieved. A teacher rotates a knob, students on the left side and the right side of the platform pull a pull rod back and forth repeatedly, a simple arithmetic question is formed in three square holes in the front face of the platform, and therefore the effects of arousing interests of children, improving attention of the children and effectively guiding the children to learn correctly are achieved.

column2: MOTOR POSITIVE AND NEGATIVE ROTATION DRIVING CIRCUIT
column4: The utility model discloses a motor positive and negative rotation driving circuit, which comprises a boosting part and an output part, the boosting part comprises a pulse generator, an N-type field effect transistor Q7, a diode D6, an inductor L1 and a capacitor C1; the output part comprises N-type field effect transistors Q1, Q2, Q3 and Q4 with parasitic diodes and NPN-type triodes Q5 and Q6; by means of the driving circuit and the connecting structure thereof, the defects that a device in a traditional driving circuit is large in size and noise, a relay has a contact adhesion phenomenon, working is not reliable and the like can be overcome, the circuit performance is effectively improved, a motor cannot feel pause feeling when started and stopped, smooth starting and stopping are achieved, more comfortable use experience is brought to people, and the driving circuit is suitable for popularization and application. The method is suitable for all motor forward and reverse rotation application fields requiring direct current, such as artificial intelligence control of current dental comprehensive treatment chairs, intelligent robots and aircrafts, electric massage chairs and the like.

column2: FULL-INTELLIGENT STUTTER CORRECTION REHABILITATION INSTRUMENT
column4: The invention discloses a full-intelligent stutter correction rehabilitation instrument which comprises a control processor, an earphone, a gesture exercise evaluation device and a Dantian respiration evaluation device, and the earphone, the gesture exercise evaluation device and the Dantian respiration evaluation device are all in wireless connection with the control processor. The control processor is provided with a display screen, a loudspeaker and an APP + intelligent robot, the gesture exercise evaluation device comprises an evaluation bracelet and an evaluation ring, the evaluation ring is provided with a track sensor, and the evaluation bracelet is provided with a blood pressure tester, a heart rate tester and a pressure sensor. The control processor adopts a mobile phone. The evaluation bracelet is provided with a vibration reminding device. According to the invention, artificial intelligence and virtual reality combination of the stutter correction activity can be realized, the man-machine interaction is strong, the real life can be integrated and effectively carried out anytime and anywhere, the purposes of smoothly speaking and correcting the stutter can be easily achieved, the relapse can be rejected, the operation is simple and convenient, and the popularization and application are convenient.

column2: HEALTH MONITORING AND SERVICE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a health monitoring and service management system based on an artificial intelligence technology, and aims to solve the technical problems that in the prior art, monitoring and long-term observation of physical fitness of students are lacked, physical abnormity of the students cannot be found in time according to fluctuation conditions of health indexes of the students, and sudden symptoms of students occurring at home are difficult to grasp, and home-school interaction cannot be achieved. The system comprises a campus health equipment terminal, a cloud platform and a campus health mobile terminal. The campus health equipment terminal is provided with a 21.5-inch touchable full-view-angle IPS screen and an Android operating system, and the campus health equipment terminal is used for collecting various data of students and uploading the collected data to the cloud platform. According to the system, the campus health equipment terminal, the cloud platform and the campus health mobile terminal are cooperatively used, a one-person-one-file health management system is established, and through long-term health monitoring management of students, united disease control of schools and emergency treatment of hospitals are facilitated.

column2: LIVING BODY DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a living body detection method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of computer vision and deep learning, and can be applied to scenes such as face recognition. The specific implementation scheme is that the method comprises the steps: acquiring a to-be-detected image, wherein the to-be-detected image comprises a detection object; extracting a first feature map from the to-be-detected image by using a first extraction layer of a pre-trained living body detection model; acquiring a frequency domain image corresponding to the to-be-detected image, and extracting a second feature map from the frequency domain image by using a second extraction layer of the living body detection model; and determining a living body detection result of the detection object based on the first feature map and the second feature map. According to the method, living body detection is carried out on the basis of the two-dimensional information of the gray information and the frequency domain information, the generalization ability of the to-be-detected image obtained by shooting the real object photo of the detection object can be improved, and the accuracy and reliability of a living body detection result are improved.

column2: ROTARY CAMERA
column4: The utility model discloses a rotary camera, which comprises an internal support, at least one first lens module, a second lens module, a rotary driving device and a base, and is characterized in that the upper end of the internal support is fixedly provided with at least one first lens module; the rotary driving device comprises a rotary driving part and a basic fixing part which are matched with each other, and the rotary driving part is mounted and fixed in the internal bracket; at least one second lens module is fixedly installed at the front end of the basic fixing part, and a base is fixedly installed on the lower end face of the basic fixing part. According to the utility model, the camera realizes a rotary shooting function, can facilitate rapid assembly and later maintenance of each component, and can realize a better automatic panoramic shooting effect.

column2: ADJUSTABLE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXERCISE GUIDANCE EQUIPMENT FOR DIABETES
column4: The utility model discloses an adjustable diabetes artificial intelligence motion guidance device which comprises an auxiliary walking device body, two connecting plates are fixedly installed on the top of the auxiliary walking device body, a mounting plate is rotatably connected between the two connecting plates, a cushion block is fixedly installed on the side wall of the mounting plate, and a movable block is installed on the side wall of the cushion block. A clamping groove is formed in a rotating shaft of the mounting plate, a fixing mechanism is arranged on one connecting plate, extends into the clamping groove and abuts against the inner bottom of the clamping groove, two mounting grooves are formed in the side wall of the mounting plate, and mounting frames are rotationally connected into the two mounting grooves. Gears are fixedly mounted on the rotating shafts of the two mounting frames, and driving mechanisms are arranged in the two mounting grooves. The folding device is reasonable in structural design and can be folded when not used, the occupied space of the folding device is reduced, and the folding device can be placed under a sickbed and is prevented from obstructing daily activities of a patient.

column2: GENE DATA FEATURE SELECTION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON BACKBONE PARTICLE SWARM ALGORITHM
column4: The invention provides a gene data feature selection method and device based on a backbone particle swarm algorithm, on the basis of a gene disease data set, gene disease data set populations are initialized, and gene features are divided into four groups through random initialization of a random grouping algorithm; a part of instances in the training set are deleted by using a proxy instance algorithm to generate a proxy instance set; for each group of gene features, Tmax iterations are carried out through the backbone particle swarm algorithm, the Tmax iterations are divided into two stages, and function fitness values of particles are evaluated through the proxy instance set and an original instance set respectively; in the first stage, a grouping algorithm is adopted to enable data to be subjected to dimensionality reduction, the optimization speed is increased, an optimization direction is found in global search, in the second stage, a local search algorithm is adopted to enable a population to find an optimal solution after the optimization direction is found, and the optimal solution is a gene feature with the best effect and is output. According to the method, the classification precision of the gene data is improved, and a good effect is achieved on a plurality of disease gene data sets.

column2: POWER LOAD PREDICTION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON EXPRESSWAY NEURAL NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses a power load prediction method and device based on a highway neural network, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining power load data and weather data of a prediction place in a historical time period, and solving a correlation coefficient of the power load data and the weather data; obtaining a feature matrix according to the correlation coefficient, and classifying the running days of the historical load by adopting a clustering analysis method; for each type of operation days, taking the operation day type, daily power load data and related weather data as input, and respectively establishing a corresponding load prediction model based on an artificial intelligence expressway neural network; and determining the type of the current operation day, and carrying out power load prediction by adopting the load prediction model corresponding to the type of the current operation day. According to the scheme, the accuracy of power load prediction is effectively ensured.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SHOOTING DEVICE CONVENIENT FOR STABLE SHOOTING
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of intelligent shooting, in particular to an artificial intelligence shooting device convenient for stable shooting, which comprises a camera, the back of the camera is fixedly connected with a mounting plate, the top of the camera is fixedly provided with a solar cell panel, and the top of the left side of the mounting plate is fixedly connected with a first fixing frame. And a screw rod is vertically connected to the interior of the first fixing frame through a bearing, the outer side of the screw rod is sleeved with a screw sleeve, the screw sleeve is located in the first fixing frame, and the side, close to the solar cell panel, of the screw sleeve is fixedly connected with a moving rod. The device is provided with the screw rod and the moving rod, the cleaning brush is used for cleaning the upper side of the solar cell panel, dust can be effectively prevented from being accumulated on the upper side of the solar cell panel, and therefore the light energy conversion efficiency is improved, the device is provided with the first spring and the contact ball, birds are repelled through sound generated in the collision process of the contact ball, and the device is convenient to use. And birds can be effectively prevented from staying at the lens of the camera.

column2: HOT ROLLED STEEL COIL CURLING EVALUATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to a hot rolled steel coil curl evaluation method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: performing graying processing on an initial steel coil image to obtain a gray image; respectively processing the gray level image to obtain a corresponding moire pattern recognition feature I and a moire pattern recognition feature II, obtaining an initial moire pattern recognition index, and when the initial moire pattern recognition index is greater than a set threshold value, taking a region formed by pixel points corresponding to the initial moire pattern recognition index as an initial moire pattern region; acquiring steel coil images at different camera positions, segmenting and deleting the steel coil images according to the initial moire region to obtain a feature image, extracting the moire region, and calculating a steel coil curling evaluation value corresponding to the camera position according to the moire region; and calculating the coil loosening degree of the current steel coil according to the total area of the initial steel coil image and the obtained steel coil curling evaluation value of each camera position. According to the method, the moire is detected, so that the curl of the steel coil is evaluated, and the detection efficiency is improved.

column2: MULTIFUNCTIONAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ROAD SAFETY SYSTEM
column4: The present invention discloses a multifunctional artificial intelligence road safety system. It includes an artificial intelligence safety guard (110) that comprises a radar sensor (112), an AI camera (113), an IoT controller (114), a display (115), a power supply part (116), and a safety guard (110), and a control server (120) that monitors a road situation in real time by communicating with the safety guard via a network and maintains the artificial intelligence safety guard (110). The present invention can prevent reverse running on a one-way road, easily recognize school zones to comply with speed limits, warn in advance of black ice on mountainous roads or shady roads to prevent accidents, and prevent road kills to play the role of safety guards for road safety, school zones, black ice, and road kills. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR CONSTRUCTING RUNNING SYSTEM, AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: Disclosed are a method and apparatus for constructing a running system, and an electronic device and a storage medium, which relate to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: acquiring an available resource parameter list by means of association querying (S11); receiving a target parameter selected by a user from the available resource parameter list and a self-defined parameter input by the user (S12); checking the target parameter and the self-defined parameter by using a check algorithm, so as to obtain a check result (S13), wherein the check algorithm comprises an integrity check algorithm, a validity check algorithm, and a dependence relationship check algorithm; if the check result indicates that the target parameter and the self-defined parameter are correct, generating a resource template according to the target parameter and the self-defined parameter (S14); creating a resource stack according to the resource template (S15); and constructing a running system according to the resource stack (S16). The method can improve the construction efficiency of a system.

column2: THERMAL IMAGE MONITORING SWITCHBOARD USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention relates to a thermal image monitoring switchboard using artificial intelligence capable of preventing disasters such as a power outage and electric fire due to a failure of a switchboard by making environmental information, sensor information of a field, and thermal image information as big data to predict a state of the switchboard and to request a visit of a field manager by operating an alarm system based on the predicted information. The thermal image monitoring switchboard using artificial intelligence comprises: an enclosure; a deterioration detector installed inside the enclosure and including an arc sensor to sense arc generation and a thermal imaging camera to acquire thermal images; a moving platform installed inside the enclosure for moving a detection area of the deterioration detector to enlarge a detection range; an environmental information receiver installed inside the enclosure to acquire weather information by communication from an external organ; a big data storing unit to detection information of the deterioration detector and weather information of the environmental information receiver; an artificial intelligence determination unit for comparing real time monitoring data of the deterioration detector with data learned by machine running using an artificial neural network based on data of the big data storing unit to calculate a predicted value as a danger degree; and a threshold value alarm unit for determining whether the danger degree predicted value of the artificial intelligence determination unit with a stored threshold value to transfer alarm to a manager when the danger degree predicted value exceeds the threshold value. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: SATELLITE-BORNE ADS-B AND REMOTE SENSING IMAGE COMBINED ABNORMAL TARGET MONITORING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a satellite-borne ADS-B (Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast) and remote sensing image combined abnormal target monitoring method. Firstly, ADS-B message information is received, incoming information of ADS-B signals is obtained, and the information is transmitted to a ground aviation data center in real time. And the ground aviation data center judges abnormal symptoms of data detected by the satellite according to the information returned by the satellite in combination with external access air traffic control data. The high-resolution remote sensing camera is used for carrying out scanning shooting on the vicinity of a target location to obtain a high-resolution remote sensing image in a medium range, and aircraft searching and aircraft type identification are carried out through an artificial intelligence algorithm. And finally, according to remote sensing image observation conditions and abnormal symptoms, specific abnormal conditions are comprehensively judged, and problems are reported to different responsible departments according to different conditions. According to the method, the defects that high-resolution remote sensing monitoring search is large in calculation amount and low in speed are overcome, interference of abnormal deception information can be eliminated under the condition that ADS-B signals are interrupted or deception signals occur, and the efficiency and accuracy of satellite-based abnormal target recognition are greatly improved.

column2: VIDEO RECOMMENDATION METHOD, SERVER AND COMPUTER STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a video recommendation method, a server and a computer storage medium. The method comprises the server obtains a heat map corresponding to multiple video streams, wherein the heat map is drawn according to the shooting place and the shooting time of each video stream, each layer in the heat map corresponds to a time period, each heat area in the layer is used for representing a shooting place corresponding to a plurality of video streams, the shooting time of the plurality of video streams is within the time period of the layer; and when request time and request pose sent by a watching end are received, determining a target layer of which the time period comprises the request time in the heat map, and recommending the video stream in the target heat area corresponding to the shooting place and the request pose in the target layer to the watching end. Thus, video recommendation can be performed according to the time and place required by the watching end, thereby ensuring that the recommended video accords with the scene and interest point required by the user, improving the video watching experience of the user, and enriching the video recommendation modes.

column2: POWER DISTRIBUTION NETWORK RELAY PROTECTION ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SETTING METHOD BASED ON REINFORCEMENT LEARNING ALGORITHM
column4: The invention relates to a power distribution network relay protection artificial intelligence setting method based on a reinforcement learning algorithm. The method is technically characterized by comprising the following steps of: establishing a reward function according to basic properties of relay protection of a power distribution network; calculating a reward value of each circuit breaker in the power distribution network according to the reward function, filling the reward values into a Q-Table table, and establishing a Q-Table table of an algorithm in reinforcement learning; carrying out iteration on the Q values in the Q-Table table; and after all the Q values in the Q-Table table are iterated, obtaining a final constant value of the power distribution network circuit breaker. According to the invention, the automatic setting function of the relay protection constant value of the power distribution network is realized, the setting efficiency of the constant value of the power distribution network is improved, the workload of employees is reduced, the problem of degradation of the setting result caused by constant value mismatch in the traditional setting calculation is effectively solved, the adaptation degree of the setting fixed value to the quickness, selectivity and sensitivity is improved, and then the problems of override tripping, failure in fault removal, overlong removal time and the like of the power distribution network caused by fixed value degradation are solved.

column2: INTELLIGENT CONSTRUCTION SITE MONITORING DEVICE
column4: The intelligent construction site monitoring device comprises a mounting plate, a first bevel gear is rotationally connected to the middle of the lower end face of the mounting plate, a threaded sleeve is fixedly connected to the lower end face of the first bevel gear, a threaded rod is in threaded connection with an inner cavity of the threaded sleeve, and a supporting plate is fixedly connected to the lower end face of the threaded rod. A bottom plate is fixedly connected to the lower end face of the supporting plate through a vertical plate, mounting blocks are symmetrically arranged on the left side and the right side of the front end face of the vertical plate, a second machine base is fixedly connected to the right end face of the mounting block located on the right side of the vertical plate, and a first servo motor is arranged at the upper end of the second machine base; the output shaft end of the first servo motor is fixedly connected with a first arc-shaped plate. The intelligent construction site monitoring device relates to the technical field of intelligent construction site monitoring devices. According to the intelligent construction site monitoring device, the problems that the monitoring angle of an existing intelligent construction site monitoring device is inconvenient to adjust, camera shooting dead angles exist, and monitoring fails due to the fact that no camera lens wiping equipment exists are solved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODEL TRAINING METHOD AND DEVICE, FAR-END PLATFORM AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence model training method and device, a far-end platform and a readable storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring standard encrypted data preprocessed and encrypted by an ith client; determining M target clients for training an artificial intelligence model from the N clients according to the running states of the N clients, and training the artificial intelligence model by using the M target clients and the standard encrypted data; receiving an ith training result output by the M target clients, and issuing the ith training result to a corresponding ith client, so that the ith client decrypts the training result, determines an evaluation index of the artificial intelligence model according to the decrypted training result, and uploads the evaluation index to a far-end platform; and determining whether to continue training the artificial intelligence model according to the evaluation index. According to the scheme, the safety of the training data can be effectively guaranteed, and the training speed of the artificial intelligence model can be increased.

column2: POINT OF INTEREST SIGNBOARD ORIENTATION DETERMINATION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a point of interest signboard orientation determination method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an intelligent traffic technology and a deep learning technology. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: according to road network information and/or ground feature information of the position of an interest point, determining a candidate signboard orientation of the interest point; obtaining a signboard image of the point of interest, and determining a value range of a signboard orientation of the point of interest in combination with shooting information of the signboard image; and determining a real signboard orientation of the point of interest according to the value range of the signboard orientation of the point of interest and the candidate signboard orientation of the point of interest. According to the scheme, the accuracy of calculating the POI signboard space orientation is improved.

column2: METHOD FOR REHABILITATION OF PATIENT WITH MUSCULOSKELETAL DISEASE BY USING POWER EXOSKELETON
column4: The invention provides a method for rehabilitation of a patient with musculoskeletal disease by using a powered exoskeleton, and relates to the technical field of musculoskeletal disease governance, the method for rehabilitation of the patient with the musculoskeletal disease by using the powered exoskeleton comprises the following steps: the comprehensive rehabilitation effect of the disabled are evaluated, i.e. indexes are measured and summarized at the beginning and the ending of a rehabilitation course, three groups of indexes are considered, and five parameters are respectively used for representing the functional states of a body, namely the cognitive function, the muscle tension, the muscle strength, the severity of pain and the excretion function; the activities in the five parameters include wrist ability, physical ability, action ability, self-service level and productivity at home; four parameters including communication skill, leisure, socialization and occupational fitness are involved, Sp1, the following physical signs are measured for research. According to the method, user data are recorded for multiple times, and the function relation between the change of first and second average characteristics of a period along with time and a vertical component supporting reaction is determined.

column2: ADVERSARIAL SAMPLE GENERATION METHOD
column4: The invention provides an adversarial sample generation method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of computer vision. According to the specific implementation scheme, acquiring a disturbance image used for representing countermeasure disturbance; displaying the disturbance image in a scene where a sample object is located through display equipment; and shooting the scene displaying the disturbance image through an image acquisition equipment to obtain an adversarial sample. The accuracy of the generated adversarial sample can be improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE THECHNOLOGY-BASED ABNORMAL SYMPTOM TARGET DETECTION MEHOTD USING BIG DATA AND SYSTEM THEREOF
column4: According to various embodiments of the present invention, an abnormal symptom target detection system for detecting an abnormal symptom of a target sailing the sea comprises: a radar detecting the sailing target to output sailing target information; a server transmitting storage target information for targets pre-registered by the server to a ship identifying device; and the ship identifying device fusing the sailing target information and the storage target information to determine and display whether the sailing target has the abnormal symptom. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: EXERCISE ROUTE RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND DEVICE AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an exercise route recommendation method and device and a medium.
