The method comprises the following steps of: acquiring current position information of electronic equipment and target exercise information of the electronic equipment input by a user; determining a plurality of to-be-selected exercise routes according to the current position information and the target exercise information; obtaining a plurality of recommendation factors of each to-be-selected exercise route; sorting the plurality of to-be-selected exercise routes based on the plurality of obtained recommendation factors of each to-be-selected exercise route; and outputting information of one or more recommended to-be-selected exercise routes according to a sorting result. According to the exercise route recommendation method and device and the medium, the to-be-selected exercise routes are sorted according to the factors such as the road section topography, road section environment and road section safety of the to-be-selected exercise routes, and the recommended information of one or more exercise routes is output according to the sorting result of the to-be-selected exercise routes for the user to select, so that the exercise experience of the user is improved, and the personalized exercise requirements of the user are met. The method and the device can be used for artificial intelligence (AI) equipment, and can provide intelligent recommendations for the user.

column2: TRUSTZONE-BASED CREDIBLE QUANTITATIVE MODEL REASONING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a TrustZone-based credible quantitative model reasoning method, which comprises the following steps of: firstly, dividing Internet of Things terminal equipment for executing artificial intelligence model reasoning into a safe world and a common world by adopting a TrustZone technology, and carrying out analysis and data quantification on an artificial intelligence model in the safe world; dividing calculation nodes into simple calculation nodes and complex calculation nodes, deploying the simple calculation nodes to the safe world, deploying the complex calculation nodes to a shared memory of the safe world; when artificial intelligence model reasoning is carried out, running the simple calculation nodes in the safe world; sending the complex calculation node to the common world through the shared memory to run, returning an operation result to the safe world, verifying the operation result of the complex calculation node by the Internet of Things terminal equipment and then integrating the operation result with an operation result of the simple calculation node, and obtaining an artificial an intelligence model reasoning result. According to the method, the simple calculation nodes and the complex calculation nodes are deployed separately, so that the reasoning efficiency of the artificial intelligence model is improved.

column2: POSE RECOGNITION METHOD AND APPARATUS BASED ON TWO-DIMENSIONAL CAMERA, AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: A pose recognition method and apparatus based on a two-dimensional camera, and a device and a storage medium, which relate to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: acquiring, by means of a two-dimensional camera, a human body image of a human body to be subjected to recognition (S1); according to the human body image, extracting body contour information, pose information and gender information of said human body (S2); generating an SMPL model according to the body contour information, the pose information and the gender information (S3); acquiring a 3D node feature from the SMPL model (S4); extracting a 2D node feature of said human body from the human body image (S5); generating an error function according to the 3D node feature and the 2D node feature (S6); adjusting the SMPL model according to the error function, and extracting a target 3D joint feature from the adjusted SMPL model (S7); acquiring skeleton information according to the target 3D joint feature (S8); and performing pose analysis according to the skeleton information (S9). The pose recognition method and apparatus based on a two-dimensional camera, and the device and the storage medium can be applied to the field of blockchains, and can accurately recognize a pose of a human body to be subjected to recognition.

column2: METHOD OF PERSONALIZING, INDIVIDUALIZING, AND AUTOMATING THE MANAGEMENT OF HEALTHCARE FRAUD-WASTE-ABUSE TO UNIQUE INDIVIDUAL HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS
column4: A method of preventing healthcare fraud-waste-abuse uses artificial intelligence machines to limit financial losses. Healthcare payment request claims are analyzed by predictive models and their behavioral details are compared to running profiles unique to each healthcare provider submitting the claims. A decision results that the instant healthcare payment request claim is or is not fraudulent-wasteful-abusive. If it is, a second analysis of a group behavioral in which the healthcare provider is clustered using unsupervised learning algorithms and compared to a running profile unique to each group of healthcare providers submitting the claims. An overriding decision results if the instant healthcare payment request claim is or is not fraudulent-wasteful-abusive according to group behavior.

column2: SPEED PLANNING METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR SELF-DRIVING, DEVICE, MEDIUM AND VEHICLE
column4: Provided are a speed planning method and apparatus for self-driving, a device and a medium, relating to artificial intelligence technologies such as self-driving and deep learning. The solution includes acquiring the current state of a vehicle (S101) and interpolating actions based on the current state and a predetermined state table to obtain the target action of the current state (S102). The current state includes at least the remaining running distance and the current speed. The state table is determined based on a reinforcement learning method and includes multiple states and an action performed in each state. The action performed in each state includes at least acceleration. With the solution, table lookup replaces a neural network. It is possible to determine the target action of the current state simply by determining the state table offline and then performing table lookup online. Therefore, not only not a large number of computing resources are occupied, but the global optimal solution of speed planning can also be obtained.

column2: DATA TRANSMISSION METHOD, EQUIPMENT, DEVICE AND SYSTEM IN FACE RECOGNITION AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a data transmission method, equipment, device and system in face recognition and a medium, and relates to a computer vision technology of artificial intelligence. The method is applied to the terminal, the terminal comprises a camera assembly and a host, the camera assembly comprises an image acquisition device and an image processing chip, and the host comprises a client running in a common execution environment REE. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a face recognition image through the image acquisition device; sending the face recognition image to a server through the image processing chip, and receiving a face recognition result sent by the server, wherein the server is used for conducting face recognition on the face recognition image to obtain the face recognition result; and sending the face recognition result to the client through the image processing chip. According to the method, the security of the face recognition data can be guaranteed.

column2: COMMUNICATION EQUIPMENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a communication device based on artificial intelligence, which belongs to the field of communication, and comprises a fixed base, the fixed base is fixed on the waist through a rope belt, a communication machine is inserted in the fixed base, and the communication machine is fixed in a staggered manner through a clamping block. When the communication device needs to be used, a pressing block is pressed, a first push rod and a second push rod move in a staggered mode, a clamping block is made to be separated from a clamping groove, the communication device is matched with an elastic piece through a limiting block, the communication device is lightly popped out, and the communication device is convenient to take and use; the communication equipment can fall down and displace due to gravity, and the descending height of the communication equipment is limited by a limiting block, so that a clamping block is prevented from being embedded into a clamping groove again, the communication equipment can be fixedly inserted conveniently, the phenomenon that the communication equipment falls down and is damaged in the running process is avoided, and the communication equipment is convenient to take and use.

column2: HUMANOID ROBOT IN HUMANOID STRUCTURE
column4: The invention provides a humanoid robot in a humanoid structure, and relates to the field of robots. The humanoid robot in the humanoid structure comprises a body model. A head model is arranged at the top of the body model, a camera is arranged on the front face of the head model, arm models are symmetrically arranged on the two sides of the body model, a circular plate is arranged above the body model, a sliding groove is formed in the circular plate, and the body model is connected with a fixing frame. According to the humanoid robot in the humanoid structure, the body model, the head model and the arm models are used for forming the robot; through cooperation of the rear arm, the front arm, the small electric push rod, the first motor, the gear and the rotating shaft, the robot makes the left-hand and right-hand alternate punching action; and through cooperation of the large electric push rod, the first motor, the third motor and the small electric push rod, the robot makes a swing punching action. Therefore, interaction between the robot dummy and a boxer is achieved, punching is conducted according to the actions of the boxer, and the purpose of training the defending capacity, the dodging capacity and the like of the boxer is achieved; and the boxing training effect is further improved.

column2: VEHICLE DRIVING ASSISTANCE SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of auxiliary driving, and particularly discloses a vehicle driving assistance system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a voice information input module, a network connection module, a driving assistance module and an execution module; the voice information input module is used to input voice commands, the driving assistance module is used for assisting a driver in vehicle driving in the driving process, the network connection module is used for providing network connection for the driving assistance module, and the execution module is used for executing functions of the driving assistance module. The driving assistance module comprises an information processing unit, a navigation unit, a camera shooting unit, a monitoring unit and a reminding unit, and the information processing unit is used for processing information input by the voice information input module. While assisting the driver in driving, the system can supervise and prompt the driving time of the driver, fatigue driving is avoided, meanwhile, the requirement for monitoring the environment inside and outside a vehicle is met, and the driver can conveniently open and close a window for ventilation in time.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD, INTELLIGENT DEVICE, INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a data processing method, an intelligent device, intelligent equipment and a storage medium, the data processing method relates to an artificial intelligence technology of behavior simulation and following, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining an operation request packet; acquiring intelligent user account data, and updating user data included in the operation data in the operation request packet by using the intelligent user account data to obtain a target operation request packet; determining an operation type to which the target operation belongs according to the operation data, and selecting a script according to the operation type; and performing recombination processing on the selected script according to the target operation request packet, and running the recombined script to send the target operation request packet to an operation interface provided by the social platform. The operation of the user can be intelligently processed, the robot operation can be automatically executed along with the operation of the user, the intelligent requirement is met, and the data processing efficiency is improved.

column2: CREDIT DEBT INVESTMENT TRANSACTION RISK PREDICTION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides a credit debt investment transaction risk prediction method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of collecting transaction data in a credit debt investment transaction process, wherein the transaction data comprises training set data and prediction set data; performing supervised training according to the training set data and a support vector machine algorithm to obtain a credit debt risk prediction model; performing risk prediction on the prediction set data based on a credit debt risk prediction model and determining the prediction accuracy of risk prediction; taking the prediction accuracy as a fitness value of a cuckoo search algorithm, and performing iterative optimization processing on penalty factors and kernel parameters in the credit debt risk prediction model through the cuckoo search algorithm to obtain a risk prediction model; and performing risk prediction on the target transaction data in the target credit debt investment transaction process based on the risk prediction model. According to the invention, the prediction accuracy of the risk prediction model is improved, the learning cost is reduced, and therefore, the prediction accuracy of the credit debt investment transaction risk is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IDENTIFICATION JELLY DEFECT DETECTION DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses a jelly defect detection device based on artificial intelligence identification, which belongs to the field of automatic detection and comprises a glass turntable, a support is arranged on one side of the glass turntable and connected with a detection barrel, the glass turntable rotates below the detection barrel, a camera fixing plate is arranged on the outer wall of the detection barrel, and a camera is arranged on the camera fixing plate. A camera is arranged on the camera fixing plate, the camera is located above the glass turntable, a lens is arranged at the front end of the camera, a through hole is formed in the side wall of the detection barrel, and the lens is aligned to the through hole. According to the device, 360-degree dead-corner-free shooting can be carried out on products through the four cameras with 90-degree included angles, AI defect identification is carried out on foreign matters in jelly, whether the products have the foreign matters or not is judged, unqualified products are removed in time, automatic online detection is achieved, and the production efficiency of the food industry is improved.

column2: ELECTRIC BICYCLE RED LIGHT RUNNING VIDEO ANALYSIS AND IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an electric bicycle red light running video analysis and identification method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: a video access module which is responsible for accessing a monitoring video of a traffic intersection, converting a video stream into a single-frame video image, obtaining the collection time of each frame of image, and transmitting the collection time to an artificial intelligence analysis module; the artificial intelligence analysis module is responsible for analyzing and comparing whether early warning information exists or not by adopting a convolutional neural network according to the single-frame video image; and the early warning output module is used for synthesizing evidence data according to the analysis result of the artificial intelligence analysis module and the video data of the video access module, capturing the picture left evidence before and after the electric bicycle enters the zebra crossing, and uploading the picture left evidence to an upper server in time to inform related functional departments. According to the method, the traffic light detection accuracy can be improved in real time, the electric bicycle is detected and tracked at high speed, and the red light running behavior of the electric bicycle is detected in real time.

column2: METHODS AND SYSTEM FOR TRAINING AND IMPROVING MACHINE LEARNING MODELS
column4: A Sports Detection System including Sports Detection Device having an artificial intelligence (AI) recognition embedded therein and configured to run an Action Detection Model (ADM) that identifies and stores one or more individual sports actions on the Sports Detection Device for later offloading onto a secondary computing device. Methods for training and improving the ADM include tagging time-aligned portions of sensed and video data to be confirmed by profilers where the feedback can be run through a supervised learning algorithm to generate or update an ADM. The process of identifying and tagging identified portions of time-aligned data can be aided by integrating data mining and pattern recognition techniques.

column2: METHOD FOR GENERATING SKELETON DATA FOR CONSECUTIVE IMAGES AND COMPUTER PROGRAM RECORDED IN RECORDING MEDIUM FOR EXECUTING METHOD
column4: The present invention proposes a method for generating skeleton data for an object identically included in consecutive images. The method comprises the steps of: identifying a second image taken temporally successively with a first image when the first image which is a target of an annotation work for artificial intelligence (AI) learning is loaded; identifying the same object as the object included in the second image from among objects included in the first image; identifying a structure template to be applied to the object included in the first image on the basis of the skeleton data annotated on the object included in the second image; and overlaying and outputting the identified structure template on the first image. In such case, the skeleton data is data related to the three-dimensional skeleton of the object for identifying a body shape, a pose, or a direction of the object included in the image, and the structure template may be a data structure having a predefined number of key points and a connection relationship between the predefined key points according to the properties of the object. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: METHOD FOR GENERATING SKELETON DATA FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LEARNING AND COMPUTER PROGRAM RECORDED ON RECORDING MEDIUM FOR EXECUTING SAME
column4: Disclosed is a method for generating skeleton data of an object included in an image when annotating data for training artificial intelligence (AI). According to the present invention, the method comprises the following steps: when an image which is a target of an annotation work for training AI is loaded, identifying a structure template to be utilized for generation of skeleton data; outputting the identified structure template by overlaying the identified structure template on the image; moving positions of one or more key points included in the structure template under control of an operator; and generating skeleton data corresponding to an object included in the image on the basis of position coordinates of the moved key point and a connection relationship between the key points. In this case, the skeleton data is data related to a three-dimensional skeleton of an object for identifying the body shape, pose, or direction of the object included in the image and the structure template can be a data structure having a predefined number of key points according to properties of the object and a connection relationship between the predefined key points. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: METHOD FOR GENERATING SKELETON DATA ACCORDING TO THREE-DIMENSIONAL MODEL AND COMPUTER PROGRAM RECORDED IN RECORDING MEDIUM FOR EXECUTING SAME
column4: The present invention relates to a method capable of generating skeleton data of an object according to a three-dimensional model included in an image in annotating data for artificial intelligence (AI) learning, establishing a relationship between adjacent key points to analyze a clear structure or posture, and estimating a hidden structure or posture, and a computer program recorded in a recording medium in order to execute the same. Proposed is the method for generating skeleton data of objects included in images in annotating data for AI learning. The method comprises the steps of: identifying a structure template that can be utilized for the generation of skeleton data, when an image that is a target of an annotation work for AI learning is loaded; outputting an identified structure template by overlaying the same on the image; moving the positions of one or more key points included in the structure template under the control of an operator; and generating skeleton data corresponding to an object included in the image on the basis of the positional coordinates of the moved key points and a connection relationship between the key points. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: NETWORK SECURITY MONITORING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a network security monitoring device based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of security monitoring. The network security monitoring device comprises a monitoring device body, a fixed box, a support rod, a mounting rack and a camera, one side of the monitoring device body is fixedly sleeved with the camera, and the bottom of the monitoring device body is fixedly connected with the fixed box. Through cooperation of a first hydraulic rod and a movable frame, a cleaning frame is driven to move to one side of the camera, then through cooperation of an air compressor, a water pipe and an atomization nozzle, water in an inner cavity of a water tank is pumped out to clean the camera, and through cooperation of a second hydraulic rod and a motor, a sponge block is driven to wipe away water stains and dust on the camera; the problem that when an existing monitoring device is used for a long time, dust and impurities in the air can be attached to the camera at the front end of the monitoring device, and consequently the shooting definition of the monitoring device is reduced is solved, dust on the camera can be rapidly cleaned, and the shooting definition of the device is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MANAGEMENT AND CONTROL SYSTEM FOR PARK
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence management and control system for a park, which comprises a server, an access control, a monitoring camera, a body temperature monitoring module, an infrared probe, an identity card scanning module, a safety reservation system and a mask wearing monitoring system. The server is used for processing, calculating and executing various commands of the whole park artificial intelligence management and control system, the access control is used for managing personnel to enter and exit, the body temperature monitoring module is used for monitoring the body temperature of a user, the infrared probe is used for shooting and sensing the body temperature of the user, the identity card scanning module is used for scanning identity card information of the user, and the mask wearing monitoring system is used for monitoring whether the user wears a mask or not. According to the invention, the user can conveniently reserve the quota of entering the park in advance, the health code and identity information of the user can be directly verified, the phenomenon that the health code is scanned by using mobile phones of other people is avoided, and whether people in the park wear masks or not can be monitored in real time.

column2: INSTANT NOODLE YELLOW SPOT DETECTION METHOD BASED ON DEEP LEARNING
column4: The invention discloses an instant noodle yellow spot detection method based on deep learning in the technical field of machine vision deep learning defect detection, and the method comprises the following steps: 1, building a shooting environment on a production line by using an industrial camera and a strip-shaped light source, the shooting environment needs to be consistent in a sample image collection process and a production process; 2, shooting a large number of instant noodle images, wherein the instant noodle images must comprise standard images and defect images and are classified; and 3, carrying out preprocessing, so that images have different effect. The instant noodle yellow spot detection method provided by the invention saves labor cost, is convenient to manage, avoids danger caused by manual operation, and is high in detection efficiency.

column2: CONTROL METHOD FOR AUTOMATIC RUNNING OF LIGHT UNMANNED WING SAIL VEHICLE
column4: The invention discloses a control method for automatic running of a light unmanned wing sail vehicle. The control method comprises the steps that wind speed and direction information, inertia information and position information of the light unmanned wing sail vehicle are obtained; wherein the inertia information comprises orientation information; according to the inertia information and the position information, the speed information of the light unmanned wing sail vehicle is determined; when the light unmanned wing sail vehicle runs against the wind, the attack angle of the light unmanned wing sail vehicle is determined according to the orientation information and the wind speed and direction information; a wing sail steering device is controlled to adjust the orientation of the wing sail according to the attack angle; and according to the speed information, the position information and the orientation information, a wheel steering device is controlled to adjust the driving direction of the wheel assembly. When the vehicle runs against the wind, the attack angle is obtained according to the orientation information and the wind speed and direction information, and the orientation of the wing sail is adjusted according to the attack angle; and then the driving direction of the wheel assembly is adjusted according to the speed information, the position information and the orientation information, and therefore driving under the upwind condition is achieved.

column2: HIGH DYNAMIC RANGE IMAGE GENERATION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON CONVERTER TEMPERATURE MEASUREMENT
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a high dynamic range image generation method and system based on converter temperature measurement. The method comprises the step of converting a conventional carbon flower image into a clear carbon flower high dynamic range image through a trained standard lookup table, wherein the method for training the standard lookup table comprises the following steps of: shooting at different transparent transmission degrees by adopting a camera with an RCCC array to obtain a plurality of exposure image combinations, combining the exposure image combinations into a plurality of high-dynamic-range images, and screening the high-dynamic-range images with the most abundant texture features as a standard image; adjusting a camera to obtain a standard high dynamic range image according to the transparent transmission coefficient of the standard image, and training a standard lookup table by comparing the denoised standard high dynamic range image with the conventional image. According to the method, the function of quickly converting the conventional image into the high-dynamic-range image through the lookup table is realized, the acquisition speed of the high-dynamic-range image is greatly improved, and meanwhile, the camera is more energy-saving.

column2: INTELLIGENT COLOR RECOGNITION DEVICE
column4: An intelligent color recognition device comprises a power supply, an IV conversion amplifier, a solid-state relay and a perovskite photoelectric detector, the IV conversion amplifier and the solid-state relay are electrically connected with the power supply, the perovskite photoelectric detector is connected with the IV conversion amplifier, the detection wavelength of the perovskite photoelectric detector is adjustable, and the perovskite photoelectric detector is used for receiving a color signal of a detected object and generating a current signal according to the color signal. The IV conversion amplifier is used for receiving a current signal generated by the perovskite photoelectric detector and converting the current signal into a voltage signal, and the solid-state relay is used for receiving the voltage signal formed by the IV conversion amplifier and controlling the on-off of the switch according to the voltage signal. According to the utility model, the perovskite photoelectric detector is taken as a core, intelligent color identification can be realized, the structure is simple, the operation is convenient, the cost is low, the device can be used for color identification of the whole visible light wave band, the accuracy is high, and the device has high practical value and potential in the industrial fields of industrial manufacturing, artificial intelligence, automatic driving and the like.

column2: FEDERAL LEARNING METHOD, FEDERAL LEARNING DEVICE AND FEDERAL LEARNING SYSTEM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a federal learning method, a federal learning device and a federal learning system, relates to the technical field of security, and aims to improve the security of data in a federal learning process. The method comprises the following steps: sending a model running environment executable mirror image file to a data participant; sending the participant artificial intelligence training model to the data participant; loading the global artificial intelligence training model to a first security isolation memory through the virtual machine; isolating the first security isolation memory from the running environment of the memory required when the CPU of the central server runs; receiving an intermediate iteration parameter sent by the data participant through the virtual machine; obtaining the intermediate iteration parameter by training a participant artificial intelligence training model by the data participant by using a local data set; and calculating global model parameters by the virtual machine according to the intermediate iteration parameters, and judging whether convergence of the global artificial intelligence training model meets an expected value or not based on the global model parameters. The method is suitable for training the artificial intelligence model.

column2: SCHEDULE ACTIVITY CONFLICT JUDGMENT METHOD, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an intelligent schedule activity conflict judgment method, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining two activity events which are at least partially overlapped in time, the two activity events being one schedule event in a calendar application, and the second activity event being the other schedule event in the calendar application or an activity event generated when an exercise health application learns work and rest behaviors of a user; or obtaining an activity event generated by a transaction platform application through a notification manager, or obtaining a severe weather event through a weather three-party cloud database. The method further judges that the two activity events conflict according to the activity factors of the two activity events and the attribute values of the activity factors, and prompts that the two activity events conflict, and the activity factors relate to the requirements or influences of the occurrence of the activity events on the user or the environment. According to some embodiments provided by the invention, the accuracy of conflict judgment of the activity event is improved.

column2: COMMUNICATION METHOD IN DEAF-MUTE ORAL TREATMENT PROCESS AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to the field of intelligent medical treatment, and discloses a communication method in a deaf-mute oral treatment process and related equipment thereof, in the method, an oral comprehensive treatment machine is provided with a shooting module with an adjustable shooting direction and a display screen with an adjustable display direction; when a doctor performs oral treatment on the deaf-mute, the oral comprehensive treatment machine captures a first sign language action made by the deaf-mute by using the shooting module, translates the first sign language action into a first voice through artificial intelligence, and outputs the first voice to the doctor; the oral cavity comprehensive treatment machine obtains a second voice sent by the doctor in response to the first voice, and translates the second voice into a second sign language action through artificial intelligence; and the oral cavity comprehensive treatment machine controls the virtual character displayed in the display screen to make the second sign language action for the deaf-mute to watch. According to the embodiment of the invention, the deaf-mute does not need to be helped by a translator in the oral treatment process, and the oral treatment efficiency of a doctor on the deaf-mute is improved.

column2: RUNNING POSTURE DETECTION METHOD AND WEARABLE DEVICE
column4: Provided are a running posture detection method and a wearable device. The method is applied to the fields of artificial intelligence and human-computer interaction. The method comprises: during the process of a user running with a wearable device being worn on their left foot, the wearable device detecting a first running posture parameter of the left foot of the user, wherein the first running posture parameter is used for representing the state of the left foot of the user during the running process, or during the process of the user running with the wearable device being worn on their right foot, the wearable device detecting a second running posture parameter of the right foot of the user, wherein the second running posture parameter is used for representing the state of the right foot of the user during the running process; determining the degree of balance of the user according to the first running posture parameter and the second running posture parameter; and determining, according to the degree of balance, whether a running posture of the user is correct. In the method, a wearable device can evaluate a running posture of a user, so as to guide the user to run correctly and healthily.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AUTOMATED HEALTH AND FITNESS ADVISEMENT
column4: A system for the generation and maintenance of a virtual assistant that facilitates a systematic and psychological approach to health-improvement and self-care. Via interaction with the assistant, patients interact to create personalized health-improvement plans and adapt based upon physiological measurements and artificial intelligence analyses of data collected from the patient via either a sensor or patient input. The system may dynamically improve health recommendations based upon patient response to interaction with the system. A computational method with statistical inference of biophysical parameters that define an artificial intelligence's internal biophysical simulation environment, which does not rely on an artificial neural network. The corresponding method relies on an internal biophysical network that computationally replicates the patient's unique, health-relevant physiological processes, and uses psychological techniques to encourage improvement of the patient's health.

column2: SMALL AND MEDIUM AIRPORT CONTROL CONFLICT SOLUTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a small and medium airport control conflict solution method and system based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the conflict types and positions of entering and leaving aircrafts, and obtaining a conflict solution library; pre-judging whether the aircraft has a conflict or not by combining the flight plan library and the conflict solution library, if so, calculating the place where the conflict occurs, and obtaining a conflict resolution scheme from the conflict solution library; detecting running of the aircraft in real time, comparing whether the aircraft is matched with the program control interval standard or not, and if not, giving and achieving an alarm; presetting the short-term conflict alarm time, performing rapid simulation according to the real-time state and the flight trend of the aircraft, and predicting whether the flight conflict possibly occurring in the future can be solved or not by executing the plan in the current state. According to the method, a conflict control plan is automatically generated based on an artificial intelligence heuristic algorithm in combination with a flight plan and airspace characteristics, and meanwhile, short-term conflict early warning and real-time conflict warning can be performed, so that the workload of a controller is reduced.

column2: ELECTRIC ENERGY METERING DEVICE STATE PREDICTION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON GAUSSIAN PROCESS
column4: The invention discloses an electric energy metering device state prediction method based on a Gaussian process, belongs to the technical field of electric energy metering and artificial intelligence, and relates to prediction of the operation state of an electric energy metering device by using collected offline data based on the Gaussian process. The off-line data of the electric energy metering device is more and complex, so that the general regression model and neural network are not efficient and accurate in the aspect. The Gaussian process has good performance in prediction of a nonparametric model and a black box function, and the device establishes an excellent evaluation system on the basis of the Gaussian process, and realizes prediction of the running state of the electric energy metering device with complex offline data by adopting a method of combining covariance and optimizing hyper-parameters.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE STUDENT CLASSROOM DOZE STATE DETECTION SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence student classroom doze state detection system, which comprises a video acquisition module, a control module and a vibration reminding module, and is characterized in that the video acquisition module and the vibration reminding module are in signal connection with the control module; wherein the video acquisition module is used for periodically shooting students from the front side to obtain video images of the students; the control module receives the video image, calls a preset judgment model to analyze the video image, obtains the mental state of the student, and sends a trigger signal to the vibration reminding module if the mental state of the student is an abnormal state; the vibration reminding module is arranged on the desk and used for receiving and responding to the trigger signal to send out vibration reminding. The system can automatically judge whether the student is in a fatigue state according to the acquired video image of the student, and after the student is confirmed to be in the fatigue state, the vibration reminding module arranged on the desk vibrates to remind the student to adjust the class state in time.

column2: WATER SURFACE FLOATING OBJECT MULTI-CAMERA REAL-TIME DETECTION METHOD BASED ON SSD NETWORK
column4: The invention relates to the field of machine learning and image recognition, in particular to a water surface floating object multi-camera real-time detection method based on an SSD network, and the method comprises the following steps: 1, collecting water surface floating object data through video recording, camera shooting and network collection; 2, performing water surface floating object data amplification by adopting a data noise reduction and data enhancement algorithm; 3, labeling the water surface floating object data set by adopting a Labelimg tool; 4, adopting transfer learning to train the SSD network model to obtain an optimal weight model; 5, detecting a multi-camera water surface floating object target based on the SSD network optimal weight model in real time. According to the invention, multi-camera real-time detection is carried out on the water surface floaters based on the SSD network, the interference of illumination, weather and dynamic background on real-time detection can be effectively reduced, the defect of single camera detection is made up, and the requirements of real-time performance and precision are met.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BIONIC EYE STRUCTURE
column4: The artificial intelligence bionic eye structure comprises a camera shooting unit, a rotary supporting unit and a driving unit, the camera shooting unit is rotationally connected with the rotary supporting unit, the driving unit comprises a pull wire, a telescopic binding piece and a supporting pulley, the pull wire is connected with the telescopic binding piece and matched with the supporting pulley, and the telescopic binding piece is connected with the supporting pulley. The telescopic collecting part comprises a base, a micro motor and a cable disc, the base is fixedly connected with the rotary supporting unit, the output end of the micro motor is connected with the cable disc through a speed reducer, and the cable disc is fixedly connected with one end of a traction line. According to the bionic eye structure, rotation driving of the bionic eye structure is achieved through mutual cooperation of the pull wire, the telescopic collecting piece and the supporting pulley of the driving unit, the bionic eye structure can freely rotate like human eyes through mutual cooperation of the driving unit and the rotary supporting unit, and therefore the good visual bionic effect is achieved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGE DATA ACQUISITION SYSTEM FOR INSECT PEST CONTROL FACILITY
column4: The utility model relates to an artificial intelligence image data acquisition system for insect pest control facilities, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The system comprises at least one deinsectization device, an image shooting device and a terminal processing device, insect sticking paper is arranged in the deinsectization device, the insect sticking paper is used for sticking insects, the image shooting device is used for shooting the insects on the insect sticking paper and numbering shot images of the insect sticking paper in sequence, and the terminal processing device is connected with the terminal processing device. A WIFI module is arranged in the image shooting device, the image shooting device transmits an image to the terminal processing device through the WIFI module, and the terminal processing device is used for comparing the transmitted influence; the terminal processing device comprises a memory module and a system processing module. An original manual data information acquisition mode is changed, the PCO working time is saved, the service efficiency is improved, and the accuracy of pest monitoring and the professional degree of identification and classification are improved.

column2: CABLE CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The invention discloses a cable climbing robot which comprises a rack, a holding assembly and a plurality of driving pre-tightening assemblies, the holding assembly is arranged on the rack and used for holding a cable, and all the driving pre-tightening assemblies surround the rack and are arranged at the upper end and the lower end of the rack correspondingly. The driving pre-tightening assembly comprises a base arranged on the rack; a supporting frame in which one end is rotatably arranged on the base, and the other end is provided with a roller; an adjusting rodwhose two ends are connected with the base and the supporting frame respectively, wherein the angle of the supporting frame relative to the base is adjusted by adjusting the length of the adjusting rod; and a rolling wheel which is provided with a driving motor, and attached to a cable rope and walks on the cable rope by adjusting the angle of the supporting frame relative to the base. The cable climbing robot not only can span a spiral line on the outer surface of the cable, but also can advance on the cable at a high speed.

column2: RUNNING POSTURE DETECTION METHOD AND WEARABLE EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a running posture detection method and wearable equipment. The method is applied to the fields of artificial intelligence and human-computer interaction. The method comprises the steps that in the process that a user wears the wearable equipment to run on the left foot, the wearable equipment detects a first running posture parameter of the left foot of the user; the first running posture parameter is used for representing the state of the left foot of the user in the running process; or in the process that the right foot of the user wears the wearable equipment to run, the wearable equipment detects a second running posture parameter of the right foot of the user; the second running posture parameter is used for representing the state of the right foot of the user in the running process; the balance degree of the user is determined according to the first running posture parameter and the second running posture parameter; and whether the running posture of the user is correct or not is determined according to the balance degree. In the method, the wearable equipment can evaluate the running posture of the user so as to guide the user to run correctly and healthily.

column2: IMAGE SHOOTING METHOD AND DEVICE, IMAGE CLASSIFICATION MODEL TRAINING METHOD AND DEVICE AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides an image shooting method, an image classification model training method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence technology and Internet of Vehicles, in particular to the technical field of machine learning and computer vision. The method comprises the following steps: determining the type of a shot image based on a trained target image classification model, and determining whether the image is a desired image or not according to the determined type of the image; and when the type of the shot image is the type wanted by the user, storing the shot image, so that the shot image is stored only when the type of the shot image is the type wanted by the user, and thereby the memory space occupied by the shot image is reduced; in addition, the target image classification model is obtained by training based on the to-be-stored image types selected by the user and the images corresponding to the image types, so that the relevance between the trained target image classification model and the user is improved. The matching degree between the classification result determined based on the target image classification model and the result expected by the user is higher.

column2: SIMPLY SUPPORTED BEAM DEFORMATION MEASUREMENT AND CRACK DETECTION SYSTEM BASED ON MULTI-MOBILE-PHONE SHOOTING
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a simply supported beam deformation measurement and crack detection system based on multi-mobile-phone shooting. The system is characterized in that an image acquisition module obtains a first marker line sequence of a first area and a second marker line sequence of a second area; a first marker line prediction module predicts a marker line of the first region through the second marker line sequence to obtain a first candidate marker line sequence; the candidate marker line sequence processing module screens and fuses the first candidate marker line sequences to obtain a first predicted marker line sequence and a corresponding first accuracy rate; a second marker line prediction module predicts a second prediction marker line sequence and a corresponding second accuracy rate of the first region at the next moment according to a sequence formed by combining the first prediction marker line sequence and the first marker line sequence; and the accuracy rate evaluation module updates the mark line sequence information through the first accuracy rate and the second accuracy rate. According to the method, rich mark line data and crack data are obtained at the same time through multiple segments of prediction mark lines.

column2: METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT FOR IDENTIFYING SURROUNDING WATER PERTURBED SOIL RANGE OF POWER TRANSMISSION LINE
column4: The invention discloses a method, a device and equipment for identifying a surrounding water perturbed soil range of a power transmission line. The method comprises the following steps of S1, preparing training data, S2, setting parameters, S3, model training: labeling and cleaning data of the environmental protection and water conservation aerial photo, marking and dividing the photo containing a target environmental protection and water conservation mark, and running a neural network training code to train a neural network model, and S4, model reasoning. According to the method, environmental water conservation pictures are obtained through aerial photography of an unmanned aerial vehicle, the pictures are imported into an artificial intelligence training platform in batches, training data are prepared for the model training, model training and model reasoning are carried out after parameters are set, and the whole process from training to recognition of environmental water conservation subject matter on the power transmission line is provided; through the trained neural network model, the environmental water conservation subject matter on the power transmission line can be automatically identified and labeled, identification can be carried out without manual eye translation, and the labor cost and the marking efficiency are greatly reduced.

column2: STORAGE SYSTEM, FILE STORAGE AND READING METHOD, AND TERMINAL DEVICE
column4: A storage system, a file storage and reading method, and a terminal device. The method can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence, and the terminal device can be a mobile phone, a tablet personal computer, a notebook computer and the like. In an example of a storage system comprising UFS, the storage system realizes multi-disk storage of mixed media by configuring different media forms of the UFS, such as configuring a persistent storage space of the UFS comprising SLC and TLC media forms. Moreover, on the basis of the storage system, a hotspot file related to the application running rate is preferentially selected and stored into an SLC storage area of the UFS, and files of mapped multiple disks are mounted in the same directory of a file system, so that migration of the files between the SLC storage area and an TLC storage area can be realized in the absence of user awareness, and the performance of the storage system is improved; in addition, the UFS is configured to have conversion modes of multiple media forms, so that requirements of users for performance and capacity are balanced, the running rate is ensured, and user experience is improved.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ANALYZING ADVERTISEMENT IN SPORTS VIDEO USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: Disclosed is a system for analyzing an advertisement in a sports video. The advertisement analysis system comprises: a scene determination module which estimates the area ratio that ground areas occupy in a sports video being broadcast, and calculates the height of an object detected in the sports video to determine a scene in the sports video; an advertisement determination module which generates an advertisement area according to the determined scene, classifies advertisement images detected in the generated advertisement area according to the advertisement type of the advertisement area, and determines in real time whether the classified advertisement images correspond to official advertisements; and an advertisement effect analysis module which calculates, as analysis results, the cumulative exposure time, cumulative number of exposures, and monetary effect of the advertisement images determined by the advertisement determination module to be official advertisements, and displays the analysis results in the sports video in real time.

column2: STATION IDENTIFYING METHOD AND DEVICE, TERMINAL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: Provided are a station identifying method and device, a terminal and a computer-readable storage medium, belonging to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: in response to being in a subway mode, collecting ambient sounds by means of a microphone (101); carrying out feature extraction on the ambient sounds to obtain energy features of the ambient sounds (102); according to the energy features, determining a running state of a subway, the running state comprising at least one of an inbound state, a stopped state, an outbound state and an inter-station traveling state (103); and in response to that the running state is the stopped state, determining a current station according to a currently registered base station (104). The method uses the characteristic that the energy features of sounds in different running states of a subway are different to determine the running state of the subway, and when the subway is in a stopped state, uses a currently registered base station to identify and update a current station, thus determining a station without using a complex model to acquire station reporting voice or third-party data, and having low power consumption and high accuracy.

column2: TABLE TENNIS TARGET TRAINING SYSTEM USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND OPERATION METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to a table tennis target training system using artificial intelligence (AI), which enables a user to increase ability or performance of table tennis, and an operation method thereof. According to the present invention, the table tennis target training system comprises: a table tennis ball supply device ejecting a table tennis ball to a user; an expression device displaying a target area requested by a smart device to the user on a table tennis table; an integrated sensor device collecting sound sensor measurement values and captured images generated when the table tennis collides with the table tennis table and transmitting data about the measured values and captured images to the smart device through wired or wireless communications; the smart device transmitting the target area on the table tennis table selected by the user or recommended by the user to the expression device, receiving the data transmitted from the integrated sensor device through the wired or wireless communications, transmitting the received data to a server, and determining whether the table tennis ball has entered the target area by using a decision model managed by the server and the data; and the server providing a deep learning model extracting and comparing features of the captured image received from the smart device to determine whether the table tennis ball has entered the target area on the table tennis table and storing the user's training difficulty, result, or history. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: CARTESIAN SPACE OBSTACLE AVOIDANCE PLANNING METHOD BASED ON BEZIER OPTIMIZATION
column4: The invention relates to a Cartesian space obstacle avoidance planning method based on Bezier optimization. The method comprises the following steps: determining the starting point and terminal point of obstacle avoidance motion and the position of an obstacle, and simplifying the obstacle through an obstacle model; determining positions of three middle control points by adopting a fourth-order Bezier curve as a target trajectory model for algorithm optimization; calculating the shortest directed distance from the points to the surface of the obstacle through spatial discretization, establishing a class potential chart, and building a spatial discretization database; updating and calculating a fitness function, and iteratively optimizing the positions of the three middle control points by adopting a particle swarm algorithm; and using the fourth-order Bezier curve to figure out an obstacle avoidance trajectory equation, and completing obstacle avoidance trajectory planning in combination with an actual control sampling period. Compared with a traditional obstacle avoidance planning method, the method has the advantages that the steps are simplified, the smoothness of the motion trajectory of a robot is guaranteed, the continuity of the speed acceleration is guaranteed, an additional smooth filtering algorithm is not needed, the implementation is simpler and more convenient, and the safety of the robot moving in an obstacle environment is improved.

column2: CONVERGENCE FITNESS SYSTEM FOR CONNECTING TO CUSTOMERS THROUGH ONLINE/OFFLINE NETWORK TO MANAGE EXERCISE AND HEALTH WHILE SHARING FITNESS SPACE WITH PLURALITY OF FITNESS INSTRUCTORS
column4: The present invention relates to a convergence fitness system for connecting to customers through an online/offline network to manage exercise and health while sharing a fitness space with a plurality of fitness instructors. According to the present invention, the convergence fitness system comprises: a web server storing an online fitness management solution connected to a fitness investment business terminal, a fitness instruction business terminal, and a fitness customer terminal through a wire or wireless network; an unmanned kiosk system module providing a touch screen, video, and artificial intelligence voice services when fitness customers enter to recognize identity of the fitness customer, help in writing personal information, performing payment of a customer member, introduce a fitness business, and introduce an incidental event; a training system module including a one or more of Bluetooth, sensor, and IoT functions between exercise apparatuses so that exercise and guidance training are perform in real-time between fitness guidance providers and fitness customers anytime and anywhere, and transmitting exercise results to the web server to check the amount of exercise; a website module performing the customer's payment, booking a fitness class, providing customized diet, supporting home training, providing online PORTABLE TERMINAL, analyzing exercise records and exercise amounts, providing calorie data, operating a shopping mall, and providing exercise posture correction through updating an exercise video; a web module capable of analyzing a body type, supporting outdoor fitness exercise, and playing a fitness exercise game; and a general management module managing a fitness center, the customer members, the fitness classes, and settlement. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the utility model discloses a climbing robot. The climbing robot is used for providing a robot solution with an upper handrail rope and a lower handrail rope as climbing objects. The climbing robot comprises a side change gear assembly and a control module, wherein the side change gear assembly comprises a body rod and a climbing module; the climbing module comprises a V-shaped wheel and a V-shaped wheel mounting bracket; the V-shaped wheel is rotatably mounted on the V-shaped wheel mounting bracket; two groups of climbing modules are mounted in parallel in the length direction of the body rod, the V-shaped wheels of one group of climbing modules are upwards matched with the upper handrail rope, and the V-shaped wheels of the other group of climbing modules are downwards matched with the lower handrail rope, so that climbing along the upper and lower handrail ropes is realized; at least one group of climbing modules further comprises a driving motor, a driving motor mounting bracket and a driving transmission part; the driving motor is fixedly mounted on the V-shaped wheel mounting bracket through the driving motor mounting bracket, and drives the V-shaped wheel to rotate through the driving transmission part; and the control module is used for controlling the rotation of the driving motor.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EARLY WARNING SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence early warning system, and relates to the field of household kitchens. The pan bottom burning black scale removing device based on automatic cleaning comprises a cloud server, a cloud database, a trip computer, a risk acquisition terminal, an early warning execution terminal, a data communication module, a risk identification module and a cloud storage. The cloud server is a device for calculating and analyzing data of the whole system; the cloud database is a device used for storing various driving data; the trip computer is control equipment used for running of vehicle equipment; the risk acquisition terminal is a device used for acquiring various driving risk data; the early warning execution is equipment used for executing early warning operation; and the data communication module is a device used for establishing a communication network with a mobile phone device of a driver. The defects in the prior art can be well overcome, traffic accidents caused by non-standard operation and fatigue driving are effectively reduced, and harm to many families can be avoided.

column2: NUMBER IDENTIFICATION EQUIPMENT BOX APPLIED TO AVIATION BLADE
column4: A number identification equipment box applied to aviation blades comprises a box body upper cover, a box body main frame, a box body bottom plate, a box body opening and closing door, a camera fixing part, a wiring fixing part, a blade clamp and a camera. The camera is fixed on the camera connector, so that adjustment of different heights can be realized to adapt to acquisition of serial number images of different types of blades; the distance between the blade clamps can be adjusted by rotating bolts so that the blades of different models can be placed. The blade clamp can complete inverted placement of different types of blades, picture definition adjustment is completed through height adjustment of the picture size of the camera and a micro-motion distance adjustment structure, clear pictures of blade bottom numbers are obtained with assistance of an illumination system of the camera, an artificial intelligence algorithm model is built in a computer, and automatic identification of the blade numbers is completed. The method can complete a clear image shooting function of the leaf bottom number, and is used for identifying and outputting the leaf number of artificial intelligence software.

column2: CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the utility model discloses a climbing robot. The climbing robot is used for providing a climbing robot solution with two ropes as climbing objects. The climbing robot comprises a main body support, a driving assembly, a control module and a driven obstacle crossing wheel assembly. The main body support is used for bearing the multiple driving assemblies, the control module is used for controlling the driving assemblies, and the driving assemblies are used for achieving the climbing function; wherein the distance between U-shaped wheels between the driving assemblies is matched with the distance between two ropes, and each driven obstacle crossing wheel assembly comprises a driven obstacle crossing wheel, a tensioning support, a tensioning support mounting shaft and a tensioning spring; wherein the driven obstacle crossing wheel is rotatably installed on the tensioning support, the tensioning support is slidably installed on the tensioning support installation shaft, and the tensioning support installation shaft is sleeved with a tensioning spring, so that the tensioning support is located at one end of the tensioning support installation shaft under the elastic force effect of the tensioning spring; and the driven obstacle crossing wheel assembly is matched with the U-shaped wheel to sink the rope between the U-shaped wheel and the driven obstacle crossing wheel.

column2: DEINSECTIZATION METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT FOR GREENHOUSE CROPS AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a deinsectization method for greenhouse crops. The method comprises the steps: controlling a deinsectization vehicle to move on a track, obtaining an image corresponding to a planting area through a shooting device, and obtaining environment information corresponding to the planting area through an environment detection device; inputting the image and the environment information into a pre-trained insect classification model, and obtaining a target image and the category of an insect target, wherein the content of the target image comprises the insect target; determining a to-be-sprayed position according to the target image and the category of the insect target; determining the working position of the deinsectization vehicle and the spraying angle of the spraying device according to the position to be sprayed; and controlling the deinsectization vehicle to move to a corresponding working position on the track, and controlling a pesticide spraying device to spray pesticide according to the pesticide spraying angle. Therefore, intelligent pesticide spraying can be realized, and the quality of crops is improved.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR IDENTIFYING AND FILING BILLS AND RECEIPTS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of bill and receipt recognition, in particular to a method and system for identifying and filing bills and receipts based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the image information of a bill and receipt, wherein the image information is obtained by shooting bills laid on a preset plane at a preset distance from the front-end camera edevice through the front-end camera device; analyzing the image information to obtain size information of the bill and receipt; according to the size information, obtaining corresponding comparison preliminary features in a database; and analyzing the image information to obtain actual preliminary features. The system includes: an image acquisition module which is used for acquiring image information of bills, wherein the image information is obtained by shooting the bill and receipt laid on a preset plane at a preset distance from a front-end camera device through the front-end camera device. The method and system have the effect of accurately identifying and classifying the bills and receipts.

column2: SHOOTING METHOD AND EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a shooting method and equipment. The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of computer vision. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a training data set for different shot objects, designing and training a super-resolution reconstruction network, and optimizing an image by using the super-resolution reconstruction network. According to the invention, the resolution of the image can be improved and the imaging effect can be improved when the electronic equipment carries out high-magnification (such as 10 magnification and above) shooting.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TABLE TENNIS TRAINING SYSTEM USING AND OPERATION METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence (AI) table tennis training system to efficiently increase a training ability and an operation method thereof. According to the present invention, the AI table tennis training system comprises: a table tennis ball supply device ejecting a table tennis ball to a user; an integrated sensor device transmitting images capturing a table tennis posture of the user and a location measurement value, which is measured for the location of the table tennis ball by one or more sensors, to a smart device through wired or wireless communications; the smart device receiving the captured image and the location measurement value transmitted from the integrated smart sensor device through the wired or wireless communications, transmitting the captured image and the location measurement value to a server, determining a table tennis posture type by using a deep learning model using the captured image as input, changing a control value of the table tennis ball supply device according to the user's table tennis posture type or the position measurement value of the table tennis ball, and including an application transmitting a character selected by the user or recommended by the smart device or a server to an expression device; the server the deep learning model for determining the table tennis posture type by extracting and comparing features as a reference image for the table tennis posture type and a function for storing the user's exercise results and history; and the expression device showing the character to be expressed in the application. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING CUSTOMIZED LIVING HEALTH INFORMATION BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention relates to a system and method for providing customized living health information based on artificial intelligence. According to the present invention, the system for providing customized living health information includes a state information management device and a living health management server. The method for providing living health information, which is an artificial intelligence-based customized living health management method performed by a living health management server according to claim 1, performs a state information collection stage, an information processing stage, and a disease prediction stage so that the present invention can check the specific individual's health status, predict a possible disease, and recommend a diet and exercise to prevent a disease if a specific individual simply enter his/her age, gender, weight, exercise-related information, food-related information and environment-related information. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: FIRE-FIGHTING PLAN DIGITAL DISPLAY METHOD AND DEVICE, SERVER AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention is suitable for the technical field of image processing, and provides a fire-fighting plan digital display method and device, a server and a readable storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a current scene three-dimensional model; taking the virtual position point as a starting point, a preset distance difference between the fire point and the virtual position, a fire spreading direction, smoke spreading and an obstacle position as influence factors, taking the exit point as an end point, and generating and marking an escape route in the current scene three-dimensional model based on a preset route planning algorithm; and sending the current scene three-dimensional model to a user terminal to indicate the user terminal to display the current scene three-dimensional model to a user. Visibly, according to the embodiment of the invention, after a user obtains the three-dimensional model of the current scene by means of shooting of the depth camera in any real scene, the escape route generated by simulating the fire process in the three-dimensional model of the current scene can be displayed on the user terminal to serve as the fire-fighting plan, and the effect of visually displaying the fire-fighting plan is achieved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM FOR TAEKWONDO POOMSAE READING AND EDUCATION
column4: According to the present invention, an artificial intelligence system for taekwondo poomsae reading and education comprises: a camera unit photographing a movement of a user, and providing photographed exercise image data; a motion recognition unit recognizing exercise motions from exercise image data photographed and provided by the camera unit by using a deep learning-based artificial intelligence image analysis algorithm; a storage unit storing preset standard motions, and storing a specific motion pre-learned by using a deep learning-based artificial intelligence image analysis algorithm; and a score conversion unit comparing an exercise motion recognized after recognizing the specific motion among the exercise motions and a standard motion to convert the degree representing the difference into a score. The present invention recognizes exercise motions from exercise image data photographed and provided by the camera unit by using a deep learning-based artificial intelligence image analysis algorithm to eliminate the need for attaching a separate specific marker for recognizing exercise motions and can quickly recognize exercise motion in real time by sensing the direction and speed of a user movement. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AUTOMATIC CONTROL PORT WOOD COUNTING AND TALLYING SYSTEM BASED ON VIDEO STREAM
column4: The artificial intelligence automatic control port wood counting and tallying system based on the video stream comprises a front end image acquisition unit, an operation terminal, a client and an intelligent analysis server which are arranged in a matched mode, and the front end image acquisition unit is used for shooting and capturing wood cross section images or videos and recognizing and counting effective wood; the operation terminal is used for controlling and driving the front-end image acquisition unit to act so as to shoot and capture wood cross section images or videos; the intelligent analysis server is used for carrying out analysis according to the shot and captured wood cross section image or video and counting wood data; the client is used by a tallying staff at the background and is provided with a graphical operation interface to receive the analysis result data transmitted by the intelligent analysis server; network equipment and a switch are arranged among the front-end image acquisition unit, the operation terminal, the client and the intelligent analysis server for data interaction.

column2: INTELLIGENT CHECKING AND DUTY-CALLING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent checking and duty-calling system. The system comprises a control terminal provided with upper computer software, at least one stage of relay equipment and a plurality of checking and duty-calling terminals, and is characterized in that a plurality of stages of relays can be arranged according to actual conditions, so the number of stages of the LORA relay equipment is increased to enlarge the network transmission distance; the checking and duty-calling terminals receives a control command of the nth level Lora relay equipment and responds, the first-level LORA relay equipment receives a control instruction of upper computer software and transmits the response of the checking and duty-calling terminal back to the upper computer software, and the big data analysis technology, the artificial intelligence technology, the modern computer network technology and other technologies are utilized, digitization and automation of checking management of dormitory management personnel are achieved, defects of a traditional checking and post calling system can be overcome, working efficiency and quality of dormitory management are improved, the checking personnel can complete checking tasks in own offices, a checking system is implemented, and rest of room personnel is not disturbed.

column2: INTELLIGENT RUNNING TIMING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a running timing system and method based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a data acquisition module, a preprocessing module, a person detection module, a track detection module, a logic judgment module, a number detection module, a line passing detection module, a timing module and a score output module. The system is applied to a running stadium composed of a runway area and a score area; n runners on a runway of the runway area wear number plates of different colors; the number plates of the same color are worn on the front and back of each runner; the runway area is sequentially divided into m shooting areas; two cameras are arranged on the runway of each shooting area, one camera shoots in the forward direction in the running direction, the other camera shoots in the reverse direction; and an industrial personal computer, a display screen and a loudspeaker are arranged in the score area. Intelligent timing of the running time can be realized by utilizing artificial intelligence, so that the field participation degree of teachers can be reduced, the score is fair, and the timing is more accurate than manual timing.

column2: CABLE CLIMBING DETECTION ROBOT AND MOVEMENT METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses a cable climbing detection robot and a movement method thereof. The cable climbing detection robot comprises a climbing front body, a detection device and a cable carrying device which are sequentially arranged and connected through a cable, and the climbing front body and the detection device are connected through a retractable first rope; the detection device and the cable carrying device are connected through a retractable second rope; wherein the front climbing body, the detection device and the cable carrying device are each provided with a rotating wheel and a holding assembly, the rotating wheels are used for being attached to a cable and rolling and walking on the cable, and the holding assemblies are used for holding the cable; the detection device is further provided with a detection unit and a first winch, the detection unit is used for detecting the cable, and the first rope is wound around the first winch; the cable carrying device is used for carrying a cable and further provided with a second winch, and the second rope is wound around the second winch.

column2: OUTDOOR SHOOTING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an outdoor shooting device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a device main body, an adjusting disc is arranged outside the device main body, a temperature sensor is arranged on the right side of the adjusting disc, and universal wheels are fixedly connected to the bottom of the device main body. An outer shell is fixedly connected into the right side of the device body, a camera is arranged in the outer shell, the air bag is fixedly connected with an air guide pipe and a hot air pipe, and an extrusion part is arranged on the side, close to the driving shaft, of the air bag.
