When the device is used, the driving device is powered on by adjusting the adjusting disc, the extruding piece extrudes the air bag, and hot air in the air bag can be sent to the front of the lens through the hot air pipe after the air bag is extruded, so that the temperature of air around the lens is increased, and atomization is avoided; therefore, the effect of automatically using the hot air to heat the air around the camera by using an artificial intelligence related technology is achieved, and unclear shooting caused by too much fog on the camera is avoided.

column2: EQUIPMENT SURROUNDING ENVIRONMENT MANAGEMENT AND CONTROL METHOD, AND DEVICE BASED ON POWER INTERNET OF THINGS AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, AND EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses an equipment surrounding environment management and control method and device based on the electric power Internet of Things and artificial intelligence, and equipment, and belongs to the technical field of intelligent power grids. The method comprises the steps that: a to-be-monitored equipment video is acquired and analyzed, an equipment operation state and an environment state in the video are extracted, and the equipment running state and the environment state are sent to the state processor; when the environment operation state is a fire-fighting state, a pre-stored fire-fighting rectification strategy is obtained, hidden danger processing data is automatically generated according to the fire-fighting rectification strategy, and the hidden danger processing data is sent to each fire-fighting subsystem; under the condition that the environment operation state is an animal invasion state, animal invasion prevention and control are carried out according to the type identification result of the pests; and the operation state of the equipment is judged according to a preset threshold value of the equipment, and alarm information is sent when the operation state of the equipment reaches the preset threshold value. According to the method, potential accident points can be found in time, early warning and handling can be performed, and personnel and equipment safety is guaranteed.

column2: ELEVATOR SAFE OPERATION MONITORING SYSTEM BASED ON SENSOR AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses an elevator safe operation monitoring system based on a sensor and artificial intelligence, which comprises a leveling sensor and an intelligent data acquisition terminal which are in signal connection, and the intelligent data acquisition terminal comprises a camera, a gyroscope and a detection module; and the detection module comprises an elevator non-gate area parking detection unit and is used for sending elevator non-gate area parking information to the cloud server when the elevator stops running and the elevator is detected to be not parked at the flat layer through the flat layer sensor. According to the elevator safety monitoring system, the safe operation state of the elevator can be monitored only by additionally arranging the leveling sensors and the intelligent data acquisition terminal on the elevator, the number of the sensors is reduced, the installation and maintenance cost is reduced, and the new mode of elevator on-demand maintenance and'Internet of Things + service + insurance 'promoted by the country is met.

column2: CLEANING DEVICE FOR VEHICLE-MOUNTED INTELLIGENT NAVIGATION ALGORITHM ROAD SCENE RECORDING LENS
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence theory and algorithm software development, and discloses a cleaning device for a vehicle-mounted intelligent navigation algorithm road scene recording lens. The cleaning device comprises a shell, the interior of the shell is movably connected with a dust collection mechanism, the dust collection mechanism comprises a swinging assembly and a collecting assembly for collecting dust of the recording lens, the swinging assembly is movably connected inside the shell, and the collecting assembly is movably connected outside the swinging assembly; a first rotating plate and a second rotating plate are driven to rotate through a rotating rod, the first rotating plate and the second rotating plate rotate to enable the collecting assembly to swing so as to facilitate the operation of cleaning tiny particle dust, and meanwhile a disturbance brush rotates to raise the tiny particle dust on the surface of a shooting head; and the raised tiny particle dust moves under the attraction of the electric field force generated by an electrode stem and is adsorbed on the surface of the electrode stem, so that more accurate road information is provided for a vehicle-mounted intelligent navigation algorithm, and the optimal driving navigation decision is provided for a user.

column2: INTELLIGENT AUXILIARY METHOD AND DEVICE FOR SOFTWARE TESTING
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent auxiliary method and device for software testing, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps that when a software testing device carries out software testing, an identification request uploaded by the software testing device is received, and the identification request comprises a software testing process data flow; based on an intelligent recognition algorithm, the software testing process data flow is intelligently recognized, a recognition result is generated, and return information is generated based on the recognition result; the return information is returned to the software testing device; a discrimination result uploaded by the software testing device is received, and an intelligent recognition algorithm is optimized based on the discrimination result; wherein the discrimination result is obtained after the identification result is discriminated. In the software execution process, monitoring and judgment on the software graphical interface and the running process data are added, software testing personnel can be assisted in capturing defects occurring in the running process, and risks are controlled more comprehensively.

column2: HEALTH ANALYSIS METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a health analysis method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps: enabling a user to wear an intelligent part, and recording the daily life data of the user in real time; the artificial intelligence analysis system analyzes and marks each fluctuation node according to the living data change trend, and a user needs to fill in motion or factors causing data fluctuation in corresponding time; performing statistical analysis on data fluctuation reasons of the user in a period of time, analyzing the influence of the fluctuation reasons in the living habit data on the health of the user, forming a fluctuation factor list having positive influence and negative influence on the health of the user, and feeding back the fluctuation factor list; according to the life data of the user, the exercise amount index of the user in each time period and the exercise conforming to the current physique of the user are analyzed, the exercise list of the user capable of performing exercise and extensible exercise is generated in combination with the data fluctuation reason for the user to select, and the user can supplement other exercises into the exercise list at the same time; and making a health plan for each time period according to the user data fluctuation time point.

column2: JOINT DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a joint detection method and device based on artificial intelligence, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. The method comprises the steps of determining a candidate bone joint in a digital X-ray (DR) image, the DR image comprising a bone image of a limb; and processing the candidate skeleton joint to obtain a target skeleton joint. According to the embodiment of the invention, the accuracy of joint detection can be improved.

column2: CABLE CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The invention discloses a cable climbing robot. The cable climbing robot comprises at least two sets of walking mechanisms moving in the axial direction of a cable and adjusting mechanisms connected with the walking mechanisms. The adjusting mechanisms are used for adjusting the distance between the adjacent walking mechanisms so that the cable climbing robot can be suitable for cables with different cable diameters. The walking mechanisms are evenly distributed in the circumferential direction of the cable. In the using process of the cable climbing robot, the cable climbing robot can be suitable for cables with different cable diameters; and in the adjusting process, the distance between the adjacent walking mechanisms can be directly changed, and thus the cable climbing robot can be suitable for a large cable diameter change range.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR CONTROLLING VIRTUAL RACE CAR, STORAGE MEDIUM, AND DEVICE
column4: This application discloses a method for controlling a virtual race car based on artificial intelligence (AI). The method includes: controlling, using a client, a first virtual race car to move on a virtual map of a round of racing game, the first virtual race car being a pursuing race car and the first account being an account participating in the round of racing game; displaying, on the client, that an endurance value of a second virtual race car is reduced when the first virtual race car hits the second virtual race car on the virtual map, the second virtual race car being a fleeing race car; and displaying, on the client, that the second virtual race car has been removed from the round of racing game when the endurance value of the second virtual race car is no greater than a preset threshold.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR PROVIDING FLEXIBLE, MULTI-CAPACITY MODELS FOR USE OF DEEP NEURAL NETWORKS IN MOBILE DEVICES
column4: Systems and methods are disclosed which allow mobile devices, and other resource constrained applications, to more efficiently and effectively utilize deep learning neural networks using only (or primarily) local resources. These systems and methods take the dynamics of runtime resources into account to enable resource-aware, multi-tenant on-device deep learning for artificial intelligence functions for use in tasks like mobile vision systems. The multi-capacity framework enables deep learning models to offer flexible resource-accuracy trade-offs and other similar balancing of performance and resources consumed. At runtime, various systems disclosed herein may dynamically select the optimal resource-accuracy trade-off for each deep learning model to fit the model's resource demand to the system's available runtime resources and the needs of the task being performed by the model. In doing so, systems and methods disclosed herein can efficiently utilize the limited resources in mobile systems to maximize performance of multiple concurrently running neural network-based applications.

column2: APPARATUS FOR ACQUIRING AND COMPARING SPORTS IMAGES IN HAN DYNASTY STONE RELIEFS
column4: An apparatus for acquiring and comparing sports images in Han dynasty stone reliefs, specifically relating to the field of research on Han dynasty stone reliefs, and comprising an image acquisition apparatus (1) and an image processing terminal (2). The image acquisition apparatus (1) comprises a base (101), a vertical rod (102), an electromagnetic sliding sleeve (103), a connecting rod (104), a horizontal sliding rail (105), an electromagnetic sliding seat (106), and a camera (107); the bottom end of the camera (107) is slidably connected to the top surface of the horizontal sliding rail (105) by means of the electromagnetic sliding seat (106); a preprocessing module (3), an information analysis module (4), and a data analysis module (5) are provided in the image processing terminal (2). By implementing automatic conversion, recognition and classification functions for Han dynasty stone reliefs, the entire algorithm system implements label classification for a great number of Han dynasty stone reliefs by means of human intervention and optimization algorithm upgrading under the intervention of an artificial intelligence algorithm, and implements full automation on the basis of the control of an artificial intelligence algorithm technology without depending on experiential knowledge of operators and without adjusting parameters for many times and performing repeated operations; the processing procedure is simple, and the efficiency is higher.

column2: GPS TRACKING DEVICE WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND GEO-FENCING
column4: An apparatus of a tracking system employing a global positioning system (GPS) for determining the location of one or more objects is disclosed. The tracking system can receive position data from a user equipment. The tracking system can send the position data via a transmitter, to a satellite of the GPS. The tracking system can receive one or more signals from the GPS via a positioning sensor, wherein the one or more signals facilitate searching locating, and acquiring location data for the one or more objects. The tracking system can obtain boundary information from the user equipment defining a restricted area. The tracking system can determine a current position of the one or more objects in relation to the boundary information. The tracking system can send an alert message to the user equipment as a result of the determination that the one or more objects have entered the restricted area.

column2: SMART SCORE DISPLAY SYSTEM USING DEEP LEARNING AND OPERATION METHOD THEREOF
column4: An objective of the present invention is to provide a smart score display system using artificial intelligence deep learning to support smooth running in athletic matches and an operation method thereof. According to the present invention, the smart score display system comprises: a smart digital scoreboard capable of collecting video and sound of athletic matches between players, teams, or users and additionally displaying scores; an application transmitting the video and sound received from the smart digital scoreboard to a deep learning server, and providing an analysis result to the players, the teams, or the users, and the smart digital scoreboard; and the server providing a model which analyzes the video and sound received from the application to extract, analyze, and read features and storing results and history of the athletic match. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ACQUIRING SAMPLE DEVIATION DATA, AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: The present application discloses a method and an apparatus (500) for acquiring sample deviation data and an electric device (600), which relate to the fields of artificial intelligence technology, automatic driving technology, intelligent transportation technology and deep learning technology. The specific implementation solution is: in case of acquiring the sample deviation data, a first driving behavior parameter of a vehicle and a second driving behavior parameter of the vehicle in a simulated automatic driving mode are respectively acquired in the manual driving mode; and it is determined whether there is a deviation between the first driving behavior parameter and the second driving behavior parameter, and if there is a deviation, the vehicle is controlled to acquire the sample deviation data within a preset time period. In this way, by establishing a running mechanism of the simulated automatic driving mode, and comparing the driving behavior parameters output in the simulated automatic driving mode with the driving behavior parameters in a real manual driving mode, the vehicle can automatically monitor a driving deviation behavior and can be triggered to automatically collect the sample deviation data when there is the deviation, thereby improving efficiency for acquiring the sample deviation data.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MEDICAL HOSPITAL GUIDE ALL-IN-ONE MACHINE
column4: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence medical hospital guide all-in-one machine, which comprises a host with a display screen and a camera for face recognition, and further comprises a pedal plate and a camera shooting frame, the camera shooting frame is installed on one side of the pedal plate, the pedal plate is installed below the right ahead of the display screen, and the bottom of the pedal plate is flush with the bottom of the host; the camera shooting frame comprises a vertically-installed automatic telescopic rod, the extending end of the top of the automatic telescopic rod is fixedly connected with a rectangular batten, the side, facing the host, of the batten is fixedly connected with a horizontally-arranged connecting rod through a connecting plate, a lead screw is arranged in the connecting rod in the length direction of the connecting rod, the lead screw is in threaded fit with a threaded block, and a camera is installed at the lower end of the threaded block. A driven belt wheel is installed at the end, penetrating through the connecting rod, of the lead screw, a driving belt wheel is installed below the driven belt wheel, the driving belt wheel is in transmission connection with the driving component to achieve rotation, and the driving belt wheel and the driven belt wheel are in transmission through a belt. The face recognition system is convenient and efficient to use and high in face recognition efficiency.

column2: FPGA (FIELD PROGRAMMABLE GATE ARRAY) VIRTUALIZATION HARDWARE SYSTEM STACK DESIGN FOR CLOUD DEEP LEARNING REASONING
column4: The invention discloses an FPGA (Field Programmable Gate Array) virtualization hardware system stack design for cloud deep learning reasoning, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, the design comprises a distributed FPGA hardware auxiliary virtualization hardware architecture, a CPU (Central Processing Unit) server node for running a virtual machine container, a static compiler and a deep neural network DNN, wherein the deep neural network DNN is used for acquiring a user instruction, and the user instruction is compiled into an instruction packet through the static compiler; the FPGA server computing node is used for operating virtualization system service and an FPGA acceleration card, and the FPGA acceleration card comprises a virtualization multi-core hardware resource pool and four double-rate synchronous dynamic random access memories (DDRs); and the master control node is used for managing each node in the CPU server node and the FPGA server computing node through a control layer. According to the scheme, the technical problem that in the prior art, an FPGA virtualization scheme oriented to deep learning reasoning application cannot be expanded to a distributed multi-node computing cluster is solved.

column2: FULL-SENSING WATER PUMP, PUMP SHAFT GAP MEASURING METHOD AND WATER PUMP MONITORING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a full-sensing water pump, a pump shaft gap measuring method and a water pump monitoring system, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The full-sensing water pump comprises a pump shaft and a plurality of blades arranged at one end of the pump shaft; each blade is provided with a plurality of limiting grooves; the limiting grooves are located in the water inlet side and the water outlet side of each blade respectively; the full-sensing water pump further comprises pressure sensors; the pressure sensors are arranged in the limiting grooves in a one-to-one correspondence mode; the sensing faces of the pressure sensors are flush with the surfaces of the blades; and the multiple pressure sensors are electrically connected with a controller so as to transmit detected pressure signals. The running state of the water pump can be monitored in real time, and water pump monitoring intelligence is improved.

column2: METHOD FOR MONITORING RAILWAY SIGNALS THROUGH OPTICAL FIBER SENSING
column4: The invention discloses a method for monitoring railway signals through optical fiber sensing, and relates to the technical field of railway signal monitoring, comprising the following steps: S1, acquiring train driving information based on a railway vibration signal acquisition system; S2, analyzing and identifying the received information based on the railway vibration signal acquisition system, and uploading the information to an early warning unit through an interaction unit; S4, using the early warning unit to send early warning information through the early warning platform after receiving the information. According to the invention, a distributed optical fiber sensing technology is combined with a current artificial intelligence algorithm and a big data processing technology, the running state of a train is monitored and obtained in real time, and labor safety monitoring and early warning of railway workers are achieved; redundant optical fibers in a railway optical cable are used as signal transmission and sensing elements, so that the system has good passive characteristics and anti-electromagnetic interference capability and can adapt to most of railway operation environments in China, additional equipment does not need to be introduced, and normal operation of other equipment management units of the railway is not affected by system construction.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DOORBELL FOR HOME FURNISHING
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence doorbell used for home furnishing, and relates to the artificial intelligence doorbell field, the artificial intelligence doorbell comprises a main body, a dust removing mechanism and a fixing mechanism, the main body comprises a wall body, the inner wall of the wall body is connected with a door plate, the outer wall of the door plate is provided with a mounting groove, and the inner wall of the mounting groove is connected with an artificial intelligence doorbell; wherein the dust removal mechanism comprises a dust removal screw rod located in the artificial intelligence doorbell, and the top end of the dust removal screw rod is connected with a connecting block. Through the arrangement of the dust removal mechanism, when the door plate is opened, the rotating shaft rotates, the rotating shaft rotates to drive the rotating disc to rotate, the rotating disc rotates to drive the dust removal lead screw to rotate, the dust removal lead screw rotates to drive the brush plate to move and brush the camera, and when the door is closed, the rotating shaft moves reversely, so that the brush plate is driven to reset. Dust on the camera can be conveniently brushed, and the influence of the dust on camera shooting is prevented.

column2: AUTOMATIC AUTOMOBILE TRACKING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides an automobile automatic tracking system based on artificial intelligence. The automobile automatic tracking system comprises a shooting module, an image processing module, a lane recognition module, a distance calculation module and a deviation early warning module; the shooting module is used for acquiring real-time images of the automobile in front, back, left and right directions; the image processing module is used for carrying out image merging processing on the real-time images to obtain a panoramic image; the lane recognition module is used for performing image recognition processing on the panoramic image to obtain a left lane line and a right lane line in the panoramic image; the distance calculation module is used for calculating the distance L between the central axis of the automobile and a left lane line and calculating the distance R between the central axis and a right lane line; the deviation early warning module is used for sending vehicle deviation early warning to a driver when L or R is larger than a preset threshold value. The problem that lane recognition is not accurate enough due to blocking of front vehicles can be well solved.

column2: UNATTENDED ROBOT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The unattended robot comprises a base assembly, a supporting assembly, a camera shooting assembly and a push rod assembly, the base assembly comprises a base and wheel bodies, the wheel bodies are arranged on the front side and the rear side of the bottom of the base, the supporting assembly is arranged on the top of the base, and the supporting assembly comprises a stand column, a transverse rod and a driving mechanism; the transverse rod is arranged on one side of the top end of the stand column, the driving mechanism is arranged on the top of the base and drives the stand column to rotate, the camera shooting assembly is movably connected to the transverse rod, one end of the push rod assembly is connected with the transverse rod, and the push rod assembly pushes the camera shooting assembly to move relative to the transverse rod. The position of the camera shooting assembly deflects, pictures in the vertical direction can be obtained, the shooting angle is wider, the driving mechanism drives the vertical rod to rotate, the transverse rod rotates along with the vertical rod, and the camera shooting assembly moves in the horizontal direction.

column2: SPLIT AIR CONDITIONER CONTROL DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a split air conditioner control device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a main control module, a wireless communication module used for data transmission with an external server, a relay control module used for controlling a split air conditioner power supply, and a metering acquisition module used for metering air conditioner power consumption and power consumption parameters, the temperature and humidity acquisition module is used for acquiring environment temperature and humidity, the illuminance acquisition module is used for acquiring environment illuminance, the touch key module is used for acquiring user key input, and the infrared remote control module is used for remotely controlling the split air conditioner in an infrared mode. The wireless communication module, the relay control module, the metering acquisition module, the temperature and humidity acquisition module, the illuminance acquisition module, the key module and the infrared remote control module are all connected with the main control module. The split air conditioner control system can adapt to most application scenes, and effectively solves the problems that when users control split air conditioners in a centralized mode, due to the fact that the air conditioners are installed dispersedly, wiring is difficult, and centralized control is difficult.

column2: DATA ACQUISITION DEVICE FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MACHINE LEARNING
column4: The utility model discloses a data acquisition device for artificial intelligence machine learning, which comprises a base disc and data acquisition equipment, an assembling groove is arranged at the center of the top of the base disc, a displacement ball is slidably mounted in the assembling groove, the top of the displacement ball is fixedly connected with a support, and the support is fixedly connected with the data acquisition equipment. The data acquisition device is arranged at the top of the support, and transverse sliding rails are arranged on the two side walls of the assembling groove. According to the data acquisition device for artificial intelligence machine learning, a transverse turning seat and a longitudinal turning seat can be turned outwards, so that the transverse turning seat and the longitudinal turning seat are turned by 180 degrees to a horizontal state, at the moment, a transverse extending rail faces upwards and is communicated with a transverse sliding rail, and a longitudinal extending rail faces upwards and is communicated with a vertical sliding rail; therefore, the moving range of the displacement ball is doubled, at the moment, the displacement ball can be driven by the moving support to move in the transverse sliding rail, the transverse extending rail, the vertical sliding rail and the longitudinal extending rail, and the shooting direction of the data acquisition equipment is multidirectional.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR IDENTIFYING SAFETY SPEED OF RECREATIONAL FACILITY
column4: The invention relates to a system and method for identifying the safety speed of a recreational facility. The system comprises a roller coaster main structure which comprises a circulating type rail, a plurality of supporting frames, a pushing motor and a speed adjusting device, the supporting frames are used for supporting the circulating type rail, the circulating type rail is used for placing a roller coaster body, the pushing motor is used for driving the roller coaster body to complete each circulation stroke on the circulation type track, and the speed adjusting device is used for controlling the output power of the pushing motor based on the received current set speed so that the running speed of the roller coaster body can be below the current set speed. The invention also relates to a method for identifying the safety speed of recreational facility. According to the invention, the artificial intelligence model can be used for the automatic setting of the highest safe speed of the roller coaster body, the safe operation of the roller coaster body is ensured, the number of field operators is reduced, or the focus of the field operators is transferred to other control aspects, so that the intelligent level of roller coaster control is improved.

column2: EXPRESSWAY SERVICE AREA PARKING SPACE INFORMATION DISPLAY SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses an expressway service area parking space information display system, comprising a plurality of cameras arranged around an expressway service area parking lot and used for shooting and collecting video monitoring images of the expressway parking lot; the intelligent analysis platform processes, analyzes and calculates the parking space according to the acquired video image information based on an artificial intelligence analysis algorithm, and displays the information on the information issuing board, the PC end system platform or the mobile end APP; according to the utility model, videos collected by the cameras in the parking area of the service area are analyzed and processed to obtain real-time parking space information of the service area, and the parking space information in the service area can be timely mastered through various display forms such as the information issuing board, the PC terminal system platform and the mobile terminal APP, so that vehicles entering and exiting the service area can be classified and counted, and the parking space information can be displayed in real time. And dynamic parking space information is displayed to the public, so that scientific management and advanced distribution are realized.

column2: RIB FRACTURE DETECTION MODEL TRAINING SYSTEM AND METHOD, RIB FRACTURE DETECTION SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The invention relates to a rib fracture detection model training system and method, a rib fracture detection system and method, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a plurality of rib-containing CT images, and marking rib fracture areas on the CT images by experts; extracting a skeleton region in the CT image as a target region, and sampling the CT image in the target region to obtain a 3D local CT image; adopting a 3D DeepLab network architecture module, using a plurality of positive samples and a plurality of negative samples to train the model, constructing a novel rib fracture detection model based on high-resolution 3D ResNet-HR, using the obtained detection model to carry out rib fracture detection, and obtaining good expected performance. The obtained detection model is used for a rib fracture detection system, compared with manual observation, the speed is increased by more than 15 times, and the technical problem that an existing rib fracture detection technology is poor in sensitivity and specificity is well solved.

column2: NEEDLE-PICKING TEXTURE ANTI-COUNTERFEITING METHOD
column4: The invention provides a needle-picking texture anti-counterfeiting method, wherein the method comprises the steps: setting codes and fiber textures on a product packaging material, shooting and collecting feature information of the fiber textures, and storing and recording the feature information as anti-counterfeiting feature information in an anti-counterfeiting checking system database for the public to check authenticity; and arranging a sharp instrument capable of picking out fibers on the product packaging material. According to the invention, a consumer can conveniently check the fiber textures through needle picking, and a counterfeiter can be forced to abandon a main counterfeiting mode of printing ink marks to imitate the counterfeited fiber textures, so that the texture anti-counterfeiting effect is enhanced, and the technical vulnerability that an existing anti-counterfeiting insurance technology easilygets insurance fraud can be blocked.

column2: ARTIFICIAL-INTELLIGENCE MONITORING EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses artificial-intelligence monitoring equipment. The artificial-intelligence monitoring equipment comprises a house roof, a camera and an installation box, wherein the installation box is arranged at the house roof, the camera is arranged in the installation box through an adjusting structure, and a camera protection structure is arranged on the house roof and located at one side of the camera; an electric power storage structure is arranged in the installation box; and a detection structure and a fire extinguishing structure are arranged on the house roof and located around the camera. The artificial-intelligence monitoring equipment has the following beneficial effects: in the technical scheme, after smoke is detected, the camera is automatically protected, the camera can be remotely controlled to carry out multi-directional angle shooting, meanwhile, a fire extinguishing system is utilized to extinguish fire sources nearby, fire disasters are effectively reduced, and meanwhile, fire extinguishers can also be helped to control the fire more quickly.

column2: "SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR GIVING WELLNESS-RELATED INTERCHANGES TO A CLIENT"
column4: An Artificial Intelligence based shrewd social insurance administration giving system is given, and yields at any rate one exercise program, and if any of the in any event one exercise program is chosen, yields an activity program chose to be synchronized to time and position, and in any event one From the wearable band including the sensor gathers achievement information including the client terminal for identifying the client's development express, the present situation of the client terminal and the situation of the at any rate one gym equipment arranged in the vendor, from the 3D data examined the dealer An observing terminal for organizing the achievement information in the changed over 2D drawing, a transmission unit for transmitting at any rate one exercise program to the client terminal, and a control unit for controlling the activity program

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ROBOT CAPABLE OF CLIMBING SMOOTH PIPELINE
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence robots, in particular to an artificial intelligence robot capable of climbing a smooth pipeline, which comprises a robot main body and a clamping device, and the clamping device comprises a fixed bottom plate and an upper fixed plate; the device comprises a fixed bottom plate, two clamping claws, a base, a corrugated pipe, a movable pipe and a suction cup, the clamping claws are symmetrically arranged on the fixed bottom plate in the front-back direction, three threaded holes are formed in the opposite side faces of the two clamping claws which are symmetrically arranged in the front-back direction, exhaust pipes are inserted into the clamping claws, and two sliding grooves are symmetrically formed in the upper end of the fixed bottom plate in the left-right direction; the smooth pipeline clamping device has the advantages that the two clamping claws are pushed by the hydraulic rods of the two hydraulic cylinders to move relatively, the smooth pipeline is preliminarily clamped, after the suction cups on the inner sides of the clamping claws make contact with the smooth pipeline, the air exhauster is started, air in the suction cups is exhausted through the air exhaust pipe, the suction cups and the smooth pipeline are tightly adsorbed together, and the smooth pipeline is clamped. Therefore, the robot is fixed with the smooth pipeline.

column2: GARBAGE CLASSIFICATION AND RECOGNITION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a garbage classification and recognition system based on artificial intelligence. The garbage classification and recognition system based on artificial intelligence comprises an intelligent control system, a camera, an image collection system, a database, a touch screen interaction system, a voice interaction system, an alarm system, a harmful garbage can, a dry garbage can, a wet garbage can and a recyclable garbage can; the intelligent control system serves as a transfer station of other systems and accessories and regulates and controls the systems and the parts; the camera is used for shooting pictures of an area in front of the classification dustbin; the image collection system is used for collecting images including garbage throwers and the garbage in the pictures shot by the camera; and the database is used for storing resources such as images and garbage classification related knowledge. According to the garbage classification and identification system based on artificial intelligence disclosed by the invention, management is convenient, meanwhile, garbage classification knowledge and previous violation records are convenient to learn, inconsistent violation records can be appealed, and an alarm is given to the surrounding when someone throws high-risk garbage.

column2: AUTOMATIC DRIVING TEST METHOD AND DEVICE AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides an automatic driving test method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as automatic driving. The specific scheme is as follows: acquiring real road test data of the autonomous vehicle; generating N simulation scenes based on N data fragments in the target semantic scene in the real road test data, N being a positive integer; running an automatic driving algorithm in the N simulation scenes for testing to obtain a result of the first test index in the N simulation scenes; and according to the result of the first test index in the N simulation scenes, determining a target test result in the target semantic scene. According to the embodiment of the invention, a scene does not need to be manually designed and a test is carried out in the manually designed scene, the N simulation scenes are generated according to the N data fragments in the real road test data in the target semantic scene, and the test is carried out in the N simulation scenes to obtain the target test result in the target semantic scene, so that the test effect in the target semantic scene can be improved.

column2: IOT-BASED HARMFUL CHEMICAL MONITORING SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to an IoT-based harmful chemical monitoring system including: a detection module (11) including one or more detection sensors (11_1 to 11_N); a classification relay module (12) receiving detection information from the detection module (11) and performing classification in accordance with position information and visual information; a risk analysis module (13) determining the risk of detection information by analyzing classification information from the relay module (12); and an artificial intelligence module (15) storing a database on the classification information and generating adaptability data with respect to the risk level of the risk analysis module (13). The risk analysis module (13) determines the risk of the classification information based on information retrieved from a big data module (14). COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: DRIVABLE THREE-DIMENSIONAL CHARACTER GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a drivable three-dimensional character generation method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, relates to the field of artificial intelligence such as computer vision and deep learning, and can be applied to scenes such as three-dimensional vision. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining a three-dimensional human body grid model corresponding to a to-be-processed two-dimensional picture; performing skeleton embedding on the three-dimensional human body mesh model; and performing skin binding on the three-dimensional human body grid model after skeleton embedding to obtain a drivable three-dimensional human body grid model. By applying the scheme, resource consumption and the like can be reduced.

column2: LIVING BODY BREEDING MONITORING AND POSITIONING METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a living body breeding monitoring and positioning method. The method comprises the steps as follows: obtaining the position information data of a to-be-monitored living body based on a monitoring device; performing grouping processing on the position information data according to a preset rule, and obtaining a target average value of each group of position information data; searching the to-be-monitored living body based on the target average value, and shooting image information of the to-be-monitored living body; and performing feature comparison on the image information and preset feature information, and determining position information of the to-be-monitored living body based on a comparison result. The living body breeding monitoring and positioning speed and precision can be improved.

column2: CLASSICAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) AND PROBABILITY BASED CODE INFUSION
column4: A method, a computer system, and a computer program product for parallel conversion is provided. Embodiments of the present invention may include analyzing raw classical code using a code embedded deep learning model. Embodiments of the present invention may include analyzing running classical code using a deep learning model. Embodiments of the present invention may include marking a location of the raw classical code for a first quantum conversion. Embodiments of the present invention may include suggesting a memory size of the running classical code for a second quantum conversion. Embodiments of the present invention may include aggregating the raw classical code for the first quantum conversion. Embodiments of the present invention may include aggregating the running classical code for the second quantum conversion.

column2: METHODS AND SYSTEMS FOR A ALL-IN-ONE PERSONAL FASHION COACHING AND ASSISTANCE USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND PEER-TO-PEER NETWORK DATABASES
column4: A method and system for providing an all-in-one personal fashion coaching and assistance readily to be used on a communication device of a user are disclosed, which includes: (a) providing clothing fitness services use after receiving input images and personal parameters from users; (b) providing try-on services using the body model and measurements and input images of F&A items; (c) providing smart style services by matching input images of F&A items extracted from past and current fashion and apparel (F&A) image files exchanged in a peer-to-peer manner among users and sellers; (d) providing a recommendation services to users by finding fashion trends, stores, locations, and suitable discounted prices.

column2: METHOD FOR DETECTING VEHICLE LANE CHANGE, ROADSIDE DEVICE, CLOUD CONTROL PLATFORM AND PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The present disclosure discloses a method and apparatus for detecting a lane change, in particular relates to artificial intelligence, and further relates to the fields of intelligent transportation and image processing technology. A specific implementation includes: performing object detection on a vehicle image acquired by a camera to obtain two-dimensional vehicle information of a vehicle in the vehicle image; determining three-dimensional vehicle information corresponding to the two-dimensional vehicle information using a ground equation and a parameter of the camera; and determining, in response to meeting a detection condition, based on lane location information in a high definition map and the three-dimensional vehicle information, whether the vehicle has a lane change, to obtain a lane change detection result. The present disclosure may solve, using three-dimensional vehicle information, the problem of lane misjudgment caused by a large shooting angle of a two-dimensional vehicle image in the existing art, and effectively improves an accuracy of detecting a vehicle lane change. At the same time, the use of the high definition map improves an accuracy of acquiring lane location information, and further improves an accuracy of detecting the vehicle lane change.

column2: PROGRAM EVALUATION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT, MEDIUM AND PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The invention provides a program evaluation method and device, equipment, a medium and a program product, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence such as deep learning and natural language processing. One embodiment of the method comprises the steps of obtaining operation information and running performance information for a target program; according to the operation information and/or the operation performance information, determining the target demand information for the target program, wherein the target demand information is used for representing the demand degree of the operation information and the operation performance information; determining weights corresponding to the operation information and the operation performance information according to the target demand information; and determining an evaluation result corresponding to the target program according to the evaluation coefficient and the weight corresponding to the operation information and the evaluation coefficient and the weight corresponding to the operation performance information.

column2: POWER GRID DISASTER RECOGNITION DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence-based power grid disaster recognition device, which comprises an electric telescopic rod, a connecting rod, a lower connecting block, a mounting plate, a vertical plate, an extrusion block, a pressure sensor, a spring, a movable block, a controller, a relay and a battery piece, and is characterized in that a box door is mounted on one side surface of a rainfall monitor mainframe box, and the extrusion block is mounted on the box door; two groups of pressure sensors are mounted in the mounting groove, a spring is mounted in the mounting groove, a movable block is mounted on a limiting block, a vertical plate is mounted at the end, away from the fixing ring, of a second fixing rod, an electric telescopic rod is assembled in the vertical plate, and a connecting rod is mounted at the piston end of the electric telescopic rod; the rainfall monitor mainframe box has the advantages that the rainfall monitor mainframe box is reasonable in structure, the box door of the rainfall monitor mainframe box can be conveniently reminded to be closed, and the rainfall monitor mainframe box is high in safety.

column2: BATCH TASK PROCESSING SCHEDULING METHOD, DEVICE AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides a batch task processing scheduling method, device and system, which can be used in the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: determining feasible batch nodes for executing a batch task from batch nodes according to business element parameters of the batch task to be processed, wherein the batch node is provided with an old version program or a new version program; obtaining operation state parameters of the feasible batch nodes, and determining target batch nodes of which the operation states meet a preset condition in the feasible batch nodes according to the operation state parameters; and transmitting the service element parameters to the target batch node. According to the batch task scheduling method and device, the batch tasks can be scheduled according to the program versions and the running states of the batch nodes, and the safety and stability of batch task processing are improved.

column2: NEURAL NETWORK ANALYSIS SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ORDER TRAINING
column4: The invention relates to a sequence training-based neural network analysis system, and the system comprises a sonar main framework which comprises a protection housing, a transmitting transducer, a receiving transducer, a power amplifier device, a signal conditioning circuit, and a signal processing device; a time-sharing detection mechanism which is used for acquiring each level value corresponding to each time point of the converted electric signal, and taking a plurality of level values corresponding to a preset number of time points before the current moment as a plurality of pieces of acquisition data; and a type identification mechanism which is used for taking the multiple pieces of acquisition data as a preset number of multiple pieces of input data of an input layer of a deep neural network and running the deep neural network to obtain single output data of an output layer of the deep neural network, wherein the single output data is an equipment type code. According to the invention, the sonar signal acquired in a time-sharing manner is identified by adopting an artificial intelligence mode, so two different requirements of precision and efficiency of type identification are met at the same time.

column2: EXCEPTION HANDLING METHOD AND DEVICE FOR AUTOMATIC TESTING
column4: The invention discloses an exception handling method and device for automatic testing, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and can be applied to the financial field or other fields. The method comprises the following steps: reading test data in a test data set one by one by utilizing the obtained test data set, and obtaining a result label corresponding to each test data; if it is known that the result label corresponding to the test data is failed or null, executing the test data, and collecting result data of the test data in the execution process; if the result data is successful, updating the result label corresponding to the test data to be successful; and if the result data is failure, repeatedly executing the test data, and collecting the execution data until the number of times of repeated execution reaches a preset value or the result data of the test data is successful. According to the method and the device, the stability and the exception handling efficiency when the exception occurs in the automatic test are improved, subsequent case failure reason tracking and successfully executed test data recording are facilitated, successful execution records are skipped during next program running, repeated execution is avoided, and the running efficiency is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LIGHTING DEVICE
column4: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence lighting device. The artificial intelligence lighting device comprises a mounting plate; the box body is fixedly mounted on the outer wall of one side of the mounting plate; the supporting shaft is rotationally mounted in the box body; the winding wheel is fixedly arranged on the supporting shaft in a sleeving manner; the bottom end of the rope is fixedly installed on the winding wheel, the rope is wound on the winding wheel, and the top end of the rope extends out of the box body; and the worm gear is fixedly arranged on the supporting shaft in a sleeving manner. The artificial intelligence lighting device has the advantages that the lighting lamp can be rapidly, conveniently, safely and simply lifted, firmly installed and reduced, disassembled and maintained, climbing can be conducted without climbing tools and the like when disassembly and assembly are needed, use is more convenient and simpler, the overall manufacturing cost is lower, and the application range is wider.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MONITORING PHYSICAL ACTIVITY
column4: Disclosed are a method and apparatus for monitoring physical activity based on a wearable sensor so that a user's physical activity can be monitored more accurately. The apparatus for monitoring physical activity includes: a memory storing one or more instructions; and at least one processor executing the one or more instructions stored in the memory. The at least one processor executes the one or more instructions, to obtain first type sensor data from a first type worn sensor, obtain second type sensor data from a second type worn sensor, and determine a user's physical activity by using an artificial intelligence learning model unit including at least one artificial intelligence learning model, the first type sensor data and the second type sensor data. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: DATA VERIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a data verification method and device, equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and further relates to an intelligent traffic technology. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps that: determining an actual value of an evaluation index of timing coordination data of intersection signal lamps on a green wave coordination trunk line, wherein the evaluation index comprises at least one of an intersection parking rate index, a road section speed index, a trunk line speed index and a trunk line parking frequency index; according to the timing coordination data of the intersection signal lamps on the green wave coordination trunk line, the position data of an intersection and the trajectory data of a vehicle running on the green wave coordination trunk line, determining the theoretical value of the evaluation index; and according to the theoretical value and the actual value of the evaluation index, verifying the rationality of the timing coordination data of the intersection signal lamps on the green wave coordination trunk line. Through the technology disclosed by the invention, a perfect new thought is provided for verifying the reasonability of the timing coordination data.

column2: INTELLIGENT BREATHING TRAINING METHOD FOR CRITICAL PATIENT
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent breathing training method for a critical patient, which comprises the following steps: S1, a medical worker inputs patient conditions including age, gender, occupational condition, illness condition and treatment condition information of the patient into a central control computer, and sets a breathing training evaluation standard; s2, acquiring the heart rate of the patient in real time through an electrocardio sensor worn on the body of the patient, acquiring the oxyhemoglobin saturation and respiratory rate of the patient in real time through a pulse oxygen sensor, and acquiring high pressure, low pressure and pulse through a blood pressure sensor; s3, through an artificial intelligence algorithm, according to the condition and time of the patient, a treatment oxygen uptake condition is formulated, an oxygen solenoid valve is autonomously controlled to adjust the oxygen concentration, a heater is controlled to adjust the oxygen temperature, an atomizer is controlled to adjust the oxygen humidity, and the respiratory function of the patient is further exercised. According to the method, the breathing exercise of the critical patient is mainly carried out autonomously according to the disease recovery condition of the patient, the human body biological clock and the surrounding environment factors, and the speed of rapidly improving the health recovery of the patient is achieved.

column2: INTELLIGENT ERROR ANALYSIS AND PRINTING SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides an intelligent error analysis and printing system. The invention includes that a subject knowledge point library is used for storing learned subject knowledge points; exercises and correct answers of all subjects are stored in an exercise library; the wrong question bank is used for storing wrong questions answered by the students; exercises answered by the student are taken by using a camera to obtain exercises and answering images; an identification module identifies exercises and answer contents in the exercises and answer images; a screening module is used for extracting keywords from the exercises and answer contents, and searching correct answers corresponding to the exercises from an exercise library according to the keywords, so that the user can conveniently screen out the exercises with wrong answers by himself/herself; the comparison module searches corresponding wrong exercise knowledge points from a subject knowledge point library by solving the keywords of the wrong exercises; the editing module is used for editing exercises with wrong answers, wrong exercise knowledge points and correct answers, and storing the edited wrong question content into a wrong question bank; and the printing module is used for calling and printing the wrong question content from the wrong question bank.

column2: VIDEO STITCHING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention provides a video stitching method based on an artificial intelligence technology, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a standing position and a face orientation of a to-be-recognized person at a current moment, and predicting a standing position and a face orientation at a next moment; selecting a camera and adjusting a shooting angle according to a prediction result, and carrying out shooting; acquiring video streams of a plurality of cameras; and extracting character features from the video streams based on a pre-trained artificial intelligence model, and cutting and sorting the video streams to obtain a stitched video. The camera and the shooting angle are adjusted in advance by predicting the standing position and the face orientation of the person, so that it is guaranteed that the subsequently shot video can have the face features to the greatest extent, shooting of unnecessary cameras is reduced, meanwhile, the artificial intelligence model is used to conduct automatic cutting and sorting on the videos, investment of equipment resources and manpower resources is reduced, the registration rate of video stitching is improved, seamless stitching of videos at different cameras or angles is realized, and a complete video effect can be presented to a great extent.

column2: HUMAN BODY THREE-DIMENSIONAL MODEL GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a human body three-dimensional model generation method and device, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a computer vision and deep learning technology, and can be specifically used in a 3D human body driving scene. According to the specific implementation scheme, firstly, a human body model is obtained, the human body model is matched with a human body parameter model, a parameter model corresponding to the human body model is obtained, then based on the parameter model, skeleton embedding and skin weight estimation are conducted on the human body model, a first human body model corresponding to the human body model is obtained, and finally based on a human body standard model, posture transformation is performed on the first human body model to generate a drivable human body three-dimensional model, thereby realizing automatic completion of human body skeleton embedding and skin estimation, improving the accuracy and efficiency of human body skeleton binding, enabling the human body model completing skeleton binding to be driven, and improving the human body skeleton embedding efficiency. Therefore, the generated drivable human body three-dimensional model can be driven by the user-defined action sequence.

column2: ULTRASONIC IMAGE RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, is applied to the field of smart medical treatment, and provides an ultrasonic image recognition method and device, equipment and a storage medium which are used for improving the recognition accuracy of ultrasonic images. The ultrasonic image recognition method comprises the following steps: sequentially performing focus area extraction and focus area pixel corrosion on an ultrasonic image of a to-be-detected part to obtain focus image data; separately performing spot structure detection and line structure detection on the focus image data to obtain to-be-processed image data; sequentially performing skeleton feature extraction and vertical line feature classification on the to-be-processed image data to obtain skeleton vertical line features and non-skeleton vertical line features, and performing comet tail feature detection on the skeleton vertical line features to obtain comet tail feature recognition information; and sequentially performing calcification detection and calcification type classification on the non-skeleton vertical line features based on statistical characteristics to obtain calcification recognition information, and obtain target image recognition information. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the ultrasonic image of the to-be-detected part can be stored in a block chain.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MONITORING PHYSICAL ACTIVITY
column4: An apparatus for monitoring a physical activity includes: a memory storing one or more instructions; and at least one processor configured to execute the one or more instructions stored in the memory to: obtain first type sensor data from a first type wearable sensor; obtain second type sensor data from a second type wearable sensor; and identify the physical activity of a user by using at least one artificial intelligence learning model, the first type sensor data, and the second type sensor data.

column2: CHAIN WHEEL TYPE WALL-CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The utility model discloses a chain wheel type wall-climbing robot, which belongs to the field of mechanical equipment and comprises a base, motors are fixedly mounted inside the front side and the rear side of the center of the base, rotating rods are rotatably connected to the left side and the right side of each motor in a manner of penetrating through the base, rotating wheels are fixedly connected to the outer ends of the rotating rods, and crawler belts are rotatably sleeved on the outer walls of the rotating wheels. Side plates are fixedly installed at the left end and the right end of the outer wall of the upper side of the base, a storage battery is fixedly installed on the outer wall of the right end of the side plate of the right side of the base, and a signal receiver is fixedly installed on the outer wall of the left end of the side plate of the left side of the base; buffering pads are fixedly installed on the lower sides of the side walls of the inner ends of the side plates. And by arranging the high-density ground gripping mechanism, the embedded fixing structure, the horizontal mechanism and the rotating structure, the practicability of the robot is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE WORKFLOW BUILDER
column4: In some examples, a method includes receiving an artificial intelligence (AI) system scenario definition file from a user, parsing the definition file and building an application workflow graph for the AI system, and mapping the application workflow graph to an execution pipeline. In some examples, the method further includes automatically generating, from the workflow graph, application executable binary code implementing the AI system, and outputting the application executable binary code to the user. In some examples, the execution pipeline includes one or more building blocks, and the method then further includes collecting running performance of each of the building blocks of the execution pipeline in a runtime environment.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MONITORING PHYSICAL ACTIVITY
column4: An apparatus for monitoring a physical activity includes: a memory storing one or more instructions; and at least one processor configured to execute the one or more instructions stored in the memory to: obtain first type sensor data from a first type wearable sensor; obtain second type sensor data from a second type wearable sensor; and identify the physical activity of a user by using at least one artificial intelligence learning model, the first type sensor data, and the second type sensor data.

column2: AGV DRIVING OPTIMIZATION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND TWO-DIMENSIONAL CODE NAVIGATION
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an AGV driving optimization method based on artificial intelligence and two-dimensional code navigation, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a driving road surface image through a camera disposed on an AGV, extracting a road surface as a region of interest, and recognizing a two-dimensional code image in the region of interest, with the two-dimensional code image comprising two-dimensional code edge information; determining the moving direction of the AGV according to the two-dimensional code edge information, wherein the camera is rotated in the moving process until the optical axis of the camera is perpendicular to the moving direction; when the acquired two-dimensional code image is equally divided by a longitudinal axis of an image coordinate system, adjusting the moving direction of the AGV to be consistent with the direction of an optical axis, so that the complete two-dimensional code image and pre-stored two-dimensional code information are acquired when the AGV runs to the position of the two-dimensional code, the running direction of the AGV is guided, and running optimization of the AGV is realized; according to the invention, AGV driving optimization of two-dimensional code navigation can be accurately realized without wireless communication.

column2: SAMPLING METHOD OF SENSOR AND RELATED DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a sampling method of a sensor and a related device, and the sampling method comprises the steps: setting a common sampling period for a plurality of sensing modules, wherein each sensing module comprises a plurality of sensors, and the sampling period meets the sampling specification of each sensor; at least dividing the confidence time of data generation of each sensor from the sampling period as an updating interval, and taking the confidence time of data acquisition as an acquisition interval; detecting the operation state of the sensor in each sensing module in the sampling period; and if each running state is a data updating state in the updating interval, stopping the acquisition interval to finish the operation of acquiring the data generated by the sensor on each sensing module. According to the method, by setting the commonly used sampling period, performing regional division on the sampling period, judging the running state of the sensor in a specific region, and determining the timing for performing synchronous data acquisition on the plurality of sensors according to the running state, the acquired data can be ensured to be synchronous and aligned.

column2: AUTOMATIC OPTICAL DETECTION SYSTEM SUITABLE FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DETECTION OF PCBS
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of automatic optical detection, and discloses an automatic optical detection system suitable for artificial intelligence detection of PCBs; the automatic optical detection system comprises a conveying mechanism and a positioning mechanism; the conveying mechanism comprises a transmission platform and a PCB bracket, the PCB bracket is mounted on the transmission platform, and the transmission platform is used for conveying the PCBs on the PCB bracket to move; and the positioning mechanism comprises fixed frames symmetrically connected to the two ends of the PCB bracket, a screw rod, screw sleeves symmetrically arranged at the two ends of the screw rod in a sleeving mode, a movable rod, a movable block, a clamping plate and a driving motor. Through cooperation of the screw rod, the screw sleeves, the movable rod, the movable block, the clamping plate and other structures, the clamping plate can move on the PCB bracket and lock a workpiece; therefore, the workpiece can be prevented from shaking and vibrating, the shooting definition is greatly improved, the locking state can be quickly released after detection, operation is simple, quick and efficient, the workpiece is not prone to being damaged, and the safety coefficient is high.

column2: PROCESSOR RESOURCE DYNAMIC ALLOCATION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a processor resource dynamic allocation method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. According to the specific implementation scheme, running state information of all second processors of the electronic equipment is monitored, and then according to the running state information of all the second processors of the electronic equipment, the second processors used for running the models are dynamically allocated to all the models included in the image recognition algorithm. Therefore, according to the embodiment, stable operation of the image recognition algorithm can be ensured, the recognition performance of the image recognition algorithm is improved, and system resources can be effectively utilized.

column2: DYNAMIC PROJECTION CONTROL METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR MULTIMEDIA TEACHING
column4: The invention provides a dynamic projection control method and system for multimedia teaching. The method comprises the steps: obtaining the distribution of seats in a classroom through shooting and analyzing a scene image in the classroom, determining whether there are students or not and the orientation postures of the heads of the students so as to determine the overall watching visual angle range of all students relative to a projection screen, determining a projection area range corresponding to the projection of a teaching video on the projection screen, and finally adjusting the projection parameters of projection, so that the projector can project the teaching video in the central area of the projection area range. According to the invention, the projector can be ensured to adjust the teaching video projection position on the projection screen in real time according to the distribution position of the students in the classroom so as to ensure that each student can watch the completed teaching video and improving the video projection flexibility and reliability of multimedia teaching.

column2: PETROLEUM DOWNHOLE TUBING LIFTING SAFETY ANALYSIS METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a petroleum downhole tubing lifting safety analysis method based on artificial intelligence, comprising the following steps: S1, erecting a network camera covering a petroleum downhole operation area, and transmitting all input video images to a background server for calculation; s2, detecting the number of operators and identifying the identities of the operators; s3, continuously carrying out hoisting ring speed detection and running direction detection; s4, continuously carrying out dangerous operation detection when the oil pipe ascends and descends; and S5, carrying out gesture detection and early warning before the oil pipe ascends. According to the invention, the on-site video of the petroleum underground operation is analyzed, the relationship between the personnel and the scene and the relationship between the action and the operation step are identified, the personnel behavior of the operation site is automatically supervised, and the early warning is performed in real time, so that the intelligent underground operation supervision is realized, and the supervision is effectively implemented while the on-site supervision personnel are greatly reduced. The method is of great significance in safety management work of petroleum projects and life and property safety guarantee.

column2: AUTOMATIC ACQUISITION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON MOBILE TERMINAL APP PERFORMANCE DATA
column4: The invention provides an automatic acquisition method based on mobile terminal APP performance data, which can be applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: running a script code to obtain first running track information of first equipment; acquiring first equipment information and second equipment information; determining second moving track information according to the first equipment information, the second equipment information and the first moving track information; acquiring APP performance data of the second equipment according to the second moving track information, wherein the first equipment information comprises screen size information of the first equipment, and the second equipment information comprises screen size information of the second equipment. The invention further provides an automatic acquisition device and equipment based on the mobile terminal APP performance data, a storage medium and a program product.

column2: DEEP LEARNING FRAMEWORK OPERATOR FUSION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides a deep learning framework operator fusion method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning. The deep learning framework operator fusion method comprises the following steps: determining at least one neural network model running in the deep learning framework, and obtaining an operator set corresponding to the at least one neural network model; determining at least one operator subset corresponding to a preset fusion mode in the operator set according to the execution sequence of the operators and the fusion label; and fusing the operators in the at least one operator subset to obtain at least one fused operator. According to the invention, the cost of operator fusion can be reduced, the accuracy of operator fusion is improved, the number of codes in a code compiling result is greatly reduced, and the running efficiency of a deep learning framework is improved.

column2: SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED VIDEO SHARING SERVICE USING CONTENT INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
column4: Provided is a system for providing an artificial intelligence (AI)-based video sharing service using content intellectual property (IP), which maximizes value of the content IP. According to the present invention, the system comprises a user terminal using content IP having at least one format including at least one of sound, image, and video to produce and upload a video and a sharing service providing server. The sharing service providing server includes: a contract making unit concluding a contract to promote content IP from at least one production company terminal; a storage unit extracting and storing a part or all of a video frame and at least one of sound and image, which form original content of the at least one producer terminal, in a database as content IP; a synthesis unit performing content fusion by using at least one AI algorithm so that the content IP is synthesized with an object included on a shooting screen of the user terminal when the content IP is selected in the user terminal; and a sharing unit uploading and posting a video produced by the user terminal. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: CLOUD GAME VULNERABILITY DETECTION METHOD BASED ON DEEP LEARNING AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SERVER
column4: According to a cloud game vulnerability detection method based on deep learning and an artificial intelligence server provided by the invention, the target cloud game running log is subjected to preorder analysis and then multi-process cloud game vulnerability item information detection is performed in a manner of performing analysis by adopting the first target deep learning model; the detection data set where the target cloud game vulnerability item in the target cloud game operation log is located, the vulnerability item detection type of the target cloud game vulnerability item and the positioning result of the core information fragment of the target cloud game vulnerability item in the target cloud game operation log are obtained; the cloud game vulnerability item element type of the target cloud game vulnerability item is further determined, so that the purpose of accurately positioning the cloud game vulnerability item information is achieved, and the technical effect of improving the detection efficiency of the cloud game vulnerability item information is achieved; and therefore, the technical problem that the detection precision of the cloud game vulnerability item information is low in the prior art is solved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TYPE MONITORING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence type monitoring device comprising a baffle plate, one side of the baffle plate is fixedly connected with a transparent baffle plate, the bottom of the baffle plate is provided with a camera, one side of the camera is fixedly connected with a support plate, the top of the support plate is fixedly connected with a rotating ring, the rotating ring is fixedly connected with a first rotating shaft, and the first rotating shaft is fixedly connected with a second rotating shaft. A first rotating shaft is fixedly connected to one side of a rotating ring, the first rotating shaft is rotationally connected with a first motor, the first motor is located in a motor box, the top of the motor box is located in a baffle and fixedly connected with the baffle, a loudspeaker is arranged in the baffle, and an electric telescopic rod is fixedly connected to one side of the rotating ring. The first rotating shaft is fixedly connected with the rotating ring, so that the supporting plate fixedly connected with the rotating ring can drive the camera to rotate when the motor is started, the shooting angle of the camera is adjusted, the height of the baffle can be adjusted through the electric telescopic rod, and the height of the camera is adjusted.

column2: DIGITAL IMMERSIVE INTERACTION DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a digital immersive interaction device based on artificial intelligence.
