The digital immersive interaction device comprises a cabin, wherein a cabin door is arranged on the rear side of the cabin; a seat device is arranged on the rear portion of the cabin bottom of the cabin; two side walls of the cabin are connected with first rotating shafts; the first rotating shafts are connected through a chain wheel transmission assembly; a drawing board is arranged on the outer side of a chain of the chain wheel transmission assembly; annular sliding rails are arranged on the left side and the right side of the seat device; first sliding blocks are arranged on the inner sides of the annular sliding rails; grips are arranged on the first sliding blocks and connected with the corresponding first rotating shafts through connecting devices; and an electronic display screen is arranged on the inner front side of the cabin. According to the invention, a user can experience a rowing process in the cabin; in the experience process, scenery on the two sides retreat, scenery images in front of a visual field are continuously enlarged, so a rowing scene is simulated as much as possible; and the annular sliding rails enable the user to train a rowing posture in the playing process, the user can control the rotating speed of the first rotating shafts, and the faster the user rows, the faster the speed of rowing boards on the two sides moving towards the rear side is, so a real rowing scene is further embodied.

column2: MOBILE INTELLIGENT INJURY MINIMIZATION SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: A system and method for biologically monitoring the fitness of an athlete, and providing a warning when an overtraining condition is determined in order to reduce injury. Through implementation of an efficient system architecture, micro-artificial intelligence use is practical for mobile situations where internet coverage is deficient or non-existent.

column2: MOBILE INTELLIGENT INJURY MINIMIZATION SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: A system 300 and method for biologically monitoring the fitness of an athlete, and providing a warning 338 when an overtraining condition is determined in order to reduce injury. Through implementation of an efficient system architecture, micro-artificial intelligence use is practical for mobile situations where internet coverage is deficient or non-existent.

column2: MOBILE INTELLIGENT INJURY MINIMIZATION SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: A system 300 and method for biologically monitoring the fitness of an athlete, and providing a warning 338 when an overtraining condition is determined in order to reduce injury. Through implementation of an efficient system architecture, micro-artificial intelligence use is practical for mobile situations where internet coverage is deficient or non-existent.

column2: MOBILE INTELLIGENT INJURY MINIMIZATION SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: A system 300 and method for biologically monitoring the fitness of an athlete, and providing a warning 338 when an overtraining condition is determined in order to reduce injury. Through implementation of an efficient system architecture, micro-artificial intelligence use is practical for mobile situations where internet coverage is deficient or non-existent.

column2: SYSTEM FOR PRESCRIBING CUSTOMIZED EXERCISE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention relates to a system for prescribing customized exercise based on artificial intelligence, comprising: a user terminal owned by users; an instructor terminal owned by instructors who provide exercise services to the users; and a management server that matches the user terminal to any one of a plurality of instructor terminals based on questionnaire information received from the user terminal and prescribes customized exercise and/or recommends products for posture correction based on the user's posture information measured through the matched instructor terminal. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: UNMANNED PLATFORM PATH PLANNING ALGORITHM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an unmanned platform path planning algorithm based on artificial intelligence. The algorithm comprises steps of S1, obtaining a starting point position and a terminal point position, and installing a pressure sensor under each seat; S2, selecting one path, and calculating a local optimal path by using a greedy algorithm; S3, in the driving process of the unmanned vehicle, live obstacles (personnel and animals) and roadblocks around the unmanned vehicle being distinguished through the 360-degree panoramic thermal camera; S4, according to information fed back by 360-degree thermal inductance camera shooting, images of children and animals being screened out, movement tracks of the children and the animals being simulated, whistling early warning being conducted in advance, and the safe distance being bypassed and guaranteed; and S5, judging whether the limb movement of the personnel belongs to vehicle blocking, parking and carrying people when an idle pressure sensor exists, and restarting to run S2. The unmanned platform path planning algorithm based on artificial intelligence greatly reduces obstacle avoidance difficulty of the unmanned vehicle in the interior, and judges limb movement of the personnel, so the unmanned vehicle can be stopped by waving hands, and convenience is provided for the personnel.

column2: STRING INSTRUMENT PLAYING TEACHING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON VIDEO MONITORING
column4: The invention provides a string instrument playing teaching method and system based on video monitoring. The method comprises the steps: determining whether a student successfully masters the debugging skill of an instrument or not by collecting and analyzing a debugging audio generated by the student in the debugging process of the string instrument; by shooting and analyzing a video image of playing a string instrument by hands of the student in a string instrument playing process, determining whether a wrong playing action exists in each playing chapter or not from the aspects of action postures and action amplitudes of fingers in the string instrument playing process of the student; and feeding back reminding message that whether the playing action is wrong or not to the student in time in the subsequent string instrument playing practice. Therefore, comprehensive, automatic and accurate teaching experience can be provided for the student, and the string instrument playing skill of the student is improved to the greatest extent.

column2: SHOOTING MECHANISM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MACHINE VISION
column4: The invention discloses a shooting mechanism based on artificial intelligence machine vision. The shooting mechanism comprises a main body box body, a driving box body, a mounting rack, a rotating rack and a dust cleaning structure, wherein a rotating disc is mounted at the top of the main body box body, the driving box body is arranged at the bottom of the main body box body, and moving wheels are mounted at the bottom of the driving box body; a second inner cavity is formed in the driving box body, the mounting frames are arranged at the top of the main body box body, the mounting frames are fixedly mounted on the two sides of the top of the rotating disc, a camera assembly is mounted between the rotating frames, and the dust removal structure is arranged at the front position of the middle of the top of the main body box body. According to the shooting mechanism based on the artificial intelligence machine vision, the driving box body is arranged, the driving assembly is arranged in the second inner cavity of the driving box body, under driving of the driving assembly, the moving wheels start to rotate, the device body is moved to a designated position, then shooting is conducted through the camera assembly, and movement and multi-angle shooting of the device are facilitated.

column2: AUGMENTED COGNITION METHODS AND APPARATUS FOR CONTEMPORANEOUS FEEDBACK IN PSYCHOMOTOR LEARNING
column4: A method of creating a scalable dynamic jointed skeleton (DJS) model for enhancing psychomotor leaning using augmented cognition methods realized by an artificial intelligence (AI) engine or image processor. The method involves extracting a DJS model from either live motion images of video files of an athlete, teacher, or expert to create a scalable reference model for using in training, whereby the AI engine extracts physical attributes of the subject including arm length, length, torso length as well as capturing successive movements of a motor skill such as swinging a gold club including position, stance, club position, swing velocity and acceleration, twisting, and more.

column2: REAL TIME SMART POLICE PATROLLING & MANAGEMENT SYSTEM??27.08.2021
column3: ABSTRACT?œREAL TIME SMART POLICE PATROLLING & MANAGEMENT SYSTEM?The present invention discloses a complete real time surveillance system comprising of smart wearable device running on an algorithm which is based on the interactive system designed for police patrolling. The invention is applicable to urban, rural, highway, jungle, mountain, coastal, as well as all other patrolling needs. This system uses all the four basic communication methods i.e. audio, visual, signal, written methods combined with combination of formats not limited to picture, text, map, drawing, video, chart, points, marks, nearby location, grouping etc. With the use of Artificial intelligence and machine learning this system is also able to respond to an emergency situation.
column4: IN

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT, ROADSIDE EQUIPMENT AND CLOUD CONTROL PLATFORM
column4: The invention discloses an image processing method and device, electronic equipment, roadside equipment and a cloud control platform, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence such as deep learning and intelligent transportation, and the method can comprise the steps: transforming the original image according to a first internal reference matrix of first shooting equipment and a second internal reference matrix of second shooting equipment corresponding to a to-be-processed original image to obtain an intermediate image; and converting the intermediate image into a target image of a predetermined size, the target image being an image suitable for being processed by an obstacle detection model corresponding to the second photographing device, and the obstacle detection model being an obstacle detection model obtained by training the focal length of the second photographing device. According to the scheme, manpower and time cost can be saved.

column2: METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT FOR DETERMINING RESIDUAL RUNNING TIME OF MOTOR AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a method, device and equipment for determining residual running time of a motor and a storage medium, and particularly relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: obtaining the capacitance value of each phase of a stator winding in the motor, the number of stator bars contained in the stator winding and the capacitance value of each stator bar; determining a current reference capacitance value of the stator bar according to the capacitance value of each phase, the number of the stator bars and/or the capacitance value of each stator bar; determining a current residual breakdown voltage corresponding to the current reference capacitance value based on a preset rule; and determining the residual operation time of the motor according to the current residual breakdown voltage and a safety voltage threshold corresponding to the motor. Therefore, by establishing the corresponding relation between the parameter and the residual operation time, the stator insulation residual operation time can be accurately and effectively evaluated.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING CAMERA CONVENIENT TO ADJUST
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence monitoring camera convenient to adjust, which comprises a mounting base, a mounting base hole is arranged in the mounting base, a mounting base thread is arranged on the inner side surface of the mounting base hole, an insertion rod is arranged in the mounting base thread, and an insertion hole is formed in the inner side surface of the insertion rod. An insertion thread is arranged on the outer side surface of the insertion rod, a camera mounting hole is formed in the upper side of the insertion rod, a camera mounting thread is arranged on the inner side surface of the camera mounting hole, and a camera body is arranged on the inner side of the camera mounting hole; a bearing is arranged around the camera main body, and balls are arranged on the inner side of the bearing, so that the problems that rainwater splashes on the outer wall of the camera to cause unclear camera shooting, the rainwater is frozen to cause difficult imaging of monitoring contents, and snowflakes accumulate above the camera to cause image shielding are solved.

column2: PROGRAM SECURITY DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, PROCESSOR CHIP AND SERVER
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a program security detection method and device, a processor chip and a server, relates to the technical field of computers, and aims to accurately identify whether known threats and/or unknown threats exist in a computer in various application scenes and effectively improve the security of the computer. The method comprises the steps that feature extraction is conducted on a program running in a first processor, and the extracted features are input into a preset detection model, wherein the preset detection model is obtained by training based on an artificial intelligence model and is scheduled by a security processor; the security processor is connected with the first processor through a security communication channel, and the first processor has no access authority to a special memory of the security processor; and the preset detection model is operated to detect whether a program running in the first processor has a threat or not. The method is suitable for the computer security technology.

column2: METHOD FOR PREVENTING TEXT STREAM ORDER TRANSFORMATION ATTACK
column4: The invention discloses a method for preventing a text stream order transformation attack through a method in the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises three steps: learning randomized sequence probability distribution based on an EM algorithm; generating a randomized sequence key. The training and deployment of the method need to build a running environment comprising pytorch and a dependency library. The optimal sequence probability distribution for resisting the attack is learned through the EM algorithm, and finally an adversarial sample aiming at the stream order attack is incapable of accurately attacking an order code, thereby achieving the effect of preventing the text stream order attack. The method disclosed by the invention has the technical effects that the attack resisting performance is optimal, and the attack intensity of other text attacks can also be weakened.

column2: CAMERA ROBOT
column4: The utility model discloses a camera shooting robot which comprises a camera, a charging module, a mobile platform and a camera installation device, the mobile platform comprises a bottom plate and a top plate, an upper installation support is arranged on the top plate, and a lower installation support is arranged on the bottom plate; the camera mounting device is mounted on the mobile platform, the camera mounting device comprises a rotary connecting piece and a lifting mechanism, the camera is mounted on the rotary connecting piece, the rotary connecting piece can ascend and descend along with the first guide block in the longitudinal direction, and the rotary connecting piece can also rotate around the rotary connecting piece; therefore, the longitudinal height and the pitch angle of the camera are respectively adjusted. Meanwhile, the charging modules are mounted on the upper mounting bracket and the lower mounting bracket, and the distance between the upper mounting bracket and the lower mounting bracket is adjusted through the height adjusting mechanism, so that the camera shooting robot can better adapt to the charging modules with different sizes, the charging modules with different powers and power consumptions can be mounted, and the application range of the robot is expanded.

column2: AUGMENTED COGNITION METHODS AND APPARATUS FOR CONTEMPORANEOUS FEEDBACK IN PSYCHOMOTOR LEARNING
column4: A method of creating a scalable dynamic jointed skeleton (DJS) model for enhancing psychomotor leaning using augmented cognition methods realized by an artificial intelligence (AI) engine or image processor. The method involves extracting a DJS model from either live motion images of video files of an athlete, teacher, or expert to create a scalable reference model for using in training, whereby the AI engine extracts physical attributes of the subject including arm length, length, torso length as well as capturing successive movements of a motor skill such as swinging a gold club including position, stance, club position, swing velocity and acceleration, twisting, and more.

column2: MEDICAL TEXT STRUCTURING METHOD AND APPARATUS, COMPUTER DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The present application relates to an artificial intelligence technology applicable to the field of medical text processing, and particularly discloses a medical text structuring method and apparatus, a computer device, and a storage medium. The method comprises: acquiring unstructured medical knowledge text; splitting the unstructured text into a plurality of first feature statements; inputting the first feature statements to a preset language recognition model to obtain semantic feature vectors; inputting the semantic feature vectors to a preset article semantics recognition model to obtain output second feature statements; calling a first code file of a medical source text to be processed; inserting segmentation symbols to positions in said first code file corresponding to the segmentation-pending positions of the second feature statements, to obtain a second code file; running the second code file so as to display on the medical source text to be processed structured medical knowledge text corresponding to the unstructured medical knowledge text. The present method improves conversion efficiency for structured medical knowledge texts.

column2: INTERACTIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CONTROLLED EDUCATION SYSTEM
column4: An interactive artificial intelligence controlled education system, characterized in that it consists of a cartoon character (1), a skeleton (2), a model (3), a child (4), an artificial intelligence (5), a scenario (6), a speech detection (7), a movement detection (8) and a device (9) such as computer, tablet, telephone, etc. providing education fitted with microphone, camera and loudspeaker allowing acting of cartoon characters according to scenarios provided to them depending on detection of speeches and movements of children with artificial intelligence as a support for children with autism, attention deficit, hyperactivity disorder, development retardation or psychological and neurological problems requiring special support for normal development.

column2: SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLING AND MANAGING A PROCESS WITHIN AN ENVIRONMENT USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNIQUES AND RELATIVE METHOD
column4: A system (100) for controlling and managing a process within an environment (A) by means of artificial intelligence techniques, the environment (A) comprising a plurality of components (101 ) for monitoring a scene of the environment, each component of said plurality (101) being configured to provide a piece of information (I) representative of a scene of the environment (A). The system (100) comprises: a data communication interface module (102) operatively connected to the plurality of components (101) for monitoring a scene of the environment (A); an object classification and recognition module (103), based on one or more neural networks (104), operatively connected to the data communication interface module (102), said object recognition and classification module (103) being configured to extrapolate in real time, by means of the running of one or more neural networks (104), from a piece of information (I) representative of a scene of the environment (A) provided by one of the monitoring components of the plurality of components (101) for monitoring a scene of the environment (A), a plurality of attributes representative of an object detected within the scene of the environment (A); an object mapping and localizing module (107), operatively connected to the object classification and recognition module (103), said mapping and localizing module (107) being configured to generate, on the basis of the plurality of attributes representative of an object within a scene of the environment (A) extrapolated for the object recognized and classified by the object recognition and classification module (103), geographical coordinates representative of the absolute position of the object; a process control and management module (105), operatively connected to the object recognition and classification module (103), said process control and management module (105) being configured to determine a process control command (CS), by combining the geographical coordinates representative of the absolute position of the object detected within the scene of the environment (A) with set process control rules, the process control and management module (105) being configured to provide the determined process control command (CS) to at least one process control component (101) which the environment (A) is provided with.

column2: THROMBUS RECOGNITION DEVICE APPLIED TO ECMO AND THROMBUS INSPECTION DEVICE OF BLOOD TRANSFUSION PIPELINE
column4: The utility model discloses a thrombus recognition device applied to ECMO and a thrombus inspection device applied to a blood transfusion pipeline. The thrombus recognition device comprises an annular lamp strip arranged on the outer side of a membrane lung in a sleeving mode, at least three cameras arranged on the periphery of the membrane lung and the thrombus inspection device arranged on the blood transfusion pipeline in a sleeving mode. The thrombus testing device comprises a shell with a U-shaped groove and an upper cover arranged above the U-shaped groove, wherein a blood transfusion pipeline is arranged in the U-shaped groove; a camera is arranged at the bottom of the U-shaped groove, cambered mirrors are arranged on the two sides of the blood transfusion pipeline in the shell, the camera directly faces the position under the blood transfusion pipeline to directly obtain images under the blood transfusion pipeline, and images above the blood transfusion pipeline and the two sides of the blood transfusion pipeline are obtained through reflection of the cambered mirrors. The upper cover comprises a shading plate arranged on the upper portion and transparent plates on the two sides. The lighting device and the camera shooting device are arranged for the blood pipeline and the membrane lung respectively, the thrombus forming conditions of the blood pipeline and the membrane lung are judged through an artificial intelligence algorithm, and intelligent recognition is achieved when thrombus appears.

column2: METHOD FOR REQUESTING ASSISTANCE FROM EMERGENCY SERVICES
column4: A method of requesting assistance from emergency services employs an electronic actuator that is preconfigured to communicate with authorities in the event that the actuator is used. An electronic signal is relayed from the device to remote servers, where machine learning and artificial intelligence logic is applied to the signal, before relaying a signal to the most appropriate authorities. The electronic signal may include information such as identifying and location information. The signal may also utilize various sensors or detectors, such as cameras, accelerometers, light sensors, pressure sensors, and more in order to collect and relay additional data. The response is then relayed to the authorities, who may continue to receive information about the user while in transit. In this way, the method of requesting assistance from emergency services provides security for people who may encounter emergency situations in which they cannot use a phone or mobile device.

column2: POWER DISTRIBUTION STATION HOUSE AI ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ANALYSIS PROCESSING SYSTEM AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention relates to a power distribution station house AI artificial intelligence analysis processing system and a method thereof. The system comprises a data processing circuit based on AI microprocessing, a video acceleration processing circuit based on a GPU, a relay coordination circuit based on an FPGA, a crystal oscillator clock circuit, a wireless communication module, a serial communication module, a PCI data bus, an address bus, a control bus, an MOS driving circuit, an IGBT driving circuit, a thyristor electronic switching circuit, a USB port, a serial communication port, an HDMI interface, a DP interface and a VGA interface. The processing method comprises the steps of system assembly, primary video processing and video analysis. The system is simple in structure, flexible and convenient in networking operation, convenient to operate, high in environment adaptability and capable of accurately identifying and monitoring personnel, equipment and foreign matters in the power distribution room, so that the reliability of monitoring operation of the power distribution room is greatly improved, and potential safety hazards of operation of the power distribution room can be found in time.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR DETERMINING MOVEMENT TIME OF ENDOSCOPE AND COMPUTER EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to an endoscopic image processing method and device, a computer readable storage medium and computer equipment, and relates to the artificial intelligence computer vision technology, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining an endoscopic image shot by an enteroscope; performing part recognition on the endoscopic image through a part recognition model to obtain a part recognition result; based on the part recognition result, determining a first endoscopic image of which the shooting part is a first part and a second endoscopic image of which the shooting part is a second part from the endoscopic images; determining the movement time of the enteroscope according to the time attribute of the first endoscopic image and the time attribute of the second endoscopic image; and obtaining a movement evaluation result corresponding to the enteroscope according to a comparison result of the movement time of the enteroscope and the movement constraint condition. According to the scheme provided by the invention, the determination efficiency of the enteroscope movement evaluation result can be improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EDUCATION SYSTEM BASED ON BIG DATA AND DATA PROCESSING METHOD
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of big data processing, in particular to an artificial intelligence education system based on big data and a data processing method, which objectively reflect the overall quality behavior of students through a comprehensive score sheet obtained by combining a score score sheet and a quality score sheet, reduce the personal impression of only relying on teachers, prefect scientific statistics, and improve the objectivity and accuracy of evaluation. The method includes: recording scores, names and personal photos of the students, and generating score texts for sending; receiving the score text, establishing a student score package, and adding and storing the score text to the student score package; reading the student score package, and generating classified student score packages; shooting and recording classroom behaviors of students, and generating a video file for transmission; and receiving the video file, establishing a student video package, and adding the received video file into the student video packet and storing the student video package.

column2: LOAN DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON GENETIC ALGORITHM
column4: The invention provides a loan data processing method and device based on a genetic algorithm, belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and can be applied to the financial field or other fields. The loan data processing method based on the genetic algorithm comprises the following steps: establishing a clientele, and extracting loan data in the clientle from a loan data processing request; determining a loan fitness function according to the loan data, the client feature data corresponding to the loan data and the bank loan features corresponding to the loan data; adjusting the clientele by genetic manipulation, and after the clientele is replaced with the adjusted clientele corresponding iterative calculation is carried out; when the current number of iterations is equal to the preset number of iterations, generating a loan issuing scheme according to the clientle corresponding to the maximum value of the loan fitness function; and processing the loan data processing request according to the loan issuing scheme. The processing efficiency of the bank loan request can be improved, the bank loss is reduced, and the bank benefit is guaranteed.

column2: SECURITY MONITORING DEVICE FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model discloses a security monitoring device for artificial intelligence equipment, which comprises a connecting transmission device, an adjusting assembly and a protection monitoring assembly, the adjusting assembly is connected to the connecting transmission device, the protection monitoring assembly is connected to the adjusting assembly, the connecting transmission device comprises a connecting cavity, a lead screw, a transmission motor and a connecting rod, and the connecting cavity is connected with the lead screw. The adjusting assembly comprises a rotating motor, a connecting plate, a transmission gear, a rotating gear and a gear ring, and the protective monitoring assembly comprises a protective shell, a camera and a storage battery. The utility model relates to the technical field of monitoring equipment, and particularly provides a security monitoring device for artificial intelligence equipment, which has the advantages of high practicability, simplicity in use, convenience in installation, reduced cost, capability of automatically adjusting the camera shooting angle and height, capability of realizing dead-corner-free monitoring, dust prevention function and capability of automatically tracking and monitoring a human body.

column2: STUDENT WRITING POSTURE CORRECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON MULTI-DIMENSIONAL MONITORING
column4: The invention provides a student writing posture correction method and system based on multi-dimensional monitoring, and the method comprises the steps of carrying out multi-dimensional shooting monitoring on a head region and a hand region of a student, and carrying out the filtering, analysis and recognition on a shot image so as to determine the pen holding posture state and the sitting posture state of the student; then determining a corresponding distance adjustment value between the head and a writing plane and an inclination angle adjustment value of the head relative to the writing plane when the writing posture is corrected from the two aspects of the pen holding posture and the sitting posture, and generating a corresponding visual prompt signal according to the distance adjustment value and the inclination angle adjustment value; therefore, the student is prompted to accurately and timely adjust the distance and the inclination angle, the writing posture of the student is monitored and adjusted in a non-contact mode, and the writing posture can be rapidly and effectively corrected anytime and anywhere with lower monitoring cost.

column2: MICRO-NANO OPTICAL UNCLONABLE ANTI-COUNTERFEITING MARK BASED ON ELECTROSTATICALLY SPUN NANOFIBER CLOTH AS WELL AS PREPARATION METHOD AND APPLICATION OF MICRO-NANO OPTICAL UNCLONABLE ANTI-COUNTERFEITING MARK
column4: The invention relates to the field of anti-counterfeiting technologies, in particular to a micro-nano optical unclonable anti-counterfeiting mark based on electrostatically spun nanofiber cloth as well as a preparation method and application of the micro-nano optical unclonable anti-counterfeiting mark. The anti-counterfeiting mark structurally comprises a substrate layer, a light response layer and a packaging layer which are sequentially arranged from bottom to top. The preparation method of the anti-counterfeiting mark comprises the steps that electrostatically spun nanofibers containing fluorescent powder are randomly distributed on a substrate and then are packaged through optical clear adhesives. The application of the anti-counterfeiting mark comprises the steps that an optical microscope is used for shooting random patterns of the electrostatically spun nanofiber cloth, artificial intelligence is adopted for deep learning and memorizing, and a genuine product database is formed; in the commodity circulation link, the optical microscope is used for shooting the structure of the anti-counterfeiting mark, then the structure is transmitted to an artificial intelligence database, and artificial intelligence is used for identification; and the authenticity is automatically verified according to the similarity between the artificial intelligence database and the genuine product database.

column2: STUDENT EXAMINATION CHEATING BEHAVIOR MONITORING METHOD AND SYSTEM THROUGH VIDEO MONITORING
column4: The invention provides a student examination cheating behavior monitoring method and system through video monitoring, and the method comprises the steps: photographing an indoor examination room; dividing an photographed image into student sub-images; then processing the student sub-images to determine whether a corresponding student has a cheating behavior or not; determining the identity information of the student who has a cheating behavior; and finally giving a warning in the indoor examination room through a cloud center. Thus, all students in the examination room can be automatically identified under the condition of image shooting monitoring, thereby quickly and accurately determining whether the student has the cheating behavior or not. Further, adaptive warning can be performed according to the number of cheating behaviors of the students, so that the comprehensiveness and reliability of examination room invigilation are improved, and the labor cost of examination room invigilation is effectively reduced.

column2: METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT FOR IDENTIFYING ILLEGAL PARKING OF VEHICLE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a method, device and equipment for identifying illegal parking of a vehicle, a storage medium and a computer program product, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the fields of deep learning, cloud computing, computer vision and the like. The method comprises steps:: acquiring a video image acquired by the electronic equipment; identifying a parking area of the vehicle in the video image; determining a shooting angle used by the electronic equipment for collecting the video image; determining an illegal parking area in the video image based on the shooting angle; and identifying whether the vehicle is parked illegally based on the parking area and the illegal parking area of the vehicle.

column2: INTELLIGENT COMMUNITY COMPREHENSIVE DETECTION STATION
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent community comprehensive detection station. The comprehensive detection station comprises a sample telescoping assembly, a first sample suction assembly, a three-axis moveing sliding seat, a dyeing assembly and a sample identification assembly, and the sample telescoping assembly comprises a movable sliding group and a sampling table; the first sample suction assembly comprises a first sample suction pipe for sucking a sample; the three-axis moving sliding seat comprises an X-axis moving sliding table, a Y-axis moving sliding table and a Z-axis moving sliding table, and a first sampling hand is arranged on the Z-axis moving sliding table; the dyeing assembly comprises a dyeing table, and a dyeing liquid pump and a dyeing liquid nozzle which are used for dyeing the glass slide are arranged on the dyeing table; and the sample identification assembly comprises a sample identification table, and a detector for acquiring sample information is arranged on the sample identification table. According to the intelligent community comprehensive detection station provided by the invention, an original manual interpretation detection method is replaced by camera shooting, image transmission to a database, AI artificial intelligence comparison and interpretation result identification, and the problem of doctor examination is solved.

column2: PAPER WRINKLE DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to artificial intelligence, and provides a paper wrinkle detection method and device, equipment and a storage medium. According to the method, a paper position and a binocular camera can be determined, text paper is stored in the paper position, the binocular camera comprises a first lens and a second lens, and a first position obtained by shooting each position point in the text paper by the first lens and a second position obtained by shooting each position point in the text paper by the second lens are obtained; the parallax of each position point in the binocular camera is determined, the lens difference value of the first lens and the second lens is obtained, the pixel depth value of each position point is calculated according to the parallax, the focal length value of the binocular camera and the lens difference value, the pixel depth values are preprocessed to obtain target depth values, a depth reference value from the target depth values, and a detection result is determined according to the depth reference value and the pixel depth values. According to the invention, the detection result of the text paper can be accurately detected. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the detection result can be stored in a block chain.

column2: FOOD MATERIAL SAFETY MONITORING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a food material safety monitoring method. The method comprises the following steps of: shooting a plurality of food pictures of food materials in a cooking utensil through a camera device at a preset position; identifying the plurality of food material pictures in a pre-trained food material identification model to obtain a confidence score that each food material picture is identified as an unsafe food material; whether the confidence score of each food material picture exceeds a preset threshold value or not is judged, and if the judgment result indicates that a certain food material picture is identified as an unsafe food material, it is determined that the food materials are not safe; and if the judgment result indicates that all the food material pictures are not identified as unsafe food materials, it is determined that the food materials are safe. According to the method and device, the problem of how to monitor and identify the toxicity of food materials in the cooking process of uncommon food materials such as wild mushrooms is effectively solved, and the situations of poisoning of the food materials and the like are avoided as much as possible.

column2: BUILDING CLOUD VISUAL INTERCOM DEVICE
column4: A building cloud visual intercom device comprises a main control chip RK3288, and the RK3288 is connected with a key input module, a camera, a 5G module, a display screen, a wifi + BLE module, an Ethernet and USB module, an auxiliary module, a power module, a light supplement lamp and an audio module. The auxiliary module comprises an ID card module, an IC card module, an RS232 module, an RS485 module, a relay output circuit and an optocoupler isolation input circuit. A wifi communication interface of the wifi + BLE module is an SDIO interface, and a BLE communication interface of the wifi + BLE module is a serial port; the 5G module comprises a Huawei HM5000 communication chip, and the HM5000 communication chip is connected with a high-speed USB 2.0 interface and an independent power supply. By means of the structure, the intelligent control system has the advantages of being high in functionality and stable in operation.

column2: IMAGE HIGH-SPEED SCANNING DEVICE FOR INTELLIGENT MEDICAL CONSULTATION SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT PLATFORM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence application software development, and discloses an image high-speed scanning device for an intelligent medical consultation software development platform, which comprises a shell, a scanning mechanism is movably connected in the shell; the scanning mechanism comprises a transmission assembly for transmitting an image, a shooting assembly for scanning the image, a transmission assembly movably connected in the shell, and a shooting assembly movably connected in the shell. According to the invention, the image film can be always kept at a fixed angle under the limitation of the orientation plate, so that the shooting quality is ensured, the consultation accuracy is ensured; meanwhile, the rebound plate moves to drive the collision rod to move so as to automatically sense whether the image film exists in the shell or not, and intelligent electrification of the scanner is realized through contact or separation of the collision rod and the contact point; besides, the scanner can be used for shooting the image film which moves at a high speed, so that the transmission efficiency of the image film is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHARGING DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence charging device, and relates to the technical field of intelligent charging equipment, the device comprises a protection housing, a guide groove body, a top cover, a charging device, a buffer spring, a contact bottom plate, a buffer air bag, a charging gun storage port, a distance measuring radar, a camera shooting induction device, an operation panel, a positioning wheel, a wheel frame, and a lifting driving mechanism. The lifting driving mechanism comprises a guide sliding groove, a screw rod, a motor, a speed reducer, a threaded sliding block, a pin hole, a butt joint pin, a pin groove and an electric telescopic rod. According to the design scheme, through the design of the protection housing and the lifting type charging device, the whole charging device is effectively protected, the service life is prolonged, and the maintenance cost is reduced; and meanwhile, through the design of the camera shooting induction device and the distance measuring radar, the charging device can fall into the protection housing in time when receiving a danger signal, and the collision damage phenomenon generated when an automobile is poured into a parking space is effectively avoided.

column2: ORAL ENGLISH TRAINING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a spoken English training device based on artificial intelligence. The device comprises a box mechanism, an error discrimination mechanism disposed on the box mechanism, a practice mechanism connected with the error discrimination mechanism, and a repeating mechanism disposed on the lower side of the training mechanism. Different modes are set for single word and long-difficult sentences. A trainee transmits sound to a sound recognizer for recognition according to English pronunciation on a display; when a single-word mode operates, when pronunciation is wrong, the error discrimination mechanism operates, and when pronunciation is correct, the practice mechanism operates; during operation in a long-difficult sentence mode, a trainer operates according to English pronunciation on the display, the repeating mechanism operates, and the repeating device rereads, a user can autonomously select an exercise mode according to own basis, oral language exercise is not limited by time and places, and the problems that the exercise mode is single and the exercise place is limited are effectively solved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LEARNING-BASED USER KNOWLEDGE TRACING SYSTEM AND OPERATING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to a user knowledge tracing method with more improved accuracy, and an operating method for a user knowledge tracing system including a plurality of encoder neural networks and a plurality of decoder neural networks includes: inputting exercise information to a k-th encoder neural network and inputting response information to a k-th decoder neural network; generating query data, which is information on an exercise for which a user is to predict a correct answer probability, by reflecting a weight to the response information and generating attention information to be used as a weight for the query data by reflecting the weight to the exercise information; and training the user knowledge tracing system by using the attention information as the weight for the query data.

column2: COACHING, ASSESSING OR ANALYSING UNSEEN PROCESSES IN INTERMITTENT HIGH-SPEED HUMAN MOTIONS, INCLUDING GOLF SWINGS
column4: The system automatically or partly automatically coaches and assesses a non-putting golf swing to increase the strength or distance of the swing. Increases are coached in the components of energy generated across specific individual joints of the player's body during the downswing. Increases are also coached in the efficiency at which the generated energy is transmitted to the clubhead. Fast or near-instantaneous feedback is provided to the player, based on measured changes in the components of energy generated in the specific individual joints and on the efficiency at which the generated energy is transmitted to the clubhead. Changes in 3D positions of the player's body segments or joints are tracked by inertial sensors or optical sensors and used in the calculation of the components of energy generated across the specific individual joints utilising an artificial intelligence system.

column2: SPEED PLANNING METHOD, APPARATUS, FACILITY, MEDIUM AND VEHICLE FOR AUTONOMOUS DRIVING
column4: The present invention provides a speed planning method, apparatus, facility and medium for autonomous driving, and relates to artificial intelligence technologies such as autonomous driving, deep learning, etc. A concrete implementation method comprises the steps of: acquiring the current state of a vehicle wherein the current state includes at least the remaining running distance and the current speed; and interpolating actions based on the current state and a predetermined state table to obtain the target action of the current state, wherein the state table is determined based on a reinforcement learning method and includes multiple states and actions performed in respective states, and the action includes at least acceleration. The present invention can replace a neural network by using a lookup table method, first determine the state table offline and then determine a target action of the current state in an online reference manner. Therefore, under the premise that a large quantity of computing resources are not occupied, and the global optimal solution of speed planning can be securely obtained. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: AUTOMATIC PAPER TYPE BOXING MACHINE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an automatic paper type boxing machine based on artificial intelligence. The automatic paper type boxing machine based on artificial intelligence comprises a pushing part, a box folding side lug mechanism and a box making table arranged in the pushing direction, and the inner side of the box making table is telescopically provided with a box containing assembly used for bearing paper and movably provided with a positioning part connected with the box containing assembly. The box containing assembly is used for driving the positioning part to move towards the center of the box making table to position the position of paper. According to the automatic paper type boxing machine based on artificial intelligence, the box containing assembly is used for bearing the paper and materials, the positioning part, a dust removal fan and a transmission assembly are in linkage, a positioning plate can transversely move along with downward movement of a bearing table to achieve the positioning and clamping effect on the paper, the containing stabilizing effect of the paper is improved, meanwhile, along with downward movement of the bearing table, the dust removal fan is driven by the transmission assembly to rotate, air flow can be formed on the side edge of the paper, impurities attached to the paper are blown off, and the adhesive force between a gluing area and an adhesive can be improved when gluing equipment conducts gluing in the follow-up process.

column2: FOOD EVALUATION AND RECIPE RECOMMENDATION EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model relates to the field of smart home, in particular to food evaluation and recipe recommendation equipment. The device comprises: a body; the loader is arranged on the body; the weighing part is connected with the loader, the original food materials act on the weighing part through the loader, and the weighing part outputs the weight of the original food materials; the video shooting part is arranged on the body and outputs a video of the original food materials; the first processing part is connected with the weighing part and the video shooting part, receives the video and the weight of the original food materials and outputs related information of the original food materials; and the second processing part is connected with the first processing part and is used for receiving the related information and outputting a corresponding recommended recipe. According to the method, the first processing part and the second processing part are arranged, on the basis of obtaining the information of the original food materials, the recipe is recommended in combination with the dietary habits of diners and the pre-stored nutrition collocation principle, individuation of recipe recommendation is achieved, and the use experience of the user is improved.

column2: MESSAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, NETWORK CARD AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of data processing, and provides a message processing method and device, a network card and a computer readable storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a to-be-processed message, and determining whether the to-be-processed message is a VxLAN message or not; if the message to be processed is a VxLAN message, decapsulating the VxLAN message to obtain a first message; determining a target virtual network card corresponding to the first message, and sending the first message to an Nginx server through the target virtual network card; obtaining a second message sent by the Nginx server, wherein the second message is obtained by performing address conversion processing on the first message by running an Nginx instance corresponding to the target virtual network card by the Nginx server; and packaging the second message to obtain a first VxLAN message, and sending the first VxLAN message to a corresponding network device. The efficiency of processing the VxLAN message by the Nginx server is improved. The invention further relates to the technical field of block chains and artificial intelligence.

column2: ENVIRONMENTAL SECURITY VERIFICATION METHOD AND SYSTEM AND CLIENT
column4: Disclosed are an environmental security verification method and system and a client, the method comprising: acquiring a data file of a running environment where an artificial intelligence model is located, the running environment comprising a deep learning framework for reasoning the artificial intelligence model; based on the obtained data file, generating first representation data of the operation environment; acquiring second characterization data of a reference environment having similar environment attributes with the operating environment; and comparing the first characterization data with the second characterization data to determine the security of the operating environment where the artificial intelligence model is located. Therefore, the consistency of the operating environment and the reference environment subjected to security verification is verified through comparison of the characterization values, so that it is ensured that data content executed in a plaintext is not dumped by a memory by determining the security of the current operating environment.

column2: FLAKY MATERIAL RAPID FLAW DETECTION INTEGRATION SYSTEM AND USE METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses a sheet material rapid flaw detection integration system used for detecting a fabric, wherein the sheet material rapid flaw detection integration system comprises an optical detection module used for shooting the fabric, a system host, a storage host and an artificial intelligence identification unit; the system host is in information connection with the optical detection module, the system host is provided with a data receiving unit, a positioning unit and a flaw judgment server which are in information connection, the data receiving unit is used for receiving photos shot by the optical detection module, the flaw judgment server is used for capturing flaw photos, and the positioning unit is used for binding the flaw photos and the corresponding coordinate positions where the flaws are located at the sheet material; the storage host is in information connection with the host system and is used for receiving the flaw photos and the coordinate positions bound with the flaw photos; and the artificial intelligence identification unit is in information connection with the storage host, and the artificial intelligence identification unit is provided with a training module and a flaw classification module which are in information connection.

column2: RESOURCE ALLOCATION METHOD, RESOURCE ALLOCATION DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a resource allocation method, a resource allocation device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: determining initial resource quotas of a plurality of task queues, and enabling each task queue to run a task by adopting the corresponding initial resource quota; when a first preset condition is met, obtaining resource use state data of at least one task queue; processing the resource use state data by using a latest reinforcement learning model to obtain resource allocation action data, and adjusting the resource quotas of the plurality of task queues by using the resource allocation action data; when a second preset condition is met, obtaining task running state data of at least one task queue; and determining a reward value according to the task running state data, and updating the reinforcement learning model through the reward value. According to the invention, efficient and reasonable resource allocation can be carried out on the task queue.

column2: COMBINED ICON REPRESENTATION METHOD OF EQUIPMENT RUNNING STATE
column4: The invention discloses a combined icon representation method for an equipment operation state, and relates to the technical field of icon representation, and icon elements comprise a wind turbine generator component, a thermal power generating unit component, a hydroelectric generating unit component, a transformer component and the like. According to the method, the feature icon elements and the state icon elements are combined into the combined icon capable of representing the running state of the equipment according to a specific combination rule, and then the different running states of the unit are represented by changing the number of components in the state icon elements in the combined icon. When the representation method is applied to equipment monitoring, convenience can be brought to users with color blindness; the application range of the users is wider, obvious equipment features and the identification degree of different operation states can be provided for the users, practicability is higher, color changes can be continuously used on the basis to further improve the identification degree and the visual effect, application of the image identification technology is facilitated through combined icons, favorable conditions are created for application of the Internet of Things, big data and artificial intelligence technologies.

column2: DETECTION MODEL ADJUSTING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a detection model adjustment method and device, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a computer vision and deep learning technology, and can be used in a smart cloud smart city scene. According to the specific implementation scheme, firstly, a first detection model running in the graphics processor is obtained, performance parameters of the first detection model are determined, the performance parameters represent the time consumption type of the first detection model, then the first detection model is adjusted based on the performance parameters of the first detection model, and a second detection model is obtained; and finally, parameter recombination is performed on the second detection model to obtain an adjusted detection model, so that the adjusted detection model can utilize effective computing resources, improve the computing speed in limited computing resources, enrich the feature expression of an output result based on parameter recombination, improve the accuracy of the detection result, and improve the accuracy of the detection result. Therefore, the optimal balance between the performance and the precision of the detection model running in the graphics processor is realized.

column2: AUXILIARY EQUIPMENT FOR PREVENTING DAMAGE CAUSED BY MISTAKEN WATERING OF PERSONNEL FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ROBOT
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence robots, and discloses auxiliary equipment for preventing damage caused by mistaken watering of personnel for an artificial intelligence robot. The auxiliary equipment comprises a flow guide groove, wherein the bottom of the flow guide groove is movably connected with a rain collecting wall, the bottom of the rain collecting wall is movably connected with a guide mechanism, the left side and the right side of the guide mechanism are movably connected with drying mechanisms, the bottom of the guide mechanism is movably connected with a protective wall, and a power-off mechanism is movably connected to the interior of the protective wall. Water absorbed by water absorption cotton is increased, and the self weight is increased, so that a supporting spring is compressed to drive a mounting base to move; and the mounting base moves to drive a connecting frame to move downwards until two flow guide lines are separated from an electrifying contact and an operation contact respectively, at the moment, a robot driving source is disconnected, current cannot pass through, so that the robot is powered off and stops running, and the effect of automatically stopping the robot according to the condition to prevent internal components from being damaged when the water is manually and mistakenly sprayed to the robot is achieved.

column2: TASK INFORMATION DISPLAY METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a task information display method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: creating a multi-way tree based on a to-be-executed task, starting from a root node of the multi-way tree, executing a stage task of each node in sequence, and scanning a running script of the stage task of each node, extracting metadata information and business logic information of the to-be-executed task; and analyzing the metadata information of the to-be-executed task, and displaying the metadata information and the business logic information of the to-be-executed task when determining that the to-be-executed task runs normally according to an analysis result and monitoring that the business logic grammar needing to be optimized does not exist in the business logic information of the to-be-executed task. By displaying the metadata information and the business logic information of the to-be-executed task, the complete execution plan is obtained, and the task display effect of the to-be-executed task is improved.

column2: AN AI-BASED SYSTEM FOR DIAGNOSIS AND TREATMENT OF MENTAL ILLNESS
column4: When it comes fulfilling the capacities of an individual in terms of psychological support and intervention the lag is evident. The huge stigma attached to the psychological issues/mental illnesses makes it all the more difficult for the population all over the world to go and approach the psychologists/psychiatrists. In addition to stigma, population is unaware of psychological signs/symptoms and emergency interventions related to psychiatric disorders. Henceforth, need of an artificial intelligence system which interacts with people about their psychological symptoms was seen. This is an inbuilt system based on Al which allows the user to express their needs and wants in a single platform. The application performs the functions from diagnosing to treating the user. Surely there are many unnoticed cases of mental illnesses which haven't been reported. The stigma attached to the mental illnesses makes it all the more difficult for the people to approach psychiatrists/therapists. This application will help the people to approach for treatment without facing any social stigma. Which in turn will help to develop a much transparent database for the same. The data base can be accessed by the Governmental Organisations to develop statistical data on the prevalence and occurrence of all psychological illnesses. Patients who are already under treatment can use the app for further interventions. Unlike other apps available in the market this app is completely Al based. How they feel, for how long are the symptoms running and further helps them track down their ongoing mental health conditions. The system will update/improve system based on latest researches and updates. The patient will be diagnosed according to their symptoms. The responses will be recorded and user will be suggested for further interventions. The recording of the response will further help in improving the quality of diagnoses. The sensors and camera of the laptop/ smart phones will be utilised to sense the emotions and vitals of the patient. The application will be connected to the smart watch also to configure the vitals of the users. Automated suggestions based on the present recorded condition of the user will pop up. For example, a pop up for breathing exercises, medicines. Time scheduled for therapies. Ongoing patients can enter their details and can continue with the treatment online. This in turn will help both the new and old patients to utilise the application. An approach to multiple health applications have been a part of the daily lives of the people. We have applications to talk to physicians, take appointment, applications taking care of our physical health have always been an emphasis.Apps taking care of our menstrual health, physical activities, diet planning, less is the area explored for mental illnesses/issues. An empty space was observed in the approach towards mental health. During the pandemic the lag was realisedon a greater wave length. When people were all locked inside their homes without an interaction with the outer world. When the population could not help themselves but be in the situation. It took months for the situations to normalise. Some might have had a good environment at home, some may not. Some might already be suffering from mental illnesses. Some might have been addicted to alcohol/drugs. Looking into the history of pandemics, we see that there was a rise of mental illnesses then and now with COVID-19. There have been reported rise in the cases of mental illnesses. People already suffering from the illnesses had no space to approach and contact psychiatrists. People who never had any symptom also gained anxiety and panic disorder as a result of the lockdown. Further the patients will get suggestions for virtual therapy and treatment sessions which they can go through from the same interface. Therapies earlier have been a separate part of the applications which either have been specified to anxiety and depression or just an app with therapies and consultations available. This invention will allow the user to go through the complete procedure at one go. The therapies again based on Al will be provided virtually. The application will register the timings and dosage of the drugs and therapies. The application will then buzz the user for their drug and therapy.Data will be gathered from the patient for the ongoing treatment and therapies or any other possible intervention that the patient is already going through or applied for the present psychological condition. The Al will take the feedback and suggest improvements on the ongoing interventions. The complete information will then be converted into a database which in turn will be utilised into the statistical information. This information can be processed into valuable data's that the organisations and governments can utilise for further interventional purposes. The prevalence of mental health issues in the community at all levels can be recognised easily. Since mental illnesses are associated with taboos in the society that people who earlier might be not in the count of the statistical data will now be part of the complete analysis of the data. The application will be helpful in taking out the real statistical data of the population. Usually, we only consider what is into account, and cannot go into the real data. People can easily be tracked and intervened for their condition. Early intervention can easily be possible for the suffering populations or the people who are unaware of the things. This application will in turn create awareness by giving health education tips and ideas for new and latest treatments for people. An A-Based System for Diagnosis and Treatment of Mental Hlness Diagram: / VirtualTherapies Pharmacology Figure. Architectural Diagram of the Proposed Invention

column2: GRAPH NEURAL NETWORK PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and relates to a graph neural network processing method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps of obtaining a labeled image and an unlabeled image; performing mixed enhancement on the labeled image to obtain a first augmented image; training an initial graph neural network according to the labeled image and the first augmented image to obtain a relay graph neural network; performing mixed enhancement on the unlabeled image to obtain a second augmented image; inputting the unlabeled image and the second augmented image into a relay graph neural network to obtain a prediction result; determining false labels of the label-free image and the second augmented image according to the confidence of the prediction result; and training the relay graph neural network according to the labeled image, the first augmented image, the unlabeled image and the second augmented image to obtain a graph neural network. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the image with the label and the image without the label can be stored in the block chain. According to the invention, the accuracy of the graph neural network obtained through training is improved.

column2: RELAY PROTECTION EQUIPMENT FAMILIAL DEFECT IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a relay protection equipment familial defect identification method based on artificial intelligence, belongs to the technical field of relay protection, solves the problem of how to effectively identify the familial defects of relay protection equipment in operation, and obtains defect data by obtaining and sorting relay protection equipment defect information and equipment ledger information. Defect data are labeled by utilizing defect point extraction, information association and data standardization, and defect reasons and specific parts of the relay protection equipment are analyzed in combination with the defect data of the relay protection equipment; according to the family model of the relay protection equipment, the specific defect distribution condition of the protection equipment is mined, and the familial defects of the relay protection equipment are screened out; and software and hardware risks of protection incorrect actions are analyzed in combination with the operation conditions of different familial defect devices in the whole network, a technical transformation method is correspondingly provided, the familial defect affirmation period of the relay protection device is shortened, the familial defect affirmation accuracy is improved, the familial defect processing capacity is effectively enhanced, and the operation stability of the power grid is improved.

column2: TWO-DIMENSIONAL CODE HIGH-SPEED DECODING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a two-dimensional code high-speed decoding method and system, and the system comprises a two-dimensional code display screen at a coding end, a two-dimensional code display screen displayed at the coding end, a high-speed camera, a USB3.0 data connectivity, a decoding server, an equipment outer support, an Ethernet cable, and a target network.The high-speed camera is aligned with the two-dimensional code display screen at the coding end; the decoding end is connected with the target network through the Ethernet cable 7, the decoding server is used for carrying out operation needed by positioning and decoding the two-dimensional code, and the equipment outer support is used for providing physical support for all the components, the high-speed camera is used for shooting the color two-dimensional code which changes at a high speed, backward support is provided for black and white two-dimensional codes, the artificial intelligence SVM technology is used, the two-dimensional codes can be received, positioned and analyzed at the speed of 120 frames per second or above, error data are removed, the two-dimensional codes are transmitted to a target network, and stable and strict physical partitions meeting requirements are provided for users having strict requirements for network safety.

column2: BANK LOG DESENSITIZATION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a bank log desensitization method and device, which relate to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of monitoring the operation process of a bank business system, wherein a bank log printing annotation is pre-configured in the bank business system, the bank log printing annotation is an annotation of a bank log printing function aspect, and the section of the bank log printing function is formed by implanting a program code for realizing the bank log printing function into a source code of a bank business system by adopting a section-oriented programming technology, when a bank log printing annotation is monitored to appear in the running process, acquiring to-be-printed bank log data, and calling the bank log desensitization configuration file, performing desensitization processing on the to-be-printed bank log data, and generating a desensitized bank log. According to the method, the bank log desensitization efficiency can be improved, the code redundancy of a bank business system is effectively reduced, the code programming workload is reduced, and the management and maintenance of the bank business system are easy.

column2: IMAGE ACQUISITION METHOD AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to the field of vehicles in the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an image acquisition method and related equipment. The method is applied to a vehicle, the vehicle is provided with a camera device, and the method comprises the following steps: controlling the camera device to shoot the environment around the vehicle to obtain first image data, wherein the first image data corresponds to the environment around the vehicle in the first time period; in response to the obtained photographing instruction, obtaining a first moment corresponding to the photographing instruction; and obtaining a target image from the first image data according to the first moment, and outputting the target image. A user does not need to shoot images any more, so that the problem that a driver cannot shoot images is solved, and the problem that potential safety hazards exist in shooting of the user is also solved; the first moment is included in the first time period, and the interval duration between the shooting moment of the target image and the first moment is smaller than or equal to a target threshold value, so that the scene to be shot is prevented from being missed.

column2: ESTIMATION METHOD FOR LENS WATCHED BY HUMAN EYES AND APPLICATION OF ESTIMATION METHOD IN INTELLIGENT AWAKENING
column4: The invention discloses an estimation method for lens watched by human eyes and application of estimation method in intelligent awakening. The method comprises the steps: enabling a camera to be aligned with a human face for real-time shooting, and obtaining the feature points of the human face in a picture through a human face recognition API; after 150 feature points in the picture are obtained, finding a minimum inclusion rectangle of each eye; respectively calculating minimum included rectangles M1 and M2; calculating whether human eyes watch the camera; when the wake-up word is eliminated, continuously recognizing the face parameters, judging whether the user watches the camera or not, and if the user watches the camera, directly waking up the central controller of the Internet of Things. Whether the human eyes watch the camera or not is detected through the camera, the purpose of awakening the artificial intelligence equipment is achieved by watching the camera, voice awakening is not needed, and noise is avoided.

column2: ?œA REAL-TIME SYSTEM FOR CLASSIFYING AND GENERATING SKELETON OF OBJECTS USING ML TECHNIQUES??06.08.2021
column3: A REAL-TIME SYSTEM FOR CLASSIFYING AND GENERATING SKELETON OF OBJECTS USING ML TECHNIQUES[033] The present invention discloses a real-time system for classifying and generating skeleton of objects using artificial intelligence and Machine learning interfaces. The method and system includes, but not limited to, image capturing device having a scanning functionality with three dimensional data representing an image with its varied environment; a processing unit having an object recognition module for recognizing the object from the image with its varied environment; a skeleton creation unit configured to generate a two-dimensional image frame on recognizing the object by the object recognition module by using a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) Module. Further, the object is classified and a 2D skeleton of the object determined by a neural network, machine learning modules and AI interfaces, and a 3D skeleton is determined by mapping the 2D skeleton to 3D.Accompanied Drawing [FIG. 1]
column4: IN

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR CONTROLLING VEHICLE RUNNING AND VEHICLE
column4: The invention provides a method and a device for controlling vehicle running and a vehicle, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, automatic driving or automatic driving, and can be applied to intelligent automobiles, networked automobiles and automatic driving automobiles. The method comprises the following steps: in an automatic running mode of a vehicle, acquiring a user instruction; acquiring environment information around the vehicle; performing multi-modal understanding on the user instruction and the environment information around the vehicle, and determining the driving intention of the user; and generating an automatic driving control instruction for the vehicle according to the driving intention of the user. According to the technical scheme, the user experience in the automatic driving process can be improved.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR HARDWARE SIMULATION AND EMULATION DURING RUNNING, AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: Provided are a method and apparatus for hardware simulation and emulation during running, and a computer device and a storage medium, wherein same are applied to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: acquiring a neural network structure graph and a neural network parameter (S101); constructing a corresponding neural network in a simulated manner according to the neural network structure graph (S102); acquiring data to be emulated, and quantizing the data according to quantization information to obtain emulation input data (S103), wherein the emulation input data and the neural network parameter are of the same hardware data type; inputting the neural network parameter and the emulation input data into the neural network for convolution calculation to obtain a convolution result (S104); and on the basis of the convolution result, obtaining an emulation result and outputting same (S105). Since data to be emulated is quantized to be of the same hardware data type as a neural network parameter, when software is used for emulation, a result of emulation calculation is closer to that of hardware calculation; and the data calculation amount of the hardware data type is less than the calculation amount of a floating-point type, such that the calculation speed of neural network emulation can also be increased.

column2: MONITORING SYSTEM, METHOD AND DEVICE OF MICRO SERVER AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses a monitoring system, method and device of a micro server and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of cloud computing and big data.
