According to the specific implementation scheme, the monitoring system of the micro server comprises a baseboard management controller (BMC) and a programmable logic device which are connected with each other; each expansion interface of the programmable logic device is connected with each signal end of each micro server module to be monitored, and the programmable logic device is used for acquiring state information of each micro server module through each signal end and storing the state information of each micro server module into a specified storage address; and the BMC is used for acquiring the state information of each micro server module from a specified storage address in the programmable logic device. Therefore, through the monitoring method of the micro server, the operation and maintenance cost and the resource waste are reduced, and the accuracy of monitoring the running state of the micro server is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model provides artificial intelligence equipment which comprises a shell, a camera shooting mechanism arranged on the upper portion of the shell, a first dust cleaning mechanism arranged on the shell, a voice input mechanism arranged in the shell, a mounting hole formed in the lower portion of the shell, a dust filter screen arranged in the mounting hole and a second dust cleaning mechanism arranged in the shell. The first ash removal mechanism comprises a first spray head arranged on the shell corresponding to the camera shooting mechanism, the first spray head is communicated with a first air supply hose, and the first air supply hose is communicated with the air supply mechanism; the second ash removal mechanism comprises lifting mechanisms arranged on the two sides of the mounting hole in the shell, pressure pipes are arranged on the lifting mechanisms, a plurality of second spray heads are arranged on the pressure pipes, the pressure pipes are communicated with a second air supply hose, and the second air supply hose is communicated with the air supply mechanism. The signal input part of the artificial intelligence equipment can be cleaned, the situation that the artificial intelligence equipment obtains external information mistakenly or cannot obtain the external information due to attachment of dust and hair is avoided, and normal operation of the artificial intelligence equipment is guaranteed.

column2: POLISHING PRODUCTION METHOD, SYSTEM AND CONTROL SYSTEM CAPABLE OF AUTOMATICALLY IDENTIFYING CAST IRON BLANKS
column4: Embodiments of the invention provide a polishing production method, system and control system capable of automatically identifying cast iron blanks. The polishing production system capable of automatically identifying the cast iron blanks comprises a camera used for shooting cast iron blanks to be polished, a conveying component used for conveying the blanks and directly distributing the unqualified blanks without subsequent operation, a robot automatic polishing component used for conducting automatic polishing according to a polishing track, a visual processing system used for identifying and positioning feature points and restoring an edge track needing to be polished, and a central major control system correspondingly connected to the camera, the robot automatic polishing system component, the conveying component and the visual processing system. The central major control system is used for controlling the conveying component to work, obtaining images shot by the camera, restoring the edge track needing to be polished through the visual processing system, and making a judgment to guide a robot to complete polishing work. According to the embodiments of the invention, the whole production station is of an assembly line structure, the influence of dust and chippings on the camera and the light source in the polishing process is considered, so that the visual inspection work and the polishing work are completed in different working areas, and each working area can be isolated by a protective cover to prevent dust diffusion or dust pollution.

column2: APPLET RUNNING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides an applet running method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as deep learning and cloud computing. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the following steps: receiving a request message sent by a client of a host application program, wherein the request message comprises a target applet identifier and current version information of the host application program; determining a target applet according to the target applet identifier, wherein the target applet has a plurality of corresponding candidate execution file packages; determining a target execution file package from the plurality of candidate execution file packages according to the current version information; and sending the target execution file package to the client. Due to the fact that the target execution file package matched with the current version information of the client side is provided for the client side of the host application program, the loading performance of the host application program for the applet is effectively improved, and the overall running performance of the applet is effectively improved.

column2: SYSTEM OPERATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a system operation method and device, computer equipment and a readable storage medium, which can be used in the field of artificial intelligence or other fields, and the method comprises the following steps: capturing the current watching position of the eye pupil of a user on a display screen; generating a cursor on the watching position, wherein the cursor and the watching position synchronously move; and when the cursor stops moving on the display screen and coincides with the icon, running an application program corresponding to the icon. According to the scheme, the running of the application program can be operated through the eye pupils, and the diversification and convenience of function operation can be improved.

column2: CONTROL DEVICE AND METHOD APPLIED AS PART OF AN ELECTRIC TRACTION KIT FOR VEHICLES AND SEMI-TRAILERS
column4: The invention relates to a control device and method applied as part of an electric traction kit for vehicles and semi-trailers, and forming an electric traction control system applied to semi-trailers and internal combustion engine vehicles, which includes an electric motor (10) or (200) to be installed on the hub and/or wheel (30), with a hollow centre for mounting on the outside of the running axle (20), maintaining the manufacturing of axles and wheel hubs widely used in auxiliary towed vehicles that have known loading and running conditions, and the electric motor (10) and/or (200) is added in order to apply acceleration torque and regenerative braking only, which is the main aim of the electric motor. The control method consists of an optimization and artificial intelligence algorithm for making the motor/generator available on the majority of the route travelled.

column2: INTELLIGENT ULCER DEGREE IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to an intelligent ulcer degree identification system. The system comprises: an electronic gastroscope structure that comprises a miniature photographing device, a telescopic probe, a handle, a field monitor and a micro-control motor, and the miniature photographing device is arranged at the top of the telescopic probe and used for conducting photographing operation on the gastric mucosa of the human body in the empty stomach state so as to obtain corresponding gastric collection images; the ulcer identification mechanism that is used for taking a plurality of real-time transformation images respectively corresponding to a plurality of stomach acquisition images obtained by photographing human stomach mucosa in an empty stomach state for preset times by the micro photographing equipment as input data of a multi-layer neural network model, running the multi-layer neural network model, and obtaining the gastric ulcer level. Through the system, artificial intelligence mode analysis can be performed on a plurality of stomach images which are acquired on site and subjected to normalization processing, and the gastric ulcer level of a stomach patient can be obtained in time, so that the gastric ulcer level is directionally detected.

column2: OPERATION METHOD AND DEVICE OF TEST UNIT, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an operation method and device of a test unit, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as deep learning. The operation method of the test units comprises the steps that the multiple test units are run concurrently based on an original group of the multiple test units, a running result of concurrent running is obtained, and the original group is determined based on the resource utilization rate of the multiple test units; the method also includes: if the test unit with the running result of running failure exists, re-grouping the plurality of test units to obtain an adjustment group of the plurality of test units; and on the basis of the adjustment group, concurrently running the plurality of test units again until the test units failing to run do not exist. The operation efficiency of the test unit can be improved.

column2: BOTTLE FOLLOWING SHOOTING DEVICE AND BOTTLE DETECTION EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of quality inspection equipment, and provides a bottle body following shooting device and bottle body detection equipment, and the bottle body following shooting device comprises: a conveying mechanism which is used for driving a bottle body to move; a support, wherein the support and the conveying mechanism are arranged in a spaced mode; a moving platform which is installed on the support in a sliding mode, wherein the moving direction of the moving platform is parallel to the moving direction of the conveying mechanism, and the moving platform is used for moving along with the bottle bodies; and a first camera which is installed on the moving platform, and a lens of the first camera faces the conveying mechanism. According to the following bottle body shooting device and the bottle body detection equipment provided by the invention, the mobile platform is arranged on the bracket, and the first camera is mounted on the mobile platform, so that the mobile platform can move along with the bottle bodies, the image of each bottle body can be shot, the collection efficiency of the image of the bottle body can be improved, and the accuracy of quality detection of the bottle body can be improved.

column2: TEST CASE EXECUTION METHOD AND DEVICE AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses a test case execution method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of automatic testing and source codes. A specific implementation scheme includes: carrying out the state monitoring on a test case in a database, and carrying out state switching among a plurality of life states on the test case according to monitored data; screening out test cases with stable life states and/or test cases with unstable life states from a database, and generating a target test case set; obtaining a target test code deployed in the execution environment; and obtaining a target test case having a mapping relationship with the target test code in the target test case set, running the execution environment, and executing the target test case based on the execution environment. Therefore, the life state of the test case can be updated in real time, the test case with the stable life state and/or the test case with the unstable life state can be screened out from the database, and the execution stability and efficiency of the test case can be improved.

column2: VIDEO AND BROADCAST INTEGRATED EMERGENCY BROADCASTING SYSTEM BASED ON REAR-END ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of emergency broadcasting, and particularly relates to a video and broadcast integrated emergency broadcasting system based on rear-end artificial intelligence, which comprises a video acquisition unit, a video and broadcast integrated platform and an audio playing unit, the video acquisition unit is used for shooting video images in a monitoring area; the video and broadcast integrated platform is used for intelligently analyzing, transmitting and storing the acquired video content, positioning geographic information data of each acquisition point in combination with a geographic information system, extracting video events, and intelligently selecting corresponding audio information and corresponding playing equipment; and the audio playing unit is used for receiving and playing the corresponding audio information. According to the technical scheme, the defects in the prior art are overcome, the video images of the monitoring area are obtained through multiple monitoring devices, the events in the video image are actively analyzed, the corresponding voice information is selected to be played, and the effect of active broadcasting is achieved.

column2: SPORTS EVALUATION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON VIRTUAL REALITY
column4: The invention provides a sports evaluation method and system based on virtual reality. The method comprises the steps: building a virtual runway scene through virtual reality glasses, carrying out the hectometer running test of a student, recording a corresponding running video in a testing process, and acquiring the time needed by the student to complete the hectometer running test; and determining a comprehensive evaluation result corresponding to the hectometer running test of the student in combination with the body shape external contour information of the student,determining the training time corresponding to hectometer running training of the student, and performing timely training reminding on the student; In the way, the convenience of carrying out sports tests on students can be improved, the accuracy of carrying out comprehensive evaluation on sports test results of the students can be improved, and the timeliness and the intelligent degree of supervising and urging sports training on the students can be effectively improved.

column2: ELECTRIC SCREWDRIVER FOR INSTALLATION AND MAINTENANCE OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ROBOT
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence robots, and discloses an electric screw driver for installation and maintenance of an artificial intelligence robot. The electric screw driver comprises an equipment main body, wherein a circular sliding rail is arranged at the center of the interior of the equipment main body, a power supply device is arranged on the inner side of the circular sliding rail, and a driving disc is rotatably connected to the outer side of the circular sliding rail. According to the electric screwdriver for installation and maintenance of the artificial intelligence robot, after the screwdriver is used, a driving disc drives a metal guide piece to slide along a circular sliding rail through an electronic starter and does not abut against two contact blocks any more, a circuit is disconnected, and the electronic starter stops running; two gravity blocks stop rotating accordingly, lose the effect of centrifugal force and get close to each other under driving of a spiral spring, the gravity blocks drive a second rotating plate and the screwdriver to move in the direction close to the center of the equipment body through a second guide rod, and therefore, the screwdriver is withdrawn, the unused screwdriver is protected, and the risk of rusting or accidental damage is reduced.

column2: COMMUNICATING SYSTEM, CALL ANSWERING AND DIALING METHOD AND COMMUNICATION SYSTEM FOR HEARING-IMPAIRED PEOPLE
column4: The invention provides a communicating system for hearing-impaired people, and the system is characterized in that the system sequentially comprises, from bottom to top, an access layer which is used for connecting a voice relay interface and a service interface ; a data layer which is used for storing user data, and the user data comprising call information and user personalized configuration information; a service layer which comprises an AI service and a business system service, the AI service using a streaming decision engine, and the business system service comprising a voice processing module and an information pushing module; and an application layer where applications are integrated in front-end applications in different forms. An artificial intelligence technology is utilized to provide a communication mode suitable for barrier-free communication of the deaf, dumb and disabled people, and the problems of call answering, call making and dialogue communication are solved. In order to solve the problems that the sign language is not popularized and professional equipment is expensive when the deaf-mute communicates, the intelligent voice technology is utilized to solve the listening and speaking problems of the deaf-mute in the existing instant messaging mode.

column2: VIDEO DATA EDGE CALCULATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses a video data edge calculation method based on an artificial intelligence algorithm. The method comprises the following specific steps of S1, collecting a driving video stream through employing a camera, and collecting the distance between a pedestrian and a vehicle and a vehicle where a user is located through employing a laser distance measurement sensor; and S2, the development board adopting a YOLO algorithm to process the collected data, and a target object being marked; the data detected by the laser ranging sensor and collected by the camera in the step S1 and the result after data processing in the step S2 are fed back to the display screen and the alarm device for processing. According to the method, objects such as vehicles, pedestrians, bicycles and the like can be detected in real time in the running process of the automobile, an approximate distance can be calculated, a sound alarm can be given at a short distance so as to assist driving, real-time monitoring can be realized through edge calculation, prompt of the text information can be given, a distance can be calculated, an alarm can be given and the like, and data does not need to be uploaded to a server. and therefore, the required real-time performance can be ensured.

column2: STORAGE YARD ANTI-COLLISION SYSTEM BASED ON THREE-DIMENSIONAL VISION
column4: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence algorithms, particularly relates to a storage yard anti-collision system based on three-dimensional vision, and aims to solve the problems that an existing storage yard anti-collision system independently uses laser radars, a single laser radar has a relatively large visual angle blind area, and a plurality of expensive laser radars are relatively high in cost, so that the cost and the efficiency cannot be considered at the same time. According to the system, the system comprises two camera arrays, industrial control equipment, a gantry crane and an artificial intelligence controller, the camera arrays are arranged at the top of the gantry crane, an electrical room is arranged in the gantry crane, the industrial control equipment is installed in the electrical room, and the artificial intelligence controller is connected with the two camera arrays. According to the method, the digital camera is used for shooting the pictures of different angles of the storage yard below the yard crane or the quay crane, and then the electronic virtual map of the whole lower storage yard is generated by using a multi-view three-dimensional reconstruction algorithm and an artificial intelligence algorithm, so that better protection can be provided for dislocation of the containers close to the storage positions, and the method also has better cost performance.

column2: POSTURE DIAGNOSIS SYSTEM, POSTURE DIAGNOSIS METHOD, AND DATA SET FOR POSTURE DIAGNOSIS
column4: Provided are a posture diagnosis system, a posture diagnosis method, and a data set for posture diagnosis which have excellent operability and can simply diagnose the distortion of the skeleton of a subject by using artificial intelligence. The posture diagnosis system of the present invention is characterized by comprising: a unit for acquiring data such as an image, which acquires data of an image or a moving image obtained by capturing the body of a subject; a skeleton data generation unit which causes artificial intelligence to specify, on the basis of the image data or moving image data, a plurality of parts of the body of the subject and to generate skeleton data; a distortion data generation unit which causes the artificial intelligence to detect, on the basis of the skeleton data, the distortion of the skeleton of the subject and to generate distortion data; and a data set generation unit which associates the skeleton data and the distortion data with symptom data pertaining to a physical symptom and/or a physical state of the subject to generate a data set.

column2: AUTOMATIC SAILING BOAT DRIVING MONITORING METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an automatic sailing boat driving monitoring method, device and equipment and a readable storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: positioning a dynamic rigid body in a preset water area in a closed test platform in real time, so as to obtain the driving speed and position coordinates of the dynamic rigid body, wherein the dynamic rigid body represents a local automatic sailing boat and a non-local automatic sailing boat; and based on the driving speed and the position coordinates, controlling avoiding cooperation between the local automatic sailing boat and the non-local automatic sailing boat, so the situation that the local automatic sailing boat collides with other objects in the driving process, and the experience feeling of a user is reduced is avoided.

column2: CAMERA MOUNTING DEVICE AND CAMERA ROBOT COMPRISING SAME
column4: The utility model discloses a camera installation device and a camera shooting robot comprising the same, the camera installation device comprises a connecting piece and two mutually parallel guide rails, the guide rails are arranged along the vertical direction, each guide rail is provided with a guide block capable of moving along the guide rail, the first end of the guide block is movably installed on the guide rail, and the second end of the guide block is movably installed on the connecting piece. The second ends of the guide blocks extend in the direction away from the guide rail, the extending directions of the two guide blocks are parallel, the extending lengths are equal, and the guide blocks can be fixed to the guide rail through positioning structures. The two ends of the connecting piece are hinged to the second ends of the two guide blocks respectively, and the connecting piece is provided with an installation area used for installing a camera. The camera is installed on the installation area of the connecting piece, and the connecting piece can ascend and descend along the guide rail in the longitudinal direction along with the guide block so as to adjust the longitudinal height of the camera. Meanwhile, the connecting piece can rotate around the connecting piece so as to adjust the pitch angle of the camera. The camera in the camera shooting robot is easy to adjust, the shooting range is wide, and the working efficiency is higher.

column2: 3D CAMERA SUPPORT
column4: The utility model discloses a 3D camera support, which comprises a base, three adjusting support legs are equidistantly arranged on the base at an angle of 120 degrees, each adjusting support leg comprises an adjusting stud and a support seat, the adjusting stud is in threaded connection with the inside of the base, a turncap is arranged at the top end of the adjusting stud, the bottom of the adjusting stud is rotatably connected with the support seat, and the adjusting stud is fixedly connected with the support seat. An anchoring rod is arranged in the adjusting stud and the supporting seat in a penetrating mode, a rotating seat is rotationally connected to the top of the base, a lifting lead screw is rotationally connected to the center of the top of the rotating seat, the lifting lead screw is sleeved with a sliding table in a threaded mode, and a camera fixing seat is rotationally connected to one side of the sliding table through an arranged rotating shaft. The 3D camera support provided by the utility model can adapt to the placement operation on a flat ground, can also adapt to the fixing operation on an uneven land, is more practical, and can adapt to the shooting requirements of different angles and different heights as the sliding table is matched with the rotatable rotating seat.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM FOR FUR COLOR IN TONGUE PICTURE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence identification system for a fur color in a tongue picture. The system comprises: a tongue picture acquisition camera, which is used for shooting a tongue needing to be diagnosed to obtain a first tongue picture, wherein the first tongue picture at least comprises a tongue picture and a reference body with a first standard gray value; and a MCU processor, which comprises a picture receiving unit, a reference body identification unit, a picture brightness adjusting unit and a fur color identification unit, wherein the picture receiving unit is used for receiving the first tongue picture sent by the tongue picture acquisition camera, the reference body recognition unit is used for recognizing the reference body in the first tongue picture and acquiring a second actual gray value corresponding to the reference body, the picture brightness adjusting unit is used for adjusting the gray value of each pixel point of the first tongue picture according to the first standard gray value and the second actual gray value, and the fur color identification unit is used for identifying the tongue picture in the first tongue picture picture, acquiring the fur color of the tongue picture, and acquiring a disease corresponding to the fur color according to the fur color. According to the invention, fur color identification accuracy is effectively improved.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR IMPROVING QUESTION ANSWERING CONCENTRATION DEGREE OF STUDENT THROUGH GESTURE OF QUESTION ANSWERING OF STUDENT
column4: The invention provides a method and a system for improving the answering concentration degree of a student through gestures of the student in question doing, which take the question doing actions of the student in the question doing process as shooting objects so as to determine the corresponding hand activity data of the student, and further analyze the hand activity data, and determine whether a student has a question-doing stopping state in a question-doing process and the duration time corresponding to the question-doing stopping state, and finally determine the question-doing concentration degree of the student and adaptively reminding the student according to the question-doing stopping state and the duration time corresponding to the question-doing stopping state, thereby utilizing the characteristic that when the student is in a question-doing non-concentration state, the question-doing gestures of the student correspondingly have abnormal conditions, by analyzing the question-doing gestures of the students, the students can be effectively supervised and urged to do questions efficiently and concentratedly, and the intelligence and automation level of monitoring the question-doing process of the students is improved.

column2: ROBOT-BASED INVESTIGATION SYSTEM, INVESTIGATION METHOD AND EQUIPMENT THEREOF
column4: The invention provides a robot-based investigation system, an investigation method and equipment thereof, and relates to the robot field. The robot-based investigation system comprises an acquisition module, a processing module, a communication module and a control terminal, and the robot of the system can autonomously act to complete investigation work. In addition, the invention further provides an investigation method based on the robot. The method comprises the steps of obtaining and sending video data of a working area; generating and sending an operation instruction according to the working area video data; obtaining and sending target person data, recognizing and analyzing a target person, and obtaining target person behavior information; and judging according to the target person information, and giving an alarm if the target person information is abnormal. According to the method, the robot can autonomously act to complete investigation work. In addition, the invention further provides investigation equipment based on the robot. The investigation equipment comprises a robot body, a camera shooting assembly, an industrial personal computer and a communication module. The robot can autonomously act to complete investigation work.

column2: POWER LINE CARRIER INTELLIGENT MONITORING METHOD AND SYSTEM OF URBAN INFORMATION MODEL
column4: The invention provides a power line carrier intelligent monitoring method for an urban model, and the method is characterized in that the method comprises the following steps: S1, building a two-dimensional model of an urban road and a building based on an artificial intelligence network; s2, manufacturing a city model object according to the two-dimensional model in the step S1, and arranging a light-emitting device at the position of the electric power equipment or the electric appliance in the road and the building of the model object; s3, constructing an urban power line carrier signal transmission system, and establishing an urban power line carrier intelligent monitoring model; and S4, monitoring the power operation state of the city in real time according to the model established in the step S3. According to the invention, through video shooting of the light-emitting 3D printing city model and identification of the artificial intelligence model, the real-time visual spatial and temporal distribution monitoring of the city power operation state can be obtained, and intelligent monitoring of the city power operation state is realized.

column2: INTELLIGENT ASSESSMENT METHOD FOR DANCE MOTION POSTURES, RHYTHMS AND EXPRESSIONS
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent assessment method for dance motion postures, rhythms and expressions. The method comprises the following steps: S1, extracting student initial joint point data, student initial face key point data, teacher initial joint point data and teacher initial face key point data; S2, performing preprocessing and normalization processing to obtain final joint point data of the student, final face key point data of the student, final joint point data of the teacher and final face key point data of the teacher; S3, calculating the facial expression similarity of each frame of image; S4, extracting key frames in the teacher dance video and the student dance video; and S5, performing action posture accuracy judgment, action rhythm accuracy judgment and expression evaluation on the dance video of the student. According to the method, an artificial intelligence deep learning technology is combined, and a human body posture analysis technology and a face recognition technology are applied to the field of practical engineering.

column2: METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT FOR MONITORING RUNNING CONDITION OF APPLICATION
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides an application running condition monitoring method, device and equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence; the method comprises the steps: determining a universal index information set of a plurality of target applications; defining a target log format according to the general index information set; using a distributed search analysis engine to record logs generated by the operation of the plurality of target applications, wherein the format of the logs generated by the operation of the plurality of target applications is the target log format; and in combination with the distributed search engine and the open source visualization platform, monitoring the operation condition of each target application based on logs generated by the operation of the target applications. In the embodiment of the invention, the reusability among the applications is effectively improved, and the running condition of each target application can be efficiently monitored through each general index in the log.

column2: MODEL REASONING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a model reasoning method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of model reasoning. A specific implementation scheme comprises: starting a preset artificial intelligence model by using an application container engine mirror image; determining a plurality of target models in the preset artificial intelligence model according to the type and reasoning requirement of the input data; setting priorities of the plurality of target models; and running the plurality of target models according to the priorities for reasoning to obtain a reasoning result. According to the embodiment of the invention, the overall operation of the reasoning process is optimized, the model reasoning efficiency is improved, the model for reasoning is flexibly selected based on different scenes and specific reasoning requirements, and the priority of model execution in the reasoning process is automatically set, so that the whole model reasoning process is more accurate and efficient.

column2: INTRAVASCULAR NANO-ROBOT DEVICE AND OPTIMAL CONTROL SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an intravascular nano-robot device and an optimal control system and method, relates to the technical field of robots and the field of data analysis and intelligent recognition by utilizing an artificial intelligence robot technology. The intravascular nano-robot device is fed into a blood vessel through a needle tube and a catheter, a nano-robot simulates jellyfish swimming to circulate and flexibly dilate the blood vessel in the blood vessel by using dual modes of autonomous learning control and far-end control of a neural network improvement method, and various vascular diseases such as vascular stenosis, plaque and embolism are monitored and intelligently recognized in real time. A support can be carried and placed by the nano-robot, and blood vessels are supported. A laser, a radio frequency device and the like are used for ablating intravascular embolism, and medicine is accurately fed at the embolism position. Vascular diseases which are slow to find, difficult to treat, poor in effect, inaccurate in dosing and high in surgical accuracy requirement are effectively solved, the risk of in-vitro surgery is reduced when the blood vessel is sent into the nano robot, basically noninvasive, real-time monitoring and optimal control are achieved, and serious diseases in the blood vessel are effectively prevented.

column2: WIRELESS CONTROLLER AND SELFIE STICK
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence internet of things, in particular to a wireless controller and a selfie stick. The wireless controller is detachably mounted on the selfie stick and comprises a key module, a control chip and a wireless communication module; wherein one end of the key module is connected with one end of the control chip, and the other end of the control chip is connected with one end of the wireless communication module; the key module is used for generating a key electric signal according to a key instruction of a user and sending the key electric signal to the control chip; the control chip is used for generating a corresponding key value electric signal according to the key electric signal and sending the key value electric signal to the wireless communication module; and a wireless communication module. And the sending module is used for sending the key value electric signal to the mobile phone to enable the mobile phone to execute shooting operation according to the key value electric signal. A user can remotely control the selfie function of a mobile phone through the wireless controller arranged on the selfie stick, and the user can conveniently adjust the selfie angle.

column2: INTELLIGENT DIAGNOSIS PLATFORM FOR LARYNGEAL DISEASES
column4: The invention relates to an intelligent diagnosis platform for laryngeal diseases, and the platform comprises a waveform recording mechanism attached to the throat of a patient with laryngeal diseases and used for collecting a throat sound signal within a preset time length, network running equipment used for running a feed-forward neural network after completing content input operation of inputting binary coded data into an input layer of the feed-forward neural network so as to obtain output data of an output layer of the feed-forward neural network, and network processing equipment used for sending the feedforward neural network trained by the network processing equipment to the network operation equipment, wherein the output data of the output layer of the feed-forward neural network is of a patient disease type. The intelligent laryngeal disease diagnosis platform is intelligent in control and wide in application. The artificial intelligence mode can be adopted to carry out on-site identification on the type of the current laryngeal disease of the patient suffering from the laryngeal disease, so that a tedious and tedious laryngeal disease diagnosis process is omitted.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EDUCATION LEARNING STARTING MACHINE SUPPORTING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence education learning starting machine supporting device which comprises a supporting frame and an AR observer matched with the supporting frame, the supporting frame is provided with a base and a supporting body located on one side of the base, the other side of the base is provided with a plurality of clamping positions, and the side, facing the clamping positions, of the upper portion of the supporting body is connected with a supporting protrusion. And a lens is arranged in the AR observer. The beneficial effects of the utility model are that through the arrangement of the support frame and the AR observer matched with the support frame, the problems that the support frame and the AR observer are mutually independent and cannot be effectively matched, the support has a single purpose, the position of the artificial intelligence education learning starting machine is repeatedly adjusted and the like are solved, so that the artificial intelligence education learning starting machine can be rapidly positioned and effectively matched in different scenes; and by arranging a plurality of clamping positions, the multi-screen display screen can be suitable for multiple scenes such as internet-surfing classes, reading picture books, recording videos and the like.

column2: WARM VENTILATOR FAULT DETECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ALGORITHM
column4: The invention provides a warm ventilator fault detection method and system based on artificial intelligence algorithm. The method comprises the steps: s1, initializing a BP model structure, and setting the number of neuron nodes of each layer of a network; s2, initializing a particle swarm; s3, calculating a particle fitness value; s4, comparing the fitness value and the global extreme value of the particle; s5, updating particle positions and velocity vector values; s6, outputting an optimal network according to the particle position updating result information and the velocity vector value updating result information, and obtaining the fault detection result information of the heating fan based on the artificial intelligence algorithm. Fault diagnosis is carried out on the heating ventilation air conditioner based on an artificial intelligence algorithm, and feedback data is provided by sensors with sampling points located at key parts of the heating ventilation system, the research data being provided by an owner intelligent control center.

column2: INTELLIGENT PEST AND DISEASE DAMAGE IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence-based pest and disease damage intelligent identification system in the technical field of pest and disease damage identification, which comprises a mobile vehicle, a shooting machine, a mobile vehicle and the like, and is characterized in that the mobile vehicle is positioned on a track laid between planted crops, and the mobile vehicle walks on the track to drive the shooting machine to shoot the planted crops; the shooting mode has a timing monitoring effect on planted crops, plant diseases and insect pests can be found in time, a manager is prompted, the loss of planters can be further reduced due to timely protection measures, and the moving vehicle repeatedly moves on the track, so that the planting efficiency is improved. The shooting machine transmits a shot picture at a corresponding position to the remote server terminal through the wireless communication module, the remote server terminal receives image data, then identifies the image by using a trained model, returns a result to the mobile terminal where the planter is located, and guides the planter to accurately apply pesticide according to the identification result. The device is convenient to use, and can diagnose, prevent and control diseases and insect pests more timely.

column2: EXERCISE LABEL PREDICTION SYSTEM BASED ON LABEL TREE AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an exercise label prediction system based on a label tree and artificial intelligence, and the system comprises an input module, a proofreading module, a labeling module, a prediction module, a database, an analysis module, a display module, a training module, and a classification model. The invention relates to a series of work of exercise label prediction under Internet education. The system not only comprises the input module, the proofreading module, the display module, the analysis module and the like which are owned by most exercise systems, but also can solve the problem of label prediction related to exercises, and is relatively complete in coverage. According to the multi-label text classification used by the platform, common sentences or words in the pre-training language model can be captured, and more importantly, vocabularies, syntax and semantic information can be captured. In the training module and the prediction module, training prediction in a full label form and training prediction in a label tree form are divided, and the prediction requirements of labels under various conditions can be met.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BIDDING ALGORITHM AND SYSTEM BASED ON BIG DATA
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent bidding, and discloses an artificial intelligence bidding algorithm and system based on big data, and the algorithm comprises a cloud computing server CCSpbts which operates product bidding transaction system server software. The product bidding transaction system comprises a transaction data module used for storing historical transaction big data information, a bidding prediction module running an artificial intelligence bidding prediction model, a bidding transaction module used for a bidding transaction user to complete bidding transaction operation, a transaction user registration module used for the bidding transaction user to complete identity registration, a transaction user verification module used for the bidding transaction user to complete identity verification, a transaction information encryption module used for the bidding transaction user to complete bidding transaction information encryption and decryption processing. According to the invention, the technical problem of how to enable a service purchaser to select commodity services meeting requirements at reasonable prices on the basis of rapid supply and demand matching is solved.

column2: CONSTRUCTION SITE CONSTRUCTION SAFETY PREVENTION ROBOT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a construction site construction safety prevention robot based on artificial intelligence. The construction site construction safety prevention robot comprises a robot body, wherein first brackets are fixedly connected to the front side, the rear side and the two sides of the robot body; second brackets are fixedly connected to the bottoms of the first brackets; supporting plates are fixedly connected to the bottoms of the second brackets; a transparent top plate is arranged at the top of the robot body; and fixing pipes are arranged on the two sides of the bottom of the transparent top plate. According to the construction site construction safety prevention robot, the robot body, the supporting plates, the second brackets, the first brackets, the fixing pipes, movable pipes, the transparent top plate, limiting plates and springs are arranged and used in a matched mode, so that the problems that an existing construction site construction safety prevention robot based on artificial intelligence is poor in protection effect and prone to side inclination when running on the uneven ground are solved; and the construction site construction safety prevention robot based on artificial intelligence has the advantages of being good in protection effect and capable of preventing side inclination, and is worthy of popularization.

column2: UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE WITH ACQUISITION FUNCTION BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXPLORATION
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence exploration-based unmanned aerial vehicle with an acquisition function. The unmanned aerial vehicle comprises an unmanned aerial vehicle body, motors are arranged at the four ends of the unmanned aerial vehicle body, rotating shafts are arranged at the top ends of the motors, fan blades are fixedly connected to the outer walls of the circumferences of the rotating shafts, a rotating device is arranged at the bottom end of the middle of the unmanned aerial vehicle body, and a camera is arranged at the bottom end of the rotating device; the camera at the bottom end can rotate through the rotating device at the bottom end, data collection is more convenient, the camera at the bottom end is rotated by inputting control instructions and rotating the rotating device, the view field of the camera can be wider, and the shooting range is larger.

column2: INSTRUCTION OPTIMIZATION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention is suitable for the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides an instruction optimization method and device, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining monitoring data which is obtained by monitoring an AI processor when the AI processor executes an instruction combination, and is used for recording the operation efficiency of each calculation unit in the AI processor; according to the monitoring data, analyzing in combination with the instruction combination, and determining optimized data of the instruction combination; and optimizing the instruction combination according to the optimization data. The monitoring data obtained through monitoring are obtained, analysis is performed according to the monitoring data and the instruction combination, the optimization data for optimizing the instruction combination is determined, and then the instruction combination is optimized according to the optimization data, so that redundant and repeated instructions in the instruction combination are avoided, and instructions needing to run by the AI processor are reduced; and when the AI processor runs the optimized instruction combination, the time spent on running the instruction combination can be reduced, and the running efficiency of running the instruction combination by the AI processor is improved.

column2: AUXILIARY PHOTOGRAPHING METHOD AND DEVICE, TERMINAL EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention is suitable for the technical field of terminals, and particularly relates to an auxiliary photographing method and device of an artificial intelligence (AI) terminal, terminal equipment and a computer readable storage medium. The auxiliary photographing method comprises the following steps: acquiring an original image, and identifying a target feature of a photographing object in the original image and a scene feature of a scene where the photographing object is located; obtaining a posture image according to the target feature of the shooting object and the scene feature of the scene where the shooting object is located, wherein the posture image comprises a to-be-recommended target posture; and displaying the posture image and the original image in an overlapping manner as a preview image, so as to guide the shooting object to carry out posture adjustment according to the target posture in the preview image, so that the shooting object can be conveniently and rapidly guided to carry out posture adjustment according to the target posture in the preview image, the posture adjustment efficiency is improved, the shooting efficiency is improved, the image shooting effect is effectively improved, and the user experience is improved.

column2: SMART PIPE INSPECTION ROBOT FOR BLOCKAGE DETECTION AND CLEARANCE
column4: ABSTRACTIn India, there are several major problems happening, therein problems sewage maintenance is one in all massive issue in Republic of India. Due to the poor maintenance, the sewerage water is overflowed on the streets and generally mixes with drinking water and becomes harmful to the people at large. In 2013, manual scavenging was declared illegal, but still private contractors engaged by the municipal government endure to hire manual scavengers. More than hundreds of fatality of the manual scavengers has been reported each year. In order to overcome this deplorable situation, artificial intelligence is deployed to replace manpower. The sewage pipe cleaning and inspection is carried out by a mechanical robot driven by electronic automation. If the avoidance pipe was blocked, the sewerage water will be blocked till it is discerned and repaired. To overcome this issue., smart pipe inspection robot for blockage detection and clearance model is planned .This model is meant to exchange human sewerage cleaners so as to confirm their health and hygiene. The planned mechanism moves through the pipeline, detects the blockage and clears them by pumping water with air mass or cuts through the blockage and moves forward. The mechanism operation is monitored and controlled manually by the sewerage employee, employing a portable computer or palmtop computer. The operator will monitor the insides of the pipe via a wireless camera hooked up to the mechanism. The assorted sensors hooked up to the mechanism helps to work out the gap of the block from the mechanism and also the presence of toxic gases within the pipeiine. The pumping mechanism pumps water or air into the pipeline with air mass so as to loosen and clear the block.

column2: A SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED AUTOMATIC ADJUSTABLE USER COMPORT SEAT FOR TWO WHEELERS
column4: A system and method for an artificial intelligence based automatic adjustable user comport seat for two wheelers. is to provide an AI based automated bike seat adjustment in two wheelers that permits independent adjustment of seat angle or seat lateral position with respecting driver requirement. To achieve the purpose, the present invention includes an n-number of pneumatic or electrically operated linear adjustment mechanisms with its one end attached in chassis and another end attached in under the seat; three or more linear actuators attached to achieve user liked performance and comfort. the adjustment for the seat is achieved by adjusting the position of the linear actuators; wherein linear actuator is to be operated and controlled by integrated AI system to gain better accuracy.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM RISK DETECTION METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND COMPUTER DEVICE AND MEDIUM
column4: The present application relates to the field of artificial intelligence model deployment, and in particular to an artificial intelligence system risk detection method and apparatus, and a computer device and a storage medium. The method comprises: running an artificial intelligence system to be subjected to detection; acquiring index parameters of various risk evaluation indexes of the artificial intelligence system to be subjected to detection during running; performing multi-dimensional quantitative detection on the artificial intelligence system according to the index parameters of the risk evaluation indexes; by means of a source code of the system and the use thereof, determining a weight parameter corresponding to the system; comprehensively taking the index parameters and corresponding parameters into consideration to obtain a running risk parameter of the artificial intelligence system to be subjected to detection; and detecting a running risk of the artificial intelligence system by means of the running risk parameter, such that the running artificial intelligence system is ensured to be secure and controllable, risks are mastered and avoided in an application process of the artificial intelligence system, and the occurrence of security problems or events is reduced.

column2: DISTRIBUTED CHANNEL INTELLIGENT DETECTION AND ACCESS METHOD FOR HETEROGENEOUS WIRELESS COOPERATIVE NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses a distributed channel intelligent detection and access method for a heterogeneous wireless cooperative network. The method comprises the following steps that: if only one information source sends an RTS packet, the information source obtains a channel access opportunity; the information sink calculates an SNR (Signal to Noise Ratio), an SNR judgment threshold and a relay number judgment interval of a direct connection channel from the information source to the information sink; the information sink makes a first-level decision, whether access through a direct connection channel or further detection of the relay nodes or re-competition of giving up the channel is judged, if further detection of the relay nodes is selected, the optimal number of detection relays is judged, the relay nodes are notified to send RTS packets, and after the information sink receives the RTS packets, the channel rate under single-relay auxiliary transmission is obtained; the information sink executes a second-level decision, and judges whether channel access, direct connection channel access or channel recompetition abandoning is carried out through assistance of a single relay; and after the two-stage decision is finished, the information source performs corresponding channel access according to a decision result. According to the invention, the signaling overhead is reduced, and the network throughput and the spectrum utilization rate are improved.

column2: VISUAL OPERATION HOISTING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a visual operation hoisting device based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of hoisting equipment. The device specifically comprises a hoisting frame; a lifting hanging bracket is mounted at the top of the hoisting frame; a protective shell cover is fixedly mounted on the outer side of the hoisting frame; storage cavities are formed in the periphery of the protective shell cover; two telescopic mechanisms are mounted in the hoisting frame, and a plurality of limiting mechanisms are mounted between the outer sides of the two telescopic mechanisms; and the limiting mechanisms are matched with the storage cavities. An upper camera shooting mechanism and a lower camera shooting mechanism shoot an upper image and a lower image in an underground tunnel, respectively, so that visualized hoisting operation in the underground tunnel is achieved, the perpendicularity of the hoisting device during operation is detected, and an alarm is given out when deviation and swing occur; and an object in the underground tunnel is adjusted through cooperation of the operation limiting mechanisms, the telescopic mechanisms and object fixing mechanisms, so that collision with the underground tunnel is reduced, and the situation that hoisting safety is affected by rotation, shaking and the like due to collision with the pit wall is avoided.

column2: PHOTOGRAPHING GUIDING METHOD, TERMINAL DEVICE, ELECTRONIC DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a photographing guiding method, terminal equipment, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as intelligent recommendation and computer vision. According to the specific implementation scheme, a guide photo and description information corresponding to the guide photo are obtained, and the description information comprises first photographing parameter information and first position information; when the second position information of the terminal equipment is consistent with the first position information, guiding a user corresponding to the terminal equipment to adjust the second photographing parameter information of the terminal equipment according to the first photographing parameter information; and when the second photographing parameter information is consistent with the first photographing parameter information, guiding the user to photograph. Therefore, when the user takes a picture, the user is guided according to the shooting parameter information of the guide picture with the same shooting place, so that the efficiency and the quality of taking the picture by the user are improved.

column2: ONLINE PERSONAL TRAINING SYSTEM AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: Disclosed are an artificial intelligence (AI)-based online personal training system and a method thereof. According to the present invention, the system receives three-dimensional (3D) modeling data of the whole body through body scanning, basic body shape information including body composition, height, weight, muscle mass, and body water content, and target body information to generate a customized body shape management program for each individual, and manages a member's exercise progress and diet on the basis of the program, so that the member performs personal training systematically, thereby maximizing an effect of personal training. In addition, the amount of food and exercise outside the fitness center are sensed through a member terminal and are reflected in the body shape management program, thereby systematically performing health management and body shape management for the member. In addition, when the member does not attend the fitness center, alternative exercise information is provided, the member's body condition information changed through exercise is continuously informed, and the member is motivated to perform exercise regularly, thereby providing body shape management and health management effects through personal training. The system comprises a fitness center server, a kiosk, a mirror transmission unit, and a viewer. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE APPLICATION SERVICE SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT TERMINAL
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of computers, and discloses an artificial intelligence application service software development terminal which comprises a protection frame and a host, an H-shaped installation plate is installed in the protection frame, the host is installed on the installation plate, cover plates are installed on the two sides of a box body of the host, a plurality of heat dissipation holes are formed in the side walls of the cover plates, and the heat dissipation holes are communicated with the protection frame. A motor is mounted at the bottom of the mounting plate, the output end of the motor is connected with a rotating rod through a coupler, connecting rods are symmetrically arranged in the protective frame relative to the rotating rod, the bottom ends of the two connecting rods are rotationally connected with the protective frame through two first bearings, and the upper ends of the connecting rods penetrate through the mounting plate and extend outwards. According to the utility model, the heat dissipation effect on the host is better, heat in the host can be quickly brought out, the influence on the running speed of the artificial intelligence application service software development host is prevented, and the host has a moisture-proof function, so that the influence on the service life of the host is avoided.

column2: SYSTEM FOR DETECTING ABNORMALITY OF PANTOGRAPH OF ELECTRIC TRAIN INSTALLED ON VEHICLE AND PROCESSING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to a system for detecting an abnormality of a pantograph of an electric train to be installed on a vehicle and a method thereof. According to the present invention, the system for detecting an abnormality of a pantograph of an electric train to be installed on a vehicle fixes and installs a camera, an arc sensor, and a pair of TOF sensors on the roof of an electric train in response to a plurality of pantographs to determine whether a pantograph of a running electric train is abnormal. The system for detecting an abnormality of an electric train to be installed on a vehicle comprises an integrated analysis server and an operating room monitor device. The camera acquires image data for the pantographs. The arc sensor senses whether an arc is created in the pantographs. The TOF sensors sense the height of both the left and right sides of the pantographs. The integrated analysis server uses artificial intelligence-based image analysis and deep learning or machine learning to analyze, compare, and repeatedly learn the image data and sensing data to determine whether an event of the pantographs occurs, and generates a warning to the operating room monitor device when an event occurs. According to the present invention, whether a pantograph is abnormal is accurately detected while an electric train is running or stopped to notify a driver when an event occurs to take quick early measures and prevent accidents. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: REAL CHARACTER AND MIXED REALITY DYNAMIC SUPERPOSITION POSITIONING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a real figure and mixed reality dynamic superposition positioning method and system, and the method comprises the following steps: a human body collection module obtains a real figure image through camera shooting, and obtains the three-dimensional data information and position information of a figure, establishing a human body three-dimensional model of the real figure image, wherein the human body three-dimensional model comprises three-dimensional data information and position information; enabling the virtual generation module to generate a virtual content; adjusting the display change of the virtual content at the corresponding position according to the real-time change of the position information of the real figure image to obtain a final three-dimensional scene; and displaying the final three-dimensional scene, and realizing real-time dynamic activity and change of a plurality of real figure images shot by the camera in a virtual content according with a visual rule. The user is positioned by acquiring the position information of the real person, and the real user and the virtual three-dimensional scene content are dynamically combined and displayed in real time according to the positioning information, so that the real-time interaction between the real person and the virtual three-dimensional scene content is realized.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE COAGULATION DOSING SIGNAL FEEDBACK CONTROL METHOD
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence coagulation dosing signal feedback control method, which comprises the following steps of: shooting a water body in a flocculation stage, preprocessing the shot image, and labeling a label, forming a training sample by the image and the corresponding label, and forming a training set by the training sample; constructing and training a convolutional network, wherein the convolutional network comprises N convolutional layers, M pooling layers and Q full connection layers; wherein the setting mode of each layer of the convolutional network is as follows: one convolutional layer and one pooling layer are arranged, then the convolutional layer and the two pooling layers are sequentially and so on, and finally, Q continuous full-connection layers are arranged, and data in a training set is adopted for training; and performing image preprocessing on a shot to-be-predicted image of the water body in a flocculation stage, and inputting the to-be-predicted image into the trained convolutional network to obtain a classification result of the water body. According to the method, the features of the original floc image are autonomously extracted through an artificial intelligence method, an additional floc collection device is prevented from being additionally arranged for manual extraction of the image features, and the environmental influence caused by floc blurring, crushing and the like is overcome.

column2: COMPUTER SURROUNDING TYPE DISPLAY SCREEN BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a computer surrounding type display screen based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a surrounding type screen, a substrate is fixed in the surrounding type screen in a penetrating manner, the longitudinal section of the substrate is of a T-shaped structure, the upper surface of the substrate is fixedly connected with a first connecting plate in a welding manner, and the upper surface of the first connecting plate is fixedly connected with a second connecting plate in a welding manner. A supporting plate is fixedly connected to the lower surface of the base plate in a welded mode, a base is fixedly connected to the lower surface of the supporting plate, the width size of the base is the same as the width size of the bottom of the surrounding type screen, a rotary damper is fixedly connected to the inner wall of the base, and the supporting plate is connected with the base through the rotary damper. According to the computer surrounding type display screen based on artificial intelligence, stable and effective dustproof and anti-scratch protection can be conducted on the screen through the baffles when the display screen is not used, a supporting structure at the bottom does not need to be disassembled during boxing, and meanwhile the use safety and convenience of the display screen are improved through the artificial intelligence technology.

column2: FAULT PREDICTION METHOD AND DEVICE FOR APPLICATION PROGRAM
column4: The invention provides a fault prediction method and device for an application program, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a target operation log text corresponding to a preset time window of a to-be-detected application program; performing word segmentation processing on the target running log text to obtain a log text word segmentation sequence corresponding to the target running log text; calling a target fault prediction model to perform fault prediction on the log text word segmentation sequence to obtain a fault prediction result of the to-be-detected application program, wherein the target fault prediction model is a model obtained by performing constraint training of fault prediction on the initial prediction model based on a sample log text set corresponding to a preset time window and a matched fault tag, and the sample log text set and the fault tag are generated based on the online problem feedback data corresponding to the preset time window and the sample log text corresponding to the online problem feedback data. Developers can be assisted in checking online problems in advance under the condition that the user is non-inductive, and the user experience is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INTERNET E-COMMERCE DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence internet e-commerce device, and relates to the technical field of e-commerce. The device comprises a box body, a display screen mechanism, a protection plate mechanism, a drawer mechanism and a camera shooting mechanism; first supports are fixed to the two side faces of the front end of the box body, the display screen mechanism is hinged to the first supports, second supports are fixed to the two side faces of the rear end of the box body, the protection plate mechanism is hinged to the second supports, a handle is arranged in the middle of the top face of the box body, and a tool containing groove is formed in the rear end of the top face of the box body. Through the design of the foldable display screen mechanism and the protection plate mechanism, the device is convenient to carry; the device is more convenient to input and output information through double-large-screen display, the box body can be prevented from toppling over through the two unfolded outer protection plates, the stability of the whole device is better, and the problems that an existing artificial intelligence internet e-commerce device is insufficient in portability, inconvenient to use due to a small screen and difficult to store e-commerce data are solved.

column2: IMAGE SHOOTING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND RELATED PRODUCT
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides an image shooting method and device based on artificial intelligence and a related product, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the motion recognition of a target human body in an image collected by a camera under the condition that the camera is turned on; taking an image between the shooting starting image and the shooting ending image collected by the camera as a shooting image; determining a target action of the target human body in each shot image, and classifying all the collected shot images according to the target action; for each shot image in each type of shot images, scoring a target action corresponding to the shot image to obtain an action score, and performing quality scoring on the shot image to obtain a quality score; obtaining a comprehensive score of each shot image according to the action score and the quality score; and determining a target shot image from each type of shot images according to the comprehensive score, and outputting the obtained target shot image.

column2: ROBOT GAIT LEARNING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON VIDEO STREAM AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a robot gait learning method and system based on video streaming and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: firstly, respectively collecting the motion video streaming of a quadruped organism moving in different environments, responding to a key frame image, extracting key pixel points of the skeleton of the quadruped organism in the key frame image, using a neural network for carrying out deep learning on different gait information corresponding to different environments, recognizing environment information of a current frame image in visual equipment, establishing a discretization gait model according to foot point coordinates in the gait information, and solving foot point coordinates of a next foot point when the four-foot bionic robot moves in the discretization gait model. According to the method, feature points are extracted through massive videos to obtain skeleton actions, so that stable bionic gait machine learning is carried out by utilizing video feature point data.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR CALIBRATING MILLIMETER WAVE RADAR, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND ROADSIDE EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a method and a device for calibrating a millimeter wave radar, electronic equipment, a computer readable storage medium and a computer program product, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as computer vision and intelligent transportation. A specific implementation mode of the method comprises the following steps: generating lane topology information under a millimeter wave radar coordinate system according to a sensing result of a millimeter wave radar on a running vehicle in a target area; according to map data of the target area, generating lane line topological information under a map coordinate system, wherein the millimeter wave radar coordinate system and the map coordinate system are established in the same mode; and based on a preset deviation value, determining actual parameters of the lane topological information matched with the lane line topological information, and calibrating the millimeter wave radar by using the actual parameters. By applying the implementation mode, calibration personnel do not need to carry out calibration on site, the calibration precision is also improved, and the requirement of a vehicle-road cooperation scene for precision is met.

column2: ENGLISH TEACHING INTERACTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to an English teaching interaction method and system based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: calculating the pronunciation complementation characteristics of any two students, taking the pronunciation complementation characteristics as the size of a node, constructing a first graph data structure, determining sets corresponding to all maximal cliques, extracting students belonging to a plurality of sets at the same time to form a set X, reconstructing, after the students in the set X are removed, a second graph data structure, obtaining a set Y, calculating the fitness of the students and the set Y, obtaining a grouping set of each student in the set X, selecting an element at random from each grouping set to form a grouping strategy, calculating the sum of the fitness of the multiple elements in the grouping strategy, selecting the grouping strategy corresponding to the maximum value of the sum of the fitness as an optimal grouping strategy, and formulating a corresponding teaching interaction strategy. According to the scheme, the students can be better grouped, and the teaching efficiency is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MOVING AGENT
column4: Disclosed is an artificial intelligence moving agent. The artificial intelligence moving agent includes a communicator in communication with a terminal of a user, a camera for shooting an image, and a processor for detecting a movement of an object, providing an image of the object to an artificial intelligence model to obtain information on whether to transmit the image of the object when the movement of the object is detected, and transmitting the image of the object to the terminal based on the obtained information.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED CONTROL SYSTEM FOR MOBILE CONTAINER SWIMMING POOL FOR SURVIVAL SWIMMING EDUCATION, HAVING CONTROL UNIT CAPABLE OF CONTROLLING CONDITION OF DIVIDED POOL AREA
column4: A swimming pool control system according to an embodiment of the present invention comprises a swimming pool formed of a mobile container and a control device for controlling a swimming pool condition related to water stored in the inner space of the swimming pool, wherein the swimming pool condition may include water quality, water temperature, and water level of pool water. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: POSE DETERMINATION METHOD AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a pose determination method. The pose determination method comprises the following steps: acquiring a scene image shot by a user by using an image acquisition device for a target scene; acquiring a trained target neural network model is obtained, wherein target neural network model is obtained based on training of a scene data training set, the scene data training set comprising at least one frame of scene image sample associated with a pose label, and the scene image sample being obtained by shooting a target scene by an image acquisition device, and the pose label being used for representing position information and pose information when the image acquisition equipment shoots the scene image sample; and inputting a scene image into the target neural network model to obtain pose information of the scene image, the pose information representing position information and pose information when the image acquisition device shoots the scene image. Therefore, the user can conveniently determine the shot content of the image based on the position information and the posture information, and the position information and the posture information can be conveniently used for processing the video or the image.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED CONTROL SYSTEM FOR MOBILE CONTAINER SWIMMING POOL FOR SURVIVAL SWIMMING EDUCATION WITH SENSOR UNIT CAPABLE OF MEASURING ATMOSPHERIC TEMPERATURE
column4: According to an embodiment of the present invention, a swimming pool control system comprises: a swimming pool formed in a movable container; and a control device controlling a swimming pool condition related to water stored in an inner space of the swimming pool, wherein the swimming pool condition comprises water quality, water temperature, and a water level of the swimming pool. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VIDEO PROCESSING DEVICE
column4: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence video processing device. The artificial intelligence video processing device comprises an AI video acquisition module, the output end of the AI video acquisition module is electrically connected with a central processing unit, the input end of the central processing unit is electrically connected with an environment detection module, and the output end of the central processing unit is electrically connected with a database. The artificial intelligence video processing device provided by the utility model has the functions of identifying whether the equipment runs normally or not through the picture action of the equipment running so as to facilitate remote automatic management and control, and judging whether the action of the equipment running reaches the standard or not according to an action comparison mode so as to provide convenience for the remote automatic management and control.
