The central control switch is controlled according to the action judgment result received by the central processing unit, a corresponding processing signal is given, automatic decision making is facilitated, automatic comprehensive monitoring of data changes is provided for a central library, and remote realtime monitoring and automatic decision making of equipment operation actions are facilitated.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EYE DISEASE SCREENING SERVICE METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence eye disease screening service method and system, and belongs to the technical field of medical treatment, and the system comprises an intelligent collection terminal, a bank processing platform, a data processing module, an intelligent screening judgment module, a report generation module, an eye disease database module, an intelligent matching module, a wireless transmission module and a superior hospital online processing platform. The intelligent acquisition terminal comprises a medical insurance card reading module, an identity selection module, a fundus photo shooting module, a data uploading module, a display feedback module and a cost calculation module; an intelligent screening and judging model is generated through the artificial intelligence algorithm, diagnosis of doctors is facilitated, the problems of missed diagnosis and misdiagnosis are reduced, and meanwhile, the eye disease screening service efficiency is improved; besides, the intelligent acquisition terminal is simple in structure and can be arranged in village and town medical clinics or basic hospitals, so that the situation of medical resource waste or insufficient medical resource supply can be effectively avoided.

column2: SENSING NETWORK AND DATA PROCESSING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a sensing network, which can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence, and comprises a feature extraction network; a first block in the feature extraction network is used for carrying out convolution processing on input data to obtain M target feature maps; at least one second block in the feature extraction network is used for performing convolution processing on M1 target feature maps in the M target feature maps to obtain M1 first feature maps, and target operation in the feature extraction network is used for processing M2 target feature maps in the M target feature maps to obtain M2 second feature maps; the splicing operation in the feature extraction network is used for splicing the M1 first feature maps and the M2 second feature maps to obtain a spliced feature map. According to the invention, cross-layer target operation between the same stages is utilized to enable the sensing network to generate the features highly similar to the key features, and the parameter quantity of the model is reduced, so that the running speed of the model on the GPU equipment, the TPU equipment and the NPU equipment is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE USED CAR VIDEO COMMERCE PLATFORM
column4: The present invention provides an artificial intelligence used car video commerce platform that can provide a buyer with a video about a used product. The artificial intelligence used car video commerce platform includes a receiver configured to receive a plurality of partial videos captured by a user terminal, wherein the plurality of partial moving pictures are taken according to a shooting guide that divides the second-hand sale into a plurality of parts and shoots each separately; a determination unit for determining whether each video and audio of the plurality of partial moving images received by the receiver are to be edited according to a preset standard; an editing unit that, when all the partial moving pictures are determined to be edit targets by the determination unit, edits the video and audio of all the partial moving images by artificial intelligence to produce a single full moving picture; a storage unit for storing one entire video produced by the editing unit; a re-shooting request information generator configured to generate re-shooting request information for a partial video that is not determined to be an editing target when there is a partial video that is not determined as an editing target by the determining unit among a plurality of the partial moving pictures; and a transmitter for transmitting the re-shooting request information to the user terminal. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ACCELERATION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON HETEROGENEOUS COMPUTING
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence acceleration system and method based on heterogeneous computing, and the method comprises the steps: achieving FPGA and CPU heterogeneous computing based on a TensorFlow computing framework, gradually increasing the learning rate of a deep learning network in the TensorFlow computing framework until the learning rate reaches the upper limit of a gate valve, gradually reducing the learning rate, obtaining a local optimal solution, and achieving artificial intelligence acceleration based on heterogeneous calculation. According to the method and device, various computing units such as the CPU and the FPGA are combined, on the basis of a Tensorflow computing framework, the computing speed of the computing framework is improved through three aspects of learning rate control optimization, framework optimization and communication optimization, and the running time is shortened by 90% compared with the running time of the CPU computing unit.

column2: PHOTOSTUDIO ILLUMINATION SCENE RECOGNITION
column4: The invention relates to a photostudio illumination scene recognition platform, and the platform comprises: a real-time timing mechanism which is disposed in a monitored photostudio, and is used for transmitting a data collection instruction once at intervals of the same time; a color temperature acquisition mechanism which is arranged near the camera position in the photostudio and is used for executing color temperature data acquisition of the position where the color temperature acquisition mechanism is located once when the data acquisition instruction is received each time so as to obtain corresponding instant color temperature data; and scene recognition equipment which is used for operating the trained bidirectional recurrent neural network to obtain output data of the trained bidirectional recurrent neural network, namely the current illumination type. The photostudio lighting scene recognition platform is customized in structure and intelligent in recognition. On the basis of customized color temperature change rate detection, an artificial intelligence mode is adopted to carry out field identification on the real illumination type of the camera position of the photostudio, so that shooting parameters and even shooting quality can be effectively controlled in a complex illumination environment.

column2: CRAWLER WALKING AUXILIARY DEVICE OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ROBOT
column4: The crawler walking auxiliary device of the artificial intelligence robot comprises a walking supporting plate, crawler bodies are fixedly installed at the left end and the right end of the walking supporting plate, guide wheels are fixedly installed on the inner sides of the crawler bodies, and the guide wheels are located at the left end and the right end of the inner sides of the crawler bodies. The guide wheel is in meshed connection with the side of the inner side of the track body, a driving wheel is fixedly installed at the upper left end of the guide wheel and is in meshed connection with the guide wheel, the upper end of the driving wheel is in meshed connection with the side of the inner side of the track body, and connecting ports are fixedly formed in the front end and the rear end of the middle of the upper end of the walking supporting plate. And a connecting thread is fixedly mounted on the inner side of the connecting port. According to the crawler walking auxiliary device of the artificial intelligent robot, the phenomenon that the crawler body slides or topples over in the running process is avoided, the crawler body can be used for assisting in the running process, meanwhile, skid resistance can be achieved, and then the stability of the device is greatly improved.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR RUNNING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE APPLICATION, AND DEVICE
column4: A method and system for running an artificial intelligence application, and a device. The method comprises: obtaining application configuration information configured for the application, wherein the application configuration information comprises scheme information of an artificial intelligence scheme for implementing the application (S3100); and generating, according to the application configuration information and a preset template file, an executable file of the application for running (S3200).

column2: DYNAMIC UPDATE FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE/MACHINE LEARNING MODEL, OR RETRAIN AND UPDATE, IN DIGITAL PROCESSES AT RUNTIME
column4:
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To dynamically update an artificial intelligence (AI)/machine learning (ML) model in a digital process at runtime.
SOLUTION: A method comprises: listening to an update request for an AI/ML model, by a digital process running on a computing system; and when the update request is received in order to update the AI/ML model, reinitializing or re-instantiating the digital process to call an updated version of the AI/ML model, and listening to another update request, by the digital process running on the computing system. updating of the AI/ML model executed during execution of the digital process. The digital process includes a robotic process automation (RPA) workflow. The AI/ML model is invoked by an activity of the RPA workflow.
SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 17
COPYRIGHT: (C)2021,JPO&INPIT

column2: USER MOTION RECOGNITION METHOD USING 3D SKELETON INFORMATION, AND SYSTEM THEREOF
column4: Provided are a user motion recognition method using 3D skeleton information, and a system thereof. The motion recognition method according to an embodiment of the present invention comprises the steps of: detecting a person in a current frame; extracting joints of the detected person; classifying the extracted joints into a plurality of joint sets; calculating spatial characteristics of the skeleton based on distance information about a distance between the classified joint sets; calculating spatial-temporal characteristics in which temporal characteristics are added to the spatial characteristics of the skeleton based on the calculated spatial characteristics and a change in position between frames of the core joints; and inferring human motion by inputting the calculated spatial-temporal characteristics to an artificial intelligence model trained for human motion recognition. Accordingly, the method extracts the user's 3D joint information from the continuous 2D images, calculates the spatial characteristics of the skeleton, and then adds the temporal characteristics that appear as a change in the position of each joint within a motion section to recognize the user's motion. Therefore, it is possible to recognize/estimate the user's motion only by the dynamic calculation of the 3D skeleton information. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: METHOD FOR DERIVING CAUSE OF DEGRADATION IN QUALITY OF WIRELESS NETWORK AND WIRELESS NETWORK QUALITY MANAGEMENT DEVICE AND COMPUTER PROGRAM THEREFOR
column4: The present invention relates to a method for deriving a cause of degradation in quality of a wireless network and a wireless network quality management device and computer program therefor. The present invention proposes the method for deriving a cause of degradation in quality by applying an artificial intelligence (AI) system to a quality-related troubleshooting method of the wireless network. Specifically, the present invention proposes the method that sets a decision rule for the cause of the problem related to the quality of the wireless network and the quality of the wireless network can be managed faster and more accurately by automatically performing labeling on the learning data for machine learning based on the decision rule. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: IMAGE ACQUISITION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an image acquisition method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence including image processing. The specific implementation mode comprises the steps of determining a detection result of at least one target in a reference image, wherein the detection result indicates a target frame corresponding to the at least one target; determining target features in the target frame as reference target features, and presenting at least one reference target feature in a displayed preview image; executing a comparison step: collecting an image as a to-be-compared image, and obtaining a comparison result of features of the to-be-compared image and the reference target features; and judging whether a comparison result meets a feature similarity condition or not, and taking the image as a target image based on a judgment result. According to the invention, equipment can guide a user to shoot, so that the user can realize accurate self-swing shooting or multi-person swing shooting aiming at a character target and realize accurate object swing shooting aiming at an object target under the condition that the user does not need to participate by other people, therefore the method is beneficial to shooting an image meeting the expectation of the user.

column2: VIRTUAL RACING CAR CONTROL METHOD AND APPARATUS, STORAGE MEDIUM AND DEVICE
column4: 48 ABSTRACT An artificial intelligence-based virtual racing car control method and apparatus, a storage medium and a device. The method comprises: when running a racing game on a client to which a first account is logged on, the client controlling a first virtual racing car of the first account to move in a virtual map of the racing game (S202); in the situation in which the first virtual racing car collides with a second virtual racing car in the virtual map, displaying on the client the durability score of the second virtual racing car being reduced (S204); and when the durability score of the second virtual racing car is a preset threshold, displaying on the client that the second virtual racing car has finished the racing game (S206). The described method does not require the second virtual racing car or the first virtual racing car to run to a pre-configured end point to end a racing game, thereby improving the efficiency of the second virtual racing car ending a current virtual game. FIG. 2

column2: SLIDING BLOCK PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE FOR VIRTUAL IMAGE
column4: The invention discloses a sliding block processing method for a virtual image, and relates to the field of virtual reality, in particular to the fields of artificial intelligence, Internet of Things, voice technology, cloud computing and the like. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps of: obtaining a shape model associated with a target semantic tag; acquiring skeleton skin data of the reference virtual image; fitting the shape model based on the skeleton skin data to obtain a corresponding skeleton linkage coefficient; and based on the skeleton linkage coefficient, generating a sliding block associated with the target semantic tag, wherein the sliding block is used for driving the reference virtual image to obtain a target virtual image conforming to the target semantic feature, and the target semantic tag comprises the target semantic feature.

column2: IMAGE-TEXT EXTRACTION METHOD AND TERMINAL
column4: The invention discloses an image-text extraction method and a terminal, and the method comprises the steps of shooting a to-be-extracted image-text into a picture or reading a picture of the to-be-extracted image-text, drawing a to-be-extracted character and an illustration on the picture through a selection lineation, and then drawing the illustration and an attached drawing through a selection wireframe, or drawing redundant image-text through the combination of an erasing lineation and an erasing wireframe; selecting an image-text, segmenting the selected image-text into a plurality of images, arranging the images in sequence, carrying out manual editing or rechecking such as sorting, line dividing, supplementing and deleting on the segmented images, carrying out OCR processing on the segmented images, extracting image-text data corresponding to the segmented images, and carrying out manual correction on the data. According to the method and the terminal provided by the invention, character and chart recognition and input of courseware and homework of students can be realized, especially manuscripts such as image-text combination, manuscripts, wrong lines, check selection, horizontal and vertical mixed editing, sentence and word confusion and the like, the recognition range, efficiency and accuracy are improved, and intelligent review, network query and intelligent teaching of homework are facilitated.

column2: UNIVERSAL SURGICAL DEVICE AND MEDICAL INSTRUMENT
column4: The invention relates to a universal surgical device and a medial instrument. The comprises a first rotating arm and a second rotating arm; one end of the second rotating arm is rotationally connected with the first rotating arm; the other end of the second rotating arm is rotationally connected with a third rotating arm; running fit faces of the first rotating arm and second rotating arm are circular ring faces perpendicular to the axis of the first rotating arm and the axis of the second rotating arm; running fit faces of the second rotating arm and third rotating arm are circular ring faces and form a set included angle with the axis of the second rotating arm and the axis of the third rotating arm; the second rotating arm is fixedly connected with a first driving tube; the third rotating arm is fixedly connected with a second driving tube; and the tail end of the third rotating arm is rotatably connected with a first clamp and a second clamp which can be opened and closed. The universal surgical device of the invention is high in rigidity and high in degree of freedom.

column2: IDENTIFICATION TABLE
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of identification tables, and discloses an identification table which comprises a rack provided with a first camera device and a foldable placing table; the placing table is movably connected with the rack and is configured to place articles; the shooting range of the first camera device is configured to cover the article. The first camera device capable of identifying the articles is arranged on the rack of the identification table, and the foldable placing table for placing the articles is arranged, so that the placing table of the identification table is folded under the condition that the identification table does not need to be used, and the space is saved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED AUTONOMOUS COOPERATIVE CONTROL METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based autonomous cooperative control method and system, and the method comprises the steps of configuring an artificial intelligence controller for a cooperative control object, and receiving the first communication from the cooperative control object through the artificial intelligence controller, wherein the first communication comprises the state information of a software application component running on the cooperative control object; and the state information comprises the trigger information corresponding to at least one potential state change available to the software application component; and explaining the state information through the artificial intelligence controller, and selecting an artificial intelligence algorithm used by the software application component from a plurality of preset artificial intelligence algorithms based on the explained state information. According to the present invention, the state information is explained by using the artificial intelligence controller, and the artificial intelligence algorithm used by the software application component is selected from the plurality of artificial intelligence algorithms based on the explained state information, so that the autonomous collaboration of the control object is realized, the method is more organized, and the cluster action problem of an unmanned aerial vehicle or an intelligent driving automobile in a complex or specific scene is solved.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an image processing method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The specific implementation mode comprises the following steps: acquiring a shooting preview image containing a target, and for the shooting preview image, determining whether target presentation information of the target and colors of the target and a background are similar or not to obtain a determination result; based on the determination result, generating adjusting prompt information for the target in the shot preview image, wherein the adjusting prompt information is used for indicating adjustment of the target in the shot preview image; and outputting adjustment prompt information for the target in the shot preview image. In the photographing process of a user, target presentation information of the target and whether the colors of the target and the background are similar or not are determined, the presentation of the target and the relation between the target and the background are accurately judged, adjustment guidance is provided for the user, and therefore, the user can shoot images which are more accurate and more accord with the willingness of himself/herself.

column2: PRESSING PLATE STATE IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON IMAGE IDENTIFICATION IN MOBILE OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE
column4: The invention relates to a pressing plate state identification system and method based on image identification in mobile operation and maintenance, and the method comprises the steps: transmitting a pressing plate state video stream signal to a remote analysis host according to the state of a hard pressing plate through an image identification technology of a mobile operation and maintenance terminal; and enabling the host intelligently to compare the collected hard pressing plate state with the standard pressing plate operation state through an artificial intelligence technical means, intelligently discriminating the abnormally-changed pressing plate, and diagnosing the harmfulness description of the abnormally-operated pressing plate. Through the research of intelligent comparison of the hard pressing plate state, the working efficiency of pressing plate inspection is improved, the working intensity of pressing plate operation and maintenance is reduced, and a technical means is provided for reliability inspection and safety monitoring of the operation state of relay protection equipment. Meanwhile, a plurality of substations can be managed by using a single mobile operation and maintenance terminal, so that multi-station and different-mode pressing plate inspection is realized, and great convenience is provided for operation and maintenance work.

column2: IMAGE INFORMATION EXTRACTION METHOD AND DEVICE COMBINING RPA AND AI
column4: The invention discloses an image information extraction method and device combining RPA and AI. The method comprises the following steps: opening a guide interface on a robot process automation (RPA) platform; configuring recognizer, a source of a selected image, a name of a selected template and a selection field on the guide interface to generate a visual structure code, wherein the recognizer is configured according to a self-defined template configured on an artificial intelligence AI platform, and the template name and the field are selected according to the name of a custom template configured on the AI platform and the field of which the identification result needs to be extracted; and running the visual structure code to extract an identification result of the image, assigning the extracted identification result as a preset variable, and carrying out simple operation and dragging to complete the intelligent robot process that information of a semi-structured bill is recognized through a self-defined template and then extracted to a structured table under the condition that no code is written completely.

column2: FACIAL RECOGNITION DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a face recognition device based on artificial intelligence, relates to the camera shooting field, and comprises a base body, one side of the top end of the base body is provided with a recovery groove, one end of the inner bottom wall of the recovery groove is provided with a holding groove, and the inner wall of the holding groove is movably connected with a valve. The top end of the valve is fixedly connected with the top end of the control hydraulic oil cylinder, and a stepping motor is arranged on the inner wall of the recovery tank. By using the stroke screw rod and the base, the monitor can be recycled and stored, the service life of the device is prolonged, the hydraulic oil cylinder and the valve are controlled to be used, the recycling groove is closed, a lens of the monitor is prevented from being impacted and abraded, the cleaning brush is used for removing dust on the lens of the monitor, and the cleaning brush is used for cleaning the lens of the monitor. And through the use of a sealing block, the holding groove is sealed, then it is guaranteed that the drying box is not in contact with outside air, and through the use of the drying box, water vapor in the recovery groove is absorbed.

column2: MONITORING EQUIPMENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model provides monitoring equipment based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the field of security and protection. The monitoring equipment based on artificial intelligence comprises a shell, a baffle is fixedly connected to the top of the shell, a through hole communicating with the interior of the shell is formed in the right side of the shell, a driving power source is fixedly installed in the shell, and a camera shooting mechanism is fixedly connected to the left side of the driving power source; the outer surface of the camera mechanism is sleeved with a lamp panel. According to the monitoring equipment based on artificial intelligence, through a power grid arranged in a power grid hole, insects attracted by a lamp source are killed through electric shock, the insects are prevented from entering the monitoring equipment, through arrangement of an insect collecting box, the insects which are electrocuted are collected, and then insect corpses can be manually treated in the follow-up process; the problems that a light source is arranged in existing monitoring equipment based on artificial intelligence, insects like to enter the monitoring equipment at night, and the use effect and the service life of the monitoring equipment can be affected along with increase of insect corpses are solved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TYPE VEHICLE SECURITY SYSTEM AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a vehicle security system based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises a vehicle-mounted monitoring device, a client and a security server; the vehicle-mounted monitoring device comprises a positioning module, a wireless transmission module, an intelligent analysis module, a data storage module, a camera module and an alarm module; the positioning module is used for acquiring the position information of a vehicle; the wireless transmission module is used for sending data of the vehicle-mounted monitoring device to the security server, the camera module is used for shooting pictures around a vehicle, the intelligent analysis module is used for analyzing dangerous factors existing in the shot pictures, the data storage module is used for storing local data, and the alarm module is used for giving out voice alarm; and the client obtains related data by logging in the security server. The security and protection system analyzes suspicious persons who are close to the vehicle and have the intention of damaging the vehicle and gives an alarm to play a deterrent role, meanwhile, images are captured to serve as evidence for follow-up responsibility investigation, the safe distance can be calculated according to the speed in the driving process, and a vehicle owner is assisted in safe driving.

column2: VISUAL TEACHING AID FOR ANIMAL BREEDING TEACHING
column4: The utility model belongs to the technical field of remote teaching, and particularly relates to a visual teaching aid for animal breeding teaching, which comprises a cloud processor, a data acquisition module and VR glasses, the cloud processor is electrically connected with the data acquisition module through a wireless transmission module, the wireless transmission module is electrically connected with the VR glasses, and the data acquisition module is electrically connected with the VR glasses. Breeding scenes of a farm are shot in real time through the remote shooting and recording module, shot data are transmitted to the VR glasses in real time through the wireless transmission module for practical training teaching, the VR glasses are effectively combined with artificial intelligence and virtual reality of the cloud processor, and real-time dynamic connection between a school theory classroom and an enterprise farm is achieved. Visual teaching of factory real scenes is achieved, situational teaching and project teaching are facilitated, seamless joint of production practice and classroom teaching is achieved, the practicability and effectiveness of teaching are improved, and the outgoing practice cost and the risk in the practice period are reduced.

column2: MODULARIZED SELF-BALANCING DOUBLE-WHEEL QUADRUPED ROBOT
column4: The invention discloses a modularized self-balancing double-wheel quadruped robot comprising a bicycle body. A battery and a control system are installed on the bicycle body. The modularized self-balancing double-wheel quadruped robot is characterized in that a self-balancing system and a quadruped system are further arranged on the bicycle body, and the self-balancing system comprises a balancing assembly and a steering assembly; the balancing assembly is installed at the front end of a frame head tube and used for controlling balance of a bicycle; the steering assembly is fixed to the balancing assembly and connected with a handle through gears and a belt, and the steering assembly controls steering of the bicycle by controlling rotation of the handle; and the quadruped system comprises four quadruped assemblies which are installed on the two sides of a front wheel and the two sides of a rear wheel correspondingly and each have three freedom degrees, and the quadruped systems are used for assisting the bicycle in walking. The balance state of the bicycle body and the motion state of each foot are detected through attitude sensors, double-wheel running and quadruped walking can be achieved, and a good movable carrier is provided for an artificial intelligence algorithm.

column2: CONTAINER AVAILABILITY TESTING METHOD AND DEVICE OF PHYSICAL MACHINE
column4: The invention provides a container availability testing method and device of a physical machine, which can be used in the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: determining a to-be-injected disk fault according to disk information of a physical disk of a running container; injecting the disk fault into the physical disk to enable the performance parameters of the physical disk to correspond to the disk fault; and monitoring the running state of the container to determine whether an exception exists or not. According to the invention, the availability of the container is verified by simulating the physical disk fault.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MICRO-INJECTION PUMP CONTROL SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence micro-injection pump control system. The artificial intelligence micro-injection pump control system comprises a self-checking function module, an operation guiding module, a two-dimensional code recognition sensing module, an input module, a storage module, a synchronization module, an operation module, a fault alarm module and a wireless Internet of Things module. The control method of the system comprises the following steps: S1) starting up the system, self-checking and networking; S2) implementing operation according to operation guidance, and inputting patient information and medication information; S3) checking and correcting the information, if the information is checked to be correct, running, otherwise, reporting an error prompt; and S4) ending the running and showing a standby state. The system and the method have the advantages that an AI-intelligent chip is additionally installed and implanted into the micro-injection pump, so a series of functions such as artificial intelligence are added; and remote networking is achieved, data intercommunication can be achieved, medicine use information can be checked, and use safety of the remote monitoring micro-injection pump is guaranteed.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ORTHOPEDIC REHABILITATION EXERCISE DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence orthopedic rehabilitation exercise device which is composed of a U-shaped supporting frame, an abdomen fixing device, a first moving mechanism, a left leg fixing mechanism, a second moving mechanism, a left leg supporting mechanism, a third moving mechanism, a right leg fixing mechanism, a fourth moving mechanism and a right leg supporting mechanism. Through mutual cooperation of the first moving mechanism, the left leg fixing mechanism, the second moving mechanism and the left leg supporting mechanism, a left leg can be comprehensively supported and exercised, and through mutual cooperation of the third moving mechanism, the right leg fixing mechanism, the fourth moving mechanism and the right leg supporting mechanism, a right leg can be comprehensively supported and exercised. An effect of walking training is improved. By designing a first supporting frame, a second supporting frame, a number one supporting frame, a number two supporting frame, a first limiting disc, a second limiting disc, a number one limiting disc and a number two limiting disc, the safety performance of the device is improved, and a medical staff can be prevented from being injured when supporting a patient.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR ADJUSTING QOE (QUALITY OF EXPERIENCE) VALUE
column4: The invention discloses a method and a device for adjusting a QoE value. The method is applied to a SoC of a mobile terminal, and comprises the following steps: acquiring a service type of a target service running on the SoC of the mobile terminal, and acquiring a QoE baseline value required by the service type; acquiring a current QoE value of the target service; under the condition that the current QoE value is not matched with the QoE baseline value required by the service type, executing one or more of the following items: adjusting the current QoE value according to the artificial intelligence AI capability of the mobile terminal SoC; obtaining a first parameter from the cloud server, and adjusting the current QoE value according to the first parameter; obtaining a second parameter from the communication network end, and adjusting the current QoE value according to the second parameter. By implementing the method provided by the invention, the actual QoE value can be matched with the QoE baseline value, so that the user experience can be improved.

column2: SHOCKPROOF PLATFORM BASED ON MICROSCOPIC AUTOMATIC SHOOTING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a shockproof platform based on a microscopic automatic shooting system, and relates to the technical field of algae analyzers. The technical problems that an existing artificial intelligence algae analyzer is not provided with an anti-seismic scanning platform and is poor in anti-seismic performance, and imaging can be affected by slight large-point vibration; therefore, in the working process, when the working personnel or other personnel touch the working table, the working table vibrates slightly, and the working personnel cannot perceive the tiny vibration; and therefore, data errors can be caused when the algae are shot and analyzed. A through groove is formed in the table top of the workbench, an adjusting mechanism is arranged in the through groove, a platform mechanism is arranged above the adjusting mechanism, a mounting plate is arranged on one side of the platform mechanism, and a vibration sensor is fixedly mounted at the rear end of the upper end face of the mounting plate; an alarm is fixedly mounted at the front end of the upper end face of the mounting plate and electrically connected with the vibration sensor through a wire.

column2: INTEGRATED TUBERCULOSIS MANAGEMENT SYSTEM AND MANAGEMENT METHOD
column4: The invention relates to an integrated tuberculosis management system and management method, and belongs to the technical field of medical technology and artificial intelligence. An artificial intelligence housekeeper is used for collecting environment temperature, environment humidity, wind speed and illumination information in a patient home to obtain patient living environment information, basic information of a patient is collected in a mode of talking with the patient, and targeted health education is carried out on the patient according to the basic information of the patient and the patient living environment information. The artificial intelligence housekeeper is also used for shooting the medicine taking process of the patient to obtain a medicine taking video of the patient so as to complete home-entry follow-up visit, monthly follow-up visit, medicine taking video auditing and the like, so that the workload of primary medical personnel for managing the pulmonary tuberculosis patient is greatly reduced, meanwhile, the contact opportunity between the medical personnel and the patient is reduced, and the infection risk is reduced; and household isolation treatment is realized.

column2: TUMBLE MONITORING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON IMPROVED PATTERN RECOGNITION
column4: The invention discloses a tumble monitoring method based on improved pattern recognition, which comprises the following steps of transmitting a video stream through a camera, and adjusting the video stream to be 320 * 240 pixel size; extracting skeleton information by means of a skeleton extraction algorithm and transmitting to a preprocessing module; enabling the preprocessing module to remove useless coordinate points, calculate coordinate data of the center line of the human body and the like, and transmit the data to the detection module when the frame number is accumulated to a certain degree; detecting data such as human body gravity center moving speed data based on an improved pattern recognition algorithm, and outputting a recognition result; and enabling the alarm system to select whether to send an alarm message according to a judgment result, and ending the process. Through an artificial intelligence algorithm, whether a human body in a picture falls down or not is judged, and reasonable feedback is given; Based on deep learning of a large amount of data sets, rich training samples effectively alleviate an overfitting problem which easily occurs in a neural network training process, so that better generalization ability is obtained to cope with application in a non-controllable scene.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR MULTIMODAL INFORMATION PROCESSING BASED ON BILINEARITY AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence method and system for multimodal information processing based on bilinearity, and a medium. The method comprises the following steps: converting a video stream into image frames; dividing an action sequence; constructing skeleton time sequence features, RGB and depth time sequence features; constructing a three-dimensional feature cube and inputting the three-dimensional feature cube into a bilinear feature learning module; and outputting a classification identification result. According to the method, the deep network is constructed in a bilinear processing mode to fuse the multi-modal information in the RGBD video, the defect that in an existing multi-modal model, features or activation vectors output by different modals are simply spliced or weighted, and information between the modals is not deeply excavated is overcome, and accurate action behavior recognition is carried out. The bilinear operation is plane-level calculation, the calculation cost is low, and the method is suitable for being applied to the industrial field with the high real-time requirement.

column2: COSMETIC-BASED PRODUCTION EQUIPMENT STATE ADJUSTMENT METHOD AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CLOUD PLATFORM
column4: The invention relates to a cosmetic-based production equipment state adjustment method and an artificial intelligence cloud platform. When the method is applied, the production state can be quickly adjusted, and the influence of production chain scheduling on the running state of the automatic production equipment is reduced. Therefore, compatibility consideration of multiple production chains can be realized based on the production chain scheduling strategy, flexible switching of the first automatic production equipment between different production chains and different types of cosmetic production can be quickly and accurately realized, high-efficiency operation of the whole cosmetic production factory is ensured, and the capacity of cosmetics is further improved.

column2: ROAD FACILITY DATA ACQUISITION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ALGORITHM
column4: The invention provides a road facility data acquisition system based on an artificial intelligence algorithm. The system comprises an AI acquisition device, a mobile terminal, a Beidou positioning module and a background server, wherein the AI acquisition device and the Beidou positioning module are both wirelessly connected with the mobile terminal, and the mobile terminal uploads received data to the background server. According to the invention, through a crowdsourcing mode, in combination with Beidou positioning and geo-fencing technologies, the image of the inspection point needing to be confirmed in road inspection is extracted with low cost and high efficiency, and the image is uploaded to the background in real time to carry out remote road inspection identification through an AI image identification technology.

column2: VEHICLE LOSS ASSESSMENT METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a vehicle loss assessment method and device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium, relates to the field of artificial intelligence such as computer vision and deep learning, and can be used in an intelligent cloud scene. The method can comprise: when an intelligent device is used for photographing a damaged vehicle, analyzing a photographed picture, generating shooting guidance information according to the analysis result, and performing picture shooting guidance by using the shooting guidance information; and when it is determined that the shot picture meets the preset requirement, uploading a picture corresponding to the shot picture to the cloud for vehicle loss assessment. By means of the scheme, the accuracy of the processing result can be improved.

column2: CONTROL METHOD, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, COMPUTER-READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM, AND CHIP
column4: The present invention relates to the field of computer vision, and discloses a control method, an electronic device, a computer-readable storage media, a computer program product and a chip, so as to solve the technical problem of poor quality of images collected by a camera of the electronic device in the prior art. The method comprises: the first electronic device obtains a shooting instruction; according to the shooting instruction, determining location information or shooting mode of the content to be shot corresponding to the shooting instruction, and according to the location information or shooting mode of the content to be shot, determining a camera at the most suitable location for shooting the content to be shot from at least two controllable camer as as the target camera; the at least two cameras comprise: a camera on the first electronic device and a camera of a second electronic device, and the first electronic device is different from the second electronic device; the first electronic device controls the target camera to execute the shooting instruction to obtain the image data collected by the target camera. The method is applicable to artificial intelligence (AI) equipment.

column2: AUTHENTICATION METHOD AND MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC APPARATUS THEREOF
column4: The present application relates to the field of communication and the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an authentication method and an electronic apparatus. The authentication method comprises: if a first apparatus determines that a distance between the first apparatus and a second apparatus has reached a first preconfigured distance, the first apparatus sending a first authentication request to the second apparatus, so as to request the second apparatus to determine whether wireless communication is being relayed between the first apparatus and the second apparatus; if the first apparatus determines that the distance between the first apparatus and the second apparatus has reached a second preconfigured distance, the first apparatus determining whether a first authentication success ciphertext sent by the second apparatus has been received; and if the first apparatus determines that the first authentication success ciphertext sent by the second apparatus has been received, and the first apparatus has verified the first authentication success ciphertext successfully, the first apparatus executing a service on which the first apparatus and the second apparatus have agreed. When services such as sensorless unlocking and sensorless payment are performed, the authentication method of the present application determines whether apparatuses of these services are being subjected to relay attacks, thereby ensuring security of sensorless services and improving intelligence of sensorless services.

column2: APPLICATION STARTUP METHOD AND APPARATUS, DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The present application discloses an application startup method and apparatus, a device and a storage medium, which relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The specific implementation solution thereof is: the method is applied to a host application having carried thereon at least one accessory application, and the method includes: preprocessing, if it is determined that a preprocessing condition of the at least one accessory application is met, an accessory application by using a corresponding running container in a background; and starting a corresponding accessory application in a foreground, in response to a selection operation to the accessory application.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED AUTOMATIC CORRECTION CALCULATION AND POWER CONTROL METHOD AND SYSTEM THEREOF
column4: Disclosed is an artificial intelligence-based automatic correction calculation and power control method which comprises the following steps of: determining protection relay correction for at least one protection relay installed in a power system; correcting an operation parameter value of a protection relay which needs protection relay correction among protection relays; and monitoring a state of the power system and an action of the protection relay. According to the present invention, it is possible to monitor before and after processes in which the protection relay acts and analyze a result of an action of the protection relay. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING DIETETIC THERAPY FOR DIABETES MANAGEMENT
column4: The dietetic therapy management server (300) comprises: an information collection module (321) which performs a membership registration procedure through data transmission/reception with the smart device (100) via the network (200) according to the execution of a diabetic manager app on the smart device (100) and stores a terminal identification number of the smart device (100), collected in the membership registration procedure, as metadata and a member ID, member password, and user personal information as a member information unit; and a diabetes management module (322) which calculate a ratio of carbohydrate, protein, fat for each individual carbohydrate requirement (calorie value) among daily calorie requirements for each person based on a glycated hemoglobin value included in user's personal information, and converts the calculated carbohydrate calories into points, and provides food and food combination information matching the converted points to the user device (100) through the network (200). Accordingly, the system provides a point dietetic therapy for the blood sugar management of a diabetic patient (including pre-diabetic patient), and artificial intelligence-based individualized coaching as major services, and additionally enables the integrated management of diabetes-related factors, such as weight, blood pressure, and exercise, through a single application, and thus increases the convenience of managing blood sugar and can prevent complications from diabetes. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: ACCOUNTING AND FINANCIAL ROBOT WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND INTERNET OF THINGS CONNECTION FUNCTION
column4: The utility model belongs to the technical field of accounting and financial robots, in particular to an accounting and financial robot with artificial intelligence and an internet of things connection function, which comprises a robot body and a camera, a sheath is mounted on the outer side of the robot body, a display screen is mounted above the sheath, the camera is positioned on the inner side of the display screen, and the camera is positioned on the outer side of the robot body. A financial processing window is installed below the camera, an infrared sensor is installed at the bottom of the financial processing window, laser range finders are installed on the two sides of the infrared sensor, a protective cover shell is installed on the outer sides of the laser range finders, a walking base is installed below the protective cover shell, and a rotating shaft is installed on the inner side of the walking base. A guide wheel is installed on the outer side of the rotating shaft, and a climbing slope is installed on the left side of the outer wall of the guide wheel. Compared with an existing accounting and financial robot, the accounting and financial robot with the artificial intelligence function and the Internet of Things connection function has the innovative capacity, can be invented and created, and can provide constructive suggestions.

column2: MODEL TRAINING METHOD, DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a model training method, a data processing method and equipment, which can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of computer vision. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, establishing a prototype (namely a category center) for each category of each domain (including a target domain and a plurality of source domains), establishing a relation matrix (namely a similarity matrix) based on the calculated prototype in each domain, constructing a target tensor according to the similarity matrix corresponding to each domain, constructing high-order correlation between the domains through the similarity matrix, and fusing the high-order correlation into a target loss function to obtain a target loss function; and enabling the model learning to extract domain-independent features. According to the method, high-order correlation between a plurality of source domains and target domains is mined by means of low-rank constraints of tensors, and the consistency of features extracted from different domains is enhanced, so that the performance of the model is well improved even if the model is in the target domain which is not seen, and the running time and the calculation overhead of a reasoning stage are not additionally increased.

column2: INTELLIGENT RUNNING TIMING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent running timing method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that 1, a camera collects running videos of runners and counts the number of the runners; 2, a starting point camera performs starting detection on a runner at a starting point and judges whether a false start behavior exists or not; 3, in the running process of the runner, the camera carries out human body tracking and human body detection on all runners entering the view range of the effective area of the runner; and 4, after the runner finishes running, through various identity authentication modes, including face recognition, fingerprint recognition and iris recognition, field flexible use is supported. Intelligent timing of the running time can be achieved through artificial intelligence, time and labor are saved, and therefore the timing accuracy can be improved while the score fairness can be guaranteed.

column2: VEHICLE DRIVING SAFETY MONITORING METHOD BASED ON INTERNET OF THINGS AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a vehicle driving safety monitoring method based on Internet of Things and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of vehicle engine detection point arrangement, detection point operation environment parameter detection, engine operation environment highest temperature and humidity value screening, vehicle engine operation environment danger coefficient statistics, engine abnormal sound early warning and operation sound danger coefficient statisticS, vehicle engine operation vibration danger coefficient statistics, vehicle engine air inflow danger coefficient statistics and vehicle engine comprehensive operation danger coefficient statistics. operation environment parameter detection, operation sound detection, operation vibration detection and operation air inflow detection are performed on the automobile engine, and statistics is performed on the comprehensive operation danger coefficient of the vehicle engine according to a detection result. The running safety monitoring of the vehicle engine is realized, the monitoring index range of the vehicle driving safety is expanded, the monitoring level of the vehicle driving safety is improved, and the life safety of drivers and pedestrians is further guaranteed.

column2: PHOTOGRAPHING QUESTION SEARCHING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a photographing question searching method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence such as natural language processing and computer vision. According to one specific embodiment, the method comprises the steps that a multi-question image is shot and uploaded, and the multi-question image comprises a plurality of exercises; receiving coordinates of a plurality of exercises obtained by performing multi-question detection on the multi-question image; carrying out frame selection on the multi-question image based on the coordinates of the plurality of exercises to obtain selection boxes of the plurality of exercises; uploading a selection box of at least one exercise in the plurality of exercises; and receiving a question searching result obtained by performing question searching based on the at least one exercise. According to the embodiment, multi-question identification and automatic question framing are supported, the operation of photographing and question searching of the user is simplified, the interactive experience of photographing and question searching is optimized, and photographing and question searching are more convenient.

column2: EXERCISE LABEL PREDICTION METHOD AND DEVICE, STORAGE MEDIUM AND COMPUTER EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses an exercise label prediction method and device, a storage medium and computer equipment, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining to-be-predicted exercises, extracting exercise vectors corresponding to the to-be-predicted exercises from a heterogeneous graph neural network, calculating the distances between the exercise vectors and all label vectors in the heterogeneous graph neural network, screening out a target distance smaller than a distance threshold value from the distances, determining a target label vector indicated by the target distance, and taking a label entity corresponding to the target label vector as an exercise label of the to-be-predicted exercise. By adopting the method and the device, the vector representation of the to-be-predicted exercises and the label entities is acquired based on the heterogeneous graph neural network of semi-supervised classification, and the exercises are labeled according to the distance by calculating the distance between the to-be-predicted exercises and each label entity.

column2: AUTHENTICATION METHOD, MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the field of communication and the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an authentication method and electronic equipment. The method comprises the following steps: when a first device judges that the distance between the first device and a second device reaches a first preset distance, sending a first authentication request to the second device to request the second device to judge whether wireless communication between the first device and the second device is relayed or not; when the first device judges that the distance between the first device and the second device reaches a second preset distance, enabling the first device to confirm whether a first authentication success ciphertext sent by the second device is received or not; and under the condition that the first device confirms that the first authentication success ciphertext sent by the second device is received and the first device verifies that the first authentication success ciphertext is passed, enabling the first device to execute a service agreed with the second device. According to the authentication method, when non-inductive unlocking, non-inductive payment and other services are executed, whether the equipment carrying out the services is subjected to the relay attack or not can be judged, so that the security of the non-inductive services is ensured, and the non-inductive services are more intelligent.

column2: BRAKE-BY-WIRE UNIT, VEHICLE BRAKE-BY-WIRE SYSTEM AND COMMERCIAL VEHICLE
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of automobile control, in particular to a brake-by-wire unit, a vehicle brake-by-wire system and a commercial vehicle. A brake-by-wire unit comprises a foot brake valve, a three-way pipe I and a three-way pipe II, a first air inlet of the foot brake valve is communicated with a first air storage tank through the three-way pipe I, and a first air outlet of the foot brake valve is communicated with a first relay valve through the three-way pipe II. A first switch electromagnetic valve is further arranged between the first air outlet of the foot brake valve and the second three-way pipe, a third port of the first three-way pipe is communicated with a third port of the second three-way pipe, and a first proportional valve is arranged between the third port of the first three-way pipe and the third port of the second three-way pipe. According to the utility model, the commercial vehicle only equipped with the ABS brake system is modified to realize the brake-by-wire function, the workload is small, the cost is low, and the performance is reliable.

column2: CHARGING TABLE OF INTELLIGENT SOCCER ROBOT
column4: The utility model discloses an intelligent soccer robot charging bench, which comprises a substrate, the upper end of the substrate is fixedly connected with a charging bench body, the upper end of the substrate is provided with a shell, the outer wall of the shell is fixedly connected with a connecting block, the connecting block is provided with a fixing screw, the upper end of the shell is fixedly provided with an electric push rod, and the electric push rod is fixedly connected with the charging bench body. A top plate is fixedly connected to one end of a piston rod of the electric push rod, a protective outer cover is fixedly connected to the outer wall of the top plate, placing grooves arranged in pairs are formed in the base plate, a convex block is fixedly connected to the upper end of the base plate, and a clamping strip is rotationally connected to the convex block. When the football robot is used, the protective outer cover and the clamping strips are arranged to fix the football robot, the situation that the football robot is touched and powered off during charging is avoided to a certain extent, and when the football robot is not charged, the wire and the charging head are located in the protective outer cover, so that the service life of the football robot is prolonged.

column2: TRAFFIC MONITORING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to a traffic monitoring method and device, a medium and equipment. The method comprises the following steps: capturing network traffic of a preset duration in a network and storing the network traffic into a database; performing feature extraction on the traffic data in the database to obtain feature data; performing feature screening on the feature data to obtain screened data; and classifying the screened data by using a preset model. According to the method and the device, the incremental learning capability is increased for the system by establishing the incremental database, so that the system can update a machine learning algorithm in time, learn new VPN traffic features and improve the detection accuracy. A feature construction program is used for carrying out feature construction on the collected network traffic, feature extraction automation is achieved, features in fixed formats are obtained, and during model training and online running, the uniformity of the formats is guaranteed, and smooth follow-up processes of the model are facilitated.

column2: GATEWAY TEST METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a gateway test method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of cloud computing. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the following steps: obtaining a running log of an online environment of an application program interface (API) gateway; determining N first-class test cases based on the running log, wherein N is an integer greater than or equal to 1; and testing the API gateway based on the N first-class test cases to obtain N first-class test results. According to the technical scheme, the testing efficiency of the API gateway can be improved.

column2: MONITORING CAMERA BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a monitoring camera based on artificial intelligence, and the camera comprises a camera, which comprises a first housing and a first camera, and the middle part of the lower surface of the first housing is rotatably provided with a rotating mechanism. A control mechanism is fixedly mounted in the first shell, a standby camera shooting structure is mounted at the inner bottom of the first shell, and an ash removal structure is mounted outside the first shell; the rotating mechanism is used for driving the camera to complete the action of rotating the shooting direction; the control mechanism is used for controlling starting and closing of the rotating mechanism and the standby camera shooting structure; when the first camera is damaged or shielded, the PLC can control the second servo motor to drive the threaded rod so as to drive the sleeve to ascend and descend and eject the second camera out for monitoring work, and the PLC can control the first servo motor to rotate, so that the column body rotates, the whole device rotates, and monitoring in multiple directions is achieved.

column2: END-TO-END-BASED LANE LINE DETECTION METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an end-to-end-based lane line detection method, device and equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a training sample set, and adding a lane line label to each sample image in the training sample set; inputting the sample image added with the lane line label into a specified depth polynomial regression model to obtain a prediction result; adjusting model parameters in a specified depth polynomial regression model according to a prediction result, and retraining the specified depth polynomial regression model to obtain a lane line detection model; and obtaining a to-be-detected image shot by a foresight shooting device of the target vehicle, and inputting the to-be-detected image into the lane line detection model to obtain a lane line of the target vehicle. In this way, the lane line can be determined more accurately and effectively, and the efficiency and the real-time performance of lane line detection are improved. The invention relates to a block chain technology, for example, image data can be written into a block chain so as to be used for scenes such as data evidence obtaining.

column2: DETACHABLE SMART GOLF BAG WITH GRIP STERILIZATION STRUCTURE
column4: The present invention relates to a detachable smart golf bag with a grip sterilization structure comprising: a case; a sterilization module; a heater; a blowing device; a control unit; and a power supply unit. The case includes a division body which is vertically divided into multiple parts to divide a part in which a golf club is accommodated inside into multiple parts; maintains or separates a state of combining the division body by a detachable combination unit; and provides an inlet and an outlet for inflow and discharge of air. The sterilization module is installed in the case and sterilizes the golf club. The heater is installed in the case and supplies heat. The blowing device is installed to discharge the air in the case through the inlet through the outlet. The control unit controls the sterilization module, the heater, and the blowing device in response to an operation signal of an operation unit. The power supply unit supplies power necessary for operations of the sterilization module, the heater, and the blowing device. The present invention is provided to assemble the part in which the golf club is accommodated in the case to be detached to the multiple parts, thereby improving comfortability and convenience of use by facilitating cleaning, maintenance, and management due to disassembly of the case. The present invention suppresses odor causing and proliferation of harmful bacteria due to use of the golf club by performing sterilizing and drying steps for a grip of the golf club. Therefore, the present invention facilitates hygienic use and storage of the golf club, and facilitates operation control by using artificial intelligence and an external terminal. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: TEXT PROSODIC BOUNDARY PREDICTION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a text prosodic boundary prediction method and device, computer equipment and a computer readable storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: inputting an obtained to-be-predicted text into a preset text prosodic boundary model; obtaining word vector information corresponding to the to-be-predicted text through the pre-trained language model; according to the word vector information, obtaining corresponding multi-dimensional vector information; performing convolution processing on the multi-dimensional vector information through the two-dimensional convolution model to obtain classification label information corresponding to each word in the to-be-predicted text; identifying the classification label information through the classification layer, and determining the prosodic boundary information of each word. The to-be-predicted text is changed into a multi-dimensional vector, so that the to-be-predicted text can be convolved by using a two-dimensional convolution network, the accuracy of prosodic boundary prediction is improved, and the running speed of the model is improved.

column2: PANORAMIC PICTURE GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON SINGLE PTZ CAMERA
column4: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and relates to a panoramic picture generation method and device based on a single PTZ camera, and the method comprises the steps: enabling the PTZ camera to shoot a plurality of pictures, so as to obtain a first picture set which is arranged according to a shooting sequence; deleting pictures of which the texture sparsity does not meet a first preset condition in the first picture set to obtain a second picture set; extracting adjacent pictures in the second picture set as picture pairs, performing region matching and feature matching on each picture pair, and judging whether feature points of effective feature matching of each picture pair determined according to a joint matching result of region matching and feature matching meet a second preset condition; and if so, sequentially splicing and fusing the pictures contained in the picture pair as to-be-spliced pictures according to a shooting sequence to obtain a panoramic picture. The invention further relates to a block chain technology, and the to-be-spliced picture can be stored in a block chain. The panoramic picture can be spliced by adopting the single PTZ camera, the hardware cost can be reduced, the application range is wide, and the splicing speed is high.

column2: METHOD FOR ADJUSTING MOVEMENT SPEED BASED ON Q-LEARNING ALGORITHM, TREADMILL AND PROMPTING DEVICE
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and provides a motion speed adjusting method based on a Q-Learning algorithm, a treadmill and a prompting device. The method comprises the following steps that S1, a motion exercise reward matrix is established based on motion exercise information of a user in a first preset time period, the motion exercise information comprises the speed and the heart rate, and the speed and the heart rate are obtained; the exercise exercise reward matrix evaluates the degree of the body change effect of the user under each speed change by taking the exercise heart rate within a preset constant heart rate range as a training target; S2, a Q-Learning matrix is formed based on the exercise reward matrix and a Q-Learning algorithm, wherein the Q-Learning matrix evaluates the benefit degree of the body change of the user under each speed change; and S3, the movement speed of the user is adjusted according to the Q-Learning matrix. Compared with existing exercise intensity monitoring which needs to depend on electronic equipment, the exercise intensity monitoring method can be separated from wearable electronic equipment, and the equipment cost of exercise is effectively saved.

column2: PORTABLE SMART CASE FOR GOLF SHOES
column4: The present invention relates to a portable smart case for golf shoes comprising: a case; a sterilization module; a heater; a blowing device; a control unit; and a power supply unit. The case includes an accommodation space of the golf shoes inside, provides an inlet and an outlet for inflow and discharge of air, provides a cover for opening and closing the accommodation space, and provides a detachable combination unit for limiting opening/closing of the cover. The sterilization module is installed in the accommodation space and sterilizes the golf shoes. The heater is installed in the accommodation space and supplies heat. The blowing device discharges the air in the accommodation space through the inlet through the outlet. The control unit controls the sterilization module, the heater, and the blowing device in response to an operation signal of an operation unit. The power supply unit supplies power necessary for operations of the sterilization module, the heater, and the blowing device. The present invention performs proper use and management of the golf shoes by maintaining portability while performing sterilizing and drying steps for the golf shoes. The present invention improves use convenience by operation control using artificial intelligence and an external terminal. The present invention provides use comfortability and a hygiene property of a user by considering a use feature in which moisture remains on outer skin when using the golf shoes to provide sterilizing and drying functions optimized for the golf shoes. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: SMART PET FEEDING SYSTEM
column4: An animal feeding system having a plurality of network connectable feeding stations, each with a base with a weight sensor for measuring a quantity of animal food placed in a food container, a processor, and network connection circuitry for connecting to a computer network. A server having a processor is coupled to a database to store pet information and use AI to analyze food and water consumption and recommend new foods or issue health alerts based on the consumption data. The server is configured for communication to feeding system bases and network connectable devices, such as smart phones, having executable food management software, wherein animal food intake information is transmitted to the server; and executable artificial intelligence loaded into and running on the server receives and processes data from the feeding stations and analyzes the data to make predictions and recommendations for foods individual animals prefer.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR IMPROVED OPERATIONS OF SKI LIFTS
column4: Systems and methods for improved operations of ski lifts increase skier safety at on-boarding and off-boarding locations by providing an always-on, always-alert system that ?œwatches??these locations, identifies developing problem situations, and initiates mitigation actions. One or more video cameras feed live video to a video processing module. The video processing module feeds resulting sequences of images to an artificial intelligence (AI) engine. The AI engine makes an inference regarding existence of a potential problem situation based on the sequence of images. This inference is fed to an inference processing module, which determines if the inference processing module should send an alert or interact with the lift motor controller to slow or stop the lift.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR IMPROVED OPERATIONS OF SKI LIFTS
column4: Systems and methods for improved operations of ski lifts increase skier safety at on-boarding and off-boarding locations by providing an always-on, always-alert system that ?œwatches??these locations, identifies developing problem situations, and initiates mitigation actions. One or more video cameras feed live video to a video processing module. The video processing module feeds resulting sequences of images to an artificial intelligence (AI) engine. The AI engine makes an inference regarding existence of a potential problem situation based on the sequence of images. This inference is fed to an inference processing module, which determines if the inference processing module should send an alert or interact with the lift motor controller to slow or stop the lift.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR IMPROVED OPERATIONS OF SKI LIFTS
column4: Systems and methods for improved operations of ski lifts increase skier safety at on-boarding and off-boarding locations by providing an always-on, always-alert system that ?œwatches??these locations, identifies developing problem situations, and initiates mitigation actions. One or more video cameras feed live video to a video processing module. The video processing module feeds resulting sequences of images to an artificial intelligence (AI) engine. The AI engine makes an inference regarding existence of a potential problem situation based on the sequence of images. This inference is fed to an inference processing module, which determines if the inference processing module should send an alert or interact with the lift motor controller to slow or stop the lift.

column4: Systems and methods for improved operations of ski lifts increase skier safety at on-boarding and off-boarding locations by providing an always-on, always-alert system that ?œwatches??these locations, identifies developing problem situations, and initiates mitigation actions. One or more video cameras feed live video to a video processing module. The video processing module feeds resulting sequences of images to an artificial intelligence (AI) engine. The AI engine makes an inference regarding existence of a potential problem situation based on the sequence of images. This inference is fed to an inference processing module, which determines if the inference processing module should send an alert or interact with the lift motor controller to slow or stop the lift.

column4: Systems and methods for improved operations of ski lifts increase skier safety at on-boarding and off-boarding locations by providing an always-on, always-alert system that ?œwatches??these locations, identifies developing problem situations, and initiates mitigation actions. One or more video cameras feed live video to a video processing module. The video processing module feeds resulting sequences of images to an artificial intelligence (AI) engine. The AI engine makes an inference regarding existence of a potential problem situation based on the sequence of images. This inference is fed to an inference processing module, which determines if the inference processing module should send an alert or interact with the lift motor controller to slow or stop the lift.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR DETERMINING RUNNING DIRECTION OF METRO TRAIN, AND TERMINAL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: Disclosed are a method and apparatus for determining a running direction of a metro train, and a terminal and a storage medium, wherein same belong to the field of artificial intelligence.
