The method comprises: at a metro train acceleration stage, acquiring first acceleration data collected by a linear acceleration sensor, wherein the first acceleration data comprises acceleration data of all directions under a terminal coordinate system; converting the first acceleration data into second acceleration data, wherein the second acceleration data comprises acceleration data of all directions under a world coordinate system; and determining the running direction of a metro train according to the second acceleration data within a target time range. The first acceleration data collected by the terminal is converted into second acceleration data, such that the attitude of the terminal is prevented from affecting the acquisition of an acceleration direction; and the second acceleration data within the target time range is comprehensively analyzed, such that the problem of the determined running direction of a metro train being inaccurate caused due to the instability of a single acceleration direction can be avoided.

column2: DISPLAY CONTROL METHOD AND TERMINAL DEVICE
column4: Embodiments of the present application relate to the technical field of artificial intelligence (AI) and provide a display control method and a terminal device. The display control method can be applied to a terminal device and comprises: in response to a first operation of a user, determining an application running on the terminal device, the first operation being used for triggering display of an interface of the application running on the terminal device; obtaining a display layout mode of the application; and displaying the interface of the application in a display area corresponding to the display layout mode, wherein the display interface of the terminal device comprises display areas respectively corresponding to N display layout modes, and N is an integer greater than or equal to 2. By displaying the display areas corresponding to the multiple display layout modes on the display interface of the terminal device, the interfaces of the at least two running applications can be displayed, and the display effect is improved.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING DIETETIC THERAPY FOR DIABETES MANAGEMENT
column4: This system for providing a dietetic therapy for diabetes management comprises an information collection module and a diabetes management module, and makes it possible to professionally manage a dietetic therapy for diabetes management by controlling carbohydrate intake. The system provides a point dietetic therapy for the blood sugar management of a diabetic patient (including pre-diabetic patient), and artificial intelligence-based individualized coaching as major services, and additionally enables the integrated management of diabetes-related factors, such as weight, blood pressure, and exercise, through a single application, and thus increases the convenience of managing blood sugar and can prevent complications from diabetes.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VISUAL SHOOTING DEVICE CAPABLE OF UTILIZING RAINWATER
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence visual shooting device capable of utilizing rainwater. The artificial intelligence visual shooting device comprises a connecting plate, a cleaning rod, a connecting hose, a pressing plate, shielding blocks and overturning plates; a shooting device body is fixed on the lower surface of the connecting plate through bolts, and a motor is fixed in the connecting plate through bolts; in addition, the cleaning rod is welded and fixed to the outer surface of the output end of the motor; a first bevel gear is welded and fixed to the outer surface of the output end of the motor; a bearing frame is fixed to the upper surface of the connecting plate through bolts, and a water storage box is welded and fixed to the interior of the bearing frame; and inserting pipes are connected in the water storage box in an embedded manner. According to the artificial intelligence visual shooting device capable of utilizing the rainwater, the pressing plate, pull wires, a first bevel gear, second bevel gears, the connecting hose, the cleaning rod and driving rods, so that the cleaning rod cleans the shooting device body more cleanly, and the shooting definition of the shooting device body is guaranteed to a certain extent.

column2: HETEROGENEOUS WIRELESS DISTRIBUTED NETWORK INTELLIGENT CHANNEL ACCESS METHOD BASED ON PURE THRESHOLD DECISION
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent channel access method for a heterogeneous wireless distributed network based on pure threshold decision, aiming at the defects of high complexity and low frequency band utilization rate in the access process of the existing heterogeneous wireless distributed network. The method is used for carrying out distributed channel intelligent detection and access decision in a heterogeneous wireless cooperative network composed of a plurality of source-sink pairs and a plurality of signal amplification forwarding type relay nodes. The plurality of information sources independently send data packets in a distribution mode to compete for channels; and the successfully competed source-sink pair realizes the optimal system average throughput performance of the whole heterogeneous wireless cooperative network through pure threshold decision, real-time channel state detection, dynamic selection of the optimal access mode and searching of the balance between the relay channel detection overhead and the channel access income. A simulation result verifies that the method can realize effective networking of the heterogeneous wireless distributed cooperative network, and improves the average throughput of the system and the utilization rate of network spectrum resources.

column2: EQUIPMENT FAULT DIAGNOSIS DEVICE BASED ON VOICE RECOGNITION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The utility model provides an equipment fault diagnosis device based on voice recognition technology, the device comprises an MCU chip, a voice recognition AI chip and a power supply module, the MCU chip is connected with the voice recognition AI chip, the voice recognition AI chip is connected with a three-axis acceleration chip, and the three-axis acceleration chip is connected with the power supply module. The MCU chip is connected with a clock chip, a display module, a communication module and a storage module, the communication module is connected with an information recording module, and the method adopts a voice recognition artificial intelligence chip and MCU double brain fault recognition architecture to process acceleration vibration information collected by the MEMS vibration sensor in real time. The current running state of the tested equipment is obtained, and real-time monitoring of the equipment can be realized. The equipment fault diagnosis device based on the voice recognition technology provided by the utility model has four paths of high-precision ADC chips, so that the circuit space is saved, the cost is low, and the fault recognition accuracy is improved.

column2: SINGLE CONDYLAR ARTHROPLASTY PREOPERATIVE PLANNING METHOD BASED ON DEEP LEARNING AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a single condylar arthroplasty preoperative planning method based on deep learning and related equipment, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining knee joint image data, and obtaining a three-dimensional skeleton image based on the knee joint image data; wherein the three-dimensional skeleton image comprises a three-dimensional femur image and a three-dimensional tibia image; identifying and displaying key points and key axes of the three-dimensional skeleton image; respectively calculating size parameters and angle parameters of the femur and the tibia according to the key points and the key axes; and based on the key points, the key axes, the size parameters and the angle parameters, single condylar prosthesis matching is carried out in a database in which prosthesis models are pre-stored, and the single condylar prosthesis matching effect is visually displayed. According to the method, the defects caused by individual differences of patients and subjective experience of doctors to the artificial single condylar arthroplasty operation are overcome, the single condylar arthroplasty prosthesis matching based on artificial intelligence is achieved, accurate and powerful technical support and guarantee are provided for the doctors, and the single condylar arthroplasty operation is more accurate and safer.

column2: RAIL TRANSIT OPERATION SAFETY ONLINE REAL-TIME MONITORING AND EARLY WARNING MANAGEMENT CLOUD PLATFORM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a rail transit operation safety online real-time monitoring and early warning management cloud platform based on artificial intelligence. The platform comprises a region division module, an image acquisition module, an image preprocessing module, a turnout model detection module, a switch rail contact area detection module, an orbital transfer speed detection module, an orbital transfer dynamic transverse stress detection module, a wheel set inner side distance detection module, a modeling analysis server, a database, a management server, an early warning module and a display terminal. Through real-time detection of the running speed, the transverse stress borne by a railway turnout, the wheel set inner side distance and the contact area of a switch rail and a slide plate during rail transfer when a train passes through the railway turnout of each detection sub-region, a rail transfer safety influence coefficient is analyzed, and the safety condition of each detection sub-region during rail transfer can be visually displayed. The safety detection efficiency and accuracy during rail transfer of the train are improved, the labor cost is reduced, and the use safety of the railway turnout is guaranteed.

column2: LEARNING TABLE TOP LIFTING CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a learning table top lifting control method and device based on artificial intelligence. The method is characterized by comprising the steps that: S100, a learning table control system is provided with a system main control board, a touch control panel, an OLED display screen, a laser distance sensor, a DC voltage and current detection module, N electric push rods, a first relay, a second relay and a third relay, wherein the system main control board controls the first relay, the second relay and the third relay, the first relay controls on and off of a power supply of the electric push rods, and the second relay and the third relay control rising/falling of the N electric push rods; S200, the learning table control system is powered on, and the learning table control system controls the table top of the learning table to the initial height; S300, the learning desk control system starts a reading and learning scene; S400, the learning desk control system starts a writing and learning scene; and S500, the real-time lifting of the desktop part of the learning desk is controlled.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI)-BASED FITNESS SOLUTION DISPLAY DEVICE AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The objective of the present invention is to provide an artificial intelligence (AI)-based fitness solution display device and a method thereof, which matches exercise videos according to the user's physical condition and desired exercise by using artificial intelligence (AI) technology so as to display an exercise video suitable for the user. A body information collection unit comprises: a body composition information collection unit which collects user's body composition analysis (body water, protein, minerals, body fat) data, skeletal muscle fat analysis (weight, skeletal muscle mass, body fat mass) data, obesity analysis (body mass index (BMI), body fat percentage) data, and body part-specific muscle and body fat data from a smart body measuring device; a user information input unit which inputs information about the user's preferred exercise type, recent exercise history, and exercise intensity; and a user diagnosis information collection unit which inputs information related to a underlying disease that the user has suffered from, allergic reaction, and food that the user cannot eat or should avoid. According to the present invention, the artificial intelligence (AI)-based fitness solution display device and the method thereof can provide the most efficient exercise effect. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides an image processing method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of image processing. According to the implementation scheme, the image processing method comprises the following steps: acquiring an image set of a first human face shot in a first time period, wherein the image set comprises a plurality of human face images of which the similarity is greater than a first threshold value; clustering the plurality of face images based on each shot geographic position in the plurality of face images to construct a plurality of image clusters; determining a first image cluster in the plurality of image clusters, the difference between the first image cluster and a second image cluster in the plurality of image clusters being greater than a second threshold, and setting a main image cluster and an alternative image cluster; and in response to determining that at least one face image in the alternative image cluster has an association relationship with the face image in the main image cluster about the shooting time and the shooting place, removing the face images except the at least one face image in the alternative image cluster from the image set.

column2: DATA CLASSIFICATION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON KEYWORDS
column4: The invention discloses a data classification method and system based on keywords, and the method comprises the steps of building keyword pools: classifying given keywords, and building a plurality of keyword pools; a sub-node expanding step: expanding sub-nodes on the basis of the keyword pool and constructing a configuration table; a storage step: establishing a data table, and storing the to-be-classified data into the data table; a storage step: storing the keywords according to the priorities in the configuration table by adopting a double linked list; and a classification step: carrying out classification processing on the to-be-classified data in the data table according to the double linked list. According to the invention, the program running efficiency can be improved when the data is more; the method is flexible and changeable, and the accuracy of data classification can be improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TRACKING SHOOTING DEVICE
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of shooting devices, and discloses an artificial intelligence tracking shooting device which comprises a shooting machine body, a supporting box and a fixing plate, and the shooting machine body comprises a camera, a second rotating support, a first rotating support, a fixing base and two infrared induction probes. According to the artificial intelligence tracking and shooting device, one side of the fixing plate is attached to the wall surface, screws penetrate through the through holes to be punched into the wall surface, then the fixing plate is fixed, since the front face and the back face of the fixing plate are flat faces without other obstacles, nailing is very smooth and convenient, and then the inserting plate on the back face of the supporting box is directly inserted into the inserting plate groove; and then the fixed base is placed in the supporting box, the connecting pull plate is pulled outwards to enable the spring to contract, when the bottom of the fixed base makes contact with the bottom face of the inner cavity of the supporting box, the hand is loosened, the left end of the movable inserting rod enters the inserting groove in the right side face of the fixed base, final installation is completed, and the whole process is very convenient and smooth.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INSPECTION SYSTEM BASED ON UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence inspection system based on an unmanned aerial vehicle. The system disclosed by the present invention comprises a battery power supply module, a master control module, a shooting module, a cruise module and a clock module; the battery power supply module provides power for shooting and flight; and the master control module firstly sets a flight mode and then controls the shooting module, the cruise module and the clock module to work; and the shooting module shoots an area needing inspection through using a camera so as to obtain an inspection picture. According to the artificial intelligence inspection system based on the unmanned aerial vehicle, a recording unit is used for recording the power supply starting time of each unit, an analysis prompting unit is used for analyzing the use frequency and the use starting time of each unit, and automatically starts a functional module with high use frequency; an abnormal power consumption condition is recorded through a power consumption recording unit, so that the unmanned aerial vehicle is convenient to overhaul, the automation and intelligence of the unmanned aerial vehicle are improved; and power consumption time is monitored, so that the inspection requirement is determined, and the inspection operation of the unmanned aerial vehicle is more intelligent.

column2: OUTDOOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VISUAL MONITORING AND SHOOTING EQUIPMENT BASED ON RAINWATER COOLING
column4: The invention discloses outdoor artificial intelligence visual monitoring and photographing equipment based on rainwater cooling, which comprises a monitoring and photographing equipment body, a base, a protective cover, a rainwater sensor and an electric heating wire, and is characterized in that the lower end of the monitoring and photographing equipment body is mounted at the upper end of the base, and the base is fixedly mounted in the protective cover; a rainwater sensor is installed in the middle of the lower end of the protective cover, a dustproof net is arranged on the side of the protective cover, a traction rope is installed on a baffle, the end of the traction rope is fixedly installed on a driving hopper, a circular gear is installed in the base, and the circular gear is installed at the lower end of a blowing fan. According to the outdoor artificial intelligence visual monitoring and shooting equipment based on rainwater cooling, rainwater can be used for cooling during use, the situation that normal use is affected by too high temperature is avoided, meanwhile, impurities attached to a dustproof net can be automatically cleaned, and the phenomenon that a lens fogs on rainy days can be effectively avoided.

column2: WAREHOUSE LOGISTICS AUTOMATIC SORTING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND CONTROL METHOD
column4: The invention relates to a warehouse logistics automatic sorting system and method based on artificial intelligence. The warehouse logistics automatic sorting method comprises the following steps that S100, a first conveyor belt and a second conveyor belt are controlled to operate, an empty sorting box enters from a goods feeding inlet of the first conveyor belt, and a grabbing box containing goods of a corresponding SKU classification number is placed on the second conveyor belt; S200, when a sensor of a recognition assembly recognizes a passing sorting box, the first conveying belt is controlled to stop running, and a two-dimensional code on the sorting box is scanned through a code scanning gun of the recognition assembly; S300, an order number corresponding to the sorting box is inquired through the two-dimensional code, and a corresponding commodity SKU list is generated according to the order number; S400, a depth camera is used for recognizing and positioning the grabbing box containing commodities corresponding to the commodity SKU list, and a mechanical arm assembly is controlled to grab the commodities in the grabbing box into the sorting box till the SKU commodities are completely grabbed by the mechanical arm; and S500, continuous processing is carried out on the order of a customer. The field space can be greatly saved, and the production efficiency is improved.

column2: ACTIVE SUSPENSION INTELLIGENT CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON DEEP LEARNING
column4: The invention discloses an active suspension intelligent control method and device based on deep learning, and relates to the technical field of dynamic control and artificial intelligence. Active suspension control can be dynamically and adaptively adjusted by using deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: using an industrial camera to collect road surface image data information of different scenes; collecting vehicle body parameter information of a vehicle running on the road surface; processing the road surface image data information by using a preset road surface model, and outputting road surface information; processing the vehicle body parameter information by using a preset parameter processing model, and outputting a suspension damping force control quantity and a suspension rigidity control quantity; and transmitting the road surface information, the suspension damping force control quantity and the suspension rigidity control quantity to a suspension controller, and enabling the suspension controller to adjust the active suspension of the vehicle in real time according to the road surface information, the suspension damping force control quantity and the suspension rigidity control quantity.

column2: INTELLIGENT ADAPTIVE LEARNING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides an intelligent adaptive learning method and system, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the dynamic image shooting of a teaching video watching process and a question answering process of a preset student object, and carrying out the recognition of a dynamic image, and obtaining corresponding teaching video watching behavior details and question answering behavior details; and finally, carrying out real-time correction on learning interest knowledge points corresponding to the preset students, so that a teaching scheme for the preset student object is adjusted in a targeted manner. According to the intelligent adaptive learning method and system, learning behavior details of corresponding dynamic images are analyzed and processed by applying an intelligent technology (such as an MCM technology), so that targeted teaching scheme adjustment can be performed according to the learning ability levels of different preset student objects, and the learning efficiency of the different preset student objects is expected to be improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED TIMING, IMAGING, AND TRACKING SYSTEM FOR THE PARTICIPATORY ATHLETIC EVENT MARKET
column4: A system for tracking competitors conducting a race on a track includes multiple object-recognition devices positioned to recognize objects at predetermined locations along the track. The object-recognition devices are configured to recognize at least one physical feature of each of the competitors. A processing device is configured to determine a time at which a competitor reached a selected one of the predetermined locations during the race based on object-recognition data from at least one of the object-recognition devices. A transmitter is configured to transmit to an output device the time at which the competitor reached the selected location during the race.

column2: 5G-BASED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SECURITY EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence security device based on 5G, which comprises an installation body and an installation seat arranged above the installation body, the installation seat is used for being installed on a wall or a support, three angle telescopic rods are distributed at the upper end of the installation body in an array mode, and the telescopic ends of the angle telescopic rods are rotatably connected with the bottom of the installation seat. A second movable block is arranged at the lower end of the mounting body, a first movable block is arranged at the lower end of the second movable block, a lifting traction piece for driving the second movable block to move up and down is arranged in the mounting body, the lifting traction piece is electrically connected with a control panel arranged in the mounting body, and a 5G module used for transmitting data is arranged on the control panel; the protective cover installation device is designed to overcome the defects of an existing device, potential safety hazards and climbing time existing in climbing are eliminated, the problem of disassembly and assembly of the protective cover is solved, and the practicability is high.

column2: INFRARED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VISUAL MONITORING AND SHOOTING DEVICE WITH AUTOMATIC ANGLE ADJUSTMENT FUNCTION
column4: The invention discloses an infrared artificial intelligence visual monitoring and shooting device with an automatic angle adjustment function. The infrared artificial intelligence visual monitoring and shooting device with the automatic angle adjustment function comprises a mounting plate, a limiting plate, an inductive probe, a pull ring and a first rotating shaft, the mounting plate is provided with a mounting screw, the mounting screw is attached to an attaching plate, and the attaching plate is provided with a first sliding block. The limiting plate is mounted at the lower end of the attaching plate, the limiting plate is attached to the mounting plate, and the mounting plate is connected with a limiting spring. According to the infrared artificial intelligence visual monitoring and shooting device with the automatic angle adjustment function, the position of the mounting plate is fixed through the mounting screw and the attaching plate, so that the position of a monitoring and shooting probe is fixed, the monitoring and shooting probe is protected through a water guide plate, and the service life of the device can be effectively prolonged; and the direction and angle of the monitoring and shooting probe are changed through the work of an electric telescopic rod and the rotation of a rotating plate, so that the application range of the device is wider.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TASK SUBMISSION MANAGEMENT METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence task submission management method and device, equipment and a medium, and the method comprises the steps of creating an artificial intelligence task according to the task type of the artificial intelligence task; receiving each instance in the artificial intelligence task; respectively creating each container where each instance in the artificial intelligence task is located; and running each instance in each corresponding container.

column2: INTELLIGENT DETECTION METHOD FOR HEAD HAIR TRANSPLANTING AREA AND HEAD AUXILIARY DETECTION SYSTEM
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of detection methods and devices before and after hair transplantation, and particularly relates to an intelligent detection method for a head hair transplantation area and a head auxiliary detection system. The intelligent detection method comprises the following steps: supplementing light for hair transplantation and hair taking parts such as the head top, the left afterbrain, the right afterbrain and the right afterbrain of a detected person; obtaining images of different spectrums through standard white light and other auxiliary irradiation in the shooting process; and according to the shot images, analyzing various data of the parts needing hair transplantation through artificial intelligence Ai software, and providing reference suggestions a hair transplantation scheme. An intelligent Ai unit is used for completing identification and drawing of the whole head top area and identifying and drawing of the hair transplantation areas with hair or without hair or with little hair, the area, needing hair transplantation, of the head can be rapidly positioned through an electronic photographing technology, virtual hair transplanting effect pictures are pasted to bald areas through artificial intelligence Ai software and the image processing technology, the detected person can select a hair transplantation scheme suitable for the detected person; and the change effect before and after hair transplantation is vividly reflected.

column2: COAL DRESSING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGE RECOGNITION
column4: According to the coal dressing system based on artificial intelligence image recognition, the conveying belt is arranged, coal materials move along with the conveying belt in a single row, coal ash on the coal materials is flushed through the spray gun in the moving process, part of solid surface is exposed, and the camera shooting device shoots and sends shot images to the control module in real time; gangue and coal briquettes are recognized in real time through an artificial intelligence image recognition technology, and then a flow guide sorting mechanism at the downstream of the conveying belt is controlled to act to separate the gangue from the coal briquettes. By arranging the spray guns to flush coal ash on coal, the visual distinction degree of coal and gangue is increased, then the artificial intelligence visual image recognition technology of deep learning is used for recognizing gangue and coal briquettes, the accuracy of machine visual recognition can be greatly improved, the sorting precision is high, the equipment cost is low, the processing size fraction is wide, the processing capacity is large, most manual work can be replaced, and the working efficiency is improved. Labor cost is saved, coal mine pollution and water consumption are reduced, and coal loss is reduced; and the coal gangue discharging amount is effectively reduced, and environmental protection is facilitated.

column2: DETECTION DEVICE FOR WEAR OF VEHICLE TIRE PATTERN
column4: The utility model relates to a vehicle tire pattern wear detection device, which comprises a base, a cleaning area and a detection area are sequentially arranged on the base along the running direction of a tire, a cleaning device is arranged in the cleaning area, and the cleaning device comprises a support frame, a cleaning motor, a cylinder and a cleaning roller. The bottom end of the supporting frame is in sliding connection with the base, the air cylinder is connected with the base, the telescopic end of the air cylinder is connected with the supporting frame, the sweeping motor is connected with the supporting frame, the sweeping roller is connected with the sweeping motor, bristles are arranged on the sweeping roller, and an automatic detection device is arranged in the detection area. The tire can be well cleaned through cooperation of the cleaning roller and the bristles, and therefore the pattern abrasion condition of the surface of the tire can be well detected.

column2: AUTOMATIC TRANSCRIPTION AND TEST METHOD IN VOICE RECOGNITION TEST ITEM
column4: The invention discloses an automatic transcription and test method in a voice recognition test item. According to the existing method, a test environment needs to be manually and frequently built. At first, according to a test standard, a test environment scene building configuration is created and stored. When a transcription or test task arrives, firstly, artificial intelligence equipment needing to be tested or recorded is placed, stored test standard configuration is selected, a recording or test working mode is started, relay audio controls output switching of related playing equipment, the position change of the related equipment is controlled through a three-extraction lifting platform, and a steering engine holder controls angle transformation of related equipment, volume calibration of a computer and audio playing, and automatically adjusts each test scene environment until all scene tests or transcription under the project are completed. According to the method, testing or transcription can be automatically completed, the working efficiency is improved, and the input cost of a project is reduced.

column2: INTELLIGENT IMAGE ACQUISITION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent image acquisition method, which comprises the following steps of S1, creating a file, and generating a serial number and a corresponding bar code/two-dimensional code; s2, enabling the mobile terminal to scan the bar code/two-dimensional code; s3, scanning the bar code/two-dimensional code/RFID card of the container corresponding to the file, and reading the container number; s4, binding a container number with a file serial number; s5, taking a picture of the container, inserting related information, discriminating the number of the appearing container through OCR (Optical Character Recognition) in the shooting process, and meanwhile, giving an alarm for the copied image data; and S6, using artificial intelligence to judge whether the condition of the shot subject matter accords with the specification according to the background setting standard and the basic information of the cargos, and giving an alarm for the potential risk to the background. According to the method, image quality evaluation can be automatically carried out before image archiving, and it is ensured that all archiving information meets the quality requirement; the background can inquire, delete and forward the images in real time, and the whole filing system is more robust through human intervention in the later period.

column2: TEACHING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching tools, and provides a teaching device based on artificial intelligence. The teaching device comprises a movable base, a measuring assembly, a mounting plate, a box body, a blackboard overturning assembly, a shooting and recording assembly, a cleaning assembly and two lifting adjusting assemblies. The outer wall of the front side of the movable base is fixedly connected with a writing table. A transparent plate and a control processor are arranged at the top of the box body. The blackboard overturning assembly is installed in the box body, the shooting and recording assembly is arranged at the top end of the box body, the cleaning assembly is arranged beside the blackboard overturning assembly, and the measuring assembly, the lifting adjusting assemblies, the blackboard overturning assembly, the shooting and recording assembly and the cleaning assembly are all connected with the control processor. According to the teaching device, the height of a writing board is intelligently adjusted according to the heights of different users, meanwhile, the writing board can be continuously used by different users, the users do not need to wait when the writing board is cleaned and erased, and the time for a teacher to inspect the learning condition of students is shortened.

column2: METHOD FOR EXTRACTING ABNORMAL EYE MOVEMENT FEATURES BASED ON GEOMETRIC ANALYSIS
column4: The invention discloses a method for extracting abnormal eye movement features based on geometric analysis, which comprises the following steps of: firstly, shooting a face video image sequence of a subject in a static sitting state from the front by using a camera or a mobile phone; secondly, geometric positioning is carried out on face key points in the video image sequence through face alignment, geometric information of eye feature points is extracted, and the relative opening degree of the eyes is calculated; secondly, filtering and correcting the relative opening degree sequence of the eyes through empirical mode decomposition denoising, eye closing detection and other processing; then, a fixed-length sliding window is used, relative opening degree sequence fragments of the eyes are extracted, a blink detector is trained, and a blink movement mode in the sequence is recognized; and finally, performing statistical analysis on the relative opening degree sequence of the eyes in combination with a blinking and closing movement mode recognition result, and extracting abnormal movement features of the eyes. The method achieves the precise and objective measurement of the abnormal eye movement features, can be used for evaluating the severity of the facial dyskinesia disease, and is of great significance in promoting the development of an artificial intelligence medical image auxiliary diagnosis technology.

column2: INTELLIGENT PLUSH TOY
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent plush toy, which comprises a structure main body, and the structure main body comprises a plush puppet and a processor. The processor comprises an image acquisition module used for shooting a surrounding environment; a voice receiving module, which is used for receiving sound generated in the surrounding environment; a voice recognition module, which is used for recognizing the utterance of a user; a data caching module; a data processing module; a data analysis module, which is used for analyzing the utterance of the user and making a reply; a data transmission module; a positioning module used for positioning; and a timed reminding module, which is used for reminding the user regularly. According to the intelligent plush toy, the surrounding environment is shot through the image acquisition module and is sent to a guardian, so that the safety of the surrounding environment is ensured; and through the arrangement of the voice receiving module, the voice recognition module and the data analysis module, artificial intelligence dialogue is realized, and the use interestingness is improved.

column2: REMOTE DETECTION SYSTEM FOR AUTOMOBILE AUTOMATIC DRIVING CONTROL BASED ON 5G NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses a remote detection system for automobile automatic driving control based on a 5G network, and relates to the technical field of automatic driving control; and the invention aims to solve the problem of automatic driving remote detection; the system specifically comprises a vehicle diagnosis module, an information processing unit, a 5G communication module and a remote control unit, and the vehicle diagnosis module is used for collecting and processing data in the vehicle running process and conducting vehicle fault diagnosis according to the processed data; and the information processing unit integrates information collected and processed by the vehicle diagnosis module. Through the vehicle diagnosis module, vehicle data are monitored in real time, data in the vehicle running process are collected and processed, vehicle fault diagnosis is carried out according to the processed data, the processed automobile real-time running working condition data are transmitted to the information processing unit, and artificial intelligence is used for assisting in studying and judging, and effective information is extracted through analysis of the information processing unit.

column2: BUS SCHEDULING METHOD, SYSTEM AND DEVICE BASED ON WILLINGNESS TO PAY AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a bus scheduling method, system and device based on willingness of payment and a storage medium, and the method comprises: obtaining an uploaded bus travel demand which comprises a get-on station, a get-off station, arrival time and a bus service level; according to the bus travel demand, the running state of the bus and the flexible bus model, determining bus operation income, and according to the bus operation income, obtaining an optimal departure strategy; adjusting a departure scheme according to the optimal departure strategy, wherein the buses comprise basic service type buses and high-level service type buses, and the two types of buses are uninterruptedly driven in one direction on a closed annular line; and maximizing the bus operation income by the optimal departure strategy. The departure scheme can be adjusted according to the demand condition of the passenger, the personalized travel demand of the passenger is met, the bus operation cost is reduced while the personalized demand of the passenger is met, and the invention can be widely applied to the field of artificial intelligence.

column2: REMOTE IDENTIFICATION PLATFORM USING INFORMATION RECORDING
column4: The invention relates to a remote identification platform using information recording, and the platform comprises a real-time recording mechanism which is used for carrying out the voice recording operation on a current live video at uniform time intervals, so as to obtain a plurality of voice segments, wherein the time length of each voice segment is equal to a preset time length; an intelligent recognition mechanism which is used for randomly selecting a preset number of voice segments from the plurality of processed voice segments as the input of a trained neural network model and running the trained neural network model to obtain the output of the trained neural network model with the output being 0 or 1; and a data sending mechanism which is used for sending an output result of the trained neural network model. The remote identification platform using information recording is simple in structure, convenient and practical. Since each voice segment can be randomly selected for each live broadcast video in an artificial intelligence analysis mode for analyzing the obscene voice segment, the automation level of the obscene live broadcast video identification is improved.

column2: MODEL COMPILING AND RUNNING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a model compiling and running method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps of obtaining a plurality of sizes of input data of a to-be-compiled model; compiling the to-be-compiled model based on the plurality of sizes to obtain model parameters used by the to-be-compiled model for processing the input data of each size in the plurality of sizes and calculation instructions used by the to-be-compiled model for processing the input data of each size; combining the parameters with the same values among the model parameters corresponding to the sizes to obtain combined model parameters, and determining a corresponding relationship between each parameter in the combined model parameters and each size; and generating a compiled model containing the calculation instructions corresponding to the plurality of sizes, the combined model parameters and the corresponding relations. By applying the scheme provided by the embodiment of the invention, the to-be-compiled model is compiled, so that the requirements of the generated compiled model on storage resources and operation resources can be reduced.

column2: HUMAN BODY TUMBLE ALARM METHOD BASED ON MULTIPLE VIEWS
column4: The invention provides a human body tumble alarm method based on multiple views. The human body tumble alarm method comprises the following steps: S1, setting a human body tumble alarm system based on multiple views; s2, constructing a multi-view position joint estimation model according to a multi-view image acquired by the camera; s3, synchronously shooting the monitoring area by adopting a plurality of cameras to obtain a multi-view human body monitoring video; s4, constructing a human body posture model by using the multi-view human body monitoring video; s5, acquiring spatial position information of key points of the head of the human body; and S6, judging whether the height of the spatial position of the key point of the human head is lower than a preset threshold value or not, if so, giving an alarm by the data processing terminal, otherwise, returning to the step S3. According to the human body tumble alarm method based on multiple views, an artificial intelligence method is adopted to perform multi-angle monitoring on the human body in real time through multiple cameras and identify and judge the posture of the human body, and real-time judgment of the posture of the human body and automatic alarm of the tumble condition are achieved.

column2: A SYSTEM AND METHOD OF VIRTUAL SCHOOLING THROUGH AI (ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE) AND PREDICTIVE ANALYSIS
column4: ABSTRACT?œA System and Method of Virtual Schooling through AI and Predictive Analysis?Accordingly, a system and method of virtual schooling through AI and predictive analysis through facial recognition is disclosed. ) A system of virtual schooling through AI and predictive analysis through facial recognition, wherein the said system comprising: A memory ;AI system with a processor, and a computer memory and a database for storing all the interactions between a student and an online lesson plan executing on the AI system; wherein the monitoring comprising the AI system obtaining or receiving the interactions from a user device through a user interface of the online lesson plan running on the user device; based on the interactions between the student and the online lesson plan, determining, by the database whether to dynamically modify the online lesson plan; allowing the student to provide a static question when the database determines, based on the interactions between the student and the online lesson plan, that the online lesson plan is to be dynamically modified; automatically transforming, by the database .

column2: MULTI-TERMINAL MANAGEMENT AND CONTROL TIME-LIMITED ENTERTAINMENT COMMUNICATION LEARNING SYSTEM AND METHOD, AND TERMINAL EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses a multi-terminal control time-limited entertainment communication learning system and method and terminal equipment. The system comprises a system/software part, a method part and a terminal equipment part. The system/software part comprises a student end time-limited entertainment communication learning system, parent management end software and school management end software; the method comprises the steps of application auditing and classification, promotion link shielding and home-school multi-terminal management and control. The terminal device part comprises a GPS/Beidou navigation device, a gyroscope, an air pressure sensor, a thermometer, an accelerometer and a smart phone general configuration. The student terminal system can perform automatic classification and time-limited management on the student terminal application, can meet the requirements of parents and schools on multi-terminal management and control and appropriate adjustment on the student terminal application, can manage and control the time periods and duration of network learning, movie watching and game playing of students, can ensure normal use of student terminal life functions, resist the bad internet surfing activities, and enable students to develop correct habits of using the intelligent terminal.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED TIMING, IMAGING, AND TRACKING SYSTEM FOR THE PARTICIPATORY ATHLETIC EVENT MARKET
column4: A system for tracking competitors conducting a race on a track includes multiple object-recognition devices positioned to recognize objects at predetermined locations along the track. The object-recognition devices are configured to recognize at least one physical feature of each of the competitors. A processing device is configured to determine a time at which a competitor reached a selected one of the predetermined locations during the race based on object-recognition data from at least one of the object-recognition devices. A transmitter is configured to transmit to an output device the time at which the competitor reached the selected location during the race.

column2: METHOD OF PERFORMING A DATA COLLECTION PROCEDURE FOR A PROCESS WHICH USES ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: A method of performing a data collection procedure for generating a dataset for input to a process which uses artificial intelligence comprises running, by a computing device, a workflow engine which is configured to perform a data collection workflow, wherein the workflow engine, when executing the data collection workflow, requests user input and guides the user through a user-driven data collection procedure of collecting labeled data and creates a dataset of labeled data as a basis for the process which uses artificial intelligence, defining a context of the data collection procedure and generating corresponding context information, after defining the context of the data collection procedure, executing the data collection workflow and providing, by the workflow engine when executing the data collection workflow, information relevant to the data to be collected on a graphical user interface, and using the context information, the provided information relevant to the data to be collected, and the received user input during the data collection workflow by the workflow engine for labelling the data and generating the dataset.

column2: METHOD OF PERFORMING A PROCESS USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to a method of performing a process using artificial intelligence. The method comprises running, by a computing device (21), an application which is configured to perform at least one process which uses an artificial intelligence model for processing signals and defining at least one parameter set for performing the at least one process, running, by the computing device (21), a user-driven workflow engine which comprises multiple modules including at least a first and second module (11, 14), defining, by the first module (11), a context of the at least one process and generating corresponding context information, providing the artificial intelligence model based on the generated context information of the at least one process, and using, by the second module (14), the artificial intelligence model in a user-driven workflow within the application while executing the at least one process. Advantageously, the combination of these modules describes an end-to-end connection which is self-learning and self-improving and is targeted at users with no expertise in the Al domain.

column2: FAULT ALARM SYSTEM FOR REMOTELY MONITORING ABNORMAL CONDITIONS OF FARM
column4: The invention discloses a fault alarm system for remotely monitoring abnormal conditions of a farm. The fault alarm system comprises a server, a storage module, a cloud end, a display module, a user service end, a man-machine interaction module, a control module, an artificial intelligence fault analysis module, a positioning module, a power change module, a voltage and current detection module, an environment data detection module, an image detection module, a video shooting module, a protection prompt module and a sensor detection module. The control module passes through the cable artificial intelligence fault analysis module, the positioning module, the power change module, the voltage and current detection module, the environment data detection module, the image detection module, the video shooting module, the protection prompting module and the sensor detection module. The fault alarm system for remotely monitoring the abnormal condition of the farm has the advantages of multiple detection, artificial intelligence analysis, protection prompt and man-machine interaction.

column2: MALICIOUS FILE IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of malicious file identification, and discloses a malicious file identification method and device, equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises: obtaining a sample file, and performing feature extraction on the sample file to obtain a first feature of the sample file; obtaining a second feature subjected to dimension reduction processing according to the first feature based on a memory mapping mode; and performing artificial intelligence prediction on the sample file according to the second feature to identify whether the sample file is a malicious file. Compared with an existing mode that all the features of the sample file are loaded into a memory for feature dimension reduction, and then the malicious file is recognized. The method can effectively solve the problem that the running memory is too high when the malicious file is recognized.

column2: NETWORK CONFERENCE CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a network conference control method, and relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to the field of artificial intelligence and voice recognition. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: acquiring audio data during the running period of a network conference program; recognizing a voice instruction from the audio data; and controlling a speech forbidding function of the network conference program according to the recognized voice instruction. The invention further discloses a network conference control device, electronic equipment and a storage medium.

column2: AUTOMATIC WAKE-UP AND TEMPERATURE-ADJUSTING AIR CONDITIONING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an automatic wake-up and temperature-adjusting air conditioning system and method based on artificial intelligence. The automatic wake-up and temperature-adjusting air conditioning system comprises a cloud server, a human body detector, an air conditioner, a timer, a temperature collection module and a temperature adjusting module. The human body detector is used for detecting whether there is a person or not in the room in which the human body detector is located; if the human body detector detects that there is no person in the room, the timer starts time counting; if the human body detector detects that there is a person in the room again, the timer stops the command; and after the timer conducts time counting for 15 minutes, the cloud server automatically controls the air conditioner to stop running, and therefore, electric energy waste is prevented. When the human body detector detects that there is a person in the room, the air conditioner is controlled to start running, and the real-time temperature information is adjusted to the range of the preset temperature information; moreover, the automatic wake-up and temperature-adjusting air conditioning system can conduct self-adaptation control according to the distance of the person in the space from the air conditioner, the adjustment of the temperature of the air conditioner meets the actual demand, and the user experience degree is increased.

column2: THROMBUS IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE APPLIED TO ECMO
column4: According to the thrombus identification method and device applied to the ECMO, image identification is carried out by arranging cameras around a membrane lung and a blood transfusion pipeline, and the thrombus identification method comprises: obtaining images shot by the cameras at regular time; calculating the texture roughness of each pixel point in the image; judging whether the corresponding pixel point is a foreign matter boundary or not according to the texture roughness; if the foreign body boundary is a foreign body boundary, further identifying the foreign body type, and if the foreign body boundary is an irregular boundary, judging that thrombus occurs. The lighting device and the camera shooting device are arranged for the blood pipeline and the membrane lung respectively, the thrombus forming conditions of the blood pipeline and the membrane lung are judged through an artificial intelligence algorithm, intelligent recognition is achieved when thrombus appears, and doctors can conveniently observe and judge the thrombus and take corresponding measures in time.

column2: OVERHEAD RAIL AI ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INSPECTION ROBOT AND POSITIONING FIRE EXTINGUISHING METHOD OF ROBOT
column4: The invention discloses an overhead rail AI artificial intelligence inspection robot and a positioning fire extinguishing method of the robot. The overhead rail AI artificial intelligence inspection robot comprises an intelligent robot body and a server, and an emergency jet medium container is arranged at the lower end of the intelligent robot body. One end of the intelligent robot body is provided with an infrared thermal scanning holder composed of an AI camera, an infrared thermal imaging lens and an infrared and ultraviolet flame spectrum sensor, the infrared thermal imaging lens is used for carrying out thermal scanning on a site and forming a heat map, the AI camera is used for shooting visible light photos of the site, the visible light photos are superimposed with a heat map to form a clear high-temperature-area temperature and position picture, and positioning of a fire point is completed. A three-dimensional laser navigation module is arranged at the lower end of the infrared thermal scanning holder, the three-dimensional laser navigation module is used for locking the distance between the intelligent robot main body and a high-temperature area, an automatic positioning emergency jetting device is fixed to the emergency jet medium container, and emergency fire extinguishing is carried out through jet medium high-pressure nitrogen.

column2: TOTAL ELEMENT MODEL TRAINING SYSTEM BASED ON SUPER COMPUTER
column4: The invention relates to a total element model training system based on a super computer, and the system comprises a process editor which is disposed on a browser of a user terminal, and is used for generating an artificial intelligence algorithm directed acyclic graph; a parameter extractor and a model mapper arranged on the cloud server, wherein the cloud server is in communication connection with the super computer and the user terminal, and the parameter extractor extracts preset parameters from the directed acyclic graph according to a preset parameter framework; wherein the model mapper is used for selecting a target deep learning framework and mapping the extracted preset parameters into mapping data and a mapping model corresponding to the target deep learning framework; the invention also comprises a code generator and a code executor arranged on the super computer, wherein the code generator dynamically generates executable codes from the mapping data and the mapping model; and the code executor runs the executable code and generates a running result. Algorithm multiplexing and framework migration are realized, multiple programming is avoided, the model training process is simplified, the model training efficiency is improved, and the fault tolerance is good.

column2: BODY MEASUREMENT INSTRUMENT CAPABLE OF AUTOMATICALLY GENERATING EXERCISE PRESCRIPTION
column4: The invention discloses a body measurement instrument capable of automatically generating an exercise prescription, and the body measurement instrument comprises a body measurement instrument body, a weight scale arranged on the body measurement instrument body and used for measuring the weight of a user, a body fat sensor used for measuring the body fat rate of the user, an infrared diffuse reflection sensor used for measuring the height of the user, an intelligent touch screen used for interacting with the user, a central processing unit which is used for collecting heart rate and blood pressure information of a user, a camera which is used for collecting a face picture, and a cloud server. According to the method, the most intelligent and scientific exercise method is provided for the user by combining the human body data collected by the body measurement instrument with the current forefront artificial intelligence neural network algorithm, and the model is continuously adjusted according to the user feedback, so that the exercise prescription is more and more scientific, the exercise injury is effectively avoided, and the exercise health of the user is protected.

column2: THREE-DIMENSIONAL GRID VERTEX FEATURE DETERMINATION METHOD, SKELETON SKIN METHOD AND RELATED DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a three-dimensional grid vertex feature determination method, a skeleton skin method and a related device in the field of artificial intelligence. The three-dimensional grid vertex feature determination method comprises the steps: for each joint in a target skeleton structure, searching a representative vertex corresponding to the joint in a graph topological structure of a target three-dimensional grid, forming a vertex representative cluster corresponding to the joint; for each target vertex in the graph topological structure, and according to the position of the target vertex, the vertex representative cluster corresponding to each joint and the position of each joint, determining the distance from the target vertex to each joint in the non-Euclidean space as a non-Euclidean space distance feature between the target vertex and the target skeleton structure; and determining a non-Euclidean space distance feature between the target three-dimensional grid and the target skeleton structure according to the non-Euclidean space distance feature between each target vertex and the target skeleton structure. According to the method, reasonable three-dimensional grid vertex features can be constructed.

column2: USER MOTION ANALYSIS METHOD FOR DANCE TRAINING USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED IMAGE RECOGNITION
column4: The present invention relates to a user motion analysis method for dance training using artificial intelligence based image recognition and, more particularly, to a user motion analysis method for dance training, which analyzes a dance motion of a user performing dance training in real time, comprising the steps of: (1) receiving image data of a user, who performs dance training, taken by a camera; (2) recognizing the user from the received image data and separating a background from a user area; (3) extracting a skeleton from the separated user area based on recognition of body portions of the user by using joint information and estimating a pose by using the extracted skeleton; and (4) analyzing the user motion for the estimated pose, wherein in step (3), the pose is estimated by using a deep learning based pretrained pose estimation model. According to the user motion analysis method for dance training using the artificial intelligence based image recognition proposed in the present invention, the pose is estimated and the user motion is analyzed with the pose estimation model pre-trained on the basis of the deep learning by using the image data photographed by a general camera, thereby efficiently and accurately analyzing the motion of the user, who performs the dance training, even without a special camera like Kinect. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INSPIRED SMART EMBEDDED SYSTEM FOR MONITORING HAND HYGIENE COMPLIANCE IN HEALTHCARE PLACES
column4: This invention on an embedded system detects condition(s) mandating handwashing by a health caretaker person working at places such as hospitals and clinical laboratories. If a person touches door handles, computing facility (keyboard, mouse, touch pad etc.), objects on the clinical samples??testing table and contacts with patient or does handshaking with visitors, then the embedded system automatically mandates a condition for handwashing. The embedded system comprises of a computing system, five compact cameras, a motion sensor, two flow detection sensors, data storage device, soft clock, three algorithms running on the computing system and an audio system. Image processing and sensors??responses determine precisely whether handwashing is accomplished appropriately or not. On failure of handwashing by person, the embedded system issues a onetime warning. If warning is not responded by the person, it further records occurrence as a lapse on the part of the same person and system sends reports using SMS and e-mail options to pre-identified authorities.

column2: METHOD FOR TREATING URBAN BLACK AND ODOROUS WATER BODY
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of urban management, and particularly relates to a method for treating urban black and odorous water. The method comprises a suspension device and a plurality of microbial carrier devices, and comprises the steps of 1) source cleaning, specifically, reducing pollutant emission from the source on the basis of cleaning garbage around the water body, and perfecting a sewage purification system; 2) dredging, specifically, draining water, cleaning sludge, and supplementing running water; 3) aeration, specifically, arranging micro-aeration heads at the river bottom; and 4) purification, specifically, adopting a microbial carrier device and a microbial agent, wherein the microbial agent is composed of nine microorganisms in proportion, and the nine microorganisms are bacillus, micrococcus luteus, rhizopus nigricans, bacillus, saccharomycetes, nitrifying bacteria, rhodopseudomonas palustris, rhodospirillum and denitrifying bacteria. The method has the effect of efficiently clarifying the black and odorous water body, has application prospect value, and adopts an exogenous emission reduction and endogenous control technology, a microbial purification technology, a water ecological restoration technology and an AI artificial intelligence online monitoring and management technology.

column2: VISUAL MONITORING AND SHOOTING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a visual monitoring and shooting system and method. The visual monitoring and shooting system comprises a visual monitoring and shooting device, a power supply module and a microcontroller, the visual monitoring and shooting device acquires image or video information of the power transmission line according to a set rule and can perform front-end processing on the acquired image or video information; the power supply module is respectively connected with the visual monitoring and shooting device and the microcontroller; and the microcontroller selects different power supply strategies to supply power to the visual monitoring and shooting device according to the current electric quantity of the power supply module. According to a monocular-camera haze weather hidden danger object distance measuring and calculating method, the dark channel prior technology and the artificial intelligence recognition technology are combined, images collected in haze weather are processed, converted and extracted, the distance of the target object is measured and calculated, the problem of measuring and calculating the distance of the hidden danger object in the haze weather is solved, and the hidden danger source can be automatically identified and the hidden danger source distance can be measured and calculated in hazy days.

column2: PORTABLE INFRARED IMAGER CONVENIENT FOR ANGLE ADJUSTMENT
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of infrared imagers, in particular to a portable infrared imager convenient for angle adjustment, which comprises a tripod and an infrared imaging camera, the top end of the tripod is provided with a holder seat, the central position of the top end of the holder seat is fixedly connected with a motor, the tail end of a main shaft of the motor is fixedly connected with a mounting shaft, and the mounting shaft is fixedly connected with the mounting shaft. A rotating seat is fixedly connected to the top end of the mounting shaft, a connecting shaft is rotatably connected to the inner side of the upper side of the rotating seat, a worm gear is fixedly connected to the outer side of the connecting shaft, a heavy hammer is fixedly connected to the bottom end of the swing rope, a pointer is fixedly connected to the bottom end of the heavy hammer, and a calibration rod is fixedly connected to the top end of the lower side of the reference cylinder; according to the utility model, the shooting angle of the infrared imaging camera can be conveniently adjusted, the adjusting speed is high, the time is saved, the pointer points to the calibration rod as a reference, the holder seat can be conveniently adjusted to a horizontal state, and the tripod can be stably placed on a slope.

column2: CLUSTER TRAINING TASK PROCESSING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of deep learning machine training, in particular to a cluster training task processing method and system. The method comprises the following steps: setting training distribution parameters, selecting training environment component options, and submitting a cluster training task; acquiring a set of allocation execution nodes according to the training allocation parameters; distributing and executing the selected training environment component for node deployment in the node set; distributing the developed program model to each distribution execution node, starting task training, and monitoring the running state of each node in the training process; and after training is finished, summarizing and outputting operation results, and releasing, allocating and executing node resources. The method has the advantages that development, node distribution, environment deployment, state monitoring and the like are in the same environment, operation from single machine development to cluster training is achieved, and the efficiency of deep learning model development and training is greatly improved; time and energy spent in node distribution and environment deployment are reduced; and the node distribution mode is optimized.

column2: WARM-UP DEGREE DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: An embodiment of the invention relates to a warm-up degree detection method. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring the heart rate data of a period of time before exercise, wherein the heart rate data is obtained through continuous detection before exercise; dividing the heart rate data into a plurality of heart rate intervals, and determining the duration of each interval of the plurality of heart rate intervals; and determining the warm-up degree of a user according to the duration of at least one heart rate interval in the plurality of heart rate intervals. The warm-up degree is quantified by detecting the continuity of the heart rate and acquiring the heart rate data within a period of time before exercise, so the current warm-up condition of the user is determined. The warm-up condition of the user is identified by using a wearable device based on artificial intelligence, and targeted suggestions are made according to the warm-up condition, so the user is allowed to form a good warm-up habit before exercise, and injury risks are reduced.

column2: ICE SPORT TRAINING SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to an ice sport training system, comprising, a body 1 having an ice rink configured in a first and second portion 3, 2 that includes a display unit 4 for allowing user to select ice sport, multiple artificial intelligence based imaging units 5 determines the conditions of the rink and playing moves of the user based on the sport, a rink resurfacing module 7,8 for helping in scraping and washing ice layer for resurfacing the rink based on sport, communication module interlinked with the imaging unit 5 and module for transferring playing information of the user and rink towards the display unit 4 and a projection unit 6 displays a visual signals regarding skill improvement receives an output from the imaging unit 5 regarding improvement based on different training modes for training the user for playing the game.

column2: ARTIFICIAL NEURAL NETWORK LEARNING METHOD AND DEVICE FOR AIRCRAFT LANDING ASSISTANCE
column4: A neural network learning method for aircraft landing assistance, the method includes receiving a set of labeled learning data comprising sensor data associated with a ground truth representing at least a landing runway and an approach light bar; running an artificial neural network deep learning algorithm on the learning data set, the deep learning algorithm using a cost function called runway threshold trapezium, parameterized for the recognition of a runway threshold and of approach light bars; and generating a trained artificial intelligence model for landing runway recognition.

column2: METHOD OF PERFORMING A PROCESS USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to a method of performing a process using artificial intelligence. The method comprises running, by a computing device, an application configured to perform a process which uses an artificial intelligence model for processing signals and defining at least one parameter set for performing the at least one process; running, by the computing device, a user-driven workflow engine which comprises multiple modules including at least a first and second module; defining, by the first module, a context of the process and generating corresponding context information, providing the artificial intelligence model based on the generated context information of the process; and using, by the second module, the artificial intelligence model in a user-driven workflow within the application while executing the process. Advantageously, the combination of these modules describes an end-to-end connection which is self-learning and self-improving and is targeted at users with no expertise in the AI domain.

column2: SMART MIRROR SYSTEM FOR COLLECTING AND VISUALIZING PHYSICAL APPEARANCE INFORMATION
column4: A smart mirror system collects and visualizes appearance data of a user with artificial intelligence (AI) technologies. The system uses various sensors and multiple cameras to acquire real-time appearance data while the user looks in a mirror of the system. Through the use of AI, the system analyzes the data and creates a three-dimensional (3D) avatar of the user, and subsequently projects the 3D avatar together with measurement data onto a display over the mirror surface of a foldable mirror. Additionally, the system provides images/videos of exercise poses of the user with a simultaneous display of an instructor's pose to guide the user's learning. Further, the system can provide outfit suggestions by analyzing the current outfit of the user and displaying simulated 3D avatars with suggested outfits for comparison. All data and results are securely saved in the system. Thus, the system offers a versatile and innovative smart mirror.

column2: GEAR TRAIN SPEED REDUCTION DEVICE CAPABLE OF ADJUSTING ROTATING SPEED AND ACHIEVING SAFE EMERGENCY STOP BASED ON CENTRIFUGAL FORCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence robots, and discloses a gear train speed reduction device capable of adjusting the rotating speed and achieving safe emergency stop based on centrifugal force. The gear train speed reduction device comprises a frame body, wherein a lifting frame is movably connected to the middle of the frame body, tooth grooves are formed in the left end and the right end of the top of the lifting frame, first gears are rotationally connected to the left end and the right end of the top of the frame body, rotating discs are fixedly connected to the peripheries of the axes of the first gears, and balance weight layers are fixedly connected to the bottoms of the rotating discs. According to the gear train speed reduction device capable of adjusting the rotating speed and achieving safe emergency stop based on the centrifugal force, the centrifugal force borne by centrifugal blocks controls the repulsive force borne by magnetic blocks, the first gears are in running fit with the tooth grooves for transmission, the lifting frame moves upwards, rotating wheels jack stop blocks for speed reduction, when the rotating speed is too high, the rotating discs rotate by a half cycle to enable the lifting frame to completely retract into the frame body, meanwhile, balance weight rings slide to the bottommost end to lower the gravity center, the frame body swings left and right in situ through inertia, and the effects of lowering the gravity center and preventing overturning during emergency stop are achieved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CAMERA DEVICE WITH LARGE CAMERA RANGE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of camera devices, and discloses an artificial intelligence camera device with a large camera range, which comprises a mounting plate, a movable plate is mounted at the bottom of the mounting plate, side plates are symmetrically and fixedly connected to the bottom of the movable plate, and a rotating rod is rotatably connected to the opposite side walls of the two side plates through two bearings, wherein a motor is installed on the side wall of one side plate, the output end of the motor is connected with a worm through a coupler. The end, close to the motor, of the rotating rod penetrates through the bearing and extends outwards, the rod wall of the rotating rod is fixedly sleeved with a worm wheel, and the worm wheel is meshed with the worm. According to the invention, dust on a lens of the camera device with a relatively high installation height is easy to clean, clear shooting of the camera device is prevented from being influenced, the height of the camera device can be adjusted, and a cross beam on a ceiling is prevented from blocking a shooting visual angle of the camera device.

column2: AC CHARGING PILE AND AC CHARGING SYSTEM
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of AC charging, and specifically discloses an AC charging pile and an AC charging system.The AC charging pile comprises a shell, a plurality of indicating lamps installed on the shell, a main control chip installed in the shell, a voltage collector, an information transceiver, a relay and a charging circuit, and the indicating lamps are electrically connected with the main control chip; the voltage collector is connected between the alternating current power supply and the relay; the main control chip is electrically connected with contacts of the voltage collector, the information transceiver and the relay; the relay is connected between the voltage collector and the charging circuit; and the information transceiver is electrically connected with the main control chip. According to the alternating current charging pile and the alternating current charging system, a card swiping charging mode in the prior art is replaced, the charging mode is simpler, the charging steps are more simplified, the operation time is saved, and the alternating current charging pile and the alternating current charging system are suitable for all walks of workers.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LIGHTING DEVICE CAPABLE OF SAVING INSTALLATION COST
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of lighting, and discloses an artificial intelligence lighting device capable of saving the installation cost.
