The device comprises a support column, wherein the upper end of the support column is fixedly connected with a transverse rod, the transverse rod is hollow, the lower side of one end, far away from the support column, of the transverse rod is fixedly connected with a connecting block, the lower end of the connecting block is provided with a lamp main body, a plug at the upper end of the lamp main body is inserted into a socket corresponding to the connecting block, a driving motor is installed at one end in the transverse rod, a worm is fixedly connected to the output end of the driving motor in a sleeved mode, a rotating rod is jointly and rotationally connected into the transverse rod through two bearings, a worm wheel is fixedly connected to the position, corresponding to the worm, of the rotating rod in a sleeved mode, and the worm wheel is meshed with the worm. The rod walls, close to the two ends, of the rotating rod are symmetrically and fixedly sleeved with winding drums, and pull ropes are fixedly wound around the winding drums. According to the lamp, maintenance personnel can replace and install the lamp main body without using climbing equipment, the later installation cost is saved, and no danger exists.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ELECTRICAL CONTROL SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence electrical control system which comprises an AI control system, a swimming pool system, an operation display system, a network communication module and an alarm system; the swimming pool system comprises a swimming pool, a filtering water cabin, electrical equipment and an electrical sensing system; the electrical equipment comprises a circulating water pump and a water injection control valve; the circulating water pump is in data communication connection with the AI control system; a water outlet is formed in the bottom of the swimming pool, the water outlet is connected with a water drainage pipe system, the water drainage pipe system is connected to the circulating water pump, and the circulating water pump is connected to the filtering water cabin. According to the number of swimmers, the circulating speed of the circulating water pump is reasonably set, so that electricity is saved, clean water is guaranteed, and safety is provided for the swimmers. Meanwhile, the human body lying at the water bottom is detected, so that potential drowning danger existing in the swimming pool is found in time, search and rescue and alarm are carried out, and the safety of the swimmers is improved.

column2: 4 * 90-DEGREE PANORAMIC SHOOTING NETWORK CAMERA
column4: The utility model discloses a 4 * 90-degree panoramic shooting network camera, which is characterized in that a fixing device is in butt joint with the bottom of a cover shell through a telescopic rod, the cover shell is in a cuboid shape, four windows are arranged on the outer wall of the cover shell, a camera and an image sensor are arranged in each window, and the camera and the image sensor are connected with each other. The four cameras and the image sensor are distributed on the horizontal plane in the circumferential direction at equal intervals, the included angle between every two adjacent cameras and the image sensor is 90 degrees, the three cameras are started at the same time for photographing, then pictures are uploaded to the server, the pictures are synthesized into a panoramic picture through an algorithm in the server, and the panoramic picture is obtained. The number of students in the pictures is displayed through artificial intelligence, then the number of students is transmitted to a control end where a teacher is located, roll call is carried out under the condition that teaching of the teacher is not affected, equipment communicates with a server through a data network, and the high efficiency of offline teaching of the students is guaranteed.

column2: ANTI-DROWNING LIFESAVING SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to anti-drowning lifesaving system comprises of, an artificial intelligence enabled image capturing unit 2 mounted at periphery of a swimming pool 1 that captures images of a user swimming inside the pool 1, a thermal image capturing unit 3 also mounted at periphery of the pool 1 that keeps track of the user(s) vitals and underwater position, a microcontroller paired with the artificial and thermal image capturing unit 2,3, the microcontroller processes data received from the image capturing units 2,3 and generates a command in case any abnormality identified in correlation with the gestures, vitals or position of the user, a safety module installed within the wall and base of the swimming pool 1, that activates upon receiving command from the microcontroller in different configurations depending upon level of drowning in order to provide safety to said user when swimming.

column2: XR DEVICE FOR PROVIDING AR MODE AND VR MODE AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to an XR device for providing an augmented reality (AR) mode and a virtual reality (VR) mode and a control method thereof. More particularly, the present invention is also applicable to the 5G communication technology field, robot technology field, autonomous driving technology field, and artificial intelligence (AI) technology field. The present invention, when sensing surrounding environment information surrounding the XR device and receiving a selection input for executing a camera mode from a user, enters the camera mode, controls a display to display a menu including a first button for displaying at least one virtual object, a second button for executing photographing, and a third button for storing at least the one virtual object, determines whether to include a part of the at least one virtual object on a screen when shooting based on the surrounding environment information and the object, and controls the camera to shoot according to the determination result. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: METHOD FOR IDENTIFYING BLEPHAROSPASM BASED ON MOTION ENERGY
column4: The invention discloses a method for identifying blepharospasm based on motion energy, which comprises the following steps of: firstly, shooting a face video image sequence of a subject in a static sitting state from the front side by using a camera or a mobile phone; and then, carrying out geometric positioning on face key points in the video image sequence through face alignment, carrying out region segmentation on the face image of the subject according to the positions of the key points, and extracting eye regions for key analysis. next, performing feature extraction on the face video image sequence, calculating a motion energy diagram by using a difference operator, calculating an integral average diagram by using an integral operator, and extracting histogram of oriented gradient features from the motion energy diagram and the integral average diagram respectively; and finally, designing a parallel integrated classifier based on a support vector machine, and identifying the blepharospasm and the type thereof. The motion analysis technology based on the video image sequence is used for clinical diagnosis of the blepharospasm disease, recognition and typing of the blepharospasm disease are achieved, and the method has great significance in promoting development of the artificial intelligence medical image auxiliary diagnosis technology.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED SPINE IMAGE PROCESSING DEVICE AND COMPUTER EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based spine image processing device and computer equipment, which can accurately classify real-time spine image information according to categories through information chain analysis, thereby reducing the workload of subsequent image processing. The spine image distribution information can be accurately obtained through segmented identification of the to-be-processed information chain so as to determine the three-dimensional space position data corresponding to each spine, and the three-dimensional space position data of each spine can be matched more quickly by marking the target spine position information. The accuracy and integrity of feature extraction of the spinal curvature feature information are ensured, and then the spinal curvature description information is obtained through feature integration. Therefore, whether the shooting angle of the real-time spine image information is qualified or not can be accurately judged according to the comparison result of the spine bending description information and the sample spine bending information, the availability and accuracy of the real-time spine image information are ensured, and noise interference of the shooting angle on the real-time spine image information is reduced as much as possible.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ELECTRICAL CONTROL METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence electrical control method. The method comprises the steps that S1, a network communication module obtains the current meteorological environment and weather temperature and transmits the meteorological environment and weather temperature data to an AI control system, and the AI control system calculates the optimal suitable water temperature according to the meteorological environment and weather temperature; meanwhile, the AI control system sets the optimal swimming water depth according to the requirements of swimmers; s2, a water temperature heating device heats the water filtered by a filtering water cabin; s3, a water temperature sensor detects the actual water temperature of the swimming pool; s4, a cleanliness sensor detects the water cleanliness of the swimming pool; s5, an operation display system is used for displaying the current operation data of the swimming pool and the operation data of an electric sensing system; and S6, an alarm system is used when the AI control system detects that the water quality is abnormal or the water temperature is abnormal or the water depth is abnormal. The circulating speed of a circulating water pump is reasonably set according to the number of the swimmers.

column2: DOUBLE-LENS SHOOTING DEVICE AND DOUBLE-LENS SHOOTING DEVICE CONTROL CIRCUIT
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of shooting, in particular to a double-lens shooting device and a double-lens shooting device control circuit, the double-lens shooting device comprises an outer shell assembly, a control assembly and a lens assembly, the outer shell assembly comprises a first shell and a second shell, the second shell is provided with a heat dissipation structure, and the control assembly is connected with the first shell and the second shell. The control assembly comprises a first circuit board and a button assembly used for opening or closing the double-lens shooting device, the first circuit board and the button assembly are electrically connected with each other, the lens assembly comprises a second circuit board and a lens module structure, the second circuit board and the lens module structure are electrically connected with each other, and the lens module structure at least comprises a first lens module and a second lens module. The first lens module and the second lens module are arranged back to back, and the central points of the first lens and the second lens are located on the same straight line. According to the double-lens shooting device and the double-lens shooting device control circuit, the mechanical structure is compact, scene shooting in a larger visual angle range can be achieved, and subsequent image processing is further facilitated.

column2: EVOLUTIONARY TECHNIQUES FOR COMPUTER-BASED OPTIMIZATION AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEMS
column4: Techniques are provided for evolutionary computer-based optimization and artificial intelligence systems, and include receiving first and second candidate executable code (with ploidy of at least two and one, respectively) each selected at least in part based on a fitness score. The first candidate executable code and the second candidate executable code are combined to produce resultant executable code of the desired ploidy. A fitness score is determined for the resultant executable code, and a determination is made whether the resultant executable code will be used as a future candidate executable code based at least in part on the third fitness score. If an exit condition is met, then the resultant executable code is used as evolved executable code.

column2: VEHICLE GEAR CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a vehicle gear control method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a driving scene image of a vehicle in a driving process; performing image recognition on the acquired driving scene image to obtain a driving scene label; the driving scene label at least comprises one of a road attribute label, a traffic attribute label and an environment attribute label; obtaining driving state data and driving behavior data corresponding to the vehicle; based on the driving state data, the driving behavior data and the driving scene label, a target gear shifting mode matched with the vehicle is determined; the target gear shifting mode is used for controlling the vehicle in the running process to run according to the target gear within the target gear shifting time. By adopting the method, the accuracy of the target gear shifting mode can be improved. The applicable fields include but are not limited to the fields of Internet of Vehicles, automatic driving, road network collaboration and the like.

column2: IMAGE RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an image recognition method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of computer vision and voice recognition. A specific embodiment of the method comprises the following steps: in response to a user entering an image recognition function, obtaining a to-be-recognized image in a camera viewing frame of the terminal equipment; acquiring voice information of a user, and performing voice recognition on the voice information to obtain a voice recognition result; matching the voice recognition result with a preset configuration item, and generating a recognition option corresponding to the voice recognition result; and shooting a to-be-recognized image, and recognizing the to-be-recognized image by adopting a pre-trained model corresponding to the recognition option. According to the embodiment, the accuracy of image recognition is improved by combining voice recognition.

column2: LARYNGOSCOPE DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses a laryngoscope device. The laryngoscope device comprises a laryngoscope body, a driving unit, a control unit and a display unit. The laryngoscope body is provided with a bent part used for being inserted into the oral cavity of a patient, and the bent part is provided with a camera element used for collecting images in the oral cavity of the patient. The driving unit is used for driving at least part of the laryngoscope body to move to enter or move out of the oral cavity of a patient. And the control unit is used for controlling the driving unit. The display unit displays the real-time position of the laryngoscope body in the oral cavity of a patient and is used for displaying images collected by the camera shooting element, and the display unit and the laryngoscope body are arranged separately. According to the laryngoscope device provided by the utility model, the probability of contact between a doctor and a patient is reduced, so that the infection risk of the doctor and the patient is reduced, the control is reliable and accurate, the hands of the doctor are liberated, and the manpower is saved. The success rate of inserting the catheter into the human trachea once is high, and the rescue time can be saved.

column2: DATA TRANSMISSION OPTIMIZATION METHOD, DEVICE AND SYSTEM SUITABLE FOR VIDEO TRANSMISSION
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a data transmission optimization method, device and system suitable for video transmission. The method comprises the following steps: when a video conference is carried out, acquiring human skeleton posture, palm and facial expression feature point information or differential picture information in a video window of a home terminal; transmitting feature point information or differential information to a display end, and transmitting meaningful changes preferentially; at a display end, adopting a generator in the recovery model to reconstruct human skeleton posture, palm and facial expression feature point information, or combining and recovering differential information and previously displayed content to obtain a target picture, wherein the target picture comprises a head portrait expression, a posture and a gesture of a real participant; and displaying the target picture on the display end. By implementing the embodiment of the invention, the artificial intelligence technology is used, the network bandwidth required by network transmission in the video conference is reduced, and meanwhile, the user experience effect is ensured.

column2: VIDEO MONITORING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, STORAGE MEDIUM AND EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a video monitoring system and method based on artificial intelligence, a storage medium and equipment, a first monitoring camera shoots a first monitoring image in a first monitoring area, and the first monitoring image comprises a first identification image with a first surface displaying a first identification form; the second monitoring camera shoots a second monitoring image in the second monitoring area, the second monitoring image comprises a second identification image with the second face displaying the second identification form, and the shooting time of the first monitoring image is consistent with the shooting time of the second monitoring image. The monitoring center equipment can obtain the display picture of the display screen to judge whether the display picture of the display screen accords with the reality or not so as to determine whether the display picture is tampered or not, so that manual monitoring can be assisted in an intelligent monitoring mode, the safety and reliability of the video monitoring system are further improved, and the user experience is improved. The blackout condition of the video monitoring system is identified and timely found and alerted, so that the effectiveness of the video monitoring system is effectively exerted.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of intellectualization, and discloses artificial intelligence monitoring equipment. The artificial intelligence monitoring equipment comprises an equipment main body, wherein a camera main body is fixedly mounted in the equipment main body, a mounting seat is fixedly mounted on the outer side of the equipment main body, a cross movable plate is movably connected to the outer side of the mounting seat, and a stress rod is movably connected to the outer side of the cross movable plate; a protection plate is fixedly connected to the outer side of the stress rod, a mounting block is fixedly connected to the inner side of the protection plate, and a shaft rod is movably connected to the end, away from the protection plate, of the mounting block. According to the artificial intelligence monitoring equipment, electromagnets are arranged in flexible clamping magnetic rods, the electromagnets in the flexible clamping magnetic rods are immediately and firmly attracted to the equipment main body along with inward pushing of the flexible clamping magnetic rods, and flexible clamping plates synchronously fix the equipment main body, so that the mounting stability of the camera main body in the equipment main body is ensured; deviation generated by angle jitter of the camera main body is prevented, which causes decline of shooting quality.

column2: CARIES DIAGNOSIS SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a caries diagnosis system based on artificial intelligence. The system is composed of an image acquisition module, a data transmission module, an intelligent diagnosis module and a diagnosis result display module. The system uses stored caries case big data, cooperates with artificial intelligence and a cloud computer to train an artificial intelligence diagnosis model of caries, obtains oral tooth image information of a user in a mobile phone and tablet camera shooting mode, and uses a user client and a flash as data transmission media to carry out data transmission. Image processing and caries diagnosis are carried out through the trained model, the diagnosis result is displayed on a user interface in an image form in a user client, operation is easy and convenient, cost is low, and caries patients can be effectively helped to discover caries as soon as possible and see a doctor in time.

column2: HUMAN BODY MOTION MEASUREMENT METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON COMPUTER VISION AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a human body motion measurement method and a system based on computer vision and electronic equipment, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a human body motion video stream through a human body motion measurement method based on optics, and extracting a current reference image and a current frame image from the human body motion video stream; according to the current reference image and the current frame image, obtaining motion information of image pixel points in the current frame image through calculation, obtaining human skeleton key point coordinate information in the current frame image, and at least according to the motion information of the image pixel points in the current frame image and the human skeleton key point coordinate information, obtaining the motion measurement information of the human body joint motion through calculation, and combing semantic vision and motion vision, so that the human body motion measurement method is more convenient to operate, and the obtained motion measurement information is more robust.

column2: WEBSITE DISTRIBUTION PROPORTION OPTIMIZATION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON MULTI-POPULATION GENETIC ALGORITHM
column4: The invention provides a website distribution proportion optimization method and device based on a multi-population genetic algorithm, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and can also be used in the financial field, and the method comprises the steps: determining the fitness corresponding to individuals in a sub-population in an initial population through a pre-constructed fitness prediction model, each individual being composed of a group of distribution proportions of to-be-dispatched websites of products; converting the initial fitness variable corresponding to each fitness into an initial gene variable; completing evolution of the sub-populations by using the initial gene variables to obtain excellent individuals corresponding to the sub-populations and excellent gene variables corresponding to the excellent individuals; and according to a preset fusion reproduction round, performing fusion reproduction on the excellent individuals by using the excellent gene variables to obtain an optimal website distribution proportion. According to the method, the optimal website distribution proportion can be obtained in the concurrent high-performance computing system by using the multi-population genetic algorithm.

column2: DEVICE, SERVER, METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CONFERENCE RECORDING
column4: The present application relates to the technical field of audio recording, and discloses a device for conference recording. The device comprises a recording device and arelay device; the recording device isconfigured to obtain voice information and identity information of a user, and send the voice information and the identity information to the relay device; and the relay device is configured to receive the voice information and the identity information and send the voice information and the identity information to a server. The voice information and t.he identity information of the user are obtained through the recording device, the voice information and the identity information of the user are sent to the relay device, the voice information and the identity information of the user are sent to the server through the relay device, and the voice information and the identity information corresponding to the voice information are obtained, so that conference speaking can be recorded in a recording mode; and the conference recording efficiency is improved compared with a recorder handwriting mode, meanwhile, voice information and spokesman identity information can be obtained, and subsequent conference recording arrangement is facilitated. The invention further discloses the server, a method and a system.

column2: SUPER NETWORK TRAINING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a super network training method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the fields of computer vision, deep learning and the like. The specific implementation scheme comprises: performing N times of iterative operations based on a preset super network to obtain a target super network, wherein the ith iteration operation in the N iteration operations comprises: taking i times of a preset resolution as a feature map resolution, and obtaining an extended sub-network based on the feature map resolution and a preset skeleton structure; updating a preset super network based on the extended sub-network, and training the updated preset super network to obtain a converged super network; and under the condition that i is equal to a preset threshold value N, determining the converged super network as a target super network. According to the embodiment of the invention, the performance of the sub-network searched in the search space of the target super network in the image processing scene can be improved.

column2: AI ENABLING METHOD AND DEVICE OF HARDWARE, STORAGE MEDIUM AND EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses an AI enabling method and device of hardware, a storage medium and equipment, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining an operation image of to-be-enabled hardware, and then sending the operation image to a pre-constructed enabling model, so as to predict the operation state of the to-be-enabled hardware at the next moment, wherein the to-be-enabled hardware and the device where the enabling model is located are located in the same local area network, and then the to-be-enabled hardware is controlled to automatically run according to the predicted running state of the next moment. It can be seen that the to-be-enabled hardware and the device where the enabling model is located are located in the same local area network, and when the enabling model is used for conducting self-defined AI enabling on the to-be-enabled hardware, the safety of data transmission can be guaranteed. Therefore, in an application scene of artificial intelligence innovation education, teachers and students can use the pre-trained self-defined enabling model to carry out self-defined AI enabling on open source hardware in the scene, data transmission safety can be guaranteed, and learning experience of students in an AI course is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AUTOMATIC FEEDING DEVICE
column4: The utility model belongs to the technical field of automatic feeding, and particularly relates to an artificial intelligence automatic feeding device which comprises a base, a feeding pipe and a processor, a storage box is installed on the top of a platform, the bottom of a discharging port is connected with the feeding pipe, a feeding screw is installed in an inner cavity of the feeding pipe, the feeding screw penetrates through the feeding pipe to be connected with the output end of a motor, and the processor is connected with the processor. The motor is connected with a feeding pipe, a feeding port is formed in the bottom of the feeding pipe, an electromagnetic valve is mounted in an inner cavity of the feeding port, a temperature sensor is mounted on the front surface of the feeding port and is in electric input connection with a processor, a time relay is in electric input connection with the processor, and the processor is in electric input connection with the electromagnetic valve and the motor. Manpower is greatly saved, the temperature sensor can measure the temperature of the front portion of the discharging port, whether animals exist in front of the trough or not and whether feeding is needed or not is judged through the measured temperature processor, and waste of fodder can be reduced.

column2: INTELLIGENT ELECTRIC FOLDING REARVIEW MIRROR CONTROL SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides an intelligent folding electric rearview mirror control system. The intelligent folding electric rearview mirror control system is characterized by comprising a rearview mirror, a rotating bracket, a signal acquisition module, a control module, a driving motor, a temperature sensor, a heater, a snow melting demister and a remote controller, the rearview mirror is installed on the rotating support, and the driving motor is connected with the rotating support. The functions of automatically folding the rearview mirror when a vehicle enters the garage in place, starting the function of automatically opening the rearview mirror when the vehicle exits the garage, automatically heating at low temperature and melting snow and demisting at regular time can be achieved; the condition that grease used for running-in lubrication in a folding shaft of the outside rear-view mirror is in a relatively solid state at low temperature due to rain and snow is avoided, and the situation that the folding and unfolding effects are affected by abrasion caused by the fact that friction resistance borne by the outside rear-view mirror during folding and unfolding is increased is avoided; and the mirror surface is prevented from being blurred in rainy, snowy and humid weather or under the influence of water mist or accumulated snow. The remote controller can select modes to control the artificial intelligence effect.

column2: DATA INFORMATION TRANSMISSION AND INTELLIGENT DIAGNOSIS SYSTEM FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INSPECTION OF UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE
column4: The invention discloses a data information transmission and intelligent diagnosis system for artificial intelligence inspection of an unmanned aerial vehicle; the system comprises a main control module, a power supply module, a monitoring module, a data transmission module, an intelligent diagnosis module and a diagnosis alarm module. The main control module controls operation of other modules, and power supply module supplies power to system. the monitoring module is used for monitoring and acquiring data, the data transmission module is used for transmitting and receiving the data, and the intelligent diagnosis module is used for receiving the acquired data and analyzing and diagnosing machine body faults and polling fault anomalies. Shooting inspection is carried out by arranging an image acquisition unit, a machine body data monitoring unit and a sensor data acquisition unit. According to the invention, the data of the machine body are monitored in real time, the surrounding environment of the machine body is monitored by using the sensor, and faults and abnormities in the fuselage and the environment are monitored in the inspection process, so that the inspection range is wider, the monitoring of the abnormities of the machine body and the inspection environment is more convenient, and the data are more accurate.

column2: ONLINE AND OFFLINE COMBINED MULTI-DIMENSIONAL TEACHING AI (ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE) CLASSROOM SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an online and offline combined multi-dimensional teaching AI (Artificial Intelligence) school system. The system comprises hardware teaching preparation deployment, wherein the whole system needs a set of playing host and an AI analysis host; full-angle intelligent identification: based on a 4D full-angle skeleton detection technology, information such as a face, an expression, a behavior and a posture of a single individual in a video being accurately identified in a multi-camera full-angle manner; audio and video two-dimensional teaching content integration: using corresponding audios to assist video stream analysis through an autonomous voice-assisted video two-dimensional recognition analysis method; individual learning condition analysis of students: collecting and analyzing classroom and learning data of each student; and education and teaching evaluation model construction: cooperating with famous schools, and establishing a plurality of intelligent evaluation models. The system has the advantages of intelligent analysis, intelligent classification, intelligent processing, reasonable design and effective improvement of the learning effect.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED PERSONAL HEALTHCARE SYSTEM
column4: Advances in computing have opened newer vistas in a wide range of applications in healthcare domain. An AI based personal healthcare system is proposed which keeps track of the vital statistics and health records of the individuals suffering from obesity either genetic or secondary obesity induced by stress or other attendant causes. The invention comprises of software which monitors the user health statistics and communicates with the healthcare professional and dieticians. It also issues alerts to keep tabs on eating time, rest time, exercise time and continuously monitors the energy balance. Negative energy balance is created to burn the stored fat and a controlled diet coupled with exercise regime is devised for reducing obesity and the adverse health effects associated with it.

column2: MULTI-TASK INTERFACE MANAGEMENT METHOD AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: A multi-task interface management method and an electronic device, relating to the field of terminal technology, being applicable to an artificial intelligence (AI) terminal, implementing quick switching of application programs and simplifying user operations. Said method comprises: a display interface of an electronic device being provided with a task area, and in response to a preset operation, the electronic device determining the priority order of one or more application programs (S101), wherein the one or more application programs comprise application programs currently running on the electronic device, and the preset operation comprises: an unlocking operation, an operation of switching to a desktop, or an operation of clicking a task area start button; and the electronic device displaying, according to the priority order of the one or more application programs, icons of the one or more application programs in the task area according to a preset rule (S102).

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IN TELEMEDICINE-ENABLED HARDWARE TO OPTIMIZE REHABILITATIVE ROUTINES CAPABLE OF ENABLING REMOTE REHABILITATIVE COMPLIANCE
column4: A computer-implemented system comprising a treatment apparatus, a patient interface, and a processing device is disclosed. The processing device is configured to receive treatment data pertaining to the user during the telemedicine session, wherein the treatment data comprises one or more characteristics of the user; determine, via one or more trained machine learning models, at least one respective measure of benefit one or more exercise regimens provide the user, wherein the determining the respective measure of benefit is based on the treatment data; determine, via the one or more trained machine learning models, one or more probabilities of the user complying with the one or more exercise regimens; and transmit the treatment plan to a computing device, wherein the treatment plan is generated based on the one or more probabilities and the respective measure of benefit the one or more exercise regimens provide the user.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EQUIPMENT AND METHOD FOR FIELD CONFERENCE GUARANTEE
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence device and method for field conference guarantee, and the device comprises a server, wherein the server communicates with a device located on a mobile device through a private network; the device on the mobile device comprises a DTU, and the DTU is connected to a camera, a millimeter wave radar, an REIF module, a GPS positioning module, and a core processor; the core processor receives input signals, processes the input signals and then transmits the input signals to the server, the camera, the millimeter wave radar, the REIF module and the GPS positioning module all transmit collected information to the server, and the server positions the mobile device based on the received information and records equipment running time, running track, running distance and running state information. And the power supply system is arranged to provide an energy source for the driving system, and manpower can be reduced through the driving force of the device.

column2: DATA INCREMENTAL CLUSTERING METHOD, SYSTEM AND DEVICE BASED ON REDUCTION, AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of image data processing, and particularly relates to a reduction-based data incremental clustering method and system, a medium and a device. The invention aims to solve the problem of low efficiency of image incremental clustering caused by high requirement on stand-alone capacity and long data processing time when the steps of searching and traversing are realized when the image data scale is very large. In order to achieve the purpose, in the process of clustering the newly-added data and the historical data, matching or clustering is carried out only through a reduction new cluster and a reduction old cluster instead of directly clustering all the newly-added data and the historical data. Therefore, reduction processing is carried out on the respective clusters before clustering of the newly added data and the historical data, the calculation amount during clustering of the newly added data and the historical data is reduced, the requirement for a running memory is lowered, and the time cost and the economic cost of clustering are saved.

column2: INTELLIGENT VEHICLE DRIVING CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE FOR HUMAN DRIVER TO MONITOR AUTOMATIC DRIVING
column4: The invention relates to an intelligent vehicle driving control method and device for a human driver to monitor automatic driving, and belongs to the technical fields of road vehicle driving control systems, driver auxiliary systems, automatic driving, artificial intelligence and intelligent vehicles. The automatic driving function of a vehicle is started in the whole process from the starting point to the ending point to complete all required driving actions, but the human driver is forcibly required to be responsible for monitoring the driving state, and a relatively simplified driving instruction of which the priority is higher than that of the automatic driving function is timely and properly sent out within a few moments; therefore, the driving labor intensity of the human driver is reduced, the learning difficulty of vehicle driving skills is reduced, meanwhile, it is guaranteed that the automatic driving vehicle can adapt to various extreme traffic conditions, the safety is improved, the vehicle is automatically driven in most time, and thus natural unstable factors of human beings are excluded from a traffic system in most time so as to improve the running stability of the vehicle and the running stability of the whole traffic system.

column2: ONLINE EXERCISE PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATION SYSTEM BASED ON MACHINE LEARNING ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses an online exercise personalized recommendation system based on a machine learning algorithm, and the system comprises a question selection module which comprises an automatic question selection module and a manual question selection module, the automatic question selection module employs an algorithm to automatically output a selected question set, and the manual selected question is autonomously selected by a user; the online learning knowledge base comprises learning resources such as exercises, test papers, hearing materials and online lesson videos, and the knowledge base comprises a learning resource feature extraction algorithm; learning a resource feature extraction algorithm: using a machine learning algorithm to obtain a hiding rule contained in the data set; and the recommendation engine is used for inferring knowledge mastering conditions and weak points of the user according to user behaviors by using a machine learning technology and matching learning resources suitable for the user from the knowledge base, and the recommendation engine comprises a user portrait algorithm and a recommendation algorithm. According to the invention, exercises can be recommended in a targeted manner for user knowledge weak points and pain points, the time is efficiently utilized, and the learning efficiency is improved.

column2: SAFETY MONITORING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a safety monitoring device based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of monitoring equipment. The safety monitoring device comprises a fixed base, a wall scraping mechanism, a camera shooting mechanism and an alarm mechanism, wherein one end of the fixed base is provided with a connecting base, and the end, close to the connecting base, of the outer wall of the fixed base is provided with clamping blocks, fixing holes and a limiting bottom block; and the limiting bottom block is located at the bottom ends of the clamping blocks and the fixing holes. According to the safety monitoring device, by arranging a first motor, a connecting ring block, a connecting groove, a second telescopic groove, a scraper rod, a limiting groove, a scraper, a reset spring, a compression block, a limiting block, a rotating round block, a transparent protection cover, a rotating shaft, a rotating groove, a camera, a rotating block and a second motor, the phenomenon that a monitored picture is fuzzy due to dust of the camera can be effectively avoided; and the camera can be protected through the transparent protective cover, and the scraper can perform wall scraping operation on the surface of the transparent protective cover, so that the monitoring picture quality of the monitoring device can be effectively improved through mutual cooperation of the parts.

column2: ARTIFICIAL-INTELLIGENCE IMAGE RECOGNITION SYSTEM AND RECOGNITION METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses an artificial-intelligence image recognition system and a recognition method thereof. The artificial-intelligence image recognition system comprises a bottom plate, wherein a connecting cylinder is fixedly connected to the outer wall of the top of the bottom plate, a first sliding rod is inserted into the outer wall of the top of the connecting cylinder, and a fixed seat is fixedly connected to the outer wall of one end of the first sliding rod; and a first fixing column is fixedly connected to the inner wall of the bottom of the fixed seat, a camera body is arranged on the outer wall of the top of the fixed seat, and a power assembly used for driving the camera body to do circular motion is arranged on the circumferential outer wall of the first fixing column and in the fixed seat. According to the invention, panorama shooting can be carried out on an object, so that the quality of the device on acquired pictures is improved, the recognition work of a subsequent recognition system is also facilitated, the situation that the recognition system cannot carry out recognition is avoided, and the stability of the camera body can be effectively ensured through a locating assembly in the working process of the camera body; and therefore, the camera body can carry out image acquisition work more stably.

column2: PRODUCT RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND SYSTEM, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to artificial intelligence, and discloses a product recommendation method and system, computer equipment and a storage medium. A server obtains a product factor matrix and parameters through initialization, and sends the product factor matrix parameters and parameter data to a plurality of clients; each client updates the user factor matrix, calculates a weighted difference value and a normalization constant by using a qFedAvg algorithm, and returns the weighted difference value and the normalization constant to the server; the server updates the product factor matrix parameter by using the product factor matrix parameter, the weighted difference value and the normalization constant; the server determines a target product factor matrix according to the updated product factor matrix parameters, and sends the target product factor matrix to the target client; and the target client calculates a predicted score value by using the target product factor matrix and the updated user factor matrix, and recommends the first N products with high rank to the user. According to the invention, the user data is protected from being leaked, and the fitness between the recommended product and the user is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASKETBALL COURT
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence basketball court which comprises a plate surface fixedly installed on the ground, a plurality of supporting rods are fixedly installed on the plate surface, first sliding grooves are formed in the opposite inner side walls of every two adjacent supporting rods, and a protection mechanism is arranged between every two supporting rods. two wire passing wheels are fixedly installed at the top of the protection mechanism, an illuminating lamp is fixedly installed at the top of the supporting rod, second sliding grooves are formed in the inner side walls of the two first sliding grooves correspondingly, clamping mechanisms are arranged in the two second sliding grooves correspondingly, and the tops of the two clamping mechanisms abut against the bottom of the protection mechanism; and a mounting groove is formed in the front side wall of the supporting rod. The basketball stopping device is reasonable in structural design, can effectively stop a basketball when an athlete performs basketball training, ensures that the basketball is in a field all the time, shortens the ball picking time of the athlete, and improves the training efficiency.

column2: IMAGE TARGET RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an image target recognition method and device, computer equipment and a readable storage medium. The method comprises the steps: obtaining an image of a target object; performing convolution operation on the image to obtain a target feature reflecting the image content; generating a candidate box on the target feature through a pre-generated anchor box, recognizing the candidate box covering the target object, and setting the candidate box as a target box; and recognizing the category of the target object according to the target frame. The invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and information can be stored in the blockchain node. According to the invention, the target frame capable of reflecting the target object in the image is recognized, and the category of the target object is recognized and judged according to the target frame, so that the target object recognition accuracy of the image generated by the vehicle in different sunshine environments and shooting angles is greatly improved.

column2: INTELLIGENT TELEVISION PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZATION METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a intelligent television performance optimization method, apparatus and device, and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a preset AI algorithm, judging a terminal device corresponding to the preset AI algorithm, and obtaining a target terminal device; when the algorithm running on the target terminal equipment is changed, obtaining each changed algorithm; integrating the algorithms, and sending the integrated algorithms to each application to obtain a distribution result; and obtaining the output capability of the target terminal device and an upper application interface, and matching with the upper application interface according to the distribution result to obtain a target application, so that the target application outputs according to the output capability. According to the invention, the changed algorithms are integrated through the preset AI algorithm to obtain the integrated preset algorithm, and the integrated preset algorithm is applied to the target application, so that the performance of the intelligent television can be effectively improved.

column2: CLOUD GROUP PHOTO METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND THREE-DIMENSIONAL MODEL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a cloud group photo method and device based on artificial intelligence and a three-dimensional model, and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: selecting or acquiring a background scene three-dimensional model and a person three-dimensional model of each group photo person according to a shooting requirement; determining a three-dimensional shooting scene and gestures of all group photo personnel models; in the three-dimensional shooting scene, selecting an illumination condition and a shooting angle to shoot a photo to be processed; and inputting the to-be-processed photo into a pre-trained photo realistic model to obtain a realistic photo. Optionally, the user-related data or models required to be used in the operations can be used only after the user authorizes the appointed group photo. The embodiment of the invention has the following advantages: (1) the group photo effect is similar to real presence, the real physical attribute of each person is fit, and the effect is better compared with the mode of direct matting or direct use of GAN generation; and (2) rigid requirements on geographic positions, user photographing postures and photographing synchronism do not exist, and only user authorization is needed.

column2: VISUAL IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE OF SALES COUNTER, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of machine vision, and provides a visual identification method and device of a sales counter, electronic equipment and a readable storage medium, the sales counter is provided with at least two cameras, and the visual identification method comprises the steps: determining track features based on image information collected by the cameras; dividing the track features of each camera into at least one section, and determining the action attribute of each section; projecting the action attribute of each section corresponding to each camera to the same time axis to obtain the action attribute of each time period on the time axis; for the action attributes of all the time periods on the time axis, if the adjacent time periods are the action attributes of the same taking and placing type, reserving the maximum value, and obtaining the integrated action attributes; and adding the integrated action attributes according to the number of articles of the same pick-and-place type, and subtracting the number of articles of different pick-and-place types to obtain an identification result. According to the visual identification method of the sales counter, the influence caused by missing shooting of part of cameras can be eliminated, and accurate identification in various scenes is realized.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IDENTIFICATION DEVICE FOR PESTS
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence identification device for pests. The artificial intelligence identification device comprises a base, A vertical beam is mounted on one side of the base, a cross beam is transversely mounted at the top end of the vertical beam, and an industrial-grade camera capable of focusing dynamically is correspondingly mounted at the end part of the cross beam; And a recognition groove is further formed in the position, corresponding to the camera, of the base. When the device is used, trapped pests are put into the identification disc, then the operation button is clicked, the industrial-grade camera which is installed above and can be dynamically focused is used for shooting the pests in the identification disc, and multi-angle comprehensive shooting is completed under the cooperation of the rotating motor and the blowing and pressing device. and the processor uploads the shot pictures to an AI identification database for image comparison identification, and feeds back an identification result to a human-computer interaction large screen and a user side or an intelligent device associated with a user, so that a one-key automatic identification process can be completed.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE HAZARD SOURCE ANALYSIS, IDENTIFICATION AND EARLY WARNING EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence hazard source analysis, identification and early warning device, relates to the field of construction site intelligent analysis, and aims to solve the problems that the functions of the conventional construction site monitoring system are mostly realized by running on a server through a fixed network, the conventional construction site monitoring system is inconvenient to move after being installed and does not have the functions of intelligent analysis and active early warning. comprising a box body provided with a box cover, four moving mechanisms are arranged at the bottom of the box body, an operation platform is fixedly connected to the bottom of the box cover of the box body, display mechanisms are arranged in and at the top of the operation platform, a control mechanism is arranged on the front face of the operation platform, and a lock catch mechanism is arranged on the left side of a cover plate of the box body. The box is novel in design and easy to operate, the box body can be moved to a designated position at any time to meet different requirements, meanwhile, the indicating lamp can give a signal prompt, effective development of related work is facilitated, the utilization rate of equipment is improved, and labor cost is saved.

column2: SWIMMING STROKE TRAINING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON MACHINE VISION
column4: The invention discloses a swimming stroke training method and system based on machine vision. The swimming stroke training method based on machine vision comprises the following steps: an acquisition step: acquiring real-time image data of a trainee during swimming through a camera; a real-time posture obtaining step: obtaining real-time posture information of the trainee according to the real-time image data; a comparison step: comparing the standard attitude information with the real-time attitude information to obtain difference point information; and a prompting step: outputting prompting information according to the difference point information to prompt the trainee. According to the invention, a trainee can know the swimming posture of himself/herself in real time, errors can be corrected in time, and the learning efficiency is improved; meanwhile, videos can be reserved in the whole learning process and can be reviewed afterwards.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CODE VERIFICATION SYSTEM, METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON CLOUD COMPUTING
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence code verification system, method and device based on cloud computing. The system comprises a computer, a code operation server, and an artificial intelligence analysis device, the computer and the code operation server carry out the wireless transmission through a network, and the computer transmits a code to the code operation server for operation. The code operation server sends error codes during operation to the artificial intelligence analysis device for analysis, and the artificial intelligence analysis device feeds error information back to a specific computer through the code operation server after analysis. The invention designs a system and a method capable of quickly analyzing code running errors and finding out an ending method, so that the overall efficiency of code verification and error correction is improved, and the labor cost and the time cost are reduced.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR FACILITATING MANAGEMENT OF WELLNESS OF USERS
column4: A method of facilitating management of wellness of a user. The method includes receiving a wellness goal associated with the user and an image representing the user, generating avatar data associated with the user based on the image and transmitting the avatar data to a display device associated with the user, receiving user activity data from a user device associated with the user, and generating avatar update data based on the user activity data and transmitting the avatar update data to the display device. Furthermore, two pictures of the user and their body measurements can be acquired by the display device and artificial intelligence used to generate and provide an avatar for the user. Furthermore, a step bank feature may be used to accumulate the user's steps as they exercise over time and allows them to redeem the steps earned at businesses on a network offering user financial incentive challenges.

column2: INSPECTION ROBOT AND INSPECTION SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses an inspection robot and an inspection system. The inspection robot comprises a high-definition camera which acquires an inspection point image in real time and identifies abnormal running states and abnormal environments of facility machine room equipment of an inspection point according to an artificial intelligence image algorithm; the temperature measuring camera is used for dynamically detecting the temperature of the facility machine room and forming a temperature field; the high-definition camera and the temperature measuring camera are both located below the inspection robot, and the two cameras are at the same visual angle. The problems that an existing inspection robot cannot detect the temperature and time and labor are wasted in inspection are solved.

column2: SYNTHESIS OF FLUORESCENCE LABEL OF ENZYME INHIBITOR
column4: According to the invention, a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug indomethacin transformant reacts with rhodamine B to form a conjugate, and the conjugate can selectively and effectively inhibit COX-2 and complete cells in two purified proteins. These conjugates that do not significantly inhibit COX-1 can optically image COX-2 in inflammatory lesions in vivo and tumors expressing COX-2. The study is useful for optimizing fluorescence conjugates from a variety of NSAID or COX-2 selective inhibitors (COXIBs). The conjugates are evaluated as imaging agents targeting COX-2 and the active molecules are validated in vitro and in vivo as cell and tumor formulations targeting COX-2. A fluorescently labeled optical imaging agent is provided, and is verified to be useful for COX-2 targeting inflammation and cancer in vivo imaging. Indometacin is used as a raw material and is condensed with hexamethylenediamine, and an obtained product is condensed with rhodamine B. The synthetic method for introducing the fluorophore into the COX-2 inhibitor indometacin is simple and convenient to operate, easily available in raw materials, low in impurity content and low in production cost, the fluorophore is introduced on the basis of ensuring the basic skeleton structure of the COX2 inhibitor indometacin, and the compound can perform autofluorescence and is a tracing application of the compound in cytobiology.

column2: SYNTHESIS OF FLUORESCENCE MARKER OF COX-2 ENZYME INHIBITOR
column4: According to the invention, a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug indomethacin transformant reacts with rhodamine B to form a conjugate, and the conjugate can selectively and effectively inhibit COX-2 and complete cells in two purified proteins. These conjugates that do not significantly inhibit COX-1 can optically image COX2 in inflammatory lesions in vivo and tumors expressing COX-2. The study is useful for optimizing fluorescence conjugates from a variety of NSAID or COX-2 selective inhibitors (COXIBs). The conjugates are evaluated as imaging agents targeting COX-2 and the active molecules are validated in vitro and in vivo as cell and tumor formulations targeting COX-2. A fluorescently labeled optical imaging agent is provided, and is verified to be useful for COX-2 targeted inflammation and cancer in vivo imaging. Indometacin is used as a raw material and is condensed with hexamethylenediamine, and an obtained product is condensed with rhodamine B. The synthetic method for introducing the fluorophore into the COX-2 inhibitor indometacin is simple and convenient to operate, easily available in raw materials, low in impurity content and low in production cost, the fluorophore is introduced on the basis of ensuring the basic skeleton structure of the COX-2 inhibitor indometacin, and the compound can perform autofluorescence and is a tracing application of the compound in cytobiology.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE OPERATING SHADOWLESS LAMP
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence operating shadowless lamp, which comprises a shadowless lamp body, the shadowless lamp body is fixed above an operating bed, a microcontroller is installed in the shadowless lamp body, a buzzer and an MIC are fixedly installed in the middle of the bottom of the shadowless lamp body, and at least three circles of LED lamp sets are fixedly installed at the bottom of the shadowless lamp body; voice instructions are recorded through voice collection, voice is recognized and converted through the voice recognition technology, and converted information is transmitted to the control module to achieve control and adjustment of the operation shadowless lamp. The high-intelligence phonetization is achieved, steps of nurses during operation can be reduced, only voice needs to be sent out, operation is quite simple, direct control can be conducted in an operation, and use is convenient; the microprocessor can control the brightness, the color temperature, the light spot gathering, the camera shooting, the deep cavity illumination and other operations of the shadowless lamp, and different requirements for lamplight in the operation process are met.

column2: DESIGN AND SYNTHESIS OF ANTI-TUMOR COMPOUNDS CONTAINING FERULIC ACID-PYRAZOLE SKELETON
column4: The invention discloses design and a preparation method of an anti-tumor compound containing a ferulic acid-pyrazole skeleton. The structure of the anti-tumor compound is shown as a formula in the specification.

column2: VEHICLE CONTROL METHOD, VEHICLE-ROAD COOPERATION SYSTEM, ROADSIDE EQUIPMENT AND AUTOMATIC DRIVING VEHICLE
column4: The invention discloses a vehicle control method, a vehicle-road cooperation system, roadside equipment and an automatic driving vehicle, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, automatic driving, intelligent transportation and computer vision. According to the specific scheme, when an automatic driving vehicle is controlled to run, road sensing information acquired in a roadside equipment coverage area is screened; effective area information of an area to which the screened target road perception information belongs is determined; the target road sensing information, the effective area information and the area information of the roadside equipment coverage area are sent to the vehicle together, so that the vehicle is accurately controlled to run by combining the target road sensing information, the effective area information and the area information, and the running safety of the vehicle can be improved; and the target road sensing information with effective reference value for vehicle driving can be sent to the vehicle in a targeted manner, so that the data transmission quantity is reduced.

column2: NOVEL INTELLIGENT LOGISTICS CENTER COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
column4: The utility model provides a novel intelligent logistics center communication system. The novel intelligent logistics center communication system comprises a main control end, a transportation system, a CAN-to-WIFI gateway, a WIFI data relay and a WIFI-to-CAN gateway. The transportation system comprises a master controller and an unmanned transportation device; the serial port of the main control end is in communication connection with the serial port of the main controller through a data line; the WIFI data relay is arranged in a logistics activity area, and the main control end is in communication connection with the unmanned transportation device through the first CAN bus, the CAN-to-WIFI gateway, the WIFI data relay, the WIFI-to-CAN gateway and the second CAN bus in sequence. According to the novel intelligent logistics center communication system, the communication quality can be improved, the stable working range of the intelligent logistics system is expanded, the transportation efficiency is improved, and the logistics cost is reduced.

column2: PROGRAM FAULT PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a program fault processing method and device based on artificial intelligence, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining running data of a program; performing feature extraction processing on the operation data to obtain fault features of the operation data; determining conditional probabilities of the fault features under different candidate fault types based on the fault features of the operation data; and performing prediction processing based on the prior probability of the operation data and the conditional probability of the fault features under different candidate fault types to obtain the fault type of the program. According to the invention, the fault type of the program can be accurately detected.

column2: MECHANICAL ARM FOR PRETREATMENT OF URINE SAMPLE
column4: The utility model discloses a mechanical arm for urine sample pretreatment, which comprises a mechanical arm module, one end of the mechanical arm module is provided with a driving shaft block, one end of the driving shaft block is provided with a horizontal shaft lever, and the horizontal shaft lever is connected with the driving shaft block through a screw. According to the mechanical arm for urine sample pretreatment, when urine or other reagents are extracted, the mechanical arm firstly descends to the position above a pipette tip through a clamping sliding block, the pipette tip is clamped through the clamping sliding block, then the pipette tip is moved to the position above a urine bottle body, the pipette tip extends into liquid, and then the pipette tip is taken out; and finally, through the work of an air pump, the interior of the liquid extraction gun head is extracted, in combination with the current artificial intelligence trend, the automation degree of the whole process can be set to be higher, assembly line operation can be achieved, the time cost is saved, the manual operation error is reduced, and the production efficiency is improved. Improving repeatability and stability.

column2: ROBOT AND METHOD FOR IDENTIFYING AREAS BY ROBOT
column4: Disclosed are a robot and a method for identifying areas by the robot. According to an embodiment of the present invention, the robot comprises: an optical sensor for identifying a dot code placed on the floor of a space; and a processor which sets a virtual wall on a map of a space along a reference line based on the dot code identified by the optical sensor, identifies an area formed by the preset virtual wall, and allocates properties information corresponding to the pattern information of the dot code identified to the identified area. The dot code can include at least two reference dots showing the reference line. The embodiments of the present invention can be realized by running an artificial intelligence algorithm and/or machine learning algorithm in the 5G environment connected for the Internet of Things (IoT). The present invention aims to provide a robot which is able to automatically recognize and classify the areas in the space. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: SHORT VIDEO ACTOR INTELLIGENT MATCHING METHOD BASED ON BIG DATA AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a short video actor intelligent matching method based on big data and an artificial intelligence method; the method comprises the steps: employing a conventional machine learning mode for sklearn, and taking the historical photographing of a database for the delivery effect in a delivery effect database as a target; data of a database actor database, a client database and a historical shooting script database are used as input of the data, a basic knowledge base is trained through processing of a data training set and a verification set, an actor matching high ROI model is trained, and under the conditions that current short video advertisement needs to explode and related industry actors are relatively lacked, appropriate actors are difficult to find, and the actors are difficult to find. The situation that manual intervention is large in the screening process and management is disordered after the scale is enlarged is avoided, most of actor requirements of standardized commercial short videos are guided by big data and intelligence, actor matching efficiency and shooting quality for commercial short video shooting are improved, and it is guaranteed that after the commercial short videos are popularized and demanded, a proper actor for shooting can be matched in a short period.

column2: POSITION-BASED WORK AGENCY RELAY SERVICE SYSTEM AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to a work agency relay service system using an exclusive application for a work agency relay. The work agency relay service system includes: a user terminal, which is a terminal possessed by a service user using a work agency service, in which the exclusive application is installed; a provider terminal, which is a terminal possessed by a service provider providing the work agency service, in which the exclusive application is installed; and a relay server providing a work agency relay service by analyzing service provider information inputted through the provider terminal and work agency information inputted through the user terminal with artificial intelligence technology, and receiving position information of the user terminal and the provider terminal in real time to provide the work agency relay service based on current positions of the user terminal and the provider terminal. According to the present invention, every type of work or duty, which irregularly occurs in an everyday life such as a house, a company, a store and the like, is converted into gig work to bring about an effect of enabling anyone to quickly and conveniently provide or receive a work agency service anywhere and anytime on a 24-hour basis. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: CEMENT RAW MATERIAL VERTICAL MILL SATURATED MILL ABNORMITY IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a cement raw material vertical mill saturated mill abnormity identification method based on artificial intelligence technology. The method comprises the steps of determining a key process index for correctly identifying a working condition state; preprocessing the obtained production data in combination with a Kalman filtering algorithm, and automatically labeling the preprocessed production data in combination with a semi-supervised learning algorithm for vertical mill historical working conditions; and constructing an abnormal working condition recognition model based on the historical data of the key process indexes of the vertical mill and the pseudo-tags in combination with a recursive lifting decision tree, and importing preprocessed data corresponding to the key process indexes into the model in real time to perform real-time recognition on the abnormal state of the vertical mill. Based on key process process variables such as main motor total active power, main motor current, mill body differential pressure, mill roll displacement, return hopper lifting current, vibration and the like and pseudo-label data, a saturated mill process anomaly identification model is established by utilizing a gradient lifting decision tree algorithm, and the current running state of the raw mill is identified online. The invention has the characteristics of high prediction accuracy, stable model and strong generalization ability.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR RUNNING NEURAL NETWORK MODEL, AND COMPUTER DEVICE
column4: A method and apparatus for running a neural network model, and a computer device, wherein same belong to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: acquiring input data and weight parameter data of the current convolutional layer (S301); performing Winograd processing on the input data (S302); performing Winograd processing on the weight parameter data (S303); reducing the number of data bits of weight parameter data after same has been subjected to Winograd processing, and performing quantization processing on weight parameter data after same has been subjected to bit reduction (S304); performing a convolution operation on the basis of input data to be subjected to the operation and weight parameter data to be subjected to the operation (S305); and performing inverse quantization processing on intermediate output data, and performing Winograd result transformation processing on intermediate output data after same has been subjected to inverse quantization processing, so as to obtain output data of the current convolutional layer (S306). The present application increases the operation speed of a convolutional layer, and can finally achieve the aim of improving the running speed of the whole neural network model.

column2: ADJUSTABLE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXERCISE GUIDANCE EQUIPMENT FOR DIABETES
column4: The invention discloses an adjustable artificial intelligence exercise guidance device for diabetes. The adjustable artificial intelligence exercise guidance device comprises an auxiliary walking device body; two connecting plates are fixedly mounted at the top of the auxiliary walking device body; a mounting plate is rotatably connected between the two connecting plates; a cushion block is fixedly mounted on the side wall of the mounting plate; a clamping groove is formed in a rotating shaft of the mounting plate; a fixing mechanism is arranged on one of the connecting plates; the fixing mechanism extends into the clamping groove and abuts against the inner bottom of the clamping groove; two mounting grooves are formed in the side wall of the mounting plate; and mounting frames are rotatably connected into the two mounting grooves correspondingly; gears are fixedly mounted on rotating shafts of the two mounting frames correspondingly; and driving mechanisms are arranged in the two mounting grooves. The adjustable artificial intelligence exercise guidance device is reasonable in structural design and can be folded when not used, the occupied space of the device is reduced, the device can be placed under a sickbed, and it is avoided that the device obstructs daily activities of a patient.

column2: ADJUSTABLE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VIDEO MONITORING DEVICE CONVENIENT TO MAINTAIN
column4: The utility model discloses an adjustable artificial intelligence video monitoring device convenient to maintain, which comprises a mounting column, a camera, a threaded rod, a transverse plate, an adjusting mechanism and a mounting mechanism, the mounting column is horizontally and fixedly connected with the transverse plate from bottom to top by two fifths, the adjusting mechanism is mounted on the transverse plate, and the mounting plate is mounted at the top end of the adjusting mechanism. And a camera is mounted on the mounting plate. The camera mounting device comprises the adjusting mechanism, when the rotating disc of the adjusting mechanism rotates, the threaded rod can rotate, the height position of the mounting plate can be changed, the camera mounted on the mounting plate can be overhauled and adjusted without climbing to the top of the mounting column manually, and overhauling of the camera is greatly facilitated; according to the adjusting mechanism, the height position of the mounting plate is adjusted by adopting the characteristics of threaded connection and the principle of gear transmission, the structure is simple, and the operation is convenient.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MEDICAL REHABILITATION EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model discloses artificial intelligence medical rehabilitation equipment which comprises a running machine body, lifting mechanisms are arranged on the two sides of the running machine body, handrails are arranged on the lifting mechanisms, a control panel is connected to the handrails, a face recognition device is arranged on the control panel, and a face recognition device is arranged on the face recognition device. According to the artificial intelligence walking rehabilitation device, the defects in existing artificial intelligence rehabilitation equipment are overcome, the heights of the control panel and the armrests can be automatically adjusted according to the height of a patient, adjustment of the patient is not needed, and the artificial intelligence walking rehabilitation device is connected with an intelligent era, so that the operation is simple, and the operation is convenient. The height of the equipment can be adjusted more intelligently, the self-adaption purpose is achieved, the structure is simple, and use is convenient.

column2: MOTION RECOGNITION CHARACTERISTIC PARAMETER ALGORITHM BASED ON MACHINE VISION
