column4: The invention provides a motion recognition characteristic parameter algorithm based on machine vision, and the algorithm comprises a skeleton articulation point capturing step: capturing a plurality of articulation points of a human skeleton through an artificial intelligence learning method, and calculating the centroid of each articulation point through the articulation points; a calculation step: calculating distance, relative speed and relative acceleration characteristic parameters of each mass center; an error comparison step: comparing errors between the matrix characteristic parameters of the exerciser and the reference sample actions; a similarity calculation step: calculating and comparing the similarity between the exercise practicer and the reference sample action; and a selection step: selecting the body parts corresponding to the unmatched articulation points in the movement process according to the similarity calculation result. Compared with a previous method, the method is based on parameters established by a single reference point, and matrix parameters take a plurality of centroids as reference points. System errors caused by single reference point position capture or calculation errors are weakened, and more related information used for identifying and comparing actions is carried.

column2: NOVEL AIR JET LOOM DIRECT DRIVE MOTOR CONTROL SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses a novel air jet loom direct drive motor control system which comprises a main control unit, a driver control unit, a direct drive motor, a display and a warp tension sensor, and the main control unit is provided with a CPU module, a data storage module, an analog input module, a switching input module, a switching output module, an RS485 communication module and an RS232 communication module. Wherein data transmission is carried out between the main control unit and the driver control unit through the RS485 communication module, data transmission is carried out between the main control unit and the displayer through the RS232 communication module, the signal output end of the warp tension sensor is connected with the analog input module, the signal output end of the driver control unit is connected with the direct drive motor, and the driver control unit is connected with the displayer through the RS485 communication module. The automatic weft insertion device has the advantages that control functions such as loom control, servo let-off and curling, weft selection and weft insertion are integrated, the structure is simple, artificial intelligence display is achieved, automatic control is achieved, and efficiency is high.

column2: WATER-JET LOOM ELECTRICAL CONTROL SYSTEM BASED ON SINGLE-CHIP MICROCOMPUTER
column4: The utility model discloses a water jet loom electrical control system based on a single-chip microcomputer, which is characterized by comprising a main control unit and a jacquard machine control unit, and the main control unit is provided with a main control CPU module, a data storage module, an analog input module, a switching input module, a switching output module, a CAN BUS communication module and an RS232 communication module. The jacquard machine control unit comprises a jacquard machine CPU module, a color selection input module, a weft density change input module, a bridge stop signal module and a flat palm output module, and data transmission is carried out between the main control unit and the jacquard machine control unit through a CAN BUS communication module. The beneficial effects of the utility model are that the control system integrates control functions such as loom control, servo let-off and curling, weft selection and insertion, jacquard color selection and weft density, and the like, and is simple in structure, artificial intelligence display, automatic control, high in efficiency, and stable in system.

column2: GROUP EXERCISE TESTER BASED ON HUMAN BODY MOTION CAPTURE
column4: The invention discloses a group exercise tester based on human body motion capture, which relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and comprises a tester main body and a body test area arranged below the tester main body, a controller is arranged in the tester main body, and an image processor, a display screen and a printer which are electrically connected with the controller are arranged on the tester main body. A body test button, an audio input interface, a start key and a printing button which are electrically connected with the controller are arranged on the tester main body below the display screen, a test area is arranged on the outer side of the tester main body, and capture equipment and a positioning system which are electrically connected with the image processor are arranged in the test area; according to the method, data analysis and judgment are used, so that the tester is fair and more scientific in a match, and meanwhile, the break through in development of human motion is promoted.

column2: IDENTITY CARD IMAGE SHOOTING QUALITY EVALUATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, is applied to the field of smart cities, and relates to an identity card image shooting quality evaluation method, which comprises the steps of performing identity card region positioning on a to-be-detected image to obtain an identity card image, wherein the identity card image is an image of an identity card area externally connected with a rectangular area; cutting an identity card area image where an identity card area is located from the identity card image; cutting a first area where a human face is located in the identity card area image to serve as a head area image; and inputting the head region image into a trained head portrait quality evaluation network for quality detection to obtain an evaluation result. By adopting the method, the technical problems of misjudgment of head portrait quality evaluation and poor robustness easily caused by adverse factors such as different identity card shooting environments, complexity, variability, random noise and the like in the prior art are solved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXERCISE AUXILIARY EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model discloses artificial intelligence motion auxiliary equipment which comprises a motion platform, anti-skidding lines are fixedly installed on the upper surface of the motion platform, installation stand columns are fixedly installed on the positions, on the two sides of the anti-skidding lines, of the upper surface of the motion platform, and motion handrails are fixedly installed on the installation stand columns. A lifting mechanism is mounted at the edge of one end of the lower surface of the moving platform, a rotating mechanism is mounted at the edge of the other end of the lower surface of the moving platform, and the lifting mechanism comprises a movable sliding groove, a sliding block, a movable rotating shaft, a hydraulic push rod and a mounting base; the movable sliding groove is formed in the lower surface of the moving platform, a sliding block is movably installed in the movable sliding groove, a movable rotating shaft is fixedly installed on the sliding block, a hydraulic push rod is connected to the movable rotating shaft, and an installation base is fixedly installed at the tail end of the hydraulic push rod. The artificial intelligence exercise auxiliary equipment provided by the utility model can enable a patient to carry out rehabilitation training of various terrains.

column2: BEHAVIOR DETECTION METHOD, DEVICE AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides a video-based behavior detection method, device and system, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. According to the method, the recurrent neural network is trained by using the plurality of training videos and the marking information about whether the corresponding preset behaviors occur or not to obtain the preset behavior detection model, then the to-be-detected video frame sequence of the to-be-detected video is obtained, according to the to-be-detected skeleton key point coordinate of the corresponding detection object in each to-be-detected video frame, a skeleton key point coordinate sequence of the corresponding detection object in the to-be-detected video frame sequence is determined; the skeleton key point coordinate sequence of the detection object is input into the preset behavior detection model, the detection result whether the preset behavior of the detection object occurs or not is output, the detection object does not need to wear extra equipment, and the application range is wider.

column2: BUSHING INSULATION MOISTURE PREDICTION METHOD BASED ON FREQUENCY DOMAIN DIELECTRIC RESPONSE AND SUPPORT VECTOR MACHINE
column4: The invention relates to the field of bushing insulation state evaluation, and discloses a bushing insulation moisture prediction method based on frequency domain dielectric response and a support vector machine, which comprises the following steps: preparing paperboards with different aging and damp states; carrying out dielectric response test, moisture titration and cellulose polymerization degree detection on the oil-immersed paperboard; extracting characteristic parameters representing oil-immersed insulation water content, namely dielectric fingerprints D1-D4; carrying out fitting by taking the polymerization degree and the water content as independent variables and taking the characteristic quantity representing the dielectric fingerprint as a dependent variable, and constructing a fitting analysis model; constructing a training set of a genetic support vector machine by the fitting analysis model; and completing the training of the GA-SVM moisture diagnosis model. According to the invention, the frequency domain dielectric response technology and the artificial intelligence algorithm are used to realize the moisture diagnosis of the bushing insulation, and a reliable basis is provided for the judgment of the running state of the bushing. And the operation of the power system is more reliable, safer and more stable.

column2: INTELLIGENT WEARABLE DATA ACQUISITION EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model discloses an intelligent warehousing spare part video identification retrieval system, and belongs to the technical field of warehousing spare part logistics management. The intelligent warehousing part video recognition and retrieval system comprises a data acquisition function module, a web front-end function module and a background management function module, the data acquisition function module is used for information acquisition and uploading; the web front-end function module can retrieve key information of the parts, and visual information management is achieved. And the background management function module comprises a database and a data analysis function and is used for storing information such as images and videos sent back by the acquisition terminal and carrying out data analysis and user management. According to the intelligent warehousing part video recognition and retrieval system, aiming at a warehousing part warehouse-out and boxing business scene, video filing is carried out on an operation real condition through wearable equipment, artificial intelligence recognition is carried out on collected information, real-time retrieval and tracing of filing information records are supported, a client is helped to troubleshoot problems in a visual mode, and the intelligent warehousing part video recognition and retrieval system is convenient to use. And the storehouse operation process and the information transparency are enhanced. Therefore, cost reduction and efficiency improvement are realized, and a powerful reference is provided for adjusting and optimizing the business process.

column2: AUTOMATIC DISPENSING DETECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an automatic dispensing detection method and system. The method comprises the following steps: firstly carrying out the spectral analysis of glue and a detected steel sheet through an atlas imaging system with a broadband light source, obtaining the strongest reaction wavelength of the steel sheet and the glue, then irradiating the detected steel sheet through white light or a multi-wavelength shadowless lamp, shooting the measured steel sheet by using a map imaging system or a color camera, finding several proper wavelengths capable of enabling the ratio of the wave band light intensity of the glue to the wave band light intensity of the measured steel sheet to be glued to be larger, taking the ratios of the color channels corresponding to the several proper wavelengths to obtain an image of the maximum contrast of the glue and the measured steel sheet, and analyzing the dispensing condition on the tested steel sheet by utilizing artificial intelligence. The automatic dispensing detection system comprises the map imaging module, the color camera, a shadowless lighting module and a clamping module. According to the invention, the problem of dispensing is solved by combining spectral analysis and artificial intelligence for the first time, and the method can be applied to various dispensing scenes in industry and life.

column2: ILLEGAL SMOKING IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON ALPHAPOSE
column4: The invention discloses an illegal smoking recognition method based on AlphaPose, and belongs to the technical field of smoke detection. The method sequentially comprises the following steps that 1, installing monitoring for recording smoking on a construction site; 2, monitoring and shooting behavior characteristics of a person in the smoking process; 3, inputting an image in monitoring into the detection system; 4, detecting wrist joint points, nose coordinates and eye distances of the person in the input image by using a detection system; 5, recording the distance between the wrist joint point and the nose coordinate detected in the detection system; and 6, comparing the distance between the wrist joint point and the nose of the person with the multiple of the eye distance of the person, and if the distance between the wrist joint point and the nose of the person is smaller than the quadruple eye distance of the person, judging that smoking is performed. The problem of inaccurate detection caused by long distance and external factor interference in a traditional smoking detection mode is solved.

column2: VEHICLE LANE CHANGE DETECTION METHOD, ROADSIDE EQUIPMENT, CLOUD CONTROL PLATFORM AND PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The invention discloses a vehicle lane change detection method and device, particularly relates to artificial intelligence, and further relates to the technical field of intelligent transportation and image processing. The specific implementation mode comprises the steps of conducting object detection on a vehicle image collected by a camera, and obtaining two-dimensional vehicle information of a vehicle in the vehicle image; determining three-dimensional vehicle information corresponding to the two-dimensional vehicle information through a ground equation and parameters of the camera; and in response to the satisfaction of the detection condition, determining whether the vehicle changes lanes based on the lane position information and the three-dimensional vehicle information in the high-precision map, and obtaining a lane change detection result. Through the three-dimensional vehicle information, the problem of lane misjudgment caused by a large shooting angle of a two-dimensional vehicle image in the prior art can be solved, and the accuracy of vehicle lane change detection is effectively improved. And meanwhile, by utilizing the high-precision map, the accuracy of acquiring the lane position information is improved, and the accuracy of detecting the lane change of the vehicle is further improved.

column2: USER INTENTION MATCHING METHOD AND DEVICE, TERMINAL EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention is suitable for the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a user intention matching method and device, terminal equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a first question inputted by a user, and determining a keyword in the first question; according to the keyword, determining a to-be-interacted service name from a plurality of preset service names; running a target product interpretation module corresponding to the service name; determining a user intention in the first question in a target product interpretation module; determining reply information for the first question according to the user intention and answer information preset in a target product interpretation module; based on the information parameters of the user, determining a display mode of the reply information, the information parameters including at least one of user historical habits, a network environment and a user intention type; and displaying the reply information according to the display mode. By adopting the display mode in the method to display the reply information, the problem that a user is difficult to visually and accurately understand the target product can be solved.

column2: SYSTEM TO NOTIFY A REQUEST FOR HELP BY DETECTING AN INTENT TO PRESS A BUTTON, SAID SYSTEM USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
FALL PREVENTING DEVICE USING REAL-TIME MOTION TRACKING BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: A fall preventing method and apparatus using real-time motion tracking are disclosed. The fall preventing method using real-time motion tracking of the present invention includes a first step of tracking a user's movement using a motion recognition device and obtaining corresponding first skeleton information, a second step of determining whether the position of the predetermined joint of the user has deviated from a position corresponding to a preset first boundary region condition to a position corresponding to a preset second boundary region condition based on the first skeleton information, and a third step of transmitting a warning signal when the position of the predetermined joint is deviated based on a result of the determination. It is possible to accurately predict and prevent the risk of falls. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: REAL-TIME FINANCIAL AND PERFORMANCE SPORTS INDEX PLATFORM USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FOR PROFESSIONAL ATHLETES AND TEAMS
column4: A Financial and Performance Index system and process using artificial intelligence giving professional athletes and sport teams a measured real-time professional athlete contract value derived from machine learning algorithms that use historical and current performance data to monitor and project insights on current and future trajectory of professional athlete performance and development, team financials, contract negotiations, professional team placement, career development, professional team roster acquisition transactions. The system and process of the present disclosure that delivers transparency and balance with real-time financial and performance insights of professional athletes and teams throughout the season, previous seasons, and future seasons that they use to enhance the decision making process.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR HARDWARE SIMULATION AND EMULATION DURING RUNNING, AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: Provided are a method and apparatus for hardware simulation and emulation during running, and a computer device and a storage medium, wherein same are applied to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: acquiring a neural network structure graph and a neural network parameter (S101); constructing a corresponding neural network in a simulated manner according to the neural network structure graph (S102); acquiring data to be emulated, and quantizing the data according to quantization information to obtain emulation input data (S103), wherein the emulation input data and the neural network parameter are of the same hardware data type; inputting the neural network parameter and the emulation input data into the neural network for convolution calculation to obtain a convolution result (S104); and on the basis of the convolution result, obtaining an emulation result and outputting same (S105). Since data to be emulated is quantized to be of the same hardware data type as a neural network parameter, when software is used for emulation, a result of emulation calculation is closer to that of hardware calculation; and the data calculation amount of the hardware data type is less than the calculation amount of a floating-point type, such that the calculation speed of neural network emulation can also be increased.

column2: A SYSTEM TO NOTIFY A REQUEST FOR HELP BY DETECTING AN INTENT TO PRESS A BUTTON, SAID SYSTEM USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: There is provided a system configured to trigger system configured to trigger a function, said system comprising:- at least one actuator that is associated with said function;- an image capturing sensor;- a computing device comprising a data processor, and- a computer program product comprising a machine learning model trained for detecting an intent of a person to operate said at least one actuator,wherein said computer program product when running on said data processor:- receives at least one image from said image capturing sensor;- analyzes said at least one image, the analyzing comprises:- subjecting said at least one image to said machine learning model;- detecting presence of said intent to operate said at least one actuator in said at least one image, and- triggers said function upon detecting said intent.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FACE RECOGNITION SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence face recognition system comprising a face recognition mechanism and an electronic coded lock, a camera shoots the face and the environment in front of a recognition system main body and uploads the face and the environment to a shooting module, the shooting module transmits information to an analysis module, and the information is analyzed by the analysis module. If the face of a person who does not live in the house is not alarmed by the alarm module of the bee alarm controlled by the single-chip microcomputer, under the action of the alarm sound, the person who passes through the road can be reminded of paying attention, lawbreakers can be stimulated to give an alarm, further activities can be abandoned, information of the camera module can be stored by the single-chip microcomputer, and once the illegal phenomenon occurs. Information stored in the single-chip microcomputer can serve as a detection basis, the screws are in threaded connection with the hanging blocks and are installed through single screws, damage to a wall during installation of the recognition system body is reduced, the inner pad is arranged on the inner side of the outer pad, the recognition system body can be fixed preliminarily and stably, the stabilization effect of the recognition system body is improved, and installation of the screws is facilitated.

column2: METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT FOR GENERATING HUMAN BODY THREE-DIMENSIONAL MODEL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a method, device and equipment for generating a human body three-dimensional model and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to the field of deep learning and computer vision. The method comprises steps of receiving a single human body image, and extracting an SMPL human body three-dimensional model and a PIFu human body three-dimensional model corresponding to the human body image; matching the SIMPL human body three-dimensional model with the PIFu human body three-dimensional model to obtain a matching result; based on the matching result, determining the vertex of the SMPL human body three-dimensional model closest to the vertex of the PIFu human body three-dimensional model, and obtaining the binding weight of the vertex of the PIFu human body three-dimensional model and each skeleton point of the SMPL human body three-dimensional model; and outputting the drivable human body three-dimensional model. According to the method, cost of generating the human body three-dimensional model is reduced, and generation efficiency is improved.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR CONTROLLING SWITCHING OF VEHICLE DRIVING MODES
column4: The invention provides a method and a device for controlling switching of vehicle driving modes, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, automatic driving or intelligent driving, and can be applied to intelligent vehicles, networked vehicles and automatic driving vehicles. The method comprises the steps: acquiring environment information detected by a second vehicle, wherein the second vehicle is a vehicle running on a target road section, and the target road section is a road section located in front of the running direction of the first vehicle; predicting whether the target road section is suitable for automatic driving or not according to the environment information detected by the second vehicle; and if the target road section is not suitable for automatic driving and the first vehicle is currently in an automatic driving mode, reminding a driver of the first vehicle to take over the driving control right of the first vehicle, so that the first vehicle is switched from the automatic driving mode to a manual driving mode. According to the technical scheme, the real-time requirement for manual takeover in the automatic driving process can be effectively lowered, and the safety of automatic driving is improved.

column2: EXCEPTION HANDLING METHOD IN PARALLEL DRIVING, AUTOMATIC DRIVING VEHICLE AND CLOUD COCKPIT
column4: The invention discloses an exception handling method in parallel driving, an automatic driving vehicle and a cloud cockpit, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as automatic driving and intelligent traffic. According to the specific implementation scheme, in the vehicle driving process, actual values of multiple operation parameters are obtained in real time, and the multiple operation parameters comprise network state parameters and state parameters of vehicle-mounted equipment; reference values of the plurality of operating parameters are determined; and under the condition that the actual value of any operating parameter deviates from the corresponding reference value, the running speed of the vehicle is reduced. In the parallel driving process, network state parameters and/or state parameters of vehicle-mounted equipment are monitored in real time, when any operation parameter is abnormal, the running speed of the vehicle is adjusted, the running safety of the parallel driving vehicle is controlled from multiple angles, and therefore the running safety and reliability of the vehicle are greatly guaranteed.

column2: CODE TEST COVERAGE RATE DISPLAY METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, is applied to the technical field of code performance testing, and discloses a code test coverage rate display method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a main branch code corresponding to a functional branch code from a code warehouse management system; determining a full code of the functional branch and an incremental code of the main branch code; performing instrumentation processing on the total code of the function branch to obtain a test code file; testing the code file through a preset test case, and obtaining first running information when a first code of the full code is executed and second running information when a second code line of the incremental code is executed; obtaining a total code coverage rate when the first code line is executed by utilizing the first running information; utilizing the second running information to obtain an incremental code coverage rate when the second code line is executed; and displaying the full code coverage rate and the incremental code coverage rate in real time.

column2: PRODUCTION RISK INTELLIGENT PREDICTION AND EARLY WARNING METHOD BASED ON INDUSTRIAL BIG DATA
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of AI artificial intelligence, in particular to a production risk intelligent prediction and early warning method based on industrial big data. The method comprises the following seven steps: 1, selecting a process bit number capable of reflecting the running state of the device in one device unit; 2, collecting historical data of all bit numbers within specified time; 3, performing validity analysis on historical data; 4, calculating a bit number historical data distribution model; 5, calculating an abnormal value score of each row of data, wherein the abnormal value score is within [0.1]; 6, determining an abnormal value score threshold; and7, calculating an abnormal value score and trend of the real-time data. The invention provides a production risk intelligent prediction and early warning method based on industrial big data in order to solve the technical problem of risk prediction in operation of a production device.

column2: DEVICE FOR AUTOMATICALLY REPELLING ANIMALS ATTACKING INTELLIGENT SHOOTING ROBOT IN FIELD
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a device for automatically repelling animals attacking an intelligent shooting robot in field. The device comprises a shell, the upper end of the shell is movably connected with an upper cover, the lower end of the upper cover is fixedly connected with a connecting rod, the lower end of the connecting rod is fixedly connected with a pressure rod, the lower end of the pressure rod is movably connected with a compression spring, the lower end of the compression spring is fixedly connected with a guide rod, the lower end of the guide rod is movably connected with a triangular block, the right end of the triangular block is fixedly connected with a movable block, the lower end of the guide rod is movably connected with the movable block, and the lower end of the movable block is fixedly connected with an air bag. Through rightward movement of the triangular block, the guide rod moves downwards through the triangular block, and then pressure is exerted on the movable block, so that the movable block presses the air bag, the size of the air bag is reduced, internal irritant gas is sprayed outwards through an internal channel, and the effects of repelling the attacking animals and protecting equipment are achieved.

column2: VIRTUAL SCENE PARAMETER SELF-ADAPTION METHOD FOR RESTRAINING UPPER LIMB SHOULDER AND ELBOW REHABILITATION COMPENSATION
column4: The invention relates to a virtual scene parameter self-adaption method for restraining upper limb shoulder and elbow rehabilitation compensation, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The virtual scene parameter self-adaption method comprises the following steps of: collecting skeleton data of a patient through a visual capture sensor, matching the data with a model to realize that a somatosensory drive control role model participates in virtual rehabilitation training, and completing designed rehabilitation training actions by the patient according to target and trajectory guidance, visual feedback and the like in a virtual scene; collecting upper limb movement data of the patient through an inertial sensor, performing analyzing and calculating to obtain shoulder and elbow joint angles, a spinal column inclination angle and the like, monitoring and judging a compensation movement condition of the patient according to angle parameters, and further adaptively adjusting scene parameters to map in a virtual scene rehabilitation training process; and extracting time domain and frequency domain features, and inputting the time domain and frequency domain features into a support vector machine together with related motion feature parameters, so that the motion function of the patient is evaluated. By means of the method, effective restraining of compensation movement in the movement function rehabilitation training process is finally achieved.

column2: 3D INTELLIGENT PRINTING EYE ACUPOINT MASSAGE DEVICE
column4: The 3D intelligent printing eye acupoint massage device is characterized in that a main machine is connected with an elastic head band, a connector male head is arranged on the arc inner wall of the main machine, a 3D printing base is integrally printed through a 3D printer, a connector female head is arranged on the arc outer wall of the 3D printing base, the connector male head is detachably connected with the connector female head, and the connector female head is detachably connected with the connector male head. The 3D printing base is provided with a plurality of 3D printing massage heads, each massage head corresponds to an eye acupoint, and the inner wall of the 3D printing base is sleeved with wrapping cloth. The 3D printing base is used for conducting directional massage on the eye acupoints (such as a fish waist acupoint and a Tongzi Baliao acupoint), the use experience is better, and the 3D printing massage effect is better. The effect of really replacing eye exercise is achieved, and the device achieves personalized private customization training through wireless data interconnection and an iterative artificial intelligence technology.

column2: HUMAN ACTION RECOGNITION METHOD BASED ON GRAPH CONVOLUTIONAL NEURAL NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses a human motion recognition method based on a graph convolutional neural network. The human motion recognition method comprises the steps: preparing human motion video data, carrying out the labeling, and labeling a video label according to different types of motions; extracting skeleton key point features of the human action video data by using an openpose attitude estimation algorithm, then calculating the change speed of skeleton key points of adjacent frames through a skeleton point mainstream network, and performing feature splicing; screening the bone key points, calculating included angles of the screened bone key points through an angle branch network, and performing feature splicing; transmitting the spliced data into a graph neural network; extending the graph convolution from a spatial domain to a time domain; enhancing the performance of the network by using a cross attention model; and performing human action recognition. The method can recognize and output the action represented by the human beings in the input video, has good usability and robustness, and lays a certain foundation for the actual landing of the artificial intelligence technology in the action recognition field.

column2: SKELETON SCREEN GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON PICTURE RECOGNITION, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a skeleton screen generation method and device based on picture recognition, equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a screenshot corresponding to a page loaded with real data; performing OCR on the screenshot to obtain region coordinate information corresponding to the page elements; and automatically generating a skeleton screen according to the regional coordinate information. In combination with the characteristics of simple layout and single style of the skeleton screen, the picture recognition technology is adopted to recognize the page loaded with the real data to obtain the region coordinate information corresponding to the page element, and then the skeleton screen is automatically generated, so the consistency of the skeleton screen structure and the page structure is ensured, the skeleton screen development process is simplified, and the development efficiency is improved. The development and maintenance cost is reduced; skeleton screen codes do not need to be written manually, and code structure analysis and configuration are not needed; the framework screen code is clear and reasonable in structure and small in size; therefore, the white screen time is greatly reduced, the page loading experience is optimized, and the user experience is improved.

column2: VOICE RECOGNITION CONTROL METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The present disclosure discloses a voice recognition control method and apparatus, an electronic device and a readable storage medium, which is a field of artificial intelligence and voice recognition. According to a specific embodiment of the present invention, the voice recognition control method includes the steps of: querying configuration information of a first operation state to determine whether the first operation state is applicable to a target scene, when being detected that an application program interface related to the target scene has been called; switching the running second operating state to the first operating state, collecting the audio clip according to a wake-up word in the second operating state and performing voice recognition of an audio clip, when the target scene is applied to the first operating state; and continuously collecting audio to obtain an audio stream in a first operating state to perform voice recognition of the audio stream. According to the present invention, the user sets a scene to trigger the first operating state according to his/her own demand to meet personalization needs of different users, and furthermore, since the device is controlled to enter the first operating state only when the target scene is applied to the first operating state, disturbance to the user can be reduced, and user experience may be improved. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DISPLAY CABINET
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence display cabinet which comprises a cabinet body frame, the cabinet body frame comprises a drawer main body, a platform layer and vertical supports, and the drawer main body and the platform layer are parallel to each other and are respectively connected with the vertical supports; a horizontal screen is arranged on the upper surface of the platform layer, an electric cabinet is fixed to the lower surface, and a first camera with the shooting direction facing backwards is arranged on the front side; an auxiliary bracket is connected above the vertical bracket; a second camera, an illuminating lamp and a microphone are arranged at the top end of the auxiliary bracket; a backboard screen and a third camera are further fixed to the vertical support, the second camera and the third camera are located on the upper portion and the lower portion of the backboard screen respectively, and the shooting direction of the second camera and the shooting direction of the third camera face forwards. And the first camera, the second camera, the third camera, the microphone and the illuminating lamp are respectively connected with the electric cabinet. The artificial intelligence display cabinet provided by the utility model is convenient for better exhibit and exhibit information, and provides better interactive experience for clients.

column2: ENERGY-SAVING FIELD CAMERA EQUIPMENT WITH WILD ANIMAL DRIVING FUNCTION
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to energy-saving field camera equipment with a wild animal driving function, which comprises a shell, the outer surface of the shell is slidably connected with a bearing block, the interior of the bearing block is fixedly connected with a nozzle, and the outer surface of the shell is fixedly connected with a limiting wheel; wherein a fixing frame is fixedly connected to the interior of the shell, a supporting seat is fixedly connected to the lower surface of the fixing frame, the bottom end of the supporting seat is fixedly connected with the inner surface of the shell, and a connecting frame is fixedly connected to the inner surface of the shell. When a piston slides in the fixing shell to compress the inner space of the fixing shell, the pressure intensity of the compressed space in the fixing shell is increased, non-toxic and harmless irritant gas in the fixed shell is sprayed outwards by a nozzle in a bearing block under the action of the pressure intensity to repel wild animals, and wild animals are prevented from damaging camera shooting equipment; and meanwhile, shooting work of the camera shooting equipment is ensured.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CAMERA DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence camera shooting device, relates to a camera shooting device, solves the problems that a large amount of working time of camera shooting personnel is consumed and the labor intensity of the working personnel is large, and adopts the technical scheme that the artificial intelligence camera shooting device comprises a main body box, a driving motor is fixedly installed at the end, located on the lower side of the partition plate, in the main body box, an output shaft of the driving motor penetrates through the partition plate, a driving gear is fixedly installed on an output shaft of the driving motor, and a matching gear meshed with the driving gear is arranged at the end, located on the upper side of the partition plate, in the main body box; an upper fixing pin column is fixedly mounted in the center of the matching gear, and the upper end of the upper fixing pin column penetrates through the upper surface of the main body box; different camera shooting angles can be changed according to the moving track, the working intensity of camera shooting personnel is reduced, the intelligent adjusting effect is achieved, and the camera shooting device is convenient and direct to use.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED SYSTEM AND DEVICE OF MOVABLE CONTAINER SWIMMING POOL FOR SURVIVAL SWIMMING EDUCATION
column4: According to an embodiment of the present invention, a control system of a swimming pool comprises: the swimming pool formed in a movable container; and a control device controlling conditions of the swimming pool related to water stored in an inner space of the swimming pool. The conditions of the swimming pool comprise a water quality, water temperature, and a water level of the water of the swimming pool. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: DATA ANTI-INTRUSION METHOD BASED ON BIG DATA AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND BIG DATA SERVER
column4: The invention relates to a data anti-intrusion method based on big data and artificial intelligence and a big data server, which can analyze different intrusion interception records, determine an interception event set corresponding to each group of intrusion interception records, and determine at least one group of interception behavior data; therefore, the intrusion attack category of the to-be-analyzed interception event is analyzed. The number of the to-be-analyzed interception events can be multiple, and different intrusion attack categories can be determined as many as possible so as to update the firewall based on the intrusion attack categories and the intrusion interception records. According to the method, the intrusion interception record can be analyzed in an interception operation level, so that intrusion attacks and firewall interception running states are analyzed, intelligent adaptation upgrading and optimization of the firewall can be realized, an interception mechanism of the firewall is prevented from being in an invariable state for a long time, the intrusion defense performance of the firewall can be improved, the interception mechanism of the firewall is prevented from being broken in the later operation process, and the reliability of data intrusion protection is ensured.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE AND FOR REALIZING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INTERPRETABILITY, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a method and device and for realizing artificial intelligence interpretability, equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: firstly, receiving to-be-interpreted data corresponding to a target artificial intelligence AI model; wherein the to-be-interpreted data comprises feature data and/or model data, and pre-estimated data; secondly, determining an interpretation operator matched with the to-be-interpreted data, and finally, running the interpretation operator to interpret the to-be-interpreted data to obtain an interpretation result. According to the embodiment of the invention, the interpretation result can be provided for the to-be-interpreted data corresponding to the target AI model, and artificial intelligence interpretability is realized. Besides, the user can design an artificial intelligence interpretable method by himself/herself on the basis of artificial intelligence interpretable requirements, the artificial intelligence interpretable method is used for interpreting the to-be-interpreted data of the target AI model, and the flexibility of the artificial intelligence interpretable method is improved.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR SHUTTING DOWN JUPYTER NOTEBOOK OPERATION SYSTEM BASED ON K8S
column4: The invention discloses a method and device for shutting down a Jupyter Notebook operation system based on k8s. The method comprises the following steps of: realizing a Jupyter Notebook management platform based on a back-end function; and enabling the Jupyter Notebook management platform and the Jupyter Notebook to perform interface calling through a REST API, and carrying out data storage and task protection monitoring. According to the method and the device, the pre-data storage and the running program safety protection can be carried out when a container is stopped, and the completeness of a working result is stored to the greatest extent.

column2: OPTIMAL SINGLE-RELAY DISTRIBUTED OPPORTUNISTIC CHANNEL ACCESS METHOD UNDER DELAY CONSTRAINT
column4: The invention discloses an optimal single-relay distributed opportunistic channel access method under delay constraint. The method comprises the following steps that: each information source competesfor a channel, when only one information source exists, the information source obtains a channel access opportunity, otherwise, all the information sources restart channel competition; after the information source i competes successfully, the relay receives the RTS packet sent by the information source i, calculates the channel quality from the information source i to the relay, then sends the RTSpacket to the information sink i, the information sink i replies to the relay after receiving the RTS packet, and the relay node calculates the channel quality from the relay to the information sinki; the relay node feeds back all information to a signal source i, and the signal source i calculates the maximum transmissible rate and makes a decision: selecting an access channel, and selecting anoptimal single relay capable of reaching the maximum rate to perform channel access by the signal source i; otherwise, the information source i gives up the channel opportunity, and all the information sources compete for the channel again. According to the method, the user diversity and the time diversity are fully utilized, and the system throughput and the spectrum utilization rate are effectively improved.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR IDENTIFYING FOOD CALORIES AND CALCULATING EXERCISE STEPS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to a method for identifying food calories and calculating exercise steps based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a target image; wherein the target image comprises food and a container for containing the food; respectively inputting the target image into a first artificial intelligence identification model and a second artificialintelligence identification model; outputting food identification data through the first artificial intelligence identification model, and outputting container identification data through the second artificial intelligence identification model; calculating food caloric information according to the food identification data and the container identification data; collecting user information, and calculating the number of exercise steps according to the user information and the food caloric information. The food heat is calculated according to the type of the food and the size of the container containing the food, the accuracy of food heat calculation is improved, the exercise step number is calculated according to the user information and the food heat, and the pertinence of exercise step number calculation can be improved.

column2: METHOD FOR ACHIEVING PLUGGABLE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VISUALIZATION
column4: The invention relates to a method for achieving pluggable artificial intelligence visualization, which comprises the following steps of: achieving data calculation and control output display content of a corresponding newly added application module based on a python code, and encapsulating different application modules into different files; constructing a data interaction module based on the javacode, achieving data transfer of the corresponding newly added application module, and achieving a data interaction channel between the database and the front end; and enabling the front end part to adaptively display a chart according to result data of data calculation to achieve visual display of the data of the corresponding newly added application module. When a new application module needs tobe added, only the database needs to be modified, and the new application module is added to the python end. Due to the fact that python is a scripting language, an interpreter is not needed in the running process, a server does not need to be restarted in deployment of python, and normal use of the algorithm is not affected at all.

column2: HOUSEHOLD DOOR ANTI-THEFT SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a household door anti-theft system based on artificial intelligence. The household door anti-theft system comprises a palm information acquisition unit, a data accumulation unit, a real-time comparison unit, a data integration unit, a fingerprint identification unit, a random decimation unit, a processor, a display unit, a storage unit, a pressure detection unit, a diving analysis unit, an intelligent device and an alarm unit. Palm information is acquired through a palm information acquisition unit, the palm information comprises a fingerprint information group and fingerprint information, the fingerprint information group refers to fingerprints of five fingers, and the fingerprint information is a fingerprint image of a palm of a user pressed on the palm information acquisition unit; the palm information acquisition unit is used for transmitting palm information to the fingerprint identification unit when acquiring the palm information, the palm information acquisition unit is used for transmitting an extraction signal to the random extraction unit when acquiring the palm information, the random extraction unit enters extraction analysis when receiving theextraction signal transmitted by the palm information acquisition unit, and through related algorithms and rules, it is automatically judged which two fingers have fingerprints to be verified at the moment.

column2: MONITORING AND ANALYZING BODY LANGUAGE WITH MACHINE LEARNING, USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEMS FOR IMPROVING INTERACTION BETWEEN HUMANS, AND HUMANS AND ROBOTS
column4: A body language system for determining a body language message of a living being in a context comprising an artificial intelligence system, said AI system running a computer program that: retrieves an image of said living being showing body language; labels said living being in said image, resulting in a labeled living being; determines said context from said image using a trained machine learning model; determines a baseline body language of said labeled living being from said image using a trained machine learning model; adapts a trained machine learning model of said AI system using said baseline body language and said context; applies the adapted trained machine learning model of said AI system to the one image for categorizing said body language resulting in a category, and applying said category for determining said body language message.

column2: CLOUD APPLICATION SCALER
column4: A system includes a processing system and a memory system. The memory system stores instructions for identifying a cloud application in a cloud environment as a non-disposable application and monitoring a plurality of instances of the non-disposable application running in the cloud environment. The instructions when executed by the processing system further result in determining that a number of the instances of the non-disposable application should be modified based on one or more demand predictions by an artificial intelligence scaler, adjusting the number of the instances of the non-disposable application running in the cloud environment based on the one or more demand predictions, and modifying an allocation of one or more resources of the cloud environment associated with adjusting the number of the instances of the non-disposable application.

column2: EXERCISING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BY REFINING MODEL OUTPUT
column4: The improved exercise of artificial intelligence. Raw output data is obtained by applying an input data set to an artificial intelligence (AI). Such raw output data is sometimes difficult to interpret. The principles defined herein provide a systematic way to refine the output for a wide variety of AI models. An AI model collection characterization structure is utilized for purpose of refining AI model output so as to be more useful. The characterization structure represents, for each of multiple and perhaps numerous AI models, a refinement of output data that resulted from application of an AI model to input data. Upon obtaining output data from the AI model, the appropriate refinement may then be applied. The refined data may then be semantically indexed to provide a semantic index. The characterization structure may also provide tailored information to allow for intuitive querying against the semantic index.

column2: MACHINE VISION EXPERIMENT TEACHING PLATFORM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a machine vision experiment teaching platform based on artificial intelligence, which structurally comprises a workbench, and is characterized in that an auxiliary mechanism is arranged at the upper end of a fixed plate, a first handle is rotated, and a limiting ball is in running fit with a first fixed block, so that a sliding block slides at the front end of a base; the fixing device is arranged in the middle of the front end of the limiting rod, and the second handle is rotated clockwise, so that the threaded rod is matched with the shell, and the pressing plateis used for fixing the connecting rod at the rear end of the camera, so that the angle of the camera is adjusted, the adjusting process is simplified, and the delay of experiment teaching time is avoided. The advantage of avoiding displacement in the rotating process is achieved.

column2: EQUIPMENT INTERACTION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an equipment interaction method and device, and relates to an artificial intelligence technology. According to the specific implementation scheme, first equipment monitors a sound signal; a first interaction action is executed according to the monitored sound signal; if the sound signal is not monitored, the first equipment judges whether an object exists in a preset visualfield range or not according to the shot image frame; and if so, a second interaction action is executed according to the shot image frame. Through sound monitoring and image frame shooting, monitoring of a user is cooperatively realized from two aspects of auditory sense and visual sense, so that the accuracy of monitoring the user can be effectively improved, and since the shooting range of thecamera is limited, a sound collection device is firstly used for sound monitoring, and the user monitoring efficiency and success rate can be further improved.

column2: DEEP LEARNING DEVELOPMENT PLATFORM RESOURCE ALLOCATION METHOD AND EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a deep learning development platform resource allocation method, belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and solves the problem that an inference service of a deep learning development platform in an existing scheme does not support MLU resources. The method comprises the steps of: obtaining mirror image data, wherein the mirror image data comprise a preset model running environment, a preset model and a WEB service framework with a service starting command; judging the data type of the mirror image data according to the mirror imagedata; creating an inference service container based on the data type; and allocating system MLU resources to the reasoning service container to obtain a reasoning service of the mirror image data.

column2: CAD MODEL PROCESSING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a CAD model processing system, and the system comprises a digital measurement shooting module for measuring the morphology of an object based on a digital measurement mode, acquiring data and a view of the object, and recording coordinate information of a measurement point; a conversion module which is connected with the digital measurement module and is used for expressingthe coordinate information of the measurement point, the corresponding measurement information, the measurement equipment information corresponding to the measurement data, the function information of the measured object, the overall feature information of the measured object, the local geometrical feature information or the measurement environment information into semantic information by utilizing a semantic information model; and an analysis module which is connected with the digital measurement module and the conversion module and is used for receiving coordinate information and semantic information of the measurement points. According to the invention, the CAD model processing system can be suitable for wps.

column2: VIRTUAL IMAGE DRIVING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT, MEDIUM AND PROGRAM PRODUCT
column4: The invention discloses a virtual image driving method and device, equipment, a medium and a program product, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as computer vision, augmented reality and deep learning. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps of obtaining to-be-processed pose data when a virtual image is adopted to simulate a target image; converting easily-lost data in the to-be-processed pose data into non-easily-lost data to obtain target pose data; and determining a skeleton driving coefficient according to the target pose data, wherein the skeleton driving coefficient is used for driving a skinned skeleton model of the virtual image. According to the invention, the accuracy of the skin skeleton model driving resultis improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MAHJONG MACHINE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence mahjong machine which comprises a mahjong machine body and further comprises an embedded or special computer system, a camera and display screens. The camera is arranged at the position, convenient for collecting an unshielded image or video and convenient for collecting the unshielded image or video after being combined, of the mahjong table, andis used for collecting tile surface information, tile playing information and tile taking information of whole tiles of players; the four display screens are arranged at the four positions of the mahjong table respectively and used for players located on the four sides to operate and watch independently. Information collected by the camera is sent to the computer system, the computer system extracts images and videos, image recognition, action recognition and scene recognition are carried out through algorithms running on the computer system, and recognition results are sent to the computer system. Software running on the computer system judges whether the tile face information of the players conforms to the game rule or not according to the preset game rule, if so, reminders corresponding to the rule are sent to display screens and mobile phones of the players or a voice reminding is carried out, and if winning happens, the number of times is calculated, and the players's performanceis counted.

column2: ONLINE WORSHIP SYSTEM
column4: The present invention is an online worship system which allows all members of a church to worship together in members own space by allowing a video of worship photographed through an administrator terminal to be displayed on a screen of a user terminal and at the same time to display materials necessary for the worship. According to the present invention, the online worship system comprises: an administrator terminal photographing a real-time video with a program for online worship installed to transmit the same to the outside, but recognizing registered managers voice to analyze the same through artificial intelligence, and then transmitting analysis data by the analysis to the outside; a management server receiving the video transmitted from the administrator terminal to relay the same to a user terminal, but generating worship data in accordance with reception of the analysis data to provide the same to the user terminal along with the video; and a user terminal receiving the video transmitted from the management server with the program for online worship installed or receiving worship materials together to provide the same to a user. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: SECURITY CAMERA BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a security camera based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a frame body and further comprises a first fixing box detachably inserted into an inner cavity in the middle of the bottom end of the frame body, a second fixing box detachably inserted into an inner cavity in the middle of the bottom end of the frame body; the two limiting strips are fixedly arranged on the front side and the rear side of the first fixing box respectively; the second fixing box is arranged at the bottom end of the first fixing box in the mode that the second fixing box can rotate around the axis of the second fixing box. And the wide-angle camera is fixedly mounted in the middle of the bottom end of the second fixing box. According to the security camera based on artificial intelligence, the installation difficulty of installation personnel is reduced, the danger degree of the installation personnel is reduced, meanwhile, the device is easy and convenient to install and detach, whether someone enters a shooting range or not can be intelligently judged, a user is informed in real time, and serious consequences are avoided; therefore, a user can have sufficient time to save loss and provide powerful evidences.

column2: NETWORK ANTI-ATTACK SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a network anti-attack system and method based on artificial intelligence, and the system is provided with a network attack information collection module which is used for monitoring and extracting network attack information; a network attack database, wherein attack data is set and collected; a risk IP address collection library which is set and used for comparing and judging whether the access IP is abnormal or not; a virtual simulation operation module which is arranged to execute the operation instruction, perform virtual operation and judge whether the operation instruction is abnormal or not; and an attack interception module which is arranged to prevent an execution instruction and give an alarm. The method comprises the following steps: 1, collecting networkinformation, comparing the network information with a network attack database, and entering the next step if abnormality occurs; 2, running the network execution instruction or the network informationdata in a virtual simulation running module, giving an evaluation conclusion, entering step 3 if the result is abnormal, and entering step 3 if the result is normal; 3, identifying an IP address, comparing the IP address with the risk IP address collection library, and entering the next step if the IP address belongs to the risk IP address; and 4, stopping and giving an alarm.

column2: PEDESTRIAN FLOW STATISTICS METHOD, SYSTEM AND DEVICE BASED ON PEDESTRIAN RE-IDENTIFICATION AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a pedestrian flow statistics method, system and device based on pedestrian re-identification, and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps of delimiting a target range from a video flow of a shooting open area; counting the total number of people in the target range, and obtaining a people flow counting initial value; performing pedestrian repositioning onpedestrians in the video stream to obtain a pedestrian tracking result; and obtaining a pedestrian flow statistics result through the pedestrian tracking result and the pedestrian flow statistics initial value. According to the method, the number of people flowing into the boundary is counted in a boundary delimiting mode, and the problem of repeated people counting in the open area is solved bycombining pedestrian re-identification and boundary crossing detection.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BODY DIAGNOSIS DEVICE BASED ON HOLOGRAPHIC PROJECTION
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of medical instruments, and discloses an artificial intelligence body diagnosis device based on holographic projection, which comprises a mounting plate, a driving motor is mounted on the left side of the top end of the mounting plate, a first gear is mounted on an output shaft of the driving motor, and movable sleeves are mounted on two sides of the bottom end of the mounting plate. The driving motor drives the first gear to rotate, so that the second gear is meshed with the first gear to drive the threaded rod to rotate, the threaded sleeve can be driven to move left and right, the movable frame can be driven to move to a designated position, a shot picture can be transmitted into a display instrument in real time through the camera, and the display instrument is convenient to use. The limiting baffle can be adjusted by controlling the rotation of the driving motor by a user, and then the electric push rod drives the connecting plate to move, so that the holographic shooting equipment can shoot an image of a body in a close range, and a shot picture can be projected to a designated position through a holographic technology.

column2: INTERNET ACCESS BEHAVIOR RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTING EQUIPMENT AND COMPUTER STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an Internet access behavior recognition method and device, computing equipment and a computer storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: controlling the Internet access equipment to access target application software, so as to obtain Internet access behavior data, wherein the Internet surfing behavior data comprises Internet access feature information and an access type corresponding to the Internet access feature information; encoding the Internet access feature informationand the access type corresponding to the Internet access feature information to obtain training data; training a deep neural network model according to the training data to obtain an identification model; and identifying the Internet access behavior of the user according to the identification model. By means of the mode, the Internet access behavior data of the user is automatically obtained, andthe Internet access behavior of the user is recognized by training the identification model.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of monitoring equipment, in particular to artificial intelligence monitoring equipment which comprises a monitoring equipment body and a servo motor, aprotective cover is fixedly installed on the surface of the monitoring equipment body, a clamping block is fixedly connected to the top end of the monitoring equipment body, and the servo motor is fixedly installed in the clamping block. A first bevel gear is fixedly connected to the side face of the servo motor, a connecting rod is fixedly inserted into the clamping block, a second bevel gear isfixedly connected to the bottom end of the connecting rod, the top end of the connecting rod is fixedly inserted into the shell, and a first shaft rod is fixedly inserted into the shell. The monitoring equipment is provided with the first fixing block and the second fixing block, so that the monitoring equipment body is more stable, the clamping block is driven to rotate through the operation ofthe servo motor, the monitoring equipment body can conveniently rotate to adjust the shooting angle of the monitoring equipment body, and the operation is very simple.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses an image processing method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as computer vision, deep learning and augmented reality. According to the specific implementation scheme, when a target skeleton driving coefficient used for generating a target image is determined, N preset skeleton driving coefficients are optimized through weight coefficients corresponding to N BlendShape models according to a to-be-processed image and the N BlendShape models, therefore, the optimized target skeleton driving coefficient corresponding to each node in the basal skin skeleton model describes the characteristics of the face image, and the problem that the skeleton driving coefficient matched with the face image cannot beobtained in the prior art is solved. Moreover, when the skeleton driving model generated based on the optimized target skeleton driving coefficient is rendered, the generated animation head portrait is closer to a real face image.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DETERMINING SERVICE ALGORITHM, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a system and method for determining a service algorithm, computer equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. Based on the system provided by the embodiment of the invention, for the first service algorithm for the first shooting scene, the model in the first service algorithm can be trained based on the algorithm analysis data of the image collected in the second shooting scene by the first service algorithm to obtain the updated second service algorithm; therefore, the service algorithm can continuously adapt to a new shooting scene, and the service algorithm can continuously meet new service requirements. Namely, the embodiment of the invention provides a system capable of autonomously learning,and the system can continuously and automatically update a service algorithm based on a new scene.

column2: IMAGE DEFINITION CALCULATION METHOD, EQUIPMENT AND COMPUTER EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an image definition calculation method, which comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-analyzed image; judging whether theimage size of the to-be-analyzed image is consistent with a preset size or not; if not, normalizing the image size of the to-be-analyzed image to be consistent with the preset size; converting the to-be-analyzed image subjected to image size normalization processing into a grayscale image; through a Canny operator and a local dynamic binarization algorithm, respectively extracting edge points of the grayscale image; and calculating the image definition according to the intersection and union set of the edge points respectively extracted by the Canny operator and the local dynamic binarizationalgorithm. Through image size normalization, all to-be-analyzed images are normalized to the same size so as to adapt to images obtained by different shooting equipments in different scenes, edge point calculation definition is extracted through two methods, accuracy is improved, and good scene consistency and equipment consistency are achieved.

column2: HOUSEHOLD SYSTEM WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LEARNING FUNCTION BASED ON ESP32 MODULE
column4: The utility model discloses a household system with an artificial intelligence learning function based on an ESP32 module, which comprises a core control module, the input end of the core control module is electrically connected with a sensor module, the output end of the core control module is electrically connected with a Web server, and the output end of the Web server is electrically connectedwith a WebHTML module. Multi-source control is adopted, namely key module control, Web webpage remote control and system automatic control are combined, the Web webpage remote control refers to thatafter leaving a server, a user logs in a website running on a specific server through the Internet, can check and manage running of indoor electric appliances, can easily turn on the website, and canconveniently and quickly control the operation of the indoor electric appliances, so that the user experience is improved. According to the intelligent home control system, the function of remote control is achieved by turning off and controlling electric appliances in the home, and meanwhile the problems that various kinds of control cannot be conducted and the current market requirements cannotbe met when the current intelligent home is controlled through a wireless network are solved.

column2: DIGITAL PLATFORM TO IDENTIFY HEALTH CONDITIONS AND THERAPEUTIC INTERVENTIONS USING AN AUTOMATIC AND DISTRIBUTED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM
column4: This disclosure is directed to method and system for automatic, distributed, computer-aided, and intelligent data collection/analytics, health monitoring, health condition identification, and patient preventive/remedial health advocacy. The system integrates (1) distributed patient health data collection devices, (2) centralized or distributed data servers running various intelligent and predictive data analytics engines for health screening, assessment, patient health condition identification, and patient preventive/remedial health advocacy, 3) specifically designed data structures including quantized health indicator vectors, patient health condition identification matrices and patient health condition vectors, (4) portal servers configured to interface with (5) distributed physician terminal devices and (6) distributed patient terminal devices for delivering health condition identification, health interventions and patient preventive/remedial health advocacy, and for monitoring and tracking patient activities. The various intelligent and predictive engines are configured to learn and extract hidden features and correlations from a large amount of data obtained from the distributed data collection devices.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ASSISTED PRODUCTION ADVISORY SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: A method includes receiving first data and building a first model of a well based at least partially upon the first data. The method also includes receiving second data and building a second model including a network of flowlines based at least partially upon the second data. At least one of the flowlines is connected to the well. The method also includes combining the first model and the second model to produce a combined model. The method also includes calibrating the combined model to produce a calibrated model. Calibrating the combined model includes receiving measured data, running a simulation of the combined model to produce simulated results, and adjusting a calibration parameter to cause the simulated results to match the measured data. The calibration parameter includes a productivity index of a fluid flowing out of the well. The method also includes updating the calibrated model to produce an updated model.

column2: LASER RADAR AND CAMERA FUSED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ORE IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a laser radar and camera fused artificial intelligence ore identification method and device, and the method and device are higher in applicability and are good in real-time performance. According to the specific scheme, ore is placed on a conveying belt running at a constant speed; a two-dimensional laser radar is adopted to emit a laser signal to the ore, and point cloud data information of the ore is acquired according to an ore return signal, wherein the point cloud data information comprises a distance point cloud and a reflectivity point cloud. A linear array camera is matched with an illumination light source to collect camera images of ores. Pixel-level fusion is performed on the point cloud data information of the ore and the camera image to obtain a three-channel image of the ore, wherein the three channels are respectively a gray value channel, a distance point cloud channel and a reflectivity point cloud channel. The three-channel image of the ore isnormalized, eliminating an interference background is eliminated, denoising processing is performed, texture features, three-dimensional shape features and gray features are extracted, and the extracted features are identified by using a convolutional neural network to obtain an ore identification result.

column2: MERCHANT-ORIENTED QUALIFICATION AUTHENTICATION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a merchant-oriented qualification authentication method, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence optical character recognition. The method comprises the following steps of: filtering an image by shooting a shop advertising board to eliminate noise mixed in the image; detecting characters in the image by adopting a character detection model, determiningcoordinate areas of the characters in the image, identifying the characters in each coordinate area by adopting a character identification model, and extracting store names in the characters by adopting named entity identification; and meanwhile, by means of position information of the store, positioning the merchant in the database, and obtaining the identity information and the business information of the employee of the store. According to the invention, shop names can be quickly identified, employee information can be quickly inquired, employee qualification can be quickly checked, unlicensed operation can be completely eradicated, and the enforcement ability of law enforcement officers can be comprehensively improved.

column2: IMAGE RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE, TERMINAL EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
