column4: The invention is applicable to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides an image recognition method and device, terminal equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining running states of a target image recognition model and a non-target image recognition model; if the operation state of the non-target image recognition model is in operation and the operation state of the target image recognition model is not in operation, stopping the operation of the non-target image recognition model, and operating the target image recognition model toperform image recognition on the to-be-recognized image to obtain an image recognition result; if the operation states of the non-target image recognition models are not operated and the operation state of the target image recognition model is in operation, sending an image reset prompt; and if a determination instruction is received, indicating the target image recognition model to perform imagerecognition on the to-be-recognized image to obtain an image recognition result. According to the method, the image recognition model corresponding to the recognition effect can be automatically selected according to the requirements of the user, the image recognition operation of the user is facilitated, and the image recognition efficiency is improved.

column2: CABLE CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a cable climbing robot. The cable climbing robot is used for reducing damage of the cable climbing robot to the surface of a cable and improving the detectionefficiency of the cable climbing robot. An embodiment of the invention comprises: a main body frame; the duct propeller is mounted on the outer side of the main body rack around the main body rack; the enclasping unit comprises an enclasping motor, an enclasping transmission part and an enclasping part, the enclasping motor is fixedly installed on the main body rack, and the enclasping motor drives the enclasping part through the enclasping transmission part so that the enclasping part can enclasping the cable; and the control module is mounted on the main body rack, is electrically connectedwith the duct propeller and the enclasping motor respectively and is used for controlling the duct propeller and the enclasping motor to work.

column2: TRAFFIC FLOW STATISTICS METHOD AND DEVICE, ROADSIDE EQUIPMENT AND CLOUD CONTROL PLATFORM
column4: The invention discloses a traffic flow statistics method and device, roadside equipment and a cloud control platform, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of intelligent traffic. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps of obtaining images, collected according to preset frequency in a preset time period, ofa vehicle running on a road; detecting each acquired image to obtain a position area of each vehicle in each image and position areas of at least three ground reference objects; and based on the position area of each vehicle in each image and the position area of each ground reference object in the at least three ground reference objects, carrying out statistics on the traffic flow of the road ina preset time period. According to the embodiment of the invention, the method can achieve the more accurate statistics of the traffic flow on the road, prevents the shielding and missing measurement, and can effectively improve the traffic flow statistics accuracy.

column2: CABLE CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a cable climbing robot which is used for reducing damage of the cable climbing robot to the surface of a cable, improving the detection efficiency and improving the quality range of carrying various devices. The climbing robot comprises a climbing front body and a detection body, the climbing front body comprises a front body rack, a duct propeller, a front body holding unit and a front body control module. The duct propeller is mounted on the outer side of the front body rack around the front body rack; the front body clasping unit comprises a front body clasping motor, a front body clasping transmission part and a front body clasping part, the front body clasping motor is fixedly installed on the front body rack, and the front body clasping motordrives the front body clasping part through the front body clasping transmission part, so that the front body clasping part clasps the cable; the front body control module is mounted on the front body rack, is electrically connected with the duct propeller and the holding motor respectively, and is used for controlling the duct propeller and the front body holding motor to work; the detection body is used for climbing along with the climbing front body and detecting the cable.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXERCISE GUIDANCE AUXILIARY EQUIPMENT FOR DIABETIC POPULATION
column4: The invention discloses artificial intelligence exercise guidance auxiliary equipment for diabetic population. The auxiliary equipment comprises a base, wherein the base is connected with an upper support column through a telescopic assembly, an obliquely arranged control panel is arranged at the top of the upper support column, a control cavity is formed in the control panel, a servo motor is arranged on the back of the control panel, the output end of the servo motor penetrates into the control cavity and is fixedly connected with an incomplete gear, and the incomplete gear is connected withtwo rotating shafts through an adjusting transmission assembly. By arranging the servo motor, the servo motor can drive two training discs to relatively rotate through the incomplete meshing gear, amoving frame, rotating gears and the rotating shafts, so that synchronization of two hands of a diabetic patient can be guaranteed during training, and auxiliary training of the diabetic patient is realized; and the servo motor can be used for controlling the training discs, and therefore, damage to the patient caused by centrifugal force generated by over-high rotating speed of the training discsis avoided.

column2: VEHICLE TYPE IDENTIFICATION AND SNAPSHOT INTEGRATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of vehicle traffic monitoring equipment, in particular to vehicle type identification and snapshot integrated equipment, which comprises at least three photographing devices which are integrated into a whole, and photographing directions which are different from one another are formed in the at least three photographing devices respectively. Therefore,through the three shooting devices with different shooting directions on one set of equipment, the license plate capturing of the vehicle head and the vehicle tail is realized, the tracking shooting of the vehicle body is realized, the consistency of the captured pictures of the vehicle head and the vehicle tail is ensured, and the images of the vehicle head, the vehicle tail and the vehicle bodyare provided for the system in real time; and the high-speed toll collection system is convenient to inquire and obtain evidences. Besides, the three shooting devices are integrated together, only oneset of equipment needs to be installed during construction and installation, other matched supports do not need to be installed, follow-up maintenance is convenient, and cost and time are saved.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: An embodiment of the invention discloses an image processing method and an electronic device, which are used for processing a video image according to the brightness of a shooting environment. The image processing method comprises the steps of: when a video is shot, detecting the shooting environment brightness of a video image; when the brightness of the shooting environment is lower than a preset threshold value, processing the video image by adopting a neural network; and when the brightness of the shooting environment is higher than or equal to a preset threshold, processing the video image by adopting a preset denoising method which does not include a neural network architecture. A neural network in the field of AI (artificial intelligence) needs a large number of computing units, certain power consumption can be brought, and the video image processing effect can be improved while the power consumption of the terminal is guaranteed by adopting the image processing method.

column2: 3 * 120-DEGREE PANORAMIC SHOOTING NETWORK CAMERA
column4: The utility model discloses a 3 * 120-degree panoramic shooting network camera which comprises a housing and a fixing device, the fixing device is in butt joint with the bottom of the housing througha telescopic rod, the housing is in a triangular prism shape, three windows are formed in the outer wall of the housing, a camera and an image sensor are arranged in each window, and the fixing deviceis in butt joint with the bottom of the housing through a telescopic rod. The three cameras and the image sensor are distributed at equal intervals in the circumferential direction on the horizontalplane, and the included angle between every two adjacent cameras and the image sensor is 120 degrees; according to the equipment, the three cameras are simultaneously started to take pictures, then the pictures are uploaded to the server, the pictures are synthesized into a panoramic picture through an algorithm in the server, the number of students in the picture is displayed through artificial intelligence, the number of the students is transmitted to a control end where a teacher is located, roll calling is carried out under the condition that the teaching of the teacher is not affected, and the teaching efficiency is improved. And the equipment communicates with the server by using a data network, so that the high efficiency of offline teaching of the student is ensured.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR REMOTE INTELLIGENT TROUBLESHOOTING
column4: System and method for autonomous trouble shooting of a unit under test (UUT) having a plurality of replaceable components include: a test station that stores an artificial intelligence (Al) program and a knowledge database (KDB) including acceptable test results for each test point represented by an acceptable test vector, a test probe to test the circuit card assembly; and an operator station to send commands to the test station via the communication network to teach the Al program to capture and store the acceptable test result for each test point of the UUT by the test probe, in the KDB, wherein the Al program commands the test probe to test the UUT, stores the test results in a test result vector, compares the test result vector with the stored acceptable test vector, and displays recommendation as which replaceable component in the UUT to be repaired or replaced.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE RECOGNITION
column4: The invention relates to a face recognition system, in particular to an image processing system based on artificial intelligence recognition, which comprises a human body recognition module used for realizing acquisition of image depth information and realizing recognition of human body information in image data according to the image depth information based on a fuzzy deep neural network model; adangerous behavior recognition module, which is started when a human body is recognized and used for obtaining human body depth information and skeleton information and recognizing dangerous behaviors according to all skeleton information based on an infinite depth neural network; a target image mining module, which is started when a dangerous behavior is found, and is used for realizing mining of a target face image set based on a Dssd_Inception_V3 coco model; and a face recognition module, which is used for extracting LBPH, SIFT and face skeleton features of the face image set and realizingface recognition based on a decision tree. According to the invention, the face image can be captured and recognized in time.

column2: ANIMATION IMAGE GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses an animation image generation method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence such as computer vision, deep learning and augmented reality technologies. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps that first position data of a first vertex of a patch model of a target object, second positiondata of a second vertex of a grid skin model in a skin skeleton model with the same topology as the patch model and first local poses of M nodes of the skeleton model in the skin skeleton model are obtained, and M is a positive integer larger than 1; determining a second local pose of the node based on the first position data, the second position data and the first local pose of the node for eachnode according to a descending order of the tree-shaped hierarchical structures of the M nodes from the root node; and adjusting the poses of the M nodes based on the second local poses of the M nodes to generate an animation image of the target object. According to the technology provided by the invention, the problem that the animation image generation difficulty is relatively high is solved, and the animation image generation difficulty is simplified.

column2: MULTI-SOURCE SERVICE PLATFORM DATA SECURITY COMPONENT MONITORING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a multi-source service platform data security component monitoring method and system. The method comprises the steps of performing configuration management on each functional component in a data security component platform; transmitting transmission data to a data security component platform to call a certain functional component; identifying a data field of a payload in the transmission data, calling a corresponding functional component according to data security component configuration, and performing format conversion on the transmission data; recording operation logs and operation detail information of the function components and the transmission data; reporting the running log detail information to a data security management and control platform according to adata security component reporting rule of a data security component reporting module; performing statistical analysis and visual display on the received running log and the running detail information;and performing alarm and alarm management according to statistical analysis and visual display results. Unified management and control of a plurality of functional components are realized through configuration management of the functional components, and integration of different service data formats is realized through a data cleaning function.

column2: REAL-TIME INTERPRETATION SERVICE SYSTEM THAT HYBRIDIZES TRANSLATION THROUGH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND INTERPRETATION BY INTERPRETER
column4: The present invention relates to a hybrid real-time interpretation service system for hybridizing translation through artificial intelligence and translation by an interpreter expert, and more particularly, to a hybrid real-time interpretation service system for hybridizing translation through artificial intelligence and interpretation by an interpreter expert, in which one or both of real-time translation through artificial intelligence and real-time translation by an interpreter expert are selected to provide an interpretation service suitable for a conversational environment and provide meeting minute information in a text format, so that a separate conversation recording is unnecessary. To this end, the present invention includes: a plurality of user terminals for requesting translation in a users requested language and performing voice or video calls with one or more other users as conversation partners; an APP server that is connected to enable data communication with terminals of the users and relay the terminals so as to enable the voice or video calls, receives voice or image information of the user terminals to generate text information through voice recognition, uses artificial intelligence in a preset language to generate translated text information, and transmits the translated text information to the user terminals upon request; and at least one expert terminal that receives, upon request of the user terminal, the voice information or video information, which is included in the voice or video call between users by the APP server, of the other users terminal of the requested user terminal from the APP server to provide the information to the interpreter expert, and provides translated audio information or translated image information to the user terminal in the set language in the requested user terminal. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR DETERMINING SHOOTING DISTANCE BETWEEN ROAD IMAGES, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a method and device for determining a shooting distance between road images, equipment and a medium, and relates to the technical field of maps, artificial intelligence, big data and cloud. The method comprises the following steps:acquiring a to-be-processed road image set, wherein the road image set comprises a first road image and a second road image; extracting each first feature point in the first road image and each second feature point in the second road image; determining a matching feature point pair between each first feature point and each second feature point; determining a first feature point distribution feature of a first feature point included in the matching feature point pair and a second feature point distribution feature of a second feature point included in the matching feature point pair; and determining a shooting distance between the first road image and the second road image according to the first feature point distribution feature and the second feature point distribution feature, thereby realizing shooting of the same target object by means of an equipped automobile data recorder and estimating the shooting distancebetween the two shot images in a vehicle driving process.

column2: VEHICLE ASSOCIATION METHOD AND DEVICE, ROADSIDE EQUIPMENT AND CLOUD CONTROL PLATFORM
column4: The invention discloses a vehicle association method and device, roadside equipment and a cloud control platform, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of intelligent transportation. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: for each observation point, acquiring an image of a current vehicle running on a road according to a preset period;determining an original observation sequence of each observation point relative to the current vehicle based on the image acquired by each observation point in the preset time period; determining a target observation sequence of each observation relative to the current vehicle based on the original observation sequence of each observation point for the current vehicle; and based on the target observation sequence of each observation relative to the current vehicle, detecting whether the current vehicles observed at every two observation points are the same vehicle or not. According to the invention, wrong association caused by single-frame image abnormity can be effectively prevented, so that the association success rate can be improved.

column2: INTELLIGENT POSTURE-CORRECTING DOUBLE-BACK-PLATE LEARNING CHAIR
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of intelligent healthy household products for children, in particular to an intelligent posture-correcting double-back-plate study chair. The double-back-plate chair comprises a chair leg assembly, a chair seat assembly, a double-back-plate chair back assembly and a single-pipe chair frame assembly, the double-back-plate chair back assembly comprises a left back plate assembly, a right back plate assembly and an intelligent voice posture correction system; the intelligent voice posture correction system comprises four pulse sensors, a voice recording and broadcasting module, two time relay modules, three relay modules, an obstacle avoidance module, a power amplifier module, a loudspeaker, a storage battery assembly, a power switch, a directcurrent charging socket, a male flat cable and a female flat cable. According to the utility model, human body biological characteristics such as heart rate, pulse and the like are utilized, artificial intelligence voice technology is applied, voice reminding attention correction is carried out when the sitting posture of a child is improper during learning, and the purpose that parents are not beside the child and can carry out caring reminding on the child through voice playing is achieved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CAMERA SHOOTING CHARACTER WHEEL READING RECOGNITION DEVICE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of reading devices, and discloses an artificial intelligence camera shooting character wheel reading recognition device, and the device comprises a meter body and a character code disc arranged at the top of the meter body, an electronic bin is arranged at the top of the meter body and located outside the character code disc, and a camera is fixedly installed on the inner wall of the top of the electronic bin; fixed blocks are fixedly arranged at the top of the watch body and located on the two sides of the electronic bin, a rotating shaft penetrates through the left side of the electronic bin, the left side of the electronic bin is rotationally connected with the side walls of the two fixing blocks through the rotating shaft, and the shaft wallof the rotating shaft and the two sides of the electronic bin are movably sleeved with torsion springs. The two ends of the torsion spring are fixedly connected with the side wall of the electronic bin and the side wall of the fixing block respectively, and a fixing mechanism is arranged between the right side of the electronic bin and the top of the meter body. According to the invention, the function of artificial intelligence remote meter reading can be realized, the camera is convenient for workers to maintain, and the labor intensity of the workers is reduced.

column2: IMU-BASED THREE-DIMENSIONAL SPACE HANDWRITING INPUT METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an IMU-based three-dimensional space handwriting input method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a plurality of pieces of inertial information collected by an inertial measurement unit IMU sensor at each position of a user; processing the plurality of pieces of inertia information through adeep neural network to obtain skeleton chain attitude information of the user; solving the skeletal chain posture information through forward dynamics, obtaining the hand position of the user, and forming a three-dimensional handwriting track according to the hand position and the historical position information. Therefore, a user can draw in the air with bare hands and watch the drawn three-dimensional track in real time to realize handwriting input, and the requirements of the user are met.

column2: LEG SWING MECHANISM OF PHYSICAL EDUCATION ROBOT
column4: The leg swing mechanism of the physical education robot comprises a bottom plate, an auxiliary supporting plate is installed on the left side of the upper end of the bottom plate, a main supporting plate is vertically installed at the rear end of the bottom plate, and the length of the auxiliary supporting plate is equal to that of the main supporting plate. A connecting plate is vertically installed on the right side of the upper end of the front end face of the main supporting plate, the upper end face of the connecting plate is flush with the upper end face of the main supporting plate, theupper end face of the connecting plate is connected to the right side of the lower end face of the rectangular supporting plate, and the left side of the lower end face of the rectangular supportingplate is connected to the upper end face of the auxiliary supporting plate. The leg swing mechanism of the physical education robot is reasonable and novel in structure, capable of helping people to independently do exercise exercise, capable of automatically controlling exercise to be slow by adjusting the flow speed adjusting valve, capable of helping people who cannot do exercise autonomously to do rehabilitation training, mild in exercise amount and suitable for wide popularization.

column2: 7DOF TWO-WHEELED MULTI-POSE ROBOT
column4: The utility model relates to a 7DOF two-wheel multi-posture robot. The 7DOF two-wheel multi-posture robot comprises a vehicle body, a left wheel, a right wheel, a pair of wheel power mechanisms and apair of wheel steering mechanisms, the pair of wheel power mechanisms and the pair of wheel steering mechanisms are symmetrically installed on the left side and the right side of the vehicle body respectively, the pair of wheel power mechanisms can be fixedly connected with the left wheel and the right wheel respectively and drive the left wheel and the right wheel to move, and the wheel steeringmechanisms control steering of the left wheel and the right wheel respectively. Therefore, the left wheel and the right wheel can realize coaxial balance bike type motion, and can also realize bike type motion with two parallel wheel planes. Movement with seven degrees of freedom is achieved, the functions of experiments, teaching, scientific research and the like are integrated, and the functionsof transportation, rescue, riding instead of walking, entertainment and the like on specific occasions can be completed. Meanwhile, the system can be used as a typical teaching and scientific research experiment platform and a research carrier of subjects such as intelligent control, artificial intelligence and robots, and can be used for detecting the effectiveness of various intelligent algorithms.

column2: SCENE ANALYSIS SYSTEM BASED ON MULTI-DATA INPUT
column4: The invention discloses a scene analysis system based on multi-data input, which comprises a multi-data acquisition system and a central intelligent processing system, and is characterized in that themulti-data acquisition system comprises a visual camera, an infrared camera and a laser radar camera; the visual camera, the infrared camera and the laser radar camera are all in data connection withthe central intelligent processing system, the visual camera is used for collecting image data specifically containing attributes such as color brightness, and the infrared camera is used for collecting and imaging heat distribution of a human body. The visual camera, the infrared camera and the laser radar camera are integrated and are in butt joint with the central intelligent processing system, artificial intelligence calculation, analysis and integration are carried out on specific behaviors captured by the cameras, the three-in-one integrated camera shooting equipment is established, multi-data image scenes can be intelligently analyzed, and according to different requirements, a multi-aspect conclusion is obtained by analyzing the data.

column2: TWIN CAMERA SPECIAL FOR COMPUTER RECOGNITION
column4: The invention discloses a twin camera special for computer recognition, and the twin camera comprises a geographic position module which is used for carrying out the geographic position coordinate recognition through a built-in GPS module and a built-in GIS module, and the geographic position coordinate recognition comprises the geographic position recognition of a camera and the GIS information recognition of a camera recognition object; a camera module which is used for shooting images, audios and videos through the plurality of shooting modules and storing the shot images and videos; an image recognition module which is used for converting the images acquired by the camera module into structured data in real time through a built-in super artificial intelligence algorithm and outputtingthe structured data to the computer; and a digital twinning module which is used for carrying out 3D model modeling and three-dimensional target identification according to the structured data and carrying out digital twinning processing on the physical target shot by the camera module to obtain a corresponding three-dimensional digital target. Structured data which can be recognized by a computercan be directly output, and the physical world photographed by the camera is twinned into a three-dimensional digital world.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING MODEL TRAINING METHOD, IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND IMAGE PROCESSING DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an image processing model training method, an image processing method and an image processing device, which can be used in the field of artificial intelligence or other fields,and the image processing model training method comprises the following steps: repeatedly executing the following operations: obtaining pseudo true value images for training images from at least two sources, wherein the training images of the at least two sources comprise images collected for the same shooting object under different light wave frequency bands; and taking the pseudo true value imageand the training images from the at least two sources as model training supervision information, and minimizing a joint loss function by adjusting model parameters of the first image processing model, wherein the pseudo true value image is a fused image which is output by a trained second image processing model and aims at training images from at least two sources, or a fused image which is output by a first image processing model in the previous training stage of the current training stage, and the joint loss function represents the loss of the fused image output by the first image processing model relative to the supervision information.

column2: POSTURE RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON TWO-DIMENSIONAL CAMERA, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and provides a posture recognition method, device and equipment based on a two-dimensional camera, and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a human body image of a to-be-recognized human body; extracting body contour information, posture information and gender information of the to-be-recognized human body according to the human body picture; generating an SMPL model according to the body contour information, the posture information and the gender information; obtaining 3D node features in the SMPL model;extracting 2D node features of the to-be-recognized human body in the human body picture; generating an error function according to the 3D node features and the 2D node features; adjusting the SMPL model according to the error function, and extracting target 3D joint features of the adjusted SMPL model; acquiring skeleton information according to the target 3D joint features; and performing attitude analysis according to the skeleton information. The posture recognition method and device based on the two-dimensional camera, the equipment and the storage medium provided by the invention can beapplied to the field of block chains, and can accurately recognize the posture of the to-be-recognized human body.

column2: AUTOMATIC DETECTION METHOD FOR PHYSICAL SURFACE IN LARGE PHASE MODIFIER NON-EXTRACTION ROTOR AIR GAP
column4: The invention provides an automatic detection method for a physical surface in a non-extraction rotor air gap of a large phase modifier, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the photographing of the physical surface in the air gap of the phase modifier through an endoscope, and obtaining a sample image; preprocessing the sample picture; feature extraction and classifier support vectormachine design: utilizing CDF 5/3 lifting wavelets to decompose the preprocessed sample pictures, obtaining approximate wavelet coefficients and high-frequency wavelet coefficients after decomposition, establishing feature vectors according to the approximate wavelet coefficients and the high-frequency wavelet coefficients, and training a classifier support vector machine according to the featurevectors; and detecting the physical surface in the air gap of the phase modifier by using a designed classifier support vector machine. According to the invention, under the condition that a rotor isnot pulled out, the endoscope technology is used for shooting the internal physical surface of the motor air gap and converting the internal physical surface into a picture stream form, and the high-accuracy automatic detection of the internal physical surface of the phase modifier air gap is realized through image processing and an artificial intelligence algorithm.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING HEALTHCARE CONTENT FOR VIRTUAL REALITY UTILIZING CLOUD-BASED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: According to one embodiment of the present invention, provided is a cloud-based healthcare content providing system, which comprises: at least one user computer; at least one administrator computer; and a cloud server which mediates data transmission/reception between the at least one user computer and the at least one administrator computer. The user computer generates exercise record data based on the users bio-signals measured using a bio-signal sensor and the number of revolutions per hour of indoor exercise equipment measured using the rotation sensor. The exercise record data may be transmitted to the manager computer through the cloud server, and customized healthcare data may be received from the manager computer and output together with the exercise record data on a display. According to one embodiment, the user may be provided with customized healthcare content according to the result of analyzing the exercise record data, and it is possible to conduct cooperative or competitive exercise programs with other users connected through the network. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022

column2: VOLLEYBALL ACTION RECOGNITION METHOD BASED ON IMPROVED DYNAMIC TIME WARPING ALGORITHM
column4: The invention relates to a volleyball motion recognition method based on an improved dynamic time warping algorithm, and the method comprises the following steps: firstly, obtaining a real-time motionvideo of volleyball motion; secondly, performing attitude estimation and target detection processing on the action video, and obtaining a time sequence of human body key points in the action video and a time sequence of each human body key point in a standard volleyball action video; and finally, performing alignment through an improved dynamic time warping algorithm to calculate the distance between the sequences, and judging the volleyball movement accuracy according to the sequence distance between the sequences. According to the method, the problem of judgment of standard volleyball actions is solved, the efficiency is greatly improved, a large amount of manpower, material resources and financial resources are saved, and the workload of teachers can also be reduced. The implementationmethod is simple, clear in thought, good in economic value and worthy of application and popularization. Research contents in the field of artificial intelligence are combined with actual volleyballexaminations, technical application is realized, and promotion of production and research combination and development is facilitated.

column2: TRAINING METHOD OF PEDESTRIAN RE-IDENTIFICATION NETWORK, PEDESTRIAN RE-IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND PEDESTRIAN RE-IDENTIFICATION DEVICE
column4: The invention provides a pedestrian re-identification network training method, a pedestrian re-identification method and a pedestrian re-identification device. The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular, computer vision. The method comprises the steps of obtaining M training images and annotation data of the M training images; initializing the network parameters of the pedestrian re-identification network to obtain initial values of the network parameters of the pedestrian re-identification network; inputting a batch of training images in the M training imagesinto a pedestrian re-identification network for feature extraction to obtain a feature vector of each training image in the batch of training images, and determining a loss function according to thefeature vectors of the batch of training images, and obtaining a pedestrian re-identification network meeting a preset requirement according to the function value of the loss function. According to the invention, the pedestrian re-identification network with good performance can be trained under the condition that a single image shooting device marks data.

column2: PROMPTING METHOD FOR FITNESS TRAINING AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a prompting method for fitness training and electronic equipment, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence (AI). The method comprises the following steps: acquiring aspace required for training, wherein the space required for training is used for completing one or more training actions; determining a training position recommended to the user according to the training scene where the user is located and the space required for training; and collecting a training action of the user based on the training position recommended for the user. According to the technical scheme, the proper training position is recommended to the user according to the training scene where the user is located and the space required by training, and the user can normally carry out training under the condition that the movement space is limited, for example, shielding exists and the field is insufficient.

column2: INTELLIGENT VOICE PLAYING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides an intelligent voice playing method and equipment, relates to the technical field of electronics, can be applied to an AI (artificial intelligence) fitness scene, and can play different voices in real time according to the current training state and training action of a user, so as to provide real-time voice feedback and action improvement real-time guidance for the user, the voice content is rich and changeable, and the user experience is good. According to the specific scheme, the electronic equipment displays an interface of a first application program, and the first application program is used for exercise training of a user; an image of a user training action is acquired; an animation of the standard action is played, and an image of the training action of the user is played; a plurality of to-be-selected voices triggered by a first action unit in the user training actions are determined, wherein the first action unit is a training action or a part of the training action; and one voice is selected from the to-be-selected voices for playing. The embodiment of the invention is used for playing voice.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELING PLATFORM AND METHOD BASED ON OBJECT-ORIENTED DESIGN
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence modeling platform and method based on object-oriented design, and the method comprises the steps of correspondingly setting different top menu viewsaccording to the roles of a user through the artificial intelligence modeling platform, providing an entity creation mode of automatic learning, coding modeling and visual modeling, and employing parallel menu views; generating running entities after the created entities are executed, and performing unified classification and management on the running entities according to the types of the entities; forming deployment node entities when deployment is executed for the output files obtained after entity execution, and performing unified management for the deployment node entities; and providinga management module for the user and the corresponding role, and a management module for the application information and the use information. Through the technical scheme of the invention, clear division of the modeling process is realized, an initialization function and a self-defined depth support function are provided, a one-key through design is provided, the hierarchy is clear, and additionaloperation caused by multi-level menus is avoided.

column2: A TWIN CAMERA FOR COMPUTER RECOGNITION AND HUMAN EYE RECOGNITION
column4: The invention discloses a twin camera for computer recognition and human eye recognition, and the camera comprises a geographic position module which is used for the geographic position coordinate recognition through a GPS module and a GIS module; a camera module which is used for shooting and storing images and audios and videos through the shooting module; an image recognition module which is used for converting the images acquired by the camera module into structured data in real time through a super artificial intelligence algorithm and outputting the structured data to the computer; a visible light image output module which is used for outputting the images and videos acquired by the camera module into images and videos which can be recognized by human eyes through two preset visiblelight image output modes; and a digital twinning module which is used for carrying out 3D model modeling and three-dimensional target identification according to the structured data and carrying out digital twinning processing on the physical target shot by the camera module to obtain a corresponding three-dimensional digital target. The invention provides the twin camera supporting computer and human eye recognition at the same time, and a photographed physical world is twin into a three-dimensional digital world.

column2: TARGET USER LOCKING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a target user locking method and electronic equipment, and relates to the field of electronic equipment. The method provided by the invention can be applied toan AI (Artificial Intelligence) fitness scene. The locking accuracy of the target user can be ensured. The electronic equipment can complete the recognition of a target user and the tracking of the target user in a fitness process through the recognition of user features, or the recognition of the user through combining with the data collected by wearable equipment worn by the user, or the recognition of a motion mode of the user.

column2: FITNESS ASSISTING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a fitness assisting method in the field of AI (artificial intelligence), and the method is characterized in that the method comprises the steps that electronic equipment obtainsuser actions; the electronic equipment determines alternative actions, meeting a first preset condition, of a movement track of a first limb in the user actions from the user actions; the electronicequipment determines an action change amplitude of a second limb in the alternative action; and the electronic equipment determines to output guidance information according to the action change amplitude. By determining the alternative action with the limb action track meeting the first preset condition, the fitness action of the user can be accurately determined according to the limb action change amplitude in the alternative action. The guidance information is output under the condition of determining that the user performs the fitness action, the accuracy of outputting the guidance information can be improved, and the user experience is improved.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses an image processing method and electronic equipment, relates to the technical field of information processing, and aims to beautify the skin of a human face image in a targetedmanner and provide better shooting experience or beautifying experience for a user. According to the scheme, an AI (artificial intelligence) method is adopted, for example, a neural network is used for carrying out multi-azimuth analysis on a first image including a face image, including recognition of shooting background information of the first image, brightness information of a face and makeupinformation. According to the embodiment of the invention, the skin beautifying processing can be performed on the face image in a targeted manner according to the specific background information ofthe image, the actual brightness distribution of the face and the actual makeup of the face, so that the face state of the person in the image is better presented, and the user experience is better.

column2: CAMERA CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE AND TERMINAL EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a camera control method and device and terminal equipment, and aims to enable a user to perceive whether a camera is turned on or not so as to effectively protect the privacy ofthe user. The camera control method comprises the steps that terminal equipment acquires a first instruction input by a user, wherein the first instruction is used for playing an action course in a first application program in the terminal equipment, and in response to the first instruction, the terminal device controls the camera to be turned on and pop up the terminal device, and obtains an image containing a user action after the terminal device is popped up, the user action being an action made by the user simulating the action tutorial. The method, the device and the terminal equipment provided by the embodiment of the invention can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence (AI), and more specifically can be applied to the field of intelligent fitness.

column2: FISHING ROD CASTING OUTDOOR EXERCISE DEVICE USING MACHINE LEARNING TECHNOLOGY, AND CASTING PRACTICE PLATFORM USING SAME
column4: The present invention relates to a fishing rod casting outdoor exercise device using machine learning technology comprising: a main body detachably attached to a fishing rod; a display unit provided on the main body to be identified from the outside; a manipulation unit provided on the main body to select an operation by manipulation; a casting motion detection unit for detecting the angle and acceleration of the fishing rod to obtain data on the casting operation; a memory unit for storing data and evaluation results required for calculating a flying distance from the casting operation and evaluating the casting operation; an artificial intelligence evaluation unit that calculates a flying distance by using the data stored in the memory unit from the data on the casting operation sensed by the casting operation detection unit and evaluates the casting operation; a communication unit for performing communication with an external terminal; a control unit controlling the flying distance calculated by the artificial intelligence evaluation unit and the evaluated result to be displayed through the display unit, and controlling to provide the same to the terminal through the communication unit; a power supply unit that provides the power required for operation; and a machine learning determination unit, in which, by receiving the casting motion data provided from the casting motion detection unit, the casting motion of the fishing rod is performed using a machine learning algorithm, and in comparison with the casting behavior characterized by each of multiple fish species and multiple casting types, the machine learning determination unit determines which of the plurality of fish species and the plurality of casting types corresponds to the casting operation of the fishing rod. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: PROMPTING METHOD FOR FITNESS TRAINING, AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: A prompting method for fitness training, and an electronic device, relating to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: acquiring a space required for training, wherein the space required for training is used to complete one or more training actions (801); determining a training position recommended for the user according to the training scene where the user is located and the space required for training (802); and acquiring training actions of the user on the basis of the training position recommended for the user (803). Recommending a suitable training position to a user according to a training scene where the user is located and a space required for training allows the user to perform training normally in a scene where there is limited exercise space, due to problems such as occlusion and insufficient space.

column2: EQUIPMENT UTILIZING HUMAN RECOGNITION AND METHOD FOR UTILIZING THE SAME
column4: A method for utilizing human recognition and a method utilizing the same are provided. The method for utilizing human recognition includes updating a moving image database to include information about a moving image in which a cluster subject appears, the information being extracted based on clustering using a face feature; receiving a search condition; and detecting moving image information using the database. According to the present disclosure, a skeleton can be analyzed and a face can be recognized using an artificial intelligence (AI) model performing deep learning through a fifth generation (5G) network, and using the analysis result, a photographing composition can be determined, and moving image information can be constructed at an edge.

column2: TARGET USER LOCKING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: The embodiments of the present application provide a target user locking method and an electronic device, relating to the field of electronic devices. Said method provided in the present application can be applied to an artificial intelligence (AI) fitness scene, and can ensure the accuracy of target user locking. The electronic device can complete the identification of a target user and the tracking of the target user during fitting by means of methods such as identifying user features, or identifying the user in combination with data acquired by a wearable device worn by the user, or identifying the user?™s motion mode.

column2: FITNESS-ASSISTED METHOD AND ELECTRONIC APPARATUS
column4: A fitness-assisted method in the field of artificial intelligence, characterized in that the method comprises: an electronic device acquiring a user's actions (S601); the electronic device determining, from the user's actions, an alternative action, where a motion trajectory of a first limb satisfies a first preset condition, in the user's actions (S602); the electronic device determining an action variation magnitude of a second limb in the alternative action (S603); and the electronic device determining to output guidance information according to the action variation magnitude (S604). By means of determining an alternative action where a limb motion trajectory satisfies a first preset condition, and according to the action variation magnitude of a limb in the alternative action, it can be accurately determined that a user performs a fitness action; and guidance information is output when it is determined that the user performs a fitness action, such that the accuracy of outputting the guidance information can be improved, and the user experience is improved.

column2: CAMERA CONTROL METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND TERMINAL DEVICE
column4: The present application provides a camera control method and apparatus, and a terminal device which enable a user to sense whether the camera is turned on, so as to effectively protect the privacy of the user. The camera control method comprises: the terminal device obtains a first instruction input by a user, wherein the first instruction is used for playing an action course of a first application in the terminal device; and in response to the first instruction, the terminal device controls the camera to be turned on and is popped up, and obtains an image containing a user action after the terminal device is popped up, wherein the user action is an action made by the user imitating the action course. The method, apparatus and terminal in embodiments of the present application can be applied to the field of artificial intelligences (AI), and more particularly to the field of intelligence fitness.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR RECEIVING OF DRIVING DATA DURING PLATOONING IN AUTONOMOUS DRIVING SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to a method for receiving driving data during platoon driving in an autonomous driving system, which comprises: transmitting a platooning request message to a leader vehicle of a platoon to join; receiving a platooning response message as a response to the platooning request message; transmitting driving data information to the leader vehicle; and receiving a list of driving data associated with vehicles of the platoon from the leader vehicle. Accordingly, the vehicles running in the platoon may receive driving data from other vehicles in the platoon. At least one among an autonomous vehicle, a user terminal, and a server of the present invention may be associated with an artificial intelligence module, a drone (unmmanned aerial vehicle, UAV) robot, an augmented reality (AR) device, a virtual reality (VR) device, a device related to 5G services, etc. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses artificial intelligence software development equipment, which comprises a host and a display, and is characterized in that the front end of the top of the display is fixedly connected with a camera module, two sides of the front end of the display are fixedly connected with voice modules, and the display is in signal connection with the host; the camera module comprises a high-definition camera, a radar camera and a zoom camera, and is used for acquiring user image information and identifying the image information; each voice module comprises a voice playing unit and avoice acquisition unit, and the voice module is used for acquiring user voice information and recognizing the voice information; the host is used for summarizing and encoding the information, generating corresponding instruction information and performing data interaction with a cloud platform; the display is used for visually displaying information; each voice module and the camera shooting module respectively collect voice information and image information of a user, the collected information is uploaded to the cloud platform through host codes to be compared, and codes generated by the cloud platform are transmitted to the host and visually displayed through the display.

column2: SCENIC SPOT ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PHOTO TAKING SYSTEM AND USING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses a scenic spot artificial intelligence photo taking system and a using method thereof, relates to the technical field of intelligent scenic spots, and aims to solve the problemsthat an existing scenic spot camera shooting service facility can only call corresponding photos through scenic spot workers and print the photos to tourists, the efficiency is low, and the touristscannot download the photos autonomously. The output end of an industrial camera is electrically connected with the input end of a server, the server is bidirectionally and electrically connected witha switch, the switch is bidirectionally connected with a scenic spot cloud, the scenic spot cloud is bidirectionally connected with a tourist mobile terminal, and the server comprises a central processing unit, a memory, a solid state disk and a face recognition system. The central processing unit is in bidirectional connection with the face recognition system, and the face recognition system comprises a face image detection module, an image preprocessing module, a face image feature extraction module and a matching recognition module.

column2: VEHICLE SHUNTING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and relates to the Internet of Vehicles and vehicle-road cooperation technology, and concretely relates to a vehicle shunting method and device, a medium and electronic equipment. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a shunting node of a to-be-shunted vehicle on a current driving road section; respectively obtaining node positions of the shunting nodes, and predicating shunting time information of the to-be-shunted vehicles for vehicle shunting at the shunting nodes according to the node positions; acquiring historical accident information corresponding to each shunting node, and predicting shunting risk information of the to-be-shunted vehicle for vehicle shunting at each shunting node according to the historical accident information; performing fusion processing on the shunting time information and the shunting risk information to obtain node evaluation information of each shunting node; and selecting a target node for the to-be-shunted vehicle to drive away from the current driving road section from the shunting nodes according to the node evaluation information. According to the method, the drivingsafety and shunting efficiency can be both considered, and accurate shunting of vehicles running on the road is achieved.

column2: PEDESTRIAN SNAPSHOT OPTIMIZATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a pedestrian snapshot optimization method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: detecting a target object in a video, and intercepting snapshots of the target object in different video frames; detecting key point information in each snapshot, screening out snapshots with complete postures according to the key point information, determining shooting angles of target objects in the snapshots, then classifying each snapshot according to the shooting angles, and obtaining multiple snapshot sets classified at differentangles; comparing confidence coefficients and interception time of all snapshots in each snapshot set, selecting snapshots with the confidence coefficients from high to low, and sending the snapshotsto a pedestrian database when the difference value of the interception time of the adjacent snapshots in the selected snapshots is greater than a preset time interval until the number of snapshots sent to the pedestrian database in each group of snapshot set reaches a preset number requirement. According to the invention, an optimal selection strategy of pedestrian snapshots is provided, and theselected pedestrian snapshots have the advantage of high recognition accuracy.

column2: PLANT GROWTH ENVIRONMENT CONTROL METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, PLANT GROWTH ENVIRONMENT CONTROL DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a plant growth environment control method based on artificial intelligence, a plant growth environment control device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium, and relates to the artificial intelligence technology. The method comprises the following steps of encoding a plurality of environment variables applied to a plant growth environment in a first period, and constructing a first environment set by a plurality of first environment individuals obtained by encoding; based on weather conditions of the first period and environment variables of a second period, performing reconstruction processing on the first environment individuals in the first environment set, and obtaining a second environment set comprising a plurality of second environment individuals, wherein the first period is later than the second period; and determining a second environment individual with the highest fitness from the second environment set, and applying a pluralityof environment variables corresponding to the second environment individual with the highest fitness to the plant growth environment in the second period. According to the method, the environmental variables of the plant growth environment can be dynamically optimized, and intelligent plant growth environment control is realized.

column2: AI MODEL TRAINING ONLINE PRACTICAL TRAINING LEARNING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The invention provides an AI model training online practical training learning system. The system comprises a server-based online training platform, an artificial intelligence framework module and a computing resource module, wherein the server-based online training platform is used for running a code file or loading a user data set; the computing resource module is used for providing a training data set required by the artificial intelligence framework module; and the artificial intelligence framework module is used for carrying out online training according to the code file, the user data set and/or the training data set. According to the invention, automatic deployment, a one-key interactive development environment, deep training and tuning of a model and multi-tenant job scheduling ofmultiple machines and multiple cards are provided, and resource integration, elastic expansion and contraction and reasonable scheduling are perfectly realized; and meanwhile, software and a mirror image library which can be defined are provided, so that more personalized requirements of users are met, and the AI development efficiency of the users is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DIVING GUARANTEE DRIVING MECHANISM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence diving guarantee driving mechanism which comprises a control assembly, a head action sensor, a propelling device and a Bluetooth headset, the head action sensor and the propelling device are both connected with the control assembly, and the Bluetooth headset is in Bluetooth wireless connection with the control assembly. compared with the prior art, safety information and safety guarantee can be provided for the diver in real time, and the system is suitable for auxiliary propulsion of the diver, can be controlled by head action, and provides support for effective rescue of related monitoring systems and rescue Internet of Things.

column2: INTELLIGENT VIDEO RECORDING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention relates to a computer vision technology in the field of artificial intelligence. The video shooting method comprises the following steps: firstly, a camera application on a terminal (such as a mobile phone) is started; in a slow action video recording mode of a camera application, when a motion detection function of the camera application is started, a video recording instruction input by a user is detected, and video frames are collected; when the motion of the human body in the collected first video frame set is a preset motion, automatically recording a second video frame setat a first frame rate; a target video is generated, the target video comprises a slow action video clip, and the slow action video clip comprises a part of video frames in the second video frame set;when the motion of the human body is the first preset motion, the playing duration of the slow motion video clip at the first playing speed is the first duration; and when the motion of the human bodyis a second preset motion, the playing duration of the slow motion video clip at the first playing speed is a second duration, the first preset motion is different from the second preset motion, andthe first duration is different from the second duration.

column2: NOVEL VIDEO BENCHMARK DATASET GENERATION AND REAL TIME RECOGNITION OF MUDRAS IN BHARATHANATYAM
column4: A Computational approach towards promotion preservation and dissemination of knowledge in the domain of cultural heritage is one of the research areas which have a wide scope. There has been a seismic shift in the way many sectors in society have adapted themselves to the pandemic situation be it healthcare, food, education diplomacy, and performing arts? Virtual learning and performing have become the need of the hour in theFIELD OF THE INVENTIONThis invention is related with the idea that is three-fold first, this creates benchmark datasets to be shared to create a beneficial impact and for a meaningful engagement by capturing recognizing, and classification the multimedia content for hasta mudras (hand poses) in Bharathanatyam second for real time recognition of mudras, to build video recommendation systems to promote art as a tool for building an international relationship and further elevate India's soft-power through performing arts and thirdly as tutoring system to aspiring learners. This work applies DeepLearning Transfer learning based CNN MobileNet architecture algorithms for Mudra recognition in Bharathanatyam.BACKGROUND OF INVENTIONRecent happenings in the current pandemic scenario have pushed various sectors of society throughout the world to go digital. It has greatly transformed the way teaching-learning methodology has conventionally taken place. A significant difference can be seen in the area of performing arts of the ancient Indian classical dance form, Bharathanatyam which relies heavily on the teacher and taught being physically present to show, instruct watch observe, and correct according to the strength of the student. Hand poses which is called Hasta mudra and is one of the striking features of this Indian classical dance form. An application area is the recognition and classification of the mudras. Five different perfect holding of the mudras( Alapadmam,Thripathakam, Katakamukam,Kapitham and Shikaram) that are No-Conflicting in nature meaning to say they do not look similar are chosen for this work from the 28 Asamyutha hastas ( single hand gestures ) which are found mention both in Bharatha's Natyasasthra and Nandhikeshwara's Abhinayadarpana - that are ancient texts pertaining to Bharathanatyam. The proposed work is motivated by the following factors (A) To bridge the gap which is there, due to the scarcity of datasets in this area of work. (B) Using the current technological leverage, this art can truly transcend boundaries both within and across countries for propagation, promotion in building diplomatic relations through arts as a tool to enhance India as a soft power (which was coined in the late eighties by Nye a political scientist, which is the extent of a country's cultural appeal, the strength of their diplomatic network. (C) Aid in the realm of teaching-learning. The Deep learning technique application for Real time recognition of mudra despite various challenges thrown through objection detection gives good recognition.PRIOR ARTA Computational approach towards promotion preservation and dissemination of knowledge in the domain of cultural heritage is one of the research areas which have a wide scope. There has been a seismic shift in the way many sectors in society have adapted themselves to the pandemic situation be it healthcare, food, education diplomacy, and performing artST Virtual learning and performing have become the need of the hour in the field of performing arts as well. To build a Real time mudra recognition system in performing arts, generation and analysis of the multimedia content of Bharathanatyam are of paramount importance. This plays a significant role in the conservation of intangible cultural heritage. . This paper proposes the application of Deep Learning techniques of CNN as a key technology to recognize the correct mudra.Experimental results on our challenging mudra dataset through MobileNet architecture show 80%-85% accuracy in real-time and . 80%-90% for Offline testing. The results presented for this interesting distinct study are reasonable and its performance issignificant.To validate the procured classification accuracies.another CNN approach, Inception V3 in deep learning is adopted andfound that in comparison MobileNet architecture performs better.References[I] Molchanov, P., Yang, X., Gupta, S., Kim, K., Tyree, S. and Kautz, J., 2016. This invention ishighly relevant in today's digital learning environment in the current Pandemic situation. Mudras are captured both through web camera and Mobile inbuilt camera. It is trained and tested.This system can recognize Mudra both in Real time and offline which is challenging and can recognize the mudra in variouspositions.Python Tensorflow package using CNN-MobileNet architecture is used to both evaluate and classify the mudra.
