DETAILED DESCRIPTIONOne of the most unexpected effects of the pandemic is the classical dance going the digital way. This process has thrown a challenge to re-design the conventional manner of teaching-learning and has felt the need to create the content of high quality in e-learning as we have to move to this realm in the performing arts sector which has felt the acute need of staying connected. This in turn will necessarily mean more technological stepping in for the online mode of learning. This work has attempted a very relevant and important area.The process of mudra recognition begins with generating a database for the five mudras Alapadmam, Thripathakam, Katakamukham, Kapitham &,Shikaram, which are bothnon-conflicting in nature,and also repeated usage of the same is found both in the basic steps and for miming the lyrics. A substantial study was undertaken to zero in on the most oft-repeated mudras and which are non-conflicting (Which are similar or look alike mudras). One of the primary objectives of this study is to generate datasets of mudras that have frequent usage and also because the training dataset in most cases is images collected through Google search engine. The mudras which are collected in such a manner are mostly web labeled rather than human-labeled which is not necessarily accurate as normally web search itself need not be accurate. The other reason for creating a dataset that is specific to these 5 mudras is that it can serve as a benchmark dataset for further research. A survey on literature relating to hand gestures reveals that not many publicly available video datasets in this specific area although there are literary works that are rich in sign language, hand gesture, etc. It is both an expensive and highly time-consuming process to generate accurate videos for specific mudras. Figure I shows the process involved in recognizing generic hand gesture recognition based on image processing techniques.A lot of effort has been taken in instructing how the hand mudra should be placed and captured with different backgrounds. Generation of data has been done by capturing data through the web camera and smartphones from different categories of people, untrained, beginners, and experts. The generation of specific data is been given high importance as existing data available consists of mostly static mudras in one particular angle whereas the need of the hour while conducting online classes there is a necessity for recognizing mudras when placed in different positions, therefore, capturing the hand movements as video. Instructions had been given to the manner of holding the finger in the correct position and moving it. This is done as it is essential to recognize the hand pose from different angles. Both the right hand and the left hand has been captured separately. Table I displays the mudras which have been focused on the proposed work.Normally either the glove-based approach or vision-based approach is used to capturing the images. While using armbands, helmets gloves, etc. certain difficulties arise on the restriction of movements, therefore, the choice for the vision-based approach was made which alleviates these problems and also the accessibility to inbuilt cameras used in smartphones and web camera in laptops which are economical. As visibility is important for recognition of the gesture how to place the hand at a certain distance from the camera, capture the video of the movement of the mudra within a limited time for both the right hand and left hand is informed well ahead to the participants. The area of the application lies both in the dance class and also in public spaces like the airport, railway stations to have a better reach of the art form to various sections of the society. Video is captured in different lighting and background and with the slow movement of the mudra so that at any point of the movement the algorithm should recognize the hand gesture whatever be the orientation of the mudra.The candidates are mostly from Nivedanam dance school Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India, an Institute which trains students of both genders and different age groups. Care was taken to capture the video in normal rooms at different venues lit with fluorescent lights in a manner occlusion does not occur. Figure 2.1 shows the Alapadmam mudra and Figure 2.2 shows the Thripathakam Mudra, Figure 2.3.Katakamukham, Figure 2.4.Kapitham & Figure 2.5 Shikaram. In Total 75 video clips have been generated from 15 different people. It is pertinent to note that they belong to male and female genders for both right and left hand. Video frames acquired of the 5 different hand mudras namely Alapadmam, Thripathakam, Katakamukham, Kapitham & Shikaram of different orientations considered in this work are shown in in Table 2.Pre-processing and segmentationGenerally, it has been found that real-time data is neither highly accurate nor consistent. To overcome this issue, preprocessing steps become an absolute necessity. Preprocessing techniques are very crucial for better clarity of the image which in turn helps in accurate identification of hand gestures in general and mudras in particular. This work has used a simple bounding box of hand as preprocessing technique for segmentation of the object which here is the hand. Hand movements and poses can be detected in different ways. One of the simplest ways to obtain the Region of interest is to segment the foreground from the background and obtain the contour of the hand.CAW ??ArchitectureAs a general rule, it is seen CNN architectures generally belong to the supervised learning category where the input image is classified and the output label is predicted. The exchange of messages between interconnected artificial neurons is what the system of the convolutional neural network is about. These networks are state-of-the-art models for various image processing tasks like Image Classification, Segmentation, Object Detection, etc. There are many layers where each layer has neurons that respond to different inputs from the previous layers. The connections have numeric weights that are tuned during the training process so that a properly trained network will respond correctly when presented with an image or a pattern to recognize. The network consists of multiple layers of feature-detecting neurons. The process of extracting the features is done by the CNN and learning various features is an automatic process. Figure 4 shows how a typical Convolutional Neural Network has been applied and its internal functionalities are further discussed in [26].The four main layers Convolution, Rectified Linear Unit (ReLU), Pooling or Sub Sampling and Classification (Fully Connected Layer) each built in a manner that the first layer detects a set of primitive patterns in the input the detection of a pattern of patterns is done by the second layer the next layer detects the patterns of those patterns which goes on. The application area of CNN is largely in the image data which is a matrix of pixel values.In the problem statement, the images of the hand are to be cropped. This dataset consisting of the five mudras of the Asamyutha hasta of Bharthanatyam are used to train the pre-train model for detecting the gestures of the hand. Matlabfile(.mat) contains a collection of polygons given along the dataset to help to detect the hands. The points that make the edges of the hand are represented by polygons such as 'Own Left', 'Own Right', 'Other Left', and 'Other Right' that is contained in each image.In an image, there can be a maximum of 4 hands. Each polygon has 4 arrays consisting of the (x,y) coordinates of each " point as a pre-processing step a box is drawn after finding min(x), min(y), max(x), max(y).Once every single image is processed it is changed to a Comma Separated Values(CSV) file. The dimension of the bounding rectangle is contained in the CSV file. Tensor flow is used to train for object detection. Conversion of CSV file to tfrecord format is done thereafter the pre-trained network is given the record file to detect an object with 5 different classes of mudras.RESULTS AND DISCUSSIONTo classify the hand gesture CNN is used. The different mudras with different positions of fingers are trained using CNN model to represent the various gestures when the hand gesture is captured in real-time the image of the hand is cropped and is sent through the same CNN model where classification is done and the probability of each of the class is given as the output.This work is a two-pronged process [A] Offline training testing [B] Real-time testing, in the first process, the dataset is split into a train set of 80 percent and a test set of 20 percent folders and convert the dataset from .csv files to tfrecords. First train 80% of the data sets which have been captured either through web camera or through smartphones and 20% test freshly given videos of the 5 different mudras and find out their accuracy. The other is for real-time using the timestamp method when the video is captured through a web camera. The specified hand movements that are captured in real-time are from persons whose hand gestures are not trained before, against the already trained mudras. Real-time classification of dynamic mudras is highly demanding this being due to how the mudra is performed and the type of people whether they belong to trained, untrained, or experts in the area. The system should also effectuate apparently where there is significantly less time lag between performing the mudra and its classification. This paper addresses these issues and employs CNN-based methods MobileNet architecture to give good results. To validate the proposed method we corroborate with another CNN-based method Inception v3 and perceive that MobileNet Architecture displays a notably higher result even for offline testing.The network goes through the first step of forwarding propagation and there would be an output accurately assigned to the class. According to the class, the output probabilities are calculated using the weights which have been optimized to correctly classify all the previous training examples for a new image. It is seen when the training set is varied.in terms of illumination, background, gender, and age, and also the data set is fairly large the network generalizes well to new images and also classifies them into the correct categories. The classes of mudras are considered together and experiments are conducted on them.Table 3 shows results for offline testing Mobile net architecture for mudra database we get 80%- 90% average accuracy and elapsed time 177.19 sees. Table 4 shows Real-time testing MobileNet architecture for the mudra database we get 80%-85% average accuracy .172 seconds for one frame. Table 5 illustrates the comparison of various approaches to static /dynamic hand gesture recognition with the proposed hand mudra recognition. The accuracy varies due to the random element in the training process.From the analysis, it is found that our proposed work uses video clips, capturing only the hand mudra during movement which captures the perfect mudra. These mudras are captured from different kinds of people belonging to different categories untrained, beginners, and well-trained persons. Instructions as to how to hold and perform the particular mudra in front of the camera are given specifically to avoid misinterpretations. Each mudra refers to a class. This is done since our work is to be used towards various application areas and not restricted to one area. The research work is expected to be of value in activities such as promotional activities of performing arts, the domain of teaching-learning, and as benchmark datasets for further exploration in this specific research area.Table 5 Comparison of various approaches with proposed work The obtained results of our proposed work with 75 video clips where each clip is of different timing consisting of a total of 5500 selected frames for training and 1100 frames fresh images for testing are reasonable for the proposed hand mudra recognition scheme. It is seen that NeuralNetworks for some earlier work provide better results this can be attributed mainly due to the crucial rationale that datasets are mostly static poses either just for hand gestures or full-body poses based on keyframe identification whereas in the current work, the frames for the mudras have been chosen in a way that the dynamic nature of the mudra movement is considered and a large number of video clips have been created in comparison with earlier related works which mostly deal with static images of mudras. This work is of high consequence in the sphere of intangible arts of India. There are no similar works in publicly available datasets specific to these mudras pertaining to dynamic videos. Yet survey finds literary work is well-supplied in hand signs related images, therefore to make a comparative study Sebastien Marcel train and test images set for sign language is taken as shown in Table 6.The images found in Sebastien Marcel Static Hand Posture Database [23] are in the PNM format. It is a database containing about 10 persons with 6 hand postures (a, b, c, point, five, v), with thousands of Various images with both uniform and complex backgrounds. The window size for each posture are varied 20x20 for A, 18x20 for C and Five, and 18x30 for B, Point, and V (Figure 3). It achieves a good recognition rate for the comparison work. This CNN model when applied to Sebastien Marcel's benchmark database gives satisfactory recognition results. Table 7represents the results for offline testing Mobile net architecture for Marcel benchmark database which gives 85%-95% accuracy as an average and elapsed time 71.119secs for all the images on an average.To corroborate the results for the image dataset generated by us another deep learning technique based on CNN architecture-Inception network, which is a significant step forward in CNN classifiers is being applied. The difference between general CNNs and inception networks is that general CNN's convolution layers are stacked deeper to get better accuracy whereas the Inception network is complex and has used different techniques to enhance the performance. There are various versions of the Inception network each one being an improvement on the earlier version. Inceptionv3 being the default architecture provided by tensor flow is the natural choice for comparative purposes as it has good efficiency with the computational cost being reasonable.Table 8 shows results for offline testing applying Inception v3 architecture for Sebastian marcel dataset where we get 63% average accuracy and elapsed time 286.51 sees for the dataset consisting of 2000 static train images and 400 static test images. The results of applying Inception v3 classier on the mudra generated are shown in the current Table 9.The current CNN-MobileNet-based architecture diligent study indicates that the number of hands that are captured is adequate in comparison with other research work and it is found that the results are within an acceptable range for mobile net architecture, and elapsed time is significantly lesser compared with earlier work [3] and reasonable when compared with work [2], [4] being static images against our proposed dynamic images.It is important to note that the work [2] and [4] have also used only static images which explains reduced time for processing whereas the proposed work uses video clips with the orientation of the mudras beingdynamic iri nature. Hence, this can be considered as good performance. The comparison results for the time elapsed are shown in table 10.CONCLUSION AND FUTURE WORKSWhile the literature on hand gesture recognition is quite rich there are relatively few works on this specific topic, recognition of mudras in Indian classical dance forms. Therefore the proposed dataset can be used as a benchmark and can be seen as a great . opportunity for exploration in this particular research area..According to our comprehension, this is one of few works using transfer learning for mudra recognition in Bharathanatyam. The present work focuses on classifying Bharathanatyam mudras of Thripathakam and Alapadmam.Katakamukam, Kapitham, and Shikaram with their corresponding labels. Identifying the discriminant feature when it is a multiclass problem is a difficult task and it requires the knowledge of an expert. Here assistance by domain experts is taken to group the hand poses correctly for training. Vision-based real-time gesture recognition proposed using deep learning alleviates the problem of wearing difficulties.The proposed model achieves good performance on the Mudra Dataset, varying between 80% - 85%with real-time recognition speed and offline accuracy of 80%-90% with MobileNet architecture. As against another state of art methodology inception v3 classifier,it is observed that the MobileNet archttecturegivesa better result. The elapsed time on an average for processing one frame is .172 seconds which is good for dynamic mudras. It is seen that the performance is good irrespective of gender, skin color, variation in illumination, background, etc. The result is credible taking into account the number of challenges ' posed by object detection like orientation, background, location lighting. Ortce the hand is detected, we use CNN to classify the'' hand image to find out the corresponding class. There is sufficient scope in the area of classification to show better accuracy both for the single-hand gestures and extend it to double hand gestures

column2: RESOURCE FILE PROTECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to a resource file protection method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, in the running process of an application program, the loading action of a target resource file is monitored, and the target resource file is obtained by encrypting the resource file of the application program; if the loading action is monitored, intercepting the loading action, and loading the target resource file into a running memory of the application program; in a running memory of the application program, decrypting the target resource file to obtain a decrypted resource file; and reading the decrypted resource file from the running memory. The decrypted resource file is prevented from being generated in the local storage space, it is ensured that the resource file in the local storage space is always in an encrypted state, the security strength of the resource file is improved, and therefore data leakage and pirated application can be avoided.

column2: SYSTEM FOR RELAYING GO GAME WITH SMART GO BOARD
column4: The present invention relates to a relay system using a smart go board, which correctly grasps the location of each moving point in a go game between players and whether each moving stone is black or white, encrypts the sequence of moving points to relay, record, and store the same to a go game relay server in real-time, and enables a large number of spectators to watch the go game on their own terminals from remote places. According to the present invention, the system comprises: the smart go board having the shape of a go board, recognizing the color of go stones put on each of 361 moving points with artificial intelligence (AI), recording and managing moving sequence data, and encrypting and converting the moving sequence data into a moving sequence blockchain packet frame to simultaneously transmit the same blockchain packet frame through multiple communication paths formed by a plurality of activated communication units; and the go game relay server receiving the packets transmitted from the smart go board through the multiple communication paths and decoding the error-free packet to check moving sequence, and recording and managing the moving sequence in an allocated area. Accordingly, the color of go stones put on each of 361 moving points is checked to correctly check whether the stone is black or white with AI, the moving sequence data is transmitted to and managed by a remote server in real-time, and moving sequence information is encrypted into a packet of a predetermined unit to simultaneously transmit the same content while being transmitted to the remote server through a plurality of communication channels, thereby providing effects of reducing transmission errors and blocking illegal hacking of other persons. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: REMOTE CONTROL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ANALGESIA PUMP DEVICE
column4: The utility model relates to a remote control artificial intelligence analgesia pump device which comprises a wireless communication end, a patient operation end and a medical care operation end, andinformation exchange is carried out between the patient operation end and the medical care operation end through the wireless communication end. One medical care operation end can control a pluralityof patient operation ends, the problem of insufficient personnel in the anesthesiology department is relieved, manual treatment is more flexible, safety is improved, a physician in the anesthesiologydepartment can remotely follow up and monitor the conditions of a plurality of patients, remotely control the analgesia pump, reduce the running wave and rapidly treat the analgesia pump problem of the patients, and the patient pain relieving efficiency is improved. The waiting time and pain of a patient are reduced, and meanwhile, medical staff can know the operation condition of the analgesia pump in time. A patient communicates with medical care in real time in a voice or video mode, diversification and humanization are achieved, remote questionnaire feedback is conducted on the analgesia condition of the patient at regular intervals, calling is convenient, and individual analgesia is achieved.

column2: MOTOR VEHICLE DRIVER TRAINING DURATION RECORD AUTHENTICATION METHOD AND RELATED DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a motor vehicle driver training duration record authentication method used for reducing the conditions of substitute training and false training in driving training at present. The method disclosed by the embodiment of the invention comprises the steps: acquiring driving training information of a target vehicle, wherein the driving training information comprises but is not limited to the running state of each part of the target vehicle, the operation behavior of a driver and the identity information of the driver in the current driving process; uploading the driving training information to a cloud database; performing multi-dimensional big data learning and analysis on the driving training information in the cloud database by using an artificial intelligence model to generate real-time driving style portrait information of a driver of the corresponding target vehicle; and comparing the historical driving style portrait information generated inthe historical training process of the target driver with the real-time driving style portrait information to determine the authentication accuracy of the target driver.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SCANNING INSTRUMENT AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence scanning instrument and system, which comprises a scanner main body, wherein the upper surface of the scanner main body is fixedly provided with a grab handle, the upper end of the grab handle is provided with a scanning head, one side of the scanning head is provided with a button for starting and stopping equipment, the lower surface of the scanner main body is fixedly provided with a connection structure, a rotating rod is arranged on the lower surface of the connection structure, a telescopic rod is fixedly installed at the lower end of the rotating rod, a base is arranged at the lower end of the telescopic rod, and an anti-skid pad is fixedly installed on the lower surface of the base. According to the artificial intelligence scanninginstrument and system, the scanner can be conveniently mounted and dismounted, a user can conveniently select a use mode and conveniently rotate the scanner for scanning and shooting, the stability and flexibility in use are improved, the height can be adjusted according to actual needs, and the practicability of the scanner is improved.

column2: DECENTRALIZED TASK SCHEDULING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a decentralized task scheduling method and device, equipment and a medium. The method comprises the steps of calling a target main node to determine a plurality of to-be-analyzed node information files from a target Zookeeper, the target main node is any one normally running main node; when the target temporarynode serial number corresponding to the target main node is the minimum value in the plurality of node information files to be analyzed, calling the target main node to determine that the attribute ofthe target main node is an activated main node, otherwise, calling the target main node to determine that the attribute of the target main node is a standby main node; calling a standby main node toregister an event monitor in the target Zookeeper; and calling the activation main node to perform task scheduling according to the to-be-executed task data and the plurality of working nodes to determine a target task scheduling result. Therefore, a decentralized architecture design is realized, a scheduling mode of a plurality of main nodes is supported, and a single-point fault risk is avoided.

column2: VIDEO-BASED INDOOR PERSONNEL POSITIONING METHOD AND VIDEO-BASED INDOOR PERSONNEL POSITIONING SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to a video-based indoor personnel positioning method, which comprises the following steps of identifying an identity number plate on a safety helmet of a worker wearing the safety helmet, performing face detection and identification on a worker not wearing the safety helmet so as to determine the identity of a to-be-positioned person, and generating personnel positioning information in combination with shooting time and a shooting place. The video-based indoor personnel positioning system comprises a video acquisition terminal and a server terminal, and the server terminal comprises a personnel detection module, a personnel safety helmet wearing detection module, a personnel non-wearing safety helmet identification assembly, a personnel wearing safety helmet identification assembly and a personnel position time information generation module. According to the invention, the problems of poor factory indoor signals, manual monitoring and incapability of identification and positioning due to the fact that the face of a worker is shielded by a safety helmet are solved, and personnel positioning in a factory indoor environment is realized.

column2: SELF-LEARNING PORTABLE QUICK-SCREENING URINE DETECTION SYSTEM
column4: A self-learning portable quick-screening urine detection system comprises an in-vitro detector used for inserting special quick-screening test paper for urine detection, shooting images and transmitting the images to an electronic device for comparative analysis, the quick-screening test paper is at least provided with an observation area and at least provided with one to fourteen test groups andan identification label, and an algorithm corresponding to the basic data of an urine detection project can be read. And the electronic device is internally provided with analysis software and a self-learning unit, and can compare the judgment data with a data parameter downloaded from cloud to generate a measurement value of each test group, and artificial intelligence learning display image correction is added so that an accurate detection report can be generated for a urine physiological reaction test item of a testee.

column2: SELF-ADAPTIVE ONLINE VOCATIONAL TRAINING PLATFORM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a self-adaptive online vocational training platform based on artificial intelligence. The platform comprises a user side and a background control side; the user side comprisesan online learning part and an online question solving part; the online learning part comprises a knowledge graph generation module, a learning behavior collection module and a personalized learning guide generation module; and the background control side comprises a learning video input module, a learning material input module, a related exercise input module and a knowledge graph division module. The device mainly negotiates from the concept of self-adaptive learning, the use condition of a user is adjusted at any time through real-time calculation of artificial intelligence, different knowledge points are pushed, and the learning efficiency of learners is improved. An accurate knowledge graph is constructed for different users and requirements.

column2: LENS STRUCTURE AND CAMERA APPLYING LENS STRUCTURE
column4: The utility model discloses a lens structure and a camera using the lens structure, the lens structure comprises a support assembly and at least two groups of lens assemblies arranged on the support assembly, each group of lens assemblies is located on different horizontal planes, and each group of lens assemblies is used for obtaining image information in the front, back, left and right directions. Through the at least two groups of lens assemblies located on different horizontal planes, the lens structure can acquire image information on different horizontal planes, so that image complementation is realized, images shot by the lens structure are richer and fuller, and the shooting effect of the lens structure is improved.

column2: EXERCISE AUXILIARY EQUIPMENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses exercise auxiliary equipment based on artificial intelligence. The equipment comprises two support columns, a support plate is arranged on the two support columns, the upper surface of a sliding plate is attached to sliding blocks, telescopic shafts and damping springs are fixedly connected between the lower surface of the sliding plate and the inner bottom walls of slidinggrooves, the damping springs movably sleeve the outer surfaces of the telescopic shafts, a movable rod is fixedly connected between the two sliding blocks, the two ends of the movable rod penetrate through the two sliding blocks respectively to extend to the outside, the two ends of the movable rod are movably sleeved with a plurality of balance weight rings, and limiting assemblies are arrangedbetween the balance weight rings and the movable rod. The equipment has the beneficial effects that when an exerciser suffers from a force disengaging situation, the sliding blocks cannot continue toslide downwards, so that the movable rod cannot continue to slide downwards, the situation that the exerciser is hit by the movable rod is avoided, and the exerciser is effectively protected.

column2: CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a climbing robot. The climbing robot is used for providing a robot solution with an upper handrail rope and a lower handrail rope as climbing objects. The climbing robot comprises a side hanging wheel assembly and a control module. The side hanging wheel assembly comprises a body rod and climbing modules; each climbing module comprises a V-shaped wheel anda V-shaped wheel mounting bracket; the V-shaped wheels are rotatably mounted on the V-shaped wheel mounting brackets; two groups of climbing modules are arranged in parallel in the length direction of the body rod, the V-shaped wheel of one group of climbing modules is upwards matched with an upper handrail rope, and the V-shaped wheel of the other group of climbing modules is downwards matched with a lower handrail rope, so that climbing along the upper and lower handrail ropes is realized; at least one group of climbing modules further comprises a driving motor, a driving motor mounting bracket and a driving transmission part; the driving motor is fixedly mounted on the V-shaped wheel mounting bracket through the driving motor mounting bracket and drives the V-shaped wheel to rotate through the driving transmission part; and the control module is used for controlling the rotation of the driving motor.

column2: VISUAL PERCEPTION PROTECTION FUNCTION AND LOOP PRESSING PLATE STATE DISTINGUISHING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a visual perception protection function and loop pressing plate state discrimination method, and the method comprises the steps: building a transformer substation screen cabinet relay protection function and loop pressing plate information model, and intelligently and dynamically capturing a screen cabinet protection function and loop pressing plate state video informationflow through a mobile terminal; and identifying the current operation state of the pressing plate by an artificial intelligence machine identification algorithm, and comparing the state with the stateof the pressing plate information model for intelligent check and judgment, so that harmfulness of the abnormal pressing plate is diagnosed, and an intelligent identification report of a protection function and a loop pressing plate state is formed. Through research and development and application of the invention, automatic identification and diagnosis of the state of the pressing plate are realized, the working efficiency of pressing plate inspection tour is improved, the working intensity of pressing plate operation and maintenance is reduced, and a technical means is provided for reliability inspection and safety monitoring of the operation state of relay protection equipment.

column2: IMAGING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses a shooting device comprising an image acquisition module, a space motion acquisition module and a first control module, and the first control module is respectively connected with the image acquisition module and the space motion acquisition module; the image acquisition module is used for acquiring panoramic image information on different planes; the spatial motion acquisition module is used for acquiring spatial motion information of the shooting device during motion; and the first control module is used for receiving the panoramic image information collected by the image collection module and the spatial motion information collected by the spatial motion collection module, and performing image processing on the panoramic image information and performing poseprocessing on the spatial motion information. And a clear three-dimensional space model can be constructed in combination with the processed panoramic image information and pose information.

column2: CONVENIENT-TO-ADJUST SECURITY AND PROTECTION MONITOR FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses a convenient-to-adjust security and protection monitor for artificial intelligence equipment, and relates to the technical field of monitors. A supporting block is hinged to the interior of a hinge seat, an adjustable fixed connection structure is formed through a limiting column and a first fixing bolt, a driving gear and a supporting seat form a rotary connection structure through a driven gear, a sliding plate is slidably installed in a first sliding groove and forms a movable fixed connection structure through a second telescopic rod, and a plurality of brushes arefixedly mounted at one side of a supporting column and located between two sliding blocks at equal intervals, so that after mounting, not only are the direction and angle of the monitor adjusted, theproblem of continuous adjustment during mounting is solved, and the mounting efficiency is improved, but also the mounting convenience and flexibility are improved, and the practicability of the monitor is improved. Moreover, front-and-back movement adjustment can be conducted, so that the reasonable utilization of space is increased, dust can be cleaned away conveniently, and the shooting definition is improved.

column2: VEHICLE AND VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE THEREOF
column4: The invention provides a vehicle and a vehicle speed control method and device thereof. The method comprises the following steps of obtaining a transverse position error and a course angle error of the vehicle; obtaining a target vehicle speed of the vehicle according to the transverse position error and the course angle error of the vehicle; acquiring an actual vehicle speed of the vehicle, and calculating a difference value between the actual vehicle speed and the target vehicle speed; adjusting the vehicle speed instruction according to the difference value, and controlling the vehicle to run according to the adjusted vehicle speed instruction; in the running process of the vehicle, obtaining the distance between the vehicle and a target parking point; and controlling the vehicle according to the distance between the actual position of the vehicle and the target parking point. According to the control method, longitudinal control over accurate position parking of the vehicle can beachieved, it is guaranteed that the vehicle runs normally under different working conditions, and the situation that the vehicle decelerates and even stops is avoided.

column2: PRESSURE EVALUATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a pressure assessment method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps as follows: a fingertip video of a test user is connected based on a mobile terminal; wherein the fingertip video is obtained by shooting when a finger of the test user shields a camera in a state thata flash lamp of the mobile terminal is turned on; the fingertip video is converted into an RGBA video format, and the sum of all pixel points in an R channel is extracted to obtain a PPG signal; based on the PPG signal, HRV features of the test user are obtained by extraction; and the HRV features of the test user are input into a preset pressure evaluation model to obtain a pressure evaluation result of the test user. When the pressure of the test user is tested, only the mobile terminal needs to be used for collecting physiological signals, professional collecting equipment is not needed, and the collecting cost is reduced.

column2: SYSTEM FOR ENCODING BUSINESS CARD IMAGES BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention relates to a method and a system for encoding business card images based on artificial intelligence. More particularly, a calculation result of a data-value generated according to the defined code system that corresponds 1:1 to real business card image information is mapped and encoded as metadata, stored and recorded in a server, so that business card information is automatically recognized and executed so as to perform a hyperlink function for connecting offline and online just by scanning (shooting) the business card image by a recipient prime;s smartphone, thereby checking relevant information and easily performing business card management, interactive communication, product promotion, or service subscription/purchase. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: INTERACTION SYSTEM OF SERVICE-ORIENTED ROBOT
column4: The invention discloses an interactive system of a service-oriented robot, relates to the field of interactive systems, and solves the problems that an existing interactive system is difficult for a user to understand a processing process, and is difficult to improve user experience and play an education role.According to the technical scheme, the interaction system comprises a robot, a touch display screen which is arranged on the robot and used for operating the robot in a touch mode, a camera which is used for shooting and obtaining images within the visual field range of the robot, and terminal equipment which is used for wirelessly controlling the robot; a display interface for a user to operate and check is arranged on the touch display screen, a plurality of sub-modules are arrangedon the display interface, and each sub-module is linked with a secondary interface for displaying information to which the sub-module belongs on the touch display screen for the user to operate and check. According to the interactive system of the service-oriented robot, good interaction between the user and the robot can be achieved, and the visual processing process improves the experience andunderstanding of the user interaction process.

column2: METHOD, DEVICE, AND APPARATUS FOR CONFIGURING AI PARAMETER OF RACING AI MODEL, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: This disclosure discloses an artificial intelligence (AI) parameter configuration method and apparatus for a racing AI model, an AI parameter configuration device, and a storage medium, belonging to the field of AI. The method includes: obtaining an nth generation of parameter set, each generation of parameter set including m sets of AI parameters, each set of AI parameters being used for indicating a travel manner of a racing AI model on a track, n??, m??; controlling the racing AI model to undergo an adaptation degree test for m times according to the m sets of AI parameters to obtain m adaptation degrees, the adaptation degree and a travel distance of the racing AI model on the track according to the AI parameters being positively correlated; generating a (n+1)th generation of parameter set according to the nth generation of parameter set in a case that all the m adaptation degrees are less than an adaptation degree threshold; and configuring, in a case that there is a target adaptation degree in the m adaptation degrees that is greater than the adaptation degree threshold, an AI parameter corresponding to the target adaptation degree as a target AI parameter. In embodiments of this disclosure, the AI parameters are automatically adjusted by using a genetic algorithm, thereby improving the efficiency of adjusting and configuring the AI parameters.

column2: EXERCISING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BY REFINING MODEL OUTPUT
column4: The improved exercise of artificial intelligence. Raw output data is obtained by applying an input data set to an artificial intelligence (AI). Such raw output data is sometimes difficult to interpret. The principles defined herein provide a systematic way to refine the output for a wide variety of AI models. An AI model collection characterization structure is utilized for purpose of refining AI model output so as to be more useful. The characterization structure represents, for each of multiple and perhaps numerous AI models, a refinement of output data that resulted from application of an AI model to input data. Upon obtaining output data from the AI model, the appropriate refinement may then be applied. The refined data may then be semantically indexed to provide a semantic index. The characterization structure may also provide tailored information to allow for intuitive querying against the semantic index.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE COMPREHENSIVE CONTROL SYSTEM APPLIED TO SOLID MAGNESIUM HYDRIDE HYDROLYSIS HYDROGEN GENERATION POWER GENERATION DEVICE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of hydrogen generation devices, and discloses an artificial intelligence comprehensive control system applied to a solid magnesium hydride hydrolysis hydrogen generation power generation device. The control system comprises an artificial intelligence control management module, a Zigbee signal transmission module, a Zigbee gateway module, a cloud data storage module, a multipath sensor signal acquisition and transmission module and a wireless control module which are established by taking a fuzzy control rule as an algorithm, the multipath sensor signal acquisition and transmission module is connected with a state monitoring sensor of the hydrogen generation and power generation device to obtain the running state of the hydrogen generation and power generation device; the signal input end of the Zigbee signal transmission module is connected to the multipath sensor signal acquisition and transmission module, and the signal output end of the Zigbee signal transmission module is connected to the artificial intelligence control and management module; the output end of the artificial intelligence control management module is connected with the input end of the wireless switching value control module; the system is high in intelligent degree and convenient to use.

column2: DYNAMIC AUTOMATION OF DEVOPS PIPELINE VULNERABILITY DETECTING AND TESTING
column4: An artificial intelligence (AI) platform to support a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for software development and operations (DevOps). One or more running processes are subject to monitoring to identify presence of vulnerabilities. An automated rebuild of the monitored processes is initiated, which includes constructing a map representing a relationship of test code elements corresponding to different portions of source code. The identified vulnerable source code reflected in a new container image is subject to an automatic verification to ascertain if the source code is covered by at least one of the represented test code elements. A risk assessment is employed as part of the verification. A new container image is selectively deployed responsive to the risk assessment.

column2: SCHEDULING IN A DATASET MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column4: Systems and methods for maintaining a project schedule in a dataset management system are provided. For example, a progress update comprising an indication of a status of training of a first machine learning algorithm may be received using at least one communication device from an external device involved in the training the first machine learning algorithm. A project schedule record may be accessed. An expected running time of the training of the first machine learning algorithm may be updated in the project schedule record based on the status of the training of the first machine learning algorithm. Information related to training of a second machine learning algorithm may be updated in the project schedule record based on the status of the training of the first machine learning algorithm.

column2: SCREEN SHOOTING RANGE USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY AND SCREEN SHOOTING GAME METHOD
column4: The present invention relates to a screen shooting range using artificial intelligence technology and a screen shooting game method. According to the present invention, the screen shooting range using artificial intelligence technology comprises: a set including a plurality of shooting spaces virtually divided to connect moving paths of a user, wherein the divided shooting spaces are decorated in accordance with different themes; a sensor unit to sense the position or movement of the user; a plurality of structures arranged in the shooting spaces; a plurality of video playing unit to play a video in the shooting spaces; a moving means provided such that the structures or the video playing unit can move; a main server to store a plurality of videos as a manual, and receive the position of a laser pointer; and a control unit to generally control the inside of the shooting spaces. Accordingly, the present invention allows a user to escape from a two-dimensional game for looking at only one screen and playing a shooting game and to enjoy three-dimensional and complex shooting games through movements similar to a real battle by using a plurality of screens and various structures. The user can enjoy a realistic game since a target appears along with movements of various structures. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: PHOTOGRAPHING METHOD AND MOBILE TERMINAL
column4: The invention is applicable to the technical field of terminals, and particularly relates to a photographing method based on an artificial intelligence (AI) technology and a mobile terminal. The photographing method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first image corresponding to a first display area; identifying a target feature of a shooting object and a scene feature of a scene where theshooting object is located in the first image; acquiring a to-be-recommended posture image according to the target feature of the shooting object and the scene feature of the shooting object, and displaying the posture image in a second display area to prompt the shooting object to perform posture adjustment according to the posture image displayed in the second display area; and photographing the photographed object to obtain a photographed image. The posture image is acquired by combining the target features and the scene features of the shooting object, the accuracy and effectiveness of posture image acquisition are improved, and the posture image is displayed in the second display area, so that posture adjustment of the shooting object can be facilitated or a photographer can guide the shooting object to perform posture adjustment conveniently, and the image shooting effect is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TYPE MONITORING DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence type monitoring device. The device comprises a base, wherein a supporting rod is fixedly connected to the top of the base, a circular groove is formed in the inner side wall of the supporting rod, a lifting mechanism is rotatably connected to the top of the inner side wall of the circular groove, and a transmission mechanism is engaged with the outer side wall of the lifting mechanism; and a monitoring box is fixedly connected to the outer side wall of the lifting mechanism, a collecting hopper is fixedly connected to the top of the monitoringbox in a penetrating mode, a filter screen is fixedly connected to the inner side wall of the collecting hopper, and an air inlet is fixedly connected to the top of the monitoring box in a penetrating mode. Through a series of driving actions, rainwater is utilized, a mirror surface is cleaned, the height of the device is adjusted, threats to the life health of people in the equipment maintenanceprocess are avoided, the mirror surface is cleaned, the influence of a large amount of dust adhering to the mirror surface on the camera shooting definition is avoided, the camera shooting definitionis improved, the camera shooting content is complete, and the life health safety of people is protected in a disguised mode.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INTERACTIVE TERMINAL DEVICE BASED ON CLOUD PLATFORM
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of cloud platform terminal equipment, and discloses cloud platform-based artificial intelligence interactive terminal equipment, which comprises a treadmill and an intelligent bracelet, the bottom of the treadmill is in transmission connection with a treadmill belt, and the left side of the top of the treadmill is fixedly connected with two parallelsupports. The upper portions of the two supports are obliquely and fixedly connected with display shells, display screens are fixedly embedded in the upper portions of the display shells, and storagegrooves are vertically and upwards formed in the positions, located on the lower portions of the right sides of the display screens, of the upper portions of the display shells. After the intelligentbracelet is connected with the Bluetooth transmission module on the treadmill through the Bluetooth transmission module of the intelligent bracelet, information in the database on the intelligent bracelet and data of the heart rate real-time monitoring module are recorded in the cloud database of the gymnasium, automatic man-machine interaction is achieved in the whole process, and in the exercise process, the exercise efficiency is improved. Exercisers can press the start-stop switch to control the treadmill to start and stop, the safety is greatly improved, and artificial intelligence interaction is more convenient.

column2: APPLICATION PROGRAM MULTI-LANGUAGE SUPPORT METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an application program multi-language support method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and can be applied to smart city construction. The method comprises the steps of receiving a page translation request sent by a user terminal; obtaining a text area contained in the page picture andcoordinates thereof through a pre-trained target detection model; separating the character area from the page picture, and identifying characters in the character area; converting the characters intoa target language to obtain translated characters; adding the translated text into the page picture, and setting the translated text on one side of the text area to obtain a target page picture; andsending the target page picture to the user terminal. Unified multi-language management is achieved through the server, multi-language maintenance on the terminal side is avoided, a multi-language library does not need to be arranged at the terminal, language version exchange does not need to be conducted, and therefore codes of the terminal are simplified, memory occupation of an application program is reduced, and the running speed of the application program is increased.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED PLATFORM SYSTEM FOR VIDEO COMMUNICATION BETWEEN NON-DISABLED PERSON AND HEARING-IMPAIRED PERSON AND OPERATING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based platform system for video communication between a non-disabled person and a hearing-impaired person. An objective of the present invention is to allow prompt communication for all users in the world between a social vulnerable class such as the hearing-impaired and the elderly and non-disabled people regardless of a country or a LANGuage, and receive and use content such as a variety of education and games regardless of men and women of all ages. For example, the platform system for video communication comprises: a first communication execution unit which is installed in a first communication terminal, transmits a video signal and a voice signal of a first user generated through the first communication terminal in real time to a server, and outputs a video signal and a voice signal of a second user received in real time from the server; a second communication execution unit which is installed in a second communication terminal, transmits a video signal and TExT data of the second user generated and inputted through the second communication terminal in real time to the server, and outputs a video signal and a voice signal of the first user received in real time from the server; and an artificial intelligence relay server unit to transceive a video signal in real time between the first communication terminal and the second communication terminal, convert a voice signal received from the first communication terminal into TExT data to transmit the TExT data to the second communication terminal, and convert at least one between TExT data and a sign LANGuage gesture of the second user in a video signal received from the second communication terminal into a voice signal to transmit the voice signal to the first communication terminal. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SUPERMARKET CASHIER SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence supermarket cashier system. The system comprises a counter, a camera frame and a main circuit board integrated with an automatic settlement system.The front part of the counter is provided with a storage table, and the rear part is provided with a conveyor belt I which is connected with a conveyor belt II; the conveying belt II is connected withthe storage table; a pedestrian path defined by a baffle is arranged on the side face of the counter, and a gate is arranged on the side, close to the conveying belt I, of the baffle; the camera frame is disposed on a counter where the conveying belt II is located and an adjacent baffle, wherein cameras I, II and III for shooting pictures of commodities purchased by customers and a binocular camera for shooting face pictures of the customers are arranged at the top of the camera frame; a loudspeaker, an LCD display and a power switch are arranged on one side of the storage table, wherein theloudspeaker, the LCD display and the gate are connected with the power switch; the conveyor belts I and II, the cameras I, II and III, the binocular camera, the loudspeaker, the LCD display and the power switch are connected with the automatic settlement system. The system is low in labor cost and high in efficiency.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR MAINTAINING CONSISTENCY OF RUNNING ENVIRONMENT, STORAGE MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses a method and device for maintaining consistency of a running environment, a storage medium and electronic equipment, relates to artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning and cloud computing, and particularly relates to the technical field of operating system virtualization and the technical field of continuous integration. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-compiled program code and target environment information in a continuous integration system; selecting a target Docker mirror image corresponding to the target environment information from the multiple Docker mirror images, wherein the multiple Docker mirror images are constructed by using the same Docker file and have different environment information; and constructing a Docker container according to the target Docker mirror image, and compiling a to-be-compiled program code in a Docker environment providedby the Docker container. Thus, the compiling execution process of other tasks can be effectively prevented from being influenced, the consistency of the running environment of the continuous integration system is maintained, conflicts with program codes for executing other tasks are avoided, and the continuous integration effect of the compiling process is effectively guaranteed.

column2: FACE 3D MODEL GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a human face 3D model generation method and device, equipment and a readable storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as image processing and augmented reality technologies. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: a server generates a second 3D model for a target object in a two-dimensional image, determines a skeleton driving coefficient set according to the second 3D model and a locally preset skinned skeleton model, and sends the skeleton driving coefficient set to electronic equipment. The electronic equipment deforms the locally preset skinned skeleton model according to the skeleton driving coefficients in the skeleton driving coefficient set, so that a first 3D model is obtained. In the process, the server only needs to send the skeleton driving coefficient set to the electronic equipment without sending a second 3D model, so that the bandwidth consumption between the electronic equipment and the servercan be reduced.

column2: FOOTBALL PLAYER TRACKING METHOD BASED ON DEEP LEARNING
column4: The invention discloses a football player tracking method based on deep learning, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. According to the method, improvement is carried out onthe basis of using an original twin region selection network, a ResNet-50 network is used for replacing an original A lecNet network to serve as a feature extraction network, the size and the aspect ratio of anchor points are modified, the twin region selection network is retrained, and the tracking precision and speed of players are improved to a certain extent. In addition, the method further introduces two parts, namely a front-end interface realized by Python, a path judgment module and a video frame interception module, so that the use experience is improved.

column2: CAMERA SHOOTING MECHANISM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a camera shooting mechanism based on an artificial intelligence system, which comprises a mounting frame,a supporting seat is fixed in the mounting frame, a supporting frame is arranged above the supporting seat, and a rotating structure is arranged between the supporting frame and the supporting seat. Acamera is mounted on the surface of the supporting frame at the top end of the supporting base, a U-shaped groove is formed in the surface of the supporting frame above the camera, cleaning sliding grooves are formed in the two inner walls of the U-shaped groove, cleaning sliding blocks are arranged in the cleaning sliding grooves, auxiliary blocks are fixed to one sides of the cleaning sliding blocks, and intelligent equipment is arranged at the bottom end of the mounting frame. According to the camera shooting mechanism, the stable rotation function of the camera shooting mechanism is achieved, the function of cleaning dust on the surface of a camera is achieved, and the convenience of dismounting and mounting of the camera shooting mechanism is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXERCISE AUXILIARY EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model discloses artificial intelligence exercise auxiliary equipment which comprises a wrist protection cushion and a main body module, one side of the wrist protection cushion is movablyconnected with a needle clamping bolt, the other side of the wrist protection cushion is provided with a fixing ring, one side of the fixing ring is provided with a needle hole seat in a penetrating mode, and one side of the needle hole seat is connected with an air detection box in a buckled mode. A connecting block is fixedly connected to one end of the wrist protection cushion, a fingerprint recognizer is arranged on one side of the main body module, the main body module is located on one side of the connecting block, a digital display screen is arranged on one side of the fingerprint recognizer, a camera is arranged above the digital display screen, and a voice loudspeaker is connected to one side of the camera in a buckled mode. And a starting block is arranged on the other side of the main body module. The artificial intelligence motion auxiliary equipment is provided with the wireless signal antenna, so that the artificial intelligence motion auxiliary equipment has an advanceddigital processing technology and a wireless positioning function, and the safety of a user is improved.

column2: TARGET USER LOCKING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a target user locking method and electronic equipment, and relates to the field of electronic equipment. The method provided by the invention can be applied toan AI (Artificial Intelligence) fitness scene. The locking accuracy for a target user can be ensured. The electronic equipment can complete the recognition of a target user and the tracking of the target user in a fitness process through the user recognition on features, or the user recognition in combination with the data collected by wearable equipment worn by the user, or the recognition on amotion mode of the user.

column2: TARGET DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a target detection method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to computer vision. The method comprises the steps of: determining at least two input images used for at least two target detectors respectively based on a to-be-detected image, wherein the at least two target detectors have different skeleton networks, and for each target detector in the at least two target detectors, processing the input image of the target detector by using the skeleton network of the target detector to obtain at least two image features of different sizes for the input image; determining a candidate detection result of the target detector based on the at least two image features of different sizes; and fusing the candidate detection results of the at least two target detectors to obtain a target detection result of the to-be-detected image.

column2: FAN BLADE FATIGUE LIMIT ATTENUATION INTELLIGENT MONITORING METHOD BASED ON IMAGE RECOGNITION
column4: The invention discloses a fan blade fatigue limit attenuation intelligent monitoring method based on image recognition. The method comprises the steps that S1, building a fan blade rapid microscopic analysis system; S2, shooting the surfaces of a new fan blade and an old fan blade according to a sweeping mode to obtain complete micrographs of different blades; S3, analyzing a micrograph, and extracting damage characteristics of scratches, cracks and pits on surfaces of leaves; S4, quantifying state parameters of blade surface damage ; S5, carrying out vibration fatigue tests on the new fan blades and the old blades with different service duration; S6, obtaining fatigue limit data of the blades; S7, realizing a method for establishing a response surface through training data based on an artificial intelligence algorithm of a small sample; and S8, establishing a fatigue limit recession intelligent prediction algorithm based on the blade surface state characteristics to obtain a corresponding relationship between the blade surface damage state parameters and the blade fatigue limit degradation degree. The invention can quickly predict the attenuation of the fatigue limit of the blades.

column2: POSTURE RECOGNITION AND TRAINING METHOD, DEVICE AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to a posture recognition and training method, device and system. The posture recognition method comprises the following steps: acquiring a three-dimensional image of a target object; obtaining a posture recognition model; and inputting the three-dimensional image into the posture recognition model, and outputting a posture recognition result of the target object. By adoptingthe technical scheme of the invention, the posture of the target object can be identified in a short time by combining the three-dimensional image and carrying out posture identification based on an artificial intelligence method only by simply shooting the object.

column2: BEHAVIOR RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and provides a behavior recommendation method, device, equipment, and a medium, which can perform processing preprocessing on annotationdata, effectively improve data quality, improve data availability, and improve interpretability of a prediction model in combination with an SHAP value and the prediction model. The to-be-improved link of each user can be judged in a targeted manner through the SHAP value, so that targeted behavior recommendation is carried out for the link subsequently, recommendation models are constructed for different user groups respectively, important exhibiting actions suitable for the respective groups are recommended, the influence on the data running speed when a single model is used is avoided, andfurthermore, thousands of people and thousands of people can be recommended in a targeted manner by combining an artificial intelligence means. The invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and the target recommendation behavior can be stored in the blockchain.

column2: AND CONTROL SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLING START AND STOP OF PLURALITY OF PASSENGER CONVEYORS
column4: A control system for controlling the start and stop of a plurality of passenger conveyors, the system comprising a remote camera and a remote controller respectively disposed corresponding to each ofthe plurality of passenger conveyors; the control system further comprises a monitoring server. The remote cameras are used for capturing images of the external states of the corresponding passenger conveyors in real time. The remote controller is arranged to control and collect the running state of the corresponding passenger conveyor; the monitoring server is connected with each remote camera and the remote controller through a data network; the monitoring server analyzes the image captured by the remote camera by using an artificial intelligence algorithm to judge whether a passenger existson the passenger conveyor or not; when the monitoring server judges that the passengers exist on the corresponding passenger conveyors, the passenger conveyors are grouped into non-automatic startingand stopping groups; and when the monitoring server judges that no passengers exist on the corresponding passenger conveyors, the passenger conveyors are grouped into groups capable of being automatically started and stopped.

column2: INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND COSMETIC PRODUCTION AND CLOUD SERVICE PLATFORM
column4: According to the information processing method based on artificial intelligence and cosmetic production and the cloud service platform provided by the invention, the running state change track betweendifferent equipment running state information can be determined and converted into the track feature list; a fault detection result when the to-be-detected cosmetic production equipment operates in the cosmetic production cycle is determined based on the node feature updating sequence in the trajectory feature list, and a target maintenance time period of the to-be-detected cosmetic production equipment is determined based on the fault detection result and production allocation information corresponding to the to-be-detected cosmetic production equipment, and the to-be-detected cosmetic production equipment is overhauled based on the target overhaul time period. Therefore, possible failure states can be analyzed in advance on the basis of the artificial intelligence model, maintenance iscarried out in the production window period, it is avoided that raw materials are polluted due to shutdown maintenance and raw material transfer when problems occur in the production process of the cosmetic production equipment to be detected, and then the production quality of subsequent cosmetics is guaranteed.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AUTOMATIC SPEED REGULATION TREADMILL
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence automatic speed regulation treadmill which comprises a treadmill case, supporting legs are fixedly connected to the lower surface of the treadmill case, a control case is fixedly connected to the side face of the treadmill case, a fixing column is fixedly connected to the front face of the control case, and a fixing frame is fixedly connectedto the upper surface of the fixing column. A handrail is fixedly connected to the lower surface of the fixing frame, a control panel is arranged on the upper surface of the fixing frame, and an intelligent voice receiver is arranged on the front face of the control panel. According to the artificial intelligence automatic speed regulation running machine, by arranging the control panel, the rotating motor, the controller and the running belt gravity sensor, the gravity transmitted from the running belt can be sensed, the gravity stays for a long time so that the controller can be convenientlytriggered, the rotating motor can be controlled to reduce the rotating speed until the rotating speed stops, and the rotating speed of the running belt is reduced until the running belt stops; therefore, the rotating speed of the treadmill can be controlled by gravity, and a runner is prevented from being injured by too high rotating speed of the treadmill.

column2: FOOD MATERIAL STORAGE METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a food material storage method and device. The method comprises the steps of acquiring a target image obtained by shooting a first area in a food material storage area througha camera device, wherein the first area is used for storing one type of food materials; identifying the target image to obtain a food material image and a background image in the target image, the food material image being an image of the food material in the target image, and the background image being an image other than the food material image in the target image; and under the condition that the food material images comprise images of at least two types of food materials at the same time, first alarm information being sent, and the first alarm information being used for indicating that a food material storage error phenomenon occurs in the first area. The technical problem that the food material storage accuracy is low is solved.

column2: LONG-DISTANCE GESTURE CONTROL INTEGRATED OPERATING ROOM SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a long-distance gesture control integrated operating room system. The system comprises a long-distance gesture recognition system and an integrated operating room system, wherein the long-distance gesture recognition system is composed of a binocular camera and artificial intelligence gesture recognition software running on the touch all-in-one machine; an integrated operating room control software system on the existing operating room touch all-in-one machine runs in the integrated operating room system; hardware of the integrated operating room system comprises a scanning gun, a touch all-in-one machine, a background server, an endoscope system, an EMR client host, a PACS client host, a video switching matrix, a plurality of medical endoscopic displays, an operating room switch, a hospital switch, an EMR server and a PACS server. The long-distance gesture recognition system acquires the instruction of the target person by collecting the hand gesture action ofthe target person, and sends the acquired instruction to the integrated operating room system, and execution of the instruction of the target person is realized.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR REMOTE INTELLIGENT TROUBLESHOOTING
column4: System and method for autonomous trouble shooting of a unit under test (UUT) having a plurality of replaceable components include: a test station that stores an artificial intelligence (AI) program and a knowledge database (KDB) including acceptable test results for each test point represented by an acceptable test vector, a test probe to test the circuit card assembly; and an operator station to send commands to the test station via the communication network to teach the AI program to capture and store the acceptable test result for each test point of the UUT by the test probe, in the KDB, wherein the AI program commands the test probe to test the UUT, stores the test results in a test result vector, compares the test result vector with the stored acceptable test vector, and displays recommendation as which replaceable component in the UUT to be repaired or replaced.

column2: POSITIONING SYSTEM OF RAIL TYPE TRANSPORTATION EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of positioning of rail-type transportation equipment, and particularly discloses a positioning system of rail-type transportation equipment, which comprises a rail and a vehicle body running along the rail, a plurality of positioning pieces are arranged on the rail along the way, and an RFID electronic tag and a permanent magnet are preset on each positioning piece along the way; the vehicle body is provided with a controller, an encoder used for measuring the rotation stroke of wheels of the vehicle body, an RFID card reader used for sensing the RFID electronic tag, and a magnetic sensor used for sensing the permanent magnet. The encoder, the RFID card reader and the magnetic sensor are all electrically connected with the controller; and the encoder, the RFID card reader and the magnetic sensor are all electrically connected with the controller. And the positioning precision, reliability and maintainability of the rail type transportation equipment are improved.

column2: VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL METHOD, DEVICE AND SYSTEM, AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a vehicle speed control method, device and system, and electronic equipment, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining a road where a current vehicle is located and a current lane, wherein the road comprises a vehicle entry located in front of the current vehicle; obtaining a target vehicle speed correction interval corresponding to the current lane, and taking the target vehicle speed correction interval as a target vehicle speed interval of the current vehicle, wherein the target vehicle speed correction interval is obtained by correcting a specified vehicle speed interval corresponding to the current lane according to the afflux information of vehicles passing through the vehicle afflux entrance; and issuing a vehicle speed control command to a speed control device of the current vehicle according to the target vehicle speed interval, and enabling the speed control device to adjust the vehicle speed according to the vehicle speed control command. The vehicle speed correction interval of the lane in the main road can be accurately determined, vehicles running on the main road are prevented fromcolliding with vehicles converged through the vehicle convergence port, and the road driving safety is improved.

column2: FITNESS ASSISTING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: The application provides a method for assisting fitness in the field of AI (artificial intelligence), and the method is characterized in that the method comprises the steps that electronic equipment obtains a user action; the electronic equipment determines alternative actions, meeting a first preset condition, of a movement track of a first limb in the user actions from the user actions; the electronic equipment determines an action change amplitude of a second limb in the alternative action; and the electronic equipment determines to output guidance information according to the action changeamplitude. By determining the alternative action with the limb action track meeting the first preset condition, the fitness action of the user can be accurately determined according to the limb action change amplitude in the alternative action. The guidance information is output under the condition of determining that the user performs the fitness action, the accuracy of outputting the guidance information can be improved, and the user experience is improved.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an image processing method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence.
