According to the embodiment of the invention, the three-dimensional face model is used as the complete face information through the non-occlusion three-dimensional face model, so that when the first image is occluded, the occluded area in thefirst image can be removed by synthesizing the complete face information and the first image, and the non-occlusion second image is obtained; in this way, the complete face is obtained by eliminatingshielding, the face recognition accuracy of the second image can be effectively improved, the complete face image can be obtained through synthesis without taking off the mask in a scene where the mask is worn, convenience and safety are improved accordingly, and an image containing the complete face can be obtained through synthesis in some shooting scenes.

column2: CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a climbing robot. The climbing robot is used for providing a climbing robot solution with two ropes as climbing objects. The climbing robot comprises a main body support, driving assemblies, a control module and a driven obstacle crossing wheel assembly; the main body support is used for bearing the multiple driving assemblies, the control module is used for controlling the driving assemblies, and the driving assemblies are used for achieving the climbing function; the distance of U-shaped wheels between the driving assemblies is matched with the distance between two ropes, and the driven obstacle crossing wheel assembly comprises a driven obstacle crossing wheel, a tensioning support, a tensioning support mounting shaft and a tensioning spring; the driven obstacle crossing wheel is rotatably mounted on the tensioning support, the tensioning support is slidably mounted on the tensioning support mounting shaft, and the tensioning support mounting shaft is sleeved with the tensioning spring, so that the tensioning support is located at one end of the tensioning support mounting shaft under the action of the elastic force of the tensioning spring; and the driven obstacle crossing wheel assembly is matched with the U-shaped wheels to sink the rope between the U-shaped wheels and the driven obstacle crossing wheel.

column2: METHOD FOR CALCULATING RUNNING POSITION OF VARIABLE FREQUENCY MOTOR DRIVEN VEHICLE BODY
column4: The invention discloses a method for calculating the running position of a variable frequency motor driven vehicle body, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, constructing an aging diagram, S2, carrying out sample learning, employing a deep convolutional neural network algorithm in a machine learning method, obtaining a numerical processing algorithm M through learning, wherein the numerical processing algorithm M is used for recognizing the aging diagram and calculating a position movement value f; wherein f is equal to M. (X, Y, C), historical data, a state value S and a standardfeedback value F are adopted as learning samples, learning algorithm coefficients are optimized and adjusted, and when the error percentage between a calculated value f and the standard feedback value is smaller than a set target, sample learning is completed; S3, judging and correcting; and S4, calculating in real time. According to the invention, an artificial intelligence machine deep learningmethod is used, a numerical algorithm is used to calculate the running position of the variable frequency motor-driven vehicle body, and equipment investment and maintenance cost are reduced.

column2: PHOTOGRAPHING METHOD, SYSTEM AND DEVICE AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a photographing method, a photographing system, photographing equipment and a medium. The method comprises the steps of: obtaining a photo data stream; identifying the state ofone or more target objects in the photo data stream, and obtaining a corresponding identification result; calculating a shooting score of the target object in the photo data stream according to the identification result and a pre-selected shooting style; and if the shooting score of the target object exceeds a preset score threshold and the image shooting device is in a shooting mode, outputting ashooting signal, and triggering the image shooting device to automatically shoot the target object. According to the invention, the shooting style type is selected in advance and the shooting score threshold value is set, so that after the image shooting device enters the shooting mode, the scene photo which most meets the aesthetic requirements of big data training and reaches the set thresholdvalue at present can be intelligently and quickly analyzed, and the shooting switch of the image shooting device is automatically triggered in time, so that the image shooting device automatically completes shooting. According to the invention, the requirement of taking pictures slightly can be met, and a person who is not professional can also take professional pictures.

column2: INDUSTRIAL VISION DETECTION METHOD BASED ON TRANSFER LEARNING AND KNOWLEDGE GRAPH
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of visual inspection, and particularly relates to an industrial visual inspection method based on transfer learning and a knowledge graph, which comprisesthe following steps: S1, shooting images of various qualified parts in various directions by using shooting equipment to serve as qualified samples; S2, importing the collected qualified sample imagesinto a computer, and labeling the qualified sample image; and S3, according to the qualified sample image, processing the qualified sample image through an RPN network and an SVM classifier to generate a qualified detection model of the part. According to the invention, the images of all directions of various qualified parts are collected as the qualified samples, so that the detection model sample of the qualified parts can be manufactured, and then the images of all directions of the to-be-detected parts are collected and compared, whether the to-be-detected parts are qualified or not can be judged, and therefore, the detection mode is more convenient and faster, the efficiency is higher, and the detection accuracy is also higher.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR IMPROVED OPERATIONS OF SKI LIFTS
column4: Systems and methods for improved operations of ski lifts increase skier safety at on-boarding and off-boarding locations by providing an always-on, always-alert system that ?œwatches??these locations, identifies developing problem situations, and initiates mitigation actions. One or more video cameras feed live video to a video processing module. The video processing module feeds resulting sequences of images to an artificial intelligence (AI) engine. The AI engine makes an inference regarding existence of a potential problem situation based on the sequence of images. This inference is fed to an inference processing module, which determines if the inference processing module should send an alert or interact with the lift motor controller to slow or stop the lift.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR SKI LIFT OPERATIONS
column4: Systems and methods for improved operations of ski lifts increase skier safety at on-boarding and off-boarding locations by providing an always-on, always-alert system that "watches" these locations, identifies developing problem situations, and initiates mitigation actions. One or more video cameras feed live video to a video processing module. The video processing module feeds resulting sequences of images to an artificial intelligence (AI) engine. The AI engine makes an inference regarding existence of a potential problem situation based on the sequence of images. This inference is fed to an inference processing module, which determines if the inference processing module should send an alert or interact with the lift motor controller to slow or stop the lift.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR SKI LIFT OPERATIONS
column4: Systems and methods for improved operations of ski lifts increase skier safety at on-boarding and off-boarding locations by providing an always-on, always-alert system that "watches" these locations, identifies developing problem situations, and initiates mitigation actions. One or more video cameras feed live video to a video processing module. The video processing module feeds resulting sequences of images to an artificial intelligence (AI) engine. The AI engine makes an inference regarding existence of a potential problem situation based on the sequence of images. This inference is fed to an inference processing module, which determines if the inference processing module should send an alert or interact with the lift motor controller to slow or stop the lift.

column2: MOBILE ROBOT USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention provides a robot cleaner comprising: a driving unit to move a main body; a cleaning unit to perform a cleaning function; a sensing unit to sense a surrounding environment; an image detection unit to acquire image data by photographing the surrounding environment; and a control unit controlling to perform preceding cleaning to generate a distance map representing distance information from an obstacle for a cleaning area based on the image information and information detected by the image detection unit and the sensing unit, and divide the cleaning area into a plurality of detail areas in accordance with the distance information of the distance map to independently perform cleaning for each detail area. Therefore, image division optimized for a mobile robot running straight can be provided by dividing an area in a map showing a cleaning area. Also, a complex moving path of a mobile robot can be minimized by separating an area in an industrial space such as a large office space, and movement can be minimized by minimizing a cleaning area having an L-shaped path. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: AUTOMATIC SCORING SYSTEM FOR BADMINTON MATCHES AND SCORING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention relates to an automatic scoring system and method for badminton matches, and the system is characterized in that the system comprises a real-time video collection unit which is used forthe real-time video collection of a court; a storage unit which comprises a video storage part and a score storage part; a calculation unit which comprises a video analysis processing unit and a ballserving analysis algorithm module, wherein the video analysis processing unit extracts video information from the video for analysis processing, and the video analysis processing unit transmits an analysis result to the ball serving analysis algorithm module; a control unit which comprises a scoring module and is in signal transmission connection with the ball serving analysis algorithm module; and a display unit which comprises a scoring display, wherein the display unit displays competition information according to the competition information, and the controller is electrically connected with the scoring display; the automatic scoring equipment based on artificial intelligence can replace a scoring referee to accurately score and display the score of each round of a match.

column2: COMPUTING POWER SCHEDULING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON KUBERNETES
column4: The invention discloses a computing power scheduling method and device based on Kubernetes, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: analyzing computing resources required by a machine learning current training task to decompose the type and quantity of a target accelerator card, screening out a corresponding machine node set according to a preset strategy in combination with computing power global data of all machine nodes in a Kubernetes cluster, and locking the computing resources of the machine nodes used by the current training task according to the corresponding machine node set, and establishing an inter-node mutual trust interconnection network on the machine nodes used by the training task, running the machine nodes used by thetraining task, and learning a training program to complete training. The device comprises an initial module, an analysis module, a screening module, an establishment module and a training module. According to the invention, intelligent distribution of resources is achieved, manual adjustment is not needed, and the efficiency is greatly improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED PERSONAL HEALTH MACHINE SYSTEM
column4: An operation method of an artificial intelligence-based health machine system according to the present disclosure comprises the steps of: selecting, by a user, a LANGuage to be used; determining, by the user, his or her own body type and characteristics by using the artificial intelligence-based health machine system; storing an exercise method executed by the user; recognizing, by artificial intelligence, an exercise type that the user desires to exercise through the stored exercise method; evaluating, by the artificial intelligence, an error and an improvement method of the exercise method of the user by utilizing exercise method data of the user according to the exercise type and error and improvement method data obtained by previously evaluating the user; and transmitting the error and the improvement method to the user and storing the error and the improvement method. According to the present invention, a user can exercise at low costs with the help of artificial intelligence. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: METHOD FOR EVALUATING FLOOD FLOODING RISK DURING RUNNING OF CANAL CROSSING BUILDING
column4: The invention relates to the field of risk assessment and particularly relates to an assessment method for flood flooding risk during operation of a canal crossing building. The method is advantaged in that most of existing researches focus on analysis of risks caused by over-standard flood, the probability of occurrence of the over-standard flood is extremely low, and contribution to improvementof the water supply safety of the artificial water conveyance canal in the operation period is small. Compared with the prior art, the risk assessment method provided by the invention focuses on floodin the design standard frequently encountered in the running period of the canal crossing building, and meanwhile, the actual conditions (silting of silt, branches, withered grass and other sundries,engineering aging and design flood calculation uncertainty) in the running period of the canal crossing building are comprehensively considered; the risk that flood overflows in the running period ofthe canal crossing building is evaluated, the allowable maximum sedimentation depth is provided, and water supply safety in the running period of the artificial water delivery canal can be effectively improved.

column2: METHOD FOR INTELLIGENTLY DISPATCHING SHOOTING TEAM BASED ON BIG DATA AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a method for intelligently dispatching a shooting team based on big data and artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, building a client database: building a client industry, region, volume and product information library, building a demand client library and a target crowd related library, wherein the client database in S1 is built througha cloud server to ensure data transmission. the invention is scientific and reasonable in structure and safe and convenient to use, and under the background of short video advertisement industrial manufacturing, the scheme solves the problems of prominent situation, large manual intervention and disordered management at present. Most standardized shooting orders are data calculation results basedon industry logic.

column2: DEVICE FOR AUTOMATICALLY COLLECTING, OBSERVING AND IDENTIFYING ACTIVATED SLUDGE SETTLEMENT EXPERIMENT PROCESS
column4: The invention discloses a device for automatically collecting, observing and identifying an activated sludge settlement experiment process. The device comprises an automatic sampling module, a comparison module, a camera module, a data processing module and a shell module, wherein the automatic sampling module comprises a transparent measuring cylinder, the bottom of the transparent measuring cylinder is provided with a waste liquid outflow pipe, the upper part is provided with an overflow port, and the top is provided with a water distribution pipe; the water distribution pipe is connected with a liquid inlet pipe and a clear water pipe; the camera module comprises a camera with a data transmission device; the comparison module comprises a comparison back plate, the comparison back plateand the camera are installed on the two sides of the transparent measuring cylinder respectively, the camera shooting module transmits shot images to the data processing module, artificial intelligence visual recognition analysis is conducted through the data processing module, and the related information of a settlement ratio experiment is obtained. The device can automatically collect, observe and identify the settlement ratio experiment process, accurately understand and describe sludge characteristics and characters, and provide technical decision reference for operation of a sewage treatment system.

column2: ACCESS DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE FOR REDIS CLUSTER
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides an access data processing method and device for a Redis cluster, which can be applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: determining a target tenant currently having an Redis cluster operation demand based on a memory data access interface opened to each tenant; and judging whether the pre-storedresource quota of the target tenant is greater than the actively acquired currently used resource quantity of the target tenant in the Redis cluster, and if so, performing data operation on the Rediscluster according to the Redis cluster operation demand of the target tenant. The resource utilization rate of the shared resources can be effectively improved, and the access data processing efficiency of the tenants for the Redis cluster and the resource allocation accuracy can be effectively improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FITNESS SERVICE SYSTEM USING SMART TRAMPOLINE
column4: The present invention relates to a fitness service system using a smart trampoline which includes a mat for providing elasticity, an exercise detection unit for detecting movement of the mat, a display unit, and a communication unit for performing communications with an external device, wherein operation of the display unit and the communication unit is controlled by a control unit. According to the present invention, an artificial intelligence fitness service system using a smart trampoline comprises: a service server allowing the smart trampoline to be accessed by the communication unit to provide a value detected by the exercise detection unit and allowing a user prime;s terminal to access and receive services related to trampoline fitness; an artificial intelligence calculation unit receiving the detected data of the exercise detection unit from the service server to calculate the exercise amount of the user who uses the trampoline; and a database unit storing data required for calculating of the exercise amount by the artificial intelligence calculation unit to provide the data to the artificial intelligence calculation unit, storing a calculation result of the exercise amount, and storing data required for providing the services related to the trampoline fitness. Accordingly, due to communications with the smart trampoline capable of detecting using movement, exercise amount information of the trampoline fitness can be provided and a user can efficiently perform fitness using the trampoline through effective guidance for the trampoline fitness. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: SMART TRAMPOLINE FITNESS SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to a smart trampoline fitness system which comprises: a trampoline including a mat having elasticity; an exercise detection unit installed to detect movement of the mat; an artificial intelligence calculation unit receiving a value detected by the exercise detection unit to calculate the exercise amount of a user who uses the trampoline; a memory unit storing data required for calculating of the exercise amount by the artificial intelligence calculation unit to provide the data to the artificial intelligence calculation unit, and storing a calculation result of the exercise amount; a display unit displaying the calculation result of the exercise amount to the outside; a communication unit performing wireless communications with an external terminal; and a control unit controlling that the calculation result of the exercise amount is displayed through the display unit and is provided to the external terminal by the communication unit. Accordingly, the system detects movement of using the trampoline to provide exercise amount information and to enable a user to perform fitness suitable for the user through effective fitness guidance, enables accurate and reliable fitness confirmation and guidance for the user by artificial intelligence and machine learning, enables the user to perform fitness autonomously and efficiently, and applies a high-elastic band and a foot for cushioning to be used comfortably and safely while preventing noise, slipping, and the like. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: METHOD AND EQUIPMENT FOR BLURRING USER PORTRAIT
column4: The invention provides a method and equipment for blurring a user portrait. The method comprises the steps of monitoring an application used by a user to obtain user use data of the application; in response to a request that the user wants to blur the user portrait, generating a simulation script for running the application according to the user use data of the application; and when the user doesnot use the application, executing the simulation script. Meanwhile, an artificial intelligence model can be used for executing the user portrait blurring method executed by the electronic equipment.

column2: SOCIAL DRIVING BEHAVIOR TRACKING EVALUATION METHOD AND RELATED DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a social driving behavior tracking evaluation method and a related device, which are used for tracking, acquiring and sending a large amount of driving process data and increasing the utilization rate of the driving process data. The method comprises the steps: acquiring driving state information of at least one target vehicle, wherein the driving state information comprises but is not limited to running state information of all parts of the target vehicle and operation behavior information of a driver; generating real-time driving behavior data according to the driving state information; uploading the real-time driving behavior data to a cloud database; performing multi-dimensional big data learning and analysis on the real-time driving behavior data in the cloud database by using an artificial intelligence model to generate driving process data; performing data classification on the driving process data to generate driving data packets required by different enabling platforms; and sending the driving data packet to a corresponding enabling platform.

column2: TERMINAL AND TOOL PROCESSING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a terminal and a tool processing method, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the terminal comprises: a camera which is used for collecting an image; a processor which is used for responding to the first tool shooting instruction and obtaining a first image collected by the camera, wherein the first image is an image containing all tools sortedafter the tools are used; inputting the first image into a trained neural network model to determine an identifier of a first tool in the first image, the identifier of the first tool being information representing the type of the first tool; determining the number of the first tools contained in the first image according to the identifier of the first tool; and comparing the number of the firsttools with the number of the second tools contained in the second image, wherein the second image is an image containing all the tools before the tools are used, and whether the tools are lost or notafter the tools are used can be accurately and conveniently judged according to the comparison result.

column2: CROWD INTERACTION-BASED INTELLIGENT IMAGE ACQUISITION AND INTERACTION METHOD AND SYSTEM, TERMINAL AND MEDIUM
column4: A crowd interaction-based intelligent image acquisition and interaction method and system, a terminal and a medium solve the problems of high effect implementation cost, increased manual misjudgment rate, reduced interaction efficiency and the like due to the fact that professional photographers are required to perform scene shooting uninterruptedly for 24 hours in the prior art. An old audience and photographer linkage system is replaced, and a traditional photographing mode is changed. Under the assistance of artificial intelligence, a potential shooting scene is intelligently searched, so that close-range shooting and a real-time live broadcast audience interaction scene are carried out. On the basis of guidance of perceptual engineering and image understanding, wonderful moments of audience interaction are automatically presented. Artificial intelligence is used for replacing professional photographers, so that the effect implementation cost is greatly reduced.

column2: CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE FOR PREVENTING EXHAUST INLET OF SANITATION SWEEPER FROM BEING BLOCKED
column4: The invention provides a control method and device for preventing an exhaust inlet of a sanitation sweeper from being blocked and the sanitation sweeper. The method comprises the steps that in the running process of the sanitation sweeper, the position of the sanitation sweeper is obtained in real time; the sanitation sweeper is controlled to be stopped at a set position, the draught fan is controlled to be turned off, and the set position at least comprises one stopping point; the motor pull rod is controlled to move to drive the air suction port to vibrate for preset times, so that foreign matters blocking the air suction port fall off. According to the control method, the sanitation sweeper is controlled to stop at the set position, and the air suction opening is controlled to vibrate,so that foreign matter blocking the air suction opening falls off, and the situation that the sweeping effect of a sweeping area is poor due to the fact that the air suction opening is blocked is avoided.

column2: MOTION MONITORING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND COMPUTER EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to a motion monitoring method and device based on artificial intelligence and computer equipment. The method comprises the steps of obtaining body state data and a motion video of a monitored object in a motion process of the monitored object; performing image recognition on the motion video to obtain a motion recognition result, wherein the motion recognition result is usedfor indicating the completion number and completion time of the key postures; if the body state data or the motion recognition result does not accord with a preset motion prescription, outputting corresponding prompt information, wherein the preset exercise prescription comprises the required number and the required frequency of the key postures. By adopting the method, the patient can be supervised to effectively implement exercise prescriptions.

column2: MOTION CONTROL METHOD OF CABLE ROBOT AND CABLE ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a motion control method of a cable robot and the cable robot. The cable robot hardly causes damage to a cable in the moving process. According to the embodiment, a load and a climbing mechanism of the cable robot are arranged in a split mode, the load can be borne on a body, the climbing mechanism is arranged on a front body, during movement, the climbingmechanism firstly moves and drives the front body to move, after the front body reaches a designated position, a first holding mechanism of the front body holds a cable tightly, and the body is pulledto move along the cable by withdrawing a connecting rope, so that the movement of the cable robot is realized. When the cable robot moves, the load does not need to be carried to climb, the load onlyneeds to be pulled through the connecting rope after the front body reaches the designated position, and the cable is hardly damaged in the load pulling process.

column2: STUDENT BEHAVIOR REMOTE MONITORING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides a student behavior remote monitoring method and system. The method comprises the following steps: carrying out the video shooting of students, extracting a plurality of corresponding images, and determine a corresponding target image pair according to the pixel correlation information of two adjacent images after preprocessing, finally, judging whether the behavior of the student is normal or not according to the image similarity between the two images contained in the target image pair, and making a corresponding warning operation, so that the shot images can be subjected to refined analysis from the pixel level, the behavior state of the student in the class process can be comprehensively, automatically and accurately remotely monitored, and therefore, various different types of abnormal behaviors made by students can be effectively discriminated.

column2: RUNNING LIMB SHIELDING POSTURE RECOGNITION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a running limb shielding posture recognition method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, collecting image data: setting image collection devices at a plurality of angles according to the requirements of a scene (a running scene) with collected data, and collecting the posture of a human body in a running state, after the limb posture image data of a person is compared with comparison information stored in a main controller, acquiring data information corresponding to the limb posture information, wherein the main controllercomprises an image processing module and a comparison module; S2, processing data; S3, tracking limb coordinates; S4, correcting coordinates; and S5, drawing animations; in the detection process, when action of a model character cannot be detected due to shielding of the character or incompleteness of an image of the edge area of a camera, the character action of the previous frame is supplemented into the current image by comparing the number of people and the position relationship of the current image and the previous image, and the problem that the character disappears suddenly is avoided.

column2: BALANCE ASSEMBLY STRUCTURE OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EDUCATION ROBOT
column4: The invention discloses a balance assembly structure of an artificial intelligence education robot. The balance assembly structure comprises a support plate, rollers, a first belt pulley, a belt, a first motor, a buffer moving mechanism and a stretching mechanism. The buffer moving mechanism is arranged at the bottom of the support plate, when the robot moves, rotating wheels drive first telescopic rods and second telescopic rods to contract through fixing blocks, and the second telescopic rods press buffer springs to deform and contract, so that the vibration force in the running process of the robot is absorbed, and the advantage that the robot can stably move is achieved; and by arranging the stretching mechanism at the top of the support plate, a second motor drives a rotating block torotate, moving blocks drive sliding plates to move at the upper end of the support plate through sliding blocks, and therefore the distance between the sliding plates is increased, large placed objects can be placed, and the advantage that the placed objects can be rapidly fixed is achieved.

column2: ELEVATOR SYSTEM WITH INTELLIGENT LEARNING FUNCTION AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ELEVATOR
column4: The invention discloses an elevator system with the intelligent learning function. The system comprises a visual acquisition device, a holographic projection elevator calling device, a voice communication device, a data acquisition system, a database, an artificial intelligence system and an elevator control system. By applying the elevator system with the intelligent learning function to an elevator, the elevator system acquires human face information of a user through the visual acquisition device, information processing and analysis are carried out through the data acquisition system, and after the human face information is compared with information data in the database, a corresponding elevator running program is executed; and when running data of the user exists in the database, the information is directly sent to the elevator control system to execute the corresponding elevator calling action, certainly, the user can also modify an elevator calling instruction through the holographic projection elevator calling device, and the use intelligence degree is high.

column2: INTELLIGENT EXPERIMENTAL ROBOT BASED ON SELF-LEARNING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent experimental robot based on a self-learning system. The intelligent experimental robot comprises a ball picking robot (100). Shooting robots (200) which can be detachably connected with the ball picking robot (100) are arranged on the left side and the right side of the ball picking robot (100) correspondingly. Ball conveying robots (300) which can be detachably connected with the ball picking machine (100) are arranged on the front side and the rear side of the ball picking machine (100) correspondingly. By adopting the intelligent experimental robot based on the self-learning system provided by the invention, self-learning can be realized through the architecture of the self-learning system, so that the robot has certain artificial intelligence; andmeanwhile, the robot can have a multi-action simulation function and can verify the self-learning system.

column2: EYE EXERCISE QUALITY EVALUATION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of computer vision, in particular to an eye exercise quality evaluation system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a data acquisition system, a data analysis system and a data evaluation system which are connected in sequence, and solves the problems that at present, people have poor accuracy in grasping eye exercise massage acupoints, and wrong eye exercises not only cannot achieve an expected result, but also can influence the vision development of teenagers. According to the method, a pre-established three-dimensional human head statistical model is aligned with the three-dimensional coordinates of the key points obtained through the deep neural network to perform acupoint alignment, so that the head acupoint points are positioned more accurately, and the network complexity is lower; and besides, the acquired actual step sequence and the standard action sequence are subjected to matching calculation, and the duration and the step sequence are combined as an evaluation judgment result, so that the judgment precision is improved, the accuracy of eye exercise acupoints is further enhanced, the quality of eye exercisesof students is improved, the system calculation amount is small, and the operability is high.

column2: RFID INVENTORY VEHICLE PATH PLANNING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to an RFID inventory vehicle path planning method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps of 1, constructing a BIM of an archive; 2, arranginga plurality of cameras in a library, shooting images in the library, projecting the images to the same composite panoramic plane, and splicing the images; 3, cutting the spliced image into sub-imageswith the same size; 4, inputting the sub-images into a key point extraction network to obtain a personnel key point thermodynamic diagram; 5, heat accumulation based on a forgetting algorithm being carried out on the thermodynamic diagram in a preset fixed time period, and BIM ground coordinates corresponding to points higher than a threshold value serving as to-be-detected target positions to bestored as path nodes; and 6, RFID inventory vehicle path planning being carried out, semantic segmentation detection results being combined in the driving process, small path planning being carried out, and crowds or obstacles being avoided in real time. According to the method, the RFID inventory vehicle inspection path can be planned, accuracy is high, efficiency is high, and the real-time performance is good.

column2: VIDEO INVENTORY MAKING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON 5G+ ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IN IRON AND STEEL INDUSTRY
column4: The invention relates to a video inventory making method and system based on 5G+ artificial intelligence in the iron and steel industry. The method comprises the following steps: 1) carrying out real-time photographing through a camera installed on a travelling crane along with the movement of a vehicle to obtain a steel coil video in a warehouse; 2) transmitting the steel coil video through 5G CPE equipment installed on the travelling crane; and 3) constructing and training a steel coil counting model, taking the steel coil video as the input of the trained steel coil counting model, countingaccording to the detection result, and outputting the final statistical result. Compared with the prior art, the method of the invention has the advantages that the efficiency is improved, counting is accurate, and repeated shooting and missing shooting are avoided.

column2: 3D MODEL CONVERSION METHOD ADOPTING RPA (ROBOT PROCESS AUTOMATION)
column4: The invention discloses a 3D model conversion method adopting RPA (robot process automation), and relates to the field of augmented reality, virtual reality and robot process automation, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, designing a 3D model conversion action into an RPA software robot working process; s2, executing actions such as model editing and modifying by using an RPA tool;s3, calling an artificial intelligence image recognition algorithm, recognizing a UI (User Interface) and a position of a computer software running environment, and updating corresponding informationin the RPA; s4, calling an artificial intelligence natural language processing algorithm, identifying output information content in computer software operation, and transmitting the output informationcontent to the RPA for processing; s5, completing an RPA process to generate a converted 3D model file; and S6, outputting the converted 3D model to augmented reality, virtual reality and other devices for display and use. According to the invention, the 3D model conversion process is automated and is combined with an artificial intelligence algorithm, so that the conversion process is intelligent, and the use of the 3D model in equipment such as augmented reality and virtual reality is promoted.

column2: POWER CONSUMPTION CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE OF ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT, STORAGE MEDIUM AND TERMINAL
column4: The invention discloses a power consumption control method and device for electronic equipment, a storage medium and a terminal. The method comprises the following steps: identifying a real-time working scene of the electronic equipment by adopting a machine learning method; and controlling the power consumption of the electronic equipment by adopting a control method corresponding to the real-time working scene. By means of emerging artificial intelligence technologies such as machine learning, the working scenes are judged according to temperature distribution of main devices, software running states, operation instructions of users and the like under various working scenes of the electronic equipment, and strategies for increasing power consumption or reducing power consumption are executed timely and accurately when the working scenes are switched, so that the endurance time of the electronic equipment is prolonged as much as possible in a scene needing endurance time improvement according to user requirements, the performance of the electronic equipment is improved as much as possible in a scene needing performance improvement, the electronic equipment has long endurance and high performance on the premise that the cost is not increased, and the market competitiveness is greatly improved.

column2: EXERCISING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BY REFINING MODEL OUTPUT
column4: The improved exercise of artificial intelligence. Raw output data is obtained by applying an input data set to an artificial intelligence (AI). Such raw output data is sometimes difficult to interpret. The principles defined herein provide a systematic way to refine the output for a wide variety of AI models. An AI model collection characterization structure is utilized for purpose of refining AImodel output so as to be more useful. The characterization structure represents, for each of multiple and perhaps numerous AI models, a refinement of output data that resulted from application of an AI model to input data. Upon obtaining output data from the AI model, the appropriate refinement may then be applied. The refined data may then be semantically indexed to provide a semantic index. Thecharacterization structure may also provide tailored information to allow for intuitive querying against the semantic index.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING CAMERA CONVENIENT TO ADJUST
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence monitoring camera convenient to adjust, which comprises a cylindrical box body, the side wall of the box body is provided with a right-angle recess, the upper end of the box body is rotatably connected with a vertically arranged rotating shaft, and the upper end of the rotating shaft is fixedly provided with a horizontally arranged camera body. Wherein a limiting piece used for limiting the camera body is arranged on the box body, a partition plate is fixedly connected in the box body, the lower end of the rotating shaft is rotatably connected to the upper end of the partition plate, and a servo motor is fixedly mounted on the lower side of the partition plate and is in transmission connection with the rotating shaft. Through the arrangement of the box body with the right-angle recess, the device can be more attached to a wall corner, and the fixing firmness is improved; through the arrangement of the rotating shaft and the servo motor, the shooting angle of the camera can be adjusted, compared with a traditional fixed camera, the shooting range can be greatly enlarged, the shooting dead angle can be reduced, and meanwhile thehardware cost can be reduced.

column2: SOFTWARE ACTIVATION VERIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides a software activation verification method and device. The method comprises the steps of detecting a current running environment of software; when the current running environmentof the software is a physical machine environment, acquiring locally stored activation information; decrypting the activation information stored locally to obtain a unique identifier of the terminaldevice, and the unique identifier comprises a universal unique identification code of the mainboard, a mainboard serial number and a BIOS serial number; acquiring a unique identifier of local terminalequipment; and when the unique identifier in the activation information is consistent with the unique identifier of the local terminal equipment, judging that the software verification is successful.According to the activation verification method, only when the running environment of the software is judged to be the physical machine, the unique identifier of the terminal device is obtained; theunique identifier is prevented from being copied and modified in the virtual machine environment, and the form of the combination of the universal unique identification code, the mainboard serial number and the BIOS serial number of the mainboard serves as the unique identification code. When in use, the unique identifier can only be read and cannot be modified, so that the invention is more convenient and safer.

column2: DRIVING ASSISTANCE SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a driving assistance system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a vehicle speed monitoring unit, a vehicle balance monitoring unit, a gearbox unit, an accelerator unit and a computer computing unit, and is characterized in that the vehicle balance monitoring unit monitors an included angle formed between a vehicle and a horizontal plane in a driving process, the automobile speed monitoring unit monitors vehicle speed, the gearbox unit realizes automatic gear shifting of the vehicle, the accelerator unit automatically feeds oil to the running vehicle,and the computer computing unit calculates real-time accelerator supply amount and gears according to the torque of the vehicle. The problems of vehicle sliding and difficult starting during uphill starting can be solved for people, and traffic accidents caused by vehicle sliding, flameout and the like are avoided.

column2: 5G COMMUNICATION TOWER MAINTENANCE PLATFORM FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the field of communication tower maintenance, in particular to a 5G communication tower maintenance platform for artificial intelligence. The 5G communication tower maintenance platform for the artificial intelligence comprises a main frame, two mounting frames, a tool box mounting frame, a tool box, a door opening and closing mechanism, climbing power mechanisms, L-shapedleg frame mechanisms, telescopic leg mechanisms and a storage battery. The two mounting frames are separately connected to the upper end and the lower end of the main frame. The tool box mounting frame is connected to the main frame, the tool box is connected to the tool box mounting frame in a rotating mode, the door opening and closing mechanism is connected to the upper end of the tool box mounting frame, one climbing power mechanism is connected to the middle of the main frame, and the other two climbing power mechanisms are connected to the two mounting frames separately. The L-shaped leg frame mechanisms are connected to the left ends and the right ends of the three climbing power mechanisms through threads, and the telescopic leg mechanisms are connected to the six L-shaped leg frame mechanisms. The 5G communication tower maintenance platform for the artificial intelligence can automatically climb a climbing ladder upwards, the climbing danger of workers is reduced, and time isshortened and labor is saved.

column2: METHOD FOR GUARANTEEING WORK QUANTITY FOR EXCELLENT WORKER IN CROWDSOURCING-BASED PROJECT FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LEARNING DATA GENERATION
column4: The present invention relates to a method for guaranteeing a work quantity for an excellent worker in a crowdsourcing-based project for artificial intelligence learning data generation. The method includes: a step of assigning work of a crowdsourcing-based project to workers and making a work execution request; a step of receiving the input of work results from the workers; a step of assigning the work results to inspectors and making an inspection execution request; a step of receiving the input of inspection results with respect to the work results from the inspectors as inspection pass or reject; and a step of calculating the number of consecutive inspection passes by worker by counting the number of inspection passes by worker based on the inspection result. The step of assigning the work results to the workers and making the work execution request includes: a step of identifying an excellent worker whose number of consecutive inspection passes exceeds a preset excellent worker reference quantity; a step of preferentially assigning the work that correspond to a guaranteed work quantity to the excellent worker; and a step of assigning one of the work to a general and non-excellent worker and assigning one new work out of the work each time the general worker completes one work and inputs one work result. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: WEARABLE DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses a wearable device, and belongs to the technical field of investigation. The wearable device of the utility model comprises a camera device. The camera device comprises at least one camera. The wearable main body comprises a shielding piece for shielding the camera device, and a light transmitting hole corresponding to the camera is formed in the shielding piece. The wearable hidden camera device provided by the utility model can shoot a target in a hidden condition so as to improve the concealment of shooting the target by reconnaissance personnel.

column2: LIMB MOVEMENT RECOGNITION AND COMPARISON METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a limb movement recognition and comparison method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, collecting standard limb movement data, andtraining a standard movement model; s2, collecting body movement data to be compared; s3, inputting to-be-compared body movement data into the standard movement model, and respectively extracting body key point data in the standard body movement data and the to-be-compared body movement data; and S4, according to the standard limb movement data and the limb key point data in the to-be-compared limb movement data, calculating the deviation between the to-be-compared limb movement and the standard limb movement, and scoring the to-be-compared limb movement. The body movement recognition and comparison cost is low, the convenience is high, the efficiency is high, and the body movement recognition and comparison method can be applied to AI fitness and other scenes.

column2: INTELLIGENT SCREENING METHOD FOR SIX-AGE DENTAL CARIES OF CHILDREN BASED ON DEEP LEARNING
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent screening method for six-age dental caries of children based on deep learning, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, collecting a six-age dental image; s2, extracting rich and reliable features from six-age tooth images with different sizes and shapes by using deep learning; s3, detecting the features; and S4, classifying the detected decayed teeth. According to the method, the area position of the six-age tooth can be accurately detected, the problems of shadow and shielding of shooting are solved, the generalization and robustness of model detection and classification are improved, the human input and personal errors are reduced through an artificial intelligence technology, and the screening efficiency, sensitivity, specificity and thelike are improved.

column2: ATTENTION MECHANISM HUMAN BODY IMAGE KEY POINT POSTURE ESTIMATION METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an attention mechanism human body image key point posture estimation method and system, belongs to the technical field of image processing, and aims at generating a product which can meet the requirements and is stable in quality; and the method comprises the steps of inputting a human body image into a neural network structure for nonlinear processing, and obtaining the generated human body skeleton key point posture image; and taking the generated human skeleton key point posture image and the truly marked human firmware key point image as inputs of a loss function, calculating a value of the loss function, solving a gradient of the value of the loss function, carrying out back propagation on the obtained gradient, updating a parameter of a network weight, and carrying out multiple iterations until the loss function is not changed.

column2: SEMANTIC EMOTION ANALYSIS METHOD, DEVICE, AND EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of intelligent decision in artificial intelligence, and discloses a semantic emotion analysis method, which comprises the steps of obtaining an importance metric value corresponding to each word in a to-be-analyzed statement; obtaining an implicit expression corresponding to the to-be-analyzed statement through two parallel running recurrent neural network modelsaccording to the importance metric value corresponding to each word in the to-be-analyzed statement; inputting the implicit expression corresponding to the to-be-analyzed statement and the sentence label corresponding to the to-be-analyzed statement into a semantic sentiment analysis classifier; and receiving an emotion analysis classification result of the semantic emotion analysis classifier for the to-be-analyzed statement. By introducing a self-attention mechanism, the importance of each word in the sentence is quantified through an importance measurement value, and then the meaning of the current word in the whole sentence is obtained according to the position of the important word, so that each word in the sentence and the corresponding importance measurement value thereof are fusedin the hidden state of the finally output whole sentence.

column2: EYE MICRO-EXPRESSION ANALYSIS METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON DEEP LEARNING
column4: The invention provides an eye micro-expression analysis method and system based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the recognition of a plurality of face images obtained through the continuous photographing of a target object, so as to obtain the dynamic change condition of the eye coordinate information of the target object; and determining eye opening and closingstate information of the target object according to the dynamic change condition of the eye coordinate information, determining association degrees between the plurality of images and different presetmicro-expressions, and finally performing quantitative evaluation on the overall expression of the target object in the shooting period so as to determine an actual micro-expression state of the target object. According to the method, the action change condition of the eye region of the target object is determined in a dynamic face image analysis mode, so that the eye micro-expression of the target object is accurately and objectively recognized and determined, and the real-time emotional state of the target object is quickly judged.

column2: DIGITAL TWINBORN BODY CONSTRUCTION METHOD OF HUMAN SKELETON
column4: The invention discloses a digital twinborn body construction method for human skeletons, which comprises the following steps: acquiring data at important positions of a human body by utilizing VR (Virtual Reality) action capture and sensor technologies aiming at real human skeletons, and performing data classification, screening, reduction and calculation through artificial intelligence to obtainkey data; solving the key data through a human body reverse dynamics and biomechanics algorithm to obtain spatial orientation information and mechanical information of a target skeleton, fusing part of sensor data with a calculation result, then performing analogue simulation on the target skeleton, and obtaining the biomechanical property of the target skeleton and predicting the biomechanical property of the skeleton in an unknown posture by utilizing a plurality of prediction algorithms; and finally, performing modeling rendering on the performance data to obtain a high-fidelity digital twinning body of a real bone, thereby realizing loyalty twinning mapping of bone biomechanical properties. Under various human body action postures, the biomechanical property of the target skeleton canbe calculated in real time by utilizing the wearable VR equipment and a small number of sensors, and the real-time health detection of the target skeleton can be realized.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DEVICE FOR CLEANING TREADMILL TRACK
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence device for cleaning a treadmill track. The artificial intelligence device comprises a machine box, wherein a fixing rod is fixedly arranged on the upper side of the machine box, and an intelligent module used for manual control is fixedly arranged on the upper side of the fixing rod; a running cavity with an upward opening is formed in the machinebox, a right belt wheel shaft is rotationally connected into the rear wall of the running cavity, and a right belt wheel is fixedly arranged on the right belt wheel shaft; and a left belt wheel shaftlocated on the left side of the right belt wheel shaft is rotationally connected into the rear wall of the running cavity, and a left belt wheel is fixedly arranged on the left belt wheel shaft. According to the artificial intelligence device for cleaning the treadmill track, compared with a traditional treadmill, firstly, an air cylinder is started to drive a lead screw to rotate so as to drivea cleaning box to move front and back to clean the treadmill track, and in addition, a water pipe in the cleaning box can be regularly tightened and loosened so as to protect the water pipe, so that the situation that the service life of the water pipe is shortened due to messy winding is prevented.

column2: ELECTRIC POWER TRANSACTION METHOD BASED ON BLOCK CHAIN TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses an electric power transaction method based on a block chain technology, and the method comprises the steps: A, a French token exchange rate is determined in an electric power transaction market according to an existing available electric power condition, and an electric power price bidding creation century block is issued through employing a block chain token; B, a power supply company publishes an online fee unit price and an artificial intelligence electric meter rental rate block; C, the artificial intelligence ammeter of the electricity or new energy user publishespredicted future electricity quantity and expected electricity price bidding blocks of the user through edge calculation after analysis according to historical electricity consumption records; D, thepower station, the new energy or the energy storage user publishes an on-grid electricity price bidding block; E, the power transaction market continuously matches the electricity prices and the electricity quantities of the power supply and consumption users according to the block chain block records, and charges transaction fees; and F, after the artificial intelligence electric meter carries out electric charge token pricing according to the actual electricity generation amount and the intelligent contract, a transaction record is issued in an online mode. According to the invention, point-to-point intelligent contract bidding, accounting, chaining and transaction of the intelligent electric meter can be realized.

column2: RESOURCE INFORMATION RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND APPARATUS BASED ON SPEECH RECOGNITION, AND TERMINAL AND MEDIUM
column4: The present application belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. Disclosed are a resource information recommendation method and apparatus based on speech recognition, and a terminal and a medium. The method comprises: acquiring an audio clip of a user to be recommended, and analyzing, according to the audio clip, data information of the user to be recommended; then, determining, according to the data information, a resource type suitable for the user to be recommended; next, determining, according to the resource type, each resource name corresponding to the resource type and a fitness function corresponding to the resource type; updating a pre-set genetic algorithm model according to the determined fitness function; taking each resource name as an input parameter of the genetic algorithm model and running the genetic algorithm model so as to obtain the name of a resource to be recommended; and sending resource information corresponding to the name of the resource to be recommended to the user to be recommended. Resources that are suitable for a user can be quickly determined, thereby improving the accuracy of resource information recommendation.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR MEASURING AND ANALYZING BODY MOVEMENT, POSITIONING AND POSTURE
column4: One aspect of the invention provides a computer-based method for providing corrective feedback about exercise form, the method comprising; recording a user performing a specific exercise: evaluating, by the computer, with machine learning, computer vision, or deep learning models that have been previously trained in order to evaluate the form of a user by training on labelled and or unlabeled datasets that consist of: both correct and incorrect exercise form for the different types of exercises being evaluated; identifying the user throughout the video, the exercise type, each repetition of the exercise, the user's errors in form; and then generating, by the computer, corrective feedback for the user on how to improve exercise form for subsequent repetitions; and communicating, via an output device, the corrective feedback to the user.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR MEASURING AND ANALYZING BODY MOVEMENT, POSITIONING AND POSTURE
column4: One aspect of the invention provides a computer-based method for providing corrective feedback about exercise form, the method comprising; recording a user performing a specific exercise: evaluating, by the computer, with machine learning, computer vision, or deep learning models that have been previously trained in order to evaluate the form of a user by training on labelled and or unlabeled datasets that consist of: both correct and incorrect exercise form for the different types of exercises being evaluated; identifying the user throughout the video, the exercise type, each repetition of the exercise, the user's errors in form; and then generating, by the computer, corrective feedback for the user on how to improve exercise form for subsequent repetitions; and communicating, via an output device, the corrective feedback to the user.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AUTOMATED RESPONSE SYSTEM HAVING CUSTOMER AUTHENTICATION FUNCTION USING SPEAKER AUTHENTICATION AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence automated response system and a method thereof. More specifically, the present invention relates to the artificial intelligence automated response system having a customer authentication function using speaker authentication and the method thereof, wherein a call, control data, and voice of the automated response system can be integrated and relayed, and the voice recognition for the customer prime;s spoken voice and the speaker authentication are performed at the same time by using the integrated relay so as to provide a service responding to a verified speaker. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: TRAMPOLINE DANGEROUS BEHAVIOR DETECTION REMINDING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a trampoline dangerous behavior detection reminding method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of establishing a standard human body three-dimensional model, and collecting an original image of a trampoline area; detecting a human body key point two-dimensional coordinate sequence in the original image, obtaining a human body key point three-dimensional coordinate sequence through a TCN network, and obtaining a human body contour map through a semantic segmentation network; optimizing the standard human body three-dimensional model accordingto the human body contour map and the human body key point three-dimensional coordinate sequence to obtain the weight W of a customer; obtaining the time experienced by the bouncing process accordingto the vertical downward deformation distance h of the center of the trampoline surface, detecting the maximum value hmax of h in each bouncing process, calculating the maximum bouncing height H of the customer according to hmax and W, and judging whether dangers possibly exist in the bouncing process or not; and detecting an average attitude score s of the human body key point three-dimensional coordinate sequence corresponding to the plurality of frames of original images in the bounce process which may have dangers, calculating a danger degree coefficient of the bounce process, and judgingwhether the bounce process has dangers or not.

column2: METHOD FOR MEASURING MASTERY DEGREE OF KNOWLEDGE POINTS
column4: The invention relates to a method and system for measuring the mastery degree of knowledge points, and the method comprises the steps of respectively obtaining the accurate proficiency of students inquestion solving, the state transition easiness degree from non-mastery to mastery, and the progress of a review link through combining three aspects which have greater impact on the firmness of the knowledge points, and finally, obtaining a firmness index value through a three-dimensional vector modulus solving method. The invention can be widely applied to an online education and self-adaptive learning platform, can grasp the state conversion and review consolidation progress according to the overall question-making performance of students, and can measure the stability degree or the degree(knowledge point firmness) of the students at the current level of each knowledge point. The index is especially helpful for more effectively distinguishing the actual mastering degree of the masteredknowledge points, thereby being helpful for distinguishing the subsequent exercise intensities of different knowledge points in the product process, and providing a personalized learning scheme for students in a more targeted manner.

column2: TARGET DETECTION MODEL PROCESSING METHOD BASED ON INTELLIGENT DECISION AND RELATED EQUIPMENT THEREOF
column4: The embodiment of the invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and relates to a target detection model processing method and device based on intelligent decision, a computer device and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the training of an initial multi-target detection model according to an obtained local data set, and obtaining a relay multi-target detection model; calculating composite model parameters according to the generated additional random number and the model parameters of the relay multi-target detection model; sending the compositemodel parameters to a central server to indicate the central server to generate global model parameters according to the composite model parameters of each node; receiving global model parameters to update the relay multi-target detection model; and taking the updated relay multi-target detection model as an initial multi-target detection model of the next round of training to carry out iterativetraining until the model converges to obtain a multi-target detection model. In addition, the invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and the local data set can be stored in the blockchain.According to the invention, the accuracy of target detection is improved.

column2: HYBRID TRAIN ENERGY MANAGEMENT METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON DEEP REINFORCEMENT LEARNING
column4: The invention discloses a hybrid train energy management method and system based on deep reinforcement learning. The method comprises: acquiring historical data of the train running speed, the train running environment, the train running energy consumption information and the train running power assembly information of a hybrid train to serve as source data; extracting speed, acceleration and battery capacity from the source data as input, taking an energy management strategy as output, and establishing an energy management strategy model; establishing a train power simulation model, and inputting the energy management strategy into the train power simulation model to obtain a simulation running state and a reward parameter; optimizing the energy management strategy model according to thereward parameters; performing offline training through deep reinforcement learning to obtain an optimized energy management strategy model; and inputting the real-time data of the hybrid train into the optimized energy management strategy model to obtain an optimized energy management strategy. According to the invention, the hybrid power train energy management can be carried out by completely applying a machine learning artificial intelligence means.

column2: I_SUIT: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND IOT BASED REMOTE CONTROLLED DEVICE FOR FACILITATING MOBILITY IN HUMAN BODY.
column4: I_Suit: An Artificial Intelligence and IoT based remote controlled device that is interchangeably called I_Suit (99) for providing the low cost and easy to use I_Suit (99) for solving the problem of immobility faced by the amputees and paraplegic people but not limited to wherein the I_Suit (99) provides the mobility, movement and/or locomotion to the users without sitting in a wheelchair. the I_Suit helps in maintaining the balance of the human body, standing, climbing, walking, coordinated leg movement and proper algorithmic steps, wherein the I_Suit can include or remove the components comprising it to fulfil, improve or add one or more functionalities. the I_Suit does not provide the mechanism or support for running and jumping. The architecture of the I_Suit is shown in Fig. 4.

column2: INTERPRETABLE INTELLIGENT LEARNING REPORT PRODUCTION METHOD
column4: The invention provides an interpretable intelligent learning report production method, which comprises the steps of shooting test paper made by a target object to obtain a test paper picture; performing content identification on the test paper photo to obtain test questions included in the test paper and test results corresponding to the test questions; wherein the test questions comprise test question contents and full score values corresponding to the test questions; wherein the test result comprises answer content and test question scores; screening out a target test result of which the test question score is smaller than a full score corresponding to the test question from the test results; obtaining target answer content included in the target test result and target test question content corresponding to the target test result; obtaining at least one problem solving method content corresponding to the target test question content; and generating a learning report corresponding tothe target object according to the target answer content, at least one question solving method content corresponding to the target test question content and a preset error reason interpretation model.

column2: CODE EDGE SAWTOOTH ANTI-COUNTERFEITING METHOD AND PRODUCT
column4: The invention belongs to a code edge sawtooth anti-counterfeiting method, which comprises the following steps of: printing a two-dimensional code on printed matter, and printing some sparse ink dots or/and line segments in a blank area with the width of 0-2mm near the two-dimensional code; promoting the ink forming the ink dots or/and the line segments to randomly diffuse to form sawtooth edges; amplifying and shooting the two-dimensional code and the sawtooth edge to obtain microscopic feature information of the sawtooth edge; and correspondingly storing the obtained microscopic feature information and the two-dimensional code into an anti-counterfeiting inspection system database to serve as an anti-counterfeiting feature information file. According to the method, the code edge is ingeniously utilized, the sawtooth edge formed by the ink dots or/and the line segments on the code edge can be used as an anti-counterfeiting feature, the trouble of revision is avoided, two-dimensional code reading interference is avoided, and microscopic feature information of the sawtooth edge can be conveniently acquired through code scanning.

column2: TITLE OF INVENTION: ALARM SYSTEM FOR SWIMMING POOL USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND METHODS THEREOF
column4: TITLE OF INVENTION: ALARM SYSTEM FOR SWIMMING POOL USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND METHODS THEREOFABSTRACT:Swimming Pools have witnessed many deaths due to negligence of the swimmers, naive learners and safeguards. The invention discloses a safety alarming system by observing the people in swimming pool by a surveillance camera, the continuous monitoring system captures images based on sensors data of availability of people in swimming pool, with the help of image processing techniques the drowning or ill health behavior are detected and with a strong alarm system, pool authority is alerted for quick action. This invention ensures safety of people from getting drowned and ensures safe environment. The system also ensures continuous surveillance based on the sensors detection of people in the pool.

column2: EYE DISEASE SCREENING ROBOT CARRYING FUNDUS PHOTO SCREENING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an eye disease screening robot carrying a fundus photo screening system, which comprises an eye disease screening robot used for automatically shooting and uploading each partof the eyes of a user, and a shooting unit used for shooting each part of the eyes of the user in a high-definition manner, wherein the support base is used for supporting and controlling the robot tooperate and is connected with the bottom of the shooting unit, and the screening system is used for analyzing and diagnosing pictures shot by the eye disease screening robot through a deep learning DenseNet algorithm. The eye disease screening robot comprises a camera, a picture interface used for receiving pictures shot by the camera, an analysis unit used for extracting picture features based on a DenseNet analysis algorithm and then conducting diagnosis, and a release interface used for sending an analysis result to the eye disease screening robot, and solves the problems that an existingmachine for screening eye diseases of patients based on an artificial intelligence system still needs to be operated by professionals; and only a single kind of eye diseases can be screened.

column2: METHOD FOR INCREASING DEEP LEARNING TRAINING DATA VOLUME
column4: The invention provides a method for increasing deep learning training data volume, which comprises the following steps: S1, determining batch of update gradients according to the total data volume, and determining sub-batch of calculation gradients according to memory or video memory data; s2, calculating a sub-batch number contained in the batch size of the update gradient, wherein the sub-batchnumber contained in the batch size of the update gradient is a quotient of the batch size of the update gradient and the sub-batch size of the calculation gradient; s3, running forward propagation ofthe network on the sub-batch number of data contained in the batch size of the updated gradient, and then performing back propagation to calculate the gradient relative to the network parameters; s4,executing the step S3 to update the sub-batch number contained in the batch size of the gradient, accumulating the sub-batch number contained in the batch size of the updated gradient, and taking an average gradient; and S5, updating model parameters by using the average gradient. Training is more stable, and the training effect is better; the training process is accelerated; a CPU with limited memory and a GPU with limited video memory can be used for training a large-scale network.

column2: EQUIPMENT SEARCHING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to an equipment searching method and electronic equipment in the field of artificial intelligence, and are used for marking a position of equipment to be searched in an image incombination with the positioning of the equipment to be searched and a shot image, so that a user can quickly search the equipment in an actual application scene, and the user experience is improved.The equipment searching method comprises the steps that: first equipment acquires position information of second equipment; the first equipment acquires a relative position of the second equipment andthe first equipment according to the position information of the first equipment and the position information of the second equipment; if determining that the second equipment is within a shooting range of the first equipment according to the relative position, the first equipment shoots a first image; the first equipment determines a region where the second equipment is located in the first image; and the first equipment highlights a region where the second equipment is located in the first image.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CAMERA STRUCTURE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of electronic equipment, and particularly discloses an artificial intelligence camera shooting structure. The structure comprises a shell, wherein an accommodating cavity is disposed in the shell, and the shell is provided with a light hole; a camera which is positioned in the accommodating cavity; a tension spring which is located in the accommodatingcavity, wherein one end of the tension spring is fixedly connected with the shell, and the other end is fixedly connected with the camera; an armature which is fixedly connected with the camera; an electromagnet which is fixedly arranged in the accommodating cavity, wherein the camera and the light hole are both located between the tension spring and the electromagnet; a control device which is used for controlling the electromagnet to be powered on or powered off according to the acquired biological characteristic information, wherein when the electromagnet is powered on, the camera slides along with the armature to be aligned with the light hole. When the electromagnet loses power, the tension spring drives the camera to deviate from the light hole. The invention provides an artificial intelligence camera shooting structure which can solve the problem that an existing camera shooting assembly can easily intercept and capture photos and videos under the condition that a user does notperceive the existing camera shooting assembly and guarantee personal information safety of the user.

column2: LIP LANGUAGE RECOGNITION METHOD FUSING VARIOUS VISUAL INFORMATION
column4: The invention discloses a lip language recognition method fusing various visual information. The lip language recognition method comprises the following steps: acquiring a lip language image by usinghead-mounted camera shooting and acquisition equipment; classifying and storing acquired video data according to an acquisition object and an acquisition batch; decomposing each video sample frame byframe, denoising an image, cutting a processed image, and only storing a lip image with a specific size; building a self-supervision optical flow generation network, and inputting the collected data into the generation network; and inputting the real image, the optical flow data and the depth image into a built three-flow fusion training network for recognition task training, and outputting a final lip language recognition result. More attention is paid to a lip area of the human face in the shot data, the step of recognizing and cutting the lip area is omitted before the neural network training is used, and recognition efficiency is greatly improved.

column2: LIMB REHABILITATION TRAINING DETECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND CONTROL EQUIPMENT
