column4: The invention relates to a limb rehabilitation training detection method and system based on artificial intelligence, and control equipment, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a rehabilitation training image of a target, obtaining human body key points through key point detection, obtaining two-dimensional skeleton key points of the target through combining a component affinity relation vector field, and generating a 3D motion sequence through a time domain convolution model, namelythe three-dimensional coordinate information of human body key points; binding each piece of behaviorinformation with a corresponding patient wristband ID through a KM matching algorithm in combination with the three-axis angular velocity of a gyroscope in the patient wristband to obtain rehabilitation training information of a patient, and comparing the rehabilitation training information of a target with rehabilitation training information of a set standard to obtain rehabilitation training action deviation, judging whether the rehabilitation training action deviation is smaller than a set deviation threshold value or not, and if yes, considering that rehabilitation training of the targetis qualified. According to the method, automatic binding of information is completed by combining visual perception and a sensor, and the rehabilitation training condition of the corresponding patientcan be more conveniently and rapidly confirmed.

column2: SPACE POSITIONING METHOD AND THREE-DIMENSIONAL RECONSTRUCTION METHOD APPLYING SPACE POSITIONING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a spatial positioning method and a three-dimensional reconstruction method applying the spatial positioning method, and the spatial positioning method comprises the steps: determining a first relative position relation matrix of a first point location and a second point location according to the first IMU data of the first point location and the second IMU data of the second point location; determining a second relative position relation matrix of the first point location and the second point location according to the feature point matching pair of the first image of the first point location and the second image of the second point location; according to the first relative position relation matrix of the first point location and the second point location and the second relative position relation matrix of the first point location and the second point location, determining the initial position of a shooting device at the second point location; and determining thefinal position of the shooting device at the second point location according to the initial position of the second point location and the feature point matching pair of the first image and the secondimage.

column2: USER-POWERED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TREADMILL
column4: The present invention relates to a user-powered artificial intelligence (AI) treadmill and, more specifically, to a user-powered treadmill using a piezoelectric device. According to the present invention, the treadmill comprises: a footplate enabling a user to put feet thereon; a piezoelectric device unit having a plurality of piezoelectric devices installed on the footplate of the treadmill to convert mechanical energy supplied by the user into electric energy; a power source operating the treadmill with the electric energy converted in the piezoelectric device; an AI sensor using a stride to check the user prime;s exercise amount and enabling the user to perform exercises based on a plan; a display unit providing an exercise video suitable for the user prime;s performance; and a wireless charging holder for a mobile terminal such as a smartphone. Accordingly, electricity can be produced simultaneously with the exercise on the treadmill, and thus the treadmill provides an effect of increasing motivation for an exercise. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: TITLE OF INVENTION: SYSTEM FOR SWIMMING POOL WATER QUALITY MAINTENANCE AND SAFETY USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND METHODS THEREOF
column4: A water quality alert system integrated with safety surveillance under water in swimming pool using artificial intelligence .The safety system with the help of laser lights detects motion with help of motion sensors , if found unusual , alerts are sent to the processor for alarming. System is also integrated with a quality control sensor to ensure water quality and using laser lights to ensure no other insects or animals are pool.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED HEALTHCARE SERVICE PROVIDING APPARATUS
column4: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based healthcare service providing apparatus. According to the present invention, the apparatus comprises: a user health information management unit which receives user health information including user information input from a user and user state information including at least one biometric information measured; a user exercise information management unit for receiving user exercise information obtained by measuring the amount of exercise of a user; an external environmental information management unit which collects environmental harmful information outside the user according to a current location of the user; an information analysis processing unit which analyzes the user health information, the user exercise information, and the environmental harmful information to predict a disease that may develop in the user; and a healthcare service providing unit which guides the improvement of the user prime;s disease by presenting a healthcare role model to the user according to the predicted disease of the user, and providing the role model prime;s eating habits and exercise habits. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: SKELETON-BASED TWO-STAGE DATA-TO-TEXT GENERATION METHOD
column4: The invention relates to a skeleton-based two-stage data-to-text generation method, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence and natural language generation. According to the method, data-to-text generation is divided into a framework construction stage and a text generation stage. The method comprises the steps: firstly, proposing a framework construction model SCST based ona structured Transformer to construct a text skeleton of data; and then, embedding the text skeleton into a skeleton-based non-autoregressive text generation model SNAM provided by the method, and gradually generating a text by utilizing insertion and deletion operations. According to the method, knowledge association between character transmission news can be well mined, and the method is remarkably superior to a traditional model in terms of BLEU and ROUGE indexes.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CNN AND LSTM NEURAL NETWORK DYNAMIC IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence CNN and LSTM neural network dynamic identification system, which belongs to the field of intelligent security early warning, and comprises a shootingacquisition terminal, a server, a convolutional neural network, a long-short-term memory neural network, an early warning system, a rejection system, a cloud server, a screening system, a confirmation module and a local data module which are connected in sequence, the output end of the elimination system is also connected with the input end of the local data module; the shooting acquisition terminal comprises an intra-area public camera, an intra-area private camera, an intra-area automobile data recorder and an intra-area mobile phone terminal, and authority acquisition APPs are arranged inthe intra-area public camera, the intra-area private camera, the intra-area automobile data recorder and the intra-area mobile phone terminal. The shooting acquisition terminal is connected with the server through the wireless communication unit to realize transmission; according to the system, comprehensive information data acquisition is facilitated, the application range is wide, and the accuracy is high.

column2: DETERMINING A SOCIAL GROUP TO WHICH CUSTOMERS BELONG FROM APPEARANCE AND USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, MACHINE LEARNING, AND COMPUTER VISION, FOR ESTIMATING CUSTOMER PREFERENCES AND INTENT, AND FOR IMPROVING CUSTOMER SERVICES
column4: An artificial intelligence (AI) system for determining to which social group a person belongs. The AI system includes a computer system and a computer program product which, when running on the computer system, is to: retrieve at least one image of the person belonging to a social group; labels the person, resulting in a labeled person; retrieve at least one image part showing appearance of the labeled person; subject said at least one image part to at least one trained machine learning model defined in the computer program product, the machine learning model including at least a part that is trained on a test set of annotated images which are annotated with respect to categories that correlate to social group, and determine from the at least one trained machine learning model a social group category to which the labeled person belongs.

column2: FOOD DELIVERY METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a food delivery method and device. The method comprises the steps of obtaining order information of a to-be-delivered target order, wherein the order information comprises a target position of a food corresponding to the target order, a target image of the food, a target weight of the food and a delivery destination of the food, and the target position is a position of obtaining the food; controlling an intelligent robot used for delivering the target order to reach the target position, thereby enabling the intelligent robot to obtain the food; under the condition thatthe intelligent robot receives the current food, shooting a first image of the current food and obtaining a first weight of the current food; and under the condition that the first weight is consistent with the target weight and the first image is consistent with the target image, delivering the current food to the delivery destination. According to the method and the device, the technical problemof relatively low food delivery accuracy is solved.

column2: ELECTRIC POWER WORKING CONDITION INTERNET-OF-THINGS MONITORING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND USING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an electric power working condition Internet-of-things monitoring device based on artificial intelligence and a using method, relates to the technical field of electric power working condition monitoring, and aims to solve the problem that working data of a monitoring device cannot be timely and effectively shared with a remote terminal due to lack of corresponding Internet-of-things intersection between the monitoring device and the remote terminal, the monitoring effect of the electric power working condition is poor, and the intelligent monitoring requirement of theelectric power working condition cannot be met. An insulation pad is arranged in the device shell, a processor is arranged in the device shell, a current transformer and a voltage transformer are arranged on one side of the processor, and a relay protector and a temperature sensor are arranged on the other side of the processor. The output ends of the current transformer, the voltage transformer and the temperature sensor are all electrically connected with the input end of the processor, a clamping groove is formed in one end of the device shell, a threaded hole is formed in the clamping groove, and a fixing block is arranged below the device shell.

column2: CONTAINER TRUCK ANTI-LIFTING CONTROL SYSTEM BASED ON VIDEO STREAM AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a container truck anti-lifting control system based on video stream and artificial intelligence, which comprises a processor, an Ethernet switch and a camera which are connected in sequence, and the camera is installed on the operation side of a cart and used for shooting video stream data of a container truck bracket in real time and transmitting the video stream datato the processor through the Ethernet switch; and the processor is used for detecting and judging the video stream data and outputting an alarm signal and a control signal to an external protection system. The device is simple in hardware composition, convenient to install and maintain and low in failure rate; the system is slightly influenced by external illumination, wind, sand, rain, snow and other environments; the system performs analysis and processing based on the image video stream, the operation response time is short, the real-time performance is high, the accident of mistakenly hoisting container trucks in the port wharf operation process is effectively avoided, and the safety of personnel and vehicles is protected.

column2: GLITCH FREE CURRENT MODE ANALOG TO DIGITAL CONVERTERS FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: Single-stage and multiple-stage current-mode Analog-to-Digital converters (iADC)s utilizing apparatuses, circuits, and methods are described in this disclosure. The disclosed iADCs can operate asynchronously and be free from the digital clock noise, which also lowers dynamic power consumption, and reduces circuitry overhead associated with free running clocks. For their pseudo-flash operations, the disclosed iADCs do not require their input current signals to be replicated which saves area, lowers power consumption, and improves accuracy. Moreover, the disclosed methods of multi-staging of iADCs increase their resolutions while keeping current consumption and die size (cost) low. The iADC's asynchronous topology facilitates decoupling analog-computations from digital-computations, which helps reduce glitch, and facilitates gradual degradation (instead of an abrupt drop) of iADC's accuracy with increased input current signal frequency. The iADCs can be arranged with minimal digital circuitry (i.e., be digital-light), thereby saving on die size and dynamic power consumption.

column2: EQUIPMENT FAULT DIAGNOSIS METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON VOICE RECOGNITION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention provides an equipment fault diagnosis method and device based on a voice recognition technology, and the device comprises an MCU chip, a voice recognition AI chip, and a power module; the MCU chip is connected with the voice recognition AI chip, the voice recognition AI chip is connected with a three-axis acceleration chip, and the MCU chip is connected with a clock chip, a display module, a communication module and a storage module; the communication module is connected with an information recording module. The method adopts a voice recognition artificial intelligence chip + MCUdouble-brain fault recognition architecture to process acceleration vibration information collected by the MEMS vibration sensor in real time. The current running state of the tested equipment is obtained, and real-time monitoring of the equipment can be achieved. According to the equipment fault diagnosis method and device based on the voice recognition technology, four paths of high-precision ADC chips are provided, the line space is saved, the cost is low, and the fault recognition accuracy is improved.

column2: PASTURE GRASSLAND DESERTIFICATION DETECTION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND AERIAL IMAGES
column4: The invention discloses a pasture grassland desertification detection method based on artificial intelligence and aerial images. The method comprises the steps: firstly carrying out data collection ofa pasture grassland through an unmanned aerial vehicle, obtaining an aerial RGB image and an aerial near-infrared image, and calculating a soil index SI and normalized difference vegetation index NDVI of the aerial image; and inputting the aerial RGB image in combination with SI and NDVI into a bare sand segmentation neural network and a grassland vegetation segmentation neural network to obtaina bare sand segmentation image and a grassland vegetation segmentation image, and performing post-processing on the two images to obtain a grassland desertification segmentation image. The unmanned aerial vehicle is used for cruising shooting to obtain a plurality of pasture aerial images, and a complete pasture area image is formed through image splicing. And the grassland desertification segmentation image and the pasture area image are projected to a pre-established pasture BIM, data visualization of pasture grassland desertification detection is performed at a Web terminal in combination with a WebGIS technology, and a bare sand distribution condition of the pasture grassland is displayed.

column2: TABLE TENNIS TABLE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a table tennis table based on artificial intelligence, which comprises two groups of table tennis tables, a support body and a dividing net, the two groups of table tennistables are spliced together, the dividing net is arranged at the splicing position of the two groups of table tennis tables, the support body is fixed at the bottom of the table tennis table, and thesupport body is fixed at the bottom of the table tennis table. First grooves are formed in the two sides of the table tennis table, second grooves are formed in the ends, away from the dividing net, of the table tennis table, driving devices are arranged in the first grooves, and moving blocks sliding in the first grooves are arranged on the driving devices. The driving device, the turnover deviceand the cloth collecting device can be automatically controlled through the weather forecast receiving device and the control device, so that the shielding cloth is shielded on the surface of the table tennis table, and erosion of rainwater is prevented.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE XIAOJING BASED ON INTERACTIVE LEARNING SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence Xiaojing based on an interactive learning system, the interactive learning system comprises a server and a learning terminal in network connection with the server, both the learning terminal and the server comprise a plurality of processors, and the artificial intelligence Xiaojing is a software system running on the processors. A program module forming the artificial intelligence Xiaojing comprises a voice detection unit; an expression feature analysis unit; a convolutional neural network speech analysis unit; a semantic judgment unit; a psychological characteristic analysis unit; and the Xiaojing image is a direct medium for interaction between the user and the learning interaction system and is displayed on a display screen of the learning terminal, and the user can perform interface operation and information retrieval on each program module through voice interaction with the Xiaojing image. Two-way questioning and answering can be supported, and the user experience is improved.

column2: SN SUPERCONDUCTING WIRE
column4: The invention discloses a device and a method for drawing and detecting a Nb<3>Sn superconducting wire. According to the method, measurement is performed in the horizontal direction and the vertical direction by utilizing a laser diameter measuring instrument; real-time imaging is performed on the cross section of the wire by utilizing a high-speed camera for 360-degree camera-shooting in combination with data processing; deformation force of the wire in the machining process is collected in real time by utilizing a pressure sensor; an image of the lubricating liquid level is collected in realtime by utilizing the high-speed camera in combination with data processing; and real-time analysis is performed through the four parameters, the plastic deformation of the wire in the machining process is judged, and whether a wire breaking dangerous point exists or not is judged, so that on-line real-time monitoring of the uniformity of the wire is realized, and plastic deformation data of thewire is obtained. According to the device and the method, full-automatic on-line evaluation is realized by utilizing artificial intelligence and a machine learning method.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR OBTAINING USER USAGE DURATION
column4: The invention provides a method and system for acquiring use duration of a user, and the method comprises the steps: performing shooting and recording in the whole online learning process of the userso as to acquire action information and voice information of the whole online learning process of the user; judging whether the user is in an effective online learning state or not in different time intervals according to the action information and the voice information, and accumulating the total effective learning use duration of the user in the whole online learning process, so that the onlinelearning efficiency of the user is improved in a targeted manner, and the online learning experience of the user is reduced.

column2: A SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MONITORING EXERCISE OF A USER
column4: The present invention relates to a system and method for monitoring and storing the workout and fitness data along with displaying the evaluated results on the screen of the display device. The disclosed system includes artificial intelligence technologies on cloud for monitoring and storing the workout and fitness data along with displaying the evaluated results on the screen of the display device. In particular, the smart exercise machine has plurality of sensors for monitoring the ongoing workout of the user and for evaluating the user?™s previous fitness data with the real-time data and recommending the exercise module based on the evaluated data.

column2: EVENT RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON IMAGE RECOGNITION, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, specifically uses an image recognition technology, and discloses an event recognition method and device based on image recognition, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of: obtaining an event image of a to-be-recognized event uploaded by a user, wherein the event image comprises shooting time and a shooting place; acquiring real-time weather of the shooting place based on the shooting time and the shooting place; performing image recognition on the event image to obtain image weather in the eventimage; determining whether the to-be-recognized event is a label event according to the real-time weather and the image weather; if the to-be-recognized event is a label event, determining the similarity between the label event and a historical abnormal event; and if the similarity between the label event and the historical abnormal event exceeds a preset value, determining that the label event isan abnormal event. Therefore, the event recognition accuracy is improved through image recognition.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE NAVIGATOR
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence navigator. The navigator comprises an awakening module, a voice instruction acquisition module, a voice instruction analysis module, a path planningmodule, a display module and a voice broadcast module. The artificial intelligence navigator is safe, reasonable and convenient to use, only authorized personnel can wake up the navigator through theawakening module, and malicious operation of other people is avoided; a driver can conveniently input destination information in a voice mode through the voice instruction acquisition module, so thatfollow-up path planning is completed, the problems that an existing navigator needs to be manually touched and operated, and the safety of the driver can be endangered when the navigator is operated in the vehicle running process are solved, and thus the travel safety of people is guaranteed.

column2: CABLE CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The utility model provides a cable climbing robot, which comprises a rack, a butt joint assembly and at least three groups of driving assemblies, and the butt joint assembly comprises a first butt joint part and a second butt joint part; each driving assembly comprises two driving mechanisms, each driving mechanism comprises a rotating base, a limiting adjusting structure, a driving wheel and a driving structure, the limiting adjusting structures can fix the rotating bases or limit the rotating angles of the rotating bases, the driving structures are assembled on the rotating bases and connected with the driving wheels, and the driving wheels are driven by the driving structures to rotate. And after one cable climbing robot is used as a rescue robot to be in butt joint with the faulty cable climbing robot, the faulty cable climbing robot can be pulled back to the recycling position. The cable climbing robot provided by the utility model can climb the cable in a straight line and can beconveniently and quickly recovered when meeting a fault, so that the detection quality and efficiency are improved, and the recovery cost is reduced.

column2: METHODS AND APPARATUS TO SELECT FEATURES USING GENETIC ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses a method and a device for selecting features by using a genetic algorithm. The method comprises the steps that a genetic algorithm is used in the feature selection process, allcandidate features correspond to the positions of chromosomes, whether one candidate feature participates in training of a learner or not is represented through the states of the positions of the chromosomes, a first-generation chromosome is generated in a random generation mode and the like, and the learner is trained by using the first-generation chromosome; the method comprises the following steps of: obtaining a learning effect, marking the learning effect as the fitness of a corresponding chromosome, performing iteration of a genetic algorithm, such as selection, propagation, variation and the like, generating a new generation of chromosomes, continuously iterating, and finally iterating the chromosomes meeting a preset condition, so as to screen out features participating in formaltraining of the learner. The problems that a feature selection scheme for training a machine learning model is not flexible enough and low in accuracy in the prior art are solved. And thus, a more flexible and accurate feature screening effect is achieved.

column2: INTELLIGENT PHYSICAL EXAMINATION SYSTEM BASED ON MOBILE EQUIPMENT AND LEARNING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent physical examination system based on mobile equipment and a learning method. The system comprises a physical examination user client, a doctor user client, medical equipment, a server and a medical health service platform, and the server is used for receiving and processing the data and sending a result to the physical examination user client or the doctor user client. The method comprises the following steps: collecting physical examination data, sign data, consumption data, exercise data, health care data, diet data and sleep data of a user, analyzing the physical examination data of the user, fully mining data information, analyzing user habits, establishing a physical examination user personal or family health mathematical model, and establishinga physical examination result; and providing a reasonable health care management method most suitable for the physical examination user. The technical scheme of the invention has the characteristics of high working efficiency, convenient operation, comprehensive health data acquisition and complete artificial intelligence learning system based on big data analysis.

column2: COMPUTER PROGRAM AND METHOD FOR DETECTING, ANALYZING AND CLASSIFYING SAFE, NON-MALICOUS PROCESSES OR FILES ON A COMPUTING DEVICE
column4: Detecting, analyzing and classifying safe, non-malicious processes or files on a computing device includes scanning all currently executing and newly created processes and files to detect if each process or file is safe/non-malicious, largely based on file reputation services, file prevalence, machine learning/artificial intelligence models and the digital signature of the file. The user or administrator is continuously notified and aware that only safe/non-malicious executable code is running on the endpoints at any given time. If any analyzed process or file is not determined to be safe/non-malicious, a network firewall rule is automatically created to block network and/or internet connectivity or deny process creation of the potentially not-safe/malicious process or file completely.

column2: CERTIFICATE IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and provides a certificate identification method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the stepsof obtaining the picture data of a same certificate shot by a plurality of different types of cameras at the same time from different angles, and obtaining the shooting parameters and environment parameters of each camera; pairing each piece of picture data with the shooting parameter corresponding to each piece of picture data to obtain a plurality of pieces of pairing information; sequentiallyinputting each piece of pairing information into a preset neural network for calculation to obtain a characteristic value corresponding to each data picture; inputting each characteristic value and the environment parameter into a preset classification network for calculation to obtain a classification result corresponding to each picture; according to the invention, the authenticity of the certificate is determined according to the classification results, so that shooting is carried out directly through the plurality of cameras with certain intervals at the same time, multi-angle shooting isrealized, the problems that the angle of traditional authentic identification shooting is not easy to control and repeated operation is needed are solved, and the collection is convenient.

column2: VEHICLE EXCEPTION HANDLING METHOD AND DEVICE, CONTROL EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a vehicle exception handling method and device, control equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps:detecting the operation state of a vehicle, and determining an operation identification of the vehicle; obtaining vehicle context information associated with the operation identifier, wherein the vehicle context information comprises state information and environment information; performing data analysis on the state information and the environment information included in the vehicle context information to obtain an exception level of the vehicle; and handling according to the exception handling rule associated with the exception level. The running state of the vehicle is detected and the operation identifier of the vehicle is determined; the vehicle context information associated with the running identifier is acquired according to the running identifier of the vehicle, then the exception level of the vehicle is determined by analyzing the vehicle context information, and finally handling is performed according to the exception handling rule associated with the exception level so that the vehicle exception handling method is efficient, accurate and rapid.

column2: WIRELESS MULTI-POINT MONITORING DEVICE APPLIED TO RICE AND WHEAT GROWTH PROCESS
column4: The utility model discloses a wireless multi-point monitoring device applied to a rice and wheat growth process. The utility model belongs to the technical field of agricultural equipment, stand column, a base is fixedly arranged at the lower end of the stand column. A storage battery is arranged at the position, located on the upper surface of the base, below the stand column. A solar cell is arranged on the surface of the outer side of the stand column, a monitoring head is arranged at the top end of the stand column, the monitoring device is provided with a heating block, heat can be provided for the interior of the monitoring head by controlling the heating block to emit heat in cold weather, and therefore fog can be prevented from falling or freezing on the surface of the lens, and the monitoring effect is effectively guaranteed. The camera cleaning device is provided with the washing device, the surface of the camera can be wiped through control of the motor, dust and impuritieson the surface of the camera are effectively wiped away, and the situation that the monitoring effect is affected due to the shooting problem caused by the dust and the impurities is avoided.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses an image processing method and related equipment. The method can be applied to the field of image processing in artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an image set of a shooting object; the brightness part of the invisible light image can be obtained; acquiring a color part of the visible light image; inputting the brightness part intoa first neural network; inputting the color part into a second neural network, the outputs of the first neural network and the second neural network are accessed to a third neural network; outputtingthe feature information of the shooting object by the third neural network; that is to say, the feature information carried in the brightness part of the invisible light image is obtained through thefirst neural network. According to the image analysis network provided by the invention, the adaptability of the image analysis network to the invisible light image is enhanced, and the brightness information carried in the invisible light image is relatively good in quality, so that the image analysis network provided by the invention can well exert the advantages of the invisible light image, and is beneficial to improving the accuracy of the output feature information.

column2: INTELLIGENT AI MULTIFUNCTIONAL ANTI-FALLING ELDERLY-HELPING SHOPPING CART
column4: The utility model belongs to the technical field of shopping carts. The utility model relates to a shopping cart, in particular to an intelligent AI multifunctional anti-falling elderly-helping shopping cart. The device comprises a pull rod frame, bases, fences and a processing module, a triangular ladder climbing wheel and a folding rod are fixedly mounted at the bottom end of the pull rod frame;the base is fixedly connected to the lower portion of the right side wall of the pull rod frame through pins. Wherein a wheel carrier and a folding operation rod are connected to the middle of the base in a pin joint mode, universal wheels are fixedly installed at the bottom of the wheel carrier, the middle of the wheel carrier, the top end of the folding rod and the middle of the folding operation rod are connected through shaft pins, and old people and people with mobility difficulties can be helped to carry articles when going upstairs and downstairs. Early warning can be sent out in timewhen the old people accidentally fall down when going upstairs; the elderly can call for help by one-key SOS when encountering danger; and AI artificial intelligence, network communication and intelligent home control are adopted to assist the intelligent life of the elderly.

column2: EYE PROTECTION METHOD
column4: The invention provides an eye protection method. Whole-course shooting can be performed on the face area of the target user. Therefore, the eye region state information of the target user is determined; eye area state information is acquired according to the eye area state information; whether the target user is currently in an eye fatigue state and the real-time learning efficiency of the targetuser is determined; in this way, the display state of the learning terminal currently used by the target user is adaptively adjusted. According to the eye protection method, the eye using degree of the target user can be automatically and intelligently judged, the display state is adaptively adjusted, students are reminded in time, and therefore the accuracy and reliability of eyesight protectionon the target user are effectively improved.

column2: CROWD DISTRIBUTION FORM DETECTION METHOD BASED ON UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a crowd distribution form detection method based on an unmanned aerial vehicle and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: shooting images of regionssuch as urban streets or parks by using an unmanned aerial vehicle, sequentially detecting a head bounding box of a person and left and right binaural key points of each person in an up-down form, projecting the head bounding box and the left and right binaural key points to the ground of a CIM model, and obtaining the position and orientation of a human body according to the binaural key points;achieving visualization of crowd information in the CIM through a tile map, counting the number of people in each tile, when the number is larger than a set threshold value, analyzing the distributionform of crowds in the tiles according to the positions and orientations of the crowds, and judging the distribution form of the gathered crowds. By the adoption of the method, the overall behavior ofthe crowd can be judged, relevant personnel can take corresponding measures conveniently, and accidents are avoided.

column2: APPLICATION PROGRAM RUNNING MONITORING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides an application program operation monitoring method and device based on artificial intelligence. According to the method and the device, after it is monitored that a user executes picture full-screen viewing Activity in a first application program; If the user does not realize full-screen exit of the picture after executing the full-screen exit operation of the picture, automatically destroying the full-screen viewing Activity of the picture to realize full-screen picture exit, thereby avoiding poor operation experience brought to the user by a series of operations such as manually closing an application program and the like by the user. Besides, whether the patch cannot quit the full screen of the picture or not is recognized by automatically detecting and updating the patch, then the problem that the full screen of the picture cannot quit is solved by selecting a system patch or the method provided by the invention, and the high stability of the patch of the system and the flexibility of the method provided by the invention are both considered. Finally, unnecessary full-screen picture viewing operation executed by the user is reduced or avoided through selection of the prompt information by the user, so that inconvenience brought to the user due to abnormal exit of the application program is reduced.

column2: MEDICAL TEXT STRUCTURING METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, is applied to the field of medical text processing, and particularly discloses a medical text structuring method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of grabbing an unstructured medical knowledge text; splitting the non-structural text into a plurality of first feature statements; after the first feature statement is input into a preset language recognition model, obtaining a semantic feature vector; after all the semantic feature vectors are input into a preset article semantic recognition model, obtaining an output second feature statement; calling a first code file of the to-be-processed medical source text, and inserting a segmentation symbol into a position, corresponding toa to-be-segmented position of the second feature statement, in the first code file to obtain a second code file; and running the second code file to display the structured medical knowledge text corresponding to the unstructured medical knowledge text on the to-be-processed medical source text. Through the invention, the conversion efficiency of the structured medical knowledge text can be improved.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR CALCULATING RUNNING TIME OF NEURAL NETWORK ON PROCESSOR
column4: The invention provides a method and device for calculating the running time of a neural network on a processor, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and can improve the compilingefficiency of a compiler. The method comprises the following steps: 1, according to the cutting information of a neural network to be compiled on a processor, acquiring data read-write time information and data processing time information of each network layer in the neural network; according to the data read-write time information and the data processing time information of each network layer, determining a time value of each network layer, the cutting information being used for describing that a plurality of network layers in the neural network are divided into M network layer groups with M> = 1, M being an integer, and each network layer group comprising at least one network layer group; and adding the time values of the network layers in the neural network to obtain a time value of the processor for running the neural network.

column2: MICROSCOPIC IMAGING DEVICE BASED ON REFRACTION WINDOW SCANNER
column4: The utility model provides a microscopic imaging device based on a refraction window scanner, and relates to the technical field of optics. The utility model relates to a microscopic imaging device based on a refraction window scanner. The system comprises a laser, a beam expanding lens group, a first reflector, a dichroscope, a first micro-lens array, a relay lens group, a refraction window scanner group, a tube mirror, a second reflector, an imaging objective lens, a second micro-lens array, a focusing lens and a detector which are sequentially arranged along a light path, and a measured object is suitable for being placed on the side, away from the second reflector, of the imaging objective lens; and the refraction window scanner group is used for forming a movable two-dimensional focusarray so as to realize scanning of the measured object. According to the technical scheme, the refraction window scanner set guides the two-dimensional focus array to move to achieve scanning of a measured object, and compared with a traditional nipkow disc scanning system, the imaging resolution ratio is doubled, and meanwhile the imaging speed is effectively increased due to the fact that an array type scanning method is adopted.

column2: PHYSICAL PEST CONTROL REMOTE MONITORING DEVICE APPLIED TO FACILITY AGRICULTURE
column4: The utility model discloses a physical pest control remote monitoring device applied to facility agriculture. The utility model belongs to the technical field of pest control equipment. Stand column,a solar power generation panel is fixedly arranged at the top end of the stand column. A bearing seat is arranged at the bottom end of the stand column; a rubber pad is arranged at the middle sectionof the stand column; storage grids are formed in the positions, located below the rubber pads, of the surfaces of the stand columns; a revolving door is arranged at the position, corresponding to thestorage grid, of the surface of the stand column; according to the utility model, the heating device is arranged; electronic elements in the monitoring device can be effectively heated by controllingthe heating principle of the heating ring at a low temperature; damage of electronic elements can be avoided, fog and frost can be prevented from falling on the surface of the lens to affect the shooting effect, the solar power generation panel is arranged and can be effectively matched with the storage battery to supply power to the monitoring equipment, the investment cost can be reduced while energy conservation and environmental protection are achieved, and the practicability of the equipment is improved.

column2: SINGLE-VIEW-ANGLE TAI CHI ACTION ANALYSIS AND ASSESSMENT SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a single-view-angle Tai Chi action analysis and assessment system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises: a template image generation unit which is used for building a virtual scene in a simulator, importing a standard Tai Chi action sequence initial frame character model into the virtual scene, shooting the character model through a plurality of virtual cameras which are distributed in a hemispherical shape by taking the character model as a center in space, and obtaining a template image by each virtual camera; the camera visual angle determining unitthat is used for determining the visual angle of the Tai Chi action sequence shot in the real scene; the body shape correction coefficient obtaining unit is used for obtaining a body shape correctioncoefficient; and the assessment unit that is used for combining the figure correction coefficient to obtain an assessment result of the to-be-assessed person. According to the invention, convenient Tai Chi analysis and examination can be realized by using the hand-held terminal.

column2: RICE PLANTHOPPER MIGRATION PATH PREDICTION METHOD BASED ON YOLO ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses a rice planthopper migration path prediction method based on a YOLO algorithm, and relates to the technical field of machine vision and artificial intelligence. According to the method, for the obtained field insect pictures, a collected image set is trained through a YOLO algorithm, a rice planthopper detection model is generated, and rice planthopper image detection in anactual field shooting state is completed; and then, the rice planthopper images acquired in different regions are identified and detected, quantity statistics are respectively performed on the rice planthoppers identified in the images, and data is uploaded to a data management center platform. The prediction of the rice planthopper migration path is completed according to the statistics of the number of the rice planthoppers in different regions. An efficient data intelligent management platform is used for accurately identifying the number of rice planthoppers in different regions, countingthe severity degree of rice planthopper diseases and insect pests and predicting the migration path of the rice planthoppers, important reference data are provided for prevention of rice planthopperpests related to crops such as rice fields, a large amount of manpower and material resources can be saved, and the agricultural pest control efficiency is improved.

column2: CONVENIENT-TO-INSTALL DATA MONITORING DEVICE FOR SCANNING CITY APPEARANCE BY REMOTE SENSING SATELLITE
column4: The utility model discloses a convenient-to-install data monitoring device for scanning city appearance by a remote sensing satellite. The device comprises a base, a mounting frame and rotating seats,a first motor is fixedly mounted in the middle of the interior of the base. A rotating head is fixedly mounted at the output end of the first motor; a bearing is arranged in the middle of the top ofthe first motor; the top end of the rotating head extends to the outer side of the base through the bearing; the top end of the rotating head is fixedly connected with the middle position of the bottom of the rotating base, shaft bases are fixedly installed in the middle positions of the two sides of the top of the rotating base, rotating rods are fixedly installed in the middle positions of the outer sides of the side walls of the two sides of the installing frame, and the installing frame is movably installed between the two shaft bases through the two rotating rods. By arranging a series ofstructures, the device has the characteristics that the camera is convenient to install and take out, and the shooting angle and direction are convenient to adjust.

column2: METHOD FOR REALIZING AI BEHAVIOR JUDGMENT BASED ON FUZZY LOGIC TECHNOLOGY OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a method for realizing AI behavior judgment based on a fuzzy logic technology of artificial intelligence and relates to the technical field of fuzzy logic. The method comprisesan input module, a construction module, a behavior database, a comparison module and a data transmission module, and mainly comprises the following steps of constructing a fuzzy criterion through theconstruction module; transmitting the constructed fuzzy criterion to a behavior database through a data transmission module; inputting a fuzzy variable through an input module; the comparison modulecompares the input fuzzy variables according to the data in the behavior database and a fuzzy criterion, and then defuzzifies to obtain a result; finally, judging whether the average maximum value ofthe calculation result exceeds the average maximum value of the current behavior or not. According to the method, the fuzzy logic technology of artificial intelligence is adopted, the AI behavior is fuzzified on the basis that the AI behavior is effectively judged, the game running effect is improved, and the game experience of a user is enhanced.

column2: METHOD OF MULTIMODAL CONTACTLESS CONTROL OF MOBILE INFORMATION ROBOT
column4: FIELD: data processing. SUBSTANCE: invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence. Invention comprises a method for multimodal noncontact control of a mobile information robot, consisting of capturing three-dimensional space, gesture recognition, characterized by that combined processing of video and audio information from a user, serial processing of video information from user, formation of areas with people on each three-dimensional (3D) frame of depth map, calculation of 3D 25-point models of human skeletons, tracking the nearest person, transformation of 3D 25-point skeleton model of the nearest person into 2D 25-point skeleton model, determining a face and hand shape graphic region within the formed rectangular area with a human, computation of visual signs of gesture at a certain moment of time, serial processing of audio information from user, calculation of acoustic features, recognition of speech commands. EFFECT: technical result consists in expansion of functionality of mobile information robot due to use of multimode human-machine interaction, which is understood as control of mobile information robot through combination of audio and video modalities. 1 cl, 1 dwg

column2: ROBOT SOFTWARE SYSTEM AND ROBOT THEREOF
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a robot software system, which comprises an operating system which runs in a microcomputer of a robot control system; an application program which correspondsto specific functions, functions and capabilities of the robot, wherein the operating system is a running environment of the application program; the operating system realizes the preset capability or preset function of the robot by calling and terminating the application program. The invention further discloses a robot adopting the robot software system, and the robot has the artificial intelligence capacity. The robot is enabled to be interconnected and intercommunicated with people or things of a new generation of information technology, interconnected and intercommunicated with a cloud platform, compatible with the previous generation of information technology, and provided with a super-intelligent brain, so that people can be perceived, and partial or all effects or capabilities likereal people can be exerted.

column2: ARRANGEMENT METHOD OF OFFSHORE WIND FIELD CABLE
column4: The invention discloses an arrangement method of offshore wind field cables. The method comprises a transformer substation and a plurality of wind turbines. The transformer substation is connected with diving equipment through a submarine cable, and supplies electric power and sends data to the diving equipment. Submarine cables are laid between the diving equipment and the adjacent wind turbinesalong the transformer substation. The submarine cable is conveyed to a bearing device at the bottom of the adjacent wind turbine. The bearing device lifts and transports the submarine cable joint to an adjacent wind turbine. Similarly, the two adjacent wind turbines are connected with the diving equipment through submarine cables, the diving equipment paves the submarine cables between the wind turbines and the adjacent wind turbines and conveys the submarine cables to the bearing devices at the bottoms of the adjacent wind turbines, and the bearing devices lift submarine cable connectors andcarry the submarine cable connectors to the adjacent wind turbines. In the whole submarine cable installation process, the requirements for divers and water ships are greatly reduced, and the influence of the marine environment on the installation process is reduced.

column2: PERSONAL HEALTH MANAGEMENT SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a personal health management system based on artificial intelligence. The system is composed of a personal health information acquisition terminal, the Internet, an artificialintelligence identification subsystem, a personal health information storage system and a personal health management system, wherein a user photographs via a mobile phone, personal medical health datasuch as medical records, medical images, physical examination reports and the like are collected and uploaded to a personal cloud account to be stored, personal health information is periodically recorded through voice, the artificial intelligence identification system at the cloud end identifies, organizes, archives and classifies the personal medical health information, and the personal healthmanagement system manages personal health such as medical advice management, exercise management and diet management according to the personal health information. According to the invention, at a userterminal, a mobile phone App is provided, and a user can complete various functions such as registration, login, acquisition, management and the like through the mobile phone App.

column2: DANCE SYNTHESIS METHOD AND DEVICE AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses a dance synthesis method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps of: obtaining synthetic dance information output by a generation network according to music characteristics of sample music information, and obtaining discrimination data output by a discrimination network based on the synthetic dance information; adjusting network parameters of the generation network based on the discrimination data, so as to enable the synthetic dance information output by the adjusted generation network based on the music characteristics to be identified as real dance information by the discrimination network; and synthesizing to-be-processed music information into target dance information through the adjusted generation network. Thus, the synthetic dance can have more characteristics of real dance and is more natural, and the obtained synthetic dance can be more diversified.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATICALLY LABELING AND CLASSIFYING QUESTIONS
column4: The invention provides a method and a system for automatically labeling and classifying questions. The method comprises the steps of shooting a target question and converting a shot image into corresponding question text data; obtaining an English text and a Chinese text respectively contained in the question text data sample through identification; according to the vocabulary types respectively contained in the English text and the Chinese text, obtaining the subject types corresponding to the vocabulary types; conducting adaptive labeling, and finally, automatically classifying the target question into the corresponding question set according to the labeling result, so that a large number of different types of target questions can be automatically labeled and classified in a targeted andefficient manner, the deep processing efficiency of the questions is improved, and subsequent analysis and processing of the questions are facilitated.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an image processing method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of computer vision, artificial intelligence and cloud computing. According to the specific implementation scheme, shooting parameters of a to-be-processed image are acquired; obtaining model information of a main body in the to-be-processed image; obtaining a model corresponding to the main body according to the model information of the main body; and putting the model corresponding to the main body into a three-dimensional simulation environment, and shooting according to the shooting parameters to generate a restored image corresponding to the to-be-processed image. Therefore, the model corresponding to the target main body is photographed according to the photographing parameters of the to-be-processed image in the three-dimensional simulation environment, a real scene when the target main body is photographed can be highly simulated and restored, and aclear, real and natural conversion image is obtained, so that the defects in the to-be-processed image are overcome, and a high-quality image is obtained.

column2: FAULT EARLY WARNING METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT FOR DISH-WASHING MACHINE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a fault early warning method, device and equipment for a dish-washing machine and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining an audio signal generated by a to-be-monitored component in a working process for each to-be-monitored component contained in the dish-washing machine; comparing a standard audio signal corresponding to the to-be-monitored componentwith the audio signal to obtain a comparison result; and determining the working state of the to-be-monitored component according to the comparison result. Therefore, the audio signals generated by the main components in the dish-washing machine in the working process are monitored in real time, when it is monitored that the audio signals are abnormal, fault early warning can be conducted in timebefore the dish-washing machine stops running, and thus interference of faults of the dish-washing machine on daily life of a user is reduced.

column2: ELECTRIC POWER INSPECTION FEW-SAMPLE IMAGE DATA ENHANCEMENT METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides an electric power inspection few-sample image data enhancement method and system. The method comprises steps of calibrating an equipment area in a few images of a to-be-identified real object collected by electric power inspection; performing background removal processing on the calibrated image, converting the background-removed physical picture, and simulating the condition of shooting the equipment from different angles and different distances; and updating the background picture to obtain images of the to-be-identified real object in different backgrounds, thereby generating a large number of calibrated pictures. The method achieves enhancement of few samples, facilitates training through an artificial intelligence deep learning algorithm, and facilitates accurate recognition of an image.

column2: MOBILE PAYMENT, PERSON AND CERTIFICATE VERIFICATION AND CERTIFICATE-FREE VERIFICATION INTEGRATED SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence terminals, and discloses a mobile payment, person and certificate verification and certificate-free verification integrated system, which comprises a certificate reading unit, a camera shooting unit, an encryption chip, a mobile payment program module, a person and certificate verification program module and a certificate-freeverification program module. A user carries out person-certificate verification or no-certificate verification through the integrated system, identity information of the user is subjected to hard encryption through the encryption chip in the verification process to prevent information leakage or the integrated system from being invaded, and after verification succeeds, the user can carry out self-service registration and order query and complete order payment through WeChat face scanning and other mobile payment modes. The integrated system integrates the functions of human-certificate verification, no-certificate verification and mobile payment, a user can conveniently perform human-certificate verification, no-certificate verification, order query and payment in a self-service mode through the integrated system, personal identity information is encrypted through the encryption chip, and the potential safety hazard of personal information leakage is reduced.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TRAFFIC SIGNAL LAMP AND SIGN LINE LIGHT SENSING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence traffic signal lamp and a sign line light sensing device. The system comprises a stop line mechanism, a pedestrian indicating lamp mechanism, aninfrared induction mechanism, a zebra crossing mechanism, a camera mechanism, traffic lights and a control system. Wherein the control system is in communication connection with the stop line mechanism, the pedestrian indicating lamp mechanism, the infrared induction mechanism, the zebra crossing mechanism, the camera shooting mechanism and the traffic light, and the traffic light is arranged in front of the stop line mechanism. By means of the intelligent traffic control technology, motor vehicle flow can be controlled and pedestrians can be guided to cross the street safely through inductionof the signal lamps, traffic accidents are greatly reduced or avoided, traffic operation efficiency of the intersection is improved, people-oriented life happiness of people is reflected, and life happiness of people is improved. The utility model has the advantages of simple structure, stable performance and longer service life.

column2: MULTI-CAMERA MULTI-TARGET ATHLETE TRACKING SHOOTING VIDEO GENERATION SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a multi-camera multi-target athlete tracking shooting video generation system and method, and belongs to the technical field of tracking shooting. The multi-camera multi-targetathlete tracking shooting video generation system is a recognition system based on artificial intelligence pedestrian detection, can realize multi-camera consistent tracking shooting of athletes in acertain sports venue region through utilizing video data acquired by multiple cameras, reduce the workload and the working difficulty of photographers, and brings convenience for shooting of sports events. The multi-camera multi-target athlete tracking and shooting video generation system is simple in structure, only comprises camera equipment, a host server, a central server and a client, is easy to deploy and low in cost, can use an existing PC as the client, and is easy to upgrade and maintain; and only software of the central server and software of the host server need to be upgraded generally, the upgrading and maintaining cost is low, the intelligent degree is high, a large amount of manual intervention is not needed, the shooting effect is stable, and the accuracy degree is high. The multi-camera multi-target athlete tracking shooting video generation system and the method can greatly improve the existing tracking shooting scene for athletes, and have high use value and ideal application prospect.

column2: COAL PREPARATION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGE RECOGNITION
column4: The invention provides a coal preparation system based on artificial intelligence image recognition. A sliding chute, the lower part of the cross section of which is close to V-shape is provided; coalmaterials fall from the above to a starting section of the sliding chute and slide to the tail end of the sliding chute and are automatically arranged in a row; when the coal materials move along thesliding chute, firstly, coal ash and coal slime on the coal materials are purged by using a spray gun, so that the coal ash and coal slime are exposed to the surface of an internal solid; and when the coal materials reach the tail end, a shooting device shoots and sends shot images to a control module in real time, the control module recognizes the coal materials into gangue or coal briquettes inreal time through an artificial intelligence image recognition technology and controls a gangue eliminating mechanism to act, and the gangue is removed from the coal briquettes. According to the coalpreparation system based on the artificial intelligence image recognition provided by the invention, the gangue separation accuracy is high, equipment is simple, the processing size fraction is wide,the processing capacity is great, and most of manpower can be replaced; and the equipment is simple and easy to maintain, is convenient to be deployed under a well, the gangue is screened out and left in the well before the coal materials are hoisted out of the well, and the amount of gangue out of the well can be effectively reduced.

column2: SPLIT TYPE CABLE CLIMBING DETECTION ROBOT
column4: The utility model provides a split type cable climbing detection robot. The robot comprises a climbing supporting part, a line driving part, a follow-up detection part and a controller, wherein the climbing supporting part comprises a rack, a climbing walking mechanism, a follow-up pre-tightening mechanism, an active holding mechanism, a first driving motor and a second driving motor; the climbingwalking mechanism comprises a climbing installation frame and a climbing wheel set. Wherein the driving enclasping mechanism comprises a second transmission assembly and an enclasping and clamping piece, the wire driving part comprises a connecting rope and a winding driving mechanism, the follow-up detection part comprises a mounting frame body, a guide wheel assembly and an enclasping and clamping mechanism, and the controller is used for controlling the first driving motor, the second driving motor, the winding driving mechanism and the enclasping and clamping mechanism. By means of the technical scheme, the problems that in the prior art, a bridge inhaul cable climbing detection robot is large in number of mechanism joints, low in climbing operation speed and low in load capacity aresolved.

column2: LASER RADAR AND CAMERA CALIBRATION METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a laser radar and camera calibration method, device and equipment and a readable storage medium, and relates to the artificial intelligence technology, in particular to the technical field of intelligent transportation and unmanned driving. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises steps of: obtaining point cloud data obtained by scanning a calibration board through a laser radar and an image obtained by shooting the calibration board through a camera; extracting a target point cloud data set located on a calibration plate plane from the point cloud data, and determining first pose information of the calibration plate under a laser radar coordinate system according to the position of the target point cloud data set; determining second pose information of the calibration plate under a camera coordinate system according to the characteristics of the calibration plate plane in the image; and calibrating the laser radarand the camera according to the conversion relationship between the first pose information and the second pose information. The method is simple in process, small in calculation amount and capable ofsaving computer resources.

column2: PROJECT RUNNING METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND COMPUTER STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, is applied to the field of smart project development of smart cities, and discloses a project operation method, device and equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: if an operation instruction input based on a target project is detected, determining whether a command line interface corresponding to the operation instruction exists or not; if so, determining a compiling framework parameter corresponding to the target project based on the command line interface; determining target configuration information of the target project based on the compiling framework parameters; operating the target project based on the target configuration information. The method is compatible with configuration of a plurality of framework projects; in the development and debugging process, the configuration information required by operation of different projects can be determined according to the command line interface by inputting the unified operation instruction, so that the projects are operated according to the configuration information, research and development personnel can perform development in a unified mode, starting difficulty is reduced, and convenient operation of the projects is realized.

column2: TEACHING VIDEO PROCESSING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides a teaching video processing method and system. Multi-angle shooting is carried out on a teaching process to generate corresponding original teaching video data; video quality processing preprocessing, splicing processing and quality evaluation processing are performed on the original teaching video data; and finally, the teaching spliced video with the optimal video goodnessis taken as a final teaching video. The teaching video can reflect the teaching process from multiple angles on the image; and the sound is relatively optimized, and the optimized three-dimensional teaching video can be regarded as the optimized three-dimensional teaching video, so that the teaching video can be updated to have relatively high presentation quality in image quality and sound quality, the immersion of the user in the watching process is improved, and the watching quality of the teaching video is improved.

column2: PORTABLE ROBOT FOR DETECTING OUTER SURFACE OF CABLE
column4: The utility model provides a portable robot for detecting the outer surface of a cable. The robot comprises a rack, a climbing walking mechanism, a follow-up pre-tightening mechanism, an active holding mechanism, a first driving motor, a second driving motor and a controller. The climbing walking mechanism comprises a climbing installation frame and a climbing wheel set. The follow-up pre-tightening mechanism comprises a first transmission assembly and a follow-up roller assembly; the driving enclasping mechanism comprises a second transmission assembly and an enclasping and clamping piece; the first transmission assembly is in transmission connection with the follow-up roller assembly; the second transmission assembly is rotationally connected with a holding and clamping piece, the controller controls the first driving motor to drive the climbing wheel set, the controller controls the second driving motor to drive the first transmission assembly and the second transmission assembly respectively, and the moving direction of the follow-up roller assembly is opposite to that of the holding and clamping piece. By the adoption of the technical scheme, the problems that in the prior art, a bridge inhaul cable climbing detection robot is large in number of mechanism joints, low in climbing operation speed and low in load capacity are solved.

column2: ROBOT GENERATING MAP ON BASIS OF MULTI-SENSOR AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, CONFIGURING CORRELATION BETWEEN NODES AND RUNNING BY MEANS OF MAP, AND METHOD FOR GENERATING MAP
column4: The present invention relates to a robot generating a map on the basis of a multi-sensor and artificial intelligence, configuring correlation between nodes and running by means of the map, and a method for generating a map. A robot according to an embodiment of the present invention generates a pose graph which: comprises a LIDAR branch, comprising one or more LIDAR frames, a visual branch, comprising one or more visual frames, and a backbone comprising two or more frame nodes registered with the LIDAR frames and/or the visual frames; and generates the correlation between the nodes of the pose graph.

column2: TARGET CLIENT MONITORING METHOD AND DEVICE, STORAGE MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses a target client monitoring method and device, a storage medium and electronic equipment. The method comprises the steps of acquiring a target log generated in the running process of a target client, wherein the target client supports code implantation; under the condition that the target client judged to have the external attack according to the target log, sending a targetcode to the target client so that the target client runs the target code to prevent the external attack, and the target code is sent to the target client under the condition that the target client inthe edge technology network is attacked, so that the target client runs the target code to resist the external attack, security of the target client is ensured. The technical effect of further ensuring the network security of the edge technology is achieved, and then the technical problem that in the prior art, the mode for improving the data security of the edge computing network is single is solved.

column2: HUMAN BODY BEHAVIOR RECOGNITION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON HUMAN BODY SKELETON
column4: The invention discloses a human body behavior recognition method and system based on a human body skeleton, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the behavior movement of the human body skeleton and the corresponding skeleton point coordinates, skeleton point inter-frame coordinate differences and skeleton features, and constructing a training set; sequentially training the graph convolution network and the attention mechanism network based on the human body part according to the training set, and constructing a behavior recognition model according to the trained graph convolution network and attention mechanism network; and recognizing the to-be-recognized human skeleton according to the behavior recognition model, and outputting human behavior actions. According to data such as three-dimensional coordinates of human skeleton joint points, coordinate differences between point frames and skeleton features, a graph convolution network is taken as a main body, an attention mechanism network based on human parts is adopted to assist in searching for skeleton points with better distinguishing ability, human behavior actions are classified and recognized, and the recognition precision is improved.

column2: SERVICE PROCESSING METHOD AND SYSTEM AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a service processing method and system and a storage medium. The service processing method is suitable for a service processing system at least comprising terminal equipment, the terminal equipment is used for providing an untrusted execution environment and a trusted execution environment, an artificial intelligence model is installed in the untrusted execution environment, and the service processing method comprises the steps that when the terminal equipment operates a service processing task, running the artificial intelligence model in the untrusted execution environment to obtain to-be-processed data; under the condition that the credibility verification result of the artificial intelligence model is determined to be credible, executing a service processing task by utilizing the to-be-processed data, wherein the credibility verification result is from a credible execution environment. According to the method, the credibility verification result stored in the trusted execution environment is confirmed to determine that the artificial intelligence model running in the untrusted execution environment and the running result thereof are honest and are not tampered.

column2: VERIFICATION METHOD, SYSTEM AND DEVICE OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODEL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence model verification method, system and device and a storage medium. The verification method runs in terminal equipment comprising a trusted executionenvironment and an untrusted execution environment, and comprises the following steps: in the trusted execution environment, carrying out credibility verification on an artificial intelligence model running in the untrusted execution environment to obtain a credibility verification result, wherein the credibility verification result is used for carrying out credibility verification on computer equipment for processing data output by the artificial intelligence model. According to the application, the verification process and the obtained credibility verification result can be ensured to be honest and not tampered, so that the operation result provided by the artificial intelligence model can be used as security-level data for a service processing task.

column2: AI ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING DEVICE CONVENIENT TO INSTALL FOR TABLE TENNIS
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of AI artificial intelligence monitoring devices, and discloses a convenient-to-mount AI artificial intelligence monitoring device for table tennis, which comprises a mounting seat and a monitor, a fixing plate is fixedly mounted in the mounting seat, a sleeve is fixedly mounted in the fixing plate, a rotating shaft is movably mounted in the sleeve,and a rotating shaft is movably mounted in the rotating shaft. Threaded shafts are fixedly mounted at the top and the bottom of the rotating shaft correspondingly, connecting shafts are fixedly mounted on the opposite sides of the two threaded shafts correspondingly, and bearings fixedly connected with the mounting base are fixedly mounted on the outer sides of the two connecting shafts correspondingly. The AI artificial intelligence monitoring device convenient to install for the table tennis ball has the advantages of being convenient to install and the like, and the problem that in the using process of an artificial intelligence monitoring device for the table tennis ball in the market, the artificial intelligence monitoring device for the table tennis ball is inconvenient to install,and therefore using of the artificial intelligence monitoring device for the table tennis ball is affected is solved.

column2: INSTRUMENT PANEL POSITIONING IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides an instrument panel positioning identification method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: pre-shooting the instrument panel to obtain an initial picture of the instrument panel; acquiring data of each instrument panel in a factory; obtaining an angle needing to be adjusted by a camera of the inspection robot based on the initial picture of the instrument panel and the instrument panel data; controlling the inspection robot to shoot the instrument panel again to obtain a target picture of the instrument panel, performing denoising and enhancement processing on the target picture of the instrument panel, and performing instrument panel identification after processing to obtain an instrumentpanel identification result.
