According to the method disclosed in the embodiment of the invention, a series of tasks such as instrument panel positioning, reading and recognition can be completed by using the inspection robot through the combination of the carried camera and artificial intelligence positioning and recognition, and the method has important significance for the development of futureintelligent factories.

column2: NEURAL NETWORK ACCELERATOR
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a neural network accelerator. According to the neural network accelerator, simplified design is carried out by taking a layer as a basic unit; all the modules can run in parallel to achieve simultaneous running of all layers of the neural network on hardware so as to greatly improve the processing speed, a main control module can complete cutting distribution of operation tasks and corresponding data of all the layers, and then all the modules execute the operation tasks of the corresponding layers. Moreover,a three-dimensional multiply-accumulate array is also realized in the neural network accelerator architecture; therefore, multiplication and accumulation operations can be operated in parallel on a large scale; the convolution calculation efficiency is effectively improved; data multiplexing and efficient circulation of convolution operation parameters and convolution operation data among the modules are realized through a first cache region and a second cache region, data multiplexing between layers of the neural network is realized to reduce external data access, so that the power consumption is reduced while the data processing efficiency is improved, and the neural network accelerator can improve the computing power consumption ratio.

column2: IDENTITY VERIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND COMPUTER EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to an identity verification method and device based on artificial intelligence, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps of: acquiring ato-be-verified face image input into verification equipment; performing equipment traceability processing based on artificial intelligence on the face image, and determining a shooting equipment identifier corresponding to shooting equipment of the face image based on first mode noise obtained by the equipment traceability processing; obtaining a verification equipment identifier determined basedon a second mode noise feature corresponding to the verification equipment; performing feature comparison on the shooting equipment identifier and the verification equipment identifier to obtain a comparison result; and when the comparison result shows that the shooting equipment and the verification equipment are the same equipment, performing identity verification based on the face image. By adopting the method, the accuracy of identity authentication can be improved, and the security of identity authentication is ensured.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR ANALYZING POSITIVE ANOMALY RUNNING STATE OF ROTARY EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a method and a device for analyzing positive anomaly running state of rotary equipment. An edge node carries out data acquisition after obtaining an equipment operation positiveanomaly state analysis model and a data processing method, and an edge operation module carries out reasoning calculation; and when an edge model judges that the equipment operation is abnormal, theedge model commands the edge node to carry out data uploading and storage with higher frequency, thereby ensuring that more than 50% of uploaded data in the limited data of the node contains fault information. According to the method for analyzing positive anomaly running state of rotary equipment, the vibration data and the magnetic field data of the rotary equipment can be collected at the sametime, meanwhile, equipment health state measurement is carried out through an edge end algorithm model, data is uploaded to a cloud platform to update an artificial intelligence model, and trained model parameters and a data processing method are issued to an edge end to carry out reasoning analysis on the state of health of the equipment.

column2: APPLICATION PROGRAM PORT MONITORING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an application program port monitoring method and device. The method can be applied to the technical field of big data and artificial intelligence. The application program portmonitoring method comprises the following steps: collecting port state information of a to-be-monitored application program in a running process; according to the counting data of the normal port state, the total inspection frequency data and the state change counting data, generating inspection pass rate and port change rate, and further generating alarm information. According to the method, theapplication program ports are automatically recognized, manual configuration is not needed, the environment maintenance cost is saved, the monitoring accuracy is improved, the port monitoring range isnot limited to application program port monitoring any more, but all active ports of the server and server port monitoring is more comprehensive.

column2: SHOOTING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a shooting method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of computer vision, artificial intelligence and deep learning. According to the implementation scheme, foreground and background recognition is carried out on a preview image acquired by image acquisition equipment, and relative distances and relative angles between the foreground and the image acquisition equipment and between the background and the image acquisition equipment are detected respectively, so that a target shooting position of the image acquisition equipmentis determined according to the relative distances and the relative angles, and prompt information of the target shooting position is displayed. According to the scheme, when the user shoots the image,the optimal shooting position is automatically calculated for the user; the target shooting position is recorded and is prompted, so that the user can move the image acquisition equipment to the target shooting position for shooting according to the prompt information, and therefore, the imaging effect can be improved, the user does not need to repeatedly shoot and screen the images, the user does not need to process the images in the later period, and the use experience of the user can be improved.

column2: INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD BASED ON 5G AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND BIG DATA CLOUD COMPUTING CENTER
column4: The invention provides an information processing method based on 5G and artificial intelligence and a big data cloud computing center, and the method comprises the steps: firstly receiving a label calibration instruction transmitted by an artificial intelligence server, and configuring an interface parameter script based on the label calibration instruction; secondly, when an information uploadingrequest broadcasted by the Internet of Things device is detected, running an interface parameter script to acquire original service information, and adding a first-level label to the acquired original service information based on a running result file corresponding to the interface parameter script to obtain first target information; and further transmitting the first target information to an artificial intelligence server. The artificial intelligence server can add the second-level label to the first target information to obtain the second target information and screen the second target information based on the first-level label and the second-level label to obtain the third target information. Thus, the service information can be accurately classified, a large amount of similar or repeated service information is prevented from being processed, redundant information in an information processing result is reduced, and the information processing efficiency is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXERCISE AUXILIARY EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses artificial intelligence exercise auxiliary equipment which comprises a machine body, a connecting rod is arranged at the top of the machine body, a circular ring is arranged below the connecting rod, the left end of the circular ring is connected with the lower surface of the connecting rod through a length-variable height telescopic rod, and the height of the circular ringis limited through a limiting mechanism; a range finder which is used for detecting the distance between the circular ring and the ground and arranged on the lower surface of the circular ring; a horizontal supporting body which is arranged on the side, deviating from the machine body, of the circular ring, a horizontal sliding groove is formed in the lower surface of the horizontal supporting body in the length direction, and a sliding block is slidably connected to the sliding groove and driven by a driving mechanism to slide on the sliding groove; a baffle which is located below the horizontal supporting body and fixedly connected with the sliding block through a lifter. According to the leg length of a trainee, the lifter is controlled to press down the baffle to the set height and enable the baffle to be located at the proper position, so that the trainee can conduct training according to the actual situation of the trainee, and the kicking heights of the trainee each time can beconsistent.

column2: EARLY WARNING METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT BASED ON NUMBER OF PEOPLE IN AREA
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides an early warning method, device and equipment based on the number of people in a region, and can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence. The methodcomprises the following steps: acquiring a shot image corresponding to the target area, wherein the shot image corresponds to a shooting moment; identifying the number of people taken in the shot image; based on the number of the shot people and the shooting moment, obtaining a regional people number peak value in an early warning time period after the shooting moment by utilizing a people numberchange rule, wherein the people number change rule is used for reflecting the people number change trend in the target area at different moments; under the condition that the peak value of the numberof people in the region is greater than a first number-of-people early-warning threshold value, sending out first early-warning information, wherein the first early warning information is used for prompting people in the target area to be evacuated. By means of the method, people in the area can be timely evacuated according to the number change trend of people in different time periods, and thesituation that the waiting time for a user to handle business is long is avoided.

column2: CIGARETTE CARTON APPEARANCE DETECTION DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a cigarette carton appearance detection device based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of packaging of cigarette cartons. The cigarette carton appearance detection device based on artificial intelligence comprises lighting equipment, image acquisition equipment and control equipment, wherein the lighting equipment and the image acquisition equipment are electrically connected with the control equipment, the lighting equipment comprises pull wire lighting equipment used for irradiating a transparent pull wire, and the image acquisition equipment comprises pull wire image acquisition equipment used for shooting the transparent pull wire; and the pull wire lighting equipment comprises a lamp strip and a cylindrical lens which are parallel to the transparent pull wire, and light emitted by the lamp strip is converged through the cylindrical lens to form parallel light with a certain width and irradiate the transparent pull wire. According to the cigarette carton appearance detection device based on artificial intelligence, the pull wire lighting equipment composed of the special lamp strip and the cylindrical lens is used for irradiating the transparent pull wire of a cigarette carton, so that the weak characteristics of the transparent pull wire can be enhanced into obvious gray contrast characteristics, then the transparent pull wire can be stably and reliably identified by the pull wire image acquisition equipment, the reliability of the cigarette carton appearance detection device based on artificial intelligence is improved, and the appearance of the cigarette carton can be reliably detected.

column2: SMALL LOW GLITCH CURRENT MODE ANALOG TO DIGITAL CONVERTERS FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: Single-stage and multiple-stage current-mode Analog-to-Digital converters (iADC)s utilizing apparatuses, circuits, and methods are described in this disclosure. The disclosed iADCs can operate asynchronously and be free from the digital clock noise, which also lowers dynamic power consumption, and reduces circuitry overhead associated with free running clocks. For their pseudo-flash operations, the disclosed iADCs do not require their input current signals to be replicated which saves area, lowers power consumption, and improves accuracy. Moreover, the disclosed methods of multi-staging of iADCs increase their resolutions while keeping current consumption and die size (cost) low. The iADC's asynchronous topology facilitates decoupling analog-computations from digital-computations, which helps reduce glitch, and facilitates gradual degradation (instead of an abrupt drop) of iADC's accuracy with increased input current signal frequency. The iADCs can be arranged with minimal digital circuitry (i.e., be digital-light), thereby saving on die size and dynamic power consumption.

column2: BUILDING INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a building information processing device based on artificial intelligence. The building information processing device comprises a patrol robot body and a building equipment control device located in the patrol robot body. The invention aims at providing building information processing equipment based on artificial intelligence, and the equipment comprises a personnel detection module which is used for judging whether there is a person in a patrol range of a patrol robot body or not, controlling an environment parameter acquisition module to acquire environment parameters within the patrol range of the patrol robot body, analyzing the environment parameters by an environment analysis module, and sending a control instruction to a control module when an analysis result shows that the current environment is not within a preset standard environment threshold value; wherein and the control module controls the running state of building equipment, so that intelligent control of the building equipment is realized, and the defects caused by manual control are avoided.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING MODEL TRAINING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an image processing model training method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. According to the embodimentof the invention, on one hand, the shielding mode is introduced, a shielding mode of a sample face image is determined and compared with the target shielding mode marked by the sample face image, theimage processing model is trained to determine more accurate shielding indication information, the accuracy of face recognition is improved, and the robustness of the image processing model is improved. The image processing model can process the image end to end without independently carrying out a prediction process of the occlusion area and a dictionary query process of corresponding characteristics of the occlusion area by virtue of an external network, so that the calculation amount is remarkably reduced, the running speed of the equipment is improved, and the size of the image processingmodel is also reduced. Moreover, the invention is not affected by external network factors, and accuracy is remarkably improved.

column2: EFFECTIVE FEEDBACK SYSTEM OF MANAGEMENTS OF EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND METHODS THEREOF
column4: Title: Effective Feedback system of Managements of Educational Institutions using Artificial Intelligence and methods thereofABSTRACTThe invention discloses a feedback system capable of improving the Involvement of Owners, Strategic Level / Top Level of the Educational Institutes in the fields of Investments in Infrastructure, Research activities, Employee Retention, Employee Motivation, Faculty developments and student?™s developments. The feedback system has the capability of generating feedback with better accuracy using Machine Learning and hence easily identifies the areas of weaknesses and strengths of the management The feedback system has the capability of understanding management from perspectives of all the stakeholders involved, thereby generating a rating with areas of improvement, the system also has the capability of addressing the weaker areas by following a PDCA (Plan Do Check Act) Cycle. The system uses Machine learning methods to suggest mentors in the areas of Development and research , automatically suggest models based on artificial intelligence so that corrective measures in running the education institution with quality education impartment is practiced.

column2: REMOTE EDUCATION SYSTEM BASED ON VISUAL RECOGNITION
column4: A remote education system based on visual recognition is used for remote video education. The system is composed of a camera combination, a communication network and a database. The method is characterized by comprising the following steps; camera combination, the system comprises a camera specially used for shooting postures, a camera specially used for shooting myopia and a camera specially usedfor shooting a homework plane and a homework scene, information shot by the cameras is transmitted to a database in real time, and non-standard postures and actions of students are reminded in time through operation and comparison of artificial intelligence so as to be corrected in time. The complete homework process is tracked and shot, and the mastery degree of students for different question types, different knowledge points and different subjects is evaluated in combination with the homework result and consumed time. In combination with comparison and analysis of multi-dimensional parameters such as posture, myopia, time and environment and in combination with personality and characteristics of students, some targeted teaching schemes can be provided, and teaching according to materials is achieved. Therefore, myopia can be prevented, and physical and psychological health can be facilitated.

column2: DIGITAL MANAGEMENT PROCESS FLOW BASED ON GRAIN STORAGE CONTAINER
column4: The invention discloses a digital management process flow based on a grain storage container. The digital management process flow comprises the following steps: a grain receiving and cleaning stage: clearing and sterilizing the container (100); a grain boxing preparation stage; a grain boxing stage; a process that the containers (100) enter a storage area; and after the grains are loaded into thecontainer, the container (100) is loaded into the flat car and moved to a storage area of the container (100) on the plane in the warehouse, and then the container (100) is moved, stacked and lifted in place, so that the grains in the container (100) are stored. The invention provides a digital management process flow of a grain depot. Based on a grain storage container grain storage technology, means such as the Internet, artificial intelligence and a computer are applied, and economic and reasonable technological process combination is matched, so full-process mechanical operation, informatization and digital management of the grain depot are achieved; the grain storage and transportation cost is reduced, manual operation and management errors are reduced, the management refinement levelis improved, and social and enterprise benefits are achieved.

column2: SWIMMING ROBOT, AND DISPLAY DEVICE FOR CHARGING SAME
column4: Disclosed is a display device having a water tank in which one or more swimming robots are located. The device comprises: a communication unit for communicating with the swimming robots or a mobile terminal; a display on which an image is displayed; one or more sensing units; a wireless power transfer unit located on the inner wall of the water tank and including a plurality of arranged transmission coils; and a control module. Accordingly, a display device having artificial intelligence and swimming robots may be provided, wherein the display device and swimming robots perform 5G communication. Accordingly, charging efficiency can be improved, and more user convenience can be provided.

column2: VIRTUAL RACING CAR CONTROL METHOD AND APPARATUS, STORAGE MEDIUM AND DEVICE
column4: An artificial intelligence-based virtual racing car control method and apparatus, a storage medium and a device. The method comprises: when running a racing game on a client to which a first account is logged on, the client controlling a first virtual racing car of the first account to move in a virtual map of the racing game (S202); in the situation in which the first virtual racing car collides with a second virtual racing car in the virtual map, displaying on the client the durability score of the second virtual racing car being reduced (S204); and when the durability score of the second virtual racing car is a preset threshold, displaying on the client that the second virtual racing car has finished the racing game (S206). The described method does not require the second virtual racing car or the first virtual racing car to run to a pre-configured end point to end a racing game, thereby improving the efficiency of the second virtual racing car ending a current virtual game.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND RELATED PRODUCTS
column4: Provided are a data processing method and a processing apparatus. The data processing method comprises: a general-purpose processor generates a binary instruction according to the device information of an end-side artificial intelligence processor, and generates an artificial intelligence learning task according to the binary instruction; the general-purpose processor transmits the artificial intelligence learning task to a cloud-side artificial intelligence processor to be run; the general-purpose processor receives a running result corresponding to the artificial intelligence learning task; the general-purpose processor determines an offline running file according to the running result, wherein the offline running file is generated according to the device information of the corresponding end-side artificial intelligence processor and the binary instruction when the running result meets a preset requirement. The present invention can realize debugging between an artificial intelligence algorithm model and the artificial intelligence processor in advance.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) ENABLED MULTI-SCREEN VISUAL CUE RELAY SYSTEMS AND METHODS
column4: Systems and methods for simultaneously displaying an external visual cue received at a primary display device on one or more secondary display devices in a distributed presentation system. The method includes displaying original content on a primary display device, detecting an external visual cue on the displayed original content, determining one or more parameters of the external visual cue, the one or more parameters including at least a location of the external visual cue relative to, or on, the displayed original content, and communicating the one or more parameters to one or more secondary display devices that are displaying the original content, to enable the one or more secondary display devices to display a representation of the external visual cue simultaneously with displaying the original content.

column2: METHOD FOR TRAINING AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODEL AND COMPUTER-IMPLEMENTED METHOD FOR AUTOMATICALLY DETERMINING A PRODUCT QUALITY
column4: A method (1000, 1000') for training an artificial intelligence model (40) on a data processing system (100) includes providing several training data (10, 10a, 10b, 20, 20a, 20b) referring to a respective product of a product class, the training data (10, 10a, 10b, 20, 20a, 20b) comprising primary training data (10, 10a, 10b) referring to a respective primary product of a first product group, and secondary training data (20, 20a, 20b) referring to a respective secondary product of a second product group. A pre-processing module (110) running on the data processing system (100) is used to determine from the training data (10, 10a, 10b, 20, 20a, 20b) respective training information (10i, 20i) including a chemical property of the respective product and/or a physical property of the respective product. The pre-processing module includes a quantitative module (111) and at least one of a linguistic module (113) referring to the product class and a semantic module (112) referring to the product class. The artificial intelligence model (40) is trained to determine from the training information (10i, 20i) a quality parameter (p) referring to a product group allocation of the respective product.

column2: CHINESE CHARACTER HARD-TIPPED PEN WRITING INTELLIGENT GUIDING AND SCORING METHOD AND GUIDING AND SCORING SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to a Chinese character hard-tipped pen writing intelligent guiding and scoring method and a guiding and scoring system. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a word stock data storage unit, acquiring full-width images or video streams of a plurality of Chinese characters by a handwritten Chinese character acquisition unit to obtain single Chinese character images or queues thereof, identifying each Chinese character, and successfully retrieving in the word stock data storage unit; if yes, analyzing the Chinese characters layer by layer, determining the structure information of the Chinese characters, scoring the Chinese characters by a writing scoring unit, and guiding the user by a Chinese character writing guiding unit until all the full-width images are recognized. Writing of a hard-tipped pen writing user is standardized on the basis of different matrixes, Chinese characters written by the user are decomposed by utilizing clear characteristicsof a stroke skeleton in hard-tipped pen calligraphy, and writing of the user is corrected from independent strokes and an overall framework, so the user focuses on one or more matrixes, confusion isavoided, the strokes and the framework conform to standards; the strokes are disassembled to guide the user, so the user can see the problem more visually and correct the problem.

column2: DRUG REHABILITATION TRAINING SYSTEM BASED ON VIRTUAL REALITY ROWING EXERCISE
column4: The invention relates to a drug rehabilitation training system based on virtual reality rowing movement, which comprises a central control end management system, an artificial intelligence main scenecontrol system, a physiological data acquisition management system, a big data management storage system and a virtual reality rowing training system. Exercise rehabilitation training is carried out on drug rehabilitation personnel, physiological data, including electroencephalogram and heart rate data, of a user are recorded in time, an analysis technology of artificial intelligence machine learning is used for carrying out operational analysis on the physiological data, and monitoring and management on the physical health condition of the training personnel are achieved. According to the invention, the problem of interaction and interconnection between people and sites and between people and instruments in a rehabilitation training center is solved; the problems of student physique monitoring and automatic acquisition, summarization and analysis of exercise data are solved; the problem of specialized formulation of student exercise prescriptions is solved; the problem of exercise safety monitoring of a rehabilitation training venue is solved.

column2: DRUG REHABILITATION TRAINING SYSTEM BASED ON VIRTUAL REALITY MOUNTAINEERING
column4: The invention relates to a drug rehabilitation training system based on virtual reality mountaineering, which comprises a central control end management system, an artificial intelligence main scene control system, a physiological data acquisition management system, a big data management storage system and a virtual reality mountaineering training system.A virtual reality mountaineering scene is combined with exercise and fitness hardware; exercise rehabilitation training is carried out on drug rehabilitation personnel, physiological data, including electroencephalogram and heart rate data, ofa user are recorded in time, an analysis technology of artificial intelligence machine learning is used for carrying out operational analysis on the physiological data, and monitoring and managementon the physical health condition of the training personnel are achieved. According to the invention, the problem of interaction and interconnection between people and sites and between people and instruments in a rehabilitation training center is solved; the problems of student physique monitoring and automatic acquisition, summarization and analysis of exercise data are solved; the problem of specialized formulation of student exercise prescriptions is solved; the problem of exercise safety monitoring of a rehabilitation training venue is solved.

column2: DRUG REHABILITATION TRAINING SYSTEM BASED ON VIRTUAL REALITY RIDING EXERCISE
column4: The invention relates to a drug rehabilitation training system based on virtual reality riding exercise, which comprises a central control end management system, an artificial intelligence main scenecontrol system, a physiological data acquisition management system, a big data management storage system and a virtual reality riding training system.A virtual reality riding scene is combined with exercise and fitness hardware; exercise rehabilitation training is carried out on drug rehabilitation personnel, physiological data, including electroencephalogram and heart rate data, of a user are recorded in time, an analysis technology of artificial intelligence machine learning is used for carrying out operational analysis on the physiological data, and monitoring and management on the physicalhealth condition of the training personnel are achieved. According to the invention, the problem of interaction and interconnection between people and sites and between people and instruments in a rehabilitation training center is solved; the problems of student physique monitoring and automatic acquisition, summarization and analysis of exercise data are solved; the problem of specialized formulation of student exercise prescriptions is solved; the problem of exercise safety monitoring of a rehabilitation training venue is solved.

column2: COMMUNICATION NETWORK FAULT DISASTER RECOVERY SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses a communication network fault disaster recovery system which comprises a network terminal, a relay device, a main connecting line, a standby connecting line and a disasterrecovery terminal used for automatically switching to the standby connecting line when the main connecting line fails. The first signal output end and the second signal output end of the relay deviceare connected with the main connecting line and the standby connecting line respectively, and the main connecting line and the standby connecting line are connected with the first signal input end andthe second signal input end of the disaster recovery terminal respectively. And the signal output end of the disaster recovery terminal is connected with the first signal input end of the network useterminal. When the main connecting line breaks down and is disconnected, the disaster recovery terminal can be rapidly and automatically switched to the standby connecting line, communication connection is guaranteed, communication interruption is avoided, and therefore the stability of data application systems such as artificial intelligence, machine learning, big data and cloud computing is guaranteed.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INFORMATION SHARING PLATFORM BASED ON INTELLIGENT TRAFFIC
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence information sharing platform based on intelligent traffic. The artificial intelligence information sharing platform comprises vehicle nodes and a cloud control platform which are respectively arranged in different vehicles, the vehicle nodes are used for acquiring vehicle state information in real time and sending the vehicle state information to the cloud control platform, wherein the vehicle state information comprises positioning information, vehicle speed and path planning information; and the cloud control platform is used for classifyingthe vehicle nodes under a certain classification condition according to the state information of the vehicles and sending the information to the vehicle nodes of the specified classification. Vehiclestate information acquired by vehicle nodes is acquired through a cloud control platform, and information interaction is carried out on vehicles running on a road; and when the sharing platform needsto publish the message, the sharing platform can perform screening according to the vehicle state information and select a proper vehicle node to perform accurate pushing, so that the information pushing effect is improved.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR RUNNING IMPLEMENTATION IN CONSTRUCTION OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE APPLICATION, AND MACHINE EQUIPMENT
column4: Method and device for running implementation in the construction of an artificial intelligence application, and machine equipment, the method comprising: receiving an artificial intelligence algorithmconfiguration selected by a user for constructing an artificial intelligence application, the artificial intelligence algorithm configuration being a network topology describing a mathematical operation performed in the artificial intelligence application (310); obtaining a dictionary which describes performing the mathematical operation according to the selected artificial intelligence algorithmconfiguration (330); reconstructing a mathematical operation for the dictionary by means of a mathematical language representation of graph theory, so as to obtain an executable text for performing the mathematical operation (350); and by executing the executable text, allowing the user to run the constructed artificial intelligence application according to the selected artificial intelligence algorithm configuration (370). The present method, device and machine equipment may be used to translate algorithm graphics obtained by graphical programming into executable artificial intelligence applications, so as to achieve the purpose of running the artificial intelligence applications.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE GRAPHICAL PROGRAMMING TEACHING PLATFORM AND METHOD
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence graphical programming teaching platform and method. The teaching platform comprises: a Jetson Nano system operation module which is used for operating a Jetson Nano system; a teaching storage module which is used for storing a basic artificial intelligence algorithm; a teaching calling module which is used for calling from the teaching storage module according to a first instruction based on the Jetson Nano system and assisting a user in mastering and learning the basic artificial intelligence algorithm; an automatic driving algorithm supportlibrary which is used for storing an automatic driving algorithm; an automatic driving extension module which is used for calling the automatic driving algorithm from an automatic driving algorithm support library according to a second instruction based on the Jetson Nano system, and assisting the user to learn to complete lane recognition, automatic obstacle avoidance, driving decision, instantpositioning and map construction; and an integrated development module which is used for manufacturing works on the basis of the running Jetson Nano system and an integrated development environment according to the third instruction. Therefore, students can experience a complete calculation processing flow at the terminal.

column2: PACKAGING BAG PACKAGING SYSTEM BASED ON INDUSTRIAL INTERNET AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention provides a packaging bag packaging system based on the industrial internet, and applies to the technical field of intelligent production lines, and further relates to a control method ofthe packaging bag packaging system based on the industrial internet. According to the packaging bag packaging system based on the industrial internet, a packaging box front conveying belt (3) is arranged below one end of a packaging bag conveying belt (1), a packaging box rear conveying belt (4) is arranged at the end close to the packaging box front conveying belt (3), and the packaging bag conveying belt (1), an infrared sensor (2), the packaging box front conveying belt (3) and the packaging box rear conveying belt (4) are connected with a control component (5). The packaging bag packagingsystem based on the industrial internet is simple in structure and developed based on artificial intelligence, so that online boxing of packaging bags is conveniently and rapidly achieved, the intelligent degree of a production line is improved, the production efficiency is improved, the manual operation error rate is reduced, and the labor intensity of operators is reduced.

column2: METHOD FOR DERIVING FREQUENTLY USED APPLICATIONS, AND DERIVATION DEVICE USING SAME
column4: The present invention provides a method for deriving frequently used applications and a derivation device using same. The derivation method according to an embodiment of the present invention comprises the steps of: collecting application usage information in at least one time period and situation among a daily time period, a pre-bedtime period, and a driving situation; learning an application usage pattern via a machine learning or artificial intelligence algorithm on the basis of the collected application usage information; and extracting frequently used applications in the time period and situation on the basis of the learned application usage pattern, and recommending the extracted frequently used applications. The step of extracting and recommending frequently used applications may comprise the steps of: extracting a frequently used application in the daily time period and a frequently used application in the pre-bedtime period on the basis of the usage counts of applications usedin the daily time period and the pre-bedtime period; and extracting a frequently used application in the driving situation on the basis of the running order in which applications are run in the driving situation. Accordingly, a user can minimize the inconvenience of searching for frequently used applications.

column2: LABEL-LEVEL ELECTRIC POWER AI SAMPLE COLLECTION PLATFORM AND USE METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses a label-level electric power AI sample collection platform and a use method thereof, which belong to the technical field of image sample collection. The platform comprises a handheld terminal, a workstation, a switch and a platform server, wherein the handheld terminal is connected with the switch through a wireless network. The switch is connected with the platform serverthrough a wireless network. The workstation is connected with the platform server through a local area network established by the switch. The handheld terminal is an AI camera running based on an Android system. The handheld terminal is adopted to remotely collect the sample, so that the power AI sample can be efficiently collected; samples can be rapidly processed by adopting a screening, samplelabeling and auditing assembly line method, the samples are effectively managed by adopting a multi-dimensional classification, statistics and export method, rapid development and optimization of an artificial intelligence algorithm are rapidly driven, and development of remote intelligent inspection business in the field of electric power is promoted.

column2: PHYSICAL EXERCISE SCHEME RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND SYSTEM, TERMINAL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a physical exercise scheme recommendation method and system, a terminal and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring user body parameter data and user living condition data; preprocessing the user body parameter data and the user living condition data, and constructing a training data set; extracting features of the training data set to train andgenerate a data classification model; based on the user body parameter data and the user living condition data, classifying the users by utilizing the data classification model; determining a corresponding exercise scheme according to the user classification result, and recommending the exercise scheme to the user, thereby determining and recommending an optimal exercise scheme for the user by considering the body parameters of the user and the living condition of the user at the same time; and according to the user classification result, combining the users belonging to the same category toconstruct a group, so that the users share exercise experience and supervise each other, and the user satisfaction and network exercise social fun are improved.

column2: APPLET TESTING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an applet testing method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence and applet problem positioning. According tothe specific scheme, the method comprises the steps: receiving problem report information of a applet sent by a first device, cloning a program package of a small program in the first equipment and acurrent running environment of a mother program to which the applet is attached, and obtaining a debugging version package of the mother program; loading a mother program and a test program in the adjustment version package; installing an applet in the mother program; modifying the running environment of the mother program according to the cloned current running environment information; startingthe applet and testing the applet by using the test program, thus restoring the applet running environment, so the problem scene of the applet is reproduced by obtaining the current running environment information of the attached mother program so as to position the problem, intelligent detection of the applet problem can be achieved, problem positioning can be rapidly conducted, and repeated communication between a problem reporter and a problem solver is avoided.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR ELIMINATING DEFOCUSING DIFFUSION EFFECT IN MICROSCOPIC IMAGING SCENE
column4: The invention provides a method and a device for eliminating a defocusing diffusion effect in a microscopic imaging scene, and belongs to the field of image processing and artificial intelligence. Themethod comprises the steps: generating a decision matrix according to a to-be-fused image set; establishing a background matrix with the same size as the to-be-fused image, obtaining background pixels with low pixel values in the to-be-fused image set according to the to-be-fused image set and the decision matrix, and recording the background pixels into the background matrix; and generating an image preliminary fusion result graph according to the decision matrix, and covering a result recorded in the background matrix in the image preliminary fusion result to obtain an image fusion result graph after the out-of-focus diffusion effect is eliminated. By adopting the method and device, the problem that artifacts are generated at the background in the fusion result due to the out-of-focus diffusion effect of the foreground in a multi-focus image fusion task in a microscopic imaging scene can be solved under the condition that the original focusing shooting interval and brightness are not changed, so that the imaging accuracy is improved.

column2: HUMAN BODY BEHAVIOR ANALYSIS METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a human body behavior analysis method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring and storing image data acquired by shooting equipment in real time; performing feature recognition on the acquired image data; after the human body contour is accurately positioned after feature recognition, acquiring all behavior features of the humanbody by using a feature extraction algorithm; constructing a feature model by utilizing the extracted behavior features; and inputting the feature model into a convolutional neural network, mining and analyzing the image data by using the convolutional neural network to obtain a human body behavior analysis result, and storing the human body behavior analysis result. A large amount of human bodyimage data is collected as a training set and a test set, the human body characteristics are identified by combining the artificial intelligence convolutional neural network, the optimal image is acquired, the human body behavior characteristics are judged and identified by taking the optimal image as the reference standard, and the human body behavior characteristics are diagnosed and early warned by setting the threshold, so that the human body behavior analysis strength and the analysis efficiency are improved.

column2: IDENTIFICATION SERVICE METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC DEVICE AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to an identification service method and device, an electronic device and a computer readable storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method may include receiving application state information from a terminal device, the application state information including information related to an operating state of an application runningon the terminal device. The method further includes determining a feature representation of the application state information. Further, the method may include identifying, based on the feature representation, a service currently being provided by the application. According to the technical scheme, the service used by the monitored APP can be automatically identified, so that the compliance test time and the labor cost are reduced. Besides, the method and the device can also be applied to real-time protection of user privacy, i.e., the service used by the application running in the user equipment is determined through the application state information uploaded by the terminal device of the user in real time, so that the user is reminded when the service is not compliant.

column2: CONTROL DEVICE OF BLOOD SAMPLING ROBOT
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of medical instruments. The invention discloses a control device of a blood sampling robot. The robot comprises an arm scanning module, an arm shooting module, a needle tip calibration module, a needle insertion coordinate determination module, a needle head position adjustment module, a needle head angle adjustment module, an arm surface detection module, a needle insertion advancing distance determination module and a blood sampling module. The control device is mainly applied to arm vein blood sampling of a patient, the blood sampling robot usingthe control device can improve the blood sampling efficiency of a whole hospital, reduce medical staff in the aspect of blood sampling, and solve the problem that in the prior art, a blood sampling device is low in automation degree, and consequently the blood sampling efficiency of the blood sampling device is low.

column2: METHOD AND COMPUTING DEVICE FOR DIAGNOSING AND ANALYZING PROBABILITY OF COVID-19 VIRUS SPREAD USING AI
column4: A method diagnosing a COVID-19 virus and analysing a probability of spread of the COVID-19 virus using an artificial intelligence (AI) based engine. The method includes recording, by a computing device (102), a sample cough sound from a suspected patient. The sample cough sound from the suspected patient is recorded using at least one of an input or output audio device. The method includes sending, by the computing device (102), a recorded cough sound to the artificial intelligence (AI) based engine. The AI based engine is running on a cloud-based server. The method includes automatically generating, by the computing device (102), using a deep neural networking model, a test result for the COVD-19 virus in the suspected patient, based on received recorded cough sound.

column2: INTELLIGENT VIDEO EXAMINATION SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR COMPETITIVE COMPETITION, MEDIUM AND TERMINAL
column4: The invention provides an intelligent video examination system and method for a competitive competition, a medium and a terminal, and the system comprises an image collection module which is disposedin a competition field and is used for collecting the image information of a target object in a competition process in real time; a storage module, an image processing module and an auxiliary penaltyterminal. According to the invention, the collected motion data can be accurately scored and judged in an artificial intelligence mode; when the athlete in the match is judged to have violation or score loss actions, the auxiliary penalty information can be synchronously notified to the referee in time, so the referee can immediately give accurate penalty, the influence of human factors on the result of the match is reduced to the greatest extent, the completeness of the match process is improved, the misjudgment probability is reduced, and the fairness of the match is facilitated.

column2: SPECIAL WORK VEHICLE STATE MONITORING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a special work vehicle state monitoring system and method. The system comprises a sensor group, an image recognition module and an alarm module, wherein the sensor group is used for acquiring a box cover opening and closing state image of a carriage and a load state image of a vehicle in the running process of the special work vehicle; the image recognitionmodule is used for processing the carriage cover opening and closing state image of the carriage and the load state image of the vehicle through an artificial intelligence algorithm to obtain alarm information; and the alarm module is used for generating a corresponding alarm according to the received alarm information. The effect of monitoring the running state of the vehicle in the running process of the special work vehicle is improved, an alarm can be generated to remind a driver, manpower and material resources are saved, and the transportation cost is reduced.

column2: SPRING FRAMEWORK GENERIC DEPENDENCY INJECTION METHOD AND APPARATUS, COMPUTER DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The present application relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and relates to a Spring framework generic dependency injection method and apparatus, a computer device and a storage medium, the method comprising: when monitored that the activation of a Spring container is finished, acquiring the operating path of a target bean object that must undergo generic dependency injection; acquiring class files according to the operating path, and collecting class files corresponding to one dependency object so as to form a class file set; and generating a bean object according to each class file in the class file set and injecting same into the attributes of the target bean object to implement generic dependency injection. The solution provided by the present application is applicable to a Spring framework that does not have a generic dependency injection function, and generic dependency injection is implemented by means of acquiring a class file from a set path after a Spring container is activated; the described means may simplify the dependency relationship between objects so that a program is simpler, is easy to read, and is less invasive; and a generated dependency object enters a ready state immediately after construction is complete, thereby improving the running efficiency of a program.

column2: METHODS AND SYSTEMS FOR AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FITNESS PROFESSIONAL SUPPORT NETWORK FOR VIBRANT CONSTITUTIONAL GUIDANCE
column4: A system for an artificial intelligence fitness professional support network for vibrant constitutional guidance includes a diagnostic engine operating on at least a server and configured to receive training data and at least a biological extraction from a user and generate a diagnostic output. The system includes an advisory module configured to receive a request for an advisory input and generate at least an advisory output. The system includes a fitness module configured to select at least an informed advisor client device and transmit the at least an advisory output to at least an informed advisor client device.

column2: METHOD FOR ANALYZING IRIS IMAGES AND RETINA IMAGES BY USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a method for analyzing diagnosis diabetes and precursor symptoms of iris images and retinal images. The method comprises the following steps of: shooting an eye image of a userby using a mobile terminal of the user; a stage of performing image preprocessing for extracting a region of interest; expanding the resolution of the attention field; in order to reduce the data storage amount, compressing attention field data needing to be transmitted to a server in a database form; performing user authentication by using the iris image; encrypting the image data; enabling theartificial neural network to learn the stored data for the diagnosis of the diabetes and the precursor symptoms thereof; and predicting the disease probability of the diabetes by using the learned artificial neural network. Meanwhile, the stage of pre-processing the imaging image further comprises the following steps of: performing gray processing on the part which is not extracted into the concerned field, and only extracting the concerned field; the stage of predicting the disease probability of the diabetes further comprises a stage of predicting the diabetes type based on the lesion position and shape.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND RELATED PRODUCT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a data processing method and a related product, and the method comprises the steps that a universal processor generates a binary instruction according to theequipment information of an end-side artificial intelligence processor, and generates an artificial intelligence learning task according to the binary instruction; the universal processor sends the artificial intelligence learning task to a cloud-side artificial intelligence processor for running; the universal processor receives an operation result corresponding to the artificial intelligence learning task; the universal processor determines an offline running file according to the running result, wherein the offline running file is generated according to the equipment information and the binary instruction of the corresponding end-side artificial intelligence processor when the running result meets the preset requirement. By implementing the invention, the debugging work between the artificial intelligence algorithm model and the artificial intelligence processor can be realized in advance.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND RELATED PRODUCT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a data processing method and a related product, and the method comprises the steps that a universal processor generates a binary instruction according to theequipment information of an end-side artificial intelligence processor, and generates an artificial intelligence learning task according to the binary instruction; the universal processor sends the artificial intelligence learning task to a cloud-side artificial intelligence processor for running; the universal processor receives an operation result corresponding to the artificial intelligence learning task; the universal processor determines an offline running file according to the running result, wherein the offline running file is generated according to the equipment information and the binary instruction of the corresponding end-side artificial intelligence processor when the running result meets the preset requirement. By implementing the method, the debugging work between the artificial intelligence algorithm model and the artificial intelligence processor can be realized in advance.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND RELATED PRODUCT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a data processing method and a related product, and the method comprises the steps that a universal processor generates a binary instruction according to theequipment information of an end-side artificial intelligence processor, and generates an artificial intelligence learning task according to the binary instruction; the universal processor sends the artificial intelligence learning task to a cloud-side artificial intelligence processor for running; the universal processor receives an operation result corresponding to the artificial intelligence learning task; the universal processor determines an offline running file according to the running result, wherein the offline running file is generated according to the equipment information and the binary instruction of the corresponding end-side artificial intelligence processor when the running result meets the preset requirement. By implementing the method, the debugging work between the artificial intelligence algorithm model and the artificial intelligence processor can be realized in advance.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND RELATED PRODUCT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a data processing method and a related product, and the method comprises the steps that a universal processor generates a binary instruction according to theequipment information of an end-side artificial intelligence processor, and generates an artificial intelligence learning task according to the binary instruction; the universal processor sends the artificial intelligence learning task to a cloud-side artificial intelligence processor for running; the universal processor receives an operation result corresponding to the artificial intelligence learning task; the universal processor determines an offline running file according to the running result, wherein the offline running file is generated according to the equipment information and the binary instruction of the corresponding end-side artificial intelligence processor when the running result meets the preset requirement. By implementing the invention, the debugging work between the artificial intelligence algorithm model and the artificial intelligence processor can be realized in advance.

column2: SPATIAL POSITIONING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT, STORAGE MEDIUM AND NAVIGATION STICK
column4: The invention discloses a spatial positioning method and device, equipment, a storage medium and a navigation stick, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method includesobtaining an image obtained by shooting a target scene by a camera; identifying the marking point information in the image; determining the position information of the camera in a three-dimensional coordinate system corresponding to the navigation stick according to the two-dimensional position coordinates and three-dimensional position coordinates of marking points corresponding to the image; based on the position information of the camera in the three-dimensional coordinate system corresponding to the navigation stick, determining the spatial transformation relationship between the three-dimensional coordinate system corresponding to the navigation stick and the three-dimensional coordinate system corresponding to the camera; and determining the spatial position information of the to bedetected position of the navigation stick based on the three-dimensional position coordinates and spatial transformation relationship of the to be detected position of the navigation stick in the three-dimensional coordinate system corresponding to the navigation stick. Thus, through the technical schemes of the embodiments, spatial positioning scope can be enlarged, the flexibility of spatial positioning can be enhanced, and spatial positioning costs can be reduced.

column2: MULTIFUNCTIONAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BRAILLE LEARNING MACHINE
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of braille alphabet conversion devices, in particular to a multifunctional artificial intelligence braille alphabet learning machine, which comprises ahost, a main control module, a point display module, an operation module, a broadcasting module and a power supply module are arranged in the host, and a display area of the point display module andthe operation module are arranged on a main panel of the host; wherein a Bluetooth connection module and a wireless connection module are integrated on the main control module, and the main control module is respectively connected with the point display module, the operation module, the broadcasting module and the power supply module; the data conversion device is reasonable in structure, can realize data conversion between a computer and a smart phone, is simple to operate and complete in function, and can meet the application requirements of the blind; the multifunctional braille alphabet reader has a reading function, a braille alphabet point display and Chinese reading function, an exercise testing function, a score uploading function, a Bluetooth screen reading function and a parameter setting function.

column2: VENOUS BLOOD SAMPLING DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, AND INTELLIGENT BLOOD SAMPLING ROBOT
column4: The invention discloses a venous blood sampling data processing method and device, and an intelligent blood sampling robot. The venous blood sampling data processing method includes the steps that aninfrared image of a venous blood vessel is obtained, processing is carried out and a contour image of the blood vessel is extracted; skeleton extraction is performed to obtain a plurality of vessel radii, and a point with the largest radius is determined as a first blood sampling puncture point; based on a plurality of sets of acquired skin height laser scan data of the body part where the first blood sampling puncture point is located, a contour curve equation of the skin where the venous blood vessel is located is fitted by the least square method, and a skin tangent direction of the first blood sampling puncture point is obtained and calculated according to the contour curve equation; a subcutaneous blood vessel depth ultrasound image is obtained, combined with the skin tangent direction, contour images of the upper and lower walls of the blood vessel are extracted from the subcutaneous blood vessel depth ultrasound image, and the puncture depth of a blood sampling needle is obtained. According to the embodiment, the venous blood sampling data processing method can improve the recognition accuracy of the blood sampling point, the effectiveness of the blood sampling needle, and the blood sampling success rate of the blood sampling robot.

column2: AMMUNITION THROWING ANALYSIS AND MOVEMENT SIMULATION TRAINING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an ammunition throwing analysis and movement simulation training method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: capturing a standard ammunition throwing action sequence by using a three-dimensional action capturing system; shooting the figure model through a plurality of virtual cameras, wherein each virtual camera obtains a template image; performing figure orientation detection, and limiting the range of searching the virtual camera to a figure orientation area according to an orientation detection result; calculating the similaritybetween the template image corresponding to the virtual camera and the initial frame of the shooting action sequence of the mobile phone of the user to obtain a camera visual angle closest to the shooting angle; and calculating the sum of key point distances of characters in the real scene and the virtual scene, and selecting the standard ammunition throwing action sequence with the minimum distance to be provided for the user. According to the invention, ammunition throwing analysis and auxiliary training are realized, and a better auxiliary training effect can be achieved.

column2: SELF-SERVICE PHARYNGEAL SAMPLE NUCLEIC ACID SAMPLING DEVICE AND AUTONOMOUS NUCLEIC ACID SAMPLING METHOD
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of medical equipment, and particularly relates to a self-service pharyngeal sample nucleic acid sampling device. The self-service pharyngeal sample nucleicacid sampling device comprises a mouth gag and a handheld tool, wherein a sampler puts the mouth gag in the mouth to play guiding and limiting roles; a pharyngeal sample at the front end of the handheld tool penetrates through a guide hole in the mouth gag, is inserted into the posterior pharyngeal wall, and rotates under the action of a rotating mechanism to scrape the posterior pharyngeal wallto complete a sampling action; and after sampling is completed, an end cover seals and isolates the sample. A camera at the front end of the handheld tool performs whole-process shooting on the sampling process, and wirelessly uploads the shooting result to a cloud server or a computer host, and background personnel or AI (Artificial Intelligence) performs auditing confirmation on the sampling process. The self-service pharyngeal sample nucleic acid sampling device is simple in structure, and is easy and convenient to operate; ordinary people can complete sampling in a self-service way; the sampler can be shunted effectively; the detection efficiency is increased; the risk of cross infection caused by contact between doctors and patients is avoided; and the working intensity of medical personnel is lowered greatly. The invention further discloses a method for performing self-service nucleic acid sampling by using the sampling device.

column2: ACCESS CONTROL SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ANALYSIS
column4: The invention discloses an access control system based on artificial intelligence analysis. The system comprises a control mechanism, a password input mechanism, a fingerprint input mechanism, a remote control terminal, a camera mechanism, a voice mechanism and a setting mechanism, wherein the control mechanism comprises a power supply module and an alarm module, the password input mechanism, thefingerprint input mechanism, the remote control terminal, the camera shooting mechanism, the voice mechanism and the setting mechanism are controlled by the control mechanism, the password input mechanism comprises number keys, a doorbell key and an information processing module, the password input mechanism is connected with a locking control module, the information processing module analyzes andprocesses the input password information, and the information processing module sends the information to an alarm module when the input password information exceeds the specified number of times andthe input incorrect information is inputted. The access control system based on artificial intelligence analysis is high in safety, can judge safety more accurately, and can get assistance more quickly in emergency.

column2: USER INTERNET SURFING BEHAVIOR-BASED DATA PREPROCESSING METHOD FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses a user internet surfing behavior-based data preprocessing method for an artificial intelligence algorithm. The method comprises the steps of: obtaining original information ofa user; processing user basic information; processing internet surfing behavior data information; and combining the data information of a visit access record table according to the user dimension to form a user data table in a predetermined internet surfing time period. Therefore, discontinuous, scattered and irregular data of internet surfing of the user can be processed to form a data format capable of being used for subsequent operation, so that artificial intelligence analysis by adopting the internet surfing behavior data of the user becomes possible.

column2: CUSTOMER SERVICE EXPRESSION EXERCISE METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to artificial intelligence, and provides a customer service expression exercise method and device based on artificial intelligence, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a face video of a customer service; detecting a plurality of face images in the face video; for the non-front face image, extracting 3D reconstruction parameters by adopting a 3D reconstruction parameter extraction model, and reconstructing a front face image based on the 3D reconstruction parameters; recognizing the front face image to obtain a service field of the customer service, and obtaining a plurality of capability score thresholds corresponding to the service field; identifying a plurality of expressions in the front face image, and calculating a plurality of service capability scores of the customer service according to the plurality of expressions and the plurality of capability score thresholds; and analyzing whether the customer service staff needs to perform the next round of expression exercise according to the plurality of service capability scores. The method can be applied to intelligent government affairs, and expression exercise can be carried out on customer services in different service fields in a personalized mode. In addition, the invention also relates to the technical field of the block chain, and a plurality of capability scoring thresholds can be stored in the block chain.

column2: GEAR SHIFTING ROBOT FOR UNMANNED DRIVING OF VEHICLE
column4: The utility model provides a gear shifting robot for unmanned driving of a vehicle, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence in the traveling aspects of unmanned driving of vehicles,vehicle testing and the like, and solves the technical problems that in the prior art, a gear shifting robot is large in occupied space and not suitable for being placed in the running process of thevehicles. The device comprises an actuator and a gear shifting handle clamping mechanism, the actuator is connected with the gear shifting handle clamping mechanism through screws, the actuator is detachably connected with an armrest table of a vehicle, and the gear shifting handle clamping mechanism can clamp a gear shifting handle of the vehicle; the rotating motor is connected with the transmission force arm through a motor base, and an output shaft of the rotating motor is connected with the gear shifting handle clamping mechanism. The power transmission mechanism is connected with the transmission force arm through a fixing base, the power transmission mechanism is detachably connected with the handrail table, and the control analysis processor can collect and analyze information andcan control the operation state of the power transmission mechanism and the rotation motor. The automatic gear shifting device is used for automatic gear shifting of vehicles.

column2: MOBILE PAYMENT, PERSON AND CERTIFICATE VERIFICATION AND NO-CERTIFICATE VERIFICATION INTEGRATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence terminals, and discloses mobile payment, person and certificate verification and no-certificate verification integrated equipment. The equipment comprises a base with a certificate reading unit, a display part and a supporting part, the display part comprises a display screen, a camera shooting unit and a shell. A PCB with a processor, a memory and an encryption chip is arranged in the shell. The memory is suitable for storing a plurality of instructions, the instructions are suitable for being loaded and executed by the processor, the instructions comprise a person and certificate verification module, a no-certificate verification module and a mobile payment module, and the encryption chip is used for encrypting at least one part of the instructions; the top end of the supporting part is rotationally connected with a support arranged on the shell. By means of the integrated equipment, a user can conveniently conduct person and certificate verification, no-certificate verification, order query and payment in a self-service mode, the potential safety hazard of personal information leakage is reduced, and the inconvenience that the user needs to adjust the body position to align the human face to the camera is avoided.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR RECONSTRUCTING DIGITAL PANORAMA OF TRAFFIC ROUTE
column4: A method for reconstructing a digital panorama of a traffic route, relating to the fields of artificial intelligence and intelligent transportation, and in particular to the field of computer vision. The method comprises: acquiring video data acquired by an original data acquisition apparatus provided on a traffic route, the video data comprising information about multiple targets running on the traffic route; determining attribute information of each target according to the video data; determining, according to the video data, a model corresponding to each target, wherein targets of the same type correspond to the same model; and constructing a digital panoramic view of the traffic route according to the models corresponding to the multiple targets, wherein in the digital panoramic view, the model of each target on the traffic route is used to represent the target, and the model of each target is associated with the attribute information of the target. The digital panoramic view acquired by using the method occupies less memory and is highly observable.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND RELATED PRODUCT
column4: Provided are a data processing method and a processing apparatus. The data processing method comprises: a general-purpose processor generates a binary instruction according to the device information of an end-side artificial intelligence processor, and generates an artificial intelligence learning task according to the binary instruction; the general-purpose processor transmits the artificial intelligence learning task to a cloud-side artificial intelligence processor to be run; the general-purpose processor receives a running result corresponding to the artificial intelligence learning task; the general-purpose processor determines an offline running file according to the running result, wherein the offline running file is generated according to the device information of the corresponding end-side artificial intelligence processor and the binary instruction when the running result meets a preset requirement. The present invention can realize debugging between an artificial intelligence algorithm model and the artificial intelligence processor in advance.

column2: VIDEO SHARING AND OBTAINING METHOD, SERVER, TERMINAL DEVICE AND MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a video sharing method. The method comprises the steps that a server obtains video data and position points from N shooting terminals; the server sends the position points obtained by the N shooting terminals to M watching terminals; the server acquires a target position point from a Qth terminal, wherein the Qth terminal is one of the M viewing terminals;and the server sends J-th video data to the Q-th terminal according to the target position point, the J-th video data is video data shot by the J-th terminal at the target position point, and the J-th terminal is the J-th terminal in the N shooting terminals. The invention further provides a video acquisition method and a device, equipment and a medium. The plurality of video shooting terminals can share the video pictures with the plurality of watching terminals, and users of the watching terminals can independently select the video pictures shared by the shooting terminals at different positions, so that a many-to-many video sharing mode is realized, the method can be applied to various different scenes, and the richness and convenience of video sharing are improved.

column2: INFORMATION ANALYSIS METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND BIG DATA, AND CLOUD COMPUTING PLATFORM
column4: The invention provides an information analysis method based on artificial intelligence and big data, and a cloud computing platform. The method comprises the steps of firstly, acquiring operation state information of power equipment; secondly, analyzing each group of obtained running state information to obtain a state change track of each group of running state information in each set time periodand a plurality of information tags, and packaging to obtain a state change set; transmitting the information to an artificial intelligence server, obtaining an identification result returned by theartificial intelligence server, and finally determining whether each power device and at least one group of power utilization networks formed by the power devices are abnormal according to the identification result. Therefore, multi-dimensional analysis can be carried out on the operation state information; therefore, possible faults of the power equipment can be comprehensively and completely analyzed, adverse effects caused by equipment loss of the power equipment are fully considered by combining the collaboration between the power equipment, accurate and reliable state monitoring on the power equipment can be ensured, and large-area power grid production accidents are avoided.

column2: METHOD FOR DERIVING FREQUENTLY USED APPLICATIONS, AND DERIVATION DEVICE USING SAME
column4: The present invention provides a method for deriving frequently used applications and a derivation device using same. The derivation method according to an embodiment of the present invention comprises the steps of: collecting application usage information in at least one time period and situation among a daily time period, a pre-bedtime period, and a driving situation; learning an application usage pattern via a machine learning or artificial intelligence algorithm on the basis of the collected application usage information; and extracting frequently used applications in the time period and situation on the basis of the learned application usage pattern, and recommending the extracted frequently used applications.
