The step of extracting and recommending frequently used applications may comprise the steps of: extracting a frequently used application in the daily time period and a frequently used application in the pre-bedtime period on the basis of the usage counts of applications used in the daily time period and the pre-bedtime period; and extracting a frequently used application in the driving situation on the basis of the running order in which applications are run in the driving situation. Accordingly, a user can minimize the inconvenience of searching for frequently used applications.

column2: GPS TRACKING DEVICE WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND GEO-FENCING
column4: An apparatus of a tracking system employing a global positioning system (GPS) for determining the location of one or more objects is disclosed. The tracking system can receive position data from a user equipment. The tracking system can send the position data via a transmitter, to a satellite of the GPS. The tracking system can receive one or more signals from the GPS via a positioning sensor, wherein the one or more signals facilitate searching locating, and acquiring location data for the one or more objects. The tracking system can obtain boundary information from the user equipment defining a restricted area. The tracking system can determine a current position of the one or more objects in relation to the boundary information. The tracking system can send an alert message to the user equipment as a result of the determination that the one or more objects have entered the restricted area.

column2: BUMPER FOR VEHICLE CONNECTED TO BRAKE APPARATUS AND MADE OF SYNTHETIC RUBBER
column4: The present invention relates to a bumper for a vehicle connected to a brake apparatus and made of lightweight synthetic rubber to reduce weight which is the conventional problem due to high oil prices by making a bumper attached to the front and rear surfaces of a vehicle of synthetic rubber, and protects a vehicle passenger, a vehicle, and opposite objects from impact energy created by collisions between vehicles or between a vehicle and an object by the development of the technology for moving equipment without the help of people by the development of artificial intelligence (AI) and global positioning system (GPS) technology. A container is made of an impact reinforcing material for absorbing an impact of a bumper in a banana shape to inject air to generate an electric signal by discharging air which is impact energy created during a collision and the elasticity of a rubber material to transfer the electric signal to a brake apparatus to apply quick braking to a vehicle moving forward to stop the running vehicle and to provide a method for reducing the loss of human lives and assets. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: RECYCLABLE GARBAGE IMAGE CLASSIFICATION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a recyclable garbage image classification method and system based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: S1, deploying a hardware environment, and building the connection among a camera, a development board main body and external display equipment; S2, shooting pictures after detecting garbage by using the camera; S3, preprocessing the pictures, comparing the sharpness of the shot pictures according to a preset sharpness judgment standard, and screening out the picture with the highest sharpness; S4, carrying out background segmentation on the screened pictures, and cutting out objects contained in the pictures; S5, putting the separated object pictures into a convolutional neural network for picture classification, and outputting corresponding probability distribution; and S6, judging the probability distribution and taking corresponding measures. According to the invention, the garbage classification efficiency of a user is improved, sothat the probability of correct garbage classification is improved.

column2: TRAFFIC SIGN DETECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON DEEP LEARNING IN EMBEDDED EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence computer vision, particularly relates to a traffic sign detection method, system and device based on deep learning in embedded equipment,which aim to solve the problem that the existing detection method cannot give consideration to both detection precision and efficiency when running in the embedded equipment. The method comprises thefollowing steps of extracting a shallow feature map of an input image through an improved feature extraction network, generating deep feature maps of different scales from the shallow feature map through an auxiliary convolutional network, fusing the shallow features and the deep features through a feature fusion network, and acquiring the category and the detection box of the traffic sign displayed on the original input image through the combination of an improved classification detector and non-maximum suppression. According to the method, the shallow features are extracted through the lightweight MobileNet, the deep features are extracted through the auxiliary network, the shallow features and the deep features are fused for classification detection, the detection efficiency is greatlyimproved on the basis that the detection precision is guaranteed, and a good effect can be achieved in embedded equipment with limited operational capability.

column2: YCYCLE
column4: The yCycle is a hybrid of E-bike and E-cycle. It can be driven as an autonomous vehicle and also as normal E-bike with pedalling system. This cycle runs on battery.The pedal-assist technology (PAS System) in the cycle make cycling easier, thus it also improves a person"s fitness. A Self-driving mode is implemented using a three-level Artificial Intelligence algorithm and Computer Vision. An innovative low-cost rear accident avoidance system is made possible using machine learning. And everything is made user-friendly by a mobile application that precisely takes to the journey"s end and even tracks your health. It also has additional features that implies Smart Summon and Electric braking system. The Smart Summon makes the vehicle to track the driver"s path and follows them.Tuhe Electric braking system evaluates the condition of road and alerts the user when brakes are applied in slippery road.

column2: TEST ASSISTING METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a test assisting method, device and equipment and a storage medium and relates to artificial intelligence and software testing. According to the specific implementation scheme,the method comprises the steps of obtaining related data generated in the running process of a to-be-tested object, wherein the related data comprise at least one of interface display content and files and an operation log; detecting whether the to-be-tested object is abnormal or not according to a preset abnormal rule and the related data; and when it is detected that the to-be-tested object isabnormal, presenting related information corresponding to the abnormality. The embodiment of the invention can reduce the probability of abnormal missing detection.

column2: SKELETON SPACE DATA ACQUISITION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a skeleton spatial data acquisition method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring articulation point data information of a human skeleton, and establishing a spatial coordinate system about the human skeleton; selecting a target feature point ofthe human skeleton in the space coordinate system; selecting the articulation points in the space coordinate system of the human skeleton; and determining data information of the target feature pointaccording to the relative position relationship between the target feature point and the reference feature point. Based on video recognition and in combination with a human body modeling mode based oncomputer vision, difficult contents in the aspects of algorithms and modeling are converted into a visual simple configuration mode, so that a user can apply a computer vision technology to carry outrelated research without understanding knowledge in the aspect of modeling.

column2: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED HELMET AND NUMBER OF PERSONS DETECTION SYSTEM FOR TWO-WHEELER
column4: The present invention relates to an AI based intelligent two-wheeler driving system which consists of a camera module, a processor, an automatic lock, and a relay unit. In the present invention, a camera captures the image which is then processed using the pre fed algorithm. The automatic lock of the present disclosure does not unlock until detection algorithm detects helmet on the head of rider and there are not more than two persons riding on the two-wheeler making the system safe for driving.

column2: TIME SEQUENCE CHARACTERISTIC-BASED POWER DISTRIBUTION NETWORK DISTRIBUTED POWER SUPPLY AND ENERGY STORAGE DOUBLE-LAYER OPTIMIZATION PLANNING METHOD
column4: The invention relates to a power distribution network distributed power supply and energy storage double-layer optimization planning method, in particular to a power distribution network distributed power supply and energy storage double-layer optimization planning method based on time sequence characteristics. The method comprises the following specific steps: S1, determining a time sequence characteristic curve of a distributed power supply by adopting a clustering analysis method; S2, randomly generating an initial planning configuration scheme in the outer-layer model; S3, performing powerdistribution network operation time sequence simulation on the inner-layer model; S4, obtaining an outer-layer fitness function value according to the inner-layer simulation result; S5, adopting an artificial intelligence algorithm to iterate for multiple times to obtain an optimal configuration result. By adopting the method, the optimal power flow scheme of the power distribution network for wind-solar-energy-storage coordinated operation can be considered under the planning scale, and the absorption potential of new energy is improved.

column2: WEARABLE SENSOR AND HEALTHCARE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM USING A WEARABLE SENSOR
column4: A healthcare management system for a healthcare team caring for a patient to serve a healthcare need of the patient includes a wearable sensor worn by the patient for obtaining healthcare data from the patient; a healthcare clinical system having an healthcare analysis subsystem for analyzing the healthcare data; and a relay device in communication selectively with the wearable sensor and the healthcare clinical system. The healthcare analysis subsystem includes an artificial intelligence (AI) engine, the AI engine having a plurality of clinical analysis modules, each clinical analysis module is directed to a respective predetermined medical area, the respective clinical analysis module analyzing the healthcare data with a respective learned algorithm directed to the respective predetermined medical area.

column2: METHODS AND SYSTEMS FOR AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FITNESS PROFESSIONAL SUPPORT NETWORK FOR VIBRANT CONSTITUTIONAL GUIDANCE
column4: A system for an artificial intelligence fitness professional support network for vibrant constitutional guidance includes a diagnostic engine operating on at least a computing device and configured to receive training data and at least a biological extraction from a user and generate a diagnostic output. The system includes an advisory module configured to receive a request for an advisory input and generate at least an advisory output. The system includes a fitness module configured to select at least an informed advisor client device and transmit the at least an advisory output to at least an informed advisor client device.

column2: PERSONAL EXERCISE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM FUSING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND WIRELESS EMG SIGNAL PROCESSING
column4: The present invention relates to a personal exercise management system fusing artificial intelligence and wireless EMG signal processing. The personal exercise management system comprises: a control server receiving exercise information by interlocking with a monitoring module in which an exercise management application is installed and through a wired/wireless communication network, and providing analysis information on exercise of a user; a signal processing module receiving detection signals from a plurality of EMG sensors attached to a body of the user, analyzing the detection signals to calculate muscle activity, and providing analyzed data to the monitoring module; and an artificial intelligence module managing the exercise of the user by performing deep learning on big data including the detection signals. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: TINY LOW POWER CURRENT MODE ANALOG TO DIGITAL CONVERTERS FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: Single-stage and multiple-stage current-mode Analog-to-Digital converters (iADC)s utilizing apparatuses, circuits, and methods are described in this disclosure. The disclosed iADCs can operate asynchronously and be free from the digital clock noise, which also lowers dynamic power consumption, and reduces circuitry overhead associated with free running clocks. For their pseudo-flash operations, the disclosed iADCs do not require their input current signals to be replicated which saves area, lowers power consumption, and improves accuracy. Moreover, the disclosed methods of multi-staging of iADCs increase their resolutions while keeping current consumption and die size (cost) low. The iADC's asynchronous topology facilitates decoupling analog-computations from digital-computations, which helps reduce glitch, and facilitates gradual degradation (instead of an abrupt drop) of iADC's accuracy with increased input current signal frequency. The iADCs can be arranged with minimal digital circuitry (i.e., be digital-light), thereby saving on die size and dynamic power consumption.

column2: LEARNING STATE TRACKING AND ANALYSIS EQUIPMENT AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides learning state tracking and analyzing equipment. The method comprises the steps of shooting a preset object to obtain a corresponding learning process video; analyzing image frames of the learning process video to determine facial region image information and limb region image information of the preset object in the learning process; and finally, determining a real-time learning state analysis result of the preset object according to the two kinds of image information. When a preset object is in different learning states, facial expression states of five sense organs ofa facial region and upper limb pose states of a limb region of the preset object are correspondingly different; the images of the facial region and the limb region are processed by a preset image information analysis model; the real-time learning state of the preset object can be quantitatively and truly obtained, so that the accuracy, real-time performance and effectiveness of tracking and analyzing the learning state of the preset object are improved, and subsequent targeted reminding and improvement on the learning state of the preset object are facilitated.

column2: CENTRIFUGAL PUMP MULTI-WORKING-CONDITION ENERGY-SAVING OPTIMIZATION METHOD BASED ON GENETIC ALGORITHM
column4: The invention relates to a centrifugal pump multi-working-condition energy-saving optimization method based on a genetic algorithm. According to the method, special adaptation is made for energy-saving optimization of an artificial intelligence technology falling to a centrifugal pump, and the method is good in stability and high in calculation efficiency. The method comprises the following main steps of 1, establishing a geometric parameter system of an impeller; 2, determining the variation range of parameters according to experience to form a design space; 3, dividing the total design spaceinto a plurality of mutually independent design subspaces according to the blade number variable; 4, checking the rationality of the geometric parameter range; 5, establishing a fitness evaluation method based on shaft power; 6, carrying out optimization by adopting the genetic algorithm until convergence; 7, reserving a plurality of optimal schemes, randomly reserving a plurality of eliminated schemes, and starting a next round of genetic algorithm optimization; 8, in each independent subspace, repeating operation of the steps 4-7; and 9, if a satisfactory result is obtained, ending the steps, otherwise, entering the step 2 and modifying the parameter change range.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING DEVICE CONVENIENT TO INSTALL FOR TABLE TENNIS
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of intelligent monitoring devices. The utility model further discloses an artificial intelligence monitoring device convenient to install and used forthe table tennis ball. The system comprises a table tennis table and two intelligent monitoring machines, supporting legs are fixedly connected to the four corners of the bottom of the table tennis table. The intelligent monitoring machine is connected with a mounting mechanism; the mounting mechanism comprises a threaded rod, a sliding rod, two threaded holes, two sliding holes and two fixing plates; the two fixed plates are fixedly connected to the bottoms of the corresponding intelligent monitoring machines respectively; the two fixing plates are located on the two sides of the table tennistable respectively, the two threaded holes are formed in the corresponding fixing plates respectively, the threaded rods penetrate through the threaded holes and are in threaded connection with the threaded holes, and the threaded rods are symmetrically arranged in a threaded mode and located above the table tennis table. According to the utility model, the intelligent monitoring device can be quickly installed at the position of the shielding net of the table tennis table without additionally occupying the table tennis table top, so that the sight of a player is not shielded, and the normaladvancing route of the table tennis is not blocked.

column2: DRIVING BEHAVIOR RECOGNITION METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a driving behavior recognition method, device and equipment and a storage medium. The driving behavior recognition method comprises the following steps: acquiring a vibration signal wave of a vehicle, and judging whether the vehicle is in a running state or not according to the vibration signal wave; if the vehicle is inthe running state, obtaining running data according to a gyroscope and an acceleration sensor, and calculating an acceleration vector; according to the acceleration vector, judging whether the displacement direction change angle in the first time interval exceeds an angle threshold value or not, and judging whether the acceleration value in the second time interval exceeds an acceleration threshold value or not; and if the angle threshold value and/or the acceleration threshold value are/is exceeded, recording the information in a log and sending out corresponding alarm information. In addition, the invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and the privacy information of the user can be stored in the blockchain. According to the invention, compared with a scheme of monitoring theoperation state by a GPS system, the driving behavior recognition method, device and equipment and the storage medium achieve the monitoring of the operation behavior of the vehicle through less powerconsumption and less private information.

column2: BLACK BOX AUTOMATIC TEST SYSTEM AND METHOD COMBINED WITH DEEP LEARNING TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a black box automatic test method combined with a deep learning technology. The method comprises the following steps: 1) enabling a user to calibrate a mechanical arm and a camera, test communication with an AI server and judge whether a UI prototype graph exists or not; 2) shooting a screen page of the tested system by a camera, transmitting the screen page to an AI serverfor judgment/detection, and generating a coverage test case by adopting a case design method based on a deep learning model; 3) carrying out non-invasive automatic test on the tested system by usinga mechanical arm, a loudspeaker, a microphone and a camera; the invention discloses a black box automatic test system combined with a deep learning technology, which comprises a test generation module, a test definition module, a test execution module and a test adaptation module. According to the invention, a non-invasive mode is adopted to innovatively combine an artificial intelligence method,and the method is applied to three links of test case design, test implementation and test acceptance, so that the test efficiency is improved, a part of manpower is replaced, and the cost is reduced;and the influence of implanted test software on the tested system is avoided.

column2: WEARABLE SENSOR AND HEALTHCARE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM USING A WEARABLE SENSOR
column4: A healthcare management system for a healthcare team caring for a patient to serve a healthcare need of the patient includes a wearable sensor worn by the patient for obtaining healthcare data from the patient; a healthcare clinical system having an healthcare analysis subsystem for analyzing the healthcare data; and a relay device in communication selectively with the wearable sensor and the healthcare clinical system. The healthcare analysis subsystem includes an artificial intelligence (AI) engine, the AI engine having a plurality of clinical analysis modules, each clinical analysis module is directed to a respective predetermined medical area, the respective clinical analysis module analyzing the healthcare data with a respective learned algorithm directed to the respective predetermined medical area.

column2: SECURITY FOR PRIVATE DATA INPUTS TO ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELS
column4: Methods, systems, and devices for supporting security for private data inputs to artificial intelligence models are described. A device (e.g., an application server) may receive a request to run an artificial intelligence model. The device may run the artificial intelligence model on a public data set and an extended set of data that includes both the public data set and a private data set. The device may determine a first set of outcomes based on running the artificial intelligence model on the public data set and a second set of outcomes based on rerunning the model on the extended set of data. The device may then compare the two sets of outcomes to determine whether a private data value is identifiable based on the second set of outcomes. If a private data value is identifiable, the device may obfuscate the results prior to transmitting the results to the requestor.

column2: COMPUTERIZED VOTING SYSTEM
column4: Officials, Official Agents and Official Devices researching, creating lists of Registered Voters, Proxy Voters whom are sent machine readable encoded Documents (Registration, Language choice, Voting Ballots), optional return Containers. Each Document correlated to Receipts via shared unique Random Symbolic Identifiers, other Security Elements. For voting privacy, Voters exchange Ballots within their Voting Region. Voters complete Documents, add Personal Security Identifiers, keep Document Receipt, send Documents to Officials In-Person or by Postal Mail, Delivery Service, Telephone, Fax or Facsimile, Internet, EMail, Interactive Television. Officials receiving Documents provide delivery confirmation. Imaging machines record Documents duplicate images, correlates RSID, stores data. Timely, valid, authentic Documents are machine read via computer software extracting Voter information, selections, Write-In choices, Personal Security Items correlated to Document RSID. Read data stored, published to Voter privately accessible data vault. Completed ballots and Documents tallied for certifying. Official computers running artificial intelligence programs manage data (security, processing, integrity), communications, devices: availability, workload allocation.

column2: MODIFYING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELS USING MODEL FRAGMENTS
column4: An example system includes a processor to monitor system resources and performance preferences. The processor is to select model fragments based on the system resources and the performance preferences. The processor is to also construct a running artificial intelligence (AI) model from the selected model fragments. The processor is to further automatically modify the running AI model using the model fragments in response to detecting a change in the system resources or a change in the performance preferences.

column2: DISTRIBUTED PRIVACY-PRESERVING COMPUTING ON PROTECTED DATA
column4: The present disclosure relates to techniques for developing artificial intelligence algorithms by distributing analytics to multiple sources of privacy protected, harmonized data. Particularly, aspects are directed to a computer implemented method that includes receiving an algorithm and input data requirements associated with the algorithm, identifying data assets as being available from a data host based on the input data requirements, curating the data assets within a data storage structure that is within infrastructure of the data host, and integrating the algorithm into a secure capsule computing framework. The secure capsule computing framework serves the algorithm to the data assets within the data storage structure in a secure manner that preserves privacy of the data assets and the algorithm. The computer implemented method further includes running the data assets through the algorithm to obtain an inference.

column2: DISTRIBUTED PRIVACY-PRESERVING COMPUTING ON PROTECTED DATA
column4: The present disclosure relates to techniques for developing artificial intelligence algorithms by distributing analytics to multiple sources of privacy protected, harmonized data. Particularly, aspects are directed to a computer implemented method that includes receiving an algorithm and input data requirements associated with the algorithm, identifying data assets as being available from a data host based on the input data requirements, curating the data assets within a data storage structure that is within infrastructure of the data host, and integrating the algorithm into a secure capsule computing framework. The secure capsule computing framework serves the algorithm to the data assets within the data storage structure in a secure manner that preserves privacy of the data assets and the algorithm. The computer implemented method further includes running the data assets through the algorithm to obtain an inference.

column2: DISTRIBUTED PRIVACY-PRESERVING COMPUTING ON PROTECTED DATA
column4: The present disclosure relates to techniques for developing artificial intelligence algorithms by distributing analytics to multiple sources of privacy protected, harmonized data. Particularly, aspects are directed to a computer implemented method that includes receiving an algorithm and input data requirements associated with the algorithm, identifying data assets as being available from a data host based on the input data requirements, curating the data assets within a data storage structure that is within infrastructure of the data host, and integrating the algorithm into a secure capsule computing framework. The secure capsule computing framework serves the algorithm to the data assets within the data storage structure in a secure manner that preserves privacy of the data assets and the algorithm. The computer implemented method further includes running the data assets through the algorithm to obtain an inference.

column2: DISTRIBUTED PRIVACY-PRESERVING COMPUTING ON PROTECTED DATA
column4: The present disclosure relates to techniques for developing artificial intelligence algorithms by distributing analytics to multiple sources of privacy protected, harmonized data. Particularly, aspects are directed to a computer implemented method that includes receiving an algorithm and input data requirements associated with the algorithm, identifying data assets as being available from a data host based on the input data requirements, curating the data assets within a data storage structure that is within infrastructure of the data host, and integrating the algorithm into a secure capsule computing framework. The secure capsule computing framework serves the algorithm to the data assets within the data storage structure in a secure manner that preserves privacy of the data assets and the algorithm. The computer implemented method further includes running the data assets through the algorithm to obtain an inference.

column2: DRIVING ASSISTANCE SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of driving equipment and discloses a driving assistance system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a central processing unit, a vehiclestate monitoring module, a surrounding environment monitoring module, a driver state monitoring module and an artificial intelligence module. The vehicle state monitoring module, the surrounding environment monitoring module, the driver state monitoring module and the artificial intelligence module are connected with the central processing unit. The vehicle state monitoring module is used for monitoring a state of the vehicle in a driving process; the surrounding environment monitoring module is used for monitoring a surrounding environment in a running process of the vehicle; and the driver state monitoring module is used for monitoring the state of a driver in the driving process, and the artificial intelligence module is used for collecting monitoring information of the vehicle state monitoring module, the surrounding environment monitoring module and the driver state monitoring module, analyzing the monitoring information and sending corresponding measure instructions. Safe drivingof an auxiliary automobile and the driver can be guaranteed, and driving safety is improved.

column2: SHOOTING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON SOUND SOURCE POSITIONING, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to artificial intelligence, and provides a shooting method based on sound source positioning. The method comprises the steps: receiving a shooting instruction, and collecting sound information; carrying out sound source positioning on the sound information to obtain alternative sound source position information; analyzing the alternative sound source position information to determine target sound source position information; obtaining initial sound source position information, and calculating an adjustment angle of a camera unit based on the target sound source position information and the initial sound source position information; adjusting the shooting angle of the camera unit based on the adjusting angle; and controlling the camera unit to shoot. In addition, the invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and the sound information can be stored in the blockchain. The invention further provides a shooting device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. According to the invention, the sound source positioning accuracy and the shooting efficiency can be improved.

column2: COLLABORATIVE METHOD OF HUMANOID MULTI-ROBOT
column4: The invention provides a collaborative method of a humanoid multi-robot. The collaborative method comprises the following steps of determining a task allocation mathematical model, describing a task allocation problem, and determining tasks, the robot capability and an objective function; after describing the task allocation problem, defining a robot task sequence and formulating constraint conditions of the objective function; decomposing the tasks, establishing a hierarchical structure model of a robot system, and designing a behavior task tree of each robot on the basis of the hierarchicalstructure model; and completing the task allocation of distributed artificial intelligence through a negotiation mechanism of a contract net protocol CNP. Experimental verification shows that the method of the invention effectively improves the collaboration efficiency among multi-robot teams, shortens the running time of a multi-robot system, and has the effectiveness and robustness in solving practical and time-critical task allocation problems.

column2: IMAGE ACQUISITION DEVICE BASED ON BINOCULAR CAMERA
column4: The utility model provides an image acquisition device based on a binocular camera, and belongs to the field of binocular cameras. The image acquisition device based on the binocular camera comprisesa supporting assembly, a first rotating assembly, an image acquisition assembly and a second rotating assembly. The first rotating shaft is in transmission connection with the second rotating shaft, afirst motor is fixed to the supporting base, and a driving shaft of the first motor is fixedly connected with the first rotating shaft; by arranging the supporting seat, the first camera and the second camera can be conveniently supported; a first motor is additionally arranged to drive a first rotating shaft and a second rotating shaft to rotate; the binocular camera is simple in structure, convenient to use, suitable for different scenes, beneficial to face variable environments and various uncertain factors, capable of conveniently adjusting the elevation angle of camera shooting and controlling the irradiation angle by controlling the second motor to drive the second gear to rotate through the first gear, capable of being adjusted in real time according to actual conditions and high in adaptability.

column2: A MOBILE DEVICE INCLUDING SCREENING COMPARTMENT
column4: The invention discloses a mobile device comprising a screening cabin, the mobile device comprising the screening cabin comprises the screening cabin, an artificial intelligence device and a medical image shooting device located in the screening cabin, and a communication connection relationship exists between the medical image shooting device and the artificial intelligence device. According to the mobile equipment comprising the screening cabin provided by the embodiment of the invention, the medical image shooting device and the artificial intelligence device are used for realizing the purpose of primarily screening the to-be-screened personnel so as to determine the primary screening information corresponding to the to-be-screened personnel. Compared with an existing screening vehicle,the movable equipment comprising the screening cabin provided by the embodiment of the invention can effectively improve the screening efficiency and reduce the field working difficulty. Besides, whenthe mobile equipment comprising the screening cabin is loaded with communication equipment, professional doctors in a hospital can perform remote diagnosis on the to-be-screened personnel based on the preliminary screening information, so that the purpose of fully improving the screening accuracy while avoiding excessive consumption of medical resources is achieved.

column2: ROBOT FOR OVERHAULING INSIDE OF GASIFICATION EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to a robot for overhauling the inside of gasification equipment. The robot comprises a vehicle body, a walking unit, an ultrasonic testing unit, an image collection and transmission unit and an incrustation detection unit, wherein the walking unit, the ultrasonic testing unit, the image collection and transmission unit and the incrustation detection unit are arranged on the vehicle body; the ultrasonic testing unit comprises a plurality of ultrasonic wave sensors and is used for detecting a space size and pipeline distribution in the gasification equipment; the image collection and transmission unit is arranged on the top of the vehicle body and consists of a wireless communication device, a telescopic arm capable of stretching and retracting, and a camera arranged onthe top end of the telescopic arm; the wireless communication device is used for transmitting image information collected by the camera to the outside; and the incrustation detection unit is arrangedon the bottom of the vehicle body and consists of an incrustation peeling arm and a bottom camera shooting mechanism. Compared with the prior art, the robot disclosed by the invention can conveniently and visually judge the internal situation of the equipment, is simple to operate, is conveniently used and maintained, has a low price and cost and can easily realize artificial intelligence.

column2: THREE-DIMENSIONAL CODE INFORMATION INTELLIGENT RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a three-dimensional code information intelligent recognition method and device. A three-dimensional code comprises a multi-layer structure body and a featureobject in the multi-layer structure body. A hollow area is distributed on the topmost layer, and a characteristic object is presented through the hollow area; wherein the hollowed-out area presents acode of a three-dimensional code formed by combining the feature object and all the color blocks; the method comprises the following steps: shooting a three-dimensional code to obtain a coded first image; obtaining an information code image composed of a feature object image and all color blocks in the first image; inputting the feature object image into an artificial intelligence model, and recognizing the feature object in the feature object image through the artificial intelligence model to obtain a first recognition result; recognizing an information code in the information code image to obtain a second recognition result; and obtaining an recognition result of the three-dimensional code according to the first recognition result and the second recognition result. According to the scheme of the embodiment, automatic recognition of the three-dimensional code containing the feature object is realized, and the recognition accuracy and the user experience are improved.

column2: CURLING BALL MOTION STATE ESTIMATION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a curling ball motion state estimation method, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence and image processing. The method comprises the steps of 1, establishing a curling ball data set, and training a curling ball target detection network and a corner detection network; 2, detecting the curling ball match video sequence by adopting the trained curling ball targetdetection network to obtain curling ball bounding box information; 3, taking out curling ball bounding box information, initializing a curling ball target tracking network, and continuously tracking acurling ball target in a subsequent video frame to obtain a center coordinate of the curling ball; 4, intercepting the curling ball from the original image according to curling ball bounding box information, and sending the curling ball into a trained corner detection network for corner extraction; and step 5, converting the central coordinate and the corner of the curling ball under the image coordinate system into the coordinate and the corner of the curling ball on the curling stadium through coordinate conversion. The method is more accurate in estimation result of the curling ball stateand the handle rotation angle.

column2: AI-BASED SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR CONFRONTING DEEPLY FORGED PORTRAITS
column4: The invention discloses an AI-based system and method for confronting deeply forged portraits, and relates to the field of confronting forged portraits. The method comprises the steps: employing a 3Dcamera for shooting portraits, so as to collect 3D portraits to facilitate 3D image construction and analysis processing; employing a 2D camera for shooting a portrait, so as to collect a 2D face image, so that a 3D head model is conveniently generated; contour line processing, which is used for comparing the generated face model with face model processing software to generate comparison data; and image calibration, which is used for carrying out size and positioning calibration on the optimized model with the contour line layer and the shot 2D face image. According to the invention, the AI artificial intelligence technology is utilized for forging a portrait; according to the method, the problems of complexity of a background environment, complexity and variability of illumination conditions, variability of portrait expressions, angle diversity of acquired portraits and shielding can be solved, so that the problem of portrait modeling errors caused by the fact that partial features of the portraits cannot be correctly extracted is avoided.

column2: BIG DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides a big data processing method and system, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the data collection according to an edge data collection rule; carrying out data processing on the collected data by utilizing an artificial intelligence model to obtain processed data; performing dynamic knowledge graph creation and heterogeneous data storage on the processed data; performing visual twinning on the structure, the state and the behavior in the information space; adopting the virtual cloud operation, and carrying out the virtual resource dynamic scheduling, resourcetrusted management and resource running state management and control. The system comprises modules corresponding to the steps: the method. According to the big data processing method provided by the invention, edge computing, artificial intelligence and visualization twinning technologies are adopted, so the problems of data redundancy, missing and conflict can be avoided.

column2: METHOD FOR CREATING VIDEO PROCESSING TASK ITEM AND METHOD FOR SCHEDULING INPUT VIDEO STREAM
column4: Disclosed are a method for creating a video processing task item and a method for scheduling an input video stream, relating to the technical field of artificial intelligence visual identification. The method for creating a video processing task item comprises: when an event for creating a video processing task item is detected on a user interface, determining information of a camera related to a video processing task item; determining a task item name of the video processing task item and a running time period of the video processing task item; and creating a video processing task item on the user interface based on the information of the camera related to the video processing task item, the task item name and the running time period. By means of the method for creating a video processing task item provided in the embodiments of the present application, a user can create a video processing task item on a user interface of a video processing system, so that the user can intuitively learn any information related to the video processing task item.

column2: AI PARAMETER CONFIGURATION METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR RACING AI MODEL, AI PARAMETER CONFIGURATION DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: An artificial intelligence (AI) parameter configuration method for a racing AI model performed by an AI parameter configuration device is provided. A first parameter set including m sets of AI parameters is obtained. Each of the m sets of AI parameters is used by the racing AI model to travel on a track. The racing AI model is controlled to undergo an adaptation degree test according to each of the m sets of AI parameters to obtain m adaptation degrees. The m adaptation degrees are positively correlated with travel distances of the racing AI model on the track according to the m sets of AI parameters. A second parameter set is generated according to the first parameter set in a case that all the m adaptation degrees are less than an adaptation degree threshold. In a case that a target adaptation degree in the m adaptation degrees is greater than the adaptation degree threshold, an AI parameter corresponding to the target adaptation degree is configured as a target AI parameter.

column2: QUADCOPTER ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CONTROLLER AND QUADCOPTER SIMULATOR
column4: An apparatus includes a quadcopter simulator coupled to an Artificial Intelligence (AI) controller. The quadcopter controller is configured to receive quadcopter flight control commands and to generate simulated sensor output and simulated camera output for a plurality of stereoscopic cameras of a simulated quadcopter. The AI controller is configured to receive the simulated sensor and camera output from the quadcopter simulator, determine a flight path for the simulated quadcopter according to the simulated sensor and camera output, generate the quadcopter flight control commands according to the flight path, and provide the quadcopter flight control commands to the quadcopter simulator.

column2: QUADCOPTER SENSOR NOISE AND CAMERA NOISE RECORDING AND SIMULATION
column4: A method of simulating a quadcopter includes recording camera output for one or more video cameras under constant conditions and subtracting a constant signal from the recorded camera output to obtain a camera noise recording. Simulated camera noise is generated from the camera noise recording and is added to a plurality of simulated camera outputs of a quadcopter simulator to generate noise-added simulated camera outputs. The noise-added simulated camera outputs are sent to an Artificial Intelligence (AI) controller coupled to the quadcopter simulator for the AI controller to use to pilot a simulated quadcopter of the quadcopter simulator.

column2: INTEGRATED TRAINING SUPPORT METHOD FOR IMPROVING PERFORMANCE OF SLED SPORTS AND SIMULATOR THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to an integrated training support method for improving the performance of sled sports such as a bobsled or skeleton, and a simulator for training sled sports applied thereto. The integrated training support method for sled sports of the present invention comprises: a first data acquisition step (S110) for acquiring, processing and managing first data through assessment of physical fitness of a trainee; a second data acquisition step (S120) for acquiring, processing and managing second data through simulated training of the trainee; a third data acquisition step (S130) for acquiring, processing and managing third data through actual training of the trainee; a data integration step (S200) for generating integrated data by integrating the first data, second data, and third data, and processing and managing the same; and a data analysis step (S300) for analyzing integrated data based on artificial intelligence, thereby improving the performance of the trainee through feedback based on result data analyzed through the integrated data analysis step. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: POSITIONING METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR TRACK TYPE TRANSPORTATION EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of positioning of track type transportation equipment, and particularly discloses a positioning method and system for track type transportation equipment.The method comprises the steps that data of a first position of a vehicle body after moving are obtained through an encoder, and permanent magnets along the way of a track are induced through a magnetic inductor to obtain a magnetic mutation signal and know the current position; an RFID card reader reads RFID electronic tags when passing through positioning pieces so as to confirm how many permanent magnets are passed at the current position to obtain data of a second position where the vehicle body is located; and a controller corrects the value of the data of the first position according tothe data of the second position. The system comprises the track and the vehicle body running along the track, and a plurality of RFID electronic tags and permanent magnets are arranged along the track; and the controller, the encoder, the RFID card reader and the magnetic inductor are arranged on the vehicle body. The positioning precision, reliability and maintainability of the track type transportation equipment are improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED POSTURE ANALYSIS SYSTEM FOR HUMAN BODY FITNESS
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based posture analysis system for human body fitness. The artificial intelligence-based posture analysis system for human body fitness comprises thefollowing modules: 1, a client data collection module, which registers, numbers and stores data, such as names, genders, ages, heights and weights of used clients so as to subsequently and rapidly find out posture analysis conditions of the clients according to the names and facilitate comparative analysis according to a plurality of groups of data; 2, a body type analysis module; 3, an in-vivo detection module; and 4, a data output module. The artificial intelligence-based posture analysis system for human body fitness not only can play a role in fitness, but also can record and analyze the posture of a human body after fitness, and can analyze and record various data in the human body, so that more use requirements of contemporary people are met.

column2: INTELLIGENT CURLING ROBOT COMPETITION MOTION CONTROL SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses an intelligent curling robot competition motion control system, relates to the field of artificial intelligence education robot competitions in middle and primary schools,and aims to solve the problem that no intelligent curling robot competition motion control system exists at present. The control system provided by the utility model conforms to the local characteristics of northern robot education; crawler as base body, a control system is designed on the device; four infrared distance detection elements are uniformly distributed on the outer edge of the curlingstone; whether an opposite curling stone impacts around or not can be detected in real time, an avoidance strategy can be made in advance when an impact signal is detected, a color recognition sensoris designed at the bottom of the curling stone, and the motion state can be controlled through a double-motor driving system by recognizing different colors of different score areas of a match map. Therefore, motion control of the curling stone in a match is realized. The robot is applied to the field of artificial intelligence education robot competitions in middle and primary schools.

column2: INFORMATION SENDING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON CROWD DETECTION MODEL, AND COMPUTER EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, is applied to the field of smart cities, and discloses an information sending method and device based on a crowd detection model, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a first spatial position, and controlling an unmanned plane to fly to a second spatial position; performing atrial scanning operation, and recording a shooting parameter set during the trial scanning operation as a first shooting parameter set; catapulting the first flight sub-aircraft away from the unmannedaerial vehicle so that the first flight sub-aircraft flies to a third spatial position; obtaining a second shooting parameter set; sending the second shooting parameter set to the first flight sub-aircraft; acquiring a first image and a second image; inputting the first image and the second image into a crowd detection model to obtain a predicted number of people; and if the predicted number of people is greater than the number-of-people threshold, sending crowd evacuation reminding information to a ground terminal. Therefore, the crowd detection accuracy is improved. In addition, the invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and the crowd detection model can be stored in a blockchain.

column2: MAPREDUCE-BASED DISTRIBUTED PARTICLE SWARM CLUSTERING ALGORITHM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence big data analysis, in particular to a MapReduce-based distributed particle swarm clustering algorithm, which is characterized by comprising the following steps of: 1, updating the centroid of a particle swarm by adopting MapReduce operation; 2, adopting MapReduce operation to evaluate the adaptability of the population with the new particle centroid generated in the step 1, calculating a new fitness value of the updated population, carrying out fitness evaluation based on a fitness function, and measuring the distances between all data points and the particle centroid by obtaining the average distance between the particle centroids; 3, combining the fitness value calculated in the step 2 with the updating group generated in thestep 1, and updating the optimal individual centroid and the optimal global centroid at the same time; and returning to the step 1, and carrying out next iteration. According to the method, the clustering problem of a super-large-scale commercial data set is effectively solved, and high-quality clustering is achieved.

column2: INTERFACE AUTOMATIC TEST METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an automatic interface testing method and device, computer equipment and a readable storage medium, and relates to artificial intelligence, which comprises the following steps:identifying a request body and a response body in an interface document; judging whether the request body and the response body have a multistage structure nesting relationship; if yes, converting the request body or the response body with the multi-level structure into JSON format request body data and response body data with a nested relationship; if not, converting the request body or the response body into request body data and response body data in a JSON format; mapping the request body data and the response body data into a preset script template to obtain a test script; triggering a preset test task according to the test script, running an execution script in the test task, sending the test script to the to-be-tested interface and running the test script, enabling the to-be-testedinterface to generate a test case according to the test script, and generating a test report according to the test case. According to the method, the accuracy and availability of the obtained test script are ensured, and the test case generation efficiency and accuracy are improved.

column2: VEHICLE FOLLOWING CONTROL METHOD AND SYSTEM OF AUTOMATIC DRIVING MOTORCADE AND VEHICLE
column4: The invention provides a vehicle following control method and system for an automatic driving motorcade and a vehicle, and relates to the technical field of automatic driving. In the system, a preceding vehicle-mounted server obtains a preceding vehicle running track of the preceding vehicle-mounted server and extracts track key points according to the preceding vehicle running track; the front vehicle-mounted server sends the track key points to rear vehicle communication equipment through front vehicle communication equipment; the vehicle-mounted server of the rear vehicle performs curve fitting according to the track key points to obtain a historical track curve of the front vehicle; the vehicle-mounted server of the rear vehicle obtains the position and heading information of the vehicle-mounted server of the rear vehicle and performs curve fitting according to any point on the historical track curve of the front vehicle to obtain a motion planning curve; and the vehicle-mounted server of the rear vehicle controls the rear vehicle according to the motion planning curve and the historical track curve of the front vehicle behind the any point, so that the rear vehicle drives according to the motion planning curve and the historical track curve of the front vehicle behind the any point.

column2: CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a climbing robot. The climbing robot is used for providing a climbing robot solution with two ropes as climbing objects. The climbing robot comprises a main body support, a driving module and a control module; wherein the main body bracket comprises a bracket body and driving module mounting brackets positioned on two sides of the bracket body; the drivingmodule comprises a driving support frame, a V-shaped wheel, a driving motor and a driving transmission part; the driving motor is fixedly mounted on the driving support frame, the V-shaped wheel is rotatably mounted on the driving support frame, and the driving motor drives the V-shaped wheel through the driving transmission part; the driving supporting frame is installed on the driving module installation support, and the distance between the V-shaped wheels on the two sides of the support body is matched with the distance between the two ropes. The control module comprises a controller which is electrically connected with the driving motor and used for controlling forward and reverse rotation of the driving motor.

column2: EXPRESSWAY ENTRANCE AND EXIT ETC ACCURATE IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an expressway entrance and exit ETC accurate identification method based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the field of ETC vehicle identification. The method specifically comprises the following steps of: S1, identifying vehicle information by adopting Python + OpenCV artificial intelligence combination, and pre-judging a lane into which a vehicle is about to drive; S2, determining a lane into which the vehicle is about to drive according to data obtained by Python + OpenCV artificial intelligence combination analysis; S3, starting the laser radar of the corresponding lane, and continuously scanning the distance between the laser radar and the measured vehicle; S4, calculating the time when the vehicle reaches the effective identification range of RSU equipment according to the change of the distance between the laser radar and the measured vehicle along with the time; S5, calling a time library of a computer, calling the time in the step S4, and regularly controlling an electromagnetic relay connected with antenna equipment in the RSU equipment; and S6, when the vehicle enters the identification range of the antenna equipment in the RSU, enablingthe antenna equipment in the RSU to send out a radio signal, so as to realize communication between OBU equipment and the RSU equipment.

column2: NETWORK PLATFORM SYSTEM AND OPERATION METHOD AND RUNNING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a network platform system and an operation method and a running method thereof. The system comprises an international collaborative network backbone network and an international collaborative network edge network, wherein the international collaborative network backbone network is used for bearing backbone flow of the international collaborative network ofeach place; wherein the international collaborative network edge network is connected between the international collaborative network backbone network and users; wherein the international collaborative network backbone network comprises a backbone network collaboration machine used for introducing a collaborative computing mechanism into a bottom layer network; the backbone network collaborationmachine is used for communication and network collaboration of the international collaboration network backbone network so as to bear the backbone network of the international collaboration network; wherein the international collaborative network edge network comprises an edge network collaboration machine used for introducing a collaborative computing mechanism into the underlying network; and the edge network coordinating machine is used for communication and network coordination of the international coordinating network edge network so as to bear processing of services related to users. Themethod uses the system. The embodiment of the invention can realize the evolution of computers, artificial intelligence and computer networks from a primary stage to an advanced stage.

column2: OVERHEAD WIRE FITTING DETECTION DEVICE AND OVERHEAD WIRE FITTING DETECTION METHOD
column4:
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide an overhead wire fitting detection device and an overhead wire fitting detection method that can correctly detect an overhead wire fitting.
SOLUTION: An overhead wire fitting detection device has a configuration including: two line sensor cameras 2A and 2B for photographing overhead wires and overhead wire facilities; a pre-processing unit 31a for learning artificial intelligence functions; a line sensor image creation unit 31b for creating two line sensor images from image signals input from the two line sensor cameras 2A and 2B while a vehicle is running; a metal fitting candidate detection unit 31c for detecting candidates of overhead wire metal fittings from the two line sensor images; a metal fitting candidate image cutout unit 31d for creating, based on the candidates of the overhead wire fittings, a cut-out image by cutting out candidates of the overhead wire metal fittings from the line sensor images; and a metal fitting determination unit 31e for identifying the overhead wire metal fittings by inputting the cut-out image to the artificial intelligence functions, which detects the overhead wire fittings from the two line sensor images.
SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2
COPYRIGHT: (C)2020,JPO&INPIT

column2: FRONT-END PERFORMANCE PROBLEM DETECTION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence information, in particular to a front-end performance problem detection method based on artificial intelligence, which comprisesthe following steps: acquiring time series data of parameters during running of a front-end website; converting the acquired time series data into a multivariate parameter time series diagram, and performing picture marking; inputting the marked multivariate parameter time sequence diagram into a deep learning model, and training an abnormal target detection model to obtain a processing conclusion; fusing the processing conclusions; according to a performance problem knowledge base and an inference rule of a problem inference unit, outputting a performance problem conclusion. Compared with the prior art, the method has the advantages that a parameter problem area can be detected according to an algorithm model for a time sequence diagram of related parameters (such as FPS, CPU and Network) acquired during running of a front-end website, and problem reasons and possible optimization practices are provided.

column2: DATA LOGIC CALCULATION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of data processing, and discloses a data logic calculation method. The method comprises: obtaining a data set and a calculation logic script of the data set; loading the computing logic script into a preset distributed storage computing node, and running the computing logic script through a compiling program in the distributed storage computing node; judging whether the calculation logic script is successfully operated or not; if the operation is successful, taking the compilation program as a target compilation program; if the running fails, adjusting parameters of the compiling program according to a running result, and running the computing logic script again until the computing logic script runs successfully to obtain a target compiling program; and performing logic calculation on the data set by utilizing the target compiling program to obtain a logic calculation result of the data set. The invention further provides a data logic calculation device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. According to the invention, the high efficiency of data logic calculation can be realized. In addition, the invention also relates to a blockchain technology and an artificial intelligence technology.

column2: SAFETY PROTECTION METHOD AND DEVICE FOR ROBOT AND ROBOT
column4: The invention provides a safety protection method and device for a robot and the robot, and relates to the technical fields of robots and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps of acquiring running data of a motor; if the motor is detected to satisfy an overload triggering condition according to the running data, executing an overload safety handling strategy corresponding to the motor; performing collision detection on the motor under the situation that the motor is determined to satisfy a collision detection condition according to the running data, wherein the collision detection condition is determined according to the overload triggering condition; and if collision of the motor is detected, executing a collision safety handling strategy corresponding to the motor. The technical scheme provided by the invention can be applied to consumer robots such as home robots for accompanying and educating children or accompanying the aged, as well as robots such as industrial robots, commercial robots and special robots, and can improve the safety protection capabilities of the robots applied.

column2: CONTROL METHOD OF CLIMBING ROBOT AND CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a control method of a climbing robot. The climbing robot comprises a climbing main body, a duct propeller and a holding unit, wherein the duct propeller and the holding unit are arranged on the climbing main body, and the climbing main body is used for sleeving a climbed object. The method comprises the following steps of determining a target position to which the climbing robot needs to climb, determining the magnitude and direction of target thrust according to the weight of the climbing robot and the inclination angle of the climbed object relativeto the ground, controlling the duct propeller to output the target thrust in the magnitude and the direction, so that the climbing robot flies along the sleeved climbed object, and when the real-timeflight position of the climbing robot is the same as the target position, controlling the holding unit to hold the climbed object.

column2: VEHICLE CONTOUR DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a vehicle contour detection method and device, computer equipment and a readable storage medium. The method comprises the steps that features of a to-be-detected vehicle image are recognized through a pre-trained vehicle visual angle contour prediction model, a visual angle prediction result of the to-be-detected vehicleimage is predicted, and the visual angle prediction result comprises contour point information corresponding to the shooting visual angle of a vehicle, such as the number of contour points and approximate position coordinates of the contour points. The vehicle contour can be predicted according to the visual angle prediction result, contour point prediction can be performed on the vehicle images of different visual angles, and the vehicle identification efficiency is improved. By adopting the method, the technical problem that the key points of the vehicle cannot be detected in the prior art is solved. The invention also relates to a blockchain technology. The vehicle viewing angle contour prediction model can be stored in a blockchain node.

column2: VEHICLE GPS DATA MAP MATCHING METHOD AND DEVICE, TERMINAL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a vehicle GPS data map matching method, comprising: acquiring GPS data and map data of a running vehicle at the current moment, the map data can be acquired from blockchain nodes, and the map data corresponding to a first geohash coded value; calculating a second geohash coded value of the GPS data at the current moment, and obtaining a target second geohash coded value matched with the first geohash coded value and a matching region; carrying out duplicate removal processing on the matching areas corresponding to all the moments to obtain a to-be-matched road section, and cutting the to-be-matched road section to obtain a plurality of cut road sections; determining a plurality of standard GPS starting points and a plurality of standard GPS end points in each segmented road section, and calculating the shortest path of the corresponding segmented road section; and determining the plurality of shortest paths as target road sections matched with the vehicle GPS data on the map. According to the method, the track corresponding to the GPS data of the running vehicle is cut, and the shortest path of the cut road section is calculated and matched to the map, so that the accuracy of map matching of the GPS data of the vehicle is improved.

column2: SECURITY AND PROTECTION CONTROL SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a security and protection control system based on artificial intelligence. The security and protection control system based on artificial intelligence comprises a main body, aninstallation platform, a storage battery and a cavity, wherein a protection structure is arranged on one side of the top of the installation platform, the storage battery is arranged on the other side of the top of the installation platform, the main body is arranged on the top of the installation platform, a connecting block is arranged at the bottom of the installation platform, an installationstructure is arranged at the bottom of the connecting block, the cavity is arranged in the installation platform, and a rotating mechanism is arranged inside the cavity. According to the security andprotection control system based on artificial intelligence, a micro motor is installed in the cavity, the micro motor is started to drive a first right-angle gear to rotate, the first right-angle gear drives a second right-angle gear meshing with the first right-angle gear to rotate, so that a rotating support rod is driven to rotate, the main body installed at the top of the rotating support rodrotates, the shooting angle of the main body can be adjusted to a certain extent, and the shooting and monitoring range is expanded.

column2: ORDER PAPER DEFECT DETECTION DEVICE BASED ON MACHINE VISION
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of computer vision identification. The utility model also relates to the technical field of paper detection. The utility model provides an order paperdefect detection device based on machine vision. The order paper defect detection device comprises a warning lamp, a touch display, an emergency switch button, a framework cross beam, two groups of short side shooting light supplementing lamps, two groups of short side shooting industrial cameras, two groups of long side shooting light supplementing lamps, two groups of long side shooting industrial cameras, a control main board, a shooting sensor module and a paper removing sensor module. According to the utility model, an artificial intelligence image identification technology is used; the order paper on the production line can be subjected to quality inspection and identification in real time; according to the method, defective order paper is removed, historical data, normal order paperdata, removed order paper data, the yield and the like are counted and displayed in real time, the production cost of enterprises is reduced, the production efficiency is improved, and the core competitiveness and the production management level of the enterprises are improved by applying a new technology.

column2: CABLE CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a cable climbing robot which is used for reducing damage of the cable climbing robot to the surface of a cable, improving the detection efficiency and widening the quality range of carrying various devices. The cable climbing robot comprises a climbing front body and a detection body, the climbing front body comprises a front body rack, a duct propeller, afront body holding unit and a front body control module. The duct propeller is mounted on the outer side of the front body rack around the front body rack; the front body holding unit comprises a front body enclasping motor, a front body enclasping transmission part and a front body enclasping piece, the front body enclasping motor is fixedly installed on the front body rack, and the front body enclasping motor drives the front body enclasping piece through the front body enclasping transmission part, so that the front body enclasping piece enclasps the cable; and the front body control module is installed on the front body rack, electrically connected with the duct propeller and the holding motor and used for controlling work of the duct propeller and the front body holding motor. The detection body is used for climbing along with the climbing front body and detecting the cable.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND RELATED PRODUCT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a data processing method and a related product. The data processing method comprises the steps that a universal processor acquires hardware architecture information of an end-side artificial intelligence processor and a corresponding configurable memory access bandwidth, and generates a corresponding binary instruction according to the hardware architecture information of the end-side artificial intelligence processor and the corresponding memory access bandwidth; the universal processor generates a corresponding artificial intelligence learning task according to the binary instruction, and sends the artificial intelligence learning task to a cloud side artificial intelligence processor for running; the cloud side artificial intelligence processorreceives the artificial intelligence learning task, executes the artificial intelligence learning task and generates an operation result; the general processor receives an operation result corresponding to the artificial intelligence learning task, and determines an offline operation file corresponding to the memory access bandwidth according to the operation result; and the universal processor determines an offline running file mapping table according to the offline running files corresponding to different memory access bandwidths of the artificial intelligence processor on the same end side.

column2: LAYOUT ANALYSIS METHOD AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a layout analysis method and electronic equipment, and relates to an intelligent recommendation and search technology in the field of artificial intelligence (AI). The problem that after the operation of triggering layout analysis by the user is received, the service actually provided by the electronic equipment does not accord with the service actually wanted by the user possibly due to the judgment mode based on the system component is solved; receiving an operation that a user triggers layout analysis on a touch screen of the electronic equipment; in response to the operation, obtaining at least one ROI; according to the content of the current display interface on the touch screen of the electronic equipment, determining the type and position information of each to-be-matched area in the current display interface; according to the at least one ROI and the type and position information of each to-be-matched region, determining the overlapping degree of the at least one ROI and each type of to-be-matched region; determining and running a corresponding service at least according to the overlapping degree of the at least one ROI and each type of to-be-matchedregion; and displaying the layout analysis result after the service is operated on a touch screen of the electronic equipment.

column2: FAULT PROMPT INFORMATION GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a fault prompt information generation method and device and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of detecting an electric signal generated on a coil loop in targetequipment, wherein an electromagnetic valve and a relay are arranged on the coil loop, the relay is used for controlling opening and closing of the electromagnetic valve, and the electromagnetic valveis used for controlling on-off of a water path of the target equipment; determining that the target equipment is in a first fault state under the condition that a first electric signal generated on amutual inductance coil loop is detected; when it is detected that a second electric signal generated on the coil loop meets a first preset condition and it is detected that a control instruction usedfor controlling the electromagnetic valve to be opened and closed meets a second preset condition, determining that the target equipment is in a second fault state; and generating fault prompt information according to the first fault state and/or the second fault state. According to the invention, the technical problem that the fault prompt information is not generated in time is solved.

column2: CABLE CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a cable climbing robot. The cable climbing robot is used for reducing damage of the cable climbing robot to the surface of a cable and improving the detectionefficiency of the cable climbing robot. An embodiment of the present application comprises: a main body frame (100); a duct thruster (200) which surrounds the main body frame (100) and is mounted onthe outer side of the main body frame (100); an enclasping unit (300) which comprises an enclasping motor (301), an enclasping transmission component (302) and an enclasping piece (303), wherein the enclasping motor (301) is fixedly installed on the main body frame (100), and the enclasping motor (301) drives the enclasping piece (303) through the enclasping transmission component (302) so that the enclasping piece (303) enclasps the cable (900); and a control module (400) which is installed on the main machine frame (100), wherein the control module (400) is electrically connected with the duct thruster (200) and the enclasping motor (301) and used for controlling work of the duct thruster (200) and the enclasping motor (301).

column2: VIDEO-BASED MOTION EVALUATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a video-based motion evaluation method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a first motion video of a user and a second motion video of a coach; identifying the motion type of the user according to the first motion video; extracting a first key frame image in the first motion video and a second key frame image in the second motion video according to the motion type; detecting a first human body key point in the first key frame image and detecting a second human body key point in the second key frame image; calculating the difference degree between the first human body key point and the second human body key point; and evaluating the exercise score of the user according to the difference degree and the exercise type.
