According to the method, the key frame image can be adaptively extracted according to the motion type, the difference degree iscalculated, the motion of the user is evaluated in combination with the motion type and the difference degree, and the accuracy is higher. In addition, the invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and the motion score can be stored in a blockchain node.

column2: INTERACTIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CONTROLLED EDUCATION SYSTEM.
column4: An interactive artificial intelligence controlled education system, characterized in that it consists of a cartoon character (1), a skeleton (2), a model (3), a child (4), an artificial intelligence (5), a scenario (6), a speech detection (7), a movement detection (8) and a device (9) such as computer, tablet, telephone, etc. providing education fitted with microphone, camera and loudspeaker allowing acting of cartoon characters according to scenarios provided to them depending on detection of speeches and movements of children with artificial intelligence as a support for children with autism, attention deficit, hyperactivity disorder, development retardation or psychological and neurological problems requiring special support for normal development.

column2: MARINE LIFESAVING SYSTEM USING GEOFENCE AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention relates to a marine lifesaving system using a geofence and artificial intelligence (AI). The marine lifesaving system of the present invention includes a transmitting device provided in a life jacket, and a receiving device and a rescue processing device provided in a ship. The transmitting device has an inertial sensor and a salinity sensor. The receiving device transmits a radio signal transmitted from the transmitting device to the rescue processing device. The rescue processing device generates voice information in accordance with various scenarios in response to various distress accidents, and forms an AI voice signal optimized for a situation of a distress accident as a database. The rescue processing device sets a positional relationship between the transmitting device and the receiving device as a geofence area. When the transmitting device deviates from a set geofence area or is detected equal to or less than a reference altitude from the inertial sensor and a certain value of salinity concentration is detected at the same time, it is determined that a distress accident or a fall accident occurs to induce sailing of a ship to a location of a survivor or to provide an operator of the ship with AI voice information guiding to rescue a falling person. According to the present invention, when a distress accident occurs, the AI voice information can be output to promptly and accurately rescue a survivor or a falling person. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: POSTURE CAPTURING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON VIRTUAL REALITY
column4: The invention provides a posture capturing method and device based on virtual reality, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of obtaining and inputting first hand posture information into a training model, wherein the training model is obtained through training of multiple sets of training data and each set of training data in the multiple sets of training data comprises the first hand posture information and a depth image; obtaining output information of the training model, the output information which comprises hand region contour information; carrying out offline training and real-time recognition on the hand region contour information according to the random forest to obtain hand skeleton information; carrying out hand tracking onthe hand skeleton information to obtain a continuous first hand part motion sequence; according to the first hand part motion sequence and the first gesture feedback information, obtaining the firstgesture recognition information, thereby achieving the technical effects of conveniently capturing gesture posture data, improving the gesture recognition rate and recognition precision, and improvingthe reality sense of the virtual avatar.

column2: HEALTH DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention aims to provide a health detection method and device, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the human body sign information of a target person through a medical sensor of a terminal, and analyzing the human body sign information to obtain a sign analysis result of the target person; shooting a face image of the target person through a camera device of the terminal, and sending the face image and the sign analysis result to network equipment, so that the network equipment analyzes the face image and the sign analysis result through artificial intelligence health big data to obtain a health analysis result of the target person; and receiving the health analysis result, sent by the network equipment, of the target person by the terminal. Thus, the obtained health analysis result of the target person is more accurate and effective through data interaction between the terminal and the network equipment, and then the specific health condition of the target person can beeffectively analyzed.

column2: OBJECT SET SCREENING IMPLEMENTATION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses an object set screening implementation method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of big data processing and artificial intelligence. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises steps of obtaining an initial object set, wherein the initial object set comprises at least two objects; performing an object screening operation on the initial object set based on a screening strategy in a sequence decision algorithm of reinforcement learning to form a target object set, wherein the number ofthe initial object sets and/or the number of the object screening operations are/is more than two so as to form at least two target object sets; obtaining gains obtained by implementing the target object sets in the running environment; and updating the screening strategy forming each target object set according to the income difference between the target object sets. According to the embodimentof the invention, the problem of universality of set screening process decisions is solved.

column2: AN ELECTRONICALLY OPERATED AUTOMATIC WIRELESS RAILWAY SYSTEM
column4: The invented Cloud Based Railway Signaling System is the World's most cheapest and Advance Railway signaling system Designed with the help of advanced technologies like- Artificial Intelligence and Internet of things . This signaling system is very easier to use by Human and it can run ParalleHy to the Current existing railway signaling system without Disturbing the Existing signaling system. This System Provide. Signals to the Running Trains like- Red, Green, Yellow, etc. including the speed of train operation and other safety & Danger Signal Alerts, gap maintaining alert. Since, this system runs Automatically, So No extra Human efforts or knowledge Required to operate this system. All these alert will be shown in the Train driver device fitted inside the Locomotive many kilometer before (about 10 Kilometers).This system is able to provide the exact Upcoming Signals Like- red, green, etc. and also provide the gap between running train and installed signal on the side of track, in the range of next 5-10 Kilometers and also provide the speed of train operation in that area and danger alert signals (if any fault occurs on rail track).So with the help of this Signaling system the train will be able to operate at very high speed because the train drivers will be already informed about the Upcoming signals in the range of next 10 Kilometers. Due to this, the Indian Trains will become Punctual & on time and will solve train cancellation problem which are the major problems in Winter & foggy season.Since, it's a cloud based signaling system and signaling data travels through radio waves, So it will play a Great role In the operation of Railway in Winter & Foggy season, When Signals are not visible to train drivers due to fog or over sun light in summer.

column2: MOTION PREDICTION METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a motion prediction method, device and equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of acquiring a reference action sequence and an action prediction model, wherein the reference action sequence comprises at least two frames of continuous skeleton data and the action prediction model comprisesa target prediction model and a target correction model, inputting the reference action sequence into the target prediction model, acquiring a preliminary prediction action sequence corresponding to the reference action sequence through prediction of the target prediction model, wherein the preliminary prediction action sequence comprises at least one frame of preliminary prediction skeleton data,and correcting the preliminary prediction action sequence by using a target correction model to obtain a target prediction action sequence corresponding to the reference action sequence. In the action prediction process, the input reference action sequence is concerned, the preliminary prediction action sequence predicted by the target prediction model is concerned, concerned information is rich,the accuracy of action prediction is improved, and the action prediction effect is good.

column2: SMART SKIN DISEASE DISTINGUISHING PLATFORM SYSTEM CONSTITUTING API ENGINE FOR DISTINGUISHING SKIN DISEASE USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DEEP RUNNING BASED ON SKIN IMAGE
column4: The present invention relates to a smart skin disease distinguishing platform system constituting an API engine for distinguishing a skin disease using artificial intelligence (AI) deep running based on a skin image and, more specifically, to a smart skin disease distinguishing platform system constituting an API engine for distinguishing a skin disease using artificial intelligence deep running based on a skin image which uses one among a two-dimensional convolutional neural network (CNN), a three-dimensional convolutional neural network, and a virtual three-dimensional convolutional neural network to classify skin disease data set image information into preset classes, then learns the classes to store and manage the classes, and determines which of skin cancer, skin pigment disease and infectious disease, and normal skin a skin disease image acquired from a user who has undergone user authentication belongs to provide the determination for a user terminal to simply check existence of a skin disease for a skin image requested in real time and provide the existence of a skin disease for an image-based skin disease AI deep-learning automatic learning unit to perform relearning. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: MOBILE TERMINAL INTELLIGENT FOUNDATION PIT MONITORING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON PHOTOGRAMMETRY
column4: The invention belongs to the field of foundation pit monitoring, and particularly relates to a mobile terminal intelligent foundation pit monitoring system and method based on photogrammetry. The monitoring system is based on a mobile terminal, and comprises a data input and storage module used for inputting data, downloading data from a cloud end and uploading the data; a camera calibration module which is used for obtaining interior and exterior orientation elements of the camera and adjusting shooting attributes of the camera; a picture screening and processing module which is used for carrying out picture gray scale, size and light sensation processing, picture feature extraction, feature matching and picture splicing; a picture analysis module which is used for calculating data, obtaining internal and external orientation elements and target point coordinates, and judging result rationality; a database which is used for storing and providing data; and a cloud artificial intelligence technology module which is used for being linked with a client database and providing cloud information and artificial intelligence analysis data. The foundation pit safety monitoring system can achieve the function of quickly monitoring the foundation pit safety, effectively save the foundation pit monitoring time, save the management cost, improve the monitoring effect and guarantee the foundation pit construction safety.

column2: APPLICATION PROGRAM STARTING METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an application program starting method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. According to the specific implementationscheme, the application program starting method is applied to a host application program, wherein the host application program carries at least one auxiliary application program, and the applicationprogram starting method comprises the steps that if it is determined that the preprocessing condition of the at least one auxiliary application program is met, adopting a corresponding running container in a background to preprocess the auxiliary application program; and in response to a selection operation on the affiliated application program, starting the corresponding affiliated application program in the foreground. According to the technical scheme, the preprocessing processes of different auxiliary application programs can be completely and physically isolated through the running container and cannot interfere with one another, so that a running sandbox mechanism between the auxiliary application programs is protected, and free configuration of the corresponding auxiliary application programs in the running container is achieved, and the safety during preprocessing of the auxiliary application programs is improved. The speed of opening the affiliated application program is increased, and degradation of starting performance is avoided.

column2: DEVICE FOR UNIFYING MULTIPLE PATHS OF SHOOTING PARAMETERS
column4: The invention discloses a device for unifying multiple paths of shooting parameters. The device comprises a multi-path camera assembly, a control device and a computer processing system. The multi-path camera shooting assembly is in communication connection with the control device, the control device is in communication connection with the control signal output device, the control signal output device and the control device are in communication connection with the computer processing system, and the multi-path camera shooting assembly is in communication connection with the computer processingsystem. According to the invention, cameras and digital cameras at different positions in the multi-path camera shooting assembly can use unified shooting parameters. The device is not affected by aphotographed object, achieves the unification of photographed image parameters, provides a unified standard for the subsequent image processing of a computer processing system, is wide in applicationrange in the emerging artificial intelligence recognition field, three-dimensional vision field and image control field, and is wide in prospect.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING AN ALERT ON DELIVERING DIGITAL CONTENT
column4: The present invention discloses a system and method for providing an alert on delivering a digital content such as when an interesting digital content is imminent, for example, the beginning of a play during a football game, to direct the focus of one or more viewers towards the digital content. The present invention is further configured to embed a commercial message in conjunction with the alert on directing the focus of the viewers. The system is adapted to activate the alert either manually or automatically. Further, the system is optionally implemented with an artificial intelligence (AI) system, which is trained using deep learning to recognize the appropriate time to automatically trigger the alert/commercial message sequence. The AI system could be trained by monitoring the manual control of alert activation.

column2: DETECTING AND DISABLING A VEHICLE LEFT RUNNING WHILE PARKED
column4: A sensor device may detect that a vehicle is running in an enclosed environment monitored by the sensor device based on one or more artificial intelligence algorithms and detect that the vehicle is emitting exhaust into the enclosed environment based on the artificial intelligence algorithms. To ventilate the exhaust, the sensor device generates a first command that causes a door in the enclosed environment to open based on detecting that the vehicle is emitting the exhaust into the enclosed environment. Furthermore, to stop the vehicle from running and/or emitting the exhaust into the enclosed environment, the sensor device may generate a second command that causes an ignition switch on the vehicle to disengage. The sensor device transmits the first command and the second command to one or more devices for execution such that the exhaust is ventilated from the enclosed environment and the ignition switch on the vehicle is disengaged.

column2: DIAGNOSIS MODEL CONSTRUCTED BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FUSION MULTI-MODAL INFORMATION AND USED FOR VARIOUS PATHOLOGY TYPES OF BENIGN AND MALIGNANT PULMONARY NODULES
column4: The invention relates to a diagnosis model constructed based on artificial intelligence fusion multi-modal information and used for various pathology types of benign and malignant pulmonary nodules. The method comprises the steps: constructing a multi-resolution 3D multi-classification deep learning network model; constructing a machine learning multi-classification model; training the constructedmulti-resolution 3D deep learning model by using CT image, and obtaining a weight; training the constructed machine learning multi-classification model by using lung tumor marker information, and obtaining a weight; and fusing the lung CT imaging information and the lung tumor marker information at the tail end of the model by migrating the weights of the deep learning network and the machine learning network model through migration learning. According to the invention, a deep learning network model and a machine learning model are adopted to respectively mine deep features related to pathological type classification in a lung CT image and a lung tumor marker, and the fusion of the CT image and the lung tumor marker multi-modal information is realized by fusing the two network models to rapidly diagnose the specific pathology type of the pulmonary nodule.

column2: SHOOTING METHOD, DEVICE AND APPARATUS
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a shooting method, device and apparatus. The shooting method comprises the steps of acquiring order information of a target object; determining color information of the target object according to the order information; generating shooting background information corresponding to the target object according to the color information; and generating a shootinginstruction corresponding to the target object according to the shooting background information, and sending the shooting instruction to shooting equipment. According to the invention, the shooting background is automatically adjusted for different to-be-shot objects, and the shooting effect is improved.

column2: INTELLIGENT ROBOT WALL CLIMBING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an intelligent robot wall climbing device. The device comprises an upper shell and a lower shell, the upper shell and the lower shell are connected and fixed through a pressure buffering assembly. The number of the pressure buffering assemblies is three. Arm rods are rotationally connected to the two sides of the upper shell and the two sides of the lower shell correspondingly. A permanent magnetic chuck is fixed to the tail end of the arm rod, a first chain wheel is meshed with an input shaft of the permanent magnetic chuck, a driving assembly is installed on the arm rod, and the interior of the driving assembly comprises a gear motor installed at the lower end of the arm rod and a speed reducer arranged on an output shaft of the gear motor. Due to the fact that the pressure buffering assembly is installed between the upper shell and the lower shell, the pressure resistance of the device can be enhanced, the device is prevented from falling off from a wall,the damage degree of parts is reduced, safety is improved, the multiple magnetic suction cups are arranged, stability is good, the actual height from the device to the ground can be detected, and then operation of workers is facilitated.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR REALIZING RELAY FAULT IDENTIFICATION BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a system and a method for realizing relay fault identification based on an artificial intelligence technology and relates to the field of electrical technology, the technical problem to be solved is that online, remote and real-time monitoring of the relay can be realized in the operation process of the relay. The system comprises a relay state acquisition layer, a data transmission layer, an artificial intelligence learning layer, a data application layer and a remote scheduling layer. A state database output interface in the relay state acquisition layer is connectedwith the input end of the data transmission layer; the output end of the data transmission layer is connected with the input end of the artificial intelligence learning layer, the output end of the artificial intelligence learning layer is connected with the input end of the data application layer, and the output end of the data application layer is connected with the input end of the remote scheduling layer. According to the invention, a user can monitor the working state of the relay without needing to be on a working site, the intelligent degree is high, the precision is high, and the practical value is good.

column2: BALL PUSHING MECHANISM OF INTELLIGENT FOOTBALL COMPETITION ROBOT
column4: The utility model discloses a ball pushing mechanism of an intelligent football competition robot. The device structurally comprises a connecting plate, an embedding groove and an adjusting bolt are arranged on the connecting plate; the embedding groove is formed in the right side of the interior of the connecting plate; the adjusting bolt is connected with the upper part of the connecting plate through a thread; a rotating ball is arranged in the embedding groove; a rough surface and a push plate are arranged on the rotating ball; the rough surface is attached to the outer surface of the rotating ball; the push plate is connected with the right end of the rotating ball in a welded mode, a supporting plate and protrusions are arranged on the push plate, the supporting plate is connected with the lower end of the push plate in a welded mode, the protrusions are evenly distributed on the inner surface of the push plate, a bearing is arranged in the supporting plate, and a fixing shaft isarranged in the center of the bearing. The angle of the push plate can be adjusted when the push plate is used, the use range of the push plate is enlarged, and the use convenience of the ball pushing mechanism is improved.

column2: SKILL CODE OBTAINING METHOD AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a skill code obtaining method and device and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that an operation server obtains a skill directory corresponding to target skill information from a network file system NFS according to the target skill information, then obtains a target skill code stored in the skilldirectory, and finally reads the target skill code. Through the above scheme, the above scheme is adopted, an operation server of each product device can obtain a required skill code from the networkfile system NFS; and the skill code is directly read to run the skill, so that the step of downloading and copying the skill code is reduced under the condition of ensuring the accuracy of skill codeacquisition, and the stability of running the skill through the skill code is improved.

column2: MULTI-AGENT COOPERATION INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD AND SYSTEM, STORAGE MEDIUM AND INTELLIGENT TERMINAL
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The invention discloses a multi-agent cooperation information processing method and system, a storage medium and an intelligentterminal. Each agent reserves own information trace in the environment when taking the next behavior in the environment, searches surrounding information trace when other agents reach the state in the environment, and adds the information trace into the neural network for training; the grouping model finds a better cooperation strategy among the multiple agents, and the grouping model predicts the optimal grouping of the multiple agents at the next moment by using the grouping relationship among the multiple agents; when one round of training through the G model is finished each time, the loss function formula of each agent is regarded as fitness, the loss value mean value of each round of intelligent agent trajectory is counted, and the loss values of all agent trajectories of each roundare summarized. According to the method, the team learning efficiency of the multiple agents is improved, and the multiple agents can better complete tasks through team cooperation.

column2: UNIVERSAL WHEEL DEVICE OF INTELLIGENT FOOTBALL COMPETITION ROBOT
column4: The utility model discloses a universal wheel device of an intelligent football competition robot. The device structurally comprises a fixed plate, a bearing is arranged in the fixed plate; a limitingblock, a movable inner ring and a supporting column are arranged on the bearing; the limiting plates are connected with the upper end of the interior of the movable inner ring in a welded mode. The movable inner ring is embedded in the center of the bearing; the bearing is movably connected with the center of the bearing; the upper end of the supporting column is inserted into the movable inner ring, the lower end of the supporting column is connected with a fixing column through a fixing bolt, connecting shafts are arranged at the two ends of the fixing column, couplers are arranged on the connecting shafts, wheel bodies are arranged on the couplers, and hollow columns are arranged on the wheel bodies. According to the universal wheel device, the buffering effect of the wheel body in therolling process is enhanced, the transmission frequency of the universal wheel device to the vibration amplitude is reduced, and the stability of the universal wheel device in the using process is improved.

column2: SOFTWARE ENGINEERING DATABASE MAINTENANCE AND EARLY WARNING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a software engineering database maintenance and early warning system based on artificial intelligence. The software engineering database maintenance and early warning system comprises a log database, a log analysis module and an edge computing task allocation module. The method comprises the steps of dividing the running state information data Di acquired in the ith period into a plurality of data blocks according to a time window with the size of Ti, and then allocating the data blocks to a plurality of edge computing terminals by an edge computing task allocation module; processing the current data block by the plurality of edge computing terminals; the processing feedback information is sent to an edge computing task allocation module; and the edge computing taskallocation module adjusts the size of the time window to Ti + 1 based on the processing feedback information, divides the running state information data Di + 1 acquired in the (i + 1) th period into aplurality of data blocks according to the time window with the size of Ti + 1, and allocates the data blocks to a plurality of edge terminals. According to the method, the artificial intelligence technology and the data mining technology are utilized to predict and early warn possible risk conditions of the software engineering database in advance.

column2: DANCE SCORING METHOD BASED ON POSTURE RECOGNITION MODEL AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a dance scoring method based on a posture recognition model and related equipment, and the method comprises the steps: calling a posture recognition model to recognize dance videos of a coach and students, and obtaining a limb point sequence; aligning the action start-stop frames of the dance videos of the coachand the student according to the limb point sequence; determining a first target limb point sequence corresponding to the action start-stop frame of the dance video of the coach and a second target limb point sequence corresponding to the action start-stop frame of the dance video of the student; and calculating an action standard degree score, a rhythm mastery degree score and a dance skill degree score according to the first and second target limb point sequences, and calculating a total score of the second dance video based on the three degree scores. The starting and ending time of the first dance video of the coach and the starting and ending time of the second dance video of the student can be aligned, it is ensured that the student corresponds to the action of the coach, and therefore the calculated score is more reliable and higher in accuracy.

column2: CONTINUOUS MOTION ACTION ACCURACY EVALUATION METHOD
column4: The invention relates to a continuous motion action accuracy evaluation method, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence and image recognition. The method comprises the steps thatS1, a skeleton is recognized, and the positions of a human trunk and joints are extracted; s2, key information is acquired, wherein the key information comprises a real-time action skeleton and joints; s3, multi-dimensional comparison: a position comparison result of the real-time action joint and the standard joint and a moving speed comparison result of the real-time action skeleton and the standard action skeleton are calculated; s4, action accuracy is calculated. According to the invention, the video camera is configured to shoot the motion video clip, and through identification, analysisand comparison of continuous actions, a difference evaluation report and targeted guidance with standard actions are provided for a practicer.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DRIVEN HORTICULTURE SYSTEM
column4: This patent provides a method, apparatus and software for an integrated, automated, and largely hands-free gardening in a constrained space. It consists of vertical and horizontal placement of a system-of-systems consisting of: a control element; light sources, removable garden modules, vertical rotating pillars, and fluid reservoir, which may be configured for aquaponics and includes plumbing for distribution and re-cycling of fluids.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING AN ALERT ON DELIVERING DIGITAL CONTENT
column4: The present invention discloses a system and method for providing an alert on delivering a digital content such as when an interesting digital content is imminent, for example, the beginning of a play during a football game, to direct the focus of one or more viewers towards the digital content. The present invention is further configured to embed a commercial message in conjunction with the alert on directing the focus of the viewers. The system is adapted to activate the alert either manually or automatically. Further, the system is optionally implemented with an artificial intelligence (AI) system, which is trained using deep learning to recognize the appropriate time to automatically trigger the alert/commercial message sequence. The AI system could be trained by monitoring the manual control of alert activation.

column2: MOBILE OBJECT AUTOMATIC MODELING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a mobile object automatic modeling method and system, and the method comprises the following steps: carrying out the pre-scanning of an object through an artificial intelligence module, and determining a scanning parameter; controlling the shooting equipment to move to a target position and automatically scan the object according to the scanning parameter; and automaticallyconstructing a three-dimensional model of the object through a first AI algorithm according to an automatic scanning result. According to the invention, the artificial intelligence module is used forpre-scanning to determine the scanning parameter, and based on the scanning parameter, controlling the shooting equipment to move to the target position, automatically scanning the object, and automatically constructing a three-dimensional model of the object through the first AI algorithm according to an automatic scanning result. The whole process of object three-dimensional model constructioncan be completed in a full-automatic mode, convenience and high efficiency are achieved, and the defects that conventional three-dimensional modeling is complex in operation, time-consuming, labor-consuming and low in efficiency are overcome. The mobile object automatic modeling method and system can be widely applied to the three-dimensional modeling technology.

column2: FOOTBALL PLAYER COMPETITION PERFORMANCE EVALUATION METHOD BASED ON EMOTION CALCULATION
column4: The invention relates to a football player competition performance evaluation method based on emotion calculation, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence machine learning. According to the football player competition performance evaluation method, an emotion calculation technology and a text information extraction technology are utilized to conduct structural processing andquantification on expressions related to player performance in football warfare, and then the expressions are combined with statistical data, and a player performance score is output through a linearregression algorithm. According to the football player competition performance evaluation method, on the basis of inputting player technical statistics, the quality of the event is quantified by introducing the tactical text information and utilizing an emotion calculation technology, so that the quantity and the quality of technical items are considered at the same time, and the competition performance of the player can be judged more scientifically and reasonably.

column2: VEHICLE COMPONENT IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, is applied to the field of intelligent transportation, and provides a vehicle part recognition method and device based on image detection, computer equipment and a storage medium, wherein the method comprises the steps of identifying a to-be-detected target vehicle picture to obtain an identification result, determining a display areaand a vehicle model of a target vehicle according to the identification result, and determining a shooting angle of the to-be-detected target vehicle picture according to the identification result andthe vehicle model. And obtaining a standard relative position relationship and a standard contour line of each key component according to the vehicle model, and correcting the display area accordingto the standard relative position relationship and the shooting angle. And performing edge approximate comparison on the corrected contour line of the target vehicle in the display area and a standardcontour line, and determining the actual position of each key component of the target vehicle. By adopting the method, the actual position of each key part of the target vehicle is further determinedthrough edge approximate comparison, and the identification accuracy of the key parts of the vehicle is improved.

column2: FREMGANGSMÃ…DE FOR PROGRAMSTYRING OG MOBILTERMINAL
column4: An application control method and a mobile terminal are provided. The method is applicable to a mobile terminal including a processor and an artificial intelligence (AI) module. Whether a current user is a registered user is detected by the processor when detecting that an application running on the mobile terminal belongs to a preset application set. A monitoring instruction carrying an identification of the running application is sent to the AI module by the processor when detecting that the current user is the registered user. A monitoring strategy of the running application associated with the registered user is acquired by the AI module, where the monitoring strategy includes a monitoring parameter and a corresponding monitoring parameter threshold. The running application is closed by the AI module when detecting that a value of the monitoring parameter of the running application is greater than or equal to the monitoring parameter threshold.

column2: WONDERFUL PICTURE REAL-TIME AUTOMATIC SNAPSHOT METHOD BASED ON MOTION SENSOR
column4: The invention provides a wonderful picture real-time automatic snapshot method based on a motion sensor, which belongs to the technical field of sports event live broadcast. According to the wonderfulpicture real-time automatic snapshot method based on the motion sensor, athlete wearable equipment, a three-coordinate positioning signal receiving module, a three-coordinate positioning signal processing module, a camera positioning module and a lens transferring module are included. A three-axis acceleration sensor and a three-axis gyroscope attitude sensor are matched with a six-axis motion sensor data processing module to monitor the motion state of an athlete in real time; a three-coordinate positioning signal emitter is matched with a three-coordinate positioning signal processing module and a three-coordinate positioning signal receiving module to determine three-axis coordinates of the athlete; and the automatic camera is enabled to automatically adjust the shooting angle by utilizing the three-axis coordinates, so that wonderful pictures can be automatically judged and snapshotted without manual capturing and snapshotting by a photographer and directors, and the labor cost isgreatly saved.

column2: AUTOMATIC MODELING METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR OBJECTS IN CLOSED CONTAINER
column4: The invention discloses an automatic modeling method and system for an object in a closed container, and the method comprises the following steps: carrying out the pre-scanning of the object in the closed container through an artificial intelligence module in the closed container, and determining a scanning parameter; controlling shooting equipment in the closed container to automatically scan theobject according to the scanning parameters; and automatically constructing a three-dimensional model method of the object through a first artificial intelligence algorithm according to an automaticscanning result. According to the invention, the artificial intelligence module in the closed container automatically pre-scans the object in the closed container to determine the scanning parameters;and according to the scanning parameters, the object is automatically scanned through the shooting device, the three-dimensional model of the object is automatically constructed through the first artificial intelligence algorithm according to the automatic scanning result, construction of the three-dimensional model of the object is automatically completed, convenience and high efficiency are achieved, and the defects that existing three-dimensional modeling is complex in operation, time-consuming, labor-consuming and low in efficiency are overcome. The method can be widely applied to the three-dimensional modeling technology.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AERIAL SUSPENSION MOBILE AUTOMATIC TARGET SCORING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence aerial suspension mobile automatic target scoring device which comprises an automatic target scoring body, an aerial suspension mobile body, a connecting structure, a power supply and a control computer. The automatic target scoring body is provided with an annular plate, a protective frame and a connecting structure. The annular plate and theprotective frame are fixed to form a target surface, and a pressure sensor is arranged on the surface, corresponding to the target surface, of the protective frame; the pressure sensor is fixed on the protection frame, and the touch surface of the pressure sensor is dispersed on the surface, corresponding to the target surface, of the annular plate; the sensor is electrically connected with the number reporting mechanism and the control device. One end of the connecting structure is fixedly connected with the target surface, and the other end of the connecting structure is fixed to an aerialsuspension moving body. The device is accurate in target scoring precision, high in reliability, stable in work and suitable for tactical shooting training and match target ranges of public security,armed police, troops or armed doors.

column2: MOTION PREDICTION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a motion prediction system based on artificial intelligence. According to the system, skeleton information is extracted from a video through an skeleton extraction module, predicting the motion state of the skeleton by a skeleton prediction module containing a recurrent neural network, and finally combining the predicted skeleton diagram with an original picture to obtain apredicted picture, so that a more reasonable motion prediction result can be quickly and accurately obtained.

column2: CONTAINER TRUCK ANTI-HOISTING CONTROL SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON VIDEO STREAMING AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a container truck anti-hoisting control system and method based on video streaming and artificial intelligence. The system comprises a processor, an Ethernet switch and a camera which are connected in sequence, the camera is installed at the operation side of a cart and is used for shooting video streaming data of a container truck support in real time and transmitting thevideo streaming data to the processor through the Ethernet switch; and the processor detects and judges the video stream data and outputs an alarm signal and a control signal to an external protectionsystem. The system is simple in hardware composition, convenient to install and maintain and low in failure rate; a mature camera is selected and a method based on image feature detection is adopted,so that the system is slightly influenced by external illumination, wind, sand, rain, snow and other environments; the system performs analysis and processing based on the image video stream, is short in operation response time and high in real-time performance, effectively avoids the accident of mistakenly hoisting the container truck in the port and wharf operation process, and protects the safety of personnel and vehicles.

column2: NEW METHOD AND NOVEL APPLICATION SYSTEM FOR IMPROVING SKETCH SHAPE ACCURACY DEGREE
column4: The invention relates to a new method and a novel application system for improving a sketch shape accuracy degree. The method comprises the following steps of: acquiring a digital 3D model of a sketchobject; performing 2D image acquisition on an exercise corresponding to the sketch object; performing comparative analysis on a 2D image of the sketch exercise and the corresponding sketch object; and generating an analysis result of a sketch exercise shape accuracy degree. According to the method, through the adoption of an object 3D scanning/modeling technology, an artificial intelligence image/video identification technology and a 2D-3D digital image comparison technology and the application of the Internet, cloud storage and mobile communication tools, the sketch exercise shape accuracy degree can be judged more objectively and quickly; and once the sketch exercise shape accuracy degree is confirmed to have problems, different colors are marked on the digital 3D model to inform a sketch learner of an inconsistent region and the degree of the inconsistent region of the corresponding sketch object in the three-dimensional model, remind the sketch learner of the shape accuracy degreewhich cannot be found subjectively and prompt the sketch learner to further correct the work of the sketch learner.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE WOUND EVALUATION AREA MEASURING AND CALCULATING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence wound evaluation area measurement and calculation method and device. The method comprises the following steps: S1, constructing a feature extractionnetwork and a convolutional neural network for wound evaluation area measurement and calculation; S2, shooting a wound picture and labeling the wound picture by using a deep learning labeling tool; S3, generating a wound picture training set based on the labeled wound pictures; s4, inputting the wound picture training set into a feature extraction network and a convolutional neural network for image data training, and generating a training model; and S5, based on the trained feature extraction network and the convolutional neural network, performing wound evaluation area measurement and calculation on the shot wound picture to obtain wound information. The method has the advantages that through an artificial intelligence algorithm, human resources are saved, and efficiency and accuracy are improved.

column2: CLASSROOM BEHAVIOR DETECTION METHOD BASED ON IMPROVED OPENPOSE MODEL AND FACIAL MICRO-EXPRESSIONS
column4: The invention discloses a classroom behavior detection method based on an improved Openpose model and facial micro-expressions, and the method comprises the steps: arranging a camera in front of a desk, and detecting the classroom behaviors of students in real time; and recognizing facial information and upper body skeleton information through an artificial intelligence model, taking whether key points can be recognized or not and the distance between the key points as main judgment conditions, serving changes of micro-expressions as auxiliary judgment conditions, if a certain student does notmeet the condition for a period of time, judging that the examination behavior of the student is abnormal. Besides, through the video stream of one class, the possible stage of abnormal behaviors ofstudents is found out and analyzed, and innovation and reform of teaching are realized. Interference factors are reduced through machine vision recognition, equipment is simplified, and meanwhile theinvention further provides a corresponding data analyzing and processing system. According to the invention, the network model is further optimized through adoption of methods such as residual network, weight trimming and the like. According to the invention, self-service classroom behavior detection and feedback are realized, the test efficiency is high, and the accuracy can reach 95%.

column2: EXAMINATION BEHAVIOR DETECTION METHOD BASED ON IMPROVED OPENPOSE MODEL AND FACIAL MICRO-EXPRESSIONS
column4: The invention discloses an examination behavior detection method based on an improved Openpose model and facial micro-expressions, and the method comprises the steps: arranging a camera in front of adesk, and detecting the examination behaviors of students in real time; recognizing facial information and upper body skeleton information through an artificial intelligence model, serving whether keypoints can be recognized or not and the distance between the key points as main judgment conditions, serving changes of micro-expressions as auxiliary judgment conditions, and if a certain student does not meet the condition for a period of time, judging that the examination behavior of the student is abnormal. Besides, through the video stream of one class, the possible stage of abnormal behaviors of students is found out and analyzed, and innovation and reform of teaching are realized. Interference factors are reduced by means of machine vision recognition, equipment is simplified, and a network model is further optimized by means of a residual network, weight trimming and the like. Compared with a traditional mode, self-service examination behavior detection and feedback are achieved,the test efficiency is high, the accuracy can reach 95%, and the method can be applied to general examination detection.

column2: DRIVING RISK ASSESSMENT METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a driving risk assessment method. The driving risk assessment method comprises the steps of: carrying out interface connection between a pre-constructed interface calling code packet and a preset type of APP according to a code buried point method; when the interface is successfully connected, running the interface calling code packet to acquire a driving behavior data set from the APP, and extracting driving features from the driving behavior data set to obtain an original driving feature set; and performing featureselection on the original driving feature set to obtain a standard driving feature set, and inputting the standard driving feature set into a pre-trained driving risk prediction model to predict a driving risk. The invention further provides a driving risk assessment device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. According to the driving risk assessment method and the driving risk assessment device, the problems of complex feature selection and strong subjectivity of driving risk assessment can be solved.

column2: STORAGE SYSTEM, FILE STORAGE AND READING METHOD AND TERMINAL EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a storage system, a file storage and reading method and terminal equipment, the method can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence, and the terminal equipment can bea mobile phone, a tablet personal computer, a notebook computer and the like. Taking a storage system comprising a UFS as an example, the storage system realizes multi-disk storage of mixed media by configuring different media forms of the UFS, such as configuring persistent storage space of the UFS comprising SLC and TLC media forms. Based on the storage system, the hotspot file related to the application running rate is preferentially selected and stored in the SLC storage area of the UFS, and the mapped multi-disk file is mounted in the same directory of the file system, so that the migration of the file in the SLC storage area and the TLC storage area can be realized under the condition that a user does not perceive, and the performance of the storage system is improved; besides, the UFS is configured to have conversion modes of multiple medium forms, the requirements of users for performance and capacity are balanced, the operation speed is ensured, and the user experience is improved.

column2: REINFORCING STEEL BAR POINT NUMBER RECOGNITION SOFTWARE SYSTEM BASED ON AI MACHINE LEARNING
column4: The invention discloses a reinforcing steel bar point number recognition software system based on AI machine learning. The method comprises algorithm, training learning, data set and shooting identification. Algorithms such as machine learning and computer vision are used for carrying out multiple times of training learning on a large number of data sets; after training, the field condition is photographed and identified, wherein a YOLOv3 single-stage detector is adopted in the algorithm, ResNet50-VD is adopted in the YOLOv3 skeleton network, and the ResNet50-VD is adopted in the YOLOv3 skeleton network, and the Deformable Conversion v2 convolution operation is adopted by a YOLOv3 single-stage detector. AI technologies such as artificial intelligence and machine learning are applied, the number of steel bars is rapidly recognized through software, the steel bar acceptance or inventory counting efficiency is guaranteed, the labor cost of building construction personnel is reduced, the steel bar counting accuracy is improved, and material losses are reduced.

column2: SHIP MONITORING MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to a ship monitoring and management system, which comprises a ship Internet of Things module, a data access module, a data support module, a building information model module, ageographic information system module, an AI intelligent analysis module and a human-computer interface display module, according to the invention, during sailing, production, equipment maintenance andfault elimination of passenger ships and cargo ships by a shipping company, unified monitoring and management are carried out, and the current real-time state of each ship is known; the collected massive real-time monitoring data and control are visually, simply and clearly displayed and operated in terms; historical data are reutilized, an artificial intelligence technology is reasonably applied, and the surrounding environment and environment related data of the ship are remotely and instantly seen, so that the operation and maintenance work of the ship is simplified, and the daily operation and maintenance efficiency of the ship is improved.

column2: INTELLIGENT SENSING AND ACCESSING METHOD FOR DISTRIBUTED CHANNEL OF WIRELESS COOPERATIVE NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent sensing and accessing method for a distributed channel of a wireless cooperative network. The method comprises the following steps that: each signal source nodesends a RTS packet in a distributed mode to compete for a shared wireless channel; when only one information source sends the RTS packet, the information source i obtains a channel access opportunity;the information sink i calculates the quality of a channel from the information source to the information sink by receiving a training sequence carried in an RTS packet sent by the information sourcei, determines the average throughput under three conditions of accessing through a direct connection channel, detecting a relay node or abandoning the channel to compete again, and informs all the information sources and the relay node of decision information; when the detection relay nodes are selected, the information sink i further determines the number of the detection relay nodes and embedsthe information into the CTS packet; and the information source i receives the CTS information and performs execution according to the three decisions. According to the method, the signaling overheadis reduced, the network average throughput and the spectrum utilization rate are improved, the reliability and robustness of the system are enhanced, and the practicability is high.

column2: BIG DATA AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TEACHING TRAINING ENVIRONMENT AND RESOURCE INTEGRATION METHOD BASED ON SOLID STATE DISK
column4: The invention provides a big data and artificial intelligence teaching training environment and resource integration method based on a solid state disk. Firstly, an operating system is installed in asolid state disk; an integrated main program running environment is deployed in the operating system; then, a big data and artificial intelligence teaching training software environment is built on anoperating system of the solid state disk through a virtual machine method or a container method, finally, a set of teaching training software environment and course resource integrated main program is developed, and the integrated main program is installed on the operating system in the solid state disk. According to the technical scheme provided by the invention, big data and artificial intelligence teaching training complex software environment and rich resources are integrated on a solid state disk system; a user can synchronously check course resources and an operation practical trainingenvironment through an integrated main program, and the problems that software environment configuration is tedious, complex and non-standardized, course resources and the software environment are separated, and the software environment is inconvenient to carry in big data and artificial intelligence teaching practical training are solved.

column2: MULTI-CLUSTER ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ONLINE SERVICE METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a multi-cluster artificial intelligence online service method and system. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining a target job request and a target job submitted bya user, analyzing the target job, and determining a job operation mode of the target job; determining a target job cluster corresponding to the target job and a target gateway component or a target container required for executing the target job according to the job running mode; executing the target job in the target job cluster through the target gateway component or the target container, obtaining and feeding back a processing result, deploying artificial intelligence online service in a multi-cluster deployment environment planned according to various requirements such as safety, and being transparent to a final user; and conveniently and efficiently accessing external cluster resources in the artificial intelligence online service to realize cross-cluster security access.

column2: THREE-DIMENSIONAL POSITIONING DEVICE CAPABLE OF MULTI-UNIT IDENTIFICATION USING 5G RADAR AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention relates to a three-dimensional positioning device capable of multi-unit identification using 5G radar and artificial intelligence. To this end, the three-dimensional positioning device capable of multi-unit identification using 5G radar and artificial intelligence comprises: 5G radar which means extremely high frequency of 28 GHz or higher, and uses extremely high frequency radar to receive a reflected wave for multiple units at an identification position and generate radar information; a camera module which is a camera device installed at the identification position, and outputs image data including the multiple units; a pose estimation module to receive the image data in real time or the image data stored previously to detect a pose of each unit of the multiple units and estimate joint information to generate pose data which are vectorized skeleton information; a pose standardization module to standardize a specific joint position of the pose data generated by the pose estimation module and a height of the skeleton information to generate standard pose data which are standardized pose data; an identification module to use the standard pose data to assign an identifier to the pose of each of the units; and a positioning module to match the identifier assigned by the identification module and the radar information received by the 5G radar to match positioning information for the identifier. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: MOLECULE GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM AND TERMINAL EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a molecule generation method and device, a computer readable storage medium and terminal equipment, and is applied to the technical field of information processing of artificial intelligence. The molecule generation device can determine activity information of generated molecules formed after the seed molecules are subjected to shape change, so that the combination stability of the generated molecules and a receptor is considered; meanwhile, the molecule generation device can compare the first pharmacophore characteristics of the generation molecules with higher activity with the second pharmacophore characteristics of the seed molecules to obtain the generation molecules with the similarity in a preset range as new seed molecules, and then the newgeneration molecules are formed. When the similarity of the pharmacophore characteristics is small, the skeleton difference between the generated molecules and the seed molecules is large, such thatthe generated molecules with characteristics of rich skeleton and high activity can be obtained when the new generated molecules are formed through the new seed molecules so as to accelerate the discovery of the new drug.

column2: THREE-DIMENSIONAL POSITIONING DEVICE CAPABLE OF DIRECTION IDENTIFICATION USING 5G RADAR AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention relates to a three-dimensional positioning device capable of direction identification using 5G radar and artificial intelligence. To this end, the three-dimensional positioning device capable of direction identification using 5G radar and artificial intelligence comprises: 5G radar which means extremely high frequency of 28 GHz or higher, and uses extremely high frequency radar to receive a reflected wave for multiple units at an identification position and generate radar information; a camera module which is a camera device installed at the identification position, and outputs image data including the multiple units; a pose estimation module to receive the image data in real time or the image data stored previously to detect a pose of each unit of the multiple units and estimate joint information to generate pose data which are vectorized skeleton information; a pose standardization module to standardize a specific joint position of the pose data generated by the pose estimation module and a height of the skeleton information to generate standard pose data which are standardized pose data; an identification module to use the standard pose data to assign an identifier to the pose of each of the units; and a positioning module to match the identifier assigned by the identification module and the radar information received by the 5G radar to match positioning information for the identifier. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: FACE RECOGNITION SYSTEM FOR SMART COMMUNITY
column4: The invention discloses a face recognition system for a smart community, which relates to the field of face recognition systems for communities. The system comprises smart management, smart security and protection, smart service and smart life; wherein the smart management comprises personnel management, vehicle management and registration modes; the smart security and protection comprises smart perception, police-people interaction and smart early warning; the smart service comprises convenience business handling and property management service; and the smart life comprises neighborhood interaction, information sharing, problem tracking, civil investigation, information management and smart pushing. By means of artificial intelligence and the Internet of Things, people, houses, vehicles,units and other information of a community are dynamically sensed through sensing equipment (camera shooting recognition equipment), multi-party government affair services such as public security, fire protection, civil administration and sanitation are linked, the community management level is effectively improved, a safe, orderly, smart and convenient community ecological environment is created,and certain use prospects are achieved.

column2: CONTROL SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING STARTUP AND SHUTDOWN OF MULTIPLE PASSENGER CONVEYORS
column4: The invention discloses a control system and method for controlling startup and shutdown of multiple passenger conveyors. The system comprises remote cameras and remote controllers which are respectively arranged corresponding to each of multiple passenger conveyors. The control system furthermore comprises a monitoring server; the remote cameras are used for capturing images of external states ofthe corresponding passenger conveyors in real time; the remote controllers are arranged to control and collect the running states of the corresponding passenger conveyors; the monitoring server is connected with the remote cameras and the remote controllers through a data network; the monitoring server utilizes an artificial intelligence algorithm for analyzing the images captured through the remote cameras to judge whether or not there are passengers on the passenger conveyors; when the monitoring servers judge that there are passengers on the corresponding passenger conveyors, the passengerconveyors are grouped to passenger conveyors which cannot be automatically started up and shut down, and when the monitoring servers judge that there are no passengers on the corresponding passengerconveyors, the passenger conveyors are grouped to those capable of being automatically started up and shut down.

column2: ROCK CLIMBING BOX
column4: The utility model discloses a rock climbing box. Box body, a first rock climbing plate is fixed on the front surface of the box body; a second rock climbing plate is arranged at the top of the box body; a third rock climbing plate is arranged on the back surface of the box body; the first rock climbing plate is hinged with the second rock climbing plate; the second rock climbing plate is hinged with the third rock climbing plate; a plurality of rock points are arranged on the surfaces of the first rock climbing plate, the second rock climbing plate and the third rock climbing plate; a hangingblock is further arranged at the bottom of the third rock climbing plate; first supporting pieces are further arranged on the two sides of the box body. The first supporting piece is used for enablingthe second rock climbing plate to be overturned to the position located on the same plane with the first rock climbing plate and keeping the state. And second supporting pieces are arranged on the two sides of the second rock climbing plate, the second supporting pieces are used for enabling the third rock climbing plate to be overturned to the position located on the same plane with the second rock climbing plate and keeping the state, and the rock climbing box enables the rock wall building process to be simple, high in efficiency and low in labor intensity.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TYPE SELF-ADAPTIVE ZOOM CAMERA
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence type self-adaptive zoom camera. Wherein the machine box is used for bearing the whole device, the rain baffle is used for preventing the camera from being caught in the rain outdoors, the camera is used for shooting images, and the camera shooting control device is used for controlling the whole camera. A camera is fixedly mounted on the rightside wall outside the right side of the case; a camera shooting control device is fixedly arranged in the machine box; a rain baffle is fixedly mounted on the wall surface above the outer part of themachine box; cleaning cotton capable of moving up and down for automatic cleaning is arranged on the right side of the camera; the device is simple in structure and convenient to use; cleaning cotton, when the camera is used for a long time; the cleaning column is controlled to extend downwards to transfer the cleaning cotton to clean the lens of the camera, and the problems that when the camerais used for a long time, a large amount of dust is attached and accumulated on the lens, the camera shooting quality of the camera is affected, and due to the fact that an outdoor camera is generallyinstalled at a high position, manual cleaning is inconvenient are solved.

column2: INCREMENTAL AI FIRMWARE UPDATES USING IN-DEVICE TRAINING AND PEER-TO-PEER UPDATES
column4: An example embodiment facilitates determining and distributing incremental updates, via a peer-to-peer network, to Artificial Intelligence (AI) firmware algorithms running on embedded systems. The embedded systems include code for implementing the peer-to-peer network and for sharing locally determined updates to weights of classification layers of neural networks used to implement the AI firmware algorithms. The updates can also be locally adjusted and/or scheduled based on context information, such as embedded device location information, network status, and so on, and in accordance with transfer-learning techniques, thereby facilitating efficient, timely, and robust updating of the AI firmware algorithms.

column2: ROBOT SOFTWARE SYSTEM AND ROBOT THEREOF
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a robot software system. The system comprises an operating system and an application program; the operating system operates in the microcomputer of a robot control system; the application program corresponds to specific functions, functions and capabilities of a robot; the operating system is a running environment of the application program; the operating system realizes the preset capability or preset function of the robot by calling and terminating the application program. The invention further discloses a robot adopting the robot software system; and the robot has the artificial intelligence capacity. The robot is enabled to be interconnected and intercommunicated with people or things of a new generation of information technology, interconnected and intercommunicated with a cloud platform, and compatible with the previous generation of information technology; the system is provided with a super-intelligent ''brain'', so that the systemcan perceive people and exert partial or all effects or capabilities like real people.

column2: METHOD FOR EXPANDING ILLUMINATION INTENSITY RANGE AND HAND-EYE SYSTEM
column4: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and relates to a method for expanding an illumination intensity range and a hand-eye system, and the method comprises the steps: S1, enabling a camera to obtain the image information of an object through a strip-shaped medium grey lens group, and transmitting the image information to computing equipment; S2, enabling the computing device to perform gray processing on the image information to obtain a gray image; S3, judging whether the exposure proportion of the grayscale image is greater than a preset exposure threshold value or not, if so, turning to the step S4, if not, ending; and S4, enabling the computing device to control a mechanical arm to drive the camera to move through a single medium grey mirror along the plane where the medium grey mirror is located, and executing then the step S1. The technical scheme has the beneficial effects that the problem that overexposure is easy to occur during shooting of the cameraworking outdoors is solved, the working illumination intensity range of the camera is greatly expanded, and in addition, the equipment is simple in structure and low in cost.

column2: PARAMETER-BASED COMPUTER EVALUATION OF USER ACCOUNTS BASED ON USER ACCOUNT DATA STORED IN ONE OR MORE DATABASES
column4: A user account evaluation system is disclosed for evaluating risk associated with a user account. The system may obtain user account data associated with many user accounts, select a statistically significant subset of the user accounts, and then process (e.g., to determine types of the user accounts, etc.) and analyze the subset of user accounts to generate a plurality of evaluation models. When a new user account is accessed by the system, user account data may be obtained for the new user account, and the new user account may be evaluated based on the plurality of evaluation models. Accordingly, a plurality of evaluation parameter scores may be generated for the new user account, each of which may indicate an amount of risk associated with the user account. Some embodiments of the present disclosure may include machine learning and/or artificial intelligence methods to improve evaluation of the user accounts.

column2: RAIL TRANSIT OBSTACLE AVOIDANCE SYSTEM BASED ON IMAGE PROCESSING AND TARGET RECOGNITION
column4: The invention discloses a rail transit obstacle avoidance system based on image processing and target recognition. The rail transit obstacle avoidance system comprises a data acquisition module, an artificial intelligence processing module and a display control module; a collected image is segmented through the artificial intelligence processing module, so that the train running track can be marked quickly and accurately, and the warning area can be divided more accurately; obstacle detection is carried out through a millimeter-wave radar to obtain orientation and distance information of the target; targets such as personnel, vehicles and trains in the collected images are recognized through the artificial intelligence processing module, target image coordinates are obtained and fused withradar data, whether obstacles exist or not is comprehensively judged, and an alarm is given if the obstacles are in a warning area. The video data can be uploaded to the display control module in real time through the Ethernet. Image segmentation is carried out on the rail, so that warning area division is more accurate; and through image target identification and radar detection, the target identification accuracy can be effectively improved, the false alarm rate is reduced, and the alarm accuracy is improved.

column2: VOICE PROMPT SIMULATION DEVICE FOR OBSTACLES UNDER PROSTHESIS VISION
column4: The invention discloses a voice prompt simulation device for obstacles under prosthesis vision. The voice prompt simulation device comprises an artificial intelligence processing unit, a smart phone wirelessly connected with the artificial intelligence processing unit, a waist bag for carrying the artificial intelligence processing unit and the smart phone, and a light head-mounted display for a user to wear, wherein a camera for shooting a scene in front of the user is arranged on the display, and the camera is wirelessly connected with the artificial intelligence processing unit. The voice prompt simulation device can simulate the prosthesis vision and recognize the obstacles in front of the user through voice prompt, and provides powerful assistance for simulation experiments in the related fields.

column2: LOGISTICS TRANSPORTATION DISTRIBUTION METHOD AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a logistics transportation distribution method and device and a storage medium. The logistics transportation distribution method comprises the steps of receiving goods information of to-be-sent goods; determining the priority of each to-be-sent cargo according to the received goods information of the to-be-sent goods; obtaining capability parameters of a storage center; according to the obtained capacity parameters of the storage center, the priority of the to-be-sent goods and the goods information of the to-be-sent goods, conducting boxing combination simulation on the to-be-sent goods; and determining the number of required boxes according to the determined boxing combination simulation result. The high boxing utilization rate can be achieved.

column2: SORTING EQUIPMENT FOR WEIGHED PRODUCTS
column4: The invention discloses sorting equipment for weighed products. The equipment comprises a water tank, a cleaning mechanism, a wiping mechanism, an air drying mechanism, a belt conveying mechanism, a weighing and sorting mechanism, a boxing and conveying mechanism and a control system. The control system comprises a data acquisition module, a 5G transmission module, a data analysis module and a final problem product processing module. Comprehensive automatic control over the cleaning and sorting process is achieved; a main body structure of the equipment is reasonable, modular design is adopted, control is accurate and reliable, and efficient, accurate and damage-free sorting of fruits is achieved; and meanwhile, a control module ensures that agricultural products to be sold do not containdamaged and rotten agricultural products, and the agricultural products can be graded. Meanwhile, data uploaded by the data acquisition module is used for enriching samples, so that the accuracy of artificial intelligence identification and classification is further enhanced; and cloud intelligent decision has the advantages that the cost can be saved, meanwhile, a database, an identification algorithm and a model can be shared to form an Internet of Things sorting system, and tracing is carried out by utilizing a block chain technology.

column2: AUGMENTED COGNITION METHODS AND APPARATUS FOR CONTEMPORANEOUS FEEDBACK IN PSYCHOMOTOR LEARNING
column4: A method of creating a scalable dynamic jointed skeleton (DJS) model for enhancing psychomotor leaning using augmented cognition methods realized by an artificial intelligence (AI) engine or image processor. The method involves extracting a DJS model from either live motion images of video files of an athlete, teacher, or expert to create a scalable reference model for using in training, whereby the AI engine extracts physical attributes of the subject including arm length, length, torso length as well as capturing successive movements of a motor skill such as swinging a gold club including position, stance, club position, swing velocity and acceleration, twisting, and more.

column2: AUGMENTED COGNITION METHODS AND APPARATUS FOR CONTEMPORANEOUS FEEDBACK IN PSYCHOMOTOR LEARNING
column4: A method of creating a scalable dynamic jointed skeleton (DJS) model for enhancing psychomotor leaning using augmented cognition methods realized by an artificial intelligence (AI) engine or image processor. The method involves extracting a DJS model from either live motion images of video files of an athlete, teacher, or expert to create a scalable reference model for using in training, whereby the AI engine extracts physical attributes of the subject including arm length, length, torso length as well as capturing successive movements of a motor skill such as swinging a gold club including position, stance, club position, swing velocity and acceleration, twisting, and more.

column2: COMMUNICATING SENSOR DATA IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEMS
column4: A method of communicating sensor data via a mobile terminal, comprising: receiving, via a non-cellular receiver, first sensor data and second sensor data from at least one wireless sensor node; determining where the second data is a duplicate of the first data; and, in response, transmitting, via a cellular transmitter, third sensor data to a server, wherein said third data is based on the first or second data. Duplicate data may be discarded, and only non-duplicate data transmitted to the server. In response to transmitting the data to the server, a terminal may receive processed data and a security key to decrypt the processed data. The server may also receive sensor data from one or more terminals and may determine if this data includes duplicates prior to processing. The sensor data may relate to a sports application, such as ice hockey tracking, and IoT application or artificial intelligence application.

column2: AUTONOMOUS HOME SECURITY ROBOT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses an autonomous home security robot based on artificial intelligence. The utility model belongs to the technical field of household security robots. COMPRISING A MACHINE HOSTHOUSING, an LED lamp is arranged on the outer surface of the front end of the machine host shell; a connecting plate is mounted on the outer surface of the lower end of the machine host shell throughscrews; the connecting plate is provided with a buffer strip in a butt joint mode through the clamping opening.
