A sensor is arranged at a position close to the upper part of the LED lamp; driving wheels are installed on the two sides of the machine main machine shell correspondingly. A camera device shell is fixedly welded to the outer surface of the upper end of the machine host shell, an auxiliary camera is arranged on the outer surface of the camera device shell, a main camera is arranged at the position close to the upper portion of the auxiliary camera, a transmission antenna is arrangedat the position close to one side of the camera device shell, and a warning lamp is arranged at the position close to one side of the transmission antenna. According to the utility model, the effectsof cleaning and dust removal can be exerted during movement, and the auxiliary camera is wound, so that the shooting recording range can be increased, and the visual range is more comprehensive.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AI SYSTEM AND DATA PROCESSING METHOD
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses an artificial intelligence (AI) system and a data processing method. The system comprises a big data processing engine, an agent component and a graphics processing unit (GPU) computing component, a plurality of AI sub-models which operate independently are deployed on the GPU computing component, wherein each AI sub-model corresponds to a part of functions in one AI model; and the big data processing engine is used for calling the AI sub-model in a remote procedure call (RPC) form through the proxy component. In this way, the AI model running on the GPU can be applied to the big data processing engine, and both the high calculation speed and the higher throughput are achieved.

column2: COMPUTER VISION REAL-TIME MULTI-PERSON POSTURE ESTIMATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DEEP LEARNING TECHNOLOGY
column4: The method is suitable for the technical field of video processing. The invention provides a computer vision real-time multi-person posture estimation method based on an artificial intelligence deep learning technology. According to the method, current frame images acquired by a camera are acquired in sequence; normalization operation is carried out; multi-person posture estimation is carried outon the current frame images by using a pre-trained neural network model and a post-processing algorithm; and human body key points and human body skeletons of all persons in the images are obtained, so that multi-person posture estimation is realized. According to the invention, multi-person posture estimation is carried out based on the whole image; the human body key points and skeleton posturesof all persons in the image can be rapidly and accurately predicted through the image collected by the camera; and the method is very suitable for judging human behaviors and human body postures in the field of security and protection. According to the invention, through the pre-trained neural network, the human body postures of all people in the picture can be predicted through one-time forwardpropagation, and the operation speed is not limited by the number of people in the picture, so that the method can operate more quickly and stably.

column2: RELAY PROTECTION DEVICE IMAGE IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a relay protection device image recognition method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of collecting an image displayed on a display screen of a protection cabinet; identifying text information and image information in the acquired image by adopting a CTPN algorithm; and outputting power line equipment setting and operation data according to the text information and the image information, and performing system safety evaluation according to the data. According to the technical scheme provided by the embodiment ofthe invention, the reliability and accuracy of power line monitoring can be improved.

column2: MAIL INTELLIGENT EDITING METHOD AND DEVICE AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology. The invention discloses an intelligent mail editing method. The method comprises the following steps: receiving a mail sent by a senderclient, performing deadlock operation on the mail to obtain a deadlock state mail, generating a function parameter by utilizing the locked state mail, creating an editable object function according tothe function parameters, and prompting the recipient client to reply the mail sent by the sender client, running the editable object function to generate an editable window, and receiving mail content edited by a recipient client in the editable window, performing combined operation and optimization processing on the mail content and a mail sent by the sender client to obtain an optimized combined mail, and sending the optimized combined mail to a next recipient client to complete intelligent editing. The invention further provides an intelligent mail editing device and a computer readable storage medium. According to the invention, an efficient and intelligent mail intelligent editing function can be realized.

column2: AI-BASED AUTOMATIC UNMANNED CLEANING VEHICLE
column4: The utility model discloses an automatic unmanned cleaning vehicle based on AI, and relates to the technical field of industrial cleaning. The device comprises a self-driven vehicle body, a sealed carriage, a panoramic camera shooting acquisition head, a navigation laser scanner and an obstacle avoidance laser scanner are respectively arranged on one surface of the self-driven vehicle body; the bottom of the inner surface of the sealed carriage is fixedly connected with a planing and milling machine lifting driving mechanism; a soda particle spraying machine and a vacuum dust collector are fixedly connected to one surface of the sealed compartment; the top of the inner surface of the sealed compartment is fixedly connected with a wireless receiving and radio frequency remote control moduleand a controller. The ground cleaning machine is used for cleaning ground cleaning operation such as road reflective markings, is internally provided with a navigation control system with various machine vision and artificial intelligence, is provided with a planing and milling machine driven by an internal combustion engine and is used for preprocessing the markings before cleaning, and is provided with a sealed carriage and a vacuum dust collecting device to prevent secondary pollution caused by leakage of sprayed soda particles.

column2: STRUCTURE SEARCHING METHOD AND STRUCTURE SEARCHING DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a structure search method and a structure search device in the field of artificial intelligence, which are used for constructing a neural network, determining the neural network meeting the time delay requirement by taking the prediction delay of a construction unit on hardware as a constraint condition, and realizing the neural network construction in artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that: a target task used for requesting to create a neural network running on preset hardware is acquired; then a super unit is obtained according to the target task, the super unit comprises a plurality of nodes, and any two nodes in the plurality of nodes are connected through multiple basic operations; then, the output of a delay prediction model is used as aconstraint condition to search the super unit, at least one first construction unit is determined, the delay prediction model is used for outputting prediction delay, and the prediction delay is prediction delay when the construction unit included in the super unit operates on preset hardware; and the at least one first construction unit is then stacked to obtain a neural network.

column2: AUGMENTED COGNITION METHODS AND APPARATUS FOR CONTEMPORANEOUS FEEDBACK IN PSYCHOMOTOR LEARNING
column4: A method of creating a scalable dynamic jointed skeleton (DJS) model for enhancing psychomotor leaning using augmented cognition methods realized by an artificial intelligence (AI) engine or image processor. The method involves extracting a DJS model from either live motion images of video files of an athlete, teacher, or expert to create a scalable reference model for using in training, whereby the AI engine extracts physical attributes of the subject including arm length, length, torso length as well as capturing successive movements of a motor skill such as swinging a gold club including position, stance, club position, swing velocity and acceleration, twisting, and more.

column2: REMOTE CONTROL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ANALGESIA PUMP SYSTEM AND WORKING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention relates to a remote control artificial intelligence analgesia pump system and a working method thereof. The system comprises a wireless communication end, patient operation ends and a medical worker operation end, wherein the patient operation ends and the medical worker operation end exchange information through the wireless communication end; one medical worker operation end can control the multiple patient operation ends, the problem of insufficient personnel of the anesthesiology department is relieved, manual treatment is added so that the system is more flexible, the safetyis improved, an anesthesiology doctor can remotely follow and monitor conditions of multiple patients and remotely control analgesia pumps, the anesthesiology doctor does not need to be busy runningabout controlling the analgesia pumps in person frequently, the problems of the analgesia pumps of the patients are rapidly solved, the waiting time and pain of the patients are reduced, meanwhile, medical workers can timely know the running conditions of the analgesia pumps, the medical workers and the patients communicate in real time in a voice or video mode, the system is more diversified andhumanized, remote questionnaire feedback is performed on the analgesia conditions of the patients regularly and is convenient to call, and individualized analgesia is realized.

column2: PROJECT FIELD MANAGEMENT SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a project field management system and method based on artificial intelligence, and specifically relates to the field of optical cable monitoring. The system comprises an optical cable cross-connection monitoring assembly, wherein the input end of the optical cable cross-connection monitoring assembly is provided with an intelligent power supply assembly used for auxiliary power supply, and the input end of the intelligent power supply assembly is provided with an environment-friendly power generation assembly used for environment-friendly power generation, a mains supply used for normal power supply and a detection unit used for detecting the external environment. According to the invention, the situation of power failure of the optical fiber cross-connection monitoring control center can be effectively avoided; when the storage capacity of the storage battery pack reaches a set value, a programmable PLC controls a first relay, a second relay and a third relay to be disconnected; meanwhile, due to the fact that the environment-friendly power generation assembly and the mains supply are mixed to store power for the storage battery pack, more energy is saved,the environment is protected, and meanwhile, the power utilization cost can be effectively reduced.

column2: ROBOT CHASSIS WORKING IN COMPLEX ENVIRONMENT
column4: The invention discloses a robot chassis working in complex environment. The robot chassis comprises a control mechanism, a mechanical mechanism, a chassis system and a robot vehicle body, wherein thecontrol mechanism, the mechanical mechanism and the chassis system are all loaded on the robot vehicle body. The novel robot chassis is good in obstacle crossing performance, stable in working environment and capable of improving the working efficiency. According to the robot chassis, the robot chassis can achieve the accuracy and rapidity of recognition and control according to the detected position of an obstacle so as to actively avoid the obstacle in time; when an intelligent recognition system carried by the robot chassis judges that a front object is collided, the obstacle can be rapidlyavoided in a short time, and the safety of the robot chassis in the running process is ensured; and the data in the running process are stored and analyzed, the data are compared through a position sensor, the error data are corrected and archived, and therefore an administrator can conveniently check the reason of the error data in the later period.

column2: SITE IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE, TERMINAL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a site identification method and device, a terminal and a storage medium, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: in response to a subway mode, collecting ambient sound through a microphone; performing feature extraction on the environmental sound to obtain energy features of the environmental sound; determining the running state of the subway according to the energy characteristics, wherein the running state comprises at least one of a pull-in state, a stop state, a pull-out state and an inter-station running state; and determining the current station according to the currently registered base station in response to the fact that the operation state is the stop state. According to the embodiment of the invention, the running state of the subway is judged by utilizing the characteristic that the energy characteristics of the sound of the subway in different running states are different, when the subway is in a stop state, the current station is identified and updated by utilizing the current registered base station, station reporting voice is not required to be acquired through a complex model or the station is determined according to third-party data, the power consumption is low, and the accuracy is high.

column2: INTELLIGENT DOUBLE-LOWER-LIMB REHABILITATION EVALUATION TRAINING EQUIPMENT INTEGRATING LYING, SITTING AND STANDING
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of rehabilitation therapy and exercise fitness equipment. The utility model further discloses intelligent double-lower-limb rehabilitation evaluation training equipment integrating lying, sitting and standing. Including a base, the top of the base is fixedly connected with a screen support. The top of the screen bracket is fixedly connected with a screen; the utility model discloses intelligent double-lower-limb rehabilitation evaluation training equipment integrating lying, sitting and standing. An artificial intelligence system of the screen assists the patient in lower limb rehabilitation training; then the patient drives the lower limb rehabilitative apparatus to move upwards under the assistance of the artificial intelligence system todrive the rotating wheel to rotate upwards; meanwhile, the lower limb rehabilitative apparatus is driven by the rotating rod I to rotate leftwards; therefore, the purpose of exercising the lower limbsis achieved, meanwhile, the effect that the patient is assisted by an artificial intelligence system to achieve rehabilitation training of the patient is improved, meanwhile, the energy loss of personnel is reduced, and the phenomenon of excessive rehabilitation training of the patient due to different physiques of the patient is also reduced.

column2: GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE OF DATA SYNCHRONIZATION SCRIPT AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and the invention discloses an intelligent generation method of a data synchronization script. The method comprises the steps of receiving a source data component, a target component and a data synchronization tool selected by a user, determining a source data attribute according to the source data component, determining synchronous data attributes according to the target component, and based on the source data attribute and the synchronous data attribute; and creating a dynamic script of data synchronization by using a data synchronization tool, running the dynamic script, if the dynamic script reports an error in a running stage, feeding back information of error reporting in the running stage to a user, re-determining the source data attribute and the synchronous data attribute, and if the dynamic script does not report an error in running, generating a data synchronization script. The invention further provides an intelligent generation device of the data synchronization script and a computer readable storage medium. According to the invention, an accurate and efficient intelligent generation function of the data synchronization script can be realized.

column2: ROLLING BEARING FAULT DIAGNOSIS METHOD BASED ON WAVELET AND IMPROVED PSO-RBF NEURAL NETWORK
column4: The invention relates to a rolling bearing fault diagnosis method based on wavelet and improved PSO-RBF neural network. The method comprises the following steps: S1, reading an original vibration signal of a rolling bearing state of a rail train; S2, carrying out wavelet denoising on the original vibration signal to obtain a pure vibration signal; S3, carrying out decomposition and phase space reconstruction on the pure vibration signal by using a wavelet packet, and extracting a feature vector; S4, training an improved PSO-RBF neural network by taking the feature vector as input and the corresponding bearing state as output to obtain a neural network fault diagnosis model; and S5, for a to-be-diagnosed original vibration signal of the rolling bearing of the rail train, inputting the feature vector obtained after the steps S1-S3 into the neural network fault diagnosis model obtained in the step S4 to obtain a diagnosis result of the rolling bearing. Compared with the prior art, the method has the characteristics of integrating the advantages of wavelet transform and an artificial intelligence algorithm, and can carry out accurate fault diagnosis on the rail transit running gear.

column2: ROBOT WITH GUIDING FUNCTION
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of robots. The robot with the guiding function comprises a machine shell, a processor is fixedly installed at the bottom of an inner cavity of the machine shell, an information recognition unit and an information transmission unit are installed at the bottom of the inner cavity of the machine shell and located on the two sides of the processor respectively, and a driving structure is arranged above the inner cavity of the machine shell; according to the utility model, the machine housing, the processor, the information identification unit, the information transmission unit, the driving structure, the driven structure, the pointing structure, the strip-shaped through groove, the walking mechanism, the top seat and the camera shooting unit arearranged; according to the robot with the guiding function, intelligent scanning prompting can be achieved, the problems that an indication board of an existing prompting carriage is high, passengerswith poor eyesight are not easy to observe, the indication board is arranged outside a ticket checking hall, and the passengers can walk by redundant distances are solved, and the robot with the guiding function has the advantage of being capable of conducting riding guiding in the left-right direction and is worthy of popularization.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND CLOTHING CLIMBING ROBOT-BASED INTELLIGENT PROTECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence and clothing climbing robot-based intelligent protection method and system. The intelligent protection method comprises the steps: if a clothing protection instruction is received, controlling clothing climbing robots to be started and controlling a miniature camera to be started to take high-definition images in real time; analyzing a crease area of user clothing in real time and controlling clothing climbing robots of a first preset number to move to the crease area and circularly move; analyzing cuff areas of the user clothing in real timeand controlling clothing climbing robots of a second preset number to move to the cuff areas and stop and fix; analyzing whether pockets of the user clothing have chains or buttons or not in real time; if the pockets do not have the chains or buttons, controlling clothing climbing robots of a third preset number to move to positions of the pockets of the user clothing to enter a motion pocket sealing state and controlling a fingerprint sensor to be started to acquire fingerprint information in real time; analyzing whether hands locate on outer surfaces of the clothing climbing robots and whether fingerprints are user fingerprints or not in real time; and if the hands locate on the outer surfaces and the fingerprints are the user fingerprints, controlling the clothing climbing robots to move sideways and upwards at the positions of the pockets of the user clothing to release pocket sealing.

column2: METHOD FOR EXTRACTING DATA FROM LOG, AND RELATED DEVICE
column4: A method and apparatus for extracting data from a log, relating to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: monitoring log update of the running system (S110); if the log update is monitored, identifying the updated log by means of a neural network model to determine the log type of the updated log (S130); searching for in a configuration file data extraction information corresponding to the log type, the data extraction information indicating a data item where the data is extracted from the log of the log type (S150); and extracting, according to the searched data extraction information, the data corresponding to the data item from the updated log (S170). According to the method, the required data is extracted from the running system in real time, and the efficiency is high.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM THAT ALERTS A USER WHILE TAKING CONTROL OF A DEVICE UNTIL A CONDITION IS MET
column4: A method and system to recommend, force and motivate people who spend time behind a desk to change postures. More specifically, the recommendations are based on data from the user's setting preferences or data from an artificial intelligence engine based on information provided by the user and compared with data from similar users based on age, type of work, health issues and needs. The method makes a suggestion to the user on when to use a workspace fitness device or the sit-and-stand desk in the sit or stand position and for how much time. The suggestions escalate to enforcement if the user selects that option. More specifically for this patent application a software that controls the user's device until a condition is met.

column2: UNMANNED BODY BUILDING ANALYSIS METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides an unmanned body building analysis method based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the field of unmanned body building technology. The method comprises the following steps of S1, defining a motion index analysis rule based on human body key points, and generating a rule table; S2, acquiring a motion image of a sporter, and acquiring framework point information of thesporter; S3, inputting the acquired framework point information into a rule table; and S4, determining whether an error value between the generated framework point information and the data in the rule table is lower than a preset threshold, if yes, determining a fact that the action is qualified, and otherwise, outputting error framework point information. According to the unmanned body buildinganalysis method, by means of technologies such as artificial intelligence, big data, cloud computing and body feeling control, health intelligent body building guidance is generated for aiming at a household scene, thereby realizing identification, tracking and positioning of mass motion video image data for realizing management. Body building guidance such as motion exercise, body building guidance and sports rehabilitation is researched. Furthermore multifunctional and intelligent sports body building analysis and guidance are performed.

column2: TRAFFIC VIOLATION IMAGE-BASED WASTE FILM ROLLBACK METHOD AND SYSTEM, TERMINAL AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a traffic violation image-based waste film rollback method, which comprises the steps of obtaining a traffic violation behavior instance image, and segmenting the violation instance image, the instance image comprising a first violation image, a second violation image, a third violation image and a violation vehicle close-up image; randomly selecting one image from the three illegal images, analyzing lane information and traffic light information from the image, and correspondingly matching the traffic light information with the lane information; detecting vehicles in the three illegal images by adopting a YOLO method and recording position information of the vehicles in the images; finding a vehicle matched with the traffic violation record from the three violationimages, and recording the position of the vehicle in the three violation images; and judging whether the vehicle in the three illegal images is illegal or not according to the vehicle information, the lane information and the traffic light information. Waste film rollback is carried out on the red light running illegal evidence image through the artificial intelligence technology, the image checking speed is high, the accuracy is high, and manpower and material resources are saved.

column2: NOVEL INTELLIGENT TABLE LAMP BASED ON MULTIPLE INTERACTION FORMS
column4: The utility model discloses a novel intelligent table lamp based on multiple interaction forms. The novel intelligent table lamp comprises a main body device, a lighting module, a display module and acamera shooting module. Wherein the lighting module, the display module and the camera module are arranged on the main body device; when the lighting module is turned on, necessary illumination brightness can be provided. The display module further comprises a display screen and a touch panel and is used for displaying pictures and touch operation of a user; and the camera module is used for shooting image and video contents. According to the novel intelligent table lamp based on the multiple interaction modes, a book and the display screen can be kept in the same illumination environment inthe learning process, and eyesight protection can be conducted on a learner in the reading process. Meanwhile, a built-in learning system of the intelligent table lamp can support various interactionmodes such as voice, shooting and touch, output information in various forms such as texts, images, audios and videos, guide learning and improve learning efficiency.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PARTNER TRAINING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: An artificial intelligence partner training method is characterized by comprising the steps: measuring body position data of a trainee; deducing a motion level by utilizing an intelligent processing module according to the body position data; when the exercise level is lower than a training standard, making an exercise plan; and braking a partner training machine module according to the motion plan to train the trainee, and measuring the body position data of the trainee while braking the partner training machine module. Due to the fact that big data of a cloud end, namely more data in more databases, can be accessed, the response of a certain competition player or competition player masses at a certain stage can be more effectively simulated. In this way, the efficiency of artificial intelligence partner training can exceed that of partner training provided by human beings, and the partner training effect of the optional degree can be achieved at any time.

column2: FACE RECOGNITION EQUIPMENT FOR RETAIL STORE
column4: The utility model discloses a face recognition device for a retail store. The base, the rotating block, the telescopic rod, the U-shaped frame, the rotating damper, the supporting rod and the face recognition equipment main body are matched; according to the face recognition equipment, the effect that the face recognition equipment main body can rotate left and right and move vertically on the base is achieved, meanwhile, the face recognition equipment main body can rotate on the U-shaped frame, the shooting angle of a camera on the face recognition equipment main body can be adjusted conveniently according to the requirements of members, and the member face recognition efficiency is improved; through the cooperation of a fixing piece, a fixing screw, a U-shaped frame, a telescopic rod, asupporting rod, a rotary damper and a face recognition equipment main body, the face equipment device is convenient to assemble and transport; through the cooperation of the base and the vacuum suction cups, the effect that the multiple vacuum suction cups are installed at the bottom of the base is achieved, the function of conveniently fixing the base is achieved, and the stability of the base ona table top is improved.

column2: WORKER CONSTRUCTION STATE MONITORING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and relates to a worker construction state monitoring method based on artificial intelligence. According to the method, a deep learning attitude estimation framework Openpose is used for obtaining skeleton joint point coordinates of workers, vectorization processing is conducted on the coordinates, the coordinates obtained after vectorization processing are trained through an LSTM network, and behaviors of the construction workers are output through the model. Meanwhile, a target detection framework Yolov3 is used for detecting markers in a picture where a worker is located, previously detected worker behaviors and markers on a construction site serve as new features, the worker construction state corresponding to the new features serves as a label, an xgboost network model is trained, and finally real-time monitoring of the real-time construction state is achieved. The construction state of workers on a construction site can be accurately monitored on the basis of the artificial intelligence theory, and the requirement for manpower during construction is reduced.

column2: IMAGE SHOOTING METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses an image shooting method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The invention provides an image shooting method in the field of computer visionof artificial intelligence. According to the embodiment of the invention, the user operation page of the information interaction room of the client is displayed; wherein the user operation page comprises a shooting control and an image area, the image area comprises a preview image, the preview image comprises member images of at least two room members, when triggering operation for the shooting control is detected, image shooting is carried out on the preview image, and an image obtained through shooting is output; according to the scheme, the room members of the virtual room can carry out image shooting.

column2: MULTI-STATION BRACKET SYSTEM
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence retail, in particular to a bracket. The multi-station bracket system comprises a rack installed on the vending machine, a left-right moving mechanism is arranged on the rack, at least one cup stand bottom frame is fixed to the moving end of the left-right moving mechanism, and cup stands used for containing paper cups arearranged on the cup stand bottom frames. Due to the adoption of the technical scheme, the cup stand stations are arranged in a left-right running mode, limitation of hardware positions of the vendingmachine is avoided, more feeding ports can be formed in an effective linear path, and diversity of vending machine products is enriched conveniently.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR RUNNING IMPLEMENTATION IN CONSTRUCTION OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE APPLICATION, AND MACHINE EQUIPMENT
column4: Method and device for running implementation in the construction of an artificial intelligence application, and machine equipment, the method comprising: receiving an artificial intelligence algorithm configuration selected by a user for constructing an artificial intelligence application, the artificial intelligence algorithm configuration being a network topology describing a mathematical operation performed in the artificial intelligence application (310); obtaining a dictionary which describes performing the mathematical operation according to the selected artificial intelligence algorithm configuration (330); reconstructing a mathematical operation for the dictionary by means of a mathematical language representation of graph theory, so as to obtain an executable text for performing the mathematical operation (350); and by executing the executable text, allowing the user to run the constructed artificial intelligence application according to the selected artificial intelligence algorithm configuration (370). The present method, device and machine equipment may be used to translate algorithm graphics obtained by graphical programming into executable artificial intelligence applications, so as to achieve the purpose of running the artificial intelligence applications.

column2: BRAIN-LIKE COMPUTING SYSTEM
column4: A brain-like computing system, comprising an arithmetic/logical operation and control unit, a brain-like coprocessing unit, a memory unit, an external port, and a bus connecting the various units and the external port. The arithmetic/logical operation and control unit is used to perform programming and configuration on the brain-like coprocessing unit, execute arithmetic operations or logical operations, and control the running and data exchange of the other units by means of the bus. The brain-like coprocessing unit is provided with an artificial neural network processing function and a pulsed neural network processing function, and is used to execute artificial neural network computation and pulsed neural network computation on the basis of instructions from the arithmetic/logical operation and control unit and store a computation result in the memory unit. The present system is able to achieve higher computational efficiency when processing different tasks in general artificial intelligence computation, and achieve real-time response to tasks by means of low-delay continuous execution of computing tasks, while also reducing the energy consumption of computation execution in the whole system.

column2: INTELLIGENT TABLE LAMP FOR LEARNING
column4: The utility model discloses an intelligent desk lamp for learning. The intelligent desk lamp comprises a main body device and a supporting device, an illumination module and a display module are arranged on the main body device; when the lighting module is turned on, necessary brightness can be provided. The display module is further provided with a display screen and a touch panel and used for displaying pictures and touch operation of a user. And the supporting device is used for supporting the main body device. According to the utility model, the structure is simple, the utility model discloses an intelligent desk lamp for learning. According to the intelligent table lamp, the screen of the intelligent table lamp can be seen clearly while learning is conducted, the illumination positioncan be adjusted according to different environment illumination by adjusting the angle and the height, and in addition, the built-in auxiliary learning system of the intelligent table lamp collects information from multiple aspects of voice, touch control and camera shooting to help to improve the learning efficiency.

column2: INTELLIGENT VEHICLE CONTROL DEVICE BASED ON GRAY SCALE CAMERA DETECTION
column4: The utility model belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence and intelligent control, and discloses an intelligent vehicle control device based on gray scale camera detection, which isprovided with a sensor acquisition device for information acquisition. The signal processing device is connected with the sensor acquisition device and is used for analyzing and processing the acquired information; the single chip microcomputer is connected with the signal processing device and is used for carrying out a control algorithm on the operation data; and the executing mechanism is connected with the single chip microcomputer and is used for executing the data generated by the single chip microcomputer. A single-chip microcomputer is used as a core processor, and sufficient guaranteeis provided for motion control of the intelligent trolley. And the sensor detection part is used for acquiring road information by adopting an image acquisition module, an ultrasonic ranging module and an electromagnetic sensor so as to acquire complex road information. And when the camera is abnormal in acquisition or does not scan the racing track, the electromagnetic sensor is used for tracingaccording to the electromagnetic guide line on the ground, so that further guarantee is provided for the trolley to continuously and stably run on the racing track.

column2: VEHICLE RUNNING STATE PREDICTION METHOD AND DEVICE, TERMINAL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a vehicle running state prediction method and device, a terminal and a storage medium, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps: when a vehicle is in use, collecting ambient sound through a microphone; performing feature extraction on the environmental sound to obtain environmental sound features of the environmental sound, the environmental sound features including at least one of an energy feature and a time-frequency feature; inputting the environmental sound features into a preset prediction model to obtain a target prediction result output by the preset prediction model, the preset prediction model comprising at least one of a first prediction model and a second prediction model, the second predictionmodel being a classification model using RNN, and the target prediction result being a predicted running state of the vehicle; and determining the target operation state of the vehicle according to the target prediction result. In the embodiment of the invention, the running state is predicted by utilizing the sound change characteristics of the vehicle, so that the accuracy and effectiveness ofrunning state prediction are improved.

column2: INTERNET OF THINGS ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ROLLER SHUTTER MACHINE FOR AGRICULTURAL GREENHOUSE
column4: The utility model discloses an Internet of Things artificial intelligence roller shutter machine for an agricultural greenhouse. The device comprises a driving motor, a motor controller and a remote controller, the input end of the driving motor is electrically connected with a motor controller; the output end of the motor controller is electrically connected with the output end of a remote controller; the utility model discloses an Internet of Things artificial intelligence roller shutter machine for an agricultural greenhouse. The driving motor performs wireless remote control through a remote controller; therefore, the driving motor can work intelligently; an image acquisition camera is arranged on the driving motor; the working state of the roller shutter machine and the actual conditions inside and outside the greenhouse are fed back in time; the method can be used as a powerful judgment basis for data acquisition information acquisition; and the open-phase protector is arranged on the driving motor control circuit, so that the driving motor is effectively protected, and the adopted solid-state relay is used for controlling the driving motor, so that the situation that the contact of the mechanical relay is ablated due to arc discharge, the motor does not work, or the driving of the driving motor is damaged due to open phase is effectively prevented.

column2: METHOD FOR IDENTIFYING AND DETECTING ABNORMAL BEHAVIORS IN TRANSFORMER SUBSTATION BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IN COMPLEX SCENE
column4: The invention discloses a method for identifying and detecting abnormal behaviors in a transformer substation based on artificial intelligence in a complex scene. The method comprises the following steps: processing a monitoring video to obtain a static graph; detecting a human body region by using a target detection algorithm FPN network based on deep learning; preprocessing the to-be-identifiedimage to generate a binary image; taking the binarized image as the input of a CPN network to detect the key points of the human skeleton; fusing the human skeleton key point image with the RGB single-frame static image, inputting the fused image into an LSTM network for classification and identification, and judging whether the behavior is an abnormal behavior or not. According to the invention,automatic detection and identification tasks of abnormal behaviors of the working area of the transformer substation in a complex scene are realized, and the method has good accuracy, stability and real-time performance, and can meet the actual application requirements of the transformer substation.

column2: SELF-AADAPTIVE TIME SEQUENCE SHIFT NEURAL NETWORK TIME SEQUENCE BEHAVIOR IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides a self-adaptive time sequence shift neural network time sequence behavior identification method and system. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, collecting characteristics of multiple time points and modeling; then introducing an adaptive time sequence shift neural network to learn a receptive field required by each layer of network; and finally, training learnable shift variables, and correcting skeleton point data. According to the invention, the receptive field required by each layer of network can be learned in a self-adaptive manner, and the receptivefield required by each data set can be learned in a self-adaptive manner. The adaptive time sequence shift neural network can learn different time shift vectors for different data, so as to adaptivelyadapt to different data distributions. Through the time sequence behavior recognition method provided by the invention, calculation resources can be saved while the behavior detection precision is improved, and the self-adaptive learning is more superior to manual parameter adjustment of common time convolution.

column2: CONVENIENT-TO-ADJUST ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING CAMERA
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of monitoring cameras, and discloses a convenient-to-adjust artificial intelligence monitoring camera. The convenient-to-adjust artificial intelligence monitoring camera comprises a base plate, wherein a supporting pillar is arranged in the middle of the upper surface of the base plate, a top plate is arranged at the top of the supporting pillar, the middle of the supporting pillar is slidably connected with a lifting plate, the right end of the lifting plate is provided with a second rotary shaft, a camera body is arranged at the lower portion of the second rotary shaft, a first driving motor is arranged at the left side of the base plate, an output shaft of the first driving motor is fixedly connected with a first bevel gear, the first bevel gear is meshed with a second bevel gear, the second bevel gear is fixedly connected with the lower portion of a first lead screw, and the middle of the first lead screw is in threaded connection with the left side of the lifting plate. According to the convenient-to-adjust artificial intelligence monitoring camera, a second driving motor is arranged to drive a rotary disc to rotate, thus a rotary plate drives the camera body to swing back and forth, thus the shooting range of the camera body is expanded, and the scope of monitoring is also expanded.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) PLATFORM-BASED MULTIPLE EXPERT GROUP CONTENT COLLABORATION SYSTEM, RELAY SERVER AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence (AI) platform-based multiple expert group content collaboration system, a relay server and a method thereof. According to the present invention, the AI platform-based multiple expert group content collaboration system comprises: a plurality of terminals for generating different types of content; and a relay server for providing a hierarchy for each user to each of the plurality of terminals, generating collective content by merging the different types of content generated in the plurality of terminals through the provided hierarchy, and sharing the collective content with each of the plurality of terminals. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2021

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING AN ALERT AND AD WHILE DELIVERING DIGITAL CONTENT
column4: The present invention discloses a system and method for providing an alert on delivering a digital content such as when an interesting digital content is imminent, for example, the beginning of a play during a football game, to direct the focus of one or more viewers towards the digital content. The present invention is further configured to embed a commercial message in conjunction with the alert on directing the focus of the viewers. The system is adapted to activate the alert either manually or automatically. Further, the system is optionally implemented with an artificial intelligence (AI) system, which is trained using deep learning to recognize the appropriate time to automatically trigger the alert/commercial message sequence. The AI system could be trained by monitoring the manual control of alert activation.

column2: ADAPTIVE TENNIS BALL MACHINE
column4: A smart ball-machine uses artificial intelligence to train a player or to play with a player. For example, the ball-machine can adjust the tennis ball speed, topspin, bounce according to the player's successful ball return rate. The ball-machine can be preconfigured with a profile of a player. For example, the ball-machine may download a complete profile of a tennis player from a game recording, or may download a file with a customized profile of a player to train a player using the ball-machine. The ball-machine is equipped with a plurality of wheels, motors, and shafts to provide a fully customizable launch of one or more balls. For example, the ball can be launched from the machine from one side of a tennis court to another side of a tennis court with a variety of speeds, trajectories, topspin, bounce etc.

column2: DIGITAL PLATFORM TO IDENTIFY HEALTH CONDITIONS AND THERAPEUTIC INTERVENTIONS USING AN AUTOMATIC AND DISTRIBUTED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM
column4: This disclosure is directed to method and system for automatic, distributed, computer-aided, and intelligent data collection/analytics, health monitoring, health condition identification, and patient preventive/remedial health advocacy. The system integrates (1) distributed patient health data collection devices, (2) centralized or distributed data servers running various intelligent and predictive data analytics engines for health screening, assessment, patient health condition identification, and patient preventive/remedial health advocacy, 3) specifically designed data structures including quantized health indicator vectors, patient health condition identification matrices and patient health condition vectors, (4) portal servers configured to interface with (5) distributed physician terminal devices and (6) distributed patient terminal devices for delivering health condition identification, health interventions and patient preventive/remedial health advocacy, and for monitoring and tracking patient activities. The various intelligent and predictive engines are configured to learn and extract hidden features and correlations from a large amount of data obtained from the distributed data collection devices.

column2: A DIGITAL PLATFORM TO IDENTIFY HEALTH CONDITIONS AND THERAPEUTIC INTERVENTIONS USING AN AUTOMATIC AND DISTRIBUTED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM
column4: This disclosure is directed to method and system for automatic, distributed, computer-aided, and intelligent data collection/analytics, health monitoring, health condition identification, and patient preventive/remedial health advocacy. The system integrates (1) distributed patient health data collection devices, (2) centralized or distributed data servers running various intelligent and predictive data analytics engines for health screening, assessment, patient health condition identification, and patient preventive/remedial health advocacy, (3) specifically designed data structures including quantized health indicator vectors, patient health condition identification matrices and patient health condition vectors, (4) portal servers configured to interface with (5) distributed physician terminal devices and (6) distributed patient terminal devices for delivering health condition identification, health interventions and patient preventive/remedial health advocacy, and for monitoring and tracking patient activities. The various intelligent and predictive engines are configured to learn and extract hidden features and correlations from a large amount of data obtained from the distributed data collection devices.

column2: AUTOMATIC ASSESSMENT DEVICE FOR DIGESTIVE ENDOSCOPY EXAMINATION QUALITY OF CHILDREN AND ADULTS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an automatic assessment device for digestive endoscopy examination quality of children and adults based on artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of automatic assessment devices for digestive endoscopy examination quality. The automatic assessment device comprises an assessment device host machine and a placing cabinet, wherein the assessment device host machine is arranged at the top end of the placing cabinet; a plurality of partition boards which are distributed in an equal distance are fixed on the inner wall of the placing cabinet; two accommodating mechanisms are arranged at the front end of each of the partition boards; each accommodating mechanism comprises a cavity; each cavity is formed in the front end of the corresponding partitionboard; an accommodating rod is arranged in each cavity; one end of each accommodating rod penetrates through the corresponding cavity to extend out of the front end of the corresponding partition board; a circular plate is fixedly arranged at one end of each accommodating rod; and four springs are arranged in each accommodating rod. According to the automatic assessment device disclosed by the invention, long transmission wires of a plurality of electronic gastroscopes are separately sorted and accommodated, so that the situation that the transmission wires are in disorder in an assessment site is avoided, each person can well identify the corresponding digestive endoscopy, and the normal running of the assessment work is guaranteed.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR PREDICTING RUNNING STATE OF VEHICLE, TERMINAL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a method and device for predicting the running state of a vehicle, a terminal and a storage medium, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that when the vehicle is in use, ambient sound is collected through a microphone; performing feature extraction on the environmental sound to obtain environmental sound features of the environmental sound, the environmental sound features including at least one of an energy feature and a time-frequency feature; inputting the environmental sound features into a preset prediction model to obtain a target prediction result output by the preset prediction model, the preset prediction model comprising at least one of a first prediction model and a second prediction model;and determining the target operation state of the vehicle according to the target prediction result. In the embodiment of the invention, since the sound change of the vehicle during pull-in braking and pull-out starting is obvious and is not influenced by other factors such as the motion state of the terminal or other environmental sounds, the accuracy and effectiveness can be improved by predicting the operation state based on the sound characteristics of the vehicle during operation.

column2: BADMINTON HALL GUIDING ROBOT WITH WIRELESS CHARGING FUNCTION
column4: The utility model discloses a badminton hall guiding robot with a wireless charging function. The field terminal comprises a shell, idler wheels used for walking are arranged at the bottom of the shell, a charging alignment groove is formed in the lower portion of the shell, a control panel is arranged in the shell, the control panel comprises a behavior control unit, a battery module, an electricquantity detection module, a wireless charging module and a main control module, and the main control module is in communication connection with a field terminal host; the power supply module comprises a wireless charging transmitting control circuit and a wireless charging transmitting coil which are connected with each other, and the power supply module is fixed on the advancing route of the robot and is provided with a charging alignment bulge corresponding to the charging alignment groove; the wireless charging module comprises a wireless charging receiving coil and a wireless charging receiving control circuit which are connected with each other. When the electric quantity detection module detects that the electric quantity is lower than a threshold value, the main control module drives the behavior control unit to enable the robot to move to the power supply module, the charging alignment groove of the robot is controlled to be aligned with the charging alignment protrusion, andthen wireless charging is started.

column2: ENTITY EXTRACTION METHOD, ENTITY EXTRACTION MODEL TRAINING METHOD, ENTITY EXTRACTION MODEL TRAINING DEVICE AND ENTITY EXTRACTION MODEL TRAINING EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses an entity extraction method, an entity extraction model training method, an entity extraction model training device and entity extraction model training equipment, and relatesto the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of obtaining an electronic document belonging to the field of short texts; running the entity extraction model to perform sequence labeling processing on the electronic document to obtain entity data in the electronic document; storing entity data in the electronic document; wherein the entity extraction model is a neural network model obtained by adopting adversarial multi-task training; wherein the multiple tasks comprise a main task and an auxiliary task, the main task is a first sequence labeling task for performing entity extraction on an electronic document in the short text field, and the auxiliary task is a second sequence labeling task for performing sequence labeling on an electronic document belonging to another short text field. According to the method, the auxiliary task is introduced to perform joint training on the entity extraction model, so that the sample size of training is increased, the training effect of the entity extraction model is improved, and the entity extraction accuracy of the electronic document is further enhanced.

column2: INTERACTION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND RELATED DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses an interaction method based on artificial intelligence and a related device. The method comprises the steps of determining a to-be-solved demand correspondingto a target user identifier in a running environment of target software, and determining interaction content for meeting the to-be-solved demand in the running environment according to the to-be-solved demand and running state information related to the target user identifier in the running environment. The running state information is generated through the target user identifier in the running environment of the target software; wherein the information is currently related to the target user identifier; the current actual situation of the user can be better reflected, so that the interactivecontent determined based on the running state information is returned according to the current actual demand of the user corresponding to the target user identifier when the user uses the target software, the possibility of providing help for the user is higher, and the interactive experience with the user is improved.

column2: INTELLIGENT COMPARTMENT VENTILATION SYSTEM
column4: Public transport vehicles are always propagation media of various severe respiratory infectious diseases. In the running process of the vehicles, compartments move back and forth irregularly, so harmful bacteria and viruses floating in the air are diffused into the whole compartments at a large probability. The invention aims to design an intelligent compartment ventilation system so as to controlan air flow path in a compartment to the greatest extent, so that sick droplets sprayed by passengers during coughing and sneezing fall down to the floor as quickly as possible, are pumped into a disinfection device, are treated and then are discharged out of a vehicle. An artificial intelligence system is introduced, a set of intelligent linkage multi-path air guide pipe system is designed to control the strength and angle of fresh air downwards conveyed by an air supply outlet in the top of the compartment in real time, air entering the top of the compartment is made to vertically flow downwards and be exhausted out of the compartment as soon as possible, so the time for harmful bacteria and viruses in the air to stay in the compartment is shortened to the maximum extent.

column2: BATTERY CAR SHARING PARKING SYSTEM, ELECTRIC CONTROL BRAKE DEVICE THEREOF AND CAR PARKING AND PICKING-UP METHOD
column4: The invention provides a battery car sharing parking system, an electric control brake device thereof and a car parking and picking-up method. The system comprises a smart phone terminal, a server terminal, a battery car, a parking space, an electric control brake device, a communication module and a control module. The smart phone terminal establishes communication with the server terminal through a wireless network; the server terminal establishes communication with the communication module through a network; the communication module is connected with the control module; a special brake control relay for the electric control brake device is connected with the control module; and the intelligent mobile phone terminal performs switching-on/switching-off control on the electric control brake device through the server terminal, the communication module and the brake control relay. The invention is simple, reliable, convenient to use, low in cost, free of manual nursing, anti-theft and capable of assisting in solving the problem that the last three kilometers are difficult to go out.

column2: TWO-DIMENSIONAL SKELETON X-RAY IMAGE THREE-DIMENSIONAL CONVERSION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention relates to the field of medical images, in particular to a two-dimensional skeleton X-ray image three-dimensional conversion method based on an artificial intelligence technology. For anobject to be tested, CT device scanning is avoided, only few X-ray images need to be shot; an X-ray image of a to-be-measured object and an eight-point algorithm are used to obtain a projection matrix, the standard three-dimensional point cloud model determines an angle parameter and an offset parameter through a capacity deformation generalized Hough transform method; obtaining an adjusted standard three-dimensional point cloud model; a projection image obtained through the projection matrix is closest to a skeleton image of the to-be-measured object; finally, coordinates of all points of the three-dimensional point cloud model of the to-be-measured object are obtained in sequence through a formula, the three-dimensional point cloud model is obtained through the method, on one hand, theeconomic burden of a patient is reduced, three-dimensional CT does not need to be conducted again, and radiation borne by the to-be-measured object is little. On the other hand, a navigation operationcan be performed in a simple and crude condition or a field operation environment, and popularization and utilization are facilitated.

column2: IMAGE DISPLAY METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses an image display method and device. One specific embodiment of the method comprises the following steps: in response to starting of a driving assistance function of color-weakness driving assistance glasses, acquiring an image obtained by shooting the surrounding environment of a vehicle; performing image color enhancement on the image to obtain a color enhanced image; performing target detection on the color enhanced image, and determining information of an object in the surrounding environment of the vehicle; an image is displayed on a lens of the color-weak driving assistance glasses based on information of the object. According to the embodiment, the images are displayed on the lenses of the color-weakness driving assistance glasses in combination with artificial intelligence technologies such as image enhancement and target detection, and the color-weakness driver can be assisted in safe driving.

column2: CLOTHING COLOR POSITIONING BIG DATA INTELLIGENT EVALUATION METHOD BASED ON WORKING SCENE
column4: The invention discloses a clothing color positioning big data intelligent evaluation method based on a working scene. The method comprises the following steps: a, constructing a color group; b, constructing a color number group; c, building a big data scoring standard model; d, scoring each color number group; e, setting a score grouping standard; f, grading and grouping the graded color number groups; g, inputting clothes data and completing color scoring; h, selecting a current season, and obtaining a score grouping proportion; i, selecting a workplace environment; j, setting scoring grouping standard proportions under different working occasion environments; and k, comparing to obtain a comparison result. According to the invention, a big data artificial intelligence algorithm is used to assist consumers to manage their own wardrobes, optimization, fitness and high efficiency of on-duty dress collocation are realized, and public consumers are helped to create an intelligent, low-carbon, green and sustainable life mode.

column2: METHOD FOR ACQUIRING EXECUTABLE FILE OF HETEROGENEOUS COMPUTING SYSTEM, METHOD FOR RUNNING THE HETEROGENEOUS COMPUTING SYSTEM AND RELATED PRODUCTS
column4: The invention relates to an executable file acquisition method and operation method of a heterogeneous computing system and a related product. According to the executable file obtaining method of the heterogeneous computing system, through the CPU program and the artificial intelligence processor program, the electronic device allows a user to compile a corresponding program according to needs to achieve needed functions, and the application range of a machine learning library is expanded.

column2: VISUALLY REPRESENTING VIRTUAL FANTASY SPORTS CONTESTS II
column4: A fantasy sports visual simulation system providing an audiovisual experience that allows contest participants and spectators to view a videogame-like model of a virtual fantasy sports contest. These simulations can occur at any time between any two or more contest participants, like mini contests within the context of a broader league. Once a league is formed and team rosters are created, numerical calculations are performed based on real-athlete statistics to determine a current ?œstate??of performance for all virtual athletes in gameplay. Further simulation inputs can be provided by artificial intelligence, coaching, randomization, and other factors. This statistical analysis is the basis for assigning performance variables to each virtual athlete, which allows the system to calculate numerical point values based on the performance of each virtual athlete and team in this fantasy sports visual simulation system. Participants can experience the simulation through a variety of audiovisual devices, including extended reality.

column2: FISH-SHAPED BIONIC RESCUE DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses a fish-shaped bionic rescue device which comprises a osculating part, a fish head part, a trunk part and a fish tail part which are connected in sequence, the osculating part is of a conical hollow cavity structure, and a rescue air bag to be inflated is contained in the osculating part. Wherein a fin structure is arranged on the body part, the fin structure at least comprises a dorsal fin and two pectoral fins, and the three fins are arranged at a preset angle; the fish tail part comprises a plurality of waterproof steering engines and a tail plate; the plurality of waterproof steering engines are connected through moving joints; the last waterproof steering engine is connected with the tail plate through a moving joint; the fish-shaped bionic rescue device further comprises a built-in main control unit, a wireless signal receiving and transmitting module, a first motor used for controlling the fins respectively, a second motor arranged between the tail portion and the body portion of the fish, and an electric control inflation assembly. The swimming speed and the flexibility of the rescue device are improved by simulating the bionic characteristics ofthe flag fish, and the rescue air bag is inflated to form a floating object so as to provide effective rescue for a target to be rescued.

column2: MULTIFUNCTIONAL CUTTER FRAME
column4: The utility model discloses a multifunctional tool rest which comprises a base with a built-in control device. The base is provided with a storage bin used for containing cutters and a cutter grindingdevice with the blade condition capable of being seen. A display panel and a plurality of keys for control are arranged on the side wall of the storage bin, and the display panel and the keys are inelectric signal connection with the control device; a heating device and a sterilizing device are arranged in the storage bin and are in electric signal connection with the control device respectively; an environment sensing element used for detecting the environment in the storage bin is arranged on the inner wall of the storage bin and is in electric signal connection with the control device. The knife sharpening device comprises an image collecting device used for shooting the blade condition during knife sharpening in real time, and the image collecting device is in electric signal connection with the control device and the display panel. Compared with the prior art, the utility model provides a plurality of richer and more practical functions, greatly improves the convenience of the product, and improves the user experience.

column2: DIGITAL PERSON CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a digital person control method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method specifically comprises the steps: controlling a digital person to execute a first task; under the condition that the first instruction is received, obtaining a first action currently executed by the digital person in the first task and asecond action indicated by the first instruction; under the condition that conflict skeleton points do not exist in the first action and the second action, fusing the first action and the second action to obtain a fused action according to the positions of the skeleton points when the digital person executes the first action, the positions of the skeleton points when the digital person executes the second action and a human body motion law; and moreover, the digital person is controlled to execute the fused action, so that action connection similar to that of the person is realized, the action is more natural and smooth, and humanization of the digital person is realized to a greater extent.

column2: MOBILE SYSTEM AND METHOD OF SELECTING AND PRESENTING CONTENT IN PARTICULAR DYNAMIC PERSONALIZED ADVERTISING
column4: The method of selecting and presenting content in particular dynamic personalized advertising using data from local sensors and artificial intelligence algorithmscharacterized in thatin the first step data (D) flowing from local sensors (C) is read, i.e. information about the ambient conditions, preferably such a : location and speed of movement, weather conditions, traffic, the number of potential recipients, sex, age, and then,in the second step, preliminary processing of the acquired (WPD) data (D) is carried out, and the acquired data (D) and the result of the preliminary data analysis (WA) are imported into intelligent analysis algorithms (Al) operating locally, preferably in memory (P) of the mobile control unit content (1), in the third step, an intelligent analysis (AI) is made by the algorithms - preferably algorithms of artificial intelligence (S) and / or decision trees, and / or decision tables and/or self-learning mechanisms (MS), preferably by neural networks - self-learning networks , whereas in the fourth step artificial intelligence (S) and / or self-learning mechanisms (MS) match the presented content - the advertisement (R), to the recipients of the content / environment (O) and then displays it on the advertising content carrier (N).Mobile system of selecting and presenting content in particular dynamic personalized advertising using the content control unit and displaycharacterized in that,the system is made of: mobile content control unit (1), display module (2), advertising content management module (3), while the mobile content control unit (1) has a memory (P) and is wired and / or wireless connected to: the display module (2) being the carrier of advertising content (N) and the sensors (C), wherein the mobile content control unit (1) is wireless connected, preferably using GSM or Wi-fi or Bluetooth, with the CMS advertising content management module (3);while the mobile content control unit (1) and display module (2) are placed on a mobile running platform (RP), preferably a semi-trailer or truck or bus or streetcar.

column2: HEALTH MONITORING APPARATUS BASED ON VIRTUAL REALITY USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to a health monitoring apparatus based on virtual reality using artificial intelligence, and to a method thereof. The health monitoring apparatus of the present invention recognizes the user prime;s motion through a sensor unit, provides the recognized user prime;s motion through virtual reality, and analyzes the recognized user prime;s motion through artificial intelligence to provide a feedback according to an analysis result, thereby being possible to perform a fitness lesson at a time and place desired by a user, increasing user satisfaction dye to a direct feedback and field lessons in a virtual reality space, and increasing immersion in exercise. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: COMBINED COMPUTER TERMINAL
column4: The utility model discloses a combined type computer terminal, which comprises a tablet personal computer, a camera, a first magnetic attraction strip, a second magnetic attraction strip, a third magnetic attraction strip and a fourth magnetic attraction strip, and the refractor is provided with a second magnetic attraction strip, the refractor is attracted to the first magnetic attraction strip through the second magnetic attraction strip, and the shooting direction of the camera is changed from the direction facing the front of the panel to the direction facing a desktop below the front of the panel, so that the tablet personal computer is supported to work in an augmented reality mode. The utility model relates to an interactive communication learning device specially designed for family members and doctors. Most functional services required by daily life such as learning, entertainment, artificial intelligence interactive communication, information query, medical service platform docking and one-key help seeking can be provided for family members through audio, video and AR technologies, and the family members can be used independently or in a combined mode through combinationof different components.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DISCOVERING NETWORK COMMUNITY STRUCTURE
column4: The invention discloses a method and a system for discovering a network community structure. The method relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and comprises the following steps: acquiring aconstructed network model, performing fitness optimization on the network model to obtain an optimization result, and converting the optimization result into a network-level community structure. A plurality of layers of a multi-layer complex network model in the real society have certain correlation; the community structures of different layers are greatly different in significance, so that fitness optimization is carried out by utilizing the correlation between the layers of the complex network model, the collaborative detection of the community structures of different network layers of the multi-layer complex network model is realized according to an optimization result, the total number of communities does not need to be specified in advance, and the method has the characteristics of universality and stability.

column2: ALARM INFORMATION SENDING METHOD AND DEVICE, STORAGE MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an alarm information sending method and device, a storage medium and an electronic device. The method comprises the steps that under the condition that it is determined that thefrequency of a target voice signal is larger than or equal to a preset threshold value, a target image obtained by shooting a target area through target image collection equipment is obtained, and the target voice signal is sent out by a piglet in the target area; whether the current state of the piglet in the target area is abnormal or not is determined according to the target image; and alarm information is sent under the condition of determining that the current state of the piglet in the target area is abnormal. By means of the method and device, the storage medium and the electronic device, the problem that the death rate of the piglets is high due to the fact that the abnormal states of piglets cannot be found in time manually is solved.

column2: LINE FAULT ELIMINATION DEVICE FOR BADMINTON HALL
column4: The utility model discloses a line fault elimination device for a badminton hall. Including a body, the top of the body is fixedly connected with a telescopic rod. A rotary table is fixedly connectedto the inner bottom of the body. A supporting rod is fixedly connected to the upper surface of the rotary table; the top of the supporting rod is fixedly connected with a limiting plate; a supportingplate is fixedly connected to the inner bottom of the body and located on one side of the supporting rod. A sliding groove is formed in the side wall of the supporting plate, a tool box is arranged inthe body, a plurality of cantilevers are fixedly connected to the two side walls of the tool box, the ends, away from the tool box, of the cantilevers extend into the sliding groove and are movably connected with rolling wheels, and the outer surfaces of the rolling wheels are attached to the interior of the sliding groove. The whole device is convenient to use, a large number of tools are integrated, the tools do not need to be carried too much time, the labor intensity of workers is relieved, and then the working efficiency can be improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ALL-IN-ONE MACHINE WITH BACKLIGHT CAMERA SHOOTING FUNCTION
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence all-in-one machine with a backlight camera shooting function. The intelligent all-in-one machine comprises an intelligent all-in-one machine bodyand a shading device, a touch screen is arranged on the surface of the intelligent all-in-one machine body; a camera is arranged above the touch screen; the shading device comprises a fixed plate anda rotating arm; the fixed plate is mounted at the upper part of the intelligent all-in-one machine body; the bottom of the rotating arm is rotationally connected with the fixed plate; the top is connected with a fixed plate through a shading shed; electric push rods are arranged on the two sides of the rotating arm; one end of the electric push rod is rotationally hinged to the rotating arm, theother end of the electric push rod is rotationally hinged to the fixing plate, the fixing plate is provided with a baffle above the intelligent all-in-one machine body, the baffle is provided with anLED lamp, and the intelligent all-in-one machine body is provided with a first control button and a second control button which are connected with the electric push rod and the LED lamp respectively.The shading device can cover the camera after being opened, the camera can be prevented from being directly irradiated by sunlight, and meanwhile the LED lamp can play a role in supplementing light.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED AUTONOMOUS CAR JACK
column4: Exemplary aspects of the present disclosure are directed towards the Artificial Intelligence Based Autonomous Car Jack. which typically consists of Artificial Intelligence Based Autonomous System (AIBAS) 101 mounted on a car jack 102 to lift the car for tyre/wheel replacement. This AIBAS consists of machine learning-enabled camera(MLEC) 101a, High torque DC motor 101b and a Li-Po battery 101c. This AIBAS can be mounted on any type of car jack and can be operated for any type of light motor car. When the camera MLEC 101a is trained with the images of car tyre/wheel in good condition and at flat condition, MLEC 101a will store the data on its internal memory. With one click the MLEC will store the picture to be tracked and simultaneous it can store seven types. Once the jack is kept under the car and turned on, MLEC 101a tracks the size and shape of the tyre/wheel and estimates whether the car is to be lifted or not and how much height needed to be lifted. Then it commands the relay connected to it to turn on the DC Motor 101b which is powered by a LiPo battery 101c. When the motor turns anti-clockwise direction then the threaded rod 102b will rotate in such a way that the gap between 102a and 102c will decrease. This action will cause the 102c to lift the car with the help of support structure 102d. When the car is lifted then the MLEC 101a compares the size and estimates the difference, once the car is lifted then MLEC 101a will disengage the relay to turn off the power to DC Motor 101b. After the tyre/wheel is replaced then either user can instruct the AIBAS 101 by a simple press on a switch or MLEC 101a will ensure that tyre/wheel has changed based on the previous wheel picture and engages the second relay so that the DC Motor 101b will operate in the clockwise direction.
