When jacks 102c and 102d come in contact the limit switch will open the power supply to the DC Motor and the system.FIG1

column2: BUILDING SPOIL PARTICLE SIZE DISTRIBUTION RAPID IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON CONVOLUTIONAL NEURAL NETWORK
column4: The invention relates to a building spoil particle size distribution rapid identification method based on a convolutional neural network, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the processing of a to-be-tested building spoil image based on a pre-trained building spoil particle size distribution identification convolutional neural network model, and obtaining the particle size distribution of to-be-tested building spoil, wherein the building spoil image is a binary image obtained by preprocessing building spoil to be tested, dispersing the preprocessed building spoil in a solution toobtain a dilute solution, and then sequentially shooting and processing the image to obtain a binary image. Compared with the prior art, according to the invention, artificial intelligence is combinedwith a traditional geotechnical test; a non-direct contact detection means is adopted, remote rapid detection and effective recording of the particle size distribution of the building spoil are achieved, the method has the advantages of being convenient to operate, simple, practical, good in result reproducibility, high in test precision and the like, a reliable and effective pretreatment mode isprovided for resource utilization of the building spoil, and high popularization value and environmental benefits are achieved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VOICE CONTROL PEN
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence voice control pen which comprises a control pen body, an installing frame, a voice permeating net, a connecting table, a miniature push rod motor, a lithium battery, a voice receiver, a time relay and a controller. The installing frame is installed on the upper side of the annular side face of the control pen body. The voice permeating net is installed on the upper end face of the installing frame. The miniature push rod motor is installed in the installing frame. The connecting table is connected with the lower end face of the miniature push rod motor. The voice receiver is installed on the upper side of the miniature push rod motor. The output end of the voice receiver is connected with the input end of the controller. The output end of the controller is connected with the input end of the time relay. The output end of the time relay is connected with the input end of the lithium battery. The output end of the lithium battery is connected with the input end of the miniature push rod motor. Due to the design, the problem that an existing artificial intelligence control pen cannot conveniently perform voice control adjustment is solved, and the artificial intelligence voice control pen is reasonable in structure, convenient to assemble and install, beneficial for voice adjustment and good in use effect.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM RISK DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence model deployment, in particular to an artificial intelligence system risk detection method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: operating a to-be-detected artificial intelligence system; obtaining index parameters of each risk evaluation index of the to-be-detected artificial intelligence system in operation, performing multi-angle quantitative detection on the artificial intelligence system according to the index parameters of the risk evaluation indexes; through a source code of the system and an application thereof, determining a corresponding weight parameter; comprehensively considering the index parameters and the corresponding parameters to obtain operation risk parameters of the to-be-detected artificial intelligence system; detecting the running risk of the artificial intelligence system through the running risk parameters, so that the running artificial intelligence system is ensured to be safe and controllable, risks are mastered and avoided in the application process of the artificial intelligence system, and safety problems or events are reduced.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND RELATED PRODUCT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a data processing method and a related product. The data processing method comprises the steps that a universal processor acquires hardware architecture information of an end-side artificial intelligence processor and a corresponding configurable memory access bandwidth, and generates a corresponding binary instruction according to the hardware architecture information of the end-side artificial intelligence processor and the corresponding memory access bandwidth; the universal processor generates a corresponding artificial intelligence learning task according to the binary instruction, and sends the artificial intelligence learning task to a cloud-side artificial intelligence processor for running; the cloud-side artificial intelligence processorreceives the artificial intelligence learning task, executes the artificial intelligence learning task and generates an operation result; the general processor receives an operation result corresponding to the artificial intelligence learning task, and determines an offline operation file corresponding to the memory access bandwidth according to the operation result; and the universal processor determines an offline running file mapping table according to the offline running files corresponding to different memory access bandwidths of the artificial intelligence processor on the same end side.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGING DEVICE WITH LARGE IMAGING RANGE
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of camera devices. The utility model further discloses an artificial intelligence camera device with a large camera range. Mounting plate, a movable plate is mounted at the bottom of the mounting plate; side plates are symmetrically and fixedly connected to the bottom of the movable plate; the opposite side walls of the two side plates are jointly and rotationally connected with a rotating rod through two bearings. A motor is installed on the side wall of one side plate, the output end of the motor is connected with a worm through a coupler, theend, close to the motor, of the rotating rod penetrates through the bearing and extends outwards, the rod wall of the rotating rod is fixedly sleeved with a worm wheel, and the worm wheel is meshed with the worm. According to the utility model, the dust on the lens of the camera device with higher installation height is easy to clean, the clear shooting of the camera device is prevented from being influenced, the height of the camera device can be adjusted, and the camera view angle of the camera device is prevented from being blocked by the cross beam on the ceiling.

column2: ROAD BARRIER PLACING AND STORING ROBOT
column4: The utility model discloses a robot for placing and storing road barriers. The robot comprises a driving device, a robot body and mechanical arms. Characterized in that it is characterized in that itcomprises, the driving device comprises a driving wheel, a driven wheel and a frame; the driving wheel is detachably connected with the driven wheel through a frame; a driving motor, a battery pack and a host are sequentially arranged in the robot body. The motor is connected with the driving wheel shaft; an artificial intelligence chip is arranged in the host; a machine vision image shooting headis arranged at the front end of the robot body, a storage basket is arranged at the rear end of the robot body, a grabber is arranged at the tail end of the mechanical arm, a forward gear and a reverse gear are arranged at the two ends of the grabber, and the main machine, the machine vision image shooting head, the driving motor, the mechanical arm and the battery pack are electrically connected. According to the road barrier storage device, the road barrier is placed and stored through the storage robot, and potential safety hazards during manual placement and storage are avoided.

column2: USER IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a user identification method and device, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a face image of a target user, wherein the face image of the target user is obtained by shooting the target user after the target user enters a service place; and matching the face image of the target user withthe face image of the user in the potential service target list, identifying the target user according to a matching result, the user in the potential service target list being a user located in a preset area in real time, and the preset area covering a service place. As only the face image of the target user needs to be matched with the face image of the user in the potential service target listinstead of all input face images, the matching efficiency is high, and the identity of the target user can be quickly recognized.

column2: METHOD FOR INTELLIGENT FRAMING DISPLAY ON SCREEN AND MOBILE TERMINAL
column4: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and relates to a method for intelligent framing display on a screen and a mobile terminal. The problem that a display target cannot be accurately achieved through manual magnifying, framing, focusing and the like is solved. Space coordinates of human eyes are collected through a front depth sensor, the angle range of sight when the human eyes observe a screen is intelligently analyzed, automatic focusing framing is conducted through a mobile phone according to the known camera shooting angle range of a rear camera, the observationrange of the human eyes is intelligently intercepted, manual operation is not needed, and screen display is automatically adjusted. Human eye space coordinates are collected all the time, a screen does not need to be adjusted when a person moves, and intelligent framing is achieved; and when the frame is narrow enough, the screen is invisible, and an effect of mixing the false with the genuine isachieved.

column2: PUBLIC WATER-SAVING CONTROL METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a public water-saving control method and system based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: shooting equipment is adopted to obtain image information in a preset range of a water outlet of water outlet equipment in real time, and transmit the shot image information to a central server in real time; the central server receives the real-time image information and judges whether a target object exists in the image or not through a pre-judgment module; the target recognition module analyzes and processes the image information containing the target object and recognizes the type and position of the target object; and the planning module plans a water outlet control strategy according to the identified target object type and target object position, and issues a water outlet control instruction to the water outlet equipment through the control module. By means of the method and the system, water outlet control modes matched with different target objects or scenes can be provided, and the method and the system have the advantages of being convenient in water use, high in water resource use efficiency, capable of preventing water resource waste and the like.

column2: HIERARCHICAL DYNAMIC DEPLOYMENT OF AI MODEL
column4: A method of deploying artificial intelligence (AI) model resources includes storing at least one AI model in a model store memory in a plurality of different versions, each different version having a different level of fidelity. When a request to exercise the AI model is received, a processor determines which version of the AI model to exercise for the received request. The determined AI model version is used to serve the received request by exercising input data accompanying the received request. The result of the exercised AI model version is used to respond to the received request.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DETERMINING RUNNING STATE OF OFFICE MANAGEMENT APPLICATION SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a method and a system for determining the running state of an office management application system. The method comprises the following steps: determining an application structure model and an application relationship model of a to-be-tested office management application system; wherein the application structure model comprises composition components of the applications, operation dependency relationships of the components and dependency relationships of the components on the applications, and the application relationship model comprises operation dependency relationships and influences between the applications; determining an application load score of the office management application system to be tested by using a load evaluation model according to the relationshipchain among the relationship target objects at different levels and the weight occupied by each relationship target object; determining an application quality score of the office management application system to be tested by using a quality evaluation model according to the relationship chain among the relationship target objects at different levels and the weight occupied by each relationship target object; and performing fault identification and early warning based on a preset rule identification method and an artificial intelligence identification method according to a preset basic index and the current log.

column2: FITNESS EQUIPMENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The utility model discloses fitness equipment based on an artificial intelligence technology. The device comprises a supporting plate and supporting beams, a rotating roller is arranged between the same ends of the two supporting beams; a plurality of gear discs are fixedly arranged on the rotating roller; a first transmission chain is arranged between the corresponding gear discs on the two rotating rollers; the outer ring faces of the first transmission chains are jointly sleeved with a rubber belt. A plurality of climbing buckle blocks are distributed on the rubber belt; static supporting rods are installed on the outer surfaces of the lower ends of the supporting beams through first supporting shafts, the lower ends of the static supporting rods are fixedly connected to the upper surface of the front side of the supporting plate, movable supporting rods are installed on the outer surfaces of the middle ends of the supporting beams through second supporting shafts, and hydraulic telescopic rods are installed on the rear side of the upper surface of the supporting plate through installation bases. The fitness equipment is small in size and can be placed in a gymnasium, and therefore people living in cities can climb and do fitness in the gymnasium.

column2: DEEP MUSCLE STRENGTHENING TRAINING SYSTEM AND DEEP MUSCLE STRENGTHENING TRAINING SYSTEM USING SAME
column4: According to an embodiment of the present invention, a deep muscle strengthening training system comprises: a deep muscle strengthening training device which strengthens and trains a deep muscle by moving the whole body of a user in eight directions such as front, back, left, right, and diagonal directions; a deep muscle strengthening training supporting ultrasonic imaging device which confirms contraction and relaxation of the deep muscle in real time through a wearable ultrasonic sensor worn on the body of the user by being connected to the deep muscle strengthening training device with wired or wireless communication; an expert server which selectively supports the deep muscle strengthening training supporting ultrasonic imaging device; and a deep muscle strengthening training big data server which receives and stores deep muscle data related to deep muscle strengthening training from the deep muscle strengthening training supporting ultrasonic imaging device, and provides a deep muscle strengthening training program for the user by artificial intelligence. The present invention can maximize an exercise effect. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: APPARATUS FOR MAKING VIDEO CONTENT IN SPORTS RELAY BROADCASTING USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND AUGMENTED REALITY
column4: The present invention relates to an apparatus for making video content in sports relay broadcasting using artificial intelligence (AI) and augmented reality (AR), which uses a video processing algorithm and the AI in sports relay broadcasting, such as baseball, billiards, soccer, basketball, volleyball, tennis, badminton, curling, fencing, taekwondo, and the like, captured through a camera to detect and mix precise and quantified data with real video information to provide various AR/MR video content. According to the present invention, the apparatus comprises: a video reception unit receiving real-time video provided from at least one camera capturing a sports game; an object detection unit capturing an image and detecting motion from video information acquired by the video reception unit based on the flow of the game recognized through image processing and AI to detect quantified object data; a storage unit storing the captured video received from the video reception unit and the object data detected by the object detection unit; and a mixed video generation unit mixing the captured video information and the object data to provide AR video content. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: SHOOTING VIEW ANGLE ADJUSTING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a shooting view angle adjusting method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. Through the shooting view angle adjusting method and device, the electronic equipment and the storage medium of the invention, a mobile device can determine a view angle parameter suitable for a current condition according to the road type of a road where the mobile device is currently located; the shooting view angle of image acquisition equipment can be adjusted on the basis of the view angle parameter; under the condition that the view angle range of the image acquisition equipment is limited, the higher the resolution ratio is, the longer the perceptible distance is; under the condition that the resolution ratio of the image acquisition equipment is limited, the smallerthe view angle range of a camera is, and the longer the perceptible distance is. Therefore, the mobile device can meet the requirements of view angle ranges and long-distance perception at any time.

column2: ROBOT COMMUNICATION METHOD, SYSTEM AND DEVICE, ROBOT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a robot communication method, system and device, a robot and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: when it is determined that direct communication with a target elevator cannot be carried out, determining at least one other robot as a relay, and the relay being used for forming a communication path for communication between the robot and the target elevator; and communicating with the target elevator through the determined at least one other robot. In the mode, under the condition that the robot cannot directly communicate with the target elevator, communication between the robot and the target elevator is achieved through the relay.

column2: REGIONAL SHIELDING HUMAN BODY SECURITY CHECK METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a regional shielding human body security check method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a target human body image; identifying and determining whether the target human body is male or female; extracting skeleton information of the target human body; determining a human body private position according to the human body skeleton information; adopting regional shielding for the private area of the human body. According to the invention, different male and female private part areas are calculated through the coordinatesbetween the human skeleton joint points, and fuzzy processing is carried out on the private areas, so that complex operation and expensive security check equipment are not needed; human body securitycheck is rapidly realized, and personal privacy is ensured as much as possible.

column2: DUAL-PURPOSE EQUIPMENT FOR INTERNET OF THINGS AND INTERNET OF VEHICLES
column4: The utility model discloses dual-purpose equipment for the Internet of Things and the Internet of Vehicles. Measurement values are collected by the main control chip and then sent to the adapter platethrough the CAN transceiver and the CAN bus. The adapter plate sends the parameters to the display screen controller through the display screen interface, so that various parameter indexes of the aircan be displayed through the display screen, the main control chip can upload the parameters to a cloud platform or a mobile phone terminal through the 4G module, and a user can conveniently check the air quality condition through the mobile phone. When the device is used in a vehicle. Mainboard only needs to be used, an adapter plate and a display screen are not needed; after the equipment is connected with an OBD female head in a vehicle through an OBD male head on a mainboard, a main control chip receives data information of a bus in the vehicle through a CAN transceiver and finally uploads the data information to a cloud platform or a mobile phone terminal through a 4G module, and a client can conveniently check the running condition of the vehicle and the air quality in the vehicle through a mobile phone. And dual-purpose air detection use of the Internet of Things and the Internet of Vehicles is realized.

column2: OUTDOOR LARGE-RANGE HUMAN BODY POSTURE RECONSTRUCTION METHOD BASED ON MOBILE PLATFORMS
column4: The invention discloses an outdoor large-range human body posture reconstruction method based on mobile platforms. The method comprises the following steps: carrying out camera pose calculation and inter-camera calibration by using various sensor data of a plurality of mobile platforms, wherein each mobile platform carries a camera bound with an inertial measurement unit, an artificial vision identifier and a satellite positioning system; enabling each mobile platform to establish a human body model in real time along with the shot human body posture; and calculating an appropriate shooting angle according to the pose of the human body in the visual field, and controlling each mobile platform to move to the optimal shooting angle for shooting. The method has the beneficial effects that each camera does not need to be calibrated manually, and the operation is simple; the three-dimensional coordinates of the joint points can be calculated in real time through real-time self-calibration.As data of a plurality of sensors are combined during self-calibration, the calibration is robust.; a camera is located on each mobile platform, so that shooting is flexible; finally, the system controls the mobile platforms to move and performs shooting at a better shooting angle, so that better human body pose information can be obtained.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHARGING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence charging device. Supporting table, a sliding plate is arranged above the supporting table; an intelligent device is arranged above the sliding plate, a storage battery pack is arranged in the intelligent device in a matched mode, an electric quantity detector is electrically connected to the storage battery pack, a storage cavity is formed inthe upper right side of the intelligent device, and a charging plug is arranged in the storage cavity in an embedded mode and electrically connected with the storage battery pack. According to the utility model, the electric quantity detector detects that the storage battery pack is fully charged; the electric telescopic rod is contracted through the second relay; the charging plug is stored in the storage cavity, and meanwhile, the wireless switch electrically connected with the servo motor is started through the third relay, so that the servo motor rotates reversely, the sliding plate drivesthe intelligent equipment to slide and reset under the matching action of the driving gear and the rack, and hidden dangers caused by the fact that the charging plug is always inserted into a socketare avoided.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING AN ALERT ON DELIVERING DIGITAL CONTENT
column4: The present invention discloses a system and method for providing an alert on delivering a digital content such as when an interesting digital content is imminent, for example, the beginning of a playduring a football game, to direct the focus of one or more viewers towards the digital content. The present invention is further configured to embed a commercial message in conjunction with the alerton directing the focus of the viewers. The system is adapted to activate the alert either manually or automatically. Further, the system is optionally implemented with an artificial intelligence (AI)system, which is trained using deep learning to recognize the appropriate time to automatically trigger the alert/commercial message sequence. The AI system could be trained by monitoring the manualcontrol of alert activation.

column2: LIFELOG-BASED DEMENTIA PATIENT HOME CARE DATA ACQUISITION SYSTEM, AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: Provided is a lifelog-based dementia patient home care data acquisition system (100). The system (100) comprises: a data collection unit (120) collecting lifelog-based log data; a data relay unit (170) linked with an actual dementia expert system (160); a dementia care social robot (130) implementing a part of a log data collection function of the data collection unit (120); and an artificial intelligence expert system (140) based on an artificial neural network technology. The dementia care social robot (130) is equipped with training content to be performed by a care subject and configured to conduct a training process for the care subject. The artificial intelligence expert system (140) develops and provides a personalized cognitive training task to the data collection unit (120). Provided is a lifelog-based dementia patient home care data acquisition method using the system (100). According to the present invention, the lifelog-based dementia patient home care data acquisition system, and the method thereof are able to improve the quality of life for the elderly. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: MOTION ACCURACY DETERMINATION SYSTEM USING SINGLE CAMERA-BASED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE POSTURE ANALYSIS TECHNOLOGY
column4: The present invention relates to a motion accuracy determination system using a single camera-based artificial intelligence posture analysis technology. The motion accuracy determination system comprises: a single camera (110) which photographs a user prime;s exercise motion and provides image data of the photographed exercise motion; a skeleton data extraction unit (120); a motion posture measurement unit (130); and a determination processing control unit (140). According to the present invention, the accuracy of a motion posture can be automatically determined. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: INDUSTRIAL EQUIPMENT STATE MANAGEMENT AND CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE INTEGRATED WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ALGORITHM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses an industrial equipment state management and control method and device integrated with an artificial intelligence algorithm, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the secondary recognition after obtaining a first physical state feature corresponding to target industrial equipment, and obtaining a second physical state feature; judging the running state of the target industrial equipment based on the second physical state feature, and if the running state is abnormal, performing fault detection on the target industrial equipment based on a preset standard test working condition; if the fault detection result meets a preset condition, predicting the target industrial equipment by utilizing a preset hybrid model to obtain expected life information; determining a target operation condition of the target industrial equipment according to the expected life information; and based on the target operation condition, adjusting the actual operation condition of the equipment. By the adoption of the method, the actual working condition of the industrial equipment can be measured and calculated, then set parameters are corrected, automatic management and control are achieved, and the operation efficiency of the industrial equipment is improved.

column2: RESERVOIR TOUR INSPECTION MACHINE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a reservoir tour inspection machine based on artificial intelligence. The machine comprises: a power supply module, which is used for supplying power to all parts; a high-definition camera, which is used for shooting the environment; a loudspeaker, which is used for playing slogans and giving out alarm sound; an ultrasonic detector, which is used for detecting the distancebetween a floating platform and the water bottom to prevent stranding; the floating platform, which is used as a carrier of each element; a driving device, which is used for driving the floating platform and enabling the floating platform to move in multiple directions; and a main control module; wherein the main control module is configured to recognize an image shot by the high-definition cameraand judge action information of a person in the image. The reservoir tour inspection machine based on artificial intelligence can carry out automatic tour inspection along a reservoir water area, canautomatically identify people who perform illegal behaviors like swimming illegally, fishing illegally and destroying reservoir facilities in a reservoir area, can give an alarm in time to repel lawand rule violators when finding the above dangerous situations, and can report information events to a management station in time.

column2: VIDEO AND AUDIO IDENTIFICATION METHOD, APPARATUS AND DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a video and audio identification method, apparatus and device, and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of receiving a target service type input by a user; searching a corresponding target service document according to the target service type, displaying the target service copywriting, shooting a target video of the target service copywriting read by the user, performing audio separation on the target video through an audio and video separator to obtain target audio information, and reducing tedious steps of manual input through voice reading; performing character recognition on the target audio information to obtain target information, and performing frame extraction processing on the target video to obtain a user picture so as to verify a user identity; and generating a target service document of the user according to the user picture and the target information, obtaining multi-aspect data by analyzing a video based on artificial intelligence, andimproving the information input efficiency of the user while verifying the identity of the user.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED MODULE IDENTIFICATION AND ASSISTANT SYSTEM
column4: Provided is an artificial intelligence-based module identification and assistant system. The artificial intelligence-based module identification and assistant system comprises: a module learning device which generates a deep learning-based module learning model on the basis of a module image provided from a camera, learns the module learning model, and generates module data; a server unit which stores the module learning model and the module data in a database; a host device which identifies a proposed module by using the camera, receives the module data corresponding to the identified module from the server unit to display the received module data to a user, and displays, to the user, whether there is an error in a product configuration using the module; and an IoT edge device which controls the module used for the product configuration, and monitors the connection relationship of the module, wherein the host device recognizes the module connected to the IoT edge device and displays, in real time to the user, status information on the module running on the IoT edge device.

column2: WEIGHT-BASED CLUSTER TASK SCHEDULING SYSTEM
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a weight-based cluster task scheduling system. The system comprises a database and an embedded framework running on each node of a computer cluster, task files, task configuration parameters and task states are stored in the database, and the embedded framework comprises a task process module, a task processing module and a task process interface; accordingto the invention, the management cost and node resources in the computer cluster can be effectively saved, and the scheduling convenience and efficiency are improved.

column2: TEMPORARY TRAFFIC CONTROL SYSTEM
column4: The utility model relates to a temporary traffic control system, which is arranged at the central position of an intersection, and comprises a detection device used for detecting vehicles to generatevehicle distance information; the control device is connected with the detection device, the control device compares the vehicle distance information with a built-in distance threshold value to judgewhether the vehicle runs the red light or not, and if the vehicle distance information is smaller than the distance threshold value, the control device runs the red light and generates a first controlsignal; if so, not running the red light and not processing; and the recording device is connected with the control device and is used for recording the vehicle according to the first control signalto obtain a red light running picture of the vehicle. The utility model has the advantages of storage capacity demand is little, need not artificial intelligence.

column2: METHOD FOR UPDATING NETWORK PARAMETERS OF INFORMATION PREDICTION NETWORK, DEVICE, MEDIUM AND EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a method for updating network parameters of an information prediction network, a device for updating network parameters of an information prediction network, a computer readablestorage medium and electronic equipment, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence technology. The method comprises the steps as follows: a server collects sample data meeting training requirements and marks original category information to which the sample data belongs; the server determines category information to which the sample data belongs through an information prediction network, and calculates a loss function value between the category information and original category information; the server calculates fitness function values corresponding to network parameters of the information prediction network according to the loss function value, and performs multiple screening processing on the fitness function values to obtain target fitness function values; and the server updates the network parameters of the information prediction network through the target fitness function values. The network parameter updating efficiency can be improved.

column2: METHOD FOR DETERMINING LIGHT SOURCE EMISSION SEQUENCE BASED ON IMAGE SUPERPOSITION IN VISIBLE LIGHT INDOOR POSITIONING
column4: The invention discloses a method for determining a light source emission sequence based on image superposition in visible light indoor positioning, and belongs to the technical field of navigation positioning. The method comprises the following steps of: firstly, adopting PN sequences for emission sequences of all light sources; secondly, performing continuous shooting at a receiving end to obtaina plurality of photos, acquiring the brightness value of each pixel point in each photo, and accumulating the pixel points of the m photos to obtain a processed pixel brightness value; extracting alllight spots on the images and coordinates of the light spots on the images according to an artificial intelligence algorithm; and finally, enabling all positions of the light spots to be in one-to-one correspondence with each picture, and judging the relationship between the pixel brightness value and the threshold M, thus obtaining the emission sequence of each light source. Compared with othermethods for determining the light source emission sequence, the method has the advantages that: the number and positions of the light sources are obtained at a time after the images are superposed, the reliability is improved, the calculated amount is small, and the operation is fast.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND AUGMENTED REALITY-BASED GOLF PRACTICE DEVICE TO ASSIST GOLF SWING PRACTICE
column4:
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a golf practice device for golf swing practice.
SOLUTION: A golf practice device 100 includes a head 110, a shaft, a socket 10 coupled to the shaft and the head, a first magnetic force section 1 provided in the socket, a second magnetic force section 2 provided in the head, and a striking section 3 provided in the head. An attractive force by a magnetic force acts between the first magnetic force section and the second magnetic force section. When a force exceeding the attractive force acts in the direction opposite to the attractive force on the second magnetic force section in the process of practicing a golf swing using the golf practice device, the second magnetic force section collides with the striking section.
SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1
COPYRIGHT: (C)2020,JPO&INPIT

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SHOOTING DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence shooting device. The artificial intelligence shooting device comprises a device body, wherein a solar photovoltaic panel is arranged above the devicebody; a power storage tank is arranged in the device body; a power storage device is arranged in the power storage tank; a shooting device is arranged on the left side of the device body; an intelligent sensing device positioned below the shooting device is further arranged on the left side of the device body; a machine base is arranged below the device body; a first rotating wheel, a second rotating wheel, a third rotating wheel and a fourth rotating wheel are arranged on the outer side of the machine base; a first rotating shaft is rotationally mounted between the first rotating wheel and the second rotating wheel; a second rotating shaft is rotationally mounted between the third rotating wheel and the fourth rotating wheel; and a transmission groove is formed in the machine base. The artificial intelligence shooting device can shoot wild animals by itself, and is provided with a moving device capable of continuously moving towards the wild animals according to observation, so thatthe wild animals can be shot at a short distance, and people can observe the life habits of the wild animals more conveniently.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE OPERATING SHADOWLESS LAMP
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence operating shadowless lamp. The shadowless lamp comprises a shadowless lamp body, the shadowless lamp body is fixed above an operating bed, a microprocessor is installed in the shadowless lamp body, a buzzer and an MIC are fixedly installed in the middle of the bottom of the shadowless lamp body, and at least three circles of LED lamp sets arefixedly installed at the bottom of the shadowless lamp body. Voice instructions are recorded through voice collection, voice is recognized and converted through the voice recognition technology, and converted information is transmitted to the control module to achieve control and adjustment of the operating shadowless lamp. High-intelligence phonetization is achieved, steps of nurses during operation can be reduced, only voice needs to be sent out, operation is quite simple, direct control can be conducted in an operation, and use is convenient; the microprocessor can control the brightness, the color temperature, the light spot gathering, the camera shooting, the deep cavity illumination and other operations of the shadowless lamp, and different requirements for lamplight in the operationprocess are met.

column2: DISPLAY CONTROL METHOD AND TERMINAL EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a display control method and terminal equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence (AI). The display control method can be appliedto the terminal equipment and comprises the steps: in response to a first operation of a user, determining an application program running on the terminal equipment, wherein the first operation is usedfor triggering an interface for displaying the application program running on the terminal equipment; obtaining a display layout mode of the application program; displaying an interface of the application program in a display area corresponding to the display layout mode, wherein the display interface of the terminal equipment comprises display areas respectively corresponding to N display layoutmodes, and N is an integer greater than or equal to 2. By displaying the display areas corresponding to the multiple display layout modes on the display interface of the terminal device, the interfaces of the at least two running application programs can be displayed, and the display effect is improved.

column2: HUMAN-COMPUTER INTERACTION LABELING DEVICE FOR IMAGE AND TEXT INFORMATION EXTRACTION
column4: The utility model is suitable for the technical field of artificial intelligence. The utility model provides a human-computer interaction labeling device for image and text information extraction. Thesystem comprises a bearing unit, an image acquisition unit, a labeling unit and a calculation unit, wherein the bearing unit comprises an objective table and a supporting arm, the objective table isfixedly connected with the supporting arm, the supporting arm is located on the upper surface of the objective table, the image acquisition unit comprises a camera shooting unit, the camera shooting unit is located on one side of the supporting arm, and the camera shooting unit is used for acquiring form data images; for image data of a fixed style, the relative positions of the fields needing tobe marked and the key content to be extracted of the same type of image data are fixed, the marking device can be used for marking the key fields in the image acquisition process, dependence on a complex marking system is reduced, the cost of manual marking is reduced, and the marking efficiency is greatly improved.

column2: FITNESS PLAN GENERATION METHOD AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: An embodiment of the invention discloses a fitness plan generation method. The fitness plan generation method is applied to intelligent electronic equipment comprising a physiological parameter acquisition device, an artificial intelligence chip and a general-purpose processor. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring the body parameters of a user through the physiological parameter acquisition device; forming input data from the body parameters through the general-purpose processor, and transmitting the input data to the artificial intelligence chip; performing neural network operation on the input data through the artificial intelligence chip to obtain an output result; and acquiring a fitness plan corresponding to the body parameters through the general-purpose processor according to the output result. According to the invention, targeted fitness can be achieved, and the fitness experience of the user is improved.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND ASSEMBLY FOR GENERATING THREE-DIMENSIONAL MODEL BASED ON TWO-DIMENSIONAL IMAGE
column4: The invention discloses a data processing method and an assembly for generating a three-dimensional model based on a two-dimensional image. The data processing method comprises the steps of acquiringthree two-dimensional images, namely a first image, a second image and a third image, of a head target, and the included angle between the shooting direction of the first image and the shooting direction of the second image and the included angle between the shooting direction of the third image and the shooting direction of the second image range from 75 degrees to 105 degrees; and acquiring a three-dimensional model of the head target by using the three two-dimensional images through an artificial intelligence algorithm. According to the data processing method and the data processing assembly for generating the three-dimensional model based on the two-dimensional images, the three-dimensional model can be generated by utilizing the three two-dimensional images; the face recognition precision is improved, a 3D model with high image quality can be obtained, the product supports face recognition when the face is completely side by 90 degrees, and the target can still be quickly locked when the camera is too high and the head of the shot target deflects.

column2: METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING INSOLE FOR GOLF SHOES
column4: Disclosed is a method for manufacturing an insole for golf shoes. The method for manufacturing an insole for golf shoes according to one embodiment, in a method for manufacturing an insole for golf shoes based on artificial intelligence, includes storing pre-recorded user prime;s swing images in a storage, converting the stored images into pictures in frame units to generate a first input signal, inputting the generated first input signal to a pre-trained convolutional neural network in the blockchain network through a high-speed Internet network, obtaining a first output signal based on the input, controlling first process equipment based on the acquired first output signal, generating a learning signal based on a correction value input by an administrator of the control device after mounting the insole for golf shoes manufactured as a control result to the user, and training a convolutional neural network based on the learning signal. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: BUILDING EXIT PASSAGEWAY MONITORING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TARGET RECOGNITION
column4: The invention discloses a building exit passageway monitoring system and method based on artificial intelligence target recognition. The system comprises a monitoring camera device, a visual exit passageway management platform, a target recognition module, a configuration module, a judgment module and an alarm module. The monitoring camera device is used for shooting video information of a space area corresponding to the building exit passageway; the target identification module is used for identifying the type and position of a target entering the building exit passageway; the configuration module is used for establishing an electronic fence according to a video shot by the monitoring camera device and a space area corresponding to the building exit passageway; the judgment module is usedfor carrying out compliance judgment according to the electronic fence, the target object type and the target object position; and if the judgment result is non-compliance, an alarm is raised by an alarm module. The problems of disordered sundry stacking, disordered parking, fire fighting access blockage and the like in the building safety access are solved, and the system has the advantages of ensuring smoothness of the building safety access, accurate target object type analysis, high monitoring visual efficiency and the like.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR RUNNING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE APPLICATION AND ENGINE DEVICE
column4: The invention provides a method and system for running an artificial intelligence application and an engine device, and the method comprises the steps: analyzing an executable file of the application,and enabling the executable file to be obtained through the definition of the application based on a template file matched with the engine device; and running the application according to the executable file.

column2: WIDE-AREA FUNDUS IMAGE QUALITY CONTROL METHOD AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to a wide-area fundus image quality control method and an artificial intelligence system. The method comprises the following steps: A1, receiving a wide-area fundus image shot bya wide-area fundus camera, A2, inputting the wide-area fundus image into a trained binary classification model, and judging whether the wide-area fundus image is a low-quality image or not, A3, whenit is judged that the wide-area fundus image is a low-quality image, sending a re-shooting prompt, and A4, judging the number of times of sending the re-shooting prompt, if the number of times does not exceed the preset number of times, returning to the step A1, and if the number of times exceeds the preset number of times, sending a referral prompt. The shot wide-area fundus image is input into the trained binary classification module to judge the quality of the wide-area fundus image, when the image is judged to be a low-quality image, a re-shooting prompt is sent, and therefore real-time and accurate quality control over the quality of the wide-area fundus image is achieved.

column2: TEACHING BEHAVIOR ANALYSIS SYSTEM AND ANALYSIS METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of teaching behavior analysis, and discloses a teaching behavior analysis system and analysis method based on artificial intelligence, which are used for realizing data operation and processing and controlling a main control module of each module to work normally through a main control computer. The teaching video acquisition module is connected with the main control module and is used for acquiring teaching video data through camera shooting; and the teaching behavior identification module is connected with the main control module and is used for identifying the teaching behavior of the teaching video through an identification program. The classroom teaching behavior cloud model is constructed by taking the speech and the activity behavior of the behavior subject as basic units through the teaching interaction analysis module, the cloud model quantitative analysis method for the classroom teaching interaction behavior is provided, and a foundation is laid for finely describing teaching interaction behavior characteristics; meanwhile, evaluation difference caused by personal evaluation is avoided through the teaching quality evaluation module, so that evaluation of the teaching design quality has more basis and credibility.

column2: DETECTION METHOD, DEVICE AND SYSTEM FOR CROSSING GATE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a detection method, device and system for a crossing gate. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-detected video image; determining a gate port area to be detected according to the video image to be detected; processing the to-be-detected gate opening area to obtain human skeleton attitude information; judging whether a gate crossing behavior exists in the gate opening area to be detected or not according to the human body skeleton posture information; and if the gate crossing behavior exists, sending prompt information. By adopting the technical scheme, not only can the cost of detection equipment be reduced, but also the detection precision can be improved.

column2: IC CHIP DEFECT DETECTION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an IC chip defect detection method based on artificial intelligence. The detection method comprises the following steps: equipment preparation: a high-definition camera unit, an AI visual center host and an annular light source; through the annular light source, an IC chip can clearly display defect image features; collecting different types of image features of the IC chipthrough a high-definition camera shooting unit. The IC chip defect detection device has the beneficial effects that the IC chip defect detection efficiency can be improved, and labor intensity of people is reduced; sample data is generated by using GAN, so that an identification model obtained by training massive real pictures is more accurate; through the additional arrangement of a labeling module and an extraction module, labeling of IC chip defect parts is facilitated, and the IC chip image recognition accuracy is improved; when IC chip image feature extraction is carried out, a bilinearinterpolation algorithm is used to zoom a picture, a convolution kernel is used to carry out convolution processing on the image, and reliable extraction of image features is further improved.

column2: SAFETY MONITORING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a safety monitoring system based on artificial intelligence. The safety monitoring system comprises a central controller as well as a gate sensing module, a window sensing module, a human body sensing module, a feature storage module, an early warning module, a child memory module, an indoor shooting module and a background server which are connected with the central controller. Through scientific and reasonable system design, the indoor safety of a user can be monitored safely in real time; the house entry risk of lawbreakers can be effectively reduced; economic lossesare reduced; dangers confronted by children in families can be stopped in time; and life safety is guaranteed. The system is worthy of application and popularization.

column2: METHOD FOR PERFORMING AGGREGATION ANALYSIS ON VEHICLE PERMANENT PARKING POINTS BASED ON PARKING POINT INTERVALS, DURATIONS AND FREQUENCIES
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of vehicle and logistics fleet management, and relates to a method for performing aggregation analysis on vehicle permanent parking points based on parkingpoint intervals, durations and frequencies. The method comprises the following steps of: S1, continuously receiving position and driving information reported by a vehicle-mounted GPS terminal, and performing preliminary analysis to form parking records; S2, obtaining parking points and parking durations in the parking records within 30 days, and obtaining candidate points; S3, setting terms and preset parameters; and S4, obtaining a candidate point cluster for the candidate points in the S2, through a clustering algorithm. With the method of the invention adopted, under a human-free interference condition, a series of parking points without specific meanings are judged and identified, parking points with practical meanings for vehicle are identified in an artificial intelligence analysismode; and therefore, a plurality of permanent parking points with specific meanings in the running process of the vehicle can be obtained, and a powerful logic basis is provided for later vehicle travel merging.

column2: TILT AND BUOYANCY ADJUSTING APPARATUS OF ROBOT FISH
column4: The present invention relates to a robot fish. The robot fish of the present invention configures a buoyancy regulator to inhale or discharge water using a pneumatic cylinder, differentially controls a water inhaling amount to adjust tilt by installing the buoyancy regulator at the front and rear of the center of gravity, and allows buoyancy to be controlled by varying a water inhaling amount. Therefore, the buoyancy and the tilt can be precisely adjusted while swimming. The robot fish is further equipped with a tilt sensor and the buoyancy regulator which can adjust the tilt and the buoyancy together. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED AUTOMATIC CALIBRATION METHOD FOR 3D PRINTING MICRO-NANO DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence based automatic calibration method for a 3D printing micro-nano device. The method comprises the specific steps of importing a calibration ruler original STL file into a printer, and printing a calibration ruler after conventional printer calibration, wherein the calibration ruler has various types of 3D models used for subsequent calibration; carrying out recognition on the calibration ruler printed by the printer through an automatic running image recognition program and a neural network, and accurately calculating the actual size printed bythe printer according to a reference substance; and automatically carrying out size calibration of the 3D models in the printer through an automatic calibration program according to the image recognition program, and giving model modification advice. Through the artificial intelligence based automatic calibration method, the model modification advice can be given quickly after the ruler is printed once, so that the effect is achieved through one step, waste of resources is reduced, and the cost of manpower and material resources is reduced.

column2: SEMANTIC RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: Embodiments of the invention provide a semantic recognition method and device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. The semantic recognition method comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-recognized target statement and inputting the to-be-recognized target statement into a representation model based on a bidirectional encoder; running a representation model based on a bidirectional encoder, and determining entity information and intention information of the target statement; and determining the meaning of the target statement according to the entity information and the intention information. According to the semantic recognition method provided by the invention, the model is represented based on the bidirectional encoder; the intention information is recognized while the entity information of the target statement is recognized, a processing structure for semantic recognition of natural languages in the field of artificial intelligence is changed, an original two-step processing mode is improved into a single-step processing mode, and the recognition efficiency of artificial intelligence on statement meanings is improved to a large extent.

column2: FACE RECOGNITION METHOD, FACE RECOGNITION DEVICE, CLASSIFICATION MODEL TRAINING METHOD, CLASSIFICATION MODEL TRAINING DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a face recognition method, a face recognition device, a classification model training method, a classification model training device and a storage medium, belongs to the technical field of computers, and relates to artificial intelligence and computer vision technologies. The category score values of face features corresponding to target objects are determined according tothe face features of a to-be-recognized image, the first recognition result of the to-be-recognized image is obtained based on the category score values corresponding to the target objects, and the first recognition result is used for indicating the target objects corresponding to the to-be-recognized image. Each target object corresponds to one category, and the face features of the face images of the target objects in different shooting states belong to the categories corresponding to the target objects, so when the category score values of the face features corresponding to the target objects are determined, the category score values of the face features corresponding to the target objects can be determined according to the face features of the face images in different shooting states,and the recognition accuracy of the preset target objects is improved.

column2: POWER SUPPLY SYSTEM FOR AGV
column4: The invention discloses a power supply system for an AGV. The system comprises a vehicle-mounted power supply. An output end of the vehicle-mounted power supply is electrically connected with input ends of a plurality of transformers, the output ends of the plurality of transformers are electrically connected with the input end of a wiring terminal, the wiring terminal is a pluggable wiring terminal, and the wiring terminal is electrically connected with a servo motor through a relay. A vehicle-mounted power supply carries out delay protection through the relay so that possible damage to coreparts in the AGV during accidental faults such as a voltage fluctuation, an overlarge current and the like is prevented; the plurality of transformers are arranged so that power can be supplied to components with different power supply adaptation standards, and a requirement of an integrated system of a complex type is met; and the wiring terminal is the pluggable wiring terminal, and a power supply scheme can be adjusted at any time according to addition and subtraction of the components.

column2: TRAFFIC ROAD MONITORING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a traffic road monitoring device based on artificial intelligence. The invention relates to the technical field of traffic road monitoring. The device comprises a supporting base and a fixing rod fixedly arranged at the upper end of the supporting base; a supporting transverse frame is arranged at the upper end of the fixing rod. A connecting rod is fixedly arranged at thebottom end of the supporting transverse frame; one end of the connecting rod is fixedly connected with a monitoring base; a camera is fixedly arranged at one end of the monitoring base; a temperaturesensor is fixedly arranged at the other end of the monitoring base; a smog sensor is fixedly arranged on the side, close to the temperature sensor, of the upper end of the monitoring base. According to the invention, the road temperature and the air smog condition can be monitored in real time, when the temperature is lower than a preset value and the road surface is frozen or air smog seriously affects the driving view, a traffic signal lamp can display and remind cautious slow driving in time, and when urban outage is needed and the traffic light stops running, the traffic signal lamp can betemporarily used as the traffic light for indicating and controlling traffic.

column2: POWER DISTRIBUTION NETWORK OVERCURRENT PROTECTION METHOD BASED ON DEEP REINFORCEMENT LEARNING
column4: The invention discloses a power distribution network overcurrent protection method based on deep reinforcement learning. The method comprises the steps: starting protection, and judging whether current quick-break protection in a cycle acts or not: determining that constant value optimization does not need to be performed if the current quick-break protection does not act; if the current quick-break protection action is performed, carrying out constant value optimization; determining an optimal constant value according to an MA-DDPG algorithm after training is completed; judging a size relationship between a current effective value and the optimal constant value; if the current effective value is greater than the optimal constant value, making a protection outlet act; if the current effective value is less than or equal to the optimal constant value, judging the size relationship between the current and a starting value; if the current is less than the starting value, returning protection; otherwise, returning to a step of judging whether the current quick-break protection in one cycle acts or not and carrying out circulation. In the invention, a content of deep reinforcement learning is applied to the field of relay protection for the first time, and an artificial intelligence technology and a traditional relay protection technology are combined to improve protection efficiency.

column2: WEBPAGE SCENE RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a webpage scene recognition method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and the method can comprise the steps: constructing a feature library according to webpage element features in different webpage scenes; for a to-be-identified webpage scene, when a to-be-processed webpage is in a running state afterbeing opened, acquiring webpage elements in the to-be-processed webpage; for any webpage element, obtaining feature information of all features of the webpage element in the webpage scene from a webpage, and determining whether the webpage element conforms to the webpage scene or not by comparing the obtained feature information with corresponding feature information in a feature library, whereinthe corresponding feature information is feature information obtained after condition configuration is carried out on features in the webpage scene in a feature library. By applying the scheme of theinvention, the accuracy of the identification result can be improved.

column2: CABLE CLIMBING ROBOT AND RECYCLING METHOD
column4: The invention provides a cable climbing robot and a recycling method, and provides a cable climbing robot. The cable climbing robot comprises a rack, a butt joint assembly and at least three sets of driving assemblies, and the butt joint assembly comprises a first butt joint part and a second butt joint part; each driving assembly comprises two driving mechanisms, each driving mechanism comprisesa rotating base, a limiting adjusting structure, a driving wheel and a driving structure, the limiting adjusting structures can fix the rotating bases or limit the rotating angles of the rotating bases, the driving structures are assembled on the rotating bases and connected with the driving wheels, and the driving wheels are driven by the driving structures to rotate. The recycling method comprises the steps that the cable climbing robot serves as a rescue robot to be in butt joint with the faulted cable climbing robot, and then the faulted cable climbing robot is pulled back to the recyclingposition. The cable climbing robot can linearly climb the cable and is convenient and rapid to recover when a fault occurs, the detection quality and efficiency are improved, and the recovery cost isreduced.

column2: CONTROL APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR SWIMMING OF ROBOT FISH
column4: Provided are an apparatus and a method of controlling swimming for a robotic fish. The robotic fish, which is operated in a narrow space like an aquarium, often hits the outer wall during submerging or upwardly swimming. In order to solve this problem, the present invention provides an inclination adjusting means, which adjusts the inclination while generating the rotational propulsive force, it is possible to do smooth submergence and upwardly swimming in the narrow space.

column2: GAS SENSING DEVICE FOR WORK SITE SAFETY
column4: The present invention relates to a gas sensing device for work site safety. The present invention is to forestall accidents and analyze hazard prediction. The present invention includes: a first unit provided at a work site place where gas leakage or oxygen deficiency is likely to occur, measuring in real time the risk of gas leakage or oxygen deficiency for workers at the work site and by comparison with a preset data value, and sending a danger signal to the worker at the work site receiving the danger signal (hereinafter, the worker) and other workers farther than the worker in the event of danger detection; a communicable second unit portable by each of the workers, receiving a signal including the danger signal from the first unit, blinking in different colors in different stages or situations, vibrating at different strengths in different stages or situations, and allowing the workers to sense the vibration; and a third unit provided outside the work site or in the work site where radio wave limitation or failure may occur, capable of relay and two-way communication between the first and second units, and turning the measured values of the first and second units into a database or transmitting to the first and second units the danger signal derived from the result of analysis of the measured value by means of an incorporated meter and artificial intelligence. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: MEDICAL AUXILIARY DIAGNOSIS METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a medical auxiliary diagnosis method, and relates to the technical field of data sharing. The method is based on a local server for storing patient medical data, an auxiliary diagnosis platform running in the local server, and a remote center server for storing patient treatment information. The auxiliary diagnosis platform is deployed in the local server, and comprises a data retrieval module and a data uploading module, the data retrieval module retrieves medical data of the local server, the data uploading module uploads the medical data of a patient to the local server for storage, and the data uploading module also extracts doctor-seeing information of the patient and uploads the doctor-seeing information to a remote center server; the remote center server establishes an index relationship with the medical data stored in the local server, and when the local server sends a request to the remote center server, the remote center server carries out searching according to the index relationship, and searches and obtains the medical data of a patient in the target server through the data retrieval module. The invention further discloses a medical auxiliary diagnosis system which is combined with the method to realize information sharing among different medical institutions.

column2: INTELLIGENT REFRIGERATOR BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides an intelligent refrigerator based on artificial intelligence. The intelligent refrigerator based on artificial intelligence comprises five main parts, namely an image shooting module 2, a voice recognition module 5, a calculation display module 3, an information networking module 4, a freezing and cold storage module 1 and the like, can take pictures of articles while peopleput the articles into or take the articles out of the refrigerator, carries out artificial intelligence recognition on the pictures, recognizes the names of the frozen and cold-stored articles, and assists in determining the names and numbers of the articles through voice recognition, and displays the storage time limit and associated warnings on a displayer 9.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IDENTIFICATION MIXING TANK DEFECT DETECTION DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence identification mixing tank defect detection device. The utility model belongs to the field of automatic detection, conveyor belt, a supporting frame is arranged on one side of the conveying belt. The support frame is connected with a detection barrel; wherein the conveying belt penetrates through the detection barrel, a camera fixing plate isarranged on the outer wall of the detection barrel, a camera is arranged on the camera fixing plate, the camera is located above the conveying belt, a lens is arranged at the front end of the camera,a through hole is formed in the side wall of the detection barrel, the lens is aligned with the through hole, and a light source is arranged in the detection barrel. According to the device, through the four cameras forming the 90-degree included angle, 360-degree dead-angle-free shooting can be conducted on products, AI character recognition is conducted on characters on the tank body, whether the products are mixed with the tank or not is judged, the tank mixing products are removed in time, automatic online detection is achieved, and the production efficiency of the food industry is improved.

column2: QUESTION DETERMINATION METHOD, APPARATUS AND DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a question determination method, apparatus and device, and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining text information in a question selection box and finger coordinates of a finger of a user in an exercise page, and enabling the question selection box to be contained in the exercise page and to be determined according to the finger coordinates; determining boundary coordinates of each exercise question in the question selection box according to the text information; and determining a target exercise question selected by the user according to the boundary coordinates and the finger coordinates. By the adoption of the scheme, the technical problem that in the prior art, when a selection box contains questions of multiple exercises, the questions of the exercises to be searched cannot be accurately determined can be solved.

column2: ANTI-SCATTERING GRATING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the field of image processing. The invention provides an anti-scattering grating method and device based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps: inputtinga preprocessed X-ray photographed image into a deep learning convolutional neural network model, so as to enable the deep learning convolutional neural network model to estimate the impact on the X-ray photographed image from scattering, and obtaining an estimated residual image; restoring the estimated residual image by using the gray interval of the X-ray shot image to obtain an absolute residual image; and performing summation processing on the absolute residual image and the X-ray shooting image to obtain an estimated image with scattering influence deducted. According to the method, a result image after the scattering influence is removed is estimated through a deep learning convolutional neural network model, so that tissue fine textures hidden in an image background due to the scattering fog influence can be effectively displayed; and the method can effectively replace a physical grating to improve the X-ray imaging quality, Meanwhile, adverse effects caused by the existence ofthe physical grating are avoided.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TREADMILL FOR ASSISTING RUNNING
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence treadmill for assisting in running. The artificial intelligence treadmill comprises a machine body; a supporting rod and a load bearing box are fixedly arranged on the top face of the machine body. A display panel is fixedly arranged on the top surface of the supporting rod; handrails are fixedly arranged on the right side face of the supporting rod in a front-back symmetry mode. Through a compression spring which can adjust the elastic force, weight-bearing running can be carried out on the treadmill; compared with a traditional treadmill, the treadmill has the advantages that the functionality can be increased, meanwhile, the angle of a treadmill body can be adjusted, the running modes in different environments can be simulated, meanwhile, the concept of artificial intelligence is integrated, and the danger that people are thrown out by the treadmill due to falling can be effectively prevented.

column2: CLOUD RESOURCE MANAGEMENT USING EXTERNALLY-SOURCED DATA
column4: A processing device can make use of an Artificial Intelligence (AI) model to make projections about resource usage based on data from external sources. The processing device can then adjust cloud-based resources accordingly. The cluster resource allocation can be adjusted as examples, by increasing, decreasing, or maintaining a number of nodes allocated to a cluster, by increasing, decreasing, or maintaining the number of pods assigned to an application or a container running in a cluster, or by increasing, decreasing, or maintaining central processing unit (CPU) resource, memory, disk storage, or a replication factor assigned to a pod.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR OBJECT CLASSIFICATION
column4: Provided are a method for object classification, relating to the field of artificial intelligence, and specifically relating to the fields of computer hearing and computer vision. The method comprises: during a training process, constructing an end-cloud combination object classification model; training the end-cloud combination object classification model according to at least one training object; and storing the trained cloud model and end model. During a reasoning process, an end computing device runs an end model to obtain an end model reasoning result; when the confidence of the end model reasoning result is less than or equal to a threshold, a feature vector output by the end model is sent to a cloud model running on the cloud computing device, and reasoning is carried out on the feature vector, output by the end model and sent by the end computing device, on the cloud computing device according to the cloud model so as to obtain a cloud model reasoning result; and when the confidence level of the end model reasoning result is greater than the threshold, the end model outputs an end model reasoning result. By means of the end-cloud combination object classification method, the accuracy of object classification is improved.

column2: SWARM SYSTEM INCLUDING AN OPERATOR CONTROL SECTION ENABLING OPERATOR INPUT OF MISSION OBJECTIVES AND RESPONSES TO ADVICE REQUESTS FROM A HETEROGENEOUS MULTI-AGENT POPULATION INCLUDING INFORMATION FUSION, CONTROL DIFFUSION, AND OPERATOR INFUSION AGENTS THAT CONTROLS PLATFORMS, EFFECTORS, AND SENSORS
column4: Systems and methods are provided in relation to a complex adaptive command guided swarm system that includes an operator section comprising a first command and control section and a plurality of networked swarm of semi-autonomously agent controlled system of systems platforms (SAASoSP). The first command and control section includes a user interface, computer system, network interface, a plurality of command and control systems executed or running on the computer system. The plurality of networked SAASoSPs include embodiments comprising a second control section, sensors, network/communication section, and equipment, wherein the second control section includes an artificial intelligence, integrated information fusion/control diffusion (AIIIFCD) enabled control sections comprising pattern recognition, a machine learning system with stored pattern identification and new pattern identification and storage system, the second control section further comprising a system adapted to receive a range of operator inputs including at least a range of high level mission objective data to actual control inputs to one or more elements of one or more of the SAASOSP.

column2: PREDICTIVE ANALYTICS METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR POSITIVELY ADJUSTING FITNESS AND/OR WELL-BEING CONDITIONING
column4: A system and method of predictive analytics that assesses multiple causal factors to a target outcome, determines the relationship and significance of those causal factors to the target outcome, and permits adjustment of a conditioning, wellness and/or athletic training program to more effectively approach or achieve the target outcome. Artificial intelligence tools are disclosed for aiding in determining the relationship and significance of the causal factors and for improving accuracy and predictive success.
