Causal factors may be physiological or non-physiological, and the system and method of the present invention may be applied to a team or individual.

column2: ELECTRONIC DEVICE AND ASSISTANT SERVICE PROVIDING METHOD THEREOF
column4: An electronic device is disclosed. According to the present invention, the electronic device comprises a communication unit, a memory, and a processor connected to the communication unit and the memory and controlling the electronic device. By executing at least one instruction stored in the memory, the processor transmits information about a user voice acquired by the electronic device to a plurality of servers providing different secretary services through the communication unit when a user input for running a secretary service is received, and provides, when a plurality of response information is received from the plurality of servers, a response for the user voice based on at least one piece of the plurality of received response information. The plurality of servers provide secretary services using an artificial intelligence agent. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: CONTROL METHOD, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT, COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM AND CHIP
column4: The invention relates to the field of computer vision, and discloses a control method, electronic equipment, a computer readable storage medium, a computer program product and a chip, so as to solve the technical problem of poor quality of an image acquired by a camera of the electronic equipment in the prior art. The method comprises the steps: enabling first electronic equipment to obtain a shooting instruction; according to the shooting instruction, determining position information or a shooting mode of the to-be-shot content corresponding to the shooting instruction, and based on the position information or the shooting mode of the to-be-shot content, determining the camera with the most appropriate shooting position of the to-be-shot content as a target camera from at least two cameras which can be controlled by the to-be-shot content, wherein the cameras comprise a camera on the first electronic equipment and a camera on the second electronic equipment, and the first electronic equipment is different from the second electronic equipment; and enabling the first electronic equipment to control the target camera to execute the shooting instruction to obtain image data collectedby the target camera. The method can be applied to artificial intelligence equipment.

column2: METHOD FOR DIAGNOSTIC CONTROL OVER WORKSHOP TEMPERATURE AND HUMIDITY BASED ON THERMAL IMAGING TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a method for diagnostic control over workshop temperature and humidity based on a thermal imaging technology, and belongs to the technical field of cigarette manufacturing. Based on thermal imaging and an artificial intelligence-image identification diagnostic technology, temperature use in a large air conditioner area is subjected to monitoring, through independent adjusting of multiple air supply doors of an air conditioner, air supply door independent adjusting is achieved, and temperature and humidity stability and uniformity in the air conditioner area can be improved. The method is small in investment cost, and stable and reliable in running, and in conclusion, the method is the most effective and economical air conditioner running improving technology at present.

column2: MULTI-SCENE DIGESTIVE TRACT ENDOSCOPIC IMAGE RECOGNITION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of image recognition, and discloses a multi-scene digestive tract endoscopic image recognition method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a data sample of a digestive tract endoscope image, marking a shooting part of the image for the data sample, checking a scene, and marking a segmentation region ofa lesion; training a corresponding shooting part recognition model/inspection scene recognition module based on the data sample set of the same shooting part/inspection scene; aiming at the combination of each shooting part and each examination scene, training to obtain a lesion identification model of the corresponding shooting part in the corresponding examination scene; for a to-be-identifiedendoscopic image, identifying a shooting part and an examination scene through a corresponding identification model, selecting a lesion identification model of the corresponding shooting part in the corresponding examination scene, and identifying a lesion part is identified. According to the scheme, the accuracy of identification and the generalization ability of the system can be improved.

column2: MOTION DESTINATION RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a motion destination recommendation method and related equipment. The method is applied to the intelligent electronic equipment comprising an image acquisition device, an artificial intelligence chip, a destination determination device and a destination recommendation device, and the method comprises the following steps: executing multiple shooting operations on a moving object through the image acquisition device to obtain multiple target images of the moving object; determining target sports clothing information and/or target sports equipment information of the sports object through an artificial intelligence chip according to the plurality of target images; determining a target sports item matched with the sports object through a destination determination device according to the target sports clothing information and/or the target sports equipment information, and obtaining a target sports destination corresponding to the target sports itemaccording to a pre-stored mapping relationship between the sports item and the sports destination; and recommending the target motion destination through the destination recommendation device. By adopting the embodiment of the invention, the efficiency and intelligence of recommending the motion destination can be improved.

column2: HUMAN BODY ACTION THREE-DIMENSIONAL DATA ACQUISITION AND REPRODUCTION PROCESSING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to a human body action three-dimensional data acquisition and reproduction processing method and system. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a human body action image comprising a plurality of different angles; generating mapping information; performing three-dimensional human body model reconstruction on the image data set; performing bone extraction on the reconstructed three-dimensional human body model by using a bone extraction algorithm to obtain a three-dimensional human body model bound with bones; acquiring a human body motion video stream, extracting human body actions through a deep learning algorithm, and fusing the extracted human body actions into the three-dimensional human body model bound with the skeleton to generate a human body model with actions; reproducing three-dimensional human actions. The system comprises an image data acquisition unit, a human body model three-dimensional reconstruction unit, a human body action model generation unit, a human body action three-dimensional model reproduction unit and a data storage unit. According to the invention, the accuracy of calculating the human body actions by the model is improved, and necessary support is provided for acquisition and reproduction of various human body actions.

column2: INSECT TYPE IDENTIFICATION EQUIPMENT AND SYSTEM
column4: The embodiment of the utility model discloses insect type identification equipment and an insect type identification system. The equipment comprises an artificial intelligence AI calculation unit, a camera module, a communication module and a pest control device, the camera module is used for shooting an image containing insects; the AI calculation unit is used for carrying out type identificationon insects in the image and sending a type identification result to the cloud server through the communication module, so that the cloud server sends a pest and disease damage alarm signal based on the type identification result to warn a worker; the pest control device is used for controlling pests according to the type recognition result. The equipment can recognize insect types in time, conveniently master crop conditions, prevent and control plant diseases and insect pests and save manpower.

column2: INTELLIGENT SCOREBOARD SPECIAL FOR BADMINTON
column4: The intelligent scoreboard special for the badminton comprises a bottom plate, a supporting frame is arranged in the middle of the upper portion of the bottom plate, a containing box is arranged on the upper portion of the right side of the bottom plate, and a first support, a second support and a third support are sequentially arranged on the supporting frame from bottom to top. A supporting frame is arranged in the middle of the upper portion of a bottom plate. The supporting frame is sequentially provided with a first support, a second support and a third support from bottom to top. The first support, the second support and the third support are all of a triangular structure. Foul counting display screens and score display screens are arranged on three outer side walls of the first bracket; a plurality of competition team name display screens are arranged above the first support, electronic watch display screens are arranged on the three outer side walls of the second support, competition section display screens are arranged on the three outer side walls of the third support, audiences in all directions can conveniently and clearly know badminton competition conditions through the structure, and the use effect is good.

column2: MULTI-ROTOR UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE FOR DUTY
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of unmanned aerial vehicles, and discloses a multi-rotor unmanned aerial vehicle for on-duty, which comprises a vehicle body, the upper ends of the four corners of the vehicle body are rotatably connected with vehicle arms through rotating shafts, the two sides of the bottom end of the vehicle body are rotatably connected with supporting legs through rotating shafts, and the middle part of the bottom end of the vehicle body is fixedly connected with a mounting frame through screws. The vehicle body and the motor are rotationally connected through the vehicle arms; therefore, the vehicle arms can be conveniently folded and stored; the connecting rod and the machine body are extruded through the spring column; therefore, the vehicle arms can be ensured to be in a stable state in the stretching process; the arms are prevented from rotating in the working process of the unmanned aerial vehicle; safety accidents are caused, the safety of theunmanned aerial vehicle is improved, the motor drives the hoop to rotate, the angle of the camera can be changed, shooting in different directions is facilitated, the hoop and the camera are fixedly connected through the hand-screwed bolt, and therefore the cameras of different types can be conveniently disassembled and assembled, and use is convenient.

column2: LOCAL AREA TERRAIN ORTHOIMAGE RAPID CONSTRUCTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE
column4: The invention discloses a local area terrain orthoimage rapid construction method and a local area terrain orthoimage rapid construction system based on an unmanned aerial vehicle. The local area terrain orthoimage rapid construction method specifically comprises the steps that an unmanned aerial vehicle module receives a shooting instruction, the unmanned aerial vehicle module carries out aerialphotography and sends real-time images, the real-time images sent by the unmanned aerial vehicle module are received and spliced, and a three-dimensional digital map is updated in real time. Accordingto the local area terrain orthoimage rapid construction method and the local area terrain orthoimage rapid construction system based on the unmanned aerial vehicle, a target area is shot by means ofthe unmanned aerial vehicle, a server receives the images in real time and carries out image splicing, and the spliced high-precision images can be updated in real time in a three-dimensional digitalearth. The most significant property of the method and the system is real-time performance, and the method and the system have important application prospect for emergency rescue and disaster relief,military reconnaissance and other scenes needing to construct a target area environment quickly.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING AN ALERT USING TAGS ON DELIVERING DIGITAL CONTENT
column4: The present invention discloses a system and method for providing an alert when an interesting segment is imminent during the delivery of a digital content such as, for example, the beginning of a play during a football game, to direct the focus of one or more viewers towards the digital content. The present invention is further configured to embed a commercial message in conjunction with the alert on directing the focus of the viewers. The alerts and commercial messages are inserted by the use of industry standard tags such as those defined by Society of Cable Telecommunications Engineers (SCTE) standards SCTE 35 and SCTE 104. The tags are subsequently replaced by the required alert and commercial message media files at some point in the delivery path of the digital content. The system is adapted to activate the alert either manually or automatically. Further, the system is optionally implemented with an artificial intelligence (AI) system, which is trained using deep learning to recognize the appropriate time to automatically trigger the alert/commercial message sequence. The AI system could be trained by monitoring the manual control of alert activation.

column2: DANCING ROOM SERVICE SYSTEM AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to a dancing room service system which recognizes user prime;s motion from a music video image or an image photographed through a camera based on artificial intelligence (AI) and deep learning and accumulating a large amount of data about dance or a game in accordance with recognition of the user prime;s motion to recognize and compare motions related to the user prime;s dance or game in real-time based on the accumulated data and calculate and display a score, and a method thereof. To this end, the dancing room service system comprises: the camera photographing a user inside a room in real-time; a microphone receiving and transferring user prime;s audio to an image control and motion recognition unit; a central control unit controlling and managing a program or application related to operation of the dancing room service system; the image control and motion recognition unit measuring music rhythm of a reference image, storing time data of the rhythm, loading reference motion recognition data of an object in accordance with the time data of the rhythm, acquiring real-time user motion recognition data related to the dance or the game from an image photographed by the camera of the dancing room; calculating the score through comparison between the real-time user motion recognition data and the reference motion recognition data, and outputting a reference image, the image photographed by the camera, and the score on a video screen or linking the same with an online server; an image output unit displaying the image; a speaker outputting the audio; and a user interface unit for enabling the user to select a music video. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLING AND MANAGING A PROCESS WITHIN AN ENVIRONMENT USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNIQUES AND RELATIVE METHOD
column4: A system (100) for controlling and managing a process within an environment (A) by means of artificial intelligence techniques, the environment (A) comprising a plurality of components (101 ) for monitoring a scene of the environment, each component of said plurality (101) being configured to provide a piece of information (I) representative of a scene of the environment (A). The system (100) comprises: a data communication interface module (102) operatively connected to the plurality of components (101) for monitoring a scene of the environment (A); an object classification and recognition module (103), based on one or more neural networks (104), operatively connected to the data communication interface module (102), said object recognition and classification module (103) being configured to extrapolate in real time, by means of the running of one or more neural networks (104), from a piece of information (I) representative of a scene of the environment (A) provided by one of the monitoring components of the plurality of components (101) for monitoring a scene of the environment (A), a plurality of attributes representative of an object detected within the scene of the environment (A); an object mapping and localizing module (107), operatively connected to the object classification and recognition module (103), said mapping and localizing module (107) being configured to generate, on the basis of the plurality of attributes representative of an object within a scene of the environment (A) extrapolated for the object recognized and classified by the object recognition and classification module (103), geographical coordinates representative of the absolute position of the object; a process control and management module (105), operatively connected to the object recognition and classification module (103), said process control and management module (105) being configured to determine a process control command (CS), by combining the geographical coordinates representative of the absolute position of the object detected within the scene of the environment (A) with set process control rules, the process control and management module (105) being configured to provide the determined process control command (CS) to at least one process control component (101) which the environment (A) is provided with.

column2: COMPUTER NETWORK MODELING
column4: Disclosed is a computer-based method for automatically detecting characteristics of a computer system that includes different running computers connected by a digital communication network. The methodincludes receiving machine-readable information about the computers, including information services and software, and building and storing a machine-readable model based on the received information.The model can be a stratified machine-readable model of the software, services, and further computer aspects. The method can also include updating the model and responding to user commands to access both stored and updated models, and/or displaying tagged and/or filtered visual representations of the model to the user. A learning method can be applied to the network using the machine-readable model, with the applying accessing artificial intelligence tags for the model, and associating artificial intelligence tags to elements of the model based on the application of the learning model to the network.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR IMPROVED OPERATIONS OF SKI LIFTS
column4: Systems and methods for improved operations of ski lifts increase skier safety at on-boarding and off-boarding locations by providing an always-on, always-alert system that ?œwatches??these locations, identifies developing problem situations, and initiates mitigation actions. One or more video cameras feed live video to a video processing module. The video processing module feeds resulting sequences of images to an artificial intelligence (AI) engine. The AI engine makes an inference regarding existence of a potential problem situation based on the sequence of images. This inference is fed to an inference processing module, which determines if the inference processing module should send an alert or interact with the lift motor controller to slow or stop the lift.

column2: ANTI-DROWNING INTELLIGENT IDENTIFYING AND POSITIONING DEVICE FOR SWIMMING POOL
column4: The utility model discloses an anti-drowning intelligent identification and positioning device for a swimming pool. The utility model relates to the field of early warning equipment, the swimming capcomprises a swimming cap body, a positioning device, an industrial camera and a visual controller. The swimming pool anti-drowning intelligent recognition and positioning device is characterized in that the swimming pool anti-drowning intelligent recognition and positioning device comprises a positioning device, an industrial camera and a visual controller, the positioning device is embedded intoone side of the interior of a swimming cap, the industrial camera is arranged around a swimming pool and connected with the visual controller, and the components form the whole swimming pool anti-drowning intelligent recognition and positioning device through a specific assembly connection relation. Compared with an existing anti-drowning technology, the anti-drowning intelligent recognition and positioning device introduces an artificial intelligence technology into the anti-drowning auxiliary equipment, and intelligent monitoring and danger judgment of swimmers are achieved.

column2: VIDEO FACE REPLACEMENT METHOD BASED ON ILLUMINATION MIGRATION
column4: The invention relates to a video face replacement method based on illumination migration, and the method comprises the steps: 1, face detection and recognition: carrying out the positioning of a replaced target face faceA in a face replacement video, recognizing a face feature value, positioning a plurality of key points of a face, and determining the angle deviation information of the face; positioning the replacement face faceB, identifying a face feature value, and detecting a plurality of key points of the face; step 2, determining a transformation matrix, positioning and detecting face information of the face-changing video, extracting features, extracting features featureA, and finding out a matrix transferA which needs distortion transformation and is obtained by converting the featureA into the featureA; step 3, face replacement: carrying out transferA-based transformation on the face B, restoring the face B to a shooting angle of a face changing video to form new face information face B, and replacing the feature A by using the feature B; and step 4, illumination migration: applying an illumination migration algorithm to obtain a final result of video face replacement. Themethod can be widely applied and popularized to computer vision, visual design, digital entertainment, film production and the like.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LAMP
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence lamp. Threaded holes are formed in the surface of the bottom of a lamp holder of the lamp body in the circumferential direction. The lampshade isof a semicircular structure, and the wide end of the lampshade extends outwards to form a threaded protruding part. The threaded protruding part is fixedly engaged with the threaded hole through a thread. Limiting through holes are formed in the two sides of the lamp holder. Springs are fixedly connected into the limiting through holes. The end part of the spring is fixedly connected to the convex limiting part; the edge of the convex limiting part is in sliding connection with the limiting through hole; lamp bead threaded holes are formed in the lampshade. The lamp bead threaded holes are fixedly connected with the lamp beads; a control assembly is arranged in the lamp holder; an illumination sensor and an infrared sensor of the control assembly are both fixed to the surface of a lamp holder, a circuit board is arranged in the lamp holder, a relay is integrated on the circuit board, a lamp bead is electrically connected with the circuit board, the illumination sensor and the infraredsensor are electrically connected with the relay through an AND gate logic device, and the relay is electrically connected with the lamp bead. According to the utility model, more energy is saved.

column2: APPARATUS FOR PROVIDING PUTTING LINE USING DRONE FOR GOLF AND GOLF BALL MARKER, AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: According to the present specification, one embodiment relates to a method for providing a putting line using a drone for golf and a golf ball marker based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: receiving, from an image sensor of the drone, image data of a putting green including a ball marker and a hole cup; obtaining pixel data including location information of the ball marker and the hole cup based on the image data of a putting green, using a previously-learned hole cup discrimination model; generating distance data between the ball marker and the hole cup from the pixel data; receiving stereoscopic image data including the hole cup from a stereo camera unit of the ball marker; generating gradient data between the ball marker and the hole cup based on the stereoscopic image data; obtaining image data in which a putting line between the ball marker and the hole cup is displayed based on the distance data and the gradient data, using a previously-learned putting line generation model; and transmitting the image data in which the putting line is displayed to a user prime;s terminal. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: INTELLIGENT RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses an intelligent recommendation method and related equipment applied to the intelligent electronic equipment comprising an information acquisition device, a personalized acquisition device, an artificial intelligence chip and a personalized recommendation device. The method comprises the following steps: executing an operation of obtaining fitness information on a to-be-tested object through the information acquisition device to obtain target fitness information of the to-be-tested object; executing an operation of obtaining personal hobbies on the to-be-tested object through the personalized collection device to obtain a first personal hobby set corresponding to the to-be-tested object; determining a second personal hobby set recommended to the to-be-tested object through an artificial intelligence chip according to the target fitness information and the first personal hobby set; and recommending the second personal hobby set through the personalized recommendation device. By adopting the embodiment of the invention, the accuracy of recommending personal hobbies to the to-be-tested object is improved, and then the motion experience of the to-be-tested object is improved.

column2: COACHING, ASSESSING OR ANALYSING UNSEEN PROCESSES IN INTERMITTENT HIGH-SPEED HUMAN MOTIONS, INCLUDING GOLF SWINGS
column4: The system automatically or partly automatically coaches and assesses a non-putting golf swing to increase the strength or distance of the swing. Increases are coached in the components of energy generated across specific individual joints of the player's body during the downswing. Increases are also coached in the efficiency at which the generated energy is transmitted to the clubhead. Fast or near-instantaneous feedback is provided to the player, based on measured changes in the components of energy generated in the specific individual joints and on the efficiency at which the generated energy is transmitted to the clubhead. Changes in 3D positions of the player's body segments or joints are tracked by inertial sensors or optical sensors and used in the calculation of the components of energy generated across the specific individual joints utilising an artificial intelligence system.

column2: COACHING, ASSESSING OR ANALYSING UNSEEN PROCESSES IN INTERMITTENT HIGH-SPEED HUMAN MOTIONS, INCLUDING GOLF SWINGS
column4: The system automatically or partly automatically coaches and assesses a non-putting golf swing to increase the strength or distance of the swing. Increases are coached in the components of energy generated across specific individual joints of the player's body during the downswing. Increases are also coached in the efficiency at which the generated energy is transmitted to the clubhead. Fast or near-instantaneous feedback is provided to the player, based on measured changes in the components of energy generated in the specific individual joints and on the efficiency at which the generated energy is transmitted to the clubhead. Changes in 3D positions of the player's body segments or joints are tracked by inertial sensors or optical sensors and used in the calculation of the components of energy generated across the specific individual joints utilising an artificial intelligence system.

column2: COACHING, ASSESSING OR ANALYSING UNSEEN PROCESSES IN INTERMITTENT HIGH-SPEED HUMAN MOTIONS, INCLUDING GOLF SWINGS
column4: The system automatically or partly automatically coaches and assesses a non-putting golf swing to increase the strength or distance of the swing. Increases are coached in the components of energy generated across specific individual joints of the player's body during the downswing. Increases are also coached in the efficiency at which the generated energy is transmitted to the clubhead. Fast or near-instantaneous feedback is provided to the player, based on measured changes in the components of energy generated in the specific individual joints and on the efficiency at which the generated energy is transmitted to the clubhead. Changes in 3D positions of the player's body segments or joints are tracked by inertial sensors or optical sensors and used in the calculation of the components of energy generated across the specific individual joints utilising an artificial intelligence system.

column2: ELECTRIC VEHICLE BATTERY FAULT DIAGNOSIS METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an electric vehicle power battery fault diagnosis method and device based on artificial intelligence. The method aims at solving the safety problem in the running process of anelectric vehicle, and preventing major personnel injuries and property losses caused by power battery faults. The method comprises the following steps: performing fault tree analysis on a power battery, utilizing wavelet packet decomposition to extract fault characteristics of the power battery, and then establishing an electric vehicle power battery fault diagnosis model based on an LSTM neuralnetwork; and training the neural network through historical data of an ion battery (the data is classified into marked fault types), after an expected diagnosis result is obtained, inputting battery data collected in real time into the neural network for classification diagnosis, and performing continuous self-learning on the neural network. The fault diagnosis precision of the battery pack can beimproved, and the safety of the electric vehicle in the driving process is ensured.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXERCISE AUXILIARY EQUIPMENT
column4: Relating to the technical field of wheelchairs, the invention discloses artificial intelligence exercise auxiliary equipment. The equipment includes a seat cushion, a bracket is fixedly connected under the cushion to support the whole equipment, bearing plates are movably connected to lateral sides of the seat cushion, through use of hook and loop fasteners can achieve fixation of feet, the ankleexercise can be more stable, thus avoiding incomplete training caused by loosening in the training process, through the cooperative use of swing rods and the bearing plates, legs can be trained in theexercise process, and the up-and-down movement of shanks drives the knees to do training synchronously, thus increasing the functions of the whole equipment, the cooperative use of movable plates andpedals can drive foot sole to automatically swing up and down, thus reaching the purpose of automatic ankle training, and the use of special-shaped wheels enables the equipment to climb stairs, therefore the whole equipment is more intelligent.

column2: LENS ROTATING STRUCTURE
column4: The utility model discloses a lens rotating structure. The structure comprises a main lens support, an auxiliary lens support, a main support limiting sheet, an auxiliary support limiting sheet and adamping rotating shaft. Wherein the main lens bracket is used for mounting a main lens; the auxiliary lens support is used for installing an auxiliary lens, the main support limiting piece is fixedlyconnected with the lower end of the main lens support, the auxiliary support limiting piece is fixedly connected with the upper end of the auxiliary lens support, one end of the damping rotating shaftis fixed to the inner side of the main support limiting piece, and the other end of the damping rotating shaft is fixed to the inner side of the auxiliary support limiting piece. An L-shaped clampingposition is arranged at one corner of the upper end of the main support limiting piece, the L-shaped clamping position is composed of two sheets which are different in length and are not located in the same plane, an L-shaped clamping groove is dug in one corner of the lower end of the auxiliary support limiting piece, and the L-shaped clamping position and the L-shaped clamping groove achieve cross alignment clamping connection in the rotating process of the damping rotating shaft. According to the utility model, the relative shooting directions of the main lens and the auxiliary lens whichare not in the same horizontal plane can be freely adjusted.

column2: ANTI-FRAUD STRATEGY OPTIMIZATION METHOD BASED ON MESSAGE QUEUE
column4: The invention provides an anti-fraud strategy optimization method based on a message queue. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-processed anti-fraud strategy, and initiating a task ofa cockamamie challenger; and performing optimization processing on the anti-fraud strategy by adopting one of the following optimization modes: (1) a grey running mode and a proportional mode. Throughthe grey running mode and the proportional mode, the target strategy is tested and optimized step by step in the two optimization modes. Optimization testing is conducted while feeding is completed.The optimization condition is judged according to the generated feeding test report. According to the method, the optimization test efficiency of related strategies can be improved to a great extent;the development period is shortened; the manpower and material resource consumption is reduced; and enterprises are helped to better and faster complete business requirements.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TYPE FULL-AUTOMATIC SEED GERMINATION CHAMBER
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence type full-automatic seed germination chamber. The artificial intelligence type full-automatic seed germination chamber comprises a device body, wherein a six-sided maintenance insulation board is arranged on one side of the device body, an entry and exit thermal insulation door is arranged at one end of the outer side of the device body, an observation window is arranged at one end of the entry and exit thermal insulation door, a lamp tube is arranged at one end of an inner cavity of the device body, a humidification system is arranged in an inner cavity of the device body, a heating system, a sterilization system, a refrigerator and an alarm system are also installed in the inner cavity of the device body, a control system is arranged atthe outer end of the device body, and the control system includes a computer system and a mobile phone AP system. The chamber is equipped with a sensor and an alarm. The alarm can give an alarm through sound, light, network remote, and telephone remote dialing. The control system of the artificial intelligence type full-automatic germination room can be connected to an office computer. Meanwhile,a user can remotely operate in real time through a mobile phone APP, remotely check the running status of the full-automatic germination room, and actual conditions of seed germination tests in the germination room.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VIDEO FINANCIAL PAYMENT DOOR LOCK AND METHOD FOR 5G LOGISTICS FRESH FOOD DISTRIBUTION
column4: An artificial intelligence video financial payment door lock for 5G logistics fresh food distribution comprises an artificial intelligence video financial payment door lock body, an express placementarea, a 5G smart phone and a smart home router. The artificial intelligence video financial payment door lock body comprises a doorbell button, a double-lithium battery module, a WIFI module, a front3D face recognition module, a financial payment control module, a lower shooting module, an express indication spotlight, a password unlocking module, a double-fingerprint module and a lower key hole.The front 3D face recognition module comprises three cameras, a human body sensor and an infrared fill-in light, and is used for recognizing facial features of a user, unlocking, recording and forwarding doorway images to the 5G smart phone and shooting payment codes. The financial payment control module comprises an artificial intelligence unit, a financial payment unit, a delivery code unit, afour-digit random code generation unit, a voice playing unit and a storage card. The lower shooting module comprises a 162-degree wide-angle lens and is used for shooting the express placement area below the door.

column2: PROCESSING METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE APPLICATION ON BASIS OF OPEN SOURCE DEEP LEARNING FRAMEWORK
column4: The invention discloses a processing method and system for an artificial intelligence application on the basis of an open source deep learning framework. The processing method and system relate to twoopen source deep learning frameworks, namely a first framework and a second framework, wherein the artificial intelligence application is developed based on the first framework. The processing methodcomprises the steps of: acquiring interface functions in the first framework and used in a source code of the artificial intelligence application, wherein the interface functions are first type interface functions; based on the API provided by the second framework, re-implementing the function of each first type interface function so as to obtain second type interface functions corresponding to all first type interface functions, wherein the interfaces of the second type interface functions are the same as the interfaces of the corresponding first type interface functions; compiling all the second type interface functions based on an API provided by the second framework so as to generate a packaging library; and recompiling the source code of the artificial intelligence application basedon the packaging library and the API provided by the second framework so as to generate the artificial intelligence application running on the second framework. According to the invention, developmenttime of an upper-layer AI application can be saved, and the transplantation efficiency is improved.

column2: CROSS-PLATFORM ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ASSISTANT SYSTEM APPLICATION SCHEME
column4: The invention provides a cross-platform artificial intelligence assistant system application scheme. The whole cross-platform artificial assistant system is constructed by means of artificial intelligence, real-time information collection, a neural network model, cloud computing, cloud data storage and exchange, block chain storage and other technologies and by means of a high-speed data communication network, various networked user terminal devices and electronic sensors. Through intelligent assistant interaction programs running on different intelligent devices and system platforms at the front end, a unified virtual electronic assistant interaction image of a user is created, data interactive aggregation and seamless link switching are adopted by relying on various personal digital terminal electronic device interaction interfaces, omnibearing communication with the user is achieved, and interaction information is provided. The intelligent assistant has the functions of executing user instructions, answering questions, reading information, assisting suggestions, assisting control, planning supervision, advanced learning, continuous accompanying and the like, and meanwhile, according to user authorization, personal information data of a user is accurately collected, archived, sorted and recorded.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DETECTING GRANARY VEHICLE CARRYING CONDITIONS
column4: The invention provides a system and method for detecting granary vehicle carrying conditions. The system comprises video processors, an intelligent NVR and two detection ball machines. The two detection ball machines are installed on columns arranged at the front end and the rear end of the ground slamming respectively. The detection ball machine shoots a picture where the ground slamming is located. The video processor is arranged in the detection ball machine, the video processor transmits pictures shot by the detection ball machine to the intelligent NVR, and the intelligent NVR performs feature analysis on the video pictures according to an artificial intelligence algorithm and transmits the video pictures back to the detection ball machine according to an analysis result so as to control rotation and shooting of the detection ball machine. The beneficial effects are that the detection ball machine and the artificial intelligence operation method can accurately shoot a detection image when the granary vehicle passes the ground slamming, analysis and judgment are carried out on the detection image, the front-end detection ball machine is further controlled to make adjustment, and to-be-detected effective information of the granary vehicle is better detected.

column2: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING WATER SPORT DEVICE USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention relates to a method for controlling a water sport device using artificial intelligence, and more specifically, to a method for controlling a water sport device using artificial intelligence, which is provided for controlling a rudder or a motor of the water sport device through a body motion interface by using artificial intelligence deep learning technologies. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: DEVICE, SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AUTOMATED GLOBAL ATHLETIC ASSESSMENT AND / OR HUMAN PERFORMANCE TESTING
column4: A system, method, and computer-readable media collect and analyze the physical performance of an individual and structure and generate an athletic protocol. Athletic assessment devices perform an athletic assessment of an individual, including kinetic, neurological, musculoskeletal and aerobic capacity. Athletic data is collected and stored in a digital data storage medium of a computer system having a display, and a central processing unit (CPU) operable with programming executes one or more analytical algorithms to assess injury risk levels of said individual based on said athletic data. Data mining algorithms using artificial intelligence are used to execute predictive modeling and analytics. The resultant athletic protocol includes information to correct imbalances to treat and/or prevent injuries, corrective exercises, performance training exercises, and protocols to maximize physical performance.

column2: METHOD OF PERSONALIZING, INDIVIDUALIZING, AND AUTOMATING THE MANAGEMENT OF HEALTHCARE FRAUD-WASTE-ABUSE TO UNIQUE INDIVIDUAL HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS
column4: A method of preventing healthcare fraud-waste-abuse uses artificial intelligence machines to limit financial losses. Healthcare payment request claims are analyzed by predictive models and their behavioral details are compared to running profiles unique to each healthcare provider submitting the claims. A decision results that the instant healthcare payment request claim is or is not fraudulent-wasteful-abusive. If it is, a second analysis of a group behavioral in which the healthcare provider is clustered using unsupervised learning algorithms and compared to a running profile unique to each group of healthcare providers submitting the claims. An overriding decision results if the instant healthcare payment request claim is or is not fraudulent-wasteful-abusive according to group behavior.

column2: WATER SOURCE ILLEGAL BUILDING IDENTIFICATION EARLY WARNING METHOD AND DEVICE, SERVER AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a water source illegal building identification early warning method and device, a server and a storage medium. The water source illegal building identification early warning method comprises the steps: obtaining the space coordinate information of a to-be-monitored water source through employing water source space information database data, and determining a to-be-monitoredremote sensing image corresponding to a forbidden building space region of the to-be-monitored water source through combining with a satellite remote sensing image; acquiring a color system value of the remote sensing image to be measured by using an image recognition technology; calling an external high-angle shooting color system library of the building, and comparing the color system value of the remote sensing image to be measured with the external high-angle shooting color system library of the building; judging whether a building target color system matched with the color system value ofthe to-be-detected remote sensing image exists in an external high-angle shooting color system library of the building or not; and if so, determining that a suspected building exists in a space areacorresponding to the to-be-detected remote sensing image, and carrying out early warning. Computer automatic identification and early warning are carried out by using an artificial intelligence building color system identification technology; and the efficiency and the accuracy are greatly improved.

column2: THREE-DIMENSIONAL MODELING RAPID SPACE RECONSTRUCTION METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to a three-dimensional modeling rapid space reconstruction method and system. The three-dimensional modeling rapid space reconstruction method is characterized in that the three-dimensional modeling rapid space reconstruction method comprises the steps: S1, obtaining a dome screen image of a scene through employing a plurality of fisheye lenses, and obtaining a plurality of fisheye images of the scene; S2, removing distortion of the plurality of fisheye images, and expanding the fisheye images into a panoramic image; and S3, splicing the plurality of expanded fisheye images to obtain a 360-degree seamless panoramic image, and generating a three-dimensional model through deep learning. The three-dimensional modeling rapid space reconstruction system comprises a dome-screen camera composed of a plurality of fisheye lenses, a control module and a cloud end. The three-dimensional modeling rapid space reconstruction method and system can seamlessly splice a plurality of photos of the same shooting datum point, and directly reconstruct a model with photo-level high reality sense from an image, are low in the cost, are high in the efficiency, and are low in the laborintensity.

column2: NOVEL CONTROLLABLE SOUND BOX FOR BADMINTON COURT
column4: The utility model discloses a novel controllable sound box for a badminton court. The loudspeaker comprises an upper loudspeaker and a lower loudspeaker. Dustproof nets are arranged on the front surfaces of the upper sound box and the lower sound box; the top of the upper sound box is fixedly connected with a connecting rod; the bottom of the upper sound box is fixedly connected with a connectingplate; the bottom of the connecting plate is fixedly connected with a rotating plate; the top of the lower sound box is fixedly connected with a platform; a sliding groove is formed in the upper surface of the platform. A plurality of sets of clamping grooves are fixedly connected into the sliding groove, balls are movably connected into the clamping grooves, the lower surface of the rotating plate is attached to the balls, a screw rod is fixedly connected to the side wall of the platform, a limiting plate is fixedly connected to the end, away from the platform, of the screw rod, and a baffleis in threaded connection with the outer surface of the screw rod. According to the utility model, the broadcasting direction of the device can be easily adjusted, broadcasting can be carried out in different directions at the same time, and the device is very convenient to use.

column2: SUBWAY RUNNING DIRECTION DETERMINATION METHOD AND DEVICE, TERMINAL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a subway running direction determination method and device, a terminal and a storage medium, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that in the subway acceleration stage, acquiring first acceleration data collected by a linear acceleration sensor wherein the first acceleration data comprise acceleration data inall directions under a terminal coordinate system; converting the first acceleration data into second acceleration data, wherein the second acceleration data comprises acceleration data in each direction under a world coordinate system; and determining the subway running direction according to the second acceleration data in the target duration. By converting the first acceleration data collectedby the terminal into the second acceleration data, the influence of the terminal posture on the acquired acceleration direction is avoided, and by comprehensively analyzing the second acceleration data within the target duration, the problem that the subway running direction is determined inaccurately due to the fact that the single acceleration direction is unstable can be avoided.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE RUNNING PERFORMANCE TESTING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence running performance testing device. According to the technical scheme, the artificial intelligence running performance testing device is characterized by comprising a starting system, a processing system started by the starting system and a sensing device, the starting system comprises a microswitch electrically connected with the processing system and a pedal for driving the microswitch; the pedal comprises an upper base and a lower base hinged to the upper base. The microswitch is arranged in the lower base; a rotating part is arranged on the lower surface of the lower base; the rotating piece comprises a front rotating piece and a rear rotating piece; the rear rotating piece comprises a cylindrical through hole formed in the rear side of the lower base; a supporting cylinder is arranged in the cylindrical through hole; the support cylinder is in clearance fit with the cylinder through hole; a spring containing hole is downwardsformed in the end, opposite to the cylindrical through hole, of the supporting cylinder. A spring is arranged in the spring accommodating hole; an adjusting nut is arranged on the rear side of the lower base; the timing device has the advantages of being accurate in timing and capable of accurately judging the starting time of an athlete.

column2: SIMPLE HOUSEHOLD NURSING MONITORING ALARM SYSTEM
column4: The utility model relates to the field of embedded systems and intelligent household monitoring, and specifically provides a simple household nursing monitoring alarm system. The system is structurally composed of keys, a controller, a relay, a camera, a recording device, a home computer, a video encoder and a mobile device. Wherein the button is connected with the controller through a wire, the controller is connected with the relay through a wire, the relay is connected with the recording device and the camera, the camera is connected with the video encoder through a wire, and the video encoder, the home computer and the mobile device are connected in sequence. Compared with the prior art, the simple household nursing monitoring alarm system has the characteristics of reasonable design,simple connection, easy installation, low cost and the like, and has good popularization value in the field of intelligent household monitoring.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CNN AND LSTM NEURAL NETWORK GAIT RECOGNITION SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence CNN and LSTM neural network gait recognition system. The system comprises a shooting terminal (100), a server (200), a convolutional neural network(300), a long-term and short-term memory neural network (400), an artificial intelligence early warning operation system (500), cloud computing (600), comparative analysis with a cloud database gait blacklist (700), target person identity determination (800) and a local database module (900). According to the invention, through the artificial intelligence CNN and an LSTM neural network gait recognition system, feature extraction is carried out by using video streams of face feature, voice feature, gait feature and behavior feature information collected by the shooting terminal; and then gait feature related technical processing is performed on the feature information, including fighting, stealing, falling of old people, crowd events, invasion, masked face and the like, so that all-weather24-hour uninterrupted monitoring in the surrounding monitoring range of the shooting terminal is realized, information sharing can be realized by users, the utilization rate of information resources is improved, and safety guarantee is increased for maintaining social security stability.

column2: EXAMINATION COUCH MATCHED WITH NOVEL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DR AND CONTROL METHOD OF EXAMINATION COUCH
column4: The invention discloses an examination couch matched with novel artificial intelligence DR, and relates to the technical field of medical equipment. The examination couch matched with novel artificialintelligence DR comprises the intelligent DR equipment, wherein a waiting region is arranged on one side of the intelligent DR equipment; rails which are arranged side by side and an examination couch body which can move on the rails are arranged between the intelligent DR equipment and the waiting region; the examination couch body comprises a couch frame, wherein rail wheels and a driving device are connected to the couch frame through rotating shafts; a couch board is connected in the length direction of the couch frame through a plurality of sliding blocks; a blind hole is formed in eachsliding block; a pressure sensor is mounted in each blind hole; connecting columns each of which cooperates the corresponding blind hole are fixed to the lower surface of the couch board; each connecting column is propped with the corresponding pressure sensor; and the couch board is connected with the couch frame through a ball screw rod mechanism. According to the examination couch matched withnovel artificial intelligence DR disclosed by the invention, the intelligent DR equipment is linked with the examination couch; and shooting body position information of a patient is extracted, the shooting positions of the intelligent DR equipment and the examination couch are automatically adjusted, integral intellectualization and automation are effectively increased, and improving the shootingefficiency of the intelligent DR equipment is facilitated.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR CONTROLLING DRIVING OF UNMANNED VEHICLE AND UNMANNED VEHICLE
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and invention discloses a method for controlling driving of an unmanned vehicle. The method comprises the following steps: detecting that a blocked vehicle exists in front of an unmanned vehicle; obtaining the driving speed of the blocked vehicle and the driving information of the unmanned vehicle, which is used for judging whether the unmanned vehicle currently has overtaking requirements; if so, acquiring a first image and a second image in a preset safe distance in front of and behind a lane on the side of the unmanned vehicle, when the first image and/or the second image are/is not included; requesting the first image and/or the second image from a vehicle in front of and/or behind the unmanned vehicle, and finally, according to the first image and the second image, determining whether an overtaking condition is satisfied or not, and if yes, controlling the unmanned vehicle to switch lanes. The method for controlling the unmanned vehicle to run provided by the embodiment of the invention can realize an overtaking function, thereby shortening the running time and improving the riding experience of passengers.

column2: METHOD FOR GENERATING TARGET DETECTION FOOTBALL CANDIDATE POINT OF NAO ROBOT BASED ON HEATMAP
column4: The invention relates to a method for generating a target detection football candidate point of a Nao robot based on a Heatmap. The method comprises the steps of selecting a convolutional neural network as a target detection model; simulating competition environments, collecting a plurality of groups of pictures to make a data set for training and testing, generating a Heatmap, processing to obtain a Heatmap visualization result, reconstructing the convolutional neural network to accelerate the network calculation speed, setting a proper threshold value, taking points greater than the set threshold value in the Heatmap as candidate points of a ball, and finally sending the candidate points into a classifier to obtain a final accurate identification result. According to the method, the adaptive capacity of the Nao robot vision system to the light environment of the competition field is enhanced; high-precision recognition of the football can be achieved in different light environments;feature extraction is completed through few convolution layers; the recognition real-time performance is guaranteed; and meanwhile the football recognition accuracy is greatly improved through the method that football candidate points are generated and then enter the classifier to be recognized.

column2: SLEEP QUALITY EVALUATION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a sleep quality evaluation system based on artificial intelligence. The sleep quality evaluation system comprises an image acquisition device and a computer for running an artificial intelligence program; the image acquisition device comprises a camera, a far infrared thermal sensor array, a controller and a memory; the controller controls the camera, the far infrared thermal sensor array and the memory; the memory is used for storing image data shot by the camera and far infrared data obtained by the far infrared thermal sensor array; the computer running the artificial intelligence program comprises a USB interface. The image acquisition device is provided with the USB interface, so the data information stored in the memory can be read through the USB interface. The problem that the existing sleeping quality video monitoring equipment is influenced by bedding when people sleep is solved.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ASSURING CUSTOMERS DURING SOFTWARE DEPLOYMENT
column4: Deployment assurance services Accelerators (?œDAS Accelerators?? include audit functionality that performs a sequential audit of each server listed in a customer's server list from customer's target environment. And artificial intelligence engine (?œAI engine?? scans each server to match all required Include entries, which enables categories of product specific checks. Checks for each product category are processed sequentially, including database specific checks. All database platforms can be configured to connect on custom\nonstandard ports, using unique credentials. After each server audit is completed, the audit results are outputted to an encrypted file, a csv or database, depending on how the execution was configured by the customer. Audits review hardware, software, registry, integration and configuration details from customer servers for, e.g., the purpose of validating fitness for use. Various validation and environment reports are generated based on the audit results.

column2: SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLING ELECTRONIC DEVICE FOR EACH SECTION USING PLURALITY OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VOICE TERMINALS AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention provides a system for controlling an electronic device for each section by using a plurality of artificial intelligence (AI) voice terminals, which is capable of preventing multi-triggering, and a method thereof. According to one embodiment of the present invention, the system comprises: a server executing a service for a voice command included in user prime;s voice when receiving the user prime;s voice; the plurality of terminals fixedly installed in each of a plurality of sections divided by a wall in a single building, and transmitting the user prime;s voice to the server when detecting the user prime;s voice; and a relay selecting one of the plurality of terminals through the user prime;s voice and relaying the user prime;s voice received from the selected terminal to the server. The server receives the user prime;s voice from the relay. When the user prime;s voice includes a section fixing voice, the server executes the service with respect to an electronic device placed in the section corresponding to the section fixing voice. In the opposite case, the server executes the service with respect to an electronic device placed in the section where the selected terminal is arranged. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: AUTOMATIC CONTROL SYSTEM FOR VEHICLE FRAME OVERTURNING IN MULTI-VEHICLE-TYPE MIXED LINE PRODUCTION
column4: The utility model discloses a multi-vehicle-type mixed line production vehicle frame overturning automatic control system which comprises an overturning machine frame which comprises a machine frame platform and machine frame feet arranged below the machine frame platform, and a vehicle frame enters the bottom of the overturning machine frame through a skid assembly line. At least two lifting turnover arms are arranged on the machine frame platform, a sliding rail is arranged on the machine frame platform, and the lifting turnover arms are arranged on the sliding rail and connected with the machine frame platform in a sliding mode. A first camera shooting device for shooting downwards is connected to the sliding rail in a sliding mode, and a second camera shooting device for shooting laterally is arranged on the rack leg; and the main controller is used for collecting view signals to control the lifting and falling of the lifting turnover arm and the movement of the lifting turnover arm on the sliding rail. Based on the machine vision and image processing technology, automatic recognition, positioning and overturning of frames of different types are achieved in the artificial intelligence category, and therefore the problem that overturning of frames of mixed line production vehicle enterprises needs manual operation is effectively solved.

column2: GARBAGE CLASSIFICATION SOFTWARE BASED ON COMPUTER VISION
column4: The invention discloses garbage classification software based on computer vision. The garbage classification software comprises a mobile terminal image acquisition system, a garbage category data system, a garbage category judgment system and a personalized user upgrading system; the mobile terminal image acquisition system acquires a garbage image through a photographing function of the mobile terminal; the garbage category data system can perform high-intensity learning and training on garbage category data by utilizing a deep learning mode; the garbage category judgment system obtains a category result of the shot garbage photos according to a learning model matching result; and the personalized user upgrading system can add a new item for garbage habitually produced by a user, so as toensure the garbage classification accuracy. According to the invention, intelligent identification of garbage classification is realized, simultaneous classification and identification of various kinds of garbage can be completed through simple shooting operation, and great convenience is provided for the life of residents.

column2: BASKETBALL SHOOTING HAND TYPE VIDEO ANALYSIS SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a basketball shooting hand shape video analysis system and method based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a hand detection system, a gesture key point detectionsystem and a hand shape analysis system. The hand detection system records a detection frame for detecting and positioning the hands of the trainee in each frame of image of the video in the trainingstate; the gesture key point detection system processes the image, detected by the hand detection system, in the hand position detection frame to obtain a joint point of the hand; and the hand shape analysis system performs action analysis according to the gesture key points obtained by the gesture key point detection system, and performs comparative analysis with preset gesture key point information of standard gestures. The analysis method comprises the steps of video acquisition, hand detection system operation, gesture key point detection system operation and hand shape analysis system operation. According to the invention, a user can provide feedback about whether the shooting hand shape is standard or not without extra manpower during shooting training, and the difference between thewrong hand shape and the correct hand shape is pointed out, so that the shooter can still obtain the teaching feedback of the shooting hand shape without a coach.

column2: SHOOTING TRAINING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON SMART PHONE AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a shooting training system and method based on a smart phone and artificial intelligence. The system comprises a court positioning system, a basket detection system, a player identity recognition system, a player action analysis system, a basketball track recording system, a goal detection system and a visual playback system. During training, the court positioning system detects positions of a court boundary line, a center line, a penalty line, and side lines of a limiting area and a penalty area; the basket detection system performs basket position detection, and performs tracking and real-time detection based on target tracking; the player identity recognition system confirms the position and identity of the player; the player action analysis system acquires player body articulation point position information; the basketball track recording system records the ball position and the target size; the goal detection system judges whether a ball enters the basket or not; and the visual playback system stores and plays back the obtained information and the frames of the video. According to the basketball shooting training system, shooting training of basketballtrainees is facilitated, and the defects of an existing shooting training system are overcome.

column2: DEVICE FOR UNIFYING MULTIPLE PATHS OF SHOOTING PARAMETERS
column4: The utility model discloses a device for unifying multiple paths of shooting parameters. The system comprises multiple paths of camera assemblies, a control device and a computer processing system, wherein the multi-channel camera shooting assembly is in communication connection with the control device, the control device is in communication connection with the control signal output device, the control signal output device and the control device are in communication connection with the computer processing system, and the multi-channel camera shooting assembly is in communication connection with the computer processing system. The utility model is advantageous in that the structure is simple, unified shooting parameters can be used by cameras and digital cameras at different positions in multiple paths of camera assemblies; the system is simple in structure, is not affected by a photographed object, achieves the unification of photographed image parameters, provides a unified standard for a subsequent computer processing system to process images, and is wide in application range and prospect no matter in the emerging artificial intelligence recognition field, three-dimensional vision field or image control field.

column2: VISION-BASED FITNESS GUIDANCE SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a vision-based fitness guidance system. The fitness guidance system comprises an identity recognition system, an action sensing system, intermediate control equipment and a motion data analysis system, the identity recognition system performs identity recognition on a user by using a face recognition technology, so that the recording continuity and privacy of personal information are ensured; the action sensing system calls sensing data of a user during movement through an AI algorithm, and performs user action recognition under the control of the intermediate control equipment; the exercise data analysis system can analyze the exercise data of the user, so that the training rest time distribution of the user is accurately limited, and a training task fitting the condition of the user is formulated. According to the invention, the identity of the user is determined visually, and the motion data of the user is subjected to sensing analysis, so that a customized user training mode is generated, and scientific guidance is provided for the motion of the user conveniently and accurately.

column2: FACE RECOGNITION MODULE AND METHOD
column4: The invention provides face recognition module and method. The face recognition module includes a near infrared flash, a master near infrared camera, an artificial intelligence NIR image model, an artificial intelligence original image model, and an artificial intelligence fusion model. The NIR flash flashes near infrared light. The master near infrared camera captures a NIR image. The artificialintelligence NIR image model processes the NIR image to generate NIR features. The artificial intelligence original image model processes a 2 dimensional second camera image to generate face featuresor color features. The artificial intelligence fusion model generates 3 dimensional face features, a depth map and an object's 3 dimensional model according to the NIR features, the face features andthe color features. In the invention, successful rate and optimum extracted features of face recognition are improved, so that the module and method can be used for artificial intelligence face detection, artificial intelligence facial feature generation, artificial intelligence landmark generation, artificial intelligence live detection artificial intelligence depth map generation, etc.

column2: SPORTS POOL BETTING DIVIDEND CALCULATOR
column4: A computer-implemented artificial intelligence, dividend calculator to facilitate bet tracking on line by selecting a pool to bet on from a predefined database, displaying statistical analysis of the selected pool, and employing a dividend calculator wherein a user can enter any plausible combination from the pool to obtain a real-time dividend result.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED SMART COACHING METHOD
column4: An artificial intelligence (AI)-based smart coaching method is disclosed. An exercise coaching method realized by a computer may comprise the steps of: establishing a communication session with an exercise machine through a short-range communication module; receiving exercise amount information sensed in real time from the exercise machine in which the communication session is established; storing and receiving the received exercise amount information for each predetermined item; and recommending customized exercise information based on the received exercise amount information and pre-registered user characteristic information. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: HUMAN SKELETON DOUBLE-PERSON INTERACTION BEHAVIOR RECOGNITION METHOD BASED ON MULTI-CHANNEL SPACE-TIME FUSION NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses a human skeleton double-person interaction behavior recognition method based on a multi-channel space-time fusion network, belongs to the field of artificial intelligence and deep learning, and aims to solve the problem of low precision of a human skeleton double-person interaction behavior recognition result. The invention constructs a visual angle invariance double associated skeleton description method of a double interactive behavior skeleton sequence, a space-time fusion network is designed to learn space-time fusion feature representation of a double skeleton, multiple groups of space-time fusion features are obtained by adopting a multi-channel fusion network structure, and the behavior category of the skeleton sequence is obtained by utilizing fusion featureclassification. According to the double-skeleton description method, multiple groups of view angle invariance double-associated feature representations of the skeleton can be obtained; the space-timefusion network can learn the space-time association features of the sequence, and the multi-channel fusion network structure can obtain a plurality of groups of space-time fusion features, thereby improving the recognition accuracy of double-person interaction behaviors. The method is advantaged in that relatively high accuracy is acquired on the basis of human skeleton-based double-person interaction behavior identification.

column2: QUEUE JUMPING BEHAVIOR MONITORING AND WARNING SYSTEM, METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON HUMAN BODY DETECTION AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a queue jumping behavior monitoring and warning system, method and device based on human body detection and a storage medium. The system comprises a queue detection unit, a queue jumping behavior detection unit and a feature recognition unit. The queue detection unit carries out basic modeling on an indoor scene and determines the range of a detection queue; the queue jumping behavior detection unit is used for positioning and detecting a human face and confirming a queue jumping human face by using a blink recognition technology; the feature recognition unit carries out face shooting by means of a camera, carries out feature recognition on the shot face and broadcasts the face, and warning of the queue jumping behavior is completed. According to the invention, thefunction of high-precision automatic detection of uncivilized queue jumping behaviors is realized, the queue jumping behaviors can be warned, and harmonious queuing is promoted.

column2: DOMESTIC/FOREIGN GOLF COACHING CONSULTATION MATCHING SERVICE SYSTEM USING LOCATION-BASED SERVICE
column4: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based golf coach matching service system using a location-based service. The system comprises: a golf coach matching service server (100) to provide a golf coach matching service application, receive golf coach and golfer profile information to provide a golf coach matching service via the golf coach matching service application to supply golfer information to a golf coach terminal, supply golf coach information to a golfer terminal, and allow a golf coach matching service in the golfer terminal and the golf coach terminal located nearby; a golf coach terminal (200) to have the golf coach matching service application loaded therein, upload golf coach profile information via the golf coach matching service application, and transmit a golf coach matching service request message to a mentee terminal (300) if golfer information matching golf coach profile information exists while the golf coach matching service application is executed; and a golfer terminal (300) to have the golf coach matching service application loaded therein, upload golfer profile information via the golf coach matching service application, and transmit a golf coach matching service request message to a golf coach terminal (200) if a golf coach matching golfer profile information exists while the golf coach matching service application is executed. Accordingly, the distance between a golf coach and a golfer is recognized, and a meeting for consultation is easily arranged. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: FACE RECOGNITION MODULE WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELS
column4: A face recognition module includes a near infrared flash, a master near infrared camera, an artificial intelligence NIR image model, an artificial intelligence original image model, and an artificial intelligence fusion model. The NIR flash flashes near infrared light. The master near infrared camera captures a NIR image. The artificial intelligence NIR image model processes the NIR image to generate NIR features. The artificial intelligence original image model processes a 2 dimensional second camera image to generate face features or color features. The artificial intelligence fusion model generates 3 dimensional face features, a depth map and an object's 3 dimensional model according to the NIR features, the face features and the color features.

column2: AUTOMATIC DRIVING DATA ACQUISITION SYSTEM AND WORKING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses an automatic driving data acquisition system and a working method thereof. The data acquisition system comprises a recorder system, a RRP professional edition system and a cloud platform service system; the recorder system comprises a recorder hardware module, a recorder software module and a Bluetooth key; the RRP professional edition system comprises a network module, a file processing module, a multi-path control module, an Ai algorithm loading and control module and a video display processing module, wherein the multi-path control module is controlled by the networkmodule, the network module is respectively communicated with the file processing module and the cloud platform service system, and the file processing module is controlled by the Ai algorithm loadingand control module. According to the invention, the problems that a large amount of data can only be stored at the terminal side, the data acquisition process is complex or the data volume is large,and the 4G uploading cost is very high in the current industry are solved. Valuable data can be quickly recognized, extracted and uploaded through running the latest artificial intelligence algorithmon the terminal-side, so that the cost is greatly saved, and the efficiency is improved.

column2: INTELLIGENT DANCING ROBOT
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent dancing robot, and relates to the technical field of robots. The intelligent dancing robot comprises a body. A head is arranged on the upper portion of the body,the two sides of the body are rotationally connected with arms, a leg part is arranged on the lower portion of the body, and a controller box and a battery are fixedly mounted in the body.
