The leg part comprises two side plates, the upper surfaces of the side plates are fixedly connected with the lower surface of the body, a novel lead screw is rotationally connected between the two side plates through bearings, the outer side of the novel lead screw is rotationally connected with two vertical rods, inclined plates are fixedly mounted at the bottom ends of the vertical rods, rollers are fixedly mounted at the bottom ends of the inclined plates, a first gear is fixedly mounted at one end of the novel lead screw, a supporting plate is fixedly mounted on one surface of one of the side plates, a drive motor is fixedly mounted on the lower surface of the supporting plate, and a second gear is fixedly mounted at the output end of the drive motor. By means of the designed dancing robot, thehands and the feet of the robot can simultaneously move, thus, the flexibility of the robot is improved, and the robot has higher ornamental value.

column2: CODE EDGE SAWTOOTH ANTI-COUNTERFEITING METHOD AND PRODUCT
column4: The invention belongs to a code edge sawtooth anti-counterfeiting method, which comprises the following steps: printing a two-dimensional code on a printed matter, and printing some sparse ink dots or/and line segments in a blank area with the width of 0-1.5 mm near the two-dimensional code; promoting the ink forming the ink dots or/and the line segments to randomly diffuse to form sawtooth edges;amplifying and shooting the two-dimensional code and the sawtooth edge to obtain microscopic feature information of the sawtooth edge; and correspondingly storing the obtained microscopic feature information and the two-dimensional code into an anti-counterfeiting inspection system database to serve as an anti-counterfeiting feature information file. According to the method, the code edge is ingeniously utilized, the sawtooth edge formed by the ink dots or/and the line segments on the code edge can be used as an anti-counterfeiting feature. The trouble of revision is avoided, two-dimensionalcode reading interference is avoided, and microscopic feature information of the sawtooth edge can be conveniently acquired through code scanning.

column2: INTERACTIVE EXERCISE EXPERIENCE
column4: Embodiments relate to a system, program product, and method for use and an artificial intelligence (AI) platform to identify and analyze physical forces related to sensory input. A sensor operatively coupled to an inertial measurement unit (IMU) is activated. An initial position of the IMU responsive to the sensor activation is captured and movement of the IMU from the initial position is recognized. A comparison is preformed, where the captured initial position is compared to a second position which is correlated with the recognized movement. A score based on the performed comparison is determined and a diagnostic assessment based on the performed comparison and determined score is created. The diagnostic assessment is converted to feedback, where the conversion utilizes real-time communication of an instruction of a second movement position of the IMU. Receipt of the feedback physically conveys a manifestation of the feedback to the apparatus.

column2: REAL-TIME SMART MANAGEMENT SYSTEM FOR TAP WATER USING BIG DATA-BASED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention was created to solve the problems of a prior art. The problem to be solved in the present invention is to provide a real-time smart management system for tap water using big data-based artificial intelligence, which is installed in a water supply pipe and detects turbidity, pH, water temperatures, redox potentials and conductivity to check whether the water supply pipe is corroded while removing the distrust of tap water supply through water quality prediction. To solve the above problems, according to the present invention, the real-time smart management system for tap water using big data-based artificial intelligence comprises: a sensor device which is installed in each of a water intake pipe, a water pipe, a water conveyance pipe, and a water supply pipe to sense a water quality state for transferred water; a relay device which receives and relays a sensing value detected by the sensor device; a collection device which collects, stores, and manages the sensing value transmitted from the relay device; an analysis device analyzing tap water based on the sensing value stored in the collection device, and predicting water quality; and a display device visually displaying the result value analyzed by the analysis device and predicted risk factors. The analysis device determines whether a pipeline from water intake to water supply is normal or abnormal based on the collected sensing values, builds patterned data through big data analysis, determines analysis/prediction for the possibility of risk factors occurrence related to water quality, and provides the determined analyzed/predicted result values as visualization information. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATICALLY AND DYNAMICALLY OUTPUTTING GAME TEXTURE FITNESS
column4: The invention relates to a method and system for automatically and dynamically outputting game texture fitness. The method and system are used for realizing the following steps of S10, accessing a game program, and calling a virtual camera or an artificial intelligence role in a game scene to gradually load the game scene; S20, carrying out coloring and detection processing on textures corresponding to a game program scene model when the game scene is loaded, and writing detection data into a readable cache; S30, reading the texture detection data in the readable cache, and performing fitnesscalculation on the detection data to obtain texture fitness; and S40, writing the fitness corresponding to the textures and texture identifiers thereof into a file. The method and the system have thebeneficial effects that after a game map is traversed manually or by a robot, all texture resource paths and size fitness information are automatically recorded, and development or art personnel perform size adjustment on improper texture information, so that the purposes of reducing the size of a mobile phone game installation package, reducing the memory requirement during game running and improving the game fluency are achieved.

column2: AIR CONDITIONER COOLING SYSTEM INTELLIGENT ENERGY-SAVING CONTROL SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON NEURAL NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses an air conditioner cooling system intelligent energy-saving control system and method based on a neural network. The system comprises a data collection module, a neural networkmodel training module, an artificial intelligence analysis module and a cooling system energy efficiency control module. The system has the advantages that firstly, the professional artificial intelligence and energy-saving control system of an air conditioner cooling system is adopted; secondly, the cooling system energy efficiency optimal control under the overall performance is achieved, and the energy-saving effect is good; thirdly, due to the fact that the cooling portion form of an air conditioner system is basically consistent, the difference mainly comprises equipment capacity and number differences, running modes and energy consumption characteristics are similar, trained models can meet the use conditions only through training with the small workloads on other projects, portability is good, and large-scale application is benefited; and fourthly, collection of needed data used for air conditioner cooling system neural network model training is basically controllable, data completeness and accuracy are ensured, the trained neural network model is good in convergence, and precision is high.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR ESTIMATING BRAKE PRESSURE OF ELECTRIC VEHICLE
column4: The invention discloses a method for estimating brake pressure of an electric vehicle, and belongs to the technical filed of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that data of a CANbus, data of a sensor and the brake pressure of a brake master cylinder of a tested vehicle during running under different working conditions are collected; the data of the CAN bus and the data of thesensor are used as input data, the brake pressure is used as reference data, an artificial neural network model is reversely trained based on Bayes rules, and the trained artificial neural network model is obtained; and the data of the CAN bus and the data of the sensor of an actual vehicle during running under different working conditions are input into the trained artificial neural network model, and the brake pressure of the brake main cylinder of the actual vehicle is estimated. According to the method, the brake pressure of the electric vehicle can be effectively estimated without the aid of a sensor.

column2: AUXILIARY TRAINING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an auxiliary training system and method. The system comprises an augmented reality module used for acquiring a standard video, simulating a real environment based on the standard video to demonstrate a standard action and sending a first time axis and first three-dimensional skeleton key points of the standard action in the demonstration process to an action analysis module, a posture capturing module used for capturing second three-dimensional skeleton key points and a second time axis in a training process and sending the second three-dimensional skeleton key points and the second time axis to the action analysis module, and the action analysis module used for selecting the first three-dimensional skeleton key points and the second three-dimensional skeleton key points at the same moment according to the first time axis and the second time axis and performing comparison to generate guidance information. The standard action is projected in the real environment,so that a real scene is effectively restored, a standard posture is provided as a reference for training a single person in a queue, and inconvenience caused by multi-person training is avoided; anda training posture is rapidly captured and compared with the standard posture to give the guidance information, so that a trainee is accurately assisted.

column2: UNDERGROUND LOCOMOTIVE PEDESTRIAN AND DISTANCE DETECTION METHOD BASED ON BINARIZATION NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses an underground locomotive pedestrian and distance detection method based on a binarization network. The method relates to the field of computer vision. The powerful performanceof the convolutional neural network is utilized to realize pedestrian detection under the mine; a pedestrian distance is detected through a principle deployment algorithm based on binocular vision difference. In addition, according to the method, a full-precision convolutional neural network is transformed into a binary convolutional neural network based on binarization; parameters of the neuralnetwork are greatly reduced, binarization and the convolutional neural network are combined to achieve the convolutional neural network with the compressed weight, the training speed is increased, themethod is easy to deploy in an embedded platform, target detection and the embedded platform are fused, and development of embedded artificial intelligence is greatly promoted. According to the technical scheme, the method is characterized by comprising the following steps of a data set preparation stage, wherein a video set is manually labeled after being processed through shooting of a camera located on a mine locomotive; and a first stage of network creation, wherein a full-precision convolutional neural network framework is created.

column2: IMAGE METHOD AGGREGATE STACKING VOID RATIO PREDICTION METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides an image method aggregate stacking void ratio method and system, and the method comprises the steps: 1) shooting an aggregate particle image, and carrying out the image processing to obtain the outer contour of an aggregate particle; 2) scanning the aggregate particles to obtain the height profile of the aggregate particles; 3) equally dividing the aggregate particles in theaggregate particle size interval of 4.75-31.5 mm into a plurality of parts, and counting the gradation volume proportions of different particle size intervals according to the particle size and areain the outer contour in combination with the aggregate height in the height contour; 4) calculating the contour data to obtain the angularity, the needle sheet shape, the flatness and the convexity ofthe particles; and 5) taking the gradation volume ratio and the grain shape parameter in the step 4) as input values, and predicting the porosity of the aggregate by using a deep learning algorithm.According to the invention, an image processing technology, a scanner technology and artificial intelligence are combined, and the method is effectively applied in the aspect of stack void ratio prediction. The particle size distribution parameters and the particle shape characterization parameter average value of the multiple particles can be rapidly measured, and the void ratio among the multiple particles can be accurately predicted.

column2: FATIGUE DEGREE DETECTION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a fatigue degree detection system based on artificial intelligence. The fatigue degree detection system comprises an image acquisition device, a voice dialogue device and a computer for running an artificial intelligence program, the image acquisition device comprises a camera and a controller; the controller controls the camera to acquire image information; the voice conversation device comprises a microphone, a loudspeaker and a controller; wherein the computer running the artificial intelligence program comprises a data interface; and the image acquisition device andthe voice dialogue device are in data communication with a computer running an artificial intelligence program through a data interface. And a computer data interface for running the artificial intelligence program is an internet access. The image acquisition device is provided with an internet access, and image data can be sent to a computer running an artificial intelligence program through theinternet access. The voice dialogue device is provided with an internet access, and can communicate with a computer running an artificial intelligence program through the internet access. The problemthat effective real-time monitoring equipment is lacked for the fatigue degree of people at present is solved.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATICALLY OUTPUTTING TRIANGULAR FITNESS OF GRID RESOURCES
column4: The invention relates to a method and a system for automatically outputting triangular fitness of grid resources. The method is used for realizing that S10, a virtual camera or an artificial intelligence role in a game scene is called to gradually load the game scene; S20, a shader is called to render the model objects of the scene one by one, and the number of pixels, belonging to the same triangle, of each pixel block is set; S30, the shader counts pixel block distribution data in the loading range screen, and further calculates the triangle suitability of each model object to obtain the suitability; and S40, the triangle suitability of each model object is written into a file. The beneficial effects of the method and the system are as follows: all object grid resource paths and trianglefitness information of the object grid resource paths are automatically recorded, triangular grid adjustment and optimization are conducted on improper object grids by developers or art personnel, the triangular shape is more reasonable or the density is lower, and therefore the effective utilization rate of a graphics card computing hardware unit can be increased, and game fluency is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXTINGUISHING METHOD WITH OPEN FIRE POINT IDENTIFICATION FUNCTION AND EXTINGUISHER
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence extinguishing method with the open fire point identification function and an extinguisher. The method comprises the steps of (1) shooting continuous image frames; (2) converting each image frame into an HSI component chart; (3) respectively setting distinguishing threshold values of saturation S and brightness I, comparing the distinguishing threshold values with a corresponding component of each image frame, and analyzing whether candidate open fire point areas exist or not; (4) when the candidate open fire point areas exist, calculating to obtain a characteristic value array sequence containing a series of characteristic values of the candidate open fire point areas; (5) determining the fire conditions of the candidate open fire point areas and quantitatively generating open fire point fire condition grades; and (6) when real open fire points exist in the candidate open fire point areas, opening a safety mechanism of the extinguisherto carry out proper spraying on the open fire points, wherein the spraying angle is consistent with the visual field direction of a camera. According to the extinguishing method and the extinguisher,the situation that casualties are caused and extinguishing substances are wasted due to mistaken spraying is avoided, the defect of an existing extinguisher is overcome, and the superiority of artificial intelligence in fire fighting is embodied.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The present application relates to the field of secure computing, and provided thereby are a data processing method and device, which are used to ensure the security of related data operations in AI technology. The device comprises: a general-purpose processor and an artificial intelligence processor. The general-purpose processor is used to configure the artificial intelligence processor to switch from a non-secure mode to a secure mode, and call the artificial intelligence processor to process secure data, the secure data being generated by the general-purpose processor running secure software. The artificial intelligence processor is used to switch from non-secure mode to secure mode in response to the configuration of the general-purpose processor, and process the secure data in response to calling by the general-purpose processor and return a secure data processing result to the general-purpose processor. In secure mode, the artificial intelligence processor cannot process non-secure data generated by the general-purpose processor running non-secure software.

column2: ADAPTIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLEGENCE INSULIN PUMP
column4: An artificial intelligence insulin pump that processes glucose data, wellness data, external data, and port information to determine the appropriate amount and timing of insulin to deliver to a person. External data includes data from sources remote from the insulin pump and the user such as social media data, GPS location data, historical data including energy and food intake at locations visited prior, data from third party sources. Such external data may include that the use is registered for a marathon and in at the marathon venue and the user's exertion level indicates that the user is running has begun to run the marathon. The AI engine would than adjust the insulin appropriately.

column2: DATA PROCESSING DEVICE, ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHIP AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: Disclosed are a data processing device, an artificial intelligent chip and an electronic device in an embodiment of the present invention. One embodiment of the data processing device comprises: an input memory storing data to be processed; a data shuttle member reading and interpreting external processing instructions to obtain a data reading address, a data writing address and operational instructions, reading data to be processed according to the data reading address, processing data to be processed according to operational instructions to obtain processed output data and data writing address, and sending a data writing request; a multiple path relay member responding to reception of the data writing request of at least one data shuttle members, outputting by gating output data of one data shuttle member and corresponding data writing address from the received output data and data writing address, and sending a writing enable signals; and an output memory responding to reception of the writing enable signals to write the output data received from the multiple path relay member on the corresponding data writing address. The corresponding embodiment improves a data processing efficiency. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: TRADITIONAL CHINESE MEDICINE TONGUE IMAGE SEGMENTATION DEVICE AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a traditional Chinese medicine tongue image segmentation device and method based on artificial intelligence and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: shooting a tongue surface image containing a tongue body through image acquisition equipment; processing RGB pixel points of the tongue surface image through an SLIC algorithm to generate N super-pixel regions; extracting a feature group of each super-pixel region; utilizing a pre-trained tongue body classifier to classify the feature group of each super-pixel region, and identifying a tongue body region and a non-tongue body region; and removing a non-tongue area from the tongue surface image and reserving the tongue area to obtain a tongue image, and outputting the tongue image through an outputunit. According to the method, the calculation amount of tongue surface image data can be reduced, the tongue body segmentation calculation speed is increased, the tongue body segmentation accuracy can be effectively improved, and the method has a wide application prospect in the field of traditional Chinese medicine tongue diagnosis.

column2: ANIMATION GENERATION METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an animation generation method, a device, equipment and a computer readable storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The specific implementation scheme comprises the following steps: acquiring a target configuration file sent by terminal equipment, wherein the target configuration file comprises all parameter information for making an animation file; adding the parameter information in the target configuration file to a corresponding position in a preset core code file to obtain a target code set; running the target code set to generate an animation file; and sending the animation file to terminal equipment for display. According to the method, the user does not need to encode according to the current requirement, the professional requirement for the user is low, when the user needs to adjust the animation file, only the parameter information needs to be adjusted, all codes do not need to be adjusted, the adjustment efficiency is improved, and then the user experience can be improved.

column2: ABNORMALITY EARLY-WARNING METHOD AND RELATED EQUIPMENT
column4: In the embodiments, the invention discloses an abnormality early-warning method and related equipment. The abnormality early-warning method comprises the following steps: obtaining target physiological parameters of an object to be monitored by a physiological parameter monitoring device when it is detected that the object to be monitored is in moving state; obtaining a target human face image byan image acquisition device; obtaining target psychological parameters of the object to be monitored by an artificial intelligence chip according to the target human face image; obtaining target exercise items and target exercise duration of the object to be monitored by an information acquisition device; determining target exercise load of the object to be monitored by an early-warning judgment device according to the target physiological parameters, the target psychological parameters, the target exercise items and the target exercise duration; confirming that the object to be monitored meets abnormality early-warning conditions by the early-warning judgment device if the target exercise load is larger than a preset exercise load; and then, executing abnormality early-warning operation by an early-warning processing device. Being adopted, the abnormality early-warning method disclosed by the embodiments of the invention is capable of beneficially improving efficiency of abnormality early-warning on an object to be monitored in moving state.

column2: DISPLAY CONTROL METHOD OF ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT WITH FOLDING SCREEN AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the field of terminal artificial intelligence (AI), and particularly provides a display control method of electronic equipment with a folding screen and the electronic equipment. The display control method of the electronic equipment with the folding screen comprises the steps that the electronic equipment determines a first using posture of a user using the electronic equipment, and in response to the first using posture, the electronic equipment locks a first screen; or, when the electronic equipment detects the shooting scene of the camera and the overturning operation of the user on the electronic equipment, the electronic equipment detects whether an object is close to the electronic equipment, and in response to a detection result, the electronic equipment switches the display of the electronic equipment from the first screen to a second screen, or the electronic equipment maintains the first screen to be turned on and the second screen to be turned off.According to the embodiment of the invention, intelligent screen locking or automatic screen switching based on different application scenes can be realized, intelligent terminal equipment is realized, and the use performance of the terminal equipment is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE HOUSE-VIEWING REPORTING MANAGEMENT EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The utility model further discloses an artificial intelligence house seeing and reporting management device. Reporting equipment body, cushions are fixedly mounted on the front side and the rear side of the reporting equipment body correspondingly. A shooting head is fixedly mounted on the left side of the reporting equipment body; connecting rods are fixedly mounted on the left side and the right side of the reporting equipment body; rotating rods are movably connected to the interiors of the two connecting rods; theouter surfaces of the two rotating rods are fixedly connected with protective covers; connecting plates are fixedly mounted at the top of the reporting equipment body, clamping grooves are formed inthe left sides and the right sides of the bottoms of the two connecting plates correspondingly, the top ends of the two protective covers are located in the clamping grooves correspondingly, protective pads are fixedly connected to the opposite sides of the two protective covers correspondingly, and fixing grooves are formed in the tops of the two protective covers correspondingly. The artificialintelligence house-viewing reporting management equipment is convenient to protect and prevents damage caused by collision.

column2: AUTOMATIC DRIVING TRANSPORTATION METHOD WITH SHARED POWER AND APPLICATION THEREOF
column4: An automatic driving transportation method with shared power and application thereof are characterized in that an automatic driving transportation system is supported by Internet artificial intelligence sensing technology. Two sets of power driving systems are provided for the transportation of trackless vehicles, wherein the first set of power driving system comprises power traction systems fixedly arranged on roads and providing main power for all automatic driving vehicles; and the other set of power driving system comprises electric power systems or other power systems arranged in the automatic driving vehicles and used for separate short-range autonomous operation. The traction power systems fixedly arranged on the roads mainly consist of various linear transmission belts, wherein thelinear transmission belts are distributed on the roads and driven by electric motors, and operate in a vertical or horizontal annular closed manner; and the linear transmission belts are arranged onthe roads in a segmented, spaced and continuous connection manner to form a relay network. The bottoms of the automatic driving vehicles are provided with homing devices and connecting devices which can realize homing and relatively constant-speed static connection or disconnection with the power traction systems, so that transportation functions of the automatic driving vehicles on the roads canbe achieved.

column2: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR PROVIDING FLEXIBLE, MULTI-CAPACITY MODELS FOR USE OF DEEP NEURAL NETWORKS IN MOBILE DEVICES
column4: Systems and methods are disclosed which allow mobile devices, and other resource constrained applications, to more efficiently and effectively utilize deep learning neural networks using only (or primarily) local resources. These systems and methods take the dynamics of runtime resources into account to enable resource-aware, multi-tenant on-device deep learning for artificial intelligence functions for use in tasks like mobile vision systems. The multi-capacity framework enables deep learning models to offer flexible resource-accuracy trade-offs and other similar balancing of performance and resources consumed. At runtime, various systems disclosed herein may dynamically select the optimal resource-accuracy trade-off for each deep learning model to fit the model's resource demand to the system's available runtime resources and the needs of the task being performed by the model. In doing so, systems and methods disclosed herein can efficiently utilize the limited resources in mobile systems to maximize performance of multiple concurrently running neural network-based applications.

column2: INTELLIGENT GOLF COURSE MANAGEMENT BASED ON INTERNET OF THINGS
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent management system applied to large, medium and small-sized golf courses. Against all types of defects and vulnerabilities in respect of golf course management atthe current stage in China, through a scientific and efficient working mode and a macroscopic control tool, namely combination of big data, artificial intelligence and the Internet-of-Things technology with the scientific and efficient working mode, management of the golf courses is intelligentized. By the application of the intelligent management system, the problems that it is difficult and troublesome to pick up balls on the golf courses, and the golf courses are disordered are solved accordingly, and the course management efficiency is greatly improved.

column2: ABNORMAL BEHAVIOR REAL-TIME MONITORING METHOD BASED ON DEEP LEARNING
column4: The invention provides an abnormal behavior real-time monitoring method based on deep learning. The abnormal behavior real-time monitoring method comprises the steps of obtaining human body target video data through a camera; extracting the human body target video data frame by frame according to the interception frequency to obtain a human body target image, and inputting the human body target image into a core controller; enabling a core controller to extract body key points and a skeleton structure of the human body target image, perform cascade connection on the extracted body key points of each target according to a motion time sequence to obtain a body posture evolution graph, and input the body posture evolution graph into a classifier; wherein the classifier is based on a body posture evolution diagram; distinguishing action classification to acquire target actions. An artificial intelligence algorithm is applied to a traditional video monitoring system, improvement of functions and performance is obtained, classification information of actions can be rapidly generated, the state of a human body can be well fed back, and the abnormal behaviors of the human body are corrected and supervised.

column2: OPERATION METHOD OF NETWORK SEPARATION APPARATUS FOR USING PUBLIC ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SERVICES OF AGENCY SYSTEM
column4: An embodiment of the present invention relates to a network separation apparatus connected to an agency management system for providing agency services. The network separation apparatus comprises: an agency network interworking module connected to an agency network secured independently by an agency management system and accessing an agency system to relay artificial intelligence service data to a user terminal receiving agency services; an artificial intelligence network interworking module connected to an artificial intelligence service system that provides artificial intelligence services through a public network; and a network separation processing module performing transmission and reception on only data for signal-converted artificial intelligence services between the agency network interworking module and the artificial intelligence network interworking module through synchronized channel connection in a state where the network interworking module and the artificial intelligence network interworking module are physically separated. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: FILE IMPLEMENTATION METHOD FOR READING ANY DATA BASED ON QUANTUM MEASUREMENT AND CONTROL SYSTEM SOFTWARE
column4: The invention relates to the field of computer systems, and particularly provides a file implementation method for reading any data based on quantum measurement and control system software. Compared with the prior art, the file implementation method for reading any data based on quantum measurement and control system software packages functions of converting read file data into required data structures and types in one function, three parameters are introduced when the function is called, and the three parameters are a file path character string head address, an address pointed by a pointer array element and an array element address. According to the method, the channel waveform data required by software running in the hard disk can be accurately read into the memory only by knowing the path where the file needs to be read, and the channel waveform data can be used for the software process of the quantum measurement and control system. Good popularization values are realized in the field of computer systems.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED PERSONAL LUNG HEALTH MANAGEMENT SYSTEM USING RESPIRATION MEASUREMENT DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based personal lung health management system using a respiration measurement device, and more particularly, to an artificial intelligence-based personal lung health management system using a respiration measurement device that can be easily used by a user anytime and anywhere, allows the user to check lung health of the user by oneself through respiration volume measurement, and provides a lung exercise method to the user to manage the lung health of the user by oneself by using a respiration measurement device that is miniaturized to measure a respiration volume of a subject anytime and anywhere not just at home or in a hospital, and has a sensor measuring a respiratory air flow and an air passage through which the respiratory air flow moves separately to be detachable so that foreign substances generated in the sensor and the air passage can be easily washed and removed. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EDUCATION ROBOT
column4: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence education robot. The system comprises a PC, a main control unit and a driving unit. PC machine connection main control unit, master control unit is connected with driving unit, the main control unit comprises a wireless network card, an infrared sensor circuit, a temperature measuring sensor, a CMOS camera and a main controller. The wireless network card, the infrared sensor circuit, the temperature measuring sensor and the CMOS camera are respectively connected with the main controller; the driving unit comprises an AVR single-chip microcomputer, a driving circuit, a left wheel motor, a right wheel motor and an encoder. The system is reasonable in design, convenient to use, capable of running in a tracing mode, stable in operation, capable of measuring the temperature, the distance and the light frequency of different landform markers when the landform markers are reached, and capable of sending data or images to the PC through thewireless network, and the temperature and distance data displayed on the upper computer of the PC are accurate.

column2: ALARM DEVICE BASED ON MACHINE VISION
column4: The utility model relates to an alarm device based on machine vision, which comprises a machine body, a transparent shell, a driving assembly, a transmission assembly, a camera recognition assembly and an intelligent control unit, according to the utility model, the central processor controls the operation of each assembly and module; the camera shooting recognition assembly transmits a shot picture back to the central processing unit. The central processing unit analyzes a picture shot by the camera shooting recognition assembly in combination with information fed back by the induction module; obstacles in the picture and related information of the obstacles are identified; voice prompt and picture prompt are fed back to a driver; the device is high in intelligent degree; according to thedevice, the distance between the automobile and the obstacle can be accurately judged, meanwhile, the type of the obstacle can be accurately judged, effective early warning information is provided for a driver, traffic accidents are avoided, meanwhile, the device can shoot recognition pictures from multiple angles and shoot a wider road area, and the situation of the obstacle around the automobile can be recognized more comprehensively.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING CLOUD PLATFORM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence monitoring cloud platform. The artificial intelligence monitoring cloud platform comprises universal wheels, a device frame, a first data line, a display, a hydraulic cylinder, a telescopic rod, an L-shaped connecting rod, an automatic telescopic rod, a connecting table, a first motor, a bearing arm, a signal transmitter and the like; Data is transmitted to a first switch through a third data line through a camera shooting device, the first switch transmits the data to the signal transmitter through a second data line, the data is wirelessly transmitted to a signal receiver through the signal transmitter, the data is transmitted to a second switch from the signal receiver through a fourth data line, the data is transmitted from the secondswitch to a hard disk video recorder through a fifth data line, and the data is transmitted to the display from the hard disk video recorder through the first data line. The telescopic rod is driven to ascend and descend through the arranged hydraulic cylinder, a second motor in the electric telescopic rod drives a movable rod on the screw rod to ascend and descend, a first motor drives the camerashooting device to rotate in each direction, and a third motor inside drives the wide-angle camera on a swing arm to adjust the angle.

column2: INTELLIGENT CLOTH INSPECTING SYSTEM BASED ON MACHINE VISION
column4: The utility model relates to an intelligent cloth inspecting system based on machine vision, which comprises a cloth inspecting machine and an intelligent control unit, the intelligent control unit controls image shooting of the camera when the cloth inspecting machine inspects cloth, and meanwhile, the intelligent control unit controls adjustment of the light brightness of the light system and controls the rotating speed of the servo motor; the cloth inspecting machine is intelligently controlled through the intelligent control unit, the cloth inspecting machine is controlled to execute various operation instructions in various control modes, and meanwhile the intelligent control unit can control the lighting system to supplement light for the camera according to actual requirements, so that images of cloth captured by the camera are clearer. The intelligent cloth inspecting system based on the machine vision is high in intelligent degree and high in automation degree, the situation that the cloth inspecting result is affected by human subjective factors existing in manual cloth inspecting is effectively avoided, and the cloth inspecting efficiency is effectively improved.

column2: CAMERA INTELLIGENT CONTROL SYSTEM APPLIED TO SERVER CABINET
column4: The invention discloses a camera intelligent control system applied to a server cabinet, relates to artificial intelligence control of a cabinet, and aims to solve the problem that the existing cameratiming turn-on mode cannot ensure that the turn-on time of a camera is the same as the operation time of an operator. According to the intelligent control circuit, intelligent control of opening thecabinet door of the server cabinet, starting shooting by the camera, closing the cabinet door of the server cabinet and stopping shooting by the camera is realized; and the telescopic device is additionally arranged, so that when the cabinet door of the server cabinet is closed, it is ensured that the camera is located in the cabinet body of the server cabinet; and when the cabinet door of the server cabinet is opened, it is ensured that the camera extends out of the cabinet body of the server cabinet. The camera intelligent control system has the advantages that it is guaranteed that the opening time of the camera is the same as the operation time of an operator, and the shooting space of the camera is met to the maximum extent.

column2: METHODS FOR TRACKING AND OPTIMIZING OF PERFORMANCE IN ORGANIZATIONS USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: An artificial intelligence system to help enhance the performance of organizations by tracking everyday work activities and periodically and automatically producing rich reporting on these activities along with recommendations that can identify and help mitigate inefficiencies. This is achieved by capturing large amounts of signals representing user activities and running a series of activity predicting models and recommendation systems, using artificial neural networks, that can characterize the nature of the activity along with useful details such as duration and relevance.

column2: EGG EMBRYO SEX DETERMINATION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON EGG SHAPE CHARACTERISTIC PARAMETERS
column4: The invention discloses an egg embryo sex determination method and device based on egg shape characteristic parameters. The method comprises the following steps: shooting a contour image of an egg; obtaining a long axis Lx, a short axis Ly, an egg-shaped area S and a small head end distance Lxt from the contour image, defining an intersection point of the long axis Lx and the short axis Ly as an egg-shaped central point, and defining a distance from the small head end of the egg to the egg-shaped central point as the small head end distance Lxt; calculating characteristic parameters of the eggshape are calculated, wherein the characteristic parameters comprise the egg shape characteristic degree EI, the thin length FL and the gravity center offset CD, EI = Lx/Ly, FL = S/Ly and CD = Lxt/Lx; and making the feature parameters into feature vectors and inputting the feature vectors into a pre-trained artificial intelligence model to obtain a sex determination result of the egg embryo. Thedevice comprises a shooting head, a processing module, a characteristic parameter calculation module and an identification module. Compared with the prior art, the non-invasive method and device are more friendly, and egg incubation cannot be affected. The method is mainly used for egg production.

column2: PORTABLE LONG-DISTANCE PLANT SIZE MEASURING INSTRUMENT AND MEASURING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention provides a portable long-distance plant size measuring instrument and the measuring method thereof which are used for acquiring phenotypic data of soybean plants in a field at any time and can also be used for acquiring phenotypic data of other outdoor plant images. The measuring instrument provided by the invention is a portable long-distance plant size measuring instrument,and comprises a measuring device and a mobile terminal. The mobile terminal is fixedly connected to the measuring device, and can be used for shooting plants. The mobile terminal receives measuring data sent by the measuring device, wherein the measuring data comprises parameters including the height from the mobile terminal to the ground during photographing of the mobile terminal, the distancebetween the mobile terminal and the highest point of the plants, an inclination angle during photographing of the mobile terminal and the like, various data and corresponding plant photos are bound, and the bound data is transmitted in a cloud server, the pictures are processed according to the data by adopting an artificial intelligence algorithm to obtain plant phenotypic data, namely the actualheight of a plant, and finally, the plant phenotypic data is stored into a plant phenotypic database.

column2: METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT FOR SHOOTING DRIVING LICENSE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and provides a method, device and equipment for shooting a driving license based on artificial intelligence, and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a picture according to a first configuration parameter corresponding to a driving license shooting mode; positioning the position of the human face in the picture; analyzing the human face in the picture, and judging whether the human face meets the condition of the first configuration parameter or not; cutting the face image according to the size set in the first configuration parameter to obtain a face image of a preset size; adjusting the background color of the face image according to the first configuration parameter; compressing the face image into a target driving license image with a preset resolution according to pixels set in the first configuration parameter; skipping to a payment page, and prompting the user to pay the shooting service on the payment page; and after detecting that the user completes payment, generating and storing an electronic receipt of the driving license photo. The scheme can improve the generation efficiency ofthe driving license photo, and is low in use threshold and convenient to operate.

column2: EXERCISE SEARCH METHOD, APPARATUS AND DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses an exercise search method, apparatus and device, and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The exercise search method includes the steps: obtaining a to-be-processed picture; cutting the to-be-processed picture to obtain a sub-picture, the sub-picture including exercise content; confirming a first vector code of the sub-picture; and based on the first vector code, searching an effective exercise picture in an exercise search engine as an exercise search result of the to-be-processed picture. By the adoption ofthe scheme, the technical problem that in the prior art, exercises containing pictures cannot be accurately searched for in an exercise library can be solved.

column2: ELECTRONIC APPARATUS AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column4: Disclosed are an electronic apparatus and a control method thereof. According to the present invention, the control method of the electronic apparatus comprises the steps of: obtaining information on a running application and storing the information in a memory when a user command is input while the application is running; and inputting a user question related to the application to a learned artificial intelligence model and outputting an answer to the obtained user question when the user question related to the application is input. The answer to the user question may be determined based on the information on the running application. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: THE CACHE MEMORY PERFORMANCE ENHANCE USING NEURAL NETWORKS AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PROGRAMING
column4: THE CACHE MEMORY PERFORMANCE ENHANCE USING NEURAL NETWORKS AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PROGRAMINGABSTRACTThe Invention is a Systems and methods for selecting an appropriate caching algorithm to be used when temporarily storing data accessed by an executing application using a neural network may dynamically and/or iteratively replace an initial caching algorithm being used for the application. An input layer of the neural network may gather values of performance related parameters, such as cache hit rates, data throughput rates, or memory access request response times. The neural network may detect a pattern or change in a pattern of accesses, or a change in a workload, a hardware component, or an operating system parameter. Dependent on these and/or other inputs, the neural network may select and apply a caching algorithm likely to improve performance of the application. Other inputs to the neural network may include values of hardware configuration parameters and/or operating system parameters. The neural network may perform a training exercise or may be self-training, e.g., using reinforcement learning.

column2: MONITORING AND ANALYZING BODY LANGUAGE WITH MACHINE LEARNING, USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEMS FOR IMPROVING INTERACTION BETWEEN HUMANS, AND HUMANS AND ROBOTS
column4: There is provided a body language system for determining a body language message of a living being in a context, said system comprising an artificial intelligence (AI) system, said AI system running a computer program that: - retrieves at least one image of said living being showing body language; - labels said living being in said at least one image, resulting in a labeled living being; - determines said context from said at least one image using a trained machine learning model; - determines a baseline body language of said labeled living being from said at least one image using a trained machine learning model; - adapts a trained machine learning model of said AI system using said baseline body language and said context; - applies the adapted trained machine learning model of said AI system to at least one of said at least one image for categorizing said body language resulting in a category, and applying said category for determining said body language message.

column2: INTELLIGENT SAFETY HELMET CAPABLE OF PREVENTING NOISE DAMAGE
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of safety helmets, and discloses an intelligent safety helmet capable of preventing noise damage. The utility model discloses an intelligent safety helmet capable of preventing noise damage. Cap body, a protective ring is fixedly installed on the periphery of the helmet body. A camera is fixedly installed on the front surface of the protection ring,an indicator lamp is fixedly installed at the bottom of the camera, an illuminating lamp control switch is movably installed on the front surface of the left side of the protection ring, an emergencyalarm button is movably installed on the right side of the illuminating lamp control switch, and a shooting control button is movably installed on the front surface of the right side of the protection ring. The utility model discloses an intelligent safety helmet capable of preventing noise damage. A more intelligent comprehensive management and control tool is provided for field operation; by utilizing technologies such as the Internet of Things, the mobile Internet, artificial intelligence big data and cloud computing, the front-end field operation is more intelligent, the rear-end management is more efficient, and meanwhile, real-time linkage of the front-end field operation and the rear-end management, synchronous transmission and storage of information and acquisition and analysis ofdata are realized.

column2: INTELLIGENT BADMINTON EJECTION WALL
column4: The utility model discloses a badminton intelligent ejection wall which comprises a badminton launching assembly, a base and a collecting pocket net, a launching wall body is fixed to the upper end ofthe base, the badminton launching assembly is arranged at the position, close to the upper end, of one side of the launching wall body, and a containing groove is formed in the position, close to thelower end, of the other side of the launching wall body. According to the badminton shooting device, the badminton shooting assembly is arranged, up-down and horizontal adjustment is conducted through the sliding rail, meanwhile, adjustment of the angle and the distance is achieved through the rotating base and the sliding base, and therefore the badminton can be shot at different angles and different positions, and different practice requirements are met; the foldable collecting bag net and the foldable middle net are arranged, the stand columns are made to rotate and ascend from the containing grooves by rotating the connecting rods, the collecting bag net is opened along with ascending of the stand columns, the middle net between the stand columns ascends to form a pull net, single-person practice is facilitated, collection is conducted through the collecting bag net, and reuse is facilitated.

column2: RESOURCE RELEASE METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides a resource release method, which comprises the steps of detecting an application task in an artificial intelligence platform according to a preset detection period; judging whether the application task is executed or not, and when the application task is executed, judging whether running resources occupied when the application task is executed in the artificial intelligenceplatform are completely released or not; if the running resources occupied when the application task is executed in the artificial intelligence platform are not completely released, determining the running resources, which are not completely released in the artificial intelligence platform, of the application task as residual resources; and executing a preset resource release strategy to release the residual resources. Through application of the method and the device, residual resources in the artificial intelligence platform can be released, available resources in the artificial intelligenceplatform are increased, the resource utilization rate of the artificial intelligence platform is improved, and stable operation of the artificial intelligence platform is ensured.

column2: INSECT TYPE IDENTIFICATION DEVICE, SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses an insect type identification device, system and method. The device comprises an artificial intelligence AI calculation unit, a camera module, a communicationmodule and a pest control device, the camera module is used for shooting an image containing insects. The AI calculation unit is used for carrying out edge detection and positioning on insects in theimages to obtain insect images, segmenting background images in the images and the insect images, segmenting at least two types of insect images, and extracting morphological features and color features of the insects from the segmented images; comparing the insect features with pre-stored insect features, and sending a comparison result to a cloud server through a communication module, so that the cloud server sends a pest alarm signal based on the comparison result to warn a worker. The pest control device is used for controlling pests according to comparison results. The device can identify insect species in time, facilitates mastering of crop conditions, can prevent and control plant diseases and insect pests, and saves manpower.

column2: BASKETBALL GOAL FRAGMENT AB TEAM AUTOMATIC DISTINGUISHING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a basketball goal segment AB team automatic distinguishing method based on artificial intelligence. The methodcomprises the following steps of detecting all players, referees and balls in a first goal video segment in a game by using a detection algorithm; carrying out clustering analysis on all players in the match segment by utilizing the color information of the polo shirt in the detection result; and 3, acquiring the basketball players of each goal segment, calculating the color features of the basketball players, and comparing the color information with the two color features stored in the step 2. According to the basketball goal fragment AB team automatic distinguishing method based on the artificial intelligence, the position and size information of the players, the referees and the balls is automatically detected by utilizing an image detection algorithm based on deep learning, the colorfeature information in the first goal segment is acquired by utilizing a color histogram and a clustering algorithm, and the team information is distinguished by calculating the color features of theshooting players in all goal segments after a second goal starts.

column2: FACE MODEL GENERATION METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to a face model generation method and device, equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a target face image; performing face feature recognitionon the target face image based on a face feature recognition model to obtain target face feature parameters of the target face image; obtaining a reference dynamic face model; determining skeleton difference information based on a target skeleton parameter corresponding to the target face feature parameter and a reference skeleton parameter corresponding to the reference dynamic face model; and adjusting the reference dynamic face model based on the skeleton difference information to obtain a target dynamic face model of the target face image. According to the invention, a dynamic face modelwhich is similar to a self-selected face image and can be played in an animation scene can be automatically generated through an artificial intelligence technology.

column2: PROJECTOR CONTROL SYSTEM AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to a control system and a control method, and more specifically, to a projector control system configured to diversify use of a protector which has been limitedly used to increase quality of life, and a control method thereof. According to the present invention, the projector control system comprises: a projector (100) capable of performing network communication; a repeater (200) configured to relay all data transmitted and received by the projector (100); an artificial intelligence (AI) server (300) configured to guide a specific data path to the projector (100) in association with the repeater (200); and a database (DB) server (400) configured to transmit selection data based on the specific data path of the AI server (300) to the projector (100). COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: INDOOR THERMAL ENVIRONMENT CONTROL SYSTEM PREDICTING THERMAL SENSATION BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses an indoor thermal environment control system predicting a thermal sensation based on an artificial intelligence technology. The indoor thermal environment control predicting the thermal sensation based on the artificial intelligence technology comprises the following steps that S1, an initial value of the comfort skin temperature of a user is set according to a recommendedcomfort temperature value, an infrared thermal imaging camera is used for shooting an infrared image of the user, and the skin temperature is identified according to thermal imaging; and S2, if the user inputs the thermal sensation such as 'feeling too cold' and 'feeling too hot'' through an HMI, the comfort domain for the skin temperature of the user is updated accordingly.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SERVICE SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to an artificial intelligence service system. The system comprises a processor, and the processor is electrically connected with a recognition unit, a parking space monitoring unit, a payment unit and a matching unit. The recognition unit comprises a first camera, and the output end of the first camera is electrically connected with a license plate recognition module, wherein the license plate recognition module is electrically connected with a vehicle body scanning module; the output end of the vehicle body scanning module is electrically connected with a data uploading module, and the data uploading module is electrically connected with the processor; the first camera is used for shooting alicense plate number of a vehicle, identifying the license plate number of the automobile through the license plate identification module and judging whether the vehicle is a foreign vehicle or not; the vehicle body scanning module is used for scanning the size of the vehicle, extracting the size data of the vehicle through the data acquisition module, and finally uploading the data to the systemthrough the data uploading module. According to the invention, the intelligent management of the parking lot is realized, and the phenomenon of disordered parking is effectively avoided.

column2: METHOD FOR SHARING APPLICATION MODULE AND APPARATUS USING THEREOF
column4: One or more of an autonomous vehicle, a user terminal, and a server of the present disclosure may be connected to, for example, an artificial intelligence module, an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV), a robot, an augmented reality (AR) device, a virtual reality (VR) device, or a 5G service device. An information processing method in an electronic device according to one embodiment of the present disclosure includes identifying a container that is logically docked on an operating system (OS), identifying an application corresponding to the container, identifying an event related to running of the application, and transmitting, to another node, information on a first block on difference including first identification information for the first block on difference generated based on first data associated with the event and second identification information for the container.

column2: CAMERA REGULATOR FOR INPUTTING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TREATMENT GLIOMA IMAGE PARAMETERS
column4: The utility model discloses a camera regulator for artificial intelligence treatment glioma image parameter input, which relates to the technical field of medical instruments and comprises a mountingplate, the lower surface of the mounting plate is fixedly connected with a stabilizing device, the right end of the stabilizing device is fixedly connected with a movable rod, and the bottom end of the movable rod is provided with a groove. The utility model discloses a camera regulator for inputting artificial intelligence treatment glioma image parameters. A second rotating shaft, a second bearing, a rotating block, a pull block, a clamping rod and a clamping groove are matched with one another; when people need to adjust the shooting angle, the camera is rotated; firstly, the pull block ispulled rightwards; the pull block drives the clamping rod to move rightwards, so that the clamping rod is separated from the clamping groove, then people can rotate the rotating block, the rotating block rotates to drive the second rotating shaft to rotate, the second rotating shaft rotates to drive the movable rod to rotate, the camera body can be driven to rotate, different parts of the brain ofa patient can be shot conveniently, and the use requirements of medical staff can be met.

column2: REMOTE DEBUGGING SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR EMBEDDED LINUX EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses a remote debugging system and method for embedded Linux equipment, belongs to the field of Linux equipment debugging, the technical problem to be solved by the invention is howto overcome the defect that embedded Linux equipment running in an intranet environment or without a network interface cannot be remotely debugged. According to the technical scheme, the system comprises a personal computer, a public network server, a handheld debugging terminal and embedded Linux equipment, wherein the personal computer is connected with the public network server, the handheld debugging terminal is connected with the public network server, the handheld debugging terminal is connected with the embedded Linux device through a serial port SSH, and the public network server is connected with the handheld debugging terminal through an SSH reverse tunnel. The method comprises the following steps: S1, a debugging person operates a public network server by using a personal computer through a remote desktop or an SSH; s2, logging in the handheld debugging terminal by the public network server through an SSH reverse tunnel; and S3, operating a serial port of the handheld debugging terminal through built-in mini software of the handheld debugging terminal, and debugging the embedded Linux equipment through the serial port.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR TESTING SCREEN OF ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT, TEST EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of intelligent manufacturing of electronic equipment and provides a method for testing a screen of electronic equipment. The method comprises the steps of controlling a production line to move the electronic equipment with the screen to a target testing position and triggering the electronic equipment to display to-be-tested content through the screen; controlling a camera to collect the screen of displaying the to-be-tested content to obtain a first image and determining shooting parameters corresponding to the screen through recognizing the to-be-tested content in the first image; and controlling the camera to collect the screen of displaying the to-be-detected content to obtain a second image on the basis of the shooting parameters and determining whether the screen passes the test or not at least on the basis of the second image. According to the method, equipment information is recognized through an image recognition technology and the proper shooting parameters can be determined by combining artificial intelligence. The invention further provides a device for testing the screen of the electronic equipment, test equipment and a computer-readable storage medium.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE APPLIED TO ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PLATFORM
column4: The invention discloses a data processing method and device applied to an artificial intelligence platform. The method comprises the steps of receiving a task request sent by a client, wherein the task request comprises to-be-processed data and a task identifier; obtaining running state information and model configuration information corresponding to each data processing module, wherein the modelconfiguration information represents a neural network model running in the data processing module; determining a target data processing module according to the task identifier and the running state information and the model configuration information corresponding to each data processing module; sending the to-be-processed data to the target data processing module; and receiving a data processing result returned by the target data processing module, wherein the data processing result is obtained by processing the to-be-processed data by the target data processing module based on the corresponding neural network model. The data processing flexibility and efficiency of the artificial intelligence platform can be improved.

column2: USER EXERCISE SCHEME GENERATION SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: An embodiment of the invention discloses a user exercise scheme generation system and method based on artificial intelligence technology. The system comprises a cloud end and a background server. Thecloud end comprises an evaluation database, a exercise scheme database and an acquisition module. The background server comprises a first receiving module for receiving user basic data and reference factors sent by the cloud end; a processing module for calling the evaluation database and processing the basic data of the user to obtain a processing result; a comparison module for comparing the processing result with the exercise scheme database to generate a preliminary exercise scheme; and a filtering module for filtering the preliminary exercise scheme by adopting reference factors so as togenerate a final exercise scheme. By implementing the embodiment of the invention, more factors (including the user basic data and the reference factors) are considered when the user exercise scheme is generated, and the background server improves the accuracy of user data analysis based on the artificial intelligence technology, so that the rationality and the value of the generated exercise scheme are improved.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR PROCESSING EQUIPMENT EXECUTION CODE OF COPROCESSOR, EQUIPMENT AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a method and device for processing equipment execution code of coprocessor, equipment and a computer readable storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. According to the embodiment of the invention, the obtained calculation expression of the calculation task of the coprocessor is analyzed and processed to obtain a syntax tree correspondingto the calculation expression, wherein the syntax tree comprises a data node and an operation node; a syntax tree is obtained according to the syntax tree; a device execution code of the coprocessoris generated, therefore, compiling processing can be performed on the equipment execution code, and the coprocessor can execute the equipment execution code. A developer does not need to manually compile the equipment execution code running on the coprocessor, the equipment execution code running on the coprocessor can be automatically compiled, the operation is simple, and the accuracy is high, so that the compiling efficiency and reliability of the equipment execution code of the coprocessor are improved.

column2: SWIMMING ROBOT AND DISPLAY APPARATUS FOR CHARGING SAME
column4: Disclosed is a display apparatus having a water tank in which one or more swimming robots are located. This apparatus includes communicator for communicating with the swimming robot or a mobile terminal, a display for displaying a video, one or more sensors, a wireless power transmitter which is located on an inner wall of the water tank and which includes a plurality of arranged transmission coils, and a controller. Accordingly, a display apparatus and a swimming robot which have artificial intelligence and which perform 5G communication may be provided. As a result, a charging efficiency can be improved, and a user's convenience can be further improved.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PERSONALIZED WELLNESS MANAGEMENT USING MACHINE LEARNING AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNIQUES
column4: The disclosure generally relates to a system and method for generating personalized wellness plans for users and monitoring adherence to such plans while providing real-time feedback to users. The personalized wellness plans are generated based on machine learning and/or artificial intelligence techniques and can provide guidance for weight loss, exercise, behavior and lifestyle modification, and integrative health and mindfulness.

column2: POWER GRID INSPECTION METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention is suitable for the field of artificial intelligence, and provides a power grid inspection method and device based on artificial intelligence, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a first image; performing feature recognition on the first image through a pre-trained target detection model, detecting whether target features exist in the first image or not, wherein the target features include power part features; if the target feature exists in the first image, calculating position information of the target feature in the first image; calculating pan-tilt control parameters according to the position information of the target features in the first image; and sending the pan-tilt control parameters to a pan-tilt to adjust the poseof the pan-tilt, obtaining a second image through shooting, wherein the second image comprises the target features. The operation amount of an operator and the searching amount of a technician for photos can be reduced, so that the troubleshooting efficiency of the technician is improved.

column2: ACQUISITION METHOD OF OPTIMAL STANDING LONG JUMP TECHNICAL TEMPLATE
column4: The invention provides an acquisition method of an optimal standing long jump technical template. The method comprises the steps of acquiring kinematics and dynamics data of the whole standing long jump process of an athlete; establishing a take-off forward kinetic equation according to data corresponding to a whole take-off process in the data, and acquiring a take-off technical equation by combining pressure distribution between feet and a supporting surface during standing long jump; establishing a target function of the lower limbs according to data corresponding to the flight time in thedata, and acquiring a flight technical equation by combining a human body relative motion rule in the air; establishing a foot bone geometric model and a finite element model according to a high-resolution tomographic image of ankles of the athlete, and calculating to obtain an optimal landing action; and establishing an optimal standing long jump technical template. According to the acquisition method of the optimal standing long jump technical template in the invention, a matching template is provided for artificial intelligence diagnosis of the standing long jump technology (joint kinematics) and a theoretical basis is provided for the optimization design of sports assistive devices.

column2: AUTOMATIC SHUTTLECOCK PICKING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an automatic shuttlecock picking device which comprises a shell, a camera shooting assembly is arranged above the left side of the shell, an oblique guide-in plate is arranged on the left side of the shell, and the camera shooting assembly comprises a fixing shaft, a limiting hole, a limiting rod, a mounting base, a rotating base, a supporting frame and a camera. According to the utility model, the shell is connected with the universal trundles through the telescopic assemblies; each telescopic assembly comprises an inner rod, a fixing protrusion, a spring, an outerrod and a fixing hole. In the use process, the lifting is needed; press-down fixing protrusion, spring stressed compression, the inner rod freely slides on the outer rod; when sliding to a proper position, the fixing bulges are clamped into the fixing holes to be fixed; when the height needs to be lowered, the operation can be completed according to the steps, the structure does not affect movement of the universal caster, the height of the shell can be adjusted, the situation that a circuit in the shell is affected by ball picking and water accumulation under the condition that it is sunny after rain is avoided, and the use safety is improved.

column2: MEMS OPTICAL SENSOR WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DETECTION FUNCTION
column4: The invention discloses an MEMS optical sensor with an artificial intelligence detection function. The solar cover is installed, the auxiliary power supply of the sensing equipment is environment-friendly and harmless, environment is not polluted, and the first optical sensing probe and the second optical sensing probe are installed, so the definition of the picture is obviously improved, staff observation and installation of infrared auxiliary devices are facilitated, and the sensor can be clearly monitored at night or in a dark place; and through mounting of protective cover, the sensing equipment can resist various severe weathers and climates, and can place the entry of tiny particles or dust and cause the failure of the compact instrument or even damage. The first optical sensing probe is used as a main probe, the second optical sensing probe is used as an auxiliary probe, the first optical sensing probe is used for shooting images, and the second optical sensing probe is used for adjusting the definition of the images.

column2: WIND DRIVEN GENERATOR SHADOW CONTROL METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a wind driven generator shadow control method and system. The method is based on unit power information, unit position information, unit shape parameters, light intensity data,unit periphery person and/or livestock distribution data information, the preset shadow flickering frequency serves as the boundary condition, the genetic algorithm is used for calculating to obtainyaw of a unit to be tested and the rotating speed control instruction, and a wind driven generator finishes the instruction response based on obtained impeller yaw and rotating speed control instructions. The wind driven generator shadow control method and system treat the related data through the artificial intelligence and machine learning method, according to the treated data, a fan is controlled to run, the shadow pollution generated during fan running can be reduced, the wind resources are used to be maximum degree, and the influence on the surrounding is reduced.

column2: WILDFIRE DETECTION SYSTEM AND METHOD USING ARRAY OF CO2 SENSORS AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention relates to a wildfire detection system that uses an array of CO2 sensors (2) and artificial intelligence. This system comprises a sensorial unit (1), a gateway (G) to relay sensorial unit data to a designated server (R) and a software (S) with a designed algorithm for processing the incoming data and trigger the fire alarms whenever it is necessary. In another aspect, the present invention relates to a method of detecting an environmental fire in its early stage by using the system described herein. Therefore, the present invention is in the domain of electronic devices for detection of environmental fires.

column2: DECISION ENGINE SYSTEM BASED ON AUDITING STRATEGY
column4: The invention discloses a decision engine system based on an auditing strategy. The decision engine system comprises a workflow module, a cleaning module, a process control module, an execution moduleand a log module. The workflow module is used for a user to combine controls in the visual operation interface in a dragging mode to form a workflow of a corresponding service scene, and each node component in the workflow is configured with a decision event. The cleaning module is used for carrying out data cleaning on the incoming data source and transmitting the cleaned data to the process control module. The process control module is used for orderly scheduling the execution process of the workflow of the corresponding service scene when the cleaned incoming data source enters.
