The execution module is used for executing rule logic and outputting a risk control decision result. The log module is used for recording and storing running process logs and execution results in the decision engine.

column2: DISTRIBUTED DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a distributed data processing method and device, an electronic device and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of loading a graph data set of a graph database into a distributed computing system; respectively constructing a current relation matrix, a propagation matrix and a label matrix according to the graph data set; running a distributed label propagation operation in the distributed computing system, and updating the label matrix through the propagation matrix; when the last two processing results are not converged, iteratively executing the construction and operation process; and when the latest two processing results converge or all nodes have the label data, extracting at least one to-be-evaluated variable according to the labelmatrix and outputting the to-be-evaluated variable to one or more artificial intelligence models.

column2: DATA ACQUISITION DEVICE FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MACHINE LEARNING
column4: The utility model discloses a data acquisition device for artificial intelligence machine learning, which comprises a bottom plate, a rotating column is rotatably arranged on the bottom plate, a dataacquisition equipment body is arranged on the rotating column, a connecting rod is arranged at one end of the bottom plate, a bearing is arranged in a retaining ring, and the rotating column is in interference fit with the inner wall of an inner ring of the bearing. The lower end of the rotary column is in point contact with the upper end of the bottom plate; therefore, frictional resistance is small, the conical groove is rotatably matched with the conical head to bear the rotation of the lower part of the rotary column; the rotating resistance to the rotating column is small; the middle of the rotary column is rotationally supported through a bearing; the rotating column can rotate stably and smoothly, so that the camera on the data acquisition equipment body can be smoothly and stably rotated to the periphery of the data acquisition device for image acquisition, the shooting direction of the data acquisition device can be changed more conveniently compared with the situation that the whole data acquisition device needs to be moved, and the problem that peripheral images are inconvenient to acquire is solved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SUPERMARKET CASHIER SYSTEM
column4: The utility model relates to an artificial intelligence supermarket cashier system. The system comprises a counter, a camera frame and a main circuit board integrated with an automatic settlement system. The front part of the counter is provided with a storage table, and the rear part is provided with a conveyor belt I which is connected with a conveyor belt II; the conveying belt II is connectedwith the storage table; a pedestrian path defined by a baffle is arranged on the side face of the counter, and a gate is arranged on the side, close to the conveying belt I, of the baffle; the camerais erected on a counter where the conveying belt II is located and an adjacent baffle; cameras I, II and III for shooting pictures of commodities purchased by customers and a binocular camera for shooting face pictures of the customers are arranged at the top of the camera frame; a loudspeaker, an LCD display and a power switch are arranged on one side of the storage table; the loudspeaker, the LCD display and the gate are connected with the power switch; the conveyor belts I and II, the cameras I, II and III, the binocular camera, the loudspeaker, the LCD display and the power switch are connected with the automatic settlement system. The device is low in labor cost and high in efficiency.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXERCISE AUXILIARY EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence exercise auxiliary device. A through hole is formed in a fixed column of the rotating assembly, and the fixed end of a rotating motor is fixed toone side of the fixed column. An output shaft of the rotating motor penetrates through the through hole and is fixedly connected with a rotating shaft; a shaft body of the rotating shaft is vertically and fixedly connected with a fixed rod; a limiting hole is formed in the end of the fixing rod in the diameter direction of the fixing rod. A limiting rod is inserted into the limiting hole and is rotationally connected with the limiting hole; an arc-shaped plate is arranged at the end part of the limiting rod; the upper end face of the arc-shaped plate is of an arc-shaped structure, a pluralityof binding belts are fixed to one side of the arc-shaped plate at intervals in the length direction of the arc-shaped plate, male hook-and-loop fasteners are arranged on the lower surfaces of the binding belts, female hook-and-loop fasteners are arranged on the other side of the arc-shaped plate in the length direction of the arc-shaped plate, and the main controller is fixed to the fixing column. According to the utility model, the body of the old people can be exercised.

column2: NETWORK RESOURCE SHARING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a network resource sharing system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a plurality of MIFI devices, a cloud server and an APP client. The MIFI equipment reports the information of the MIFI equipment through the cloud server; the cloud server comprises resource scheduling, flow statistics and information collection. The cloud server performs cloud control,scheme presetting and adjustment after artificial intelligence modeling learning; the APP client comprises a lease resource service and a connection resource service. The leasing resource service is completed by opening a hotspot, setting a password and transmitting the password to a cloud server in an encrypted manner. The transaction of the connection resource service is completed by receiving the encrypted hotspot SSID and password and decrypting and transmitting the encrypted hotspot SSID and password to the mobile phone end of the shared person, and the cloud server can complete the relayof a plurality of MIFI devices through a relay algorithm. Compared with the prior art, the method has the advantages of uniform load, no signal relay and full utilization of resources.

column2: IDENTIFICATION PHOTO SHOOTING METHOD, APPARATUS AND DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, provided are an identification photo shooting method, apparatus and device, and a storage medium, the method comprising: after starting ashooting apparatus of a terminal, displaying a plurality of shooting modes in a function menu, each shooting mode being a shooting mode for defining a shooting type of an identification photo, and each shooting mode corresponding to a configuration parameter of a group of image features; acquiring a picture photographed by the shooting apparatus according to a first configuration parameter acquired by a target shooting mode selected by a user; recognizing a human face in a picture shot by the camera according to a human face recognition algorithm, and positioning the position of the human face in the picture through a positioning frame; analyzing the human face in the picture, and judging whether the human face in the picture meets the condition of the first configuration parameter or not; and performing standardization processing on the face image according to the first configuration parameter to generate an identification photo. By adopting the scheme, the generation efficiency andthe success rate of self-service shooting of the identification photo can be improved.

column2: METHOD FOR EARLY WARNING OF ROLL PACKING EQUIPMENT FAILURE BASED ON EQUIPMENT VIBRATION IMAGING DIAGNOSIS
column4: The invention discloses a method for early warning of roll packing equipment failure based on equipment vibration imaging diagnosis, and belongs to the technical field of roll packing failure analysis. The technology for early warning of roll packing equipment failure firstly disassembles or separates the components of the roll packing equipment from the transmission system, and turns on the equipment to the running state to collect a vibration signal as a basic vibration signal of equipment running; loads the disassembled components in sequence, turns on the equipment to the running state tocollect a vibration signal as a basic vibration signal of component running; performs machine automatic learning on the collected image signal; issues early warning prompts; and performs manual confirmation and consolidation. The technology, based on a single equipment vibration analysis, combines artificial intelligence-image recognition software to learn the collected images, and further uses the component positioning analysis technology to improve the diagnostic effectiveness and accuracy.

column2: AI-BASED BODY POSTURE ANALYSIS ASSISTANT SYSTEM AND TRANSMISSION METHOD
column4: The invention relates to the field of computer networking technology and artificial intelligence, and specifically provides an AI-based body posture analysis assistant system and transmission method.Compared with the prior art, the AI-based body posture analysis assistant system is composed of a smart accessory, an AI subsystem, and a cloud server. The smart accessory is configured to be put on various parts of a body in order to collect the exercise information, the body posture artificial intelligence, body fat content, and the heart rate of a user and upload the collected data to the AI subsystem; the AI subsystem uses CNN to extract the features, forms a feature vector to characterize the body posture for human modeling analysis, designs a personalized exercise plan neural network, inputs a fitness plan, generates body posture acquisition data by a neural network to customize a personalized exercise plan, uploads the personalized exercise plan to the cloud server; the cloud serveris configured to store the data uploaded by the AI system, the data which can be observed by a client at any time. By means of the network connection and instantaneous transmission characteristics ofthe smart accessory, the AI, and the cloud server, the system has a good promotional value in helping people with healthy lives.

column2: PLAIN CODE PRIZE CLAIMING VERIFICATION METHOD
column4: The invention provides a plain code prize claiming verification method, which comprises the following steps: after a consumer purchases a product, damaging a product package, shooting the damaged product package and a prize claiming number by using a smart phone, and uploading the obtained damage evidence information and prize claiming number to a prize claiming verification system; and after theimage identification check confirms that the product packing material is really damaged, opening the prize claiming authority to the consumer, and allowing the consumer to get the set prize. By usingthe method, the prize claiming number does not need to be covered for secrecy, the process can be greatly simplified, the production is convenient, the cost can be reduced, the prize claiming participation enthusiasm of consumers can be improved, and the product sales big data acquisition rate can be improved.

column2: A SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATIC PASSENGER LOAD SENSING IN PUBLIC TRANSPORT
column4: A system using artificial intelligence for dynamic allocation of the buses and routes, where the system automatically calculates the number of passengers in the bus and senses the passenger congestion at each bus stop. The system also provides live information of the running buses in that particular route by collecting the live location of the bus. . The system may also cancel the route of that bus in which no passenger will be available or it may club the buses on neighboring routes to distribute the load efficiently or provide new bus to that particular route.

column2: AUXILIARY SPORTS TRAINING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an auxiliary sports training method based on artificial intelligence. A user model is built according to personal archive data and training strategy data of a trainee; a recommendation model is built through a collaborative filtering recommendation algorithm; and recommendation of training strategies is provided for subsequent trainees. During training, an exercise duration, image data, exercise video data and interactive data of the trainee are collected; the video data and the image data in the exercise training process are analyzed; the physical ability and the exercise intensity of the trainee are evaluated according to an exercise result; and the result obtained by the video data and the image data in the exercise training process and other data in the trainingprocess are added into a personal archive as exercise records. The quality and precision of the recommendation algorithm are improved by updating the user model; and the problems of exercise analysisand action quality evaluation in the exercise training process are solved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TABLE TENNIS COACH ADOPTING HOLOGRAPHIC PROJECTION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence table tennis coach technology adopting a holographic projection technology. Training, competition and physical fitness data of table tennis playersis collected in real time through a table tennis player training competition information collector, meanwhile, the training and competition field data is collected by the table tennis training competition information collector, the collected data is processed and analyzed through a global excellent table tennis coach training competition big data analysis system, the processed data is transmittedto an artificial intelligence coach optimization guidance system for the table tennis training competition, and an optimized coach guidance scheme is generated; and according to the artificial intelligence table tennis coach imaging system in the holographic projection technology, a virtual artificial intelligence coach training guidance image is generated, and finally artificial intelligence table tennis coaches are stereoscopically imaged to guide the players for training in various places through various holographic projection terminal devices, so that each player, table tennis enthusiastsand audiences can accept optimized table tennis training guidance anytime and anywhere.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE GOLF COACH ADOPTING HOLOGRAPHIC PROJECTION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence golf coach technology adopting the holographic projection technology. Through a golf player training and match information collector, training, match and physical fitness data of a golf player are collected in real time, meanwhile, the golf training and match information collector collects training and match site data, a global excellent golf coach training and match big data analyzing system carries out processing and analyzing on the collected data, the processed data are transmitted to a golf training and match artificial intelligence coach optimizing guide system, an optimized coach guide scheme is generated, through an artificial intelligence golf coach imaging system adopting the holographic projection technology, a virtual artificial intelligence coach training guide image is generated, finally, through various holographic projection terminal devices, an artificial intelligence golf coach can be formed through stereoimaging invarious places for guiding training of the player, and then each player, each golf lover and audience can receive the optimized golf training guidance anytime and anywhere.

column2: BRAKING DEVICE OF FORCE LIFTING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses a brake device of a strength lifting device, and aims to provide a brake device of a strength lifting device, which can effectively solve the problem that when an athlete exhausts or is out of hand by mistake, the athlete is hit by the gravity of a barbell, and the danger of injury exists in the conventional strength lifting device. The braking device comprises a braking mechanism, the braking mechanism comprises a vertical guide rail arranged on a rack of the force lifting equipment, a heavy hammer sliding block sliding along the vertical guide rail, strip-shaped braking blocks used for braking the heavy hammer sliding block and parallel to the vertical guide rail, supporting rod sets in one-to-one correspondence with the strip-shaped braking blocks, and a braking block driving executing mechanism used for driving the strip-shaped braking blocks to move up and down. The supporting rod set comprises a plurality of supporting rods distributed side by side from top to bottom, one ends of the supporting rods are hinged to the rack, and the other ends of the supporting rods are hinged to the side faces of the strip-shaped brake blocks.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR CONDUCTING ON-BOARD COMPUTING UNIT POWER CONTROL ACCORDING TO ELECTRIC SELF-DRIVING CAR RUNNING STATE
column4: The invention discloses a method and device for conducting on-board computing unit power control according to the electric self-driving car running state, and belongs to the technical field of new energy resource self-driving car energy consumption control. According to the method for conducting on-board computing unit power control according to the electric self-driving car running state, judgment and pre-judgment of the intelligent car running state are conducted through a on-board computing unit, in addition, the current running scene is recognized through AI, and the power of the on-boardcomputing unit is controlled according to the current running state and the pre-judged running state. Through the method for conducting on-board computing unit power control according to the electricself-driving car running state, the situation that computing capacity wasting and energy consumption are caused due to the fact that an intelligent car operates at the real-time full power in the whole running process can be avoided, accordingly, power control of the on-board computing unit is achieved more flexibly, and the quite good application and popularization value is achieved.

column2: FORCE LIFTING EXERCISE DEVICE WITH SAFETY PROTECTION FUNCTION
column4: The utility model discloses a force lifting exercise device with a safety protection function. The utility model discloses a strength lifting exercise device, and aims to provide the strength liftingexercise device which can monitor the barbell holding state of an athlete and can quickly respond to brake a barbell once the athlete exhausts or the barbell slips out of the hand, thereby avoiding the problem that the barbell hurts the body of the athlete due to gravity strike. The device comprises a rack, the braking unit comprises a braking mechanism, a vertical guide rail arranged on the rack,a heavy hammer sliding block sliding along the vertical guide rail, a strip-shaped braking block used for braking the heavy hammer sliding block, supporting rod sets in one-to-one correspondence withthe strip-shaped braking block and a braking block driving executing mechanism; the conduction unit comprises a transmission rope and a guide pulley block arranged on the rack, the first end of the transmission rope is connected with the heavy hammer sliding block, and the second end of the transmission rope bypasses the guide pulley block and is suspended below the guide pulley block; and a barbell rod of the barbell is connected with the second end of the transmission rope.

column2: ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT PRODUCT SERIAL NUMBER BINDING DEVICE AND BINDING METHOD
column4: The invention relates to an electronic equipment product serial number binding device and binding method. The electronic equipment comprises a PCB, a shell and a display screen, product serial numbersof the electronic equipment comprise a PCBA serial number and a shell serial number, the PCBA serial number is stored on the PCB, and the shell serial number is printed on the shell. Wherein the display screen is connected with the PCB, the binding device comprises a camera assembly and a computer terminal, and the camera assembly is connected with the computer terminal. A display screen of the electronic equipment displays the PCBA serial number, and the camera shooting assembly acquires an acquired image containing the PCBA serial number and the shell serial number and transmits the acquired image to the computer terminal; and the computer terminal identifies the PCBA serial number and the shell serial number in the acquired image, and binds and stores the PCBA serial number and the shell serial number. The artificial intelligence image recognition technology is applied to industrial production, the operation is simple, the error rate is extremely low, a large amount of manpower issaved, and the efficiency is improved.

column2: HIGH-PRECISION CAMERA FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IDENTIFICATION
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence camera position adjusting devices, and provides a high-precision camera for artificial intelligence identification, which comprises an adjusting assembly connected with a camera body and a transmission rod respectively, the adjusting assembly is fixed on the swinging assembly; the adjusting assembly comprises a box body, and a rotatable worm and an adjusting shaft are arranged in the box body in a penetrating mode. The worm and the adjusting shaft are respectively connected with the transmission rod and the camera body; the swing assembly comprises two parallel vertical plates, and swing shifting forks are arranged on the vertical plates. A rotating wheel is further arranged; and a rotating shifting fork in periodic contact with the swinging shifting fork is arranged on the rotating wheel. According to the utility model, the rotation angle of the camera body is enlarged by adopting the adjusting assembly; the horizontal shooting range of the camera body is expanded through the swing assembly which swings horizontally and transversely. Through the combination of the two, the shooting vision field of the camera is greatly expanded. Therefore, information acquisition dead angles are effectively avoided, one camera can cover a plurality of camera positions, and the information acquisition cost is reduced.

column2: STRUCTURE OF MODULE COMBINATION PHOTOGRAPHIC EQUIPMENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses a structure of module combination photographic equipment based on artificial intelligence and a method thereof. The structure comprises a central control bin, a multi-section electric control mechanical arm and a photographic assembly; according to the invention, a user selects video shooting or photo shooting, and the user presets a photographic equipment figure to locateand track an object; the photographic equipment performs figure dynamic tracking according to the video shooting setting of the user or performs figure positioning tracking according to the photo shooting setting of the user; the artificial intelligence algorithm automatically operates the electric control mechanical arm and switches the lens to complete video shooting according to the scene set by the user, and automatically operates the electric control mechanical arm, switches the lens, sets an aperture and the like according to the current environment to complete photo shooting.

column2: BEHAVIOR IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON LOCAL JOINT POINT TRACK SPACE-TIME VOLUME IN SKELETON SEQUENCE
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a behavior recognition method based on a local articulation point trajectory space-time volume in a skeleton sequence, and the method comprises the steps: extracting the local articulation point trajectory space-time volume from inputted RGB video data and skeleton articulation point data; extracting image features by using a pre-training model based on the RGB video data set; constructing a codebook for each different feature of each joint point in the training set and encoding the codebook, and connectingthe features of the n joint points in series to form a feature vector; and performing behavior classification and recognition by using an SVM classifier. According to the method, manual features and deep learning features are fused, local features are extracted by using a deep learning method, and fusion of multiple features can achieve a stable and accurate recognition rate. According to the invention, the 2D human body skeleton estimated by the attitude estimation algorithm and the RGB video sequence are used to extract the features, the cost is low, the precision is high, and the method hasimportant significance when applied to a real scene.

column2: THROWING METHOD OF CURLING ROBOT
column4: The invention discloses a throwing method of a curling robot, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence and control. The method comprises the following steps of determining the quantity and positions of curlings of two parties inside and outside a base camp; obtaining a curling playing field image; performing image correction; performing curling recognition, division and positioning; determining the quantity and positions of the curlings of the two parties inside and outside the base camp; designing a curling game self party score function St; setting a curling radius to berc; comparing distances from the curling centers of the two parties to a center point of the base camp to a base camp radius r; determining the curling quantity of the self party in the base camp tobe K, the curling quantity of the other party to be H, and the score to be St; determining a throwing method; designing an evaluation function in the curling throwing process according to the currentmoment score conditions St and the curling quantities of the two parties in different positions; and then, determining the throwing method according to the evaluation function. The throwing method ofthe curling robot has the advantages that the complexity of a curling robot throwing strategy algorithm is greatly reduced, and the basis is provided for further decision and control implementation ofthe curling robot.

column2: LASER RADAR DYNAMIC OBJECT SENSING METHOD APPLIED TO INTELLIGENT DRIVING VEHICLE
column4: The invention discloses a laser radar dynamic object sensing method applied to an intelligent driving vehicle. The laser radar dynamic object sensing method specifically comprises the following stepsthat a high-precision map is constructed to obtain an environment point cloud map of a vehicle running route and corresponding geographic coordinates; rough positioning is carried out on the high-precision map, and the environment point cloud in the vicinity of the current position of the high-precision map is obtained; a high-precision map positioning module carries out point cloud matching basedon the point cloud scanned by the current laser radar and the point cloud on the high-precision map to obtain an accurate position; the high-precision map positioning module performs matching to obtain the environment point cloud at the corresponding position of the map and the point map scanned by the current laser radar; and the point cloud corresponding to a dynamic object is obtained according to the confidence degree of Gaussian distribution. According to the method for extracting the dynamic object point cloud of the laser radar based on the high-precision map, radar point cloud classification is carried out by combination of visual recognition and point cloud calibration fusion, so that the clustering and tracking calculation amount can be greatly reduced, and meanwhile, the accuracy can be improved.

column2: ROCK CLIMBING BOX
column4: The invention discloses a rock climbing box. The rock climbing box comprises a box body, wherein a first rock climbing plate is fixed to the obverse side of the box body, a second rock climbing plateis arranged at the top of the box body, a third rock climbing plate is arranged on the reverse side of the box body, the first rock climbing plate is connected with the second rock climbing plate in ahinged mode, the second rock climbing plate is connected with the third rock climbing plate in a hinged mode, a plurality of rock points are arranged on the surface of the first rock climbing plate,a plurality of rock points are arranged on the surface of the second rock climbing plate, a plurality of rock points are arranged on the surface of the third rock climbing plate, a suspension block isfurther arranged at the bottom of the third rock climbing plate, first supporting pieces are further arranged at two sides of the box body, the first supporting pieces are used for making the secondrock climbing plate turn over to a position in the same plane as the first rock climbing plate and maintain the state, second supporting pieces are arranged at two sides of the second rock climbing plate, and the second supporting pieces are used for making the third rock climbing plate turn over to a position in the same plane as the second rock climbing plate and maintain the state. Through therock climbing box, a rock wall construction process is simple, efficiency is high, and labor intensity is low.

column2: MONITORING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON FACE RECOGNITION AND HEAD AND SHOULDER DETECTION
column4: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence monitoring, and particularly relates to a monitoring method and system based on face recognition and head and shoulder detection. The method comprises the following steps: S1, deploying and controlling a specified number of cameras according to a monitoring place to realize full-coverage monitoring of the place; S2, performing databasemanagement, transmitting the images to be compared to a database for storage; S3, shooting a video image and tracking and capturing a human face image by a camera, and transmitting the image information to a back-end server; S4, the back-end server calling the images stored in the database and comparing and analyzing the images with the face images captured by the camera, detecting and tracking all people in the video by the head and shoulder, acquiring the head and shoulder information of each person, numbering the ID for each person, and tracking the motion trail of each ID; and S5, carryingout early warning if the face matching is successful, and giving a motion track corresponding to the person whose face matching is successful.

column2: OBJECT IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The invention relates to the field of computer vision, and discloses a method for optimizing a photographing posture of a user, being applied to electronic equipment. The method comprises the following steps: displaying a photographing interface of a camera of the electronic equipment; obtaining a framing image of the shooting interface, and determining that the shooting interface comprises a portrait according to the framing image; and entering a posture recommendation mode, and presenting the human body posture recommendation picture to the user according to a preset preview mode, wherein the human body posture picture is at least one picture which is selected from a picture library by using metric learning, and the similarity between the picture and the framing image is ranked at the top, and the similarity is the overall similarity fusing the background similarity and the foreground similarity.

column2: TASK SCHEDULING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: Embodiments of the present application relate to the field of artificial intelligence. Disclosed are a task scheduling method and device, capable of improving the working efficiency of a vehicle-mounted device in comprehensive consideration of delay requirements and power consumption requirements in a running state. The method comprises: determining a motion state of a mobile device, and determining, according to the motion state of the mobile device, M tasks to be carried out; determining N delay-sensitive tasks in the M tasks; for the delay-sensitive tasks, computing power consumption demands of the delay-sensitive tasks; determining operators having target power consumption headroom ranges matching the power consumption demands of the delay-sensitive tasks and being capable of finishing the delay-sensitive tasks within delay-required durations of the delay-sensitive tasks as target operators for carrying out the delay-sensitive tasks; and allocating the delay-sensitive tasks to the target operators for delay-sensitive tasks.

column2: MONITORING AND ANALYZING BODY LANGUAGE WITH MACHINE LEARNING, USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEMS FOR IMPROVING INTERACTION BETWEEN HUMANS, AND HUMANS AND ROBOTS.
column4: There is provided a body language system for determining a body language message of a living being, said system comprising an artificial intelligence (AI) system, said AI system running a computer program that:5 - retrieves at least one image of said living being showing body language; - labels said living being in said at least one image, resulting in a labeled living being; - determines a baseline body language of said labeled living being; - adapts said AI system using said baseline body language;10 - applies said adapted AI system to at least one of said at least one image for categorizing said body language resulting in a category, and applying said category for determining said body language message.

column2: NUCLEAR POWER PLANT OPERATION FAULT ALARM METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a nuclear power plant operation fault alarm method based on an artificial intelligence technology, and the method is characterized in that the method comprises the steps: (1) carrying out the quantitative analysis of nuclear power plant operation parameters possibly affected by an operation fault; (2) screening according to results, and determining final parameters; (3) establishing a neural network model according to the final parameters, and training the neural network model; (4) determining and calculating training residual dimensionality reduction curve data and test residual dimensionality reduction curve data, and determining a threshold value triggered by an alarm function; and (5) realizing operation fault alarm according to the final parameter and a corresponding trigger threshold. The method has the following beneficial effects: aiming at specific power plant operation parameters, a dynamic power plant operation parameter operation zone can be formed by means of a prediction value and an alarm threshold value of a neural network algorithm. The running belt can adaptively change along with the change of the running working condition of the unit, sothat the problems of alarm missing and false alarm under complex working conditions are effectively avoided.

column2: POWER GRID INSPECTION VEHICLE DRIVING ASSISTANCE SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a power grid inspection vehicle driving assistance system based on artificial intelligence. The system is arranged in a power grid inspection vehicle, and comprises a positioning module, a map navigation module, a driving module, a ranging module, a camera shooting module, a recognition module and a transmission module. With the implementation of the system, the driving direction of the power grid inspection vehicle can be automatically corrected, obstacle avoidance treatment can be performed, the picture and position of a failed power grid can be sent to a remote background, power grid inspection efficiency and accuracy can be improved, and labor costs can be reduced.

column2: ADAPTIVE ADJUSTMENT TARGET TRACKING ALGORITHM BASED ON DEPTH IMAGE
column4: The invention discloses an adaptive adjustment target tracking algorithm based on a depth image. The system comprises a central processing unit, a client and a camera acquisition module, the input endof the central processing unit is connected with the output end of the camera shooting acquisition module; wherein the output end of the camera shooting acquisition module is connected with the inputend of the scanning system, the scanning system comprises an illumination scanning module, a local scanning module, a gray processing module, an recognition module, an angle processing module and a distance sensing module, and the invention relates to the technical field of computer vision. The invention discloses a self-adaptive adjustment target tracking algorithm based on a depth image. The output end of the camera shooting acquisition module is connected with the input end of the scanning system, so that the target tracking based on the depth image is not interfered by the problems of illumination condition change, obstacle shielding, variable target scale and the like, the target tracking effect is better, and the accuracy, stability and real-time performance of target tracking are improved.

column2: METHOD FOR ENDOWING EFFECTIVE ADVERTISER WITH RIGHTS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IDENTIFICATION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a method for endowing an effective advertiser with rights based on artificial intelligence identification technology, and the method comprises the steps: constructing an intelligent identification system which comprises a camera device, a processing device and a display device, and the camera device is used for shooting an advertisement viewer in a specific region; the processing device is used for receiving the information shot by the camera device and identifying, analyzing, calculating and processing the shot information so as to confirm whether a viewer meets the viewing requirement of the system or not, and if the viewer meets the viewing requirement set by the system, the processing device sends an instruction to give a specific permission to the advertisementviewer; and the display device is used for displaying image-text or video information. According to the invention, the advertisement can be watched more actively and enthusiasm, whether the playing of the advertisement is effectively watched by people or not can be known from unknown, and the advertisement can be objectively and accurately recorded, counted and analyzed.

column2: DEFECT CLASSIFICATION LEARNING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND CLASSIFICATION METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses a defect classification learning system based on artificial intelligence and a classification method thereof, the defect classification learning system comprises a camera device, the camera device is provided with two shooting areas, and an image photosensitive chip is arranged in each shooting area; a light source device; a detection device which comprises a rolling assembly and a conveying belt, the rolling assembly drives the conveying belt to conduct cyclic conveying, the camera device is arranged above the conveying belt, and the light source device is arranged below the conveying belt to correspond to a shooting area; and an image processing unit which is in communication connection with the camera device so as to detect image signals shot in the image photosensitive chip, control the camera device to shoot the surface of the same coiled material in different shooting areas, and finish defect detection on the surface of the coiled material by combining twotimes of detection contents. Defects on the surface of the coiled material can be recorded, analyzed and stored.

column2: PRODUCT SURFACE STATE DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a product surface state detection method and device, equipment and a medium, and relates to the field of cloud computing and the field of artificial intelligence. According tothe specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a plurality of surface state pictures obtained by shooting at least two illumination intensities of a to-be-detected target product at at least two shooting angles; inputting each surface state picture into a corresponding detection model, and obtaining a defect detection result corresponding to each surface state picture according to an output result of each detection model; wherein the detection model is obtained by training a sample image obtained by shooting at set illumination intensity at a set shooting angle; and determining a detection result of the target product according to the defect detection result corresponding to each surface state picture. According to the technical scheme of the embodiment of the invention, the product can be automatically detected according to the surface state picture of the product, and the detection efficiency and the detection precision are improved.

column2: ROCK CLIMBING PLATE
column4: The utility model discloses a rock climbing plate which comprises a plate body and a plurality of rock points, the plate body comprises a reinforcing layer, a reinforcing layer, a plurality of reinforcing ribs, a plurality of reinforcing ribs and a plurality of reinforcing ribs, the upper protective layer is located on the upper surface of the reinforcing layer and comprises a polyvinyl chloride (PVC) layer attached to the upper surface of the reinforcing layer and a first glass fiber reinforced plastic layer arranged on the surface, back to the reinforcing layer, of the PVC layer; the lower protective layer is located below the reinforcing layer and comprises a PVC layer attached to the lower face of the reinforcing layer and a second glass fiber reinforced plastic layer arranged on the face, back to the reinforcing layer, of the PVC layer, and the rock climbing plate is high in strength, good in waterproof, corrosion-resistant and fireproof performance, wide in use range and suitablefor severe use environments; the composite board is high in toughness, excellent in impact resistance, capable of being conveniently cut into any size, capable of conveniently customizing the installation position of a rock point, high in installation freedom degree, small in self-weight of the board body, capable of being conveniently installed by workers, low in manufacturing cost and good in economic benefit.

column2: MONITORING AND ANALYZING BODY LANGUAGE WITH MACHINE LEARNING, USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEMS FOR IMPROVING INTERACTION BETWEEN HUMANS, AND HUMANS AND ROBOTS
column4: There is provided a body language system for determining a body language message of a living being in a context, said system comprising an artificial intelligence (AI) system, said AI system running a computer program that: - retrieves at least one image of said living being showing body language; - labels said living being in said at least one image, resulting in a labeled living being; - determines said context from said at least one image using a trained machine learning model; - determines a baseline body language of said labeled living being from said at least one image using a trained machine learning model; - adapts a trained machine learning model of said AI system using said baseline body language and said context; - applies the adapted trained machine learning model of said AI system to at least one of said at least one image for categorizing said body language resulting in a category, and applying said category for determining said body language message.

column2: EXERCISING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BY REFINING MODEL OUTPUT
column4: The improved exercise of artificial intelligence. Raw output data is obtained by applying an input data set to an artificial intelligence (AI). Such raw output data is sometimes difficult to interpret. The principles defined herein provide a systematic way to refine the output for a wide variety of AI models. An AI model collection characterization structure is utilized for purpose of refining AI model output so as to be more useful. The characterization structure represents, for each of multiple and perhaps numerous AI models, a refinement of output data that resulted from application of an AI model to input data. Upon obtaining output data from the AI model, the appropriate refinement may then be applied. The refined data may then be semantically indexed to provide a semantic index. The characterization structure may also provide tailored information to allow for intuitive querying against the semantic index.

column2: INDEXING REFINED OUTPUT OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELS
column4: The improved exercise of artificial intelligence by systematically refining and semantically indexing the output from AI models, so that the semantic index is highly relevant. To do this, the computing system obtains results of an input data set being applied to an AI model. The computing system then determines a refinement to apply to the obtained results. This determination may be based on one or more characteristics of the AI model and/or input data set. The determination may also be based on hints associated with that AI model, and/or learned behavior regarding how that AI model is typically used. The obtained results are then refined using the determined refinement. It is then this more relevant refined results that are semantically indexed to generate the semantic index. Thus, the semantic index represents, the more useful output from an AI model, which is semantically exposed so as to provide meaning.

column2: INTERFACING WITH RESULTS OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENT MODELS
column4: The improved exercise of artificial intelligence by providing a systematic way for a computing system to interface with output from AI models. To do this, the computing system obtains results of an input data set being applied to an AI model. The results are then refined based characteristic(s) of the AI model and perhaps the input data set. Based upon characteristic(s) of the AI model and perhaps the input data set, interface element(s) are identified that can be used to interface with the refined results. The interface element(s) are then communicated to an interface element that interfaces with the refined results. The interface element(s) may include, for instance, operator(s) or term(s) that may be used to query against the refined results and/or an identification of visualization(s) that may be used to present to a user results of queries against the refined results.

column2: ELEVATOR GUIDE RAIL COMPREHENSIVE PARAMETER DETECTION AND EVALUATION METHOD AND DETECTION SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an elevator guide rail comprehensive parameter detection and evaluation method and a detection system. A robot is installed on a detected guide rail, and the robot walk to a support detection position to detect guide rail steps, a guide rail distance and guide rail verticality. Detection data is wirelessly transmitted to a handheld equipment terminal. A detection robot anti-collision system detects a guide rail terminal, completes detection work and returns to an initial position. The method and the system have advantages that an independent control model can solve conflicts among multiple detections or control tasks, a guide rail climbing detection robot can detect a detection item specified by a standard only through one-time automatic operation, and detection efficiency is improved; the handheld equipment terminal is convenient to carry, and labor intensity is reduced; ' 'Internet +' ' and artificial intelligence technologies are adopted, potential safety hazards can be found in advance through data mining, and elevator safety is guaranteed; a guide rail distance detection module is in rigid connection with a step detection sensor, assembling errors caused by guide rail distance detection are avoided, and a detection result is accurate.

column2: REFRIGERATOR USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGES FOR RECOGNIZING AND DETECTING ICING
column4: The invention relates to a refrigerator using artificial intelligence images for recognizing and detecting icing. An image without icing or a water film, an image without icing and with a water film,an image without icing and with a water film and water drops, an image after icing and an image after frosting of a refrigerator evaporating pipe are shot with camera shooting equipment, and through artificial intelligence image recognition, it is judged to be icing or frosting when the similarity of the image after icing or frosting and a real-time image in detection reaches a threshold value. The refrigerator refers to a device which is composed of a compressor, an evaporator, a refrigerant and an insulation tank and can change the temperature of a specific space.

column2: VOICE RECOGNITION DATA DISTRIBUTION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to a voice recognition data distribution method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises thefollowing steps that voice recognition data corresponding to voice is acquired; the voice recognition data is data generated according to a specified data format protocol according to the result of voice recognition and semantic understanding; a first access party is obtained according to the data distribution rule and the content of the voice identification data; the data distribution rule comprises the corresponding relation between the content of the voice identification data and the first access party; the first access party is at least one of the M voice service access parties installedin a terminal; each voice service access party is a program with a unified software development kit (SDK); and the voice identification data is distributed to the first access party through the uniform SDK included in the first access party. According to the scheme, the internal storage occupied by codes of an interface adaptation part in the running process of a voice assistant can be reduced, and the performance of the terminal during running of the voice assistant is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ALGORITHM MODEL SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON DYNAMIC MONITORING OF HEART FUNCTIONS
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence algorithm system and method based on dynamic monitoring and analysis of heart functions. The artificial intelligence algorithm system includes a dataacquisition device, a compression sensing device, a compression domain calculating device, a preprocessing device and a convolutional neural network device. Based on the artificial intelligence algorithm model system, the system is used in a portable heart intelligent patch system, can be worn at the breast wall of a human body in a wearable device manner, the mechanical vibration of heart is monitored in vitro, vibration information of the heart is obtained continuously, in real time and non-invasively, and with combination of digital processing, machine learning and artificial intelligencetechnology pattern recognition and intelligent diagnosis, the abnormal physical structure and pulse rhythm of the heart are found in the early stage, such as valvular lesions, abnormal movement of heart wall, change of the ejection fraction of the heart, arrhythmia and the like. The purposes of early warning and timely medical care for heart diseases can be realized. The system has practical significance on early warning and monitoring of the heat functions and contrast postoperative rehabilitation monitoring, daily monitoring of home-based elderly people and physical exercise people.

column2: MANAGEMENT SERVICE SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON DYNAMIC MONITORING AND ANALYSIS OF HEART FUNCTIONS
column4: The invention discloses a health management service system and method based on dynamic monitoring and analysis of heart functions. The system includes a heart health service cloud platform, a connected heart function intelligent monitoring and early warning device, an intelligent mobile terminal and a management subsystem connected with a medical service institution information platform. The mechanical vibration of the heart is monitored in vitro by a portable intelligent wearable device, vibration information of the heart is obtained in real time and non-invasively, and with combination of digital processing, machine learning and artificial intelligence technology pattern recognition and intelligent diagnosis, the abnormal physical structure and pulse rhythm of the heart are found in theearly stage, such as valvular lesions, abnormal movement of heart wall, change of the ejection fraction of the heart, arrhythmia and the like. With combination of an early warning reporting system, the purposes of early warning and timely medical care for heart disease can be realized. The system has great significance for early warning and monitoring and contrast postoperative rehabilitation monitoring of serious arrhythmia, angina pectoris and acute myocardial infarction, daily monitoring of home-based elderly people and physical exercise people.

column2: MEDICAL ENDOSCOPE IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND SYSTEM, MACHINE EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a medical endoscope image processing method and system, machine equipment and a medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence image processing, machinelearning and the like. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an original endoscope image according to a medical endoscope video stream; processing the obtained original endoscope image into a set size, and generating a standard endoscope image; predicting a low-quality image and a non-low-quality image of the standard endoscopic image through a neural network, the low-quality image being a standard endoscopic image with interference; and filtering the standard endoscopic image belonging to the low-quality image to obtain a target endoscopic image. According to the technical scheme, shooting switching and shaking of the endoscope in the digestive tract can be eliminated, a large amount of low-quality noise images exist under various liquid and foreign matter conditions, the robustness of the noise images is enhanced, and then systematic and complete image recognition can be achieved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FITNESS COACH ADOPTING HOLOGRAPHIC PROJECTION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence fitness coach technology adopting a holographic projection technology. Through a fitness personnel training and competition information collector, health and physical ability data of fitness personnel are collected in real time; meanwhile, a fitness training information collector collects training and field data; then the collected data are processed and analyzed through a global excellent fitness coach training and competition big data analysis system; the processed data are transmitted to an artificial intelligence fitness coach optimization guidance system; an optimized coach guidance scheme is generated; virtual artificial intelligence coach training guidance images are generated through an artificial intelligence fitness coach imaging system using a holographic projection technology; and finally, various kinds of holographic projection terminal equipment are used for stereo-imaging of artificial intelligence fitness coaches in various places to guide the fitness personnel in training, so that the fitness personnel and fitness enthusiasts can accept optimized fitness training guidance anytime and anywhere.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE WHEELCHAIR FOR OLD-AGED PROVISION
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence wheelchair for old-aged provision. The artificial intelligence wheelchair comprises a chair back, a back cushion, a handle, a storing frame, a chairplate, a chair seat, electric wheels, a bottom plate, chair frames, a pedal, an operation table, a supporting vertical rod, a supporting transverse rod, a display screen and the like; and the back cushion is arranged on the front side of the chair back, the handle is arranged on the rear side of the upper end of the chair back, the storing frame is arranged on the lower part of the chair back, thechair plate is arranged on the lower part of the front part of the chair back, a hydraulic device is arranged on the lower part of the chair plate, and the bottom plate is arranged on the lower partof the hydraulic device. Through the artificial intelligence wheelchair for old-aged provision, the positioning, moving, physical detecting, physical exercise and emergence condition treatment functions for the aged are integrated, thus the aged can be well nursed in time, and meanwhile, the aged take and place objects more conveniently through the operation table or the storing frame which is arranged on the two sides of the wheelchair; and compared with an existing wheelchair, the artificial intelligence wheelchair for old-aged provision is more powerful in function, more convenient to use,and safer.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FOOTBALL COACH ADOPTING HOLOGRAPHIC PROJECTION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence football coach technology adopting a holographic projection technology. According to the technology, training, game and physical data of football players are acquired in real time by a football player training information acquisition device, and simultaneously, a football training information acquisition device collects training and game field data; then the collected data are processed and analyzed by a global excellent football coach training big data analysis system; the processed data are transmitted to a football training artificial intelligence coach optimization guiding system to generate an optimized coach guide scheme; a virtual artificial intelligence coach guide image is generated by an artificial intelligence football coach imaging system adopting the holographic projection technology; and finally, by various holographic projection terminal equipment, an artificial intelligence football coach is stereoscopically imaged invarious places to guide football players to train, so that each player, football fans and audiences receive the optimized football training guidance anytime and anywhere.

Such raw output data is sometimes difficult to interpret. The principles defined herein provide a systematic way to refine the output for a wide variety of AI models. column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ASSISTED PRODUCTION ADVISORY SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: A method includes receiving first data and building a first model of a well based at least partially upon the first data. The method also includes receiving second data and building a second model including a network of flowlines based at least partially upon the second data. At least one of the flowlines is connected to the well. The method also includes combining the first model and the second model to produce a combined model. The method also includes calibrating the combined model to produce a calibrated model. Calibrating the combined model includes receiving measured data, running a simulation of the combined model to produce simulated results, and adjusting a calibration parameter to cause the simulated results to match the measured data. The calibration parameter includes a productivity index of a fluid flowing out of the well. The method also includes updating the calibrated model to produce an updated model.

column2: AUTOMATIC ROLLER SHUTTER TYPE BADMINTON NET RACK
column4: The utility model discloses an automatic roller shutter type badminton net rack which comprises a winder, a base, a badminton intercepting net, a sliding block and a connecting rope, a supporting rodis fixed at the upper end of the base, universal wheels are arranged at the lower end of the base, a first badminton net and a second badminton net are arranged at the upper end of the supporting rodrespectively, and a winding reel is arranged at the upper end of the supporting rod. According to the utility model, the high-strength adsorption magnetic blocks with opposite magnetisms attract eachother, so that the interception ball net is fixed, and meanwhile, the adsorption magnets and the corresponding high-strength adsorption magnetic blocks at the lower end are adsorbed, fixed and secondarily fixed, so that the interception ball net is rapidly and stably adsorbed and fixed through the high-strength adsorption magnetic blocks; the intercepting ball net is wound by the winding reel, andthe sliding block slides along the connecting rope, so that the intercepting ball net cannot be stacked during winding, the winding stability is guaranteed, and after the intercepting ball net is wound, the connecting rope is wound into the winder, and quick and stable winding is realized.

column2: QUICKLY-FIXED BADMINTON SWING RECORDING DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses a shuttlecock swing recording device capable of being fixed quickly. The device comprises a mounting port, a protective cross, recording equipment, an interlayer, a silicagel fixing sleeve, a sleeving port and a square hole, an interlayer is arranged at the upper position in the silica gel fixing sleeve. A sleeving opening is formed in the lower end of the silica gel fixing sleeve; a protective cross is arranged at the upper end of the silica gel fixing sleeve; recording equipment is arranged above the interlayer; the silica gel fixing sleeve has the advantages that due to the fact that the installation openings are formed in the surfaces of the periphery of the silica gel fixing sleeve, according to the good mechanical property of silica gel, an operation recording device is plugged into the silica gel fixing sleeve through the installation openings, and the recording device is convenient to fix; the protective cross is designed on the silica gel fixing sleeve, so that the corners of the recording equipment are protected, the badminton racket handle is prevented from falling on the ground, the recording equipment directly impacts the ground, and the recording equipment is protected.

column2: INTELLIGENT ANTI-THEFT BADMINTON RACKET PLACING RACK
column4: The utility model discloses an intelligent anti-theft badminton racket placing rack. Including a base, an anti-theft shed is arranged above the base; a steel wire grid is arranged at the top end of the interior of the anti-theft shed; drying balls are arranged in the steel wire grids; an upper cross beam is arranged on the upper portion of the interior of the anti-theft shed, a lower cross beam isarranged on the lower portion of the interior of the anti-theft shed, a groove is formed in the upper cross beam, a badminton racket is arranged in the groove, the badminton racket is connected withthe groove through an anti-theft assembly, and an anti-theft door is arranged on the side wall, close to the groove, of the anti-theft shed. The badminton racket is provided with the anti-theft shed,the anti-theft door and the anti-theft assembly, the anti-theft door and the anti-theft shed are fixed through the intelligent anti-theft lock, the anti-theft assembly comprises the locking block, theconnecting rod body, the locking hole and the anti-theft lock, the intelligent anti-theft lock and the anti-theft lock are matched in the using process to achieve the dual anti-theft function of thebadminton racket, and placement safety is improved.

column2: INTELLIGENT ANTI-THEFT BADMINTON FRAME
column4: The utility model discloses an intelligent anti-theft badminton frame. The badminton net comprises a ground, bases are symmetrically arranged on the left side and the right side of the upper portion of the ground, grooves are symmetrically formed in the left side and the right side of each base, the ground is connected with the grooves through anti-theft assemblies, a vertical rod is arranged on each base, and a badminton net body is arranged between the two vertical rods; the anti-theft assembly comprises a limiting plate, an intelligent coded lock, a lock chain, a limiting base, a first limiting hole, a second limiting hole and a containing groove. The vertical rod is of a liftable structure; the device is mainly composed of an inner rod, an outer rod, a fixing hole, an elastic protrusion and a spring. In the using process, the elastic protrusions are pressed down, the springs are stressed to contract, the inner rod can slide in the outer rod at the moment, the elastic protrusions are directly clamped into the fixing holes to be fixed when the inner rod slides to the proper position, the structure can be suitable for people of different ages and heights, and popularization is easier.

column2: AUXILIARY FITNESS METHOD BASED ON ELECTROMYOGRAPHIC SIGNAL
column4: The invention discloses an auxiliary fitness method based on an electromyographic signal, belongs to the technical field of mode identification and artificial intelligence and relates to an auxiliaryfitness method based on an electromyographic signal. According to the method, an electrode slice collects the human body surface electromyographic signal, the human body surface electromyographic signal is processed through multiple kinds of collection circuits, the processed electromyographic signal is uploaded to an upper computer, and the signal is subjected to characteristic value extraction.A support vector machine (SVM) for machine learning is used as a classifier model for judging whether or not actions are standard, a linear kernel and Gaussian kernels of different lambda parameters are used separately, SVM model training is conducted separately, and a model fitness action standard with a best training effect is selected for judgement. A three-layer BP nerve network is adopted asa classifier model for classifying the actions, and an extracted characteristic value is used as an input nerve cell of the nerve network. An RELU function is used as an activation function, nonlinearmapping of input information is achieved, the classifier model obtained after training is used for achieving action identification, and the accuracy is high.

column2: INTERACTIVE BADMINTON SCORING DEVICE BASED ON BEHAVIOR RECOGNITION
column4: The utility model discloses an interactive badminton scoring device based on behavior recognition. It comprises a housing, a first display screen, a first camera, a second display screen and a secondcamera are arranged on the two opposite sides of the shell respectively. Control panel arranged in shell, the control panel comprises a GPU processor, a data memory and a wireless signal transceivingmodule. Wherein the output ends of the first camera and the second camera are connected with the input end of the GPU processor, the output end of the GPU processor is connected with the input ends ofthe first display screen and the second display screen, and the data memory and the wireless signal transceiving module are in bidirectional connection with the GPU processor; and the GPU processor judges a score result according to a preset rule and the video images shot by the first camera and the second camera, and displays the score result on the first display screen and the second display screen. By arranging the interactive scoring device which can be clamped and installed on the badminton net, a user can check score conditions and countdown time at any time during sports.

column2: CHARGING METHOD, DEVICE AND SYSTEM, TERMINAL AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of computer, in particular to a charging method, device and system, a terminal and a storage medium. The charging method provided by the disclosure includes the following steps: firstly, acquiring the charging parameters of a terminal; secondly, running an artificial intelligence model according to the charging parameters to determine a charging mode; and finally, negotiating with a charger according to the charging mode so as to enable the charger to adjust the supply voltage and/or supply current according to the negotiation. In the charging method provided by the disclosure, the best charging mode of the terminal under the current state is obtained by using the artificial intelligence model according to the real-time charging parameters of the terminal, so that a balance between the best charging efficiency and the current charging state can be achieved according to the hardware characteristics of different terminals.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VR DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence VR device. The artificial intelligence VR device comprises a simulation cabin, a first servo motor, an electric glass door, a running machine, an environmental simulation unit and a VR touch garment, wherein the running machine is mounted at the bottom of the inner side of the simulation cabin; the first servo motor is mounted on the top of the simulation cabin through screws, the output shaft of the first servo motor is connected with a sliding mechanism through a transmission mechanism, a lifting mechanism is mounted at the bottom of the sliding mechanism, and an angle adjusting mechanism is mounted at the end of the lifting mechanism; the environmental simulation unit comprises a speed adjusting air blower and a heater, the heater is assembled at the position of an air outlet of the speed adjusting air blower, and the speed adjusting air blower is mounted at the end of the angle adjusting mechanism; and sensing sleeves are arranged,corresponding to wrist and ankle parts of a human body, on the VR touch garment. The device is high in environmental simulation capacity, high in reality of environmental simulation and good in simulation effect, and the experience feeding of a user is improved.

column2: DEVICE FOR GUIDING USER TO DO CERVICAL VERTEBRA MOVEMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to the field of computer technology artificial intelligence and the technical field of unmanned aerial vehicles, in particular to a device for guiding a user todo cervical vertebra movement. According to the device for guiding the user to do the cervical vertebra movement, the user is guided to adjust the body posture in the preset mode, and the user can dophysical exercise accurately and interestingly, so that the effect and the efficiency are better.

column2: A SYSTEM AND METHOD TO ANALYZE AND IMPROVE SPORTS PERFORMANCE USING MONITORING DEVICES
column4: The embodiments herein provide a method and system for monitoring, analyzing, improving and giving instant feedback on sports performance of an individual. The embodiments also provide a system and method to create visual representation of a sports action without the use of any visual data capture mechanisms. The system includes a game monitoring device, a communication network, a remote server, and a computing device. The remote server comprises a filtering and signal processing module, an analytics module, a database, and an artificial intelligence module. The computing device incudes several modules and a user interface. The game monitoring device detects several data points from the player and transmits the same to the remote server. The remote server filters and processes the signals for analyzing each shot and the game of the player. The analysis is visualized and displayed on the user computing device.

column2: METHOD FOR GUIDING USER IN CERVICAL VERTEBRA EXERCISE THROUGH UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence of a computer technology and the technical field of unmanned aerial vehicles, in particular to a method for guiding a user in cervical vertebra exercise through an unmanned aerial vehicle. The method, provided by the embodiment, for guiding the user in cervical vertebra exercise through the unmanned aerial vehicle is used for guiding the user in body posture adjustment in a preset mode, so that physical exercise of the user is precise and interesting, and accordingly the better effect and efficiency are achieved.

column2: MULTI-TASK SCHEDULING METHOD AND DEVICE AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology. The invention discloses a multi-task scheduling method. The multi-task scheduling method comprises the steps: receiving a new task tnew,and performing admission judgment on the new task tnew according to an admission principle; if the new task tnew does not meet the admission principle, executing the next step; if so, not allowing the new task tnew to enter a task queue; if the new task tnew meets the admission principle, executing the next step; and performing queue jumping operation on the task queue based on the task type of the new task tnew, and after the queue jumping operation is completed, performing preemption operation and priority reversal operation on the new task tnew and a currently running task in the task queue based on a preemption principle to obtain an updated task queue, and performing task scheduling based on the updated task queue. The invention further provides a multi-task scheduling device and a computer readable storage medium. According to the invention, an efficient multi-task scheduling function can be realized.

column2: ENVIRONMENTAL POLLUTION MONITORING METHOD BASED ON BIG DATA AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides an environmental pollution monitoring method based on big data and artificial intelligence, relates to a method for monitoring the running state of pollution treatment systems,is applied to the field of methods of supervision for prevention and control of environmental pollution and the field of data analysis of enterprise pollution control systems, and is used to solve theproblem that government environmental protection departments or enterprises cannot remotely monitor whether the pollution control systems cooperate with the production systems for normal operation. The invention designs a method for analyzing the operation states of production systems and pollution control systems in real time based on the data of power distribution systems of enterprise production systems and pollution control systems, and a statistical machine learning method is used to analyze and determine whether the pollution control systems cooperate with the production systems for normal operation.

column2: VIDEO STREAM PROCESSING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides a video stream processing method and system. The method comprises the following steps that: a decoding chip decodes a video stream to obtain an image frame; directly copying theimage frame to an artificial intelligence processor chip through direct memory access copying; wherein the decoding chip and the artificial intelligence processor chip do not share a memory; the artificial intelligence processor chip executes a binary instruction in an offline running file to perform reasoning on the image frame; wherein the binary instruction in the offline running file is obtained through analysis according to a neural network model corresponding to an artificial intelligence learning task.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR ONLINE ENERGY EFFICIENCY AND STATE MONITORING AND FAULT PREDICTION OF WATER PUMP
column4: The invention discloses a method and device for an online energy efficiency and state monitoring and fault prediction of a water pump. The device comprises a data wireless transmission unit, a data acquisition switch, a voltmeter installed on a motor, an ampere meter and a power factor meter, wherein a shaft vibration sensor is installed on the water pump and a motor coupling, a temperature sensorand a pressure sensor are installed at an inlet and outlet of the water pump correspondingly, a flow sensor is installed on an inlet or outlet pipeline of the water pump, a cloud platform is away from the water pump unit site, and the cloud platform comprising a water pump energy efficiency evaluation module, a motor energy efficiency evaluation module and a fault artificial intelligence prediction module. According to the method and the device, the judgment and decision basis are provided for improving the running efficiency of the water pump unit, the long-term low-efficiency operation of the water pump unit is avoided, the operation efficiency is improved, and the energy consumption is reduced; sudden faults can be avoided, the gradual failure can be controlled, the equipment maintenance cost is reduced, the equipment availability time is increased, the operation benefit of equipment is improved, and good economic benefits are brought.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CONVOLUTIONAL NEURAL NETWORK FACE RECOGNITION SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence convolutional neural network face recognition system. The system comprises a shooting terminal (100), a network (200), a server (300), a convolutional neural network module (400), an artificial intelligence early warning operation system (500), a cloud computing unit (600), a comparison analysis with a cloud database face blacklist unit (700), atarget person identity determination unit (800) and a local database module (900). The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an image or video stream containing a face by using a shooting terminal through an artificial intelligence convolutional neural network face recognition system, automatically detecting and tracking the face in the image, and further performing a series of technicalprocessing related to the face on the detected face, including face detection, face key frame extraction and face verification; all-weather 24-hour uninterrupted monitoring on the periphery of the shooting terminal is realized, a user can realize information sharing, the utilization rate of information resources is improved, and the safety guarantee is increased for maintaining the stability of social security.

column2: PARKING LOT REVERSE VEHICLE FINDING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON 5G, C-V2X AND AUTOMATIC DRIVING TECHNOLOGIES
column4: The invention discloses a parking lot reverse vehicle finding system and method based on 5G, C-V2X and automatic driving technologies, and belongs to the Internet of Vehicles and automatic driving technologies. The parking lot reverse vehicle finding system and method aim at solving the technical problem of how to achieve the effect that a vehicle finds an owner based on the 5G, C-V2X and automatic driving technologies, prevent time-consuming and laborious vehicle finding and improve the driving safety of the vehicle. According to the technical scheme, the system comprises vehicle-mounted C-V2X equipment, a vehicle-mounted automatic driving module, vehicle owner portable C-V2X equipment and parking lot C-V2X equipment.
