The method comprises the following steps of S1, binding of the vehicleand the vehicle owner; S2, communication between the vehicle and the vehicle owner, wherein in a parking lot, the vehicle owner sends a confirmation instruction and his/her real position to the vehicle-mounted C-V2X equipment of the target vehicle through the 5G communication network connection of the vehicle owner portable C-V2X equipment and the vehicle-mounted C-V2X equipment carried by the vehicle; S3, establishment of two-way communication through a direct communication mode of the C-V2X technology; S4, adjustment of the running state of the vehicle.

column2: BADMINTON SKILL ANALYSIS SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a badminton skill analysis system. The system comprises a player information acquisition module; the system is composed of a data model construction function module, a comparison data generation and processing function module and a data precipitation and correction function module. The data model construction function module is used for carrying out refined decomposition onmotion videos of professional badminton players, drawing a vector diagram of the posture and the motion trail, forming a ball skill standard data model based on input ball skill standards finally. The comparison data generation and processing function module can realize data comparison; meanwhile, a result is output to a user; wherein the data precipitation and correction function module is an important function module known and interacted by a user, the data precipitation and correction function module is used for ensuring real-time updating and correction of accuracy, along with long-time accumulation of data precipitation, more accurate and quicker ball skill analysis experience can be provided for the user, and the three modules are matched with one another, so that the use effect isexcellent.

column2: PHOTOGRAPHING METHOD, DEVICE AND EQUIPMENT AND MACHINE READABLE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a photographing method and device, equipment and a machine readable medium. The method comprises the steps: outputting an attraction signal for attracting the attention of a shot object during image shooting; and obtaining a target image corresponding to the photographed object, and if the feature parameters of the target image accord with preset feature parameters, performing feature recognition on the target image. According to the invention, the attraction signal for attracting the attention of the photographed object can be output, the photographed object is attracted to actively gaze at the terminal equipment through the attraction signal, and if the feature parameter of the image of the photographed object presented by the photographing window conforms to the preset feature parameter, the photographing operation is executed. The problems of angle difference and unclear face image of the face image shot by the terminal device due to the fact that the shot object does not gaze at the terminal device are solved.

column2: VEHICLE SENSING SYSTEM AND METHOD IN RAIN FOG SCENE
column4: The invention discloses a vehicle sensing system and method in a rain fog scene. The system comprises a laser radar sensor, a millimeter wave radar sensor and a visual sensor group, wherein an outputend of each sensor is connected with an input end of a vehicle intelligent controller; and the visual sensor group comprises a binocular camera, a rain sensor, a temperature sensor, a dust sensor, a fog sensor and an illumination sensor. The method specifically includes the following steps that: after confirming that a vehicle enters an intelligent driving mode, a vehicle intelligent controller collects environmental data through each sensor; it is analyzed and determined whether there are obstacles and obstacle information around the vehicle or not; and the running speed and the travelling route of the vehicle are determined, and sent to the related execution part of the vehicle to drive the normal running of the vehicle. The vehicle sensing system and method can accurately sense the surrounding environment of the vehicle under various extreme weathers, enables the unmanned driving to adapt to more scenes, and provides guarantee for the normal and safe operation of the unmanned vehicle.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR CLASSIFYING SHOT PARTS IN MEDICAL IMAGE
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a method and a device for classifying shot parts in a medical image and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring medical images corresponding to multiple directions, adopting a plurality of image classifiers to classify medical images corresponding to a plurality of directions, and determining the comprehensive classification result of the shooting parts by synthesizing the primary classification results of the shooting parts output by the image classifiers. Compared with classification based on medical images of the shooting parts shot in a single direction, the obtained features of the shooting parts are more comprehensive, so that the classification accuracy of the shooting parts in the medical images is improved. Meanwhile, the image classifier is adopted to automatically classify the shot parts in the medical image. The comprehensive classification result of the shot parts in the medical image is determined according to the classification result. As a result, compared with a manual classification mode, the method is not influenced by artificial subjective factors. Theaccuracy and the efficiency are higher.

column2: EXTERNAL SKELETON CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention relates to an external skeleton control method and device, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps that the mass information of one half of a human body and the joint torque information of the human body are acquired, the mass information of one half of the external skeleton is acquired, the joint torque information of the external skeleton during squatting and rising, moving and lifting of the human body is calculated according to the mass information of the human body, the joint torque information of the human bodyand the mass information of the external skeleton; and the movement of the external skeleton is controlled according to the joint torque information of the external skeleton. The problem of torque distribution of the load bearing carrying external skeleton is solved, namely, a scientific basis is provided for external skeleton joint motor and hydraulic pressure model selection, a carrying torqueand power sequence chart is also assisted to be analyzed, so that a mechanical mode, an electrical mode and control of the load bearing carrying external skeleton are more scientific, and the great reference value is achieved for the whole external skeleton industry.

column2: INTELLIGENT POSTURE-CORRECTING SINGLE-BACKBOARD LEARNING CHAIR
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of intelligent healthy household products for children, in particular to an intelligent posture-correcting single-backboard learning chair. The chair comprises a chair leg assembly, a chair seat assembly, a single-backboard chair back assembly and a single-tube chair frame assembly, an intelligent voice posture correcting system is mounted on the single-backboard chair back assembly; the intelligent voice posture correcting system comprises a time relay module, a power amplifier module, a relay module, a voice recording and broadcasting module,a power switch, a direct-current charging socket, a loudspeaker, an electrocardiogram monitor module, a storage battery assembly, an electrocardiogram monitoring probe A, an electrocardiogram monitoring probe B and an electrocardiogram monitoring probe C. According to the utility model, human body biological characteristics such as heart rate, pulse and the like are utilized, an artificial intelligence voice technology is applied, voice reminding and attention correction are carried out when the sitting posture of a child is improper during learning, and the purpose that parents are not besidethe child and care reminding can be carried out on the child through voice playing is achieved.

column2: RESOURCE INFORMATION RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON GENETIC ALGORITHM, TERMINAL AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a resource information recommendation method and device based on a genetic algorithm, a terminal and a medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining data information of a to-be-recommended user; according to the data information, determining a resource type suitable for the to-be-recommended user; according to the resource type, determining each resource name corresponding to the resource type and a fitness function corresponding to the resource type; according to the determined fitness function, updating a preset genetic algorithm model; taking the resource names as the input parameters of the genetic algorithm model and operating the genetic algorithm model to acquire the to-be-recommended resource names, and finally sending the resource information corresponding to the to-be-recommended resource names to the to-be-recommended users, so that the resource names suitable for the users can be quickly determined, and the recommendation effect is good.

column2: MULTIFUNCTIONAL HEALTH CARE ROBOT
column4: The invention discloses a multi-functional health care robot which is achieved by the linkage of five parts including a base, a bed, five sets of intelligently driven massage physiotherapy devices, anInternet of Things (IOT) and payment unit and an artificial intelligence controller. A four-corner balance bracket with adjustable height is set under the base, a high-strength aluminum alloy supportframe, guide rails and a bed tilted driving unit are set in the base, the middle part of the bed is provided with an intelligent controller (with touch screen keys, and card readers), at the same time, an external IOT intelligent control box is equipped, the IOT intelligent control box comprises all function control keys, an IOT system, a face recognition unit, a payment system, a positioning system and also comprises a human-machine voice interactive system, a health monitoring unit, a medical history question and answer unit and an alcohol detection unit, and the real-time remote monitoringand member face recognition and payment can be achieved. Two sides of the bed are equipped with a music light unit, a projector, a sound therapy system and a universal moxibustion bracket. A high-frequency tremor system and a left and right swing system are installed above one end of the bed, and the other end is a half-moon-shaped baffle plate. A back wheel type massage device is installed froman inner side of the baffle plate to the middle part of the bed, and the middle part of the bed is equipped with limb air pressure massage bags and a blood pressure monitoring unit. A yoga board is installed on the bed. The robot is equipped with a wireless remote controller. A user lies on the robot and can achieve the double conditioning of physical organs and psychological spirit through the artificial intelligence and the IOT, the double help and common health of mind and a physical body are achieved, and the positive spirit can be obtained by conditioning.

column2: DIALOG PROCESSING SERVER CONTROL METHOD FOR DIALOG PROCESSING SERVER AND TERMINAL
column4: The present invention enables dialog between AIs. A dialog processing server 9 is provided with: a relay unit 43 that communicates with both a first information processing terminal 4A and a second information processing terminal 4B which are portable or vehicle-mounted terminals and which each have an input/output interface unit 30 for communicating with an external artificial intelligence; and a determination unit 45 that determines whether predetermined dialog conditions are met. This dialog processing server 9 is configured to allow the artificial intelligence with which the first terminal communicates to receive dialog content generated by the artificial intelligence with which the second terminal communicates and vice versa if said dialog conditions are met.

column2: VOICE RECOGNITION-BASED RESOURCE INFORMATION RECOMMENDATION METHOD, DEVICE, TERMINAL AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence and discloses a voice recognition-based resource information recommendation method, a resource information recommendation device, a terminal and a medium. According to the invention, the method comprises the steps of acquiring an audio clip of a to-be-recommended user; analyzing the data information of the to-be-recommended user according to the audio clip; acquiring the data information according to the data information; determining a resource type suitable for the to-be-recommended user; according to the resource type, determining each resource name corresponding to the resource type and a fitness function corresponding to the resource type, updating a preset genetic algorithm model according to the determined fitness function, taking each resource name as an input parameter of the genetic algorithm model and operating the genetic algorithm model to obtain a to-be-recommended resource name; and sending the resource information corresponding to the name of the to-be-recommended resource to the to-be-recommended user. Therefore, resources suitable for the user can be quickly determined. The accuracy of resourceinformation recommendation is improved.

column2: DISTRIBUTED WIRELESS NETWORK SPECTRUM ACCESS METHOD BASED ON GLOBAL OPTIMAL THRESHOLD DECISION
column4: The invention discloses a distributed wireless network spectrum access method based on a global optimal threshold decision. The method comprises the following steps of: starting from time slot, all the information source nodes send RTS data packets to independently compete for a channel; all the relay nodes respond to the information source node by using the CTS data packet, the information sourcenode obtains CSI from the information source node to the relay, a global optimal threshold value is calculated, the global optimal threshold value is compared with a fixed threshold, the winning information source node determines whether a first hop frequency spectrum access opportunity exists or not, and if yes, the winning information source node broadcasts data to all the relay nodes; otherwise, channel competition is carried out again; at the beginning of the next time slot, each relay node independently sends an RTS data packet to compete for a channel; the sink node calculates the reachable data rate of the second hop based on the first-hop CSI and the second-hop gain, compares the reachable data rate with a threshold, and makes a second-hop channel access decision to perform data transmission; and after the transmission is finished, all the information source nodes start a new round of channel competition and data transmission. According to the invention, the average data throughput of the wireless network is improved.

column2: WIRELESS DISTRIBUTED COOPERATIVE NETWORK ACCESS METHOD BASED ON DOUBLE-LAYER LOOSE COUPLING OPTIMAL STOP
column4: The invention discloses a wireless distributed cooperative network access method based on double-layer loose coupling optimal stop. The method comprises the following steps of: a plurality of signal source nodes of the first hop perform distributed channel competition in a time division form of a micro time slot; the relay node compares the signal-to-noise ratio under the first hop channel of thewinning information source node with a threshold value, if the signal-to-noise ratio is not smaller than the threshold value, the access channel is used for completing the first hop transmission, otherwise, the winning information source node gives up the channel, and all the information source nodes start a new round of competition in the next micro time slot; channel access of a second hop is started, an RTS packet is sent to an information sink node by the relay node, the reachable transmission rate of a second hop channel is calculated by the information sink node, and if the reachable maximum rate of the second hop is not less than the transmission rate of the first hop, transmitting is performed to the information sink node from the relay node; otherwise, the relay node gives up transmission and continues to perform channel detection after the channel related time; and the above process is repeated until the second hop information transmission is completed. According to the invention, the average throughput of the wireless network is improved.

column2: METHOD FOR CARRYING OUT THREE-DIMENSIONAL SPACE MODELING BY UTILIZING PROJECTION CHARACTERISTICS
column4: The invention discloses a method for carrying out three-dimensional space modeling by utilizing projection characteristics, and relates to the technical field of three-dimensional imaging digital modeling. The method comprises the following steps: preparing raw materials; shooting a group of position pictures consisting of RGB pictures and sample projection pictures at two different positions in the space respectively; performing feature point extraction on the position picture; performing feature point fusion on the same group of position pictures to obtain a position feature point of the position; carrying out an SIFT algorithm on different position feature points to carry out matching calculation; calculating initial camera positions by means of an SLAM algorithm when different groups of position pictures are shot, calculating accurate camera positions and sparse point clouds by an SFM algorithm, performing three-dimensional structured modeling based on the camera positions and thesparse point clouds, and finally performing three-dimensional scene mapping. According to the method, the feature points of the sample projection picture and the feature points of the RGB picture arefused to form mutual complementation of the feature points, and the problems that the number of the feature points extracted in a single-color space is small, the difficulty of three-dimensional modelreconstruction is large, and the effect is poor are solved.

column2: BEHAVIOR RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to a behavior recognition method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps of: obtaining graph data containing human body behaviors, generating skeleton data and joint node data according to the graph data; inputting the skeleton data into a trained skeleton recognition network model; and obtaining a first probability that the skeleton data is recognized as each human body behavior, inputting the joint node data into a trained node recognition network model to obtain a second probability that the joint node data is recognized as each human body behavior, calculating a weighted value of the first probability and the second probability of each human body behavior, and determining a target behavior according to the weighted value. Graph data are decomposed into skeleton data and joint node data, the skeleton data and the joint node data are independently identified, and then two identification results are integratedto obtain an identification result of the graph data. The data are divided into data representing different features, recognition is performed according to the data of different features, recognitionresults of different features are integrated, and the recognition accuracy is improved.

column2: SHOPPING ANALYSIS METHOD BASED ON FIRST-PERSON PERSPECTIVE SHOPPING VIDEO
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence application, in particular to a shopping analysis method based on a first-person perspective shopping video. The method specifically comprises the following steps: dividing a complete shopping video into a plurality of video clips; extracting N image frames from the video clip; analyzing the extracted image frame to obtain a shopping action type corresponding to the video frequency band; identifying commodities corresponding to the video clips of the preset shopping action type according to the obtained shopping action types corresponding to the video clips; and establishing a corresponding relationship between the identified commodity and the shopping action type corresponding to the commodity. According to the method, comprehensive consumption analysis is carried out by using a consumer shopping video from a first-person perspective, so that compared with a picture-based analysis method, the burden of shooting and uploading of consumers is reduced, the whole shopping process can be comprehensively analyzed, and a complete consumption record is obtained.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED ELECTRONIC PRODUCT MODELING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The embodiments of the present application provide an artificial intelligence-based electronic product modeling system and method, said method comprising: receiving a sample model and simulating running of the sample model, so as to generate a simulated running result; then analyzing an intrinsic relationship between the sample model and the simulated running result thereof, and accordingly generating an analysis result, so that subsequently, an electronic product, which conforms to index parameters to be modeled, can be automatically modeled according to the generated analysis result. In this way, the present application can enable modeling of an electronic product more rapidly and efficiently, and can improve the robustness of the modeling of the electronic product.

column2: METHOD FOR CARRYING OUT THREE-DIMENSIONAL SPACE MODELING BY UTILIZING INVISIBLE LIGHT PROJECTION CHARACTERISTICS
column4: The invention discloses a method for carrying out three-dimensional space modeling by utilizing invisible light projection characteristics, and relates to the technical field of three-dimensional imaging digital modeling. The method comprises the following steps: shooting a group of position pictures at two different positions in the space respectively; performing feature point extraction on the position picture; performing feature point fusion on the same group of position pictures to obtain a position feature point of the position; carrying out SIFT algorithm on different position feature points to carry out matching calculation; and calculating initial camera positions by utilizing an SLAM algorithm when different groups of position pictures are shot, calculating accurate camera positions and sparse point clouds by utilizing an SLAM algorithm, performing three-dimensional structured modeling based on the camera positions and the sparse point clouds, and finally performing three-dimensional scene mapping. According to the method, the feature points of the invisible light projection picture and the feature points of the RGB picture are fused with each other to form mutual complementation of the feature points, so that the problems of relatively few extracted feature points, relatively high difficulty in three-dimensional model reconstruction and relatively poor effect when modeling is carried out in a single color space in an SIFT mode are solved.

column2: TREND PREDICTION METHOD BASED ON DOUBLE HIDDEN LAYER QUANTUM CIRCUIT RECURRENT UNIT NEURAL NETWORK
column4: The invention relates to a trend prediction method based on a double hidden layer quantum circuit recurrent unit neural network(DHL-QCRUNN). The trend prediction method comprises the steps of: constructing a permutation entropy set of original operation data; inputting the permutation entropy set into DHL-QCRUNN for training and prediction to obtain a predicted permutation entropy set; constructing a permutation entropy error set of predicted values and actual values at each time point; inputting the permutation entropy error set into DHL-QCRUNN for training and prediction to obtain a predicted and normalized permutation entropy error set; and performing denormalization processing on the predicted and normalized permutation entropy error set to obtain a final prediction result. The invention proposes a novel quantum neural network: the double hidden layer quantum circuit recurrent unit neural network. The trend prediction method updates network parameters of the DHL-QCRUNN by adoptingan LM algorithm to improve the convergence performance of the neural network, compared with other artificial intelligence methods, the DHL-QCRUNN has better nonlinear approximation ability, generalization property and faster convergence speed, the trend prediction method is used for predicting a running trend of a monitored object, and the trend prediction achieves high prediction precision, prediction stability and calculation efficiency.

column2: PROTECTIVE RELAY DEVICE FOR AUTOMATICALLY CALCULATING CORRECTION VALUES BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention relates to a protective relay device for automatically calculating correction values based on artificial intelligence. The device comprises: an input conversion unit which receives input information from a current transformer and a potential transformer and converts the information into data for a plurality of protective relays; an input unit which receives filters, encodes and temporarily stores the converted data for the plurality of protective relays; a data processing unit which analyzes a power system accident of a device by referring to the temporarily-stored data as fault accident case waveform data with respect to the device in which the power system accident occurred among the plurality of devices; a setting unit which includes a protective relay automatic calculation program, receives data on a collected protected device, performs automatic setting to a setting parameter value, and determines in real time whether or not the setting parameter value that is automatically set is appropriate during a power equipment operation; an output interface outputting a cutoff signal by configuring a protective element operation output with logic or receiving contact points from the outside; and a communication unit which transmits the automatically-set setting parameter value while communicating with the plurality of protective relays. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: INTELLIGENT AUTOMATIC MONITORING SYSTEM FOR CENTRALIZED CONTROL OPERATION OF POWER PLANT
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence based automatic monitoring system for centralized control operation of a power plant, relates to the fields of automatic control and artificial intelligence, and aims at solving the problems of fatigue and burden caused by that centralized control operation of the power plant relies on staring at screens by humans. A computer programmed knowledgebase is constructed, display frames of different display terminals are obtained to obtain all running data in real time, knowledge of the knowledge base is combined with the real-time obtained running data, and the running state of the power plant is evaluated by simulating a practical determination manner of an on-duty person. When predetermined alarm condition is determined and detected, promptand alarm signals are emitted to related staff immediately. The system does not rely on or interfere in an original system of the power plant, and via the system, the work burden and labor intensityof the staff can be alleviated greatly, and operation staff in the power plant can be arranged without less worry.

column2: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND WEARABLE EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a method for controlling electronic equipment and wearable equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, the method comprises the steps that pre-collected time and physiological feature parameters are used as training samples, training is conducted in a supervised learning mode to obtain a sleep judgment model, and therefore after wearable equipment collects current time and current physiological feature parameters of a user, the sleep judgment model can be used for determining the current sleep state of the user. When the sleep state of the user is a sleep state and the current running state of the electronic equipment is an on state, a turn-off signal is sent to the electronic equipment, so that the electronic equipmentis switched to the turn-off state, the electronic equipment does not influence the sleep of the user, and meanwhile, the electric energy is saved.

column2: IMPELLER REVERSE ENGINEERING METHOD BASED ON GENETIC ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses an impeller reverse engineering method based on a genetic algorithm. The method mainly comprises the following steps: 1, establishing a parameter system of an impeller; 2, introducing a knowledge guidance strategy, and establishing a constraint relationship; 3, establishing a fitness evaluation method; and 4, entering a genetic algorithm, and solving the parameter system. Reverse engineering is carried out on an impeller model by utilizing a genetic algorithm in artificial intelligence technology, and a parameter system is regarded as an optimization variable, so that ageometric modeling problem of reverse engineering is converted into an optimization problem in a multi-dimensional space. Reverse engineering of impellers can be rapidly and automatically completed only through a small amount of manual operation, and a fully-parameterized geometric model is obtained. The time consumption of manual operation is greatly reduced and experience dependence on a three-dimensional modeling engineer is reduced.

column2: WIRELESS DISTRIBUTED COOPERATIVE NETWORK OPPORTUNISTIC CHANNEL ACCESS METHOD BASED ON THRESHOLD MEASUREMENT
column4: The invention discloses a wireless distributed cooperative network opportunistic channel access method based on threshold measurement. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, each information source node sends an RTS data packet to independently compete for a channel; the relay node sends the RTS data packet to the information sink node, and the information sink node sends the CTS datapacket to all the relay nodes for reply; then all the relay nodes send CTS data packets to the information source node in sequence, and the CTS data packets are inserted into the channel state from the information source node to the relay nodes; after the CTS data packet is received, the information source node calculates to obtain a relay node sequence capable of realizing the maximum transmission speed, and calculates a threshold value; and finally, the information source node performs measurement according to the threshold value and decides whether to access a channel for cooperative transmission or not. After the access is finished, all the information source nodes start a new round of distributed channel competition. According to the invention, the communication range of the wirelessnetwork is expanded, the distributed cooperative access of the wireless network is realized under lower signaling overhead, and the network throughput is improved.

column2: ELECTRICAL SAFETY DETECTING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an electrical safety detecting system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of electrical safety technology. According to the electrical safety detecting system, remaining current and temperature data on a power supply circuit is collated through a detection module, then the data is transmitted to a monitoring system server by an electrical appliance control module, the data is uploaded to an artificial intelligence learning analysis module regularly by the monitoring system server, the data is processed by the artificial intelligence learning analysis module, a control command is generated according to a data processing result, the command is issued to the electrical appliance control module through the monitoring system server, and one high level or low level is generated by the electrical appliance control module through an output end so as to control the on and off of normally-closed contacts of relay modules, so that the on and off of the power supply circuit are controlled to reach the purpose that the power supply circuit is disconnected automatically when potential safety hazards exist.

column2: ONLINE PCB DETECTION EQUIPMENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND DEEP LEARNING
column4: The utility model relates to on-line PCB detection equipment based on artificial intelligence and deep learning, which comprises a frame body, and further comprises a storage rack, an X-axis driving mechanism, machine shooting equipment and a Y-axis driving mechanism which are arranged in the frame body, a storage rack is arranged in the frame body and is used for placing a PCB; the bottom of thestorage rack moves in the X-axis direction through an X-axis driving mechanism. Camera shooting devices are respectively arranged above and below the storage rack; wherein the cameras are respectivelyused for shooting the front surface and the back surface of the PCB; the camera shooting device moves in the Y-axis direction through a Y-axis driving mechanism. The online PCB detection equipment based on artificial intelligence and deep learning is simple in overall structure and low in production cost, can automatically complete PCB detection through camera shooting equipment and make corresponding judgment, greatly improves the PCB detection efficiency, reduces the labor cost, and is beneficial to production and development of enterprises.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON LSTM, STORAGE MEDIUM AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides a data processing method and device based on LSTM, a storage medium and electronic equipment, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The data processingmethod comprises the following steps: inputting to-be-processed data into an input unit of a long-short-term memory network, wherein the long-short-term memory network further comprises a plurality ofcomputing units; calculating the to-be-processed data based on the connection relationship of the long-term and short-term memory network; when the next computing unit connected with the current computing unit is also connected with at least one input unit, storing the intermediate data output by the current computing unit into a memory, and calculating in the next computing unit according to theintermediate data and the data in the input unit connected with the next computing unit; and outputting result data corresponding to the to-be-processed data at an output unit of the long-short-termmemory network. According to the data processing method, memory resources required for running the LSTM can be reduced, optimization of an engineering stage is realized, and application to a terminalis facilitated.

column2: ROBOT PATH PLANNING METHOD BASED ON BEZIER OPTIMIZATION GENETIC ALGORITHM
column4: The invention, which belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, relates to a robot path planning method based on a Bezier optimization genetic algorithm. With a Bezier curve, an initial solutionof a genetic algorithm and paths generated in crossing and mutation processes are optimized to eliminate a peak inflection point and reduce redundant nodes, thereby improving the path smoothness. Andthen fitness functions of a safety distance and an adaptive penalty factor are added and the path obtained by the genetic algorithm is adjusted dynamically, so that the quality of the planned path isenhanced. With the provided method, a short-distance smooth path can be searched and thus the energy losses caused by frequent running state switching of the robot due to the dramatic path turning are reduced, thereby guaranteeing the safety of the robot movement.

column2: WEARABLE ELECTROCARDIOGRAPHIC MONITORING TECHNOLOGY (ECG) WITH AN AIRTIGHT CONTAINER FOR MEDICINES, AND INTEGRATED MEDICAL MONITORING SYSTEM
column4: The present invention refers to a wearable, individual, customized and different sized technology for men and women, composed of electrodes, conductive track and airtight container for medicines, coupled to one another, and a mini electrocardiogram (ECG) apparatus containing a GSM (Global System Mobile) modem and a GPS (Global Positioning System) or a Bluetooth system which, through a wireless network specification within a personal scope (Wireless Personal Area Networks?”PANs) deemed as PAN-type or even WPAN, the electrical signal acquisition begins when the user press the button down. It is in the field of medical, recreational and/or sport applications, aiming at monitoring patients at high cardiovascular risk, being possible to diagnose it as soon as possible, aiming at shortening time to definite treatment of those who present acute coronary syndrome (ACS), acute myocardial infarction (AMI), acute atrial fibrillation-type (AAF) cardiac arrhythmias, and other cardiac arrhythmias or other cardiac pathologies capable to be detected by the electrocardiographic trace. Moreover the invention has tools to analyze a bunch of data?”big data analytics and deeplearning?”by utilizing artificial intelligence. Finally, the invention also has a module to proper administer the drug contained into the airtight container.

column2: DIALOG PROCESSING SERVER, CONTROL METHOD FOR DIALOG PROCESSING SERVER, AND TERMINAL
column4: A dialog processing server is configured by including a relay unit which communicates with each of a first information processing terminal and a second information processing terminal, each serving as a portable or vehicle-mounted terminal and including an input/output interface unit with an artificial intelligence provided outside, and a determination unit which determines whether or not a predetermined dialog condition is established, in which between the artificial intelligence with which the first terminal communicates and the artificial intelligence with which the second terminal communicates, dialog contents respectively generated by the artificial intelligences can be transmitted and received when the dialog condition is established.

column2: INTELLIGENT LENS DETECTING AND SORTING ALL-IN-ONE MACHINE ADOPTING NOVEL PROCESS METHOD
column4: The utility model discloses an intelligent lens detecting and sorting all-in-one machine adopting a novel process method. The utility model belongs to the technical field of lens sorting and warehousing production. The system comprises a detection machine and a sorting machine, detection machine comprising a detection device, the sorting machine comprises an empty cup holder conveying device, a sorting device, a lens temporary storage device, a printing device, a collecting device and the like. The device is scientific, reasonable and novel in design; compact structure, mechanism simple, smallfloor area, operating efficiently, simulated artificial intelligence, the automation level and the production efficiency are high; running safety and reliability, maintenance and repair convenience,simple operation, use of lenses of different specifications can be adapted; the device can be compatible with feeding of a single lens or a whole pile of lenses using a cup holder container, the lensgrabbing action is softer and more stable, temporary storage of the lenses is carried out by adopting a vacancy and model complementing method, the lenses are placed by adopting a sensor detection method, an automatic label feeding mechanism is adopted, and the lens production quality is ensured by adopting open type front and back channel structures.

column2: AUTOMOBILE IDENTIFICATION METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER SYSTEM AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an automobile identification method and device, a computer system and a readable storage medium, and the method is based on artificial intelligence, and comprises the followingsteps: photographing an automobile frame number, and obtaining automobile frame number data; extracting automobile series information according to the automobile frame number data; obtaining a confirmation result or a difference item according to the automobile series information; shooting the automobile according to the difference item to obtain a difference set; and comparing the difference setwith the automobile series, and obtaining a confirmation result. Through shooting the vehicle frame number is shot, the vehicle frame number data is obtained, and then the vehicle series informationis extracted. The identification of the automobile series of the automobile is realized. A difference item is obtained by utilizing a difference comparison module, the automobile is shot by using a shooting identification module to obtain a difference set. Finally, the difference set is compared with the automobile series to obtain a confirmation result, so that the identification of the automobile style information of the automobile is realized, the user can determine the exact price of the automobile, the risk of a credit enterprise is reduced, and the loss of the credit enterprise caused bywrong automobile valuation is avoided.

column2: HUMAN BODY SITTING POSTURE REAL-TIME MONITORING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON DEEP LEARNING
column4: The invention provides a human body sitting posture real-time monitoring method and system based on deep learning. The method comprises the steps that a shot human body sitting posture image is inputinto a core processor in real time; the core processor takes the received human body sitting posture image as an input, the human body sitting posture image enters a trained Yolo3 network, and a bounding box classified as a human body is output; the bounding box is input into an attitude estimator to obtain a key point skeleton diagram through a G-RMI network; the skeleton diagram is input into aclassifier to obtain a current sitting posture state of the user corresponding to the human body sitting posture image; the current sitting posture state is input into a posture corrector, a posture correction scheme of the current sitting posture state is obtained through the state transition graph, the current sitting posture state is recorded, and voice prompt is performed through a voice prompt module when the user maintains the same posture for more than specified time. According to the method, an artificial intelligence algorithm is applied to a traditional hardware system, and posture classification and posture correction information can be quickly generated through improvement of functions and performance.

column2: PASTURE PEST CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a pasture pest control method and device based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the field of agricultural science and technology. The invention is used for solving the problems of large workload, low disease and pest identification accuracy, single treatment method and the like in crop disease and pest treatment. The method comprises the steps of inputting a received pest picture into a classification model to obtain a probability value of a pest category, and when the probability value is greater than a set threshold, determining the pest category corresponding to the maximum probability value as the pest category; sending the disease and pest category and the disease and pest picture to a disease and pest comprehensive treatment module, so that the disease and pest comprehensive treatment module determines a treatment scheme and a prevention scheme of the disease and pest picture; determining geographic position information and environment information of the pest picture according to the shooting geographic information and time information carried by the pest picture; and adding the disease and insect pest category, the treatment scheme, the prevention scheme, the environment information and the time information corresponding to the disease and insect pest picture into the pasture disease and insect pest situation display map.

column2: SYSTEM-ON-CHIP
column4: The invention relates to the field of semiconductor chips, and discloses a system-on-chip, which comprises an MCU kernel and an FPGA kernel, and is characterized in that the FPGA kernel comprises an FPGA internal boundary bus and at least one external device; the MCU core comprises a system bus and a signal interruption processing unit. According to the system-on-chip provided by the invention, the internal structure of the system-on-chip is rearranged, so that the MCU kernel of the system-on-chip is ensured to have a good running speed, the requirement that an external device is easy to expand is met, meanwhile, the processing efficiency of an artificial intelligence algorithm can be improved, and the running power consumption of the chip is reduced.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR ANALYSING A GOLF SWING
column4: This invention is an apparatus and method for measuring or analysing a golf swing. Measurement or analysis is made relative to energy generation and transfer through a player's body and club. The measurement or analysis data is principally obtained from the player's ground-reaction forces. Processed signals are analysed with an artificial intelligence system. Ground-reaction forces relate to reaction forces which occur between a standing surface and the player's feet. The apparatus and method measures or analyses a golf swing in an automatic manner or in an automatic and interactive manner.

column2: VIDEO PLAYING METHOD AND DEVICE CAPABLE OF INTELLIGENTLY ADJUSTING VISUAL ANGLE
column4: The invention provides a video playing method and device capable of intelligently adjusting a visual angle. The video playing method comprises the steps of obtaining panoramic video data; learning thepanoramic video data by using an artificial intelligence algorithm; and when a view angle playing instruction is received, intelligently adjusting the user view angle in the panoramic video playing according to the trigger time point of the instruction. The video playing device is used for executing the processing of the video playing method. According to the video playing method and device, theviewing angle of the panoramic video watched by the user can be adjusted to be a wonderful viewing angle, and the viewing angle of the panoramic video watched by the user can be changed to be similarto the shooting skill of a professional photographer or the post-processing skill of the panoramic video.

column2: BATCH PROCESSING METHOD, EQUIPMENT AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a batch processing method, equipment and device based on artificial intelligence, and a storage medium. The batch processing method comprises the steps: receiving a batch processing instruction of a current period, and extracting a target business type from the batch processing instruction; searching a corresponding target batch processing parameter through a preset tree structure according to the target service type; generating a target batch task according to the target business type and the corresponding target batch processing parameter; and running the target batchprocessing task according to specified time, obtaining a first running result of the current period, and sending the first running result of the current period to a target person. By intelligently configuring the batch processing parameters, the batch processing method does not need manual configuration, and can improve the batch processing efficiency.

column2: DYNAMIC ONLINE DTY TEXTILE YARN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INSPECTION SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses a dynamic online DTY (draw textured yarn) spinning yarn artificial intelligence inspection system. The device comprises a system support, a roller conveying rail, a rotating motor, a positioning disc, a mounting outer sleeve, a jacking air cylinder, a bearing push block, a rolling bearing, a shooting camera, an annular lamp, a bowl lamp, a holding claw plate and a holding claw air cylinder. A gap is formed in the middle of the roller conveying rail; the rotating motor is positioned below the gap; the movable end of the rotating motor is connected with the positioning disc; one side of the lower end of the mounting jacket close to the rolling bearing is provided with an inclined surface; the lower end of the outer ring of the rolling bearing is connected with thesystem support, the upper end of the outer ring of the rolling bearing is connected with the inclined face, the shooting camera is fixed to the system support, the annular lamp is located below the wire coil, the movable end of the holding claw air cylinder is connected with the holding claw plate, and the holding claw plate is used for grasping the wire coil. The dynamic online DTY spinning yarnartificial intelligence inspection system can perform rotary photographing detection on DTY placed on the wire coil in the DTY conveying process, and is high in real-time performance and compact andstable in structure.

column2: UNDERGROUND PARKING GARAGE PEDESTRIAN AND VEHICLE MONITORING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an underground parking garage pedestrian and vehicle monitoring method based on artificial intelligence. At present, an underground parking garage is lack of an effective platform system for people and vehicle detection and unified management. In addition, the method can collect attribute information of the vehicle owner and the driven vehicle through the face recognition module and the vehicle attribute recognition module and carry out one-to-one correspondence marking contact on the vehicle owner and the driven vehicle. If the vehicle is parked at a certain moment, the human face verification is inconsistent, human body posture detection is carried out to identify human body skeleton key point information, and abnormal behavior detection and identification are carried out through the human body skeleton joint point information, so that abnormal behavior actions such as tumbling and door opening to enter a vehicle can be effectively identified, and the vehicleand personal safety of a vehicle owner can be effectively guaranteed.

column2: APPLICATION CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE, STORAGE MEDIUM AND TERMINAL
column4: The invention discloses an application control method and device, a storage medium and a terminal, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that inthe process of displaying an interactive picture, terminal state information is obtained, and the interactive picture is provided by an interactive application currently in a running state on a terminal; when the terminal state information indicates that the terminal is in a target state currently, a locking operation is executed on a currently displayed interactive picture, and a locking picturematched with the terminal state information is displayed; wherein the target state is a non-static state or is in a specific geographic environment. On the basis of the terminal state information, the interactive application is automatically locked when the user is in the unsafe state; namely, the user is automatically forbidden to use the interactive application in the non-safe state according to the scene where the terminal is located, so that the user concentrates on the surrounding environment, the user is prevented from being excessively immersed in the terminal, the personal safety of the user when using the terminal is guaranteed, and the control effect on the terminal is good.

column2: NEW-ENERGY ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ELEVATOR AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses a new-energy artificial intelligence elevator and a control method thereof, and belongs to the technical field of elevators. The new-energy artificial intelligence elevator comprises an elevator shaft, an elevator track, a ground-floor elevator assembly, an elevator room, a generator set assembly, an atmosphere pressure pump, a hydraulic speed reducer, an anti-skid pulley set and a control system assembly, wherein the elevator track is mounted in the elevator shaft; the ground-floor elevator assembly is mounted at the bottom part of the elevator shaft; the elevator roomis mounted on the elevator track; the generator set assembly is mounted in the elevator shaft; the atmosphere pressure pump and the hydraulic speed reducer are correspondingly mounted at the bottom part and the top part of the elevator room; the anti-skid pulley set is mounted on the top part of the elevator room; and the control system assembly comprises an artificial intelligence transferring system, an artificial intelligence central control system, an energy synthesizing conversion system, an elevator queuing system, a new energy storing system and an anti-fall multi-track system. Therefore, the elevator running efficiency is improved while earth resource is greatly saved and the environmental pollution is reduced.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DEVICE CONTROLLING AUTHORITY FOR USE OF EXTERNAL DEVICE BASED ON USER IDENTIFICATION THROUGH IMAGE RECOGNITION AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: Provided is an artificial intelligence device. The artificial intelligence device includes: a memory storing registered user information and authority information about whether a user can use at least one external device; a communication part receiving a first image file made by photographing an environment including at least one external device; a running processor providing the first image file to an image recognition model, which specifies the face of a person included in an image file and an external device to be used by the person, to specify first face information of a person in the first image file and first external device information to be used by the person in the first image file; and a processor obtaining information about a first user corresponding to the first face information and the authority of the first user from the memory to control the use of the first external device by the first user based on the authority. Therefore, the present invention is capable of preventing children from using a dangerous product. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: MUSIC SYNTHESIS METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a music synthesis method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The music synthesis method comprises the steps that current hidden variables are obtained; the current hidden variables are input into all recurrent neutral network units included in a recurrent neutral network model so as to obtain music features output by all the recurrent neutral network units; the music features output by all the recurrent neutral network units are converted into corresponding music sequences through a generator trained in a confrontation neutral network model, wherein the recurrent neutral network units and the generator are obtained under the situation that a discriminator in the confrontation neutral network model is trained; and the music sequences are spliced to obtain synthesized music sequences corresponding to the current hidden variables. All the music sequences relay on the current hidden variables and the music features output by at least one recurrent units in front of all the recurrent units, the relaying sequence lengths of all the music sequences are short, and artificial intelligence synthesis of long music is realized.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VIDEO CAMERA FIXING SEAT
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence video camera fixing seat comprising a fixing seat unit. The fixing seat unit is provided with a fixing member, a first motor and a transmission unit. The first motor is provided with a motor shaft, and the first motor is used for outputting power and driving the fixing member to rotate through the transmission unit. The artificial intelligence video camera fixing seat further comprises a rotation angle sensing unit. The rotation angle sensing unit comprises a magnetic component and a magnetic rotation angle detecting device. The transmission unit drives the magnetic component to rotate. The magnetic rotation angle detecting device is provided with a hall element. The artificial intelligence video camera fixing seat can achieve automatic steering and locating and even achieve full-automatic shooting without manual monitoring, the artificial intelligence video camera fixing seat has the automatic focusing function and can sense and calculate the position of an installed video camera, the video camera is made to rotate to a correct direction, and unnecessary manual control over turning of the video camera can be reduced; the artificial intelligence video camera fixing seat has the advantage of high accuracy, and by means of the feedback mechanism of the rotation angle sensing unit, it can be ensured that the video camera is always kept at a correct position.

column2: TABLE TOP SMALL ROBOT BASED ON MOBILE BASE AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a table top small robot based on a mobile base and a control method thereof. The robot receives a voice instruction from the exterior, and an APP end instruction, the received instructions are converted into bottom layer instructions capable of being recognized by chassis mechanical rollers, and the robot is controlled to advance forwards, backwards retreat and steer; in the forward advancing, backward retreating and steering process of the robot, an infrared induction module mounted on the periphery of a robot chassis analyzes and recognizes whether the running path of the robot is on the table top edge or not; through voice and remote app, the robot running path is controlled; through the robot, a camera can be driven to obtain the viewing angle within the wider range, through the voice instruction and the APP instruction, the table top robot is moved and controlled, the price is lower than that of a mobile robot at the market by dozens of times, the partial moving function is achieved, the table top robot is more vivid, and the user more easily receives the robot.

column2: WIRELESS DISTRIBUTED NETWORK OPPORTUNITY CHANNEL ACCESS METHOD BASED ON DOUBLE-HOP THRESHOLD DECISION
column4: The invention discloses a wireless distributed network opportunity channel access method based on a double-hop threshold decision. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, sending a detection packet by a plurality of information source nodes through competition, and obtaining channel states from a winning information source node to all relay nodes; calculating a threshold value offline, and comparing the threshold value with the current channel state to obtain a first-hop channel access decision; enabling the information source node to broadcast and send the data packet to all relay nodes, and enabling the relay nodes to carry out digital sampling storage on the channel; then, enabling the plurality of relay nodes to send detection packets through competition, obtaining the real-time state of a channel from the relay nodes to the information sink node, calculating a threshold value on line, obtaining a second-hop channel access decision through online threshold value comparison, enabling the winning relay nodes to forward the sampled data to the information sink node, and completing one-time distributed channel access of multiple information source-information sink pairs;; and carrying out competitive access again by the plurality of information source nodes, and repeating the access process. According to the invention, the average network throughput rate of the distributed cooperative network is improved.

column2: INFANT CARE NOTIFICATION SYSTEM OF POSTNATAL CARE CENTER USING INTERNET OF THINGS DEVICE AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SMART DEVICE
column4: According to an embodiment of the present invention, an infant care notification system of a postnatal care center can be easily used by a postnatal caretaker of a postnatal care center, and clearly collects newborn infant care information to be imaged and provided on a mobile communication device of a newborn infant protector. The infant care notification system of a postnatal care center comprises: an input unit having a dial unit and a button unit for allowing newborn infant care information to be directly input by a postnatal caretaker; a network unit for transmitting and receiving input infant care information to and from a relay unit; a relay unit for dividing the infant care information into nursing, sleeping, defecation, change of consumables, and vomiting to store the same, and processing the stored information by a graph, an image, an image motion, and a TExT to transmit and receive the same through the network unit; and a smart device including a screen to enable a newborn infant protector to check the processed infant care information transmitted by the relay unit through the network unit, or including an artificial intelligence service. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: UNMANNED-AERIAL-VEHICLE-BASED AUTOMATIC IDENTIFICATION AND EARLY WARNING METHOD FOR VENDORS IN NO-PEDDLER AREA
column4: The invention provides an unmanned-aerial-vehicle-based automatic identification and early warning method for vendors in a no-peddler area. The unmanned-aerial-vehicle-based automatic identification and early warning method comprises the following steps: obtaining an aerial shooting image of the no-peddler area in a city in a jurisdiction range, and extracting a plurality of pixel areas from the image as feature comparison elements; collecting feature images of various roadside vendors in the market at various angles, acquiring feature image information of a plurality of vendors, and extracting vendor feature image spots from pixel areas of the image images according to the feature image information of the vendor, wherein the unmanned aerial vehicle is used for aerial photography of the jurisdiction no-peddler area to obtain an aerial photography picture; obtaining a plurality of pixel areas in the aerial image; and comparing and identifying suspected vendor image spots in the pixel region of the aerial photo with vendor feature image spots in a feature library, and when a threshold value of an identification matching result is greater than a set threshold value, giving an alarm. Through an artificial intelligence mode, the vendors in the no-peddler area are rapidly positioned, and the pressure on city management is reduced.

column2: POWER TRANSMISSION LINE INTELLIGENT MONITORING AND SHOOTING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of power transmission line monitoring, in particular to an intelligent power transmission line monitoring and shooting device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a background image intelligent identification module and a front-end image intelligent identification module, and is characterized in that the front-end image intelligent identification module is loaded with an edge calculation module. According to the invention, an Huawei Atlas200 module is built in the monitoring shooting device, so that the intelligent level of the front-end monitoring equipment is greatly improved, the real-time online monitoring and analysis of the power transmission line are achieved, the image analysis can be achieved, the hidden danger recognition efficiency of the power transmission line is improved, the active alarm uploading is conducted only when an abnormal phenomenon is detected, the network pressure of the backhaul communication is greatly relieved, and the power consumption of the whole equipment is reduced, and accordingly the safety level of the power transmission line is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED TONGUE IMAGE DETECTION AND RECOGNITION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence based tongue image detection and recognition method. By adoption of camera of a mobile phone or a tablet computer or a special tongue image acquisition device, limitation of large-scale tongue image acquisition due to a single acquisition mode is solved, and convenience is provided for tongue image acquisition. Real-time automatic detection of tongue images and tongue positions can be realized, manual or automatic shooting, storing and uploading can be realized, and the problem of difficulty in accurate detection of a tongue body due to the fact that other parts of the human face in a traditional acquired tongue image occupy most of areas while the tongue body position is less is solved. Tongue colors, tongue shapes, tongue coating textures and tongue coating texture properties can be automatically recognized in the tongue images, and doctors of traditional Chinese medicine can be assisted in tongue diagnosis. A detection and recognition process avoids a complex man-machine interaction process, and quickness in tongue image data analysis and calculation and accuracy of results are realized.

column2: PET SOUND SERVICE PROVIDING METHOD USING DEEP NEURAL NETWORK MACHINE LEARNING-BASED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: Disclosed is a pet sound service providing method using deep neural network machine learning-based artificial intelligence (AI). The method comprises: a step of allowing a management server to request recording and uploading of a sound for an opinion or emotion of a user prime;s pet to a pet application running on a user terminal; a step of allowing the pet application to upload the sound data of the user prime;s pet recorded by the requested opinion or emotion to the management server; a step of allowing the management server to train a deep neural network machine learning-based AI model with the uploaded opinion or emotional sound data; a step of allowing the management server to provide the trained AI model to the pet application; and a step of allowing the pet application to generate the pet sounds corresponding to the user input by using the AI model and output the same through the speaker. Accordingly, by using the deep neural network machine learning-based AI, it is possible to easily reproduce the opinions and feelings the user wants to convey to the pet with sounds which can be understood by the pet. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: BUSINESS MODEL AND METHOD BASED ON VISUAL DYNAMIC USER BEHAVIOR INTERACTION ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE APPLICATION
column4: The shooting and three-dimensional digital virtual and IT cross fusion lightweight technology is adopted, multi-dimensional behavior associated data collection is established by adjusting different angles and spatial positions of presented graphic image digital contents by a user independently, and artificial intelligence big data system decision is realized; the technology belongs to a new generation of information technology application of visual technology and big data artificial intelligence. The method has the advantages that the structural lightweight stereoscopic visual interactive display terminal is popularized and applied to brand cross-space-time marketing, the resource configuration utilization rate is increased, and brand core value cognition is enhanced to be converted into a green and environment-friendly novel tool; parameter variables and an AI intelligent algorithm are creatively added into digital content to improve experience optimization, brand active interaction demand feedback based on users is provided, and market research cost is reduced; cognitive cost reduction is realized based on active participation of users, and social popularization applicability is met.

column2: TENNIS ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMPLEMENTATION METHOD FOR VIRTUAL TENNIS SIMULATION, VIRTUAL TENNIS SIMULATION SYSTEM AND METHOD USING SAME, AND COMPUTING DEVICE-READABLE RECORDING MEDIUM FOR RECORDING SAME
column4: The present invention is for providing a tennis artificial intelligence implementation method for virtual tennis simulation, and a virtual tennis simulation system and method using same, the tennis artificial intelligence implementation method for virtual tennis simulation enabling the implementation of artificial intelligence of a sophisticated virtual opponent, which was difficult to implement by conventional screen tennis systems as mentioned above, and accordingly, enabling a player to undergo tennis practice or play a tennis match under various situations, thereby enabling the realization of a realistic rally, etc.

column2: VIRTUAL TENNIS SIMULATION SYSTEM AND CONTROL METHOD THEREFOR
column4: The present invention provides a virtual tennis simulation system and a control method therefor. According to the virtual tennis simulation system, when a player plays tennis by a virtual tennis simulation method such as a screen tennis system, even when a virtual opponent player on an image hits a virtual ball in various ways under various situations and conditions by artificial intelligence, the movement of the virtual ball through the image corresponds to the throwing of a ball by a ball machine installed at the rear surface of a screen, and thus a virtual tennis play, in which the situation on the image and the actual situation unfold by being combined, may be implemented as a dynamic and realistic play like an actual tennis match, and thus the concentration on and interest in the virtual tennis player of the player may be enhanced.

column2: FACE RECOGNITION UTILIZATION TERMINAL AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: Disclosed are a face recognition utilization terminal and a method thereof. The method for utilizing face recognition comprises the steps of: updating a video database including video information of a group main subject appearance extracted based on grouping by using face characteristics; receiving a search condition; and detecting the video information by using the database. According to the present invention, the present invention uses an artificial intelligence model of deep learning performance through a 5G network to enable a skeleton analysis and face recognition, and uses an analysis result to determine photographing composition and construct the video information at an edge stage. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: SWIMMING ROBOT AND DISPLAY DEVICE FOR CHARGING SAME
column4: Disclosed is a display device having a water tank in which one or more swimming robots are located. The device comprises: a communication unit communicating with a swimming robot or a mobile terminal; a display where a video is displayed; one or more sensing units; a wireless power transfer unit located in an inner wall of the water tank and including a plurality of arranged transmission coils; and a control module. Accordingly, the present invention provides the display device which has artificial intelligence and performs 5G communication and the swimming robot. Therefore, charging efficiency can be increased and user convenience can be further increased. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING DEVICE AND OPERATION METHOD THEREOF
column4: According to an embodiment of the present invention, an artificial intelligence monitoring device comprises: a camera for shooting an image; a communication unit for receiving cleaning information from the artificial intelligence monitoring device; and a processor for determining whether a floor situation needs to be cleaned based on the image or the cleaning information, determining a cleaning area and a cleaning type when the floor situation is determined that the cleaning is necessary, and transmitting a cleaning command including the determined cleaning area and cleaning type to the artificial intelligence cleaner through the communication unit. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: PLASTIC MATERIAL IDENTIFICATION AND DETECTION DEVICE
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of plastic classification devices. The utility model relates to a detection device, in particular to a plastic material recognition detection device. The device comprises a feeding mechanism, a conveying mechanism, a recognition mechanism and a sorting mechanism. According to the utility model, the visual camera is used for shooting the plastic on the feeding mechanism; identifying colors and contours; the white light transmittance sensor is used for detecting the light transmittance of the plastic on the feeding mechanism; detecting transparency, the infrared spectrometer is used for carrying out infrared spectrum detection on the plastic on the feeding mechanism and generating an infrared spectrum curve; integration of the three kinds of information, a processor of the sorting mechanism can perform comparative analysis according to an internal preset database to obtain the types of the plastics; the processor sends signals to the controller, the controller controls the mechanical arm to sort different kinds of plastic, the processor can conduct self-learning through the artificial intelligence technology, the recognition accuracy can be effectively improved, and neural network model data generated by learning are stored in the storage device.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an image processing method and device, and the method comprises the steps: shooting multiple frames of original images of a target object; detecting a target area corresponding to a target object in each frame of original image in the plurality of frames of original images; performing noise reduction based on artificial intelligence on the target area of each frame of original image to generate a noise reduction image; and carrying out high-dynamic synthesis on all the noise reduction images to generate a target image. Therefore, on one hand, an artificial intelligence-based noise reduction mode is adopted to reduce the noise of the image, more image details are reserved while the image purity is ensured, and on the other hand, noise reduction processing is only carried out on the target area, so that the noise reduction efficiency is greatly improved.

column2: ACTIVE RESPONSIVE TYPE INTELLIGENT ROBOT
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an active responsive type intelligent robot. The active responsive type intelligent robot comprises a housing and a chassismounted on the bottom of the housing, the front surface of the housing is provided with a touch screen, the housing is internally provided with a voice interaction system, a target positioning system, an obstacle avoidance system and a central control module, and the chassis is equipped with a running mechanism. The problem that in the prior art, the intelligent robot applied to large exhibitioncan be interacted with persons through manners of simple voice and touch screen operation, the scope of activities is also small, the active service cannot be realized, and the practicability is poorare solved; and the active responsive type intelligent robot can actively serve target users, and the scope of activities is also large.

column2: GEOLOGICAL MONITORING BP NEURAL NETWORK OPTIMIZATION METHOD, APPARATUS AND DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a geological monitoring BP neural network optimization method, apparatus and device, and a storage medium.. The method comprises the following steps: optimizing a to-be-optimized geological monitoring BP neural network; by combining the hill climbing algorithm, the genetic algorithm and the simulated annealing algorithm with the BP neural network, realizing local and global search so that the optimized BP neural network can effectively improve the global convergence and avoid falling into a local extreme value compared with the BP neural network which is optimized by only using the genetic algorithm.

column2: SYSTEM, APPARATUS, AND METHOD FOR IMPROVING CALL QUALITY
column4: Disclosed is a method for improving call quality to operate a system and apparatus for improving call quality by running artificial intelligence (AI) algorithm and/or machine learning algorithm in a 5G environment connected for the Internet of Things. According to one embodiment of the present invention, the method may comprise the steps of: receiving a voice signal from a far-end talker; receiving a sound signal including a voice signal from a near-end talker; receiving an image for face of the near-end talker including a lip; and extracting the voice signal of the near-end talker from the received sound signal. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: WEARABLE ELECTROCARDIOGRAPHY (ECG) MONITORING TECHNOLOGY WITH SEALED TANK FOR MEDICATION AND INTEGRATED MEDICAL MONITORING SYSTEM
column4: The present invention refers to a wearable, individual, customized and different sized technology for men and women, composed of electrodes, conductive track and airtight container for medicines, coupled to one another, and a mini electrocardiogram (ECG) apparatus containing a GSM (Global System Mobile) modem and a GPS (Global Positioning System) or a Bluetooth system which, through a wireless network specification within a personal scope (Wireless Personal Area Networks - PANs) deemed as PAN-type or even WPAN, the electrical signal acquisition begins when the user press the button down. It is in the field of medical, recreational and/or sport applications, aiming at monitoring patients at high cardiovascular risk, being possible to diagnose it as soon as possible, aiming at shortening time to definite treatment of those who present acute coronary syndrome (ACS), acute myocardial infarction (AMI), acute atrial fibrillation-type (AAF) cardiac arrhythmias, and other cardiac arrhythmias or other cardiac pathologies capable to be detected by the electrocardiographic trace. Moreover the invention has tools to analyze a bunch of data - big data analytics and deeplearning - by utilizing artificial intelligence. Finally, the invention also has a module to proper administer the drug contained into the airtight container.

column2: BIG DATA CLOUD PLATFORM BASED INTELLIGENT OPTIMIZING CONTROL METHOD AND DEVICE OF CENTRAL AIR-CONDITIONING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a big data cloud platform based intelligent optimizing control method and device of a central air-conditioning system, and relates to the technical field of air conditioners. The device comprises a data transmission module, a server data platform, various sensors and a controller, wherein the data transmission module comprises a data filter module, a data I/ O interface input end, a data I/ O interface output end, an RS485 communication interface, a 4G/ 5G communication interface, a WAN communication interface, a power supply and a data connection end port.
