According tothe method and the device, the influence of the running condition of each power device of the central air-conditioning system on the energy consumption of the whole system is comprehensively considered, so that the optimal energy saving effect of the central air-conditioning system can be further improved; a big data platform and an artificial intelligence algorithm are adopted, so that the accuracy of an energy consumption model or a performance model of the system power devices can be greatly improved; a high-dimensional optimizing model is solved by a biological evolutionary algorithm, thus the optimal calculation efficiency is effectively improved, and necessary conditions are supplied to online optimizing of a big central air-conditioning system.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PROVIDING INFORMATION RELATED TO VEHICLE DRIVING
column4: One or more among an autonomous vehicle, a user terminal, and a server in accordance with the present invention can be linked or fused to an artificial intelligence module, an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV), a robot, an augmented reality (AR) device, a virtual reality (VR) device, and devices related to 5G services. According to an embodiment of the present invention, a method for providing vehicle running information by an arithmetic operation device comprises: a step of acquiring vehicle running history information corresponding to a driver; a step of predicting vehicle running information based on the acquired history information; and a step of transmitting driving-related information of the vehicle verified based on the predicted information to a target vehicle if the predicted information satisfies a specific condition. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: PORTABLE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED REHABILITATION SYSTEM
column4: This invention relates to an artificial Intelligence Based Rehabilitation system having an exercise monitoring system and in particular, this invention relates to an artificial Intelligence Based Rehabilitation system which can monitor the variety of different posture correction and pain relieving exercises. More particularly, this present invention relates to an artificial Intelligence Based Rehabilitation system watch which can be paired wirelessly with a smartphone and through the mobile application. This invention also relates to the artificial Intelligence Based Rehabilitation system having an exercise monitoring system in which the accelerometer is capable of detecting translational motion of different body parts while the gyroscope can detect rotational motion. Furthermore, this invention also relates to the artificial Intelligence Based Rehabilitation system having an exercise monitoring system which has the beneficial effects of having rates high advantages, is suitable for the wide application, the structure is simple, maintenance is low, and light weight, low power and portable.

column2: FORENSIC INITIAL INSPECTION TABLE CONTROL SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of computer artificial intelligence, in particular to a forensic initial inspection table control system. By the joint work of software and hardware and the linkage work of transmission and capture of specific wave signals, hybrid shooting control of an infrared control unit and a voice control module, data classification and storage and camera auto-focusing, the artificial intelligence of physical evidence sampling is realized; in the process of sampling bulky physical evidence, a sampling worker does not need to control a camera to be aimed at theto-be-sampled physical evidence by hand or manually control the camera to confirm shooting or manually control shot videos or photos to be classified and stored, the hands of the sampling worker arecompletely freed, the situation that as the sampling worker touches other components besides the physical evidence, the physical evidence is contaminated will not occur any more, and the legal effectof the physical evidence is improved.

column2: FUNGUS DATA COLLECTING METHOD BASED ON CHROMAGAR CULTURE
column4: The invention discloses a fungus data collecting method based on Chromagar culture. The method includes the steps of firstly, collecting samples, carrying the target fungi, from the cuticle or hair ofa patient, and numbering the samples; repeatedly culturing the collected target fungi, and then purifying the fungi; performing DNA sequencing on the purified fungi; fourthly, performing color development culture on the single colony of the purified fungi on the Chromagar culture for 48 hours; fifthly, performing comparison correction on the color development results of the cultured fungi and theDNA sequencing results to remove problematic samples; sixthly, shooting the correct and cultured colonies; seventhly, using artificial intelligence to perform data collection and identification on the pictures of the color-developed fungi in the Chromagar culture. By the method, hospitals and doctors which cannot identify fungus species are intelligently assisted by the image identification method to lower identification cost.

column2: METHOD FOR DETERMINING PLACEMENT FITNESS OF MICROPHONE AND APPARATUS THEREOF
column4: Disclosed is an apparatus for determining the placement fitness of a microphone implementing an artificial intelligence (AI) algorithm and/or a machine learning algorithm and communicating with other electronic devices and external servers in 5G communication environments. The apparatus comprises an input unit, a communication unit, a storage unit and a processor. The apparatus can increase a sound recognition effect. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2020

column2: BALL GAME FIELD CAMERA SHOOTING IMPLEMENTATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VISUAL RECOGNITION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a ball game field camera shooting implementation method based on an artificial intelligence visual recognition technology. The method comprises the following steps that S1, a background server sets a competition ball as a tracking camera shooting target and sets a pre-movement area b in the camera shooting range a of a lens, and the pre-movement area b comprises a fixed monitoring area c; s2, the camera collects images of an area where the game ball is located and judges a camera shooting area where the game ball is located through a background server visual identification module; s3, the camera uploads the collected images to a background server, and the background server publishes the received images to required audiences in a live broadcast mode through the Internet; s4, the background server carries out automatic highlight image editing on the image and stores the highlight image in a memory for later viewing; the area where the game ball is located can be always located below the lens in real time, the game ball is effectively prevented from flying out of a shot picture, and the video recording effect and the live broadcast effect of shooting are improved.

column2: MULTI-COMMUNICATION-MODE ALL-ANGLE SNAPSHOT CAMERA BASED ON FACE COMPARISON
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of AI artificial intelligence recognition, and particularly relates to a multi-communication-mode all-angle snapshot camera based on face comparison, whichcomprises a camera, an image processing module, a front-end comparison module, a DDR storage module and a communication module; the camera is used for capturing a face entering a shooting area; the image processing module is used for preprocessing the face pictures captured by the camera; the front-end comparison module is used for analyzing the face picture obtained by preprocessing of the imageprocessing module; the DDR storage module is used for storing blacklist face data and caching snapshot faces; and the communication module is used for transmitting the face pictures screened by the front-end comparison module to the cloud server. According to the invention, only the face pictures in the list library are pushed, or the face pictures in the list library are filtered, or all the captured face pictures are pushed based on the face recognition method according to actual requirements, so that the processing efficiency is improved.

column2: SWIMMING POOL DROWNING PREVENTION ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EARLY WARNING DEVICE BASED ON IMAGE RECOGNITION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The utility model discloses a swimming pool anti-drowning artificial intelligence early warning device based on an image identification technology. The device structurally comprises a fixed seat, a waterproof frame, a waterproof cable, a fixed head, a camera, a waterproof cover, an anti-reflection film, a circuit board, a central processing unit and a wireless module, the utility model relates toa swimming pool drowning prevention artificial intelligence early warning device based on an image identification technology. Advantages are as follows, the device can autonomously judge the drowningsituation; early warning, wherein image recognition is adopted, an artificial intelligence image recognition OpenCV library and a Python program language are introduced; the method comprises the following steps: extracting frames of a video at a certain frequency to obtain a plurality of pictures and performing HSV format processing; the head portrait of the swimmer in the swimming pool is recognized through the Hough circle function, whether the swimmer is drowned or not is judged by continuously calculating the state function of the head portrait, finally early warning is conducted on possible drowning events, misjudgment can be reduced, the drowning recognition precision is improved, and therefore early warning is conducted in time, and the drowning events are prevented from happening.

column2: HUMAN BODY POSTURE BEHAVIOR INTELLIGENT ANALYSIS AND RECOGNITION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a human body posture behavior intelligent analysis and recognition method. The method comprises the following steps: collecting sample video data; extracting all joint points of each human body in each frame of image in the sample video, and connecting all joint points of each human body in a segmented and partial manner; connecting the same joint point of each human body in two adjacent frames of images to form a space-time diagram of each human body skeleton framework; classifying the behaviors by adopting a SoftMax classifier, and dividing behavior feature categories; performing deep learning according to the divided behavior feature categories, and training a behavior analysis model; collecting a human body posture behavior video to be analyzed, extracting a space-time diagram of each human body skeleton framework in the video, inputting the space-time diagrams into the behavior analysis model, and analyzing the behavior category of each human body in the video by the behavior analysis module. Human body posture behaviors are analyzed and recognized through feature extraction, behavior modeling and behavior classification, and the accuracy is high.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TRAFFIC INTERNET COMMAND EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence traffic Internet command device, and belongs to the technical field of traffic command. Artificial intelligence traffic Internet command equipment, the system comprises a command booth, an operation desk, an information processor, a first camera monitoring module and a second camera monitoring module, the outer wall of the operation table is connected with an operation control panel and a robot work control module. The operation control panel and the robot work control module are both electrically connected with the information processor,the outer wall of the operation table is connected with a first display module and a second display module, and the first camera shooting monitoring module and the second camera shooting monitoring module are in signal connection with the first display module and the second display module respectively. According to the utility model, a traffic police can sit in the command booth to operate the command robot, so that the robot is operated to assist traffic, the operation is convenient, the labor intensity is reduced, and excessive fatigue and harm to the body of the traffic police are avoided.

column2: VISIBILITY IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM BASED ON METEOROLOGICAL OBSERVATION AND ROAD CAMERA SHOOTING AND APPLICATION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a visibility identification system based on meteorological observation and road camera shooting. The system includes a user interaction module, a highway monitoring image dataacquisition module, a highway camera position information extraction module, a camera and meteorological station observation data association module, a visibility observation data acquisition module,a highway monitoring image and visibility big data analysis module, a visibility recognition training module based on a deep convolutional neural network, a real-time operation scheduling module, a visibility estimation and inspection module and an interface service module. According to the system, highway camera shooting data is taken as an object, and through machine learning and an artificial intelligence technology, under the combined action of related software, the road visibility information is extracted from the high-speed monitoring image in a full-automatic mode, effective monitoringof sudden agglomerate fog of the bureau can be achieved, monitoring information is provided for passing of heavy fog weather of a road, the utilization value of a monitoring camera is increased, and afavorable information guarantee is provided for reducing traffic meteorological disasters induced by heavy fog.

column2: CREATING CUSTOMIZED ADAPTIVE WORKOUT PROGRAM
column4: A process for creating an adaptive workout program comprises receiving physical characteristic information about a person via a user interface and receiving goal information via the user interface. Using artificial intelligence running on a processor and interacting with an electronic database, an adaptive workout program is determined based on the physical characteristic information and the goal information. Instructions for the workout program are retrieved and displayed. Before, during, or after the person performs the workout program, feedback is received and used to update the workout program.

column2: RECRUITMENT INTERVIEW METHOD AND DEVICE AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a recruitment interview method which comprises the following steps: extracting a preset field from recruitment information of a recruitment unit to screen out matched resumes, searching for other resumes similar to the resumes selected by the recruitment unit at the same time, and pushing the resumes to the recruitment unit; carrying out an online stroke test and/or interview on a job seeker by an intelligent interview robot; traversing and questioning the automatically generated stroke test and/or interviewquestion, performing recording and camera shooting collection in the answering process of the job seeker, automatically identifying the answer of the job seeker by utilizing a speech recognition technology, and performing matching degree calculation and scoring on the answer of the job seeker and the correct answer. The invention further provides a recruitment interview device and a computer readable storage medium. According to the invention, a recruitment interview scheme not based on manpower is realized.

column2: COPPER-SILVER ION STERILIZATION AND ALGICIDE DEVICE
column4: The invention provides a copper-silver ion sterilization and algicide device. The device comprises the following components: an microprogrammed control unit (MCU) core controller which is used as a processor of the device; a power supply module which is connected with the MCU core controller and supplies power for the device; an artificial intelligence (AI) input module which is connected with theMCU core controller and serves as an access interface of a copper ion concentration sensor and a silver ion concentration sensor; a relay module which is connected with the MCU core controller and iscontrolled by the MCU core controller; a (digital-to-analog) DA output circuit which is connected with the relay module and converts a current into a direct current for output; copper-silver electrodes which are connected with the current output end of the DA output circuit and generates copper ions and silver ions; and a direct input (DI) output module, wherein the input end of the DI output module is connected with the MCU core controller and is controlled by the MCU core controller, and the output end of the DI output module is connected with the relay module and controls polarity conversion of a relay. According to the device, a large amount of copper can be generated and are flushed into water, so that the effect of water body purification is achieved.

column2: INTELLIGENT GYMNASTICS TRAINING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent gymnastics training system. The intelligent gymnastics training system includes gymnastics training apparatus, a terminal and a server connected by communication, and the terminal includes a sensor, somatosensory collection equipment, a movement camera, an intelligent decision module, and a communication module; the senior s used for collecting user movementdata; the somatosensory collection device senses physical sign data of a user, and the terminal is used for sending the physical sign data to the server; the movement camera is used for recording or taking pictures of user training image information during training, and the terminal sends the training image information to the server; the intelligent decision module is used for performing aggregation of the user movement data and physical sign data and calculating the amount of exercise and the body index of the user through an algorithm, and through an artificial intelligence algorithm, the health index and a health advice of the user are calculated; and the communication module is used for communicating with a cloud end server in a data mode and uploading the collected user data. Basic gymnastics education of children achieves digitization, informatization, and intelligence, and management of student information and grades of a school is convenient.

column2: SWIMMING POOL UNDERWATER INTELLIGENT LIFE-SAVING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a swimming pool underwater intelligent life-saving system. The swimming pool underwater intelligent life-saving system comprises underwater cameras, an intelligent life-savingsystem, a work station, handheld field display terminals and the like. The underwater cameras are arranged at a swimming pool so as to collect information such as images and data of all the swimming crowds in the swimming pool, through a computer artificial intelligence technology, a visual recognition technology, a behavior recognition technology and a deep learning technology, within 8 seconds,a drowning person appearing underwater is recognized and found and alarm information is sent at the same time so that a lifeguard can be assisted in rescuing the drowning person in the shortest time,and the life safety of swimmers can be guaranteed; and according to the swimming pool underwater intelligent life-saving system, the artificial intelligence technology and the swimming exercise are deeply integrated, so that the defects of an existing drowning life-saving mode are overcome, an intelligent anti-drowning early warning and alarming system is built at the swimming pool, and then active prevention, early warning and timely finding of drowning life-saving are realized.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE RUNNING PERFORMANCE TESTING DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence running performance testing device. According to key points of the technical scheme, the artificial intelligence running performance testing device comprises a starting system, a processing system started by the starting system, and an induction device; the starting system comprises a microswitch electrically connected with the processing system and a pedal driving the microswitch; the pedal comprises an upper base and a lower base hinged to the upper base, the microswitch is arranged in the lower base, and rotating pieces are arranged on thelower surface of the lower base; the rotating pieces comprise the front rotating piece and the rear rotating piece; the rear rotating piece comprises a cylindrical through hole formed in the rear sideof the lower base, a supporting cylinder is arranged in the cylindrical through hole, and the supporting cylinder and the cylindrical through hole are in clearance fit; spring containing holes are downwards formed in the opposite ends of the supporting cylinder and the cylindrical through hole and internally provided with springs; and an adjusting nut is arranged on the rear side of the lower base. The artificial intelligence running performance testing device has the effects that timing is accurate, and the getting-off time of athletes can be accurately judged.

column2: DOUBLE-DOME-SCREEN CAMERA AND THREE-DIMENSIONAL MODELING METHOD OF DOUBLE-DOME-SCREEN CAMERA
column4: The invention discloses a double-dome-screen camera three-dimensional modeling method and a double-dome-screen camera, and the method comprises the steps: S1, carrying out the data collection: employing the double-dome-screen camera to carry out the shooting, and obtaining a main photo and an auxiliary photo at the same shooting moment; S2, extracting feature point data from the main photo and theauxiliary photo through an SIFT algorithm, matching feature points of the main photo and the auxiliary photo, and calculating depth data of the feature points of the main photo through a binocular vision algorithm; S3, based on the feature point data and the depth data of the main photo, calculating the position of the camera and dense point cloud by using a binocular SFM algorithm; s4, performing structured modeling on the camera position and the dense point cloud to obtain a group of dome pictures of the main camera; and S5, carrying out mapping on the model based on the dome-screen photo of each group of main cameras. A depth camera is replaced by a double-dome-screen mode, so that the cost is reduced, and the modeling speed and effect are improved.

column2: DAI-BASED RESOURCE ALLOCATION METHOD FOR OPTICAL WIRELESS SENSOR NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses a DAI-based resource allocation method for an optical wireless sensor network, and the method comprises the steps that node positions are determined and dynamically updated through employing a vector quantization method based on energy detection; after the node position is determined, the node position is optimized by using a particle swarm optimization algorithm, the nodeposition with the minimum energy consumption value is searched by taking the energy consumption as a fitness function, and the energy consumption of the whole network is balanced; the intra-cluster nodes output and transmit perception information to the cluster head nodes, the cluster heads perform resource allocation, and in the resource allocation process, distributed artificial intelligence isutilized to form coordination in the interaction response between the intra-cluster nodes and the cluster heads and between the intra-cluster nodes and the cluster heads; according to the invention, aparticle swarm optimization algorithm (PSO) and distributed artificial intelligence (DAI) are added into the optical wireless sensor network, so that energy saving and intelligent mechanisms are increased for the network, the energy consumption of the network is balanced, the response of network nodes is optimized, and the network performance is improved.

column2: AI CHASING METHOD FOR COMPETITIVE GAME APPLICATIONS
column4: The invention provides an AI chase method for competitive game applications, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The AI chasing method includes the steps that AI is divided into fourgroups of a backward group, a middle group, a leading group and an accompanying group; the backward group, the middle group and the leading group take the fixed position in front and back of the players as targets, the accompanying group takes the position of the players at a target; each AI group dynamically enhances or reduces own car performance parameters to reach a target point. The scheme can enable a racing car AI to achieve a more realistic simulation effect.

column2: ELEVATOR CAR RUNNING POSITION MONITORING EARLY WARNING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an elevator car running position monitoring early warning system and method. Emission grating sensors are installed on an elevator car and a guide rail, an NB-IoT module is installed on the top of the elevator car, the grating sensors are connected with the NB-IoT module, the NB-IoT module transmits data to a processor through a monitoring center gateway, the processor judges real-time position data of the elevator car, and if the real-time position data of the elevator car exceed the standard, the processor directly raise alarms; and the real-time position data of theelevator car are stored in a data center if not exceeding the national standards, potential faults of the elevator position are predicted through an artificial intelligence algorithm, and the alarms are raised in advance. According to the system and the method, the alarms can be raised on the real-time position abnormity of the elevator car, and whether a fault occurs in a future period or not canbe judged, and the alarms on the abnormity can be raised in advance.

column2: COLORFUL GREENBELT SPRAYING OPERATION VEHICLE
column4: The invention belongs to a colorful greenbelt spraying operation vehicle. An electrostatic spraying system is mounted on a vehicle capable of running and comprises a spraying box capable of covering landscape plants, an electrostatic spray gun, an electrostatic generator, a color coating, a coating container, a coating delivery pipe and a grounding awl; the landscape plants serve as a positive pole, the color coating serves as a negative pole, the color coating with high-voltage negative charges is sprayed to the landscape plants serving as the positive pole, and green leaves of the landscapeplants are coated into color leaves in other bright colors. The vehicle can automatically spray the coating to urban greenbelts to form colorful greenbelts.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR CONTROLLING MULTI-AXIS SYNCHRONOUS MOTION OF ROBOTS
column4: The invention provides a method and device for controlling multi-axis synchronous motion of robots, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and aims at solving the problem that theshortest time required for meeting the motion constraint and motion synchronization requirements cannot be calculated efficiently. The method comprises the steps of inputting a motion parameter of each of N axes of a robot and a motion distance of each axis of the robot in a specified running track into a constraint equation group, wherein N is an integer which is greater than or equal to 2; obtaining an optimal solution of a target function in a feasible domain of the constraint equation group so as to obtain an acceleration time Ta, a uniform speed time Tu and a deceleration time Td of eachaxis of the robot under the optimal solution; carrying out rounding to obtain an actual acceleration time, an actual uniform speed time and an actual deceleration time of each axis of the robot completing the specified running track; and generating a control signal according to the actual acceleration time, the actual uniform speed time, the actual deceleration time, an actual maximum motion speed, an actual maximum acceleration and an actual minimum acceleration to control the motion of each axis.

column2: METHOD FOR DISPLAYING PROMPT OF MAN-MACHINE INTERACTION INSTRUCTION AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: The invention provides a method for displaying a prompt of a man-machine interaction instruction and an electronic device, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of voice assistants. When a user uses the voice assistant, the method comprises the following steps of acquiring the position information and the time information of a user, a currently-used application, the content information currently browsed by the user (for example, a certain position in a page in the currently-used application or a sub-page where the currently-used application of the useris located), the running state of a mobile phone and the like; and according to one or more pieces of information in the above information, recommending a man-machine interaction instruction in a targeted manner, and guiding a user to use the voice assistant more easily to complete a wanted thing, so that the operation is simplified, meanwhile, the user can use the voice instruction to control amobile phone conveniently to execute the corresponding operation, and the user experience is improved.

column2: HEALTH ASSISTANCE SYSTEM BASED ON HEALTH INFORMATION ACQUISITION AND ANALYSIS
column4: The invention discloses a health assistance system based on health information acquisition and analysis. The system comprises a data acquisition module, a backend analysis module and a frontend interaction module. Multiple mechanisms which comprises an account number protecting mechanism, an encryption transmission mechanism and a user feedback mechanism are utilized. According to health expert opinions and an artificial intelligence algorithm, through perfecting the mode of a health characteristic table, a recommending article database is enriched. The system realizes relatively abundant frontend function designing and has certain user adhesiveness. The system has advantages of realizing low requirement and low dependence to a community hospital, reducing technology application difficultyand enlarging application area of technology. The system aims to perform a health assistance function and does not require to coping with challenges of many diseases, large individual difference andinsufficient measuring precision. Only suggestions of corresponding health characteristic to the user are required. The suggestions comprise science popularization health knowledge, sleeping, exercise, diet, etc. The system has a unified service management function which comprises auxiliary mechanism such as privacy protection, user right protection and insurance.

column2: DISTRIBUTED TICKETING SYSTEM FOR 5G SMART DIGITAL CINEMA BY FACE-SCANNING PAYMENT
column4: A distributed ticketing system for a 5G smart digital cinema by face-scanning payment comprises a movie hall, a ticket buying APP, a health guarantee refund system and a cinema management system. Themovie hall comprises a face payment concave type three-face ticket service door, a follow-up detection device, a night camera set and an outer display screen. The face payment concave type three-faceticket business door is located at an entrance of a movie hall and composed of a face payment ticket business processing door, an exit and entrance door and a background door. The night camera group is used for shooting whether there is garbage in the movie hall after the movie hall returns and a seat number corresponding to the garbage, sending shooting information to the 4G artificial intelligence server for motion identification, and recording the movie hall. The movie hall types comprise a small movie hall, a middle movie hall and a large movie hall. The height of the small movie hall is 6-8 meters. The height of stalls can be expanded on the first, second and third floors of a shopping plaza. The height of the middle movie hall is 8-9.5 meters. Stalls in the first, second or second and third floors can be vertically connected and combined. An entrance is arranged in each layer. A movie hall is arranged on the top layer. A big move hall is on the top layer.

column2: STEEL ROLL SURFACE QUALITY DEFECT DETECTION SYSTEM BASED ON MACHINE VISION
column4: The invention discloses a steel roll surface quality defect detection system based on machine version. The system comprises an equipment layer, a perception layer, a data layer and an application service layer, wherein the equipment layer comprises industrial equipment covering an implementation enterprise and various working condition sensors, and is used for supplying data to restore the implementation process and running environment of a practical production service; the perception layer is connected with the equipment layer, and used for acquiring required data and files; the data layer isbuilt with an artificial intelligence algorithm based on an industrial scene, and applied to data real-time access processing, model calculation, rule judgement and real-time early warning; the application service layer is used for supplying steel plate quality analysis and guiding equipment predictive maintenance and process optimization; and the application service layer further comprises a human-machine interaction layer, and used for performing rule recording, querying steel roll information and presenting reports. The steel roll surface quality defect detection system based on machine vision has the advantages that intermittent working can be realized, and the labor cost is lowered. Moreover, high shooting accuracy is achieved, and the defect detection accuracy is improved.

column2: PARALLEL TWO-WHEELED ELECTRIC VEHICLE
column4: The utility model provides a parallel two-wheeled electric automobile. The parallel two-wheeled electric automobile mainly comprises main electric wheels (1), a cab (2), an automobile body frame (3),a steering hand wheel (21), auxiliary wheels (4), a speed regulating roller (22), a forward or reverse switch (23) and a gyroscope or a gyro sensor (37), advanced balance sensing technologies such asgyroscopes or gyro sensors are combined with artificial intelligence control software and hardware, two main electric wheels are timely powered to achieve automatic balance of the vehicle, the radar detection technology is combined with the artificial intelligence software and hardware, the distance between the vehicle and a front vehicle or an object in front of the vehicle can be automatically kept, and rear-end collision is avoided. The vehicle has an in-situ 360-degree arbitrary steering function, and can flexibly steer and park; the vehicle has the functions of left and right driving andleft and right hand single-hand operation steering and acceleration and deceleration, and can be used as a sport vehicle, an entertainment vehicle or a scooter for old people by adding structures suchas universal wheels.

column2: MULTI-PARTY MOBILE CONTENT SHARING SERVICE THROUGH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED CUSTOMIZED MUSIC RECOMMENDATION AND SYSTEM THEREOF
column4: The present invention provides a dance and vocal learning service providing apparatus using mobile content which recommends dances and songs suitable for a user, provides content to learn a selected dance and song, and shares level evaluation and information with others through a social network service (SNS) and a method thereof. According to the present invention, the dance and vocal learning service providing apparatus comprises: a song processing unit including a microphone and a speaker, providing musical sounds to a user and receiving the user prime;s voice signal; a dance processing unit detecting user prime;s movement performed through a dance image provided by a display unit; an analysis unit separating a signal inputted from the song and dance processing units and matching the sound or movement of the user with previously stored reference information to calculate a score in accordance with the matching degree or detecting the dance/song; a storage unit storing song information, dance information, and user information; and a playback processing unit storing score or dance/song information analyzed by the analysis unit in the storage unit or providing the same to the display unit and searching for a requested dance or song information in the storage unit to combine dancer or singer content with the dance/song information and output the combined information through the display unit or microphone. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DIGITAL INTERPHONE SYSTEM AND WORKING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence speech recognition, digital code transmission and wireless remote wake-up technology. Language expression is standardized and replaced by digital codes, the part which cannot be standardized is expressed by the text, and only the digital codes or the text information is transmitted in a radio frequency mode and is far shorter than language inputor voice playing time. Therefore, a single radio frequency channel can be used for transmitting text information in a time-sharing manner to realize double-power communication. The wireless remote RFfeature wake-up technology is adopted, the standby power consumption of the interphone is greatly reduced, and information relay independent of a base station can be achieved. According to the invention, the voice information radio frequency transmission data volume is greatly reduced, so that the advantage of LPWAN low-rate long-distance communication can be utilized to realize ultra-long-distance talkback transmission, the frequency resource is saved, the service life of a battery is prolonged, the cost is reduced, and the security is improved. Therefore, the system can be widely applied tochildren supervision, travel, property management, industrial and agricultural production management automation control and the like, especially military and public security communication.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VEHICLE AUXILIARY SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence vehicle auxiliary system. The artificial intelligence vehicle auxiliary system comprises a power supply, a switch, a camera shooting module, a central processor, a driver face detection module, a display screen module, a detection module, an analysis module, a processing module, an information sending module, an information receiving module, an auxiliary control module, a vehicle state monitoring module, a vehicle safe driving module, an artificial intelligence control module, an intelligent navigation module, an acousto-optic reminding module, a radar module, a vehicle sensing module, a vehicle environment detection module, a vehicle driving auxiliary module and a circuit protector; and the power supply is electrically connected with theartificial intelligence control module through a conductor. The artificial intelligence vehicle auxiliary system is reasonable in design structure and can remind a driver in time through the processing module and the information sending module, the safe driving effect is achieved, and through the radar module, feedback for the driver can be effectively conducted when the driver backs a vehicle orpasses through a narrow channel.

column2: FULL-AUTOMATIC OPTICAL DETECTION SYSTEM FOR CHIP DETECTION
column4: The invention discloses a full-automatic optical detection system for chip detection. The full-automatic optical detection system for chip detection comprises an objective table, a feeding and discharging device, an acquisition device, a detection system and a logic control module, wherein the acquisition device is controlled to shoot chip image information on the objective table, and whether solder joints of chip gold wires and pins in a chip are qualified or not is analyzed and judged according to the chip image information; and the logic control module is used for controlling the feeding and discharging device to place the chip to be detected on the objective table, the objective table is controlled to move to a shooting area of the acquisition device, and the chip detected on the objective table is taken down. The purpose of the full-automatic optical detection system for chip detection is to provide a method for replacing traditional manual naked eyes to detect the chip, the advanced computer technology and the artificial intelligence technology are adopted, and a manipulator and the objective table are controlled to move according to instructions through the advanced machinelearning software; a product is scanned by a high-power camera to obtain the image information of the solder joints of the chip gold wires and the pins, the quality of the solder joints is judged, andfull-automatic detection is achieved.

column2: MULTI-CHANNEL ASK DATA TO WIFI TRANSMISSION SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses a multipath ASK data-to-WiFi transmission system, and belongs to the field of data communication. The system is composed of an ASK data transmitter, a multi-channel ASK data receiving-to-WiFi transmission device, a WiFi AP and the Internet. The ASK multi-channel data receiving to WiFi transmission equipment is composed of a multi-channel ASK data receiving module and aWiFi module. Wherein the ASK data receiving module has ASK data receiving and demodulating functions, the WiFi module has a CPU (Central Processing Unit) running program, a WiFi baseband processing function, an RF (Radio Frequency) processing function and a transmitting function, and data is accessed to the Internet through an AP (Access Point). ASK data receiving has the advantages of low power consumption and long distance, and WiFi data transmission has the advantage of flexible and convenient interconnection access.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CNN AND LSTM NEURAL NETWORK DYNAMIC IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence CNN and LSTM neural network dynamic identification system. The system comprises a shooting terminal (100), a server (200), a convolutional neural network (300), a long and short term memory neural network (400), an artificial intelligence early warning operation system (500), the cloud computing (600), dynamic blacklist comparative analysis (700)with a cloud database, determination of a target person identity (800) and a local database module (900). According to the invention, through an artificial intelligence CNN and LSTM neural network dynamic identification system, the feature extraction is carried out by using a video stream of the face features, voice features and behavior feature information collected by the shooting terminal; andthen the behavior feature and the abnormal behavior related technical processing is carried out on the feature information, including fighting, stealing, falling of old people, crowd events, invasionand the like, so that the all-weather 24-hour uninterrupted monitoring within the monitoring range around the shooting terminal is realized, the information sharing can be realized by a user, the utilization rate of information resources is improved, and a safety guarantee is increased for maintaining the public security stability of the society.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR MONITORING CONTENT IN LIVE BROADCAST TYPE APPLICATION
column4: The invention discloses a method and a system for monitoring content in a live broadcast type application. According to the embodiment of the invention, an internet network side is provided with a cloud system; the cloud system is composed of an instance for running the Android system and a live broadcast type application. When content in an application of a certain live broadcast type is monitored, the cloud system runs the corresponding live broadcast type application; the live broadcast type application normally loads the live broadcast content information of the live broadcast type application through the Internet, the cloud system obtains the loaded live broadcast content information from the instance of the Android system running the live broadcast type, and performs monitoring analysis by applying technologies such as artificial intelligence (AI) and the like to obtain a monitoring result, and evidence collection is performed on illegal content in the monitoring result. Therefore, according to the embodiment of the invention, contents in all live broadcast type applications can be monitored, and the method and the device have universality, high efficiency and accuracy.

column2: CLOUD HOME-SCHOOL SYSTEM BASED ON INTERNET OF THINGS
column4: The invention discloses a cloud home-school system based on the Internet of Things. The system comprises a processor, a message pushing module, a psychological health perception module, an activity track perception module, a classroom performance perception module, a physical exercise perception module, an academic quality perception module, a physical health perception module, a disease prevention perception module and a school attendance perception module. An internet of things technology is introduced to improve the data quality of home-school communication and the user experience; based onthe Internet of Things equipment, the performance data of the students in school are automatically generated, filtered, analyzed and summarized through the sub-modules from multiple aspects; feedbackand communication are carried out through the Internet, the teacher workload is reduced, the data accuracy is high, the school informatization degree is improved through the Internet of Things, an intelligent cloud home-school system is constructed, a big data basis is laid for construction of an artificial intelligence campus, and learning and growth of students are facilitated.

column2: AUTOMATIC OPTICAL DETECTION DEVICE SUITABLE FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DETECTION OF PCB
column4: The utility model relates to an automatic optical detection device suitable for artificial intelligence detection of a PCB. Including a machine frame, wherein a transmission platform is arranged on the rack; a feeding section and a discharging section are arranged on the conveying platform. A first bracket is arranged at the feeding end; a scanning camera is arranged on the first bracket; a secondmovable support is further installed on the discharging section, one or more shooting cameras are connected to the second movable support, the scanning camera and the shooting cameras are arranged ina matched mode and connected with the automatic detection and artificial intelligence recognition device, and the artificial intelligence software part is operated through a special host. According to the utility model, full-automatic detection can be realized, and the working efficiency is improved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CAMERA DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence camera device. Camera field, the device comprises a supporting assembly, a telescopic assembly and a camera assembly, the supporting assembly comprises a supporting base with a hollow part, a voice device and an alarm device. The middle part of the supporting seat is of a cavity structure with a channel; slideway plates are arranged on the inner walls of the supporting seats; the slideway plate is arranged corresponding to the channel; the voice device is arranged on the inner wall of the supporting seat; a charging head is arranged at oneend of the supporting base and sleeved with a detachable first waterproof sleeve, an alarm device is arranged on one side of the voice device and arranged on the outer wall of the supporting base, aclamping groove used for containing a memory card is formed in one side of the alarm device, the telescopic assembly is arranged on the upper portion of the supporting assembly, and the camera shooting assembly is arranged on the upper portion of the supporting assembly. The artificial intelligence camera device has an alarm function, can guarantee the indoor safety of a house, can rotate and ascend and descend by 360 degrees, is larger in camera shooting range, is provided with the storage groove for placing a mobile phone, and is diversified in function.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGE PROCESSING SYSTEM FOR PRODUCTION LINE AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence image processing system for a production line and a method thereof, and relates to the technical field of image processing. The system comprises a camera, a first storage module, a microprocessor, an image processing unit, a comparison module, a feedback module and a second storage module. The camera is used for shooting and recording products onthe production line and storing the image information in the first storage module; and the microprocessor carries out the product feature data extraction on the image information stored in the first storage module through the image processing unit. According to the invention, the product feature data extraction is carried out on the product image information shot by the camera through the image analysis module and the feature extraction module, the product feature data is compared with the product image information in the product image library through the comparison module, the comparison result is sent to the microprocessor through the feedback module, and finally the microprocessor controls the execution mechanism to sort the products, so that the sorting efficiency of the products is improved, and the labor cost and the transportation cost are reduced.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR GENERATING OPTIMAL MULTI-FACE IMAGE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a method and system for generating an optimal multi-face image, equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a plurality of continuously shot multi-face images, and carrying out the global quality analysis of the plurality of multi-face images, so as to obtain a global optimal image; carrying out face detection and face quality analysis on the multiple multi-face images, and recognizing a face image with the optimal face quality corresponding to each person; and synthesizing the face image with the optimal face quality corresponding to each person into a global optimal image to obtain an optimal multi-face image. Compared with a PS means, the method has the advantages that the global image quality is optimal, artificial subjective judgment and later PS are not needed, and the effect and efficiency of shooting the group photo are greatly improved.

column2: AI INTEGRATED ANTI-DISASTER DISTRIBUTION BOARD AND SYSTEM THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence (AI) integrated anti-disaster distribution system. An integrated control relay in a low voltage board generates a danger alarm event when only a turn-on event is received. The integrated control relay generates the danger alarm event when only an operation control signal event is received. The integrated control relay blocks a corresponding load and generates a danger alarm event when only an abnormal signal event is received. The integrated control relay generates the danger alarm event when an early fire detection event is generated. The integrated control relay generates a fire alarm event when a fire detection event is generated. The integrated control relay operates a high voltage breaker when one or more of the turned-on event, the operation control signal event, and the abnormal signal event and the fire detection event are generated at the same time. The integrated control relay supplies low voltage board driving power by pressuring common power of the low voltage board from 220 V to 110 V when abnormality is generated in a storage battery board without the early fire detection event or fire detection event. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: DYNAMIC ACCESS OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ENGINE IN A CLOUD COMPUTING ARCHITECTURE
column4: A method and a cloud-computing architecture for enabling dynamic access of an artificial intelligence engine are described. A record that includes a set of one or more fields is stored in a database. A first field from the set of fields includes an identification of an artificial intelligence (AI) engine and one or more additional fields from the set of fields respectively include one or more parameters for the AI engine. The record is accesses causing the AI engine to run with the one or more parameters. As a result of the AI engine running with the one or more parameters upon access of the record, a desired predicted output is obtained.

column2: METHOD FOR DERIVING FREQUENTLY USED APPLICATIONS, AND DERIVATION DEVICE USING SAME
column4: The present invention provides a method for deriving frequently used applications and a derivation device using same. The derivation method according to an embodiment of the present invention comprises the steps of: collecting application usage information in at least one time period and situation among a daily time period, a pre-bedtime period, and a driving situation; learning an application usage pattern via a machine learning or artificial intelligence algorithm on the basis of the collected application usage information; and extracting frequently used applications in the time period and situation on the basis of the learned application usage pattern, and recommending the extracted frequently used applications. The step of extracting and recommending frequently used applications may comprise the steps of: extracting a frequently used application in the daily time period and a frequently used application in the pre-bedtime period on the basis of the usage counts of applications used in the daily time period and the pre-bedtime period; and extracting a frequently used application in the driving situation on the basis of the running order in which applications are run in the driving situation. Accordingly, a user can minimize the inconvenience of searching for frequently used applications.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PROVIDING EFFICIENT TESTING OF SYSTEMS BY USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TOOLS
column4: An artificial intelligence testing apparatus may include processing circuitry configured to execute instructions that, when executed, cause the apparatus to create initial sample points based on a simulation received at the apparatus, and employ cyclic evaluation of the simulation until a stopping criteria is met. Employing the cyclic evaluation includes running the simulation at design points for a set of queries associated with a current iteration of the cyclic evaluation, training a set of meta-models of parameter space associated with the simulation for the current iteration, computing a set of metrics for the current iteration, and employing a selected sampling approach to select a new set of design points for a next iteration of the cyclic evaluation.

column2: A SYSTEM AND METHOD TO ANALYZE AND IMPROVE SPORTS PERFORMANCE USING MONITORING DEVICES
column4: The embodiments herein provide a method and system for monitoring, analyzing, improving and giving instant feedback on sports performance of an individual. The embodiments also provide a system and method to create visual representation of a sports action without the use of any visual data capture mechanisms. The system includes a game monitoring device, a communication network, a remote server, and a computing device. The remote server comprises a filtering and signal processing module, an analytics module, a database, and an artificial intelligence module. The computing device includes several modules and a user interface. The game monitoring device detects several data points from the player and transmits the same to the remote server. The remote server filters and processes the signals for analyzing each shot and the game of the player. The analysis is visualized and displayed on the user computing device.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON MULTIPLE FRAMES OF IMAGES AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an image processing method and device based on multiple frames of images and an electronic device. The method comprises: acquiring multiple frames of original images; performingartificial intelligence noise reduction on part of the original images to obtain a first noise reduction image, performing artificial intelligence noise reduction on the other original images to obtain a second noise reduction image, the part of the original images being original images of at least two frames in the multiple original images; converting the first noise reduction image into a firstYUV image, and converting the second noise reduction image into a second YUV image; and synthesizing to obtain a high dynamic range image according to the first YUV image and the second YUV image. According to the method and the device, the image noise and effective details of the high-dynamic-range image can be distinguished more accurately, reduction of the number of original image acquisitionframes is facilitated, the total time length required in the whole shooting process is shortened, the condition of image blurring caused by overlong shooting time length is avoided, and clear shootingof dynamic night scenes is facilitated.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DATA ACQUISITION TERMINAL FOR INTELLIGENT NETWORK CONNECTION VEHICLE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence data acquisition terminal for an intelligent network connection vehicle. The system comprises a processor unit, a power supply unit, a clock module, a communication module, a positioning module, a storage module, an interface module, a CAN module, an expansion module, an antenna module and a sensor unit. According to the utility model, the functions of collecting, displaying, inquiring and storing battery information, motor controller information, whole vehicle information, vehicle running state information, fault information and the likeof a vehicle can be monitored in real time, the system can adapt to the front-mounted and rear-mounted functions of mainstream vehicle types, and a monitoring platform can remotely set equipment in real time.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LABORATORY
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence laboratory. The laboratory comprises a displacement system and a robot system; the displacement system is used for placing workpieces and placing theworkpieces at designated positions through lifting, slewing and overturning; the robot system is used for identifying the workpieces, pre-stored control programs are matched according to the identified workpieces, and corresponding wok on the workpieces is achieved according to the matched control program or the field real-time editing workpiece. According to the artificial intelligence laboratory, a practice and exercise platform is provided for students and technicians, and the defect that efficient practice and enterprises lack theoretical guidance is overcome; the advantages of industrialrobots and requirements of universities and enterprises are combined, so that the industrial robots are applied more widely, the labor production rate is increased, and the labor conditions are improved.

column2: FPGA PIN DISTRIBUTION DESIGN METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an FPGA pin distribution design method and device. The method comprises the steps of determining and designing a top input/output port information file and a device available pin information file corresponding to the type of a used FPGA; running the FPGA pin graphic template database generation script to read the two files so as to generate an FPGA pin graphic template database for distributing FPGA pins on a graphical interface; operating FPGA pin distribution software with a graphical interface, designing a top input/output port FPGA pin distribution condition in a file of the database, and displaying the file through the graphical interface; and according to an external operation based on a graphical interface, modifying the distribution condition and updating the distribution condition into the file of the database to complete the FPGA pin distribution design. According to the scheme, pin pre-distribution is automatically carried out, and then pin distribution adjustment is carried out manually according to needs, so that the labor input is greatly reduced, and the FPGA design efficiency can be improved.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON MULTI-FRAME IMAGE AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention provides an image processing method and device based on a multi-frame image and electronic equipment. The method comprises: acquiring a multi-frame image; performing artificial intelligence noise reduction on the part of frame original images to obtain noise-reduced images, the part of frame original images being original images of at least two frames in the plurality of frames of original images; and performing synthesizing to obtain a high-dynamic-range image according to the noise reduction image and other frames of original images, and forming a plurality of frames of original images by a part of frames of original images and other frames of original images. According to the method and the device, the image noise and effective details of the high-dynamic-range image can be distinguished more accurately, reduction of the number of original image acquisition frames is facilitated, the total time length required in the whole shooting process is shortened, the condition of image blurring caused by overlong shooting time length is avoided, and clear shooting of dynamic night scenes is facilitated.

column2: PET ROBOT/DRONE: A WEARABLE FLYING DEVICE FOR SAFETY APPLICATION
column4: A personal safety apparatus which can infer and analyse the situation real-time using Artificial Intelligence (AJ) of an emiergency condition and also capture at a bird's eye perspective, and report to the nearest base quantitatively.The proposed device is an advanced setup which has a moving camera which can capture information from a better perspective and also has a real-time AI inference engine. Present invention relates to a safety bracelet which can launch a camera into 3D space and captures the situation at a bird eye perspective. The safety bracelet is wearable device which can be strapped to hand like wrist watch or a fitness band. The bracelet is activated based on the sensors which identify emergency situations like accident, robbery, attack, bomb blast, murder, sexual assault and other kind of distress. The device not only transmits images and emergency warning but also informs the emergency responder the kind of danger the user is in. This is done by the AI inference engine which processes the video real-time to identify the emergency and label them appropriately and also identify number of people and objects around. This will help the emergency responder come prepared to handle the situation. Figure lis the representative figure.

column2: FACILITY MANAGEMENT SERVICE USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: A system administrator, which is an artificial intelligence agent, provides an artificial intelligence agent which receives request and data of a service user, diagnoses the user prime;s problem in the category necessary for facility maintenance, provides the best service in the situation best suited to the user prime;s request, needs and level, and provides cost calculation according to risk and difficulty through a relay agreement for an AR service, a consultation service, a visiting service and a material and supply service. In addition, the present invention also relates to an artificial intelligence system capable of analyzing the highest risk area through a virtual design of facility safety for a space and recommending interiors optimized for facility use through a facility redesign, and an interior analysis and recommendation suitable for a space based on the data in which high-quality qualitative information on year and method products and materials is generated only by a facility construction method and facility accessories based on the data accumulated by commercialization of the basic image processing technology on the basis of the data obtained by the agent from the user and the supplier. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an image processing method and device, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining an original image; performing brightness adjustment on the original image to generate at least one reference image; carrying out noise reduction based on artificial intelligence on the original image and all reference images to generate noise reduction images; and carrying out high-dynamic synthesis on all the noise reduction images to generate a target image. Thus, on one hand, denoising is carried out the image by adopting a denoising mode based on artificial intelligence; more image details are reserved while the image purity is ensured; and on the other hand, the plurality of images used for synthesis are all from the original image, so that the phenomenon of missuperposition ghosting of the synthesized target image is avoided, and on the other hand, the reference image is acquired based on the brightness adjustment of the shot original image, and the shooting of the reference image is not needed, so that the imaging efficiency of the target image is improved.

column2: MOTION RESISTANCE CONTROL SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses a motion resistance control system. When the damping unit receives movement resistance of a sporter, a resistance value is formed. If so, a signal of the sensing unit is transmitted back to the microcontroller; the microcontroller transmits the resistance value back to the data link unit and returns the resistance value back to the control center; the cloud server, theportable electronic device and the biological recognition device are mutually combined; the biological characteristics of the sporter are identified by the biological identification device; determining the body of the sporter; the cloud server is enabled to know the resistance value formed by the sporter and the identity of the sporter; namely, the physiological state of the sporter corresponds tothe type of the sports equipment; the consumed heat and the optimal exercise time of the sporter are actively evaluated, and the muscle of the part needs to be strengthened; the system is suitable for the evaluation information of sports equipment, sports curve graphs and the like, transmits and receives the evaluation information through the cloud server and the portable electronic device, provides query and setting for sporters, forms an artificial intelligence fitness center, enables the sporters to achieve the optimal fitness training effect, and reserves the complete training information.

column2: DATA ACQUISITION ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses a data acquisition algorithm. A main function of a data acquisition gateway is to convert data of industrial bottom-layer equipment into network application layer protocols such as MQTT and the like, wherein switching value signals reflecting the running state of the equipment, analog quantity signals transmitted by a plurality of sensors and data streams, which are transmitted by network ports or serial ports of the equipment and exist in a protocol mode, are provided. The data is integrated into an MQTT protocol by the edge computing capability of the data acquisitiongateway, and the MQTT protocol is transmitted to a cloud platform port of a public network in a wireless or wired mode, and finally the information such as the running state of equipment, environmental parameters and the like are truly reflected. According to the technical scheme, the data acquisition algorithm adopts a meta-algorithm to invoke an algorithm framework of each sub-algorithm, so that the applicability of the data acquisition gateway is improved; according to the on-site condition, the edge detection of the switching value and the configuration selection of analog quantity according to physical quantity are optimal solutions; and the CNN deep learning algorithm of the protocol is the technical scheme capable of combining the data acquisition field and artificial intelligence.

column2: PRINTED CIRCUIT BOARD CONTINUOUS PROCESSING EQUIPMENT WITH BOARD SAVING SINGLE MACHINE
column4: The utility model relates to printed circuit board continuous processing equipment with a board rescuing single machine. An artificial intelligence type single board rescuing machine is additionally arranged on high-order semiconductor printed circuit board continuous processing equipment; when the printed circuit board continuous processing equipment operates normally, the operation is simple; the board rescuing single machine executes a relay conveying function, but when the printed circuit board continuous processing equipment is abnormal, the board rescuing single machine executes a boardrescuing program function, so that the high-order semiconductor printed circuit boards of which the processes are not completed can be completely and safely taken out, semi-finished circuit boards ofwhich the processes are not completed can be protected, and after the equipment is repaired to be normal, the equipment is put into production again.

column2: METHOD FOR REALIZING REMOTE MONITORING AND AUTHORIZATION OF TRAMCAR BASED ON BIM+AI
column4: The invention provides a method for realizing remote monitoring and authorization of a tramcar based on BIM+AI. The method comprises the following steps of acquiring tramcar running related information in real time by adopting an information acquisition module; transmitting the acquired tramcar running related information to an information processing module, enabling the information processing module to carry out computational analysis on the information and storing corresponding data through a data storage module, and processing an analysis result through a BIM module and displaying the analysis result through a display module. According to the method, a building information model technology is adopted, and simulation and schematic equipment and data display modes in the traditional urbantramcar industry are broken, accurate display of tramcar running lines, vehicles, stations, equipment and the like on a three-dimensional comprehensive monitoring platform is realized, real-time on-spot remote monitoring of the tramcar is realized, an artificial intelligence technology is applied to a comprehensive management system of the tramcar, and fine and flexible authorization in a tramcaroperation and maintenance management process is realized.

column2: PROGRAM STORED ON MEDIUM TO EXECUTE AQUA SYSTEM CONTROL USING ROBOT FISH
column4: The present invention relates to an aqua system using a robot fish, a control method thereof, a program stored on a medium to execute the same, and a recording medium thereof. A robot fish is inserted into an aquarium, and a background display device is installed on a rear surface of the aquarium. The robot fish is manually controlled or controlled with automatic swimming through a remote controller or a control device. A virtual object and a background image are displayed on a background screen to present underwater environment. Moreover, the virtual object is matched based on location information on the robot fish to enable the virtual object to follow the robot fish. In addition, the virtual object can be used for promotions or advertisements for expressing underwater creatures or various promotional products or objects. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: RECORDING MEDIUM WHICH RECORDS PROGRAM FOR EXECUTING AQUA SYSTEM CONTROL USING ROBOT FISH
column4: The present invention relates to an aqua system using a robot fish, a control method thereof, a recording medium which records a program for executing the same, and the recording medium. A robot fish is inserted into an aquarium, and a background display device is installed on a rear surface of the aquarium. The robot fish is manually controlled or controlled with automatic swimming through a remote controller or a control device. A virtual object and a background image are displayed on a background screen to present underwater environment. The virtual object is matched based on location information on the robot fish to enable the virtual object to follow the robot fish. Moreover, the virtual object can be used for promotions or advertisements for expressing underwater creatures or various types of promotional products or objects. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: AQUA GAME SYSTEM USING FISH ROBOT
column4: The present invention relates to an aqua game system using a fish robot. A fish robot is inserted into an aquarium, a background display device is installed on the rear side of the aquarium, the fish robot is manually controlled through a remote controller or control device, a virtual game object and a game background image are outputted to a background display device through the control of the control device, and the virtual game object is controlled in response to real time position information of the fish robot to provide an aqua game. The aqua game includes a variety of game content such as soccer, ice hockey, underwater hunting, underwater exploration maze and the like, and the virtual game object can be used to provide advertisements and various events. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING AQUA SYSTEM USING ROBOT FISH
column4: The present invention relates to a method for controlling an aqua system using a robot fish. According to the method for controlling an aqua system using a robot fish, the robot fish is inserted into an aquarium, and a background display device is installed on a rear surface of the aquarium. The robot fish is manually controlled or controlled with automatic swimming through a remote controller or a control device. A virtual object and a background image are displayed on a background screen to present underwater environment.
