column2: MOTION HEALTH DATA ACQUISITION MANAGEMENT PRESCRIPTION BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, AND TERMINAL SERVICE SYSTEM
column4: The invention belongs to the field of an artificial intelligence motion health management system, and particularly relates to a motion health data acquisition management prescription based on artificial intelligence, and a terminal service system. According to the motion health data acquisition management prescription, parameters at three aspects of environment, motion and physique of a user object are acquired through a data acquisition module; a background data analysis module performs automatic analysis on the acquired parameter data at three aspects of the user; a personalized motion prescription is generated through a motion plan generating module; and motion prescription management AI pushes the personalized motion prescription to a personal terminal in real time. The motion health data acquisition management prescription settles problems of single reference condition, incomprehensive data and incapability of effectively guiding body building of the user in the personalized motion prescription, and furthermore can supply a personalized terminal service. Through analyzing and quantifying more factors of different physique testing persons, a true and more effective personalizedscientific motion prescription can be generated. Optimization, analysis and information feedback are performed on the system through artificial intelligence technology, thereby improving interactionexperience between the user and the system.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PROCESSING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) UNIT STATE INFORMATION
column4: The invention discloses a method and system for processing artificial intelligence (AI) unit state information. The method for processing the artificial intelligence (AI) unit state information comprises the following steps that a great deal of state information of AI units in game running is acquired; the state information is sorted on a time axis according to the time sequence to obtain time axis information; and the time axis information is displayed in a preset display area in a game map. Furthermore, the technical problems of non-intuitive display of the state information of the AI unitsand poor user experience in related technologies are solved.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MAKING INTELLIGENT CO-SHOOTING VIDEO
column4: The invention discloses a system and a method for making an intelligent co-shooting video. The system comprises a main material creating device, an intelligent co-shooting video application program, aco-shooting material creating device, a co-shooting material database, a co-shooting material uploading interface, an intelligent module, a co-shooting material searching and selecting module and a network. According to the invention, the artificial intelligence technology is used to automatically select the co-shot video material; the group photographer and the group photographing material are automatically matched; the combined shot video is automatically edited and combined; people are found by shooting the materials in a combined manner; no skill is required, any co-shooting material doesnot need to be found and provided; the system and the method are free of any limitation, very simple and easy to use, for different co-photographers, different co-photographing materials can be selected according to genders, ages, face values and the like of the co-photographers, the created co-photographing short video has strong pertinence and matching performance on the co-photographers, strong psychological and emotional satisfaction can be brought to the co-photographers, and the practicability is higher.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING SYSTEM BASED ON INFANT BODY LANGUAGES
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence monitoring system based on infant limb languages in the technical field of infant nursing. The artificial intelligence monitoring system comprises asound monitoring module, a sound recognition module, a shooting monitoring module, a shooting recognition module, a control module, a voice playing reminding module and a mobile phone reminding end. The sound monitoring module is connected with the control module through the sound recognition module; the shooting monitoring module is connected with the control module through the shooting recognition module; the control module is connected with the voice playing reminding module; the control module is connected with the mobile phone reminding end through wireless data; the baby behavior information is supervised by using the sound monitoring module and the shooting monitoring module, so that various behavior information of the baby can be known in time, nursing personnel can be convenientlynotified to carry out corresponding management work on the baby in the first time in a voice manner, and the baby nursing efficiency and strength are improved.

column2: SHOOTING METHOD AND DEVICE FOR INTELLIGENT ROBOT, TERMINAL EQUIPMENT AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention is applicable to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a shooting method and device for an intelligent robot, terminal equipment and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: when a shooting event is triggered, starting a camera of the intelligent robot; performing image recognition on a shot image of the camera to determine the position of a shot object inthe shot image; controlling a camera of the intelligent robot to move until the position of the shot object in the shot image is located in a preset area, and stopping moving; wherein the preset areais a sixteen-equal-part area of the shot picture, and the golden section point of the shot picture exists in the preset area. According to the invention, automatic composition in the shooting processof the intelligent robot is realized; therefore, the output image is ensured to have a better composition effect, the shooting quality of the photo is prevented from being influenced when a user without a shooting foundation controls the intelligent robot to shoot, and the stable output of the high-quality image is ensured.

column2: FACE ANALYSIS-BASED MULTI-PERSON IMAGE SCORING METHOD, SYSTEM AND DEVICE AND MEDIUM
column4: The invention provides a face analysis-based multi-person image scoring method, system and device and a medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a multi-person image, and detecting the position, size and angle of each face in the multi-person image through a face detection algorithm; calculating the face quality score of each face in the multi-person image by adopting a face quality scoring algorithm; calculating the face weight of each face according to the position, size and face quality score of each face in the multi-person image; calculating a face comprehensive score in the multi-person image by combining the face weight and the face quality score of each face; calculating a light source consistency score of the multi-person image by using a light source consistency analysis algorithm; calculating a formation score of the multi-person image by using a formation analysis algorithm; and calculating a total score of the multi-person image according to the face comprehensive score, the light source consistency score and the formation score. According to the present invention, by using the multi-person image final score, the quality of the shot multi-person image can bedetected, but also the assistance can be carried out during multi-person group photo shooting to improve the shooting quality.

column2: VEHICLE AND MOUNTING BRACKET THEREOF
column4: The utility model relates to the technical field of vehicles, in particular to a vehicle and a mounting bracket thereof. The mounting bracket comprises a mounting base and a mounting platform; each mounting base comprises a base, a fixing part fixedly connected to the bottom of the base, adjusting plates oppositely arranged on the two sides of the base, and a connecting piece fixedly connected between the adjusting plates; the fixing part is used for fixing the base on a vehicle body; the adjusting plate is provided with at least one fixing hole and/or at least one arc-shaped hole penetratingthrough the thickness of the adjusting plate, and the adjusting plate is fixedly connected to the side face of the base through a first fastener arranged in the arc-shaped hole and/or the fixing holein a penetrating mode. The mounting platform is fixedly connected to the connecting piece. The mounting bracket is used for solving at least one of the defects that existing electronic equipment is mounted outside a vehicle body through a stand column and a cross rod, the electronic equipment shakes too much in the vehicle running process, effective data cannot be obtained, and the position and/orposture of the electronic equipment is inconvenient to adjust.

column2: AQUA GAME SYSTEM USING FISH ROBOT
column4: The present invention relates to an aqua game system using a fish robot. A fish robot is inserted into an aquarium, a background display device is installed on the rear side of the aquarium, the fish robot is manually controlled through a remote controller or control device, a virtual game object and a game background image are outputted to a background display device through the control of the control device, and the virtual game object is controlled in response to real time position information of the fish robot to provide an aqua game. As the aqua game, a variety of game content such as soccer, ice hockey, underwater hunting, underwater exploration maze and the like can be provided, and the virtual game object can be used to provide advertisements and various events. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: AQUA SYSTEM USING ROBOT FISH
column4: The present invention relates to an aqua system using a robot fish. A robot fish is inserted into an aquarium, and a background display device is installed on a rear surface of the aquarium. The robot fish is manually controlled or controlled with automatic swimming through a remote controller or a control device. A virtual object and a background image are displayed on a background screen to present underwater environment. The virtual object is matched based on location information on the robot fish to enable the virtual object to follow the robot fish. Moreover, the virtual object can be used for promotions or advertisements for expressing underwater creatures or various types of promotional products or objects. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: FERTILITY DIAGNOSTICS MONITORING SYSTEM FOR FERTILITY BIOMARKER AND RELATED METHODS
column4: The present invention relates to the programming of a microprocessor to make two (2) genuine electronic sensors in direct contact with the vagina, sensing or actuating, to automate the natural birth control process. The stand-alone medical device measures the Body Basal Temperature (BBT) and detects the conditions and quality of cervical mucus in real-time -using LED lights and an audible sound to indicate infertile or fertile conditions. The stand-alone medical device is time critical, as it can only be used in the morning waking hours. However, when the stand-alone medical device is connected to computing devices via Bluetooth, it can be used as a vaginal probe in real-time before sexual intercourse. The computing device loaded with application software receives real-time, wireless data from the medical device and inputs from users. It also stores body parameters, and personal ovulation benchmarks to further analyze, consolidate, process data and display information on the fertility/infertility of users. A cloud-based software and Internet platform integrate ovulation data sent wirelessly from the computing devices onto digital records of users on health, exercise, stress level, sleep, and nutrition. The new Internet platform is named Family & Lifestyle Planner. The cloud-based software uses machine learning, Artificial Intelligence, and Big Data computing.

column2: GOLF TRAINING DEVICE FOR SUPPORTING GOLF SWING PRACTICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND AUGMENTED REALITY
column4: Disclosed is a golf training device for supporting golf swing practice based on artificial intelligence and augmented reality. The golf training device for supporting golf swing practice comprises: a head; a shaft; a socket coupled with the shaft and head; a first magnetic force unit provided in the socket; a second magnetic force unit provided in the head; and a hitting unit provided in the head. An attractive force is applied between the first magnetic force unit and the second magnetic force unit. When a user practices golf swing by using the golf training device and a force exceeding the attractive force in the opposite direction of the attractive force is applied to the second magnetic force unit, the second magnetic force unit hits the hitting unit. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM APPLIED TO PHARMACEUTICAL FACTORIES AND AN IDENTIFICATION METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence identification system applied to pharmaceutical factories and an identification method thereof, the system comprises a server and a medicinal material screening machine, and the server is connected with the medicinal material screening machine through a network; the server is used for storing the trained artificial intelligence model; and the medicinal material screening machine is used for shooting traditional Chinese medicinal material pictures and receiving recognition results of the server. The recognition method of the system comprises the steps that traditional Chinese medicinal materials are photographed through a camera of a medicinal material screening machine, and photographed traditional Chinese medicinal material pictures are uploaded to a server; the server receives the traditional Chinese medicinal material pictures, triggers an artificial intelligence model to identify the traditional Chinese medicinal material pictures,and feeds back an identification result to the medicinal material screening machine; and the medicinal material screening machine obtains an identification result, classifies the traditional Chinesemedicinal materials, classifies unqualified traditional Chinese medicinal materials into a waste pile, and transmits qualified traditional Chinese medicinal materials to the refining furnace. The method does not depend on the level of inspection personnel, can ensure the high quality of the traditional Chinese medicine raw materials more quickly, accurately, comprehensively and intelligently, andimproves the efficacy of the Chinese patent medicine.

column2: A VIDEO PROCESSING TASK ITEM CREATION METHOD AND AN INPUT VIDEO STREAM SCHEDULING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a video processing task item creation method and an input video stream scheduling method, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence visual identification. The method for creating the video processing task item comprises the following steps: when an event for creating the video processing task item is detected on a user interface, determining informationof a camera related to the video processing task item; determining a task item name of the video processing task item and a running time period of the video processing task item; and creating a videoprocessing task item on the user interface based on the information of the camera related to the video processing task item, the task item name and the running time period. According to the video processing task item creation method provided by the embodiment of the invention, the user can create the video processing task item on the user interface of the video processing system, so that the usercan visually know any information about the video processing task item.

column2: AN ORDERED CLASSIFICATION METHOD FOR SKIN BLACKHEAD DETECTION
column4: The invention discloses an ordered classification method for skin blackhead detection, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: shooting a front image of a face to be detected by using a high-resolution camera; extracting face feature points by using a face recognition technology; calculating the distance between two eyes in the face feature points, and zooming the picture to enable the distance between the two eyes to be 512 pixel points; extracting pictures of a nose, a left face, a right face and a forehead area in the face feature pointpictures; judging the severity degree of the blackheads in each region picture by using the designed convolutional neural network in cooperation with a fixed threshold ordered classification model; and synthesizing the brief text report and providing the brief text report to the detected person. According to the method, the ordered multi-classification problem is converted into the regression problem through the fixed threshold ordered classification model, the full convolutional neural network is used for processing the to-be-detected picture of any size, and the text report is provided forthe detected person, so that artificial intelligence can predict the blackhead level conveniently, the blackhead severity distinguishing efficiency is improved, and the distinguishing cost is reduced.

column2: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED TRADITIONAL CHINESE MEDICINAL MATERIAL PLANTING ORIGIN IDENTIFICATION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based traditional Chinese medicinal material planting production place identification method, which comprises the following steps: collecting a plurality of different traditional Chinese medicinal material decoction pieces from different production places, and shooting at least one hundred of pictures of each traditional Chinese medicinal materialdecoction piece from different production places; extracting a multi-dimensional characteristic value of each picture by using a trained deep learning convolutional neural network framework; inputting the multidimensional characteristic value of each picture and known planting origin information into an SVM for training, and automatically summarizing fine difference characteristics in different traditional Chinese medicine decoction piece pictures of different planting origins by a trainer to generate a classification model; And classifying and storing the classification model, and identifying the planting place of the traditional Chinese medicinal materials to be identified. The method is wide in application range and high in classification precision, the classification precision reaches95% or above, the classification capability is basically the same as that of experts, and the method is suitable for application and popularization.

column2: ROBOT FISH
column4: The present invention relates to a robot fish, and more specifically, to a robot fish which allows easy control of buoyancy, makes swimming underwater free, performs a change in direction by enabling reverse propulsion and rapid acceleration, and increases fun and entertainment of the interaction while increasing an ornamental effect by sensing and reacting to the motions of visitors gathered around an aquarium. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: ROBOT FISH
column4: The present invention relates to a robot fish, and more specifically, to a robot fish which allows easy control of buoyancy, makes swimming underwater free, performs a change in direction by enabling reverse propulsion and rapid acceleration, and increases fun and entertainment of the interaction while increasing an ornamental effect by sensing and reacting to the motions of visitors gathered around an aquarium. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: ROBOT FISH
column4: The present invention relates to a robot fish, and more specifically, to a robot fish which allows easy control of buoyancy, makes swimming underwater free, performs a change in direction by enabling reverse propulsion and rapid acceleration, and increases fun and entertainment of the interaction while increasing an ornamental effect by sensing and reacting to the motions of visitors gathered around an aquarium. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: ROBOT FISH
column4: The present invention relates to a robot fish, and more specifically, to a robot fish which allows easy control of buoyancy, makes swimming underwater free, performs a change in direction by enabling reverse propulsion and rapid acceleration, and increases fun and entertainment of the interaction while increasing an ornamental effect by sensing and reacting to the motions of visitors gathered around an aquarium. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: A VIRTUAL GARMENT TRY-ON SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a virtual garment try-on system which comprises an in-store database module used for storing a model of garments owned in a store and a human body AI model of a client and usedby the client at the next time; a human body information acquisition module which is used for scanning and shooting the body of the user to obtain body data and a face image of the user; a model generation module which is used for establishing a human body model according to the information acquired by the human body information acquisition module, and Inputting data of the human body informationfor training to obtain a human body AI model corresponding to the figure; a clothes model selection module which is used for calling the clothes model of the in-store database module to be selected by the user; a model modification module which is used for responding to the request of the user, modifying the model of the clothes selected by the fitting person, and generating sample clothes conforming to the size of the fitting person; and a synthesis rendering module which is used for controlling actions of the clothes model and the selected user model according to the estimated posture of the user; The virtual garment try-on system can display the body type and the effect of the tested garment.

column2: DIGITAL PLATFORM TO IDENTIFY HEALTH CONDITIONS AND THERAPEUTIC INTERVENTIONS USING AN AUTOMATIC AND DISTRIBUTED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM
column4: This disclosure is directed to method and system for automatic, distributed, computer-aided, and intelligent data collection/analytics, health monitoring, health condition identification, and patient preventive/remedial health advocacy. The system integrates (1) distributed patient health data collection devices, (2) centralized or distributed data servers running various intelligent and predictive data analytics engines for health screening, assessment, patient health condition identification, and patient preventive/remedial health advocacy, 3) specifically designed data structures including quantized health indicator vectors, patient health condition identification matrices and patient health condition vectors, (4) portal servers configured to interface with (5) distributed physician terminal devices and (6) distributed patient terminal devices for delivering health condition identification, health interventions and patient preventive/remedial health advocacy, and for monitoring and tracking patient activities. The various intelligent and predictive engines are configured to learn and extract hidden features and correlations from a large amount of data obtained from the distributed data collection devices.

column2: A TRADITIONAL CHINESE MEDICINAL MATERIAL HARVESTING TIME IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based traditional Chinese medicinal material harvesting time identification method, which comprises the following steps: collecting a plurality of traditional Chinese medicinal materials at different harvesting times, and shooting at least one hundred of pictures of each traditional Chinese medicinal material at different harvesting times; Extracting a multi-dimensional characteristic value of each picture by using a trained deep learning convolutional neural network framework; Inputting the multi-dimensional characteristic value of each picture and known harvesting time information into an SVM for training, and automatically summarizing fine difference characteristics in different traditional Chinese medicine decoction piece pictures at different harvesting times by a trainer to generate a classification model; And classifying, storing and packaging the classification model into client software for a client to identify the harvestingtime of the traditional Chinese medicinal materials. The method is wide in application range and high in classification precision, the classification precision reaches 90% or above, the actual commercial requirements are met, and the method is suitable for application and popularization.

column2: ROBOT FISH
column4: The present invention relates to a robot fish, and more specifically, to a robot fish which allows easy control of buoyancy, makes swimming underwater free, performs a change in direction by enabling reverse propulsion and rapid acceleration, and increases fun and entertainment of the interaction while increasing an ornamental effect by sensing and reacting to the motions of visitors gathered around an aquarium. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: ROBOT FISH
column4: The present invention relates to a robot fish, and more specifically, to a robot fish which allows easy control of buoyancy, makes swimming underwater free, performs a change in direction by enabling reverse propulsion and rapid acceleration, and increases fun and entertainment of the interaction while increasing an ornamental effect by sensing and reacting to the motions of visitors gathered around an aquarium. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING OPERATION OF HOME APPLIANCE, HOME APPLIANCE AND METHOD FOR OPERATING HOME APPLIANCE
column4: Disclosed are an apparatus and a method for controlling a home appliance by running an artificial intelligence (AI) algorithm and/or a machine learning algorithm under the 5G environment connected for the Internet of Things. An embodiment of the present invention provides a home appliance control apparatus, comprising: a setup unit, if receiving a voice command from a speaker, setting one main home appliance among multiple home appliances and settings, as a sub home appliance, at least one among the remaining home appliances; and a communication control unit, if set conditions are satisfied, controlling communications between the main hole appliance and the sub home appliance based on a mutually agreed communication protocol besides a preset network protocol. The present invention transmits and receives voice commands of a user based on the agreed communication protocol even though a network failure occurs, thereby being capable of performing remote control of the home appliance. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: ELECTRIC PUBLIC TRANSPORT AUTOMOBILE SAFETY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an electric public transport automobile safety management system and an electric public transport automobile safety management method. The electric public transport automobilesafety management system comprises a sensor component, a driver operation information acquisition system, a central dispatching system and an overall automobile control system; a signal transmission end of the sensor component is connected with the signal transmission end of the driver operation information acquisition system; the driver operation information acquisition system is connected with the central dispatching system and the overall automobile control system through an internet of automobiles. Compared with the prior art, the electric public transport automobile safety management system based on the technologies of automatic control, networks, big data and artificial intelligence realizes the monitoring of running conditions and driver operations of each running bus through a management centre, and automatically alarms and intervenes when a driver performs a rule-breaking operation, and takes over the bus when necessary so as to prevent potentially dangerous accidents, reducerule-breaking operations of drivers, and reduce the probability of accidents.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED TRUE AND FALSE MIXED TRADITIONAL CHINESE MEDICINAL MATERIAL IDENTIFICATION METHOD
column4: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based true and false mixed traditional Chinese medicinal material identification method, which comprises the following steps of: dispersing particles of certified traditional Chinese medicinal materials and counterfeit traditional Chinese medicinal materials on a desktop with a pure color background, and shooting at least one hundred of images; converting the picture into an image in an hsv format, taking pixel values of four vertexes of the picture, and judging the background color of the picture according to an interval where the pixel values are located; judging all pixel points in the image according to the pixel threshold range of the color of the background of the image, regarding the pixel points in the threshold interval range asbackground areas, and regarding the image areas where other pixel points are located as Chinese herbal medicine areas needing to be identified; after the background is recognized, obtaining an area where each traditional Chinese medicinal material particle is located according to a connected area marking method, and cutting the area in the original photo to obtain sub-pictures of certified and counterfeit traditional Chinese medicinal material particles; and identifying the traditional Chinese medicinal materials by using the sub-picture training classifier. The classification precision can reach 95% or above, the actual commercial requirements are met, identification is rapid, and time and labor are saved.

column2: SCIENTIFIC BODY BUILDING GUIDING SYSTEM BASED ON KNOWLEDGE ATLAS AND METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a scientific body building guiding system based on a knowledge atlas and a method, wherein the system comprises a sensor module, a body building information resource acquiringmodule, a knowledge atlas module, a body building knowledge database, an intelligent analysis module, a body building guiding module and a user interaction module. The method comprises a scientific body building guiding system constructing method and a method for acquiring a scientific body building guiding suggestion by the user. According to the scientific body building guiding system and the method, the body building information resource is acquired in multiple manners; the knowledge atlas technique is utilized for constructing the body building knowledge database, thereby improving body building guiding accuracy and effective utilization rate of the resource. Furthermore multiple artificial intelligence algorithms are utilized for improving body building data analysis accuracy.

column2: PROTECTING AI PAYLOADS RUNNING IN GPU AGAINST MAIN CPU RESIDING ADVERSARIES
column4: Methods and apparatus relating to protecting Artificial Intelligence (AI) payloads running in Graphics Processing Unit (GPU) against main Central Processing Unit (CPU) residing adversaries are described. In an embodiment, memory stores data corresponding to one or more Artificial Intelligence (AI) tasks. The memory comprises at least a shared memory partition and a Graphics Processing Unit (GPU) only memory partition. Logic circuitry performs one or more operations in a protected environment to cause transmission of the stored data from the shared memory partition of the memory to the GPU only memory partition of the memory. The shared memory partition is accessible by both a GPU and a Central Processing Unit (CPU), and the GPU only memory partition is only accessible by the GPU. Other embodiments are also disclosed and claimed.

column2: INDIVIDUALLY TAILORED EXERCISE TRAINING AND REHABILITATION TECHNIQUE: MEDICAL PERSONAL TRAINER
column4: The present invention concerns a new individually tailored exercise training and rehabilitation technique, referred to as "MPT: Medical Personal Trainer". More precisely, the invention concerns an innovative method to be used in the field of physical activity and exercise training/rehabilitation programs for healthy individuals and for patients with chronic diseases. It merges together, in an interactive way, advanced notions from medicine, engineering, mathematics, artificial intelligence, in order to provide new clinical perspectives for automatic personalized health care as well as novel insights on individually-tailored management and advanced treatment, in a user-familiar setting, of healthy subjects (including elderly) and patients with chronic diseases.

column2: EXERCISE POSTURE CORRECTING TOOL
column4: The present invention relates to an exercise posture correcting tool which assists to maintain a correct posture by recognizing and analyzing a motion of a user. The exercise posture correcting tool comprises: a chip in which artificial intelligence and big data are embedded; a voice recognition device, a motion recognition device, and a speaker which are connected to assist a function of the chip; and a support which prevents falling down. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DROWNING PREVENTION EARLY WARNING SYSTEM, EQUIPMENT AND METHOD BASED ON IMAGE RECOGNITION
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence anti-drowning early warning device based on image recognition, which comprises a wearable swimming device, the wearable swimming device is provided with an image recognition area, and the image recognition area is provided with image recognition characteristics. The invention also provides an artificial intelligence anti-drowning early warning system based on image recognition, and the image acquisition equipment of the anti-drowning early warning system is installed near an overwater facility and is used for carrying out image acquisition on the swimming guest state in an overwater facility. The input end of the system host is connected with image acquisition equipment, and the output end of the system host is connected with an early warning device. The system further comprises the wearable swimming device for image recognition, and a swimmer is in visual connection with the image acquisition device through the wearable swimming devicefor image recognition. The invention further provides an anti-drowning early warning method of the artificial intelligence system based on image recognition. The overwater facility drowning accidentrecognition rate can be increased, a lifeguard is assisted in completing lifesaving work, and the safety of the overwater facility is improved.

column2: SHOOTING ASSEMBLY FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHANNEL GATE
column4: The embodiment of the utility model discloses a shooting assembly for an artificial intelligence passage gate, which is used for solving the technical problem that the shooting assembly adopted by theexisting passage gate cannot be used for quickly identifying people with different heights. The embodiment of the utility model comprises a base, a swinging module and a camera module, wherein the base comprises a first side plate and a second side plate; the swinging module comprises a rotating bracket; the camera module is fixedly mounted on the rotary bracket; the rotary bracket is arranged between the first side plate and the second side plate; a rotating motor and a sensor are fixedly installed on the side face, away from the rotating support, of the first side plate. The sensor is in communication connection with the rotating motor; an output shaft of the rotating motor penetrates through the first side plate and is connected with the first end of the rotating bracket; the second end of the rotary bracket is rotationally connected to the second side plate; in the embodiment, the camera module can be driven by the rotating motor to rotate upwards or downwards by a certain angle,so that crowds with different heights can be quickly and accurately recognized.

column2: DUAL-PURPOSE UNMANNED VEHICLE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and in particular to a dual-purpose unmanned vehicle that mainly comprises an electric vehicle and an electric aircraft; the electric vehicle is provided with a chassis and a vehicle body, and the electric aircraft is provided with an aircraft body and wings. When the vehicle is used, a person only needs to sit in the vehiclebody to control a control panel to input a destination; scientific distance calculation can be carried out on the vehicle according to the destination input by the person. A traveling scheme is formulated; if the electric quantity of the automobile is not enough to support traveling of the destination or the vehicle needs to reach the destination through a waterway, the vehicle can send out a signal, and an idle aircraft in a city can get close to the vehicle and take away the vehicle body through being connected with the vehicle, so that relay type movement is realized. The dual-purpose unmanned vehicle has the beneficial effects that the transportation vehicle is convenient and fast to use, the traveling efficiency of people is improved, the original box type transportation is changed,and more freedom is provided for traveling of people.

column2: AN EXTRACTION SYSTEM OF A THREE-DIMENSIONAL MODEL
column4: The invention discloses an extraction system of a three-dimensional model, and the system comprises a three-dimensional model curvature calculation unit which is used for calculating the curvature ofeach point on the three-dimensional model; a three-dimensional model key point extraction unit which is connected with the three-dimensional model curvature calculation unit and extracts key points ofthe three-dimensional model according to the curvature; a three-dimensional model measuring and calculating unit which is connected with the three-dimensional model key point extracting unit and is used for calculating the distance from the point on the three-dimensional model to each key point and obtaining the height value of each point on the three-dimensional model according to the minimum value in the distance; a three-dimensional model dividing unit which is connected with the three-dimensional model measuring and calculating unit and divides the three-dimensional model into a pluralityof height intervals according to the height values, wherein each height interval corresponds to one association point; and a correlation point processing unit which is connected with the three-dimensional model dividing unit and is used for connecting the two correlation points in the two adjacent height intervals by using a straight line according to the correlation points to form a three-dimensional model framework. The extraction system of the three-dimensional model can extract the skeleton of the three-dimensional model.

column2: INTELLIGENT METER READING DEVICE
column4: The utility model provides an intelligent meter reading device, which is used for reading display data of a dial plate. The device comprises a shooting module used for shooting display data from a dial plate; the processing module is used for receiving the first image information transmitted by the shooting module and carrying out artificial intelligence identification on the image information; the plurality of wireless communication modules upload the second image information processed by the processing module to the cloud platform for display; the intelligent meter reading device provided bythe utility model has the advantages of intelligent data acquisition of each meter, such as remote transmission, remote sensing, acquisition, centralized acquisition and the like, can realize real-time monitoring by using a network platform, saves the labor cost of traditional manual meter reading, and provides convenience for users to monitor and use data while improving the working efficiency.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR OPTIMIZING BOILER COAL-FIRED EFFICIENCY BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a method and a device for optimizing boiler coal-fired efficiency based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the field of environmental protection and energy conservation. The method and the device solve the problem of combustion control of an existing boiler, replace the traditional manual auxiliary adjustment, and realize automatic and continuous high-efficiency control of the combustion of the boiler, thereby saving energy and reducing environmental pollution caused by emission. The technical key points comprise a sensing device for obtaining all operating state indexes of the boiler, a load adjustment interface for receiving a guiding load, a learning device for automatically learning control strategies from boiler operating data, a control logic device for generating boiler control instructions, and a control device for sending the control instructions to actual execution of the boiler. According to the method and the device for optimizing the boilercoal-fired efficiency based on the artificial intelligence, the built-in boiler control device is arranged, so that the running state of the boiler is dynamically and accurately adjusted, thereby reducing manual labor and being more refined and standardized than manual operation; and the built-in learning device is arranged so that the boiler control strategies can be automatically learned and continuously optimized, and the boiler combustion efficiency is improved.

column2: INDIVIDUALLY TAILORED EXERCISE TRAINING AND REHABILITATION TECHNIQUE: MEDICAL PERSONAL TRAINER
column4: The present invention concerns a new individually tailored exercise training and rehabilitation technique, referred to as ?œMPT: Medical Personal Trainer?? More precisely, the invention concerns an innovative method to be used in the field of physical activity and exercise training/rehabilitation programs for healthy individuals and for patients with chronic diseases. It merges together, in an interactive way, advanced notions from medicine, engineering, mathematics, artificial intelligence, in order to provide new clinical perspectives for automatic personalized health care as well as novel insights on individually-tailored management and advanced treatment, in a user-familiar setting, of healthy subjects (including elderly) and patients with chronic diseases.

column2: SERVICE ATTITUDE ASSESSMENT METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON FACIAL EXPRESSION RECOGNITION AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a service attitude assessment method for service personnel based on facial expression recognition, which comprises the following steps: extracting facial data of multiple expressions in a preset expression database, and establishing a comparison expression library of the service personnel; Shooting facial expression images of multiple expressions of the service personnel by utilizing camera equipment, carrying out digital image processing on the shot facial expression images of the service personnel, and establishing a service personnel facial expression library; training a deep neural network model by utilizing the face expression library of the service personnel and the comparison expression library ofthe service personnel, and establishing an expression recognition model; and identifying expressions of the service personnel by utilizing the expression identification model so as to judge the service attitude of the service personnel. The invention further provides a service attitude assessment device based on facial expression recognition and a computer readable storage medium. According to the invention, the evaluation of the service attitude of the service personnel can be realized through expression recognition.

column2: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR AVOIDING SHIP COLLISION THROUGH IMAGE ANALYSIS OF MONITOR OF RADAR DEVICE
column4: The present invention relates to an apparatus and a method for avoiding ship collision through image analysis of a monitor of a radar device, and specifically, to an apparatus and a method for avoiding ship collision through image analysis of a monitor of a radar device, which analyzes a photographed image of a monitor of a radar device by an artificial intelligence algorithm applying machine learning or deep learning, determines whether an obstacle approaching a ship is present or not, generates an alarm signal when the obstacle is present, and operates a power steering device to change a ship course when determining the presence of a collision risk with a mother ship and the obstacle, thereby being possible to avoid collision with the ship. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: NOVEL EXPLOSION-PROOF CRANE
column4: The invention provides a crane and relates to the field of explosion-proof crane technologies and safety. The crane is suitable for special chemical industry and military environment and mainly comprises a trolley, a cart running mechanism, a hoisting mechanism, a hydraulic system and the like. For the crane, the self weight of the crane can be effectively lowered; in addition, by adopting hydraulic transmission and safe voltage control, the safety performance and the stability performance of lifting equipment can be better ensured; and the technical problems of easiness in damage of explosion-proof electrical elements, difficulty in electrical arrangement, easiness in electric leakage injury caused by explosion-proof equipment, high requirements for grades of an anti-explosion electric hoist and a motor, poor smoothness in starting and braking of the motor, easiness in abrasion of a steel wire rope and swing of the steel wire rope, instability in the steel wire rope and the like in the prior art solved, so that the crane is convenient to use and overhaul, the artificial intelligence (AI) chemical plant can be easily realized in the future, the cost is lowered, and the safety is improved.

column2: WAVE SIMULATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND NUMERICAL MODEL
column4: The invention provides a wave simulation method based on artificial intelligence and a numerical model. The wave simulation method comprises the following steps: 1, determining a wave model structure;2, initializing wave model parameters; 3, outputting an initial condition, and calculating a fitness value of the wave model; 4, performing selection operation; 5, performing cross operation; 6, performing mutation operation; 7, calculating fitness; 8, judging whether an end condition is met or not, and if so, entering 9; if not, returning to the step 4; 9, obtaining an optimal parameter combination; and 10, substituting the parameters obtained in the step 9 into the model of the formula in the step (1) again to calculate the simulated wave again. According to the invention, an artificial intelligence technology is combined with a wave model to realize automatic selection of wave model parameters; according to the input wind speed condition and topographic condition, wave model parameterswhich more accord with the reality can be automatically selected, and the simulation accuracy is improved.

column2: HIGH-INTEGRATION-LEVEL HOUSEHOLD WATER LEAKAGE PREVENTION DEVICE BASED ON FPGA
column4: The utility model discloses a high-integration-level household water leakage prevention device based on an FPGA. Intelligent household appliance, the utility model aims to solve the technical problemof how to realize household water appliances. the water gate is intelligently and automatically closed and a user is intelligently reminded; timely discovery and timely maintenance by a user are ensured; the adopted technical scheme is as follows: the device structurally comprises a shell, an FPGA control module, an electromagnetic flow module, a wireless charging module and a wireless communication module are arranged in the shell. an electromagnetic water gate is arranged below the shell; the FPGA control module comprises an FPGA chip, a power supply management module and an SPI FLASH chip;wherein the FPGA chip is connected with the SPI FLASH chip, the FPGA chip is connected with the wireless communication module through a Rapid IO interface, the FPGA chip is connected with the electromagnetic flow module through a serial port, and the FPGA chip is connected with the electromagnetic water gates through relays; the power management module is connected with the wireless charging module, the wireless communication module, the electromagnetic flow module, the electromagnetic water gate, the relay and the FPGA chip for power supply.

column2: UNDERWATER CAMERA AND WATER QUALITY MONITORING SYSTEM
column4: An underwater camera and water quality monitoring system provides the capability of shooting video or time lapse photography together with recording water condition or quality measurements in an integrated device for stationary, submerged deployment in a body of water under study. The underwater camera and water quality monitoring system has a configurable delay from submerged deployment in the waterway until image/video recording and water quality measurement sampling begins, allowing aquatic life activity to resume in the vicinity after disruption of the system deployment. The monitoring device may be used in combination with recognition software utilizing artificial intelligence techniques to identify species or individuals observed during monitoring.

column2: TEACHING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE RECOGNITION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a teaching system based on an artificial intelligence recognition technology. The system comprises a teacher module and a student module. each of the teacher module and the student module comprises a literature module; a course publication module and a theory module, the literature module comprises politics; History and geography, the public course module comprises Chineselanguage; wherein the mathematical department module comprises physics, biology and chemistry, each subject comprises a test question exercise module, each test question exercise module comprises an error question summarizing module, each error question summarizing module comprises a teaching plan making module, and each teaching plan making module comprises a teaching plan summarizing module; According to the teaching system, after students make test questions, the test questions made by the students can be analyzed, the distribution of the wrong questions can be clearly displayed so as to betransmitted to teachers, the teachers can make teaching plans for the wrong questions in a targeted manner, and the teaching efficiency is improved.

column2: WHEEL SET RUNNING SYSTEM AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses a wheel set running system and a control method thereof. The system comprises wheel hub motors, the wheel hub motors are connected by a main connecting shaft mechanism to forma wheel set structure, and in the running process, an angle sensor place on a shaft coupling mechanism collects states of running of two wheels; collected data is processed by an intelligent insertingtype control panel, and a control algorithm is utilized for controlling the presently obtained state of the wheels; the intelligent inserting type control panel and other wheel sets to form a networkso as to achieve cooperative control. According to the system, a traditional wheel steering mechanism is broken through, running modes of future vehicles are explored in a brand new mode, the corresponding design is provided, and a brand-new driving mode capable of achieving sharing economy development and artificial intelligence development is provided.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR SYNCHRONIZING TELEVISION PARAMETERS
column4: The invention discloses a method for synchronizing television parameters. According to the system, the method comprises steps of shooting reference setting pictures of a reference television image setting menu comprising parameters such as brightness, contrast ratio and saturation degree; and sending the reference setting picture to a to-be-debugged target television, the to-be-debugged target television transmitting the reference setting picture to the Internet cloud for artificial intelligence analysis; and sending the analysis result back to the to-be-debugged target television, setting theto-be-debugged target television according to the obtained image parameters, and then comparing the observation effect with the reference television, so that the to-be-debugged target television image is adjusted and improved. Therefore, the problem of rapidly setting and synchronizing television parameters of different brands or different chip schemes of the same brand is solved, and a good solution is provided for accelerating television development and debugging.

column2: SDN ENHANCED PATH ENCASEMENT DEVICE AND METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an SDN (Software Defined Networking) enhanced path encasement device and method, which are used for solving the encasement problem appearing in an SDN controller-based path computing unit. According to the invention, bandwidth resources in the communication network are comprehensively considered; The invention discloses an SDN controller network topology planning method based on particle swarm optimization, relates to related constraint conditions such as disturbance and time delay, combines a particle swarm algorithm with an SDN controller network topology planning module related technology, aims at intelligently adjusting service path planning under the condition that new service bandwidth resources in a network are insufficient, and provides a boxing scheme, andbelongs to the field of telecommunication network intelligent algorithm optimization. The main innovation points are as follows: 1, a network boxing service arrangement scheme based on an SDN technology; 2, SDN-based network service scheduling is introduced into the encasement decision model; And 3, improving the overall bandwidth utilization rate of the network by using a particle swarm algorithmmodel.

column2: STAIRS CLIMBING MACHINE
column4: The invention discloses a stairs climbing machine. The stairs climbing machine comprises a cargo cabin vertical plate, wherein a rear part of the cargo cabin vertical plate is connected with a fence for loading cargoes, two sides of a front part of the cargo cabin vertical plate are provided with a guide rail groove, and two sides of an upper end of the cargo cabin vertical plate are connected with a first pawl through a first connecting rod; and a stairs climbing vertical plate, wherein two sides of a rear part of the stairs climbing vertical plate are provided with a guide rail, the guide rail is slidably connected in the guide rail groove, two sides of the stairs climbing vertical plate are connected with a sucker through a hollow rod, a front part of the stairs climbing vertical plateis centrally fixedly provided with a telescopic-type hydraulic cylinder, the top of a piston rod of the telescopic-type hydraulic cylinder is connected with a horizontal cross rod through a connectingbase, and a front part of the horizontal cross rod is connected with a second pawl through a second connecting rod. The stairs climbing machine is capable of enabling intelligence to be combined witha mechanical device, adequately developing advantages of climbing stairs, wherein manual operation is not needed in a process of climbing the stairs from adsorption, automatically controlling througha PLC controller, conveying cargoes to a designated site, and realizing the artificial intelligence.

column2: TARGET OBJECT ELIMINATING METHOD BASED ON A PANORAMIC CAMERA
column4: The invention discloses a target object eliminating method based on a panorama camera, the panorama camera comprises at least two independent lenses, and the method comprises the following steps: S1,shooting a basic panorama picture by using each independent lens; S2, identifying a target object from each basic panoramic picture; S3, each basic panoramic picture is divided into a plurality of picture areas, the sizes of the picture areas are equal or unequal, and at least one picture area comprises a target object; S4, deleting one picture area including a target object in each basic panoramic picture; And S5, combining all the rest picture areas in each basic panoramic picture together to obtain a corrected panoramic picture with the target object eliminated. The invention provides a target object elimination method based on a panoramic camera, which can quickly and efficiently eliminate a target object and ensure the image quality.

column2: ACTION RECOGNITION METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention provides an action recognition method and device. The method comprises the steps of obtaining skeleton data of a to-be-recognized object in a video during movement; Generating a skeletonsequence of the to-be-identified object according to the skeleton data; Generating a bone feature image corresponding to the bone sequence, wherein the bone feature image comprises a plurality of bone points; And inputting the bone feature image into a preset convolutional neural network model for classification to obtain an action category corresponding to the bone feature image. According to the invention, the problem of action recognition is converted into the problem of bone sequence image classification, the bone sequence is converted into the bone feature image, and then the bone feature image is classified, so that the recognition is more accurate and the efficiency is higher.

column2: INDIVIDUALLY TAILORED EXERCISE TRAINING AND REHABILITATION TECHNIQUE: MEDICAL PERSONAL TRAINER
column4: The present invention concerns a new individually tailored exercise training and rehabilitation technique, referred to as 'MPT: Medical Personal Trainer'. More precisely, the invention concerns an innovative method to be used in the field of physical activity and exercise training/rehabilitation programs for healthy individuals and for patients with chronic diseases. It merges together, in an interactive way, advanced notions from medicine, engineering, mathematics, artificial intelligence, in order to provide new clinical perspectives for automatic personalized health care as well as novel insights on individually-tailored management and advanced treatment, in a user-familiar setting, of healthy subjects (including elderly) and patients with chronic diseases.

column2: AUTOMATIC PROGRAMMING METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR NATURAL LANGUAGE MACHINE THINKING
column4: The invention discloses an automatic programming method and system for natural language machine thinking. After a task book is obtained, the following steps are sequentially carried out: S1, converting and expressing a task book text; S2, establishing a corresponding relation library; S3, externally inputting or automatically compiling a task book text, and interpreting, defining and understandingthe task book to be solved; S4, searching an algorithm module library according to the problem type and the problem framework composition mode, and designing an algorithm for solving the problem, a design program and a selected algorithm according to the algorithm module library; S5, entering a natural language generation type system, and outputting an instruction to enter programming software orenter any programming language for programming to obtain a program; And S6, running the program, and checking an output result of the program. Therefore, the machine automatically generates a specific program capable of completing the target after receiving the demand description about the target to be realized by the designed program. The method is a creative artificial intelligence technology,and has a great commercial value.

column2: WIRELESS DEVICE AND COMPUTER CONNECTION METHOD, ELECTRONIC DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to artificial intelligence, and provides a wireless device and computer connection method, an electronic device and a storage medium, the method comprises the following steps: enabling a wireless connector of each computer to receive a connection signal sent by a wireless device, wherein each computer comprises a camera, a display and a wireless connector; enabling a camera of each computer to obtain and store the image of the corresponding camera shooting area; carrying out face recognition on the images acquired by each camera, and intercepting interested areas of the left eye and the right eye according to the recognized face images; And according to the intercepted region of interest, carrying out sight detection and tracking on the eyeball center, and according to a display projected by the sight of the eyeball center, connecting a wireless connector of a computer corresponding to the display projected by the sight of the eyeball center with a wireless device. According to the invention, one set of wireless equipment is adopted to control the switching of a plurality of computers, thereby helping users who need to face the work of the plurality of computers, saving the cost and improving the switching control efficiency.

column2: THE INVENTION DISCLOSES AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VEHICLE TUTORING SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence vehicle counseling system. The vehicle auxiliary device comprises a vehicle auxiliary device body. a display screen is fixedly mounted on the outer surface of the front end of the vehicle auxiliary device main body; A power switch key is fixedly installed on the lower portion, close to the display screen, of the outer surface of the front endof the vehicle auxiliary device body. A regulation and control key is fixedly installed on the side, close to the power switch key, of the outer surface of the front end of the vehicle auxiliary device body, a USB interface is fixedly installed on the side, away from the regulation and control key, of the outer surface of the front end of the vehicle auxiliary device body, and a first connecting rod is fixedly installed at the rear end of the vehicle auxiliary device body. According to the artificial intelligence vehicle guidance system, the turnable camera is additionally arranged on the vehicle guidance device, so that the shooting range is wider, recording is more comprehensive, meanwhile, the mobile phone support is additionally arranged on one side of the vehicle guidance device, a user can conveniently use a mobile phone when driving the vehicle, and a better use prospect is brought.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PERSONAL TRAINING APPLICATION UTILIZING SENSOR AND BEACON
column4: Provided is a system for personal training and membership management based on a fitness center application which utilizes an armband with a heart rate sensor, dumbbells and barbells to which approach sensors are attached, a beacon providing exercise videos, and artificial intelligence (AI) suggesting an alternative exercise to enable personal training through a smartphone. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: PHOTOGRAPHING METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to a photographing method, a device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a preset shooting strategy and a pre-shot image of a shooting device; inputting the pre-shot image into a key point detection model; detecting the pre-shot image through the key point detection model to obtain the pose of each shot object and the positionof the corresponding key point; when the positions of all the key points are located in a preset area, judging whether the pose of the shooting object is matched with a standard pose corresponding toa preset shooting strategy or not, when the pose of the shooting object is matched with the pose corresponding to the preset shooting strategy, executing a shooting instruction is generated, the shooting instruction, and obtaining a corresponding shot image. The key points of the shot object are detected through the key point detection model, whether shooting is carried out or not is determined according to the positions of the key points and the position of the shot object, when all the positions meet the requirement, shooting is more convenient, and an obtained image is more exquisite.

column2: PROCEDIMIENTO Y APARATO DE ELIMINACION DE MATERIAL DE SOPORTE DE UNA PIEZA
column4: A process for support material removal for 3D printed parts wherein the part is placed in a media filled tank and support removal is optimized in a multi-parameter system through an artificial intelligence process which may include, but is not limited to, the use of historical data, parametric testing data, normal support removal data, and outputs from other support removal AI models to generate optimally efficient use of each parameter in terms of pulse repetition interval (PRI) and cycle time as defined by pulse width (PW). The input parameters may include heat, circulation, ultrasound and chemical reaction, which are used in sequence and/or in parallel, to optimize efficiency of support removal. Sequentially and/or in parallel, heat, pump circulation and ultrasound may vary in application or intensity. Selection of means of agitation depends on monitored feedback from the support removal tank and application of a statistically dynamic rule based system (SDRBS).

column2: A SYSTEM AND METHOD TO ANALYZE AND IMPROVE SPORTS PERFORMANCE USING MONITORING DEVICES
column4: The embodiments herein provide a method and system for monitoring analyzing improving and giving instant feedback on sports performance of an individual. The embodiments also provide a system and method to create visual representation of a sports action without the use of any visual data capture mechanisms. The system includes a game monitoring device a communication network a remote server and a computing device. The remote server comprises a filtering and signal processing module an analytics module a database and an artificial intelligence module. The computing device includes several modules and a user interface. The game monitoring device detects several data points from the player and transmits the same to the remote server. The remote server filters and processes the signals for analyzing each shot and the game of the player. The analysis is visualized and displayed on the user computing device.Fig 1.

column2: THE INVENTION DISCLOSES A CONTROL SYSTEM OF A HIGH-TEMPERATURE BOX-TYPE FURNACE
column4: The utility model discloses a control system of a high-temperature box type furnace. PS comprising a temperature controller, a pin 13 of the temperature controller PS is connected with a pin 19 of thetemperature controller PS; a pin 13 of the temperature controller PS is connected with a pin 1 of a trigger CF; a normally open contact of the intermediate relay KA; Rotary knob SA, a pin 2 of the trigger CF is connected with a pin 14 of the temperature controller PS; wherein the trigger CF is connected with a temperature controller PS and a zero line N, a 20 pin of the temperature controller PSis connected with one end of a coil of an intermediate relay KA, the other end of the coil of the intermediate relay KA is connected with the zero line N, the model of the temperature controller PS isSRS12A-8IN-90-N100050, and the model of the trigger CF is JHB-C1. The method has the advantages that an advanced AT artificial intelligence adjusting algorithm is adopted, overshoot is avoided, the self-tuning function is achieved, a digital correction system is adopted for input, the measurement precision reaches up to 0.2 level, and power consumption is low.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE OPTIMIZATION SYSTEM AND METHOD ADOPTING ADVERSARIAL RESISTANCE TRAINING
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence optimization system and method adopting adversarial training, and belongs to the field of machine learning. The method comprises the following steps:carrying out feature extraction on acquired data in an original data set, and training a neural network model which is not subjected to adversarial training to obtain an identification model; Takingthe identification model as a parameter for calculating the fitness, and generating confrontation samples by a genetic algorithm based on the calculated parameter and the extracted characteristics toobtain all the generated confrontation samples; Mixing all generated adversarial samples with the samples subjected to feature extraction, and performing supervised training of the identification model again as a new data set to obtain an identification model subjected to supervised training; Testing the supervised and trained recognition model, if the supervised and trained recognition model meets a given requirement, obtaining a finally trained recognition model, and if not, adjusting parameters of a genetic algorithm, and then generating a confrontation sample again for training. The methodis used for training the neural network model against resistance, and the model security is improved.

column2: MAINTENANCE MANAGEMENT TERMINAL AND METHOD FOR POWER SYSTEM
column4: The disclosure proposes a maintenance management terminal and a maintenance control method for a power system. A monitoring and control component is set in the maintenance management terminal and transmitted as a configuration file to a relay protection device, and the monitoring and control component capable of running in the background collects the running state data of the relay protection device in real time to realize data collection in the running state and data transmission to the maintenance management terminal for data processing, which can directly reflect the real-time running dataof the relay protection device and improve the accuracy of the running state judgment. And an artificial intelligence method is used to input the collected data into the neural network for judgment, thereby generating maintenance tasks and improving the efficiency of maintenance control.

column2: RED LIGHT RUNNING DATA PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE, COMPUTER DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to a red light running data processing method and device, a computer device and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of inputting a to-be-detected image containing pedestrians into a pedestrian detection model for pedestrian detection; obtaining an image containing the candidate pedestrian, wherein the to-be-detected image is an image shot in the red light period;extracting the candidate features of each candidate pedestrian through a human body feature extraction model; and matching each candidate feature with each reference feature in the red light runningrecord library, updating the red light running record in the personal data corresponding to the reference feature matched with the candidate feature when the matching is successful, and obtaining a management rule corresponding to the red light running record in the personal data, the management rule being used for guiding a manager to perform management. And by identifying and managing pedestrians, the traffic can be better standardized, so that the safety of people can be better protected.

column2: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SAFETY MONITORING MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence safety monitoring management system which comprises a video acquisition module, a video structuralization module, a safety monitoring management module, a display terminal and an information output module. The system reads video, A video is segmented into single-frame pictures, the video is structured to obtain video structured data, and various algorithms based on deep learning are adopted, so that the problems of high network transmission pressure and high data flow cost are solved, and high-real-time and high-accuracy processing of video data transmission is effectively realized; Besides, when the system obtains a video, a combination of a wide-angle camera and a telephoto camera is applied, and an index of an image and a space-time position is established, so that long-distance high-definition shooting can be performed on a target in a large range, and the target in the long-distance large range can be quickly identified and positioned.

column2: PREPARATION METHOD AND SYSTEM OF REMOVABLE PARTIAL DENTURE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a preparation method and system of a removable partial denture based on artificial intelligence. The method includes the following steps of 1, oral cavity examination, 2, toothpreparation, 3, model refinement, 4, dental cast manufacture, and 5, try-in and adjustment. The main mode manufacture process includes abutment tooth selection, database building and three-dimensional design. The system of the removable partial denture based on artificial intelligence includes a data input module, a data preprocessing module, a database, a data comparison module, a data adjustment module and a data output module. The output end of the data input module is in signal connection with the input end of the data preprocessing module. According to the preparation method and system of the removable partial denture based on artificial intelligence, when a base support is manufactured, through the combination of the actual situation and past cases, the manufacturing cycle is greatly reduced, many unnecessary troubles are avoided, patients do not need to run in removable partial dentures for a long time, the running-in cycle and pain are reduced, the work efficiency is improved,and the cost is thus reduced.

column2: AI WATER COOLING FAN
column4: The utility model discloses an AI water cooling fan. The water-cooling fan comprises a water-cooling fan body and a voice receiving device. An air inlet device, an air outlet device, a wind wheel device, a humidifying device and a core processor are arranged in the water cooling fan body. The air inlet device, the air outlet device, the wind wheel device and the humidifying device are connected with a core processor, the core processor is further connected with a voice processing device, and the voice processing device and the voice receiving device transmit information through a communicationdevice. The AI water cooling fan is controlled by the core processor, the opening and closing of the water cooling fan can be controlled by voice, and the running speed and the running mode of the water cooling fan are regulated and controlled according to data detected by a plurality of sensors with different functions, so that artificial intelligence is realized.

column2: A STUDENT IDEOLOGICAL AND POLITICAL CONDITION EARLY WARNING METHOD BASED ON DEEP LEARNING
column4: The invention discloses a student ideological and political condition early warning method based on deep learning, which is used for accurately analyzing retrieval records and keywords in retrieval records and sentiment problem tendency in student internet surfing behaviors by collecting whole network news data training prediction material libraries, so that the purposes of complete data and noveldata are achieved. Meanwhile, an artificial intelligence algorithm and a big data analysis technology are integrated, the whole ideological and political condition analysis process does not need to participate in analysis tasks subjectively, teachers can be guided to conduct academic or ideological and political condition early warning on students, and compared with traditional ideological and political condition analysis, the method is more objective and more comprehensive.

column2: AN ELECTRIC BICYCLE MOTOR LANE OCCUPATION IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an electric bicycle motor lane occupation identification method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: shooting video images of a motor vehicle lane and a non-motor vehicle lane in an area, and transmitting the video images to a video analysis system; Learning the characteristics of the electric bicycle based on the deep neural network, and establishing an appearance training model and a license plate training model of the electric bicycle; Carrying out image segmentation on the video image to distinguish a motor vehicle lane from a non-motor vehicle lane; Extracting a video image in the motor vehicle lane, and inputting the video image into the shape training model to mark the electric bicycle in the motor vehicle lane; And inputtingthe video image of the electric bicycle in the marked motorway into a license plate training model, and detecting and outputting the license plate number of the electric bicycle. Through the scheme, the method has the advantages of being accurate in recognition, reducing the calculation workload and the like, and has very high practical value and popularization value in the technical field of artificial intelligence.

column2: A PORT INTELLIGENT CONTROL SYSTEM AND A RELATED SYSTEM AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a port intelligent control system and a related system and device, which are used for realizing full automation of ship loading and unloading. According to the port intelligentcontrol system, enabling a dispatching center system to determine a ship loading plan according to ship information, container information and shore crane equipment information; generating a ship berthing task, a ship loading task and a container distribution task according to the ship loading plan, and respectively sending the tasks to a ship control system of the target ship, a shore crane control system of the target shore crane equipment and a storage management system of a storage center; the ship control system controls the target ship to run to an operation area corresponding to the target shore crane equipment; the shore crane control system controls the target shore crane equipment to load the container on the vehicle onto the target ship; the warehouse management system dispatches warehouse hoisting equipment to load the target container in the container distribution task to the vehicle; and the vehicle control system controls the vehicle to run to the boxing position for boxing, and controls the vehicle to run to the box unloading position for box unloading after boxing is completed.
