column2: PERFORMING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SIGN LANGUAGE TRANSLATION SERVICES IN A VIDEO RELAY SERVICE ENVIRONMENT
column4: Video relay services, communication systems, non-transitory machine-readable storage media, and methods are disclosed herein. A video relay service may include at least one server configured to receive a video stream including sign language content from a video communication device during a real-time communication session. The server may also be configured to automatically translate the sign language content into a verbal language translation during the real-time communication session without assistance of a human sign language interpreter. Further, the server may be configured to transmit the verbal language translation during the real-time communication session.

column2: CLOUD-BASED SYSTEM AND METHOD TO TRACK AND MANAGE OBJECTS
column4: A system, method and computer program product for integrated management of animate and inanimate objects of an enterprise, including a cloud-based server having a database, a website, and configured for running computer programs thereon; a user device including a smartphone, tablet and/or personal computer (PC) running an application or software including a gamified user interface (UI) configured to connect to the database and function as a data entry and display device; automated devices including a sensor, electronic switch, pump and/or a hydroponic dosing device connected to the database and configured to collect and transmit data or to react to received commands; an Artificial Intelligence (AI) powered engine configured to monitor statuses of animate and inanimate objects of an enterprise, as well as external conditions and actors that affect the enterprise, and based on analysis of the statuses, configured to task employees and/or the automated devices of the enterprise, and configured to employ cognitive reasoning to provide the enterprise with advice on managing business operations; and a framework employed by the AI engine based on a metaphor of a novel, with business operations of the enterprise presented as a story, and including a data model that follows rules of grammar.

column2: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR PROMOTING SLEEP OF USER AND TERMINAL EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of the Internet, and particularly discloses a method and device for promoting sleep of a user and terminal equipment, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the face image information of a monitored object; identifying the face image information by using a pre-established artificial intelligence (AI) identification model, and determining the mental state of the monitored object; when it is determined that the monitored object is in the fatigue state, the running application programs, except for the monitored object, in the intelligent device are controlled to be closed, and the monitored object is promoted to quickly enter the sleep state. In this way, the monitored object is prevented from forcibly supporting the fatigue body of the monitored object to watch film and television programs or play games and the like, the user can enter the sleep state as soon as possible, the sleep quality is improved, and human healthis promoted. Moreover, only when it is determined that the monitored object is in the fatigue state, other application programs are closed, and the mobile phone is not closed forcibly at regular time, so that the condition that the monitored object is slept forcibly due to no sleepiness is avoided, and the user experience is improved.

column2: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM FOR DRIVING ASSISTANCE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence system for driving assistance and aims to solve the problems in the manual driving in the prior art that when it is red light, braking may not be timely, vehicles may occupy sidewalks and cause inconvenience to pedestrians, and even accidents may occur. The system comprises a central processing module, a traffic light information obtaining module,a stop line position obtaining module, a vehicle body position real-time positioning module, a distance detection module, a voice reminding module, a vehicle body braking module, a vehicle body starting module, a display module and a vehicle body deceleration module. According to the invention, the vehicle body can be automatically braked when it is red light or about to be red light and the vehicle body is prevented from exceeding a stop line when the vehicle body stops, so that the behavior of occupying a sidewalk caused by untimely braking of the vehicle body during manual driving can be avoided; a driver is prevented from running the red light to a certain extent, accidents are avoided to a certain extent, and the driving safety is improved.

column2: A SHUTTLECOCK SERVING VIOLATION JUDGMENT METHOD BASED ON MACHINE VISION
column4: The invention provides a method for judging a serving violation in a badminton serving process by using a computer open-source vision library (OpenCV) as an identification means, and relates to the fields of image processing, artificial intelligence and the like, aiming at the problems of excessive subjectivity judgment of serving hands and waist violations in the badminton serving process in a badminton court. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a video image frame sequence of an athlete during serving, and performing motion detection preprocessing to achieve the purpose of improving the system efficiency; The method comprises the following steps: establishing a badminton image data set, extracting LBP digital image features, carrying out classifier training, and determining the position of a badminton during serving; Calculating the positive and negative of the relative angle of the racket during serving by using OpenCV to judge whether serving is passed or not; And establishing a relation equation between the badminton top image point and the vertical foot image point, and calculating the terrain clearance of the serving point to judge whether the serving is over-waisted or not. The image processing technology is mainly applied to the badminton court, and the method has the advantages of being simple in detection and practical.

column2: MULTI-ROBOT COOPERATIVE SERVICE METHOD, DEVICE, CONTROL EQUIPMENT AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and discloses a multi-robot cooperative service method, a device, control equipment and a system. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring service tasks of users detected by robots; according to the service tasks and service areas of the robots, determining the service operation on the users by the robots in the service areas of the robots; and controlling the robots to execute service operation in the service areas of the robots. According to the technical scheme provided by the embodiment of the invention, service is provided for the users by the robot in each service area through a relay mode and single robot does not needs to follow one user in the whole course, so that the execution time of the single task by the robot is reduced, the service efficiency of the robots is improved and the user experience is improved.

column2: AN UNATTENDED OPERATION SYSTEM FOR A BADMINTON HALL
column4: The invention discloses an unattended operation system for a badminton hall. The system comprises access control devices arranged at entrances and exits of badminton halls, illumination control devices arranged in the badminton halls, field opening and closing control devices, venue hosts, a cloud server in communication connection with the venue hosts, and a badminton service management platformused for system management. The badminton service management platform obtains the authorization information of the user and sends the authorization information to the cloud server, and the cloud server stores the authorization information and sends the authorization information to a venue host of the badminton venue selected by the user, and after the user arrives at the badminton court to be played, the court host identifies the authorization information of the user and automatically controls the access control device, the illumination control device and the opening and closing field controldevice to execute corresponding operations. According to the application, by adopting the field end host with the AI control function, the unattended operation system has the advantages of being weakin centralization, rapid in response and capable of being used when a network is disconnected.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TEACHING AID
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching aid, including USB sensor module (1), power supply circuit module (2), relay control circuit module (4), control circuit socket (5), DAconversion module (6), clock module (7), program compilation module (8) outward, p12303 connects computer module (9), amplifier circuit (10), its characterized in that: power supply circuit module passes through the wire and exchanges ferroelectric phase even with 220v, it passes through the wire and exchanges ferroelectric phase company through the relay control circuit module with 220v to control circuit socket outward, the relay control circuit module is passed through the wire and is connected with a logic control circuit (3), again DA conversion module pass through the wire respectively with the clock module, the program compilation module is connected, meet amplifier circuit after the program compilation module, the program compilation module is passed through the wire and is connected the connection of computer module with p12303 again, P12303 connects the computer module and is connected to computer USB through the wire.

column2: FIRE FIGHTING ACCESS OBSTRUCTION IMAGE IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a fire fighting access obstruction image recognition method based on artificial intelligence, belongs to the technical field of fire fighting, and aims to solve the technical problem of how to provide a feeding bed which is convenient to clean and can ensure that boars are in a clean and dry living environment. According to the technical scheme, the method comprises the following steps of shooting an image of a fire fighting access under the non-blocking condition to serve as a reference image, and shooting the reference image at the same angle and the same position ofan intelligent camera; Entering a management interface of the monitoring host, setting a reference image, setting a main feature area on the reference image, and setting a ratio compared with the mainfeature area; And exiting from the management interface, entering a working state, carrying out network connection with the intelligent camera, and setting the intelligent camera to shoot an image atregular intervals. The device has the advantages of being reasonable in design, simple in structure, convenient to clean, capable of enabling breeding pigs to be in a clean and dry living environmentand the like.

column2: INTEGRATED PLANNING DECISION SUPPORT SYSTEM OF AN URBAN CONNECTION BUS SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an integrated planning decision support system of an urban connection bus system. Fusion of big data, The invention discloses a GIS, operation optimization, artificial intelligence and other technologies. analyzing resident travel time-space aggregation points through mobile phone signaling data and a GIS; the actual topological structure of the road is considered; feasibleconnection stations around any resident travel gathering point are automatically screened; Running state according to traffic network, An intelligent decision-making technology is utilized, an optimal resident getting-on position is selected from an alternative connection station set, demand points are distributed to connection stations, accordingly, the sequence of the connection lines accessingthe connection stations and the departure frequency of the connection lines are calculated, and urban connection bus system design is assisted by comparing design schemes under different conditions.The method provided by the invention is applied; The method has the advantages that connection bus planning and management can be assisted, on the basis of passenger travel space-time aggregation characteristics, the optimal bus station position is selected according to the topological structure and the operation state of a traffic network, demand points are distributed to selected connection stations, the route direction and the departure frequency are reasonably determined, the travel convenience of passengers is improved, and the bus operation cost is reduced.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING AN ALERT ON DELIVERING DIGITAL CONTENT
column4: The present invention discloses a system and method for providing an alert on delivering a digital content such as when an interesting digital content is imminent, for example, the beginning of a play during a football game, to direct the focus of one or more viewers towards the digital content. The present invention is further configured to embed a commercial message in conjunction with the alert on directing the focus of the viewers. The system is adapted to activate the alert either manually or automatically. Further, the system is optionally implemented with an artificial intelligence (AI) system, which is trained using deep learning to recognize the appropriate time to automatically trigger the alert/commercial message sequence. The AI system could be trained by monitoring the manual control of alert activation.

column2: A METHOD AND A SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATICALLY SHIELDING OR PROMPTING ADVERTORIAL ADVERTISEMENTS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a method and system for automatically shielding or prompting advertorial advertisements based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of network application and artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining text contents of a webpage through setting shielding software, and classifying the obtained text contents through a natural language analysis convolutional neural network; defining a webpage as a soft text article, wherein the webpage containing advertisement content in the text is classified and predicted through a natural language analysis convolutional neural network; According to the setting, when a webpage defined as a soft text article cannot be opened or opened, the webpage is marked as a soft text at an obvious position. A system for automatically shielding or prompting advertorial advertisements based on artificial intelligence comprises a data acquisition module, a data analysis module, a data processing module and a natural language analysis module. According to the method, the advertorial advertisements can be effectively distinguished and shielded, the interference of the advertorial advertisements when users surf the Internet is reduced, the rights of the users are maintained, and the Internet surfing time is saved.

column2: SHOT IMAGE SCORING METHOD AND DEVICE, ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to a shot image scoring method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps of acquiring a shot image, and acquiring image information of the shot image; scoring the shot image according to the image information in order to obtain a scoring result of the shot image; and displaying the scoring result of the shot image. According to the method provided by the embodiments of the invention, the shot image can be scored during a user shooting process or after shooting according to the image information, and the scoring resultis displayed to a user, so that the user can know the quality condition of the shot image of the user, and thus the shooting position, shooting angle or shooting parameters can be adjusted in time inorder to obtain a high-quality shot image, or the shot image is shot again.

column2: UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE FLIGHT PATH PLANNING METHOD, DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention relates to an unmanned aerial vehicle flight path planning method, device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps that the current pose information of a current node of an unmanned aerial vehicle and the position information of a corresponding target node are obtained, a current three-dimensional environment map is acquired, a standby planning path is determined according to the current three-dimensional environment map, the current pose information and the position information of the target node, and whether the standby planning path meets the safe flight condition or not is judged; a corresponding flight command is generated according to the standby planning path when the condition is met, and the flight command is executed so asto enable the unmanned aerial vehicle to fly to the target node according to the flight command. The three-dimensional environment map is generated in real time through images shot by shooting equipment on the unmanned aerial vehicle, the environment information around the unmanned aerial vehicle is determined according to the three-dimensional environment map generated in real time, the flight path is planned in real time according to the environment information and the positioning information of the unmanned aerial vehicle, and safe flight of the unmanned aerial vehicle can be guaranteed according to the safe flight conditions, so that the unmanned aerial vehicle can fly safely in an unknown environment.

column2: VIRTUAL REALITY VR AND AUDITORY INTEGRATION METHOD FOR TREATMENT AND EVALUATION OF CHILDREN AUTISM
column4: The invention provides a virtual reality (VR) stimulation and auditory integration method for treatment and evaluation of children autism. The method achieves audio and video integration treatment forthe autistic children and evaluates the degree of the autistic children immersed in a VR and auditory integration environment. The invention relates to the fields of computer graphics, man-machine interaction, artificial intelligence and the like. According to the virtual reality (VR) stimulation and auditory integration method for the treatment and evaluation of the children autism, interactiveVR games suitable for the autistic children are developed to achieve visual sensory stimulation and interactive behavior drive for the autistic children, sensitive frequencies are filtered, so that the auditory cortex of the brain is reorganized, the awareness of all the frequencies is promoted to achieve the therapeutic effect. A low-power-consumption smart bracelet is worn to collect the real-time heart rate and arm exercise amount of the children, and analyze and evaluate the interactive VR games and the degree of concentration on the VR and auditory integration environment. The virtual reality (VR) stimulation and auditory integration method for the treatment and evaluation of the children autism has the advantages that the evaluation objectivity and systematicness are strong, the perception of the autistic children for audiovisual content can be quantitatively analyzed and judged, and the integration treatment effect on the children autism is improved.

column2: INTELLIGENT FEEDING SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR LIVESTOCK
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent feeding system and method for livestock. The system comprises a storage module, a camera, an identification module, an electronic feeder and a controller. The storage module is used for storing a feeding rule of livestock; the camera is installed above a trough and collects a face image of the livestock which are closest to the trough when a shooting instruction is received; the identification module is used for determining an identifier of the livestock according to the face image; the electronic feeder is installed on the trough and adds feed to the trough according to a received discharging instruction; the controller is used for sending the shooting instruction to the camera according to the feeding rule of the storage module, receiving the face image and a feed image from the camera, transmitting the face image and the feed image to the identification module, receiving the identifier of the livestock and the feed surplus amount of the troughfrom the identification module and sending the discharging instruction to the electronic feeder according to the identifier of the livestock in combination with the feeding rule. According to the intelligent feeding system, all the livestock are distinguished through a face identification technology of artificial intelligence, the livestock individuals are remotely and precisely fed and controlled, and the feeding rule is conveniently made and adjusted.

column2: ELECTRIC POWER ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHIP AND AN ELECTRIC POWER FAULT IDENTIFICATION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an electric power artificial intelligence chip and an electric power fault identification method, and the electric power artificial intelligence chip comprises a data interfaceand an NPU neural network processor, and further comprises only one framework in an ARM framework or an RSIC-V instruction set framework, and the ARM framework or the RSIC-V instruction set frameworkis used for providing the running environment of a chip.; the data interface is used for receiving a power high-frequency signal spectrum and transmitting the signal spectrum to the NPU neural network processor; and a neural network model is arranged in the NPU neural network processor. The system can receive and process a power high-frequency signal spectrum in real time, and makes power fault judgment in time; the method adapts to judgment of various power failure conditions, and the neural network is high in big data processing capability and high in power failure identification accuracy.

column2: BIG DATA-BASED OPTIMIZATION OPERATION METHOD OF DESULPHURIZATION DEVICE ABSORPTION CIRCULATION SYSTEM, AND ADSORPTION CIRCULATION SYSTEM
column4: The invention provides a big data-based optimization operation method of a desulphurization device absorption circulation system. The big data-based optimization operation method of the desulphurization device absorption circulation system comprises the following steps: running monitoring and optimizing monitoring are carried out on absorption circulation systems of all units in a power plant so as to collect running data of the absorption circulation systems; on the basis of the running data, collected in real time, of the absorption circulation systems and with the combination of historicalrunning data of the units, analyzing and calculating are carried out through a big data means, and an optimal operation scheme under the current working condition is given or no suggestion is proposed; and the optimal operation scheme under the current working condition is provided to a user. According to the method and the system provided by the invention, fine running operation is realized through optimizing the operation capacity of a slurry circulating pump, and the energy conservation and consumption reduction of enterprises are achieved while national environmental protection requirements are met. According to the method and the system, advanced technologies such as internet, big data, artificial intelligence and the like are deeply integrated with conventional environment-friendly equipment management, and national development strategy requirements are met.

column2: CARGO TRANSPORT CONTROL SYSTEMS AND RELATED SYSTEM AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a cargo transport control system and a related system and device. Automated storage, distribution and container transportation are achieved when ship loading and unloading operation is conducted at a port. The cargo transportation control system comprises a scheduling system which is used for generating a boxing task and a container storage task according to a ship unloading plan and sending the boxing task and the container storage task to a vehicle control system and a storage management system of a vehicle respectively; the vehicle control system is used for controlling the vehicle to drive from the current position to the boxing position in the boxing task for boxing when the boxing task is received, and controlling the vehicle to drive from the current positionto the box unloading position in the box unloading task for box unloading when the box unloading task is received; and the warehouse management system is used for dispatching warehouse hoisting equipment to hoist each target container for vehicle transportation to a corresponding storage position according to the container storage task when the container storage task is received.

column2: INTEGRATED CCTV CONTROL CENTER SYSTEM HAVING INTEGRATED CCTV CONTROL RELAY CONTROL MODULE INCLUDING TRAFFIC SITUATION MONITORING, REAL-TIME TRAFFIC INFORMATION ANALYSIS, AND TRAFFIC SIGNAL CONTROL
column4: An objective of the present invention is to provide an integrated CCTV control center system having an integrated CCTV control relay control module including traffic situation monitoring, real-time traffic information analysis, and traffic signal control, capable of increasing the detection rate of an arbitrary moving vehicle by 80%. According to the present invention, the system comprises a site CCTV module (100), an integrated CCTV control management server (200), and an artificial intelligence (AI) integrated CCTV control relay control module (300). The AI integrated CCTV control relay control module (300) comprises: a main body (310); a power supply unit (320); an LBS network forming unit (330) for grouping and connecting a plurality of site CCTV modules with an LBS network; a site CCTV video data processing unit (340) for each frame; a matrix integrated control video data conversion control unit (350); and a hybrid AI control unit (360). COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: A PANORAMA SHOOTING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE KEY IMAGING DEVICE DEVICE
column4: The utility model discloses a panorama shooting artificial intelligence key imaging device device belongs to shooting by mobile phone auxiliary device technical field, for solving the current limitedscheduling problem design of shooting by mobile phone scope. The utility model discloses a panorama shooting artificial intelligence key imaging device device includes that the cell -phone centre gripping shoots the unit, cup joints the bracing piece that forms, sets up at the bearing of bracing piece bottom and install the panoramic lens on the cell -phone by many hollow tubes, the cell -phone centre gripping shoot be provided with on the unit shoot the feeler lever with be used for the pulling to shoot the end of feeler lever touching the shoot feeler lever stay cord of button of cell -phone, the free end of feeler lever stay cord is worn out in the bottom of bracing piece after passing the inner chamber of bracing piece, be provided with on the bearing and be used for adjusting the positioner of bracing piece direction and the fixing device who is used for fixed support bar. The utility model discloses a panorama shooting artificial intelligence key imaging device device panorama shooting's effect is better, and the scope of shooting is wider.

column2: AUTOMATED COGNITIVE PROCESSING OF SOURCE AGNOSTIC DATA
column4: With the scale of information available today along with the existing diverse channels of communication, manual processing of information is becoming a challenge and companies across industries are under tremendous pressure to lower transactional costs. Artificial Intelligence based automation of business transactions has seen regulatory hurdles due to probabilistic nature of the outcome. The main challenge lies in processing of transactions with unstructured information. Systems and methods of the present disclosure uses deterministic as well as probabilistic approaches to maximize accuracy. The larger use of deterministic approach with configurable components and ontologies helps to improvise accuracy, precision and reduce recall. The probabilistic approach is used when there is absence of quality information or less information for learning. Also, confidence indicators are provided at attribute level of data being processed and at each decision level.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IDENTIFICATION
column4: The invention discloses an image processing method and device based on artificial intelligence identification. The image processing method comprises the following steps of acquiring the several 3D images of a shooting target and 2D images which form one-to-one correspondence with the 3D images; splicing the two 3D images to generate a 3D initial model; identifying target information in the 2D images corresponding to the two 3D images through artificial intelligence; and correcting the splicing of the 3D initial model according to the target information to generate a 3D optimized image. By using the image processing method and device based on the artificial intelligence identification, the more fidelity 3D images can be acquired so that the imaging of the 3D images is clear and 3D modelingis accurate.

column2: FARMING EVIL CONTROL PREVENTING -AND -CURING APPARATUS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ANALYSIS
column4: The utility model discloses a farming evil control preventing -and -curing apparatus based on artificial intelligence analysis, comprises a box bod, the side surface of box body is provided with control switch, the embedding of the upper surface of box body is provided with slewing mechanism, and the upper surface of box body corresponds slewing mechanism top rigid coupling and have a camera, theinternally mounted of box body has the battery, dash board is installed to the top of box body, the utility model discloses in setting through slewing mechanism for the camera rotates the shooting, has guaranteed the all -round control in farmland, through the setting of disc and inserted bar, can fix the device in the farmland fast, made things convenient for the user, improved its stability, through adjustment mechanism's setting, user's highly adjusting the device has been made things convenient for to being adapted to different areas, can also killing the pest in the different altitude ranges, the device can carry out the remote monitoring to the farmland, and the people of being convenient for in time know the extent of injury of insect pest.

column2: INTELLIGENT BADMINTON POINT ACCUMULATING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent badminton point accumulating system, and relates to the technical field of badminton. The system comprises a badminton site, a detection side and a counting side, the output end of the detection side is connected with the input end of the counting side, a first fixed plate and a second fixed plate are fixedly connected to the rear sides of the left and rightsides of the top of the badminton site respectively, and control boxes are fixedly connected to the right side of the first fixed plate and the left side of the second fixed plate. According to the intelligent badminton point accumulating system, photoelectric sensors are arranged at the two sides of the site and divided into an upper group and a lower group, the photoelectric sensors at the upperportion can sense racket swinging from top to bottom, the photoelectric sensors at the lower portion can sense racket swinging from bottom to top, then whether or not a badminton ball is hit over canbe judged according to racket swinging, and then whether or not the opposite side catches the ball can be judged; through the mode, intelligent point accumulating can be simply and conveniently conducted, manual judgement is not needed, the system is precise, and erroneous judgment cannot occur.

column2: A VERIFICATION METHOD AND A VERIFICATION DEVICE
column4: The present application discloses a verification method and a verification device for improving the verification efficiency of a running result. The authentication method comprises the following steps: When the convolution neural network is accelerated from the FPGA board, the upper software of the computer enables the convolution neural network layer in turn through the first register defined bythe computer, and automatically detects the running result of the corresponding layer when the corresponding layer is finished, and obtains the running result of the current layer of the convolution neural network through the PCIE interface; Compared with the simulation results of the corresponding computer software of the neural network layer, if the comparison results are consistent, the next network layer can be automatically enabled to continue the operation, and if the comparison results are inconsistent, the network operation layer and the position information with inconsistent results can be returned.

column2: TRANSMISSION ELECTRON MICROSCOPE SAMPLE DRIFT CORRECTION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses a transmission electron microscope sample drift correction method based on the artificial intelligence algorithm. Specifically, an operation transmission electron microscope isimaged and displayed on a display, and the size of an imaged picture is m*n. A user selects an area m*n which is smaller than or equal to the size of the picture according to the formed picture. Theselected area serves as an image template. According to the selected area, an algorithm is used for extracting and recording a gray value as a data template. After that, a threshold value A is set anda correction mode is selected. The in-situ correction or the non-in-situ correction is performed. During the in-situ correction, only the image deviation, namely the non-contrast variation, is generated. During the non-in-situ correction, the contrast variation is generated. The deviation degree D is calculated. If the minimum value of the deviation degree D is larger than the preset threshold value A, the mechanical resetting is realized by controlling a sample rod. If the minimum value of the deviation degree D is smaller than the preset threshold value A, the resetting is realized throughan algorithm. By adopting the method, the drifting and the shaking of images can be effectively prevented during the continuous shooting of a plurality of transmission electron microscope pictures.

column2: INDIVIDUAL SUB-HEALTH INTERVENTION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON BIG DATA AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an individual sub-health nutrition and health intervention method based on big data and a management system. The method comprises the steps of establishing a sub-health assessment initial model and a nutrition and health intervention scheme library on the basis of evidence based medicine, epidemiology, dietary nutrition survey and nutrition intervention data; revising sub-health assessment model parameters by food, exercise and sign information analytic statistics results of a large sample of people and carrying out cross validation; acquiring individual sub-health score, an interpreted report and a recommended nutrition and health intervention scheme from personal information; in a process of executing the nutrition and health intervention scheme, assessing individual sub-health at regular intervals and adjusting the individual sub-health to obtain an optimal intervention effect; and meanwhile, continuously calculating and optimizing the individual sub-health assessment model by cumulative data of the personal information. The management system which executes the method consists of four modules including a personal information acquiring module, a calculating module, a display module and a supervision module. By the method and the management system, a scientific, individualized, visual and traceable sub-health solution is provided for residents, and long-term health records are established.

column2: A BINARY SEARCH TREE METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The technical proposal of the invention comprises a binary search tree method and system, which are used for realizing the following steps: S1, dividing the data to be analyzed into a plurality of data groups; S2, converting a plurality of divided data into a plurality of corresponding sub-SBT trees; S3, merging a plurality of sub-SBT numbers into one SBT tree. The invention has the advantages ofsmall time complexity and high running efficiency, and is convenient to be used for fast and orderly retrieval of super large-scale data in the artificial intelligence field.

column2: A COMPUTER VISION ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE APPLICATION METHOD AND SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a computer vision artificial intelligence application method, which comprises the following steps: installing a depth camera in an area to be monitored; starting the system through the system interface, wherein the system automatically connects kinect; real-time detecting all human torso tilt degree within the field of vision by depth camera to obtain bone images; calculating the angle between the torso and the ground according to the acquired skeleton image; according to the angle between the torso and the ground, comparing with the preset threshold value; automatically saving depth maps, bone maps and 3D coordinates of all bone points to the specified directory at the corresponding time, and issuing an alert when the angle between the torso and the ground exceedsthe threshold. The invention can realize the purpose of reducing the occurrence of fall by monitoring the inclination degree of the trunk to carry out the fall warning innovatively.

column2: TRANSIENT STABILITY RISK ASSESSMENT METHOD FOR AC/DC SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a transient stability risk assessment method for an AC/DC system, and belongs to the intersection field of the field of relay protection of a power transmission line and the artificial intelligence field. The invention adopts the real-time measurement information in the large disturbance state of a DC control system to perform the parallel analytical evaluation of a fast hypothetical fault set, so as to obtain the continuous commutation failure risk estimation value of the perturbation based on the hypothetical fault set. The method proposed by the invention can quicklyevaluate the risk of continuous commutation failure of a DC transmission system based on the measurement information after the occurrence of AC disturbance, overcome the problem that the operation risk of the DC transmission system is difficult to evaluate. Based on the analytical equivalent model of a DC converter station and parallel computing, the computational speed of engineering field applications is accelerated. The transient stability risk assessment method has broad engineering application prospect.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE STUDY TABLE LAMP
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence study table lamp comprising a table lamp body, a first shooting device, a second shooting device, a voice input device, a voice output device and a display device. The first shooting device is arranged at the upper end of the table lamp body. The field angle of the first shooting device covers the working face below the table lamp body. The secondshooting device is arranged in the middle of the table lamp body, and the field angle of the second shooting device is the area in front of the table lamp. The voice input device, the voice output device and the display device are all arranged on the table lamp body. The artificial intelligence study table lamp can be suitable for man-machine interaction and distance education simultaneously andhas a more reasonable structural layout.

column2: ELECTRIC WATER HEATER AND WISDOM PRONUNCIATION INTERACTIVE SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INTERACTION TECHNOLOGY
column4: The utility model provides a based on artificial intelligence interaction technology's electric water heater wisdom pronunciation interactive system, it includes electric water heater control mainboard and interface operation panel, still includes artificial intelligence interaction system especially, and its speech input output device connects human -computer interaction interaction technology 0respectively, and human -computer interaction interaction technology 0 passes through interaction technology 3 and connects interaction technology 4, artificial intelligence high in the clouds serverand interaction technology 6, and interaction technology 4 connects interaction technology 6. Propose the electric water heater based on artificial intelligence interaction technology who adopts thissystem again, electric water heater control mainboard, voice input device, instantaneous speech power and human -computer interaction communication device install in the electric water heater main part, and the interface operation panel is installed on the front of electric water heater main part, and electric water heater control mainboard is connected to interaction technology 0, interaction technology 1 and water interaction technology 2 and silicon controlled rectifier and/or relay electricity respectively. The utility model discloses man -machine interdynamic, intelligent control and intelligent house entertainment function have.

column2: METHOD FOR REALIZING TENNIS ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FOR VIRTUAL TENNIS SIMULATION, VIRTUAL TENNIS SIMULATION SYSTEM AND METHOD USING SAME, AND RECORDING MEDIUM FOR RECORDING SYSTEM AND METHOD READABLE BY COMPUTING DEVICE
column4: The present invention provides a method for realizing tennis artificial intelligence for virtual tennis simulation, and a virtual tennis simulation system and a virtual tennis simulation method using the same. The method for realizing tennis artificial intelligence for virtual tennis simulation can realize realistic artificial intelligence of a virtual partner which is difficult to be realized by a conventional screen tennis system and thus can also realize a realistic rally by allowing players to practice tennis or play a tennis game in various situations. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: ELECTRONIC DEVICE AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column4: Disclosed are an electronic device and a control method thereof. The disclosed electronic device comprises an input unit, a communications unit, a processor, and a memory. The memory may include instructions in which the processor perform: controlling a communications unit to request identification information including a call word for using an artificial intelligence secretary function to another electronic device when an event for requesting a setting of a first mode capable of using an artificial intelligence secretary function of another electronic device occurs; receiving the identification information from the other electronic device through the communications unit in response to the request; and controlling the communications unit to transmit a user command to the other electronic device on the basis of identification information when a user command is received in a first mode operation of an artificial intelligence secretary. The electronic device or server providing the artificial intelligence secretary function can recognize and analyze a voice by using a rule-based or artificial intelligence algorithm. When the voice is recognized and analyzed by using the artificial intelligence algorithm, the electronic device or server providing the artificial intelligence secretary function can recognize and analyze the voice by using a machine learning, neural network, or deep running algorithm. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: VIRTUAL TENNIS SIMULATION SYSTEM AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to a virtual tennis simulation system and a control method thereof. For a tennis match which a player plays in a virtual tennis simulation method such as a screen tennis system, even when a virtual opponent player on an image hits a virtual ball in various ways under different situations and conditions set by artificial intelligence or the like, the movement of the virtual ball on the image is made to correspond to the launching of each ball hit by a ball machine installed at the rear side of a screen. Accordingly, the virtual tennis match, in which virtual situations on the image are combined with actual situations, can be played like a dynamic and realistic actual tennis match, thereby enhancing a tennis player prime;s concentration and interest on the virtual tennis match. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: INTELLIGENT DISPATCHING MANAGEMENT SYSTEM FOR MINE TRACKLESS RUBBER-TYRED VEHICLE
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent dispatching management system for a mine trackless rubber-tyred vehicle. The system comprises a downhole positioning system, a data processing system, an in-vehicle terminal and an artificial intelligence terminal, wherein the downhole positioning system is used for positioning the vehicle and an underground worker, the data processing system comprises data processing software and a data processing host, the data processing software is arranged in the data processing host, the data processing software is internally provided with a data integrated management platform, the data integrated management platform comprises a three-dimensional map under a coal mine and aggregates real-time running data of the worker and vehicle, data in an application database is collected through application program service, and an execution command is issued after the data is processed; the management platform is internally provided with a preparation module, a task processing module and an execution module, and the execution module is used for executing commands. The intelligent dispatching management system for the mine trackless rubber-tyred vehicle achieves comprehensive sensing of the information of the mine trackless rubber-tyred vehicle and intelligent auxiliary scheduling of vehicle resources, and the mine establishes a smart underground transportation network by depending on a transportation dispatching and commanding brain integrating worker and vehicle running big data,.

column2: ONLINE FITNESS SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND PERSONAL TRAINING METHOD
column4: Disclosed are an online fitness system based on artificial intelligence and a personal training method. The present invention generates a personalized body type management program by inputting basic body type information and target body type information including whole body three-dimensional modeling data, body components, a height, a body weight, a muscle amount, and an in-body water amount through body scanning and manages an exercise progress situation and a diet menu through the personalized body type management program, thereby enabling personal training to be more systematically performed and maximizing a personal training effect. In addition, it is possible to systematically manage health and a body type of a member by sensing the amount exercise and food taken from the outside of a fitness center through a member terminal and reflecting sensed data to the body type management program. Moreover, when the member does not attend the fitness center, replacement exercise information is provided and body state information of the member which changes through exercise is continuously informed. Also, the member is motivated to steadily exercise. Therefore, it is possible to create a body management and health management effect through personal training. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AUTOMATIC DETECTION SYSTEM FOR INSPECTION AND DETECTION
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence automatic detection system for inspection and detection and relates to the field of artificial intelligence detection. The problems that manual detection and repair have a high dangerous degree and the detection is not precise are solved. The system comprises a sensor, the sensor collects signals of equipment in real time and transmits the signalsto a processor, the processor receives the signals and processes the signals, the processed signals are compared with a reference value module to obtain difference values, state recognition and faultdiagnosis of the equipment are carried out according to the difference values, running monitoring and governance defense of the equipment are carried out if the difference values are within a presetrange, the sensor collects the signals of the equipment in real time again after the governance defense, and shut-down inspection is carried out if the difference values are not in the preset range. The system has the advantages of being high in detection precision and reliability and the like.

column2: ADJUSTING METHOD AND DEVICE FOR FAN YAW SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an adjusting method and device for a fan yaw system. The method comprises the steps that sample data of a fan in the running state are obtained; according to the sample data and preset wind speed range segments, wind direction angle-power curves corresponding to the wind speed rage segments correspondingly are generated through a preset artificial intelligence fitting model; according to the wind direction angle-power curve corresponding to each wind speed range segment, the optimal wind facing angle corresponding to the wind speed range segment is calculated; accordingto numerical value intervals of the all the wind speed range segments and the optimal wind facing angles corresponding to all the wind speed range segments, the whole optimal wind facing angle is calculated; and according to the whole optimal wind facing angle, yaw wind facing adjustment is carried out on the fan. By implementing the adjusting method and device for the fan yaw system, wind facingadjustment can be carried out on fan yaw through the optimal wind facing angle, accuracy of yaw wind facing adjustment can be improved, a reference scheme is provided for the adjusting technology ofan existing fan yaw system, and therefore limit is lowered.

column2: INTELLIGENT LENS DETECTING AND SORTING INTEGRATED MACHINE ADOPTING NOVEL TECHNOLOGY METHOD
column4: The invention relates to an intelligent lens detecting and sorting integrated machine adopting a novel technology method and a lens detecting and sorting method, and belongs to the technical field oflens sorting and warehousing production. A detecting machine and a sorting machine are included. The detecting machine comprises a detection device. The sorting machine comprises a hollow cup tray conveying device, a sorting device, a lens temporary storage device, a printing device, a collecting device and other devices. The intelligent lens detecting and sorting integrated machine is scientific,reasonable and novel in design, compact in structure, simple in mechanism, small in occupied area, efficient in running, high in automation level and production efficiency, safe and reliable in running, convenient to maintain and repair, simple in operation and capable of adapting to usage of different specifications of lenses, the artificial intelligence is simulated, feeding of single lens or whole-pile lenses using cup support containers can be combined, and the lens grabbing action is softer and more stable. Temporary lens storage is conducted through an empty position and type position supplementing method. A sensor detection method is adopted for lens containing. An automatic label throwing mechanism is adopted, an opened front and back way structure is adopted, and the lens production quality is ensured.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR INTELLIGENT CONTROL ON WORK OF CAPSULE ENDOSCOPE IN DIFFERENT PORTIONS OF DIGESTIVE TRACT
column4: The invention discloses a method for intelligent control on work of a capsule endoscope in different portions of the digestive tract. The method includes that a patient swallows the capsule endoscopeto the esophagus; the capsule endoscope takes pictures of different portions of the digestive track and sends the images about the digestive track to an image receiving unit arranged therein, the image receiving unit sends the images about the digestive track to a preset module or an AI (artificial intelligence) identification unit; the preset module or AI identification unit identifies information that the capsule endoscope locates at different portions of the digestive track and sends the information to the capsule endoscope, a control system of the capsule endoscope regulates system parameter of the capsule endoscope at different portions of the digestive track according to the information. The invention further discloses an apparatus for intelligent control to work of a capsule endoscope in different portions of the digestive tract. The method and the apparatus have the advantages of reducing shooting of redundant images, decreasing reading quantity of doctors, improving image shooting quality and increasing utilization rate of power of the capsule endoscope.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED DEPTH MAP BALANCE OPTIMIZATION ALGORITHM AND DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a depth map balance optimization algorithm and a device based on artificial intelligence. The depth map balance optimization algorithm comprises the following steps: acquiring3D images of a plurality of frames of a shooting target; The abnormal 3D images are searched in all 3D images by artificial intelligence recognition technology, and the abnormal 3D images are processed according to the 3D images other than the abnormal 3D images to obtain the high-quality 3D images. The depth map balance selection algorithm and the device of the invention can accelerate the speedof multi-frame posture alignment, pave the way for obtaining a clearer 3D model, and improve the calculation speed and the image quality of the three-dimensional reconstruction.

column2: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CUT-IN-LINE PREVENTION CONTROL METHOD, SYSTEM AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses an adaptive cruise cut-in-line prevention control method, system and device and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. According to own characteristics, different motor vehicles internally have a corresponding relation between the vehicle speed under the low-speed running state and a target vehicle following distance; then during low-speed running, the vehicle speed can be changed constantly according to the corresponding relation, the target vehicle following distance is dynamically determined, and a vehicle runs according to the target vehicle following distance. Since the target vehicle following distance is the distance to drive safely under the condition that the current vehicle speed is ensured, the safety of a drivercan be ensured, in addition, the target vehicle following distance is the vehicle following distance capable of preventing cut-in-line, thereby being capable of achieving cut-in-line prevention duringlow-speed vehicle following running. In addition, the invention further provides an automatic interventional mechanism which prevents cut-in-line when the vehicle starts during vehicle following running and during cut-in-line of adjacent vehicles.

column2: MODEL CUTTING METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a model cutting method and a device. The model cutting method comprises the following steps: selecting a first structural parameter to be adjusted from the structural parameters of the original model; Adjusting the value of the first structural parameter in the original model to change the structure of the original model, comparing and determining the structure difference between the original model and the adjusted model; Adjusting the values of the first structural parameters in the first model substructurefor a plurality of times to trim the first model substructure to obtain a plurality of second model substructures; Obtaining a result of measuring a plurality of second model sub-structures, selectinga third model sub-structure satisfying a running speed requirement from the plurality of second model sub-structures according to the result, and constructing a clipped model; The other parameters inthe original model are migrated to the clipped model, and the migrated model is obtained. This method can greatly improve the cutting efficiency of the model, at the same time, the performance of themodel will not be significantly degraded after cutting.

column2: A METHOD OF CONTROLLING INTELLIGENT ELECTRIC APPLIANCE AND INTELLIGENT ELECTRIC APPLIANCE
column4: The invention discloses a method of controlling an intelligent electric appliance and the intelligent electric appliance. when an artificial intelligence AI sleep mode is started, the intelligent electric appliance monitors the physical state information of a user, wherein the physical state information comprises part or all of the heartbeat rate, the respiration frequency, the sleep posture and the skin humidity; a current physical sensation state of the user corresponding to the physical state information is obtained, and the physical sensation state comprises part or all of supercooling, overheating, drying, moisture and comfort; and on the basis of the physical sensation state, the running status of the intelligent electric appliance is controlled, so that the technical problems in theprior art that the intelligent electric appliance cannot adjust the running state when a user feels uncomfortable to the current running state of the intelligent electric appliance in a sleep state and user experience is reduced are solved.

column2: A STUDENT APPLICATION PROGRAM MONITORING METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a student application program monitoring method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps of obtaining a working mode of a teacher end; if the working mode of the teacher end is a class mode, establishing a connection between the teacher end and the student end; controlling the teacher to send a monitoring program to the student;obtaining the running application program of the student end through the monitoring program, and sending the application program data to the teacher end; and performing the corresponding operation onthe student side according to the obtained application program. The invention can realize that when the teacher end is connected with the student end in the information network classroom, the application program running in the course can be obtained, and the corresponding operation can be executed according to the type of the application program, so that the student dynamics can be understood conveniently and the teaching efficiency can be improved.

column2: BLIND POINT MONITORING AUTOMATIC ADJUSTING SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AUTOMOBILE BASED ON IMAGE RECOGNITION AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a blind point monitoring automatic adjusting system and method for an automobile based on image recognition and artificial intelligence. The system comprises a data collectingunit, a background system and an executing unit, the background system comprises an analyzing measuring unit, a predicating unit and a decision-making unit, the data collecting unit comprises a shooting module and a radar data collecting module, and the output ends of the shooting module and the radar data collecting module are electrically connected with the input end of the analyzing measuring unit through a noise reducing and abnormal value removing module and a smoothing and standardizing treatment module; the output end of the analyzing measuring unit is electrically connected with the input end of the decision-making unit through the predicating unit, and the output end of the background system is electrically connected with the input end of a displayer. Through a factor analyzing and forecasting system, a decision-making system and an executing system, the safety of an automobile under some driving conditions of change lanes, u-turning roads and the like can be improved, and theprobability of automobile loss or injury and death of persons is reduced.

column2: BUT ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE NECK INTERVERTEBRAL DISC OF RECORD PRESSURE AND MOTION
column4: The utility model relates to a but artificial intelligence neck intervertebral disc of record pressure and motion, including upper plate, supporter, hypoplastron, at least one pressure sensor, angulardisplacement receptor, wireless communication module and micro -battery, the supporter can be movable relatively with the upper plate, and the supporter is the macromolecular material, is equipped with pressure sensor, wireless communication module and micro -battery in the supporter, and the upper plate all is equipped with angular displacement receptor, wireless communication module and micro -battery with lower inboard. The utility model discloses well supporter can be changed alone, and the accessible minimal access surgery change, avoids the destruction once more at tabulare healing interface, but the supporter passes through baroreceptor real time sensor pressure variation and pressure position to distribute, and angle running parameter that the angular displacement receptor can independent real -time recording three dimensions can not have the function and the state of wound, incessant real -time supervision false body to assess in detail the patient behind the artifical intervertebral disc displacement technique of cervical vertebra in the recent period in and risk at a specified future date, instruct kang xunlian.

column2: WET MONITORING PANTY -SHAPE DIAPERS OF URINE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a wet monitoring panty -shape diapers of urine based on artificial intelligence, including the panty -shape diapers body, still including wet monitor of urine and relay module, an inside main control unit and the wireless module of being equipped with of the wet monitor of urine, main control unit connects humidity response piece, the 2nd wireless module who is equippedwith the relay control ware in the relay module and is used for communicating by letter with a wireless module, the 2nd wireless module, pilot lamp, bee calling organ, GSM module are connected to therelay control ware, the last triangular plug that is equipped with of relay module, the built -in power module of connector assembly, the wet monitor of urine is fixed in panty -shape diapers throughthe fixed band on, be equipped with the fixed area of rectangle on the panty -shape diapers, the fixed band bonds on the fixed area through its marginal nylon adherent buckle. The utility model relates to a simply, convenient to use, the fully provided user's needs, wide application prospect has.

column2: CLOUD-BASED SYSTEM AND METHOD TO TRACK AND MANAGE OBJECTS
column4: A system, method and computer program product for integrated management of animate and inanimate objects of an enterprise, including a cloud-based server having a database, a website, and configured for running computer programs thereon; a user device including a smartphone, tablet and/or personal computer (PC) running an application or software including a gamified user interface (Ul) configured to connect to the database and function as a data entry and display device; automated devices including a sensor, electronic switch, pump and/or a hydroponic dosing device connected to the database and configured to collect and transmit data or to react to received commands; an Artificial Intelligence (Al) powered engine configured to monitor statuses of animate and inanimate objects of an enterprise, as well as external conditions and actors that affect the enterprise, and based on analysis of the statuses, configured to task employees and/or the automated devices of the enterprise, and configured to employ cognitive reasoning to provide the enterprise with advice on managing business operations; and a framework employed by the Al engine based on a metaphor of a novel, with business operations of the enterprise presented as a story, and including a data model that follows rules of grammar.

column2: ARTIFICIAL-INTELLIGENCE EXERCISE ASSISTANCE EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention discloses artificial-intelligence exercise assistance equipment, belongs to the technical field of artificial-intelligence exercise equipment, and solves the problems that existing robots for assisting in walking in the market cannot run according to the driving will of the human body and are poor in exercise effect. The artificial-intelligence exercise assistance equipment is characterized by comprising a knee joint rotation connector, a hip joint protection plate, a thigh support plate, a shank support plate and a foot support plate, wherein a sensor component is arranged on the foot support plate and used for detecting the stress distribution of the foot support plate and provides convenience for adjusting the overall length, and therefore the equipment is applicable to people of different heights and high in wearing stability. Adjustment of the bending angle between an upper knee expansion plate and the shank support plate is achieved by adjusting the rotation of theknee joint rotation connector, and therefore the exercise assistance equipment runs according to the driving will of the human body and keeps the gravity balance of the human body at the same time. Under the assistance of the exercise assistance equipment, time and strength are saved, and the walking movement of limbs is facilitated.

column2: LOADING METHOD OF VR SCENE AND OBJECT BASED ON BIG DATA AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: Loading method of VR scene and object based on big data and artificial intelligence are disclosed . the operation habit of an operator is mastered according to the common operation habit of a common operator and the different operation habit of an individual operator so as to perform next operation flow or pre-estinate loading scene and objects after operation steps, The invention solves the problem of loading scene on demand in virtual reality, reduces the amount of image transmission and loading data, improves the running efficiency of virtual 3D scene, reduces redundancy, especially in Webapplication, mobile VR application is more important, and the effect is more obvious.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PERCEPTION MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence perception management system, including supporting base and monitoring bracelet, support base top even fixedly connected with bracing piece all around, upper end of the support bar is connected with the display instrument, is equipped with the touch screen in the display instrument, the utility model discloses a be equipped with the touch screen in the display instrument, and the display instrument passes through the bluetooth and connects the high accuracy rhythm of the heart sensor on the bracelet, after body -building person gets into the body -building shop, the pull goes out to support the hou mian slide of base, take out the wrist department of cover at oneself with the monitoring bracelet in the bracelet standing groove, as body-building person in body -building the time, monitoring hand intra -annular high accuracy rhythm of the heart sensor can send body -building person's rhythm of the heart to display instrument throughthe bluetooth and shows in body -building person's wrist, when the rhythm of the heart of seeing certain body -building person as the train for a long time is in higher scope, can remind this body -building person need carry out appropriate rest in the past, rationally carry out body -building, it is impaired to avoid the health.

column2: INTELLIGENT POSTURE-CORRECTING DOUBLE BACKBOARD STUDY CHAIR
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent healthy home appliances for children and specifically relates to an intelligent posture-correcting double backboard study chair. The intelligent posture-correcting double backboard study chair comprises a chair leg assembly, a chair seat assembly, a double backboard chair back assembly and a single tube chair frame assembly; the double backboard chair back assembly comprises a left backboard assembly, a right backboard assembly and an intelligent voice posture-correcting system; the intelligent voice posture-correcting system comprises four pulse sensors, a voice recorded broadcast module, two time relay modules, three relay modules, an obstacle avoidance module, a power amplifier module, a horn, an accumulator component, a powerswitch, a direct current charging socket, a male flat cable and a female flat cable. According to the invention, human biological characteristics, such as heart rate and pulse, and an artificial intelligence voice technology are adopted for reminding children of correcting posture through a voice prompt when the sitting posture is improper during study period, so as to achieve the purpose of caring and reminding children through voice broadcast when parents are not aside the children.

column2: NETWORK-INTERACTION TEACHING METHOD AND ROBOT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a network-interaction teaching robot based on artificial intelligence. The network-interaction teaching robot based on artificial intelligence comprises a body, wherein a drivemechanism is installed at the bottom of the body; a central processing unit is installed in the head part; a flash memory module and a storage device are arranged on the central processing unit; a human-computer interaction control module is installed on an abdomen part; a power supply is electrically connected with the central processing unit; the central processing unit is electrically connected with the drive mechanism, a voice broadcast module, a liquid crystal display module, a projection module, a network communication module, Bluetooth, a USB interface and the human-computer interaction control module; and the human-computer interaction control module is electrically connected with a sound acquisition module, a scanning module and an execution module. Through the combination of software and hardware, and human-computer interaction, the network-interaction teaching robot based on artificial intelligence is enabled to guide students to actively construct the knowledge structure and ability structure through active studying, understanding and exercise, and complete a teaching program step by step and complete teaching objectives.

column2: SALES PROMOTION SYSTEM, MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, MACHINE LEARNING DATA PROVIDING DEVICE, AND PROGRAM
column4:
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To overcome the limitation of the effects of sales promotion by conducting a machine learning using artificial intelligence for a specific scene alone of customer contact.
SOLUTION: Professional agents 9-12 and 14 perform sales actions a1 to a5 in plural scenes in an action environment 1 of a user 2 when the user is in his/her house, is activating an application, is logging-in the SNS, is viewing a signage, or is visiting a shop. The main agent 15, who performs the total optimization, determines rewards r1 to r5 based on the consumption actions (purchase of a golf club, for example) of the user 2 after the above actions, and gives the rewards r1 to r5 to professional agents who have made contributions. The agents do reinforcing learning to maximize the accumulated value of the reward.
