column2: FLEXIBLE GAIT MONITORING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CALCULATION
column4: The invention discloses a flexible gait monitoring method based on artificial intelligence calculation. The method is characterized by comprising the step of utilizing multiple sets of pressure data of the knees and foot soles of the human body during walking for training a neural network capable of running on an FPGA, then inputting the real-time collected pressure data to the trained neural network for comparison and identification, and intelligently monitoring the human-body shape and health, wherein according to training of the neural network, knee and foot sole pressure signals collectedby a sensing array are processed through an ADC conversion module and then connected into an artificial intelligence learning system of a three-layer network architecture for learning, a trained neural network input feature comparison module compares and identifies the real-time input pressure signals, and therefore the human-body shape and health are intelligently monitored. Compared with the prior art, the method has the advantages that the prediction accuracy is high, the structure is simple, the use is convenient, effective intelligent monitoring of human-body shape and health is achieved,and reliable and effective data support is provided for reliable analysis and research of the human-body shape and health state.

column2: MICRO-POWER-GRID ENERGY STORAGE SCHEDULING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON DEEP Q-VALUE NETWORK (DQN) REINFORCEMENT LEARNING
column4: The invention discloses a micro-power-grid energy storage scheduling method and device based on deep Q-value network reinforcement learning. A micro-power-grid model is established; a deep Q-value network reinforcement learning algorithm is utilized for artificial intelligence training according to the micro-power-grid model; and a battery running strategy of micro-power-grid energy storage scheduling is calculated and obtained according to input parameter feature values. According to the embodiment of the invention, deep Q-value networks are utilized for scheduling management on micro-power-grid energy, an agent decides the optimal energy storage scheduling strategy through interaction with an environment, a running mode of the battery is controlled in the constantly changing environment,features of energy storage management are dynamically determined on the basis of a micro-power-grid, and the micro-power-grid is enabled to obtain a maximum running benefit in interaction with a mainpower grid; and the networks are enabled to respectively calculate an evaluation value of the environment and an additional value, which is brought by action, through using a competitive Q-value network model, decomposition of the two parts enables a learning objective to be more stable and accurate, and estimation ability of the deep Q-value networks on environment status is enabled to be higher.

column2: LABORATORY ANIMAL CAGE POSSESSES FULL -AUTOMATIC INTELLIGENT CONTROL WASHING UNIT
column4: The utility model discloses a laboratory animal cage possesses full -automatic intelligent control washing unit, including controller, water tank, water pump, motorised valve and shower nozzle, the shower nozzle is installed in the cage utensil, and with the play water end (W. E. ) of water pump is connected, the water pump intake the end with the water tank is connected, the shower nozzle with between the play water end (W. E. ) of water pump the motorised valve is all installed in intaking of water pump between end and the water tank, the controller is connected respectively the water pump with the motorised valve, control the water pump with the motorised valve switch. The utility model discloses a laboratory animal cage possesses full -automatic intelligent control washing unit, can freely set for the time of washing, the time long and wash interval time, guarantee to rinse well thoroughly through the water pump pressurization, be provided with the running water and cut off the water and have protect function, cut off the water and to report to the police, can realize full -automatic artificial intelligence control, the energy saving is not operateed in water pump standby whennot washing the instruction.

column2: METHOD FOR PREDICTING THE NUMBER OF DISEASE SYMPTOMS BASED ON IMPROVED GA-BP ALGORITHM
column4: The invention relates to a method for predicting the number of disease symptoms based on the improved GA-BP algorithm, belongs to the technical field of an artificial intelligence algorithm, solves problems that the traditional BP network is easy to fall into local minimum points and the convergence speed is slow through combining the genetic algorithm, the particle swarm algorithm and the BP neural network and improves prediction accuracy. The method is characterized in that firstly, a database of disease symptoms is established, and data are preprocessed; secondly, the network topology structure is determined based on prediction objects, the weight and the threshold of the BP neural network are initialized, and genetic parameters are initialized; thirdly, all the samples are trained through the established BP neural network, a fitness function is calculated, the optimal fitness value and optimal individuals are obtained by the genetic algorithm, the optimal weight and the optimal threshold are obtained, the optimal parameters are substituted into the BP neural network, the network is trained, the particle swarm algorithm is introduced to update the weight and the threshold, whether the ending condition is satisfied is determined, and the algorithm is exited to obtain the prediction result.

column2: REMOTE MACHINE IMAGE IDENTIFICATION DIAGNOSIS SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a remote machine image identification diagnosis system and method and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The system includes an image collection device,an application and a server, wherein the application is used for acquiring images of at least one body part of a user through the image acquisition device and further used for sending the images of the at least one body part to the server, the server is used for receiving the images of the at least one body part and further used for diagnosing the target diagnosis result corresponding to the images of the at least one body part for the images of the at least one body part, the diagnosis result includes personality and/or physical fitness and/or a symptom name of the user, the server is used for sending the at least one target diagnosis result to the application, the application is further used for receiving and displaying the at least one target diagnosis result, diseases of the user canbe diagnosed without a professional mechanism, and disease diagnosis convenience is improved.

column2: A PUMPING STATION OPTIMAL DISPATCHING METHOD BASED ON VARIABLE LENGTH GENETIC ALGORITHM
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, More specifically, the invention relates to a pumping station optimal dispatching method based on variable length genetic algorithm, theinvention can dynamically adjust the number of pumps, the pump can be stopped at any time for overhaul, under replacement and disassembly conditions, and under the conditions of satisfying the flow restriction of the pump station and reducing the number of pump start-stop times, keep the algorithm valid, and the optimal start-stop combination of pump is obtained, Minimum power dissipation, The fitness function not only considers the energy consumption of the pump, but also considers the flow penalty factor and the start-stop penalty factor of the pump, and the sigmoid normalization function isused to normalize these three factors, which prevents the influence of a certain factor and the small situation caused by the large difference between the numerical values.

column2: PERCEPTUAL CODING ACQUISITION DEVICE AND METHOD BASED ON 3D CAMERA
column4: The present invention discloses a perceptual coding acquisition device and method based on 3D camera, the perceptual coding acquisition device comprises a 3D camera and a processing end, wherein the processing end includes an acquiring module, the 3D camera is configured to acquire an initial image of a shooting target; the acquiring module is configured to acquire a depth-sensing code corresponding to the initial image according to an artificial intelligence network, a label is set on an target coding point on the depth-sensing code, the artificial intelligence network includes a sample library, the sample library includes a number of 3D samples, labels are provided on target digital points of the 3D samples. The perceptual coding acquisition device and method based on 3D camera can obtain a more standardized digital point cloud,making the acquired 3D image easier to manage and control, and can reduce resources consumed by operation. When the initial image acquires the perceptual coding, the point cloud is compressed and simplified thereby reducing space occupied by the 3D images.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE STATISTICAL METHOD OF REMOTE SENSING SATELLITE EFFECTIVENESS
column4: The invention discloses a method for statistical intelligence artificial intelligence of remote sensing satellites. The specific steps include: 1) constructing a simulation archive database, a data processing database, a performance statistics function library, and performing maintenance; 2) formulating a statistical process according to the performance indicators to be counted. 3) run the simulation program and archive the running data; 4) automatically runing the multi-level processing program for data processing; 5) generating the graph based on the data after the data processing, and visualize the data. The invention provides a statistical method for artificial intelligence of remote sensing satellite performance, which replaces labor by computer, reduces statistical error conditions and improves statistical efficiency.

column2: INTERACTION SYSTEM AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an interaction system based on artificial intelligence and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The system includes a wakeup unit, a voice unit, a semantic unit, avoice synthesis unit, a central control unit, a data acquisition unit and a terminal control unit, wherein the wakeup unit is used for waking up the system and response service, the voice unit is usedfor acquiring the user voice information and identifying the user voice information, the semantic unit is used for performing semantic identification of the voice information and generating the corresponding instruction information, the voice synthesis unit is used for converting the instruction information into the user-identifiable information and presenting the information, the central controlunit is used for acquiring the instruction information and running a system program to execute instructions, the data acquisition unit is used for acquiring data required to complete the instructionand transmitting the data to the central control unit, and the terminal control unit is used for controlling terminal application operation and display.

column2: APPARATUS, SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR FACILITATING COMMERCE
column4: An apparatus, system and method are provided for facilitating commerce. At least one image of an item is received one or more computing devices from a device associated with a user. The at least one image of the item is compared to a plurality of images of corresponding items for sale using artificial intelligence running on the one or more computing devices. A set of matching images is identified from the plurality of images of the corresponding items for sale matching the at least one image of the item based on the use of the artificial intelligence running on the one or more computing devices.

column2: USER EXPERIENCE APPARATUS USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: Disclosed is a user experience apparatus enabling a user to have an image. The user experience apparatus comprises: a box including side walls forming front, rear, left, and right sides and an upper wall closing an upper side to provide a space where a user may act; a walking assistant means provided below the box and allowing the user to take a walking or running action; one or more displays displaying virtual reality images; a control unit analyzing the virtual reality images displayed on the one or more displays and determining an environment corresponding to the virtual reality images; and an internal environment adjusting means adjusting an environment inside the box to cope with the environment determined in the control unit. column2: A METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DETECTING NUTRITIONAL DEFICIENCIES AND SUGGESTING DIET, EXERCISE AND STRESS REDUCTION PLAN USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: A method (200) for detecting nutritional deficiencies and suggesting diet, exercise and stress reduction recommendations using artificial intelliegence have been disclosed. The method (200) begins at step 210, plurality of input elements are received and stored in a control module (510). At step 220, the plurality of input elements are compared with information stored in an information database (130) via artificial intelligence (130). At step 230, one or more recommended attributes are provided by an output module (520) for the plurality of input elements. At step 240, the one or more recommended attributes are displayed on a display unit (110) connected with a user device (140).[Figure 1]

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING AN ALERT ON DELIVERING DIGITAL CONTENT
column4: The present invention discloses a system and method for providing an alert on delivering a digital content such as when an interesting digital content is imminent, for example, the beginning of a play during a football game, to direct the focus of one or more viewers towards the digital content. The present invention is further configured to embed a commercial message in conjunction with the alert on directing the focus of the viewers. The system is adapted to activate the alert either manually or automatically. Further, the system is optionally implemented with an artificial intelligence (AI) system, which is trained using deep learning to recognize the appropriate time to automatically trigger the alert/commercial message sequence. The AI system could be trained by monitoring the manual control of alert activation.

column2: SYSTEM FOR ITERATIVELY TRAINING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE USING CLOUD-BASED METRICS
column4: A method may include receiving, at an artificial intelligence cloud service, a plurality of artificial intelligence feedback communications from a plurality of devices, wherein each artificial intelligence feedback communication of the plurality of artificial intelligence feedback communications includes data generated by software application components running on respective ones of the pluralityof devices, the software application components including respective current artificial intelligence models, deriving, from the data included with each artificial intelligence feedback communication,an associated artificial intelligence model update for each of the respective current artificial intelligence models on the plurality of devices, and transmitting, to the plurality of devices, a plurality of artificial intelligence model update communications, wherein each artificial intelligence model update communication of the plurality of artificial intelligence model update communications includes the derived associated artificial intelligence model update for updating a corresponding one of the respective current artificial intelligence models on the plurality of devices.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR HIERARCHICAL DETECTION OF SOFTWARE BEHAVIOR DEFECTS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DECISION TREE
column4: The invention provides a method and a system for hierarchical detection of software behavior defects based on an artificial intelligence decision tree, First, test the software, After testing, A decision tree of artificial intelligence is constructed by using the historical data, Extracting classification rules of software behavior, Then, during the running of the software, Aiming at the softwarebehavior during software running, a layered detection model of software behavior defects based on system layer, state layer and function layer is established for the information system. The risk behavior and abnormal behavior of the system layer and the state layer are detected first, and when there is no software behavior defect in the system layer and the state layer, the function layer detection is carried out again. By comparing the method of the invention with the traditional defect detection method, the time for accurately locating the cause of the defect after the defect is found in thesoftware running process is obviously longer than that of the traditional detection method.

column2: CONTROLLING BEHAVIOR OF ENTITIES IN FUNNEL SECTIONS OF A COMPUTER-REPRESENTED ENVIRONMENT
column4: Innovations in the area of controlling behavior of computer-controlled entities such as cars in a computer-represented environment are presented herein. In various examples described herein, the behavior of computer-controlled cars is controlled by an artificial intelligence (?œAI?? behavior engine. The AI behavior engine performs operations to determine if the behavior (driving pattern, etc.) of a computer-controlled car should change for a funnel section. If so, the AI behavior engine switches the computer-controlled car to a trailing mode configuration and selects a candidate car to follow in the funnel section based on various criteria. The AI behavior engine also determines how to follow the candidate car by selecting a racing path and setting rules to determine the speed to use for following the candidate car. Control values are then set. The described innovations also generally apply to other racing scenarios, self-driving/autonomous cars, and other applications with robotic equipment and devices.

column2: CONTROLLING BEHAVIOR OF ENTITIES IN FUNNEL SECTIONS OF A COMPUTER-REPRESENTED ENVIRONMENT
column4: Innovations in the area of controlling behavior of computer-controlled entities such as cars in a computer-represented environment are presented herein. In various examples described herein, the behavior of computer-controlled cars is controlled by an artificial intelligence ("AI") behavior engine. The AI behavior engine performs operations to determine if the behavior (driving pattern, etc.) of a computer-controlled car should change for a funnel section. If so, the AI behavior engine switches the computer-controlled car to a trailing mode configuration and selects a candidate car to follow in the funnel section based on various criteria. The AI behavior engine also determines how to follow the candidate car by selecting a racing path and setting rules to determine the speed to use for following the candidate car. Control values are then set. The described innovations also generally apply to other racing scenarios, self-driving/autonomous cars, and other applications with robotic equipment and devices.

column2: GENERATION METHOD OF INITIAL POPULATION IN CLASS INTEGRATION TEST SEQUENCE PROBLEM BASED ON SEARCH
column4: Generation method of initial population in class integration test sequence problem based on search. First, a constraint condition is introduced, that is, when a sequence of classes is tested, strong dependencies between classes are not allowed to be broken. A method for generating class test sequences under that constraint condition is proposed, includes analyzing system to obtain strong dependency matrix, transposing and traversing matrix to construct multi-branch tree or multi-branch tree forest, merging trees that can be merged, completing classes that have not been traversed to obtain complete forest, traversing every tree in forest in random order hierarchy to obtain class test sequence; The invention solves the problem that the convergence speed and the optimization result of the algorithm are affected by the low fitness value of the initial population individual and the poor overall quality when the artificial intelligence algorithm (such as the genetic algorithm and the particle swarm algorithm) is used for solving the class integrated test sequence to a certain extent. The class test sequence generated by this method is taken as the initial population, which is random, andthe overall quality is improved, and the searching ability of simple genetic algorithm and simple particle swarm optimization algorithm is enhanced.

column2: VEHICLE MANAGEMENT IS WITH INTELLIGENT CAR MACHINE
column4: The utility model discloses a vehicle management is with intelligent car machine, including the car owner body, the car owner body is including power supply unit, core device and storage device, powersupply unit includes the lithium cell, and the lithium cell passes through the power cord and be connected with core device, storage device, the core device includes input device, processing apparatus and dispensing device, processing apparatus includes the GPS module, the CAN converter, 485 converter and six acceleration sensor, and GPS module, the CAN converter, 485 converter and six acceleration sensor are connected with microprocessor, the device need not reequip the vehicle, can reduce overall cost, and can improve the running efficiency of vehicle, put forward the high intelligentization degree, and simultaneously, can make things convenient for managers to carry out the flexibility to the vehicle, effectual management, can make things convenient for the driver to open the vehicle.

column2: AN ONLINE ITEM BANK BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND AN APPLICATION METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses an online item bank based on artificial intelligence and an application method thereof, the online question bank includes an input module, a search module, an item bank system,a display module, a computing module, an exercise classification module, an error-prone item bank module and a server, the input module is connected with the search module, the search module is connected with the item bank system, the item bank system is respectively connected with the display module and the computing module, the computing module is connected with the exercise classification module and the error-prone item bank module, the exercise classification module and the error-prone item bank module are connected with the server, and the server is connected with the display module. Theitem bank system comprises a storage unit, a matching unit, an extraction unit and a sorting unit. The storage unit is connected with the matching unit, and the matching unit is connected with the extraction unit. The invention can lock exercises through keywords and can carry out advanced classification on exercises and generate wrong question bank, which has strong user autonomy and pertinence,and improves user learning efficiency.

column2: MODEL GENERATION METHOD, DEVICE, AND COMPUTER-READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a model generation method, a device and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: a server obtains a target data file used for representingall instruction operation processes in a target instruction set; the target instruction set is use for generating a corresponding number of target models which have that same running purpose and are respectively applicable to different target running environments; a model driver corresponding to the target running environment is obtained according to the corresponding relationship between the pre-established running environment and the model driver; According to the obtained model, the target data file is processed and the target model is obtained. As can be seen from the technical scheme provided by the embodiment of the present invention, the server processes the target data file according to the model driving corresponding to different running environments to obtain the model suitable for different running environments, Therefore, in artificial intelligence (AI) model visualization software, the corresponding number of AI models suitable for different depth learning frameworks are generated, which saves the model generation time and improves the user experience.

column2: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PROGRAMMER WRITE-IN DATA RELAY PAYLOAD SOURCE CODE METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a method for artificial intelligence programmer write-in data relay load source code method, including the following steps: constructing relay load-related component code library and algorithm library, standardizing the description of data relay load, writing codes by AI programmer, including communication-related code, mechanics code, power subsystem code, setting simulation parameters of data relay load, carrying out data relay load simulation. The invention provides a method for an artificial intelligence programmer to write data relay load. The source code is written to carry out thermoelectric whole subsystem coupling simulation of data relay load of a data relay satellite, and the working state is tested, so as to provide guarantee for normal operation of thedata relay satellite in orbit. Artificial intelligence programmers for different types of satellites, can quickly generate the corresponding simulation source code, reduce human workload, not only more time-saving and labor-saving more intelligent, but also improve the efficiency.

column2: INTELLIGENT TRACKING AND PHOTOGRAPHING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent tracking and photographing system, comprising a camera, which is used for photographing a specific object; A photographing moving unit for loading the camera andrealizing the adjustment of the distance and the angle between the camera and the specific object; An artificial intelligence processing unit for controlling the movement of the photographing movingunit and controlling the camera to automatically photograph, and processing and outputting photographing data; The central management unit is configured to receive a shooting menu selected by a user through a communication interface, instruct an artificial intelligence processing unit to track shooting of a specific object according to shooting menu control, and supply shooting data to the specific object. The invention can carry out intelligent tracking shooting according to user requirements, and can store the cloud end in real time, thus realizing more efficient, simplified and intelligentshooting.

column2: A MULTI-SENSOR VEHICLE ACQUISITION DATA PROCESSING DEVICE AND A METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a multi-sensor vehicle acquisition data processing device and method, which solve the problem that life safety of the personnel is affected when the personnel do not find someabnormal conditions in the vehicle running process. The device and method are characterized in that: the device includes a sensor module, a data analysis module, a data sending module and a promptingmodule; the sensor module collects the data and transmits the data to the data analysis module for analysis and processing, and the abnormal data is analyzed and sent to the prompting module, which isused to prompt the abnormal condition of the personnel, so as to facilitate the personnel to discover and process the abnormal condition in time. The device and the method avoid the problem of inaccuracy caused by environmental factors when a single sensor collects data by installing a plurality of sensors on the vehicle for data acquisition, and have high accuracy. After data collection, the abnormal situation is analyzed and the personnel is prompted, so as to facilitate the personnel to find and deal with the abnormal situation in a timely manner.

column2: TWO HAIRDO SPHERICAL JOINTS
column4: The utility model belongs to the technical field of robot and artificial intelligence, especially relate to a two hairdo spherical joints. Including motor (1), drive plate (2), reducing gear box (3),motor two (4), reducing gear box two (5), switching gear assembly (6) and decorative cover (7), wherein motor (1) is through one (3) speed reduction of reducing gear box, one (3) inner space of reducing gear box is big, and motor two (4) is fixed inside it, and the two can close to a whole, motor two (4) slows down through reducing gear box two (5), and a new whole joint module is constituteed toeach part, and this joint module constructs the integration together with the rotation exercise machine of two script mutually perpendicular's independence and freedom degree.

column2: INTELLIGENT MANAGEMENT AND CONTROL CLOUD OF PUBLIC BUILDING ENERGY SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to an intelligent management and control cloud of a public building energy system, which comprises a data collection subsystem, a real-time monitoring subsystem, a data visualization subsystem, a running optimization subsystem, an energy efficiency diagnosis subsystem and an integrated management subsystem. The could has good scalability and is conducive to the integration ofmultiple types of energy data communication protocols, energy system physical modeling can be used for energy efficiency diagnostics, energy system simulation technology and artificial intelligence can be used to optimize the operation of the energy system of public buildings energy management system.

column2: AIRPORT ROBOT SERVICE SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an airport robot service system, and relates to the technical field of robot control. The airport robot service system comprises a control server and at least one mobile robot,wherein each mobile robot comprises a mobile module, a camera shooting module, a voice interaction module, a display module and a communication module. A provided airport robot service system comprises the multiple mobile robots arranged in an airport area and the control server, each mobile robot comprises the mobile module, the camera shooting module, the voice interaction module, the display module and the communication module, the mobile robots move in an airport through the mobile modules, and the communication modules are used for communicating with the control server; the airport robotservice system can provide various services, wherein the services comprise a welcome service for passengers, a people-searching service for the passengers and a question consultation service for thepassengers.

column2: VIDEO RELAY SERVICE, COMMUNICATION SYSTEM, AND RELATED METHODS FOR PERFORMING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SIGN LANGUAGE TRANSLATION SERVICES IN A VIDEO RELAY SERVICE ENVIRONMENT
column4: Video relay services, communication systems, and methods are disclosed herein. The video relay service for providing automatic translation services during a real-time communication session. The video relay service comprises at least one server configured to receive a video stream containing sign language content from a video communication device associated with a hearing-impaired user; automatically translate the sign language content into a verbal language translation during the real-time communication session without assistance of a human sign language interpreter; and transmit the verbal language translation to a far-end communication device associated with a hearing-capable user during the real-time communication session.

column2: A CLASSIFICATION METHOD BASED ON AUDIO CHARACTERISTIC SIGNALS
column4: The invention relates to a classification method based on audio characteristic signals, belonging to the technical field of audio signal processing. The invention classifies the audio characteristic signal after dimension reduction processing by using Gaussian kernel function and Bayesian prior knowledge. The classification algorithm based on audio characteristic signals of the invention can be used for audio broadcast monitoring, artificial intelligence speech recognition, audio scene pattern discrimination and the like. The invention mainly performs audio classification according to the characteristics of the audio characteristic signal coefficient domain, and has more universality and stability than the prior audio content-based classification technology. The invention utilizes the excellent nonlinear characteristics of the Gaussian kernel function and the efficient optimization algorithm, thereby avoiding the shortcomings of single application scene, slow running speed and poor classification effect caused by the linear mapping. The algorithm theory is also relatively simple and easy to program, more practical and practical engineering projects.

column2: UNMANNED INTELLIGENT COURT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM AND METHOD AND COURT
column4: The invention discloses an unmanned intelligent golf court management system and method and a court. The system comprises a server, a camera and a lighting lamp arranged above and/or around the side of the court, and an intelligent door lock arranged around or at the entrance of the court. The camera, the lighting lamp and the intelligent door lock are communicatively connected with the server, and the server controls the intelligent management of the court. The server has a booking coaching system, an intelligent access control system, a lighting system, a security monitoring system, a courtdata analysis system, a video playback system and an artificial intelligence algorithm system inside. The invention improves the comprehensive utilization rate of the golf court, is conducive to optimizing the utilization rate of the court, and is conducive to improving the consumption and sports experience of users.

column2: PERSONALIZED INTELLIGENT TEACHING SYSTEM
column4: The invention belongs to the field of intelligent teaching, and discloses a personalized intelligent teaching system. The personalized intelligent teaching system is characterized in that a task module is presented in a barrier passing mode, and different knowledge point explanation units, example units and exercise units are set at the corresponding barriers; a review module includes a personalized question pushing unit, a personalized question selecting unit and a personalized question exercising unit, and a subject map module displays the learning tasks and completion thereof of learners inthe form of images and in a split manner; and a feedback module includes a performance fluctuation display unit, a capability index display unit, a capability ranking display unit and an intelligentevaluation display unit. The personalized intelligent teaching system uses artificial intelligence and a big data algorithm to optimize the learning strategies of students, provide students with intelligent and personalized teaching content and exercises and provide visual intelligent feedback and suggestions.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE WRITING METHOD OF MULTI-PLATFORM AND MULTI-RUNNING MODE SOURCE CODE FOR DIGITAL VEHICLE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence writing method for multi-platform and multi-running mode source code of a digital aircraft, which comprises the following steps: a common part of thesource code is saved as a template in advance and stored in a source code library; according to the platform type applicable to the source code, a template path is established by code function; Readstream design XML file, stream design database and package design database; according to the running mode information and the template path carried in the package design database, the template is readand the multi-running mode source code is written. According to the XML file of stream design, the platform information carried in stream design database and package design database as well as the template path, the template is read and the source code of application layer and system layer are written in multi-platform source code; according to the source code platform information carried in thepackage design database, combined with the application layer and system layer source code of multi-platform source code and multi-running mode source code, the engineering framework file of multi-platform source code is obtained, and the writing of multi-platform multi-running mode source code is completed.

column2: A THREE-DIMENSIONAL MODELING METHOD AND SYSTEM COMBINING A LIDAR AND A SPHERICAL CURTAIN CAMERA
column4: The invention discloses a three-dimensional modeling method and system combined with a laser radar and a spherical curtain camera, which relates to the technical field of three-dimensional imaging modeling. The method comprises the following steps: scanning the current scene with a laser radar to obtain data in real time; triggering a spherical curtain camera to take photographs and obtain panoramic photographs; uploading radar data and panoramic photos to the mobile terminal, calculating a path and buffering the panoramic photos according to the radar data through the mobile terminal; uploading the path data and panoramic photo data processed by the step to the server for three-dimensional modeling. Laser radar real-time scanning and positioning, compared to running into a white wall, when the characteristic points such as glass and the like are few, the vision-based SLAM which is lost in tracking will appear. The real-time scanning and positioning of the laser radar is more stable and accurate than the video stream positioning of the vision-based SLAM, and the created three-dimensional model will not produce model distortion, and the scene of the created three-dimensional model is more accurate and reliable.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LIGHTING SYSTEM USING DATA COLLECTION TO BE USED IN INDOOR AND OUTDOOR ENVIRONMENT
column4: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence lighting system which uses data collection and can be used in an indoor or outdoor environment. The artificial intelligent lighting system can eliminate the durability degradation of lamps due to the operations for turning the lamps installed in a location on or off whenever sensing vehicles or users entering or exiting the corresponding location during a predetermined period with the frequent entering or exiting operations, eliminate the cost increase due to maintenance, replacement, or repairs of the lamps, and eliminate the problems of lights being turned off even when a user is present or lights being turned on due to the conventional slow sensing speed or a non-sensing state. According to the present invention, the artificial intelligent lighting system includes: a sensing module which senses visual information in a situation needing lighting on a body sensing lamp and transmits the visual information to a server by including sensors and data transmission modules; an automatic lighting system unit which includes a deep-learning-based flickering determination system for accurately determining the flickering based on the data transmitted from the sensing module; a relay switch including a data reception unit which controls the flickering of the lamps after receiving signals from the automatic flickering system unit and a lamp flickering control unit; and a lamp configured to include LEDs to function as a lamp. Accordingly, the artificial intelligent lighting system can have the above-described effects. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: FOOTBALL TRAINING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a football training method, and relates to the technical field of football training systems. An internet of things precise positioning system acquires positioning positions andmovement information of footballers and footballs and transmits the positioning positions and the movement information to a cloud server processing platform, and the cloud server processing platforminstantly generates a positioning system position distribution diagram of a football field, the footballers and footballs. Intelligent ball passing guidance software is arranged on the cloud server processing platform, and the footballers wear tactical wristwatches to individually receive a footballer position distribution mini-map, or wear intelligent glasses to receive comprehensive informationand select a video broadcast mode or positioning system footballer distribution map mode according to own requirements. By starting with footballer position judgment, running position control consciousness raising, football field real-time training scientific and technological means upgrading and the like, a God's perspective scientific and technological football training system for internet of things precise positioning, the intelligent glasses, intelligent wearing, AR (augmented reality) and AI (artificial intelligence) computing is built to improve crowd control level of footballer positionand distance macroscopic immersion feeling, overall situation control precision feeling and the like.

column2: REGIONAL FITNESS INTERCONNECTION SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to a regional fitness interconnection system. The system includes a fitness instrument monitoring end, a fitness staff monitoring end, a public facility monitoring end, a healthmonitoring device and multiple network access ends making all the devices above linked with a regional network, wherein the network access ends constitute the regional network, and management of the devices in the network and the fitness activities of fitness users is carried out through a management platform. By means of the system, network interconnection of different kinds of fitness facilitiesin a gym, information terminals of the fitness users and public facilities can be achieved. Not only can the fitness activities of the fitness users be monitored and recorded, but also specific fitness schemes can be provided for the fitness users, and therefore the fitness users can search for, execute and amend the schemes in real time during the fitness activities, so that the system has the advantages of fitness big data and artificial intelligence. The fitness scientificity and safety of people in the current era can be improved, and the utilization of fitness instruments can be increased.

column2: AN OPTICAL DETECTION METHOD FOR HUMAN BODY DETECTION
column4: The invention discloses an optical detection method for human body detection, which comprises the following steps: S1, the product is placed in an unmanned environment, and background information of the monitoring area is collected through an optical technical module on the sensor as an environmental template; S2, the background information of the monitoring area is collected through an optical technical module on the sensor as an environmental template. S2, continuously collecting and feeding back the collected pattern to the vision recognition technology module through the camera lens on thesensor; 3, feature extraction of that pattern is carry out through a visual recognition technology module; S4, comparing the extracted pattern features with the environmental templates in the learning database through the image algorithm module on the sensor; S5, analyzing the collected image through the logic recognition algorithm in the vision recognition technology module on the sensor, obtaining the result, and outputting the result to the relay; S6, the relay makes corresponding switch change according to the signal and gives an alarm. The invention not only solves the current technicalproblem, but also integrates the artificial intelligence, imaging and sensing technologies to meet the needs of customers, and pushes the technical level of the industry to a new level.

column2: SKIN FEATURE FUSION MARKING METHOD BASED ON UV LIGHT AND NATURAL LIGHT
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of skin detection, and discloses a skin feature fusion marking method based on UV light and natural light, comprising the following steps: S1, preparing for detection: a patient extends a face into a detection device for detection; S2: UV light irradiation: using UV light source to irradiate the patient's face; S3, shooting marker: shooting face image,and marking acne, deep color spot and color spot precipitation distribution part in skin in UV light shooting image by artificial intelligence image marker technology; S4: Natural light shooting: starting the natural light illumination imaging module to irradiate the patient's face; 5, re-photograph that mark: photographing the face image and mark the face image by the artificial intelligence image marking technology; S6: Comparative comparison: S3 and S5 were photographed to mark the characteristics of the skin points for comparison. The skin feature fusion marking method based on UV light and natural light can solve the problem that the health condition of the skin is not understood, and the result is half the result with twice the effort.

column2: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING MOVING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ROBOT
column4: A moving robot according to one aspect of the present invention comprises: a running unit for moving a main body based on a navigation map having a plurality of local maps; an image acquiring unit for acquiring a plurality of images in areas corresponding to the local maps during moving; a storing unit for storing the plurality of images acquired by the image acquiring unit; and a controlling unit for recognizing properties of the local maps acquiring N images filmed in different directions among the plurality of local maps, controlling to store the recognized result in the storing unit, creating a semantic map formed by a predetermined number of the local maps adjacent to each other among the plurality of local maps, and recognizing final properties of an area corresponding to the semantic map in response to the property recognition results of the local maps included in the semantic map, thereby capable of effectively recognizing the properties of areas. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: PUBLIC RENTAL ELECTRIC VEHICLE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to a public rental electric vehicle management system based on artificial intelligence, including a data processing server based on cloud computing platform, a third-party payment platform server, a third-party map navigation server, a customer identification server, a communication protocol management server, a relay server, a data communication network, and an electric vehicle control terminal. The use method comprises the following four steps: equipment assembly, mailing address assignment, user identity registration and vehicle use. On the one hand, the invention caneffectively meet the needs of centralized management and operation of various types of electric vehicles, high flexibility and reliability, on the other hand, it can effectively improve the working efficiency of electric vehicle remote rental operation and management, convenience and flexibility of the need, and the operation of data communication capabilities, high reliability of supervision andoperation of electric vehicle equipment in the process of intelligent degree, greatly improving the safety and stability of electric vehicle equipment rental services.

column2: SUBMERSIBLE MANTA RAY TOY SPECIALLY USED FOR TEENAGER ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EDUCATION
column4: The invention relates to a submersible manta ray toy specially used for teenager artificial intelligence education. The toy includes a fish body, a head, lips, a left eye, a right eye, a left gill, aright gill, a left fin, a right fin, a left tail pin, a right tail pin and a tail vane pin. The toy is characterize in that by means of a micro motor drive mechanism, an electronic chi, an LED lamp, abroadcaster, an electronic voice chip and a lithium battery arranged in the body of the submersible manta ray toy, a vivid illustration of the bionics, mechanical dynamics, electronic induction, electronic chip and LED lamp technology involved in imitation of free swimming of a manta ray by the manta ray toy in water is given. The toy is made of environment-friendly soft silica gel so as to protect the tender skin of children from being scratched when playing. The toy can teach the children that the manta ray is not only a master of swimming and sports, but also an endangered species of endangered wildlife under protection of international convention so as to cultivate the awareness of protecting and refusing to eat manta rays from childhood. Therefore, the toy has far-reaching significance for the development of popular science education for teenagers.

column2: CLASSIFIER PERFORMANCE EVALUATION METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND COMPUTER-READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The present disclosure relates to a classifier performance evaluation method and apparatus and a computer-readable storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence technology. The method comprises the following steps: determining the weight of each data category according to the quantity of each data category contained in the training data set, wherein the larger the quantity ofeach data category contained in the training data set, the larger the corresponding weight; training the classifier by using the training data set; testing the trained classifier through the test data set to obtain the classification accuracy of the classifier for each data category; weighting and summing the classification accuracy of each data class by the weight of each data class to determinethe classification performance of the classifier. The technical solution of the present disclosure can improve the accuracy of the performance evaluation of the classifier.

column2: MODULARIZATION WALL CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The utility model provides a modularization wall climbing robot belongs to the artificial intelligence field. This modularization wall climbing robot includes sufficient formula vacuum chuck skeleton(1), strength magnets formula wheel group (2), (4) four functional modules on visual system (3) and the chassis, and the different compound mode of these four functional module accessibles forms the wall climbing robot who possesses different functions. Compared with the prior art, the utility model discloses a modularization wall climbing robot in the real work can according to pipe -line system's actual conditions with different module independent assortments, have sufficient formula vacuum chuck and wheel formula electromagnetism and adsorb two kinds of absorption pattern, be applicable tomultiple different materials surface, nimble more stable.

column2: SMART WATCH TABLE
column4: The present invention relates to a table, and specifically, to a whole table serving as a smart watch. In general, the conventional table has been a simple table having no special function. It is inconvenient to buy a new one to use something helpful together with the table. To solve the above problems, the present invention removes the inconvenience to buy something required and integrates the additional function into one table. To achieve the above-mentioned object, the table includes: desk legs each enabling the height to be adjustable; a large smart watch disposed on the top of desk legs, in which the program in the smart watch has a clock function for indicating time, a health function related to health, an office function for improving business performance, and a waterproof function to prevent breakdown due to a liquid because the table is an electronic product; an iris recognition sensor; a touch sensor; and a fingerprint recognition sensor. As described above, according to the present invention, the table enables a user to do more tasks at home without standing up at the table. For example, the user eats breakfast while watching time when being in a hurry, and the table checks a healthy state of the user when a body of the user is in a bad condition, adjusts the diet, and sets the amount of exercise. In addition, the user conveniently makes a video call using a big screen when a video call is requested. Further, the table is equipped with an artificial intelligence service with voice recognition function, so that conversation is available when the user feels lonely. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: COMPUTERIZED VOTING SYSTEM
column4: Officials, Agents and Devices researching, creating lists of Registered Voters, Proxy Voters whom are sent machine readable encoded Documents (Registration, Language choice, Voting Ballots), optional return Containers. Each Document correlated to Receipt(s) via shared unique Random Symbolic Identifier(s), other Security Elements. For voting privacy, Voters exchange Ballots within their Voting Region. Voters complete Document(s), add Personal Security Identifier(s), keep Document Receipt, send Documents to Officials In-Person or by Postal Mail, Delivery Service, Telephone, Fax or Facsimile, Internet, EMail, Interactive Television. Officials receiving Documents provide delivery confirmation. Imaging machines record Documents duplicate images, correlates RSID, stores data. Timely, valid, authentic Documents are machine read via computer software extracting Voter information, selections, Write-In choices, Personal Security Items correlated to Document RSID. Read data stored, published to Voter privately accessible data vault. Completed ballots and Documents tallied for certifying. Official computers running artificial intelligence programs manage data (security, processing, integrity), communications, devices: availability, workload allocation.

column2: RACKET ERECTION SUPPORT AND BADMINTON ROBOT
column4: The utility model discloses a racket erection support and badminton robot relates to badminton robotechnology. The utility model provides a racket erection support includes racket bottom plate, support group spare, drive device, connecting axle and mount pad, support group spare is installed on the racket bottom plate, and drive device installs on support group spare, and the connecting axle is connected with the drive device transmission, and connecting axle and support group spare rotate and is connected, mount pad and connecting axle fixed connection, and the mount pad sets up with connecting axle one -tenth contained angle, the mount pad is used for the fixed racket of installation, and the racket bottom plate is used for installing can slide rail first relatively and the slip of second slide rail in first slide rail and second slide rail. The utility model also provides a badminton robot including the racket erection support. The utility model provides a racket erection support and badminton robot's simple structure, convenient to use. And it has stable bearing structure, can provide good support and batting motion for racket.

column2: RACKET ORBIT AND BADMINTON ROBOT
column4: The utility model discloses a racket orbit and badminton robot relates to badminton robotechnology. The utility model provides a racket orbit includes base, a sliding rail set spare, the 2nd sliding rail set spare. A sliding rail set spare includes that first runner, second runner and cover locate the conveyer belt on first runner and the second runner, and first runner and second rotate all to beconnected with the base rotation. The 2nd sliding rail set spare includes first track, second track, a balance member and the 2nd balance member, and first track and second track set up relatively, and first track and second track all are used for installing the racket connecting seat to make the racket connecting seat slide along first track and second track the utility model also provides a badminton robot including the racket orbit. The utility model provides a racket orbit and badminton robot's simple structure, convenient to use to can make the nimble ground motion of racket connecting seat, hit with the accuracy and play badminton.

column2: RACKET SLIDING CONSTRUCTION AND BADMINTON ROBOT
column4: The utility model discloses a racket sliding construction and badminton robot relates to badminton robotechnology field. The utility model provides a racket sliding construction includes racket bottomplate, bearing structure, batting drive device, connecting axle and mount pad, bearing structure install in on the racket bottom plate, the batting drive device install in bearing structure is last,the connecting axle with the drive device transmission is connected, just the connecting axle with bearing structure rotates the connection, the mount pad with connecting axle fixed connection, just the mount pad with the connecting axle becomes the contained angle setting, the mount pad is used for the fixed racket of installation. The utility model also provides a badminton robot including racket sliding construction. The utility model provides a racket sliding construction and badminton robot's simple structure, convenient to use. And it can provide good support and batting motion for racket.

column2: FETAL HEART RATE CURVE CLASSIFICATION SYSTEM, METHOD AND DEVICE
column4: The invention is applicable to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a fetal heart rate curve classification system, method and device. The system comprises medical acquisitionequipment, user equipment, and a cloud server, wherein the medical acquisition equipment and the cloud server are connected with the user equipment; the medical acquisition equipment is used for acquiring a fetal heart rate curve of a user's fetus and sending the fetal heart rate curve to the user equipment; the user equipment is used for sending the fetal heart rate curve to the cloud server, andreceiving the health category of the fetal heart rate curve returned by the cloud server and output the health category of the fetal heart rate curve; the cloud server is used for dividing the fetalheart rate curve into segments, identifying the health category of each fetal heart rate curve segment through a trained convolutional neural network, determining the health category of the fetal heart rate curve according to the health category of the fetal heart rate curve segments, and sending the health category of the fetal heart rate curve to the user device, and thus the accuracy, efficiency and intelligence of the classification of fetal heart rate curve are improved effectively.

column2: CRANIOMAXILLOFACIAL SKELETON AND SOFT TISSUE MORPHOLOGY PREDICTION METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a craniomaxillofacial skeleton and soft tissue morphology prediction method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of firstly, collecting genome data;secondly, collecting skeleton and soft tissue morphology data and acquiring feature points; thirdly, carrying out whole genome correlation analysis by utilizing the genome data subjected to quality control and the morphology data subjected to dimensionality reduction, thereby obtaining SNP loci; and fourthly, training a machine learning model according to the SNP loci and coordinates of the feature points, thereby obtaining a skeleton and soft tissue morphology prediction model. The skeleton and soft tissue prediction model is obtained in combination with the genome data and the morphology data; the precision of the obtained model is high; and the prediction has the advantages of high efficiency, accurate result and the like.

column2: MIRROR IMAGE AUXILIARY PARKING DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND WORKING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses a mirror image auxiliary parking device based on artificial intelligence and a working method thereof. The mirror image auxiliary parking device based on the artificial intelligence comprises a bearing wall, a mirror image auxiliary mechanism and a control mechanism. The control mechanism comprises a processor, a driving device and a positioning device. The positioning device is used for acquiring position information of the bearing wall. The bearing wall is installed at the front side or the rear side of a parking spot. The bearing wall comprises a rectangular storagetank and a camera device. The camera device is used for shooting a movement situation of a vehicle in the parking spot. The mirror image auxiliary mechanism is started while the vehicle enters and exits the parking spot. The mirror image auxiliary mechanism comprises a convex mirror, a rotating device, a protecting cover, a laser range finder and a warning device. The convex mirror is installed inthe rectangular storage tank, and fixed to the bearing wall through the rotating device. The convex mirror comprises a display. The rotating device is installed at two sides of the convex mirror. Therotating device controls the convex mirror to rotate by 180 degrees. The protecting cover is installed at the outer side of the convex mirror. The laser range finder is used for detecting a distancevalue between the vehicle and the convex mirror. The warning device is used for outputting warning sound to the outside.

column2: CLOUD BIG DATA-BASED INTELLIGENT SMART CARE SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to a cloud big data-based intelligent smart care system for prevention and treatment of dementia, which comprises: a biometric information recognizer (10) recognizing user prime;s biometric information and transmitting the biometric information to the set-top box in a Bluetooth manner; the set-top box (20) including a body information extracting unit (21) for collecting behavior and voice information of the user, a transmitting unit (22) for receiving information transmitted from the biometric information recognizer (10) and information transmitted from a cloud server (30), and transmitting the collected biometric and body information of the user to a cloud, and a connecting unit (23) for transmitting an exercise program transmitted from the cloud server (30) to a TV screen through an HDMI; a cloud server (30) including a speech impairment program, a behavior pattern program, an artificial intelligence program, and an exercise program, analyzing the user prime;s biometric information and body information transmitted from the set-top box (20), continuously storing the information in a user database (DB), diagnosing a dementia stage of the user, and transmitting an exercise program corresponding to each dementia stage to the set-top box (20); and a display unit (40) outputting, on a screen, a dementia diagnosis result and an exercise program transmitted from the cloud server (30) to the set-top box (20). COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: CHARGING PILE RUNNING STATE MANAGEMENT METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to a charging pile running state management method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: assembling equipment, distributing a communicationaddress, compiling a data acquisition strategy, acquiring charging pile information, and expanding and updating a system. According to the charging pile running state management method based on the artificial intelligence provided by the invention, on one hand, the requirements of centralized management and operation of various types of charging piles can be effectively met, and the operation flexibility and reliability are high; and on the other hand, the efficiency, convenience and flexibility of remote charging operation management work of the charging piles can be effectively improved, theoperation data communication capability is good, the operation automation degree and the intelligent degree are high, and the reliability of the supervision operation can be effectively improved andthe labor intensity and cost of the management operation can be greatly reduced; and meanwhile, the running state of the charging piles can be monitored effectively and comprehensively, remote supervision is carried out on the charging piles, and the defects of running with faults and the like of the charging piles are effectively avoided, therefore the reliability and safety of operation of charging pile equipment are greatly improved.

column2: APPLICATION CONTROL METHOD AND MOBILE TERMINAL
column4: An application control method and a mobile terminal are provided. The method is applicable to a mobile terminal including a processor and an artificial intelligence (AI) module. Whether a current user is a registered user is detected by the processor when detecting that an application running on the mobile terminal belongs to a preset application set. A monitoring instruction carrying an identification of the running application is sent to the AI module by the processor when detecting that the current user is the registered user. A monitoring strategy of the running application associated with the registered user is acquired by the AI module, where the monitoring strategy includes a monitoring parameter and a corresponding monitoring parameter threshold. The running application is closed by the AI module when detecting that a value of the monitoring parameter of the running application is greater than or equal to the monitoring parameter threshold.

column2: APPLICATION CONTROL METHOD AND MOBILE TERMINAL
column4: An application control method and a mobile terminal are provided. The method is applicable to a mobile terminal including a processor and an artificial intelligence (AI) module. Whether a current user is a registered user is detected by the processor when detecting that an application running on the mobile terminal belongs to a preset application set. A monitoring instruction carrying an identification of the running application is sent to the AI module by the processor when detecting that the current user is the registered user. A monitoring strategy of the running application associated with the registered user is acquired by the AI module, where the monitoring strategy includes a monitoring parameter and a corresponding monitoring parameter threshold. The running application is closed by the AI module when detecting that a value of the monitoring parameter of the running application is greater than or equal to the monitoring parameter threshold.

column4: An application control method and a mobile terminal are provided. The method is applicable to a mobile terminal including a processor and an artificial intelligence (AI) module. Whether a current user is a registered user is detected by the processor when detecting that an application running on the mobile terminal belongs to a preset application set. A monitoring instruction carrying an identification of the running application is sent to the AI module by the processor when detecting that the current user is the registered user. The running application is closed by the AI module when detecting that a value of the monitoring parameter of the running application is greater than or equal to the monitoring parameter threshold.

column4: An application control method and a mobile terminal are provided. The method is applicable to a mobile terminal including a processor and an artificial intelligence (AI) module. Whether a current user is a registered user is detected by the processor when detecting that an application running on the mobile terminal belongs to a preset application set. A monitoring instruction carrying an identification of the running application is sent to the AI module by the processor when detecting that the current user is the registered user. The running application is closed by the AI module when detecting that a value of the monitoring parameter of the running application is greater than or equal to the monitoring parameter threshold.

column2: USER EXPERIENCE DEVICE USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The present invention provides a device for delivering the same effect which is directly placed in an image watched by a user. A user experience device comprises: a box including a side wall forming front and rear sides and left and right sides and an upper wall closing an upper side, in order to provide a space for the user to act on; a walking assistant means composed on a lower side in the box, and allowing the user to take walking or running action; one or more displays displaying a virtual reality image; a control part analyzing the virtual reality image displayed on the one or more displays, and determining an environment corresponding to the virtual reality image; and an internal environment adjusting means adjusting an environment in the box so as to correspond to the environment determined by the control part. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTERNET-OF-VEHICLES SYSTEM AND BUILDING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses an artificial internet-of-vehicles system and a building method thereof. The system comprises multiple artificial intelligence bodies and computational experiment modules; eachartificial intelligence body corresponds to one impact factor in an actual internet-of-vehicles system; attributes of the artificial intelligence bodies comprise initial state parameters and behaviorrules, and the initial state parameters and the behavior rules are matched with feature attributes of the impact factors; the artificial intelligence bodies randomly run within a behavior rule rangeon the basis of the initial state parameters, and simulation behavior features emerge; the computational experiment modules are matched with a running system of the actual internet-of-vehicles system,and conduct computing according to the simulation behavior features emerging from all the artificial intelligence bodies to obtain an experiment result. Compared with the prior art, the artificial internet-of-vehicles system can more accurately simulate and predict the state of the internet-of-vehicles system, and thus more accurate data support is provided for studying, controlling and optimizing the internet-of-vehicles system.

column2: DOUBLE-CAMERA MODULE CORRECTING DEVICE AND CORRECTING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses a double-camera module correcting device, and belongs to the technical field of a camera assembly. The double-camera module correcting device mainly solves the problems that the treatment cost of the existing processing device is increased; the labor restoration is used; the product error increase can be caused; the work intensity of personnel can be restored. The double-camera module correcting device is characterized by comprising a feeding box, a left upright post, a right upright post and a shooting unit, wherein the left upright post and the right uptight post arerespectively arranged at the left and right sides of the feeding box; the left upright post is fixedly welded with the support seat; the feeding box is fixedly arranged on the support seat through screw bolts; a shooting unit is arranged in the feeding box; a first conveying belt is arranged under the shooting unit; the first conveying belt is used for conveying the double-camera module; the shooting unit is a digital camera. The fast and accurate correction on the dimension height of the double-camera module can be realized; the qualification rate of the corrected product can be ensured.

column2: METHOD FOR IDENTIFYING OBJECT AND DEVICE THEREOF
column4: The present disclosure relates to an artificial intelligence (AI) system, which simulates functions such as recognition, determination, etc. of a human brain by utilizing a machine learning algorithm such as deep running and the like and an application thereof. According to the present invention, a method for identifying an object by a device comprises the steps of: obtaining an image including an object; extracting attribute information on the object from the image using a plurality of layers included in a network for determining a category of the object; combining the attribute information on the object extracted from at least a part of the layers using at least one characteristic extraction layer to obtain characteristic information representing the object; identifying the object on the basis of a result of comparing the obtained characteristic information with characteristic information on each of a plurality of pre-stored object images; and setting at least one parameter of the characteristic extraction layer in accordance with a learning result on the basis of a database including a plurality of images. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2019

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE WINDING MECHANISM USING
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence winding mechanism, which comprises a box body, wherein a large cavity with an upward opening is fixedly arranged in the box body, and the left and right end walls of the large cavity are fixedly provided with fixing rods; the outer surface of the fixing rod is slidably provided with a pushing block, and the pushing block is internally and fixedlyprovided wit a working cavity with an upward opening; the left and right end walls of the working cavity are rotatably provided with symmetric side rods, and an upper side synchronous wheel is fixedlyarranged on the outer surface of the side rod; the outer surface of the side rod is in slide fit and connection with a pushing plate, and the outer surface of the pushing plate is rotatably providedwith a threaded block; a threaded cavity with an opening towards the working cavity is fixedly arranged in the threaded block, and the left end wall of the working cavity is fixedly provided with a rotating motor; the rotating motor is in running fit and connection with the right end wall of the working cavity. The artificial intelligence winding mechanism disclosed by the invention has simple structure and convenient use, and the device adopts an adjustable clamping method and an automatic winding range converting working mode to achieve the variety of winding methods, thereby effectively improving the winding quality and efficiency of the device.

column2: ACCURATE DIGITAL INDICATOR READING DETECTION METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an accurate digital indicator reading detection method in the technical field of mode recognition and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps of: (1)data obtaining: shooting an instrument image which comprises a reading area by adoption of a camera device; (2) data processing: manually annotating an instrument reading value and carrying out randomrotation, stretching and translation transformation on the instrument image; (3) deep network model construction and training: inputting the instrument image and corresponding annotation data into adeep network model to carry out training; and (4) instrument reading detection: inputting the instrument image and returning a standard instrument reading image by a system. The method is capable of overcoming deficiencies of existing instrument reading extraction methods, sufficiently utilizing parameter learning ability of the deep network model, and accurately detecting digital indicator readings through distribution of learning data samples on the basis of adversarial learning ability of the deep network model and physical meaning of backpropagation residuals, has the characteristics of being strong in practicability and high in correctness, and has a relatively good practical value.

column2: IMMERSIVE VIRTUAL REALITY DISASTER SURVIVAL RESCUE OPTIMAL PATH SELECTION SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to an immersive virtual reality disaster survival rescue optimal path selection system, comprising a positioning and tracking unit, a negative factor unit, a scene model unit, apath node unit, an artificial intelligence unit, a voice unit, a database unit, a network unit and a three-dimensional engine unit. The selection system is equipped with a training platform. The training platform comprises an accident scene selection module and a function module. The function module comprises a theoretical part and a practical part. The theoretical part comprises a perception andcognition module and a teaching module. The practical part comprises a simulation exercise module and an examination module. According to the system, a virtual reality technology and artificial intelligence are combined to simulate a real disaster scene; through utilization of an immersive virtual reality technology, a participant is enabled to feel a tension atmosphere of a disaster site; and escape training is carried out on a student through utilization of the perception and cognition module, the teaching module, the simulation exercise module and the examination module, so survival probability of people on the site when a disaster occurs is improved.

column2: WORKING METHOD OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AIR CONDITIONING SYSTEM BASED ON TIME SIMULATION
column4: The invention relates to a working method of an artificial intelligence air conditioning system based on time simulation. The working method comprises the following steps that the control module controls the air conditioner to work; the first time module timings the travel time of the user; the positioning module is used for positioning the position of the user; the first time module is used for timing the travel time of the user and the residence time of the user; the second time module is used for subtracting the running time from the pre-prepared working time; the second time module is usedfor adding the staying time into the pre-prepared working time; the simulation module is used for simulating the indoor temperature change process according to the real-time pre-prepared working time; the simulation module is used for calculating the ratio of the time exceeding the time according to the time reaching the specified temperature; the calculating module is used for calculating the adjusting amplitude of the working power of the air conditioner according to the time exceeding time; and the control module adjusts the working efficiency of the air conditioner according to the adjusting amplitude.

column2: SLEIGH PULLING ROBOT DOG
column4: The invention discloses a sleigh pulling robot dog. The sleigh pulling robot dog comprises a sleigh, a child, a control switch, a park, a storage battery, a track, a power line I, a power line II, a power line III, a power line IV, a dog I, a dog II, a dog II, a dog IV and a servo motor. The sleigh pulling robot dog has the advantages that the track for sliding of the sleigh pulling robot dog andthe sleigh is paved on the ground of the park by using concave steel; the child sitting on the sleigh turns on a power switch of the storage battery through controlling the control switch so as to supply power to the servo motor in the sleigh and then drive idler wheels at the lower end of the sleigh to run; synchronously, another path of circuit of the storage battery supplies power to micro motors in the dogs I, II, III and IV, so that the micro motors correspondingly drive idler wheels at the lower ends of the four dogs to run; and the sleigh pulling robot dog has positive contribution forpushing the sleigh sport of the country to develop in an artificial intelligence direction, and adds an innovative technology for the field of world entertainment equipment.

column2: IMAGE PROCESSING HIGH DEFINITION ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TAKES PHOTOGRAPH CAMERA BASED ON FACE IDENTIFICATION
