column4: The utility model discloses an image processing high definition artificial intelligence takes photograph camera based on face identification, including safety cover, connecting block and connecting rod, first spring is installed to the inboard of safety cover, and the first spring inboard that is close to the safety cover axis is fixed with the organism, the pulley is installed to the below of organism, and the middle part of organism is provided with the camera, the connecting block is fixed in the top middle part of safety cover, and the top of connecting block is provided with the kelly, there is the coupling bar inside the running through of below of kelly, and installs the second spring above the inside of kelly, the left side of kelly top is run through has first through -hole, and the inside of first through -hole is provided with the push rod, the connecting rod sets up in the top of kelly, and the left side of connecting rod below is run through and is had the second through -hole. This image processing high definition artificial intelligence takes photograph camera based on face identification is provided with the safety cover, can arrange in insidely with taking the photograph camera to carry out diversified dustproof dampproofing the processing to taking the photograph camera.

column2: ARTIFICIAL-INTELLIGENCE-BASED GREENING PRUNING EQUIPMENT AND WORKING METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses artificial-intelligence-based greening pruning equipment and a working method thereof. The artificial-intelligence-based greening pruning equipment comprises a pruning mechanism, a control mechanism and a moving mechanism; the control mechanism comprises a processor, a driving device, a locating device and a navigation device; the locating device is used for acquiring the position information of the pruning mechanism; the navigation device is used for generating a moving route of the pruning mechanism; the pruning mechanism comprises an image pick-up device, a lifting device, a clamping device, electric scissors and a storage box; the image pick-up device is connected with the processor and is used for shooting an ambient environment of the pruning mechanism; the lifting device, the clamping device and the electric scissors are respectively connected with the driving device; the lifting device is set as a hydraulic lifting unit and is used for regulating the vertical heights of the image pick-up device and the electric scissors; the clamping device comprises mechanical arms and mechanical claws and is used for fixing the pruned tree branches and transferringthe pruned tree branches; the electric scissors are used for pruning the tree branches; the storage box is used for storing sundries; and the moving mechanism is arranged below the pruning mechanismand is used for driving the pruning mechanism to move.

column2: OPEN -AIR PATROL MACHINE PEOPLE
column4: The utility model discloses an open -air patrol machine people, include shells assembly, explore the subassembly, warn subassembly and control assembly, shells assembly includes car body casing, stretches and falls post, swivel base, rotation post and survey the shell, stretch fall the post with car body casing fixed connection, and be located car body casing's top, the swivel base with stretch and fall post fixed connection, the utility model discloses being provided with the lift post and rotating the post, conveniently survey 360 degrees nos dead angles on the lamp and survey, set up someone face scanner, conveniently open -air carry out the scanning of people's face to the dangerous person, be provided with alarm system, running into dangerous personnel messenger, can warn through thewarning light, the security personnel can carry out long -range communication through audio controller, the utility model discloses set up the GPS locator, the security personnel can pinpoint dangerous place, the utility model discloses it is simple to use, convenient to carrying out patrol in real time and monitor in the field.

column2: DYNAMIC FAULT DETECTION METHOD FOR ELECTRO-HYDRAULIC EXECUTER ENERGY ACCUMULATOR
column4: The invention discloses a dynamic fault detection method for an electro-hydraulic executer energy accumulator. The dynamic fault detection method comprises the following step that field input signalswhen an intelligent electro-hydraulic executing mechanism is in the work state are collected, and the field input signals include pressure sensor signals, displacement sensor signals, temperature sensor signals, liquid level sensors and motor state signals. The dynamic fault detection method has the beneficial effects that rapid and accurate detection and diagnosis can be conducted on all faults of an EHS intelligent electro-hydraulic executing control system, the automatic control system reliability analysis technology, the fault detection technology and the artificial intelligence knowledgereasoning judgment technology can be comprehensively applied to achieve the fault detection and diagnosis technology only owned by few talented persons originally, a user conveniently knows and graspsthe real-time health condition of the whole system running, and accordingly fault enlarging and disastrous events can be prevented.

column2: THREE-DIMENSIONAL DIGITAL MODELING METHOD BASED ON BALL SCREEN VIDEO STREAM
column4: The invention relates to a three-dimensional digital modeling method based on a ball screen video stream. The method comprises the following steps of S1, holding a ball screen camera to carry out video shooting according to a route required by a user; S2, acquiring a hand-held ball screen camera video stream; S3, automatically extracting a key frame from the video stream; S4, using super-resolution algorithm to increase the image quality of a key frame image; S5, tracking pixel points on the key frame image to obtain dense point cloud; S6, selecting a tracked stable pixel point and using a PnPalgorithm to estimate a camera motion track so as to determine a camera position and an orientation, wherein the stable pixel point is the point in the middle area of the key frame image and the continuous tracking frame number of the stable pixel point is greater than 10 frames; and S7, carrying out three-dimensional modeling according to the dense point cloud obtained in the step S5 and the camera position and the orientation obtained in the step S6. By using the three-dimensional digital modeling method provided in the invention, fixed point shooting is not needed, three-dimensional modelestablishing stability is high and the fluency of a visual effect is high.

column2: VISUAL MULTIDIMENSIONAL KNOWLEDGE MANAGEMENT AND LEARNING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a visual multidimensional knowledge management and learning system. The visual multidimensional knowledge management and learning system comprises knowledge points, a knowledgebase, a learning system, and capability evaluation maps. The knowledge base consists of the knowledge points, dependency relationships exist among the knowledge points, and the dependency relationships are represented by using trees or graphs. Dependency relationships further exist among the plurality of trees and graphs, thus a multidimensional knowledge is formed, and the dependency relationships are visual. Each knowledge point has corresponding multimedia learning content, and real-time multimedia tutoring of a real person or artificial intelligence. In the learning system, a learner specifies the target knowledge point, the system automatically generates a series of evaluation test papers according to an exercise set of knowledge points that the knowledge point depends on, obtains knowledge blind spots of the learner according to evaluation results, begins to push related learning content and exercises orderly from the most basic knowledge blind spot according to the dependency relationships, forms a closed loop of learning, practicing, evaluating and re-learning, improves the learning efficiency in a targeted manner, and replaces the repeated labor of the existing manual knowledge transmission by teachers.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MAKE-UP MIRROR SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence make-up mirror system. The artificial intelligence make-up mirror system comprises an interaction unit, a database unit, a camera shooting unit, a control unit and a display unit. The camera shooting unit is used for acquiring the human head image of a user, the control unit preprocesses head image information, head feature information is acquired, and a 3D head model is set up. Makeup look template information or cosmetic attribute information in the database unit is read and output to be selected by a user, a makeup look model or a cosmeticeffect model is determined based on the choice of the user, the makeup look model or the cosmetic effect model is synthesized with the 3D head model, and a makeup image is obtained and output to the display unit to be displayed. The aims of looking in a mirror, fast switching different makeup looks, seeing the makeup effect and selecting the makeup look and cosmetics suitable for herself are achieved.

column2: GENETIC PROFILE TEST AND RELATED PURCHASE RECOMMENDATIONS VIA AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-ENHANCED CHATBOT
column4: Presented herein are systems and methods that allow a user to interact with an artificial intelligence chatbot in order to automatically identify genetic profile tests of interest to them, as well as recommendations about health and fitness products and/or plans personalized for the user based at least in part on the user's genetic profile test results (e.g., as stored in his/her/their genetic profile). Such recommendations may include, for example, additional diagnostic tests (e.g., additional genetic profile tests, e.g., tests for particular characteristics, traits, diseases, and/or conditions), recommendations of nutritional supplements to purchase, recommendations about specific programs (e.g., meal programs, fitness programs, etc.) that are well-suited for the user, and the like.

column2: METHOD FOR PREDICTING RESIDUAL LIFE OF AXLE BOX
column4: The invention discloses a method for predicting the residual life of an axle box, which comprises the steps of first, collecting an original vibration signal of a test vehicle axle box with the running speed of 70km/h at an ambient temperature of 20 DEG C; second, building an artificial intelligence model based on the least squares support vector machine; third, preprocessing the original vibration signal to obtain a correlation coefficient table; and fourth, inputting the correlation coefficient table into the artificial intelligence model to obtain the residual life of the axle box. According to the method, the artificial intelligence model based on the least squares support vector machine is utilized, the correlation coefficient table is enabled to serve as the input of the artificial intelligence model, and the residual life of the axle box is obtained. The method is simple, and the obtained residual life is high in precision. The method can be applied to the field of residual lifeprediction for functional components.

column2: ALBUM PHOTO DISPLAY SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to an album photo display system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises an album body, a database management system and a control processor, wherein the album body comprises a plurality of photo storage devices, an automatic turning device and a first camera-shooting device, a face recognition panel and a display device are arranged on the external surface ofthe album body, a second camera-shooting device and a photo selection panel are arranged on the surface of the face recognition panel, a user standard face model storage base is arranged inside each photo storage device, the database management system is provided with a third camera-shooting device in a connection mode, a photo automatic printing device, an old photo recognition device and an automatic replacement device are also arranged inside each photo storage device, the album body is also provided with a photo assistant storage device, a data storage base is provided with a video importsystem and an automatic screen capture system in a connection mode, each standard face model storage base is provided with a standard face model comparison system in a connection mode, and an automatic pop-up device is arranged at one end of the album body.

column2: ARTIFICIAL NEURAL NETWORK PROCESSOR FOR INTELLIGENT RECOGNITION
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence camera and an elevator dispatching system. The artificial intelligence camera comprises a camera shooting piece and a processor, wherein the camera shooting piece is used for shooting an external image and/or video; and the processor is used for converting the image and/or video into a face recognition result and performing neural network operationby using the face recognition result as at least part of input data, and an output neuron obtained after operation comprises the number of people in the image and/or video. Through the artificial intelligence camera, the number of people in the shot image and/or video can be analyzed at the camera, and a basis is provided for later analysis without the need for transmitting the video to a background for processing again.

column2: CLOUD DIAGNOSIS AND TREATMENT SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a cloud diagnosis and treatment system provided with a computer diagnosis and treatment network (9). A diagnosis module (1) and a treatment module (2) are connected with the computer diagnosis and treatment network (9) through signal lines. The computer diagnosis and treatment network (9) is connected with an Internet cloud service platform (4). With the characteristics ofbig data, fastness and intelligence, the cloud diagnosis and treatment system brings the revolution of clinical medicine, provides decision support for smart medical treatment, and realizes resource sharing for fine management. The Internet improves a telemedicine coordination mode, breaks a space boundary, and provides medical help for long-distance patients. The Internet of Things helps to improve medical quality supervision, records medical work nodes in real time, tracks the quality of the whole process of diagnosis and treatment, monitors the running status of medical equipment in real time, and manages and supervises the patients. The artificial intelligence, by means of signal quantification and image recognition, greatly improves diagnosis and treatment efficiency and brings a major breakthrough to life sciences.

column2: NETWORK ACCELERATION METHOD, DEVICE AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM BASED ON SDN NETWORK
column4: The invention provides a network acceleration method, device and computer readable storage medium based on the SDN network. The method comprises the following steps: the collected historical data stream is into an AI accelerator in the SDN network to train the deep training model and a first inference model is generated, the first inference model is deployed to the SDN cloud network controller, according to the first inference model, the SDN cloud network controller logically infers the collected data stream in real time and obtains the control inference result, the SN cloud network controllerperforms the control inference result in the SDN network. The above method combines artificial intelligence, realizes the self-optimizing acceleration of SDN network, improves the running speed of SDN network, and reduces the operating cost of SDN network.

column2: COMBINED INTELLIGENT MELON AND FRUIT CHILDREN'S TOY
column4: A combined intelligent melon and fruit children's toy comprises a pumpkin baby, a luffa baby, a left eyebrow, a right eyebrow, a left eye, a right eye, a mouth imitating player, a left palm, a right palm, rollers, luffa stems and an apple teacher. According to the characteristics and requirements of mental growth of children, humanized bionic design is given for melons and fruits such as a luffa,a pumpkin and an apple, the shapes of the pumpkin baby, the luffa baby and the apple teacher are vivid, language dialogue functions are implanted, interaction dialogue and dance of the melons, the fruits and people are realized, strong effects of teaching through lively activities are achieved, the vacancy of Chinese toy markets is filled in, Chinese toy design is promoted to develop towards the field of higher artificial intelligence, and Chinese toys are more effectively promoted to move towards international children's toy markets by wisdom in China.

column2: MULTIFUNCTIONAL WATER PURIFIER
column4: The utility model discloses a multifunctional water purifier, including water quality purification system, air purification system, air humidifying system and major control system, water quality purification system sets up at bottom of the body, and its pure water tank's top is equipped with the water intaking system, is connected with the intake pipe in the water intaking system, and pure water tank's bottom is connected with the inlet tube, neighbour's side that air purification system set up at water quality purification system is equipped with an air intake and two air outlets on its air handling box body, is equipped with the air humidifying system on one of them air outlet, and the water box of air humidifying system passes through pipeline and pure water tank intercommunication, major control system sets up at the organism top, includes that master control circuit, apparent accuse panel and empty gas detection survey the device, and the power failure way of opening of above -mentioned water quality purification system and air purification, humidification system all is connected through relay switch and master control circuit. It is together integrated with three kinds of functions, guaranteed the quality and the security of drinking water, can realize the regulation and control of function self -adaptation, the artificial intelligence degree is high, and compact structure is reasonable.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATOR SIMULATION SYSTEM AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: According to the present invention, a technical problem to be solved is to provide an artificial intelligence-based key performance indicator simulation system and a method thereof capable of automatically defining a KPI suitable for a company from past data so as to apply a single system regardless of a company prime;s specificity and a method thereof. According to the present invention, a system for simulating a key performance indicator based on an artificial intelligence and a method thereof comprises a past DB for receiving and storing past history data from a basic data collection system (POP, point of production, 11), an integrated production management system (MES, 12), an enterprise resource planning system (ERP, 13) and a supply chain management system (SCM, 14), etc.; a control unit 20 for extracting significant data from the data in the past DB (30) and defining a KPI; a KPI DB (50) for storing the defined KPI; an artificial intelligence module unit (40) for predicting the fitness and achievement of KPI stored in the KPI DB (50) based on learned data; and an application programing interface (API) module unit (70) for displaying the processing result of the artificial intelligence module unit (40) on a display unit (71) so that the user can confirm the processing result and providing the input data of the user inputted through an input unit (72) to the artificial intelligence module unit (40) so as to adjust the KPI. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2018

column2: ACTIVE INTELLIGENT NURSING WHEELCHAIR BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to an active intelligent nursing wheelchair based on artificial intelligence. The active intelligent nursing wheelchair based on the artificial intelligence comprises a wheelchair body, a camera device, a power device and a control device. The camera device is arranged on the wheelchair body and used for collecting an image containing at least the entire head of a user; the power device is disposed on the wheelchair body, connected to a moving component on the wheelchair body and used for controlling the moving speed and direction of the wheelchair body; the control device is separately connected to the camera device and the power device and used for running a program, and the program is configured to perform the following steps of imputing the image captured by a camera, using image recognition for detecting the head pitch angle, head azimuth and head tilt angle of the user, controlling the power device to drive the wheelchair body to move forward or stop according to the head pitch angle, controlling the power device to adjust the moving direction of the wheelchair body according to the head azimuth, and sending an alarm signal to the outside after the headtilt angle exceeds a set alarm threshold vale for a period of time. Compared with the prior art, the active intelligent nursing wheelchair based on the artificial intelligence has the advantages of improving the nursing efficiency, providing convenience for the user to travel independently and the like.

column2: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING MULTIFUNCTIONAL TRUNK BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a method for controlling a multifunctional trunk based on artificial intelligence, the multifunctional trunk comprises a box body, a plurality of rollers are disposed at the bottom of the box body, and a pull rod is disposed on the back of the box body, and the multifunctional trunk further comprises a clean energy power generation system, an unmanned aerial vehicle system,an identity verification system, an electronically-controlled fixture, an electronically-controlled trampoline booster and a main controller. The clean energy power generation system is conducive to improving of energy utilization rate, is more energy-saving, low-carbon and environmentally-friendly. The unmanned aerial vehicle system is arranged on the smart multifunctional trunk, and helps to meet the various needs of self-photographing, aerial photography, road exploration, inspection of dangerous locations and entertainment during the travel of a user; and by design of an unmanned aerial vehicle hangar, needs of storage protection, efficient charging, and clean maintenance can be satisfied. By designing of the electronically-controlled fixture for the smart multifunctional trunk, reliable and stable fixation of the smart multifunctional trunk can be facilitated. The electronically-controlled trampoline booster helps to save physical output of the user going up and down an escalatoror steps.

column2: WIDE INTELLIGENT FACE IDENTIFICATION EQUIPMENT OF APPLICABLE TO THE CROWD WITH CORRECTION FUNCTION
column4: The utility model relates to a wide intelligent face identification equipment of applicable to the crowd with correction function, comprising a base plate, a main bod, the backplate, the roof, correctional agency, compensator constructs and two footboards, be equipped with display screen and first camera in the main part, compensator constructs including the translation subassembly, translation panel, the accent is to subassembly and second camera, the accent includes direction -adjusting rod to the subassembly, a first sprin, first motor, the drum with act as go -between, correctional agencyis including the response subassembly, second motor and two straightening component, this wide intelligent face identification equipment of applicable to the crowd with correction function passes through correctional agency and corrects the head, make people's face just to first camera, guarantee that the facial image deviation of shooing is little, and then the recognition accuracy of equipment has been improved, moreover, construct through compensator and carry out scanning and shooting to the part of sheltering from of picture frame, a people face branch that the first camera of is not gathered is provided, it is complete to make feature data, the face identification of being convenient for, and then the applicable to the crowd scope of this equipment has been enlarged.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE METHOD FOR WRITING MOTION COUPLED DIGITAL SATELLITE POWER SUBSYSTEM SOURCE CODE
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence method for writing a motion coupled digital satellite power subsystem source code, which comprises the following steps: (1) establishing a sample satellite and an environmental knowledge base; (2) establishing a power subsystem source code writing method library; (3) designing a digital satellite power subsystem; (4) according to the digital satellite power subsystem design result and the power subsystem source code writing method library, creating a file and writing functions and variables in the file, or adding functions and variables related to the power subsystem in the existing files. Through the artificial intelligence method in the invention, the digital satellite power subsystem source code is written in a standardized way, which reduces the development difficulty of the digital satellite power subsystem source code, improves the development efficiency, and makes the written digital satellite power subsystem source code closerto the actual satellite running physical process.

column2: HEALTH LEARNING ECOLOGICAL SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of school supplies, and particularly relates to a health learning ecological system based on artificial intelligence. The health learning ecological systemcomprises an intelligent eye protection lamp and an intelligent health posture correcting learning chair, and the intelligent eye protection lamp is placed on a function table; an intelligent mastercontrol processing module is electrically connected with a loudspeaker, a microphone array, a touch display screen, a first camera shooting device, a second camera shooting device, an illuminance measurement sensor and an infrared sensor; the power input interface is electrically connected with a lamp battery module, the lamp battery module supplies power to an intelligent lamp control module, andthe lamp intelligent control module is electrically connected with an LED light source panel, the lamp intelligent control module and an LED light source driving module; and the intelligent master control processing module is electrically connected with the intelligent lamp control module. The health learning ecological system has the beneficial effects that the intelligent eye protection lamp and the intelligent health posture correcting learning chair are intelligently combined, so that the sitting posture of a user can be effectively adjusted, proper learning light brightness can be guaranteed, and the sitting posture of the user is further regulated after the intelligent health learning table is combined.

column2: METHOD, DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM FOR CONTROLLING VEHICLE IN USE
column4: The invention discloses a method, device and storage medium for controlling a vehicle in use, which belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The method includes: an AI vehicle running pictureis obtained, wherein the AI vehicle running picture comprises a picture of the AI vehicle travelling on the track; an AI track image is extracted from an AI vehicle running picture, wherein the AI track image is an image of a road segment at an AI vehicle; the AI track image is input to a travel decision model, the travel decision model is generated according to a sample track image and a sample travel strategy training, the sample track image and the sample travel strategy are extracted from a sample vehicle running picture, and a picture running on the vehicle track which comprises real player control in the operation picture of the sample vehicle; according to the target travel strategy output by the travel decision model, the AI vehicle is controlled. In the embodiment of the application, the travel strategy output by the travel decision model is more consistent with the operation habit of the real player; thereby a more realistic simulation effect is achieved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHIP PROCESSING DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent piloting system, comprising an image photographing device which is used for photographing an image in front of sailing when the sailing is carried out; a targetidentification device which is used for processing the image photographed when the navigation is carried out, comparing the image with a sample library and identifying a barrier type in the image; aninformation processing device which is used for receiving the processed image and the identified barrier type and outputting sailing selection data through neural network operation; and a display device which is used for displaying the sailing selection data output by the information processing device to a user. The system provided by the invention can be applied to the intelligent piloting, the labor cost can be reduced, and the risk in a vehicle sailing process is reduced.

column2: BODY TEMPERATURE MONITORING PANTY -SHAPE DIAPERS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a body temperature monitoring panty -shape diapers based on artificial intelligence, including the panty -shape diapers body, still include body temperature monitoring wareand relay module, an inside main control unit and the wireless module of being equipped with of body temperature monitoring ware, body temperature monitoring ware middle part is equipped with the body temperature monitoring contact that is used for contacting skin, and perception body temperature feeds back to main control unit, main control unit connect temperature sensor, the tablet is connected to temperature sensor's response end, the 2nd wireless module who is equipped with the relay control ware in the relay module and is used for communicating by letter with a wireless module, the 2ndwireless module, pilot lamp, bee calling organ, GSM module are connected to the relay control ware, the body temperature monitoring ware is equipped with the oval -shaped fixed area be fixed in panty-shape diapers through the fixed band on the panty -shape diapers, the fixed band bonds on the fixed area through its marginal nylon adherent buckle. The utility model relates to a simply, convenientto use, the fully provided user's needs, wide application prospect has.

column2: ARTIFICIAL-INTELLIGENCE PRECISE FISHING DEVICE AND WORKING SYSTEM AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention, which relates to the technical field of fishing, discloses an artificial-intelligence precise fishing device and a working system and method thereof. The artificial-intelligence precisefishing device comprises a box body; a channel is arranged in the box body; thresholds are arranged at the two ends of the channel symmetrically; and two electric push rods are arranged at one surface of each threshold vertically. A plurality of lifting lugs are arranged at the other end surface of the box body. Rectangular blocks are welded to jacking ends of each two electric push rods; a crossbar is welded between each two rectangular blocks; and a gate is welded to the side of the cross bar. At least one thermal imager is arranged on the inner wall surface of the box body; and the lifting lugs are connected to an inflation rubber buoy by steel wire ropes. According to the invention, the box body structure with the gates having the automatic opening and closing functions is designed,the channel for fish swimming is formed between the gates and the box body, and the thermal imaging device and monitoring equipment arranged in the channel and a power source and a controller arrangedat the bottom are arranged, so that the precision and efficiency of capturing specific cultured rare fish by cast net fishing in the existing fishing filed are improved.

column2: HUMAN-MACHINE INTERACTIVE TYPE ROAD DETECTION METHOD BASED ON AERIAL SHOOTING IMAGES
column4: The invention discloses a human-machine interactive type road detection method based on aerial shooting images. According to the invention, target identification detection based on unmanned aerial vehicle aerial shooting images is a key field in artificial intelligence research; and in the target identification detection, through the computer vision technology and image processing technology, images are analyzed, processed and understood, so detection and classification of the images are finished. It is a great process to apply the method in road management departments.

column2: PORTRAIT IMAGE SHOOTING METHOD, TERMINAL AND COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a portrait image shooting method based on artificial intelligence, a terminal, and a computer readable storage medium, and belongs to the field of the mobile terminal. The portrait image shooting method is applied to the mobile terminal, and comprises the following steps: acquiring entire information of a shot user, and analyzing the entire information to obtain feature information of the shot user; automatically tracking the shot user, and confirming the shot subject figure according to the feature information of the shot user; acquiring and analyzing multiple previewRAW data through a camera bottom layer, confirming a shooting posture of the shot subject figure according to preset judgment standard; after determining the shooting posture of the shot subject figure, issuing a shooting event by the camera to shoot the portrait image. Through the portrait image shooting method based on artificial intelligence, the terminal, and the computer readable storage medium provided by the invention, the problem that the user cannot easily get into the shooting when needing to intervene to control the mobile terminal in self-timer alone can be solved; the shooting problem is improved, and the user experience is improved.

column2: SHOOTING ANGLE DETERMINING METHOD AND DEVICE, TERMINAL AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The invention discloses a shooting angle determining method and device, a terminal and a readable storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: performing image capture in advance at a current shooting angle, and determining a shooting object and feature information of the shooting object in the captured image; in a pre-stored artificial intelligence AI picture library, searching a reference image which is identical to the shooting object and comprises reference feature information having the highest matching degree with the feature information through a preset AI algorithm; determining whether the matching degree of the feature information with the reference feature information exceeds a preset matching degree; if yes, determining the current shooting angle as a recommended shooting angle, and prompting a user with the information of the recommended shooting angle, so that the user carries out shooting according to the recommended shooting angle. According to the shootingangle determining method and device, the terminal and the readable storage medium in the invention, the terminal can provide a better shooting angle for the user to achieve an ideal imaging effect, thereby meeting the use requirements of the user.

column2: POWER GRID REGULATION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a power grid regulation method and device based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring historic databases of the power grid and the current weather data, wherein the historic databases comprise a historic load database, a historic weather database, a historic power generation plan database, and a historic security measure arrangementdatabase; calling a first neural network, transmitting the historic databases and the current weather data to the first neural network, and computing to obtain a first power generation plan and a first security measure arrangement; calling a second neural network, transmitting the historic power generation database and the first power generation plan to the second neural network, and computing toobtain a second power generation plan; and calling a third neural network, transmitting the historic security measure arrangement database and the first security measure arrangement to the third neural network, computing to obtain a second security measure arrangement. Through the power grid regulation method disclosed by the invention, the accurate power generation plans and the immediate security measure arrangement can be provided according to the historic data and the current data, thereby guaranteeing the stable and safe running of the power grid.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED ELECTRONIC PRODUCT MODELING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides an artificial intelligence-based electronic product modeling system and method. The method comprises the following steps of: receiving a sample model; carryingout simulation running on the sample model to generate a simulation running result; and analyzing the internal relationship between the sample model and the simulation running result to generate an analysis result so as to automatically build an electronic product model conforming to index parameters of a to-be-built model according to the generated analysis result. By means of the system and themethod which are provided by the invention, the electronic product model can be more quickly and more efficiently established and the robustness of electronic product modeling can be increased.

column2: AGENT APPARATUS AND AGENT METHOD
column4: An agent apparatus has an interface configured to obtain fitness data and training instruction data and an artificial intelligence unit configured to provide an artificial coach by analyzing the fitness data and the training instruction data.

column2: METHOD FOR THREE-DIMENSIONAL MODELING LARGE SCENE BY MOBILE TERMINAL AND DOME-SCREEN CAMERA
column4: The invention discloses a method for three-dimensional modeling a large scene by a mobile terminal and a dome-screen camera. Included are a mobile terminal and a dome-screen camera in communication connection with the mobile terminal. The method comprises the following steps: shooting the video stream of a current location point through a mobile terminal camera; locating the mobile terminal by theobtained video stream of the current location point, that is, obtaining location information of any current location; triggering the dome-screen camera to take a photo; and performing three-dimensional modeling based on a sparse point cloud. The method has the advantages that locating is more accurate by using the mobile terminal, and no distortion occurs when the SLAM is located; the energy consumption of the dome-screen camera is saved to the utmost extent; and the three-dimensional modeling scene is more accurate.

column2: AUTOMATIC PAYMENT CASH REGISTER BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IDENTIFICATION ALLERGEN, AND USE METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an automatic payment cash register based on an artificial intelligence identification allergen. The automatic payment cash register comprises an automatic payment money collection device, a member allergen query server and a face identification medical care server, wherein the automatic payment money collection device is used for transmitting to a barcode scanning device and a weighing device to calculate price when a commodity is put in a conveyor belt, and is used for reading customer member information and obtaining customer identity information, health query authorization information and payment information; the member allergen query server is used for inquiring the allergen information of the customer from a social security server, a novel rural cooperative medical service query country and an electronic medical record server according to the customer identity information and the health query authorization information; the face identification medical care server is used for shooting the appearance of the customer, carrying out medical image identification on the appearance of the customer and judging possible diseases; and the face identification medical care server adopts medical image identification based on a convolutional neural network, and a learning way is mass data plug deep learning.

column2: HIGH-EFFICIENCY RADIATION DEVICE FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE COMPUTER HOST CASE
column4: The invention discloses a high-efficiency radiation device for an artificial intelligence computer host case. The high-efficiency radiation device comprises a machine body, wherein a suction fan and afirst air blower are respectively embedded at the left side and the right side of the machine body, a flow diving pipe is arranged in the machine body, the right side of the flow dividing pipe is fixedly connected with an inner wall of the right side of the machine body, an air inlet corresponding to the first air blower is arranged in the right side of the flow dividing pipe, a plurality of airoutlets are arranged in the left side of the flow dividing pipe, a water pipe is arranged in the machine body, the top of the water pipe penetrates through the top of the machine body and extends outwards, the left side of the water pipe is fixedly communicated with a second air blower, the bottom of the second air blower is fixedly connected with the top of the machine body, a rotating motor is fixedly connected to the right side of the water pipe, the bottom of the rotating motor is fixedly connected with the top of the machine body, and the bottom of the machine body is fixedly connected with the upper surface of a horizontal part of a U-shaped supporting seat. The high-efficiency radiation device disclosed by the invention has convenience in use, can conveniently radiate the computer host case and meanwhile can conveniently fix the computer host case.

column2: CHILDREN PICTURE BOOK AUXILIARY READING METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a children picture book auxiliary reading method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps that: shooting book page images by page, manufacturing a book page image template, and storing book page image characteristics; through a camera, shooting book page images, extracting the texture characteristics of the book page images, matching with the template, and judging a book page number; according to the book page number, loading touch and talk resources on a current page, wherein the touch and talk resources comprise figures in the picturebook and corresponding audio stories and question answering resources; detecting the key image frame of a dynamic gesture, and abandoning a fuzzy and unclear gesture image frame; through the camera,shooting a video frame image, detecting the touch and talk resources to which a child points with a finger, and playing the story of the corresponding figure; entering a voice question answering, matching questions in a knowledge library according to the contents of a currant page, and actively carrying out a conversion with the child.

column2: SPORTS TALENT INNOVATION AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP SHARING ECONOMY PLATFORM BASED ON A HEALTH INTERNET OF THINGS
column4: The invention discloses a sports talent innovation and entrepreneurship sharing economy platform based on a health Internet of things. The platform comprises a sports health entrepreneurship ecological sharing platform which is used by a sharing platform user to share a scenario and use and share data by a sharing entrepreneurship mode. The sports health entrepreneurship ecological sharing platform includes the core technology of the sharing platform and the ecological resources of the sharing platform. The core technology of the sharing platform include human detection, evaluation, exercise prescription generation, prescription execution, effect monitoring, and exercise prescription re-optimization health Internet of Things, big data and artificial intelligence closed loop technology.

column2: MULTI-FUNCTIONAL LUGGAGE CASE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The embodiment of the invention provides a multi-functional luggage case based on artificial intelligence. The multi-functional luggage case comprises a case body, a plurality of rolling wheels arranged at the bottom of the case body, a pulling rod arranged on the back part of the case body, and further comprises a clean energy power generating system, an unmanned aerial vehicle system, an identification verifying system, an electric control fixing device, an electric control trampoline power assisting device and a main controller. The clean energy power generating system is beneficial to improve the energy utilization rate, and can further achieve energy conservation, low carbon and environmental protection. By arranging the unmanned aerial vehicle system on the intelligent luggage case,the various kinds of demands such as selfie, aerial photographing, road exploration, dangerous section checking and entertainment of a user in travel can be satisfied advantageously. The design of anunmanned aerial vehicle hangar meets the requirements for storing, protecting, efficient charging and cleaning and maintaining an unmanned aerial vehicle. By designing the electric control fixing device for the intelligent luggage case, reliable and stable fixing of the intelligent luggage case can be achieved advantageously. The electric control trampoline power assisting device is beneficial tosave physical output when the user steps on and off an escalator or steps.

column2: FIRE-FIGHTING AR HELMET AND POLICE AR GLASSES BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGE RECOGNITION, AND APPLICATION THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses a fire-fighting AR helmet and police AR glasses based on artificial intelligence image recognition, and application thereof. By integrating a 3d image modeling algorithm and adeep learning AI image recognition algorithm into the fire-fighting helmet and the glasses in AR field, photos and videos with large-capacity are not needed to be uploaded to a server for processing so as to realize efficient, fast and low-power consumption identification of the images at a local equipment, for the fire-fighting field, the equipment helps firefighters quickly locate the source ofthe fire and the injured in a smoke-filled fire site, avoid obstacles and find escape exits. The hand-held shooting equipment is not required, hands are released for extinguishing or rescuing, precious time is saved, the fire extinguishing and people rescuing efficiency is greatly improved, and the safety coefficient of the firefighters is also improved; for the police field, a police officer directly identifies a license plate number or a human face through the depth learning artificial intelligence image recognition algorithm when patrolling, and does not need to manually enter or take pictures so as to realize quick identification of problem vehicles and suspicious characters.

column2: INTELLIGENT SELF-SERVICE CABINET
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of self-service and discloses an intelligent self-service cabinet. The intelligent self-service cabinet comprises a cabinet body, a cabinet door, at leastone vending unit and cameras, wherein each vending unit is arranged in the cabinet body and comprises at least one goods shelf and one taking opening; the cameras are arranged at the taking openings and used for shooting information of to-be-sold goods on the goods shelves; each goods shelf comprises an information shooting area which is used for exposing partial surfaces of the to-be-sold goods.According to the intelligent self-service cabinet, the to-be-sold goods in the goods shelves are recognized by artificial intelligence, the vending speed is high, space utilization rate of the cabinetis high, a customer can select the goods freely, and grab-and-go is realized truly.

column2: EFFLUENT BOD SOFT MEASUREMENT METHOD BASED ON SELF-ORGANIZATION RBF NEURAL NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses an effluent BOD soft measurement method based on a self-organization RBF neural network and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method is directly applied to the field of sewage disposal. In order to solve the problems that effluent BOD in the current sewage disposal process cannot be obtained in real time, the manufacturing price of instruments and equipment is high, and the accuracy of a measurement result is low, the effluent BOD soft measurement method based on the self-organization RBF neural network includes the steps of adopting an approach basedon interaction information for extracting effluent BOD feature parameters as input variables of a soft measurement model; designing a self-organization RBF neural network based on error correction-sensitivity analysis and using an improved Levenberg-Marquardt (LM) algorithm for training the network to increase the training speed. It is indicated by a result that the structure of the soft measurement model is compact, the effluent BOD concentration of sewage disposal can be predicted quickly and accurately, and a theoretical support and a technical guarantee are provided for safe and stable running of a sewage disposal process.

column2: AI PARAMETER CONFIGURATION METHOD, DEVICE, EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM FOR RACING AI MODEL
column4: The invention discloses an AI parameter configuration method, device, equipment and storage medium for a racing AI model, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises thesteps that an nth-generation parameter set is obtained, the parameter set in each generation contains m sets of AI parameters used for indicating the movement mode of an automobile race AI model, wherein n is larger than or equal to 1, and m is larger than or equal to 2; the automobile race AI model is controlled to perform adaptation degree test for m times according to the m sets of the AI parameters to obtain m adaptation degrees, wherein according to the movement distance of the AI parameter on a racing track, the adaptation degrees are positively correlated with the automobile race AI model; if the m adaptation degrees are all less than an adaptation threshold, an n+1th-geneartion parameter set is generated according to the nth-generation parameter set; if a target adaptation degree larger than the adaptation threshold exists in the m adaptation degrees, the AI parameter corresponding to the target adaptation degree is configured as a target AI parameter. The AI parameter configuration method, device, equipment and storage medium for the racing AI model has the advantages that the embodiment adopts a genetic algorithm to achieve the automatic adjustment of AI parameters, so that the efficiency of adjustment and configuration of the AI parameters is improved.

column2: COMPUTER NETWORK MODELING
column4: Disclosed is a computer-based method for automatically detecting characteristics of a computer system that includes different running computers connected by a digital communication network. The method includes receiving machine-readable information about the computers, including information services and software, and building and storing a machine-readable model based on the received information. The model can be a stratified machine-readable model of the software, services, and further computer aspects. The method can also include updating the model and responding to user commands to access both stored and updated models, and/or displaying tagged and/or filtered visual representations of the model to the user. A learning method can be applied to the network using the machine-readable model, with the applying accessing artificial intelligence tags for the model, and associating artificial intelligence tags to elements of the model based on the application of the learning model to the network.

column2: COMPUTER IMPLEMENTED PLATFORM FOR THE CREATION OF A VIRTUAL PRODUCT
column4: A computer implemented platform to create and display a virtual product to be manufactured and/or assembled includes: a database storing variations of components that define variants of the virtual product and data on mechanical coupling of all component variations; a hardware infrastructure storing and running artificial intelligence that selects, suggests, and displays optimal variations among a plurality of variations stored in the database, and a software module creating the variable virtual product, wherein, starting from an initial version, the user can interactively and cyclically choose one or more of the variations selected and suggested by the artificial intelligence and displayed on a graphical user interface, until reaching an acceptable final version to be realized by the manufacturing and/or assembly process; and an interface for interacting with, monitoring and controlling the artificial intelligence and software module and that includes and electronic visual display and input pointing device for control and management.

column2: SPEED LIMIT ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VARIABLE SYSTEM
column4: The present invention relates to a speed limit artificial intelligence variable system. More specifically, a speed limit artificial intelligence variable system installs a vehicle speed recognition sensor at every predetermined section of a road, calculates a number and a time of vehicles passing through each section and varies a speed limit appropriate for a speed limit display device. Also, the present invention transmits the speed limit and data varied through a wired/wireless network to a central management server monitoring a road situation while warning speeding. The central management server (300) receives and processes the varied speed limit data to generate a message, and transmits the data to a safety manager monitoring the road situation, a terminal of a road patrol vehicle or a portable computer. Therefore, the safety manager or the road patrol vehicle can check the road situation in real time. The speed limit artificial intelligence variable system comprises: a transmitting device including a buffer part, a memory part, a timer part, a first MICOM, and an output part; and a relay device including a second MICOM, an RF part, the display device, and a communication part. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2018

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENT SQUARE DANCE FOCUSING SOUND SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligent square dance focusing sound system and method. Sound equipment in the system receives a starting instruction of a mobile terminal, controls a camera toshoot a square dance region, and processes the shot picture so as to obtain a sound signal, and the sound signal is transmitted to a sound generator; the sound generator converts the sound signal into divergent sound energy to outwardly propagate; an acoustic lens diverges the divergent sound energy to the external of the sound equipment, or converges the sound energy transmitted by the external;the sound equipment comprises high-pitched sound equipment located above the center location of the square dance region, and mega bass sound equipment uniformly arranged on the edge of the square dance region; the high-pitched sound equipment is located above the square dance region, and the high pitch is downward and cannot transmit to all directions; and the mega bass sound equipment can re-converge the diverged sound energy into the square dance region, the situation that the noise is propagated to all directions is reduced, and the lives and the reset of the residents at the place out ofthe park and the community activity cannot be influenced.

column2: METHOD FOR COLLECTION AND ANALYSIS OF TONGUE IMAGE FACE THROUGH INTELLIGENT DEVICE BASED ON INTERNET OF THINGS
column4: The present invention discloses a method for collection and analysis of a tongue image face through an intelligent device based on the internet of things. The method comprises the steps of: employingan intelligent device with built-in artificial intelligence model and algorithm to collect physical fitness test person's tongue images and face data; inputting collected tongue images and face data to automatically identify corresponding symptoms; outputting the data to a front end to timely display the data to the physical fitness test person; allowing the intelligent device to connect with theinternet of things to transmit data to cloud; allowing the cloud to employ a big data storage mode to store the data; and automatically marking symptom marks identified by the device onto the storagedata to allow background managers to check the symptom marks and allow doctors to check whether the symptoms identified by the devices are correct or not, and if not, manually marking symptom marks tocorrect the identification errors of the device. On the basis of establishing a lot of experience data, a mode of normally extracting image features and processing image features is employed withoutdepending on single doctor's experience and a identification mode of a single doctor so as to improve the whole efficiency and the identification accuracy.

column2: MODULAR WALL-CLIMBING ROBOT
column4: The invention provides a modular wall-climbing robot, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The modular wall-climbing robot comprises four functional modules, namely, a foot type vacuumchuck framework (1), a magnet adsorbing type wheel set (2), a vision system (3) and a chassis (4), wherein the four functional modules can be combined in different modes to form the wall-climbing robot with different functions. Compared with the prior art, the modular wall-climbing robot has the advantages that different modules of the modular wall-climbing robot in actual work are freely combined based on the actual condition of a pipeline system; a foot type vacuum chuck adsorbing mode and a wheel type electromagnetic adsorbing mode are provided, so that the modular wall-climbing robot is applicable to the surfaces of various different materials; and the flexibility and the stability are improved.

column2: METHOD FOR GENERATING EXERCISE PRESCRIPTION BY COLLECTING EXERCISE HEALTH DATA
column4: The invention discloses a method for generating an exercise prescription by collecting exercise health data. A built-in artificial intelligence model and an algorithmic intelligent device collect individual physical test data; the collected physical test data is classified automatically and used to analyze the physique automatically and generate a customized exercise prescription; the customized exercise prescription is output in the front end and displayed for a physical testee timely, and the physical testee makes exercise in shared treadmill according to the exercise prescription; the intelligent device is connected to the Internet of Things, and transmits physical test and exercise data to the cloud end; the cloud end stores the data in a big data storage manner; and the physical testis marked with an exercise prescription mark generated by the device, a background management staff can check the exercise prescription mark and determine whether the prescription generated by the device is correct, and if NO, the exercise prescription mark can be adjusted manually, and an error of the device is corrected. The method can be used to generate customized scientific exercise prescriptions with slight difference by analyzing and quantifying slight physical difference among different physical testees.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MANDARIN EXERCISE EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence mandarin exercise equipment, including central processing unit, central processing unit's input is connected with voice processing module's output electricity, voice processing module's input is connected with the output of speech perception module electricity, the output of speech perception module still is connected with cache module's inputelectricity, cache module's output is connected with central processing unit's input electricity, central processing unit is connected with the two -way electricity of database, central processing unit's input is connected with power module's output end electricity. The utility model discloses a set up pronunciation contrast module and feedback module no. 1, the pronunciation that the messenger people were typeeed contrast with the dialect of various places fast to confirm the dialect kind that the user said, thereby make equipment application scope wide, can use and use the crowd in vast different dialects.

column2: ROBOT MOVEMENT METHOD AND ROBOT
column4: The invention relates to the field of robots, in particular to a robot movement method and a robot. The method comprises the steps that movement locus information of a badminton in the air is obtainedthrough a locus obtaining assembly and is sent to the robot, a robot position acquisition assembly acquires first position information of a robot chassis, second position information sent by other robots is received, the first position information and the second position information are sent to a control assembly, the control assembly predicts a falling point of the badminton according to the movement locus information, the robot chassis is controlled to kept static or move in the position range where the falling point of the badminton is located in a predetermined site according to the falling point of the badminton, the first position information and the second position information, and a racket control assembly is controlled to move on the robot chassis so as to achieve badminton receiving or serving when the robot chassis moves to the position range where the falling point of the badminton is located and stops moving. The robot effectively performs badminton doubles by adopting the method.

column2: AUXILIARY VEHICLE BRAKING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides an auxiliary vehicle braking system based on artificial intelligence. The auxiliary vehicle braking system comprises a signal acquisition module, a central control unit, a cloudserver, a braking mechanism driving module and vacuum braking mechanisms, wherein the central control unit, the cloud server, the braking mechanism driving module and the vacuum braking mechanism arearranged in a vehicle. The cloud server uses vehicle state information obtained before and after each time of auxiliary braking as input values to be input into an auxiliary braking depth-learning neural network and uses an auxiliary braking strategy, an auxiliary braking adjustment instruction and a tire pressure adjusting strategy as output values to learn the auxiliary braking depth-learning neural network. The braking strategy is generated by analyzing running vehicle state signals, the braking mechanism driving module is driven to drive the vacuum braking mechanisms to run according to the braking strategy, the vacuum braking mechanisms are arranged on an automotive chassis and are in contact with the road surface, and vacuum environments are formed at the contact parts. The system can cooperate with an automobile main braking system, a braking distance is remarkably decreased, and the braking stability and safety of a running vehicle are improved.

column2: SMART RAILWAY COMPREHENSIVE TRANSPORTATION JUNCTION INTEGRATED CONTROL SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a smart railway comprehensive transportation junction integrated control system comprising a central control module, a real-time control module, a comprehensive data monitoringmodule, an energy monitoring and energy-saving control module, a comprehensive running information module, a pre-warning and pre-planning module, a comprehensive scheduling module, a passenger service control module and a task and operation module, The system provided by the invention has the advantages that the comprehensive transportation junction is built to be a smart management control system which has high artificial intelligence, and is high integrated, efficient and convenient.

column2: SYSTEM FOR ADAPTIVE GUIDED AMPHIBIAN ROWING (SAGAR)
column4: The primary problem with amphibious aircraft is its performance degrading due to the adaptation for water operations. The conventional design of amphibious aircraft which include hull, floats, hydrofoil, sponsons, pontoons etc. will negatively impact the aerodynamic characteristics of the aircraft and also have stability issues, problems due to loading of wave slap, and problems with operation from sea other than calm state. This indicates a strong need of an innovative approach while adapting the aircraft for land and water operations.Hydrodynamic stability of ships and seaplanes or flying boat or amphibious aircraft depend on Weight (in air and water), Geometry, Centre of Gravity, Centre of Buoyancy, Metacentre and the restoring moment created thereby when disturbed from rest. Conventionally this is addressed by floats suitably sized and located along with the hull or the fuselage. While the floats are a proven way of handling the operations in water, the associated penalties in terms of weight, drag etc. are the areas wherein improvements can still be made. Without compromising the flying characteristics of a proven aircraft, meeting the requirements of operations in and out of water is challenging for the amphibious aircraft design. The amphibious aircraft needs to takeoff, land and dock in still and moving water bodies like sea, lakes, rivers etc. where the characteristics of the water body plays major role in the dynamics of the amphibian. Keeping these key aspects of operational requirements, the conceptual invention of a System for Adaptive Guided Amphibian Rowing (SAGAR), helps the amphibious aircraft to maintain its stability, augment its controllability and handling when in water. The concept uses a feedback controller which works on Artificial Intelligence technique such as Artificial Neural Network based adaptive reconfigurable control system taking into consideration of various parameters such as speed, sea state, wave height, etc. to manoeuvre the seaplane with adequate safety for passengers and freight. This system drives a retractable Rowing or paddle mechanism with actuators and associated sensors and will be located within the fuselage. The requirement of float or sponsons or pontoons is avoided by utilizing the benefits offered by SAGAR. This ensures that aerodynamic characteristics of the aircraft are not affected much due to the adaptation for water operations. The SAGAR mechanism offers a scheme in order to improve hydrostatic stability, hydrodynamic stability, water performance, wave performance and also aerodynamic performance of the aircraft. The retractable/ rowing control surfaces of the SAGAR can aid in additional lift generation which would be beneficial to enhance STOL (short take-off and landing) performance of the aircraft on water as well as for land based applications. The SAGAR can be used in amphibious aircraft or seaplane or flying boat for optimum performance on water, land based runway, and in air. This concept can also be used in ships for enhanced water performance under different sea state conditions.

column2: FISH ROBOT
column4: Provided herein is a fish robot. The fish robot includes a head unit corresponding to head portion of a fish; a driving unit coupled to the head unit to generate driving force by sinusoidal swimming movement; a waterproof cover coupled to the head unit with elasticity in which the driving unit being inserted to be sealed; and a body unit coupled to the head unit with elasticity corresponding to body portion of the fish in which the waterproof cover being inserted to be supported.

column2: PRIMARY HEADACHE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DIAGNOSIS AND DIFFERENTIAL DIAGNOSIS SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to a primary headache artificial intelligence diagnosis and differential diagnosis system comprising a patient information collection unit, a medical record automatic generationunit and a headache intelligent diagnosis unit. The patient information collection unit is used for collection of patient information. The patient information comprises one or more items of a course of headache, a form of the headache, a nature of the headache, duration of the headache, a location of the headache, severity of the headache, presence or absence of aura, duration of the aura, duration of the aura before the headache occurs, and presence or absence of dizziness and vertigo during the headache; presence or absence of fear of sound and photophobia; presence or absence of nausea andvomiting; presence or absence of lacrimation, bulbar conjunctiva hyperremia, and running nose; medical history, and presence or absence of history of use of painkillers; the medical record automatic generation unit is used for automatically generating standard clinic medical records of patients according to the information collected via the patient information collection unit. The headache intelligent diagnosis unit is used for quantifying the collected information into a machine language and comparing all kinds of primary headache types one by one, and final diagnosis and treatment principlesuggestions are generated according to comparison logic.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DEVELOPMENT PLATFORM AND SYSTEM
column4: An embodiment of the invention discloses an artificial intelligence development platform and system. The artificial intelligence development platform comprises a user terminal, a controller module anda hardware equipment module, wherein the user terminal is connected with the controller module and is used for transmitting a first control command to the controller module by running an artificial intelligence software development platform installed at the user terminal; and the controller module is connected with the hardware equipment module, and is used for controlling the hardware equipmentmodule and receiving feedback signals transmitted by the hardware equipment module according to the received first control command. The artificial intelligence development software platform installedat the user terminal is combined to the controller module and the hardware equipment module, thus, a developer can test on the basis of hardware equipment of an artificial intelligence actual application scenario in a software program development process, program learning and development can be carried out accurately, code debugging and testing can be carried out in real time, and product development and testing efficiency is improved.

column2: PIG FACE RECOGNITION METHOD
column4: The invention relates to a pig face recognition method, which belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: S1, multiple pigsties are arranged side by side, wherein each pigsty comprises a pigsty entrance arranged oppositely, and the pigsty is internally provided with a camera facing the pigsty entrance; S2, the cameras carry out shooting on pig faces entering the pigsties, and pig face video source data are acquired synchronously; S3, the video source data are uploaded to a server and processed to pig face images; S4, the pig face imagesare screened and labeled, effective pig face images are kept, and the coordinate information of the labeled pig face images is used as image data sources; S5, a model for pig face recognition is trained according to the image data sources; and S6, according to the well-trained pig face recognition model, the acquired pig face video source data are processed automatically. Through adopting a Tensorflow system for pig face recognition, the problem of lacking a technology for pig face recognition currently is solved.

column2: MAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND APPARATUS, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, AND COMPUTER-READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column4: The application relates to an image processing method and apparatus, an electronic device, and a computer-readable storage medium. The method comprises: a to-be-processed image is obtained; the to-be-processed image is inputted into an artificial intelligence (AI) image segmentation model for segmentation processing to obtain a segmented image region, wherein the AI image segmentation model is obtained by training according to a face image and a scene image; and the type of the image region after segmentation is identified and corresponding white balance processing is carried out based on thetype of the image region. Because the AI segmentation is performed on the region in the image and white balance processing is performed according to the segmented image, the image content is considered fully and different contents are processed by using different white balance parameters, so that a problem of poor image shooting image is solved and thus the picture becomes natural.

column2: INTERACTIVE SPORTS EXERCISE DEVICE OF INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model relates to an artificial intelligence technique field discloses an interactive sports exercise device of intelligence, including the big data processing center of cloud platform, electrical power generating system, central processing system, storage module, communication module, combination formula casing, human -computer interaction system, audio/visual communication system, mobile reception control terminal. The utility model discloses a there are a plurality of specifications in assembled shell and audio/visual communication system according to system's model configurationdifference, has the mutual form of multiple input, simple device structure, is easy to carry out, and the automation is high, have intelligent characteristics, its power source is photovoltaic powergeneration technique and the combination of municipality ferroelectric phase simultaneously, provide required electric energy with the electric energy of light energy conversion for each module, energy pressure has been alleviated, energy -concerving and environment -protective effect has been reached, each module cooperation is used and to be realized light the exercise, the body -building by scientific methods, knowledge learning, the mesh of the supplementary health control of artificial intelligence.

column2: INTELLIGENT SORTING GARBAGE CAN
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent sorting garbage can, and relates to the technical field of garbage sorting. The intelligent sorting garbage can comprises a garbage can body; a plurality of sorting sub-garbage can bodies are arranged in the garbage can body; an throw-in door is arranged on a garbage can cover; a sorting device comprises a moving device, a positioning device and a placing platform; a main controller controls a turnover plate mechanism or an opening and closing mechanism in a driving mode and controls opening and closing of the throw-in door in a driving mode; and an automatic garbage identification system based on artificial intelligence and a machine deep learning algorithm comprises a camera arranged in the garbage can body. According to the intelligent sorting garbage can, multi-angle shooting is carried out on garbage on the placing platform through the camera, the types of the garbage to be detected can be identified through the artificial intelligence and the machine deep learning algorithm, a sorting mechanism rotates a sorting platform to the position above collecting ports of the different sub-garbage can bodies through a control system, the turnoverplate mechanism or the opening and closing mechanism is controlled to be opened, the garbage fall into the different collecting ports, so that the garbage can be automatically sorted and processed, the sorting precision can be improved, and the labor amount of garbage sorting can be decreased.

column2: POWER DISTRIBUTION NETWORK RECONSTRUCTION METHOD APPLYING SINGLE PARENT GENETIC ALGORITHM
column4: The invention relates to a power distribution network reconstruction method applying a single parent genetic algorithm, and belongs to the technical field of distribution network automation and artificial intelligence distribution networks. Through the technical scheme, the method comprises the following steps: carrying out chromosome coding; generating an initial group; calculating the fitness function value of each individual inside the group; carrying out selection operation; carrying out PGA gene shifting operation; carrying out PGA gene mutation operation; generating a new generation of group; judging a convergence criterion according to the new generation of group, outputting the result if the criterion is met, and ending the program. The method has the beneficial effects that the single parent genetic algorithm (PGA) which is relatively effective for solving a combinational optimization problem is introduced into a power distribution network for reconstruction, the effect of double-parent crossover operator which is severely damage for scheme feasibility in a conventional genetic algorithm is eliminated, an object-oriented power distribution network model is established, thesingle parent genetic algorithm is packaged effectively, and the reconstruction of the power distribution network has flexibility, openness, easy maintenance and data completeness.

column2: DIALOG PROCESSING SERVER, CONTROL METHOD FOR DIALOG PROCESSING SERVER, AND TERMINAL
column4: The present invention enables dialog between AIs. A dialog processing server 9 is provided with: a relay unit 43 that communicates with both a first information processing terminal 4A and a second information processing terminal 4B, which are portable or vehicle-mounted terminals and which each have an input/output interface unit 30 for communicating with an external artificial intelligence; and a determination unit 45 that determines whether predetermined dialog conditions are met. This dialog processing server 9 is configured to allow the artificial intelligence with which the first terminal communicates to receive dialog content generated by the artificial intelligence with which the second terminal communicates, and vice versa, if said dialog conditions are met.

column2: MULTI-POINT MUSCLE STIMULATOR
column4: The present invention relates to a multi-point muscle stimulator. The multi-point muscle stimulator comprises a controller, an abdomen simulator, a leg simulator and an arm simulator. The abdomen simulator, the leg simulator and the arm simulator are arranged at one side of the controller, the controller is internally provided with a single chip microcomputer, and the single chip microcomputer isinternally provided with a signal receiving module, a data analysis module, an A/D conversion module, a time regulation module and a current control module.
