The multi-point muscle stimulator is arranged to achieve common simulation for muscles at different parts so as to improve the working efficiency, different output currents are employed to generate strong and weak simulation signals for the muscles to simulate the muscles so as to achieve a treatment effect and achieve an effect on exercise of the muscles, the trinitized arrangement of the computer field, the electricity field and an intelligent control system is employed to achieve artificial intelligence, the structure is simple, the operation mode is simple, usage is safe, the muscles can be subjected to multi-point simulation, andthe simulation efficiency can be improved.

column2: BUILDING SERVICE ROBOT
column4: The invention provides a building service robot, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The building service robot comprises a storage space, a motion mechanism, a sensor module and a navigation module; the motion mechanism comprises multi-joint legs, trundles arranged on the tail ends of the multi-joint legs and mechanical arms; the multi-joint legs are used for crossing over the obstacles or climbing ladders, the trundles are used for high-speed displacement, the mechanical arms are used for operating an elevator, the sensor module at least comprises a laser radar sensor, and a high-speed camera used for recognizing the position or avoiding obstacles, the navigation module comprises an electronic map used for providing a track route. Full-weather building serviceexecution can be achieved, the life of the crowd can be facilitated, the material and manpower input can be reduced, and the community service quality can be improved.

column2: ECOLOGICAL AND ENVIRONMENTAL WARNING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON LASER RADAR AND DEEP LEARNING PATH OPTIMIZATION
column4: The invention discloses an ecological and environmental warning system and method based on laser radar and deep learning path optimization. The system comprises an ecological and environmental warningboat and a bank-based server, wherein the ecological and environmental warning boat comprises a core control module, a sailing drive module, a water quality detection module, an intelligent obstacleavoidance evidence module, a communication module and a power module; the bank-based server comprises a data analysis module and a route planning module; the bank-based server is used for checking theposition of the ecological and environmental warning boat, receiving and analyzing data passed back by the ecological and environmental warning boat, planning the path of the ecological and environmental warning boat and predicting a central position of the pollution source according to multi-point data; the ecological and environmental warning boat completes water quality monitoring and samplingunder the optimal path and treats slight pollution on premise of performing data analysis and path planning by the bank-based server. The problems that the traditional water quality monitoring is greatly limited by the environment, the sampling period is long, much money is spent and the like can be accurately solved, and application of artificial intelligence in an aspect of improving the ecological environment is really realized.

column2: STATIC-TO-STATIC OPTICAL DIRECT AIMING METHOD BASED ON BORE AND DIRECT AIMING DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses a static-to-static optical direct aiming method based on a bore. The method includes the following steps that an optical direct aiming system is placed into the bore; scenery in front of a gun barrel is obtained; scenery image reproduction is generated based on the obtained scenery in front of the gun barrel; the scenery image reproduction is provided for a display screen;and based on the relative positions of the scenery image reproduction and a front sight, a gun turret is horizontally rotated, the gun barrel is vertically adjusted, and a target is aligned at the front sight. By means of the aiming method, line-free connection between the aiming system and a tank can be guaranteed, the condition that aiming cannot be achieved due to differences is avoided, all-time correction for parallelism of an aiming line and the gun axis is not needed, the target can be aimed at any time and any place when an aiming system of the tank breaks down, and high-hit rate static-to-static optical direct aiming shooting is achieved through mechanical direct gun barrel operation. According to the aiming method, image treatment and artificial intelligence algorithms are used,the aiming difficulty is reduced, and the hitting accuracy is guaranteed.

column2: GENETIC PROGRAMMING METHOD FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PROGRAMMER WRITING OF DIGITAL AIRCRAFT CODE
column4: The invention provides a genetic programming method for the artificial intelligence programmer writing of a digital aircraft code. The method specifically comprises the following steps that: determining the target sample component of each component in a digital aircraft to input and store an instruction vector, a state vector in the component and a component output physical amount vector, converting into a genetic programming input vector and a genetic programming target output vector, carrying out a genetic programming operation, and optimizing the model function of each component according to a fitness value to reasonably finish the genetic programming decision of the digital aircraft code. According to the method, the writing automation and intellectualization of the digital aircraft code are realized, and the simulation cost of the aircraft is lowered.

column2: VIDEO ENCODING
column4: A method comprises: determining, by a neural network, a first spatial region (area) of a video as a salient region (region of interest, ROI); determining, by the neural network, at least one first encoding parameter value for the first spatial region and at least one second encoding parameter value for a second spatial region of the video; and encoding the first and second spatial regions in accordance with the first and second encoding parameter values (e.g., as represented in a parameter matrix). The neural network (artificial intelligence (AI) system) may determine the video context (e.g., sport, concert, etc), for example by identifying a pattern or feature via sound/audio characteristics, and determine coding parameters based on context. Viewer (user) feedback may indicate saliency; a quality score used to determine first spatial region and encoding parameters - may be determined, indicating correspondence between determined and viewer-indicated salient regions. Feedback data may be based on viewer graze direction data or other user interaction. Encoding parameters may be resolution, bit-depth, quantization parameter, dynamic range, or colour format or gamut. A Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) may be used. The method may be applied to three-dimensional (3D) video and a virtual reality (VR) head-mounted display (HMD).

column2: HXCEL TECHNICAL METHOD FOR GENERATION SYSTEM OF LARGE TEXT INTELLIGENT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of an Hxcel technical method for a generation system of a large text intelligent management system. Artificial intelligent management software manages software in a fixed format and cannot be applied in a change manner for many years. Artificial intelligence is realized in automatic generation system of the intelligent management system, and a management system is created at any time and the application of the management system is modified. A key technical method for solving the problem is a management system format, application of data change, searches of management system changes under the conditions of changing formats and data and application of a screening technology. A large text management application is different from computational statistical type management, data representation formats and operating methods. An intelligent software function technology is used for realizing running of various large text management system applications, multi-user authorization management applications and data authorization management application, standalone version management system applications and network management system applications. The management application demand that a user does any management application at any time can be satisfied by the large text intelligent Hxcel. All original innovation core technologies are adopted.

column2: UNDERWATER PERFORMANCE SYSTEM OF ROBOT FISH
column4: The present invention relates to an underwater performance system of a robot fish, capable of providing a spectator with various entertainment content. According to the present invention, the underwater performance system of a robot fish comprises: a water tank filled with water; and the robot fish to perform underwater performance while swimming in the water tank in accordance with a predetermined scenario. The system comprises a projector, a screen, a background image display unit, a location detection unit, and a control unit. The projector is disposed in the front side of the water tank, and generates and projects a moving image capable of moving in response to the robot fish swimming in the water tank. The screen is disposed between the water tank and the projector, and displays the moving image. The background image display unit is disposed on the rear side of the water tank and displays a background image corresponding to a background in which the robot fish is swimming. The location detection unit detects a location of the robot fish swimming in the water tank. The control unit is connected to the projector to control a position of the moving image and is connected to the location detection unit to receive the location of the robot fish. When the location of the robot fish and the position of the moving image are fit to a predetermined position, the control unit controls any one among the location, the color, and the image of the moving image. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2018

column2: CONSTRUCTION MONITORING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a construction monitoring method. The method comprises the following steps: step one, registering identity information of all construction people; step two, identifying the identity information of the construction people and allowing the construction people to enter a construction area; step three, recording a site structure of the construction site, dividing a safety area,and monitoring a structural safety hazard of the site in real time; step four, monitoring the construction site remotely and commanding the construction; and step five, tracking and shooting the construction process, analyzing the construction information in real time, and carrying out classification and storage automatically. According to the invention, on the basis of comparison of an electronic tag including the identity information of construction people with preset information, the construction people entering the construction area are managed precisely and thus the construction site canbe managed remotely and the potential safety hazard of the construction site can be monitored in real time; the construction process is recorded and analyzed in real time; the safety of the construction site is enhanced to a certain extent; and with voice communication and an infrared camera, the technical staff and the management staff can carry out communication with the field staff conveniently, thereby avoiding the error caused by pure voice communication.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TYPE ORGANIC HEAT CARRIER BOILER
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence type organic heat carrier boiler. This artificial intelligence type organic heat carrier boiler is intelligent integrated control system to equipment control system design, increases human -machine interface touch screen in the system, makes equipment operation concentrated, simple. The integrated CPU module that is of the original controllingelement of separation, the CPU module is controlled to the touch -sensitive screen, provides the signal through the operation by the CPU module and gives touch -sensitive screen, control circuit, andcontrolgear normally works, makes the improvement of automation degree. Set for oil pressure demonstrations, oil pressure settlements, under -voltage warning, under -voltage shut down, temperature display, temperature settlement, over -temperature alarm, thermostatic control, oil mass in the conspicuous screen interface and show, owe functions such as oil shut down, realization equipment intelligentization operate control with full -automatic safety protection, enable equipment safety running behaviour and further promote.

column2: MEANS, APPARATUS, AND METHOD FOR HUMANISTIC INTELLIGENCE, UNDIGITAL CYBORG CRAFT, AND SOUSVEILLANT SYSTEMS FOR MACHINE INTEGRITY
column4:
Advances in sensing technology, combined with AI
(Artificial Intelligence) have created devices and
systems that sense our every movement in intricate
detail. Society is evolving toward a world of surveillant
systems - - machines that sense us more intimately,
yet reveal less about their internal states and
functions. The modern "user-friendly" trend is to hide
functionality and machine state variables to "simplify"
operation for end-users. While this "dumbed down"
(and "dumbing down") technology trend is supported
by most of society, there is a risk that it undermines
the natural scientific curiosity and comprehensibility of
some end-users, leading them away from trying to
understand our technological world. Surveillant systems
work against users of intellect, excluding them from
particpating fully in technological progress, and
possibly driving some users away from logical thinking and
toward technopaganist "witchcraft" and insanity.
To reverse this harmful trend, Minsky, Kurzweil,
and Mann proposed the use of HI (Humanistic
Intelligence) to create a "Society of Intelligent Veillance".
Accordingly, Sousveillant Systems are systems that are
designed to reveal their internal states to end-users
intelligently, to complete an HI feedback loop. This paper
is in-part a kind of "manifesto" to (or at least
inspiration for) product designers, system designers, creators,
manufacturers, etc., on how to create better technology
that makes us smarter rather than stupider. Here is
disclosed a number of embodiments of an invention
related to the new emerging field of Sousveillant Systems.
The invention is based on technology that makes its
internal state apparent to the end user, without
appreciable delay or omission ("Feedback delayed is feedback
denied").
In one embodiment, a Haptic Augmented Reality
Computer Aided Design system allows the user to
create content using a special kind of lock-in amplifier. In
another embodiment, the user's body, especially their
core (e.g. transversus abdominis, obliques, rectus
abdominis, erector spinae, etc.) facilitates a pointing device
or cursor, in the feedback loop of an interactive
computational process such as a game. This "PlankPoint .TM."
or "CorePoint .TM." technology gives rise to a new form
of fitness based on Integral Kinesiology such as
absement or absangle with respect to a target path or goal
trajectory through a multidimensional virtual reality or
augmented reality space.

column2: CONTROL METHOD AND SYSTEM OF ENGINEERING MACHINE
column4: The invention discloses a control method and system of an engineering machine. The control method comprises the steps of shooting a satellite map image of a target area and conducting GPS locating onthe engineering machine; planning the target area into a working area and a non-working area according to the satellite map image; automatically controlling the engineering machine to work in the working area through an intelligent control system on the engineering machine according to GPS locating information and the satellite map image. By means of the control method and system of the engineering machine, the technical problem that an existing unmanned engineering machine based on an artificial intelligence technology cannot be effectively controlled according to actual situations since thesite of the work area cannot be stereoscopically observed is solved.

column2: HIGH-VOLTAGE ISOLATING SWITCH OVERHEATING STATE PREDICTING METHOD BASED ON PSO-SVM
column4: The invention relates to a high-voltage isolating switch overheating state predicting method based on a PSO-SVM. Multiple factors influencing heating of an isolating switch like the load current, therated current, the environment temperature, the pollution grade, the latest overhauling year and the running state of the isolating switch are considered, an artificial intelligence algorithm of the particle swarm optimization support vector machine is adopted, and a high-voltage isolating switch overheating state predicting model is built. During application, original data or a testing sample during running of the high-voltage isolating switch is input to the built prediction model, the isolating switch state is predicted so that the heating state of the high-voltage isolating switch can be accurately predicted, a targeted overhauling strategy is timely taken aiming at the running state of the isolating switch, and the occurrence of power failure accidents is reduced.

column2: APPLICATION CONTROL METHOD AND MOBILE TERMINAL
column4: An application control method and a mobile terminal are provided. The method is applicable to a mobile terminal including a processor and an artificial intelligence (AI) module. Whether a current user is a registered user is detected by the processor when detecting that an application running on the mobile terminal belongs to a preset application set. A monitoring instruction carrying an identification of the running application is sent to the AI module by the processor when detecting that the current user is the registered user. A monitoring strategy of the running application associated with the registered user is acquired by the AI module, where the monitoring strategy includes a monitoring parameter and a corresponding monitoring parameter threshold. The running application is closed by the AI module when detecting that a value of the monitoring parameter of the running application is greater than or equal to the monitoring parameter threshold.

column2: DEVICE OF SEEKING HELP IS GUARDED IN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ENDOWMENT WITH LEARNING FUNCTION
column4: The utility model discloses a device of seeking help is guarded in artificial intelligence endowment with learning function, including erecting network camera device and alarm lamp, the handle hand, it gets into between the frequent prefabricated house of old man or the room of living to promote whole equipment, through controller control cylinder switch, open the cylinder, the piston rod removes,adjust suitable height, let network camera device can catch old man's position, move through the controller control motor, drive first gear and the 2nd gear revolve, it rotates to drive connecting rod one end, the swinging arms makes a round trip to be the arc swing, displacement sensor can the non -volatile recording go up and down highly with the statistics, the utility model discloses a can the intelligent regulation height, increase network camera device camera shooting range, further increase application range, emergency adopts alarm and telephone contact rescue, can in time deal with various problems produces, the drawer is deposited to the medicine can deposit relevant medicine, for healthy improvement guarantee.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENT CONTROL WATER HEATER
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligent control water heater, which comprises an intelligent control assembly (1) with a display, a water tank (2), a light wave heating tube heating element (3) and a temperature probe (1-6), wherein the light wave heating tube heating element (3) and the temperature probe (1-6) are arranged in the water tank; the used intelligent assembly is wifi connection APP remote control Internet of things intelligent bluetooth insertion control equipment based on a cloud database; the artificial intelligence and the internet are combined; the intelligent assembly comprises a control unit, a relay, a bluetooth module and a wifi module; the control unit is used for controlling the relay to be connected with the modules; a temperature display is connected withthe control unit. The temperature display is arranged on a water heater case; the electric heating element is a metal electric heating tube or a nonmetal case light wave electric heating tube.

column2: AN EXERCISE AND FITNESS PLAN MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of fitness management and specifically provides an exercise and fitness plan management system. The system comprises a user health data collecting system,a user exercise data collecting system, a user life data collecting system, a communication module and a background system. The user health data collecting system is used for acquiring health data ofa user; the user exercise data collecting system is used for collecting exercise data of a user; the user life data collecting system is used for collecting diet data and work and rest data of a user;the background system comprises a plan generating module, a neural network module and a plan correction module; the plan generating module generates a fitness plan according to the health data of a user via the artificial intelligence algorithm, the neural network module adjusts the parameters of the algorithm according to fitness effects of the user and the plan correction module adjusts schemesin real time according to plan execution conditions of the user. The system solves the problem that proper and scientific fitness plans cannot be made because of incomplete physical test data and lowprofessional degrees of instructors.

column2: MULTIFUNCTIONAL ROBOT WHICH CAN FLY IN DISASTER SCENE
column4: The invention provides a multifunctional robot which can fly in a disaster scene. The multifunctional robot which can fly in a disaster scene includes a control module, a sensing module, a mechanicalarm module, a wireless data transmission module, a navigation positioning module, a flight movement module, a power driving module, an image acquisition and processing module, a man-machine interaction module, and a first aid article library module, wherein the sensing module, the mechanical arm module, the wireless data transmission module, the navigation positioning module, the flight movement module, the image acquisition and processing module, the man-machine interaction module, and the first aid article library module are connected with the control module; and the mechanical arm module and the flight movement module are connected with the power driving module. The search and rescue robot has the advantages of having relatively higher artificial intelligence, being able to quickly arrive at the specified position, being high in man-machine interactivity, being high in obstacle climbing ability, being high in navigation positioning accuracy, being high in data transmission rate, being able to detect the content of each gas component in the air, being able to give necessary assistance to the trapped person, and being high in search and rescue flexibility of the robot and the adaptive capacity to environment.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SOLAR CHARGING STAKE
column4: The utility model relates to an artificial intelligence technique field, and disclose an artificial intelligence solar charging stake, including the pile body, the stake door is installed in the frontof pile body, and the signal indication lamp is installed at the positive top of stake door, and the signal indication lamp includes trouble lamp, running direction lamp, charge indicator and infrared morse signal light, and trouble lamp, running direction lamp, charge indicator and infrared morse signal light from left to right arrange in proper order, and human -machine interaction interface and controller are from left to right installed in proper order to the below of signal indication lamp. This artificial intelligence solar charging stake through setting up the signal indication lamp and to the injecing of controller, carries out analysis of the data and feedback to the behavior of pile body, responds to the analysis electric quantity condition and temperature conditions to the charge condition of vehicle simultaneously to it is safer to make the pile body use, through setting up light and solar cell panel, is providing the illumination for the pile body at night, and it is safer to make people use night the pile body to charge.

The present invention relates to a method of implementing eyesight strengthening software based on a computer and a smartphone. An individually preferred color and screen by theme are selected and an eyesight strengthening exercise model including a location moving pattern and a distance moving pattern of a target or a combination thereof is variously set. Style information including a size or shape of eyes of each user, whether glasses are worn, and eyesight which are continuously collected or a combination thereof is analyzed by machine learning to generate an eyesight strengthening exercise model suitable for each group. An optimal eyesight strengthening exercise model in accordance with the style information of a specific user photographed by a camera to be analyzed is extracted to be provided based on the eyesight strengthening exercise model generated for each group to allow each user to perform training to strengthen eyesight using an artificial intelligence (AI)-based customized eyesight strengthening exercise model suitable for the user. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2018

column2: AUTOMATIC GOLF BALL PICKING MACHINE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an automatic golf ball picking machine based on artificial intelligence. The automatic golf ball picking machine includes a machine body, a detection device and a control device; the detection device includes an infrared sensor arranged on the top of the machine body and an ultrasonic sensor arranged on the side surface of the machine body; rolling wheels and a first driving device for driving the rolling wheels to rotate are arranged on the lower portion of the machine body; the automatic golf ball picking machine also includes a ball picking device, and the ball picking device includes a ball collecting roller, a temporary storage chamber, a ball storage chamber, a conveying device connecting the temporary storage chamber with the ball storage chamber and a discharging device for discharging golf balls from the ball storage chamber. The automatic golf ball picking machine can automatically pick the golf balls and store the golf balls, manpower is greatly saved, and a great amount of time consumed for manually picking the golf balls is saved at the same time.

column2: CAR DEALER PERFORMANCE ANALYSIS EXPERT SYSTEM BASED ON NEURAL NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses a car dealer performance analysis expert system based on a neural network. By making use of the distributed storage, parallel processing, self-learning, self-organization and other functions of a BP neural network system, decision rules can be extracted by training data, and automatic calibration can be carried out under supervised learning according to running data to intelligently update and evolve the decision rules. Evolution of decision rules is realized. A series of problems in the existing expert system, such as difficulty in obtaining decision, no automatic reasoning and low level of artificial intelligence, are solved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INTERVENTION SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DIABETES FIVE CARRIAGES
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence intervention system and method for diabetes five carriages. According to a medical examination result, historical pharmaceutical and intervention behaviors and other data of a user, from the six aspects of daily life, nutrients, diet, drinking, exercise and blood glucose monitoring, one set of intelligent, scientific and normative rehabilitation intervention guiding scheme is formulated for the user, and a needle decrease and medicine decrease intervention guiding scheme is indirectly provided on the basis of the rehabilitation intervention guiding scheme. According to the method, on the basis of intelligent reminding, monitoring and evaluating, the problems that a diabetic is poor in autorhythmicity and a scientific intervention method islacked are solved; a plan is reminded to be executed regularly and intelligently in a timed mode, and the execution result is evaluated and sent to the user and a designated guardian in real time; onthe basis of big data analysis, the problems existing in the intervention process of the diabetic are told, the diabetic is helped and supervised by the guardians (parents and specialists and the like) for correct and scientific intervention of the diabetic, the drug dependence is abandoned step by step, the living quality is improved, and the hospitalization cost is lowered.

column2: SUPERCONDUCTIVITY MAGNETIC LEVITATION SKY STREET RAIL TRAFFIC TOOL
column4: The invention provides a superconductivity magnetic levitation sky street rail traffic tool. The superconductivity magnetic levitation sky street rail traffic tool is applied to sky streets characterized by linear buildings and comprises a vehicle body, a superconductive low temperature container is arranged on the inner bottom face of the vehicle body and is internally provided with a high temperature superconductor block material, and a permanent magnetic rail is arranged at the portion, located on the upper surface of the foundation, under the high temperature superconductor block material;a wheel device capable of retracting and folding is connected to the vehicle body; the superconductivity magnetic levitation sky street rail traffic tool further comprises a control system for controlling the wheel device to retract and fold. The superconductivity magnetic levitation sky street rail traffic tool has the advantages that the structure is simple, sliding friction of the vehicle bodyafter power down is turned into rolling friction, and the damage of rigid impact to the vehicle body, the rail and passengers is lowered. Through the combination of the mechanical structure and artificial intelligence, the sensitivity and the executing force are high, and the personal safety is protected while the reliability of the vehicle body is improved. An electric heating wire is arranged on the rail base surface, a slide groove is internally provided with a through hole, accumulated water or accumulated snow on the rail base surface are timely removed, and the safety of running of thevehicle body is better guaranteed.

column2: RESCUING METHOD AND DEVICE OF SWIMMING POOL RESCUING ROBOT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a rescuing method and a device of a swimming pool rescuing robot based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The rescuing device includes a sound source positioning system, a controlling device, and a power-driven system. The sound source positioning system is connected with the power-driven system through the controlling device. The sound source positioning system includes a speech acquisition module used for collecting signals sent out by a sound source, a speech signal preprocessing module used for conducting treatment and recognition on the collected speech signals, and a sound source positioning module used for determining the sound source position through calculating the time difference or the sound pressure ratio. The power-driven system includes an infrared detector used for detecting obstruction ahead and a power device is used for providing power for the swimming pool rescuing robot and redirection. Accordingto the rescuing method and the device of the swimming pool rescuing robot based on artificial intelligence, through the speech acquisition module, different sound sources in the swimming pool are collected, when the processed sound source appears with a preset sound source, the swimming pool rescuing robot sends out an alarm and swim to the target sound source rapidly, the safe level of an indoorswimming pool is improved, and casualties caused by drowning are avoided.

column2: WIRELESS CHARGING CIRCUIT OF PORTABLE EQUIPMENT FOR SURFING NET
column4: The utility model discloses a wireless charging circuit of portable equipment for surfing net in mobile communication and the artificial intelligence field, including power amplification and wirelesstransmitting module, signal source VINT connects a second resistance R2 and a field effect transistor Q1's grid, and triode Q3's base and third resistance R3 are connected to second resistance R2's the other end, and triode Q3's collecting electrode passes through the grid that first diode D1 connects the 2nd field effect transistor Q2, field effect transistor Q2's the first resistance R1 of source connection, triode Q3's collecting electrode passes through fourth resistance R4 and connects a transmitting coil L1, the 2nd transmitting coil L2 and power negative pole VSS, and a transmitting coil L1 connects a field effect transistor's source electrode, and the 2nd transmitting coil L2 connects the 2nd field effect transistor Q2's drain electrode. The utility model discloses satisfying the restriction of electronic equipment duration on having broken use and space in not enough, the work of giving people, living and brought very big facility.

column2: METHOD FOR OPTIMIZING SUPPORT VECTOR MACHINE ON BASIS OF PARTICLE SWARM OPTIMIZATION ALGORITHM
column4: A method for optimizing a support vector machine (SVM) classification model on the basis of a particle swarm optimization (PSO) algorithm, relating to the technical field of computer artificial intelligence. On one hand, an inertia weight is adjusted according to particle fitness, so that adaptive adjustment of the inertia weight is implemented, the diversity of the inertia weight is increased, and a global exploration capability and a local search capability of a PSO algorithm are better balanced. On the other hand, the time of particle mutation can be better controlled by using a threshold value calculated by means of the position of a successfully found particle as a mutation condition, the capability of the particle to jump out of the local best solution is improved after the mutation of the particle, and optimizing an best value of a parameter of an SVM is facilitated, and thus the classification accuracy of an SVM algorithm is improved. By optimizing the parameter of the SVM classification model, the present invention improves the classification accuracy of the SVM classification model, and promotes wider applications of the SVM classification model in the fields of model identification, system control, production scheduling, computer engineering, and electronic communications.

column3: a method thereof and system thereof. The electronic apparatus using a wearable device capable of performing psychological prescription for user prime;s emotion and behavior through an artificial intelligence model comprises: a communications unit which performs communications with at least one wearable device that a user has; a control unit which extracts movement data
column4: bio-data
column5: and voice data from exercise data received from the wearable device
column6: identifies a user prime;s movement state based on the movement data
column7: predicts a user prime;s emotion state based on the bio-data and voice data
column8: and checks psychological prescription data through the artificial intelligence model based on the movement and emotion states; and a display unit which outputs the psychological prescription data. Other embodiments can also be applied. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2018"

column2: INTELLIGENT INTERACTIVE ATHLETICS EXERCISE EQUIPMENT
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and discloses intelligent interactive athletics exercise equipment. The equipment comprises a cloud platform big data processingcenter, a power supply system, a central processing system, a storage module, a communication module, a combined shell body, a human-computer interaction system, a sound-light display system and a mobile receiving control terminal. According to the intelligent interactive athletics exercise equipment, the assembling outer shell and the sound-light display system have a plurality of specificationsaccording to different system model configuration and have multiple input interaction forms; the equipment has the advantages that the structure is simple, implementation is easy, the automation degree is high, and the equipment is intelligent; and simultaneously, the photovoltaic power generation technology and commercial power are combined as the resource of electricity, electric energy transformed by luminous energy supplies required electric energy to each module, and accordingly energy pressure is relieved, the effects of the energy conservation and environment protection are realized, and all the modules are operatively used to realize the purposes of relaxed exercise, scientific fitness, knowledge study and artificial intelligence auxiliary health management.

column2: AUTOMATIC FEEDING AND DISINFECTANT POWDER SPREADING METHOD FOR SILKWORM BREEDING
column4: The invention discloses an automatic feeding and disinfectant powder spreading method for silkworm breeding. The method comprises the steps that an equipment running switch is switched on, and a robotmoves mulberry leaves to a feeding area of a mulberry leaf feeding manipulator according to the requirements of a program; a disinfectant powder spreading manipulator starts to spread disinfectant powder layer by layer according to the program; a material suction disc begins to suck the mulberry leaves onto a suction plate, and meanwhile the mulberry leaf feeding manipulator begins to find the layer to conduct feeding layer by layer according to the program; an instruction is sent to the robot through a wireless network, the robot moves one silkworm rack to an original silkworm rack placementarea of a silkworm breeding area, and the operation is conducted repeatedly till all silkworms are fed at a time. According to the method, artificial intelligence is adopted in the whole process, theoperation is conducted through a photoelectric sensor and the designed program, automatic feeding and disinfectant powder spreading during silkworm breeding are achieved, and a large amount of laborcost for silkworm breeding is saved; meanwhile, since fewer persons are needed, the risk that the silkworms are infected with germs is reduced; since equipment runs automatically, the silkworms are fed with an even amount of feed on time, great benefits are provided for the growth of the silkworms, and the space for silkworm breeding is also saved.

column2: METHOD FOR ENABLING STUDENT RECEIVING K12 EDUCATION TO SURF THE INTERNET IN GREEN WAY
column4: The invention discloses a method for enabling a student receiving K12 education to surf the internet in a green way. Under the informationized educational reform background, the student cannot be adversely affected by the social entertainment and games while really enjoying the convenience of the informationized education; the student can focus on the classroom while in school, and the teacher canunderstand and master the internet usage state of the student at any time, and can open the network as award during a certain period of time, thereby enabling the student to learn in the fun; the parents can trust the child to learn by using the electronic equipment; the green internet surfing function is realized in a way of combining the artificial management and control, the big data collection and the artificial intelligence, and the defects that the existing scheme is inflexible, universal in application and cannot really realize the green internet surfing are offset.

column2: FISH ROBOT
column4: Disclosed herein is a fish robot. The fish robot characterized in comprising a head unit corresponding to head portion of a fish; a driving unit coupled to the head unit to generate driving force by sinusoidal swimming movement; a waterproof cover coupled to the head unit with elasticity in which the driving unit being inserted to be sealed; and a body unit coupled to the head unit with elasticity corresponding to body portion of the fish in which the waterproof cover being inserted to be supported.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IS FLEXIBLE CABLE FOR ROBOT
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence is flexible cable for robot, including protective sheath, electric power transmission conductor, signal transport conductor, first insulation layer, second insulating layer, first shielding layer, secondary shielding layer, flame retardant coating, filling layer, mounting groove, running roller and waterproof layer, the inboard of protective sheath is equipped with the flame retardant coating, the inboard of flame retardant coating is equipped with the waterproof layer, the inboard of waterproof layer is equipped with a plurality of electric power transmission conductors and a plurality of signal transport conductor, every the outside of electric power transmission conductor by interior and outward in proper order the cover be equippedwith first insulation layer and first shielding layer, every the conductor was carried to the signal the outside by interior and outward in proper order the cover be equipped with second insulating layer and secondary shielding layer, compare with prior art, can reduce the frictional force between cable and the ground, it can reduce the burden of robot to prevent effectively that the cable from being frayed, has promoted the fireproof waterproof performance of cable, has promoted the anti -electromagnetic interference ability and the compliance of cable.

column2: MULTIFUNCTIONAL REMOTE SENSING DEVICE FOR FOREST MONITORING
column4: The invention discloses a multifunctional remote sensing device for forest monitoring. The device comprises a base, a retractable supporting rod, a supporting plate, a solar device, a camera shootingdevice and an insect catching device, four universal wheels are arranged on the base, and the solar device and the insect catching device are fixedly arranged at the upper end portion of the supporting plate; the camera shooting device is connected with the upper end portion of the supporting plate through an annular structure, a positioning device and a driving device are arranged in the annularstructure, and a GPS positioning device and an infrared thermodetector are further arranged at the side end portion of the supporting plate; a circuit box is further arranged on the bottom of the retractable supporting rod, a single chip microcomputer, a signal converter and a network transmission device are further arranged in the circuit box, and the single chip microcomputer, the signal converter, the network transmission device, the GPS positioning device, the infrared thermodetector, the positioning device, the driving device, the camera shooting device and the insect catching device areelectrically connected. The multifunctional remote sensing device for forest monitoring is simple in structure and has an artificial intelligence function.

column2: GOLF PICKING MACHINE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a golf picking machine based on artificial intelligence. The golf picking machine comprises a body, a detection device and a control device and further comprises a picking device, wherein the detection device comprises an infrared induction sensor arranged on the top of the body and an ultrasonic sensor arranged on the side face of the body; a roller and a first driving device driving the roller to rotate are arranged on the lower part of the body; the picking device comprises a picking roller, a temporary storage bin, a ball storage bin, a conveying device and a roll-out device; the conveying device is connected with the temporary storage bin and the ball storage bin; the roll-out device is used for outputting golf balls from the ball storage bin; the picking roller is arranged on the front side of the lower part of the body; and the temporary storage bin and the ball storage bin are formed in the body. According to the golf picking machine disclosed by the invention, automatic ball picking and storing operations can be realized, the manual labor is greatly saved, and lots of time consumed by manual ball picking is also saved.

column2: INTELLIGENT ESTIMATION METHOD OF DIRECTION OF ARRIVAL SUITABLE FOR SOUND ARRAY WITH ARBITRARY STRUCTURE
column4: The present invention provides an intelligent estimation method of a direction of arrival (DOA) suitable for a sound array with an arbitrary structure. For a sensor array with an arbitrary structure,the particle swarm optimization in an artificial intelligence field is employed to achieve time difference direction finding of the array with the arbitrary structure, and an intelligent optimizationmode is employed to search an optimal azimuth estimation value and an optimal pitch angle estimation value of an information source. In order to perform rapid convergence and prevent from falling intoa local optimal solution, the method provided by the invention employs a linear least square method to provide initial estimation values of an azimuth and a pitch angle of a particle swarm and takesan accumulation cost value of three-dimensional array direction-finding squared errors as a fitness function of an evaluation criteria. The method is characterized in that: high DOA estimation precision can be obtained even if the method is applied to a sensor array with an arbitrary structure. The method is also suitable for the information source DOA estimation problem of other types of arrays,and can achieve accurate estimation of the azimuth and the pitch angle of the information source of the three-dimensional space.

column2: AUTOMATIC PING-PONG BALL PICKING MACHINE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses an automatic ping-pong ball picking machine based on artificial intelligence. The automatic ping-pong ball picking machine disclosed by the invention comprises a shell, a control system, an intelligent detection device and a running system and further comprises a ball picking device, wherein the intelligent detection device comprises an infrared scanning sensor arranged onthe top of the shell and an ultrasonic sensor arranged on a side face of the shell; the ball picking device comprises a ball collection device, a ball storage bin, a conveying device and a roll-out device; the ball collection device is communicated with the ball storage bin by virtue of the conveying device; the shell comprises an upper half shell and a lower half shell; the ball storage bin is formed in the upper half shell; and the upper half shell is vertically arranged in the lower half shell in a sliding manner. According to the ball picking machine disclosed by the invention, operationsof picking balls and transferring the balls into a ball storage barrel of a pitching machine can be automatically realized, the manual labor is greatly saved, and lots of time consumed by manual ballpicking is also saved.

column2: HIGH-VOLTAGE CIRCUIT BREAKER OPENING AND CLOSING TIME ONLINE MONITORING DEVICE AND METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a high-voltage circuit breaker opening and closing time online monitoring device and method. The device is composed of a circuit breaker opening and closing event database, a circuit breaker opening and closing time online monitoring module and a human machine interaction interface, wherein data of the circuit breaker opening and closing event database are from SCADA (Supervisory Control And Data Acquisition) and measurement and control devices in a substation and a converter station, a circuit breaker phase selection opening and closing device, a relay protection device, a relay protection information system, a fault recording device and a fault recording system; and the circuit breaker opening and closing time online monitoring module is composed of an opening andclosing intelligent strategy analysis module, an opening and closing time monitoring module, a closing and opening time monitoring module, an opening and closing auxiliary contact switching time monitoring module and the like. The high-voltage circuit breaker opening and closing time online monitoring cloud database in different levels can be formed through special network connection, higher-precision online monitoring can be realized with the help of big data, cloud computing and an artificial intelligence technology, and more accurate data are provided for full life cycle management on thecircuit breaker.

column2: GOODS LIFT HOIST CONTROL SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The utility model discloses a goods lift hoist control system based on artificial intelligence, including power module, data acquisition unit, central controller, data processing and analysis unit, goods lift lifting controller, remote mobile terminal, relay, surveillance camera head and image data storage, power module includes commercial power electric wire netting, battery, transformer, stabiliser, electric quantity monitoring module, singlechip and change over switch. This goods lift hoist control system based on artificial intelligence can monitor the dynamic information in the goods lift, and its security protection degree is high, its the two storage work that still can carry out field data storage and remote data storage to each item data of field monitoring gained can prevent lossof data, when it overloads at goods lift, can accomplish on -the -spot the warning and remote alarm work automatically, and this goods lift hoist control system based on artificial intelligence can go up and down to carry out intelligent control to goods lift, and its intelligent height accords with user's user demand.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR LEARNING AND IDENTIFYING NUMBER OF BANKNOTES IN BLUETOOTH CASHBOX IN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MANNER
column4: The invention relates to a system for learning and identifying the number of banknotes in a bluetooth cashbox in an artificial intelligence manner, which comprises a money depositing and withdrawing voucher, an office table, a cabinet box, a foot box, an external camera shooting system, a shock absorption keyboard, a character recognition system and an artificial intelligence financial server, wherein the artificial intelligence financial server comprises an artificial intelligence device, a financial server and a vibration avoidance dispatching device. The artificial intelligence device performs image edge detection on an image which is acquired from a fixed-focus macro lens and subjected to light-splitting three-image overlap processing in each counter by using a Canny edge detection operator, then processes the edge detected image by using a back propagation neural network to obtain the number of physical banknotes in the counter, then from the financial server the number of accounting banknotes in the counter corresponding to the image, checks the number of physical banknotes and the number of accounting banknotes and gives out warning information through the financial server if the number of physical banknotes is inconsistent with the number of accounting banknotes so as to enable a user to perform instant manual rechecking, and the user inputs a rechecking result to the artificial intelligence server.

column2: A SYSTEM AND METHOD TO ANALYZE AND IMPROVE SPORTS PERFORMANCE USING MONITORING DEVICES
column4: The embodiments herein provide a method and system for monitoring, analyzing, improving and giving instant feedback on sports performance of an individual. The embodiments also provide a system and method to create visual representation of a sports action without the use of any visual data capture mechanisms. The system includes a game monitoring device, a communication network, a remote server, and a computing device. The remote server comprises a filtering and signal processing module, an analytics module, a database, and an artificial intelligence module. The computing device includes several modules and a user interface. The game monitoring device detects several data points from the player and transmits the same to the remote server. The remote server filters and processes the signals for analyzing each shot and the game of the player. The analysis is visualized and displayed on the user computing device.

column2: INTELLIGENT FLOWERPOT WITH AUTOMATIC WATER ADDING FUNCTION
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent flowerpot with an automatic water adding function. The intelligent flowerpot comprises a mounting base, supporting legs and a water tank are fixedly connected tothe upper surface of the mounting base, a flowerpot carrier plate is fixedly connected to the upper surfaces of the supporting legs, cushion blocks are slidably connected to the upper surface of theflowerpot carrier plate, a potting flowerpot body is fixedly connected to upper surfaces of the cushion blocks, and water spraying pipes and a soil humidity sensor are fixedly connected to the inner wall of the potting flowerpot body. The intelligent flowerpot with the automatic water adding function has advantages that real-time humidity detection of soil in the potting flowerpot body is realized, and timeliness in adding of water into the potting flowerpot body is achieved; when the soil humidity sensor reaches a starting value, a miniature water pump is controlled to start pumping water through a variable-speed module and a single-way relay module, so that automatic water adding is realized, artificial intelligence is realized, and the problem of withering of plants in the flowerpot dueto the fact that people using the flowerpot for flower cultivation forget to water or go out for a long time is effectively solved.

column2: COUNTER-IMPACT BLOCKING ANTI-TERRORISM HITTING-TYPE SAFETY PILE UTILIZING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a counter-impact blocking anti-terrorism hitting-type safety pile utilizing artificial intelligence. The pile comprises a safety pile housing. The top position of the safety pile housing is equipped with an electronic intelligent system. The electronic intelligent system comprises a camera, an LED warning lamp, a light supplementing flash lamp, a warning sounder, and an electronic conversion input-output control board. The middle position of the safety pile housing is equipped with a high-end energy absorption device or a multi-layer buffer board. The lower position ofthe safety pile housing is equipped with a market-known safety pile elevation system device. The safety device is arranged on a road place. If a car draws close and wants to pass the road place, a camera-shooting system is used for networking retrieval. If the car is retrieved to be normal, the system outputs an instruction to descend the safety pile so that the car is allowed to pass by. If the car is retrieved not to be normal and should be stopped, the system outputs an instruction to give an acousto-optic alarm. The safety pile vertically stands still to keep the car from going. If the caris forced to pass the high-end energy absorption device or the multi-layer buffer board, the car is safely and effectively forced to stop.

column2: BODY -BUILDING AUXILIARY SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE JOINT CAPTURING TECHNOLOGY

This body -building auxiliary system caninstruct for the body -building personnel obtain professional body -building, can reduce the body -building expense in addition.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LIVE GOLF POSTURE CORRECTING APPARATUS USING VOICE AND IMAGE OF PROFESSIONAL GOLFERS AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: An existing golf posture correcting system is able to only transmit images and simple comment messages for posture correction using a drawing pen, and thus, users are less interested in the system and reliability thereof is low, and therefore, the online market of golf swing posture correction is gradually reduced. To solve the problem, the present invention provides an artificial intelligence live golf posture correcting apparatus which comprises a live golf posture correcting application module (100), a cash payment management module (200), a smart golf posture analysis control module (300), and a smart professional golfer image photographing and verifying module (400). As such, the apparatus is capable of vitalizing the market by increasing the user interest. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2018

column2: INDIVIDUALLY TAILORED EXERCISE TRAINING AND REHABILITATION TECHNIQUE: MEDICAL PERSONAL TRAINER
column4: The present invention concerns a new individually tailored exercise training and rehabilitation technique, referred to as "MPT: Medical Personal Trainer". More precisely, the invention concerns an innovative method to be used in the field of physical activity and exercise training/rehabilitation programs for healthy individuals and for patients with chronic diseases. It merges together, in an interactive way, advanced notions from medicine, engineering, mathematics, artificial intelligence, in order to provide new clinical perspectives for automatic personalized health care as well as novel insights on individually-tailored management and advanced treatment, in a user-familiar setting, of healthy subjects (including elderly) and patients with chronic diseases.

column2: ENERGY -CONSERVING HEAT PUMP OF COLD AND HOT ECONOMIC BENEFITS AND SOCIAL BENEFITS

The utility model discloses utilize heat exchange effect to produce the hot and cold water simultaneously, can be according to the temperature of the required hot and coldwater of outdoor atmospheric temperature intelligent regulation, economic being suitable for.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MANDARIN EXERCISE EQUIPMENT, METHOD AND APPLICATION
column4: The invention discloses artificial intelligence mandarin exercise equipment, a method and an application. The equipment comprises a central processor. An input terminal of the central processor is electrically connected to an output terminal of a voice processing module. An input terminal of the voice processing module is electrically connected to an output terminal of a voice receiving module. Anoutput terminal of the voice receiving module is electrically connected to an input terminal of a buffer memory module. An output terminal of the buffer memory module is electrically connected to aninput terminal of the central processor. The central processor and a database are bidirectionally and electrically connected. An input terminal of the central processor is electrically connected to anoutput terminal of a power supply module. In the invention, through arranging a voice comparison module and a feedback module 1, recorded voices are rapidly compared with dialects of various regionsso as to determine a dialect kind of a user. A suitable range of the equipment is wide and the equipment can be used by different and wide dialect groups.

column2: FREIGHT ELEVATOR LIFTING CONTROL SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a freight elevator lifting control system based on artificial intelligence. The freight elevator lifting control system comprises a power module, a data collecting unit, a central controller, a data processing and analyzing unit, a freight elevator lifting controller, a remote mobile terminal, a relay, a surveillance camera and an image storage. The power module comprises an electric supply power grid, a storage battery, a transformer, a voltage stabilizer, an electric quantity monitoring module, a single chip microcomputer and a shift switch. According to the freight elevator lifting control system based on artificial intelligence, dynamic information in a freight elevator can be monitored, and the safe-protection degree of the freight elevator lifting control system is high; double storage work of field data storage and remote data storage can further be conducted on data obtained by field monitoring, and the data can be prevented from being lost; when the freight elevator is overloaded, field alarming and remote alarming work can be automatically completed; and the freight elevator lifting control system based on artificial intelligence can conduct intelligent control on lifting of the freight elevator, the intelligence of the freight elevator lifting control system is high, and the freight elevator lifting control system can meet the using requirements of users.

column2: GENETIC ALGORITHM AND MOUNTAIN CLIMBING ALGORITHM BASED CONCRETE DISTRIBUTION VEHICLE DISPATCHING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a genetic algorithm and mountain climbing algorithm based concrete distribution vehicle dispatching method. A time window punishment mechanism is added and a mathematical modelis established for the concrete vehicle dispatching problem, the model is calculated by using a genetic algorithm and mountain climbing algorithm based hybrid genetic algorithm, and an optimal vehicle dispatching scheme of the model is acquired finally. The genetic algorithm and the mountain climbing algorithm in an artificial intelligence algorithm are combined, global searching capability highin the genetic algorithm and local searching capability high in the mountain climbing algorithm are fully utilized, a mountain climbing operation is added in the genetic algorithm process, convergencerate of the algorithm is effectively increased, and capability in searching the optimal solution is effectively improved.

Its characterized in that: including tamp mechanism (5) and walking chassis(1), walking chassis (1) walking be equipped with running gear in the both sides lower part around the orientation, walking chassis (1) upper portion uses the walking orientation be divided into as the benchmark around two regions, anterior regional each side is equipped with a set of and the parallel tamp mechanism (5) of railway line rail pillow, the side respectively is equipped with a set ofclamping rail mechanism (3) around two sets of tamp mechanisms (5), is equipped with in the middle part of the walking chassis (1) to drive pivoted lower track mechanism (4) of complete machine lift.The utility model relates to a mechatronic's artificial intelligence type equipment, the manpower has not only been saved to whole operations such as last lower track of the transfer of equipment, automatic tamp operation, equipment by a wide margin to single can the realization to improved work quality, it is little to the driving interference, realized that railway line way trouble tamp operation upgrades to the automatic trade from mechanized.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENT SOLAR CHARGING PILE
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an artificial intelligent solar charging pile. The artificial intelligent solar charging pile comprises a pile body. The front of the pile body is provided with a pile door. The top of the front of the pile door is provided with a signal light. The signal light comprises a fault light, a running light, a charging light and an infrared communication light. The fault light, the running light, the charging light and the infrared communication light are arranged from left to right in sequence. The lower portionof the signal light is provided with a man machine interface and a controller from left to right in sequence. According to the artificial intelligent solar charging pile, by arranging the signal lightand limiting the controller, data analysis and feedback are conducted on working conditions of the pile body, meanwhile, charging situations of a vehicle is induced, and the electricity condition andthe temperature condition are analyzed, so that the pile body is used more safely; by arranging an illumination lamp and a solar panel, illumination is provided for the pile body at night, and peopleuses the pile body for charging more safely at night.

It introduces the bus system with the constant speed cruise function, makes bus driver's both feet obtain appropriate efficiency, has improved the security of driving indirectly.
