column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TYPE END WATER -TEST DEVICE AND SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence type end water -test device and system can gather pressure and flow data in real time, realizes the on -the -spot of test data and long -range synchronous transmission, demonstration and memory management, and its test control accuracy is high, application scope is wide, and has improved the stability and the reliability of the operation of trying the water for a long time effectively. This end water -test device includes: manometer, maintain valve, pressure transmitter, flow transmitter, solenoid valve, the shower nozzle that tries the water, flame detection subassembly, signal processor and test valve, wherein, pressure transmitter and flow transmitter send pressure and the traffic signal who detects, flame is surveyed the subassembly and is sent the flame detectable signal to signal processor, signal processor generate test command signal and detection data send the detection data and the running state data of formation and follow distal end acceptance test command signal to the distal end, the solenoid valve is used for opening or closing according to test command signal.

column2: METHOD TO AUTOMATICALLY MATCH ONLINE CHATTING PARTNERS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE USING BIG DATA AND AUTOMATIC MATCHING SYSTEM THEREOF
column4: The present invention relates to a method to automatically match online chatting partners based on artificial intelligence (AI) using big data, automatically selecting a chatting partner fit to a user and making a connection in online chatting based on a network communication network, such as Internet, Ethernet, etc.; and an automatic matching system thereof. According to the present invention, the system comprises: a website module communicating with a user terminal, and executing webpage output and online chatting relay processes; an integrated database to store integrated preference data generated by a chatting analysis module during online chatting; the chatting analysis module to automatically generate integrated preference data including personal information of the user and the chatting partner, preferred points of interest (POI), and a point value of each POI in accordance with a chatting analysis algorithm while analyzing TEXT inputted during online chatting; a matching module searching the integrated preference data of the user in the integrated database to select the chatting partner for the user in accordance with a matching algorithm; and an algorithm module to update the chatting analyze algorithm and the matching algorithm, and to transfer the same to the chatting analysis module and matching module. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2018

column2: MOTION INTERACTIVE VIDEO RECORDING FOR FIGHTERS IN A MIXED MARTIAL ARTS AND BOXING MATCH
column4: A motion interactive video recording and scanning mechanism and system. A scanning and recording device is configured to capture a 360Â° HD video with infrared emitters, image sensors and optical character recognition for detecting motion and precision of a fighter's movements while engaged in a fighting match. At least one 360Â° HD video camera is provided. A pair of smart UFC official fight and boxing gloves has a removable, personalized wrist pulse tracker configured to track, analyze, and interpret the fighter's specific heart rate and vital signs. training and fight smart gear and equipment configured to send a wireless signal of statistical data received from the pair of smart pro series Mixed Martial Arts gloves, a pair of smart boxing gloves, a smart punching bag, a smart protective cup system, a smart protective headgear, smart Thai pads, a smart focus mitt, or a smart hand wrap. Artificial intelligence software counts and deciphers the number of strikes thrown and landed by each individual fighter, the part of the fighter's body on which the strike landed, and the speed and power of each strike that landed.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MEDIA EXPERIENCE DATA
column4: A system for passive collection of media experience data to increase efficiencies in identifying and delivering desired media content. Behavioral data measured with a wearable device and camera sensors, including physical activity and physiological data, may be captured during a media content presentation and analyzed with media contextual and experiential data to measure media experience data and render media connectedness values between a subject and the presented media content. A system may operate on a network with access to a web service program and utilize mechanized learning and artificial intelligence to compare the previously analyzed media experience data with contextual data associated with media content available on searchable databases. The system may share media experience data and analyzed results with a social network group which can use the media connectedness value data intelligence to refine search methods for media content. The system's learning capabilities, for managing the described ongoing data collection ecosystem, will increasingly improve interpretive and analytic insights of a subject, their preferred choices media content, and the optimal conditions and environment for presenting specific media content with little or no input from the subject.

column2: ENERGY SUPERVISION SYSTEM AND METHOD USED FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TIMES
column4: The invention discloses an energy supervision system and method used for artificial intelligence times. The system comprises a qualification authentication system, a human body end, a machine end, a program library, an energy production unit, an energy supply apparatus, an energy supply switch, a communication network, a cloud computing supervision platform, energy laws and regulations, a standby energy system and a central control room. Through the qualification authentication system, permissions of the human body end and the machine end are managed and controlled; through the energy production unit, the energy supply apparatus is produced; through the energy supply switch, the energy supply apparatus is controlled to be started and stopped; through the program library, information of program running and energy conversion is monitored; through the communication network, the monitored information is transmitted to the cloud computing supervision platform; through the cloud computing supervision platform, the monitored information is collected and analyzed, and an instruction is sent out to control turn-on and turn-off of the energy supply switch; through the standby energy system, standby energy is provided; and through the central control room, a highest supervision permission in the field of energy power is executed. Through the system, absolute control ability of human being to energy development, production, use, research and supervision processes is ensured.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MUNICIPAL GARDEN WATERING DEVICE OF ADJUSTABLE SPRAY REGIME
column4: The utility model relates to an artificial intelligence technique field, and disclose an artificial intelligence municipal garden watering device of adjustable spray regime, including the locomotive, fixed mounting has the door window on the front surface of locomotive, the right side fixed mounting of locomotive has the automobile body, the bottom fixed mounting of automobile body has the front wheel, the right side fixed mounting of front wheel has the rear wheel that is located the automobile body bottom, the top fixed mounting of automobile body has the storage water tank that is located the locomotive right side, the top fixed mounting of storage water tank has into the water installation, the right side fixed mounting of storage water tank has the first reciprocal spring that is located the automobile body top, the inboard fixed mounting of first reciprocal spring has the rubber shock absorber strut who is located the automobile body top. This artificial intelligence municipal garden watering device of adjustable spray regime can guarantee effectively that artificial intelligence municipal garden watering device is running into not the area that sprays that makes things convenient for directly adjusted shower nozzle department when the municipal garden of equidimension area sprays, has made things convenient for the area of accurate control watering.

column2: INSIDE-ELEVATOR CHILDREN RECOGNIZING METHOD BASED ON MACHINE LEARNING
column4: The invention discloses an inside-elevator children recognizing method based on machine learning, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence machine learning. The method involves an elevator control system, a camera shooting device, an elevator monitoring and managing platform, an image classifying server and an alarm device. The camera shooting device is installed on the inner top of an elevator and connected with the elevator monitoring and managing platform and the elevator control system. The elevator monitoring and managing platform is connected with the image classifying server, the alarm device and the elevator control system. The image classifying server is provided with a trained elevator image classifying model. The camera shooting device is triggered by a door closing signal to take images of the current passenger conditions in the elevator. The camera shooting device sends the collected images to the elevator monitoring and managing platform. The elevator monitoring and managing platform sends the images to the image classifying server. When the recognizing result shows that only children exist, an alarm is triggered. The conditions in the elevator are intelligently monitored, the conditions that children take the elevator alone are recognized in real time, and the elevator events are avoided through alarm of the alarm device.

column2: SYSTEM FOR ITERATIVELY TRAINING AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE USING CLOUD-BASED METRICS
column4: A method may include receiving, at an artificial intelligence cloud service, a plurality of artificial intelligence feedback communications from a plurality of devices, wherein each artificial intelligence feedback communication of the plurality of artificial intelligence feedback communications includes data generated by software application components running on respective ones of the plurality of devices, the software application components including respective current artificial intelligence models, deriving, from the data included with each artificial intelligence feedback communication, an associated artificial intelligence model update for each of the respective current artificial intelligence models on the plurality of devices, and transmitting, to the plurality of devices, a plurality of artificial intelligence model update communications, wherein each artificial intelligence model update communication of the plurality of artificial intelligence model update communications includes the derived associated artificial intelligence model update for updating a corresponding one of the respective current artificial intelligence models on the plurality of devices.

column2: SYSTEM FOR ITERATIVELY TRAINING AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE USING CLOUD-BASED METRICS
column4: A method may include receiving, at an artificial intelligence cloud service, a plurality of artificial intelligence feedback communications from a plurality of devices, wherein each artificial intelligence feedback communication of the plurality of artificial intelligence feedback communications includes data generated by software application components running on respective ones of the plurality of devices, the software application components including respective current artificial intelligence models, deriving, from the data included with each artificial intelligence feedback communication, an associated artificial intelligence model update for each of the respective current artificial intelligence models on the plurality of devices, and transmitting, to the plurality of devices, a plurality of artificial intelligence model update communications, wherein each artificial intelligence model update communication of the plurality of artificial intelligence model update communications includes the derived associated artificial intelligence model update for updating a corresponding one of the respective current artificial intelligence models on the plurality of devices.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CONTROLLER THAT PROCEDURALLY TAILORS ITSELF TO AN APPLICATION
column4: A method may include receiving a communication from a device at an artificial intelligence controller including state information for a software application component running on the device, the state information including information corresponding to at least one potential state change available to the software application component, and metrics associated with at least one end condition, interpreting the state information using the artificial intelligence controller, and selecting an artificial intelligence algorithm from a plurality of artificial intelligence algorithms for use by the software application component based on the interpreted state information; and transmitting, to the device, an artificial intelligence algorithm communication, the artificial intelligence algorithm communication indicating the selected artificial intelligence algorithm for use in the software application component on the device.

column2: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CONTROLLER THAT PROCEDURALLY TAILORS ITSELF TO AN APPLICATION
column4: A method may include receiving a communication from a device at an artificial intelligence controller including state information for a software application component running on the device, the state information including information corresponding to at least one potential state change available to the software application component, and metrics associated with at least one end condition, interpreting the state information using the artificial intelligence controller, and selecting an artificial intelligence algorithm from a plurality of artificial intelligence algorithms for use by the software application component based on the interpreted state information; and transmitting, to the device, an artificial intelligence algorithm communication, the artificial intelligence algorithm communication indicating the selected artificial intelligence algorithm for use in the software application component on the device.

column2: INFANT GUARDS EARLY ROBOT OF TEACHING BASED ON PROJECTING APPARATUS
column4: The utility model discloses an infant guards early robot of teaching based on projecting apparatus, include: the projecting apparatus, first processing controls ware, the setting of first processing controls ware is connected on the projecting apparatus and with the projecting apparatus, the monitor, the monitor setting is in projecting apparatus bottom and be connected with first processing controls ware, a wireless communication module, a wireless communication module is connected with first processing controls ware is linear, a memory, the memory is connected with first processing controls ware, the touch -control board, be provided with the 2nd wireless communication module with a wireless communication module looks communication on the touch -control board, second processing controls ware, second processing controls ware sets up on the touch -control board. In this way, infant guards early robot of teaching based on projecting apparatus, utilize the projecting apparatus to carry out the projection of teaching video and operation exercise, the field of vision is big, has avoided the harmful effects of growing infant's eye, touch -control board light in weight is handheld light and handy.

column2: INTELLIGENT WIRELESS ENDOSCOPY CAMERA SHOOTING LIGHT SOURCE SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent wireless endoscopy camera shooting light source system, and belongs to the field of equipment for disease inspection, surgical videography and lighting in medical institutions. The system includes a functional end and a mobile terminal which is communicated with the functional end; the functional end includes a CCD photosensitive integrated module, an FPGA image acquisition module connected with CCD photosensitive integrated module, a DSP high-speed digital processor for receiving the photographic information of the FPGA image acquisition module, a self-service optical zoom control module for receiving control signals from the DSP high-speed digital processor, and a self-service optical zoom motor which is controlled by the self-service optical zoom control module and used for adjusting the optical power of the FPGA image acquisition module. The system achieves that one machine serves multiple purposes, and is compatible with the diagnosis and treatment requirements of various departments; the system can achieve synchronous videography, save video data and achieve mobile consultation, thereby achieving the purposes of remote guidance, conferences and artificial intelligence, solving the problem of tedious connection and light beams when an operation is conducted in an operating table, and facilitating the operation process.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MANAGEMENT METHOD BASED ON CROP GROWTH DATE DATA AND GROWTH STATE IMAGES
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence management method based on crop growth date data and growth state images. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a classification comparison system; inputting real-time crop growth date data, and obtaining crop growth images; shooting the crop growth images, and obtaining real-time crop growth date data; and outputting crop production management opinions according to the real-time crop growth date data and the crop growth images. The crop growth images comprise optical images and/or spectrum images. After the technology provided by the invention is adopted, the artificial intelligence management method can be applied to the Internet and mobile Internet platforms, the crop growth date (GDDs) data can be visually displayed through the real crop growth state images, the real crop growth state images can be accurately described by the crop growth date (GDDs) data so as to guide the production and management of the crops, which is conducive to the large-scale promotion and application of the agricultural technology.

column2: TIDAL CURRENT SENSOR
column4: The present invention relates to a tidal current sensor capable of simultaneously measuring a direction and strength of a tidal current. The tidal current sensor comprises: a sensing unit including an artificial cilium longitudinally formed in a prescribed length, and one or more tentacle arms radially protruding from a portion of an outer circumferential surface of the artificial cilium to be extended in a prescribed length; a pressure measurement unit including a PCB installed on a lower portion of the tentacle arms in parallel with the tentacle arms, and a pressure sensor mounted on the PCB and brought into contact with or separated from a lower surface of the tentacle arms by changing the artificial cilium to measure a contact pressure of the tentacle arms; and a link unit to couple the sensing unit and the measurement unit to allow the sensing unit to freely change with respect to the measurement unit. Strength of a tidal current flow and a direction of the flow can be simultaneously sensed to be applied to a drone swimming in a fluid by remote control or artificial intelligence. Also, a direction and strength of a fluid flow can be measured even at a precise level to greatly reduce a size of a drone swimming in the fluid. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2017

column2: DESIGN METHOD FOR SOLVING RED LIGHT RUNNING PROBLEM BY MEANS OF CAMERA FENCE RISING AND FALLING BARS
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of design methods for solving red light running problems by means of camera fence rising and falling bars, and belongs to the technical fields of artificial intelligence, computer image processing, metal processing, digital circuits, microprocessors and radio. The design method comprises the main technology that a section of right-angle fence is arranged at each corner of four corners of pavements a crossroad in a surrounding manner, receiving controllers are installed on the pavements, the rising and falling bars are installed on the receiving controllers, the rising and falling bars and traffic lights are synchronous, the rising and falling bars fall when the traffic lights are red and rise when the traffic lights are green, intelligent cameras and the traffic lights are synchronous in the rising or falling process of the rising and falling bars when the traffic lights are yellow, and pedestrians breaking through the crossroad when the traffic lights are red are recorded for illegal behavior scoring and informed through short messages.

column2: AUTOMATIC SOLVER FOR ALGEBRAIC APPLICATION PROBLEMS BASED ON DEPTH-ENHANCED LEARNING
column4: The present invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an automatic solver for algebraic application problems based on depth-enhanced learning. According to the automatic solver for algebraic application problems based on depth-enhanced learning, a digital strategy is used to identify the related numbers as the bottom layer of an expression tree, and the expression tree is constructed in a bottom-up manner by determining operator nodes of number nodes; and three related numbers (13, 4, 9) are extracted as the bottom layer of the expression tree. The method of the present invention is more efficient and accurate than the current advanced method; compared with the comparison algorithms, when solving an application problem, the framework of the present invention only requires 10 times less running time while improving the accuracy; and what's more, in the most challenging benchmark datasets, the accuracy is increased from 45.2% to 63.7%, and the universality of the DQN framework is verified.

column2: DATA PROCESSING METHOD, DEVICE AND ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT
column4: The embodiment of the invention discloses a data processing method, a device and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of the artificial intelligence. The data processing method disclosed by the embodiment of the invention comprises the following steps: setting a data running rule of a target object; selecting a training data set which contains a feature plane and is matched with the data running rule of the target object; determining a strategy network structure of the target objet according to the target object rule and the receptive file range corresponding to the tactic, thereby enabling the combination of the convolution kernel size and the convolution layer number of the strategy network structure to satisfy the requirement of the receptive field range; and training the strategy network of the target object by using a training data set. By using the scheme disclosed by the embodiment of the invention, the data processing problem of the target object can be effectively solved.

column2: DEVICE COMPRISES A DEVICE BODY,
column4: The utility model provides a device comprises a device body, relates to the artificial intelligence monitoring devices field. This device comprises a device body, , including the monitor, the left side fixed mounting of monitor has the casing, the bottom fixed mounting of monitor has the fixed block, the one end that the monitor was kept away from to the fixed block has the horizontal pole through pivot swing joint, it is provided with the bolt to alternate on the horizontal pole, one end that the bolt is close to the horizontal pole runs through the horizontal pole and extends to the top of horizontal pole. This device comprises a device body, through the setting to bolt, nut, sleeve, antiskid ribbed tile, inserted bar, plate body, fixture block, buffer substrate tablet, montant, slide and spring, has reached the convenience and has carried out effect easy to assemble to artificial intelligence monitoring devices for the table tennis to make things convenient for user's use, consequently also improved artificial intelligence monitoring devices's work efficiency for the table tennis.

column2: CLOUD-BASED SYSTEM AND METHOD TO TRACK AND MANAGE OBJECTS
column4: A system, method and computer program product for integrated management of animate and inanimate objects of an enterprise, including a cloud-based server having a database, a website, and configured for running computer programs thereon; a user device including a smartphone, tablet and/or personal computer (PC) running an application or software including a gamified user interface (Ul) configured to connect to the database and function as a data entry and display device; automated devices including a sensor, electronic switch, pump and/or a hydroponic dosing device connected to the database and configured to collect and transmit data or to react to received commands; an Artificial Intelligence (Al) powered engine configured to monitor statuses of animate and inanimate objects of an enterprise, as well as external conditions and actors that affect the enterprise, and based on analysis of the statuses, configured to task employees and/or the automated devices of the enterprise, and configured to employ cognitive reasoning to provide the enterprise with advice on managing business operations; and a framework employed by the Al engine based on a metaphor of a novel, with business operations of the enterprise presented as a story, and including a data model that follows rules of grammar.

column2: CLOUD-BASED SYSTEM AND METHOD TO TRACK AND MANAGE OBJECTS
column4: A system, method and computer program product for integrated management of animate and inanimate objects of an enterprise, including a cloud-based server having a database, a website, and configured for running computer programs thereon; a user device including a smartphone, tablet and/or personal computer (PC) running an application or software including a gamified user interface (Ul) configured to connect to the database and function as a data entry and display device; automated devices including a sensor, electronic switch, pump and/or a hydroponic dosing device connected to the database and configured to collect and transmit data or to react to received commands; an Artificial Intelligence (Al) powered engine configured to monitor statuses of animate and inanimate objects of an enterprise, as well as external conditions and actors that affect the enterprise, and based on analysis of the statuses, configured to task employees and/or the automated devices of the enterprise, and configured to employ cognitive reasoning to provide the enterprise with advice on managing business operations; and a framework employed by the Al engine based on a metaphor of a novel, with business operations of the enterprise presented as a story, and including a data model that follows rules of grammar.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VIRTUAL-DOCTOR DIAGNOSIS AND TREATMENT SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON DIABETES
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence virtual-doctor diagnosis and treatment system and method based on diabetes. The system includes a login module for logging in the system and entering a consultation interface by a user, a consultation module for displaying multiple service items for the user to choose on the consultation interface, a selection module for obtaining the service item selected by the user on the consultation interface and entering a corresponding service module, and the service module for prestoring a consultation process and multiple plan schemes, wherein the service module can be used for asking questions on the consultation interface according to the consultation process, and when the user finishes inquiry, the service module selects and outputs the corresponding plan scheme according to the user's answer. The user can communicate by voice, text or pictures, and therefore the method and system have the advantages of being simple in interactive method, wide in applicability, convenient for the elderly to use, and capable of formulating diet, exercise and medicine schemes according to various factors including diet, exercise, medicine and the like. The method and system are equivalent to carrying a diabetic doctor by a patient who can ask questions anytime and anywhere, and can reduce the workload of doctors.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CONTROL 'S WATER HEATER
column4: Artificial intelligence control's water heater, including intelligent control subassembly (1), water tank (2) that have the display, the heating by photoelectron pipe heating element (3) of dress in the water tank, temperature probe (1 6 ) the intelligent components who adopts is based on cloud database, and wifi connects APP remote control's the intelligent bluetooth of thing networking and inserts accuse equipment, combines artificial intelligence to be in the same place with the internet, and including the control unit, bluetooth module and wifi module are taken to the relay, the control unit is used for the control relay and is connected with above -mentioned module, and temperature monitor is connected with the control unit in addition, and this temperature monitor adorns on heater shell, electric heating element is metal electric heating pipe or non -metal casing light wave electric heating tube.

column2: RECIPE MATCHING METHOD AND RELEVANT PRODUCT
column4: The invention discloses a recipe matching method and a relevant product. The method is applied to a mobile terminal comprising a processor and an artificial intelligence (AI) module. The method comprises the steps that the mobile terminal controls the processor to acquire a food material image when selection operation by a user on a first application is detected, display a shooting interface containing the food material image and send the food material image to the AI module; the mobile terminal controls the AI module to call a second application to determine at least one recipe relevant to food material information when it is recognized that the food material image contains the food material information and send the recipes to the processor; and the mobile terminal controls the processor to display the recipes on the shooting interface. The embodiment is beneficial for improving the intelligence, convenience and high efficiency of the mobile terminal.

column2: A DORMANCY CONTROLLING MEANS FOR CHILDREN'S STORY ROBOT
column4: The utility model discloses a dormancy controlling means for children's story robot, a dormancy controlling means for children's story robot, its characterized in that, include: power management module: be used for obtaining sleep state detection module postback data, control machine people running state: including awaken up, dormancy, shutdown, sleep state monitoring module: be used for detection ring border light, perception gravity change, environmental sound sampling, the memory: a sleep journal file for saving children's story data and sleep state detection module provide, a serial communication port, be used for connecting remote server, the adjustment children story broadcast kind and the frequency. Through above -mentioned mode, the utility model provides a dormancy controlling means for children's story robot effectively detects children's sleep state, and according to lukily setting up broadcast children story, long during perception human body activity accumulative total deep sleep, control machine people stops to broadcast automatic dormancy.

column2: ONLINE DYNAMIC RESOURCE PLANNING FOR EVENTS BASED ON AGGREGATE ATTENDANCE
column4: A resource server tracks merchant accounts for fitness studios and other businesses to sign-up students for a particular class. An initial price for the class is set based on a minimum number of attendance. As the resources for the class optimize by maximizing a number of students making use of the resource, a price for the class is reduced. The savings can be issued in some form an incentive awards to students, tracked by the resource sever. Further inputs including historical data and analytics, along with artificial intelligence can also affect price adjustments.

column2: MESSAGE SENDING METHOD AND RELATED PRODUCT
column4: An embodiment of the invention discloses a message sending method and a related product. The method is applied to a mobile terminal comprising a processor and an AI (artificial intelligence) module and comprises steps as follows: the mobile terminal controls the AI module to inform the processor of operating a second application in the background when the mobile terminal detects that the number of English words in a message display window of a first chat interface of a first application is larger than a preset number threshold; the mobile terminal controls the processor to operate the second application in the background; the mobile terminal controls the AI module to translate a Chinese message into an English message through the second application running in the background after the mobile terminal detects the Chinese message in a message recording window of the first chat interface; the mobile terminal controls the AI module to send the English message to a server after the mobile terminal detects the user operation for determining sending of the English message. By means of the embodiment, the convenience of the mobile terminal in controlling the applications and the message processing efficiency are advantageously improved.

column2: CROSS-BORDER PAYMENT RAPID SETTLING METHOD BASED ON CREDIT BIG DATA
column4: The invention discloses a cross-border payment rapid settling method based on credit big data. Based on the historical transaction big data accumulated on e-commerce platforms by merchants, commodities and users, the method carries out estimation to the transaction risks using the artificial intelligence method. For the transactions whose estimated risks are low, a third-party is used to pay in advance so that the capital settlement is made in advance to the domestic accounts of merchants. This avoids the complicated and tedious procedures of a regular settling mode requiring the transaction completion by the users, e-commerce platform financial period completion, e-commerce settlement to a third party and third-party clearance via banks until to the domestic accounts of merchants. Therefore, under the condition that the pre-paid risk is controlled, the cross-border capital settling procedure for the merchants is simplified, the third-party payment and settlement efficiency is increased; and the capital can be transferred among accounts in shorter time. Therefore, the capital cycling efficiency is increased; the risk change risk incurred from an excessively regular long settlement period is reduced, and the operation risks of the merchants are reduced.

column2: METHOD, DEVICE AND SYSTEM FOR DISPLAYING CHARACTER INFORMATION IN VIDEO BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention proposes a method, a device and a system for displaying character information in a video based on artificial intelligence, wherein the method for displaying people and object information in the video based on the artificial intelligence comprises: according to the received people and object identification instruction, snap-shooting the current television picture to obtain a to-be-identified image with a human face; transmitting the to-be-identified image to a server so that the server could perform human face identification to the to-be-identified image; according to the human face identification result, obtaining the people-related information of the to-be-identified image and returning the people-related information; and displaying the people-related information on the television screen. The people-related information in video displaying method on the basis of artificial intelligence of the invention enables that a user does not have to switch to other devices for the people-related information; and the people-related information can be viewed on the television screen. This reduces the complexity of operations, increases the efficiency to obtain information and increases the user's use experience.

column2: AUTOMATIC EXTRACTION METHOD OF STROKES OF CHINESE CHARACTER BASED ON MANIFOLD LEARNING
column4: The invention provides an automatic extraction method of strokes of a Chinese character based on manifold learning, and belongs to the fields of artificial intelligence and computer graphics. The method is used for the guidance to extracting strokes of a target character by constructing a two-dimensional manifold space of the skeleton of a Chinese character and searching therein for a character having the most similar style as a reference character. The invention can solve the problem that the reference character has a style far different from that of the target character in a data-driven automatic extraction method of strokes, and the accuracy of extracting the strokes of the Chinese character is effectively improved.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE LEARNING USING MESSAGING SERVICE AND METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR RELAYING ANSWER USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: Provided are an artificial intelligence (AI) learning method and system and an answer relay method and system using an AI. According to an AI learning method, an AI may transmit a question to users through a messaging service and may acquire learning data for the AI through reactions of the user to the transmitted question.

column2: MONITOR VIDEO RECORDER
column4: The invention discloses a monitor video recorder, and belongs to the technical field of the monitor equipment. For preventing the monitor video from receiving unnecessary interference, reducing the recording an invalid video and saving the hard disk space, the monitor video recorder disclosed by the invention adopts the following technical measures: installing multiple vibration sensors on the ground of a site monitored by the monitor video recorder, wherein each vibration sensor is connected with a computer, and the computer controls a video recording device; a user can set the monitoring range on the ground through the computer; the computer computes whether a position of a vibration source is in the monitoring range according to the data transmitted from each vibration sensor and whether the position of the vibration source is in the monitoring range can be used as the basis of whether to turn on the video recorder; the computer utilizes the artificial intelligence to set the monitoring range on the ground of a shooting site; only when the position of the vibration source is in the monitoring range, the computer turns on the monitor video recorder to record the monitoring range, or the video recorder is in the dormancy status. The recording of the invalid image is avoided, the space of each of the hard disk, a memory card or a magnetic tape is saved, and the searching time of the image is further saved.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TABLE TENNIS TABLE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence table tennis table, include the workstation and fix four support columns at the workstation lower extreme, the workstation middle part is fixed with the baffle, the baffle comprises a plurality of folded sheets, the folded sheet passes through locking buckle and locks each other, four corners on the workstation all are provided with transparent piece, install infrared detector in the transparent piece, mutually support through four signal receiver and infrared detector in the workstation, be equipped with the PLC treater in the workstation, signal receiver and PLC treater electric connection, PLC treater electric connection has bluetooth communication module, temperature controller and battery, workstation one side is provided with the operation panel, operation panel and PLC treater electric connection, can be fine satisfy the pursuit psychology of modern to intelligent product for table tennis table's functional great reinforcing, whole structural design is reasonable.

column2: USER PORTRAIT SYSTEM AND PORTRAIT METHOD BASED ON BIG DATA
column4: The invention belongs to the fields of big data, data mining, artificial intelligence and business Intelligence, and discloses a user portrait system and portrait method based on big data. The system comprises a "user association module" and a "user portrait module", wherein the user association module consists of a user data processing unit, a website data processing unit and a data matching unit; user data generated by the user data processing unit and website data generated by the website data processing unit are processed by the data matching unit to finish the matching of a user unique Internet-surfing identification number and a website account; a user accurate portrait module consists of a website data crawling unit, a text data processing unit and a user tag unit, wherein the website data crawling unit crawls specific website contents of the website for the text data processing unit so as to extract specific aspects in which a user is interested in; and the user tag unit makes a tag for the user to finish the user accurate portrait.

column2: CAN BE APPLIED TO SPHERICAL TIRE FORMULA SELF -DRIVING CAR'S INTELLIGENT CAR LIGHT
column4: Can be applied to spherical tire formula self -driving car's intelligent car light, including self -driving car, this self -driving car is provided with intelligent car light subassembly, intelligence car light subassembly is when past four the orientations motions all around of four wheels of the self -driving car of the spherical tire of adoption, combination head -light mainly used the place ahead road lighting, combination tail lamp is used for illumination of car rear and safety warning, at the side direction formula signal lamp on the fender upper portion of automobile body both sides front and back wheel then adopt when being used for car right direction motion left and show the arrow point, turn to the pattern, relevant text message or voice prompt's mode provides instruction information to other vehicles and pedestrian, and this side direction formula signal lamp and on -vehicle artificial intelligence system, stadia computational system, reaction type sound radar and GPS system signal communicate with each other, the security performance has further been improved. The utility model discloses when self -driving car needs crossed running, can transmit the signal to other vehicles and pedestrian effectively, prevent the traffic accident.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ENGINE HAVING MULTIPLE INDEPENDENT PROCESSES ON A CLOUD BASED PLATFORM CONFIGURED TO SCALE
column4: The multiple independent processes run in an AI engine on its cloud-based platform. The multiple independent processes are configured as an independent process wrapped in its own container so that multiple instances of the same processes can run simultaneously to scale to handle one or more users to perform actions. The actions to solve AI problems can include 1) running multiple training sessions on two or more AI models at the same time, 2) creating two or more AI models at the same time, 3) running a training session on one or more AI models while creating one or more AI models at the same time, 4) deploying and using two or more trained AI models to do predictions on data from one or more data sources, 5) etc. A service handles scaling by dynamically calling in additional computing devices to load on and run additional instances of one or more of the independent processes as needed.

column2: ASSEMBLY TOLERANCE OPTIMIZATION METHOD BASED ON QUALITY LOSS AND COST MINIMIZATION
column4: The invention relates to an assembly tolerance optimization method based on quality loss and cost minimization. The method mainly comprises the following steps: establishing a mathematical model of quality loss and processing cost; adding actual processing capability constraints; performing parameter initialization on a multi-objective teaching and learning algorithm; performing iteration in a teaching phase on an initial solution of the algorithm; adopting a hill-climbing search strategy to further develop the solution; performing Pareto ranking on a population; further studying the solution, and further increasing the accuracy of the solution; and completing the iterative process and finding the optimal solution. The assembly tolerance optimization method based on the quality loss and cost minimization provided by the invention is based on the computer technology, and combines the swarm intelligent optimization algorithm in the field of artificial intelligence, which further improves the calculation efficiency and calculation accuracy of assembly tolerance design, and aims to satisfy the design accuracy under precision manufacturing, improve the production efficiency, and improve the parts quality, so as to further reduce the production cost.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MONITORING DEVICE CONVENIENT TO INSTALL FOR TABLE TENNIS BALLS
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence monitoring device convenient to install for table tennis balls, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence monitoring devices. The artificial intelligence monitoring device convenient to install for table tennis balls comprises a monitor, a shell is fixedly installed on the left side of the monitor, a fixing block is fixedly installed at the bottom of the monitor, a transverse rod is movably connected to the end, away from the monitor, of the fixing block through a rotating shaft, a bolt is arranged on the transverse rod in a penetrating and inserted mode, and the end, close to the transverse rod, of the bolt penetrates through the transverse rod and extends to the portion above the transverse rod. According to the artificial intelligence monitoring device convenient to install for table tennis balls, by arranging the bolt, a nut, a sleeve, an antiskid plate, an insertion rod, a plate body, a clamping block, a buffer plate, a vertical rod, a sliding plate and a spring, the effect that the artificial intelligence monitoring device for table tennis balls can be installed conveniently is achieved, so that a user conveniently uses the monitoring device, and the working efficiency of the artificial intelligence monitoring device for table tennis balls is improved.

column2: NOVEL HIGH -ACCURACY ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INSTRUMENT INSTRUMENT SIGNAL CABLE
column4: The utility model discloses a novel high -accuracy artificial intelligence instrument instrument signal cable belongs to artificial intelligence instrument instrument technical field, include insulation protective layer, heat -resistant layer, wind covering, electromagnetic shield layer, fire -resistant filling layer, conductor insulating layers, earth connection, skeleton and electric conductor, the outmost fixed insulation protective layer that is provided with of cable, the fixed heat -resistant layer that is provided with of insulation protective layer inlayer, the heat -resistant layer inlayer is fixed to be provided with around the covering, around the fixed electromagnetic shield layer that is provided with of covering inlayer, the electromagnetic shield layer inlayer is fixed and is provided with fire -resistant filling layer, the fixed skeleton that is provided with of cable SMIS, fire -resistant filling layer internal fixation is provided with conductor insulating layers, inside the fixing of conductor insulating layers is provided with the electric conductor, this signal cable low in cost, and the modern design, the novelty is high, and signal cable is inside to be provided with heat -resistant layer, electromagnetic shield layer, fire -resistant filling layer, earth connection and electric conductor, accords with artificial intelligence instrument instrument signal cable's designing requirement.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED GARDEN PESTICIDE SPRAYING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based garden pesticide spraying method. The artificial intelligent garden pesticide spraying method has the advantages that a pesticide dispensing box is arranged on a vehicle plate, a stirring rod and stirring blades are arranged in the pesticide dispensing box, and the stirring blades are driven by a stirring motor to rotate and stir pesticide and water mixed liquid in the pesticide dispensing box, so that the purpose of pesticide dispensing is realized, more convenience in use is realized, and the trouble of artificial pesticide dispensing is avoided; a pesticide hopper is arranged at the top part of the pesticide dispensing box, a first flowmeter and an electromagnetic valve are arranged at the bottom part of the pesticide hopper, the amounts of pesticide and water are set by a control panel in a driving cab, the first flowmeter is used for making statistics on the pesticide which flows from the interior of the pesticide hopper into the pesticide dispensing box, and transmitting statistic data to the control panel, and when the amount of the pesticide entering the pesticide dispensing box reaches a set value, the control panel is used for controlling the closing of the electromagnetic valve, so that the purpose of intelligent control is realized, and more convenience in use is realized; a water tank is arranged on the vehicle plate, and is used for storing running water; a water inlet pipe is connected with a running water pipe by a rubber pipe in the use process, and the purpose of supplement water into the water tank is realized.

column2: INTEGRAL TYPE HIGH TEMPERATURE MUFFLE FURNACE
column4: The utility model discloses a horse is furnace box body and control system not, control system setting is in horse furnace box body's bottom not, and control system includes a plurality of pilot lamps, display screen, a plurality of control button, bee calling organ, transformer, control transformer, solid state relay, controller main body and alarm switch, controller main body establishes in control system, and a plurality of pilot lamps, display screen, a plurality of control button and bee calling organ inlay the dress and horse not on furnace box body's the outer terminal surface, lie in not furnace box body's bottom of a matter portion of horse, and a plurality of pilot lamps, display screen, a plurality of control button and bee calling organ are connected with the controller main body electricity, the transformer sets up in controller main body, and control transformer, solid state relay, alarm switch be controller main body even, the external 220V alternating current power supply of controller main body. The utility model discloses a microcomputer artificial intelligence technique of adjusting has PID fuzzy control, the function of adjusting certainly, and control accuracy is high, have a temperature equilibrium, surface temperature is low, and it is fast to rise cooling rate, characteristics such as energy -conservation.

column2: METHOD FOR OPTIMIZING SUPPORT VECTOR MACHINE BASED ON PARTICLE SWARM OPTIMIZATION
column4: The invention discloses a method for optimizing a support vector machine (SVM) based on Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO). The embodiments of the invention disclose a method for optimizing a SVM based on PSO, and belongs to the technical field of computer artificial intelligence. According to the embodiments of the invention, on one hand, the method by adjusting inertia weight according to particle fitness, achieves adaptive adjustment of the inertia weight, increases diversity of the inertia weight and better balances global exploration capability and local searching capability of PSO; on the other hand, by taking the threshold values calculated by searching the position of successful particles as variation conditions, the method can better control the timing of particle variation, and after the variation of the particles, the method increases the ability of particles to jump out of local optimal solution, is conducive to optimization of the optimal value of parameters of the SVM, and increases classification accuracy of the SVM algorithm. According to the invention, the method, by optimizing the parameters of a SVM classification model, increase the classification accuracy of the SVM classification model, and can promote wide applications of the SVM classification model in the field of mode identification, system control, production scheduling, computer engineering and electronic communication.
