column4: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence unmanned automated golf ball recollection system and method thereof. More specifically, the artificial intelligence unmanned automated golf ball recovery system comprises: a ball recollection robot comprising a main body which has a certain size and weight to receive power from an embedded battery and move, a communications module arranged in the main body to receive a wireless control command of a remote side and transmit obtained information of a surrounding area to a control server, and a ball push bar which is horizontally installed on both lateral portions of the front side of the main body, is maintained to be separated from the bottom surface at a certain distance, and pushes a golf ball located on the bottom surface when the main body moves; and a remote controller having a manipulation switch which can remotely control movement, changes in direction, and moving speed of the ball recollection robot. The main body comprises: a main power control unit which controls the whole operation of the ball recollection robot; and a ball recollection mode selection unit which is formed on one side of a upper surface of the main body to enable a user to select one of various modes, having been input, for a ball recollection process using the ball recollection robot and to perform the ball recollection process. The artificial intelligence unmanned automated golf ball recollection system additionally comprises a home station installed on one side of a golf driving range where the ball recollection robot will be used to enable the ball collection robot to automatically return, be charged, and wait for work when a charged amount of a battery arranged in the main body is lower than a certain reference amount or a ball recollection service is completed. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2017

column2: PICTURE RESOURCE PUSHING METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a picture resource pushing method and device based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of monitoring location information of a user and acquiring current scene features if it is determined that the current location is a preset effective scenic spot; querying information of pictures annotated in advance in a resource library to acquire a target picture corresponding to the effective scenic spot and the scene features and marked with shooting parameters; and pushing the target picture to the user so that the user can perform shooting according to the shooting parameters. In this way, the target picture marked with the shooting parameters is recommended to the user in real time based on the current scene features of the user so that the user can set out anytime and do viewing anytime and can also shoot proper pictures, time is saved for the user, and convenience in travel is improved.

column2: TRACKING SHOOTING METHOD AND APPARATUS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: The invention provides a tracking shooting method and apparatus based on artificial intelligence, and an electronic device. The method comprises the following steps: a, determining a control signal corresponding to a current state according to a preset tracking shooting strategy model, controlling a tracking shooting device to enter a second state according to the control signal, and determining an evaluation value corresponding to the control signal according to the state information of the second state; b, using the second state as the current state, and repeating step a until a preset number of evaluation values are obtained; c, updating model parameters of the tracking shooting strategy model according to the preset number of evaluation values to update the tracking shooting strategy model; d, using the updated tracking shooting strategy model as the preset tracking shooting strategy model, and repeating step a to step c until the model parameters of the tracking shooting strategy model are converged; and e, using the converged tracking shooting strategy model to perform tracking shooting. By adoption of the method, the tracking shooting device can adopt the most appropriate tracking shooting strategy to perform the tracking shooting in different tracking shooting environments, and thus the tracking shooting quality is improved.

column2: TRANSLATION SERVICE METHOD USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TRANSLATION SOFTWARE
column4: The present invention relates to a translation service method using artificial intelligence translation software, capable of selecting the optimal translation proofreader group. According to the present invention, a method for performing translation using artificial intelligence translation software, comprises the steps of: receiving translation request data from a requester; running the artificial intelligence translation software; generating, by the artificial intelligence translation software, a first translation; providing, by the artificial intelligence translation software, the generated first translation to a predetermined proofreader; receiving a plurality of translation response data from a supervision group; selecting, by a manager of the artificial intelligence translation software, one of the plurality of translation response data; transmitting the selected translation response data to the requester; and receiving an acceptance request signal from the requester. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2017

column2: CAMERA ASSEMBLY DEVICE OF ROBOT AND SHOOTING AND TRACKING METHOD THEREOF
column4: A camera assembly device of a robot and a shooting and tracking method thereof. By constructing a camera assembly device (6) comprising a device main body (7), a drive mechanism, a laser ranging scanning sensor (1), a signal transceiving device and a power source device, automatically recognizing and sensing abnormality of the outside by means of voice control or artificial intelligence of a robot, the device main body (7) is able to leave the robot main body together with a camera (4) and move to a designated location, to automatically move and track a suspicious person and/or object, capture enough information, and save shot video information or send same to an owner. By means of the camera assembly device and shooting and tracking method thereof, the purpose of enabling the device main body (7) to leave the robot main body together with the camera (4) to better complete the tracking and shooting in a narrow region can be achieved, and the robot main body is automatically found and automatically mounted to the original location after completing the operation task, thereby facilitating implementation and effectively improving the efficiency of tracking and shooting of the robot.

column2: FISH ROBOT
column4: The present invention relates to a fish robot of which the fish body joints are not exposed, which is waterproof-optimized, and which can swim smoothly. To this end, the fish robot comprises: a head unit corresponding to the head portion of a fish; a driving unit, which is coupled with the head unit and generates driving force with a sinusoidal-type swimming movement; a waterproof cover, which is coupled with the head unit with elasticity, and into which the driving unit is inserted and sealed; and a body unit, which is coupled with the head unit with elasticity to correspond to the body portion of a fish, and into which the waterproof cover is inserted and supported.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FILLS ELECTRIC PILE
column4: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence fills electric pile, the ground wire pile comprises a pile body, the pile body top sets up the sunshade, just a pile body side -mounting maintenance measure door, maintenance measure door one side sets up the socket opening that charges, just the inside lamp house subassembly that sets up in socket opening top charges, lamp house subassembly bottom sets up reads the card unit, just the one side of reading the card unit sets up man -machine interface, man -machine interface one side sets up the running direction lamp, just running direction lamp one side device fault pilot lamp, trouble lamp one side sets up charge indicator, just charge indicator one side sets up infrared communication port, this kind of artificial intelligence fills electric pile can be quick charge for the battery, to not harm of battery, before the car was scrapped, the battery can not go wrong moreover, not only environmental protection but also save money is simply easy -to -use to the car owner, can accomplish automatically and charge, the phenomenon can not appear filling, safe and reliable is fit for using widely.

column2: CIRCUIT BOARD DETECTION METHOD AND DEVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention provides a circuit board detection method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that an image is detected and captured through a shooting mechanism firstly, then the image is displayed on a display screen, and a processing mechanism conducts fitting analysis on image data, judges whether the image data accord with characteristic information in a database, conducts marking correspondingly, and transmits a marking signal to the display screen to make the marking signal displayed; after fine product confirmation is conducted on a marked product, the processing mechanism conducts fitting comparison on data information again to judge the matching condition, conducts data classification definition and storage, and finally conducts classification and verification after classification. The method has the advantages that the portions, not up to specification, of a circuit board can be marked and displayed quickly, so that an operator can find the portions in time and conduct corresponding defect treatment; meanwhile, various circuit boards can be detected, and detection efficiency is improved greatly.

column2: 10KV SWITCHGEAR EXAMINATION OPERATION EQUIPMENT
column4: The utility model relates to a distribution network automation electric power system equipment examination operation's technical field, especially, 10kV switchgear examination operation equipment, have the information and the collection of state and the PLC system of control that are responsible for 10kV switchgear, be responsible for artificial intelligence instrument instrument that 10kV switchgear took certainly or the industrial computer of protecting communication between the monitor control device, receive switch quantity output's in the PLC system control then remove to control the relay control section of big voltage heavy current and provide inspection man -machine interface's man -machine interface for 10kV switchgear. This examination operation equipment can be safely, high -efficient, comprehensive, audio -visual inspection 10kV switchgear.

column2: TAEKWONDO TRAINER
column4: The utility model relates to a taekwondo trainer technical field specifically is a taekwondo trainer, a taekwondo trainer, including the taekwondo trainer casing, be equipped with chinese boxing training piece in the taekwondo trainer casing, the outer wall of taekwondo trainer casing is opened there is a chinese boxing training passageway, the fixed back shaft that is equipped with in inner chamber middle part of taekwondo trainer casing, fixedly connected with chinese boxing training on electric telescopic handle's the other end, keep away from electric telescopic handle's a lateral wall in the inner chamber of chinese boxing training on the embedding be equipped with pressure sensor. Transmit received pressure signal for the controller in the control panel through pressure sensor, an electric telescopic handle withdrawal is controlled then to the controller to control other electric telescopic handle and stretch out, reach the effect that the study course was trained to the artificial intelligence taekwondo, make the efficiency of training higher.

column2: FEEDWATER TREATMENT AUTOMATIC INTEGRATION INTELLIGENT CONTROL SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a feedwater treatment automatic integration intelligent control system which comprises a water intake pump, an agent adding device, a tubular mixer, a reaction settling pond, a valveless filtering pool, a clean water basin and an intelligent control system. The water intake pump, the tubular mixer, the reaction settling pond, the valveless filtering pool and the clean water basin are sequentially connected through a water pipe, the tubular mixer, the reaction settling pond and the agent adding device arranged in a parallel connection mode, the outer side of the clean water basin is connected with a second-level pressure pump, and the water intake pump, the agent adding device, the tubular mixer, the reaction settling pond, the valveless filtering pool, the clean water basin and the second-level pressure pump are connected with the intelligent control system. The equipment is simple in structure, design is reasonable, the failure rate is low, and use safety and running stability are good; artificial intelligence and automatic control are adopted in the device, automatic and intelligent operation of a water plant is achieved, the operation cost is reduced, intelligent fault analysis and processing are achieved through the big data analysis function of the device, the operation working condition is automatically optimized, and the use effect is good.

column2: AUTOMATIC INTEGRATION INTELLIGENT CONTROL SYSTEM OF FEED WATER TREATMENT
column4: The utility model discloses an automatic integration intelligent control system of feed water treatment, including sensor, data storage and analysis storehouse, controller, online industry control display platform, data output end and printer, the sensor links to each other with data storage and analysis storehouse, and data storage and analysis storehouse link to each other with the controller, and the controller links to each other with online industry control display platform, is provided with data output end on the online industry control display platform, and the printer links to each other with data output end. The device simple structure, reasonable in design, the fault rate is low, and the safety in utilization goes with operating stability, the device utilizes artificial intelligence and automatic control, has realized the automation and the intellectuality of water factory's operation, has practiced thrift the running cost, has reduced the operation personnel, reduces the energy consumption, and the device's big data analysis function has realized trouble intelligent analysis and processing, and the operating condition is automatic optimizes excellent in use effect.

column2: VISION FOLLOWING CONTROL METHOD OF ROBOT AND ROBOT
column4: The present invention relates to a vision following control method of a robot and a robot. A sensor detection unit is configured to detect the surrounding environment, obtain the depth datagram of the environment, and send the obtained depth datagram to a data processing control unit; the data processing control unit is configured to process the received date after receiving the depth datagram, obtain the real world coordinate system, identify the human and barriers in the environment, and perform skeleton and motion identification and tracking of a following object to obtain an execution command; and a motion execution unit is configured to control the robot to track the following object according to the obtained following object information, and controlling the robot according to the obtained execution command to execute the command. The vision following control method of the robot and the robot are able to rapidly identify the following object, complete the effective identification of the following object in the environment having many people and rapidly make out reaction for the position changing of the following object, and are applicable to the vast majority of the commercial application scenes.

column2: INTERACTIVE TOY OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EMULATION FOOTBALL SHOOT
column4: The utility model discloses an interactive toy of artificial intelligence emulation football shoot belongs to an interactive toy, and the toy includes sportsman's part and goal and goalkeeper's part, including a microphone and a driving motor, a driving motor is connected with actuating lever power in sportsman's parts, and a microphone and a driving motor all insert an intelligent chip, and goal and goalkeeper's parts include alignment sensor and the 2nd driving motor, and the 2nd driving motor is connected with goalkeeper's power, gather pronunciation through the microphone and instruct, and then control the action that shoot was accomplished to a drive?motor?drive actuating lever to under the effect of alignment sensor, make the 2nd driving motor can be according to the real -time position of football, the drive goalkeeper move to with football corresponding position on, thereby stop that the football gets into the goal, under the individual cases football does and avoids the goalkeeper and get into the goal, and then has effectively satisfied people shoot's in to football appreciation demand, and the toy is interactive better.

column2: TRAVEL RECORDER FOR REALIZING INTELLIGENT INTERACTION, AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention belongs to the technical field of car networking artificial intelligence, and especially relates to a travel recorder for realizing intelligent interaction. The travel recorder comprises a shooting module, a control module and a storage module, the shooting module is used for obtaining video information surrounding a vehicle and outputting the video information to the control module, the control module compressing the video information and storing the compressed video information in the storage module, the travel recorder also comprises a man-machine interaction module, a control instruction is sent to the control module through the man-machine interaction module when snapshot is needed by a user, and the control module intercepts the video information according to the control instruction, and directly stores the intercepted video information in the storage module. The invention also discloses a control method of the travel recorder. The control instruction can be convenient emitted through the man-machine interaction module when the snapshot is needed, and the control module intercepts the video information according to the control instruction, and directly stores the intercepted video information, so enough intelligence of an image or a short video intercepted in the snapshot process is guaranteed, the image or the short video can be stored as a souvenir or can be shared with friends, and the above operation is very convenient, and can effectively utilize the inforamiton stored by the travel recorder.

column2: ROBOT CONTROL SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DESIGN
column4: The utility model discloses a robot control system based on artificial intelligence design, including front end inductor system, information fusion system, embedded computer system, power supply system, master control PC, servo motor, big power?motor and program memory, the front end inductor connection?information fusion system of system, information fusion headtotail embedded computer system, program memory connects the embedded computer system, the embedded computer system connects servo motor and big power?motor respectively, electrical power generating system connects master control PC and embedded computer system respectively, front end inductor system can take the initiative or passive information monitoring passback to embedded computer system in, adopt the embedded computer system to load artificial intelligence control strategy's mode setting to combine the master control PC to carry out coordinated control, can carry out the robot sport administration under the mode of artificial intelligence management function, make whole robot have more the hommization.

column2: FEEDING ROBOT CONTROL SYSTEM FAULT DIAGNOSIS EXPERT SYSTEM AND DIAGNOSIS METHOD
column4: A feeding robot control system fault diagnosis expert system is composed of a detection system, an expert system, and an execution mechanism. The detection system is used for collecting the status information of a feeding robot control system in real time. The expert system is used for receiving the various status information of the feeding robot control system uploaded by the detection system and analyzing the status information in real time. The execution mechanism is used for receiving a control instruction issued by the expert system and executing the control instruction as required. According to the invention, the system carries out reasoning and makes judgment based on a lot of knowledge and experience of the feeding robot control system, through use of an artificial intelligence technology and according to the professional knowledge and experience provided by experts in the field, and simulates experts to make a decision. The feeding robot control system is monitored in real time. A fault can be diagnosed comprehensively and accurately and removed in a timely manner. Thus, good running status of the feeding robot control system is ensured, the working continuity and reliability and the duration of stable operation are improved, and the level of intelligence of feeding robots is improved.

column2: NPC DECISION MAKING MODELING METHOD IN DYNAMIC TERRAIN ANALYSIS BASED ON PROSPECT THEORY
column4: The present invention provides a non player character (NPC) decision making modeling method in dynamic terrain analysis based on a prospect theory, which is to enable decision making and an action an NPC to be modeled to approach to an actual selection pattern and an action pattern of a human by applying a prospect theory in behavioral economics to a game artificial intelligence technique. According to the present invention, the NPC decision making modeling method in dynamic terrain analysis based on a prospect theory arouses various NPC actions by enabling the each NPC to make different decisions using decision making algorithm based on the prospect theory in which the dynamic terrain analysis to which the prospect theory is applied is performed so a moving target point of the NPC is selected. So, the NPC decision making modeling method in dynamic terrain analysis based on a prospect theory can improve immersion and interest of a game user in a game and enables a three-dimensional and intelligent game design. Specifically, the NPC decision making modeling method in dynamic terrain analysis based on a prospect theory is efficiently applied to a real-time strategy game or a sport game to improve quality of the game. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2016

column2: INTELLIGENT BATTLING ROLE CONTROL SYSTEM AND METHOD IN TABLE TENNIS GAME
column4: The invention provides an intelligent battling role control system and method in a table tennis game. The system comprises an information interaction module and a logical operation module, wherein the information interaction module is used for receiving a ball hitting request which is transmitted to non-user controlled roles, wherein corresponding grade marks to the various non-user controlled roles, generating a calling command in accordance with the ball hitting request so as to obtain an aiming result, acquiring response action data for displaying simulated operating behaviors on balls and/or cues on a display interface in accordance with the aiming result, and outputting the response action data; and the logical operation module is used for receiving the calling command, calling an aiming operation unit which is in correspondence to the grade marks and is used for computing the aiming result in accordance with the grade marks of the non-user controlled roles, and generating the aiming result. In the mode of being independent of client and server-side settings or preferably embedded in the server-side setting, the control system ad the control method can conveniently regulate and configure AI (artificial intelligence) data timely in accordance with operation and product requirements.

column2: INTELLIGENT POWER GRID EQUIPMENT ON-LINE MONITORING SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent power grid equipment on-line monitoring system including a sensor set, a signal processor, an A/D converter, a DSP controller, a wireless communication module, a wireless center sensing network, a monitoring center, and an artificial intelligence diagnosis system. The sensor set is composed of a voltage sensor, a temperature sensor, a current sensor and a gas sensor which are connected with the signal processor. The signal processor is connected with the A/D converter, and the A/D converter is connected with the DSP controller. The wireless communication module is connected with the DSP controller. The wireless center sensing network is connected with the wireless communication module, and the wireless center sensing network is further connected with the monitoring center. The monitoring center is equipped with the artificial intelligence diagnosis system, and the artificial intelligence diagnosis system is connected with the monitoring center. With the intelligent power grid equipment on-line monitoring system, the time for planned power outage is reduced greatly, the running reliability of a power system is improved, the initial failure of power equipment can be found out timely, measures can be taken timely, and the degree of damage to equipment is reduced.

column2: METHOD OF PERSONALIZING, INDIVIDUALIZING, AND AUTOMATING THE MANAGEMENT OF HEALTHCARE FRAUD-WASTE-ABUSE TO UNIQUE INDIVIDUAL HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS
column4: A method of preventing healthcare fraud-waste-abuse uses artificial intelligence machines to limit financial losses. Healthcare payment request claims are analyzed by predictive models and their behavioral details are compared to running profiles unique to each healthcare provider submitting the claims. A decision results that the instant healthcare payment request claim is or is not fraudulent-wasteful-abusive. If it is, a second analysis of a group behavioral in which the healthcare provider is clustered using unsupervised learning algorithms and compared to a running profile unique to each group of healthcare providers submitting the claims. An overriding decision results if the instant healthcare payment request claim is or is not fraudulent-wasteful-abusive according to group behavior.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ASSISTED PHYSICAL THERAPY AND REHABILITATION ROBOT USED FOR TREATMENT OF DAMAGED AND WEAKENED MUSCLES AND REHABILITATION OF THE PATIENT
column4: A physical therapy and rehabilitation robot with an artificial intelligence for treating congenital or acquired joint, muscle, musculoskeletal system disorders and diseases affecting the locomotor system, minimizing the problems, handicaps or disabilities of the locomotor system, facilitating the daily life and minimizing dependence of a person on others for living, wherein it includes the following: a control panel, a head fastening element, a back fastening element, a leg-hip connection element, an arm exercise mechanism, an arm-shoulder connection mechanism and a leg exercise mechanism.
