column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MATTRESS
column4: The utility model relates to a mattress, concretely relates to artificial intelligence mattress. Including mattress skeleton, mattress face and control module, mattress skeleton inherence is located mattress face below and is equipped with the motion unit, the motion unit links to each other with control module. Real zero pressure sleep can be accomplished by user control bed surface and human body curve's degree of agreeing with, very big improvement sleep quality to this mattress to this mattress on can the dynamic adjustment mattress difference portion bit position connect temperature pressure parameter.

column2: LOCOMOTIVE DIFFERENTIATION WIRELESS RECONNECTION SYNCHRONOUS CONTROL METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention discloses a locomotive differentiation wireless reconnection synchronous control method based on artificial intelligence. On the basis of a locomotive control system, a set of locomotive differentiation wireless reconnection synchronous control system based on artificial intelligence is added so that differentiation locomotive reconnection synchronous traction running can be achieved. The locomotive differentiation wireless reconnection synchronous control system based on artificial intelligence is added to an original locomotive, and therefore differentiation locomotive wireless reconnection marshalling is achieved. Multiple differentiation locomotives are controlled to run in a wireless reconnection mode, interconnection among the locomotives can be built fast, effectively and stably, and interconnection and reconnection control over locomotives of different types is achieved.

column2: AUTOMATIC OPTIMIZATION-SEARCHING CONTROL METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses an automatic optimization-searching control method based on the artificial intelligence algorithm. The automatic optimization-searching control method based on the artificial intelligence algorithm comprises a step S1, obtaining an initial value of a control parameter of a machine and enabling the machine to operate stably at the initial value, and a step S2, performing oscillation adjustment on the control parameter of the machine through the artificial intelligence algorithm according to a change feedback of a performance coefficient, and enabling the performance coefficient to tend to an optimal value. According to the automatic optimization-searching control method based on the artificial intelligence algorithm, the problem that the machine cannot be always kept at the best running state in the prior art can be solved. The performance coefficient tends to the optimal value.

column2: PERSONAL SUBMERSIBLE DRONE FOR AQUATIC EXPLORATION
column4: The invention is directed toward an autonomous submersible aquatic drone, a system utilizing an autonomous submersible aquatic drone and a control unit, a control unit for controlling an autonomous submersible aquatic drone, and a method for using the same. The autonomous submersible aquatic drone comprises a shaped housing, a propulsion system, one or more electromotors, a camera, a sonar unit, a wireless transponder, a battery, a microcontroller unit, and a control hardware unit. The control hardware unit is configured with artificial intelligence logic. The submersible drone surveys a predetermined area around a person engaged in a water sport for the presence of an underwater threat. When the aquatic drone detects the presence of an underwater threat the submersible drone sends a warning signal to a control unit worn by the person. The aquatic drone may also have a threat response unit to deter an attack on the person.

column2: METHOD, APPARATUS, AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EDITOR FOR IMPLEMENTING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BEHAVIOR
column4: Methods, apparatus and artificial intelligence (AI) editors for implementing an AI behavior are provided herein. In an exemplary method, an AI behavior configuration file can be obtained. The AI behavior configuration file can be configured using at least one preset component, and the AI behavior configuration file matches logic of a preset AI behavior. It can be tested whether a result of running the AI behavior configuration file reaches a preset effect. When the result of running the AI behavior configuration file reaches the preset effect, the preset AI behavior can be implemented according to the AI behavior configuration file.

column2: METHOD, APPARATUS, AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EDITOR FOR IMPLEMENTING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BEHAVIOR
column4: Methods, apparatus and artificial intelligence (AI) editors for implementing an AI behavior are provided herein. In an exemplary method, an AI behavior configuration file can be obtained. The AI behavior configuration file can be configured using at least one preset component,and the AI behavior configuration file matches logic of a preset AI behavior. It can be tested whether a result of running the AI behavior configuration file reaches a preset effect. When the result of running the AI behavior configuration file reaches the preset effect, the preset AI behavior can be implemented according to the AI behavior configuration file.

column2: ON-BOARD INTEGRATED CREW SUPPORT INFORMATION SYSTEM AND COGNITIVE FORMAT OF PRESENTING FLIGHT INFORMATION AT TAKE-OFF PHASE OF MULTI-ENGINE AIRCRAFT
column4: FIELD: physics, computer engineering. SUBSTANCE: group of inventions relates to self-contained digital integrated systems of on-board equipment of multi-engine aircraft. The on-board information support system comprises a take-off dynamics module, an altitude-speed and meteorological parameter module, a flight characteristics module, an aerodynamics module, an engine thrust module, an aerodrome database module and a global database of the topography of the underlying surface EGPWS of high precision in 3D format and minimum safe altitude, an analysis and decision-making module and other modules. The disclosed cognitive format of presenting information on a flight display includes a synthesized display of the runway with an axial line, the runway threshold, display of the boundaries of maximum allowed lateral deviation of aircraft take-off run and other vital displays. The flight display, on the background of the windscreen, further displays commands to raise the nose wheel, take-off, accelerate the aircraft to safe climbing speeds and commands to maintain an optimum pitch angle at the airborne part of the take-off distance, as well as commands to turn and emergency climb to prevent collision with the underlying surface and manmade obstacles. The formats of said parameters are displayed using principles of activating visual perception of information in information support of the crew in cognitive operations of the crew using principles of artificial intelligence, completeness of information presentation, relevancy and interactivity. EFFECT: easier control of aircraft and safer flights. 20 cl, 10 dwg, 3 tbl

column2: INTELLIGENT POWER GRID EQUIPMENT ON-LINE MONITORING SYSTEM
column4: The utility model discloses an intelligent power grid equipment on-line monitoring system including a sensor set, a signal processor, an A/D converter, a DSP controller, a wireless communication module, a wireless center sensing network, a monitoring center, and an artificial intelligence diagnosis system, the sensor set includes a voltage sensor, a temperature sensor, a current sensor, and a gas sensor that are connected with the signal processor, the signal processor is connected with the A/D converter, the A/D converter is connected with the DSP controller, the wireless communication module is connected with the DSP controller, the wireless center sensing network is connected with the wireless communication module, the wireless center sensing network is connected with the monitoring center, the artificial intelligence diagnosis system is arranged on the monitoring center, and the artificial intelligence diagnosis system is connected with the monitoring center. The intelligent power grid equipment on-line monitoring system can greatly reduce the time for planned power off, improves the running reliability of a power system, can timely find out the initial failure of power equipment and timely take some measures, and reduces the damage degree of the equipment.

column2: TRAINING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: A method and system is presented that may be used for providing workouts. The system includes a plurality of units, or ?œcones,??which may be placed on a field. The units are in wireless communication with a hand-held device, which may facilitate the setting up and running of workouts. In one embodiment, the units are placed in a layout on a field, and a sequence of units is actuated to signal the user to move towards particular units. The units also contain devices that sense the presence of the user. In certain embodiments, the system modifies the pattern during a run using an artificial intelligence algorithm. In other embodiments, the units include devices that may be used to trilateralize the positions of the devices using acoustic ranging.

column2: TRAINING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column4: A method and system is presented that may be used for providing workouts. The system includes a plurality of units, or "cones," which may be placed on a field. The units are in wireless communication with a hand-held device, which may facilitate the setting up and running of workouts. In one embodiment, the units are placed in a layout on a field, and a sequence of units is actuated to signal the user to move towards particular units. The units also contain devices that sense the presence of the user. In certain embodiments, the system modifies the pattern during a run using an artificial intelligence algorithm. In other embodiments, the units include devices that may be used to trilateralize the positions of the devices using acoustic ranging.

column2: INTELLIGENT SWIMMING SYSTEM BASED ON INTERNET OF THINGS AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to an intelligent swimming system based on the Internet of Things and artificial intelligence. According to the intelligent swimming system based on the Internet of Things and artificial intelligence, drowning accidents can be prevented through an intelligent swimming bracelet and an intelligent monitoring life-saving system, and convenience is brought to positioning and rescuing; corresponding exercise plans can be made for different swimmers through communication between the intelligent swimming bracelet worn by one swimmer, the intelligent monitoring life-saving system, a cloud platform and a mobile client terminal.

column2: FAILURE RECOVERY METHOD BASED ON MIDDLE-HIGH VOLTAGE POWER DISTRIBUTION NETWORK
column4: The invention discloses a failure recovery method based on a middle-high voltage power distribution network. The method comprises the steps that a power distribution network transformer high-voltage side busbar breaks down; the first-stage optimization process is started, and a fault busbar is cut off; the artificial intelligence algorithm is utilized for network reconstruction; the switch combination of an optimal solution is obtained; whether the optimal solution meets the constraint condition or not is judged, if yes, the reconstruction process is finished, and if not, the second-stage optimization is carried out; a leaf node of the low-voltage power distribution network on a subtree of out-of-limit nodes is searched for; the feeder load on the leaf node is cut off, and a new network structure is obtained; under the new network parameters, reconstruction is started to be optimized again. According to the failure recovery strategy based on the middle-high voltage power distribution network, the two-stage optimization strategy is provided according to the different degrees of importance of target functions, the artificial intelligence algorithm is sufficiently utilized for achieving power distribution network optimization reconstruction, the reconstruction time is shortened, the benefits are maximized, and the failure recovery method is used in power distribution network planning, reduces network losses and improves economic benefits and the power distribution network running quality.

column2: INTELLIGENT IRIS IDENTITY RECOGNITION SYSTEM APPLIED TO MOBILE COMMUNICATION DEVICE
column4: The invention discloses an iris safety certification method with artificial intelligence. A system for achieving the iris safety certification method comprises a display part, a camera shooting part, an operation part and a control part. The iris safety certification method is characterized in that a, an image comprising a user iris is extracted from an image shot by the camera shooting part and compared with a pre-registered iris template, and the iris certification function is achieved; under the condition that the iris image is coincident with the iris template, it is judged that the current user and a registered user with the pre-stored iris template are the same person, iris certification is determined to be successful, and otherwise, the certification is determined to be unsuccessful; b, when the iris certification is successful and the mobile communication device normally works, a mobile device automatically inquires the user about whether the iris mouse function is used or not, or the user directly requests to implement the iris mouse function in a button manual operation mode. By means of the iris safety certification method, the iris certification can be carried out when the mobile communication device is started, and when the application with the specific function is carried out, multiple safety guarantees can also be provided for the user in an iris certification mode.

column2: INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column4: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an information processing method and an electronic device, for overcoming the technical problem that user characteristics obtained in the prior art are not complete enough. The method is applied to a first electronic device, and includes the steps of: detecting to obtain M pieces of behavior data of a first user, wherein the M pieces of behavior data specifically represents the data of M operations which have been performed on the at least one object in a first display interface by the first user, when a first application program in a second electronic device is running and corresponding to the first display interface; calling a behavior model analysis module; inputting the M pieces of behavior data into the behavior model analysis module to allow the behavior model analysis module to analyze and process the M pieces of behavior data, and thereby generating a processing result; obtaining the processing result, and determining a first characteristic value corresponding to the first characteristic information of the first user according to the processing result, wherein the first characteristic information is the information for representing the identity, physiological characteristics and/or hobbies and interests of the first user.

column2: PERSONIFICATION LEARNING TYPE INTERACTIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXPERT SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses a personification learning type interactive artificial intelligence expert system, which is characterized by being composed of artificial intelligence software, an expert management system, a cloud service platform and a client, wherein the running basis of the artificial intelligence software comprises a basic fact set, an execution attribute set capable of being possessed by each basic fact and a user set which are managed by the expert management system; first-dimension basic facts refer to specific typical types of goods or objects and are defined by the expert management system; second-dimension execution attributes refer to actions which can be executed or variation attributes of the objects described by the basic facts, and the specific content of the attributes and applicable users are defined by the expert management system; the user set refers to all users who access to the artificial intelligence software through client registration; and the cloud service platform is stored with the artificial intelligence software and running data thereof, the expert management system and running data thereof, and data indicating whether the users have cognition or not for each attribute of each basic fact set. Disclosed by the invention is a rather simple personification interactive artificial intelligence expert system.

column2: COMPUTERIZED VOTING SYSTEM
column4: Officials using computers for research, create lists of Registered Voters, Proxy Voters whom are sent machine readable encoded documents (registration, language choice, voting ballots), optional return containers. Linking each document to correlated receipt(s) by sharing unique Random Symbolic Identifier(s), other Security Elements. For voting privacy, Voters exchange Ballots within their Voting Region. Voters complete document(s), add Personal Security Identifier(s), keep document receipt, send documents to Officials In-Person or by Postal Mail, Delivery Service, Telephone, Fax, Internet, Email, Interactive Television. Officials receiving documents provide delivery confirmation. Document image machine recorded, Identifier correlated, stored. When document timely, valid, authentic?”voter information, selections, write-in choices, personal security items are machine read via software template, read data correlated to document RSID, data stored, published to Voter privately accessible data vault. Adequately completed documents are tallied for certifying. Official computers running artificial intelligence programs manage data (security, processing, integrity), communications, devices: availability, workload allocation.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FULL-AUTOMATIC-RESTORATION E-BIKE CONTROLLER AND VOICE LOUDSPEAKER DEVICE THEREOF
column4: Disclosed are an artificial intelligence full-automatic-restoration e-bike controller and a voice loudspeaker device thereof. A program is preset in a single chip microcomputer circuit of a controller circuit and used for enabling the single chip microcomputer circuit to automatically detect fault types according to changes of abnormal electric signals of related ports when an e-bike circuit is in circuit faults, allowing low-speed traveling in a safe mode, except speed-adjusting rolling handle fault; faults are automatically restored temporarily by using a method set in the program to enable the controller circuit to be in a low-speed traveling state; when the speed-adjusting rolling handle of an e-bike is rotated, or when the speed-adjusting rolling handle of the e-bike is not loosened while automatically-restorable circuit faults occur during traveling, and the single chip microcomputer circuit receives speed-adjusting signals through a speed-adjusting signal input wiring end and controls a driving circuit to output a driving power source for low-speed traveling and adjustable in traveling speed in the safe mode to a/ motor driving power source output wiring end. In addition, the voice loudspeaker device can be added to realize voice prompting of the fault types, temporary automatic restoration and low-speed traveling.

column2: COMPUTERIZED VOTING SYSTEM
column4: Officials using computers research then create lists of Certified Registered Voters and Proxies whom are sent computer encoded ballots and return containers. Each Ballot and correlated Receipt(s) share a unique Random Symbolic Identifier (RSID) and embedded Security Elements to prevent counterfeiting. For privacy, before voting, Voters-Proxies optionally exchange ballots within their Voting Region, validating ballots by submitting Ballot Validation RSID to Officials. Voter-Proxy completes ballot(s), adds Personal Security Identifier(s), receives ballot receipt, delivery receipt upon sending ballot to Officials via postal mail, Interactive Television, Internet, Telephone, Fax, Email, In-person. Received ballots are scanned and recorded; if timely and authentic, voter selections are extracted, tallied if properly marked, and published to Voters' private data area accessed via Receipt RSID and passcode. Official devices, communications computer processing partially managed and optimized by computers running artificial intelligence software programs. After voting ends, Officials publish data for verification.

column2: SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLING WIRELESS OPERATION GOLF CART FOR GOLF FIELD
column4: The present invention relates to a system for controlling a wireless operation golf cart for a gold field, and more particularly, to a system for controlling a wireless operation golf cart for a gold field, which includes a remote controller having a GPS module and a Bluetooth module, and a cart. The cart tracks the remote controller while being maintained to be spaced apart from the remote controller by a predetermined interval based on a distance between the cart and the remote controller. The distance is calculated based on a comparison value obtained by comparing location information about a remote controller received through the Bluetooth module with location information about a cart obtained through a GPS module; and the intensity of a wireless signal transmitted from the Bluetooth module of the remote controller. According to the present invention, when a golfer possessing the remote controller moves in a golf field, the cart automatically tracks the remote controller while being maintained to be spaced apart from the remote controller by the predetermined interval, so a golf bag of the golfer can be transferred without the limitation in a golf bag transfer area. In addition, since the cart tracks the golfer without any operations of the remote controller, convenience can be provided to the golfer. In addition, in case that an exceptional situation such as an obstacle or a steep grade while automatically tracking the golfer, the cart can make a detour of the obstacle or steep grade by artificial intelligence or can inform the golfer of the situation to allow the golfer to manually control the cart. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2014

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ASSISTED PHYSICAL THERAPY AND REHABILITATION ROBOT USED FOR TREATMENT OF DAMAGED AND WEAKENED MUSCLES AND REHABILITATION OF THE PATIENT
column4: The present invention relates to a physical therapy and rehabilitation robot with an artificial intelligence on its own for treating congenital or acquired joint, muscle, musculoskeletal system disorders and diseases affecting the locomotor system, minimizing the problems, handicaps or disabilities of the locomotor system, facilitating the daily life and minimizing dependence of a person on others for living, wherein it comprises the following: a control panel (10), a head fastening element (20), a back fastening element (30), a leg - hip connection element (40), an arm exercise mechanism (50, 50'), an arm - shoulder connection mechanism (60) and a leg exercise mechanism (70, 70').

column2: ROBOT SOCCER DYNAMIC DECISION-MAKING DEVICE AND METHOD BASED ON ANT COLONY ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses a robot soccer dynamic decision-making device and method based on an ant colony algorithm, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The robot soccer dynamic decision-making device comprises an information monitoring and extracting module, a situation assessment module, a motion decision-making module and an effect assessment and feedback module. The robot soccer dynamic decision-making method is based on the device and comprises the steps that the information of an opposite side, the own side and a soccer on a ball park are acquired through the information monitoring and extracting module; the situation assessment module is used for accessing the situation of the ball park; the motion decision-making module is used for selecting the next motion scheme to be executed; the effect assessment and feedback module is used for comparing an expected result with an actual execution result, and the priority of the motion scheme is updated. According to the device and method, the defect that a current robot is poor in dynamic adaptability in a soccer game is overcome, the decision-making success rate is high, the tactic strategy of the own side can be modified dynamically, and tactic effectiveness and the whole offensive and defensive ability of a team are improved.

column2: METHOD FOR PROVIDING SHOOTING GAME, APPARATUS THEREOF, AND RECORDING MEDIUM THEREOF
column4: The purpose of the present invention is to provide a shooting game which can manipulate multiple characters while having a first person shooter (FPS) type game interface in order to increase game coenesthesia of a game player and give the game player strategic fun in a game. A method for providing a shooting game, where multiple characters are grouped as one team which targets the position of the other team, comprises: a game screen display controlling step which displays and controls the screen of a game in first person point of view of a player character; a player character controlling step which controls the player character by the FPS manipulation of a game player according to the game screen in first person; and a team member character controlling step which controls the characters of team members other than the player character through an artificial intelligence module, and controls such that at least one character among the characters of team members can execute a motion corresponding to special manipulation of the game player when the special manipulation, different from the FPS manipulation of the game player, is recognized. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2014

column2: METHOD FOR SEGMENTING COLOR IMAGES ON BASIS OF BIO-INSPIRED COMPUTATION
column4: The invention discloses a method for segmenting color images on the basis of bio-inspired computation, and relates to a method for segmenting images. An optimized artificial intelligence algorithm is adopted in the method. The method includes steps of inputting original images and converting the RGB (red, green, blue) images into HSV (hue, saturation, value) spaces; reading three components HSV and respectively acquiring corresponding segmented images by the aid of the PS<2>O (particle swarm optimization) algorithm on the basis of bio-inspired computation; combining segmentation results of the three components HSV with one another to obtain final segmented images. The method has the advantages that the segmentation performance can be adaptively adjusted; the integral running speed of the algorithm can be increased, and the segmentation precision of the color images can be improved; novel ideas can be provided for analyzing complicated problems, and accordingly the method has a broad application prospect in the aspects of image processing, image recognition, communication, decision optimization and the like.

column2: COMPUTERIZED VOTING SYSTEM
column4: Officials using computers research and create lists of Certified Registered Voters and Proxies whom are sent computer encoded ballots and return containers. Each Ballot and correlated Receipt(s) share a unique Random Symbolic Identifier (RSID) and use embedded Security Elements to prevent counterfeiting. For privacy, before voting, Voters-Proxies optionally exchange ballots and return containers within their Voting Region, validating ballots electronically or in-person by submitting Ballot Validation RSID to Officials. Voter-Proxy completes ballot(s), adds Personal Security Identifier(s), receives ballot receipt, delivery receipt upon sending ballot to Officials via postal mail, Interactive Television, Internet, Telephone, Fax, Email, In-person. Received ballots are electronically-optically recorded; if timely and authentic, voter selections are extracted, tallied if properly marked, and published to Voters' private data area accessed via Receipt RSID. Official devices, communications computer processing partially managed and optimized by computers running artificial intelligence software programs. After voting ends, Officials publish all data for integrity verification.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PROVIDING WEAPON ITEM INFORMATION OF SHOOTING GAME
column4: Provided is a technology for recommending a weapon item appropriate for the play tendency of a user. A method for providing weapon item information of a shooting game according to an embodiment of the present invention includes: a step in which an apparatus providing information on a weapon item of a shooting game, which is a game played by at least one user and has a play method of removing an attack target character by attacking the attack target character, which is operated by another user or an artificial intelligence, by mounting a weapon item on a user character, extracts play history information of the user character from a play history database storing information on the history for the user to play the game provided in the shooting game by operating the user character; a step of selecting data on an attack success probability which is data on a ratio of attack success on the attacked target part of the attack target character, as to the total attack number of the user character using the extracted play history information, but selecting the data on the attack success probability for each attack target area by dividing the attacked target part into at least one attack target area; a step of selecting at least one weapon item from a weapon item database of a game server, using the attack success probability for each attack target area; and a step of controlling to output a list of the selected weapon items on an item shop access screen of a user terminal. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2014

column2: SELF-LEARNING TRANSIT PARTICLE SWARM ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ALGORITHM
column4: The invention discloses a self-learning transit particle swarm artificial intelligence algorithm. The self-learning transit particle swarm artificial intelligence algorithm comprises the steps that (1), all parameters of the self-learning transit particle swarm algorithm are input; (2) values are assigned to the positions and the speeds of particles at random, the fitness values of the particles are calculated, and an initial population is generated; (3) self-adaptive adjustment is conducted on inertia weights of the particles, the positions and the speeds of the particles are renewed, a new generation of population is generated, a new fitness value is calculated and compared with an individual optimum value and a global optimum value, and whether renewing needs to be conducted or not is judged; (4) the flying direction of a global optimum particle is modified through migration, and a new population is generated; (5) whether the condition that the fitness value of the global optimum particle is continuously smaller than a given convergence threshold value multiple times or the condition that the fitness value of the global optimum particle reaches the maximum iteration is met is judged, if not, the step (3) is executed again, and if yes, iteration is stopped and a final optimization result is output. According to the self-learning transit particle swarm artificial intelligence algorithm, the rate of convergence is increased, the accuracy of convergence is improved, and the problem that a particle swarm algorithm is prone to local optimum can be effectively solved.

column2: FUZZY INFERENCE-TYPE AUTOMATIC SAILING METHOD OF YACHT
column4: The present invention relates to a fuzzy inference-type automatic sailing method of a yacht and, more specifically, to a fuzzy inference-type automatic sailing method of a yacht enabling even an ordinary person rather than a yacht expert to smoothly and easily drive a yacht to enjoy water leisure, by automatically controlling directions of a sail or rotation angles of a rudder using an artificial intelligence obtained by a fuzzy inference. According to the present invention, the fuzzy inference derived from a direction of wind blowing toward a yacht, a progressing direction of a yacht hull, and a rotation angle of a rudder installed beneath the yacht hull, can be used to calculate a target category area and a target attack angle. In accordance with the calculated results, an operation of an electric winch for winding and unwinding a rope connected to the sail can be controlled, thus enabling an automatic control of the yacht. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2014

column2: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR ANALYSING A GOLF SWING
column4: An apparatus for measuring or analysing a golf swing includes a processing means and a detection means. The detection means is operable to detect ground-reaction forces, and includes a standing surface and sensor means. The apparatus further includes an artificial intelligence means. The processing means includes an early-processing means, and information from the sensor means or detection means is processable by the early processing means, into data which better characterises the swing, before being received by the artificial intelligence means. The artificial intelligence means is operable to receive and process information from the early-processing means.

column2: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR ANALYZING A GOLF SWING
column4: This invention is an apparatus and method for measuring or analyzing a golf swing. Measurement or analysis is made relative to energy generation and transfer through a player's body and club. The measurement or analysis data is principally obtained from the player's ground-reaction forces. Processed signals are analyzed with an artificial intelligence system. Ground-reaction forces relate to reaction forces which occur between a standing surface and the player's feet. The apparatus and method measures or analyses a golf swing in an automatic manner or in an automatic and interactive manner.

column2: METHOD FOR UPDATING THERMOTECHNICAL SOFT MEASUREMENT MODEL BASED ON BUFFER BLOCK SEQUENCE DESIGN
column4: The invention relates to a method for updating a thermotechnical soft measurement model based on the buffer block sequence design, and belongs to the cross technical field of a thermotechnical technology and the artificial intelligence. The method is characterized in that an auxiliary variable is used as the input of the model, a predicted key variable is used as the output of the model, and the initial soft measurement model is established by selecting historical running data; the updating time sequence is designed by utilizing the buffer block, the latest sampled data sample is temporarily stored into the buffer block, after the buffer block is full, the performance of the model is judged so as to determine whether updating the model or not; the updating of the model is not carried out for the sample of the current moment, and the samples in the buffer block are gradually updated one by one. By adopting the buffer block time sequence design updating method, the measurement noise is lowered, the influence of an outlier sample on the performance of the model is reduced, so that the updating of the model can be prevented from being triggered by the noise and interference collection in the sample; meanwhile, the updating module can be applied to the real engineering, the updating frequency is also reduced, and the calculation time is reduced.

column2: ONLINE SHOOTING GAME PROVIDING METHOD AND GAME PROVIDING SERVER
column4: The present invention relates to the technology of game provision. An online shooting game providing method according to an embodiment of the present invention is performed in a game providing server capable of providing a virtual online shooting game using a plurality of characters controlled by game clients and being connected to the game clients through a network. The online shooting game providing method includes: a step (a) of setting two or more teams of the characters controlled by the game clients; a step (b) of granting one or more artificial intelligence (AI) characters performing an action according to a command of a user character and following the user character; and a step (c) of providing the online shooting game by placing the two teams including the AI characters following the user characters in a virtual space. According to the invention, user interest can be improved by providing a new type of online shooting game by providing it in a type for group direction with the AI characters differently set according to each game mode. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2014 [Reference numerals] (110) Communication part; (120) Game room management part; (130) AI character management part; (140) Attack determining part; (150) Game provision control part

column2: INTERNET BASED ARTIFICIAL-INTELLIGENCE KNOWLEDGE LOGIC SYSTEM AND METHOD THEREOF
column4: The invention discloses an internet based artificial-intelligence knowledge logic system and a method thereof. The method includes gathering, organizing and analyzing problems of users; handling problem points and problem corrections of the users, and gathering, organizing and inputting related collected data into a computer; completing data transmission and judgment by a data analysis and program logic system of the computer; entering a logic knowledge base online system for analyzing and processing, mining data, and collecting and mining related data information; after object data analysis is completed, entering a final gathering and organizing stage of the logic knowledge base online system, and entering a rapid logic knowledge calculation and forecast process of a logic deduction rule database online system; after analyzing and judging by the logic knowledge base online system and the logic deduction rule database online system, providing reference answers, methods and suggestions for the users by combing opinions of related industrial experts. The system comprises a computer server, a timing relay and a computer client. By the system and the method thereof, related decision analysis and suggestion reports are provided, and decision risks are reduced.

column2: INTELLIGENT AIR CONDITIONER CONTROL SYSTEM
column4: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and aims to solve the problems that air conditioners can not utilize sources equally in the prior art, multiples air conditioners used at the same time leads to energy waste and household air conditioners can not connect with other intelligent electric appliance and intelligent residential districts. An intelligent air conditioner control system comprises an indoor unit, an outdoor unit, and an intelligent control box. The intelligent control box is connected with the indoor unit and the outdoor unit separately, the indoor unit checks and transmits indoor environment parameters to the intelligent control box, the outdoor unit checks and transmits outdoor environment parameters to the intelligent control box, and the intelligent control box receives indoor environment parameters transmitted by the indoor unit and outdoor environment parameters transmitted by the outdoor unit and performs optimal allocation according to system running optimized rules and human body comfortable rules, adjusts and controls the whole system, and allocates the operation of the indoor unit and the outdoor unit. The intelligent air conditioner control system is applicable to the intelligent household electrical appliance system.

column2: GAME SYSTEM, METHOD FOR PROVIDING GAME, TERMINAL AND RECORDING MEDIUM FOR STORING GAME PROGRAM
column4: Provided are a game system, a method for providing a game, a portable terminal and a recording medium for storing a game program. The game system herein is a game system that provides a game in which a plurality of user terminals connected through a network participate, the game system comprising: a game proceeding unit for running, according to a game request from a first user terminal, a game in which each artificial intelligence character of the first user terminal and of at least one second user terminal selected by the first user terminal participates; and a notifying unit for transmitting, to at least one second user terminal, a notification for inquiring about whether to interfere in the game being executed. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2014 [Reference numerals] (100) First user terminal; (200) Second user terminal; (300) Network; (400) Game system

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FULL-AUTOMATIC REPAIR ELECTRIC VEHICLE CONTROLLER AND VOICE HORN DEVICE THEREOF
column4: The invention provides an artificial intelligence full-automatic repair electric vehicle controller and a voice horn device thereof. The artificial intelligence full-automatic repair electric vehicle controller comprises a mainframe shell, a controller circuit, a classification signal output terminal and the voice horn device, wherein the classification signal output terminal is electrically connected with a single chip microcomputer circuit in the controller circuit, the voice horn device is electrically connected with the classification signal output terminal, and no one-key repair signal input terminal is arranged. When an electric vehicle has faults, the single chip microcomputer circuit automatically detects the types of the faults according to changes of abnormal electric signals of relative ports, automatically completes repair, and controls a driving circuit to output a low-speed running driving power supply when a speed regulating handle is rotated. Meanwhile, the single chip microcomputer circuit outputs fault classification signals to the classification signal output terminal so that the voice horn device can prompt the types of the faults which are temporarily repaired through voice, and low-speed running can be conducted. According to the artificial intelligence full-automatic repair electric vehicle controller and the voice horn device thereof, artificial intelligence technique is applied better, fault repair work is completed in a full-automatic mode, and the trouble that a vehicle owner must learn first, then start to complete the specific operation method of one-key repair and can drive the vehicle at low speed when the vehicle has the faults and is parked is avoided.

column2: COMPUTERIZED VOTING SYSTEM
column4: Officials using computers research then create lists of Certified Registered Voters and Proxies whom are sent computer encoded ballots and return containers. Each Ballot and correlated Receipt(s) share a unique Random Symbolic Identifier (RSID) and embedded Security Elements to prevent counterfeiting. For privacy, before voting, Voters-Proxies optionally exchange ballots within their Voting Region, validating ballots by submitting Ballot Validation RSID to Officials. Voter-Proxy completes ballot(s), adds Personal Security Identifier(s), receives ballot receipt, delivery receipt upon sending ballot to Officials via postal mail, Interactive Television, Internet, Telephone, Fax, Email, In-person. Received ballots are scanned and recorded; if timely and authentic, voter selections are extracted, tallied if properly marked, and published to Voters' private data area accessed via Receipt RSID and passcode. Official devices, communications computer processing partially managed and optimized by computers running artificial intelligence software programs. After voting ends, Officials publish data for verification.

column2: METHOD FOR OPTIMIZING DISASTER EMERGENCY DECISION SYSTEM PATH
column4: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence algorithms, and provides a method for optimizing a disaster emergency decision system path. The method comprises the steps that S11, an objective function and a fitness function are defined; S12, chromosome coding is carried out; S13, operators are selected according to the fitness function; S14, the operators are crossed; S15, the operators are mutated according to the fitness function and pheromone updating guiding mutation rules; S16, a plurality of sets of optimal solutions are generated, and the best solution is output through the fitness function. The quality and efficiency of the solutions are effectively improved through the pheromone guiding mutation rules of an ant colony algorithm. A large amount of useless redundant iteration of a genetic algorithm is avoided through the positive feedback mechanism and the parallelism of the ant colony algorithm, and the solution speed of the genetic algorithm is further improved. The decision model with a single saving point and multiple disaster points based on continuous supply losses is more suitable for emergency situations, and practical significance is achieved.

column2: THERMAL PROCESS SOFT SENSOR MODELING METHOD BASED ON LEAST SQUARES AND SUPPORT VECTOR MACHINE ENSEMBLE
column4: The invention discloses a thermal process soft sensor modeling method based on least squares and support vector machine ensemble, and belongs to the technical fields of thermal process and artificial intelligence intersection. The method includes selecting auxiliary variables as an input of a model and key variables to be predicted as an output of the model, selecting running data as an initial training sample, utilizing the soft fuzzy c-means clustering (SFCM) method to divide the initial sample into sub-datasets which are overlapped and which are provided with differences, establishing individual models on each sub-dataset, and synthesizing predicted outputs of the individual models to obtain estimation of the key variable; aiming to optional new acquired sample xk, obtaining a corresponding predicted value. According to the thermal process soft sensor modeling method, the soft fuzzy C-means clustering method is adopted, predicting accuracy is improved by means of establishing integrated models, calculating of the models is easier, and calculating efficiency is improved; boundary samples are processed effectively, the process is convenient to implement, the key variable can be predicted accurately, and important significance is provided to optimized operation of the thermal process system.

column2: METHOD FOR ADVANCING MOBILE BASEBALL GAME WITH CHANGEABLE GAME MODE
column4:
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a method for advancing a mobile baseball game with changeable game modes.
SOLUTION: A method for advancing a mobile baseball game with changeable game modes is provided. Specifically, when a baseball game proceeds on a user terminal such as a smart phone, a game mode can be selected out of a baseball team mode in which a game is advanced by artificial intelligence (AI) of a game server, a coach mode in which the game server advances only the detailed matter of pitching and batting with AI, and a player mode in which a user advances all operations of the game. In this method for advancing the mobile baseball game with changeable game modes, the player can enjoy the game in a suitable method according to the situation of the user when enjoying the baseball game using a mobile terminal such as the smart phone, and a degree of the user intervening in the control of the game can be adjusted to have an effect of increasing the user's interest.
COPYRIGHT: (C)2014,JPO&INPIT

column2: METHOD OF PROGRESSING MOBILE BASEBALL GAME CAPABLE OF CHANGING GAME MODE
column4: The present invention relates to a method of progressing a mobile baseball game capable of changing a game mode, and more specifically, to a method of progressing a mobile baseball game capable of changing a game mode, in which when the baseball game is played at a user terminal such as a smart phone, the game mode can be selected among an owner mode in which the game is entirely progressed by artificial intelligence (AI) of a game server, a manager mode in which only details of pitching and hitting are progressed by the AI of the game server, and a player mode in which a user performs the entire handling of the game.

column2: DEVICE AND METHOD FOR ANALYSIS OF SWING IN GOLF
column4: FIELD: games. SUBSTANCE: present invention is intended for a device and method for measuring or analysing swing in golf. Measurement or analysis is performed with respect to generation and transmission of energy through the body of the player and the stick. The data of the measurements or analysis are mainly obtained from ground contact forces of the player. The processed signals are analysed by the artificial intelligence system. The ground contact forces refer to the reaction forces that occur between the motionless surface and the soles of the player. EFFECT: device and method are for measuring or analyzing swing in golf or with automatic means or automatic and interactive means that enables to analyse the movements of the athlete and the stick when hitting the ball in the most accurate way. 29 cl, 18 dwg

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AUTOMOBILITY FOR FORK LIFTS
column4: The Artificial Intelligence Automobility (AIA) for fork lift is designed to make the process of stocking warehouses and material handling in industries safer and more efficient. With current manually operated fork-lifts, employees are at risk of injury. Employers also spend a lot of money on insurance and paying multiple employees to operate fork-lifts in their warehouses. The AIA will limit the need for employees to operate fork-lifts manually. Automatic Fork-lift is much more efficient and safer than the conventional fork-lifts. It will provide much greater safety while working in industries. Our implementation also helps industries by saving their money in material handling process i.e. the money actually industries spending on the workers of material handling, Fork-lifts truck Drivers and Helpers. This invention has improvised the working in all the medium and large scale industries providing sequential and accident free working while material handling in Warehouses, Shop floors, inside plant etc. Following invention is described in detail with the help of Figure 1 of sheet 1 shows conventional manually battery operated fork lift, Figure 2 of sheet 1 shows top view of designed embodiment of automated fork lift, Figure 3 of sheet 2 shows Artificial Intelligence Automobility, Figure 4 of sheet 3 shows Working of RFID?™s, Figure 5 of sheet 3 shows Proxy sensors, Figure 6 of sheet 4 shows microcontroller with a to d decoder, Figure 7 of sheet 4 shows microcontroller program with relay.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MANAGING GAME SIMULATION
column4: Disclosed are a method and an apparatus for managing a game simulation. The method for managing the game simulation of an online sports game, according to the present invention, comprises the steps of: receiving from a user terminal a selection input of a simulation item, which is an item for simulating a result of a game played by a team managed by a user run by artificial intelligence instead of the user, the game included in a predetermined game mode that determines a winning team by at least one game played according to a winning percentage determination method or a tournament method from a plurality of teams run by the user and run by the artificial intelligence of a game server; simulating a game between the team run by the user and one of a plurality of teams run by the artificial intelligence in accordance with the predetermined game mode; and providing a result of the simulated game to a user terminal.

column2: METHOD AND SERVER FOR PROVIDING NATION-TO-NATION BATTLE MATCH IN ONLINE SPORTS GAME
column4: Provided is a technique for increasing utilization by users by providing a novel multiplay mode in an online sports game. A method for providing an nation-to-nation battle match mode in the online sports game, according to one embodiment of the present invention, comprises the steps of: a server providing the online sports game providing to the users a first play mode, which is a game mode for providing battle play using national teams between a user who has selected one team from national teams included in a recent national battle match and belonging to each predetermined group included in the nation-to-nation battle match, and another user who has selected on national team belong to the same group as that of the user, from a real sports game corresponding to a game category; changing the play mode of the user corresponding to the user terminal from the first play mode when a selection input is made with respect to a play mode change menu, which is a menu through which a play mode change request can be made from the user terminal; providing a second play mode, which is a game mode for providing a tournament-type game play between a team managed by a predetermined first number of users whose play modes are changed and a team managed by artificial intelligence of a predetermined second number of servers; and providing a predetermined compensation benefit usable in the game to a user determined to be the winner in the finals of a tournament as the result of running the second play mode.

column2: COMPUTERIZED VOTING SYSTEM
column4: Officials using computers research and create lists of Certified Registered Voters and Proxies whom are sent computer encoded ballots and return containers. Each Ballot and correlated Receipt(s) share a unique Random Symbolic Identifier (RSID) and use embedded Security Elements to prevent counterfeiting. For privacy, before voting, Voters-Proxies optionally exchange ballots and return containers within their Voting Region, validating ballots electronically or in-person by submitting Ballot Validation RSID to Officials. Voter-Proxy completes ballot(s), adds Personal Security Identifier(s), receives ballot receipt, delivery receipt upon sending ballot to Officials via postal mail, Interactive Television, Internet, Telephone, Fax, Email, In-person. Received ballots are electronically-optically recorded; if timely and authentic, voter selections are extracted, tallied if properly marked, and published to Voters' private data area accessed via Receipt RSID. Official devices, communications computer processing partially managed and optimized by computers running artificial intelligence software programs. After voting ends, Officials publish all data for integrity verification.

column2: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR ANALYSING A GOLF SWING
column4: The system analyses a golf swing, predicting swing parameters, including individual joint powers generated in a player's body, utilising a processor and artificial intelligence means. A depth camera and force plate system are used to measure inputs to the processor and artificial intelligence means. The artificial intelligence means is trained with motion capture, depth camera and force plate related parameters from a large database of golf swings. The system produces an instantaneous analysis and can be used by a player without assistance from a coach or other party.

column2: GAME SERVER FOR SUPPLYING A PRACTICE GAME SERVICE ON A SPORTS GAME, A METHOD, AND RECORDING MEDIA THEREOF CAPABLE OF SUPPLYING A PRACTICE GAME ACCORDING TO A LEVEL
column4: PURPOSE: A game server for supplying a practice game service on a sports game, a method, and recording media thereof are provided to supply a practice game, thereby knowing well the operation method of the game and a terminal to play the sports game. CONSTITUTION: A game database(110) stores practice game data and AI(Artificial intelligence) module running as an opposite one of a user in the practice game. A level setting unit(120) chooses the AI module corresponding to a level setting signal inputted by a terminal. A practice game execution unit(130) reads the practice game data and the AI module from the game database and executes the AI module, and then processes the practice game according to a game progress signal inputted by the terminal. column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FOR GAMES
column4: A program for platform games using AI and make a computer to act including steps of: deciding a solution for platform game includes: initializing solutions (S101), selecting an initial solution and a new solution (S102), a first comparison of fitness score (S103); generating a current solution (S104); repeating generating another new solution and comparing fitness scores (S105); and replacing a state (S106).

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TYPE ELECTRIC BAGGAGE AND A DRIVING METHOD CAPABLE OF DETERMINING DRIVING AND STOP WITHOUT OPERATION OF AN ON/OFF SWITCH OF GEAR
column4: PURPOSE: An artificial intelligence type electric baggage and a driving method are provided to automatically drive the bag by sensing slope of the bag using an inclination sensor and running a motor. CONSTITUTION: An artificial intelligence type electric baggage comprises a main body(20) which is divided into an upper holding room(30) and a lower electric room(40), a pullable handle(50) equipped with an operation panel, a driving shaft(60) which is pivotally installed by being connected with a bearing in lower part of a transmission room, wheels(70) which are combined with both ends of the driving shaft, a tilt sensor which is installed in the lower part of the transmission room and measures slope of the main body, and a control part(90) which is installed in the lower part of the transmission room in order to control signals and runs an electric motor. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2012

column2: MINIMIZING LATENCY IN NETWORK PROGRAM THROUGH TRANSFER OF AUTHORITY OVER PROGRAM ASSETS
column4: Authority over an artificial intelligence (AI) asset can be controlled among two or more processing devices running a common program over a network using a technique in which authority can be transferred. A first processing device can exercise authority over the AI asset by executing code that controls one or more actions of the AI asset according to a decision tree. The decision tree can determine whether to engage the program asset based on criteria other than a distance between the AI asset and the program asset. The first processing device can broadcast a state of the AI asset to one or more other devices running the program. If the decision tree determines that the AI asset should engage a program asset over which another processing device has authority the first processing device can relinquish authority over the AI asset and transfer authority to the other device.

column2: SOFTWARE CREDIBILITY MEASUREMENT AND ESTIMATION METHOD BASED ON DATA MINING
column4: The invention discloses a software credibility measurement and estimation method based on data mining, and the method comprises the following steps of: (1) on the basis of a concept hierarchy, defining a construction relation of each attribute weight and an adjacent layer attribute set in the same attribute set; (2) based on a software testing environment, providing a credibility computing base operator facing to an attribute feature set by combining with an artificial intelligence theory; (3) based on a software blackbox testing method, combining a data mining theory, obtaining a software credibility static state attribute feature set and a credibility computing base operator by using the blackbox testing, computing the initial credibility of the software layer by layer, obtaining a software dynamic attribute feature set by testing the software when running, and obtaining the credibility of the software in running by using a congruence measurement operator; (4) defining the lowest subjective expectation to the attribute feature set through a user, and computing the credibility of the software when in termination layer by layer; and (5) providing an estimation recommendation to the credibility of the to-be-estimated software.

column2: ELECTRICITY-STEALING PREVENTION ON-LINE ANALYSIS METHOD BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: The invention relates to an electricity-stealing prevention on-line analysis method based on artificial intelligence, comprising the following steps of: firstly, judging whether the electricity-stealing situation happens; if so, deducing the type and the mode of an electricity-stealing behavior and a phase line with the electricity-stealing behavior; then, deducing the type and the time of the electricity-stealing behavior according to a user type and historic load data; and estimating the stolen electric quantity which should be supplemented. According to the electricity-stealing prevention on-line analysis method, the problem that a high-tech electricity-stealing behavior is difficult to find and take the evidence is solved, the time, the position and the mode type of the electricity-stealing behavior in a power supply circuit can be systemically judged, and a technical support and a data record are provided for power supply enterprises to prevent the electricity-stealing behavior and supplement stolen electricity amount; the phenomena that metering meters and shunting and voltage-division metering loops are changed and even metering loop equipment is replaced can be prevented; and the electricity-stealing behavior of the secondary sides of various transformers, which happens by bypassing the metering meters and the metering loops, can be avoided. The electricity-stealing prevention on-line analysis method has an important meaning for treating electricity-stealing behaviors and preventing national assets from running away.

column2: ENVIRONMENT-PROTECTIVE ILLUMINATION INTELLIGENT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column4: The invention discloses an environment-protective illumination intelligent management system which comprises an upper computer, an intelligent monitoring terminal, an intelligent server and a single-lamp energy-saving controller, wherein the upper computer is arranged in a monitoring center and is provided with an intelligent management software, and the functions that the remote monitoring management (remote metering, remote controlling, remote signaling, remote viewing, and remote regulating) of urban public lighting facilities, electronic map operation and management of street lamp monitoring, map direct-viewing presentation and convenient positioning of relevant facility resources of the street lamp, as well as production management, warehouse management, artificial intelligence, and the like are realized by the upper computer; the intelligent monitoring terminal actualizes the measurement and gathering of electrical parameters of the street lamp, and the control of an illumination return circuit and a branch circuit, is connected with the intelligent server, and performs communication with the upper computer through an operator public network (GPRS, CDMA); the intelligent server is connected with the intelligent monitoring terminal, performs communication with a single lamp controller through a power-line carrier mode with automatic relay, delivers the control command, and receives single lamp status data and warning data; and the single lamp energy-saving controller receives the instructions of the intelligent server, and the control of the switching, power decreasing, light adjusting and the like for the single lamp is realized, and gathers the data such as electrical parameters, state, alarming of the single lamp.

column2: SELF-ADAPTIVE PARTICLE FILTER-BASED ROBOT VISION SERVO CONTROL METHOD
column4: The invention discloses a self-adaptive particle filter-based robot vision servo control method which belongs to the technical field of computer artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps of: providing an expected target image characteristic and corresponding robot joint angle according to practical demand; then shooting the image and reading the robot joint angle at the moment; calculating the practical image characteristic of an object according to the image; calculating image characteristic deviation and transformation; if image characteristic deviation is zero, indicating that a robot arrives in the preset position and finishing the control process; otherwise, obtaining an image jacobian matrix; and finally, obtaining an estimating value of joint angle variation according to the obtained image jacobian matrix and image characteristic transformation. The estimating value of joint angle variation is input into a robot controller, and the controller controls and adjusts the motion of the robot according to the estimating value of joint angle variation. The method of the invention can be suitable for a nonlinear non-Gaussian control system by introducing a self-adaptive particle filter algorithm.

column2: SPA CONTROL SYSTEM WITH IMPROVED FLOW MONITORING
column4: A spa control system that measures the flow of water through the heater and accurately reports water temperature in the spa using only one solid-state sensor in the heater. The working condition of the sensor is first determined by activating the heater for a brief period of time, with the circulation pump de-energized, and watching for the expected heat rise at the sensor. A small rise is sufficient to proceed with the flow test. The rate of flow is now determined by energizing the pump, with the heater still de-energized, and observing the rate in which the moving water cools the inside of the heater. If there is no circulation of water through the heater, the temperature of the sensor will continue to rise from the energy applied when the heater was briefly energized. This rise will be quite significant and a clear indication of a flow problem. If the flow is found to be adequate, the heater will be energized for a normal period of time. The sensor is now carefully monitored for a sudden increase in temperature, which would indicate loss of a normal flow of water. It is known that the temperature of the water in the spa will be within one or two degrees of the observed temperature in the heater, even when the heater is energized. The water temperature can, therefore, be accurately reported to the user just from measuring the temperature of the water in the heater. The only problem with making all measurements at the heater is that the real water temperature is unknown when the pump is not running. This problem can result in short heating cycles, or create the need to run the pump several times per day just to check on the real water temperature. The present invention uses artificial intelligence to find the difference between the heater temperature and the real water temperature and then applies the learned difference to the heater temperature measurement as an offset for the next heater and pump activation, where a new offset will be calculated.

column2: INTELLIGENT MOBILE PHONE BLIND-GUIDING DEVICE AND BLIND-GUIDING METHOD
column4: The invention discloses an intelligent mobile phone blind-guiding device, comprising a mobile phone camera module, an embedded mobile phone processor, a software module, a mobile phone wireless signal emitting and receiving module, an input and output interactive module and a back ground server, wherein the mobile phone camera module comprises a mobile phone pick-up lens and an image sensor; the embedded mobile phone processor and the software module comprise an embedded processor and an embedded operating system of a mobile phone as well as application software running on the embedded operating system; and the application software is blind-guiding software. Feature analysis is carried out on collected images through a machine vision technology, and the features of field images are matched with obstacle parameters in a background database by using an artificial intelligence technology, thereby achieving recognition and position interpretation of barriers and using voice and vibratory modes to prompt a blind person to move. The blind-guiding device of the invention is in common use and is low in cost, and has functional expansibility and upgrading capabilities.

column2: METHOD FOR MANAGING OBESITY, DIABETES AND OTHER GLUCOSE-SPIKE-INDUCED DISEASES
column4: Disclosed is a method for managing diabetes by reducing the post-prandial blood glucose spike, or the glucose shock. The blood glucose spike, or the glucose shock is reduced by generating a person-specific glucose profile for at least one significant meal to tune or train a blood glucose model (kinetic, artificial intelligence or hybrid), and then using the tuned or the trained model embedded in a computation-capable electronic device to compute and recommend a person-specific meal plan and an exercise plan, including semi-continuous meal ingestion and post-meal exercise while sitting at home or office. Advantages over prior art are that the method uses less strenuous exercise with no or less medicine, is person-specific, quantitative and more suitable for use by an individual, a dietician, or a health care practitioner.

column2: METHOD FOR MANAGING OBESITY, DIABETES OR OTHER GLUCOSE-SPIKE-INDUCED DISEASES
column4: Disclosed is a method for managing obesity, diabetes, hair loss, aging, cardiovascular, or other blood glucose-spike-induced diseases by reducing the post-prandial blood glucose spike, or the glucose shock. The blood glucose spike, or the glucose shock is reduced by generating a person-specific glucose profile for at least one significant meal to tune or train a blood glucose model (kinetic, artificial intelligence or hybrid), and then using the tuned or the trained model embedded in a computation-capable electronic device to compute and recommend a person-specific meal plan and an exercise plan, including semi-continuous meal ingestion and post-meal exercise while sifting at home or office. Advantages over prior art are that the method uses less strenuous exercise with no or less medicine, is person-specific, quantitative and more suitable for use by an individual, a dietician, or a health care practitioner.

column2: PATTERN RECOGNITION-BASED VEHICLE ANTI-FATIGUE DRIVING INTELLIGENT STEERING WHEEL
column4: The invention relates to the fields of automotive electronics and artificial intelligence, and in particular discloses a pattern recognition-based vehicle anti-fatigue driving intelligent steering wheel and an anti-fatigue driving monitoring method. The intelligent steering wheel comprises a steering wheel shell (containing an alarm interrupt key), a steering wheel framework, an embedded system (containing a microprocessor, an application program and related algorithms which are solidified in an internal memory), a GPS module, an alarm, a transformer type sensor, a power supply system and an integrated circuit board. The steering wheel has the embedded system serving as a core, acquires the torque and voltage change of the steering wheel through the transformer type sensor, monitors a fatigue driving state by combining the pattern recognition and a sustained driving time parameter, and judges a parking or running state of the vehicle through the GPS data change so as to control the computation period of the sustained driving time. By using the steering wheel as a carrier, the pattern recognition-based vehicle anti-fatigue driving intelligent steering wheel has anti-fatigue driving monitoring function on the premise of not adding any facility, breaks through the research range of domestic video signal-based driver eye physiological characteristics, and improves the anti-fatigue driving practicability.

column2: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR ANALYSING A GOLF SWING
column4: This invention is an apparatus and method for measuring or analysing a golf swing. Measurement or analysis is made relative to energy generation and transfer through a player's body and club. The measurement or analysis data is principally obtained from the player's ground-reaction forces. Processed signals are analysed with an artificial intelligence system. Ground-reaction forces relate to reaction forces which occur between a standing surface and the player's feet. The apparatus and method measures or analyses a golf swing in an automatic manner or in an automatic and interactive manner.

column2: HEALTH-PROMOTING PROGRAM
column4:
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a program contributing to the health promotion by evaluating the basic motion such as moving the body regardless of the kind of sports or exercise performed by the middle-aged and older in the aging society.
SOLUTION: A system includes a step for measuring the motion of the body by using a pedometer equipped with a 3D sensor based on the activity in doing sports (MET) and the exercise time; a step for transmitting the measured exercise time and records to an exclusive server on the Internet via public communication lines or radio; a step for processing the quantity of physical activity and physical characteristics based on the MET, exercise time and walking record stored in a data file in the exclusive server by a data mining method using artificial intelligence technologies and statistics, and outputting the ranking in the degree of health promotion, effects and estimated effects of respective exercises on the physical characteristics, and the advice for respective participants; and a step for transmitting the output data to the participants via the public communication lines or radio or Internet PCs.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PATIENT MONITORING WITH WIRELESS INTERNET CONNECTIVITY
column4: Embodiments of the invention provide a method and apparatus for a wireless health monitoring system for interactively monitoring a disease or health condition of a patient (38) by connecting an internet-enabled wireless web device ('WWD') (12) to a health monitoring device (11) which may be a medical device or other health related device such as an exercise machine. The WWD (12) may be connected to the health monitoring device directly by a wired connection (42) to a generic input/output device port of the WWD (12) using an optional adaptor if necessary. Alternatively, the WWD (12) may be wirelessly connected (16) to the health-monitoring device, such as via an infrared or radio frequency connection, including using protocols such as Bluetooth or 802.11. The wireless connection (16) may also employ an adaptor if necessary. The user may also input data to the WWD (12) manually, such as by a keypad, keyboard, stylus, or optionally by voice command (36). The health related data is transmitted from the WWD (12) to a server (37) using standard internet protocols. The server (37) calculates a response using a software program which may include an algorithm or artificial intelligence system, and may further provide for review by a physician or health specialist. The user may interact with the server (37). For example, the server (37) transmits a response to the WWD (12), and the user may answer the response or provide other information.

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD CONFIGURED TO PROVIDE A LOCATION-BASED VEHICULAR RACING VIDEOGAME
column4: A system and method are configured to provide a videogame to one or more players. The videogame may involve a series of different virtual geographic locations at which players perform activities. A group of players may be associated with each location. The players may include virtual players controlled by artificial intelligence and one or more real world players. Players may progress through the videogame by moving from location to location, performing objectives at the various locations, and interacting with the players at the locations.

column2: METHOD FOR AUTOMATICALLY GENERATING TITLE BY ADOPTING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
column4: The invention discloses a method for automatically generating a title by adopting an artificial intelligence technology, which is realized by learning word characteristics generated on the basis of background knowledge related to the text by using a machine. The method comprises the following steps of: generating a query for the text by using a conversion technology from the text to the query; searching full text of Wikipedia by using the query; defining new word characteristics through an article structure obtained by analysis and the literature styles; running the generated characteristics on the machine by using a learning method so as to extract candidate title words from the text; and clustering the works to generate the final title. By the method, the background knowledge of the Wikipedia is introduced to the recognition process of the candidate title words; various structural information of the Wikipedia can be fully utilized; the characteristics of the words can be defined by using the styles of literature; and the titles can be automatically generated by using a computer.

column2: SELF-OPTIMIZING ADAPTIVE ANTENNA
column4: The present invention determines optimal positions of a variable antenna using an artificial intelligence-based genetic algorithm (GA). The GA acquires a fitness value for an individual of a genetic algorithm population by updating positions of the antenna. The population improves through an evolutionary computational process using a fitness measure based on the signal strength. At the end of the process, the system positions the antenna to the best position found by the GA. Therefore, the final position gives exceptionally clear reception for a chosen received frequency.

column2: ON-LINE TRANSFORMER FAULT DIAGNOSIS METHOD BASED ON SVM AND DGA
column4: The invention discloses an on-line transformer fault diagnosis method based on support vector machines (SVM) and dissolved gas analysis (DGA), which belongs to the field of transformer fault diagnosis. The method comprises the following steps of: acquiring the concentration of fault feature gases including H2, CH4, C2H2, C2H4 and C2H6 in transformer insulating oil by a gas chromatographic analysis method, normalizing the data through a preprocessing system, sending the data to a classification diagnosis system assembled by an integrative learning method and formed by six SVM classifiers according to a decision process, classifying the measurement data through calculation, judging the running state of the transformer, and at last outputting the diagnosis results. In the method, the support vector machines (SVM) of the artificial intelligence technology are adopted to analyze the gases in the oil, and the relation between gas components and the running state of the transformer can be objectively and essentially reflected, thereby the accuracy of fault diagnosis is effectively improved.

column2: INTELLIGENT JUNGLE CANOPY SURVEILLANCE APPARATUS AND METHOD
column4: Jungle canopy surveillance apparatus and method for surveillance of human presence in a jungle canopy environment includes a plurality of sensor-relay units configured to be disposed on or near the jungle floor, and configured to detect human presence and wirelessly transmit a corresponding detection signal. At least one of the sensor-relay units is configured to receive a detection signal from another sensor-relay unit and to relay the thus-received detection signal. An artificial intelligence center is configured to be disposed on or near the top of the jungle canopy, and is configured to (i) receive at least one of the detection signal and the relayed detection signal, (ii) analyze the received at least one of the detection signal and the relayed detection signal using artificial intelligence software, and (iii) transmit a corresponding report signal to a receiving platform.
