column2: GOAL SEEKING ADAPTIVE PATTERN PROCESSING ENGINE
column4: This document describes an Engine which is designed to operate in changing real world environment. Engine can be described as a Black Box to be assigned a goal (see Figure 1). The Black Box operates in the World with which it interacts by recognising the World's current state and executing commands against the World. The World can react on commands by changing its current state or ignore commands and stay in the same state. The World also can change its state by own reasons which Black Box cannot understand and control. At some point World can start responding differently to commands issued by Black Box and Black Box must be intelligent enough to recognise this change and adapt own behaviour accordingly. Goal of this project is to eliminate as much as possible human involvement in programming of Engine's behaviour and let Engine to work out by itself how to achieve a goal by interacting with World by trials and errors. Properly constructed Engine is able to act autonomously. Its elements are autonomous modules working undependably and parallel to each other. Highly parallel architecture allows achieving breakthrough in speed and performance. Engine design can be as complex as required to handle given number of tasks and regardless complexity can be fast, robust, responding in a real time. Engine can be implemented as software or hardware solution or mix of both approaches which looks more promising up to date. Leading world CPU manufacturers are changing their strategies towards multicore computer processing architecture when a single CPU runs many parallel processes in the same time. This tendency will make engines similar to one described in this document very useful and highly demanded on the market. Nature of this engine makes it ideal where artificial intelligence is required. Decades ago artificial neural networks seemed to be appealing technology to achieve artificial intelligence but unfortunately they are still in their infancy, complex and difficult to implement. Engine described is aimed to bridge the gap and bring affordable artificial intelligence solution to everyday life. GG Figure 2. GGP and IGP

column2: PRESS FOR SPHERO-DYNAMIC HANDLING BY RUNNING
column4: FIELD: metallurgy. SUBSTANCE: invention relates to press-forging equipment, particularly to machines for cold solid machining by method of local deformation with preliminary plasticisation of blanks metal. Press contains positions of blank running, its electric pulse machining and sphero-dynamic percussive-pulse handling. At running position on driving slide block it is free installed sphero-dynamic module. Module is implemented in the form of ellipsoid of revolution with annular groove on side surface. In groove it is located replaceable elemental annulus with external surface, equidistant to side surface of ellipsoid of revolution. One of moulds on running position is outfitted by horizontal displacement driving. Puncheon on running position is implemented with working surfaces by shape of electropulse and sphero-dynamic percussive-pulse handling are implemented with replaceable locating blocks. Locating blocks on position of electric pulse machining are outfitted by feed device to it of pulse of current. Locating blocks on position of sphero-dynamic percussive-pulse handling allows ability of rotationally oscillatory movement. EFFECT: there is provided creation in blank material of nanostructure with "artificial intelligence". 3 dwg

column4: The invention discloses a self-healing control method for operation of an urban distribution network, which is used in an operated urban distribution network. column2: NEW INVENTION FOR INTERNET MODEL VENUE
column4: We start off this invention with a new James Bond movie. Part of the charm of James Bond movies is that life styles of the rich and notorious; and each movie has different and exotic locales. In the movie Bond is with his internet saavy girlfriend when she notes there is something strange happening in the Second Life (or similar Virtual World Platform perhaps our own creation eg. Next To Life), Bond follows the chase trail to a call centre in India where 3 hijacking techies have broken in to the Second Life Management (security database) using Artificial Intelligence. He follows the trail to Japan teleport city where he climbs on to the roof and fight it out. It turns out the culprits behind this ruse are a multiracial, Intercontinental hacking syndicate (called The Allegiance). The Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform comes with direct neural link (that can come with Artificial Intelligence to help sort and analyze information as an Aid and also help filter secrets). The neural link has an internal component - understanding via simulation (of scenarios and circumstances) and/or key words, Logical Language and/or memory models, representative words/symbols... and weighing to make a decision which option to choose - which is behind the scenes not observable by anyone else on the Next To Life VR Platform; and an external component to execute physically/verbally acting out the decisions. There can be a micro screen or partition of the screens Both the internal and external neural thought links can have a list of choices (drop down menu), there are 3 methods to navigate the menus, (first starting in the middle) Method 1. moving up or down each choice one by one, or Method 2. half-way splitting - which involves starting in the middle half-way distance then either choosing moving half-way up or down between the middle half-way distance to the half-way between the very top or the very bottom, by splitting the distance half-way between the top and the bottom, eventually you home in on the place or your desired choice to arrive at. Or Method 3. if your choice is near the top or the bottom you can take the top option and move directly to the top or the bottom and then use navigation method 1 move down or up one choice by the next choice. The Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform incorporates: 1. 3 to 4 screens (using Logic Language, systems/parts, memory models, representative words/symbols/attributes/clues/linkages/relationships). 2. Possible 3-D and IMAX (joint locale experience). 3. Neural Networks, where thoughts can be connected directly to other minds for the ultimate closeness experience, or can be filtered by dividing thoughts into an internal and external component. So the Professional Hacking Syndicate use Artificial Intelligences' to break into and using high speed (gold orbs) instead of persona's - the orbs move faster and suck in all the electronic trail behind it. By hacking into the secure database (which appears as a bank for each country), they obtain identity theft of which they use to make fake buy's and sells of items under the stolen identity's credit/debit cards. They break into the Virtual Reality House of the elected President of Next To Life and steal all his high level security codes and use Artfficial Intelligence to block him from using his computer by infecting his computer with a network of mainframes Artificial Intelligence changing coding that is nearly impossible to crack. James Bond is enters the Next to Life system with the help of his girlfriend who has written a character/persona that is a silver liquid shape shifter (like the orbs) form that are capable of high speed. When he follows the orbs into the Smithsonian Institute he meets two twin chicks (one is an Artificial Intelligence plant and the other is a college girl that is experimenting), the Artificial Intelligence makes them appear as twins. They both sleep with him in the 5 star Hawaiian Hotel a place in the Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform for conjugal visits neural intimacy. The girls are designed by the Hackers because they have heard about James Bond's weaknesses. The Hackers get the lead, in the Smithsonian Institute he retraces his steps and to speed up he takes on the form of a pilot in a transforming robot - Avro Arrow to chase the orbs (Q has given him glasses that sees streams of translucent wavy trail where removal of an electronic trail has left behind). The gold orbs take on the form of Black Mech Droids Jets, they battle the USA forces which come in Blue/White/Red Mech Droids Jets. The Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform could have an X-Box Portal and Play Station (2) Portal for Video Gamers to jointly play video games that are available over the internet via Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform. We could create a Large Scale/Big Box Tech support (helping clients find what their problems are) and helps them order parts (eg. hardware), what they need for installation level of difficulty to install whether its worth buying the installation tools, eg. installing upgrade to RAM. We could have the world's largest selection of electronic parts, selling tech parts, service upgrading, buy, sell and trade used parts certified pool of workers. We could supply these wide range of tech goods and services over the Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform. We could tie with the computer company (sorting by part) eg. monitor versus printer, noting their integratebility/sustainability, by brand name and model number. Eventually we could even start our own brand name for our own audio/video and tech goods. We would like to create a Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform version of the Smithsonian Institute using pictures/prints/faux copies. We also plan to have a Hall of Fame for Celebrities; scientists and humanitarians (selling mementos, cards and signed pictures). We could also have a Business Hall of Fame. People can buy cards (like Hockey Cards), of companies, cards of Vice Presidents of Different Departments - their Stats: age; years in the firm; metrics measuring their success for that year - CEO's Presidents, Chairmen and even the Bottom (lowest position). Stats of the business include % of the market, estimated size of the market (reason for market share captured in excess or below expectations eg. supply and/or demand factors), Classification of business, major competitors, Picture of Exec's Educations, titles, Philanthropy, belong to what associations... We could create an investment/investor matching service centre in the Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform (option for fair trade) especially for the poor worldwide. Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform can join with NYSE, NASDAQ TMX and LSE, members receive a hat or badge, on their computer screen they press button to show real time ticker tapes. Investors (members) could trade via robot and/or video conference on the trading floor via streaming real time bid/asks, posting shares of bid/ask on video screen for the brokers to see. Investors are alerted when a new release from one of their invested companies' is expected, what the forecast is (metrics), and recommendations on what to do if it is above or below expectations. They receive analyst recommendations in real time. Buys, sells, which stock companies, industry, sector economy, the best way to play the trends and events. There is a database taken from articles in the Wall Street Journal, Reuters, Dow Jones and Bloomberg that picks out (say in the last week) company names (or symbols) especially those that have high volatility and/or volume also ranked and sorted by % rise and % fall. And overall long term steady upward trend. We could sell advertising in the form of Bill Boards (eg. on building walls or along streets); LED Boards; Posters; Banners; Neon signs - all of which the user can print. Erecting street signs on building walls outside and inside. These signs could have say 3 or 4 layers, by pressing a button, you switch from one picture to the next and/or backward. We could also create a consumer Ratings of Latest High Tech Roll Outs of New Products (new innovations and why it is better than current technology and whether it is worth the increased cost). Judgement criteria - usages that the new product can be applied; in areas of professional, home, friends, to what part of life of whom it caters the most benefits; listing what the new products does (functions: new, old, utility in what areas of life...) of which creates more versus benefits that different people may be looking for. We plan to create a shopping mall for high end brand names (with streets similar to Rodeo Drive, with Boutique Hotel lounges and Virtual Reality Rooms, where only those allowed through the lockable portals can have conjugal visits. We want the most trendy Brand Names. We could hold fashion shows with invitations for real and Virtual Reality seats and after show video sales. We plan to design the grounds and services and products of tourists (attraction sites) - throughout the world, we could hire a robot carrying a camera, to move through museums, art galleries...and offer extensive gift shops. Share leisure places to visit eg. cruise ships... We could have sports, new release movies (Movies Library) and other public events (like closed circuit television). Horticulturists - throughout the world can offer live or previously taped video taped rare coveted or beautiful plants, including pictures of plants in bloom, (sale of seeds) tending needs - even genetically engineered plants; arrangements; landscaping. 2. Bird watching - pictures of rare or very beautiful birds, where they were taken and when, video tape of bird sanctuaries, live or previously taped. 3. Model Building - fantasy, space, movies (when was movie released), - historical, cars, soldiers, planes, ships. Sets for sale via Next To Life purchase. 4. Adopt/sponsor an orphan and/or poor, homeless and/or sick (dying eg. last wish), picture is available previous to donation, then video clip and video conferencing available. Also with stray pets and animal sanctuary... 5. Any and all recreation and leisure. 6. Sports and any and all athletic and intellectual endeavours. 7. Walk in the park, by bodies of water, rain forests, Grand Canyon, Valleys, Oceans, Rivers (Beaches), Mountains, where in real a controlled camera could be strung the capture the view and the client could rent and pay for video footage and pictures. 8. Boating - cruises and sailing, surf boarding, sea doo, ski doo... 9. Camping, trekking, climbing, bungee jumping. 10. Amusement Park. 11. Skiing, snowboarding, sledding, tobogganing, heli skiing - boarding, cross country skiing, snow showing, horse and carriage. 12. Full Working University. Classes are by neural node network, unless video conferencing classes are opted for: Subjects Include: Landscaping Interior Design Architecture Wood working Electrician Plumber Ant and All Contractors Project Managers Software/Hardware Expertise Law School Medical School Any and All Science Geneticist, Biologists, Botanists... Psychology Social Worker History Political Science Languages Anthropologists Theatre Engineer Physicists Astronomy Mathematician Enrollment can be by correspondence, in addition to real time neural nodes teaching (possibly with Artificial Intelligence as well) there could be video taped classes (which may need to be updated as time passes) and video conferencing classes as well as written and/or DVD textbooks, notes... We could tie up each character/persona with face book like profile (eg. Name Age, interests) and pictures, basically exposure of personal real information about the person/character/persona (changeable/updateable) where depending on the person (eg. pressing a button to see the information about the person/character/persona they are meeting and/or interested about (eg. possible index), there would be different levels of security access as to the level of personal/intimate information available for different people who want to view and get to know via such information. We could also map out Las Vegas (GP 1%), the White House, Yellow Stone Park...Any and all places that people would like to visit. Also we could have a forum that allows Users (to share with fellow Users eg. commentary and/or text line at the bottom of the screen) to watch events such as sports or the Fourth of July Celebrations. We could also develop stadium/collesium/conference centres in Next To Life, where Clients can play hockey, basketball, baseball, football, soccer, venue for Jazz, musical concerts, (whereby Artificial Intelligence can filling for missing players) and any and all events, we could invite real life professional players. We could allow audience to watch and pay on a first come first serve basis.

column2: NEXT TO LIFE VERSION II
column4:
We start off this invention with a new James Bond movie. Part of the charm of
James Bond
movies is that life styles of the rich and notorious; and each movie has
different and exotic
locales. In the movie Bond is with his internet saavy girlfriend when she
notes there is
something strange happening in the Second Life (or similar Virtual World
Platform perhaps
our own creation eg. Next To Life), Bond follows the chase trail to a call
centre in India where
3 hijacking techies have broken in to the Second Life Management (security
database) using
Artificial Intelligence. He follows the trail to Japan teleport city where he
climbs on to the roof
and fight it out. It turns out the culprits behind this ruse are a
multiracial, Intercontinental
hacking syndicate (called The Allegiance). The Next To Life Virtual Reality
Platform comes
with direct neural link (that can come with Artificial Intelligence to help
sort and analyze
information as an Aid and also help filter secrets). The neural link has an
internal component
- understanding via simulation (of scenarios and circumstances) and/or key
words, Logical
Language and/or memory models, representative words/symbols... and weighing to
make a
decision which option to choose - which is behind the scenes not observable by
anyone else
on the Next To Life VR Platform; and an external component to execute
physically/verbally
acting out the decisions. There can be a micro screen or partition of the
screens

Both the internal and external neural thought links can have a list of choices
(drop down
menu), there are 3 methods to navigate the menus, (first starting in the
middle) Method 1.
moving up or down each choice one by one, or Method 2. half-way splitting -
which involves
starting in the middle half-way distance then either choosing moving half-way
up or down
between the middle half-way distance to the half-way between the very top or
the very
bottom, by splitting the distance half-way between the top and the bottom,
eventually you
home in on the place or your desired choice to arrive at. Or Method 3. if your
choice is near
the top or the bottom you can take the top option and move directly to the top
or the bottom
and then use navigation method 1 move down or up one choice by the next
choice.

The Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform incorporates:

1. 3 to 4 screens (using Logic Language, systems/parts, memory models,
representative words/symbols/attributes/clues/linkages/relationships).
2. Possible 3-D and IMAX (joint locale experience).
3. Neural Networks, where thoughts can be connected directly to other minds
for the
ultimate closeness experience, or can be filtered by dividing thoughts into an

internal and external component.

So the Professional Hacking Syndicate use Artificial Intelligences' to break
into and using
high speed (gold orbs) instead of persona's - the orbs move faster and suck in
all the
electronic trail behind it.

By hacking into the secure database (which appears as a bank for each
country), they obtain
identity theft of which they use to make fake buy's and sells of items under
the stolen
identity's credit/debit cards.

They break into the Virtual Reality House of the elected President of Next To
Life and steal
all his high level security codes and use Artificial Intelligence to block him
from using his
computer by infecting his computer with a network of mainframes Artificial
Intelligence
changing coding that is nearly impossible to crack.



James Bond is enters the Next to Life system with the help of his girlfriend
who has written a
character/persona that is a silver liquid shape shifter (like the orbs) form
that are capable of
high speed.

When he follows the orbs into the Smithsonian Institute he meets two twin
chicks (one is an
Artificial Intelligence plant and the other is a college girl that is
experimenting), the Artificial
Intelligence makes them appear as twins. They both sleep with him in the 5
star Hawaiian
Hotel a place in the Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform for conjugal visits
neural intimacy.
The girls are designed by the Hackers because they have heard about James
Bond's
weaknesses. The Hackers get the lead, in the Smithsonian Institute he retraces
his steps
and to speed up he takes on the form of a pilot in a transforming robot - Avro
Arrow to chase
the orbs (Q has given him glasses that sees streams of translucent wavy trail
where removal
of an electronic trail has left behind). The gold orbs take on the form of
Black Mech Droids
Jets, they battle the USA forces which come in Blue/White/Red Mech Droids
Jets.

The Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform could have an X-Box Portal and Play
Station (2)
Portal for Video Gamers to jointly play video games that are available over
the internet via
Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform.

We could create a Large Scale/Big Box Tech support (helping clients find what
their
problems are) and helps them order parts (eg. hardware), what they need for
installation
level of difficulty to install whether its worth buying the installation
tools, eg. installing upgrade
to RAM. We could have the world's largest selection of electronic parts,
selling tech parts,
service upgrading, buy, sell and trade used parts certified pool of workers.
We could supply
these wide range of tech goods and services over the Next To Life Virtual
Reality Platform.
We could tie with the computer company (sorting by part) eg. monitor versus
printer, noting
their integratebility/sustainability, by brand name and model number.
Eventually we could
even start our own brand name for our own audio/video and tech goods.

We would like to create a Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform version of the
Smithsonian
Institute using pictures/prints/faux copies. We also plan to have a Hall of
Fame for
Celebrities; scientists and humanitarians (selling mementos, cards and signed
pictures). We
could also have a Business Hall of Fame. People can buy cards (like Hockey
Cards), of
companies, cards of Vice Presidents of Different Departments - their Stats:
age; years in the
firm; metrics measuring their success for that year - CEO's Presidents,
Chairmen and even
the Bottom (lowest position). Stats of the business include % of the market,
estimated size
of the market (reason for market share captured in excess or below

and/or demand factors), Classification of business, major competitors, Picture
of Exec's
Educations, titles, Philanthropy, belong to what associations...

We could create an investment/investor matching service centre in the Next To
Life Virtual
Reality Platform (option for fair trade) especially for the poor worldwide.

Next To Life Virtual Reality Platform can join with NYSE, NASDAQ TMX and LSE,
members
receive a hat or badge, on their computer screen they press button to show
real time ticker
tapes.

Investors (members) could trade via robot and/or video conference on the
trading floor via
streaming real time bid/asks, posting shares of bid/ask on video screen for

see.



Investors are alerted when a new release from one of their invested companies'

what the forecast is (metrics), and recommendations on what to do if it is

expectations.

They receive analyst recommendations in real time. Buys, sells, which stock

industry, sector economy, the best way to play the trends and events.

There is a database taken from articles in the Wall Street Journal, Reuters,
Dow Jones and
Bloomberg that picks out (say in the last week) company names (or symbols)
especially
those that have high volatility and/or volume also ranked and sorted by % rise
and % fall.
And overall long term steady upward trend.

We could sell advertising in the form of Bill Boards (eg. on building walls or
along streets);
LED Boards; Posters; Banners; Neon signs - all of which the user can print.

Erecting street signs on building walls outside and inside.

These signs could have say 3 or 4 layers, by pressing a button, you switch
from one picture
to the next and/or backward.

We could also create a consumer Ratings of Latest High Tech Roll Outs of New
Products
(new innovations and why it is better than current technology and whether it
is worth the
increased cost). Judgement criteria - usages that the new product can be
applied; in areas
of professional, home, friends, to what part of life of whom it caters the
most benefits; listing
what the new products does (functions: new, old, utility in what areas of

creates more versus benefits that different people may be looking for.

We plan to create a shopping mall for high end brand names (with streets
similar to Rodeo
Drive, with Boutique Hotel lounges and Virtual Reality Rooms, where only those
allowed
through the lockable portals can have conjugal visits. We want the most trendy
Brand
Names. We could hold fashion shows with invitations for real and Virtual

after show video sales.

We plan to design the grounds and services and products of tourists
(attraction sites) -
throughout the world, we could hire a robot carrying a camera, to move through

art galleries... and offer extensive gift shops. Share leisure places to visit

We could have sports, new release movies (Movies Library) and other public

internet) could communicate as they watch the same or even different movies,

screen video conferencing and/or text at bottom of screen.

Sharing of hobbies:

1. Horticulturists - throughout the world can offer live or previously taped

rare coveted or beautiful plants, including pictures of plants in bloom, (sale
of seeds)
tending needs - even genetically engineered plants; arrangements; landscaping.
2. Bird watching - pictures of rare or very beautiful birds, where they were

3. Model Building - fantasy, space, movies (when was movie released), -

4. Adopt/sponsor an orphan and/or poor, homeless and/or sick (dying eg. last

picture is available previous to donation, then video clip and video

available. Also with stray pets and animal sanctuary...
5. Full Working University. Classes are by neural node network, unless video

We could tie up each character/persona with face book like profile (eg. Name
Age,

column2: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR ANALYSING A GOLF SWING
column4: This invention is an apparatus and method for measuring or analysing a golf swing. Measurement or analysis is made relative to energy generation and transfer through a player's body and club. The measurement or analysis data is principally obtained from the player's ground-reaction forces. Processed signals are analysed with an artificial intelligence system. Ground-reaction forces relate to reaction forces which occur between a standing surface and the player's feet. The apparatus and method measures or analyses a golf swing in an automatic manner or in an automatic and interactive manner.

column2: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR ANALYSING A GOLF SWING
column4:
An apparatus for measuring or analysing a golf swing, the apparatus
comprising: a processing means; a detection means operable to detect ground-
reaction
forces; a standing surface; and a sensor means, wherein: (A) the apparatus
includes an artificial intelligence means; (B) the processing means includes
an early-processing
means, and information from the sensor means or detection means is
processable by the early-processing means, into data which better
characterises the
swing, before being received by the artificial intelligence means; and (C) the
artificial
intelligence means is operable to receive and process information from the
early-processing
means.

column2: GOLFER POSTURE CORRECTION SYSTEM USING THE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TYPE CADDY AND GOLFER POSTURE CORRECTION METHOD USING THE SAME
column4: PURPOSE: A golfer posture correction system and a golfer posture correction method using the same are provided, which enables a golfer to correct the posture systematically through the artificial intelligence type caddy. CONSTITUTION: A golfer posture correction system comprises: a golf action correction device(200) providing video data about the swing operation of a golfer and the information for the posture correction of a golfer; a user analysis device(300) providing video data about the swing operation of a golfer, base data of a golfer, and the first information about real-time sensing data; an environmental information construction device(400) providing the second information toward the environmental information of the virtual golf simulation; an inquiry module which produces the inquiry value by using the first information and the second information; and an artificial intelligence caddy device(500). Â©KIPO 2009

column2: AGRICULTURAL PRODUCTS
column4: We plan to grow algae, bamboo, sugar cane and corn to make ethanol. The sugar cane will be shredded and its liquids squeezed out for ethanol. The remaining fibers will be shredded and cut to an optimal length for agricultural use. Sugar is a form of fertilizer. These fibers will be cooked in manure tea (stirred even blended to instil fertilizing potency - wider blend of nutrients) and rolled and squeezed and cooked in manure tea (stirred even blended to instil fertilizing potency - wider blend of nutrients) rolled and squeezed (depending on whether the results of such a process - high quality organic fertilizer are worthwhile). The fertilizer can even be pelletized. The tea manure as well as the powdered sugar cane can be used to grow algae. The algae could be bagged with transparent bags and solar panels underneath the bags could further make the most use of the site by both producing energy; Solar panel energy and algae converted into ethanol. A self brewed medium for algae includes Glucose, Na2HPO4, KH2PO4, NH4Cl, NaCl,MgSO4, CaCl2... column2: HIGH SPEED HOVER JET RACING
column4: New Sport - High speed Hover (possibly with jet engines), vehicles that race on flat land, mud, snow, ice, (different sized) bumps, water...In the case of jets, we could race a drag race along a straight track (such as the Utah or other deserts) we could try all shaped tracks for feasibility. We could have categories, by the size of the vehicles and with or without skirts (Ja 5%). Hovercrafts for and all robots could be created (eg. demolition derby) (GV 30%)...They could be Artificial Intelligence controlled (GV 60%).

column2: MULTI STORY/LEVEL MAGNETIC LEVITATION VEHICULAR (JETSONS') SYSTEM
column4: Our Mag Lev expandable multilevel system for all uses from city to in-between cities.... Where there are ramps and/or elevators to change levels or enter garages at the same level that has an entrance/ext at that level or go down to the road below to park or enter a garage. 1. Is the overhanging (from above or below the magnetic levitation vehicles) support possibly made of tungsten steel carbide, titanium and magnetic track that it supports (possibly crisscross lattice such as the tall structures of construction cranes -- although traditional concrete with tension cables could be used - we like crane lattices because it allows sunlight to shine on the street and pavement below; furthermore the crane lattice supports that the Mag Lev vehicle track uses, its back end maybe lodged (space carved or mutually supported) - attached or the side of the building with an encasement of concrete at its base. 2. Concrete blocks or encasement in buried concrete that gives reinforcing support from the lower levels. 3. Additional, expanding supports to upper (tracks) levels that can be wrapped/entwined with steel cables for mutual support furthermore we could make the shape of the supports vertically slide in slots that are vertically height oriented where possibly two of (or more than 2) sides depending on number level slides into each other's male and female holsters.. 4. The magnetic tracks, possibly two going lanes on each side. 5. Support may have to be cut into some surrounding buildings where the buildings are to close to the street leaving no room for the support 6. Direction of that side of the tracks. We could even build in vertical supports that rise from in-between the roads below, wherever feasible or necessary. We could build futuristic multiple story/level magnetic levitation tracks for magnetic levitation vehicles could glide to alleviate traffic congestion and increase density, for the most productive use of land and saving urban sprawl from destroying our agricultural and wild life preserve. There could be traffic functions, such as four way alternation stop, and turning lights... And intervals along the road are situated fast magnetic elevators (and possibly mixed with actuator or pneumatic or winch elevators). These elevators could be integrated with a far right lane allowing drivers to get into the right lane and exit into the elevator to change stories/levels and then use a far right lane or to merge back into the road. Changing stories/lanes could also be done with ramps (GP 10%). Changing stories/levels could also be done via overpass - built between one or more stories/levels (as well as changing direction). Trucks and buses could use the ground level/ underground and/or the first story/level which's strength could be reinforced the most. Finally the entire logistics could be controlled via Artificial Intelligence or computer algorithms, so human passengers no longer need to drive they simply instruct the Al/computer of their destination (GPS or track monitoring place/speed of vehicles and where there is access space; where a vehicle is sped up by Al/computer and thus creates space for other cars to speed up behind; where there is a bottleneck the Al/computer could compute if time can be saved by taking an alternate route - perhaps change story/level that has faster traffic. We could even create multiple lanes (magnetic levitation tracks) highway with multiple stories/levels. The vehicles could be made of aluminium. Instead of magnetic levitation we could use the cheaper monorail tracks (GP 10%) of multiple stories/levels and separate vehicles made of aluminium; so the tracks don't need as much reinforcement and therefore needs less space (current monorail tracks are an eyesore and take up so much space for one simple story/floor of tracks). We could also make vehicles that both function as rubber tire vehicles (for the street on the concrete story/floors below) and switch back and forth to alternative functioned vehicles that use the monorails tracks midway above and/or magnetic levitation tracks higher up (GP 10 %). We could also create carriers of chains of standardized cargo containers that have a skeleton hooking the cargo containers (made of aluminium skin with carbon fibre cage or fibre glass walls) chain at points along the chain that run along the monorail or magnetic levitation or which can be separate from the trucking streets on the ground and underground floor below, another option is to assign a whole story/level to cargo chains (for delivery between ports and warehouses...). We are considering Gravity Chain Machine elevators. Additionally we could magnetize the bumpers surrounding the vehicles to avoid accidents. Additionally we could magnetize the bumpers surrounding the vehicles to avoid accidents, or add some sort of sensors (we could sell this technology to all car companies) that depending on distance and acceleration and speed of the a car nearing another car (possibly microchips on all four corners of the cars) slams on the brake strategically in a rhythm that maximize wheel to grip time.

column2: POINTER-DEPENDENT OBJECT DETECTING METHOD FOR MOBILE ROBOT NAVIGATION, INVOLVES REALIZING POINTER AS SUBJECTIVE OBJECT, AND STORING OBJECTS ON HEAP BASED ON TYPE OF THINKING PATTERN OF CLASS-BASED MODEL OF OBJECT ORIENTED PROGRAMMING
column4: The method involves subjectively realizing and handling a pointer as a subjective object for running time in a main memory of a computer system of an artificial intelligence system of a cyborg or an android. Storage addresses of inputs of all n-reactions of all n-sensor groups are stored in the pointer, where the sensor groups represent all sense organs. The subjective objects are stored on heap based on a type of thinking pattern of a class-based model of object oriented programming (OOP) and/or a programming language C++.

column2: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR GENERATING, SELECTING, AND RUNNING EXECUTABLES IN A BUSINESS SYSTEM UTILIZING A COMBINATION OF USER DEFINED RULES AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: A system including: a memory element of a specially programmed general-purpose computer storing a set of rules; a generating element in a processor for the computer using at least one genetic algorithm to generate a plurality of executables; a selecting element in the processor using the set of rules to select an executable from the plurality of executables; and an interface element in the computer outputting the executable. A system including: a generating element in a processor for a specially programmed general-purpose computer arranged to generate a marketing offer using a set of rules and at least one genetic algorithm and an interface element in the computer arranged to output the marketing offer. In some aspects, the generating element is arranged to: generate, using the at least one genetic algorithm, a plurality of marketing offers; and select, using the rules, the marketing offer from the plurality of marketing offers.

column2: SOLAR LIGHT TRACKING POWER ENERGY SYSTEM AND SMOOTH NETWORK MULTI-RANK SERVO CONTROL METHOD
column4: The invention provides a solar energy sunlight tracking power energy system and a smoothing network multistage servo control method, which can be applied to the fields such as solar power generation, power energy, automatic control and artificial intelligence, etc. The system comprises a signal acquisition and processing circuit (1), a CPU control circuit (2), a motor drive circuit (3), a keyboard display circuit (4) and a power circuit (5). The system and the arrangement of multi-sensors can ensure that a solar energy panel can rotate to the best lighting point in a real-time manner to acquire and store the solar energy with high efficiency. The smoothing network multistage servo control method can solve the problems that a motor vibrates when in commutation and is blocked when in low-speed running and burnt due to the over-voltage under various circumstances. The solar energy sunlight tracking power energy system and the smoothing network multistage servo control method provided by the invention especially improve the efficiency, the stability and the intellectualization of the solar energy system.

column2: METHOD FOR AUTOMATICALLY ADJUSTING SHOOTING PARAMETERS ACCORDING TO SHOOTING OPERATION HABIT OF THE USER
column4: The invention relates to an automatically adjusting method for photo taking parameters according to personal photo taking habits, which includes the following steps: a database of the photo taking habits of a user is created in a digital camera according to various types of photo compositions or environments; then an intelligent adjusting mode of the digital camera is used for linking to the photo taking habit database; which type of the photo composition or the environment of the current object belongs to is identified in the digital camera; and at last, the photo taking parameters are adjusted automatically by comparison between the identified photo composition or the environment with the photo taking habit database. When the digital camera in use, an artificial intelligence module selectively remembers the adjusted values according to the current photo environment to help the user adjust the camera to the relevant photo taking parameters in advance for the same environment later.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PLANT GROWTH SURROUNDINGS REGULATE AND CONTROL EXPERT DECISION-MAKING SYSTEM
column4: The core of a modern controlled environment agricultural factory run is to carry out effective control on the cultivation environment in the facilities and carry out mechanized and automated production. In countries where the controlled environment agriculture is developed, most of greenhouse facilities can carry out management control through computer intelligent regulation and control devices and measure ecological environmental factors within the facilities (such as temperature, humidity, solar radiation, nutrient solution EC value and crop growth parameters ) through various sensors. According to optimum conditions for crop growth, a computer intelligent system can give instructions to exercise control on systems and related devices and adjust and control factors such as temperature, light, water, fertilizer and air, thereby greatly improving the productivity and finished product output capacity of the crop. Compared with the manual experience operational control, the intelligent integrated control technique can save energy by from 15 percent to 50 percent and provide all-weather 24-hour information and control support for planters with memory and inquiry function and decision support function.

column2: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR HEALTH AND DISEASE MANAGEMENT COMBINING PATIENT DATA MONITORING WITH WIRELESS INTERNET CONNECTIVITY
column4: Embodiments of the invention provide a method and apparatus for a wireless health monitoring system for interactively monitoring a disease or health condition of a patient by connecting an internet-enabled wireless web device (?œWWD?? to a health monitoring device which may be a medical device or other health related device such as an exercise machine. The WWD may be connected to the health monitoring device directly by a wired connection to a generic input/output port of the WWD using an optional adaptor if necessary. Alternatively, the WWD may be wirelessly connected to the health monitoring device, such as via an infrared or radio frequency connection, including using protocols such as Bluetooth or 802.11. The wireless connection may also employ an adaptor if necessary. The user may also input data to the WWD manually, such as by a keypad, keyboard, stylus, or optionally by voice command. The health related data is transmitted from the WWD to a server using standard internet protocols. The server calculates a response using a software program which may include an algorithm or artificial intelligence system, and may further provide for review by a physician or health specialist. The user may interact with the server. For example, the server transmits a response to the WWD, and the user may answer the response or provide other information.

column2: METHOD, SYSTEM AND COMPUTER PROGRAM FOR DEVELOPING CORTICAL ALGORITHMS
column4: A system, method and computer program for developing artificial intelligence through the generational evolution of one or more genomes. Each genome includes a set of functions. The method includes creating one or more cortices, operating the one or more cortices to perform one or more specified tasks, calculating a fitness score for each cortex based on its ability to perform the specified tasks, and selecting one or more of the cortices based on the respective fitness scores. Each cortex includes a plurality of cortical units. Each cortical unit includes a set of functions. Each cortical unit is created from the one or more genomes.

column2: PERSONALIZED BEHAVIOR OF COMPUTER CONTROLLED AVATARS IN A VIRTUAL REALITY ENVIRONMENT
column4: Racing-based computer games typically include a mode in which one or more human players can compete against one or more computer-controlled opponents. For example, a human player may drive a virtual race car against a computer-controlled virtual race car purported to be driven by Mario Andretti or some other race car driver. Such computer controlled opponents may be enhanced by including a sampling of actual game behavior of a human subject into the opponent's artificial intelligence control system. Such a sampling can allow the game system to personalize the behavior of the computer control opponent to emulate the human subject.

column2: IMAGE GENERATING DEVICE FOR AN EGO SHOOTER GAME
column4: An image generating device for displaying on a display (1a) images for a player to play a gun shooting game with an enemy character existing in a virtual game space. The image generating device comprises: AI (artificial intelligence) processing means (101) for executing AI processing (steps S8/S9) incorporating emotions of said character influenced between circumstances, evaluation/determination, and factors of behaviors in said game.

column2: MOBILE DEVICE INTERNET ACCESS
column4: A mobile device browser accesses (2) a proxy server and the user selects preferred categories of web pages. This is done using a graphical interface generated by a feedback mechanism of the proxy server. A profiling mechanism of the proxy server incorporates an artificial intelligence engine and it maintains a table of preferred categories in a customer profile. The mobile device accesses (3) a recommended site. The mobile operator server downloads (4) instructions to the mobile device to cause it to display a toolbar. The user selects one icon on the toolbar to indicate whether the site is approved or disapproved. If the approval icon is clicked, the server automatically downloads (5) a page for posting comments. The page or form includes a list of options to be ticked by the user to indicate the preferred subject matter areas such as science, ring tones, entertainment, sport, technology, and news. Also, the server automatically transmits (6) notifications to other users by using a current database of approved sites. If disapproved, the above steps are repeated for a next site. The feedback mechanism of the server is configured to enable transformation of mobile content by addition of the toolbar. The profiling mechanism of the server performs real time monitoring of content access by mobile devices, and determines if it scores highly enough to be successful.

column2: ELECTRONIC PRODUCT FOR ARRESTING THIEF, CAPABLE OF HELPING TO PREVENT CRIME AS CRIMINAL ARREST FUNCTION
column4:
PURPOSE: An electronic product for arresting a thief is provided to transmit a moving picture to a mobile phone by taking the thief with an automatic CCTV after the thief is anesthetized by firing an electronic tranquilizing bullet with a function of an artificial intelligence computer.
CONSTITUTION: An electronic product for arresting a thief includes a switch(9), an electronic sensor(2), an infrared sensor(3), a tranquilizing bullet firing device(4), an artificial intelligence computer chip(8), a control circuit(10), a transceiving unit(17), a CCTV transceiving unit(15), a telephone remote transceiving automatic device(13), a booby-trap(20), and an electronic shock device(19). The switch(9) is turned on and off in the electronic product(1). The electronic sensor(2) and the infrared sensor(3) are installed at one side of the switch to be operated by automatically recognizing the intrusion of a burglar. The artificial intelligence computer chip(8) transmits the recognition to a tranquilizing bullet firing device(4) as an electric signal. The transceiving unit(17) transmits a moving picture by recording the thief with a CCTV by installing a control circuit unit(10). The booby-trap device(20) and a mobile phone transceiving unit(16) are installed at one side of a CCTV transceiving unit(15). A net installer(6), a shooting unit(7) and an electronic sense are installed to inform the intrusion through a megaphone(11) and a bell when a thief trespasses. The telephone remote transceiving automatic device(13) and the electronic shock device(19) are installed on the electronic product(1) to arrest the thief. And, the electronic product(1) is made of a tourmarine material(18).
Â© KIPO 2006

The switch(9) is turned on and off in the bag(1). The electronic sensor(2) and the infrared sensor(3) are installed to be operated by automatically recognizing the intrusion of a burglar. column4:
PURPOSE: A digital robbery prevention device for arresting a thief is provided to transmit a moving picture to a mobile phone by taking the thief with an automatic CCTV after the thief is anesthetized by firing an electronic tranquilizing bullet with a function of an artificial intelligence computer installed on the digital robbery prevention device.
CONSTITUTION: A digital robbery prevention device for arresting a thief includes a switch(9), an electronic sensor(2), an infrared sensor(3), a tranquilizing bullet firing device(4), an artificial intelligence computer chip(8), a control circuit unit(10), a transceiving unit(17), a CCTV transceiving unit(15), a booby-trap(20), a mobile phone transceiving unit(16), a telephone remote transceiving automatic device(13), and an electronic shock device(19). The switch(9) is turned on and off in the burglar alarm device(1). The electronic sensor(2) and the infrared sensor(3) are installed to be operated by automatically recognizing the intrusion of a burglar. The artificial intelligence computer chip(8) transmits the recognition to a tranquilizing bullet firing device(4) as an electric signal. The transceiving unit(17) transmits a moving picture by recording the thief with a CCTV by installing the control circuit unit(10). The booby-trap device(20) and a mobile phone transceiving unit(16) are installed at one side of a CCTV transceiving unit(15). And, a net installer(6) and a shooting unit(7) are installed. An electronic sense(14) is installed to inform the intrusion through a megaphone(11) and a bell(12) when a thief trespasses. The telephone remote transceiving automatic device(13) and the electronic shock device(19) are installed on the bag(1) to arrest the thief. And, the digital robbery prevention device(1) is made of a tourmarine material(18).
Â© KIPO 2006

column2: DIGITAL VEHICLE FOR ARRESTING THIEF, CAPABLE OF HELPING TO PREVENT CRIME AS CRIMINAL ARREST FUNCTION
column4:
PURPOSE: A digital vehicle for arresting a thief is provided to transmit the photography to a mobile phone by photographing the thief with an automatic CCTV after the thief is anesthetized by firing an electronic tranquilizing bullet.
CONSTITUTION: A digital vehicle for arresting a thief includes a switch(9), an electronic sensor(2), an artificial intelligence computer chip(8), an infrared sensor(3), a transceiving unit(17), a booby-trap device(20), a telephone remote transceiving automatic device(13), and an electronic shock device(19). The switch(9) is turned on and off in the vehicle(1). The electronic sensor(2) and the infrared sensor(3) are installed to be operated by automatically recognizing the intrusion of a burglar. The artificial intelligence computer chip(8) transmits the recognition to a tranquilizing bullet firing device(4) with an electric signal. The transceiving unit(17) transmits a moving picture after recording the thief with a CCTV. The booby-trap device(20) is installed at one side of a CCTV transceiving unit(15). A mobile phone transceiver(16), net equipment(6), and a shooting unit(7) are installed. When a thief trespasses, an electronic sense(14) alerts through a megaphone(11) and a bell(12). The telephone remote transceiving automatic device(13) and the electronic shock device(19) are installed on the digital vehicle to arrest the thief. And, the digital vehicle is made of a tourmarine material(18).
Â© KIPO 2006

column2: SAFE FOR CAPTURE OF THIEVES FOR SHOOTING ANESTHETIC BULLETS BY AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE COMPUTER
column4:
PURPOSE: A safe for capture of thieves is provided to anesthetize thieves by shooting anesthetic bullets by an artificial intelligence computer in opening the safe, taking a picture about the thieves by a CCTV(Closed Circuit Television), and then transmitting the picture to a cellular phone.
CONSTITUTION: A safe(1) for capture of thieves is composed of a switch(9); an electronic sensor(2) and an infrared sensor(3) installed at the side of the switch and operated by automatically recognizing an invasion of the thieves; an artificial intelligence computer chip(8) and a control circuit unit(10) transmitting the result detected by the sensors to an anesthetic bullet shooter(4) as an electric signal; a booby trap(20); a transmitting and receiving unit(17), a CCTV transmitting and receiving unit(15), and a cellular phone transmitting and receiving unit(16) recoding the thieves by a CCTV and remotely transmitting the movie; a net device(6); a shooting part(7); a functional electronic sense(14) speaking the invasion of the thieves; a speaker(11) and a bell(12) warning users of the invasion of the thieves; an automatic telephone remote transmitting and receiving device(13); and an electronic shocking machine(19).
Â© KIPO 2006

The electronic sensor(2) and the infrared sensor(3) are installed at a side of the switch to be operated by automatically recognizing the intrusion of a burglar. The artificial intelligence computer chip(8) transmits the recognition to a tranquilizing bullet firing device(4) as an electric signal. The transceiving unit(17) transmits a moving picture by recording the thief with a CCTV by installing a control circuit unit(10). The CCTV transceiving unit(15), a mobile phone transceiving unit(16) and a net installer(6), a shooting unit(7) are installed. And, a megaphone(11) and a bell(12) inform the intrusion by installing an electronic sense(14) speaking and a booby-trap device(20) when a thief trespasses. The telephone remote transceiving automatic device(13) and the electronic shock device(19) are installed on the door(1) to arrest the thief. And, the door(1) is made of a tourmarine material(18).

column2: METHOD, SYSTEM AND COMPUTER PROGRAM FOR DEVELOPING CORTICAL ALGORITHMS
column4: A system, method and computer program for developing artificial intelligence through the generational evolution of one or more genomes. Each genome includes a set of functions. The method includes creating one or more cortices, operating the one or more cortices to perform one or more specified tasks, calculating a fitness score for each cortex based on its ability to perform the specified tasks, and selecting one or more of the cortices based on the respective fitness scores. Each cortex includes a plurality of cortical units. Each cortical unit includes a set of functions. Each cortical unit is created from the one or more genomes.

column2: HOME AUTOMATION DEVICE, ESPECIALLY CAPABLE OF CONTROLLING ALL HOME APPLIANCES AT HOME BY USING AN INTEGRATED-TYPE SET TOP BOX
column4:
PURPOSE: A home automation device is provided to integratedly control home appliances by using a set top box that remembers control signals of all of the home appliances, and to conduct reservation and automatic control functions on the home appliances by using an artificial intelligence function of the set top box.
CONSTITUTION: An integrated controller(2) comprises as follows. A remote control signal receiver receives a signal of a remote controller(12). A CPU(Central Processing Unit) executes a home appliance control menu corresponding to an output signal of the receiver to generate a control signal. A video output unit generates a video signal corresponding to the control menu. A memory stores control programs corresponding to plural home appliances(6,8,10) and reserved contents. A modem transceives a remote control signal through a telephone line to output the transceived signal to the CPU. The integrated controller(2) recognizes the remote control signal received from the remote control signal receiver and the remote control signal received through the telephone line, and generates a control signal. Plural relay units(4) relay the control signal to the plural home appliances(6,8,10). The remote controller(12) generates the remote control signal for driving the controller(2). A telephone(14) sends the control signal for driving the controller(2) through the telephone line.
Â© KIPO 2006

column2: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DEVELOPING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: In a method and system for developing a neural system adapted to perform a specified task, a population of neural systems is selected, each neural system comprising an array of interconnected neurons, and each neural system is encoded into a representative genome. For a given genome, a processing gene encodes a neural output function for each neuron, and the connections from each neuron are encoded by one or more connection genes, each connection gene including a weight function. The given neural system is operated to perform the specified task during a trial period, and performance is continually monitored during the trial period. Reinforcement signals determined from the continually monitored performance are applied as inputs to the functions respectively associated with each of the processing genes and connection genes of the given neural system. At the conclusion of a trial period, the fitness of the given neural system for performing the specified task is determined, usefully as a function of the reinforcement signals applied during the trial periof. A set of genomes, respectively representing the neural systems of the population that have been determined to have the highest finjess values, are selected for use in forming a new generation of neural systems.

column2: SYSTEM DESIGN USING ARTIFICAL INTELLIGENCE
column4: A technique for system design using artificial intelligence. System components to be incorporated into the design are selected from a larger set of available components using a genetic algorithm. Values assigned (e.g., by a user) to attributes for the design may be incorporated into a fitness function. Accordingly, the fitness function is adaptive in that it differs for each different set of desired attribute values. Individual designs are selected from a population according to their fitness, as determined ny applying the fitness function. Multiple generations of the genetic algorithm may be performed therby refining the population of possible designs. An individual design may be selected from the population when a pre-determined number of generations have been formed and/or when generation-to-generation improvements in fitness values diminish.

column2: HUMAN POWER CONVERSION SYSTEM BASED ON VIDEO GAME PLAY WITH EXERCISE BICYCLE
column4: The invention is based on the use of pneumatic systems for the conversion of human power of children's play. The energy of the compressed air can then be converted to electricity for purposes such as lighting and communication. This provides a low-cost, low-resource means of generation of electricity, especially for use in developing countries. This embodiment is an extension of the invention by generating electricity from the pedaling action of an exercise bicycle while playing a video game and includes the use of a stationery exercise bicycle, a video gaming system, a monitor, a game controller including buttons/joystick on the bicycle, electromechanical and biomedical sensors, an artificial intelligence-based pre-processor for signals from the controller, and a pneumatic or electromechanical energy conversion device for producing electricity. The electricity produced can be used to quantify the play or exercise involved, and to provide incentives to encourage sustained play or exercise.

column2: WIDE AREA REAL-TIME SOFTWARE ENVIRONMENT
column4: A system for the remote monitoring or modification, whether temporary or permanent, of a running application's attributes. These attributes include, for example, art, sound, music, text, environmental variables or artificial intelligence parameters, program source code, program pseudo code, program compiled code or any other computerized attributes. The application is enabled so that there is the ability to dynamically monitor an application's internal data, components and functionality via a remote station and/or dynamically save application usage data while that application is executing. Further, this program has the ability to temporarily or permanently change internal settings and attributes of the application and add extra functionality to the application. If charges or added functionality are permanent, they can be used when the application is executed.

column2: PERSONALIZED BEHAVIOR OF COMPUTER CONTROLLED AVATARS IN A VIRTUAL REALITY ENVIRONMENT
column4: Racing-based computer games typically include a mode in which one or more human players can compete against one or more computer-controlled opponents. For example, a human player may drive a virtual race car against a computer-controlled virtual race car purported to be driven by Mario Andretti or some other race car driver. Such computer controlled opponents may be enhanced by including a sampling of actual game behavior of a human subject into the opponent's artificial intelligence control system. Such a sampling can allow the game system to personalize the behavior of the computer control opponent to emulate the human subject.

column2: PERSONALIZED BEHAVIOR OF COMPUTER CONTROLLED AVATARS IN A VIRTUAL REALITY ENVIRONMENT
column4: Racing-based computer games typically include a mode in which one or more human players can compete against one or more computer-controlled opponents. For example, a human player may drive a virtual race car against a computer-controlled virtual race car purported to be driven by Mario Andretti or some other race car driver. Such computer controlled opponents may be enhanced by including a sampling of actual game behavior of a human subject into the opponent's artificial intelligence control system. Such a sampling can allow the game system to personalize the behavior of the computer control opponent to emulate the human subject.

column2: MODIFIED MOTION CONTROL FOR A VIRTUAL REALITY ENVIRONMENT
column4: In a virtual reality environment, the behavior of the computer-controlled virtual vehicle may be made more human-like by increasing the AI driver's reaction time to environmental stimuli, such as physical stimuli (e.g., detecting a loss of tire traction, audio warning signals, smoke, virtual fatigue, weather changes, etc.) or ?œvisual??stimuli (e.g., virtual visual detection by the computer driver of a turn or obstacle in its path, ambient lighting differences, etc.). Reaction time may be increased by introducing a delay in receipt of stimuli by the artificial intelligence motion control system, by introducing a delay in receipt of control signals by the physics engine, or by modifying the control signal to degrade their accuracy in approximating a prescribed racing line.

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TYPE CROSSING CONTROL SYSTEM CAPABLE OF PERFORMING ALARM AND BLOCKING FUNCTIONS REGARDLESS OF RAILROAD CAR TRAVEL DIRECTION
column4:
PURPOSE: An artificial intelligence type crossing control system is provided to prevent accidents by performing alarm and blocking functions regardless of railroad car travel direction.
CONSTITUTION: An artificial intelligence type crossing control system comprises a tool box including an output relay(110), an input relay, and a terminal block; a power unit for preventing an over current, and performing a voltage and current charging function, wherein the power unit includes a rectifier, an insulation transformer, a safety member, and a battery; a control unit(300) including a CPU card, an input/output card, a communication board, and a power card; an alarm control unit(400) including an alarm lamp and bell card, a horn speaker card and a voice card, an obstacle alarm card, a failure detection card, and a failure transmitting card; a detection unit(500) including a CPU card, a FTM card, a power card, an obstacle detection card, and a camera; and a display unit including an input card, a power card, and a display panel.
Â© KIPO 2005

column2: HIGHLY ADVANCED HIGH-TECH DIGITAL VEHICLE
column4:
PURPOSE: A highly advanced high-tech digital vehicle is provided to monitor and apprehend an invader by using an artificial intelligence computer.
CONSTITUTION: A computer(23) includes an artificial intelligence processor and a chip in order to control a control circuit(10), a power supply(9), a switch(9'), and a CCTV transceiver(15). An electromagnetic induction device(2) and an infrared sensor(3) are used for sensing an invader and transmitting a sensed signal to the control circuit. A CCTV camera(15") is installed at a hallway. The CCTV camera transmits motion pictures and pictures to a control center of a police office and a cellular phone by using a remote transceiver(13). An anesthesia bullet is shoot from a tranquilizer gun(4) to a target(5) by using sensors(2,3). A net shooting device(6) is installed at one side of a door. An artificial intelligence computer(8) controls the net shooting device and the tranquilizer gun.
Â© KIPO 2004

column2: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXERCISE TREADMILL
column4:
PURPOSE: Provided is an artificial intelligence exercise treadmill to simulate a realistic exercising environment with a variety of features, including a video monitor or a headphone set, making walking or running more interesting.
CONSTITUTION: The artificial intelligence exercise treadmill comprises: a control module; a display unit; a computer unit; and a driving mechanism(20). The control module controls image data input by a user to be displayed on the display unit and controls driving information synchronized with the image data to be output to the driving mechanism(20). The display unit includes multiple switches as means for inputting user's commands and displays the image data supplied from the control module. The computer unit stores various kinds of image and sound data and provides the image data and driving information to the control module. The driving mechanism(20) receives the driving information and drives a treadmill belt based on the received driving information. An oxygen supplying device is optionally provided for a better cardiopulmonary function.
Â© KIPO 2004

column2: METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING GOAL POST WITH DIGITAL IC COMPUTER CHIP
column4:
PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing a goal post with a digital integrated circuit computer chip is provided to endow the goal post with various new functions in a digital manner, thus maximizing the interest of a football game.
CONSTITUTION: Inside a transparent golf post(1) are mounted with an artificial intelligence computer chip(9), an infrared detector(2) and a measuring device(4) for measuring the numbers of goals, an electric panel(28), a control box(17), a firecracker device(15), a speaker, a melody chip(5), a perfume sensor(6), a perfume generator(7), a perfume reservoir(8), a speaker plug(14), a battery box(13), and other various functional units.
Â© KIPO 2004

column2: ENGINE SYSTEM FOR FUEL SAVING
column4:
PURPOSE: An engine system for fuel saving is provided to reduce the necessity on a clutch and to control a clutch pedal by using artificial intelligence clutch controlling and to prevent incomplete combustion by injecting fuel while a crank shaft rotates.
CONSTITUTION: An engine system comprises a sensor unit including a pedal position sensor, a driver action sensor, an outer obstacle sensor, a shock sensor, a crank angle sensor, a speed sensor, a navigation system, a humidity sensor and a stick sensor, a fuel injection control unit, an artificial intelligence clutch control unit and an automatic transmission enabling skip cycling, a clutch control unit connected with an electric motor and a torque converter, an ECU(Electronic Control Unit) and a battery connection control unit using a voltage measuring unit and a battery residual amount measuring unit, an ECU and a connection control unit connecting an alternator with an engine, and a dehumidifier consisting of an atmospheric pressure control part and a cooling part.
Â© KIPO 2003

column2: PLANNING SYSTEM FOR BROADBAND MULTI-SERVICE CONNECTIONS
column4: A syntactical representation is used to generate data describing a hierarchical broadband network and relationships between it elements. The format of the syntactical representation resembles logic programming language clauses. The syntactical representation is used to specify a broadband connection problem to be solved. Data describing physical resources and functionality of a set of network elements is entered into an inference engine which applies an algorithm to its input in order to find a solution to a specified connections planning problem. The algorithm is recursive and uses artificial intelligence techniques; such as, first fail hierarchical planning and hill-climbing to guide the inference engine's search for a solution.
